Omiyo kik uluor. Abiro ritou uduto kod jouteu. " Kamano e kaka nokueyo chunygi gi wechemamit. Tho mar Josef
Josef nomedo dak Misri gi joodgi.  Nodak kuom higni mia achiel gapar,
moneno nyithi Efraim gi nyikwaye.  Noneno bende nyithind Makir wuodManase, mi nokwanogi ka nyithinde.
Achien Josef nowacho ni owetene niya, "An koro achiegni tho, toNyasaye biro ritou, kendo golou e pinyni, moteru e piny mane osingore ninomi Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo. "
Bang’ mano nomiyo yawuot Israelokuong’ore kowachonigi niya, "Kuong’reuru ni ndalo ma Nyasaye nokonyue,mi ua ka, to nyaka ukaw chokena udhigo. "
Josef notho ka en ja-hignimia achiel gapar.  Ne giwiro ringre gi yath mondo kik otow, mi gikete esanduk e piny Misri kuno. Wuok
Thagruok jo-Israel e piny Misri
Jo-Israel ma nodhi Misri gi Jakobo, moro ka moro gi joode, e magi:
Reuben gi Simeon gi Lawi gi Juda
gi Isakar gi Zebulun gi Benjamin
giDan gi Naftali gi Gad kod Asher.
Kar romb joka Jakobogo duto noromopiero abiriyo.  (Josef to noyudo ka ni Misri. )
Bang’e achien, Josef gi owetene kod tieng’no duto notho.
To jo-Israelnonywolo nyithindo mang’eny, mi ginya ahinya, kendo ne gipong’o piny,nyaka ne gibedo oganda maratego.
Koro ruoth manyien mane ok ong’eyo wach Josef nochako tich e Misri.
Nowacho ni joge niya, "Neuru! Jo-Israel osedoko oganda maduong’ kendomaratego, ma koro nyalo loyowa.
Nyaka watang’, mondo watamgi kikginya, nimar kapo ni lweny owuok, to kamoro ginyalo dok ni wasikwa,mondo giked kodwa, mi giring gia e pinywa. "
Kuom mano, jo-Misri noketojo-Israel e tij athwon, ka nyipeche ritogi mondo giti matek, eka gibedmoboch.  Mano e kaka ne gigero ni Farao miech keno miluongo ni Pithom giRameses.
To kaka nomed sandogi e kaka ne gimedo bedo mang’eny kendogilandore, nyaka jo-Misri nodoko mosin kodgi, kendo oluorogi.
Kuommano ne gibembo wasumbgi ma jo-Israel gi tich mapek,
ka gimiyo ngimagidoko matek gi tije achune mag nyono lowo, gi loso matafari, kod tijeduto mag pur.
Bang’e ruodh Misri nowacho ni mond Hibrania ariyo ma jocholo, miluongoni Shifra gi Pua, niya,
"Ka ucholo mond jo-Hibrania, mi uneno ka dhakomoro onywolo nyathi ma wuowi, to neguru nyathino.  To ka en nyathi manyako, to kik unege. "
To jocholo noluoro Nyasaye, omiyo ne gichayochik ruoth, mi ne ok ginego nyithindo machwo.
Ruodh Misri noluongojochologo, mopenjogi gimomiyo giweyo nyithindo machwo, mak ginego.
Negidwoke niya, "Mond jo-Hibrania ok chal gi mond jo-Misri.  Gin muchgithoth, omiyon ginywolo nyithindo piyopiyo, kapok jacholo ochopo irgi. "
Kuom mano Nyasaye noguedho jochologo, kendo jo-Israel nomedo nya,modoko oganda maratego ahinya.
Nyasaye nomiyo jocholo obedo ginyithindo kod nyikwayo nikech ne giluore.
Bang’e Farao nochiko joge duto niya, "Nyithindo ma chwo duto majo-Hibrania onywolo, mondo uwit e aora Nael, to nyiri uwe odongi. "Wuok
Nywol mar Musa, kendo kaka notony
Jalawi moro nokendo nyar dhoodgi,
mi chiegeno nomako ich, monywolonyathi ma wuowi.  Ka noneno ni en nyathi ma jaber, nopande kuom duecheadek.
To kane koro ok onyal medo pande, nokawo adita mochwe gi togo, miomwono gi lop chwech kod odok, mondo kik chwer.  Nopielo nyathi eiaditano, eka nokete ei togo e bath aora Nael.
To nyamin nyathinonochung’ gi chien matin mondo one ane gima nyalo timorene.
Eka nyar Farao nobiro mondo olwokre kanyo, ka jotichne manyiri towuotho e geng aora.  Nopo koneno adita ka ni ei togo, mooro misumbanemanyako moro mondo odhi oome.
Kane osekelnego, noele, moyudo nyathi mawuowi eiye ka ywak.  Nokeche, mowacho niya, "Nyaka bed ni en achiel kuomnyithind jo-Hibrania. "
Kane nyamin nyathi owinjo kamano, nopenje niya,"Adhi aluongni chi ja-Hibrania moro mondo odhodhni nyathino?"
Nyarfarao nodwoke ni, "Tim kamano. " Mi nyano nodhi moluongo mana minnyathino.
Kane dhakono obiro, nyar Farao nowachone niya, "Kaw nyathini,ipidhna, kendo abiro chuli kuom timo kamano. " Mi dhakono nokawe,mopidhe.
Kane oseweyo dhoth, notere ir nyar Farao, ma koro nokawe kamare.  Nowacho niya, "Ne agole e pi. " Emomiyo nochake ni Musa (tiende nimogol. )Musa oringo odhi e piny Midian
Chieng’ moro kane Musa osedoko ng’at maduong’, nodhi mondo onejo-Israel wetene, moneno kaka ichunogi gi tich matek.  To bende noneno kaja-Misri moro goyo achiel kuom jo-Hibrania wetene.
Nong’iyo koni gikoni, to kane ok oneno ng’ato, nonego ja-Misrino, mopando ringre eikuoyo.
Kinyne nodok, moneno jo-Hibrania ariyo kagore.  Nokwero jal maneokwinyo wadgi niya, "Mar ang’o igoyo wadu?"
Jalo nodwoke ni, "Ng’anomoketi jatendwa kata jang’adnwa bura? Koso idwaro nega kaka ninegoja-Misri cha?" Kane Musa owinjo kamano, kibaji nogoye, koparo ni,"Adier, kara nyaka bed ni wachni oseng’ere!"
Farao nowinjo gimanotimore, motemo mondo oneg Musa, to Musa noringo mondo odhi odag e pinyMidian.  Kane ochopo e pinyno, nobet e dho soko moro.
Noyudo ka jadolo mar Midian nigi nyiri abiriyo.  Nyigo nobiro umbo pi,mi giolo e mberni ma jamni modhoe, mondo jamb wuon-gi omodhi.
Jokwathmoko nobiro mondo oriembgi, to Musa nokonyogi, kendo omodhonigi jambgi.
Kane nyigo odok ir Reuel wuon-gi, nopenjogi niya, "Ang’o momiyo uduogochon kawuono?"
Ne gidwoke ni, "Ja-Misri moro noresowa ka jokwath mokothagowa, bende en ema nende omiyo jambwa pi. "
Reuel nopenjo nyige ni,"En kanye? Mar ang’o uweye kuno? Dhiuru uluonge obi ochiem kodwa. "
Musa noneno ni ber mondo odag gi ng’atno, mi Reuel nomiye nyare maZipora, mokendo.
Zipora nonywolo ni Musa wuowi, mi Musa nochako niGershom, (tiende ni jadak ka).  Nochake kamano nikech noneno ni osedokojadak e piny ma ok margi.
Bang’e achien, ruodh Misri notho, to jo-Israel ne pod ng’ur malichkuom bedo wasumbini, kendo ne giywak malit mondo ogolgi e thagruok makamano.  Ywakgino notundo ni Nyasaye
kendo nowinjo ng’urgi, mi noparosingruok mane otimo gi Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo.
Noneno kakajo-Israel thagore, mi wachno nodonjone malit!Wuok
Nyasaye oluongo Musa
Chieng’ moro Musa ne kwayo jamb Jethro jaduong’ne, ma jadolo marMidian.  Nong’ado thim gi jamni nyaka Horeb god Nyasaye.
Malaika marNyasaye nofwenyorene kanyo e ligek mach maliel e chuny bungu moro.  Musanorange, moneno ni bungu liel aliela to ok wang’,
mi nowacho niya,"Nyaka adhi machiegni mondo ane ane hono maduong’ni.  Ang’o momiyo bunguliel aliela to ok wang’?"
To kane Ruoth Nyasaye oneno kosudo machiegni,noluonge gie chuny bungu niya, "Musa! Musa!" Musa to nodwoke ni, "Anka. "
Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Kik imed sudo machiegni, to lonywuocheni, nikech kama ichung’ieno en kama ler. "
Eka nomedo wacho niya,"An Nyasach kwereni ma Nyasach Ibrahim gi Nyasach Isaka kod NyasachJakobo. " Mi Musa noumo wang’e, nikech noluoro ng’iyo wang’ Nyasaye.
Bang’e, Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Aseneno ratiro kaka joga thagore epiny Misri.  Asewinjo ywakgi, ka gikwayo ni mondo oresgi gia e lwet jomachunogi gi tich matekno.  Adier ang’eyo chandruokgi.
Omiyo aselor mondoaresgi e lwet jo-Misri, kendo agolgi e pinyno mondo atergi e piny maberkendo malach.  En piny momew, kendo machiek, ma koro jo-Kanaan gi jo-Hitigi jo-Amor gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus ema odakie.
Asewinjoywak jo-Israel, kendo aneno kaka jo-Misri thirogi malit.
Omiyo koroabiro ori ir Farao mondo igol joga ma jo-Israel oa e piny Misri. "
Musa to nowacho ni Nyasaye niya, "An to an ng’a, ma dadhi ir Faraokendo agol jo-Israel e piny Misri?"
Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Anabedkodi, kendo kisegolo ji Misri, to unulama e godni.  Mano nobed ranyisi nian ema aseori. "
Musa nowacho ni Nyasaye niya, "To ka adhi ir jo-Israel, mawachonigini Nyasach kweregi oseora, gibiro penja ni, ‘Nyinge ng’a?’ An tonadwokgi ang’o?"
Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "AN MANTIE e nyinga. "Eka nomedo wacho niya, "Ma e gima mondo iwach ni jo-Israel: ‘AN MANTIEoseora iru. ’ "
Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa niya, "Nyaka iwach nijo-Israel kama: ‘Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu, ma Nyasach Ibrahim, giIsaka kod Jakobo, oseora iru. ’ Ma e nyinga ma nyaka chieng’, kendo matienge mabiro duto noluongago.
Dhiyo mondo ichok jodong Israelkanyakla, kendo mondo iwachnigi ni Nyasach kweregi, ma Nyasach Ibrahimgi Isaka kod Jakobo osefwenyoreni, mochiki mondo iwachnigi niya,‘Asebiro iru, kendo aseneno gima jo-Misri timonu.
Koro aseng’ado wachni nyaka agolu e piny Misri kuma isandoue, mi ateru e piny ma jo-Kanaangi jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebuz odakie.  Enpiny momew kendo machiek. ’
Kamano jo-Israel biro winjo gima iwacho. Bang’e nyaka udhi gi jodong Israel ir ruodh Misri, kendo uwachne niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania, oseromp kodwa.  Omiyo koro yie iwewadhi e thim kuom wuodh ndalo adek, mondo watim misango ni Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachwa. ’
Chutho to, ang’eyo ni ruodh Misrim ok nowe udhi, makmana kochune.
To abiro tiyo gi tekona, mi nasand Misri gi honni dutoma natim kuno.  Eka bang’e noyienu mondo udhi.
"Anami jo-Misri geno jogi, mi ka uwuok to ok unudhi gi lwetu nono.
Dhako ka dhako nodwar gik moko mag fedha kod dhahabu, kaachiel gilewni kuom jagweng’gi, kendo kuom dhako moro amora modak kode e ode. Unurwak nyithindu gi gigo, kendo mano e kaka unuyak jo-Misri. "Wuok
Musa nodwoko Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Ok gibi yie kata winjo gima awacho,to gibiro mana wachona ni, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok ofwenyoreni. ’ To koroabiro timo ang’o?"
Ruoth Nyasaye nopenje niya, "Mano ang’o miting’o elwetino?" Nodwoke ni, "En luth. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya,"Bole piny. " To kane Musa obole piny, nolokore thuol, mi Musa oringe.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Make gi iwe!" Musa nomakematek, mi olokore luth e lwete.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Timkamano mondo onyis jo-Israel ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi, maNyasach Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo osefwenyoreni. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa kendo niya, "So lweti e lawi. " Notimokamano, to kane ogolo lweteno oko, nonwang’o kotimo dhoho, kendo olokorerachar ka pe.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone ni, "So lweti e lawi kendo. "Mi notimo kamano, to kane ochako ogole oko nonwang’o kochango modokomangima mana kaka dende duto.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Kagitamore yie gi wecheni, kata ka ranyisi mokwongo ok omiyo giyie, toranyisi mar ariyoni nomigi yie.
To kapo ni ok giyie gi ranyisi ariyogi,kata winjo gima iwacho, to mondo itwom pi e aora Nael, ipuk piny.  Kitimokamano, to pigno nolokre remo. "
Musa nowacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Ruoth kiyie; ok an ng’at mong’eyowuoyo e nyim ji, kata mana sani, ma koro isewuoyo kodani, pod an manakamano.  Lewa pek, kendo aywayo wach. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya,"En ng’a ma chueyo dho dhano, kata en ng’a ma miyo dhano doko momo, katama ite odino? En ng’a mamiye wang’ mabith, kata loke muofu? Donge anRuoth Nyasaye ema atimo gigi duto?
Emomiyo koro dhiyo! Anakonyi wuoyo,kendo ananyisi gima onego iwachi. "
To Musa ne pod odagi, ka kweroRuoth Nyasaye niya, "Ruoth, kiyie to or ng’at moro nono mihero. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho gi Musa, mowachone niya, "Harun owadu ma ja-Lawidonge nitie? En to ang’eyo ni onyalo wuoyo maber.  Ero en e yo, obiroiri, kendo obiro bedo mamor ahinya koneni.
En aema iwuo kode, kinyisegima onego owachi.  Abiro konyou wuoyo, kendo nyisou gima onego utim.
Harun biro wuoyo gi ji kari, nimar en ema nobedni ka dhogi, to in emanibedne ka Nyasaye, kinyise gima onego owachi.
Kaw ludhini, nikech enema ibiro timo kode honni. "Musa odok Misri
Musa nodhi ir Jethro jaduong’ne mowachone niya, "Yie mondo adog Misriir jowetena, mondo ane ka pod gingima. " Jethro nowachone niya, "Ber, dhigi kue. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa e piny Midian niya, "Koro dog Misri,nikech jogo duto ma nyocha dwaro negi osetho. "
Mi Musa nokawo chiegegi nyithinde, kendo noketogi e kanyna, modok Misri, koting’o luth maneNyasaye omiye.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Koro ero idokMisri, to nyaka ine ni itimo honni ma asemiyi teko ni mondo itim, e nyimFarao.  To abiro miyo chunye doko matek, mi ok nowe jo-Israel thuolomondo oa.
To nyaka inyise ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘Israel enwuoda makayo.
Nawachoni ni mondo iwe wuoda odhi olama, to nidagi,omiyo koro abiro nego wuodi makayo. ’ "
Ka ne Musa pod ni e yo, Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi ire kama nobworoe, mondoonege.
To Zipora nokawo kidi mabith, mong’adogo wuode nyangu ekanomulo Musa gi pien ma nong’adono, kowachone niya, "In chwora mar remo. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye noweyo Musa.  Ter nyanguno ema nomiyo Zipora owachoni, "In chwora mar remo. "
E ndalogo Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Harun niya, "Dhiyo e thim mondoirom ni Musa. " Nodhi moromo kode e god Nyasaye, kendo nonyodhe.
Musanonyiso Harun weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiye mondo odhi owachi, kodhonni mane onego odhi otim.
Eka Musa kod Harun ne jodhi, mochokojodong Israel kanyakla.
Harun nonyisogi weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasayeowacho ni Musa, kendo notimo honnigo duto e nyimgi,
mi ne giyie nikara Ruoth Nyasaye oseoro Musa adier.  Bende kane giwinjo ni RuothNyasaye oselimo jo-Israel, moneno chandruokgi, ne gikulore, mi gilame. Wuok
Musa gi Harun odhi ir Farao
Bang’e, Musa kod Harun nodhi ir Farao, mowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach jo-Israel owacho kama: ‘We joga odhi, mondo otimna sawo ethim. ’ "
To Farao nodwokogi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye to en ng’a, ma dawinjwachne, mi awe jo-Israel dhi? Akia Ruoth Nyasaye, bende ok nawejo-Israel odhi!"
Ne giwachone niya, "Nyasach jo-Hibrania oseromo kodwa. Omiyo, yie iwe wadhi e wuodh ndalo adek e thim, mondo watim misango niruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, nono to obiro kelonwa tho, kata lweny maditiekwa. "
Farao, ruodh Misri nodwoko Musa gi Harun niya, "Marang’oumono ji tiyo tijegi? Doguru e tiju wasumbnigi!"
Eka nomedo wacho niya,"Jou koro ng’eny moloyo jo-Misri to eka pod udwaro mana ni mondo giwetich!"
Odiechieng’no, Farao nochiko jo-Misri ma jorit wasumbni kod jo-Israelma nyipeche niya,
"Kik uchak umi jo-Israel tiang’ ma gilosogo matafari,kaka usebedo ka utimo, to weuru gidhi giom tiang’ giwegi.
To nyaka uneni giloso matafari ma kwan-gi romre gi mago ma gisebedo ka giloso.  Kikuwe kwanno dog chien! Gin jonyawo, emomiyo gigoyo koko ni mondo gidhigitim misango ni Nyasachgi.
Mednigiuru tich matek, mondo gibed modich,kendo giwe chiko itgi e weche manono. "
Jo-rit nowuok kaachiei gi nyipeche, mowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Faraoosewacho ni ok obi medo miyou tiang’.
To ni nyaka udhi udwar tiang’uwegi kamoro amora moyudoree.  To bende nyaka ulos matafari ma kwan-giromre gi mago muloso pile. "
Omiyo ji noke e piny Misri duto, ka dwarotiang’.
Jorit ne rungogi kawacho niya, "Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ nyakautiek tich momiu, mana kaka nutimo e ndalo mane imiyoue tiang’. "
Jodong Farao nogoyo jo-Israel mane giketo nyipeche, ka gipenjogi niya,"Ang’o momiyo kawuono ok ulos matafari marom gi mago ma yande uloso?"
Nyipeche ma jo-Israel notero ywakgi ni Farao ka giwachonigi niya,"Ruoth, ere gimomiyo itimonwa kama?
Tiang’ koro pok miwa, to eka podichunowa ni mondo walos matafari, goch bende igoyowa, to jogi iwuon emaketho. "
To Farao nodwokogi niya, "Un jonyawo ahinya! Mano emomiyoukwaya ni mondo aweu udhi utim misango ni Nyasachu.
Koro doguru etiju! Ok bi miu tiang’ to nyaka ulos mana kar kwan matafari moketnu!"
Kane nyipeche jo-Israel owinjo ni nyaka gilos matafari ma kwan-giromre mana gi mago ma gisebedo ka giloso, ne gineno ni kara gin echandruok.
Ne gia ir Farao mi giromo gi Musa kod Harun ma noyudoritogi,
mi giwachonigi niya, "Nyasaye mondo one gima usetimo, kendookumu kuom miyo Farao gi jodonge bedo mamon kodwa.  Useketo ligangla elwetgi mondo ginegwago!"Musa olemo
Musa nodok ir Ruoth Nyasaye, mowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, ang’omomiyo isando jogi? Koro niora nang’o?
Chakre kinde ma nabiroe irFarao ma awuoyo e nyingi, osemana bedo kosando jogi, to in pok itimoegimoro mondo iresgi. "Wuok
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Koro ibiro neno gima abiro timo niFarao.  Abiro chune mondo owe jo-Israel odhi.  Adier abiro chune ni nyakaoriembgi e pinye. "Ruoth Nyasaye oluongo Musa kendo
Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa, mowachone niya, "An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nafwenyora ni Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo ka Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto, to ne ok aweyo ging’eya gi nyinga mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Bende natimokodgi singruok, kawachonigi ni namigi piny Kanaan, mane ginie jodak.
Koro asewinjo ywak jo-Israel ma jo-Misri oseloko wasumbni, mi aseparosingruok mane atimono.
Omiyo koro nyaka iwachni jo-Israel kama: ‘An eRuoth Nyasaye, abiro golou e tije mapek ma jo-Misri oketo kuomu, kendoabiro resou e tij bedo wasumbni magi.  Narie bada mang’ongo kuomgi,kakumogi malit mondo owaru.
Anakawu ka joga awuon, kendo anabedNyasachu, mi unung’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma golou e tijjo-Misri mapek michunou mondo uti.
Anateru e piny mane asingora ni namiIbrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo, kendo anamiugo mondo obed maru, an e RuothNyasaye. ’ "
Musa noluwo ni jo-Israel wechegi, to ne ok gidewe, nimarchunygi nool nikech tich matek mar bedo wasumbni.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Dhi nyis Farao ruodh Misrini nyaka owe jo-Israel oa e pinye. "
To Musa nodwoko Ruoth Nyasaye ni,"Ka jo-Israel ema ok nyal winja, Farao to diwinja nadi, an ng’at maywayowachni?"
To Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa gi Harun ni gidhi ginyisjo-Israel kaachiel gi Farao ruodh Misri ni Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyogi tichmar golo jo-Israel e piny Misri. Anywola joka Musa gi joka Harun
Jodong dhoud Israel e magi:Yawuot Reuben ma kach Israel ne gin Hanok gi Palu gi Hezron kod Karmi. Mago e jo-Reuben.
Yawuot Simeon ne gin Jemuel gi Jamin gi Ohad gi Jakin gi Zohar kodShaul wuod dhako ma nyar Kanaan.  Mago e jo-Simeon.
To magi e nying yawuot Lawi kaachiel gi nyikwagi: Gershon gi Kohathkod Merari.  Lawi nodak higni mia achiel gi piero adek gabiriyo.
Joka Gershon ne gin dhout Libni gi Shimei.
Yawuot Kohath ne gin Amram gi Izhar gi Hebron kod Uziel.  Kohar nodakhigni mia achiel gi piero adek gadek.
Yawuot Merari ne gin Mali kod Mushi.  Mago e dhout jo-Lawi gi nyikwagi.
Amram nokendo Jokebed nyamin wuon mare, ma nonywolone Harun gi Musa. Amram nodak higni mia achiel gi piero adek gabiriyo.
Yawuot Izhar ne gin Kora gi Nefeg kod Zikri.
To yawuot Uziel ne ginMishael gi Elzafan kod Sithri.
Harun nokendo Elisheba nyar Aminadab ma nyamin Nashon, monywologoNadab gi Abihu gi Eliezar kod Ithamar.
Yawuot Kora ne gi Asir gi Elkana kod Abiasaf.  Mago e dhout joka Kora.
Eliezar wuod Harun nokendo achiel kuom nyi Putiel, ma nonywoloneFinehas. Mago e jodong dhout jo-Lawi.
Ma e Harun nogo, kaachiel gi Musa, mane Ruoth Nysaye owachonigi niya,"Goluru jo-Israel e piny Misri kochan-gi e dhoutgi. "
Musa gi Harungogo ema nowacho ni Farao ruodh Misri ni mondo owe jo-Israel oa Misri. Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa kod Harun
Kane Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo gi Musa e piny Misri,
nowachone niya, "Ane Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nyis Farao ruodh Misri weche duto ma abiro wachoni. "
To Musa nodwoko Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Ing’eyo ni an ng’at maywayo wach,to ere kaka Farao diwinj wachna?"Wuok
To Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Koro ng’e ni aseketi ka Nyasayeni Farao, kendo Harun owadu nowuo kari.
Ininyis Harun owadu weche dutoma abiro chiki mondo iwachi, to en ema nowach ni Farao ni mondo owejo-Israel oa e pinye.
To anami chuny Farao doko matek, kendo named timoranyisina kod honni maga.
To kata kamano Farao ok nowinju.  Omiyoanasand Misri gi timbe madongo kakumo jo-Misri malich, mi nagol joga majo-Israel e Misri, kochan-gi e dhoutgi.
Kamano jo-Misri nong’e ni an eRuoth Nyasaye, katimonigi timbe madongo, kendo kagolo jo-Israel kuomgi. "
Kuom mano Musa gi Harun notimo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochikogi.
Ekinde mane giwuoyoe gi Farao, Musa ne jahigni piero aboro, to Harun nejahigni piero aboro gadek. Ludh Harun
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
"Kapo ni Farao owachonuni mondo utimne ranyisi moro, to in Musa mondo iwachni Harun kama: ‘Bolludhi piny e nyim Farao mondo olokre thuol. ’ "
Kane Musa kod Harunjobiro ir Farao, ne gitimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochikogi, Harun nobololudhe piny e nyim Farao gi joge, mi ludhno nolokore thuol.
Kane Faraooneno kamano, noluongo ji mariek kod ajuoke, kendo ajuoke mag Misrigobende notimo mana hono machal kamano gi bindgi.
Ng’ato ka ng’atonobolo ludhe piny, kendo luth ka luth nolokore thuol, to ludh Harunnomwonyo ludhegi.
To Farao ne wiye tek mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosenyiso, mo nodagi winjo weche Musa gi Harun. Masich Remo
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Farao wiye tek, kendo odagi weyojo-Israel mondo oa.
Dhiyo ire gokinyi, kodhi e aora Nael, mi irite edho aora, kiting’o luth mane olokore thuolcha.
Nyis Farao kama: ‘RuothNysaye ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania ne oora mondo anyisi ni, we joge oa mondoodhi olame e thim.  To nyaka chil kawuono pok isetimo kamano.
Omiyokoro Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni ibiro ng’eyo ni en e Ruoth Nyasaye kuom gikma obiro timo.  Abiro chwado pi aora gi luth ma ating’oni mi pi birolokore remo.
Rech biro tho, kendo aora biro bedo mang’ue marach, mijo-Misri ok noyud kaka modho pi aorani. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Nyis Harun kama: ‘Rie ludhi e wipige duto man Misri, kaka aore madongo gi matindo, kod yewni gi sokni. ’Pi biro lokore remo, kendo piny duto nopong’ gi remo, koda ka dapige magyien mopa, koda mag kite. "
Musa gi Harun ne jotimo kaka Ruoth Nyasayenochikogi.  Harun noting’o ludhe malo e nyim Farao gi jodonge, kendonochwado pi aora Nael, mi pi duto nolokore remo.
Rech notho, kendoaora nodoko mang’ue marach, mi jo-Misri ne ok nyal modho pi aorano.  PinyMisri duto nopong’ gi remo.
To bang’e ajuoke mag Misri bende notimohono mana machal kamano gi bindgi, mi wi Farao nosiko matek kaka chon. Notamore winjo wach Musa gi Harun mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosenyiso,
kendo noa modok e ode ka ok odewo wachgi.
Jo-Misri duto nokunyo bathaora Nael mondo giyud pi modho, nikech ne ok ginyal modho pi aora.
Pinobet kolokore remo kuom ndalo abiriyo kane Ruoth Nyasaye osechwado aoraNael. Wuok
Masich ogwende
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Dhiyo ir Farao mondo inyise niRuoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘We joga oa mondo odhi olama.
To winji! Kaok iyie timo kamano, to abiro kelo ogwende e pinyi duto mondo asandugo.
Ginipong’ aora Nael, kendo giniwuog ka gidhi e odi nyaka kor nindo gikitandani kod ut jodongi gi mag jogi, kendo ei kendeni kod eisufriecheni mitedoe makati.
Bende ginichikre kuomi kendo kuom jogi kodkuom jodongi. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho ni Musa niya, "Nyis Harun mondo orie ludheewi aore gi sokni kod yewni, mondo ogwende onywolre mathoth e pinyMisri. "
Kamano Harun norieyo lwete ewi pige duto, mi ogwende nobiromopong’o piny.
To ajuoke notiyo gi bindgi, mi gin bende ne gimiyoogwende obiro e piny.
Farao koro noluongo Musa gi Harun mowachoniginiya, "Kwauru Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ogol ogwende oko kuoma, kendo kuomjoga, eka awe jou oa mondo odhi otim misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Mi Musanowacho ni Farao niya, "Timna ng’wono, mondo inyisa sa monego alemnie,kaachiel gi jodongi kod jogi, mondo ogwende oweu, kendo oa e uteu, migidong’ mana e aora Nael kende. "
Nodwoke niya, "Kiny. " Musa nowachoneniya, "Biro timore mana kaka iwacho, mondo ing’e ni onge Nyasaye moromachalo gi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa.
Ogwende biro weyi, kaachiel gijodongi kod jogi, kendo gibiro a e uteni, mi ginidong’ mana e aora Naelkende. "
Eka Musa gi Harun ne joa ir Farao, mi Musa nolamo RuothNyasaye gi chunye duto, ni mondo ogwende ma nosekelo kuom Farao oa.
Ruoth Nyasaye notimo kaka Musa nokwaye, mi ogwende duto mane ni e udigi lerni kod puothe notho.
Jo-Misri nochokogi tuche tuche, mi pinynodoko mang’ue marach.
To kane Farao oneno ni oyudo yueyo, wiyenochako obet matek, kendo nodagi wach Musa gi Harun, mana kaka RuothNyasaye nosenyiso. Masich kikun
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Nyis Harun ni mondo ochwad pinygi ludhe mi buru biro lokore kikun e piny Misri duto. "
Ne giwinjo gimanowachonigi mi Harun norieyo ludhe, mochwadogo piny, mi buru nolokorekikun, kuom ji gi jamni.  Buru duto manie Misri nolokore kikun.
Ajuokenotiyo gi bindgi ni mondo gin bende gihon kikun, to notamogi.  Kikun neni kuonde duto, kuom ji gi jamni.
Eka ajuoke nowachoni Farao niya, "Maen hond Nyasaye. " To wi Farao ne pod tek, kendo ne ok owinjo wach Musagi Harun, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosenyiso. Masich lwang’ni
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Dhiyo gokinyi mang’ich, mondoirom gi Farao, ka dhi aora Nael, kendo inyise ni Ruoth Nyasaye owachokama: ‘We joga oa mondo odhi olama.
To ka ok itimo kamano, to abirohono lwang’ni kuomi gi kuom jodongi gi kuom jogi kod kuom uti, kendogibiro pong’o ut jo-Misri, kaachiel gi pinygi duto.
To chieng’no oknahon lwang’ni e piny Goshen, kuma joga odakie, mi ining’e ni an RuothNyasaye kara anie pinyni!
Kamano ok natim ni joga gima abiro timo nijogi.  Hononi kiny notimre kiny. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye notimo kamano, kendolwangni mang’eny nopoto e od Farao gi ut jodonge kod e piny Misri duto. Lwang’nigo noketho piny.
Farao noluongo Musa gi Harun mowachonigi niya, "Dhiuru, utim misangoni Nyasachu, to nyaka utime mana ei pinyni. "
To Musa nodwoke niya, "Okonego watim kamano, nimar timo misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa gidhiang’ en gima kwero ni jo-Misri.  Kapo ni gineno kwatimo misango makamano, to gibiro goyowa gi kite mwatho.
Omiyo nyaka wadhi thim kuomwuodh ndalo adek, mondo watim misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa manakaka nochikowa. "
Farao nodwokogi niya, "Abiro weyou udhi mondo utimmisango ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu e thim, to mana ka ok udhi maborahinya.  Omiyo koro kwanauru. "
Musa nowachone niya, "Ka asedhi, toabiro kwayo Ruoth Nyasaye mondo kiny lwang’ni oweyi gi jodongi kod jogi. To kik ichak iwuondwa, mi itam jowa dhi timo misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Musa noa ir Farao molamo Ruoth Nyasaye,
mi Ruoth Nyasaye notimonegima nokwayo.  Lwang’ni noa kuom Farao gi jodonge kod joge, ma onge katamana lwang’ni achiel mane odong’.
To kata e kindeno bende wi Faraonochako obedo matek, mi ne ok oyie mondo jo-Israel oa. Wuok
Masich tho mar jamni
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Dhiyo ir Farao mondo inyise niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania owacho kama, ‘We joga oa mondo odhiolama.
To ka idagi weyogi,
to abiro kelo tho marach kuom fareseni gikenjeni gi ngamiani gi dhogi kod rombi gi dieki.
Jamb jo-Israel to okabi timonigi gima abiro timoni jamb jo-Misri, mi onge chiach ja-Israelkata achiel ma notho. ’
Bende Ruoth Nyasaye oseketo odiechieng’, kowachoni kiny ema notimie kamano e pinyni duto. "
Kinyne Ruoth Nyasaye notimokaka nowacho, mi jamb jo-Misri duto notho, to chiach jo-Israel ne okotho kata achiel.
Kane Farao oneno to nonyise ni onge chiach ja-Israelmane otho kata achiel.  To kata kamano wiye ne pod tek, mi ne ok oyiemondo jo-Israel oa. Masich tuo buche
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya, "Jukuru buch kendo gilwetu, mondo Musa okir e kor yamo e nyim Farao.
Buruno biro lokore burumayom e piny Misri duto, kendoo obiro kelo tuo buche malokore adhondekuom ji gi jamni. "
Kamano ne gijuko buru e kendo mi gidhigo ir Farao. Eka Musa nokiro buruno e kor yamo, mi buruno nokelo tuo buche manolokore adhonde kuom ji gi jamni.
Ajuoke ne ok nyal piem gi Musanikech gin bende dendgi ne buche okuodo, mana kaka jo-Misri mamoko.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo wi Farao odoko matek, mi ne ok odewo Musa giHarun, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosenyiso Musa. Masich pe
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Dhi ir Farao gokinyimang’ich, mondo inyise ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach jo-Hibrania owachokama: ‘We joga oa mondo odhi olama.
To wang’ni, ka ok itimo kamano, toin ema abiro kumi kaachiel gi jodongi kod jogi, kakelonu sand duto mondoing’e ni onge ng’at marom koda e piny ngima.
Ka dine arie bada miagoyi gi tuo moro, kaachiel gi jogi, to dikoro kari oselal.
To aseweyiibet mangima mana ni mondo anyisigo tekona, kendo mondo humba olag epiny ngima.
To kaka pod ithago joga, kendo ok iyienigi mondo gia,
kiny kar sa ma kama, naor pe malich ma pok one e piny Misri nyakanene.
Koro gol chik mondo jambi kod gigi duto man oko orwak e udi,nimar pe biro goyo ji kod jamni mowe oko, mi gibiro tho giduto. ’ "
Luoro nomako jodong Farao moko nikech gima Ruorh Nyasaye nosewachono,omiyo ne gikelo wasumbgi gi jambgi e udi piyopiyo.
To joma ne ok odewowach Ruoth Nyasaye noweyo wasumbgi gi jambgi mana oko.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Rie lweti kochomo polo mondo peogo ji gi jamni kod buya duto man piny e Misri. "
Kamano Musa norieyoludhe kochomo polo, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nooro mil polo kaachiel gi pe mipolo nogoyo piny.  Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo pe ogoyo Misri malich,
ka polomil koni gi koni.  Ne en pe marach mane pok one e piny Misri nyaka nene.
Pe nogoyo gik moko duto, kaachiel gi ji kod jamni mane ni oko kuondeduto e piny Misri.  Bende nogoyo buya manie piny, moturo yien duto.
Tomak mana piny Goshen kende mane jo-Israel odakie, ema ne ok ogoyo.
Farao noluongo Musa gi Harun, mowachonigi niya, "Koro asekotho.  RuothNyasaye e man kare, to an, kaachiel gi joga, ema wasetimo marach,
lamnwa Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech pe gi polo osegoyowa mohingo tekowa. Asingora ni abiro weyou mondo udhi ma ok urito gimoro kendo. "
Musanowachone niya, "Ka asea e dalani, to abiro rieyo bada kalamo RuothNyasaye.  Polo biro weyo mor, kendo pe bende biro chok mondo omi ing’e niRuoth Nyasaye e wuon piny ngima.
To ang’eyo ni in kaachiel gi jodongipod ok uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye. "
(Tworo gi shairi nokethore chuth, nimar noyudo ka tworo osetegno, toshairi ne koro eka mino.
To ngano ne ok okethore nimar ojachiekachien. )
Musa noa ir Farao, mowuok e dala.  Eka noting’o bedene malokolamo Ruoth Nyasaye, mi mor polo gi pe norumo, kendo koth bende nochok.
Kane Farao oneno ni gigo duto noserumo, nochako oketho, mi chunye,kaachiel gi chuny jodonge nomedo mana bedo matek.
Kamano wi Faraonomedo bet matek, mi notamo jo-Israel dhi, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosemiyo Musa owacho. Wuok
Masich bonyo
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Dhi ir Farao, asemiyo chunye,kaachiel gi chuny jodonge obedo matek mondo anyisgi hondenagi,
kendomondo unyis nyithindu gi nyikwau e ndalo mabiro kaka nene afuwo jo-Misrigi honnigo.  Kamano unung’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Kuom mano Musa gi Harun nodhi ir Farao, mowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach jo-Hibrania owacho niya, ‘Pod ibiro dagi bolori e nyima nyakakar ang’o? We joga oa mondo odhi olama.
Ka pod itamori miyo joga thuolomondo oa, to kiny nakel bonyo e pinyi,
kendo gibiro nur e piny ma katamana lowo ok nonen.  Ginicham gik moko duto modong’, mane pe ok oketho,kaachiel gi yien duto.
Ginipong’ uteni gi ute jodongi kod ute jogi. Ginibed marach moloyo gimoro amora ma wuoneu kata kwereu oseneno nyakane gibi e pinyni. ’ " Kane Musa osewuoyo kamano, noa moweyo Farao.
Jodong Farao nowachone niya, "Ng’atni pod biro thagowa nyaka kar ang’o?We jo-Israel machwo odhi mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.  Dongekoro ing’eyo ni Misri osekethore. "
Kuom mano, noom Musa gi Harun,moduogo ir Farao, mi nowachonigi niya, "Unyalo dhi mondo ulam RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu.  To ng’a gini ma biro dhi?"
Musa nodwoke niya,"Wabiro dhi waduto, joma tindo kod joma dongo, nyiri gi yawuowi,kaachiel gi jamni duto, nimar waduto nyaka watim ni Ruoth Nyasaye sawo. "
Farao nowachonigi niya, "Nyasaye mondo okonyu ka po ni ayienu udhikaachiel gi mondu kod nyithindu! Nyaka bed ni uchano timo gimoro marach.
Ooyo, ok ayienu timo kamano! Un joma chwo kende ema unyalo dhi mondoulam Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech mano ema nudwaro. " Mi noriembogi gia e nyime.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Rie badi e piny Misri mondo bonyoobi ocham gik moko duto mane pe oweyo ma ok ochamo. "
Omiyo Musanorieyo ludhe e piny Misri, mi Ruoth Nyasaye notugo yamb ugue mokudho epinyno odiechieng’no duto gotienono duto.  To kane piny oru, noyudo kayamb ugue osekelo bonyo.
Bonyogo nopie e piny Misri mang’eny ma nyakanene pok one bende ok none nyaka chieng’.
Ne gipoto piny mi pinynolokore bonyo lilo kendo ne gichamo gik moko duto mane dongo e pinykaachiel gi olembe duto mane pe oweyo.  Onge kata lith oboke mane odong’e piny Misri duto.
Farao noluongo Musa gi Harun, mowachonigi niya, "Aseketho ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo ni un bende.
Koro yie ung’wonnae dichiel,kendo ulam Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mondo oyie ogol masira malichnikuoma. "
Kuom mano Musa noa ir Farao modhi olamo Ruoth Nyasaye.
RuothNyasaye noloko yamono mi okudho matek kaa imbo, motero bonyo e NamMakwar, ma kata achiel ne ok odong’ Misri.
To Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyochuny Farao odoko matek, mi ne ok oweyo jo-Israel odhi. Masich mudho mandiwa
Bang’ mano Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Rie badi kochomo polomondo mudho mandiwa, ma ji muloe mana gi lwetgi, oim piny Misri. "
Musanorieyo bade kochomo polo, mi mudho mandiwa noimo piny Misri duto kuomndalo adek.
Onge ja-Misri mane nyalo neno wadgi, kendo onge ng’at maneowuok e ode kuom ndalo adekgo.  To kamoro amora mane jo-Israel odakie emaler ne nitie.
Farao noluongo Musa, mowachone niya, "Dhiuru ulam Ruoth Nyasaye.  Mondugi nyithindu bende nyalo dhi kodu, mak mana jambu ema nyaka dong’ ka. "
Musa nodwoke niya, "To ing’eyo ni in ema nyaka imiwa jamni mwatimogoni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa misengni miwang’o pep kod misengni mamoko.
To jambwa bende nyaka wadhigo, kendo onge kata achiel ma biro dong’chien, nimar dipo ka wadwaro jamni moko mwadhi lamogo Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa kuom jambwago, nikech kapok wachopo kuno to ok wang’eyo niwadhi lame gang’o. "
To Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo chuny Farao odoko matek,mi nodagi ni kik gidhi.
Nowacho ni Musa niya, "Aye e wang’a! To bendekik ichak inena, nikech chieng’ minenae kendo to nitho!"
Musa nodwokeni, "Adier, ok nachak aneni kendo. "Wuok
Musa okoro tho nyithindo makayo
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Koro odong’ masira achiel ma abirokelo ni Farao gi jo-Misri.  Eka noweu udhi.  To ok mano kende, to noriembumana kaka ng’at ma riembo chiege.
Koro nyis ji ni ng’ato ka ng’ato madichwo kata ma dhako mondo okwa gik molos gi fedha kod dhahabu kuomjogweng’gi. "
Mi Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Misri ogeno jo-Israel.  To bendejodong Farao gi jo-Misri duto nomiyo Musa duong’ ahinya.
Musa nowachoni Farao niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘Abiro wuotho kuom jo-Misri edier otieno tir,
kendo nyithindo makayo duto manie piny Misri biro tho,chakre kach ruoth Farao nyaka kach dhako ma misumba ma jarego, kaachielgi kach jamni duto.
Ywak maduong’ ma pok one, bende ma ok none, birobedo e piny Misri.
To jo-Israel biro bedo gi kue, ma kata mana guok oknogue dhano kata chiayo. ’ Kamano unung’e ni Ruoth Nyasaye oketo pogruoke kind jo-Misri gi jo-Israel.
Bang’e jodongi nobi ira, mi ginikulrenaka giwacho niya, ‘Dhiyo, un gi jou duto!’ Bang’ mano eka naa. " Mi Musanoa ir Farao gi mirima mager.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Farao ok bi winjo wachni.  Omiyoabiro medo timo honni e piny Misri. "
Musa gi Harun nosetimo honnigoduto e nyim Farao, to Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo wiye odoko matek, mi ne okonyal weyo jo-Israel a e pinye. Wuok
Pasaka
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun e piny Misri niya,
"Dueni emabiro bedonu due mokwongo mar higa.
Nyis jo-Israel duto kama: Chieng’due apar mar dueni ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka yier nyarombo kata nyadiel nijoode, tiende ni chiayo achiel ni ot ka ot.
To kapo ni joot moro nokahinya ma chiayo ngima ohingo, to wuon odno kod ng’at modak bute nyakariwre e chiayono.  Nyaka upim gima ng’ato ka ng’ato nyalo chamo, mondoung’ego kar romb joma oromo chiayo achiel.
Chiayono nyaka bed nyarombokata nyadiel ma dichwo ma jahiga achiel ma onge songa.
Kanuru chiayogonyaka chop chieng’ mar apar gang’wen mar dueni, eka oganda jo-Israelduto mondo oneggi ka piny dwaro yuso.
Bang’e gikaw remo, giwirgo sisimag dhoudi kod wi dhoudi mag udi duto ma nochamie jamnigo.
Nyaka gibulring’o gotienono, kendo gichame gi makati ma ok ketie thowi, kaachiel gialode makech.
Kik ucham ringe moro manumu, kata motedi, to nyaka buleduto, kaachiel gi wiye gi tiendene kod jamb iye.
Kik uwe lemo morodong’ nyaka okinyi.  To kapo ni moro odong’, to nyaka wang’e e mach.
"Nyaka uchame kutueyo okanda e nungou, kendo kurwako wuoche e tiendu,kendo kumako ludhe e lwetu; to bende nyaka uchame piyopiyo.  En sapPasaka mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Otienono nawuoth e piny Misri duto kendonaneg nyathi ka nyathi ma dichwo makayo mar dhano kod mar chiayo.  An eRuoth Nyasaye, kendo anakum nyiseche duto mag jo-Misri.
Rembnyirombego nobed kido ma nyiso udi mudakie, kendo kaneno remono toanakadhu, mi masich tho magoyogo piny Misri ok nomaku.
"Odieching’no nobednu chieng’ rapar, omiyo nyaka urite ka sawomochwere ni Ruoth Nyasaye kuom tiengeu duto.
Nyaka ucham makati ma okketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo.  Chieng’ mokwongo, nyaka ugol thowi dutomanie uteu, nimar ka ng’ato kuomu ochamo makati moketie thowi chakrechieng’ mokwongo nyaka chieng’ mar abiriyo to nong’ad kare oko kuomoganda jo-Israel.
Chieng’ mokwongo kod chieng’ mar abiriyo, nyaka utimchokruok moyiedhi.  Kuom ndalo ariyogo kik uti tich moro mak mana tijloso chiemo.
Nyaka utim sawo mar makati ma ok ketie thowi, nikechchieng’no ema nogolie ogendu e piny Misri.  Tiengeu duto nyaka ritodiechieng’no mondo obed chieng’ sawo mochwere.
Chakre odhiambo mardue apar gang’wen mar due mokwongo, nyaka odhiambo mar due piero ariyogachiel ema unuchamie makati ma ok ketie thowi.
Kuom ndalo abiriyogokik thowi bedie uteu, nikech ng’at mochamo gimoro moketie thowi nong’adkare oko kuom oganda jo-Israel, bed ni en japiny kata jadak.
Kik uchamgimoro moketie thowi, to nyaka ucham mana makati ma ok ketie thowikamoro amora mudakie. "
Musa noluongo jodong Israel duto, mowachonigi niya, "Ng’ato ka ng’atomondo odhi oyier nyarombo kata nyadiel ni joode, mondo unegi kutimogoPasaka.
Eka ukaw oboke mag owino ulutie remo manie tawo, kendo uwirgiwi dhoudi kod sisi mag dhoudi.  Kik ng’ato kuomu wuog oko nyaka okinyi.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro wuotho e piny Misri duto, mondo oneg jo-Misri, toenokadh dhoot ka dhoot moneno remo e wiye, kendo e sisi mage, kendo oknowe malaika maneko donje uteu mondo onegu.
"Rituru chikegi mochwere kaachiel gi nyithindu.
Ka udonjo e piny maRuoth Nyasaye nomiu kaka osesingore, to nyaka urit sawoni.
To kanyithindu nopenju tiende,
to unudwokgi ni, ‘En misango mar Pasakamitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye nikech nokadho ut jo-Israel e piny Misri konegojo-Misri, to oweyo miechwa. ’ " Kane Musa otieko wuoyo, jo-Israel nogoyochonggi piny molemo.
Ne gidhi, mi girito wechego, kendo gitimo gimaRuoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa gi Harun. Masira mogik: Tho nyithindo makayo
E dier otienono tir, Ruoth Nyasaye nonego nyithindo ma yawuowi makayoduto, chakre kach ruoth Farao nyaka kach ng’at motue e jela, kaachiel ginyithindo makayo duto mag jamni.
Farao gi jodonge kod jo-Misri dutonochiew gotienono, kendo ne nitie ywak malich ahinya e Misri nimar neonge kata dala achiel ma ok nyathi ma wuowi othoe.
Otieno nogo Faraonoluongo Musa gi Harun mowachonigi niya, "Wuoguru gi jo-Israel piyopiyomondo uwe joga.  Dhiuru ulam Ruoth Nyasaye kaka usekwayo.
Jambu bendekawuru uago.  An bende lamnauru mondo ayud gueth. "
Jo-Misri norungojo-Israel mondo oa e pinygi piyopiyo, ka giwacho niya, "Waduto wabirotho ka ok ua. "
Omiyo jo-Israel nokawo sufriache mag makati moting’omogo modwal mapok oketie thowi.  Ne giboyogi gi nenggi, mi giting’ogi egokgi.
Noyudo ka jo-Isreal osekwayo jo-Misri lewni kod gik moko molosgi fedha kod dhahabu, kaka Musa nosechiko.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyojo-Misri ogeno jo-Israel, mi ne gimiyogi gik moko duto mane gikwayo. Kamano e kaka ne giyako jo-Misri. Jo-Israel owuok Misri
Jo-Israel nochako wuoth Rameses kochomo Sukoth.  Ne gin ji alufu miaauchiel ka ok okwan mon gi nyithindo.
Oganda maduong’ mar ji mamokokaachiel gi jamni bende nodhi kodgi.
Ne gikawo mogo modwal mane giagoMisri, mi gitedogo makati ma ok oketie thowi.  Ne ok oketie thowi nikechne oriembgi gia Misri apoya.  Bende ne ok giyudo thuolo kata mana martedo chiemo ma gidhi chamo e wuoth.
Jo-Israel nosedak e piny Misrikuom higni mia ang’wen gi piero adek.
To chieng’ mane higni miaang’wen gi piero adekgo orumoe ema ne ogend Ruoth Nyasaye duto owuokieMisri.
Ne en otieno mane Ruoth Nyasaye oritogie mondo ogolgi e pinyMisri.  Otieno nogono en otieno moket mondo jo-Israel duto oparie RuothNyasaye nyaka chieng’ ka ginindo bedo. Chike mamoko mirito kitimo Pasaka
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya, "Magi e chike monego uritkitimo Pasaka: Jodak kik chame,
to wasumbini duto mong’iew nyalo chamemana kuseterogi nyangu.
To japiny moro kata ng’ato ang’ata mondiki kikchame.
Nyarombo ka nyarombo nyaka cham mana e ot achiel; kik gol lemokata achiel oko, bende kik utur choke kata achiel.
Oganda jo-Israelduto nyaka tim sawoni.
Kapo ni nitie jadak moro kuomu ma dwaro timoPasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nyaka ukuong uter joge machwo duto nyangu,eka onyalo riwore kodu e timo sawono, mi koro nokwane ka ja-Israel hie. To ng’at ma ok oter nyangu kik chame.
Chikni otweyo ja-Israel gi jadakmachalre. "
Jo-Isreal notimo gik moko duto mane Nyasaye ochiko Musa gi Harun,
michieng’onogo, ema nogoloe jo-Israel e piny Misri, kochan gi e ogendgi. Wuok
Chik mar walo nyithindo makayo ni Nyasaye
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyathi ka nyathi makayo nyakawalna, nikech dhano kata chiayo mokwong nywol e Israel en mara. "Sawo mar Makati ma ok Ketie Thowi
Musa nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Nyaka upar odiechieng’ ma uwuokieMisrini, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ogolou gi tekone maduong’ e piny maneubedoe wasumbini.  Makati moketie thowi ok onego cham kawuono,
nikechodiechieng’ni, due mar Abib, e chieng’ wuoku Misri.
Ruoth Nyasayenosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu piny momew kendo machiek ahinya majo-Kanaan gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Hivi gi jo-Jebus odakie.  Ka RuothNyasaye oseterou kuno, to nyaka utim sawoni e due nogoni.
Nyaka uchammakati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo, to chieng’ mar abiriyo utimsawo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Makati ma ok ketie thowi, ema nucham kuom ndaloabiriyogo, to makati miketoe thowi, kata gimoro amora moket gi thowi,kik yud e pinyu duto.
Odiechieng’no nyaka unyis yawuotu niya, ‘Ma emawaparogo gima Ruoth Nyasaye notimonwa kwawuok Misri. ’
Raparni nyaka bedka kido e lwetu, kendo ka ranyisi e lela wang’u mondo usik kuwacho chikRuoth Nyasaye e dhou, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nogolou Misri gi tekonemaduong’.
Rituru chikni e higa ka higa e ndalo moketi. "Nyithindo makayo
"Ruoth Nyasaye nokelu e piny Kanaan mane osingore ni nomiu kaachiel gikwereu.  Kosemiyougo,
to nyaka uchiwne nyithindu machwo makayo duto. Nyithind jambu makayo machwo duto bende gin mag Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nyakauwal nyithind kenjeu machwo makayo duto, kuketo nyirombe kargi.  To ka okudwar warogi, to nyaka utur ng’utgi.  Bende nyaka uwar yawuowi makayoduto munywolo.
Ka chieng’ moro yawuotu penjou ni, ‘Ere tiend gimautimoni?’ To nyaka uduokgi niya, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye nogolowa gi tekonemaduong’ e piny Misri, kuma ne wabedoe wasumbini.
Kane Farao otamoreweyowa mondo waa, Ruoth Nyasaye nonego nyithindo makayo duto, mag dhanogi mag jamni, e piny Misri.  Mano emomiyo watimo ni Nyasaye misango ginyithind jamni machwo makayo duto, to wawaro nyithindwa makayo kwachiwogik moko kargi.
Timni nyaka bednu rapar, mana ka kido manie lwetu kataka ranyisi manie lend wang’u, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye nogolowa Misri gitekone maduong’. ’ "Siro mar bor polo gi siro mar mach
Kane Farao oweyo jo-Israel mondo odhi, Nyasaye ne ok otelonigi e yomadhi e piny Filistia, kata obedo ni yorno ema ng’ado machiegni.  Nyasayenoparo niya, "Ka jo-Israel oneno ni gibiro kedo, to chunygi nyalo lokoremi gidog Misri. "
Omiyo kar luwo yorno to Nyasaye notelonigi e yomaluoro maluwo thim kochomo Nam Makwar.  Jo-Israel noa Misri koikore nilweny.
Musa nokawo chok Josef, modhigo, nikech Josef nosemiyojo-Israel osingore, kowachonigi niya, "Chieng’ moro Nyasaye nokonyu,omiyo ka udhi, to mondo ukaw chokena udhigo. "
Ne gia Sukoth, mi giwuotho nyaka Etham man e lak thim.
Godiechieng’Ruoth Nyasaye notelo nyimgi kobet e siro mar bor polo, mondo onyisgi yo,to gotieno notelo nyimgi ei siro mar mach, mondo omenynigi ler.  Kamanone ginyalo wuotho odiechieng’ gotieno.
Siro mar bor polo nosiko kotelonyimgi godiechieng’ to siro mar mach ne telonigi gotieno. Wuok
Jo-Israel ong’ado Nam Makwar
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel mondo odog obwor enyim Pihahiroth, e kind Migdol gi nam, yo wuok chieng’ mar Baal-zefon. Bworuru e dho nam, kama omanyore gi dalano.
Farao biro paro nijo-Israel digni e thim, kendo ni thim ogeng’onigi.
Abiro miyo chunyedoko matek, mi enolawu.  To loch ma nalogo Farao kaachiel gi ogandane marlweny nomi nyinga duong’, mi jo-Misri nong’e ni kara an Nyasaye. " Kamanojo-Israel notimo kaka nowachnigi.
Kane onyis Farao ruodh Misri ni jo-Israel oseringo, chunye gi chunyjodonge nolokore ni nonego ni kik giwe gia, mi giwacho niya, "Ang’omwasetimoni? Waseweyo wasumbwa ma jo-Israel odhi!"
Omiyo Farao noikogache mar lweny, modhi gi joge mag lweny.
Nokawo geche mag lweny moyiermia auchiel, gi geche moko duto mag Misri, ka jatend lweny ni ei moro kamoro.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo chuny Farao ruodh Misri odoko matek, minolawo jo-Israel ma nosewuok ka chunygi ochayo jo-Misri.
Jo-Misrinolawogi gi farese Farao duto gi geche mag lweny gi joidh faresene,kaachiel gi joge mag lweny, mi gijukogi ka gibworo e dhonam butPihahiroth, yo wuok chieng’ mar Baal-zefon.
Kane Farao ochopo machiegni, jo-Israel noting’o wang’gi, moneno kajo-Misri lawogi machiegni, mi ne giluor ahinya, kendo ne giywak ni RuothNyasaye.
Ne giwacho ni Musa niya, "Donge liete ni Misri? Ang’o momiyonikelowa oko e thim ka, mondo wathoe? Koro neye gima isetimo kuom golowaMisri!
Donge ne wanyisi kapok wawuok Misri ni gima kama biro timore?Ne wakweri ni mondo iwewa wati ni jo-Misri.  Da obedo maber ka wanwasumbgi, moloyo tho e thim ka. "
Musa nodwokogi niya, "Kik uluor!Chung’uru motegno mondo une kaka Ruoth Nyasaye biro resou kawuono, nimarjo-Misri munenogi, ok unune kendo.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro kedonu, omiyo unling’uru aling’a. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Marang’o iywakna? Wach nijo-Israel odhi adhiya nyime.
Kaw ludhi, irie e nam, mondo nam opogrekoni gi koni, eka jo-Israel ong’ade, kawuotho e lowo motwo.
Abiro jiwojo-Misri mondo oluw bang’u.  Nyinga noyud duong’ kuom loyo Farao gi jogemag lweny gi gechene, kaachiel gi joidh faresene.
Eka jo-Misri nong’eni kara an Ruoth Nyasaye, kaseloyogi. "
Malaika mar Nyasaye mane otelo e nyim oganda jolweny mar Israel noamodok kang’egi.  Siro mar bor polo bende noa e nyimgi, mi nodok mochung’kang’egi,
kopogo kind jolweny mag Misri gi jolweny mag Israel.  Borpolono nokelo mudho kanyo, mi piny noyuso piyopiyo, kendo oganda moro neok osudo machiegni gi wadgi otieno duto.
Musa norieyo bade e nam, mi Ruoth Nyasaye notugo yamb ugue mokudhomatek otieno duto, mi nam nong’wel, kendo kama ne pi nitie nodoko motwo. Pigno nopogore diriyo,
kendo jo-Israel nong’ado namno kawuotho e lowomotwo, ka pi ogingore koni gi koni.
Jo-Misri nolawogi, modonjo bang’ginyaka e chuny nam gi farese Farao duto, gi gechene mag lweny kod joidhfaresene.
Kane piny dwa yawore, Ruoth Nyasaye nong’iyo jolweny magMisri gi e siro mar mach kod mar bor polo, mi nomiyo kihondko omakogi.
Nomiyo tiend gechegi omoko, mi koro ne ok ginyal ringo maber, nyakajo-Misri nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ema kedonigi kodwa. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Rie badi e nam mondo pi oduog oimjo-Misri gi gechegi kod jogi ma joidh farese. "
Mi Musa norieyo bade enam, kendo kane piny oyawore, pi noduogo e wang’e machon.  Jo-Misrinoyudo ringo kane pi duogo, mi Ruoth Nyasaye notiekogi e chuny nam.
Pinoduogo, moimo geche lweny gi joidh farese kod jolweny duto mag Farao manolawo jo-Israel ei nam.  Onge kata ng’at achiel mane odong’.
Tojo-Israel noseng’ado nam, ka wuotho e lowo motwo, ka pi ogingore koni gikoni.
Kamano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye noreso jo-Israel e lwet jo-Misriodiechieng’no.  Bang’e jo-Israel noneno jo-Misri koriere e dhonamkosetho.
Kane jo-Israel oneno teko maduong’ mane Ruoth Nyasaye okumogojo-Misri, ne giluore, mi ne giyie kuome kendo kuom Musa jatichne. Wuok
Wend Musa
Bang’e Musa gi jo-Israel nowero ni Ruoth Nyasaye wendni:"Abiro wer ni Ruoth Nyasayenikech oseyudo duong’ mipako ahinya. Osewito farese kod joithgi e nam.
Ruoth Nyasaye e tekona,kendo e wenda,En ema osewara. En e Nyasacha,kendo abiro pake. En e Nyasach wuora,kendo abiro miye duong’.
Ruoth Nyasaye en jalweny,kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nyinge.
Osewito geche Farao gi jolweny mage e nam,kendo jatend Farao moyierjosenimo e nam Makwar.
Nam matut oimogi. Ne ginyumore piny ka kidi.
"A Ruoth Nyasaye,badi ma korachwich nigi teko maduong!Oturo wasiki matindotindo.
Kuom duong’ mar tekoniniloyo joma nopiem kodi. Mirimbi noliel ka mach,mowang’ogi ka tiang’.
Much umi nomiyo pi ogingore,mi apaka nochung’ tir ka ohinga,kendo nam matut ne opotonyaka pier pi piny
Jasikwa nowacho niya,‘Analawgi, mi ajukgi!Anape mwandugi,kendo anayak gimoro amora ma adwaro. Anawuodh ligangla,kendo anatiekgi gi tekona. ’
To in, a Ruoth Nyasaye,nikudho muya achiel kende,mi nam oimogi,Ne ginimo ka nyinyoe apaka madongo.
A Ruoth Nyasaye,Ere Nyasaye machal kodi?Ere ng’ama ler ka in?Ere ng’ama chal kodi,manyalo timo honnikod timbe madongo miwuoro?
Nirieyo badi ma korachwich,mi piny nomwonyo wasikwa.
Kuom herani mosikoisetelo ni joma niwaro. Kuom tekoni maduong’isetelonigi nyaka kar dakni maler.
Ogendini moko osewinjo, mi otetniRem machal gi muochomako jo-Filistia.
Koro luoro omako jodong Edom,kendo ruodhi mag Moab ochako kirni. Ji duto modak Kanaan,bende chirgi olal.
Luoro gi kihondko omakogi,mi gichung’ achung’a ka siro,nikech duong’ mar tekoni. A Ruoth Nyasaye,gichung’ kamano,nyaka joma iloko jogi kadhi.
A Ruoth Nyasaye,ibiro rwakogi,kendo ibiro chwoyogi ka kodhie godi iwuon,kama niloso mondo obed kar dakni,
Hekalu ma in iwuon nigero. A Ruoth Nyasaye,bed Ruoth nyaka chieng’. "
Farese Farao kod gechene gi joithgi nodonjo e nam, mi Ruoth Nyasayenoduogo pi, moimogi.  To jo-Israel nong’ado nam, kawuotho e lowo motwo.
Miriam janabi ma nyamin Harun nokawo bul, kendo mon duto nowuok moluwobang’e, ka goyo bul kendo miel.
Miriam nowernigi niya:"Weruru ni Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech oseyudo duong’ mipako ahinya!Osewito farese gi joithgi e nam!"Pi makech man Marah
Musa nogolo jo-Israel e dho Nam Makwar, kuma ne gibworoe, mi negiwuotho e thim Shur kuom ndalo adek ma ok giyudo pi.
Bang’e negichopo Marah, to ne ok ginyal modho, nimar pi mane ni kuno ne kech. Mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni Marah (tiende ni, makech).
Ji noywak niMusa, ka giwacho niya, "Wabiro modho ang’o?"
Musa nolamo Ruoth Nyasayegi chunye duto, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nonyise osiki moro.  Nokawe, mobole epi, mi pi nodoko mamit. Kanyo ema Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyogie chik mogurore, kendo kanyo emanotemogie.
Nowachonigi niya, "An Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Ka uwinjowechena gi chunyu duto, mi utimo mana kaka adwaro, kendo kumako chikenagi buchena, to ok nasandu gi tuoche ma nakelo kuom jo-Misri, nimar an eRuoth Nyasaye machangou. "
Bang’ mano, ne gichopo Elim, kuma ne giyudoe sokni apar gariyo, kodyiend othidhe piero abiriyo, mi ne gibworo but soknigo. Wuok
Nyasaye ochiwo Muma
Oganda duto mar jo-Israel noa Elim, mi ochopo e thim Sin manie kindElim gi Sinai.  Mano notimore due mar ariyo kane gisea Misri.
Jo-Israelduto noywak ni Musa gi Harun,
ka giwacho niya, "Mad ne Ruoth Nyasayenegwa e piny Misri, kuma ne wanyalo betie piny gi tap ring’o e nyimwa,mwachiem mana kaka wadwaro.  To koro usekelowa e thimni mondo kech onegwawaduto!"
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Abiro loronu chiemo koa e polo. Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ ji nyaka dhi mondo ochok chiemo moromo chamoodiechieng’no.  Kamano abiro temogi mondo ane ane ka giyie chikena.
Tochieng’ mar auchiel, ka gitedo gima gisechoko, to giniyud ni oromrediriyo gi mago michoko pile e odiechieng’ achiel. "
Omiyo Musa kod Harunnowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya, "Godhiamboni ubiro ng’eyo ni adier RuothNyasaye ema nogolou Misri,
kendo kinyne gokinyi unune duong’ne maler,nimar osewinjo kaka uywakne.  Wan ok ema uywagnwa, nikech wan ok wangimoro. "
Eka Musa nomedo wacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ema biro miyou kuonmang’eny mondo ucham gokinyi, nimar osewinjo kaka uywakne.  Wan okuywagnwa, to Ruoth Nysaye ema uywakne, nikech wan ok wan gimoro. "
Musa nowachoni Harun niya, "Nyis ji duto mondo ochung’ e nyim RuothNyasaye, nimar osewinjo ywakgi. "
Kane Harun pod wuoyo gi jo-Israel, neging’iyo yo kathim, kendo ne gipo ka duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasayeothinyore e bor polo.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Asewinjoywak jo-Israel, omiyo koro nyisgi kama: ‘Kapok piny oyuso, ubiro yudoring’o mondo ucham, to gokinyi ubiro yudo kuon mang’eny.  Eka unung’e nian Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. ’ "
Godhiambono aluru mang’eny nobiro moimo kama ne gibworoe, kendogokinyi tho nomoko, molworo kambi duto.
To kane tho orumo, gik mokomatindotindo, mong’inore machalo gi tho, nodong’ e thim.
Jo-Israelnonenogo, to ne ok ging’eyo ni en ang’o, omiyo ne gipenjore kendgigiwegi ni, "Mano to ang’o?" Musa nodwokogi niya, "Mano e kuon ma RuothNyasaye osemiyou mondo ucham.
Ruoth Nyasaye osechiko ni mondo ng’atoka ng’ato kuomu ochok morome, ka kwanyo ondweto achiel ni ng’ato kang’ato manie hembe. "
Jo-Israel notimo kamano.  Jomoko kuomgi nochoko mang’eny, to jomokonochoko manok.
To kane gipimogi e ondweto, ne giyudo ni joma nochokomang’eny ne ok nigi mathoth mohingogi, bende joma nochoko manok ne oknigi matin moremogi to ng’ato ka ng’ato nosechoko mana morome.
Musanowachonigi niya, "Kik ukan chiemo moko nyaka kiny. "
Jomoko kuomgi neok odewo wach Musa, to nokano chiemo moko nyaka kinyne, mi kudninopong’o chiemogo, moketho.  Omiyo Musa nokecho kodgi.
Okinyi kokinyi,ng’ato ka ng’ato ne choko chiemo morome chamo.  To ka chieng’ oseowore,chiemono ne leny rumo.
Chieng’ mar auchiel ne gichoko chiemo moromo chamo diriyo.  Ng’ato kang’ato nochoko anduetni ariyo.  Jodongo duto mag oganda nobiro, monyisoMusa wachno,
mi nodwokogi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osechiko kama: ‘Kiny enchieng’ yueyo ma en Sabato mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kuom chiemomusechokogo, unyalo bulo mago mudwaro bulo, kendo boko mago mudwaroboko.  To modong’ mondo oket tenge, okan nyaka kiny. ’ "
Ne gitimo kakaMusa nochiko, mi ne gikano gima odong’ nyaka kinyne, kendo ne okokethore, bende kudni ne ok odonjoe.
Musa nowachonigi niya, "Mano emamondo ucham tinende, nikech kawuono en chieng’ sabato.  Tiende ni chieng’mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Omiyo ok ubi yudo chiemo oko mukwanyo.
Unyalochoko chiemo kuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo, ma en chieng’Sabato, chiemono ok bi lwar. "
To chieng’ mar abiriyonogo, jomoko nodhi mondo ochok chiemo, to ne okgiyudo.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ubiro tamoru ritochikena gi buchena nyaka karang’o?
Ng’euru ni an Ruoth Nyasaye emaaseketonu chieng’ Sabato.  Kuom mano, chieng’ mar auchiel amiyou chiemomoromo ndalo ariyo.  To chieng’ mar abiriyo, ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka bedmana kama entie, kendo kik owuog e dalane. "
Kamano ji noyueyo chieng’mar abiriiyo.
Jo-Israel nochako chiemono ni, ‘Manna’.  Nochalo gi kodhi matindotindomarachere, kendo nomit ka kek moted gi mor kich.
Musa nowacho niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko kama: ‘Kawuru manna moromo ondweto achiel, ukan ninyikwau, mondo chieng’ moro gine chiemo mane amiyou mondo ucham e thim,kane agolou Misri. ’ "
Eka Musa nowacho ni Harun niya, "Kaw agulu,iolie manna moromo ondweto achiel, kendo iket e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mondookan ni nyikwawa. "
Omiyo Harun nokawe, mokete e nyim Sandug Muma,mondo okane kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jo-Israel nochamo manna kuom higni piero ang’wen, nyaka ne gichopo epiny mane ginyalo dakie.  Ne gichamo mannano kamano nyaka ne gichopo embap piny Kanaan.  (
Onduetni ang’wen romre gi debe achiel). Wuok
Pi owuok e lwanda(Kwan
.
-
)
Oganda duto mar jo-Israel nowuok e thi Sin, mi giwuotho matintin kakaRuoth Nyasaye ne chikogi.  Ne gibworo Refidim, to pi modho ne onge kuno.
Mano nomiyo ji odhaw gi Musa, ka giwachone niya, "Miwa pi wamodhi!"Musa nodwokogi ni, "Marang’o udhaw koda? Ang’o momiyo utemo RuothNyasaye?"
To ji ne riyo oloyo malich, omiyo ne giywakne, ka giwachoniya, "Ere gimomiyo nigolowa Misri gi nyithindwa kod jambwa mondo riyoobi onegwa?"
Kane Musa owinjo kamano nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunyeduto, kopenjo niya, "Abiro timo ang’o gi jogi, nimar gichiegni goya gikite?"
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Kaw jodong Israel moko mondo itelgoe nyim ji, kiting’o ludhi mane ichwadogo aora Nael.
Anachung’ e nyimikanyo, but lwanda man Horeb.  Inichwad lwandano, mi pi nowuogie mondo jiomodhi. " Musa notimo kamano e nyim jodong Israel.
Nochako nying kanyoni Masa, (tiende ni, tem), to bende nochake ni Meriba, (ma tiende ni,dhaw), nikech jo-Israel nodhaw kode kanyo, kendo otemoe Ruoth Nyasaye,ka gipenjo niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ni koda, koso oonge?"Jo-Israel okedo gi jo-Amalek
Jo-Amalek nobiro Refidim, momonjo jo-Israel.
Mi Musa nowacho ni Joshuaniya, "Yier jomoko mondo kiny udhi ukednwago gi jo-Amalek.  An to abirochung’ ewi got kating’o luth mane Nyasaye omiya. "
Joshua notimo kakaMusa nochike, mi nokedo gi jo-Amalek, to Musa gi Harun kod Hur ne joidhoewi got.
E kinde duto mane Musa oting’o bedene malo, jo-Israel neloyo, to kane odwoko bedene piny, to jo-Amalek ema ne loyo.
Kane bedeMusa koro ojony, Harun gi Hur ne joketone kidi mobetie, ka giting’obedene koni gi koni malo.  Ne gisiro bedene kamano nyaka chieng’ opodho,
mi Joshua noloyo jo-Amalek monegogi.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ndik gima osetimoreno ekitabu mondo e ndalo mabiro ji opar wachno.  Bende inyis Joshua ni abiromiyo wi ji duto wil chuth gi jo-Amalek. "
Musa nogerokendo-mar-misango, mi nochake ni Jehova-Nisi, (tiende ni, Ruoth Nyasayee bandecha. )
Eka nowacho niya, "Akuong’ora e bwo bandech RuothNyasaye, ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro kedo gi jo-Amalek nyaka chieng’. "Wuok
Jethro obiro limo Musa
Jethro jadolo mar Midian, kendo jaduong’ Musa, nowinjo gik moko dutomane Nyasaye osetimo ni Musa gi jo-Israel, kendo kaka Ruoth Nyasayenogologi Misri.
Kane Musa oriembo Zipora chiege, Jethro nokawo nyareno
kaachiel gi yawuote ariyo, ma Gershom gi Eliezer.  Musa nosewacho niya,"An jadak e piny ma ok marwa," omiyo nochako wuode achiel ni Gershom,(tiende ni, jadak).
Bende nosewacho niya, "Nyasach wuora en jakonynamane oresa ka Farao dwaro nega. " Omiyo nochako wuode machielo niEliezer, (tiende ni, Nyasaye en Jakonyna).
Jethro nobiro ir Musa e god Nyasaye, kuma ne Musa obworoe, kokelonechiege gi yawuote.
Noter ne Musa wach ni, "Jaduong’ni Jethro biro irigi chiegi kod yawuoti. "
Musa nowuok, modhi romone.  Nokulorene, kendoonyodhe, mi gimosore.  Kane gisedonjo e hema,
Musa nonyise duto maneRuoth Nyasaye osetimo ni Farao, kendo ni jo-Misri, nikech noherojo-Israel.  Bende nonyise thagruok mane giyudo e yo, kendo kaka RuothNyasaye noresogi.
Jethro koro ne mor ahinya kowinjo ng’wono mane RuothNyasaye otimo ni jo-Israel koresogi kuom jo-Misri.
Nowacho niya, "OpakRuoth Nyasaye mane oresou e lwet jo-Misri, kendo e lwet Farao.
Koroang’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye duong’ moloyo nyiseche duto, nikech oseresojo-Israel e loch mar jo-Misri, kuma ne iritogie gi achaye. "
Bang’eJethro notimo ni Nyasaye misango miwang’o pep, kod misengni mamoko. Harun gi jodong Isarel duto ne jobiro mochamo sawono gi Jethro e nyimNyasaye. Yiero mar jong’ad bura(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Kinyne Musa nobet piny mondo oyal ji, mi ji nochung’ kolwore, chakreokinyi nyaka odhiambo.
Kane Jethro oneno tich mang’eny mane Musa timoni ji, nopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyo itiyo tijegi ni jogi duto, ka inkendi, ka ji ochung’ kolwori chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo?"
Musanodwoke niya, "Nyaka atim kamano, nikech ji biro ira mondo ong’e gimaNyasaye dwaro.
Ka ng’ato odonjo ni wadgi, to gikelo wachno ira mondoang’ad buchgi.  To bende anyiso ji buche gi chike mag Nyasaye. "
Jethronowachone niya, "Gima itimoni ok ber.
Ibiro mana ol, kaachiel gi jogiduto.  Tijni ng’eny, omiyo ok inyal time kendi.
We ang’adni rieko,mondo Nyasaye okonyi.  In onego ibed jachung’ ni ji e nyim Nyasaye,kiterone ywakgi.
Bende onego ipuonjgi chike kod buche, kendo inyisgiyore monego giluw, kod gik monego gitim.
To nyaka iyier ji mariekkendo moluoro Nyasaye kuom ji duto.  Nyaka gibed joadiera, kendo ma oknyal chamo asoya.  Gin ema mondo iketgi jotend ji.  Jomoko kuomgi onegorit ji alufu achiel achgiel, to moko ji mia mia, kendo moko ji pieroabich abich, to moko ji apar apar.
Jogi ema mondo ong’ad ni ji burapile.  Buche matek kende ema ginyalo kelo iri, to moko matindo to ging’adkendgi.  Kipogo ting’ kodgi kamano, to tiji biro dong’ moromi.
Kitimogima awachoni, to Nyasaye biroo konyi, mi ok ibi ol, kendo ji duto nyalodok miechgi piyo, ka buchegi oserumo. "
Musa nowinjo wach jaduong’ne, motimo kaka nowachone.
Noyiero jomariek kuom jo-Israel duto, moketogi jotelo mag ji alufu achiel achiel, gimag ji mia mia, gi mag ji piero abich abich, kod mag ji apar apar.
Jotelogo ne ng’ado bura ni ji kinde duto.  Buche matek kende ema negitero ir Musa, to mago matindo ne ging’ado kendgi giwegi.
Bang’e Musanoweyo jaduong’ne oa, modok thurgi. Wuok
Jo-Israel e got Sinai
E due mar adek kane jo-Israel osewuok Misri, ne gichopo e thim Sinai.
Ne giwuok Refidim mi gitundo e thim Sinai, kuma ne gibworoe momanyoregi got.
Musa noidho godno ir Nyasaye.  Mi Ruoth Nyasaye noluonge giegot, mowachone niya, "Nyis nyikwa Jakobo ma jo-Israel kama:
‘Nunenogima natimo ni jo-Misri, kendo kaka nakelou ira, ka ating’ou kaka ongoting’o nyithinde e bwombe.
Koro ka unuluora murit singruok ma atimokodu, to unubed joga awuon, ma aseyiero kuom ogendini duto; nikech pinyduto en mara.
Unubed oganda mowal, matiyona ka jodolo. ’ Mano e wach maonego inyis jo-Israel. "
Omiyo Musa nodhi, mochoko jotend jo-Israel kanyakla, monyisogi wecheduto mane Ruoth Nyasaye osewachone.
Ji duto nodwoke rat niya, "Wayietimo gik moko duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho. " Mi Musa nodwoko ni RuothNyasaye wach mane ji owacho.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,"Abiro biro iri ka an ei bor polo mapek, mondo awuo kodi ka ji winjo,mondo gen ma gigenigo kik rum. " Musa nonyiso Ruoth Nyasaye gima jinodwoko.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Dhiyo, ipuodh ji kawuono gi kinykendo inyisgi gilwok lepgi.
To orucha nyaka gibed moikore, nikechodiechieng’no ema an Ruoth Nyasaye, nalor ewi got Sinai, kama ji dutononenae.
Nyaka iket tong’ molworo got, kendo iwach ni ji niya, ‘Neuruni ok uidho got, kata mana nyono tike.  Ka ng’ato omulo got, to nyakanege.
To ka unege, kik umule gi lwetu, to goyeuru mana gi kite katachieleuru mana gi asere.  Timuru kamano ni dhano kata ni le.  To mak manaka tung’ oywak eka ji nyalo dhi e got. ’ "
Musa nolor oa e got, moduogo ir ji.  Nopuodhogi, kendo ne gilwokolepgi.
Nowachonigi niya, "Ikreuru, kendo kik uriwru gi mon, mondoorucha oyud ka usepuodhoru. "
Chieng’ mar adek, kane piny oru, polo ne mor kendo mil ewi got, bendene nitie bor polo mapek, kendo tung’ maywak, mi ji duto mane nie kambinokirni.
Musa notelo ni ji ka gia e kambi gidhi romo gi Nyasaye, mi negichung’ e tiend got Sinai.
Wi got duto notimo iro, nikech RuothNyasaye noselorie, ka en ei mach.  Iro ne dhuolore, kendo ji duto nekirni malich.
Ywak tung’ nomedore kendo e kinde ka kinde mane Musawuoyo, Nyasaye ne dwoke gi mor polo.
Ruoth Nyasaye nolor, mochung’ ewigot Sinai, kendo noluongo Musa kanyo, mi Musa noidho modhi ire.
Nowacho ni Musa niya, "Lor idhi isiem ji dipo ka gikadho tong’ mondogibi ginena, nono to gibiro tho mang’eny.
Kata mana jodolo bende,moyienigi chopo ira, nyaka ne ni opuodhore, nono to abiro mwomorakuomgi. "
To Musa nodwoko Ruoth Nyasaye ni, "Ji ok nyal biro ewi gotSinai ku, nikech in iwuon ema nisiemowa matek, kichikowa ni mondo wakettong’ ni got mondo wawalego, osik maler. "
Ruoth Nysaye nowachone niya,"Lor mondo idhi iom Harun.  To jodolo kaachiel gi ji kik kadh tong’ kagiidho ira, nono to abiro mwomora kuomgi. "
Omiyo Musa nodhi ir ji,mowuoyo kodgi. Wuok
Chike apar(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Nyasaye nowuoyo kowacho wechegi:
"An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, maneogolou e piny Misri kuma ne ubedoe wasumbni.
"Kik ubed gi Nyasaye moro, to mak mana an.
"Kik ulos kido moro mopa kata gima chalo gi gimoro manie polo malo,kata manie piny mwalo, kata mana manie pi ma e bwo piny.
Kikukulrunigi, kata lamogi kik ulamgi, nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuan Nyasaye ma janyiego.  Akumo nyithind joma ochaya nikech richojonywolgi nyaka tieng’ mar adek gi mar ang’wen,
to tienge gana gi ganamohera kendo momako chikna, to ahero gi hera mosiko.
"Kik uluong nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kayiem nono, nimar anakumng’ato ka ng’ato mokonyore gi nyinga e yo ma ok ni kare.
"Paruru chieng’ Sabato, kendo uwale ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nyaka uti tijeuduto kuom ndalo auchiel,
to chieng’ mar abiriyo en chieng’ yweyo mowalni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Chieng’no, un kaachiel gi yawuotu kodnyiu, kata wasumbu machwo gi mamon, kata jambu, kata mana jodak maniemiechu, kik ti tich moro,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye mochweyo polo gi pinykod nam, kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie igi kuom ndalo auchiel, tochieng’ mar abiriyo noyueyo.  Mano emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye noguedho chieng’Sabato, kowale mondo obed maler.
"Luor wuoru gi meru, eka mondo idag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu biro miyou.
"Kik ineki.
"Kik iterri.
"Kik ikwal.
"Kik ihang ni ng’ato wach.
"Kik igomb od ng’ato, kata chi ng’ato, kata misumba ng’ato, kata dherng’ato, kata kanj ng’ato, kata gimoro amora ma ng’ato nigo. "Luoro omako jo-Israel(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Kane ji duto oneno ka polo mor kendo mil, bende kane giwinjo ka tung’ywak, kendo gineno ka got dum’ iro, ne gikirni, mi gichung’ gi chien.
Ne giwacho ni Musa niya, "In ema mondo iwuo kodwa, to wabiro winjowachni.  To ka Nyasaye ema owuoyo kodwa, to wabiro tho. "
Musa nodwokoginiya, "Kik uluor, nimar Nyasaye osebiro mana ni mondo otemu, kendo omiusik kuluore mondo kik utim richo. "
Ji nochung’ gi chien, to Musakende ema nosudo machiegni gi bor polo mapek mane Nyasaye nie iye. Chike mag kende mag misango
Ruoth Nysaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Nyis jo-Israel kama: ‘Koro ung’eyoni asewuoyo kodu gie polo.
Kik ulos nyiseche mag fedha kata magdhahabu mondo ulam kaachiel koda.
Nyaka ulosna kendo-mar-misango marlowo, kendo utimie misengni miwang’o pep, kod misengni mag sawo, mutimogi rombu kod dhou.  Kamoro amora ma achiko ni mondo ulamae, to anabiekendo naguedhue.
Kapo ni uloso na kendo-mar-misango gi kite, to kikugere gi kite mopa, nikech kupayogi, to umiyo kendono bedo mogak.
Kikng’ato dhi e kendona-mar-misango koidho raidhi, nimar dipo ka dugeoneno. ’ "Wuok
Chike mag rito wasumbini(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
"Chike ma nyaka imi jo-Israel e magi:
"Ka ng’ato ong’iewo misumba ma ja-Hibrania, to misumbano notine kuomhigni auchiel, to e higa mar abiriyo nyaka oweye oa, mak ochulo gimoro.
Kane obiro kapok okendo, to enodog kende.  To kane obiro kosekendo, toenodog ir chiege.
To ka ruodhe ema omiye dhako, mi onywologo nyithindo,dhakono gi nyithindogo, nyaka dong’ ni ruodhe, to ng’atno noa kende.
Tokapo ni misumbano ohulo ratiro niya, ‘Ahero ruodha gi chiega kodnyithinda, omiyo ok adwar a’,
to ruodhe nyaka tere e nyim Nyasaye,kendo e dhoot kata e sis dhoot, mi otuch ite gi riw, kendo ng’atno nobedmisumbane nyak chieng’.
"Ka ng’ato ong’iewo nyar ng’ato mondo obed misumbane, to ok nowenyakono oa kaka iweyo wasumbini machwo.
To ka ok otoyo ruodhemanong’iewe ka dwaro kende, ruodheno nyaka weye mondo ng’ato oware.  Took oyiene mondo ong’iewe ni japiny moro, nikech osewuonde.
Ka odwaro nimondo wuode okende, to nyaka osewe kaka dosew nyare owuon.
Ka omedodhako machielo, to nyaka one ni pod omiyo mokwongono chiemo, gi lewni,kendo onindo e ode.
To ka ok otimne gik moko adego, to nyaka oweye oamak ochulo gimoro. Chike mag timbe mahundu
"Ngato ka ng’ato mogoyo wadgi monego, en bende nonege.
To kaobothne, to onyalo ringo mondo odhi oresre kuma abiro nyisou.
To kang’ato okinyo wadgi, monego maroyiem, to unugole kata mana e kendona marmisango mondo onege.
"Ng’at mogoyo wuon kata min nyaka negi.
"Ng’at mokwalo dhano nyaka negi, kata da bed ni oyud koseng’iewe,kata koyud ka pod en kode.
"Ng’at mokuong’o wuon kata min nyaka negi.
"Ka ji dhaw, mi ng’ato ogoyo wadgi gi kidi kata gi adhong’, to jalmogono ok otho, to obedo matuo e pien,
kendo bang’e ochango, ma koroonyalo wuotho oko kata mana kosirore gi luth, to jal mane ogoyeno oknobed gi bura.  To nyaka ochul gimoro kuom kinde ma jalo oseketho, kendonyaka one ni othiedhe, mochango chuth.
"Ka ng’ato ogoyo misumbane ma dichwo kata madhako gi luth motho ewago, to nyaka kume.
To ka misumbaneno obet mangima kuom ndalo achielkata ariyo, to ok nokume, nikech misumba en mwandu ruodhe.
"Ka chwo moko gore, mi moro otuomore kuom dhako ma yach, mi dhakonoiye okirore, to tuo moro ok oluwe, ng’at mohinyeno nyaka chul gima chwordhakono dwaro, ka jong’ad bura oyiego.
E kinde akinda ma ng’ato ohinyowadgi, to kum nyaka bed maromre gi hinyruok: Ngima kar ngima,
wang’kar wang’, lak kar lak, tielo kar tielo,
weng’o kar weng’o, lero karlero, kendo chwat kar chwat.
"Ka ng’ato ogoyo wang’ misumbane ma dichwo kata madhako motucho, tonyaka owe ni misumbaneno thuolo mondo oa, kar chule pesa mar wang’eno.
Kata ka ng’ato omuko lak misumbane, to nyaka owene thuolo mondo oa,kar chule lakeno. Chike momako weg gik moko
"Ka rwath ochwowo dichwo kata dhako moro, monego, to nyaka go rwadhnogi kite mi tho, kendo ringre kik cham.  To wuon rwadhno ok noyud kum.
To ka rwadhno osebedo ka chwowo ji, kendo osesiem wuon-go, to otamoretueye, mi onego ng’ato, to wuon-go bende nyaka negi.
To ka buch thooloki, moketne chudo, to nyaka ochul gimoro amora mowachne, mondo owargongimane.
Ka rwath onego nyathi moro, bed ni en wuowi kata nyako, tochik achielno ema nyaka tigo.
To ka rwath onego misumba ma dichwo katamadhako, to wuon rwadh-no nyaka chul ruodh misumbano fedha moromo nuskilo, kendo rwadhno nyaka go gi kite mi tho.
"Ka ng’ato oelo dho bur, moweyo nono, kata ka okunyo bur, to ok oumodhoge, mi rwath kata faras onyumoree,
to nyaka ochul chiayono.  Enochulwuon chiayo pesa, to chiayo mothono nodong’ne.
"Ka rwadh ng’ato onego rwadh ng’at machielo, to ji ariyogo nyaka lokrwath mangimano pesa, mondo gipogre, kendo ring chiayo mothono bendenyaka gipogre.
To ka ong’ere ni rwadhno jachwow rwedhi wetene, towuon-go nyaka chul rwath kar rwadhno, to chiayo mothono dong’ne. Wuok
Chike moket kuom chulo gima okethi
"Ka ng’ato okwalo rwath kata rombo, mi oyang’o kata ong’iewo, to nyakaochul rwedhi abich kar rwadhno, kata rombe angwen kar rombono.
-
Nyakaochule te.  To ka jakuogno jachan, to nyaka ong’iewe ka misumba, mondopesa mong’ieweggo obed chudo kar gima osekwalo.  To ka oyude gi chiayonoka pod ngima, kata bed ni en rwath kata kanyna kata mana rombo, to nyakaochul nyadiriyo. "Ka ojuk jakuo katuro ot, mi onege, to ok noyal ng’at monegeno e buchnek.  To ka gima kamano otimore ka chieng’ osewuok, to nyaka yal ng’atmonegeno e buch nek.
"Ka ng’ato kwayo jamni e puoth cham, kata e puoth mzabibu, moweyo jambeochamo puoth ng’at machielo, to nyaka ochul chamgo gi cham mabeyo, kataochul olembego gi olembe mabeyo mag puothe owuon.
"Ka mach omuoch, kendo olandore, momako yugi, kendo owang’o tuche magcham mobeti, kata cham ma pok oka, kata mana puodho ngima, ng’at momokomajno nyaka chul kar gik mokethogo.
"Ka ng’ato omiyo wadgi pesa kata gimoro ni mondo okanne, mi okwal gigoe od wadgino, koyud jakuogno to nyaka ochul gik mokwalgo nyadiriyo.
Toka ok oyude, to nyaka wuon odno dhi e nyim Nyasaye mondo okuong’re ni okokawo gino.
"Gimoro amora mochachni, kata rwath kata kanyna, kata rombo, kata law,kata gimoro amora mokwany ma ji ariyo laro, nyaka ter wachne e nyimNyasaye.  Jal ma Nyasaye onyiso ni e jaketho, nyaka chul wadgi mokehonenonyadiriyo.
"Ka ng’ato oriembo ni wadgi kanyna, kata dhiang’, kata rombo, katachiayo moro amora, mi chiayono otho, kata ohinyore, kata ope e kwath, kang’ama neno onge,
to ng’at mane oriembnegono nyaka kuong’re e nyimNyasaye, konyiso ni en ok okawe.  To ka oyud ni ok okwale adier, towuon-go nyaka we wachno kamano, kendo ng’atno ok nochule.
To ka okwalchiayono kuome, to nyaka ochul wuon-go.
To ka ondiek ema onege nyakaokel ringe modong’ mondo ji one, nikech ok onego ochul gima ondiek emaonego.
"Ka ng’ato oholo chiach wadgi, to bang’e chiayono ohinyore kata othoka wuon-go onge, to jal moholono nyaka chule.
To ka chiayono ohinyorekata otho ka wuon-go nitie, to jaholono ok chule.  To ka en gima ichuloegimoro, to euon chiayono noyud mana chudono kende. Chike mag dak gi mag dini
"Ka ng’ato osero nyako ngili ma pok okendi mi oriworego, to nyakaokende.
To ka wuon nyako odagi ni ng’atno ok kend nyare, to nyakang’atno chul pesa moromo nywomo nyako ngili.
"Kik uwe dhako ma jajwok bed ngima, to nyaka unege.
"Ng’ato moterore gi chiayo nyaka negi.
"Ng’ato motimo liswa ni nyasaye moro, ma ok Ruoth Nyasaye, nyakanegi.
"Kik uthag jadak, kata kik uthire, nikech un bende ne un jodak e pinyMisri,
bende kik uthag chi liel kata nyathi ma kich.
Ka uthagogi, migiywakna mondo akonygi, to anawinjgi,
kendo anakech kodu, mi anakellweny ma unuthoe.  Kamano mondu nodong’ mond liete, kendo nyithindu nobedkiye.
"Ka iholo ng’ata moro ma jachan pesa, to kik ikaw kuome ohala, kajahol pesa.
Kata ka ng’ato osingoni lawe, to nyaka idwokne lawno kapokchieng’ opodho,
nikech mano e lawe kende moumorego.  Ka ok itimokamano, to ere gima donindie? Ka oywakna ni mondo akonye, to anawinje,nikech ang’won.
"Kik uyany Nyasaye, kendo kik ukuong’ jotendu.
"Kik utamru miya chiwo moa kuom chambu, kata kuom divai, kata kuom mo. Yawuotu makayo bende nyaka umiya,
kendo utim kamano gi jambu, bende. Nyaka gibed gi min-gi kuom ndalo abiriyo, to chieng’ mar aborounumiyagi.
"Unubed ji mowalna, omiyo kik ucham ring’o ma ondiek onego oko ethim, to nyaka uwite mana ni guogi. Wuok
Bura makare kendo madiera
"Kik ijig wach, kendo kik ikony ng’at ma jaketho, kibedo janeno marmiriambo.
Kik itim gimoro marach mana nikech iluoro koma ji ng’enyie,kata kik iketh bura mana nikech idwaro chwako koma ji ng’enyie.
Tobende kik idog ni ng’at modhier kayiem.
"Kineno dher jasiki kata kanje karingo lal, to nyaka igeng’e mi idwokeni wuon-go.
Ka iyudo kanj ng’at moro mamon kodi kopodho gi misike, tonyaka ikony wuon-go chunge, kata dabed ni ok idwar konye.
"Kik uketh buch jachan, kiyale.
Beduru mabor gi wach mar miriambo,kendo kik umi ng’at ma onge ketho ng’adne buch tho, nimar ok nawe ng’atmotimo marach machalo kamano.
Kik ucham asoya nikech asoya mono katang’at maber wacho adiera, kendo owito buch ng’at ma onge gi ketho.
"Kik usand jodak, nikech ung’eyo paro ma jodak nigo, nimar un bende neun jodak e piny Misri. Higa mar Sabato, kod chieng’ Sabato
"Unyalo puro lopu kuom higni auchiel, kendo kayo gik monyakie.
To ehiga mar abiriyo nyaka uwe onindi mak opure, mondo jou modhier ocham gikmoloth kuno.  To le mae thim nocham gik ma joma odhier oweyo kuno. Puotheu mag mzabibu, gi mag zeituni bende nyaka uwe kamano.
"Unuti kuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo kik uti, mondo dhougi kenjeu oyue, kendo mondo chuny wasumbu kod chuny jodak oduogi.
"Mak uru weche duto ma asenyisou.  Kik ulam nyiseche mamoko, kendo kikumul nyinggi. Sewni adek madongo(Wuok
.
-
; Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
"Nyaka utimna sawo didek e higa:
Unurit Sap Makati ma ok ketie Thowikaka nachikou, kuchamo makati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo ekinde moketie e due mar Abib, ni mar dueno ema ne uae Misri.  Kik ng’atobi e nyima gi lwete nono.
Kukayo cham nmane uchwoyo e lopu, to nyakautim Sap Keyo, kukelona cham mukwongo kayo.  Bende unutim Sap Olembe egiko higa, ka usepono olembe puotheu mag mzabibu kod mag zeituni.
Kinde adekgo e higa, jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyima an RuothNyasaye.
"E kinde ma utimonae misango gi chiayo, to kik uchiw gimoro moketiethowi, kendo kik uwe bor chiayo motimnago misango dong’ nyaka piny rumak uwang’o pep.
"Cham mabeyoe moloyo mukwongo kayo, nyaka ukel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu. "Kutedo nyadiel, to kik uolie cha min mare. Malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye oor mondo otel ni jo-Israel
"Koro aoro malaika mondo otelnu e yo, koritou nyaka kuma aseiko.
Nyaka uwinj wachne, kendo utim kaka owacho.  Kik utamru winje, nikechkutamoru kamano, to ok nowenu richo ma kamano, nimar an ema an kode.
To ka uwinjo wachne, mutimo duto mawachonu, to anakednu gi wasigu,kendo anathag joma thagou.
Malaikana notel e nyimu, kendo noteru epiny ma jo-Amor gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus odakie,mi anatiek ogendinigo.
To kik ukulru ni nyiseche jogo, kata kikulamgi.  Bende kik utim gik ma jogo timo.  Nyaka uketh nyisechegi chuth,kendo nyaka umuk sirni maggi ma gilamo.
Lamauru, an Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, mi anaguedhu gi chiemo kod pi, bende anatiek tuoche dutokuomu.
Ong’e dhako ma iye nokirre e pinyu, kendo onge ma nobedmigumba.  Bende anami udag aming’a.
"Anaor kihondko otel nyimu mondo ochand joma dwaro kedo kodu, mi anamiwasiku duto ringu.
Bende anaor luoro mondo otel nyimu, kendo luoronogo noriemb jo-Hivi gi jo-Kanaan kod jo-Hiti, mondo owenu thuolo.
Oknariembgi duto e higa achiel, nimar dipo ka piny odong’ nono, molokorethim, kendo ondiegi dinywolre mi thagu.
To anariembgi matintin nyakachop kusemedoru mang’eny moromo kawo pinyno duto.
Anayar tong’ pinyu,kochakore e Nam Makwar nyak Nam Maduong’ manie tong’ jo-Filistia, kendokochakore e thim man yo milambo, nyaka aora Yufrate.  Anami ulo jopinyno,mi unuriembgi.
Kik utim kodgi winjruok kendo kik ulam nyisechegi,
kik uwe gidag e pinyu nimar dipo ka gimiyo uketho e nyiuma mi ulamonyisechegi.  Mano dilokrenu obadho. "Wuok
Jo-Israel otimo winjruok gi Nyasaye
Noyudo ka Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni Musa niya, "Bi ira e got, kaachielgi Harun gi Nadab gi Abihu kod jodong Israel piero abiriyo, to kapokuchopo machiegni, kulreuru mondo ulem.
In kendi, Musa, ema nichopmachiegni koda.  Jomokogo ok nosud ira, to bende onge ng’ato ang’ata manoidh kodi ku. "
Musa nodhi monyiso ji chike kod buche duto mag Ruoth Nysaye.  Ji dutonodwoke niya, "Wayie timo gik moko duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho. "
Musa nondiko chike duto mag Ruoth Nyasaye.  To kinyne gokinyi nogerokendo-mar-misango e tiend got, kendo nochungo kite apar gariyo magrapar, maromre gi kar romb dhout Israel apar gariyo.
Eka nooro yawuowimoko ma jo-Israel monego rwedhi, mi gitimogo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengnimiwang’o pep, kod misengni mag sawo.
Musa nokawo remo moko, moolo etewni, to remo modong’ nokiro e kendo mar-misango.
Bang’e nokawo kitabumondikie weche mag singruokgo, mosomo matek mondo ji duto owinji.  Gidutone giwacho niya, "Wayie winjo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo wanatim dutomosechiko. "
Bang’ mano Musa nokawo remo, mokiro kuom ji, kowacho niya,"Ma e remo mar singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo utimo kode, kaluworegi weche manie kitabuni. "
Musa gi Harun gi Nadab kod Abihu, kaachiel gi jodong Israel pieroabiriyo nodhi e got, moneno Nyasach Israel.
Nochung’ ewi gima chalo gilaro molos gi kit ombo marieny mana ka polo.
To Ruoth Nyasaye ne okohinyo jodong Israelgo.  Ne gineno Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gichiemo kode kendogimetho. Musa e got Sinai
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Bi ira e got ku, mondo ibed ka. Abiro miyi kite mopamore ma asendikoe buche kod chike mondo ipuonj ji. "
Musa kaachiel gi Joshua jatichne nodhi e god Nyasaye.
Noyudo Musaosewacho ni jodong Israel niya, "Ritwauru ka, nyaka waduogi.  Harun kodHur eki odong’ kodu.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato man gi wach modwaro loso to mondoodhi irgi. "
Kamano Musa nodhi ewi got, kendo bor polo noimo got.
Duong’ malermar Ruoth Nyasaye nolor ewi got Sinai, mi bor polo noimo got kuom ndaloauchiel.  To chieng’ mar abiriyo Ruoth Nyasaye noluongo Musa gi e borpolo.
Duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye ne chalo ni jo-Israel mana kamach maduong’ maliel ewi got.
Musa nodonjo e bor polono, modhi ewigot, kendo nobet kuno kuom ndalo piero ang’wen odiechieng gotieno. Wuok
Nyasaye okwayo jo-Israel mondo okelne chiwo(Wuok
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel mondo okelnachiwo, kendo ichokna chiwo moro amora kuom ji duto moyie golo kuomherogi.
Gik ma onego ichok e magi: Dhahabu gi fedha kod mula,
kaachielgi law mambulu kod marathuol kod makwar, kod law katana maber, gi yiediek,
gi piende rombe molok gi range makwar gi piende monyong’ gi yiendshita,
gi mor taya kod gik mang’ue ng’ar,
gi kite mibiro keto e lawdolo miluongo ni efod kod law agoko.
Bang’ mano gigerna Kama Ler mondoadag kodgi.
To nyaka gere kaachiel gi gige duto, kiluwo mana kido maabiro nyisi. Sanduk mar Rapar(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los sanduk ma borne oromo mita achiel, to lachne nus mita, kendoborne modhi malo bende nus mita.
Bawe gi dhahabu maler, oko gi iye,kendo ilosne laini mar dhahabu molwuoro bethene duto.
Thedhne rategeang’wen mag dhahabu, kendo ketgi e tiendene ang’wen.  Ratege ariyo nobede bathe konchiel, to ariyo e bathe komachielo.
Los ludhe ariyo giyiend sida, mi ibawgi gi dhahabu,
kendo irwakgi e ratege manie bathsanduk koni gi koni mondo oting’go sanduk.
Ludhego nyaka sik eiratege, ma ok ogolgi oko.
To ketie kite ariyo mag rapar ma abiro miyi.
