"Losne raum mar dhahabu ma borne oromo mita achiel, to lachne nusmita, obed kar-ng’wono.
Kaw dhahabu, ithedhgo kido ariyo machalo gimalaika miluongo ni kerubi, mondo gibed gimoro achiel gi raum, mondoobed kar ng’wono.
Kerubi achiel nobed e dho raum konchiel, kendoachiel e dhoge komachielo.
Ginibed ka giyaro buombegi malo mondogigeng’ raum, kendo ginimanyre, ka ging’iyo wi raum.
Ket raumno e dhosanduk, to iye ketie kite ariyo mag rapar ma abiro miyi.
Kanyo emanaromie kodi, kendo ka an ewi raum e kind kerubi ariyo manie wi SandugRapar, anamiyi chikena duto, iter ni jo-Israel. Mesa mar makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los mesa gi yiend sida, ma borne romo mita achiel, to lachne nusmita, kendo borne modhi malo bende nus mita.
Bawe gi dhahabu maler,kendo ilosne laini mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto.
Chue mithe alworama lachne romo tat lwedo achiel, kendo ichue dir mitheno gi dhahabu.
Ilos ratege ang’wen mag dhahabu, kendo ichomgi e tunge ang’wen magmesa kama tiendene nitie, mondo oting’ego.
Ratege ma norwakie ludhemiting’ego nobed e mithe.
Ilos ludhego gi yiend sida, kendo ibawgi gidhahabu.  Gin ema noting’ kodgi mesano.
Los tewni gi kikombe gi agulnikod agwetni mitiyogo kitimo misengni miolo piny.  Gigo duto nyaka los gidhahabu maler.
To makati miketo e nyima pile nyaka bed e mesano ndaloduto. Rachung taya mar dhahabu(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ilos rachung taya gi dhahabu maler.  Tiende kod kore to mondo ilos gidhahabu mothedhi, kendo maupe mogorie, kaachiel, gi thiepegi kodobokegi, nyaka los obed gimoro achiel kode.
Nobed gi bede auchiel moae bathe koni gi koni, adek e bathe konchiel, kendo adek e bathekomachielo.
Moro ka moro nyaka bed gi maupe adek mogor kaachiel githiepegi kod obokegi, machal gi thiep oyungu.
E kor taya hie nyakabedie maupe ang’wen man gi thiepe kod oboke machalo gi thiep oyungu.
Bede ariyo ariyo mag rachungino nyaka bed gi maua achiel e bwogi.
Maupego gi bedego kod rachungino nobed gimoro achiel mothedh gidhahabu maler.
To bende ilos teyni abiriyo ni rachungi, kendo iketgimalo mondo giliel ka gimenyo yo ka nyime.
Rangis teyni kod tepe nyakalos gi dhahabu maler.
To nyaka ikonyri gi kilo piero abich mag dhahabumaler kuom loso rachungino, kaachiel gi gige duto.
To nyaka ine niilosogi machal gi kido mane onyisi ewi got. Wuok
Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los Hema Maler gi pasia apar mag law katana maber.  Nyaka gor kuomgikido mar kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, ma jatweng’o maolony ema ogoro.
Bor pasia ka pasia nyaka bed mita apar gang’wen, tolachne mita ariyo, kendo giduto nyaka gibed maromre.
Abich kuomgi noriwkaachiel, kendo abich modong’ bende noriw kamano.
Nyaka ilos tondemambulu piero abich e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia abich mokwongo,kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia abichmodong’.
Tondego nyaka bed momanyore.
Bende ilos ramekni piero abichmag dhahabu kendo iriwgo pasia ariyo momanyorego, mondo Hema Maler obedgimoro achiel.
"Los Hema gi pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek, mondo obed hema ma okomaumo Hema Maler.
Bor pasia ka pasia nyaka bed mita apar gabich, tolachne mita ariyo.  Giduto nyaka gibed maromre.
Riw pasia abichkaachiel, kendo auchiel modong’ bende iriw kamano.  Bang’e ban pasia marauchiel mondo obed e dho Hema gi malo.
Los tonde piero abich e riakpasia matung’ kuom pasia abich, kendo tonde piero abich moko e riakpasia matung’ kuom pasia auchiel.
Bende los ramekni piero abich magmula, kendo irwakgi e tonde mondo iriwgo hema obed gimoro achiel.
Bathhema modong’ koliero, nyaka geng’ tok Hema Maler.
Kamano hema maokobiro bedo mabor moloyo pasia maiye gi nus mita koni gi koni, omiyo obiroliero mondo ogeng’ Hema Maler.
To bende los raum mar piende imbe molokgi range makwar mondo oumgo hema maokono, kendo raum machielo molos gipiende monyong’, mondo obed ewi mokwongono.
"Nyaka ilos ni Hema Maler sirni mag yiende shita.
Bor mar siro kasiro nyaka bed mita abich, to lachne nus mita.
Siro ka siro nyaka bedgi tiendene ariyo moriw kaachiel.  Sirni duto mag Hema Maler nyaka losmachal kamano.
Kiloso sirnigo, to nyaka ilos piero ariyo migerogo sisimar Hema Maler mochomo yo milambo,
kendo ilos rachungi piero ang’wenmag fedha mirwakoe sirnigo.  Rwak tiende ariyo mag siro mokwongo erachungi ariyo, kendo itim kamano gi sirni duto.
Sisi mar Hema Malermochomo yo nyandwat bende nyaka ilosne sirni piero ariyo,
kaachiel girachungi piero ang’wen mag fedha.  Rwak siro ka siro ei rachungi ariyoariyo.
Bende los sirni auchiel ni tok Hema Maler koma odok yo podhochieng’,
kaachiel gi ariyo mamoko mibiro keto e konde ariyo man yo katok Hema Maler.
Sirni mag kondego nyaka riw gi ratego achiel, chakreka tiendegi nyaka malo.  Sirni ariyogo duto nyaka los machal.
Kamanoginibed sirni aboro kod rachungi apar gauchiel mag fedha.  Siro ka siromondo orwak ei rachunge ariyo ariyo.
"Los rariw apar gabich gi yiend shita.
Rariw abich obed mag sirnimag bath Hema Maler konchiel, kendo abich mamoko obed mag sirni molosgoka toke, mochomo yo podho chieng’.
Rariw ka rariw madiere mondo okadhe kor sirni, koa tung’ konchiel nyaka tung’ komachielo.
Nyaka gibawsirnigo gi dhahabu, kendo iketnigi ratege mag dhahabu mondo omakrariwgo, ma bende nyaka ibaw gi dhahabu.
Kamano nyaka ilos Hema Maler,kiluwo mana kido mane onyisi ewi got.
"Twang’ pasia mar law katana maber.  Nyaka jatueng’o molony gor kuomekido mag kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.
Ng’aw pasiano girang’aw mag dhahabu e sirni ang’wen mag yiend shita, mobaw gi dhahabu,kendo morwak ei rachungi ang’wen mag fedha.
Kiseliere e rang’awgo, ekaiket Sandug Rapar e toke gi yo ka iye.  Kamano pasiano nopog kind KaMaler kod Kama Ler Moloyo.
Bang’e ket raum ewi Sandug Rapar ei KamaLer Moloyo.
Mesa nyaka ket yo nyandwat gi yo ka oko mar pasia, torachung taya iket momanyore gi mesa, yo milambo mar Hema Maler.
Los nidho Hema pasia mar law katana maber.  Nyaka gorie maradadi gi usi mambulugi maralik kod makwar.
Los ni pasiano sirni abich gi yiend shita, miibaw gi dhahabu, kendo iketnigi rang’aw mag dhahabu kod rachunge abichmag mula. Wuok
Kendo-mar-Misango(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los kendo-mar-misango gi yiend shita.  Borne gi lachne mondo obed mitaariyo gi nus.
Nyaka ilosne konde ang’wen e kondene mondo gibed gimoroachiel kode, kendo ibawe gi mula.
Bende losne agulni mag golo buru kodmo, kaachiel gi rajow gi tewni gi rachwow kod tep mach.  Giduto nyakailosgi gi mula.
Losne gimoro mar mula machalo gi sing’enge, kendoikelne ratege achiel achiel mag mula e kondene ang’wen.
Kete e bwondiri molworo kendo-mar-misango gi yo ka piny, mondo ochop mana e korkendo-mar-misango.
Los ni kendono ludhe mag shita, kendo ibawgi gimula.
Norwakgi e ratege man e bath kendo koni gi koni, mondo oting’ego.
Nyaka ilos kendo-mar-misango gi bao, to iye mondo obed thuolo, ka isanduk.  Lose mana kaka ne onyisi ewi got. Laru mar Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los laru ni Hema Maler.  Koma odok yo milambo nyaka bed gi pasia marlaw katana maber ma borne romo mita piero abich,
mong’aw e sirni pieroariyo, morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula.  To rang’aw kod rategemiriwogo sirnigo nyaka bed mag fedha.
Kamano koma odok yo nyandwatbende nyaka bed gi pasia ma borne romo mita piero abich, mong’aw e sirnipiero ariyo, morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula.  Rang’epi kod rategemiriwogo sirni bende nyaka bed mag fedha.
To lach laru modok yo podhochieng’ nyaka bed gi pasia ma borne romo mita piero ariyo gabich,mong’aw e sirni apar, morwak e rachungi apar.
To lachne koma omanyo yowuok chieng’, bende borne nyaka rom mita piero ariyo gabich.
E dirrangach koni gi koni nyaka bedie pasia ma borne romo mita abiriyo ginus.
Pasia ka pasia nyaka ng’aw e sirni adek, morwak e rachungi adek.
To e dhoranga laru iketie pasia mar law law katana maber, mogoriemaradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.  Pasiano nong’aw e sirniang’wen morwak e rachungi ang’wen.
Sirni duto molworo laru nyaka bedgi ratege mag fedha, kod rachungi mag mula.
Kamano bor laru biro bedomita piero abich, to lachne mita piero ariyo gabich, kendo borne modhimalo mita ariyo gi nus.  Pasiano nyaka los gi law katana maber, kendorachungi duto nyaka bed mag mula.
Gik moko duto mibiro tiyogo e HemaMaler, kaachiel gi loyene duto, kod mago mag laru, nyaka los gi mula. Tich rito Taya(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"In iwuon nyaka ichik jo-Israel mondo okelni mor zeituni maliw mondooliel e taya pile.
Tayano nyaka bed ei Hemb Romo ma Nyasaye romoe gijoge, gi yoka oko mar pasia mogeng’o Sandug Rapar.  Harun gi yawuotenyaka rite pile mondo oliel e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, chakre odhiambo nyakapiny ru.  Chikni omako jo-Israel kod nyikwagi nyaka chieng’. Wuok
Lep Jodolo(Wuok
.
-
)
"In iwuon nyaka iluong Harun owadu gi yawuote, ma Nadab gi Abihu giEleazar kod Ithamar, kuom jo-Isarael mondo iket obed jodolona.
Twang’niHarun owadu lep dolo, mondo omedu duong’ gi chia.
Nyis jotich molony maasemiyo rieko olos ni Harun lewni morwako kokete jadolona.
Lewni monegogilos e magi: Law agoko gi law dolo miluongo ni efod, gi aroya, gi lawakor mogorie maridadi, kaachiel gi kilemba kod okanda.  Ginibed lewnimaler ma Harun owadu gi yawuote rwako ka tiyona tich dolo.
Nyaka losgigi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber.
"Bende gilos law dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gimaralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber ma jatueng’o molony oloso.
Toobed gi misibe ariyo mitueyego gok, gi yo ka nyime kod yoka chien.
Okanda man kuome nyaka chue machal kode, kendo en bende nyaka lose gidhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber.
Kaw kite ariyo mag berul mondo indikie nying yawuot Israel.
E kidimokwongo ndikie nying’ auchiel, to nying’ auchiel modong’ ndik e kidimar ariyo, kaluwore gi nywolgi.
Ng’at molony e goro kidi ema nyakandik nying’ yawuot Israel e kite ariyogo, eka ichomgi e otunge magdhahabu.
Tuegi e misib efod, obed rapar mar yawuot Israel.  Harunnoting’ nyinggi e goke ka rapar e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Los otunge mag dhahabu
kod thiwni ariyo mag dhahabu maler, molos katol mokadi, kendo ituegi kuom otungego.
Jatueng’o molony ema nyaka loslaw agoko mar ng’ado bura gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kodmakwar, kod law katana maber, mana kaka olos efod.
Borne obed lwedoachiel, to lachne bende lwedo achiel, kendo mondo obane diriyo.
Nyakaichan laini ang’wen mag kite ma nengogi tek.  Laini mokwongo nobediesardius gi topaz kod karbunkel,
to laini mar ariyo ketie emerald gisafir kod diamond.
Laini mar adek to ketie jasinth gi agat kodamethust,
kendo laini mar ang’wen ketie berul gi oniks kod jasper. Kidi ka kidi mondo orwak e otunge achiel achiel molos gi dhahabu.
Kitego nyaka ndikie nying mag dhoudi apar gariyo, kaka igoro teremigoyogo sei.  Kidi ka kidi mondo ondikie nying’ mag dhoudi apargariyogo.
"Los ni law agoko thiwni mag dhahabu maler, mokadi ka tol.
Bende losratege ariyo mag dhahabu, kendo iketgi e riak law agoko gi malo koni gikoni.
Tue tonde ariyo mag dhahabugo e ratege manie riak law agoko konigi koni,
to dho tondego komachielo tue e otunge ariyo kande.  Kamano ekaka itud law agoko gi misibe miriwogo ka nyim efod gi katoke.
Losratege ariyo mag dhahabu, kendo iketgi e riak law agoko gi yo ka malo gika iye koni gi koni.  Nyaka gibed momanyore gi efod.
Bende ilos rategeariyo moko mag dhahabu, mi iketgi yo ka mwalo e dho misibe ariyo mag gokefod kama otwang’gigo e okanda.
Eka iriw ratege mag law agoko giratege mag efod gi tol mambulu, mondo law agoko obed ewi okanda gi malo,mondo kik ogonyre.
Kamano ka Harun donjo Kama Ler, nobed koting’onying yawuot Israel e law agoko mar ng’ado bura e kore ka rapar e nyimRuoth Nyasaye kinde duto.
"To koro mogik, nyaka iket ombulu miluongo ni Urim gi Thumim ei lawagoko mar ng’ado bura, mondo gibed e kor Harun kodonjo e nyim RuothNyasaye, ka Harun donjo e nyim Ruoth Nyasye, nobed koting’o gik ng’adobura ni jo-Israel e kore.
"Los aroya mar umo efod gi law mambulu.
Nyaka obed gi otuch e dierema wich wuokie.  Aluora mar otuchno duto nyaka twang’ gi pien, mondo kikyiech.
Twang’ gik mong’inore ka machunga molos gi usi mambulu gimaralik kod makwar e riak lawno alwora, kendo iketie gara mag dhahabu ekindgi e kindgi.
Kamano gik mong’inorego nobed mokikore gi garago elaini achiel alwora mar riake mogik piny.
Harun nyaka rwak aronyanokotiyo tich dolo, mondo garago owinj ka odonjo Kama Ler e nyim RuothNyasaye, kendo kowuok.  Kamano ok notho.
"Los gima opamore ka san gi dhahabu maler, kendo indikie ni, ‘MOWAL NIRUOTH NYASAYE’.  Wechego nyaka gor kaka igoro tere migoyogo sei.
Itueyegi tol mambulu, kendo ikete ka nyim kilemba.
Gima opamoreno nyaka bede wi Harun, kendo kamano e kaka enopwodh ketho moro ma dipo kobetie kuommich maler ma jo-Israel ochiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Omiyo gino nyaka bed ewiye kinde duto, mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie chiwogo.
"Itwang’ law akor mar katana maber, kendo ilos kilemba bende gi lawkatana maber, kod okanda mogoye maradadi.
Los ni yawuot Harun kendhegi okendni kod kilembni, mondo omedgi duong’ gi chia.
Gigi imi Harunowadu gi yawuote, eka iwirgi gi mo, kendo iwalgi mondo gibed jodolona.
Ilosnigi sirweche mag law katana machopo e thochgi, mondo oim duggi.
Harun gi yawuote nyaka rwakgi ka gidonjo e Hemb Romo, kata ka gidhi ekendo-mar-misango mondo giti tich dolo.  Kamano ok ginikethi, kendo okginitho.  Chikni omako Harun gi nyikwaye nyaka chieng’. Wuok
Keto Harun gi yawuote e tich dolo(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"Kiwalo Harun gi jowuote mondo obed jodolona, to nyaka itim kama: Kawnyarwath kod imbe ariyo maonge gi songa.
Bende ikaw makati, kek motedgi mo, kod chapat mowirie mo.  Magi duto nyaka los gi mok ngano mayom, maok oketie thowi.
Iketgi e odheru, kendo ikelgigo.  Bende ikel nyarwathgi imbe ariyo kande.
Bang’e ikel Harun gi yawuote e dho Hemb Romo kendoilwokgi.
Eka ikaw lewni kande, ma gin kandhu gi aroya maumo efod giefod wuon, kod law agoko, irwak ni Harun, kendo ituene efod gi okandane.
Sidhne kilemba, kendo ituene gima opamore cha, ma en osimbo maler.
Ekaikaw mor wir, iol e wiye kiwalego.
Bang’ mano ikel yawuote, miirwaknegi aroche,
kendo ituenigi okanda e nungogi, bende isidhnigikilemba.  Mano e kaka iniket Harun gi yawuote e tichgi, kendo ginibedjodolo mosiko nyaka chieng’.
"Kel nyarwath e nyi Hemb Romo, kendo Harun gi yawuote oket luetgi ewiye,
eka iyange e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo kanyo.
Kawrembe moko, imien gi lith lweti e tunge kendo-mar-misango.  To remo dutomodong’ iol e tiend kendono.
Eka ikaw boche duto mogawo jambich, giatel man kuom chuny, kod nyirokene, kaachiel gi boche mogawogi, kendoiwang’gi e kendo-mar-misango.
To ring nyarwath kod piene, kaachiel giich iwang’ e tok kambi oko, nikech en misango mar golo richo.
"Bang’ mano ikaw achiel kuom imbe kande, kendo Harun gi yawuote oketluetgi e wiye.
Eka iyange, kendo ikaw rembe, ipuk e korkendo-mar-misango.
Ipoge lemo lemo, kendo ilwok jambi iye kodtiendene, mi iketgi kaachiel gi ringe moko kod wichne.
Eka iwang’ imnoduto e kendo-mar-misango.  Mano en misango miwang’o pep ni Ruoth Nyasaye. En tik mang’ue ng’ar moa kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kaw im mar ariyo, kendo Harun gi yawuote oket luetgi e wiye.
Ekaiyange, kendo ikaw rembe moko mondo imien e it Harun makorachwich kod ityawuote ma korachwich kod lith luetegi mathuon makorachwich kod lithtiendegi mathwon bende.  To remo modong’, ipuk e kor kendomar-mar-misango koni gi koni.
"Kaw remo moko manie wi kendo-mar-misango, kod mor wir, mi ikir kuomHarun gii yawuote, kendo kuom lepgi, kamano Harun gi yawuote kaachiel gilepgi nodok maler.
Kaw bor im, gi sembe kod boche mogawo ich, gi atelman kuom chuny, gi nyirokene, kaachieel gi boche mogawogi, kod emmakorachwich, ni mar en im mirwakogo jodolo.
Bang’ mano ikaw makatiachiel, gi kek achiel moted gi mo, kod chapat achiel, mogol e odherumoting’o makati ma ok ketie thowi man e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ket magoduto e lwet Harun, kendo e lwet yawuote, kendo iyieggi e nyim RuothNyasaye.
Eka ikawgi e lwet Harun gi yawuote, kendo iwang’gi ekendo-mar-misango, kaachiel gi misango kmiwang’o pep, mondo gidum tikmang’ue ng’ar moa kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Bang’e ikaw agoko im mane orwakgo Harun, kendo iyiege e nyim RuothNyasaye.  En ema nobed lembi kuom chiayono.
Ipuodh agoko im maneorwakgo Harun gi yawuote, kiyiege e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Em imno mokettenge ni jodolo bende itim kamano.
Mago nobed lemo ma Harun gi yawuoteyudo kuom jo-Israel, nyaka chieng’.  En lemo moket tenge ni jodolo majo-Israel golo kuom misengni mag sawo.  En mich ma nyaka gichiw ni RuothNyasaye.
"Lep harun mag dolo nyaka dong’ ni yawuote bang’ thone mondo girwakkiwirogi kendo kiketogi e tich dolo.
Wuod Harun ma noket kare e tich,kendo ma nobed kadonjo e Hemb Romo mondo oti e Kama Ler nyaka rwakgikuom ndalo abiriyo.
"Kaw im morwakgo jodolo, inegi, eka ited ringe kamoro mowal niNyasaye,
mi Harun gi yawuote nocham ring’ono, kaachiel gi makatimodong’, ka gin e dho Hemb Romo.
Ginicham gigo mane opwodhgo richogikirwakogi kendo kiwalogi.  To ng’ato ma ok jadolo kik chamgi nimar gingik maler.
Kapo ni ring’o, kata makati moko odong’ nyaka okinyi, tonyaka wang’gi.  Kik chamgi, nimar gin gik maler.
"Tim ni Harun gi yawuote mana kaka asechiki.  Kamano ketogi e tichnokaw ndalo abiriyo.
"Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ kuom ndalo abiriyo duto, nyaka itim misangomar golo richo gi nyarwath mondo opwodhgo richo.  Kamano inipwodhkendo-mar-misango, kitimo misango mar golo richo kuome, kendo iniwire gimo kiwalego ni tich Nyasaye.
Nyaka ipwodh kendo-mar-misango kuom ndaloabiriyo, mondo obed maler moloyo.  Gimoro amora mogere kuome nodok mowalni Ruoth Nyasaye. Misengni mitimo pile(Kwan
.
-
)
"Gik ma inichiw e kendo-mar-misango gin e magi: Odiechieng’kodiechieng’ nyaka itim misango gi nyirombe ariyo ma hikgi achielachiel.
Ineg nyarombo achiel gokinyi, to machielo ineg godhiambo.
Kichiwo nyarombo mokwongo, to nyaka ichiw bende mogo mayom moromoondweto, moruw gi mo maliw moromo lita ariyo.  To bende nyaka ichiw divaimoromo lita ariyo, ka misango miolo piny.
To godhiambo ineg nyarombomachielo, kendo ichiwe kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod misango miolopiny, mana kaka nende ichiwo gokinyi, mondo odum tik mamit.  En misangomiwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Misangono nyaka bed kitimo e dho Hemb Romoe nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom tienge duto nyaka chieng’.  Kanyo ema an RuothNyasaye nabed karomoe kodu, kendo losoe kodi.
Kanyo bende ema naromiegi jo-Israel, kendo duong’na maler nomi kanyono bedo maler.
AnaguedhHemb Romo kod kendo-mar-misango obed maler, bende anawal Harun giyawuote mondo obed jodolona.
Anadag gi jo-Israel, mi anabed Nyasachgi,
kendo dakna kodgino nomi ging’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgimanogologi Misri.  Adier, an Ruoth Nyasaye an Nyasachgi. Wuok
Kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe obani(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los kendo-mar-misango mar wang’o ubani, gi yiend shita.
Borne gilachne obed nus mita maromre, to borne modhi malo obed mita achiel. Tungene nyaka bed gimoro achiel kode.
Bawe duto gi dhahabu maler, kendoichuene ndiga mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto.
Losne ratege ariyoariyo mag dhahabu, kendo iketgi e bwo ndigano e konde ariyo man koni gikoni, mondo irwakie ludhe miting’ego.
Nyaka ilos ludhego gi yiendshita, kendo ibawgi gi dhahabu.
Ket kendono e nyim pasia mogeng’oSandug Rapar, kama nobed karomoe kodu.
Harun nyaka wang’ ubani mang’ueng’ar e kendono okinyi kokinyi koiko teyni,
kendo odhiambo kodhiambokomokogi.  Kamano ubani nobed kiwang’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye nyakachieng’.
Kendono kik wang’ie ubani ma ok owinjore, kata misangomiwang’o pep, kata mar cham, kata mana mano miolo piny.
Harun nyakamien tunge kendono gi remb chiayo mitimogo misango mar golo richo higaka higa, kopwodhego.  Nyaka tim kamano dichiel e higa kuom tienge dutomondo opuodhego.  Kendono nobed maler moloyo, mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye. "Chiwo ma jo-Israel warogo ngimagi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Kikwano jo-Israel, to ng’ato kang’ato nyaka chul Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo mowarogo ngimane, mondo kik giyudmasira e ndalo mikwanogie.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato mokwan nyaka chul nusshekel mondo obed chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, (shekel achiel oromo gerapiero ariyo, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye. )
Nga’to ka ng’atomokwan ma hike oromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo nyaka chul RuothNyasaye chiwono.
Kuchulo Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo muwarogo ngimau, ng’at majamoko ok nochul mang’eny moloyo, to bende ng’at ma jachan ok nochulmorem.
Pesa ma jo-Israel chiwo kar ngimagi nyaka itigo e Hemb Romo. Pesa muchiwo kar ngimaugo nomi Ruoth Nyasaye paro jo-Israel. "Karaya mar lwok molos gi mula
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Los karaya mar lwok gi mula, marachungine bende mar mula.  Kete e kind Hemb Romo gi kendo-mar-misango,mi iolie pi
mondo harun gi yawuote olwokgo luetegi gi tiendegi.
Pileka gidonjo e Hemb Romo to nyaka gilwokre gi pigno kamano mondo kikgitho.  Bende ka gidhi e kendo-mar-misango mondo gitiye, kendo giwang’iemisango ni Ruoth Nyasaye,
to nyaka gilwok luetegi gi tiendegi mondokik githo.  Mano nobed chik mochwere momako harun gi nyikwaye kodtiengegi duto. "Mor wir, kod ubani
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa niya,
"In to ikaw gik mang’ueng’ar, mabeyo machal kama: Manemane manumu moromo kilo apar gi dalasinimoromo kilo abich, gi ondago bende kilo abich,
gi kasia kilo apar,(duto nyaka pim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye,) kod mor zeitunimoromo lita abiriyo.
Gigo ema mondo ilosgo mor wir maler mang’ueng’ar, mana kaka jalos gik mang’ue ng’ar loso.  Mano nobed mor wir maler.
Morno iwirgo Hemb Romo gi Sandug Rapar,
kod mesa gi gige, kodrachung taya gi gige, kod kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe ubani,
gi marmisango miwang’o pep, kaachiel gi gige, kod karaya mar lwok girachungine.
Kamano nyaka ipwodh gigo mondo obed maler ahinya.  Togimoro amora mogere kuomgi nobed mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To bende iwirHarun gi yawuote, kiwalogi mondo gibed jodolona.
Wach ni jo-Israelkama: ‘Morni nobed mor wir maler kuom tiengeu duto.
Kik konyruok kodekuom wiro joma ok jodolo, bende kik ulos mo moro machal kode.  Em momowal maler, kendo nyaka obednu kamano.
Ng’ato ang’ata ma nolos momachal kamano, kata manowir kode ng’at ma ok jadolo nyaka ng’ad kare okokuom jowetene. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Kaw gik ma kiwang’o to ng’ueng’ar, machalo duogo gi sare gi mieny kod ubani maler.  Pimgi maromre,kendo iketie chumbi
mondo ilosgo ubani mang’ue ng’ar, kaka jalos gikmang’ue ng’ar loso.  Nobed gima ler, kendo mowal ni tich Nyasaye.
Kawmoko, iswag mayom mondo iket e nyim Sandug Rapar ei Hemb Romo kamanaromie kodu.  Enobednu gima ler ahinya.
Ubani molos e yo makama kikukonyrugo e yoru uwegi.  Nyaka obednu gima ler ahinya, mowal ni RuothNyasaye.
Ng’ato ang’ata ma nolos ubani machal kode kamano, mondo otigoe yore owuon, nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom jowetene. "Wuok
Ruoth Nyasaye oluongo Bezalel gi Oholiab(Wuok
.
—
.
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Ng’eni aseyiero Bezalel wuod Hur,ja Juda.
Asepong’e gi Roho mara mondo obed gi lony kod nyalo, kaachielgi rieko mar ng’eyo tije duto mag lwedo, kaka:
goro kido mabeyo magdhahabu gi fedha kod mula,
kendo ng’ado kite michomo, kaachiel gi payobao, kata tich moro amora mar lwedo.
To bende aseyiero Oholiab wuodAhisamak, ja Dan, mondo okonye, kendo asemiyo jotich duto molony riekomondo olos gigo duto masechiki.
Ginilos Hemb Romo, kod Sandug Rapar giraumne kod gik moko duto mag hema,
kaka mesa gi gige, kod rachung tayamag dhahabu maler gi gige,
kod kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe ubani, gimar misango miwang’o pep, gi gige, kod karaya mar lwok gi rachungine,
kod lep dolo malich mag Harun jadolo gi mag yawuote, ma girwako kagitiyo tich dolo,
kod mor wir gi ubani mang’ue ng’ar mar Kama Ler.  Kagiloso gigo duto, to nyaka giti mana kaka asenyisi. "Oket chieng’ Sabato mondo obed ranyisi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel kama, ‘Nyakaurit chieng’ Sabatona, nikech chieng’ yueyono en ranyisi manie kindakodu kaachiel gi nyikwau nyaka chieng’, mondo ung’e ni an e RuothNyasaye mopuodhou.
Kuom mano nyaka urit Sabato nikech en chieng’ moketmondo obednu maler.  Ka ng’ato ok orite, to nyaka nege.  Ng’ato ang’atamotiyo chieng’no nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom jowetene.
Unyalo tiyo tijeukuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo en chieng’ yueyo maler, mowalni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ng’ato ang’ata manoti chieng’ Sabato nyaka negi.
Jo-Israel nyaka rit chieng’ Sabato kuom tiengegi duto kaka chieng’ magisesingore rito nyaka chieng.
En ranyisi mochwere manie kinda kodjo-Israel, nimar an Ruoth Nyasaye, nachueyo polo gi piny kuom ndaloauchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo naweyo tich, mayueyo. ’ "
Kane Ruoth Nyasaye osetieko wuoyo gi Musa e got Sinai, nomiye kitemopamore ariyo mag rapar.  Gin e kite ariyo mane Nyasaye ondikoe gi lithlwete. Wuok
Nyaroya molos gi dhahabu(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Kane ji oneno ni Musa osedeko e got, ka pok olor piny, ne gichokorekuom Harun, mi giwachone niya, "Bi ilosnwa nyasaye mondo otelnwa, nikechwakia gima osetimo ng’at ma Musano, mane ogolowa e piny Misri. "
Harunnodwokogi niya, "Deduru bonje mag dhahabu ma mondu gi yawuotu kod nyiuorwako mondo ukelna. "
Mi ji duto nogolo bonjegi, motero ni Harun.
Nokawo bonjego molenyo, eka noolo e gimoro mokuny iye e kido marnyaroya, molosogo nyaroya.  Jo-Israel nowacho niya, "Ma e nyasaye maneogolowa e piny Misri!"
To kane Harun owinjo gima giwachono, nogerokendo-mar-misango e nyim nyaroyano.  Eka nogoyo milome, kowacho niya,"Kiny wanatim sawo mwamiyogo Ruoth Nyasaye duong’. "
Kinyne ji nochiewgokinyi mang’ich, motimo lisweche miwang’o pep, kendo ne gikelo liswechemag sawo.  Ne gibet piny mondo gichiem, kendo gimethi, to bang’e ne giamalo mondo gitugi.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Lor piyopiyo, nikech jou maneigolo Misri osetimo marach.
Piyopiyo nono giseweyo yo mane achikogi nimondo giluw, mi giseloso nyaroch dhahabu mondo gilam.  Gisekulorene,kendo gisetimone liswa, ka giwacho niya, ‘A jo-Israel, ma e nyasaye manogolowa e piny Misri. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho ni Musa niya,"Aserango jogi, maneno ni gin joma wigi tek.
Koro weya mondo atiekgigi mirimba mager.  Bang’e anamiyi doko oganda maduong’. "
To Musa nohombo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, kowachone niya, "A RuothNyasaye, ang’o momiyo iwang’o jogi gi mirimbi? Donge gin jogi mane igoloMisri gi teko maduong’?
Ang’o momiyo imiyo jo-Misri biro wacho, niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye nogolo jo-Israel Misri mana ni mondo otimnigi marach,konegogi e gode, kendo otiekgi chuth’? Yie iwe mirimbi mager, kendo ilokparoni, mondo kik ikel masirani kuom jogi.
Par jotichni ma Ibrahim giIsaka kod Israel, kendo kaka nikuong’orinigi gi nyingi iwuon, kiwachoniya, ‘Anamiu nyikwayo mang’eny ka sulue ma e polo, kendo anamigi pinyniduto kaka nasingora, ni nobed margi nyaka chieng’. ’ "
Omiyo RuothNyasaye noloko parone, mi koro ne ok okelo ni joge masira mane osewacho.
Musa nowichore molor oa e got, koting’o kite ariyo mag rapar e lwete. Kitego nondiki koni gi koni.
Ne gin tich Nyasaye, kendo ndiko mane nikuomgi ne mar Nyasaye.
Joshua nowinjo ka ji goyo koko, mowacho ni Musa niya, "Awinjo mahu marlweny e kambi. "
To Musa nodwoke niya, "Mano ok agoro mar joma oloyolweny, bende ok en ywak mar joma olo e lweny, to en mana koko mar jomawer. "
Kane Musa osesudo machiegni gi kambi, noneno nyaroya, kendo noneno jikamiel, mi nokecho malich.  Nowito kitego piny e tiend got mobarore.
Nokawo nyaroya mane ji oselosono mowang’o.  Norege, molokore buru, ekanokire e pi, momiyo jo-Israel pigno omodho.
Nopenjo Harun niya, "Ang’oma ne jogi otimoni momiyo imiyo gitimo richo maduong’ kama?"
Harunnodwoke niya, "Ruoth, kik ikechi.  Ing’eyo ang’eya kaka chuny jogi richo.
Ne giwachona niya, ‘Losnwa nyasaye mondo otelnwa, nikech wakia gimaosetimo Musani, ma nogolowa e piny Misri. ’
Omiyo nawachonogi mondojoma nigi dhahabu oded oko.  Ne gimiya dhahabugo, mabolo e mach, minyaroyano ema owuok. "
Kane Musa oneno ka ji osenjawni, nikech Harun noseweyo ni wasikgithuolo mondo ojargi,
nochung’ e dhoranga kambi, mogoyo koko niya, "Ekejoma ni kor Ruoth Nyasaye? Biuru ira!" Mi jo-Lawi duto nochokore ire.
Nowachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho ni, ng’atoka ng’ato kuomu mondo orwak liganglane, kendo ong’ad e dier kambi koa edhorangach ma koni nyaka dhorangach ma kocha.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondooneg owadgi gi osiepne kod ng’at modak bute. "
Jo-Lawi notimo kaka Musanosechikogi, kendo chieng’no ji alufu adek notho.
Eka Musa nowachonigikendo niya, "Kawuono usewaloru ni tich Nyasaye chuth, nikech usenegoyawuotu kod oweteu, omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye oseguedhou tinende. "
Kinyne Musa nowacho ni ji niya, "Usetimo richo maduong’.  To koro abiroidho got, mondo adhi ir Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kamoro onyalo yie weyonu richouka akwaye. "
Kamano Musa nodok ir Ruoth Nyasaye mowachone niya, "Yieiwinj wachna.  Jogi osetimo richo maduong’ ahinya! Giseloso nyasaye mardhahabu mondo gilam.
To koro yie iwenigi richogi.  Ka ok iyie timokamano, to kara yie iruch nyinga oko e kitabu misendiko. "
RuothNyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "Ng’at motimo richo e nyima ema naruch nyingee kitapa.
Koro dhiyo mondo itel ni ji nyaka kuma nasenyisi.  Malaikananotel nyimi, to kinde biro chopo ma anakumgie kuom richogi. "
Bang’eRuoth Nyasaye nogoyo jo-Israel gi tuo kuom lamo nyaroya mane Harunoloso. Wuok
Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko jo-Israel mondo oa e got Sinai
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Wuoguru in kaachiel gi jomanigolo Misri, kendo udhi e piny mane asingora ni nami Ibrahim gi Isakakod Jakobo, kawachonigi ni nami nyikwagi pinyno.
Anaor malaika mondootel nyimu, kendo anariemb jo-Kanaan gi jo-Amor gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Perizigi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.
Anateru e piny momeu kendo machiek.  To anawuon ok nadhi kodu, nimar dipo ka atiekou e yo, nikech un ji ma tokgitek. "
Kane jo-Israel owinjo wach magerno, ne gichako ywak, mi ongeng’at ma norwako bonjene.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Nyis jo-Israel ni gin joma tok gitek, kendo ka da bed ni anyalo wuotho kodu kata kuom sa matin kende, todatieku te.  Koro mondo gilony bonjegi, eka abiro ng’eyo gima anyalo timonigi. "
Omiyo jo-Israel nogonyo bonjegi e got Horeb kanyo, kendo ne okgichako girwakogi. Hemb Romo ma Nyasaye romoe gi joge
Musa ne thoro golo hema e kambi kendo guro oko mochwalore.  Nochake niHemb Romo, kendo ng’ato ang’ata mane dwaro penjo Nyasaye wach ne dhikanyo.
Kinde duto kane Musa wuok dhi e hemano, ji duto ne a malo, kendong’ato ka ng’ato chung’ e dho hembe ka rango Musa nyaka donj e hema.
Tokane Musa osedonjo e hema, bor polo ne lor piny kendo chung’ e dho hemaka Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo gi Musa.
Kane ji oseneno ka bor polo ochung’ edho hema kamano, ne gikulore giduto, ng’ato ka ng’ato e dho hembe owuon.
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ne wuoyo gi Musa wang’ gi wang’ mana kaka ng’atowuoyo gi wadgi.  Bang’e Musa ne duogo e kambi.  To Joshua wuod Nun, wuowimane kone, ne dong’ mana e hema. Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni obiro bet kod jo-Israel
Musa nowacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "En adier ni isenyisa mondo atelni jogi nyaka piny Kanaan, to pok inyisa ng’at ma ibiro orago.  To bendeisewacho ni ing’eya maber, kendo imor koda.
Ka imor koda kamano, tokoro akwayi mondo ipuonja yoreni mondo ang’eyi, kendo imed bedo mamorkoda.  To bende ng’e malong’o ni jogi gin jogi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwokeniya, "Abiro dhi kodi an awuon, kendo anamiyi kue. "
Musa nowachoneniya, "Ka in iwuon ok idhi kodwa, to kik igolwa ka,
nikech ka ok idhikodwa, to ere kaka ji nyalo ng’eyo ni imor kodwa? To ka idhi kodwa, jogikaachiel gi an nobed joma opogore gi dhoudi duto manie piny. "
Mi RuothNyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "Abiro timo mana kaka isekwayo, nikech amorkodi, kendo ang’eyi maber. "
Musa nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Yie inyisa duong’ni maler. "
RuothNyasaye nodwoke ni, "Abiro miyo berna duto kadh buti, kendo anahulnyinga ma JEHOVA mana kiwinjo.  Anaher ng’at ma adwaro hero, gi heramosiko, bende anakech jalo ma adwaro kecho. "
Nomedo wacho ni Musa ni,"To ok inyal neno wang’a, nikech onge dhano ma nyalo neno wang’a, mi podobed mangima. "
Eka nodhi nyime, kowachone niya, "Nitie kamoro buta ka. Bi ichung’ e wi lwanda,
to ka duong’na maler kadho, abiro keti e geklwanda, kendo anaumi gi lweta nyaka akadhi.
Eka nagol lweta, mi ininemana ng’eya.  To wang’a ok nine. "Wuok
Kite ariyo mamoko(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Pa kite ariyo machal gi mane igoyopiny, mobarore kande, mondo andikie weche mane ni e kite mokwongogo.
Kiny iikri gokinyi mondo ibi e got Sinai.  Ichung’ kuno, kendo irita.
Ng’ato kik idh kodi kuno, bende ng’at moro kik bed kamoro amora ewigodno, kata mana jamni kik kwa e alwora ne. "
Kuom mano Musa nopayo kiteariyo machal gi mokwongo.  Kinyne gokinyi nodhi ewi got Sinai, kaka RuothNyasaye nosechike koting’o kitego.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nolor e bor polo,mochung’ bute kanyo, mi ohulo nyinge ma JEHOVA.
Nokadho e nyim Musa, kowacho gi dwol maduong’ niya, "An JEHOVA.  AnRuoth Nyasaye, an Nyasaye ma jang’wono kendo makecho ji.  Iya ok wang’piyo, kendo anyiso hera mosiko kod adiera.
Arito singruokna masetimo giji gana gi gana, kendo aweyonigi rochruokgi gi kethogi kod richogi, tokata kamano ok akwan jaketho ka ng’ama ler, to akumo nyithindo ginyikwayo nyaka tieng’ mar adek kod mar ang’wen nikech richo kweregi. "
Musa nokulore piny piyopiyo, molemo.
Nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye,kimor koda adier, to koro akwayi mondo idhi kodwa, jogi tokgi tek, tokata kamano, yie iwenwa kethowa gi richowa, kendo ikawwa ka mwanduniiwuon. "Nyasaye ochako otimo singruok gi jo-Israel(Wuok
.
-
; Rapar mar Chik
.
-
;
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Koro adwaro timo kodu singruok.  Abirotimo honni madongo ka jou neno, ma nyaka nene pok otim e piny ngima,kata e oganda moro.  Ji duto ma un e kindgi biro neno gima an RuothNyasaye anyalo timo, nikech abiro timonu gima lich.
Kuom mano, rituruchike ma abiro miyou kawuono, eka abiro riembo jo-Amor gi jo-Kanaan gijo-Hiti gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus mondo owenu thuolo.
Ritreuru mondo une ni ok utimo winjruok moro gi jo piny mudhiyeno,nono to gilokorenu obadho.
Nyaka umuk kendegi mag liswa, kendo ukethsirni maggi milamo, mag kite gi mag yien.
"Kik ulam nyasaye moro machielo ni mar an Ruoth Nyasaye, nyinga enNyasaye ma Janyiego, kendo an Nyasaye ma janyiego adier!
Ritreurumondo kik utim winjruok gi jopinyno nikech ka gilamo nyisechegi, kendogitimonigi liswa, to gibiro lwongou, mi kamoro dipo ka uchamo chiembliswechegi.
Yawuotu bende dikend nyigi, to mondgigo dilam nyisechegi,mi gimi yawuotu weya, kendo lam nyisechegigo.
"Kik ulos nyiseche mag mula mondo ulam.
"Rituru sawo mar makati ma ok oketie Thowi, kaka asechiki.  Nyakaucham makati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo e ndalo mar Abib,nikech dueno ema ne ua e piny Misri.
"Nyithindo makayo ma chwo duto mag dhano kata mag jamni gin maga.
To ngima kanyna makayo unyalo waro gi nyarombo, to ka ok udwar ware,to nyaka tur ng’ute.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka war ngima wuode makayo,kendo onge ng’at ma nobi ira gi lwete nono.
"Unuti kuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka uyue, kataobedo ni en kinde mag pur kata mag keyo.
"Nyaka urit Sap Jumbe, tiende ni sap chiwo mar cham mokwongo nyak.  Tobende nyaka urit Sap Pono Olembe e giko higa.
"Jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyima didek e higa, an Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel
nimar kaseriembonu ogendini ma weg pinyno, kendo ayaropinyu, to onge wasigu ma notem kawo pinyu e kinde adek mubiro biroe enyima higa ka higa.
"E kinde mutimoe misango ni chiayo, kik uchiw gimoro moketie thowi,kendo kik uwe ring chiayo motimgo Sap Pasaka dong’ nyaka piny ru makuwang’o te.
"Cham mabeyoe moloyo mukwongo kayo nyaka ukel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu. "Kitedo nyadiel, to kik uolie cha min. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ndik wechego, nikech gin emaatimogo singruok kodi kaachiel gi jo-Israel. "
Omiyo Musa nobet giRuoth Nyasaye kanyo kuom ndalo piero ang’wen, odiechieng’ gotieno, ma okochiemo kata metho, kendo nondiko weche mag singruokno e kitego.  Ne ginChike Apar. Musa olor oa e got Sinai
Kane Musa lor a e got Sinai, koting’o kite ariyo mag rapar, wang’e nerieny nikech nosewuoyo gi Ruoth Nyasaye, to kata kamano ne ok ong’eyo niwang’e rieny kamano.
Harun gi jo-Israel duto norango Musa moneno kawang’e rieny, mi ne giluor sudo bute.
To Musa noluongogi, mi Harun gijodong oganda nodok ire, moloso kodgi.
Bang’ mano jo-Israel duto nodhiirgi machiegni, kendo Musa nomiyogi chike duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyee got Sinai.
Kane Musa osetieko wuoyo kodgi, nogeng’o wang’e gi law,
E kinde duto mane Musa donjo e hemb Ruoth Nyasaye mondo olos kode,nogolo lawno e wang’e nyaka owuog oko.  To pile kane owuok mondo onyisjo-Israel weche duto ma nochike ni mondo owachi,
ne gineno wang’e karieny.  Eka bang’e nogeng’o wang’e kendo, nyaka odonj e hema, mondo owuogi Ruoth Nyasaye. Wuok
Chike mag Sabato
Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto, mowachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasayeosechikou ni mondo uti kama:
Unyalo tiyon kuom ndalo auchiel, tochieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka bednu chieng’ yueyo maler, nimar en Sabatomowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ng’ato ang’ata motiyo chieng’no nyaka negi.
Kikumok kata mana mach e miechu chieng’ Sabato. "Chiwo mokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye(Wuok
.
-
)
Musa nowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye nosechiko ni mondouchiwne mich.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato moyie timo kamano, mondo okelna chiwo magdhahabu kod mula,
gi nanga mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, gi law katanamaber, gi yie diek,
gi piende rombe molok gi range makwar, gi piendemonyong’ gi yiend shita,
gi mor taya, kod gik mang’ue ng’ar milosogomor wir, gi ubani mang’ue ng’ar,
gi kite mag oniks kod kite moko miketokuom law dolo miluongo ni efod, kendo kuom law agoko. Gik moket e Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
"Jotich duto molony man kuomu mondo obi, kendo olos gik moko duto maneRuoth Nyasaye ochiko.
Ginilos Hema Maler, gi hembe maoko, kod raumne,gi ramekni mage, gi bepene, gi raripene, gi rachungine,
kod Sanduk giludhene miting’egoo, gi raumne, kod pasia mogeng’e,
gi mesa kodludhene gii gige duto, gi makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile,
kodrachung taya machiwo ler, kod gige duto, gi teyni mage kod mor taya,
gi kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe ubani kaachiel gi ludhene, kod mor wirgii ubani mang’ue ng’ar, gi pasia manie dho hema,
kodkendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep, kaachiel gi ndiri mare molos gi mula, giludhene kod gige duto, gi karaya, kod rachungine,
gi pasia mag laru gisirni kod rachungigi gi pasia mar dhoranga laru,
kod loye mag Hema giloye mag laru kod tondegi,
kaachiel gi lewni malich ma jodolo tiyogoKama Ler, ma gin lep lemo ma Harun jadolo gi yawuote rwako ka gitiyotich dolo. "Ji okelo Chiwo
Oganda jo-Israel duto nowuok oa ir Musa.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato ma noyiegolo chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye notimo kamano, mondo olosgo Hemb Romo gi gikmoko duto mitiyogo kanyo, kaachiel gi lep lemo.
Mon gi chwo nobiro,kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato ma noyie golo chiwo nokelo ngaga gi sitadi gibony gi mula kod gimoro amora maber mar dhahabu.  Ji duto nokelo ni RuothNyasaye chiwo mag dhahabu,
to bende ng’ato ka ng’ato nokelo gima en gokaka nanga mambulu kata maralik kata makwar, kata law katana maber, katayie diek, kata piende rombe molok gi range makwar.
Joma ne nyalo chiwomich mag fedha gi mag mula nokelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kendo jii duto maneni gi yiend shita mane inyalo losogo gimoro amora bende nokelo.
Monduto mane olony e wicho nowiyo usi mambulu gi maralik gi makwar mokelo,kaachiel gi law katana maber.
Bende mon duto mane olony e tich wiyoyie diek nowicho gi chuny achiel.
Jodongo nokelo kite mabeyo mag oniksgi kite miketo kuom efod kendo kuom law agoko,
kaachiel gi gik mang’ueng’ar kod mor taya gi mor wir kod mor ubani mang’ue ng’ar.
Jo-Israelduto machwo gi mamon mane oyie golo chiwo ni tich duto mane RuothNyasaye osechiko Musa ni mondo otim, nokelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye michgi. Luong mar Bezalel gi Oholiab(Wuok
.
-
)
Musa nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye oseyiero Bezalel wuodUri ma wuod Hur ja Juda.
Osepong’e gi Rohone, mondo obed gi lony kodnyalo kaachiel gi rieko mar ng’eyo tije duto magh lwedo,
kaka gorokido mabeyo mag dhahabu gi fedha kod mula,
kendo ng’ado kite michomo,kaachiel gi payo bao, kata tich moro amora mar lwedo.
Ruoth Nyasayeosemiyo Bezalel gi Oholiab wuod Ahisamak ma ja Dan, teko, mondo gipuonjji tich lwedo.
Osemiyogi rieko mathoth mar tiyo tije duto mag lwedo,kaka tich goro kite, gi mar kwoyo nanga, gi mar tweng’o gi usi mambulugi maralik, gi mar loso law katana maber, kod mar chweyo nanga.  Gin jimanyalo timo tich moro amora. Wuok
"Bezalel gi Oholiab kod jotich molony duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyorieko kod ng’eyo mar loso gik moko duto midwaro mondo olosgo Kama Lernyaka los gigo duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osechiko. "Ji okelo chiwo mang’eny
Musa noluongo Bezalel gi Oholiab kod joma olony e tijegi, mane RuothNyasaye osemiyo rieko, kendo mane oyie konyo tich, mi nonyisogi mondogichak tich.
Nomiyogi chiwo mane jo-Israel okelo mondo olosgo Kama Ler. To jo-Israel nomedo mana kelo chiwo ni Musa okinyi kokinyi,
nyaka jomane olony e tije mopogore opogore mane loso Kama Ler noweyo tijegigo,
mobiro ir Musa ka giwachone niya, "Ji kelo gik mang’eny moloyo karmidwaro kuom tich mane Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko ni mondo otim. "
Omiyo Musanogoyo milome e kambi kokwero ji duto niya, "Ng’at ma dichwo kata madhako kik med loso gimoro mitiyogo e Kama Ler. " Kamano ji noweyo kelogik moko.
Gik mane osekel ne ng’eny mohewoo tieko tich. Loso Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
Jotich molony ema noloso Hema Maler.  Ne gilosone pasia apar mag lawkatana maber, mogoe kido mag kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwarmana kaka jatueng’o molony goro.
Bor pasia ka pasia ne romo mita apargang’wen, to lachne mita ariyo, kendo giduto ne giromre.
Abich kuomginoriw kaachiel,, kendo abich modong’ bende noriw kamano.
Ne gilosotonde piero abich mambulu e riak pasia matung’, kuom pasia abichmokwongo, kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasiaabich modong’.
Tondego nobedo momanyore.
Bende ne giloso rameknipiero abich mag dhahabu, mi giriwogo pasia ariyo momanyorego, mondo HemaMaler obed gimoro achiel.
Ne giloso pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek, mondo obed hema maoko maumoHema Maler.
Bor pasia ka pasia, ne romo mita apar gabich, to lachnemita abich, to lachne mita ariyo.  Giduto ne giromre.
Ne giriwo mitaabich kaachiel, kendo auchiel modong’ bende ne giriwo kamano.
Negiloso tonde piero abich, e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia abich, kendotonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia auchiel.
Bendene giloso ramekni piero abich mag mula, mane giriwogo hema mondo obedgimoro achiel.
Ne giloso raum mar piende imbe molok gi range makwarmondo giumgo hema maoko, kendo raum machielo molos gi piende monyong’mondo obed ewi mokwongono.
Ne giloso ni Hema Maler sirni gi yiend shita.
Bor siro ka siro neromo mita abich, to lachne nus mita.
Siro ka siro ne nigi tiende ariyomoriw kaachiel.  Sirni duto mag Hema Maler nolos machal kamano.
Negipayo sirni piero ariyo mondo gilosgo sisi mar Hema maler mochomo yomilambo,
kod rachungi piero ang’wen mag fedha mane girwako e sirnigo. Ne girwako siro mokwongo e rachungi ariyo, kendo ne gitimo kamano esirni duto.
Sisi mar Hema Maler mochomo yo nyandwat bende ne gilosonesirni piero ariyo,
kaachiel gi rachungi piero ang’wen mag fedha.  Negirwako siro ka siro ei rachungi ariyo ariyo.
Bende ne giloso sirniauchiel ni tok Hema Maler koma odok yo podho chieng’,
kaachiel giariyo mamoko mane giketo e konde ariyo man yo ka tok Hema Maler.
Negiriwo sirni mag kondego gi ratego achiel, chakre ka tiendgi nyaka malo,kendo sirni ariyogo nolos machalre.
Kamano ne gin sirni aboro kodrachungi apar gauchiel mag fedha.  Siro ka siro norwak ei rachungi ariyoariyo.
Ne giloso rariw apar gabich gi yiend shita.  Rariw abich nomako sirnimag bath Hema Maler konchiel,
kendo abich mamoko nomako sirni e bathekomachielo, to abich modong’ nomako sirni mane olosgo ka toke, mochomoyo podho chieng’.
Ne giloso rariw ka rariw madiere mondo okadh e korsirni, koa tung’ konchiel nyaka tung’ komachielo.
Ne gibawo sirnigo gidhahabu, kendo ne giketonigi ratege mag dhahabu mondo omak rariw. Rariwgo bende ne gibawo gi dhahabu.
Ne gitwang’o pasia mar law katana maber, mi gigoyoe kuome kido magkerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, mana kaka jatueng’o molonygoro.
Ne giloso ni pasiano sirni ang’wen mag yiend shita, mi gibawo gidhahabu, kendo ne gilosone rachungi ang’wen mag fedha.
Ne gitwang’o ni dho hema pasia mar law katana maber, mi gigoyoemaradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.
Ne gibawo wi sirnigokod ratege molworogi gi dhahabu, to rachungi abich mirwako e sirnigonolos gi mula. Wuok
Loso Sanduk mar Nyasaye(Wuok
.
-
)
Bezelel noloso Sanduk gi yiend shita, ma borne oromo mita achiel, toolachne nus mita, kendo borne modhi malo bende nus mita.
Nobawe gidhahabu maler iye gi oko, kendo nolosone ndiga mar dhahabu molworobethene duto.
Nothedhone ratege ang’wen mag dhahabu, moketo e tiendeang’wen.  Ratege ariyo nobet e bathe konchiel, to ariyo e bathekomachielo.
Noloso ludhe ariyo gi yiend shita, mobawo gii dhahabu,
kendo norwakogi e ratege manie bath Sanduk koni gi koni mondo gibed magting’e.
Bende nolosone raum mar dhahabu maler ma borne oromo mitaachiel to lachne nus mita, obed kar ng’wono.
Nothedho kerubi ariyo magdhahabu, mondo obed gimoro achiel gi raum.
Kerubi achiel noketo e dhoraum konchiel, kendo achiel e dhoge komachielo.
Ne gibedo ka bwombegioyarore kochomo malo mondo ogeng’ raum, kendo ne gimanyore, ka ging’iyoraum. Loso mesa mar makati(Wuok
.
-
)
Bezalel noloso bende mesa gi yiend shita, ma borne oromo mita achiel,to lachne nus mita, kendo borne modhi malo bende nus mita.
Nobawe gidhahabu maler, kendo nolosone ndiga mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto.
Nochueyo mithe alwora ma lachne oromo tat lwedo achiel, kendo nochueyodir mitheno gi dhahabu.
Nothedhone ratege ang’wen mag dhahabu, moketo,e kendo ang’wen mag mesa, kama tiendene nitie, mondo obed mag ting’e.
Ratege mane orwakie ludhe miting’ego noket e mithe.
Noloso ludhegogi yiend shita, mobawo gi dhahabu.
Bende noloso gik mitiyogo e mesa,kaka tewni, gi kikombe gi agulni kod aguetni mitiyogo gitimo misengnimiolo piny.  Gigo duto noloso gi dhahabu maler. Loso rachung taya(Wuok
.
-
)
Noloso rachung taya gi dhahabu maler.  Tiende gi kore noloso gi dhahabumothedhi, kendo maupe ma nogorie, kaachiel gi thiepege kod obokeginobedo gimoro achiel kode.
Ne en gi bede auchiel moa e bathe koni gikoni, adek e bathe konchiel kendo adek e bathe komachielo.
Bedenegomoro ka moro ne nigi maupe adek molos gi thiepegi kod obokegi machal githiep oyungu.
E kor rachung taya hie ne nitie maupe ang’wen man githiepe kod oboke machal gi thiep oyungu.
Bedene ariyo ariyo ne nigimaua achiel achiel e bwogi.
Maupego gi bedego kod rachungi nobedogimoro achiel mothedh gi dhahabu maler.
Bende noloso ni rachunginoteyni abiriyo gi rangis teyni kod tewni.  Mago duto noloso gi dhahabumaler.
Rachung taya kod gige duto nolos gi dhahabu maler moromo kilopiero abich. Loso kendo miwang’oe ubani(Wuok
.
-
)
Noloso kendo miwang’oe ubani gi yiend shita.  Noromre koni gi koni. Borne ne nus mita, kendo lachne bende nus mita, to borne modhi malo mitaachiel.  Tungene nobedo gimoro achiel kode.
Nobawe duto te gi dhahabumaler, kendo nochueyo laini mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto.
Nolosoneratege ariyo ariyo mag dhahabu, moketo e bwo laini e konde ariyo mankoni gi koni, mondo orwakie ludhe miting’ego.
Ludhego noloso gi yiendshita, mobawo gi dhahabu.
Noloso bende mo maler mar wir, kod ubanimaler mang’ue ngar. Wuok
Loso kendo-mar-misango(Wuok
.
-
)
Bezalel noloso kendo-mar-misango miwang’o te gi yiend shita.  Borne gilachne ne mita ariyo gi nus maromre, to borne modhi malo ne mita achielgi nus.
Noloso tungene e kondene ang’wen mobedo gimoro achiel kode,kende nobawe duto gi mula.
Noloso gik moko duto mitiyogo ekendo-mar-misango, kaka agulini, gi rajope, gi tewni, gi rachwow, kodtegni mag mach.  Gigo duto noloso gi mula.
Bende nolosone kendono gimoromar mula machalo gi sing’enge moketo e bwo ndiri molwore.  Gino nochopomana e kore gi yo ka malo.
Nothedho ratege ang’wen mag mula, moketo ekonde ang’wen mag gima chalo gi sing’engeno, mondo orwakie ludhene.
Noloso ludhego gi yiend shita, mobawo gi mula.
Norwakogi e rategemanie bath kendo-mar-misango koni gi koni, mondoo gibed mag ting’e. Nolose gi bepe moweyo iye thuolo ka i sanduk. Loso karaya mar mula(Wuok
.
)
Nolenyo mula mag rangi mane okawo kuom mon mane tiyo e dho Hemb Romo,mi olosogo karaya mar lwok kod rachungine. Loso laru mar Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
Bende noloso laru.  Kuma odok yo milambo noketoe pasia molos gi lawkatana maber ma borne romo mita piero abich.
Nong’awogi e sirni pieroariyo, morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula.  To rang’aw kod rategemiriwogo sirnigo nolos gi fedha.
Koma odok yo nyandwat noketoe pasiama borne romo mita piero abich.  Nong’awogi e sirni piero ariyo, morwak erachungi piero ariyo mag mula.
To koma odok yoo podho chieng’ noketoepasia ma borne romo mita piero ariyo gabich mong’aw e sirni apar kodratege apar.  Rang’aw kod ratege miriwogo sirni nolos gi fedha.
Bor markoma odok yo wuok chieng’ ne romo mita piero ariyo gabich.
E dirrangach koni gi koni nolieroe pasia ma borne oromo mita abiriyo gi nus.
Pasia ka pasia nong’aw e sirni adek, morwak e rachungi adek.
Pasiamag laru duto notwang’ gi law katana maber.
Rachungi norwakie sirnimolos gi mula, to rang’aw kod ratege mag sirni nolos gi fedha, kendonobaw wi sirnigo gi fedha.  Ratege mag sirni duto mag laru bende nolos gifedha.
Pasia mar dhoranga laru nolos gi law katana maber, mogoe kidogi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.  Borne ne romo mita apar, to bornemodhi malo mita ariyo gi nus maromre gi pasia mar laru.
Ne ong’awe esirni ang’wen morwak e ang’wen mag mula, to rang’awgi nolos gi fedha,kendo wigi kod rategegi nobaw gi fedha.
Loye duto mag Hema Maler kodmag laru nolos gi mula. Kar romb chumbe molosgo Hema Maler
Magi e kar romb gik mane Musa oketo e lwet jo-Lawi mane tiyo e bwoIthamar wuod Harun jadolo, mondo olosgo Hema Maler, ma nyinge moro enHemb Rapar.
Bezalel wuod Uri ma wuod Hur ja-Juda noloso gik moko dutomane Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa.
Oholiab wuod Ahisamak ma ja Dan ema nekonye.  Oholiab nolony e tich goro kite, gi tweng’o, kod tich goyomaradadi e law katana gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.
Kar romb dhahabu duto mane otigo kuom loso Kama Ler ne romo kilo alufuachiel gi mia ariyo kod piero adek, kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tichNyasaye.  Dhahabugo duto nochiw ka mich mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Karromb fedha mane ji ogolo e kinde mane ikwanogie, ne romo kilo alufuang’wen gi mia abich kod piero aboro, kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tichNyasaye.
Fedhago ema ne ochok ka ne ng’ato ka ng’ato mokwan ogolo nus-shekel,nimar kar romb joma ne okwan ma hikgi oromo piero ariyo kata mokadhokanyo ne alufu mia auchiel gadek, kod mia abich gi piero abich. (
,
) Nus shekelno nopim gi rapim mitiyogo tich Nyasaye.
Kiloalufu ang’wen gi mia abich kod piero abich mag fedhago nolosgo rachungimag Kama Ler kod mag pasia.  Kilo alufu ang’wen gi mia abich kod pieroabichgo ema nolosgo rachungi mia achiel, ka rachung ka rachung kawo kilopiero ang’wen gabich gi nus.
To kilo piero adek mag fedha mane odong’nolosgo rang’aw kod ratege mag sirni, kendo nobawgoo wi sirni.
Mulamane ji ochiwo ka mich mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye noromo kilo alufu adek gimia abich.
Mago Bezalel nolosogo rachungi mag dhoranga Hemb Romo,kendo nolosogo kendo-mar-misango mar mula kod gima chalo gi sing’enge,kaachiel gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono.
Bende nolosogo rachungiduto mag laru gi mag sirni mane ni e dhoranga laru, kaachiel gi loyeduto mag Hema Maler kod mag laru. Wuok
Loso lep jodolo(Wuok
.
-
)
Ne gitiyo gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kuom loso lewni malichmane jodolo rwako ka gitiyo Kama Ler, kendo kuom loso ni Harun lep lemokaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Ne giloso law dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gimaralik kod makwar, kendo gi law katana maber.
Ne gipamo dhahabu nyakaodoko mareprep, mi ne gilire matindotindo, kendo ne gikade ka tol mondojatweng’o molony oti kode kaachiel gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwarkod law katana maber.
Ne giloso ni efod misibe ariyo mitweyego e gok giyo ka nyime kod kang’eye.
To okanda mane ni kuome nolos machal kodekendo en bende nolose gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwarkod law katana maber, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Ne giloso kitemag berul, mi gichomo e otunge mag dhahabu, mondikie nying yawuot Israele yo ma jagoro molony goroe.
Noketogi e misib efod ka rapar mar dhoutIsrael mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Ne giloso law agoko e yo ma jatueng’o molony tueng’oe, ka gitiyo gidhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber manakaka niloso efod.
Ne gilose maromre, mi gibane diriyo.  Borne ne romolwedo achiel, to lachne bende lwedo achiel.
Ne gichano kuome lainiang’wen mag kite ma nengogi tek.  Laini mokwongo noketie sardius gi topazkod karbunkal,
to laini mar ariyo ne mar emarald gi safir kod diamond.
Laini mar adek noketie jasinth gi aget kod amethust,
to laini marang’wen ne mar berul gi oniks kod jasper.  Kidi ka kidi norwak e tungemar dhahabu.
Kitego nondikie nying dhout Israel apar gariyo.  Nogorgika kido, ma moro ka moro ne nigi nying achiel achiel mag dhoudi apargariyogo.
Ne giloso ni law agoko thiwni mag dhahabu maler, molos katol mokadi.
Ne giloso otunge ariyo kod ratege ariyo mag dhahabu, ekane giketo ratege ariyogo e riak law agoko gi malo koni gi koni.
Negitueyo thiwni ariyo mag dhahabu e ratege kande mane ni e riak law agokokoni gi koni.
To dho tondego komachielo ne gitueyo e otunge ariyo ka. Kamano e kaka ne gitudo law agoko gi misibe miriwogo ka nyim efod gi katoke.
Ne giloso ratege ariyo mag dhahabu mi giriedo e riak law agokogi yo ka mwalo kod yoka iye, koni gi koni kama omanyore gi efod.
Bendene giloso ratege ariyo moko mag dhahabu, mi girwako yo ka mwalo e dhomisibe ariyo mag gok efod, but kama otuang’gigo e okanda.
Ne gitueyoratege mag law agoko e ratege mag efod gi tol mambulu mondo law agokoolier e okanda gi malo, kendo kik ogonyre.  Mano e kaka Ruoth Nyasayenochiko Musa.
Ne giloso aroya mar umo efod gi law achiel mambulu.
Notuch diere mawich wuokie, kendo aluora mar kama otuchino notwang’ gi pien, mondo kikyiechi.
E riak lawno aluorane ne gitwang’o gik mong’inore ka machunga,molos gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber.
Bende ne giloso gara mag dhahabu, mi giketo e riak lawu aluora e kindgik mong’inorego.
Kamano gara nokikore gi gik mong’inore ong’inore elaini achiel e aluora mar riak lawno mogik piny.  Lawno nirwako pilekitiyo tich dolo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Ne gitwang’o kandhe ni Harun gi yawuote,
kendo ne gilosonigi kilembagi ogute gi sirweche
kod okanda.  Gigo duto nolos gi law katana mabermogoe maradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, eyo ma jagoromolony goyoe.  Mago duto ne gitimo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Ne giloso gima opamore ka san gi dhahabu maler mondo obed osimbo malerkendo ne gindiko kuome ni, "MOWAL NI RUOTH NYASAYE" wechego nogor mana eyo ma jagor kidi goroe.
Ne gitueyone tol mambulu mondo oketego ekilemba gi yo ka malo, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. Tich loso Hema Maler orumo(Wuok
.
-
)
Tije duto mag Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo ma Nyasaye romoe gi jogenorumo.  Jo-Israel notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochikoMusa.
Ne gikelo ni Musa Hema Maler gi hema ma oko kod gige duto, kakaramekni gi bepe gi rariw gi sirni kod rachungi,
gi raum molos gipiende imbe molok gi range makwar, kod raum molos gi piende monyong’ kodpasia mogeng’o sanduk,
gi Sandug Rapar, gi ludhene, gi raum,
kodmesa gi gige duto gi makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile,
kod rachungtaya molos gi dhahabu maler, kaachiel gi teyni miketo kuome, gi gigeduto, kod mor taya,
gi kendo mar dhahabu, gi mor wir, gi umani mang’ueng’ar, gi pasia mar dho Hema,
kod kendo-mar-misango molos gi mula gigire mar mula machalo gi sing’enge, gi ludhene kod gige duto, gi karayakod rachungine
gi pasia mag laru, gi sirni mage kod rachungine,kaachiel gi pasia man e dhoranga laru, gi tondene kod loyene gi gik mokoduto mitiyogo tich Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo.
Ne gikelo bende lewnimotwang’ malich ma jodolo tiyogo e Kama Ler, tiende ni lep lemo magHarun jadolo kod lep yawuote ma girwako ka gitiyo tich dolo.
Jo-Israelnosetimo tije duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Musa norangogik moko duto mane giseloso, moneno ni giselosogi mana kaka RuothNyasaye nosechiko, omiyo noguedhogi. Wuok
Chungo Hema Maler kendo walogi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Chieng’ due achiel mar duemokwongo, nyaka ichung Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo.
Ket Sandug Rapar eiye kendo igeng’ Sanduk gi pasia.
Kel mesa e iye, kendo ichanie gikmoko duto monego obedie.  Rachung taya bende ikel, mi imok teyni mankuome.
Ket kendo miwang’oe ubani e nyim Sandug Rapar, kendo igeng’ dhoHema Maler gi pasia.
To ket kendo-mar-misango e nyim dho Hema Maler, maen Hemb Romo.
Ket karaya e kind Hemb Romo gi kendo-mar-misango, miiolie pi.
Bang’e ichielne laru aluora gi pasia, kendo ilier pasia moromondo ogeng’ dhoranga laru.
"Eka ikaw mor wir, iwirgo Hema Maler kod gik moko duto manie iye. Kamano inipuodhe kaachiel gi gige duto mondo obed gima ler ahinya.
Bang’e iwir kendo-mar-misango, kaachiel gi gige duto mondo obed malerahinya.
Bende iwir karaya kaachiel gi rachungine mondo iwalego.
"Bang’e ikel Harun gi yawuote e dho Hemb Romo, kendo ilwokgi gi pi.
Eka irwak harun gi lep dolo, kendo iwire gi mo, kiwale mondo obedjadolona.
Bang’ mano ikel yawuote machiegni, kendo irwaknigi kandhe.
Wirgi mana kaka isewiro wuon-gi, mondo gin bende gibed jodolona.  Wirnobiro miyo gibedo jodolona kaachiel gi nyikwagi kuom tiengegi duto nyakachieng’. "
Musa notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
Omiyochieng’ due achiel mar due mokwongo e higa mar ariyo ka ne gia Misri,nochungo Hema Maler.
Nochunge kama: Nochano rachungi, morwakoe bepe,kendo noketo raripene mochungogo sirni.
Noyaro hema maoko e wi Hemamaler, mi noume gi raumne kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
Nokawo kite magrapar moketo e sanduk.  Norwako ludhe e ratege mag sanduk, eka noyieyoraum e wiye.
Noketo sanduk e Hema Maler, mogeng’e gi pasia.  Kamanonogeng’o Sandug Rapar kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
Noketo mesa e Hemb Romo gi yo ka oko mar pasia, koma ochomo yonyandwat,
mochanoe makati miketo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye pile mana kakaRuoth Nyasaye nochike.
Noketo rachung taya e Hemb Romo gi yo milambokoma omanyore gi mesa,
moketo teyni kuome e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, manakaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
Noketo kendo-mar-dhahabu e Hemb Romo gi yoka oko mar pasia,
mowang’oe ubani mang’ue ng’ar mana kaka RuothNyasaye nochike.
Nogeng’o dho Hema Maler gi pasia,
kendo noketokendo-mar-misango e dho Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo.  Notimoe misango marmogo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
Noketo karaya mar lwok e kindHemb Romo gi kendo-mar-misango, mooloe pi lwok.
Musa gi Harun giyawuote ne lwokoe lwetegi gi tiendegi
ka gidonjo e hemb romo kata kagidhi e kendo-mar-misango mana kaka Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Nolieropasia e aluora duto mar laru, mogeng’ogo Hema Maler kaachiel gikendo-mar-misango, kendo noliero pasia moro e dhoranga laru. Bor polo olor ewi Hemb Romo(Kwan
.
-
)Kamano Musa notieko tich duto,
mi bor polo noimo Hemb Romo, kendoduong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nopong’e.
Musa ne ok nyal donjo e HembRomo nikech bor polo ne ni kanyo, bende nikech duong’ maler mar RuothNyasaye nopong’e.
E wuodh jo-Israel duto, ne ginyalo dhi e kambi moromana ka bor polo oa e Hema Maler,
to kane bor polo ok oa, ne ok gidhinyime gi wuoth, to ne girito nyaka chieng’ moro oa.
Kamoro amora manejo-Israel dhiye, bor polo mar Ruoth Nyasaye nosiko ewi Hema Malergodiechieng’, to gotieno mach ne liel ei bor polono, kendo jo-Israelduto ne nyalo nene. Tim jo-Lawi
Misengni miwang’o pep
Ruoth Nyasaye noluongo Musa mowuoyo kode gi e Hemb Romo ma Nyasayeromoe gi joge, kowachone niya:
Nyis jo-Israel ni ka ng’ato kuomgi chiwochiayo mondo otimna misango, to chiayono nyalo bet dhiang’ kata dielkata rombo.
Ka ng’ato chiwo dhiang’ mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep, to nyakaobed rwath maonge songa.  Enochiwe e dhoranga Hemb Romo e nyim RuothNyasaye mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie kode.
Nyaka oket lwete ewi chiayono,mi Ruoth Nyasaye noyie gi misangono mondo obed gima opwodhnego richone.
Eka noneg rwadhno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo jodolo ma joka Harunnokaw remo, kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango manie dhoHemb Romo.
Bang’ mano noyang’ chiayono, kendo nopoge lemo lemo.
JokaHarun jadolo nomok mach e kendo-mar-misango, kotimogo misango, miginiketie yien.
Ginichan lemogo kod wich gi bor e yien moket e majno.
Jambich gi tielo to nyaka lwok gi pi, eka jadolo nowang’gi kaachiel gilemo duto e kendo-mar-misango, kotimogo misango miwang’o pep, mondo odummamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ka ng’ato ochiwo rombo kata diel mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep, tonyaka obed im kata nyuok maonge songa.
Nyaka onege e nyim RuothNyasaye e bath kendo-mar-misango koma ochomo yo Nyandwat, kendo jodoloma joka Harun nyaka kir remo e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango.
Ekang’atno nopog ring’o lemo lemo, mi jadolo nocham lemogo kaachiel gi wichkod bor kuom yien moketi e mach manie kendo-mar-misango.
Jambich gitielo to nyaka lwok gi pi, eka jadolo nochiwgi kaachiel gi lemo duto ekendo-mar-misango mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep ma tikne dum mamitni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ka ng’ato chiwo winyo mondo otimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’opep, to nyaka ochiw mana akuch odugla kata nyathi akuru.
Jadolo nokelchiwono e kendo-mar-misango kendo nochod wiye, eka owang’e e kendomar-misango, to rembe nyaka bi mi chuer e kor kendo-mar-misango.
Nyakaogol oswakone kaachiel gi gik manie iye, mi owit e bathkendo-mar-misango komma ochomo yo wuok chieng’, kama ipukoe buru.
Nyaka obambe ma ok ogolo buombene oko, eka owang’e ewi yien moket emach manie kendo-mar-misango.  En misango miwang’o pep, madum mamit niRuoth Nyasaye. Tim jo-Lawi
Misengni mag cham
Ka ng’ato timo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango mar cham, to nyaka ochiw mogomayom, kendo ool mo kuome, mi omedie ubani.
Eka nokele ni jodolo majoka Harun, kendo jadolo achiel nojuk mogo sanja moruw gi mo, mi nowang’kaachiel gi ubani duto ka rapar e kendo-mar-misango.  Mano en misangomiwang’o mondo tikne odum mang’ue ng’ar ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To mogo gi momodong’ kuom chiwono nobed mar Harun gi yawuote.  En gima ler moloyo,nimar ogole kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ka ichiwo gima otedi mondo otimgo misango mar cham, to nyaka obedmakati matindotindo ma ok ketie thowi, molos gi mogo mayom modwal gi mo,kata chapat ma ok ketie thowi, mowir gi mo.
To ka en gima ochiel etawo, to nyaka obed mar mogo mayom moruw gi mo, to ok oketie thowi.
Nyaka ging’inge madundedunde, kendo olie mo.  Mano en misango mar cham.
Ka ichiwo gima otedi e sufuria mondo otimgo misango mar cham, to nyakaobed mar mogo mayom modwal gi mo.
Kel ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango moloskamano, kendo imiye jadolo, mi jadolo notere e kendo-mar-misango.
Enopog moko mondo owang’ e kendo-mar-misango ka rapar.  En misangomiwang’o mondo tikne odum mang’ue ng’ar ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To gimaodong’ kuom chiwono nobed mar Harun gi yawuote.  En gima ler moloyo,nikech ogole kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Misengni duto mag cham muchiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka bed ma ok oketiethowi.  Bende kutimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o, to kik thowi katamor kich bedie.
To gigo unyalo chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka misango marchamb agwela, to kik wang’gi e kendo-mar-misango kaka iwang’o misangomadum tik mang’ue ng’ar.
Misengni duto mag cham mutimo nyaka ketiechumbi majiwo singruok mane utimo gi Nyasaye.  Kamano chumbi nyaka keti emisengni duto mutimo.
Ka utimo ni Nyasaye misango mar cham gi cham mokwongo nyak, to nyakauchiw cham manyien molodi kendo moyoki.
Nyaka uolie mo, kendo uketieubani.  Mano en misango mar cham.
Jadolo nokaw cham moko moruw gi mo,mi nowang’ kaachiel gi ubani duto ka rapar.  En misango miwang’o ni RuothNyasaye. Tim jo-Lawi
Misengni mag sawo
Ka ng’ato chiwo rwath kata dwasi mondo otimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misangomar sawo, to nyaka obed mana dhiang’ ma onge songa.
Ng’atno nyaka ketlwete ewi dheno, kendo oyang’e e dho Hemb Romo.  Jodolo ma joka Harunnokaw remo, kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango.
Achiel kuomjodologo nyaka kaw boche duto mag jambich,
gi nyiroke gi boche mogawogiman but oguro, kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke, mi owang’gi niRuoth Nyasaye ka misango miwang’o pep.
Joka Harun nowang’gi ekendo-mar-misango ewi misango miwang’o pep man e yien moket e mach mondoobed misango miwang’o madum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ka ng’ato chiwo diel kata rombo mondo otimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misangomar sawo, to nyaka obed ma dichwo kata ma dhako maonge songa.
Ka im emaotimogo misango, to nyaka okele e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,
mi oket lwete ewiye, kendo oyang’e e nyim Hemb Romo.  Eka joka Harun nokaw remo, kendonokir e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango.
Bang’ mano, ng’atno nyaka pogboche duto kaka sembe mong’ad gie lihumblu, gi boche mag jambich,
kodnyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro kod jwala mabor man ewichuny gi nyiroke, mondo obed misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Jadolonowang’ mago duto e kendo-mar-misango ka chiemo michiwo ni RuothNyasaye.
Ka chiwo ma otimogo misangono en diel, to nyaka ochiwe e nyim RuothNyasaye,
mi oket lwete ewi chiayono, kendo oyang’e e nyim Hemb Romo. Eka joka Harun nokaw remo, kendo nokir e bethe duto magkendo-mar-misango.
Bang’ mano ng’atno nyaka pog boche duto magjambich,
kod nyiroke, kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro, kodjwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke, mondo obed misango miwang’o niRuoth Nyasaye.
Jadolo nowang’ mago duto e kendo-mar-misango madummamit.  Boche duto gin mag Ruoth Nyasaye.
Enobed chik mochwere kuomtienge duto, kamoro amora mudakie, ni kik ucham bor kata remo. Tim jo-Lawi
Misengni mag golo richo
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya:
Nyis jo-Israel ni magi e chike maomako ng’ato ang’ata ma oboth, mi oketho chikna moro amora mi otimogimoro ma chikgo okwero:
Ka jadolo maduong’ oketho, mi okelo chola kuom jo-Isarel, to nyakaochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyarwath maonge songa mondo otimgo misango margolo richo, kopwodhogo ketho ma osetimono.
Enokel nyarwadhno e dho HembRomo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi noket lwete e wiye, kendo noyang’e kanyo.
Eka nokaw rembe moko, mi okel ei Hemb Romo.
Enolut lith lwete eremono, kendo nokir nyadibiriyo e nyim pasia maler e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Bang’ mano, jadolono nomien remo moko e tunge kendo mar misangomiwang’oe ubani e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ei Hemb Romo, to nopuk remo dutomodong’ e tiend kendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep manie dho Hemb Romo.
Toboche duto mogol kuom nyarwadhno nyaka ket tenge.  Gin boche mag jambich,
kod nyiroke, kaachiel gi bocho mogawogi man e bath oguro, kod jwalamabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke.
Mago noket tenge mana kaka iketo bochemogol kuom boche mitimogo misengni mag sawo.  Jadolo nyaka wang’ bochegoe kendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep.
To pien nyarwadhno gi ringe duto,kaachiel gi wiye kod tiendene gi jambiye kod owuoche,
ma tiende ninyarwadhno duto, noting’ kendo noter oko mar kambi kama owe ni puko buchkendo-mar-misango, mi nowang’e kanyo te e mach mar yien e pidh buruno.
Ka oganda Israel duto odoko joketho kakia, mi gitimo gimoro ma chikRuoth Nyasaye okwero, mi wachno ok ong’ere,
to achien ofwenyore, tonyaka gichiw nyarwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, mi gikele enyim Hemb Romo.
Eka jodong oganda noket lwetgi ewi nyarwadhno e nyimRuoth Nyasaye, kendo noyang’e kanyo.
Jadolo maduong’ nokaw remo mokokendo nokel ei Hemb Romo.
Eka nolut lith lwete e remono kendo nokirnyadibiriyo e nyim pasia maler e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Bang’ mano nomienremo moko e tunge kendo-mar-misango man e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ei HembRomo, kendo nopuk remo duto modong’ e tiend kendo-mar-misango miwang’opep man e dho hemb romo.
Eka nokaw boche duto mag nyarwadhno, minowang’gi e kendo-mar-misango.
Nowang’ nyarwadhno mana kaka iwang’orwath mitimogo misango mar golo richo.  Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodhnigikethogi, mi nowenigi.
Enogol nyarwadhno oko mar kambi, kendo nowang’emana kaka nowang’ rwath machielo cha.  Mano en misango mar golo richo nioganda.
Ka jatelo moro oketho chik moro amora mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachekakia, mi odoko jaketho,
to bang’e onyise ni oseketho chik, nyakaochiw nywok maonge songa mondo otimgo misango.
Enoket lwete ewichiayono, kendo noyang’e e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kama iyang’oe chiayomitimogo misango miwang’o pep.  En misango mar golo richo.
Eka jadolonogwel remb chiayono gi lith lwete, mi nomien e tunge kendo-mar-misangomiwang’o pep.  To remo duto modong’ nyaka puk e tiend kendono.
Enowang’boche duto e kendo-mar-misango mana kaka iwang’o boche mag misengni magsawo.  Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ketho ng’ato mi nowene.
Ka ng’ato ang’ata oketho chik moro amora mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasache kokia, mi odoko jaketho,,
to bang’e onyise ni oseketho chik,to nyaka okel diel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango maonge songa mondootimgo mosango mar golo richo, kopwodhogo ketho mosetimono.
Enoketlwete ewi chiayono, kendo noyang’e e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kama iyang’oejamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep.
Eka jadolo nogwel remo gi lithlwete, mi nomien e tunge kendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep.  To remo dutonyaka puki e tiend kendono.
Enogol bochene duto mana kaka igolo bochemag jamni mitimogo misengni mag sawo, mi jadolo nowang’gi ekendo-mar-misango mondo odum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kamano e kakajadolo nopwodh ketho ng’atno, mi nowene.
Ka ng’ato ochiwo rombo mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, to nyakaobed rombo ma nyaburi maonge songa.
Enoket lwete e wiye, kendonoyang’e mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kama iyang’oe jamnimitimogo misengni miwang’o pep.
Eka jadolo nogwel remo gi lith lwete,mi nomien e tunge kendo mar misango miwang’o pep.  To remo duto nopuk etiend kendono.
Enogol boche duto, mana kaka igolo boche mag rombemitimogo misengni mag sawo.  Eka nowang’ bochego ewi misengni miwang’o niRuoth Nyasaye, kopwodhogo ketho ma ng’atno osetimo, mi nowene. Tim jo-Lawi
Ka omi ng’ato okuong’ore mondo ohul gima oseneno kata mosewinjo, tootamore hulo, en bende odoko jaketho, kendo nyaka ochul.
Ka ng’ato omulo gimoro makuero, kaka le makuero motho, bed ni en lemaoko kata mopidhi, kata gima mol motho,
kata ka ogere kuom gimoroamora makuero moa kuom dhano, ka ok ong’eyo, mi ofwenyo achien, toenodok jaketho.
Kata ka ng’ato omwomore, mokuong’ore ka ok ong’eyo,mondo otim gima rach kata gima ber e wach moro ma ji thoro mwomoreekakuong’ore, mi ofwenyo achien, to enodok jaketho.
Ka achiel kuombuchegi omako ng’ato, mi ohulo kaka oseketho,
to nyaka okel ni RuothNyasaye chiayo madhako, ma rombo kata diel, kuom keto mosetimono mondootimgo misango mar golo richo.  Eka jadolo nopwodhnego kethoneno, minowene.
Ka ng’ato odhier ma ok onyal yudo kata mana chiayo moro matin, toenokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye akuch odugla ariyo, kata nyithi akuru ariyo,kuom richo mosetimono.  Akuru achiel notimgo misango mar golo richo, tomachielo notimgo misango miwang’o pep.
Enokel ni jadolo winygo, kendonokuong ochiw winyo monego timgo misango mar golo richo, mi jadolo nominwiye, to ok nochod chuth.
Enokir remb winyono moko e korkendo-mar-misango, to remo modong’ nyaka bi, mi chuer e tiend kendono. En misango mar golo richo.
Winyo machielo, to notimgo misango miwang’opep, kaka chik dwaro.  Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodhnigo ng’atno kethone,mi nowene.
Ka ng’ato ok nyal kata mana chiwo akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuruariyo kuom richone, to nyaka ochiw kilo ang’wen mag mogo mayom mondootimgo misango mar golo richo.  To kik oolie mo, kata kik oketie ubani,nikech en misango mar golo richo.
Enokel ni jadolo mogono, mi jadolonojuk sanja ka rapar, mondo owang’ e kendo-mar-misango ewi misengnimiwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ni ng’atnoketho mosetimo kuom chikego, mi nowene. Misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya:
Ka ng’ato oboth, moketho, mi okochiwo gima onego ochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nyaka okelni Ruoth Nyasayeim maonge songa, mondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  Nengoimno nyaka pim gi shekel mar fedha mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye.  En misangomar golo ketho.
Bende nyaka ochul nengo mar gima ne ok ochiwo ni RuothNyasaye, komedoe achiel kuom abich mar nengono.  Enochiwe ni jadolo, mijadolo nokaw imno, kendo notimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, miketho ng’atno nowene.
Ka ng’ato oketho, motimo gima Ruoth Nyasaye okwero, be dni ok ong’eyoni osetimo kamano, to pod en mana jaketho.
Nyaka okel ni jadolo immaonge songa, mondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, kendojadolo nopwodhnego ketho mosetimo kokia, mi nowene.
En misangomipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, nikech ng’atno oseketho mobedo gi gowi e nyimRuoth Nyasaye. Tim jo-Lawi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya:
Ka ng’ato oketho, motimo gimarach e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mokuong’ore gi miriambo, kowuondo wadgi kuomgima nomiye mondo okan, kata kuom gima osingne, kata kuom gima osekwalo,kata kosechamo malang’
kata kokwanyo gimoro to oriamboe,
odokojaketho.  Omiyo nyaka ochul gima osekwalo kata mosechamo malang’, kata manomiye mondo okan, kata mane olal to okwanyo,
kata gimoro amora maneokuong’oree gi miriambo, to enochul gino pep, chieng’ mochiwoe misangomipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, komedoe achiel kuom abich mar nengo gino.
Bende enokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye im maonge songa ma nengone opim ni oromotimogo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.
Jadolo notimnego misangomipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, mi nowene kuom gimoro amora ma notimo,mosemiyo obedo jagowi. Chike mag misengni mamoko
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Koro nyis Harun gi yawuote nichik mar misango miwang’o pep ema: Misango miwang’o pep nyaka bed ekendo mar misango otieno duto nyaka okinyi, to bende mach nyaka sik kaliel kanyo.
Bang’e jadolo norwak law katana maber, kod sirwari mondoogeng’go duge.  Eka nogol buch misango ma mach osewang’o ekendo-mar-misango, mi noket e bath kendono.
Bang’e nolok lepe moko,eka nogol buru e kambi, mi oter oko kama oyangi.
Mach nosik ka liel ekendo mar misango ma ok otho.  Okinyi kokinyi, jadolo nyaka ketie yienmondo oliel, eka ochanie misango miwang’o pep, kendo owang’ie boche magmisengni mag sawo.
Mach nyaka sik ka liel e kendo mar misango ma okotho ngang’.
To ma e chik mar misango mar cham: Joka Harun nochiwe e nyim RuothNyasaye e dho kendo-mar-misango.
Achiel kuom jodolo nojuk mogo sanjamoruw gi mo, kaachiel gi ubani duto moketie.  Enowang’ sanja mojukono karapar e kendo-mar-misango mondo odum mang’ue ng’ar ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To modong’, Harun gi yawuote nocham, maonge thowi, e laru mar HembRomo, ma en kama oyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Mogono asemiyo joka Harun kamigapgi kuom misengni motimna kiwang’o gi mach.  En gima ler moloyo manaka misango mar golo richo kendo ka misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.
Joka Harun duto machwo nyalo chame ka migapgi kuom misengni mowang’ niRuoth Nyasaye.  Mano en chik mochwere kuom tiengeu duto.  Gimoro amoramogerer kuom misengnigo nodok mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Mich ma Harun gi yawuote nochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye chieng’ mowire nobed mogo moromo kilo ang’wen, ma enmisango mar cham mapile.  Nus mogono nochiw gokinyi, to nus machielonochiw godhiambo.
Notede gi mo e tawo, eka inikele ka oseruwore maber,mi inichiwe kong’injore matindotindo mondo otimgo misango mar cham madummamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nyakwar Harun ka nyakwar Harun mobedo jadolomaduong’ ema nochiwe.  Mano en chik mochwere nyaka chieng’.  Nowang’e niRuoth Nyasaye ka misango miwang’o pep.
Misengni duto mag cham majodolo chiwo nyaka wang’ pep.  Kik chamgi kata matin. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis Harun gi yawuote ni chikmar misango mar golo richo ema: Chiach misango mar golo richo nyakayang’ kama iyang’oe jamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep.  En gima lermoloyo.
Jadolo motimo misangono ema nochame e laru mar Hemb Romo ma enkama oyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Gimoro amora mogere kuom misangono nobedmowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ka remb misangono okirore e nanga, to nyakalwoke kama oyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Agulu motedie ring misango mar goloricho nyaka negi.  To ka aguch mula ema otedee, to nyaka rudhe kendo lawegi pi.
Ng’ato ang’ata ma dichwo ma jaodgi jadolo nyalo chamomisangono.  En gima ler moloyo.
Ka remb chiayo motimgo misango mar goloricho okel e Hemb Romo mondo opwodhgo richo e Kama Ler, to misangono oknocham, to nowang’e mana gi mach. Tim jo-Lawi
Ma e chik mar misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  En gima ler moloyo.
Chiach misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi nyaka yang’ mana kama iyang’oejamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep, kendo rembe nyaka kir e bethe dutomag kendo-mar-misango.
Jadolo nokaw bochene duto, kaka sembe gi bochemoumo jambich,
kod nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro kodjwala mabor manie wi chuny kod nyiroke.  Enochiwgi
kowang’ogi ekendo-mar-misangoo mondo obed misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Enmisango mipwodhogo kethoo mar gowi.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato ma dichwo majaodgi jodolo nyalo chame, to nyaka chame kama owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech en gima ler moloyo.
Nitie chik achiel moriwo misango mar goloricho kod misango pipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  Misengnigo nodong’ nijadolo motimogi, kopwodhogo richo.
Jadolo motimo misango miwang’o gichiayo ma ng’ato ochiwo, nodong’ gi pien chiayono.
Bende misango kamisango mar cham motedi e kendo, kata mochiel e sufuria kata e tawo,nodong’ ni jadolo matime.
To misengni mamoko duto mag cham, moruw gimo kata ma ok oruw gi mo, joka Harun duto nopogre maromre.
Chik mar misango mar sawo michiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ema:
Ka ng’atoochiwe ka gir erokamano, to nyaka omedie makati ma ok oketie thowi,moted gi mo, gi chapat maonge thowi mowirie mo, kod kek matindotindomoted gi mogo mayom, modwal gi mo.
To bende nyaka medie makati moketiethowi.
To kek achiel kuom misango ka misango nyaka yiegi e nyim RuothNyasaye.  Enodong’ ni jadolo ma kiro remb misango mar sawo e kendo marmisango.
Ring misango mar sawo nyaka cham chieng’ mochiwee.  Ok nowekata matin nindi nyaka okinyi.
To ka ng’ato otimo misango mochopogo kuong’ruok, kata ma otimo atimakuom herone, to jodolo nyaka chame chieng’ mochiweno kod kinyne.
To karing’o moko odong’ nyaka chieng’ mar adek, to nyaka wang’ie e mach.
Karing misango mar sawo ocham nyaka chieng’ mar adek, to Nyasaye ok noyiegi ng’at mochiweno, kata misango bende ok nochiw ka gima ber, to enobedgima kwero, kendo ng’at mochame nobed jaketho.
Ring’o aring’a ma ogere kuom gima ogak ok nocham, to nyaka wang’e gimach. Ng’ato ang’ata ma ok ogak nyalo chamo ring’o,
to ng’at mogak kochamoring misango mar sawo mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nong’ad kare oko kuomogandagi.
Ka ng’ato ogere kuom gimoro mogak, bed ni en dhano kata le,kata gimoro amora makuero, to bang’e ochamo ring misango mar sawo mochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nong’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
ni mondo onyis jo-Israel kama: Kikucham bor chiayo moro amora.
Bor chiayo motho athoya kende kata maondiek onego unyalo konyorugo e tich moro, to kik uchame.
Ng’atoang’ata mochamo bor chiayo ma lembe moko nono osetimgo misango miwang’oni Ruoth Nyasaye, nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
Kik ucham remo moro amora, bed ni en mar winyo kata mar le, kamoroamora mudakie.
Ng’ato ang’ata mochamo remo nong’ad kare oko kuomogandagi.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
ni mondo onyis jo-Israel kama: "Ng’atoang’ata mobiro mondo otim misango mar sawo nyaka pog lemo moko obedmisango michiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
En owuon nokel ni Ruoth Nyasayeboche miwang’o gi mach, kod agoko ma iyiego e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Jadolo nowang’ bochego e kendo-mar-misango, to agoko nodong’ ni Harungi yawuote.
Bende unumi jadolo em ma korachwich mar chiayo ka chiayomotimgo misango mar sawo.
Jaka Harun machiwo remo kod boche magmisango mar sawo ema nokaw emno.
Agoko kod em mag chiayo ka chiayo majo-Israel timogo misengni mag sawo, amiyo Harun jadolo kod yawuote mondoobed mich moyiedhi migolo kuom jo-Israel nyaka chieng’.
Mano en lemomomi Harun gi yawuote kuom misengni miwang’o, chakre chieng’’ maneoketgie jodolo mag Ruoth Nyasaye.
Chieng’ mane owirgieno, RuothNyasaye nogolo chik ni, jo-Israell nyaka mi jodolo migepego.  Mano enchik momako jo-Israel nyaka chieng’.
Mago e chike mag misango miwang’o pep, gi mag misango mar cham, gi magmisango mar golo richo, gi mag misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, gi magmisengni mitimo chieng’ miketo jadolo e tich, kod mag misengni mag sawo.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Musa chikego e got Sinai chieng’ mane ochikoejo-Israel mondo ochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni maggi, ka gin e thimSinai. Tim jo-Lawi
Oket Harun kod yawuote e tich dolo(Wuok
.
-
