kendo indik nying ng’ato ka ng’ato ma dichwo mahike oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo, moromo dhi e lweny.  Un giHarun nyaka undik nyinggi malong’o kuchanogi e ogendini mag lweny.
Nyaka okaw ng’ato achiel ma jatelo e dhoot ka dhoot mondoo okonyu etijno.
Magi e nying jogo ogogo:E dhood Reuben, en Elizur wuod Shedeur.
E dhood Simeon, en Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai.
E dhood Juda, en Nashon wuod Aminadab.
E dhood Isakar, en Nathaneel wuod Zuar.
E dhood Zebulun, en Eliab wuod Helon.
Kuom joka Josef to en Elishama wuod Amihud e dhood Efaraim, kodGamaliel wuod Pedazur e dhood Manase.
E dhood Benjamin, en Abidan wuod Gideoni.
E dhood Dan, en Ahiezer wuod Amishadai.
E dhood Asher, en Pagiel wuod Okran.
E Gad en Eliasaf wuod Reuel.
To dhood Naftali, en Ahira wuod Enan. "
Mago ne jotelo mochung’ ni oganda duto e dhoutgi, kendo ne gin jodongomag dhout Israel.
Musa gi Harun nokawo joma osehul nyinggigo,
kendo ne gichoko ogandajo-Israel chieng’ mokwongo mar due mar ariyo.  Ne gichano anywolagi edhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi, ka kindiko nying ng’ato ka ng’ato ma dichwoma hike oseromoo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo, kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosechiko Musa.
Kamano e kaka Musa nokwano jo-Israel e thim Sinai.
Ne ochan jo-Reuben, ma wuod Israel maduong’, e utgi kaluwore gikweregi, kindiko nying ng’ato ka ng’ato ma dichwo ma hike oseromo pieroariyo kata mokadho kanyo moromo dhi e lweny.
Kar rombgi ne alufu pieroang’wen gauchiel gi mia abich.
Jo-Simeon e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying ng’ato ka ng’atoma dichwo ma hike oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo moromo dhi elweny,
ne alufu piero abich gochiko gi mia adek.
Jo-Gad e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto mahikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
nealufu piero ang’wen gabich gi mia auchiel kod piero abich.
Jo-Juda e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto mahikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
nealufu piero abiriyo gang’wen gi mia auchiel.
Jo-Isakar e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto mahikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
nealufu piero abich gang’wen gi mia ang’wen.
Jo-Zebulun e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto mahikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
nealufu piero abich gabiriyo gi mia ang’wen.
Joka Josef ma jo dhood Efraim e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindikonying joma chwo duto ma hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo maoromo dhi e lweny,
ne alufu piero ang’wen gi mia abich.
To jokaJosef ma jo dhood Manase e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying jomachwo duto ma hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi elweny,
ne alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia ariyo.
Jo-Benjamin e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo dutoma hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
ne alufu piero adek gabich gi mia ang’wen.
Jo-Dan e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto mahikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
nealufu piero auchiel gariyo gi mia abiriyo.
Jo-Ashur e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto mahikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
nealufu piero ang’wen gachiel gi mia abich.
Jo-Naftali e utgi kaluwore gi kweregi, kindiko nying joma chwo duto mahikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhi e lweny,
nealufu piero abich gadek gi mia abich.
Mago e kwan jo-Israel mane Musa gi Harun kod jodong dhout Israel apargariyogo ochano, ka jaduong’ ka jaduong’ ochung’ gi dhoot ka dhoot.
Jo-Israel ma hikgi oseromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo ma oromo dhie lweny ne ondik nyinggi e dhout kweregi.
Kar rombgi ne alufu miaauchiel gadek gi mia abich gi piero abich. Okel jo-Lawi e tich mar rito Hema Maler
To nying jo-Lawi kaluwore gi kweregi ne ok ondiki,
nikech RuothNyasaye nosewacho ni Musa niya,
"Kik ikwan jo-Lawi kaka ikwanojo-Israel mamoko, kendo kik indik nyinggi kodgi,
to iketgi e tich ritoHema Maler gi gige duto.  Gin kende ema ginibed jorit Hema Maler, kendoginigur hembegi molwore koni gi koni.
Ka Hema Maler dhi kamoro, tojo-Lawi ema nopudhe, kendo kochopo kama gidhiye, to gin ema onegogigure.  Ka ng’ato ang’ata ma ok owal ni tijno osudo but Hema Maler, tonyaka nege.
Jo-Israel mamoko duto nyaka gur hembegi dhoot ka dhoot ekambine, kendo e bwo bandeche.
To jo-Lawi nogur hembegi e alwora marHema Maler mar Rapar, mondo mirimba kik bi kuom oganda duto mag Israel. Kamano jo-Lawi ema nobed karito Hema Maler mar Rapar. "
Jo-Israel notimo mana kaka ne Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa. Kwan
Cheno mar dhout jo-Israel e kambegi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun kama:
Jo-Israel nyaka buor kang’ato ka ng’ato ni e bwo bandech jatendgi kendo e bwo bandech dhoodgi. Ginigur hembegi molworo Hemb Romo, kendo momanyore kode.
Koro magi e dhoudi manogur hembegi yo wuok chieng, e nyim Hemb Romo:Jo-Juda nobed e bwo bandech kambigi, kochan e ogendgi mag lweny. Jatendgi en Nashon wuod Aminadab.
Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufupiero abiriyo gang’wen gi mia auchiel.
Jo-Isakar ema nogur hembegimachiegni gi jo-Juda.  Jatendgi en Nethaneel wuod Zuar.
Ogandane romo jialufu piero abich gang’wen gi mia ang’wen.
Butgi jo-Zebulun emanobedie.  Jatendgi en Eliab wuod Helon.
Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufupiero abich gabiriyo gi mia ang’wen.
Kamano ji duto manie kambi marjo-Juda, kochan e ogendgi, romo alufu mia achiel gii piero aborogauchiel gi mia ang’wen.  Ka oganda jo-Israel duto chako wuoth, to ginema gikwongo.
Magi e dhoudi ma nobed yo milambo: Jo-Reuben nobed e bwo bandechkambigi kochan e ogendgi mag lweny.  Jatendgi en Elizur wuod Shedeur.
Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu puero ang’wen gauchiel gi mia abich.
Jo-Simeon ema nobed butgi.
Jatend jo-Simeon gogo nobed Shelumielwuod Zurishadai.  Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero abichh gochikogi mia adek.
Bang’e to jo-Gad ema nobedie.  Jatendgi en Eliasaf wuodReuel.
Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero ang’wen gabich gi miaauchiel gi piero abich.
Kamano ji duto manie oganda jo-Reuben, kochane ogendgi mag lweny, romo alufu mia achiel gi piero abich gachiel kodmia ang’wen gi piero abich.  Gin ema giniwuog mar ariyo.
Bang’gi to Hemb Romo ema nowuogi, ka kambi jo-Lawi osiko kargi e dierkambe mamoko.  Ka giwuotho, to ginichanre mana kaka kambegi ochanore, kang’ato ka ng’ato ni e bwo bandeche.
Dhoudi ma nobed yo podho chieng’ e magi: Jo-Efraim nobed e bwobandechgi, kochan e ogendgi mag lweny.  Jatendgi en Elshama wuod Amihud.
Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero ang’wen gi mia abich.
Jo-Manase ema nobed butgi.  Jatend jo-Manase en Gamaliel wuod Pedazur.
Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia ariyo.
Bang’ jogo jo-Benjamin ema nobedie.  Jatendgi en Abidan wuod Gideoni.
Ogandane mar lweny romo ji alufu piero adek gabich gi mia ang’wen.
Kamano ji duto manie kambi jo-Efraim, kochan e ogendgi mag lweny romoji alufu mia achiel gaboro gi mia achiel.  Gin ema giniwuog mar adek.
Dhoudi ma nobed yo nyandwat e magi: Jo-Dan nobed e bwo bandechkambigi, kochan e ogendgi mag lweny, jatendgi en Ahiezel wuod Amishadai.
Ogandagi romo ji alufu piero auchiel gariyo gi mia abiriyo.
Jo-Ashurema nobed butgi.  Jatendgi en Pagiel wuod Okram.
Ogandane mar lwenyromo ji alufu piero ang’wen gachiel gi mia abich.
Jo-Naftali ema nobedbut dhoodno.  Jatendgi en Ahira wuod Enan.
Ogandane romo ji alufu pieroabich gadek gi mia ang’wen.
Kamano ji duto manie kambi jo-Dan romoalufu mia achiel gi piero abich gariyo gi mia auchiel.  Gin ema giniwuogachien e bwo bandechegi, kochan-gi e ogendgi mag lweny.
Mago e jo-Israel mane okwan kaluwore gi dhoutgi.  Kar romb ji duto ekambi, kochan e ogendgi mag lweny romo ji alufu mia auchiel gi adek, gimia abich gi piero abich.
Kane ikwano jo-Isarel, to jo-Lawi ne ok kwan, nikech kamano e kakaRuoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Jo-Israel notimo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenochiko Musa.  Ne gibworo e bwo bandechegi, kendo ne giwuotho e bwobandechegigo, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato nigi joodgi e dhoodgi mana kakanonyisgi. Kwan
Kar romb jo-Lawi gi tijegi
Magi ne e nyikwa Harun gi Musa e kinde mane Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyoe giMusa e got Sinai:
Yawuot Harun ne Nadab, wuowi maduong’, gi Abihu giEleazer kod Ithamar.
Mago e nying yawuot Harun mane obiro, moketi e tijdolo.
To Nadab gi Abihu notho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech ne giwang’oubani ma ok ni kare e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye e thim Sinai.  Ne githo ka pokginywolo nyithindo, omiyo Eleazer gi Ithamar ne jokawo tij dolo ka wuongi pod ngima.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Kel jo-Lawi machiegni, kendoiketgi giti ni Harun.
Nyaka gitine, kendo giti ni oganda duto e nyimHemb Romo ka gitiyo tich lemo e Kama Ler.
Ginibed ka girito gik mokoduto mitiyogo e Hemb Romo, kendo giniti tich lemo e Kama Ler nijo-Israel.
Iniket jo-Lawi e teko Harun gi yawuote, mondo gibed jomaochiwne kuom oganda jo-Israel.
Harun gi yawuote ema inimi tich dolo,to ng’at ma ok jadolo motiyo tich dolo nyaka negi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Aseyiero jo-Lawi kuom jo-Israelkar nyithindo makayo duto ma mond Israel onywolo.  Kuom mano, jo-Lawi ginjoga,
nimar nyithindo duto makayo gin maga.  Chieng’ mane anegonyithindo duto makayo e piny Misri ne awalo nyithind Israel makayo dutoobed maga, bed ni gin mag dhano kata mag le.  Gin maga.  An e RuothNyasaye. "
Ruoth Nyasaye ne ochako owacho ni Musa e thim Sinai niya,
"Ndiknying jo-Lawi machwo duto chakre ja-due achiel kadhi nyime, kichanogi edhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi. "
Omiyo Musa nondiko nyinggi kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike,
kendo nyingyawuot Lawi e magi: Gershon gi Kohath, kod Merari.
Joka Gershon e dhoutgi gin Libna gi Shimei.
Joka Kohath e dhoutgigin Amram gi Izhar gi Hebron kod Uziel.
Joka Merari e dhoutgi gin Malikod Mushi.  Mago e dhout Lawi kaluwore gi kweregi.
E dhood Gershon ne nitie joka Libni kod joka Shimei.  Mago ne dhoutGershon,
kendo kar romb jogi machwo mane okwan chakre ja-due achielkadhi nyime ne alufu abiriyo gi mia abich.
Dhout Gershon ne oket yopodho chieng’ e tok Hema Maler.
Jatendgi ne Eliasaf wuod Lael.
Tokuom tich Hemb Romo, joka Gershon ne omi tich rito Hema Maler, kaachielgi gik miumego, kod pasia mar dhood Hemb Romo,
gi pasia mag laru gimag rangach midonjogo e laru mar e aluora mar Hema Maler gi aluora markendo-mar-misango, kod gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyo.
E dhood Kohath, ne nitie joka Amram gi joka Izhar gi joka Hebron kodjoka Uziel.
Mago ne dhout Kohath, kendo kar romb jogi machwo manokwan, chakre ja-due achiel ka dhi nyime ne alufu aboro gi mia achiel. Gin ema ne gin jorit Kama Ler.
Dhoutgi noket yo milambo e bath HemaMaler.
Jatendgi ne en Elizafan wuod Uziel,
kendo ne omigi tich ritoSandug Muma gi mesa gi rachung taya gi kende mag misango gi gik mokoduto mitiyogo e lemo, kod pasia gi gige duto.
Jaduong’ jotend jo-Lawiduto ne Eleazer wuod Harun jadolo.  En ema nokete jatelo mar rito HemaMaler.
E dhood Merari ne nitie joka Mali gi joka Mushi.  Mago ne e dhoutMerari,
kendo kar romb jogi machwo mane okwan, chakre ja-due achielkadhi nyime, ne alufu auchiel gi mia ariyo.
Jatendgi ne Zuriel wuodAbihail, kendo noketgi yo nyandwat mar Hema Maler.
Joka Merari ne omitich rito frembe gi rariw gi sirni gi rachungi mag Hema Maler, kaachielgi gige duto kod gik moko duto mitiyogo kanyono,
gi sirni molworolaro, kod rachungigi gi loyegi kod tondegi.
To mogik, Musa gi Harun kod joka Harun noket e nyim Hema Maler yo wuokchieng’ mar Hemb Romo.  Gin ema ne omigi tich rito Kama Ler ni jo-Israel,to ng’ato ang’ata ma ok jadolo mane nyalo sudo machiegni nyaka ne negi.
Kar romb jo-Lawi machwo mane Musa ondiko nyinggi e dhoutgi kaka neRuoth Nyasaye ochiko ne alufu piero ariyo, chakre jadue achiel kadhinyime. Nyasaye okawo jo-Lawi kar jo-Israel machwo makayo
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ndik nying jo-Israel machwomakayo duto chakre ja-due achiel kadhi nyime, kendo ikwan kar rombgi.
An e Ruoth Nyasaye.  Unuwalna jo-Lawi kar jo-Israel machwo makayo. Kamano bende unuwalna jamb jo-Lawi kar jamni makayo mag jo-Israel. "
Musa nondiko nying jo-Isarel machwo makayo duto, chakre ja-due achielkadhi nyime, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
Kar rombgi ne alufu pieroariyo gariyo gi mia ariyo gi piero abiriyo gadek.
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa niya,
"Kaw jo-Lawi karjo-Israel machwo makayo duto, kendo kaw jamb jo-Lawi kar jambgi.  Jo-Lawinyaka bed joga.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
To jo-Isarel machwo makayo ng’enymoloyo jo-Lawi gi ji mia ariyo kod piero abiriyo gadek,
omiyo nyakauwar joma odong’go gi shekel abich abich, kipimo gi shekel mitiyogo etich Nyasaye.  (Shekel achiel romre gi gera piero ariyo. )
Pesamowargigo unuchiw ni Harun gi yawuote. "
Ka ne gisetieko waro joma kayo mane odong’, Musa nokawo pesamowargigo.
Kar romb pesago ne shekel mag fedha alufu achiel gi miaadek kod piero achiel gabich kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye.
Nochiwo pesago ni Harun gi yawuote kaka ne Ruoth Nyasaye owachone. Kamano notimo gima ne Ruoth Nyasaye ochike. Kwan
Tije momi jo-Lawi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
"Kwanuru jo-Lawi ma jokaKohath e dhoutgi, kaluwore gi kweregi,
kundiko nying joma hikgi niekind piero adek gi piero abich, monego ti tich lemo e Hemb Romo.
"Tich momi joka Kohath e Hemb Romo ma en tich maler moloyo, ema:
Kaudaro kambiu, to Harun gi yawuote nyaka bi mi lor pasia mogeng’o KamaLer moloyo, kendo giumgo Sandug Rapar.
Eka giume gi piende monyong’,kendo giboye gi law mambulu.  Bang’e girwakne ludhe miting’ego.
Ginipedhlaw mambulu e mesa miketoe makati e nyim Nyasaye pile, kendo giniketietewni gi tegni gi kikombe kod agwetni mitiyogo kitimo misengni nilopiny.  Makati michiwo pile bende nyaka bed ewi mesano.
Bang’ mano, nyakagipedh law makwar ewi gigo, kendo gichak giumgi duto gi piende monyong’. Eka girwak ludhe miting’ego.
Ginikaw law mambulu, giumgo rachung tayagi teyni mage, gi rangisni gi rajow, kod gik miting’ogo mor taya,
ginibo rachung taya kod gige duto gi piende monyong’, kendo giniting’ekoliero e luth.
Ginipedh law mambulu e mesa mar dhahabu kendo giniumegi piende monyong’.  Bang’e ginirwakne ludhe miting’ego.
Ginikaw gikmoko duto mitiyogo e Kama Ler, mi giket e law mambulu, kendo giumgi gipiende monyong’, eka giniting’gi ka giliero e luth.
Ginijow buru ekendo-mar-misango, mi gium kendono gi law maralik.
Eka giniket kuomegik moko duto mitiyogo e tich dolo, kaka tep mach gi rachwow gi rajow gitewni kod gik moko duto mag kendo mar misango.  Giniume gi piendemonyong’, kendo ginirwakne ludhe miting’ego.
Pile ka kambi dar, tojoka Kohath nyaka bi mondo oting’ Hema Maler kod gige duto.  To kik gibika pok Harun gii yawuote otieko umogi, bende kik gimul gimoro amoramaler, nono to githo.  Mago duto gin gik Hemb Romo ma joka Kohath emating’o.
Eleazer wuod Harun jadolo ema norit mor taya gi ubani mang’ueng’ar, gi mor wir kod misango mar cham michiwo pile.  Hema Maler gi gikmoko duto manie iye, tiende ni Kama Ler kod gige, bende en ema noriti. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
"Kik uwe dhood jokaKohath rum mi lal kuom jo-Lawi wetegi,
to nyisgiuru ni ka gisudomachiegni gi gik maler, to gima onego tim mondo kik githo ema: Harun giyawuote ema nyaka donji mondo omi ng’ato ka ng’ato tije kod gima onegong’atno ting’
to joka Kohath kik donj, nikech dipo ka gigoyo wang’gikuom gik maler, mi githo. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Kwan joka Gershon e dhoutgi,kaluwore gi kweregi,
kindiko nying joma hikgi ni e kind piero adek kodpiero abich, monego ti e Hemb Romo.
"Tije momigi kod gik ma onego giti e magi:
Giniting’ pasia mag KamaLer kendo giniting’ Hemb Romo gi law miumego, kaachiel gi piendemonyong’ moluow kuome, gi pasia mar dhood Hemb Romo,
gi rageng’ni maglaru gi mag pasia mar rangach midonjogo e laru mar aluora mar Hema malergi aluora mar kendo-mar-misango gi tondegi kod gik moko duto mitiyogo. Gin ema omigi tich rito gigo.
Harun gi yawuote ema nochan tije dutomag joka Gershon, kod gik ma onego giting’.
Mano e tich momi jokaGershon e Hemb Romo.  Ithamar wuod harun jadolo ema nobed jatendgi.
"Nyaka ikwan joka Merari e dhoutgi moluwore gi kweregi,
kindikonying ji duto ma hikgi ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich, monego ti eHemb Romo.
"Gik ma onego giting’ kaka tichgi e Hemb Romo e magi: Frembe mag HemaMaler gi rariw mage gi sirni mage gi rachungi,
gi sirni mag larumolworo hema, gi rachungine gi loyegi gi tondegi kod gik moko dutomitiyogo kanyo.  Nyaka pog ni ng’ato ka ng’ato gik ma onego giting’.
Mago e tije momi joka Merari e hemb Romo.  Ithamar wuod Harun jadoloema nobed jatendgi. "
Musa gi Harun kod jodong oganda jo-Israel nokwano joka Kohath edhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi,
ka gindiko nying ng’ato ka ng’ato ma hikeni e kind piero adek gi piero abich, moromo tiyo e Hemb Romo.
Karrombgi kochan e dhoutgi ne alufu ariyo gi mia abiriyo gi piero abich.
Mano ne e kar romb joka Kohath mane tiyo e Hemb Romo.  Musa gi Harunnokwanogi mana kaka ne Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa onyisogi.
,
Joka Gershon ma hikgi ne ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich ma netiyo e Hemb Romoo nondik nyinggi kaluwore gi kweregi.
Kar rombgi edhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi ne alufu ariyo gi mia auchiel gi piero adek.
Mago e joka Gershon mane tiyo e tich Hemb Romo, kendo mane Musa giHarun ondiko nyinggi kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosechikogi.
,
Joka Merari ma hikgi ne ni e kind piero adek gi piero abich maneoromo tiyo e Hemb Romo ne ondik nyinggi e dhoutgi kaluwore ki kweregi.
Kar rombgi e dhoutgi ne alufu adek gi mia ariyo.
Musa gi Harunnondiko nying joka Merarigo ka gichanogi e dhoutgi kaka Ruoth Nyasayenomiyo Musa ochikogi.
Mano e kaka Musa gi Harun kod jodong Israel nondiko nying jo-Lawi dutoe dhoutgi kaluwore gi kweregi.
Ne gin joma hikgi ni e kind piero adekgi piero abich mane tiyo tije mopogore opogore e Hemb Romo, kendo maneting’oo gik Hemb Romo.
Kar rombgi duto ne alufu aboro gi mia abich kodpiero aboro.
Musa nondiko nying ng’ato k a ng’ato kuomgi kaka ne RuothNyasaye ochike, kaluwore gi tijegi kod gik mane onego giting’.  Mano ekaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa mondo otim. Kwan
Ogol joma ogak e kambi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Chik jo-Israel ni joma nigi tuodhoho, kata man gi nyach machuer, kata mogak nikech omulo gimoro motho,mondo ogol e kambi.
Nyaka uketgi gidag oko mar kambi, bed ni gin chwokata mon, mondo kik gidwany kambeu, kuonde ma adake kodu. "
Omiyojo-Israel nogolo joma nigi tuoche ma kamago e kambi, mana kaka RuothNyasaye nonyiso Musa. Chik mar chudo kuom ketho
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa
mondo onyis jo-Isarel kama: "Kang’ato otimo marach ni wadgi, mi oketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, bed ni endichwo kata dhako, to mano omiyo obedo jaketho, kendo en gi gowi manyaka ochul.
Nyaka ohul ketho mosetimono, kendo nyaka ochul ng’atmokethoneno gima oromo gi kethono, komedoe achiel kuom abich.
Kang’atno osetho, to oonge gi jaodgi mahie ma dichul kuom kethono, tochudono kaachiel gi im ma jadolo pwodhogo jakethono nobed mar RuothNyasaye, kendo nodong’ ni jadolo.
"Mich moyiedhi duto ma jo-Israel kelo nobed mag jadolo.
Enokaw michmoyiedhi duto, bende gimoro amora momiye nobed mare. "Chik mar tieko chich
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa
ni mondo onyis jo-Israel niya,"Nyalo bet ni chi ng’ato oketho,
koterore gi ng’ato, ka chwore kia. Kodwanyore kamano ling’ling’, ma onge janeno kata kaonge ng’ama ojuke,
to bang’e gimoro otimore momiyo chwore ochich kode,
to nyaka chworetere ir jadolo, bed ni dhakono osedwanyore adier, kata chwore chich manakode kayiem.  Chwore nyaka kel mogo mayom moromo kilo abiriyo kaka chikdwaro, to kik oolie mo, bende kik oketie ubani, nimar en misango marcham mitiekogo chich, tiende ni misango mifwenyogo adiera.
Jadolonokel dhakono e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,
eka notwom pi maler gi tawo, kendonojuk lop dier ot mar Hema Maler, mi noruw gi pigno.
Kosekelo dhakonoe nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, to nogony yie wiye, eka noket misango mar chammifwenyogo adiera e lwete.  En misango mar cham mitiekogo chich.  Tojadolo noting pi mar muma mafwenyo adiera e lwete owuon.
Bang’ manonomi dhakono kuong’re, kowachone niya, ‘Ka ng’ato ok oseterore kodi,kendo ok iseketho kidwanyori, to in chi chwori, to pi mar muma mafwenyoadierani kik hinyi.
To ka en adier ni iseketho kidwanyori, mi ng’atooterore kodi, to in chi chwori,
to Ruoth Nyasaye mondo omi iyi okirre,kata omi ibuog nyathi ka kindeni mar nywol pok ochopo, kibedogo ranyisini jou kuom wach kuong’ruok.
Pigni mondo odonj e iyi, kendo omi iyiokirre, kata omi ibuog nyathi ka kindeni mar nywol pok ochopo. ’ Kajadolo osemiyo dhakono okuong’ore kamano, to dhakono nodwok ni, ‘Obedkamano. ’
"Eka jadolo nondik weche mag kuong’go e kalatas, to nolwokgi gi pi marmuma mafwenyo adiera.
Bang’e nomi dhakono pigno omodhi mi donj e iye.
Jadolo nokaw misango mar cham mitiekogo chich e lwet dhakono, minochiwe e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi.  Bang’ mano nokel mogono ekendo mar misango,
mi nojuk sanja, kendoo nowang’ ka rapar ekendo-mar-misango, eka nochak omi dhakono modh pigcha.
Ka en adieri niosedwanyore, koterore, to en chi chwore, to ka jadolo osemiye pignoomodho, to iye nokirre, kata nobuogi ka kindene mar nywol pok ochopo,kendo nyinge nobed mokwong’ e nyim jogi.
To ka dhakono ok osedwanyorekendo adier oler, to ok noyud hinyruok, to nonywol anywola maber.
"Mano e chik mar weche mag chich, ma ka chi ng’ato oketho, miodwanyore,
kata ka chwore ochich achicha kode, to nyaka okele e nyimRuoth Nyasaye, mi jadolo timne kaka chikno dwaro.
Dichwo nobed maongeketho, to chiege nyaka yud kum kuom kethone. "Kwan
Chik moket ni ng’at mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka ja-Nazir
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
ni mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Ng’atoang’ata ma okuong’ore ni obiro bedo ja-Nazir, tiende ni ng’at mowal niRuoth Nyasaye,
ok nomadh kong’o kata gimoro mamero ji, bed ni en dichwokata dhako.  Ok nomadh gik ma kamago, kata gimoro amora molos gi mzabibu,to bende ok nocham mzabibu manumu kata motuo.
E kinde duto maokuong’ore ni obiro bedo ja-Nazirno, ok nomul gimoro amora moa kuom yadhmzabibu kata matin.
"E kindeno duto bende mirich ok noka wiye, to nowe yie wiye dongi,kendo nokadgi akada, nyaka ndalo mag kuong’ruok norum.  Enoritre maler niRuoth Nyasaye.
Ok nosud machiegni gi ng’at motho,
ma dimi obed mogak,bed ni en wuon kata min kata owadgi kata nyamin.  Yie wiye maboyogo emanyiso ni osewale ni Ruoth Nyasae.
Enoritre maler ni Ruoth Nyasaye ndaloduto mag kuong’ruokne.
"Ka ng’ato otho bute apoya, mogere kuome, mi omiyo yie wiye ogak, tonyaka oliel wiye bang’ ndalo abiriyo, chieng’ moket ni ipwodhee.
Tochieng’ mar aboro nyaka okel ni jadolo akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithiakuru ariyo e dho hema miromoe gi Nyasaye.
Jadolo nokaw akuru achiel,mi notimgo misango mar golo richo to machielo notimgo misango miwang’opep, mi nopwodh ng’atno kuom gak mane oyudo kuom ng’at motho.  Ekaja-Nazir nochak opidh wiye chieng’no, kowalore manyien ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kuom ndalo duto mane okuong’oree, kendo nokel nyaim ma hike achielmondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  To kinde mane oyudoosetieko e walruokneno ok nokwan, nikech yie wiye mane nyiso ni owale neodoko mogak.
"Chik momako ja-Nazir chieng’ ma kindene mar walruok orumo ema: Nyakatere e dho Hemb Romo,
kendo nochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyaim ma hikeachiel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep, gi rombo swinimaonge songa mondo otimgo misango mar sawo,
gi odheru moting’o makatima ok ketie thowi, moted gi mo, kod chapati ma bende ok ketie thowi,mowir gi mo kaachiel gi misengni mag cham kod misengni miolo piny, kakachik dwaro.
Jadolo nochiw gigo duto e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, eka notim ning’atno misango mar golo richo kod misango miwang’o pep.
Im cha tonotimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango mar sawo, kaachiel gi makati manieodheru.  Bende nochiw misango mar cham gi misango miolo piny.
Ja-Nazirno noliel wiye e dho Hemb Romo, kendo nokaw yie wiye ma yandeowalno, mi owang’ie mach mitimogo misango mar sawo.
Bang’ mano jadolonokaw bad im kosetedi, kaachiel gi makati ma ok ketie thowi mogol eodheru, kod chapat achiel ma ok ketie thowi, mi noketgi e lwetja-Nazirno, koselielo yie wiye mane owalego no.
Eka jadolo nochiwgi niRuoth Nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi.  Lemogo kaachiel gi agoko kod em michiwoni Ruoth Nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi, gin gik maler, omiyo gidong’ nijadolo.  Bang’ timo mago duto, ja-Nazirno koro nobed gi thuolo mar madhodivai.
"Mano e chik momako ja-Nazir ma osekwong’ore, kendo mano e misango manyaka otim ni Ruoth Nyasaye kuom walruokne, ka ok okwan gik mamoko maonyalo chiwo.  Nyaka ochop kuong’ruokne duto, kaluwore gi chik marwalruokne. "Weche mag gueth ma jadolo onego oguedhgo ji
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa ni mondo onyis Harun niya,
"Ka iguedhojo-Israel, to magi e weche ma nyaka ikonyrigo:
‘Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oguedhu kendo oritu,
Ruoth Nyasaye mondo orienynu kendo ong’wonnu,
Ruoth Nyasaye mondo orangu maber,kendo okelnu kue. ’
Kamano e kaka ginihul nyinga ni jo-Israel kendo naguedhgi. "Kwan
Chiwo ma jotend Israel owalogo kendo-mar-misango
Chieng’ mane Musa otieko chungoe Hema Maler, nowirogo gi mo mowale nitich Nyasaye, kaachiel gi gige duto kod kendo-mar-misango gi gige duto.
Jodong Israel ma jotend dhoutgi mane okonyo Musa e tich kwanojo-Israel, nogolo chiwo.
Chiwo mane gikelo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye e magi:Geche auchiel moum wigi, kaachiel gi rwedhi apar gariyo.  Ruodhi ariyoariyo nochiwo gari achiel achiel, kendo ruoth ka ruoth nochiwo rwathachiel.  Kane gikelo gigo e nyim Hema Maler, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niMusa niya,
"Kaw gik ma gisechiwogo, nikech ibiro tiyo kodgi e HemaMiromoe gi Nyasaye.
Migi jo-Lawi kaka tich ng’ato ka ng’ato dwaro. "
Omiyo Musa nokawo geche kod ruedhi, momiyo jo-Lawi.
Nomiyo jokaGershon geche ariyo gi ruedhi ang’wen, moromo tichgi.
Joka Merari tonomiyo geche ang’wen gi ruedhi aboro, kaka tijgi dwaro, Ithamar wuodHarun jadolo ema nobedo jatend jogo.
To joka Kohath ne ok omiyo gimoro,nikech tich mane omigi ne mar ting’o gik maler, mane nyaka ting’ mana egokgi.
Kane owir kendo-mar-misango gi mo, jodongo nokelo chiwogi e nyimkendono mondo owalego.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "We jodongoochiw michgo mar walo kendo-mar-misango ni tich Nyasaye, ka jaduong’ kajaduong’ kelo michne chieng’ achiel achiel. "
Chieng’ mokwongo Nashon wuod Amonadab ma ja-Juda ema nokelo chiwomare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo shekel mia achiel gipiero adek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani pong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwanng’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod rwedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Nashon wuod Aminadab ogolo.
Chieng’ mar ariyo, Nethaneel wuod Zuar, jatend jo-Isakar, nokelo chiwomare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo shekel mia achiel gipiero adek kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod rwedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Nethaneel wuod Zuar ogolo.
Chieng’ mar adek, Eliab wuod Helon, jatend jo-Zebulun, nokelo chiwomare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gi pieroadek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha ma pekneshekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Eliab wuod Helon ogolo.
Chieng’ ang’wen Elizur wuod Shedeur, jatend jo-Reuben, nokelo chiwomare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo shekel mia achiel gipiero adek kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Elizur wuod Shedeur ogolo.
Chieng’ mar abich, Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai, jatend jo-Simeon nokelochiwo mare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gipiero adek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod rwedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Shelumiel wuod Zurishadai ogolo.
Chieng’ mar auchiel, Eliasaf wuod Reuel, jatend jo-Gad, nokelo chiwomare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gi pieroadek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha ma pekneshekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Eliasaf wuod Reuel ogolo.
Chieng’ mar abiriyo, Elishama wuod Amihud, jatend jo-Efraim, nokelochiwo mare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gipiero adek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Elishama wuod Amihud ogolo.
Chieng’ mar aboro, Gamaliel wuod Pedazur, jatend jo-Manase nogolochiwo mare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gipiero adek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Gamaliel wuod Pedazur ogolo.
Chieng mar ochiko, Abidan wuod Gideoni, jatend jo-Benjamin nokelochiwo mare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gipiero adek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Abidan wuod Gideoni ogolo.
Chieng’ mar apar, Ahiezer wuod Amishadai, jatend jo-Dan, nokelo chiwomare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gi pieroadek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha ma pekneshekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.

gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,

Chieng’ mar apar gachiel Pagiel wuod Okra, jatend jo-Asher, nokelochiwo mare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gipiero adek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Pagiel wuod Okra ogolo.
Chieng’ mar apar gariyo, Ahira wuod Enan, jatend jo-Naftali, nokelochiwo mare.
Nochiwo nyalaro mar fedha ma pekne romo kilo mia achiel gipiero adek, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye, gi tawo mar fedha mapekne shekel piero abiriyo.  Giduto ne giting’o mogo moruw gi mo mitimogomisango mar cham.
Bende nochiwo kikombe mar dhahabu ma pekne shekelapar ma ubani opong’o,
gi nyarwath gi im gi nyaim ma hike achielmitimogo misango miwang’o pep,
gi nywok mitimogo misango mar goloricho,
kod ruedhi ariyo gi imbe abich gi nywogi abich kod nyiimbeabich ma hikgi achiel achiel.  Jamnigo duto ne ibiro timogo misango marsawo.  Mago e chiwo mane Ahira wuod Enan ogolo.
Gik mane jodong Israel ochiwo mondo owalgo kendo mar misango chieng’mane iwire e magi: Nyilerni mag fedha apar gariyo gi tewni mag fedhaapar gariyo kod kikombe mag dhahabu apar gariyo.
Pek mar nyalaro kanyalaro ne romo shekel mia achiel gi piero adek, to pek mar tawo ka tawoshekel piero abiriyo.  Kamano pek mag gigo duto ne romo shekel alufuariyo gi mia ang’wen, kipimoo gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye.
Kikombe apar gariyo ma ubani opong’ogo, moro ka moro pekne ne romoshekel apar kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye.  Kamano kar romb pekdhahabu mag kikombego ne romo shekel mia achiell gi piero ariyo.
Tokar romb jamni duto mitimogo misango miwang’o pep ne ruedhi apar gariyogi imbe apar gariyo gi nyiimbe apar gariyo ma hikgi achiel achielachiel, kaachiel gi misengni mag cham michiwo kodgi kaka chik dwaro, kodnywogi apar gariyo mitimogo misango mar golo richo.
Kar romb jamnimitimogo misango mar sawo ne rwedhi piero ariyo gang’wen gi imbe pieroauchiel gi nywogi piero auchiel kod nyiimbe oiero auchiel ma hikgiachiel achiel.  Mago e gik mane ochiw mondo owalgo kendo mar misangochieng’ mane iwire.
To kane Musa odonjo e Hemb Romo mondo owuo giNyasaye, nowinjo Dwond Nyasaye ka wuoyo kode ewi raum mar Sandug Raparmiluongo ni kar-ng’wono, e kind kido ariyo machalo gi malaika miluongoni kerubi. Kwan
Harun oketo teyni e rachungi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
mondo onyis Harun niya, "Ka iketo teyniabiriyo e rachungi, to cha-ngi mondo girieny ka gimenyo kanyimrachungi. "
Omiyo Harun noketo teyni mondo orieny kamenyo kanyimrachungi mana kaka ne Nyasaye ochiko Musa.
Kor rachungi kaachiel gibedene kod thiepene ne othedhi gi dhahabu.  Musa nolose mana machal gikido mane Ruoth nyasaye onyise. Walo jo-Lawi ni Ruoth Nyasaye
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa niya,
"Pog jo-Lawi kuom dhoutIsrael mamoko mondo ipwodhgi.
To ma e kaka nipwodhgi: Kir kuomgi pimapwodho richo.  Nyaka giliel dendgi duto, kendo gilwok dendgi, mi gidokmopwodhore.
Bang’ mano gikaw nyarwath mondo otimgo misango miwang’opep.  In to nikaw nyarwath machielo mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo.
Eka nikel jo-Lawi e dho Hemb Romo michok oganda duto mar Israelkanyakla.
Ka isekelo jo-Lawi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, to inimi jo-Israelket lwetgi e wigi.
Bang’ mano Harun nochiw jo-Lawi e nyim RuothNyasaye ka mich moyiedhi moa kuom jo-Israel, kendo nowalgi ni tich RuothNyasaye.
Jo-Lawi noket lwetgi ewi ruedhi kande.  Rwath achiel notimgomisango mar golo richo, to machielo notimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misangomiwang’o pep, mondo opwodhgo ni jo-Lawi richogi.
Bang’e iniket jo-Lawie nyim Harun gi yawuote kichiwogi ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi.
Kamano iniwal jo-Lawi kuom dhout Israel mamoko, mi ginibed joga.
"Ka isepwodho jo-Lawi kichiwogi ka mich moyiedhi kamano, to ginidonj eHemb Romo mondo gitiye,
nimar osewalgi chuth kuom jo-Israel duto. Asetimogi joga, ka akawogi kar nyithind Israel duto makayo,
nikechnyathi moro amora ma dichwo mokwong nywol e Israel en mara, bed ni ennyathi dhano kata nyathi chiayo.  Chieng’ mane anegoe nyithindo makayo epiny Misri, nawalo nyithindo makayo duto e piny Israel mondo obed maga,
to koro asekawo jo-Lawi kargi.
Aseketo jo-Lawi e lwet Harun giyawuote, ka joma owal kuom jo-Israel mondo oti tich lemo ni jo-Israel eHemb Romo kendo opwodhnigi richogi, mono kik jo-Israel tho ka sudomachiegni gi Kama Ler. "
Musa gi Harun kaachiel gi jo-Isarel duto nochopo chike duto maneNyasaye omiyo Musa kuom tich walo jo-Lawi.
Jo-Lawi nopwodhre kuomrichogi, kendo olwoko lepgi eka Harun nochiwogi e nyim Nyasaye ka michmoyiedhi kendo mitimogo misango mipwodgo richo mondo gibed maler.
Bang’e ne gidonjo e Hemb Romo mondo giti tich lemo e nyim Harun giyawuote, kamano Musa notimo ni jo-Lawi mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye noochike. Higni ma ja-Lawi onego otieki e tich
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa niya,
"Chik moketi ni jo-Lawima: Ka ja-Lawi oseromo higni piero ariyo gabich, to nochak tich e HembRomo.
To kosebedo jahigni piero abich, to nowe tich.
Onyalo konyojowadgi kuom tich Hema, to ok nobed kotiyo tich mapile.  Mano e kakainichan tich jo-Lawi. "Kwan
Rito Sap Pasaka
E due mokwongo mar higa mar ariyo kane jo-Israel osewuok e piny Misri,Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa e thim Sinai niya,
"Jo-Israel nyaka timSap Pasaka e kinde moketne.
Unutime godhiambo chieng due apar gang’wenmar dueni, kendo unutime pile e kinde moketneno, ka uluwo chikene duto. "
Kuom mano Musa nochiko jo-Israel mondo otim Pasaka,
kendo ne gitimegodhiamb chieng’ due apar gang’wen mar due mokwongo, e thim Sinai, kagiluwo chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.
To noyudo jomoko odoko mogak, nikech ne gisemulo ng’at motho, omiyo neok ginyal timo Pasaka chieng’ moketi.  Kuom mano ne gidhi ir Musa giHarun chieng’ onogo,
mi giwacho niya, "Wagak, nikech wasemulo ng’atmotho.  To koro mano dimonwa kelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye chiwowa chieng’moketi, kaachiel gi jo-Israel mamoko koso?"
Musa nodwokogi niya,"Rituru mondi nyaka chop ang’e gima Ruoth Nyasaye biro wacho kuomu. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa ni mondo onyis jo-Isarel niya,
"Kang’ato kuomu, kata kuom nyikwau, odoko mogak kuom mulo ng’at motho, kataka en e wuoth kuma bor, to nyaka pod enotim atima ni Ruoth Nyasaye SapPasaka,
kar timogo e due mokwongo, to ng’at ma kamano notime e due marariyo, due apar gang’wen, godhiambo.  Chiayo mitimogo Pasakano nyaka chamgi makati ma ok ketie thowi, kod alot makech.
Kik lembe moro dong’nyaka okinyi, kendo kik tur choke kata achiel.  Pasaka nyaka tim manakaka chik dwaro.
Ka nga’to odagi timo pasaka, to ok ogak, kata ok odhie wuoth kuma bor, to nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi, nikech okosekelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo e kinde moketi.  Ng’at ma kamano noyud kumkuom kethone.
"Ka japiny moro odak kuomu, to en bende nyaka otim ni Ruoth NyasayeSap Pasaka, koluwo chike moketi duto.  Chik achielno omako jadak gija-Israel machalre. "Bor Polo ewi Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
Chieng’ mane giguroe Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Rapar, bor polo ne oime,to godhiambo ler machal gi mach nothinyore e wiye, mosiko kanyo nyakaokinyi.
Kamano bor polo noime godiechieng’, to gotieno ne nitie lermachal gi mach.
E kinde akinda mane bor polo oa ewi Hema Maler,jo-Israel ne pudho hembegi kendo ne gichak gigurogi kamoro amora ma borpolo ochung’ie.
Ne gichako wuoth mana ka Ruoth Nyasaye ochikogi, kendone giguro hembegi mana ka Ruoth Nyasaye ochikogi, mi gibed kanyo kuomkinde duto mane bor polo ni ewi Hema Maler.
Kane bor polo obet aming’aewi Hema Maler, to jo-Israel nosiko ka lemo alema e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo ne ok gidhi nyime gi wuoth.
Kamano bende kane bor polo obet ewiHema Maler mana kuom ndalo manok, to ne giguro hembegi kendo gimukogimana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ochikogi.
Bende ne nitie kinde moko mane borpolo bet ewi Hema Maler chakre odhiambo nyaka okinyi kende, to oagokinyino, kendo jo-Israel dhi nyime gi wuoth.  Kane bor polo oa ewi HemaMaler, to ne gichako mana wuoth, bed ni en otieno kata odiechieng’.
Kata bed ni ne obet ewi Hema Maler kuom ndalo achiel kata ndalo ariyo,kata kuom due kata higa, kata bed ni obudho marom nadi, to jo-Israel nebet mana e kambi to ne gichako wuoth mana ka oa ewi Hema Maler.
Negiguro hembegi kendo gipudho mana ka Ruoth Nyasaye ochikogi.  Kamano negilamo Ruoth Nyasaye kaluwore gi chik mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa. Kwan
Tunge mag fedha
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Thedh tunge ariyo mag fedha mondoigo kiluongo jo-Israel, kendo kigoyogo milome mondo kambi odar.
Ka ogotunge ariyogo duto, to ji duto nobi iri e dho Hemb Romo.
To ka tung’achiel kende ema oywak to jodongo ma jotend dhout Israel kende ema nobi.
Ka tung’ oywak moriwore gi sigiya, to joma ojot yo wuokchieng’ nochakwuoth,
kendo ka tung’ mar ariyo oywak moriwore gi sigiya, to joma ojotyo milambo nochak wuoth.  Kamano ka idwaroo mondo kambi odar, to tung’nyaka ywagi moriwore gi sigiya,
to ka ichoko ji, to tung’ nyaka ywagimaonge sigiya.
Jodolo ma joka Harun ema omi tich goyo tung’.  Mano enchik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng’.
"Ka ukedo gi wasigu momonjou e pinyu, kendo dwaro loyou, to unugo tungemoriwore gi sigiya, mi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noparu, kendo noresukuomgi.
E kinde ma utimoe nyasi, gi ndalo moketi mutimoe sewni, kodchieng’ mokwongo mar due ka due, unugo tung’ kutimo misengni miwang’opep, kod misengni mag sawo, mi tungego nomi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuparu.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. "Jo-Israel owuok Sinai
Due piero ariyo, due mar ariyo, e higa mar ariyo, bor polo nowuok oaewi Hemb Rapar.
Eka jo-Israel nochako wuoth mosmos ka gia e thimSinai, nyaka bor polo nodhi mochung’ ewi got Paran.
Kane gikwongo mukokambi, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Musa ochikogi,
kambi jo-Juda emanokwongo wuok e bwo bandechegi ka gichanore e ogendgi mag lweny.  Kambinonoting’o jo-Juda ma jatendgi ne Nashon wuod Aminadab,
gi jo-Isakar, majatendgi ne Nethaneel wuod Zuar,
kod jo-Zubulun, ma jatendgi ne Eliabwuod Helon.
Kane Hema Maler omuki, joka Gershon gi joka Merari nowuokkoting’e.
Kambi jo-Reuben ema nowuok mar ariyo, kochanore e bwo bandechgi, eogendgi mag lweny.  Kambino noting’o jo-Reuben, ma jatendgi ne Elizurwuod Shedeur,
gi jo-Simeon, ma jatendgi ne Shelumiel wuod Zurushadai,
kod jo-Gad, ma jatendgi ne Eliasaf wuod Reuel.
Joka Kohath majoting’ gik maler ema nowuok bang’ jogo, to kane gichopo kama onegogurie kambi, ne giyudo ka osegur Hema Maler.
Kambi jo-Efraim ema nowuok mar adek, kowuok e bwo bandechegi, eogendni mag lweny.  Kambino noting’o jo-Efraim, ma jatendgi ne Elishamawuod Amihud,
gi jo-Manase, ma jatendgi ne Gamaliel wuod Pedazur,
kodjo-Benjamin ma jatendgi ne Abidan wuod Gideoni.
Kambi jo-Dan ema nowuok mogik bang’ kambi mamokogo, kochanore e bwobandechegi, e ogendgi mag lweny.  Kambino noting’o jo-Dan, ma jatendgi neAhiezer wuod Amishadai,
gi jo-Asher, ma jatendgi ne Pagiel wuod Okran,
kod jo-Naftali, ma jatendgi ne Ahira wuod Enan.
Kamano e kaka jo-Israel nochanore ka gichako wuoth, kendo ne giwuothoka gichanore kamano.
Musa nowacho ni Hobab wuod Reuel ja-Midian ma ore niya, "Koro wawuokwadhi e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni nomiwa.  Yie wadhi kodi, kendowabiro timoni maber, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye osesingore ni obiro guedhowa. "
To Hobab nodwoke niya, "Ok adhi kodu, ber mondo adog e pinywa kuomjowa. "
To Musa nowachone niya, "Ahombi kik iwewa, nimar in ema ing’eyokama onego wabworie e thim, kendo in ema inibed ng’at motelonwa.
Kainyalo dhi kodwa, to gima Ruoth Nyasaye ogwedhowago wanapog kodi. "
Ne giwuok ka gia e god Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giwuotho kuom ndalo adek, kaSandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye otelo nyimgi mabor ma dirom wuodhodiechieng’ achiel, mondo omanynigi kama ginyalo bworoe.
Bor polo marRuoth Nyasaye ne ochung’ e wigi godiechieng’ ka gin e wuoth.
Pile kane Sanduk chako wuoth, Musa ne wacho niya,"A Ruoth Nyasaye, a malo, mondo wasiki oke,kendo joma mon kodi oringi!"
To pile kane Sanduk chung’, to Musa ne wacho niya,"Yue, A Ruoth Nyasaye, Nyasach jo-Israel gana gi gana. "Kwan
Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni obiro miyo jo-Israel ring’o
E kinde moro jo-Israel noywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye kuom thagruokgi.  RuothNyasaye ne okecho kowinjo wechegigo, mi mach moa kuome nomuoch kuomgi,kendo oketho bath kambi konchiel.
Eka jo-Israel noywak ni Musa, mi Musanokwayonigi Ruoth Nyasaye mi mach otho.
Ne ochak kanyo ni Tabera,(tiende ni, kar weng’o) nikech mach moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nomuochkuomgi kanyo.
Ne nitie joma yoreyore moa e ogendini mopogore opogore, mane wuotho gijo-Israel.  Chuny jogo nochako gombo gik mopogore opogore.  Jo-Israelbende nochako ywak, kapenjo ni "Onge ng’at ma dimiwae ring’o ngang’?
Parieuru rech mane wachamo nono e piny Misri, gi budho gi poipoi gikitungu kod alode mamit.
Dwondwa tinde otwo, kendo onge gimoro amora mawanyalo neno mak mana Manna. "
(Manna ne chalo gi kodhi matindotindo, makitgi chal gi dwogo.
Ji ne kwanyogi kendo regogi e pong’ lwedo, katayokogi e pany, eka ne gitedogi e agulu, kendo gilosogo kek.  Ka ichame,to ndhathe chalo gi ndhath kek moted gi mo.
Kane tho omoko gotieno, tomanna bende ne lwar. )
Musa nowinjo ka jo-Israel ywak, ka joot ka joot ochung’ e dho hembgi. Mano omiyo mirima mager nomako Ruoth Nyasaye, mi chuny Musa nochandore.
Nopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Ang’o momiyo isekelo chandruok kuomjatichni? Ere ketho ma aseketho e nyimi momiyo iketo kuoma ting’ mapekmar rito jogi duto?
An e min-gi mane onywologi? Koso ka gidhi e pinymane isingori ni nimi kweregi, to nyaka ating’gi mana e kora kaka japiditing’o nyathi?
Ere kuma anyalo yudonigie ring’o giduto? Gichandochunya ka giywakna ni mondo amigi ring’o gicham.
Ting’ mar rito jogiduto ohinga.  Ok anyal ting’e kenda.
Omiyo ka mano e tich ma imiya, tokara ber mondo inega chuth.  To kapo ni ikecha, to yie iwe miya thagruokmakama. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "Chok jodong Israel piero abiriyo maing’eyo ni jotend oganda.  Kelgi e nyima e Hemb Romo kendo gichung’ kodikanyo.
Abiro lor mondo awuo kodi, kendo abiro kawo kuomi teko mokomane amiyi, mondo ami jogo okonyi rito oganda, mi ting’no ok noturi.
To nyis jo-Israel duto kama: ‘Puodhreuru nikech kiny unucham ring’o. Ne uywakna ka upenjo ni, "Ere ng’ama nyalo miyowa ring’o?" Kendo kuwachoni, "E piny Misri ne wadakie maber. " Koro Ruoth Nyasaye biro miyouring’o, kendo ubiro chamo!
To ok nuchame kuom ndalo achiel kata kuomndalo ariyo kata abich kata apar kata mana ndalo piero ariyo,
tounuchame kuom due ngima, nyaka chop othing’u, mi ung’ogi, nikech usedagiRuoth Nyasaye modak e kindu, kendo useywakne kuwacho niya, "Ang’o momiyone wawuok e piny Misri?" ’ "
Musa nodwoko Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "An gi jolweny alufu mia auchiel, toin iwacho ni ibiro miyogi ring’o ma gichamo kuom due achiel ngima!
Erekaka rombe gi ruedhi diyang’ mi romgi? Kata mana ka omak rech duto maenam, to mago bende ok diromgi!"
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nopenjo Musa niya,"Bende nitie gimoro manyalo tamo Ruoth Nyasaye? Kawuono ibiro ng’eyo kawechena gin adier, kata ka ok gin adier. "Omi jodong Israel teko
Musa nowuok oko, monyiso ji gima ne Ruoth Nyasaye owacho.  Nochokojodong oganda piero abiriyo, mi oketo e alwora mar Hema.
Eka RuothNyasaye nolor e bor polo mowuoyo kode, kendo okawo kuome teko moko maneosemiye, mi omiyo jodongo piero abiriyogo, kendo kane Roho osedonjokuomgi ne gidhumore.  To bang’ mano ne ok gidhumore kendo.
To ji ariyo ma nyinggi Eldad kol Medad, mane osekwan kaachiel gijodongo piero abiriyoka nodong’ chien e kambi.  To kata obedo ni gin neok gidhi e Hema kamano, Roho nobiro kuomgi, mi gidhumore e kambi.
Wuowi moro noringo, odhi ir Musa, monyise ni Eldad kod Medad jodhumoree kambi.
Eka Joshua wuod Nun, mane oyudo osetiyo ni Musa chakre tinne,nowacho niya, "Jaduong’ Musa, kwergi. " To Musa nodwoke niya, "Iywaga nigimaya duong’ koso?
Mad jo-Ruoth Nyasaye duto dok jonabi, kendo RuothNyasaye migi teko mar Roho!"
Bang’ mano Musa gi jodong Israel nodok ekambi. Ruoth Nyasaye okelo aluru
Ruoth Nyasaye notugo yamo, mokelo aluru koa yo podho chieng’, kendoalurugo ne huyo gi piny maromo mita achiel koa e lowo, e bath kambi konigi koni, kuma bor ma dirom wuodh ndalo achiel koa e kambi.
Ji nomakoalurugo odiechieng’no gi otieno kod kinyne duto, ma kata ng’at maneomakoe manok moloyo ne oyudo depe piero ariyo.  Ne gimoyogi e kambi dutomondo gitwo.
To Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho kodgi, mi ogoyogi gi tho marachmana ka koro eka gichako kayo ring alurugo kendo pok gimwonyo.
Neochak kanyo ni Kibroth-hataava, (tiende ni liete joma jowuoro), nikechkanyono ema ne giyikoe joma ne wuoch ring’o omako. Miriam gi Harun jokuodho Musa
Jo-Israel noa Kibroth-hataava modhi Hazeroth, kendo kane gin kunoKwan
Miriam gi Harun ne jochako kuodho Musa nikech nyar Kush mane okendo.
Ne giwacho niya, "Musa kende ema Ruoth Nyasaye osewuoyogo koso? Wandonge osewuoyo kodwa?"
(To ka iwacho adier, Musa ne en ng’at mamuolahinya moloyo ji duto manie piny. ) Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo kaka jogokuodhe,
mi nopoyo Musa gi Harun kod Miriam gi wach niya, "Wuoguru, unji adek, udhi e Hemb Romo. " Kamano ji adekgo nowuok modhi,
eka RuothNyasaye nolor e siro mar bor polo.  Nochung’ e dho Hema, mi oluongo Harungi Miriam,
kendo ka ne gibiro e nyime, nowachonigi niya,"Winjuru wechena:Ka de ni Musa en mana janabiu,to dafwenyorane, kendo dawuoyo kode e lek.
To jatichna Musa ok en janabi ma kamanoen kende e jaadiera kuom joga duto.
En awuoyo kode wang’ gi wang’,kende mana moyangore ma onge ngero. Enone kit Ruoth Nyasaye. Ere kaka uhedhoru kuodho jatichna Musa?"
Mirima nomako Ruoth Nyasaye kodgi mi oa,
kendo kane bor polo oa eHema kamano, dhoho nomako dend Miriam, molokore marachar ka pe.  KaneHarun olokore monene,
nokwayo Musa niya, "Jaduong’, lamnwa! Kik iwewachul gop richo, kata obedo ni wasetimo gima ofuwo kendo marach kamano.
Kik iwe Miriam chal gi nyathi monywol kosetho, ma bath dende konchielgimoro ochamo. "
Omiyo Musa noywak niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, gima kamakik timre.  Akwayi ni yie ichange. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwok niya, "Ka dabed ni wuon mare ema ong’udho olawo e wang’e, donge da obedo gi wichkuotkuom ndalo abiriyo? Kuom mano keteuru kar kende oko mar kambi kuom ndaloabiriyo, eka mondo oduoge. "
Kamano noket Miriam oko mar kambi kuomndalo abiriyo kendo kambi ne ok odar nyaka oduogo.
Bang’ mano ne giaHazeroth, mi gidhi giguro kambi e thim Paran. Kwan
Oor jombetre apar gariyo e piny Kanaan(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Or joote mondo odhi ocheng pinyKanaan ma abiro miyo jo-Israel.  Jootego nyaka bed jotelo, ma ng’ato kang’ato ochung’ ni dhoot ka dhoot. "
Omiyo Musa noorogi kapod gin e thimParan, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  Giduto ne gin jotend jo-Israel,
kendo magi e nyinggi:E dhood jo-Reuben, ne en Shamua wuod Zakur;
E dhood jo-Simeon, ne en Shafat wuod Hori;
E dhood jo-Juda, ne en Kaleb wuod Jefune;
E dhood jo-Isakar, ne en Igal wuod Josef;
E dhood jo-Efraim, ne en Hoshea wuod Nun;
E dhood jo-Benjamin, ne en Palti wuod Rafu;
E dhood jo-Zebulun, ne en Gadiel wuod Sodi;
E dhood jo-Josef, tiende ni dhood jo-Manase, ne en Gadi wuod Susi;
E dhood jo-Dan, ne en Amiel wuod Gemali;
E dhood jo-Asher, ne en Sethur wuod Mikael;
E dhood jo-Naftali, ne en Nabi wuod Vosfi;
E dhood jo-Gad, ne en Geuel wuod maki.
Mago e nying joma Musa nooro mondo odhi ocheng piny Kanaan, to Hosheawuod Nun to nochako ni Joshua.
Kane Musa dwaro orogi mondo gidhi gicheng pinyno, nowachonigi niya,"Chikuru yo milambo mar pinyno, bang’e uidh e piny gode.
Chenguru kakapinyno chalo, kendo ka ji modak kuno rateke kata nyap, bende kata kaginok kata ging’eny
Ranguru ane ka kit piny ma gidakieno ber katarach, kendo kata ka mier ma gidakie ochiel motegno kata mayomyom,
bende kata ka pinyno omew kata otwo kata ka yien nitie kata onge. Dhiuru gi chir, kendo ukel olemb pinyno moko. " Noyudo ka en ndalo mamzabibu nyakie.
Kamano ne gidhi mi gichengo pinyno chakre thim Zin nyaka Rehob man butkama idonjogo Hamath.
Ne giidho ka ging’ado piny milambo, mi gichopoHebron, kuma ne Ahiman gi Sheshai kod Talmai ma nyikwa Anak odakie. (Hebron noger higni abiriyo kapok oger Zoan man e piny Misri. )
Bang’ene gichopo e holo mar Eshkol, (tiende ni, saga mar mzabibu,) mi ging’adobad mzabibu monyago saga achiel, kendo ji ariyo noting’e koliero e luth. Bende ne gipono olemb komamanga, kod ng’owo.
Ne ochak kanyo ni holomar Eshkol, nikech kanyo ema jo-Israel nong’adoe saga mar mzabibu.
Bang’ ndalo piero ang’wen ne gidwogo Kadesh e thim Paran, ka giachengo pinyno,
mi gibiro ir Musa gi Harun kod oganda jo-Israel duto. Ne gipimonigi wach, kendo ne ginyisogi olembe mag pinyno.
To negiwacho ni Musa niya, "Ne wadhi mwawuotho e piny mane iorowa,
miwanwang’o ni en piny maber kendo momew, kendo magi e olembe manyak kuno. To jopinyno rateke, kendo miechgi ochiel motegno malich, kendo ne wanenonyikwa Anak kuno,
gi jo-Amalek modak e piny milambo, gi jo-Hiti gijo-Jebus kod jo-Amor modak e piny gode, kod jo-Kanaan modak e dho nam,kendo e bath aora Jordan. "
To Kaleb nokwayo ji e nyim Musa mondo oling’, kowacho niya, "Wadhiurupiyopiyo mondo wakaw pinyno, nikech wan gi teko mwanyalo kawego. "
Tojoma noyudo osedhi kode kuno nowacho niya, "Ooyo, ok wanyal monjo jogo,nikech gitek moloyowa. "
Kuom mano weche mane giwacho ni jo-Israel kuompiny mane gia chengono nonyoso chuny ji, nikech ne giwacho niya, "Pinyma nyocha wadhi chengono en piny manyalo mwonyo ng’ato ang’ata modhidakie.  Bende ji duto ma waneno kuno gin joma rabede.
Kane wagoyowang’wa kuom jo-Nefili, to ne waneno ka wachalo mana dede, bende mano ekaka ne wachalonigi. " (Jo-Anak gin nyikwa Nefili. )Kwan
Jo-Israel oweyo Ruoth Nyasaye
Kane giwinjo weche jogo, oganda jo-Isarel duto noywak matek otienonoduto, ka chunygi lit.
Giduto ne ging’ur ni Musa gi Harun, ka giwachoniya, "Mad ne watho e piny Misri, kata e thimni!
Ere gima omiyo RuothNyasaye okelowa e pinyni mondo watho e lweny, kendo omak mondwa ginyithindwa? Donge diber ka wadok Misri?"
Eka ne gimedo wacho niya,"Wayier ng’ato mondo odwokwa Misri. "
Musa gi Harun ne jopodho piny mana e nyim oganda jo-Israel,
to Joshuawuod Nun kod Kaleb wuod Jefune, mane gin ji ariyo kuom joma nochengopiny Kanaan, noyiecho lepgi,
mi owacho ni oganda duto niya, "Piny manewadonjoe kendo wachengono en piny maber sidang’.
Ka Ruoth Nyasaye morkodwa, to obiro terowa e piny maber kendo momewno, mi omiwago.
To kikuwe Ruoth Nyasaye, bende kik uluor jopinyno, nimar wabiro mwonyogiamwonya.  Tipo ma nyocha ogeng’ogi osea, to wan, Ruoth Nyasaye ni kodwa,omiyo kik uluorgi. "
To kar dwokogi, oganda jo-Israel nobwogogi mana nigoyogi mana gi kite, to sano duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye nothinyorenigiduto e Hemb Romo.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Jogi biro chaya kamano nyakakarang’o? Pod gibiro tamore gena marom nadi, to eka asetomonigi ranyisimang’eny?
Abiro goyogi gi tuo, bende ok abi kwanogi ka joga.  To in ginyikwayi natimu oganda maduong’ kendo mang’eny moloyogi. "
To Musanodwoko Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, jo-Misri ong’eyo ni in emanigolo jo-Israel kuomgi gi tekoni iwuon,
kendo gibiro nyiso jo-Kanaankamano.  Gin bende koro gisewinjo ni idak e dier jogi, kendo ni gineniwang’ gi wang’.  Ging’’eyo bende ni bor polo mari ochung’ ewi jo-Israel,ka itelonigi e siro mar bor polo godiechieng’, to gotieno itelonigi esiro mar mach.
Kuom mano, ka inego jogi duto rat, to ogendinimosewinjo humbi biro wacho niya,
‘Ruoth Nyasaye osetieko jogi e thim,nikech kelogi e piny mane osingorenigi otame. ’
"Omiyo ma e sa monego inyisie tekoni machal gi weche mane iwacho niya,
‘Ruoth Nyasaye ok kech piyo, kendo onyiso herane mosiko, koweyo ni jikethogi gi richogi, to kata kamano ok okwan jaketho ka ng’ama ler, tookumo nyithindo nyaka tieng’ mar adek kod mar ang’wen nikech richokweregi. ’
Omiyo kaka ng’wononi thoth, we ni jogi richogi, mana kakaisetimo, chakre Misri nyaka koroni. "Nyasaye okumo jo-Israel(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "Koro asewuoyonigi kaka ikwaya.
Tokaka antie, kendo kaka duong’na nopong’ piny duto,
akuong’ora ni ongekata mana ng’at achiel kuom joma oseneno duong’na kod honni mane atimo epiny Misri kendo e thim
ma none piny mane asingora ni nami kweregi. Gisetema kendo gisetamore winja nyadipar, omiyo onge kata ng’at achielkuom joma nochayago ma none pinyno.
To jatichna Kaleb ema osebedo gichuny maber, nimar oseluwa gi chunye duto.  Kuom mano abiro kele e pinymane osedhiye, mi nyikwaye nokaw.  En piny pap, ma jo-Amalek kodjo-Kanaan odakie.
Kuom mano, kiny nyaka uwichru, mi udogi e thim,kuluwo yo ma ochomo Nam Makwar. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
"Asewinjo ka jo-Isarelng’urna.  Anyalo ng’’wono ni oganda marachni nyaka karang’o?
Wachnigini awacho kakuong’ora ni, kaka antie, abiro chopo mana weche ma asewinjokuwacho.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato ma nyinge nondiki e kweno cha, chakrejahigni piero ariyo kadhi nyime, chokene biro dong’ e thimni, nikechuseng’urna.
Onge ng’ato kuomu ma nodonj e piny mane akuong’orakating’o bada ni nobed maru, to mak mana Kaleb wuod Jefune gi Joshuawuod Nun.
To nyikwau mane uwacho ni nobed joma omak e lweny ema abirokelo e piny ma usedagino, mi ginidagie maber.
To un uduto, chokeunodong’ e thim.
Nyithindu biro digni e thim kuom higni piero ang’wen,nyaka ng’atu mogik tho kuno, ka gichulogo richo mane utimo kuom weya.
Ne ubet ka urango pinyno kuom ndalo piero ang’wen omiyo unuchul richoukuom higni piero ang’wen, ka higa achiel ikwano kar ndalo achiel, miunung’e kaka ajok kodu.
An Ruoth Nyasaye, asewuoyo, kendo abiro timoni oganda marach moseriworeni gima asewachono.  Gibiro rumo mana ethimni! Adier, ka ema gibiro thoe!"Jombetre apar maricho otho
Joma Musa nooro mondo ocheng piny, kendo mane oduogo mi omiyo ogandaduto ochako ng’urne,
tho nonego e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye nikech ne gikelowach marach.
To Joshua wuod Nun gi Kaleb wuod Jefune kende ema nokwokuom joma nodhi chengo pinyno. Jo-Israel olo Horma(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Kane Musa onyiso jo-Israel gima Ruoth Nyasaye owacho, ne gimuoch giywak.
To kinyne ne giwuok kogwen, mi gidhi ewi gode mag pinymoting’ore, ka giwacho niya, "Wayie ni wasebedo joketho, omiyo koro wane yo, wadhi kuma Ruoth Nyasaye owacho. "
To Musa nodwokogi niya,"Marang’o umedo ketho chik Ruoth Nyasaye? Tim makamano ok nyal kelo gimaber,
Kik umed dhi nyime gi wuoth, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ok nobed kodu,kendo wasiku biro loyou.
Jo-Amalek gi jo-Kanaan nie nyimu, kendogibiro negou.  Ruoth Nyasaye ok nyal bedo kodu, nikech useweyo luwe. "
Kata kamano pod ne gihedhore ahedha idho gode mag piny moting’oreno,to Sandug Muma, kata mana Musa, ne ok owuok kodgi e kambi.
Jo Amalekgi jo-Kanaan ma nodak e godego nomwomore kuomgi, moriembogi ka rodhoginyaka Horma. Kwan
Chike moketi mag misengni
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Ka usedonjoe piny ma abiro miyou mondo udagie,
to unutim ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengnimiwang’o.  Ginyalo bedo misengni miwang’o pep, kata misengni michopogokuong’ruok, kata ma ng’ato timo kuom herone, kata mitimo e ndalo magsewni moketi.  Ka uwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye jambu ka misango ma dum tikmamit kamano,
to ng’at machiwo misangono nyaka chiw bende misango marcham mar mogo moromo kilo adek moruw gi mo lita ariyo.
Bende nyakauchiw lita ariyo mar divai obed misango miolo piny kuom nyarombo kanyarombo mutimogo misango miwang’o pep, kata misango mar sawo.
"Ka chiayo mitimogo misangono en im, to mogo mitimogo misango mar chamnyaka bed kilo apar gang’wen moruw gi mo moromo lita adek,
kendo divaimitimogo misango milo piny nyaka bed moromo lita adek.  Kamano e kakaunutim ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango madum tik mamit.
"To ka nyarwath ema utimogo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o pep, katamisango michopogo kuong’ruok, kata misango mar sawo,
to nyaka uchiwbende mogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo moromo lita ang’wen, mondootimgo misango mar cham,
kod divai moromo lita ang’wen mondo otimgomisango milo piny.  Gigo duto nobed misango miwang’o mondo odum tik mamitni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Mano e gima nyaka utim ni rwath ka rwath, kata ni imka im, kata ni nyarombo ka nyarombo.
Kata bed ni utimo misengni gijamni adi, to ciayo ka cjiayo nyaka timne kamano.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato maja-Israel nyaka rit chikego ka otimo misango miwang’o mondo odum tikmamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Ka japiny moro man kuomu, kata modak kodu chuth, otimo misangomiwang’o mondo odum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nyaka otim mana kakautimo.
En mana chik achiel ma omakou kaachiel gi japiny moro modakkuomu, kendo omako nyikwau nyaka chieng’.  Un gi jodak uchalru e nyimRuoth Nyasaye.
Chik achielno ema omakou machalre gi japiny moro modakkuomu. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
mondo onyis jo-Israel niya,
"Kausedonjo e piny ma abiro teroue, mi uchamo chiemb pinyno, to nyaka uchiwni Ruoth Nyasaye mich moyiedhi.
Ka utedo makati gi mok cham mukwongokayo, to nyaka uket makati achiel tenge, obed mich moyiedhi, mana kakauketo tenge cham mukwongo dino.
Nyaka uchiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye michmoyiedhi mugolo kuom makati mukuongo tedo.  Mano en chik momakou ginyikwau nyaka chieng’.
"Ka uketho ka ukia, mi uweyo chik moro amora kuom chike mane RuothNyasaye omiyo Musa,
ma gin chike duto momakou gi nyikwau nyakachieng’, kendo mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyou gi lwet Musa chakre chieng’mokwongo,
to ma e gima nyaka utim.  Ka oganda duto ema oketho ka kiakamano, to nyaka gichiw nyarwath mondo gitimgo misango miwang’o pepmondo odum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kaachiel gi misango mar cham kaachielgi miolo piny mitimego kaka chik dwaro.  Bende nyaka gichiw nywok mondogitimgo misango mar golo richo.
Eka jadolo nopwodh oganda duto marIsrael, mi nowenigi richogi, nikech ne giketho mana ka gikia, kendogisetimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o.  Bende gisetimo misango margolo richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ketho mane giketho ka gikia.
Kuommano oganda jo-Israel duto, kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomunowenigi kethogi, nimar oganda duto ema noketho.
"To ka ng’at achiel kende ema oketho ka kia, to nyaka ochiw dielswini ma hike achiel, mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo,
kendojadolo nopwodh ni ng’atno kethone e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi nowene.
Enchik achiel kende momako ng’at ma oketho ka ok ong’eyo, bed ni en japinykata jadak.
To ng’ato ang’ata ma oketho goyiem oyanyo Ruoth Nyasaye,bed ni en ja-Israel kata japiny moro modak kuomu.  Nyaka ng’ad kare okokuom ogandagi,
nimar osechayo wach Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo osekethochikne.  Ng’at ma kamano nyaka ng’ad kare oko chuth, kendo kethonenonobed e wiye owuon. "Oneg ng’at ma oyud ka tiyo chieng’ Sabato
E kinde mane jo-Israel ni e thim, ne oyud ng’at moro ka modo yienchieng’ Sabato.
Joma ne ojuke komoto, nokele e nyim Musa gi Harun kodoganda duto mar Israel.
Ne gikete e od tuech nikech ne ok ging’eyomalong’o gima onego timne.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,"Ng’atno nyaka negi.  Oganda duto nyaka goye gi kite oko mar kambi. "
Kuom mano ne gigole oko, mi gigoye gi kite giduto nyaka otho, manakaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. Usi momin miketo e riak law
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa
mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Unkaachiel gi nnyikwau nyaka umin usi, mondo uket e riak lepu.  Achiel kuomusi momin-go nyaka bed mambulu.
Kamano e kinde duto ma unenoe usimambuluno, to nupar chike duto mag Ruoth Nyasaye mo unumakgi, kendo okunuluw yore maricho ma wengeu gi chunyu nyalo teroue.
Usi mominnonobed ranyisi maparonu chikena duto mondo uritgi, kendo ubed joma ler,mowal ni Nyasachu.
"An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou e piny Misri mondo obedNyasachu.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. "Kwan
Korah gi Dathan kod Abiram jong’anyo
Korah wuod Izhar ma wuod Kohath ma wuod Lawi, kod jo-Reuben ma Dathangi Abiram yawuot Eliab, kod On wuod Peleth,
ne jotamore bet e bwo Musa,kendo jo-Israel mia ariyo gi piero abich ma jotend oganda kendo ma jomaogen bende ne ni kodgi e wachno.
Ne giriwore giduto ni Musa gi Harun,mi giwachonigi niya, "Marang’o uhedhoru moloyo, to ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomoganda jo-Israel owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ni kodgigiduto.  Ere gima omiyo ukaworu moloyo jo Ruoth Nyasaye duto?"
Kane Musaowinjo kamano, nopodho piny auma.
Bang’e nowacho ni Korah gi joge niya,"Kiny gokinyi Ruoth Nyasaye nohul ng’at ma ng’ate adier, kod ng’atmowalne, kendo monego timne misengni.  Ng’at ma Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero emanotim misengni ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To in Korah, gima nyaka utim kaachielgi jogi duto e ma: Kiny ukaw tepe ubani,
uket mach e igi, mi uolieubani e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ng’at ma kiny Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero e ng’atmowalne.  Un ema uhedhoru moloyo, un jo-Lawi!"
Musa nochako owacho ni Korah niya, "Winjuru un jo-Lawi.
Donge en gimaber ka Ruoth Nyasaye osepogou kuom dhout Israel mamoko kokelou butemondo urit tije mag Hema Maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kuchung’ e nyim ogandajo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kutiyonigi?
Osekelou machiegni kode, unkaachiel gi jo-Lawi weteu, to koro eka udwaro ni mondo ubed jodolobende!
Mano emomiyo in kaachiel gi jogi duto useriworu ka ukwedo RuothNyasaye.  Uparo ni Harun nigi teko manade, ma omiyo onego uywagnekamano?"
Musa nooro wach mondo oluongne Dathan gi Abiram ma yawuot Eliab, to negidwoko niya, "Ok wabi.
Iparo ni gol mane igolowago e piny maber kendomomew mondo watho e thim ka, en gima tin koso, ma pod idwaroe mana ninyaka ibed jatendwa?
To gima rach moloyo en ni ok isekelowa e pinymaber kendo momew, bende ok isemiyowa puothe cham gi mag mzabibu mondoobed mawa.  Iparo ni inyalo wuondo ji machal kodwa kama? Ooyo, ok wabi!"
Kane Musa owinjo wechegigo, mirima mager nomake, mi owacho ni RuothNyasaye niya, "Kik idew ng’ur ma ging’urgono.  Pok amayogi kata manakanyna achiel, bende pok atimo marach ni ng’ato ang’ata kuomgi. "
Musa nochako owacho ni Korah niya, "Kiny ibi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, inkaachiel gi jogi kod Harun bende.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nyaka kaw tapmach, kendo oketie ubani.  Eka inikel jogi kaachiel gi tepegi mia ariyogi piero abich e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kendo un gi Harun bende nyaka ukeltepeu. "
Kuom mano, ng’ato ka ng’ato nokawo tape, moketoe mach kendooolo e ubani.  Musa gi Harun to nodhi mochung’ e dho Hemb Romo.
Korahbende nochoko joge duto, mi gichung’ ka gimanyore gi ji ariyogo e dhoHema. Bang’e duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nothinyore ni oganda duto marIsrael,
kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
"Chung’uru mabor gi ogandani mondo atiekgi dichiel ka diemo wang’!"
To ne gipodho piny auma, ka giwacho niya, "A Nyasaye ma Nyasach ngima,bende mirima nyalo maki gi oganda duto mana nikech richo mar ng’atoachiel?"
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Wach ni ji mondo osudgi chien, oa but hembe mag Korah gi Dothan kod Abiram. "
Kamano Musa nodhi ir Dothan gi Abiram, kendo jodong Israel noluwobang’e.
Eka nowacho ni oganda duto niya, "Suduru mabor gi hembe mag jimarichogi.  Kik umul girgi moro amora, nono to urumo nikech richogi. "
Kuom mano, oganda duto noa kama ne Korah gi Dothan kod Abiram nitie. Koro noyudo ka Dothan gi Abiram josewuok, mochung’ e dho hembegi,kaachiel gi mondgi gi nyithindgi kod jogi.
Musa nowacho nigi niya,"Ubiro ng’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ema noora mondo atim gigi duto, to ok niaketora awuon.
Ka jogi otho mana kaka ji duto tho, to kara RuothNyasaye ok oseora.
To ka Ruoth Nyasaye otimo hono, mi bur obarorematut, kendo piny ong’amo dhoge momuonyogi kaachiel gi mwandugi duto, migidhi e bur ka gingima, eka unung’e ni ne gichayo Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Kane dho Musa pok olwar, lowo mane jogo ochung’ie nobarore,
kong’amodhoge momwonyogi gi hembegi kod ji duto mane luwo Korah, kaachiel gimwandugi duto.
Ne gidhi e bur ka gingima, mi lowo oumogi kod mwandugiduto, kendo gidwono nono kuom oganda jo-Israel.
Ne giywak, mijo-Israel duto mane ni machiegni kanyo, oringo ka kok niya, "Neyeurukaka piny biro mwonyowa!"
Ruoth Nyasaye nooro mach mowang’o ji miaariyo gi piero abich mane oyudo wang’o ubani kande.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis Eleazer wuod Harunjadolo mondo ogol tepe mag ubani e buch mach, kendo opuk mach man e igikuma bor, nikech gin gik maler.
Adier, tewni mag joma timo richo, mioyudo kum mar tho ler, nikech osechiwgi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Omiyonyaka uthedhgi mopamore mondo oumgo kendo mar misango.  Ginibed rapar nijo-Israel. "
Kamano Eleazer jadolo nokawo tepe ubani mag mula ma jimane mach owang’o ochiwo.  Ne othedhgi rauom mar kendo-mar-misango,
mondo obed rapar ni jo-Israel ni ng’ato ang’ata ma ok jadolo, kendo maok jaka Harun kik wang’ ubani ni Ruoth Nyasaye, nono to otho mana kakaKorah kod joge.  Mago duto notimore mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Musaochiko Eleazar.
To kinyne oganda duto mar Israel nong’ur ni Musa gi Harun, kagiwachonigi gisemiyo jo Ruoth Nyasaye moko otho.
E sa mane gichokoreeka ging’ur ni Musa gi Harun, ne giwichore ka gichiko Hemb Romo mi ginenoka bor polo oime, kendo duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nothinyore kanyo.
Musa gi Harun ne jobiro e nyim Hema,
kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nowachoniginiya,
"Chung’uru, mabor gi jogi mondo atiekgi dichiel ka diemo wang’!"To ne gipodho piny auma.
Eka Musa nowacho ni Harun niya, "Kaw tapi marubani iketie mach moa e kendo-mar-misango, kendo iolie ubani, mi idhikode piyopiyo ir oganda mondo ipwodhnigi richogi.  Mirima mager mar RuothNyasaye osechopo, kendo tho osechako nego ji. "
Omiyo Harun nokawo tapemar ubani kaka Musa nochike, mi noringo odhi ir oganda jo-Israel, kendonoyudo ka tho osechako nego ji adier.  Ne oketo ubani e tawo, mi opwodhoni ji richogi,
kochung’ e kind joma osetho gi joma ngima, mi thonorumo.
To ji alufu apar gang’wen gi mia aboro notho, ka ok kwan jomane otho nikech ketho mar Korah.
Kane tho oserumo, Harun nodok ir Musae dho Hemb Romo. Kwan
Ludh Harun
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel mondo jotend dhootka dhoot omiyi luth achiel achiel, duto ludhe apar gariyo, ma moro kamoro ondikie nying jatelo ka jatelo.
Kuom ludh dhood Lawi to mondoindikie nying Harun, nimar luth ka luth nyaka bed mar jatelo ka jatelo.
Eka iketgi duto e Hema e nyim Sandug Rapar, kama aromoe kodu,
kendong’at ma ludhe oloth e ng’at ma ayiero.  Mano e kaka abiro tieko ng’ur majo-Israel ng’urnigo. "
Kuom mano, Musa nowuoyo gi jo-Israel mi jatend dhoot ka dhoot nomiyeluth, duto ludhe apar gariyo, koriwore gi mar Harun.
Musa noketogi enyim Ruoth Nyasaye ei Hemb Rapar.
Kinyne ka ne odonjo e Hema, noyudo kaludh Harun, ma ludh dhood Lawi, ema oloth.  Adier, noloth mogolo ite kodthiepe, kendo onyago olembe!
Eka Musa nogolo ludhego oko, monyisojo-Israel duto.  Ne ginenogi gi wang’gi, kendo jatelo ka jatelo nokawomare.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Dwok ludh Harun e nyimSandug Rapar, obed ranyisi ma siemo joma wigi tek duto, mondo owe ywaknachuth, eka ok ginitho. "
Musa notimo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
Bang’e jo-Israel nowacho ni Musa niya, "Waserwenyo! Waduto warumo!
Ng’ato ang’ata kuomwa mosudo machiegni gi Hema Maler mar Nyasaye birotho! Wabiro tho waduto koso?"Kwan
Pok jodolo gi jo-Lawi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Harun niya, "In gi yawuoti, kaachiel gijodhoodu duto, ema unubed ka urito tich Kama Ler, kendo gimoro amoramarach motimore kuome nobed wachu.  To gimoro amora motimore marach kuomtich dolo, nobed wachni kaachiel gi yawuoti.
Iniwe jodhoodu ma jokaLawi bed kodu kendo konyu, kutiyo gi yawuoti e nyim Hemb Rapar.
Ginibedka gikonyou, mi gitiek tije duto mag Hema, to kik gisud machiegni gi gikmaler, kata gi kendo-mar-misango, nono to githo kaachiel gi un bende.
Ginibed kodu, kendo ginikaw ting’ duto mag rito Hema e yo moro amora,to onge ng’at ma ok jadolo ma nosud machiegni kodu.
To un uwegi unubedkutiyo tije mag Kama Ler, kod tich dolo e kendo-mar-misango, mondomirima mager mar Ruoth Nyasaye kik bi kuom jo-Israel kendo.
An awuonasepogo joweteu ma jo-Lawi kuom dhout Israel mamoko duto mondo achiwnugika joma owalna mondo orit Hema.
To in gi yawuoti kende ema nyaka utitichu mar dolo mitimo e kendo-mar-misango, kendo mitimo e tok Pasia. Tich dolono e tich ma amiyou.  Ng’ato ang’ata ma ok jadolo motiyo tichdolo nyaka negi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Harun niya, "An awuon aketo e lwetimich duto, tiende ni chiwo maler duto ma jo-Israel okelo.  Amiyigi kapokni kaachiel gi nyikwayi, kaluwore gi chik mochwere.
Gima ogol kuomchiwo moro amora maler moloyo, ma ok owang’ e kendo-mar-misango, nobedmari gi nyikwayi, bed ni en misango mar cham, kata mar golo richo, katamipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, mochiwna ka mich maler moloyo.
Unuchamekaluwore gi chik mar chamo gik maler moloyo, kendo ng’ato ang’ata kuomuma dichwo nyalo chame, enobed gima ler.
"Gik ma jo-Israel chiwo ka mich moyiedhi bende nobed mau.  Achiwonugikaachiel gi yawuoti kod nyigi, kaluwore gi chik mochwere.  Ng’ato ang’atamae odi ma ok ogak nyalo chamogi.
"Amiyou mo maber gi divai manyien mabeyo duto gi cham mabeyo, tiendeni cham agwela mochiw ni Nyasaye.
Olembe duto mokwong pon e pinyu,mokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye nobed mau.  Ng’ato ang’ata mae odi ma ok ogaknyalo chamogi.
"Gimoro amora mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye chuth e Israel nobed maru.
"Nyithindo makayo duto michiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye nobed mau, bed ni ginmag dhano kata mag le.  To nyaka war nyitnindo duto makayo mag dhano kodmag le ma ok ler.
Ka gisetieko due achiel, to nyaka wargi gi shekelabich abich, mopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye (shekel achiel oromogera piero ariyo. )
To kik wariw nyithindo makayo mag dhok kata magrombe kata mag diek, nimar gin jamni maler.  Nyak ukir rembgi e kendo-marmisango, kendo uwang’ bochegi kutimogo misango miwang’o mondo odum tikmamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ringgi to nodong’nu mana kaka agoko gi em makorachwich mag mich moyiedhi dong’nu.
"Mich duto mag gik maler ma jo-Israel chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, amiyo giyawuoti kod nyigi, kaluwore gi chik mochwere.  Mano en singruok mosiko maok kethre, ma Ruoth Nyasaye otimo kodi kaachiel gi nyikwayi bende. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho ni Harun niya, "In ok nibed gi lowo mopognie piny jo-Israel.  Ok ginipogni kata lithe matin, nimar an e mwandunikendo e pokni.
"Jo-Lawi to amiyo achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto obed pokgi kuomtich rito Hemb Romo.
Jo-Israel ok nochak osud machiegni gi Hema, nonoto githo.
To jo-Lawi ema nobed ka tiyo tich Hema, kendo gimoro amoramarach motimore kuome nobed wachgi.  Mano e chik momakou gi nyikwau nyakachieng.  Ok giniyud lowo moro mopognigi kuom jo-Israel,
nimar amiyogiachiel kuom apar mag gik moko ma jo-Israel chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mondoobed mwandugi.  Mano emomiyo anyisogi ni ok giniyud lowo mopognigi kuomjo-Israel. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Lawi kama, "Kajo-Israel chiwonu achiel kuom apar mag mwandugi, ma amiyou ka poku, toun bende nyaka uchiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye achiel kuom apar mag gigo.
Chiwono nokwan mana ka cham mogol kar dino, kata divai mogol karbicho.
Mano e kaka unugol ni Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo mogol kuom achielkuom apar duto ma uyudo kuom jo-Israel.  Chiwo mugolo ni Ruoth Nyasayenonyaka umi Harun jadolo.
Kuom chiwo duto muyudo, unugolie mich michiwoni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nyaka uchiw mana mabeyo moloyoe kuomgi.
"Bende wach ni jo-Lawi niya, "Ka usegolo ni Ruoth Nyasaye mich mabeyomoloyo kuom poku, to modong’ nobednu ka cham mogol kar dino, kata divaimogol kar bicho.
Unyalo chamogi kamoro amora gi joodu.  En e pok muyudokuom tiyo e Hemb Romo.
Ka usegolo ni Ruoth Nyasaye gik mabeyoe moloyokamano, to ok unubed joketho kuom wachno, kendo ok nobed ni udwanyo gikmaler ma jo-Israel ochiwo, ma dimi utho. "Kwan
Chike mag pwodho joma ogak
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun mondo onyis jo-Israel chikmoseketno, kowacho miya,
"Wachnigiuru ni mondo gikel ni Musa dhiang’malando ha maonge songa, kendo ma pok otuene jok.
Nyaka ichiwe niEleazar jadolo mondo ogole oko yo wuokchieng’ mar kambi, kendo onegekuno.
Eleazar jadolo nogwel remo gi lith lwete, kendo nokir nyadibiriyokochomo yo ka nyim Hemb Romo.
Nyaka wang’ dheno mana e wang’e koneno;piene gi ringre gi rembe kod owuoche duto nyaka wang’.
Jadolo nokawyiend sida gi owino kod usi makwar, mi nobolgi e chuny mach ma dhiang’wang’ie.
Bang’e enolwok lepe kendo nolwokre gi pi, eka onyalo donjo ekambi, to kata kamano, pod nosik kogak nyaka chieng’ podhi.
Ng’atmowang’o dheno nolwok lepe, kendo nolwokre, to en bende nosik kogaknyaka chieng’ podhi.
Bang’ mano, ng’at ma ok ogak nojow buch dheno, minodhi oole oko mar kambi, kamoro maler.  Nyaka kan buruno mondo ogandajo-Israel olosgo pi mar pwodhruk, nikech dheno otimgo misango mar goloricho.
Ng’at mane ojowo buch dheno nyaka lwok lepe, to en bende nosikkogak nyaka chieng’ podhi.  Chikni omako jo-Israel nyaka chieng, kaachielgi jopinje mamoko modak kuomgi.
"Ng’at momulo ng’at motho nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Enopwodhregi pi pwodhruok chieng’ mar adek gi chieng’ mar abiriyo, to nosik kogak.
Ng’ato momulo ng’at motho, to ok nopwodhre, ochido Hema Maler marRuoth Nyasaye.  Ng’atno nong’ad kare oko kuom jo-Israel.  Pi pwodhruok neok kir kuome, omiyo osiko kogak.
"Ka ng’ato otho e hema, to chik moketi ema: Ng’ato ang’ata modonjo ehemano, kata ng’ato ang’ata manie hemano nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo,
kendo agulu manie hemano ma dhoge ni nono ma ok oum, bende nobedmogak.
Kata ka ng’at man oko omulo ng’at moneg e lweny kata ng’at maotho athoya, kata omulo choke dhano kata mana liel obedo mogak kuomndalo abiriyo.
Kuom gak ma kamano, ginikaw buch misango mar goloricho, mi giruw gi pi aora manie agulu.
Bang’e ng’at ma ok ogak nokawowino mi nolut e pigno, eka nokir e hema kod e gik moko manie iye,kaachiel gi ji duto ma tho ng’atno oyudo kanyo.  Ng’at momulo chokedhano, kata ng’at monegi, kata ng’at motho athoya, kata momulo liel,bende nokir pigno kuome.
Ng’at ma ok ogak nyaka kir pigno kuom ng’atmogak chieng’ mar adek gi chieng’ mar abiriyo, mi chieng’ mar abiriyonodok mopwodhore kuom gakne.  Nolwok lepe, kendo nolwokre, eka nobedmaler ka chieng’ opodho.
"To ka ng’at ma ogak ok opwodhore, to nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuomogandagi, nimar dochid Kama Ler mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Pi pwodhruok ok okirkuome, omiyo osiko kogak.
"Chikno omakou nyaka chieng’.  Ng’at makiro pi pwodhruok nyaka lwoklepe, kendo ng’ato ang’ata momulo pigno nobed mogak nyaka chieng’ podhi.
Gimoro amora ma ng’at mogak omulo bedo mogak, kata ng’at momulo ginobende bedo mogak nyaka chieng’ podhi. "Kwan
Pi owuok e lwanda(Wuok
.
-
)
E due mokwongo, oganda jo-Israel duto nochopo e thim Zin, kendo negibet Kadesh kuom kinde mogwarore.  Kanyo ema Miriam nothoe, moyikee.
Pi ne onge ni jo-Israel kanyo, omiyo ne gichako ng’ur ni Musa giHarun.
Ne gidhaw gi Musa ka giwacho niya, "Mad ne watho kaachiel gijowetewa mane otho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye!
Ere gima omiyo isekelo ogandamar Ruoth Nyasaye e thimni mondo wathoe kaachiel gi jambwa?
Ang’omomiyo nigolowa Misri kikelowa kama rach ma kata cham kata ng’owo katamzabibu kata komamanga ok nyagie, bende onge kata mana pi ma dwamodhi?"
Musa kod Harun nodhi e Hema Miromoe gi Nyasaye e nyim jo-Israel.  Negipodho piny auma, mi duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nothinyore.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Kaw ludhi, kendo in gi Harunowadu, uchok jo-Israel kanyakla, kendo chik lwanda mondo ogol pi ka jiduto neno.  Kamano inigol pi e lwanda mondo oganda omodhi, kaachiel gijambgi. "
Musa nokawo ludhno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mowuokgo kaka RuothNyasaye nosechike.
Bang’e Musa gi Harun nochoko oganda kanyakla e nyimlwandano.  Musa nowachonigi niya, "Winjuru un joma tokgi tekgi! Uparo ninyaka wagolnu pi e lwandani koso?"
Eka noting’o bade mogoyo lwandanodiriyo gi ludhe.  Pi nobubni mang’eny, mi oganda nomodho kaachiel gijambgi.
To Ruoth Nyasaye nowachi ni Musa gi Harun niya, "Ne ok ugenamoromo nyiso jo-Israel ni an ng’ama ler! Kuom mano ok unyal teroogandani nyaka piny mane asingora ni namigi. "
Mago e sokni mag Meriba, kama ne jo-Israel odhawie gi Ruoth Nyasaye minonyisogi ni en ng’ama ler.  (Tiend Meriba en dhaw. )Jo-Edom otamo jo-Israel kadho e pinygi
