Kane jo-Israel ni Kadesh, Musa nooro joote ir ruodh Edom, kowachoniya, "Owadu Israel owacho kama: Ing’eyo malong’o chandruok dutomwaseyudo,
kendo kaka kwerewa nodhi Misri, mi wasedak kuno kuom hignimang’eny.  Jo-Misri nothagowa malit mana kaka ne githago kwerewa,
tokane waywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye mondo okonywa, nowinjo ywakwa, mooromalaika mogolowa Misri, omiyo koro wan Kadesh, dala ma en tong’ pinyi.
Wakwayi ni yie wakadhi e pinyi.  Ok wananyon puotheu mag cham kata magmzabibu, kendo ok wanamodh e sokniu.  Wanaluw mana Ndach Ruoth, kendo okwanabar korachwich kata koracham nyaka wakadh pinyi. "
To jo-Edomnodwoke niya, "Ok unyal kadho e pinywa, nono to wamonjou. "
Tojo-Israel nowacho niya, "Donge wabiro mana luwo Ndara? To kata ka wan gijambwa wamodho piu to wanachulu.  Omiyo wewauru wang’ad ang’ada. "
Tojo-Edom ne ok oyienigi mondo gikadhi, kendo ne giwuok gi jolweny mathothmondo girad kodgi.
Kamano jo-Edom notamo jo-Israel kadho e pinygi, mijo-Israel notando, moluwo komachielo. Harun otho e got Hor
Oganda jo-Israel nowuok Kadesh, modhi e got Hor.
Ruoth Nyasayenowacho ni Musa gi Harun e got Hor man but tong’ piny Edom niya,
"Harun biro tho, mi luw kwerene, to ok nodonji e piny ma nasingora ninami jo-Israel, nikech nudagi rito chikna kuom pi Meriba.
Kaw Harunkod Eleazar wuode mondo uidhgo got Hor.
Eka ilony lep Harun mondoirwakni Eleazar wuode.  Harun to notho mana kanyo, koluwo kwerene. "
Musa notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike, mi ne giidho got Hor, kaoganda duto neno.
Nolonyo lep Harun, morwako ni Eleazar wuod Harun. Harun to notho ewi got kanyo.  Bang’e Musa gi Eleazar nolor piny oa egot.
Kane oganda jo-Israel oneno ni Harun osetho, ne giywage kuomndalo piero adek. Kwan
Jo-Kanaan omonjo jo-Israel
Kane ja-Kanaan ma ruodh Arad mane odak yo milambo mar pinyno owinjo nijo-Israel biro koluwo yor Atharim, nomonjogi momako jomoko kuomgi.
Ekajo-Israel nokuong’ore ni Ruoth Nyasaye kawacho niya, "Ka ichiwo jogi elwetwa, to wabiro ketho miechgi chuth. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo kwayogi,mi ochiwo jo-Kanaan e lwetgi.  Ne gitiekogi kendo giketho miechgi chuth,mi gichako kanyo ni Horma, (tiende ni, keth. )Thuond mula
Bang’e ne gia got Hor ka giluwo yor Nam Makwar malworo piny Edom.
Tone gichako ng’ur ka gin e yo, mi giywak ni Nyasaye kod Musa, ka giwachoniya, "Ere gimomiyo usegolowa e piny Misri mondo watho e thimni, kamaonge chiemo kata pi? Chiemo marachni ojogowa!"
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye noorothuonde man gi kwiri mager, mokayo jo-Israel kendo onego ji mang’eny.
Omiyo ji nobiro ir Musa, mowachone niya, "Ne waketho kuom ng’ur niRuoth Nyasaye kod in.  Yie ikwanwa Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ogol thuonde okokuomwa. " Kuom mano Musa nokwayonigi Ruoth Nyasaye,
mi Ruoth Nyasayenowachone niya, "Los thuond mula, igur e luth mabor.  Ka ng’ato thuolokayo, mi orango thuond mulano to nochangi. "
Kamano Musa noloso thuondmula moketo e luth, ni, ka ng’ato thuol okayo, mi orango thuond mulano,to chango. Jo-Israel owuotho kalworo piny Moab
Jo-Israel nodhi nyime gi wuoth, moguro kambi kamoro miluongo ni Oboth.
Bang’e gia Oboth, mi gidhi giguro kambi Iye-abarim, e thim man yowuokchieng’ mar piny Moab.
Ka ne gia kanyo, to ne gidhi mi gigurokambi e hoho mar Zared.
Eka ne gia Arnon e thim momakore gi pinyjo-Amor.  Aora Arnon ne ni e tong’ piny jo-Moab gi piny jo-Amor.
Manoemomiyo Kitap Lwenje mag Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo kuom Vaheb man Sufa, kodhohni man kuno niya,
"Arnon kod hohni motimo thidhya,gi piny maridore kochomo mier mag Ar,kod tong’ piny Moab. "
Jo-Israel noa aora Arnon modhi Beer, (tiende ni soko. ) Mano e sokomane Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kuome ni Musa niya, "Chok ji kaachiel mondoami pi. "
"Chieng’no ema jo-Israel nowerie niya,In soko, bubni oko!Waweruru ni soko!
En soko mane jodongo okunyogi ludhe kod odungnigi,mi obedo chiwo manie thim. "
Ne gia Beer, mi gidhi Nahaliel, kendo ne gia Nahaliel, mi gidhiBamoth.
Bang’ a Bamoth, ne gidhi e holo man piny Moab ewi got Pisga,kama inyalo nenogo thim. Jo-Israel oloyo Sihon(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Jo-Israel nooro joote ir Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, ka gikwaye niya,
"Yienwa mondo wakadh e pinyi.  Ok wananyon puotheu mag cham kata magmzabibu.  To bende ok wanamodh e sokniu.  Wanaluw mana Ndach Ruoth nyakachop wakadh pinyi. "
To Sihon ne ok oyie mondo jo-Israel okad e pinye. Ne ochoko joge duto, mi owuok mondo oked gi jo-Israel e thim.  Nodhinyaka Jahaz, momonjogi kuno.
To jo-Israel nonegogi oyokre, mokawopinygi, chakre aora Arnon nyaka aora Jabok, ma en tong’ piny jo-Amon,kuma ne giyudoe ka weg pinyno rateke.
Kuom mano jo-Israel nokawo miechjo-Amorgo duto, modakie.  Miego ne gin Heshbon kod mier matindo mage.
Hesbon ne dala maduong’ mar Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, mane oyudo osekedo giruodh Moab machon, mi okawo pinye nyaka aora Arnon.
Mano emomiyo jowernochuogo wer niya,"Biuru Heshbon, biuru!Wageruru dala Sihon obed kaka chon,
nimar mach nomuoch Heshbon!Ee, mach noliel e dala Sihon. Noketho Ar dala Moab,kendo notieko gode mag Arnon.
A yaye Moab!Uromo, un jo-Kemosh. Kemosh oseriembo yawuote,moringo, kendo osemiyo Sihon ruodh Amor omako nyige.
Nyikwagi orumo, chakre Heshbon nyaka Dibon,to mach pod liel kochomo Medeba!"
Kamano jo-Israel nokawo piny jo-Amor, modakie. Jo-Israel oloyo Og ruodh Bashan(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Eka Musa nooro joote mondo odhi ocheng Jazer, mi jo-Israel nokawe,kaachiel gi mier matindo mage, kendo ne giriembo jo-Amor mane oyudo odakkuno.
Bang’e ne giwichore mi giluwo yo mochomo Bashan.  Og ruodh Bashankod joode duto nobiro Edrei, mondo oked kodgi.
To Ruoth Nyasayenowacho ni Musa niya, "Kik iluore, nimar asechiwe e lweti, kaachiel gijoge duto kod pinye.  Timne mana kaka nitimo ni Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, maneodak Heshbon. "
Kamano jo-Israel nonego Og kaachiel gi yawuote kod jogeduto, nyaka ne onge kata ng’at achiel modong’, mi ne gikawo pinyegidakie. Kwan
Balak oluongo Balaam
Jo-Israel nodhi moguro kambi e piny Moab mamwalo, man yo wuokchieng’mar aora Jordan, kama omanyore gi Jeriko.
Balak wuod Zipor nowinjo gima ne jo-Israel otimo ni jo-Amor.
Tojo-Moab bende kihondko malich nomako, nikech ne gineno ka jo-Israelng’eny ahinya.
Omiyo ne giwacho ni jodong Midian niya, "Oganda maduong’malichni biro nang’owa mana kaka dede nang’o lum. " Balak wuod Zipor,mane ruodh Moab e kindego,
nooro joote ir Balam wuod Beor mane oyudo niPethor but aora Yufrate e piny jo-Amav, kowachone niya, "Oganda maduong’moa e piny Misri osebiro, mi opong’o piny, kendo othung’a marach.
Omiyobi piyo mondo ikuong’gi nikech ging’eny ahinya mohewowa.  Bang’e dipo kaaloyogi, mi ariembogi oko e pinywa, nikech ang’eyo ni joma igwedho toyudo gueth, to joma ikwong’o to yudo kuong’. "
Jodong Moab gi Midian ne jokawo gik michulo jokor, mi gidhi ir Balaam,kendo ginyise kaka Balak oorogi.
Balaam nowachonigi niya, "Ninduru kaotienoni, kendo abiro wachonu gima Ruoth Nyasaye onyisa kuom wachni. "Kuom mano jodong Moabgo nonindo ka Balaam.
Eka Nyasaye nofwenyore niBalaam, mopenje niya, "Joma olimigo oa kanye?"
Balaam nodwoke niya,"Balak wuod Zipor ma ruodh Moab ema oseorogi ira, konyisa ni
ogandamaduong’ osea e piny Misri mopong’o piny.  Omiyo odwaro ni mondo adhiakuong’negi, eka dipo ka oloyogi, mi oriembogi. "
To Nyasaye nowacho niBalaam niya, "Kik idhi kodgi, to bende kik ikuong’ jogo nikech gin jomaoguedhi. "
Kuom mano, kane Balaam ochiew gokinyi, nonyiso jodongo maneBalaam ooro niya, "Doguru thuru nimar Ruoth Nyasaye osekwera ni kik adhikodu. "
Omiyo jodong Moabgo noa modok ir Balak, monyise ni Balaamosedagi biro kodgi.
Eka Balak nochako ooro jodongo moko mang’eny kendo madongo moloyo maneoseoro mokwongo.
Ne gibiro ir Balaam, mi giwachone niya, "Balaam wuodZipor oorowa mondo wanyisi kama, ‘Kik gimoro moni biro ira,
nikechabiro miyi duong’ miwuoro, kendo anatimni gimoro amora miwacho.  Omiyonyaka ibi mondo ikuong’na jogi. ’ "
To Balaam nodwoko jodong Balakniya, "Kata ka bed ni Balak dwaro miya fedha gi dhahabu duto manie ode,to ok anyal chayo chik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha e yo moro amora.
Tokata kamano, ninduru ka gotienoni kaka ne jou mokwongo ka onindo mondoawinj ane gima nyien ma Ruoth Nyasaye nyalo nyisa kuom wachno. "
Nyasaye nofwenyore ni Balaam gotieno, mowachone niya, "Ka jogo osebiroluongi, to dhi kodgi.  To nyaka itim mana gima abiro wachoni. "
Omiyokane Balaam ochiew gokinyi, nogawo kanje, modhi gi jodong Moab. Malaika kod kanj Balaam
To kata kamano Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho nikech Balaam ne dhi, omiyo kaneBalaam biro koidho kanje, ka en gi jotichne ariyo, malaika mar RuothNyasaye nobiro mochung’ e nyime mondo ogeng’ne kik okadhi.
Kane kanynaoneno malaika kochung’ e yo gi ligangla, nobaro moweyo yo, to Balaamnochwade mondo oduog e yo.
Eka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nodhimochung’ kamoro ma yo dinygo e kind puothe mag mzabibu, kama ochiel giohinga koni gi koni.
Kanyna noneno malaika kochung’ kanyo, mi norere eohinga, kendo odiyo tiend Balaam e ohingano, mi Balaam nochako chwade.
Bang’ mano, malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nosudo modhi ochung’ kamoromadiny ma ng’ato ok nyal baroe korachwich kata koracham.
Kane kanynaoneno malaika kanyo, nonindo gi Balaam piny, mi mano nomiyo Balaammirima, mochwade gi ludhe.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo kanyna owuoyo, kapenjo Balaam niya, "Koro igoya didek, to ere gima aseketho?"
Balaamnowachone niya, "Isebedo kichanda, kendo ka dabed ni an gi ligangla, todikoro asenegi!"
To kanyna nopenjo Balaam niya, "To donge an e kanjima isebedo kiidho pile? Bende asetimonie gima kamano nyaka nene?" Balamnodwoke ni, "Ooyo. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye noyawo wang’ Balaam monenomalaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye kochung’ e yo gi ligangla.  Nokulore, mopodhopiny auma e nyim malaika.
Malaika nopenje niya, "Ere gima omiyo inyalogoyo kanji didek kamano? Ne abiro mondo ageng’ni, to ne ichoma mana tir,
to ka kanji nende onena didek, mobaro oa e yo.  To ka da bed ni okobaro, to dikoro asenegi, mi aweye odhi. "
Balaam nowacho ni malaikamar Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Aseketho.  Ne ok ang’eyo ni ichung’ e nyima e yomondo igeng’na.  To koro ka wuodhani ok berni, to ayie dok dala. "
Tomalaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Dhiyo adhiya gi jogo, tonyaka iwach mana gima abiro nyisi. " Omiyo Balaam nodhi adhiya gi jodongBalak. Balaam gi Balak
Kane Balak owinjo ni Balaam biro, nowuok modhi nyaka Ar e piny Moabbut aora Arnon manie tong’ pinye, mondo oromne.
Balak nopenjo Balaamniya, "Donge naoroni joote ndalo mang’eny mondo oluongi? Ang’o ma neomoni biro? Koso ne iparo ni ok anyal miyi duong’?"
Balaam nodwokeniya, "Eri asebiro, to koro ere teko ma an-go ma dawachgo gimoro amora?Wach moro amora ma Nyasaye omiya ema abiro wacho. "
Kamano Balam nejodhi gi Balak nyaka Kiriath-huzoth,
mi Balak oyang’o dhok gi rombe niBalaam kod jodongo ma ne ni kode. Balaam oguedho jo-Israel
Kinyne gokinyi Balak nokawo Balaam motero ewi got miluongo niBamoth-baal, kuma ne onyalo nenogo oganda jo-Israel duto. Kwan
Eka Balam nowacho ni Balak niya, "Gerna kende abiriyo mag misango ka,kendo kelna ruedhi abiriyo gi imbe abiriyo. "
Balak notimo kamano,mochiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo mar misango.
Ekanowachoni Balaam niya,
"Aseloso kende abiriyo mag misango kendoasechiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo. " Balaam nowacho niBalak niya, "Chung’ e bath misango misechiwo to an iweya adhi kenda. Kamoro dipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye ofwenyorena, kendo gimoro amora mowachonaabiro nyisi. " Kamano nowuok modhi, kendo Nyasaye nofwenyorene
monyiseweche ma onego owachi, kowachone niya, "Dog ir Balak, kendo iwachne manakaka anyisi. "
Omiyo nodok moyudo Balak kochung’ e bath misango maneosechiwo, kaachiel gi jodong Moab duto.
Eka ne Balaam ohulo wach moakuom Nyasaye kama:"Balak ruodh Moab oseoma Arampiny gode man wuok chieng’ kowachona niya,‘Bi mondo ikuong’na joka Jakobo!Bi ikwer jo-Israel. ’
To ere kaka dakwong’joma Nyasaye ok osekuong’o?Ere kaka dakwerjoma Ruoth Nyasaye ok osekwero?
Anenogi kachung’ ewi lwendni maboyo,kendo arangogi gi ewi gode. Aneno oganda modak kar kende,ma ok oseriworegi ogendni mamoko.
Ere ng’ama nyalo kwano oganda joka Jakobo,kata manyalo riwokar romb jo-Israel?Weuru atho kaka joma kare tho,kendo abed achiel kodgi. "
Bang’ mano Balak nowacho ni Balaam niya, "Mano to ang’o misetimono? Nealuongi mondo ikuong’na wasika, to in koro isemana guedhogi!"
ToBalaam nodwoke niya, "Donge nyaka awach mana gima Ruoth Nyasayeosenyisa?"
Eka Balak nowachone niya, "Bi mondo ateri kamoro machielo ma inyalonenogo mana bath jo-Israel konchiel, to ok giduto, mondo ikuong’nagikanyo. "
Kamano ne otero Balaam e paw Zofim ewi got Pisga, kendonogeroe kende abiriyo mag misango, mi ochiwoe rwath achiel gi im achiele kendo ka kendo.
Eka ne Balaam owacho ni Balak niya, "Chung’ butmisango misechiwo, an to adhi romo gi Nyasaye kucha. "
Ruoth Nyasayenofwenyore ni Balaam monyise gima onego owachi kowachone niya, "Dog irBalak kendo iwach mana kaka anyisi. "
Omiyo nodok, moyudo ka Balakochung’ e bath misangone kaachiel gi jodong Moab.  Balak nopenjo gimaRuoth Nyasaye owacho.
Mi Balaam nohulo wach moa kuom Nyasaye kama:"Balak a malo mondo iwinj!Ruodh Zipor winji gima onyisa mondo awachi!
Nyasaye ok en dhano ma doriambi. Ooyo, ok en dhano ma dolokre. Osewuoyo, to donge obiro timo kaka owacho?Adier, obiro chopo gima osehulo.
Osechika mondo achiw gueth,omiyo abiro chiwo gueth,to ok anyal loko guethno.
Onge ketho moseyudo kuom joka Jakobo. Ooyo, onge richo moseneno kuom jo-Israel. Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi ni kodgien ema giyie ni en e Ruodhgi.
Nyasaye, ma nogologi e piny Misri,tekone chalonigi gi teko jowi.
Tim ajuoke onge kuom joka Jakobo,adier, timbe ndagla onge kuom jo-Israel. Koro ma e sa monego wanyisie joka Jakobo ma jo-Israel niya,‘Neyeuru gima Nyasaye osetimonu!’
Ogandagi chalo gi sibuor ma dhako mokichore,kendo ojuol ka sibuor ma dichwo. Ok onyal nindo piny,ka pok ochamo gima onego momadho rembe. "
Eka Balak nowacho ni Balaam niya, "Ka ok idwar kuong’ogi, to kara bermondo kik iguedhgi bende. "
To Balaam nodwoke niya, "Donge ne anyisi ninyaka atim gik moko duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye ochika?"
Balak nowachoneniya, "Bi mondo ateri kamoro machielo, dipo ka Nyasaye oyie, miikuong’onagi kanyo. "
Kamano notero Balaam ewi got Peor, momanyore giJeshimon.
Eka Balam ne onyise mondo olosne kende abiriyo mag misangokanyo, kendo ochiw ruedhi abiriyo kod imbe abiriyo.
Balak notimo kakane Balam onyise mi ochiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo. Kwan
Koro kaka Balam nong’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro ni mondo oguedhjo-Israel, ne ok odhi mondo otim tim ajuoke, kaka ne osetimo mokwongo,to nowichore mochomo thim,
kendo kane ong’icho, noneno jo-Israel kogurokambigi kochanore e dhoutgi.  Eka teko mar Nyasaye nobiro kuome,
miohulo kama:"Ma e wach madiermar Balaam wuod Beor,mana ng’at ma wang’e bith,
kendo ma winjo weche Nyasaye. En wach ma ng’at ma wang’e oyepo,kendo ma neno fwenyruokmoa kuom Ng’at ma Nyalo Gik Moko Duto.
A joka Jakobo,mano kaka hembeu beyo!A jo-Israel,kar daku long’o!
Hembeu chalo gi yiend othidhemopidhi e laini maboyo,kendo chalo gi puothemae bath aora,kaka yien mabeyoma Ruoth Nyasaye opidho,kendo kaka yiend sidamae dho pi.
Pi mae dapigeu biro bubni oko,kendo kothu nochal gi nembe madongo,mondo ruodhu obed maduong’moloyo Agag,kendo lochne oyud duong’,
Nyasaye mane ogolou e piny Misri,tekone chalo gi teko jowi. Uchamo ringre ogendini ma wasikubende urado chokegi,kendo uturo lembgi matindotindo.
Uchalo gi sibuor madhako manindo piny,ma onge ng’ama hedhore chiewo. Joma guedhou mondo oyud gueth,to joma kuong’ou mondo oyud kuong’!"Balaam okoro wach
Kane Balak owinjo wechego, nokecho ahinya gi Balaam, mi ne okeyolwetene, kowacho ni Balaam niya, "Ne aluongi mondo ikuong’na wasika, toin koro iseguedhogi mana nyadidek!
Omiyo wuogi, idhi thuru.  Neasingora ni damiyi duong’ mang’ongo, to koro Ruoth Nyasaye osemoni yudoduong’no. "
To Balaam nodwoke niya, "Donge ne anyiso jooteni mane ioroira
ni kata dibed ni Balak dwaro miya fedha kod dhahabu duto manieode, to ok anyal chayo chik Ruoth Nyasaye, ka atimo dwarona awuon, bedni en gima ber kata gima rach, to abiro wacho mana gima Ruoth Nyasayeonyisa.
Koro adok ir jowa, to ka pok adhi, to nyaka anyisi gimajo-Israel biro timo ni jogi e ndalo mabiro. "
Kamano Balaam nohulo wachmoa kuom Nyasaye kama:"Ma e wach madiermar Balaam wuod Beor,mana wach ng’at ma wang’e bith,
kendo mawinjo weche Nyasaye. En wach ng’at mong’eyo riekomar Ng’ama Duong’ Moloyo,ng’at ma wang’e oyepo,kendo ma neno fwenyruok moa kuom Ng’ama Nyalo Gik Moko Duto.
Anene, to ok sani,kendo ang’iye,to ok machiegni. Sulue nobi koa kuom joka Jakobo,kendo ludh duong’ nowuog kuom jo-Israel. Obiro goyo oganda lweny mag jo-Moab,kendo nolo joma sungore.
Obiro loyo piny Edom e lweny, mi okawkendo jo-Seir ma wasike nobed mage. Jo-Israel biro timo timbe chir.
Ee, joka Jakobo biro loyo wasikgi. Onge ng’at ma nodong’ Ar ka ngima. "
Eka Balaam norango piny Amalek, mi ohulo kama:"Oganda mane okwongo betie ne jo-Amalek. To mogik ginirum chuth. "
Eka norango jo-Keni, mi owacho niya,"Yaye un jo-Kain,kata obedo ni kar daku otegno,kendo udak malo ewi gode,
to obiro wang’. Uparo ni unyalo dak e nyima kanyo nyaka karang’o?"
Ne ochako ohulo kendo niya,"Yaye, mago jokanye machokore malogo?
Gin mony moa Saipras. Gibiro ketho Asuria,kendo giniketh Eber,to kata gin bendegibiro rumo chuth. "
Bang’ mano Balaam nowuok modok thurgi, to Balak bende nodhi. Kwan
Jo-Israel olamo Baal-peor
Kane jo-Israel ni Shitim, ne gichako terore gi nyi Moab,
mane luongogie sep misengni mane gitimo ni nyisechegi.  Ne gidhi, mi gichamo chiemogo,kendo gilamo nyiseche jo-Moab.
Kane jo-Israel ochako lamo Baal-peorkamano, Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho kodgi.
Mowacho ni Musa niya, "Ter jotendoganda ewi got idhir olwar piny, mondo otho e nyima odiechieng’ alanga,mondo mirimba mager oa kuom jo-Israel. "
Omiyo Musa nowacho ni jong’adbura mag Israel niya, "Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nyaka neg joge moselamoBaal-peor. "
Noyudo ja-Israel moro okelo nyar Midian e hembe ratiro ka Musa kodoganda duto neno, ka noyudo giywak e dho Hemb Romo.
Kane Finehas wuodEleazar ma wuod Harun jadolo onene, nowuok e oganda mokawo tong’,
kendoodonjogo e ot ma iye, kodwaro ja-Israelno.  Nochwowe gi tong’ moriwekaachiel gi nyakono.  Eka tho mane oyudo ogoyo jo-Israel orumo.
Tonoyudo ka thono osenego ji piero ariyo gang’wen.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Finehas wuod Eleazar ma wuodHarun jadolo osemiyo mirima mane an go gi jo-Israel orumo, nikech mirimamosemake kodgi chal gi mara.  Mano emomiyo kata obedo ni ne an gi nyiegokod jo-Israel nikech aherogi ahinya, to ne ok atiekogi.
Dhi iwach niFinehas ni asingorane ni obiro bedo jadolo nyaka chieng’.
Asingorane,en kaachiel gi nyikwaye ni ginibed jodolo nyaka chieng’ nikech osebedogi mirima ma nyiso ni ohero Nyasache, mi opwodho jo-Israel kuomrichogi. "
Ja-Israel mane onegi kaachiel gi nyar Midian niluongo ni Zimri wuodSalu ma jatend dhoot achiel kuom dhout jo-Simeon.
To nyar Midian ma neonegno nyinge ne Kozbi nyar Zur, ma ne jatend dhout Midian moko.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Sanduru jo-Midian, kendouneggi,
nikech ne githagou gi timbegi mag amara mane gitimo Peor,kendo kuom wach Kozbi ma nyargi, ma nyar jatend Midian, mane oneg ndalomane yamb tho obiro nikech gima notimore Peor. "Kwan
Okwan jo-Israel e piny Moab
Bang’ yamono, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Eleazar jadolo ma wuodHarun niya,
"Kwanuru oganda jo-Israel e dhoutgi, kundiko joma hikgioromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo, kendo moromo dhi e lweny,"
Musagi Eleazar nochoko ji duto ma hikgi piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo,
epiny Moab mamwalo, e bath aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko, kakaRuoth Nyasaye nosechiko Musa. Jo-Israel mane owuok Misri e magi:
Jo-Reuben ma wuod Israel makayo, kochan e dhoutgi, ne joka Hanok gijoka Palu
gi joka Hezron gi joka Karmi.
Mago ne dhout Reuben.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gi mia abiriyo kod piero adek.
Wuod Palu ne Eliab,
to yawuot Eliab ne Nemuel gi Dathan kod Abiram. Gin e Dothan gi Abiram mane joma ogen e oganda, to ne gipiem gi Musa kodHarun, mi giriwore gi jo-Korah mondo gipiem gi Ruoth Nyasaye.
Bang’epiny nong’amo dhoge, mi omwonyogi kaachiel gi Korah, mi ogandagi norumo,kendo mach nowang’o ji mia ariyo gi piero abich kande.  Ne gidoko ranyisima siemo ji.
To kata kamano jo-Korah ne ok otho duto.
Jo-Simeon, kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Nemuel gi Joka Jamin gi joka Jakin
gi joka Zera kod joka Saulo.
Mago ne dhout joka jo-Simeon.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ariyo gariyo gi mia ariyo.
Jo-Gad, kochan e dhoutgi, ne joka Zefon gi joka Hagi gi joka Shuni
gi joka Ozni gi joka Eri
gi joka Arod kod joka Arieli.
Mago nedhout jo-Gad.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gi miaabich.
Yawuot Juda ne Er gi Onan gi Shela gi Perez kod Zera.  To Er gi Onannotho e piny Kanaan.
Jo-Juda, kochan e dhoutgi, ne joka Shela gi jokaPerez kod joka Zera.
Dhout Perez ne joka Hezron gi joka Hamul.
Magone dhout Juda.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero aabiriyogauchiel gi mia abich.
Jo-Isakar kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Tola gi joka Pua
gi joka Jashubkod joka Shimron.
Mago ne dhout Isakar.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi nealufu piero auchiel gang’wen gi mia adek.
Jo-Zebulun kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Sered gi joka Elon kod jokaJaleel.
Mago ne dhout Zebulun.  Kar romb joma ondik nyingi ne alufupiero auchiel gi mia abich.
Yawuot Josef ne Manase gi Efraim.
Jo-Manase kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Makir gi joka Gilead.  (Gilead newuod Makir. )
Dhout Gilead ne Jezeer gi joka Helek
gi joka Asriel gijoka Shekem
gi joka Shemida kod joka Hefer.
Zelofehad wuod Hefernonywolo mana nyiri kende.  Nyingi ne Mala gi Noa gi Hogla gi Milka kodTirza.
Mago ne dhout Manase.  Kar romb joma ne ondik nyinggi ne alufupiero abich gariyo gi mia abiriyo.
Jo-Efraim kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Shuthela gi joka Beker kod jokaTahan.
Dhood Shuthela ne joka Eran.
Mago ne dhout Efraim.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia abich. Mago duto ne joka Josef, kochan e dhoutgi.
Jo-Benjamin kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Bela gi joka Ashbel gi jokaAhiram
gi joka Shufam kod joka Hufam.
Yawuot Bela ne Ard gi Naaman. Dhout Bela ne joka Ard gi joka Naaman.
Mago ne dhout Benjamin.  Karromb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gabich gi mia auchiel.
Jo-Dan kochan e dhoodgi ne joka Shuham.  Mano ne dhood Dan.
Kar rombjoka Shuhan ma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero auchiel gang’wen gi miaang’wen.
Jo-Asher kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Imna gi joka Ishvi kod joka Beria.
Dhout Beria ne joka Heber gi joka Malkiel.
Bende Asher ne nigi nyakoma nyinge Sera.
Mago ne dhout Asher.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi nealufu piero abich gadek gi mia ang’wen.
Jo-Naftali kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Jazeel gi joka Guni
gi jokaJezer kod joka Shilem.
Mago ne dhout Naftali, kochan e utgi.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gabich gi mia ang’wen.
Kamano kar romb jo-Israel duto ne ji alufu mia auchiel gi achiel, kodmia abiriyo gi piero adek.  (
,
)Piny nyaka pog gi ombulu
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyaka pog piny gi dhoudi manamaromre gi kar joma ondik nyinggi.
Oganda maduong’ inimi lowomaduong’, to oganda matin nimi matin.  Oganda ka oganda nopogne lowomaromre gi kar romb joma ondik nyinggi.
Kata kamano unupog piny managi ombulu,
mi dhoot ka dhoot noyud lowo maromre gi kar romb nying jomaondik e dhoodgi.  Lowo nopog gi ombulu ni ogendni madongo gi matindobende. "Dhood Lawi
Jo-Lawi mondik nyinggi kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Gershon gi joka Kohathkod joka Merari.
Dhout Lawi ne joka Libni gi joka Hebron gi joka Maligi joka Mushi kod joka Korah. Kohath ne wuon Amram,
to chi Amram ne nyinge Jokebed nyar Lawi, maneLawi onywolo Misri.  Jokebed nonywolo ni Amram nyithindo ma nyinggi Harungi Musa kod Miriam ma nyamin-gi.
Yawuot Harun ne Nadab gi Abihu giEleazar kod Ithamar.
To Nadab gi Abihu notho nikech ne giyiego mach maok ni kare e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kar romb jo-Lawi ma chwo, chakre ja due achiel kadhi nyime, ne alufupiero ariyo gadek.  Nondik nyinggi mopogore gi dhout Israel mamoko,nikech ne ok opognigi lowo kaka ipogo ni dhout Israel mamoko. Kaleb gi Joshua kende ema odong’
Mago e nying jo-Israel mane Musa gi Eleazar jadolo ondiko e piny Moabmamwalo e bath aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko.
To onge ja-Israelmoro kata achiel mane Musa gi Harun jadolo okwano e thim Sinai, maneokwan e kweno mar ariyoni,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nosewacho ni nyakagitho giduto e thim.  Onge ng’ato kuomgi mane pod ngima, mak mana Kalebwuod Jefune kod Joshua wuod Nun. Kwan
Kwayo mar nyi Zelofehad
Bang’ kweno, nyi Zelofehad nobiro.  Zelofehad ne wuod Hefer ma wuodGilead ma wuod Makir ma wuod Manase ma wuod Josef.  Nying nyirigo ne Malagi Noa gi Hogla gi Milka kod Tirza.
Ne gibiro e dho Hema Miromoe giNyasaye e nyim Musa gi Eleazar jadolo kaachiel gi jodongo kod ogandaduto, mi giwacho niya,
"Wuonwa ne otho e thim, to ne ok en achiel gijo-Korah mane piem gi Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ne otho athoya kuom richone owuon,kendo noonge gi yawuowi.
Koro ere gimomiyo nying wuonwa dilal e dhoodgimana nikech oonge gi wuowi? Pognwa lowo mana kaka ipogo ni ominewuonwa. "
Kuom mano Musa notero wachgi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,
mi Ruoth Nyasayenowachone niya,
"Gima nyi Zelofehad dwaro ni kare.  Nyaka ipognigi lowomana kaka ipogo ni omine wuon-gi.
To wach ni jo-Israel ni ka ng’atootho maonge wuowi, to mwandune nyaka dong’ ni nyare.
Ka oonge gi nyako,to mwandune nyaka dong’ ni owetene.
To ka oonge gi owetene, tomwandune dong’ ni omine wuon-gi.
Ka wuon onge gi ominene, to mwandunedong’ ni watne moro machiegni, kendo ng’atno ema kawo.  Wachni nobed chikni jo-Israel. " Mano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. Oket Joshua jatelo kar Musa(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Idh got Abarim, mondo ine pinymasemiyo jo-Israel.
Ka isenene, to ibiro tho miluw kwereni, mana kakaHarun owadu notho,
nikech nutamoru rito chikna kane oganda jo-Israelpiem koda e sokni manie thim Zin, kendo ne ok unyiso oganda ni an Ng’amaLer. " (Mago e sokni mag Meriba man but Kadesh e thim Zin. )
Bang’e Musa nowacho niya,,
"A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach ngima, yierjatelo ni ogandani,
mondo otel nigi e gik moko duto ma gitimo, kendooritgi ka giwuok kendo ka giduogo dala, mondo oganda Ruoth Nyasaye kikbed ka rombe maonge jakwath. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "KawJoshua wuod Nun, ng’at ma teko ni kuome, mondo iket lweti kuome,
kendoikete e nyim Eleazar jadolo gi oganda duto.  Miye chik e nyimgi,
kendoimiye tekoni moko mondo oganda jo-Israel duto oluore.
Enobed kodhi irEleazar jadolo ma nobed ka goyone ombulu miluongo ni Urim, mondo ong’egogima Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro.  Oganda jo-Israel, kaachiel gi Joshua, nowuogoko kendo noduog dala, mana kaka Eleazar ochikogi. "
Musa notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  Nokawo Joshua moketo e nyimEleazar jadolo gi oganda duto,
moyieyo lwete kuome, kendo omiye chikkaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosechike. Kwan
Misengni mitimo pile(Wuok
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
Chik jo-Israel mondo ochiw gikmitimonago misengni miwang’o mondo obed chiemba madum tik mamit e kindemoketi.
"Bende nyisgi ni misengni miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye e magi: Odiechieng’kodiechieng’ nyaka chiw nyiimbe ariyo maonge songa ma hikgi achiel,mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep.
Nyaim achiel unutimgo misangogokinyi, to machielo unutimgo misango godhiambo mar ang’ich welo.
Misango mar cham michiwo kodgi to nobed mogo moromo kilo adek moruw gimo maber moromo lita ariyo.
(Mano e misango mitimo miwang’o mitimo pilemondo odum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mane ochak tim e got Sinai. )
Tomisango miolo piny mitimego nobed divai moromo lita ariyo kuom im ka im. Nyaka uol divai makechno ei Kama Ler ka misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nyaimmachielo mutimogo misango godhiambo mar ang’ich welo nyaka chiw gimisango mar cham kod miolo piny maromre gi mago michiwo gokinyi.  Enmisango miwang’o mondo odum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye. Misengni mitimo chieng’ sabato, kendo mitimo due ka due
"Chieng’ sabato to nyaka uchiw nyiimbe ariyo maonge songa ma hikgiachiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Nyaka chiwe gi misango miolo piny,mitimego kaka chik dwaro.
Misango miwang’o pep mitimo chieng’ sabatoka sabatono nyaka utim kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kodmisango miolo piny mitimego.
"To chieng’ due achiel mar due ka due nyaka uchiw nyiruedhi ariyo giim achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgomisango miwang’o pep.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.
Misango marcham michiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobed mogo moromo kilo apar moruwgi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed moromo kilo abiriyo,
kendo michiwo ginyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.  Mano en misango miwang’o pep mondo odum tikmamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Misango miolo piny mitimo gi nyarwath kanyarwath nobed divai moromo lita ang’wen, to michiwo gi im nobed litaariyo, kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim lita achiel, mano en misangomiwang’o pep ma nyaka tim due ka due e higa ngima.
Bende nyaka uchiwnywok mondo otimnigo Ruoth Nyasaye misango mar golo richo.  Mano nyakautim kumedo ewi misango miolo piny michiwego. Misengni mitimo e sewni moketi
"Nyaka utim Pasaka mar Ruoth Nyasaye due apar gang’wen mar duemokwongo,
to due apar gabich unutim sawo, kensdo nyaka ucham manamakati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Chieng’ mokwongo to nyakaubed gi chokruok mar lemo, kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile chieng’no.
Nyaka uchiw nyiruedhi ariyo gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgiachiel achiel mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep, madum tik mamit niRuoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.
Misango mar chammichiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobed mogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo,
to michiwo gi im nobed kilo abiriyo, to michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim,kilo adek.
Bende nyaka uchiw nywok mondo otimgo misango mar goloricho, upwodhrugo.
Mago duto nyaka uchiw kumedo ewi misango miwang’opep mitimo gokinyi pile.
Unutim misengnigo pile nyaka chieng’ marabiriyo.  En misango mitimo mondo obed chiemo madum tik mamit ni RuothNyasaye.  Nyaka uchiwe kumedo ewi misangoo miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kodmisango miolo piny michiwego.
Chieng’ mar abiriyo bende nyaka ubed gichokruok maler, kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile.
"Chieng’ muchiwoe chamb gwel, ka ukelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo marcham manyien e Sap Jumbe, to nyaka ubed gi chokruok maler, kendo ok nutitijeu mapile.
Unuchiw nyiruedhi ariyo gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyoma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep madum mamit niRuoth Nyasaye.
Misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobedmogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed kilo abiriyo,
kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.
Bende nyaka uchiw nywokmondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, upwodhrugo.
Jamnigo duto nyakabed maonge songa, kendo misengnigoo duto nyaka utim kumedo ewi misengnimiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kaachiel gi misango miolo piny michiwogigo. Kwan
"Due achiel due mar abiriyo, nyaka ubed gi chokruok mar lemo, kendo okunuti tijeu mapile.  Mano en chieng’ mor mugoyoe tung. ’
Unuchiw nyarwathachiel gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgi achiel achiel mondootimgo misango miwang’o pep madum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigoduto nyaka bed maonge songa.
To misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwathnobed mogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed kiloabiriyo,
kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.
Bende nyaka uchiwnywok mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, upwodhrugo.
Mago duto nyakautim kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pep mitimo due ka due, kendo mitimopile, kaachiel gi misengni mag cham gi miolo piny, michiwogigo kaka chikdwaro.  En misango miwang’o mondo odum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Due apar due mar abiriyono nyaka ubed gi chokruok maler, kendo nyakausandru kuriyo kech, bende kik uti tich moro amora.
Unuchiw nyarwathachiel gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgi achiel achiel mondootimgo misango miwang’o pep madum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigoduto nyaka bed maonge songa.
Misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwath nobedmogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed kilo abiriyo,
kendo michiwo gi nyaim, kilo adek.
Bende nyaka uchiw nywok mondootimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misango mipwodhogo richo, kodmisango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod miolopiny michiwo kodgi.
"Due apar gabich due mar abiriyo, nyaka ubed gi chokruok mar lemo.  Okunuti tijeu mapile, to nyaka utim ni Ruoth Nyasaye sawo kuom ndaloabiriyo.
Unuchiw nyiruedhi apar gadek gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apargang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel, mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep madumtik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.
Misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobed mogo moromokilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im ka im nobed kilo abiriyo,
kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.
Bende nyaka uchiw nywokmondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pepmitimo pile, kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod miolo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar ariyo unuchiw nyiruedhi apar gariyo gi imbe ariyo kodnyiimbe apar gang’we ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango. Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.
Misengni mag cham kod miolo pinynyaka bed moketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.
Bendenyaka uchiw nywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewimisango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi milo pinymichiwego.
"Chieng’ mar adek unuchiw ruedhi apar gachiel gi imbe ariyo kodnyiimbe apar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango. Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge gi songa.
Misengni mag cham kod milopiny nyaka bed moketio kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.
Bende nyaka uchiw nywok achiel mondo timgo misango mar golo richo,kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gimiolo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar ang’wen unuchiw ruedhi apar gi imbe ariy kod nyiimbe apargang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo timgo misango.  Jamnigo duto nyakabed maonge songa.
Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bed moketikaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.
Bende nyaka uchiw nywokachiel mondo timgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misango miwang’opep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi milo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar abich unuchiw ruedhi ochiko gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbeapar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Jamnigo dutonyaka bed maonge songa.
Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.
Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi miolo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar auchiel unuchiw ruedhi aboro gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbeapar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Jamnigo dutonyaka bed maonge songa.
Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.
Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo timgo misango mar golo richo kumede ewi misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi misango miolo pinymichiwego.
"Chieng’’ mar abiriyo unuchi ruedhi abiriyo gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbeapar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Jamnigo dutonyaka bed maonge songa.
Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.
Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kumedo ewi misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi misango miolo pinymichiwego.
"Chieng’ mar aboro unutim nyasi mitiekogo chokruok, kendo ok unutitijeu mapile.
Nyaka uchiw rwath achiel gi im achiel kod nyimbe abiriyoma hikgi achiel achiel, mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep madum tikmamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.
Misengnimag cham kod miolo piny michiwogo ruedhi gi imbe kod nyiimbe nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.
Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedoe misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gii milo piny michiwego.
"Mago e misengni ma nyaka utim ni Ruoth Nyasaye e sewni moketi, kumedoewi misengni muchopogo kuong’ruok, gi muchiwo kuom herou, gi miwang’opep gi mag cham gi miolo piny kod mag sawo. "
Musa nonyiso jo-Israel mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike. Kwan
Chike mag kuong’ruok gi singruok
Musa nowacho ni jotend jo-Israel niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko kama: Kang’ato osingore ni Ruoth Nyasaye kata okuong’orene, to kik olokre. Gimoro amora mowacho gi dhoge, to nyaka otim.
"Ka nyaka matin ma pod ni e odgi osingore ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kataokuong’orene,
kendo wuon mare owinjo singruokno kata kuong’ruokno, took owachone gimoro, kuong’ruokneno nyaka siki.
To ka wuon odagi wachnochieng’ mowinjeeno, to kuong’ruokgo duto ok nyal mako nyakono.  RuothNyasaye nowene nikech wuon mare osedagi.
"To ka nyako okendi ka pod kuong’ruok omake, kata ka wach mane owachopiyopiyo ka ok oparo pod otweye,
to eka bang’e chwore owinjo to oling’aling’a to kuong’ruokno nyaka siki.
To ka chwore odagi kuong’ruoknochieng’ mowinjoe wach mi oketho kuong’ruok, to kuong’ruokno ok nyal makodhakono, to Ruoth Nyasaye nowene.
"Kuong’ruok moro amora ma chi liel kata dhako ma chwore oriembookuong’orego nyaka siki.
To ka dhako okuong’ore kata otuere gikuong’ruok,
to eka bang’e chwore owinjo to oling’ aling’a mi ok odagiwachno, to kuong’ruokgo duto nyaka siki.
To ka chwore odagikuong’ruokgo ratiro kowinjogi, to onge gimoro amora mane chiege owachoma nomake, bed ni en kuong’ruok kata singruok.  Chwore osekethogi, omiyoRuoth Nyasaye nowene.
"Chwor dhako nyalo guro kata ketho singruok kata kuong’ruok ma chiegedwaro sandorego.
To ka dichwo oling’ chieng’no kod kinyne, to manonyiso ni oyie gi singruok kata kuong’ruok mane chiege otuerego. Ginisiki, nikech ka ne owinjogi, to noling’.
To kolokore mana achien,modagi kosewinjogi, to ketho mar chiege nobed mare, kendo nyaka ochul. "
Mago chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa kuom dichwo gi dhako kendokuom wuon nyako gi nyare matin ma pod ni e odgiKwan
Jo-Israel ochulo kuor ni jo-Midian
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Inimi jo-Israel chul kuor nijo-Midian.  Bang’ mano ibiro tho, miluw kwereni. "
Omiyo Musa nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Yieruru jou moko, mondo odhioked gi jo-Midian, ochulnigi kuor e nying Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nyaka ugol jialufu achiel achiel e dhoot ka dhoot mar Israel. "
Kamano noluongjo-Israel alufu apar gariyo moikore ni lweny, ka ogol ji alufu achielachiel e dhoot ka dhoot.
Musa nooro jolwenygo gi Finehas wuod Eleazarjadolo mane oting’o gik lemo mag Kama Ler kod tunge migoyo mondo ji ogosigich lweny.  Ji alufu achiel achiel noa e dhoot ka dhoot.
Ne gikedo gijo-Midian kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa, mi ginego jogi machwo duto.
To bende ne ginego Evi gi Rekem gi Zur gi Hur kod Reba, mane ruodhiabich mag Midian, kaachiel gi Balaam wuod Beor.
Jo-Israel nomako mondjo-Midian gi nyithindgi, kendo ne giyako jambgi kod mwandugi duto.
Negiwang’o miechgi duto, kod kuondegi mag buoro.
Bang’e ne gikawo jamnikod gik moko duto mane giyako, kaachiel gi joma ne gimako,
mi giteroir Musa gi Eleazar jadolo kod oganda jo-Israel e kambi mane ni e pinyMoab mamwalo but aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko. Chik mar pwodho gik moyaki
Musa gi Eleazar jadolo gi jodong oganda duto nodhi romo ni jolwenygo edho kambi oko.
To Musa nokecho gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gimatindo mane duogo koa e lweny,
mopenjogi niya, "Ere gimomiyo useweyomon-gi mak unego?
Donge ung’eyo ni ka ne Balaam osea gweng’ Peor, tomon-go ema nobet kawuondo jo-Israel mondo owe Ruoth Nyasaye, mi manonomiyo tho ogoyo oganda Ruoth Nyasaye?
Emomiyo neguru nyithindo machwoduto, kaachiel gi mon duto,
to uwe nyiri ma pok ong’eyo chwo, mondoukaw.
To ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu moseneko, kata mosemulo ng’at motho,nyaka dong’ oko mar kambi kuom ndalo abiriyo.  Gudreuru chieng’ mar adekkod chieng’ mar abiriyo, kendo upwodh joma umako e lweny.
Bendepwodhuru lewni duto gi gimoro amora molos gi pien, kata gi yie dielmokadi, kata gi bao. "
Eleazar jadolo nowacho ni jolweny mane dwogo koa e lweny niya, "Ma echik achiel kuom chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.
,
Gimoro amoramanyalo tamo mach wang’o, kaka dhahabu gi fedha gi mula gi nyinyo giopanga kod lisasi, nyaka uketi e mach, eka obed maler.  To kata kamanonyaka pwodhgi gi pi mar pwodhruok.  Bende gimoro amora ma mach nyaloketho nyaka lwok e pigno.
Chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka ulwok lepu, miubed maler, eka bang’e unyalo dwogo e kambi. "Gik moyaki opogi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Un gi Eleazar jadolo kod jodongdhout oganda mondo ukwan jamni gi gik moko moyaki, kaachiel gi joma omake lweny.
Bang’e poguru gigo maromre e kind jolweny mane odhi kedo, kodji duto mane odong’.
Kuom mago mopogni jolweny, ugolie achiel kuom miaabich abich, bed ni gin ji kata dhok kata kenje kata rombe, mondo obedchiwo momi Ruoth Nyasaye.
Gik mugolo kuom pok jolwenygo nyaka miEleazar jadolo kaka chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To kuom gik mopog nijo-Israel modong’, ugolie achiel kuom piero abich abich, bed ni gin jikata dhok kata kenje kata rombe, omi jo-Lawi ma jorit Hema Maler marRuoth Nyasaye. "
Musa gi Eleazar jadolo ne jotimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.
Togik moyaki, ka ok okwan mago mane jolweny okawo e magi: Rombe alufu miaauchiel gi piero abiriyo gabich (
,
)
Gi dhok alufu piero abiriyogariyo,
kod kende alufu piero auchiel gachiel,
kaachiel gi nyirialufu piero adek gariyo ma pok ong’eyo chwo.
Kamano gik mane omi joma ne okedo e lweny
ne rombe alufu mia adek gipiero adek gabiriyo kod mia abich, (
,
)
Gi dhok alufu piero adekgauchiel,
kod kenje alufu piero adek gi mia abich,
kaachiel gi jialufu apar gauchiel.  Kuom mano, pok mane ogol mondo ochiw ni RuothNyasaye ne rombe piero abiriyo gariyo, gi dhok mia auchiel gi pieroabiriyo gabich, kod kenje piero auchiel gachiel, kaachiel gi ji pieroadek gariyo.
Musa nomiyo Eleazar jadolo pok mane ogol ni RuothNyasaye, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
To gik mane odong’ ni jo-Israel,tiende ni mago mane Musa oketo tenge komiyo jolweny pokgi,
ne rombealufu mia adek gi piero adek gabiriyo gi mia abich, (
,
)
gi dhokalufu piero adek gauchiel
kod kenje alufu piero adek gi mia abich,
kaachiel gi ji alufu apar gauchiel.
Kuom gik mane opogni ogandajo-Israelgo, Musa nogolo achiel kuom piero abich abich, bed ni gin jikata jamni, momiyo jo-Lawi mane jorit Hema Maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye kakaRuoth Nyasaye nochike.
Bang’e jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo nobiro ir Musa,
nowachone niya, "Jaduong’, wasekwano jolweny mawa duto mwayudo nigintie gite.
Kuom mano wasekelo gik molos gi dhahabu mane wayako, kakathiwni gi manyonge gi tere gi stadi kod tigo, mondo wachiw ni RuothNyasaye ka gik mwawarogo ngimawa. "
Eka Musa gi Eleazar jadolo nokawo gik molos gi dhahabugo kuom jotelomadongo gi matindo.
Pek chiwo mar dhahabu mane gimiyo Ruoth Nyasayenoromo kilo mia ariyo,
nimar jalweny ka jalweny noseyako.
KamanoMusa gi Eleazar jadolo noyudo dhahabu kuom jotend ogend lweny madongo gimatindo, mi ne gikelo e Hema Miromoe gi Nyasaye mondo Ruoth Nyasayeopargo jo-Israel. Kwan
Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod nus jo-Manase omi piny man yo wuok chieng’ maraora Jordan(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad ne ni gi jamni mang’eny, kendo kane gineno ka pinyJazer kod piny Gilead ni gi lege mabeyo,
ne gibiro ir Musa gi Eleazarjadolo kod jodong oganda, mi giwacho nigi niya,
"Piny moting’o Atarothgi Dibon gi Jazer gi Nimra gi Heshbon gi Eleale gi Sebam gi Nebo kodBeon
ma Ruoth Nyasaye osekawo ka jo-Israel neno, en piny man gi lekmaber mar jamni, kendo ung’eyo ni wan jopith jamni.
Kuom mano ka uyiekodwa, to miwauru pinyno obed marwa.  Kik wang’ad aora Jordan. "
To Musa nopenjo jo-Gad kod jo-Reubengo niya, "Udwaro ni mondo joweteuodhi oked e lweny ka un to udong’ ka?
Ere gimomiyo unyoso chunyjo-Israel mondo kik ng’ad loka, odhi e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyogi?
Mano e gima ne wuoneu otimo kane aorogi ka wan Kadesh-barnea mondogidhi gicheng piny Kanaan.
Ne gidhi mi gichengo pinyno nyaka holo marEshkol, to kane gidwogo ne ginyoso chuny jo-Israel ni ok ginyal dhi kawopiny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyogi.
Mirima mager nomako Ruoth Nyasayechieng’no, mi okuong’ore niya,
‘Jo-Israel osedagi luwa gi chunygiduto, omiyo onge kata ng’ato achiel ma jahigni piero ariyo kata mokadhokanyo mane owuok Misri, manone piny mane asingora ni Ibrahim gi Isakakod Jakobo.
Kaleb wuod Jefune ja-Kenizi, kod Joshua wuod Nun kende emanodonj e pinyno, nikech giseluwo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunygi duto. ’
RuothNyasaye nokecho gi jo-Israel mi ne omiyo gidigni e thim kuom higni pieroang’wen gi, nyaka tieng’ mane oketho e nyimeno otho duto.
Koro kendouluwo mana timbe wuoneu! Un joma timbegi richo, ma pod biro mana medomirimb Ruoth Nyasaye kuom jo-Israel.
Nimar ka udagi luwe, to obirojwang’o oganda jo-Israel duto e thim, kendo un ema ubiro miyo girum. "
Bang’ kinde matin ne gidwogo ir musa, mi giwacho niya, "Wadwaro geroabilni ni jambwa ka, kod mier mondo mondwa gi nyithindwa odagie.
Bang’e wanyalo dhi e lweny mondo waked ka watelo ni jo-Israel, nyakachop gikaw piny ma gidhi dakie.  To e kinde ma pod wadhi kedo, mondwa ginyithindwa nyalo dak e mier mochiel motegno gi ohinga ma jo pinyni oknyal monjogie.
Ok wanaduogi ka pok ja-Israel ka ja-Israel oyudo lowomopogne.
Wan ok wadwar mondo opognwa piny kodgi loka machielo mar aoraJordan, nikech osepognwa lopwa yo wuok chieng’chieng’ mar Jordanlokani. "
Musa nodwokogi niya, "Ka unyalo rito singruokmusesingorugoni, mi uyie kedo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,
kendo jou duto majolweny ong’ado aora Jordan e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gibet kuno nyakachop Ruoth Nyasaye riemb wasike,
mokawo pinyno, to un udwog ka, kendounubed maonge ketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kendo e nyim jo-Israel, mipinyni nobed maru e nyim Ruloth Nyasaye.
To ng’euru ni ka ok utimokamano, to unubed joketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo richou nokelnukum.
Kuom mano, geruru mier ni mondu kod nyithindu, kendo uger abilnini jambu, to nyaka utim mana kaka usesingoru!"
Jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben nodwoko Musa niya, "Jaduong’ wan jogi omiyo wabirotimo kaka ichikowa.
Nyithindwa gi mondwa kod jambwa duto biro dong’ emiech Gilead ka,
to jowa duto ma jolweny biro ng’ado aora mondo odhioked e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kaka isechiko. "
Kuom mano, Musa nochiko Eleazar jadolo gi Joshua wuod Nun kod jodongdhout Israel niya,
"Ka jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben duto ma jolweny ong’adoaora Jordan kodu mondo oked e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi ukawo pinyno, tonyaka upognigi piny Gilead.
To ka ok ging’ado aora mi gidhi e lwenykodu, to upognigi lowo e piny Kanaan. "
Jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben nodwokoniya, "Jaduong’, wabiro timo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osechikowa.
Waduto mwaromo dhi e kedo wabiro ng’ado loka cha e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,to lopwa nobed mana loka Jordan koni. "
Omiyo Musa nomiyo jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben kod nus jo-Manase wuod Josefpiny Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, gi piny Og ruodh Bashan duto, kaachiel gimiechgi kod gwenge mokiewo kodgi.
Jo-Gad nogero Dibon gi Ataroth giAroer,
gi Atroth-safan gi Jazar gi Jogbeha
gi Bethnimra kodBethharan, duto mier mochiel motegno gi ohinga, kendo ogerie abilni magjamni.
Jo-Reuben to nogero Heshbon gi Eleale gi Kiriathaim
gi Nebogi Baal-meon, (mane nyinge oloki) kod Sibma.  Mago e nying mane gichakomier mane gigerogo.
Joka Makir wuod Manase to nomonjo piny Gilead,mokawo, kendo ne giriembo jo-Amor mane oyudo odakie.
Eka Musa nomiyojoka Makir wuod Manase piny Gilead, mi gidak kuno.
Jair nyakwarManase, to nomonjo miech Ham, mi okawo, kendo ochako ni Havoth-jair,(tiende ni, miech Jair. )
Noba to nomonjo Kenath gi mier matindomikiewo kode, mi ne ochake ni Noba, nyinge owuon. Kwan
Wuodh jo-Israel e thim
Kane Musa gi Harun otelo ni jo-Israel e dhoutgi ka giwuok e pinyMisari,
Musa nondiko nying kuonde mane gibworoe mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenochiko, kendo magi e kuonde mane gibworoe gogo:
Jo-Israel noa Ramases chieng’ due apar gabich mar due mokwongo, ma enchieng’ maluwo chieng’ Pasaka.  Ne giwuok ka jo-Misri nenogi, to ne okgidewo.
Jo-Misri noyudo yiko nyithindgi makayo duto mane Ruoth Nyasayeonego, kang’adogo bura ni nyisechegi.
Jo-Israel noa Ramases, modhi oguro kambi Sukoth.
Eka ne gia Sukoth, migidhi giguro kambi Etham e bath thim.
Ne gia Etham, mi gidok chien butPihahiroth, yo wuok chieng’ mar Baal-Zefon, mi giguro kambi kamaomanyore gi Migdol.
Bang’e ne gia Pihahiroth, mi ging’ado nam nyakathim, kendo ne giwuotho kuom ndalo adek e thim Etham, mi giguro kambikamoro miluongo ni Marah.
Ka gia Marah, ne gidhi Elim kuma ne giyudoe sokni apar gariyo mag pikod yiend othidhe piero abiriyo, mi giguro kambi kuno.
Eka ne giaElim, mi giguro kambi e bath Nam Makwar.
Ne gia e bath Nam Makwar, migidhi giguro kambi e thim Sin.
Bang’e ne gia kanyo mi gidhi gigurokambi Dofka.
Ne gia Dofka, mi gidhi giguro kambi Alush.
Kane giaAlush, ne gidhi mi giguro kambi Refidim, kuma ne onge pi ma ji modhi.
Eka ne gia Refidim, mi gidhi giguro kambi e thim Sinai.
Ne gia ethim Sinai, mi gidhi giguro kambi Kibroth-hatava.
Bange ne giaKibroth-hatava mi gidhi giguro kambi Hezeroth.
Ne gia Hezeroth, migidhi giguro kambi Rithma.
Eka ne gia Rithma, mi gidhi giguro kambiRimon-parez.
Ne gia Rimon-parez, mi gidhi giguro kambi Libna.
Bang’ene gia Libna, mi gidhi giguro kambi Risa.
Ne gia Risa mi gidhi gigurokambi Kehelatha.
Ne gia Kehelatha, mi gidhi giguro kambi e Got Shafer.
Kane gia got Shafer, ne gidhi mi giguro kambi Harada.
Eka ne giaHarada, mi gidhi giguro kambi Makeloth.
Bang’e ne gia Makeloth, mi gidhi giguro kambi Tahath.
Ne gia Tahath,mi gidhi giguro kambi Tara.
Ne gia Tara, mi gidhi giguro kambi Mithka.
Eka ne gia Mithka, mi gidhi giguro kambi Hashmona.
Ne gia Hashmona,mi gidhi giguro kambi Moseroth.
Bang’e ne gia Moseroth, mi gidhigiguro kambi Bene-jaakan.
Ne gia Bene-jaakan, mi gidhi giguro kambiHorhagidgad.
Kane gia Horhagidgad, ne gidhi mi giguro kambi Jotbatha.
Ne gia Jotbatha, mi gidhi giguro kambi Ebrona.
Eka ne gia Ebrona, migidhi giguro kambi Ezion-geber.
Ne gia Ezion-geber, mi gidhi gigurokambi e thim Zin, ma en thim Kadesh.
Ne gia Kadesh, mi gidhi gigurokambi e got Hur, manie tong’ piny Edom.
Eka Harun jadolo noidho gotHor kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike, mi otho kuno due achiel, due mar abich ehiga mar piero ang’wen bang’ wuok jo-Israel e piny Misri.
Ne enjahigni mia achiel gi piero ariyo kane otho kuno.
Ruodh Arad ma ja-Kanaan, mane odak yo milambo mar piny Kanaan,nowinjo ni jo-Israel biro.
Kane gia got Hor ne gidhi mi giguro kambiZalmona.
Ne gia Zalmona, mi gidhi giguro kambi Punon.
Eka ne giaPunon, mi gidhi giguro kambi Oboth.
Ne gia Oboth, mi gidhi gigurokambi Iye-Abarim e tong’ piny Moab.
Bang’e ne gia Iyim, gidhi gigurokambi Dibon-gad.
Kane gia Dibon-gad, ne gidhi mi gidhi giguro kambiAlmon-diblathaim.
Ne gia Almon-diblathaim, mi gidhi giguro kambi egode mag Abarim, yo wuok chieng’ mar Nebo.
Ne gia e gode mag Abarim, mi gidhi giguro kambi e piny Moab, mamwalo ebath aora Jordan, kama omanyore gi Jeriko.
Kambigino nochakoreBeth-Jeshimoth, moyarore nyaka Abel-shitim e piny Moab ma mwalo. Tong’ piny Kanaan, kendo kaka nopog pinyno
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e piny Moab mamwalo e bath aora Jordan,kama omanyore gi Jeriko,
mowachone mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Korouchiegni ng’ado aora Jordan mondo udonj e piny Kanaan.
Nyaka uriemb jiduto modak e pinyno mondo owenu thuolo, kendo uketh kido maggi mopa kodmag mula moleny
Kawuru pinyni mi udagie, nimar asemiyougo mondo obedmaru.
Nyaka upoge gi ombulu e kind dhoutu, mondo dhoot ka dhoot oyudlope.  Dhoot maduong’ nyaka yud lowo maduong’ to dhoot matin nyaka yudmatin.  Pognigiuru mana kaka ombulu owacho, ka dhoot ka dhoot kendo jootka joot yudo lopgi.
To ka ok uriembo joma odak e pinyno mondo owenuthuolo, to joma uweyogo nobednu kaka pedo mandhodho wang’u, kendo kakudho machwowo dendu.  Ginibed ka gilaro kodu piny mudakieno,
kendogima naparo timonigi, ema natimnu. "Kwan
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Korouchiegni donjo e piny Kanaan, momiu mondo obed mwandu nyaka chieng’.  Enpiny Kanaanno duto, ma tong’ne chalo kama:
pinyu man yo milambonochakre e thim Zin manie tong’ piny Edom.  Tong’u ma yo milambo mogik yowuok chieng’ nobed giko mar nam Kado.
Eka kochopo yo milambo mar pithAkrabim, too nogom mokadh Zin, kendo gikone ma yo milambo nobedKadesh-barnea.  Eka nochom Hazar, mochop Azmon,
kendo nogom kochomo aoramanie tong’ piny Misri, mi nogik e Nam Mediterenia.
"Tong’u ma yo podho chieng’ to nobed Nam Mediterenia, gi dho namno. Mano ema nobed tong’u ma yo podho chieng’.
"To tong’u ma yo nyandwat nobed koa e Nam Mediterenia kochomo got Hortir,
kendo koa got Hor, nochom kama idonjogo Hamath, mi nogik Zadad.
Eka noa kanyo kochomo Zifron, mi nodhi ogik Hazer-enan.  Mano ema nobedtong’u ma yo nyandwat.
"Tong’u ma yo wuok chieng’ noa Hazar-enan kochomo Shefam tir.
Bang’enoridre koa Shefam nyaka Ribla yo wuok chieng’ mar Ain, molor nyaka godeman yo wuok chieng’ mar Nam Galili.
Eka nomed lor nyaka aora Jordan,mi ogik e Nam kado.  Kamano piny duto ma tong’go olworo nobed maru. "
Bang’e Musa nochiko jo-Israel kama: "Mano e piny ma ubiro pogo giombulu, mondo dhoot ka dhoot oyud lope.  En piny ma Ruoth Nyasayeosechiko ni mondo omi dhoudi ochiko gi nus,
nikech jo-Reuben gi jo-Gadkod nus jo-Manase oseyudo pinygi, dhoot ka dhoot.
Dhoudi ariyo ginusgo oseyudo pinygi loka aora Jordan koni, yo wuok chieng’ mar Jeriko. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Joma biro konyi pogo pinynoe magi: Eleazar jadolo kod Joshua wuod Nun.
To bende nyaka ikaw jotenddhoot ka dhoot mondo okonyi e tijno,
kendo magi e nyinggi: E dhoodjo-Juda en Kaleb wuod Jefune.
E dhood jo-Simeom en Samuel wuod Amihud,
to e dhood jo-Benjamin en Elidad wuod Kislon.
E dhood jo-Dan tojatelo nobed Buki wuod Jogli.
Kuom joka Josef, jatend dhood Manasenobed Haniel wuod Efod,
to jatend dhood Efraim nobed Kemuel wuodShiftan.
E dhood jo-Zebulun to jatelo nobed Elizafan wuod Parnak,
toe dhood jo-Isakar jatelo nobed Paltiel wuod Azan.
E dhood jo-asher,jatelo nobed Ahihud wuod Shelomi,
to e dhood jo-Naftali, jatelo nobedPedahel wuod Amihud. "
Mago e joma ne Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero mondo opog ni jo-Israel lowo epiny Kanaan. Kwan
Miech jo-Lawi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e piny Moab mamwalo but aora Jordan kamaomanyore gi Jeriko, mowacho niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel mondo oyier miechgimoko, kaachiel gi lowo molworogi, mondo omi jo-Lawi odagie.
Ginidag emiergo, kendo jambgi nokwa e legegi.
Lach mar lowo mumiyo jo-Lawi,chakre e ohinga mar dala ka dala, kadhi nyime noromo mita mia abichkuonde duto koni gi koni.
Kamano bor tong’ man yo wuok chieng’ nobedmita alufu achiel, gi man yo milambo gi man yo podho chieng’ kod man yonyandwat, duto mita alufu achiel achiel maromre.  To dala nobed e dierlowono tir.  Lowo molworo dala ka dala nobed lek ma joma odak e dalanokwayoe jambgi.
"Ka umiyo jo-Lawi miechgi, to auchiel kuomgi nobed miech tony, ma jomaoneko nyalo pondoe.  To bende unumigi mier piero ang’wen gariyo mamoko.
Kamano kar romb mier monego umi jo-Lawi, kaachiel gi legegi, gin pieroang’wen gaboro.
Ka uyiero miergo e piny jo-Israel duto, to ukaw miermang’eny kuom dhoudi matindo.  Dhoot ka dhoot nomi jo-Lawi mier maromregi lowo mane opogne. "Miech tony(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
; Joshua
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa
mondo onyis jo-Israel niya,"Kuseng’ado aora Jordan, mudonjo e piny Kanaan,
to yieruru mier mokomondo obed kuonde ma ma ng’at moneko kobothne nyalo tonyie.
Miergonobed miech tony, ma ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie koringo ng’at madwarochulone kuor, mondo kik nege kapok oyale e nyim oganda.
Ginibed mierauchiel moyier kaka miech tony,
ka adek ni yo wuok chieng’ mar aoraJordan, to adek nie piny Kanaan.
Mier auchielgo nobed kuonde tony, maka ng’ato oboth monego nyawadgi, to onyalo tonyie, bed ni en ja-Israelkata wendo kata japiny moro modak kuomu.
"Ka ng’ato ogoyo wadgi gi gima olos gi nyinyo, mi otho, to ng’atmogoyeno doko janek, omiyo nyaka nege.
Ka ng’ato nigi kidi e lwete manyalo nego ng’ato, mi ogoyogo wadgi, motho, to en janek, kendo nyakanege.
Kata ka ng’ato nigi gimoro molos gi yien e lwete manyalo neko,mi ogoyogo wadgi motho, to en janek, omiyo nyaka nege.
Owadgi ng’atmonegno nyaka neg janekno koyudo mondo ochulne kuor.
Ka ng’ato odhirowadgi goyiem, kata ka odiro gimoro mogoye,
kata kogoye adhong’, motho,to nyaka nege, nikech en janek.  Owadgi ng’at monegno nyaka neg janekno,koyudo.
"Kapo ni odhiro wadgi ma ok gimonrego, kata ka ochiele gi gimoro ka oken gi paro mar goye,
kata ka oboth, mobolo kuome kidi manyalo neko kaok onene, mi otho, kendo ka en adier ni ok gimonre, kendo ne ok odwarhinye,
to oganda nyaka yal wachno e kind janek gi owadgi ng’at monegi,kaluwore gi chikegi eki.
Oganda nyaka kony janekno kuom kuor ma owadging’at monegi dochulone, mi gidwoke e dala tony, kuma ne otonyiemokwongo.  Enobed kuno nyaka jadolo maduong’ tho.
To kapo ni chieng’moro janekno okadho tong’ mar dala tony,
mi owadgi ng’at mane onegocha oyude monege, to owadgi ng’at mane onegono onge gi ketho.
Janeknyaka sik mana e dala tony nyaka jadolo maduong’ tho.  Ka jadolo maduong’osetho, to eka onyalo dok thurgi.
Mago nobednu chik mochwere, kamoroamora mudakie.
"Ng’at moneko nyaka ng’adne buch tho mana kuom dho joneno.  To wachjaneno achiel kende ok oromo ng’ado ni ng’ato buch tho.
Kik uyie janekmong’adne buch tho warre, to nyaka nege.
Bende kik uyie ng’at mopondoe dala tony warre mi dog dag e dala, kapok jadolo maduong’ otho.
Kikuketh pinyu gi remo kamano, nikech remo ketho piny, kendo pinyu ok nyalpwodhore kuom gak mar remo mochuer, mak mana ka opwodhe gi remb ng’atmane ochuero remono.
Kik uchid pinyu mudakie, kendo ma an bendeadakie, nimar an Ruoth nyasaye adak e kind jo-Israel. "Kwan
Chik kend mar nyiri ma opognigi lop wuonegi
Jodong dhout Gilead wuod Makir ma wuod Manase ma achiel kuom dhoutJosef, nodhi ir Musa gi jotend oganda kod jodong dhout Israel,
mowachoniya, "Jaduong’, Ruoth Nyasaye nochiki mondo ipog ni jo-Israel lowo giombulu, to bende nochiki mondo ipog lowo ma dine owadwa Zelofehad oyudoni nyige.
To kapo ni moro kuom nyirigo okendi e dhood ja-Israel moro,to lowo mopogne biro lal kuom lop kwerewa, mi nomiye dhoot ma okendienyakono.  Kamano lopwano dilal.
Ka higa mar mor ochopo e piny Israel, tolowono nomi dhoot mokendie nyakono, mi nolal chuth kuom lop kwerewa. "
Kane Musa oseng’eyo gima Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro, nonyiso jo-Israel niya,
"Joka Josef ni kare, kendo kama e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osechiko kuom wachnyi Zelofehad.  Ginyalo tedo ni ng’ato ang’ata ma gihero, mak mana ninyaka bed ni okendgi e dhoodgi.
Onge lop ja-Israel moro amora ma nowuoge dhoodgi, kimiyo dhoot machielo, to ng’ato ka ng’ato e Israel nyaka sikmana gi lop wuon mare.
Nyar Israel moro amora ma opogne lop wuon marenyaka kendi mana e dhoodgi.  Kamano ng’ato ka ng’ato e Israel nosik e lopkwerene.
Onge lowo ma noa e dhoot moro kimiyo dhoot machielo, to dhootka dhoot nosik gi lope. "
,
Kuom mano, Mala gi Tirza gi Hogla gi Milka kod Noa, ma nyiZelofehad, notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa, mi gitedo mana niyawuot omine wuon-gi.
Nokendgi e dhood Manase ma wuod Josef, kendolopgi nosik mana e dhood kweregi.
Mago e chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa onyiso jo-Israel e pinyMoab mamwalo e bath aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko. Rapar mar Chik
Musa oparo ni jo-Israel singruok mane Nyasaye otimonigi Horeb
Magi e weche mane Musa owacho ni jo-Israel duto kane gin e thim manieholo, yo wuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan.  Kuno nomanyore gi Suf, ka Parannie bathe konchiel, to Tofel gi Laban gi Hazeroth kod Dizahab e bathekomachielo.
(En wuodh ndalo apar gachiel kia Horeb nyaka Kadesh-barnea,kiluwo yo mokadho e piny gode mag Seir. )
Chieng’ mokwongo mar due mar apar gachiel, e higa mar piero ang’wenbang’ wuok Misri, Musa nonyiso jo-Israel weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasayeosechike mondo owachnigi.
Mano notimore kane oseloyo Sihon ruodh Amor,mane odak Heshbon, kod Og ruodh Bashan, mane odak Ashtaroth gi Edrei.
Epiny Moab loka Jordan kuno, ema Musa nong’adoe bura e chunye, ni mondoonyis ji tiend chikni.  Nowacho niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwanowuoyo kodwa Horeb, mowachonwa kama: ‘Usebet e godni moromo,
omiyokoro chakuru wuoth, mondo udhi e piny gode mag jo-Amor, kendo uked gijoma odak machiegni kodgi e holo mar aora Jordan, gi piny gode kod pinypewe gi piny man yo milambo, kod dhonam, ma tiende ni piny Kanaan kodpiny Lebanon duto nyaka aora maduong’ mar Yufrate.
Aseikonu pinyno,omiyo dhiuru mondo ukawe.  En e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni nomikwereu ma Ibrahim gi Isaka gi Jakobo kod nyikwagi. ’Oyier jong’ad bura(Wuok
.
-
)
"E kinde nogo nawachonu niya, ‘Ting’uru pek ma ok anyal ting’o kenda,
nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyo unya ahinya, ma koro ung’enymana ka sulue mae polo.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu onego mi umednya nyadi gana gi gana moloyo kaka uromoni, kendo oguedhu kakanosingore.
To tich bedo jatendu kod ng’ado buchu osedoko mapek mohewa.
Kuom mano, yieruru ji man gi rieko kendo molony mondo oketgi jotenddhoutu. ’
Ne udwoka ni uyie gi gima nawachonu.
Omiyo nakawo ji man girieko kendo molony, maketo mondo oritu.  Moko kuomgi naketo jotend jigana, to moko jotend ji mia mia, to moko jotend ji piero abich abich,kod ji apar apar, kendo moko bende naketo jotelo mopogore opogore edhoutu duto.
E kinde nogo nachiko jong’ad bura mau niya: ‘Un ema onegouyal buche mag joweteu, kendo nyaka ung’ad bura kare e kind ng’ato giwadgi, kata bed ni ng’atno en ja-Israel wadu, kata en jadak.
Nyakaubed jaratiro kung’ado bura, kendo nyaka uwinj wach ng’at modhier manakaka uwinjo wach jamoko.  Kik uluor wang’ ng’ato, nikech ng’ado bura enmar Nyasaye.  Kapo ni uneno ka bura moro tek ahinya, ma ok unyal ng’ado,to kelnagouru mondo ayale. ’
Chieng’ onogo bende nachikou kuom gik mokoduto monego utim. Oor jombetre koa Kadesh-barnea odhi ocheng piny Kanaan(Kwan
.
-
)
"Bang’e ne wawuok Horeb kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochikowa, mi ne wawuotho ethim maduong’ kendo malich kaka ne uneno cha, kwadhi e piny gode magjo-Amor, mi wachopo Kadesh-barnea.
Eka nawachonu ni, ‘Koro wasechopo epiny gode mag jo-Amor, ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa miyowa.
RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu oseikonu piny ma uneno e nyimuno, omiyo dhiuru mondoukawe kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nosingorenu.  Kik chunyunyosre, kata kik ubed maluor. ’
To kane uwinjo kamano, nubiro irauduto, muwachona niya, ‘We mondo waor jomoko mondi nyimwa, odhiochengnwa pinyno, eka gidwoknwa wach, ka ginyisowa yo ma onego waluw,kod mier man kuno. ’
Ne ayie gi wachuno, mi ayiero jou apar gariyo kang’ato achiel achiel ochung’ ni dhoot ka dhoot.
Ne giwuok, mi giwuothoe piny gode nyaka holo mar Eshkol, mi gichengo gweng’no.
Ne gikawo gikmonyak e pinyno, mi gikelonwa, ka ginyisowa ni piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa dwaro miyowano en piny maber ahinya.
"To kata kamano nudagi dhi kuno, kendo nutamoru winjo chik RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ne ung’ur e hembeu, kuwacho niya, ‘Ruoth Nyasayeok oherowa, emomiyo osegolowa Misri mondo oketwa e lwet jo-Amor,otiekwa.
Ang’o ma wabiro yudo kuno ka wadhi? To jowetewa mane waoroosenego chunywa, ka wachonwa ni ji man kuno rabede kendo boyo mohewowa!Bende ginyisowa ni mier man kuno dongo, kendo nigi ohinga maboyo mochopoe polo.  To kendo nyikwa Anakim bende gineno kuno!’
"To nanyisou ni, ‘Chunyu kik nyosre, kendo kik uluor jogo.
RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu e jatendu, kendo en ema obiro kedonu, mana kakanokedonu e Misri cha. ’
To bende kane un e thim nuneno kaka ne RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu oting’ou e wuodhu duto nyaka nuchopo kaeri, mana kang’ama ting’o nyathine.
To kata obedo kamano, pod nutamoru atama genokuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,
mane telo nyimu mondo ong’inu kuondemane unyalo bworoe.  Gotieno notelo nyimu kobet ei mach, mondo onyisukuma onego uluw, to godiechieng’ notelonu kobet e bor polo. Nyasaye okumo jo-Israel(Kwan
.
-
)
"Kane Ruoth Nyasaye owinjo wecheugo, mirima nomake, mokuong’ore niya,
‘Onge kata ng’at achiel kuom tieng’ marachni ma none piny maber maneasingora ni nami kweregi,
mak mana Kaleb wuod Jefune.  En ema nonepinyno, kendo anamiye kaachiel gi nyikwaye piny ma osenyonono, nikechosebedo ka oluwa gi chunye duto. ’
Gima nutimono nomiyo Ruoth Nyasayeokecho koda an bende, mowachona niya, ‘Kata in bende ok inidonji epinyno,
to Joshua wuod Nun matiyoni ema nodonj kuno.  Kuom mano, jiwemondo obed motegno, nimar en ema nomi jo-Israel okaw pinyno.
Nyithinduma pod tindo mane uparo ni nobed joma nomak e lweny, kendo mapok ong’eyopogo ber gi rach ema nodonj e pinyno.  Gin ema namigi pinyno, kendoginidagie.
Omiyo chakuru wuoth mondo udog e thim kuchomo Nam Makwar. ’Olo jo-Israel Horma(Kwan
.
-
)
"Eka nudwoka niya, ‘Waseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo koro wabirodhi mondo wamonj pinyno kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ochikowa. ’ Omiyong’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nokawo gi lwenje, kuparo ni en gima yot monjopiny godeno.
To Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Kwergi kik gidhigikedi, nimar an ok nabed kodgi, omiyo wasikgi biro loyogi. ’
Nanyisoukamano, to ne ok udewo.  Nudagi winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye, mudhi umonjopiny gode mana gi wiu matek.
Jo-Amor modak e piny gode nowuok kedokodu, mi ginur kuomu mana ka kich, kendo ne gikeyou e gweng’ Seir, migiriembou nyaka Horma.
Bang’ mano nuduogo, muywak e nyim RuothNyasaye, to ne ok onyal winjo ywaku, kendo ne ok onyal dewou.
Mano emaomiyo nudak Kadesh-barnea kuom ndalo mang’eny. Rapar mar Chik
Higni mane jo-Israel otieko e thim
"Bang’e ne wamako yo mang’ado thim, kwachomo Nam Makwar, kaka RuothNyasaye nochikowa, kendo ne wadigni e piny gode mag Seir kuom ndalomang’eny,
nyaka Ruoth Nyasaye nokona niya,
‘Usebedu kudigni e pinygodegi moromo, omiyo koro wichreuru uchom yo nyandwat.
To wach ni jikama: "Bang’ kinde manok ubiro ng’ado e piny joweteu ma nyikwa Esaumodak Seri.
Ginibed maluor ka ginenou, to un nyaka une ni ok ukwinyogi,nikech ok namiu pinygi kata matin nono, nimar piny gode mag Seir asemiyoEsau ka mwandune.
Unyalo yudo chiemo gi pi kuomgi, to nyaka uchul,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseguedhou kuom gik moko duto mausetimo.  Oseritou ka uwuotho e thim malichni.  Kuom higni pieroang’wen-gi duto Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osebedo kodu, kendo onge gimausechando. " ’
Kamano ne wakadho, mi waweyo jowetewa ma nyikwa Esaumodak Seir, kendo ne waweyo yo mochomo Elath gi Ezion-geber, mi newawichore mwamako yo mochiko thim Moab.
"Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Kik umonj jo-Moab, kendo kikukwinygi nikech ok namiu pinygi kata matin mondo obed mwanduu, nimarasechiwo dala mar Ar ni nyikwa Lut mondo obed mwandugi. ’
(Jo-Emim maneoganda maratego ahinya, kendo mane nigi ji mang’eny nosedak kuno e kindemoko.  Ne gin joma raboche mana ka jo-Anakim.
Ji ne luongogi nijo-Refaim, mana kaka niluongo jo-Anakim, to jo-Moab ne luongogi nijo-Emim.
Mokwongo jo-Hori nodak Seir to nyikwa Esau notiekogi, mokawopinygi kendo odakie, mana kaka jo-Israel notimo e piny mane RuothNyasaye omiyogi mondo obed mwandugi. )
"Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi nyime kowachona niya, ‘Wuothuru mondo ung’ad holomar Zere. ’ Mi ne wang’ado.
Ne wasetieko higni piero adek gaboro chakrekinde mane wawuokie Kadesh-barnea, nyaka wang’ado holo mar Zered.  Ekindeno tieng’ mar jolweny ne koro osetho duto, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosekuong’ore.
Ruoth Nyasaye ema nokelonigi masira, motiekogi pep, maonge kata ng’atgi achiel mane odong’ e kambi.
"Kane jolwenygo duto osetho te,
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya,
‘Kawuono ubiro ng’ado tong’ mar Moab e dala mar Ar,
kendo kuchopo epiny jo-Moab, to kik ukwinygi kata kik umonjgi, nikech ok namiu pinygimondo obed mwanduu, nimar asechiwe ni nyikwa Lut. ’
(Pinyno bendeikwano ka piny jo-Refaim.  Jo-Refaim nosedak kuno mokwongo, to jo-Amon nelwongogi ni jo-Zamzumim.
Ne gin oganda maratego ahinya, kendo manenigi ji mang’eny.  Ne gin joma raboche mana ka jo-Anakim, to RuothNyasaye notiekogi, kane gitemo geng’o ni jo-Amon mane monjogi, mijo-Amon nokawo pinygi mi odakie.
Mano notimore mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenotimo ni jo-Hori mane otemo geng’o ni nyikwa Esau mane odak Seir. Notieko jo-Horigo mi nyikwa Esau nokawo pinygi kendo pod gidakie nyakachil kawuono.
To jo-Avim mane odak e mier matindo but Gaza, jo-Kaftorema notieko, mokawo pinygi, modakie. )
"Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi nyime, kowachone niya, ‘Wuothuru mondo ung’adholo mar Arnon, nimar asechiwo Sihon ja-Amor ma ruodh Heshbon e lwetukaachiel gi pinye.  Koro donjuru e pinye mondo uked kode.
Chakrekawuono abiro miyo ogendni duto ma e piny ngima luorou ahinya, ma kataka giwinjo mana humbu, to gibiro kirni ka kihondko omakogi. ’Jo-Israel oloyo Sihon(Kwan
.
-
)
"Omiyo kane pod wan e thim Kedemoth, naoro joote ir Sihon ruodhHeshbon kakwaye gi ng’wono niya,
‘Yie mondo wakadh e pinyi.  Wabiroluwo mana yo tir ma ok wabaro korachwich kata koracham.
Bende wabirong’iewo kuomu chiemo mwachamo kod pi mwamodho.
Omiyo yienwa mondowakadhi mana kaka nyikwa Esau modak Seir kod jo-Moab modak Ar ne joyienwa, mwakadho.  Bang’ mano, wanyalo ng’ado Jordan mondo wadonj e pinyma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa miyowa. ’
To kata kamano, Sihon ruodhHeshbon nodagi miyowa thuolo mondo wakadhi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nomiyo toke odoko matek mondo ochiwe kaachiel gi pinye e lwetu,kendo uneno ka pinyno pod marwa nyaka chil kawuono.
Kuom mano RuothNyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Biuru, nikech koro adwaro chiwo Sihon kaachielgi pinye e lwetu.  Monjeuru, mondo ukaw pinye. ’
Kamano Sihon gi jogenowuok morado kodwa Jahaz.
To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochiwe elwetwa, mi wanege kaachiel gi yawuote kod joge duto.
Kinde nogonobende ema ne wakawoe mier mage duto, mwaketho chuth, kendo wanego jiduto mane odakie, chwo gi mon kod nyithindo.  Onge ng’ato kata achielmane waweyo ka ngima.
Jamni kaachiel gi gik mane wayako e mier manewaloyo kende emane wakawo.
Onge dala mane nyalo sirowa, chakre Aroer edho holo mar Arnon, kod dala man e holo hie, nyaka chop Gilead.  AdierRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ema nochiwo gik moko duto e lwetwa.
To katakamano, nomako chik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa gi chunyu duto mi okumonjo piny jo-Amon ji yo ka holo mar Jabok, kata mana gi yo ka miechgimanie gode. Rapar mar Chik
Jo-Israel oloyo Og ruodh Bashan(Kwan
.
-
)
"Bang’e ne wawuok, mi wamako yo mochomo piny Bashan.  Eka Og ruodhBashan kaachiel gi joge duto ne jowuok mondo oked kodwa Edrei.
To RuothNyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Kik uluor Og, nimar asechiwe kaachiel gi jogekod pinye e lwetu.  Timneuru mana kaka nutimo ni Sihon ruodh jo-Amor maneodak Heshbon. ’
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochiwo Og ruodhBashan kaachiel gi joge e lwetwa, mi ne wanegogi duto, ma ok waweyo katang’at achiel ka ngima.
E kindeno bende ne wakawoe gweng’ Argob duto,man e piny Og ruodh Bashan.  Ne wakawo mier mage duto, ma onge kataachiel mane odong’.
Ne gin mier piero auchiel, mochiel motegno giohinga maboyo, moketie dhorangeye man gi thipe kod lodi.  To bende newakawo mier moko matindo mang’eny ma ok ochiel.
Dala ka dala ne wanegoeji duto modakie, chwo gi man kod nyithindo, mana kaka be watimo ni miechSihon ruodh Heshbon.
To jamni kod mwandu duto mane nie miego, newayako.
"Kamano e kaka ne wakawo pinje mag ruodhi ariyo mag jo-Amor mane niloka Jordan yo wang’chieng’, chakre holo mar Arnon nyaka got Hermon.
(Jo-Sidon lwongo got Hermon ni Sirion, to jo-Amor luonge ni Senir. )
Ne wakawo mier duto manie piny gode motarore, kaachiel gi piny Gileadkod piny Bashan, nyaka Saleka gi Edrei, miech Og ruodh Bashan.
(Ogruodh Bashan kende ema nodong’ kuom jo-Refaim.  Sandug liende, molos gikite maratenge, pod ni Raba dala jo-Amor nyaka chil kawuono.  Bornechiegni romo mita abich to to lachne mita ariyo. )Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod nus jo-Manase omi piny man yo wuokchieng’ marJordan(Kwan
.
-
)
"Kane wakawo pinyno ne apogo ni jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad piny man yonyndwat mar Arwer, e bath holo Arnon, kod nus mar piny gode man Gilead,kaachiel gi mier duto mane ni kuno.
To nus piny Gilead, komachielo kodBashan piny Og, napogo ni nus jo-Manase.  (Piny Bashan duto niluongo nipiny jo-Refaim.
Jair nyakwar Manase nokawo gweng’ Argob duto nyakatong’ jo-Geshur gi jo-Maakath.  Pod nitie mier moko e Bashan kunomiluongo ni Havoth-jair ma tiende ni miech Jair. )
Napogo ni joka Makirpiny Gilead.
To jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad napogonigi piny mochakore Gileadnyaka dier holo mar Arnon, kendo nyaka holo mar Jabok, moting’o tong’ gipiny jo-Amon,
kaachiel gi piny manie holo mar aora Jirdan, chakre NamGalili nyaka Nam Araba miluonmgo ni Nam Kado, man yo podhochieng’ margot Pisga.
"E kinde nogono nachiko dhoudi ariyo gi nusgo kama: ‘Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu osemiyou pinyni mondo obed mwanduu, to jolwenju duto nyakadong’ e oganda lweny, kendo otel e nyim jo-Israel weteu.
Mak manamondu gi nyithindu kod jambu ema mondo odong’; e mier masemiyougo. (Ang’eyo ni un gi jamni mathoth. )
To ka Ruoth Nyasaye osekonyo oweteukaka osekonmyou, mi gikawo piny man loka Jordan ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu miyogi, mi gidakie, eka unyalo dok e piny ma asemiyouni, ng’atoka ng’ato e dalane. ’
"Chieng’no bende nachiko Joshua niya, ‘Nuneno gi wang’u gima RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu notimo ni ruodhi ariyo kande.  Ruoth Nyasaye birotimo mana kamano ni pinje duto mubiro donjoe kuseng’ado aora Jordan.
Kik uluorgi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema biro kedonu. ’Ruoth Nyasaye ok oyie mondo Musa odonj e piny Kanaan
"Chieng’ onogono, nakwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
‘A Ruoth Nyasaye,isechako nyisa duong’ni gi tekoni.  Onge Nyasaye moro amora e polo kata epiny ma tekone nyalo romo gi tekoni, kata manyalo timo timbe madongomitimogi.
Akwayi ni yie ang’ad Jordan mondo aneye piny maber man lokacha kod piny gode mabeyo, kaachiel gi piny Lebanon. ’
To Ruoth Nyasayenokecho koda ahinya nikech gik musetimo, omiyo notamore winjo kwayona. Nodwoka nioya, ‘We! Mano oromo.  Kik ichak iwuo koda kendo kuom wachno.
Dhiyo ewi got Pisga mondo irang yo nyandwat gi yo milambo, kendo irangyo wuokchieng’ gi yo podhochieng’.  Inyalo mana neno pinyno gi wang’i, toin iwuon ok ning’ad Jordan.
Ket Joshua mondo okaw kari.  Ijiwe kendoimiye teko, nimar en ema obiro telo ni jogi, koterogi loka cha mondogikaw piny minenono. ’
"Kuom mano ne wadong’ e hoho momanyore gi Beth-peor. "Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
. Rapar mar Chik
Musa ojiwo jo-Israel mondo orit chik
Musa nomedo wacho niya, "To koro, un jo-Israel, winjuru chike gi buchema apuonjou, kendo umak, eka unubed mangima kendo unudonj e piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nomiu, mudagie.
Kik umed gimoro kuomgik ma achikou, kata kik ugol gimoro kuomgi.  Rituru chike mag RuothNyasaye adimba, mana kaka amiyougi.
Nuneno gi wang’u gima Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu notimo Baal-peor.  Nonego jou moko duto mane lamo Baal manyasach Peor.
To un mane upadoru kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, podungima uduto nyaka chil kawuono.
Asepuonjou chike gi buche kaka RuothNyasaye ma Nyasacha nochika.  Mago duto nyaka urit e piny mudhi donjoe,kendo kawo.
Ritgiuru adimba, nimar mano biro nyiso ogendini mamoko niuriek.  Ka giniwinj chikegi eki, to giniwach niya, ‘Onge oganda moromariek ka oganda maduong’ni. ’
Giniwach kamano nimar onge oganda moro,kata bed ni oduong’ manade, ma nyasache nyalo sudo machiegni kode kakaRuoth Nyasaye sudo machiegni kodwa e sa asaya ma walame.
Onge ogandamoro kata bed ni oduong’ manade, man gi chike kod buche makare machal giChik ma aseketo e nyimu tinendeni. Musa oparo ni jo-Israel gima notimore Horeb
"To beduru kutang’ kendo neuru ni wiu ok owil gi gik museneno giwang’u.  Kik uwe gia e chunyu ka pod ungima, to hulgiuru ni nyithindukendo ni nyikwau.
Nyaka uparnigi gik mane otimore chieng’ mane uchung’Horeb e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu cha, ka Ruoth Nyasaye wachona ni,‘Chokna ji e nyima ka, mondo giwinj kawuoyo kodgi, kendo gipuonjre luorae ngimagi duto. ’
Nusudo machiegni, mi uchung’ e tiend got.  Got newang’ gi mach matundo e polo, e mudho mandiwa gi rumbi kod ong’weng’omopoto.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye noloso kodu gie majno, muwinjo dwolmawuoyo, to ne ok uneno kit gimoro amora.  Dwol kende ema nuwinjo.
Nohulonu ratiro singruok ma koro notimo kodu, kochikou mondo uritsingruokno, tiende ni rito Chike Apar, mane ondiko kuom kite ariyomopamore.
To bende e sano Ruoth Nyasaye nochika ni mondo apuonju chikegi buche ma nyaka udhi urit e piny mudhi donjoe mondo ukauw. Osiem jo-Israel ni kik lam gik maket
"Chieng’ mane Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kodu Horeb gie mach, ne ok unenokit gimoro amora,
omiyo ritreuru matek ni kik udonj e richo mar losokido maket, bed ni en gima chal gi dichwo, kata gi dhako,
kata manamachal gi chiayo, kata gi winyo,
kata gi gima mol, kata gi rech.
Bende kung’iyo polo, muneno gik moko duto mantie, kaka chieng’ gi duekod sulue, to kik gimoro ywau mondo ukulrunigi kata ulamgi.  Gik makamago Ruoth Nyasaye osechiwo ni ogendini mamoko e piny duto ka gik magilamo.
To un e oganda ma Ruoth Nyasaye nokawo, mogolo Misri e sandmager ka mach makakni, ni mondo ubed joge owuon, kaka pod un nyaka chilkawuono.
To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nokecho koda nikech un, miokuong’ore ni ok nang’ad aora Jordan, kata donjo e piny maber ma omiyoumondo obed maruno.
An to nyaka atho e pinyni mak ang’ado Jordan, to unubiro dhi loka mondo ukaw piny maberno.
Ritreuru mondo une ni wiu okowil gi singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osetimo kodu.  Kik uloskido moro amora maket, kukethogo chik mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en mach matieko gik mowang’o, kendo enNyasaye ma janyiego.
"Ka usedak e pinyno aming’a munywolo nyithindu gi nyikwau, to bedurumotang’ mondo kik udonj e richo kuom loso kido moro amora maket.
Koroaluongo polo gi piny mondo obed janeno ni, ka timbeu obedo maricho enyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kamano, mokecho kodu, to unurum piyopiyo,kendo ok nudag aming’a e piny ma koro ung’ado Jordan mondo udhi ukaw, tonotieku chuth.
Ruoth Nyasaye noriembu, kendo nokeu e kind ogendinimamoko, mi nudong’ ji manok e kindgi.
Kuondego unulamie nyiseche molosgi yien kata gi kidi, ma ok nyal neno, kata winjo wach, kata chamogimoro.  Tik gimoro bende ok ginyal winjo.
To kudwaro Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu gi chunyu duto gi adiera kuonde moterouego, to unuyude.
Tomogik, ka gigi otimorenu, mi udonjo e masira, to unudog ir Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu, kendo unurit chikene.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu enNyasaye mang’won, omiyo ok nojwang’u, kata kethou ok nokethu, kendo wiyeok nowil gi singruok ma notimo gi kwereu kokuong’ore.
"Koro penjuru ane gima notimore e higni machon, ndalo mane pokonywolu, chakre kinde mane Nyasaye ochueyoe dhano e piny.  Bende penjuruane wach, chakre tung’ piny nyaka tung’ piny, ka gima duong’ kamanooseneye kata osewinjie.
Bende nitie oganda moro mosewinjo dwondNyasaye kawuoyo gie mach kaka usewinjo, to kendo pod ngima?
Koso nitieNyasaye moro mosetemo golo oganda moro kuom oganda machielo maneoselokogi wasumbni? Bende nyasaye moro osetimo timbe madongo gi ranyisikod honni, kokedo gi teko maduong’ kendo komiyo ji luoro kod kibaji? ToRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu notimonu gik ma kamago kogolou Misri manakuneno gi wang’u.
Mago duto Ruoth Nyasaye notimo mondo onyisu ni enNyasaye.  Onge Nyasaye moro mak mana en.
Ne oyienu winjo dwonde giepolo mondo opuonjugo, bende noyienu neno maye malich ei majno.
Noherokwereu, moyiero nyikwagi, omiyo en owuon nogolou Misri gi tekonemaduong’,
kendo noriembo ogendini madongo kendo mohewou gi teko, nimondo udonj e pinygi, kendo ukaw obed maru, kaka pod en nyaka chilkawuono.
Kuom mano koro beduru gi adiera, kendo ung’e ni Ruoth Nyasayeen Nyasaye, kendo onge nyasaye moro e polo kata e piny.
Emomiyo riturubuche kod chike Nyasaye ma amiyou kawuono.  Eka un kaachiel gi nyikwauunubed maber, kendo unudag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachumiyou mondo obed maru nyaka chieng’. "Miech tony man yo wuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan
Bang’e Musa noyiero mier adek e piny man yo wuokchieng’ mar aoraJordan,
mondo obed kuonde ma ka ng’ato oboth, monego wadgi ma yande okgimonrego, to onyalo pondoe.  Kochopo e achiel kuom miergo, to oresongimane.
Miergo ne: Bezer-e-thim manie piny gode motarore, manejo-Reuben nyalo pondoe, gi Ramoth-gilead manie piny Gilead, mane jo-Gadnyalo pondoe, kod Golan manie piny Bashan, mane jo-Manase bende nyalopondoe. Kinde mane Musa onwoyoe weche mag Chik
Koro magi e chike mane Musa omiyo jo-Israel.
Gin e chike gi buchemane Musa onyiso jo-Israel kane gisea Misri,
mi gichopo e piny man yowuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan e hoho momanyore gi Beth-peor e piny Sihonruodh Amor modak Heshbon.  Musa gi jo-Israel noloyo ruodhno kane giseaMisri,
mi ne gikawo pinye kaachiel gi piny Og ruodh Bashan.  Ruodhigone mag jo-Amor mane odak e piny man yo wuokchieng’ mar Jordan.
Pinynonochakore Aroer man e bath holo mar Arnon nyaka got Sirion, ma bendeiluongo ni Hermon,
