kaachiel gi piny pap duto man yo wuokchieng’ maraora Jordan, nyaka Nam Kado man e tik got Pisga. Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
. Rapar mar Chik
Chike Apar(Wuok
.
-
)
Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto mowachonigi niya, "Un jo-Israel winjuruchike kod buche ma awasecho kuwinjo kawuono ni.  Puonjreuru, kendo uritgimaber.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa notimo kodwa singruok Horeb.
Ne okotimo singruok gi kwerewa, to mana kodwa, waduto ma wan ka, ma podwangima.
Ruoth Nyasaye noloso kodu wang’ gi wang’ gie mach, ewi godno.
Chutho an nachung’ e kindu gi Ruoth Nyasaye e sechego, mondo eka akownuweche Ruoth Nyasaye nikech nuluoro mach, mi ne ok uidho godno. "Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya,
" ‘An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachun ma nogolou e piny Misri kuma neubedoe wasumbini.
" ‘Kik ubed gi Nyasaye moro mak mana an.
" ‘Kik ulos kido moro mopa kata gima chalo gi gimoro manie polo malokata manie piny mwalo kata mana manie pi mae bwo piny.
Kik ukulrunigi,kata lamogi kik ulamgi, nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu an Nyasayema janyiego.  Akumo nyithind joma ochaya nikech richo jonywolgi nyakatieng’ mar adek gi mar ang’wen,
to tienge gana gi gana mohera kendomomako chikena, ahero gi hera mosiko.
" ‘Kik uluong nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kayiem nono, nimaranakum ng’ato ka ng’ato mokonyore gi nyinga e yo ma ok kare.
" ‘Rituru chieng’ Sabato kendo uwale ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kaka RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu nochikou.
Nyaka uti tijeu duto kuom ndalo auchiel,
to chieng’ mar abiriyo en chieng’ yueyo mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu.  Chieng’no un, kaachiel gi yawuotu kod nyiu, kata wasumbumachwo gi mamon, kata ruethu kata kata kenjeu kata dhou, kata mana jodakmanie miechu kik ti tich moro.  Mano en ni mondo wasumbu machwo gi mamonoyue kaka un bende uyueyo.
Paruru malong’o ni un uwegi ne un wasumbnie piny Misri, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nogolou kuno gi teko mathothkod bat morie.  Mano emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nochikou ni mondourit Sabato.
" ‘Luor wuoru gi meru kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nochikou, ekamondo udag aming’a, kendo udhi maber e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachubiro miyou.
" ‘Kik ineki.
" ‘Kik iterri.
" ‘Kik ikwal.
" ‘Kik ihang ni ng’ato wach.
" ‘Kik igomb chi ng’ato kata od ng’ato kata puoth ng’ato kata misumbang’ato kata dher ng’ato kata kanj ng’ato, kata gimoro amora mar ng’ato. ’Luoro omako jo-Israel(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyou chikego ka uchokoru uduto e got.  Noloso gidwol maduong’ gie mach ei rumbi kod ong’weng’o mopoto, eka noweyo wuoyo. Bang’e nondiko chikego e kite ariyo mopamore, momiya.
Kane uwinjo dwolka wuok e mudho, to got wang’, jotend dhoutu gi jodongu nobiro ira,
mowachona niya, ‘Ne! Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa osenyisowa duong’nemaler gi tekone, kendo wasewinjo dwonde kawuok ei mach.  Omiyo korowang’eyo ni kara Nyasaye nyalo wuoyo gi dhano, mi dhano chak bed abedamangima.
To kata kamano, kik wawit ngimawa, nimar mach malich chanyalo mana wang’owa, mi tiekwa.  Kwachako wawinjo dwond Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa kendo, to wabiro tho,
nikech onge ng’at moro amora mosewinjodwond Nyasaye mangima kawuok e mach, kaka wasewinjo, to pod ngima.
Inema inyalo sudo machiegni mondo iwinj weche duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa dhi wacho.  Bang’e iduog iwachnwa gigo duto mowachoni, ekawanawinjgi, kendo wanamakgi. ’
"Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo gima nuwachona, mokona niya, ‘Asewinjo gima jiowachoni.  Gin kare.
Da ber ka gisiko gi chuny moluora kendo moritochikena duto, eka mondo gin gi nyikwagi gidag maber nyaka chieng’.
Dhiyo kendo iwachnigi mondo gidog e hembegi,
to in dong’ koda kamondo ahulni chike gi buche ma nyaka ipuonjgi girit e piny ma amiyogimondo gidagie. ’
"Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyou chikegi, omiyo ritgiuru maber.
Luwuru yo ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechikou, mak ubaro korachamkata korachwich.  Bang’e eka unubed maber kendo unudag aming’a e piny maudhi kawo. Rapar mar Chik
Chik maduong’ moloyo
"Koro magi e chike kod buche mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikamondo apuonju uriti e piny mubiro donjoe kendo kawo mondo obed maru.
Engimau duto un kaachiel gi nyikwau nyaka uluor Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo urit buchene gi chikene ma amiyou kawuono.  Bang’e ekaunudag maber aming’a.
Omiyo un jo-Israel winjuru kendo rituru chikegomondo udag maber kendo unya e piny maber kendo momewno, mana kaka RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nosingorenu.
"Winjuru un jo-Israel.  Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasachwa, en e Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo en kende e Nyasaye.
Heruru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi chunyuduto, gi parou duto, kendo gi tekou duto.
Chike ma amiyou kawuonogi,kanuru e chunyu,
kendo puonjgiuru nyithindu.  Bende twaguru kuomgi emier, kata kuwuotho e yo, kata kudhi nindo, kata kuchiew gokinyi.
Tuegiuru ka ranyisi e lwetu, kendo mien-giuru e lend wang’u ka kido,
bende ndikgiuru e sirni mag dhoutu kendo kuom rangeyeu. Osiem jo-Israel ni kik gitamre mako chik
"Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nokelu e piny mane osesingore ni kwereu maIbrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo ni nomiu.  En piny man gi mier mang’enymadongo miwuoro, mane ok ugero,
kod udi mopong’ gi kit gik moko dutomabeyo ma un ne ok uketoe.  En gi sokni mokuny e lwanda ma un ne okukunyo, kod puothe mag olemb mzabibu kod mag zeituni mane ok upidho. Kusechiemo, muyieng,
to kik wiu wil gi Ruoth Nyasaye mane ogolou epiny Misri, kuma ne ubedoe wasumbni.
Luoruru Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo utine.  Ka ukuong’oru to nyaka ukuong’ru mana gi nyinge.
Kik uluw nyiseche mag ogendini mokiewo kodu,
nikech kuluwogi, toRuoth Nyasaye modak e dieru biro kecho kodu ahinya mi dotieku e wang’piny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasaye ma janyiego.
"Kik utem Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kaka nuteme ka un Masa.
Nyakaurit malong’o chike Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kaachiel gi wechene kodbuchene moko mane omiyou.
Timuru gik makare kendo mabeyo e nyim RuothNyasaye, mondo udag maber mi udonj kendo ukaw opiny maber maneosesingore kokuong’ore ni kwereu
Obiro riembonu wasiku duto mondoowenu thuolo, kaka nosingore.
"To e ndalo mabiro ka yawuotu nopenju ni, ‘Weche gi buche kod chikemane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyou, tiendgi ang’o?’
To nudwokgi niya, ‘Ne wanwasumb Farao e piny Misri, to Ruoth Nyasaye nogolowa kuno gi tekomaduong’. ’
Kendo nosando piny Misri gi Farao kod joge duto, kokelonigimasiche madongo gi ranyisi kod honni, kaka ne waneno.
Nogolowa kunomondo oterwa e piny mane osesingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa.
RuothNyasaye nochikowa ni mondo warit chikegi duto, kendo ni mondo waluore. Eka dwadag maber ndalo duto, kendo domed ritowa.
Ka warito chikegiduto e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, to obiro kwanowa ka joma kare. "Rapar mar Chik
Jo-Israel onego obed joma owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oterou mondo ukaw piny ma ubirodhiyoeno, noriembnu ogendini abiriyo madongo kendo marateke moloyou, magin jo-Hiti, gi jo-Girgash gi jo-Amor gi jo-Kanaan gi jo-Perizi gijo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.
Kosechiwogi e lwetu kamano, muloyogi to nyakauneggi duto.  Kik utim kodgi winjruok, to bende kik uwe mak utiekogi,
Kik uyie yawuotgi okend nyiu, bende kik yawuotu kend nyigi,
nimarkutimo kamano, to nyigo nolok chuny yawuotu mondo kik lam Ruoth Nyasaye,to olam mana nyiseche mamoko.  Mano dimi Ruoth Nyasaye kech kodu, kendotieku piyopiyo.
Kuom mano, onego utimnigi mana kama: Mukuru kendegi magliswa, kendo kethuru sirni maggi milamo mag kite gi mag yien, mi uwang’kido mag nyisechegi manono,
nimar un joma owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu.  Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noyierou e kind ji duto mae pinymondo ubed ogandane moyiero.
"Uparo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noparou, moyierou nikech ung’enymoloyo ogendini mamoko duto koso? Ooyo, ka adier to un e oganda matiniemoloyo.
Noyierou mana nikech noherou, kendo nikech norito singruok maneotimo ni kwereu.  Mano emomiyo nogolou gi tekone maduong’ e piny maneunie wasumbini, moresou e lwet Farao ruodh Misri.
Omiyo koro ng’euru niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasaye.  En Nyasaye ma jaadiera kendomarito singruokne kuom tienge gana gi gana mag jii mohere kendo momakochikene, koherogi gi hera mosiko.
To jogo mochaye kendo ma ok ohere,otieko chuth piyopiyo ma ok odeko.
Nyaka umak chikene gi buchene maamiyou kawuononi, kendo uritgi. Gueth miyudo kimako chik(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
; Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
"Kuwinjo chikegi kendo uritogi, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu birorito singruok mane otimo gi kwereu, kendo obiro siko koherou.
Enoherukendo enogwedhu, mi enomi unya mathoth.  Enoguedhu gi nyithindo mang’enykod gik manyak e pwotheu, kaka ngano gi divai kod mo, kendo enoguedhu gijamni mang’eny e piny ma nosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu.
Unubed jomaogwedhi moloyo ogendini mamoko duto.  Ok nobedie bwoch kata lur kuom joukata kuom jambu.
Ruoth Nyasaye notiek tuoche duto kuomu bende oknokelnu tuoche maricho mane goyou e piny Misri, to wasiku ema nokelnetuochego.
Tiekuru ji duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro chiwo elwetu.  Kik uwegi, to bende kik ulam nyisechegi, nikech kutimo kamano, tomano dibednu obadho.
"Dipo ka uwacho niya, ‘Ogendinigi ng’eny mohingowa.  Ere kakadwariembgi?’
Kata kamano kik uluorgi, to paruru gik ma Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu notimo ni Farao kendo ni piny Misri ngima.
Paruru timbemadongo mane uneno gi wang’u kod ranyisi gi honni kaachiel gi tekomaduong’ mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ogolougo Misri gi bat morie. Kamano e kaka obiro timo ni ogendini duto muluorogo.
Bende obiromiyogi kihondko, mondo otiek joma pod odong’, kata mago mopondo kamoroamora.
Kik luoro maku kukedo kodgi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,ma en Nyasaye maduong’ kendo malich ni kodu.
Obiro riembonu ogendinigomatintin nyaka girum.  Ok unutiekgi dichiel, nimar dipo ka ondiegionywolore mang’eny, mothagou.
To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nochiwogendinigo e lwetu, kendo ok nowenigi thuolo nyaka chop girum te.
Enochiw ruodhi mag ogedinigo e lwetu, mi unumi kargi lal chuth, kendoonge kata ng’at achiel kuomgi ma nosiru, to unutiekgi pep.
Nyakauwang’ kido mag nyisechego manono, kendo kik ugomb fedha gi dhahabu magibawogo nyisechegigo, bende kik ukawgi.  Kutimo kamano, to enobednuobadho, nimar gigo gin gik makuero e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Kik ukel gimoro amora makuero e miechu, nikech kutimo kamano, to unbende unubed joma okwedi.  Nyaka ubed mosin kod gik ma kamago, kendoukwan-gi ka gik makuero, nikech gin gik ma nyaka utiek, marum chuth. Rapar mar Chik
Piny maber ma jo-Israel biro kawo
"Nyaka urit chike duto ma amiyou kawuononi, mondo ubed mangima, miunya, kendo udonj e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni nomi kwereu,odagie.
Paruru wuoth mabor mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu otelonue kuomhigni piero ang’wen ka un e thim.  Nodwokou piny kotemougo, mondo ong’eane ka unyalo rito chikene adier.
Nodwokou piny, kendo nomiyo kechokayou, eka bang’e nomiyou manna mondo ucham.  En chiemo mane pok uneno,kendo kwereu bende ne ok oneno.  Notimo kamano mondo onyisugo ni dhano okbed mangima nikech chiemo kende, to obedo mangima gi weche duto mawuok edho Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kuom higni piero ang’wen go duto, lepu ne ok oti,kata tiendu ne ok okuot.
To nyaka ung’e ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nerieyou mondo opuonju mana kaka ng’ato puonjo nyathine.
Rituru chikeRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mondo uwuoth e yorene, kendo umiye duong’,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu terou e piny maber, motimo aore gisokni, kendo man gi kuonde ma pi wuokie ewi gode kendo e holni.
En pinymachiego cham kaka ngano gi shairi, kendo machiego mzabibu gi ng’owo gizeituni kod olembe mamoko, bende ma mor kich ng’enyie.
En piny maunubedie gi chiemo mang’eny, kendo onge gima unuchandie.  Bende en pinyman gi kite miloso nyinyo.  Mula bende unyalo kunyo e godene.
Kusebedogi chiemo mang’eny, moromou, to pakuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuompiny maber mosemiyouno. Osiem jo-Israel ni kik wi Nyasaye
"Kik wiu wil gi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo kik uwe rito chikenegi buchene ma amiyou kawuononi.
Kusebedo gi chiemo mang’eny moromou,kendo usegero udi mabeyo mudakie,
mi jambu gi fethu gi dhahapu kodmwanduu duto omedore,
to kik ubed josunga, mi wiu wil gi Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu mane ogolou Misri kuma nubedoe wasumbni,
nimar notelonu ethim maduong’ kendo malich, kuma otwo ma onge pi, kendo ma thuonde mangi kwiri maricho kod thomoni opong’o.  En ema nomiyo pi owuoknu e lwandamotegno,
bende nomiyou manna mane kwereu pok ong’eyo mondo ucham ethim.  Notimo kamano mondo odwokugo piny, kotemou, eka bang’e ogwedhu.
Emomiyo kik uwach ni tekou gi riekou ema osemiyo uyudo mwandugo,
toparuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, nimar en ema omiyou teko mar yudomwandu.  Kamano ochopo singruok mane omiyo kwereu, kokuong’ore.
"To kapo ni wiu owil gi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, muluwo nyisechemamoko, mi ulamogi kendo ukulorunigi, to akuong’ora kawuono ni natiekuma onge kiawa.
Adier, ka ok uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, tonotieku mana kaka ogendini ma obiro tieko ka odonjo e pinyni. Rapar mar Chik
Ruoth Nyasaye biro tieko ogendini modak e piny Kanaan
"Winjuru un jo-Isarel.  Kawuono ubiro ng’ado Jordan mondo udhi ukaw pinyogendini marateke kendo madongo moloyou, kaachiel gi mier mochiel giohinga mochopo e polo.
Gin joma dongo kendo maboyo ma nyikwa Anakim,kaka ung’eyo, nimar usewinjo ka iwacho niya, ‘Ere joma nyalo siro nyikwaAnakim?’
To ubiro ng’eyo kawuono ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu emaotelonu kachalo mach matieko gik mowang’o.  Obiro tiekogi en owuon, kendoobiro loyonugi.  Kuom mano, ubiro riembogi kendo tiekogi piyopiyo, manakaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosingorenu.
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu riembo jogo mondo owenu thuolo, to kikuwach ni timbeu mabeyo ema osemiyo Ruoth Nyasaye okelou e pinyni.
Oktimbeu mabeyo kata dimbruok ma un-go ema omiyo ubiro donjo e piny jogomondo ukaw, to en mana nikech richo mag ogendinigo emomiyo Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu riembogi mondo giwenu thuolo, kochopogo singruok ma notimogi kwereu ma Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo.
Kuom mano koro ng’euru niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ok miu piny momewni nikech timbeu mabeyo,nimar ka adier, to un joma tokgi tek. Jo-Israel ong’anyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka gin Horeb(Wuok
.
—
.
)
"Paruru ma wiu ok owil kaka numiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mirima ethim, chakre chieng’ ma ne uwuokie Misri nyaka chieng’ mane uchopoe ka,usebedo kutamoru winjo Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nukwinye e got Horeb, mokechokodu, kendo odwaro tiekou.
Noyudo ka asedhi ewi got mondo akaw kitemopamore mag singruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye otimo kodu, mi ne abet ewi gotkuno kuom ndalo piero ang’wen, odiechieng’ gotieno, ka ok achiem kata okamadh gimoro.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiya kite ariyo mopamore, mondik gilith lwete.  Weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye owachonu gie mach ewi gotchieng’ chokruok, ondiki e kitego.
Kane ndalo piero ang’wen-go orumo,Ruoth Nyasaye nomiya kite ariyo mopamore mag singruokgo,
kowachonaniya, ‘Lor piny piyopiyo ia e got, nikech jou mane igolo Misri osetimomarach.  Piyopiyo nono, giseweyo yo mane achikogi ni mondo giluw, migiloso kido mar dhahabu moleny mondo gilam. ’
"Bang’ mano Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Aserango jogi, ma ayudo nigin joma tokgi tek.
We mondo atiekgi, kendo ami nyinggi olal e pinyduto.  Bang’e anamiyi doko oganda maratego kendo maduong’ moloyogi. ’
Kamano nawichora mi alor piny kaa ewi got mane oyudo wang’, ka ating’okite mopamore mag singruok e lweta.
Naneno ni useketho e nyim RuothNyasaye kuom loso kido mar nyaroya gi dhahabu moleny, kendo ni piyopiyonono, useweyo yo mane Ruoth Nyasaye ochikou mondo uluw.
Omiyo nakawokite ariyo mopamorego, mawito piny gi lwetena ariyo, mi ne ging’inyorematindotindo e nyimu.
Eka nariera piny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalopiero ang’wen odiechieng gotieno, kaka nasetimo e kinde mokwongo, miariyo kech ka ok achiem kata ok amadh gimoro, nikech richo duto maneusetimo kuketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kumiye mirima.
Naluoromirima mager mar Ruoth Nyasaye mane chiegni tiekou, to Ruoth Nyasayenochako owinjo ywakna.
Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho gi Harun ahinya, kendonodwaro tieke, to e sano en bende ne alemone.
Eka nakawo gimanukethogo, ma en kido mar nyaroya mane uloso, mi awang’o e mach.  Neatoye matindotindo mi arege, molokore buru, kendo nakawo buruno makiro eaora mamol koa e got.
"Bende numiyo Ruoth Nyasaye mirima ka un Tabera gi Masa kodKibroth-hataava,
kendo kane un Kadesh-barnea, Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nowacho ni mondo udhi ukaw piny momiyou, to nudagi winjowachne, kendo ne ok ugeno kuome, bende ne ok urito chikne.
Usebedokudagi Ruoth Nyasaye chakre chieng’ mokwongo mane ang’eyoue.
"Nariera piny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo piero ang’wen,odiechieng’ gotieno nimar nosewacho ni odwaro tiekou.
Nalamo RuothNyasaye kakwaye niya, ‘A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ruodha, kik itiek jogi, nimargin mwanduni mane iwaro gi tekoni maduong’, mi igolo Misri gi batmotegno.
Par jotichni ma Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo, kendo kik idewwich teko gi kethruok kod richo mag jogi,
nikech ka ok kamano to wegpiny mane igolowae biro wacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osetero joge e thimmondo otho kuno, nikech osin kodgi, kendo nikech ok onyal terogi e pinymane osesingore ni nomigi. "
To Ruoth Nyasaye, jogo gin jogi kendomwanduni iwuom mane igolo e piny Misri gi tekoni maduong’ kod batmorie. ’Rapar mar Chik
Kite ariyo mamoko(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Pa kite ariyo machal gi mane igoyo pinymobarore kande, mondo ibigo ira ewi got.  Bende los sanduk mar bao.
Weche mane andiko kuom kite mokwongo mane ibaro kande ema abiro ndikokuom kitego, kendo iniketgi e sandugno. ’
Kuom mano, naloso sanduk giyiend shita, kendo napayo kite ariyo machal gi mokwongo ka, mi adhi ewigot kating’o kite ariyogo e lweta.
Ruoth Nyasaye nondiko kuom kitegochike apar mane osewachonu gie mach ewi got chieng’ chokruok, mana kakanosendiko e kite mokwongo ka, mi nomiyagi.
Eka nadwogo iru kaa ewi got,mi aketo kitego ei sanduk mane aloso, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochika, kendogisebedo kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
"Jo-Israel noa e gweng’ sokni mag jo-Jaakan, mi giwuotho matintin kagidhi Mosera.  Eka Harun notho, moyike kuno, mi Eleazar wuode, nodokojadolo kare.
Ne gia kuno, mi gidhi Gudgoda.  Eka ne gia Gudgoda, migidhi Jotbatha, piny motimo aore.
"E kindego Ruoth Nyasaye nowalo jo dhood Lawi mondo obed joting’Sandug Muma mare, kendo obed jodolo mage, ka giguedho ji e nyinge, manakaka pod gitimo nyaka chil kawuono.
Mano emomiyo jo-Lawi onge gi pinymopognigi ka mwandugi, kaka opog ni dhout Israel mamoko.  Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu owuon e mwandugi, mana kaka nosesingorenigi.
"Nabet ewi got kuom ndalo piero ang’wen odiechieng’ gotieno, manakaka nasetimo mokwongo, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owinjo kwayona moyie niok obi tiekou.
Nowachona niya, ‘Chak wuoth kitelo ni ji, mondo gidhigikaw piny mane asingora ni nami kweregi. ’Gik ma Nyasaye dwaro kuom joge
"Koro un jo-Israel, ang’o ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro kuomu?Donge odwaro mana ni mondo uluore kendo uwuoth e yorene duto, kuherekendo kutiyone gi chunyu duto?
Ubiro timo kamano kurito chikene gibuchene duto, ma amiyou kawuono mondo okonyu.
Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu e wuon polo duto, kata polo man malo manadi, kaachiel gi pinybende kod gik moko duto manie iye.
To kata kamano, Ruoth Nyasaye nepod rito kwereu nikech noherogi, mi bang’gi noyiero mana un nyikwagikuom ogendini moko duto mondo ubed joge, kaka pod ubet nyaka chilkawuono.
Kuom mano, koro nyaka uyie mako singruok gi chunyu duto,kendo kik umed bedo joma tokgi tek,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu enNyasaye moloyo nyiseche duto, kendo Ruoth moloyo ruodhi duto.  En Nyasayemaduong’ kendo malich miwuoro.  En kende e Nyasaye miluoro, ma ok dewwang’ ng’ato, kendo ma ok cham asoya.
To ong’ado bura kare ni mondliete, kendo ni nyithi kiye.  Ohero jodak, kendo omiyogi chiemo gi lewni.
Omiyo un bende onego uher jodak man kuomu, nimar un bende ne un jodake piny Misri.
Nyaka uluor Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo ulame gichunyu duto, bende kukuong’oru mana gi nyinge.
En ema nyaka upake,nimar en Nyasachu mosetimonu timbe madongo kendo malich, ma useneno giwang’u.
Kane kwereu odhi Misri, ne gin mana ji piero abiriyo kende, tokoro Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo unya ka sulue mae polo. Rapar mar Chik
Duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye
"Heruru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo nyaka urit chikene gi buchenendalo duto.
Kawuono paruru puonj mane uyudo kuom Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, nimar, kata obedo ni nyithindu pok oneno kata pok ong’eyopuonjno, un to ung’eye.  Bende paruru duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye gi tekonekod bade morie,
gi ranyisi kod timbe mane otimo e piny Misri, kosandogoFarao kaachiel gi pinye duto.
Donge nuneno gima notimo gi jolwenj Misrigi faresegi kod gechegi? Kane oyudo gilawou, nomiyo pi Nam Makwaroimogi, motiekogi pep.
Bende paruru gik mane otimonu e thim nyakanuchopo kaeri,
kod gima notimo ni Dathan kod Abiram, yawuot Eliab maja-Reuben, kendo kaka piny nong’amo dhoge momwonyogi kaachiel gi joodgigi hembegi kod ji duto mane gin-go, mana ka jo-Israel duto neno.
Unuwegi useneno timbe madongo kendo malich ma Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo. Gueth ma jo-Israel biro yudo e piny Kanaan
"Nyaka urit chike duto ma amiyou kawuono, mondo ubed gi teko kendo ukawpiny ma ubiro donjeno.
Kamano unudag aming’a e piny maber kendo momewmane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni nomi kwereu gi nyikwagi.
Piny ma ubirodonjoe mondo udagieno ok chal gi piny Misri kuma ne uaye, nimar kunokane usechwoyoe cham, to bang’e nusombo pi uole, mana kaka itimo nipuoth alot.
To piny ma udonjoe mondo udagieno en piny motimo gode giholni, kendo en piny koth.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu rito pinynomaber, kendo orange pile pile e higa ngima.
Omiyo kurito chike maamiyou kawuonogi, mi uhero Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo utiyone gichunyu duto,
to enokelnu koth e ndalo chwiri gi ndalo opon, mondo uyudcham gi mzabibu kod mo.
Enomi lum lodhi e legeu mondo jambu ocham,kendo un bende unuyud chiemo moromou.
To ritreuru mondo kik ulal, miuti ni nyiseche ma moko kendo ulamgi.
Kutimo kamano, to mirimb RuothNyasaye noliel kuomu ka mach, mi enomi koth rum.  Piny ok nochieg cham,kendo karu nolal nono piyopiyo e piny momew ma Ruoth Nyasaye nomiuno.
Kanuru wechegi e chunyu, kutueyogi ka ranyisi e lwetu, kendo kuketogie lend wengeu ka kido.
Puonjuru nyithindu wechegi kendo twaguru kuomgika un e mier, kata kuwuotho e yo, kata kudhi nindo, kata kuchiew.
Ndikgiuru e sirni mag dhoutu, kendo kuom rangeyeu,
mondo un ginyithindu udag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye nosingore ni nomi kwereuobed maru nyaka chieng’.
"Ka urito chike ma amiyougi adimba, mi uhero Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo uwuotho e yorene duto, kuketo chunyu kuome,
to obiroriembonu ogendinigo mondo owenu thuolo, mi unukaw pinje mag ogendinimadongo kendo marateke moloyou.
Kamano kamoro amora ma tiendu onyononobed maru, kendo mbap pinyu nochakre e thim yo milambo nyaka pinyLebanon yo nyandwat, kendo chakre aora Yufrate yo wuok chieng’ nyaka namMediterania yo podho chieng’.
Onge kata ng’ato achiel ma nonyal sirou,kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nomi ji luorou, mi kibaji nogogi kuondeduto mudhiye, mana kaka nosingorenu.
Kawuono aketo gueth kod kuong’ enyimu.
Ka urito chike mag Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma amiyou kawuono,to ubiro yudo gueth.
To ka ok uritogi, mi ubaro kuweyo yo ma asechikoukawuono mondo uluw, mulamo nyiseche mamoko ma ok ung’eyo, to ubiro yudokuong’.
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseterou e piny mudhiye mondo ukaw obedmaru, to uhul weche gueth e got Gerizim, to weche mag kuong’ uhul e gotEbal.
Godego ni yo podho chieng’ mar aora Jordan, kama omanyore giGilgal, but yadh More, e yo mochiko piny jo-Kanaan.
Koro uchiegning’ado aora Jordan mondo udonj e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyoumondo ukaw obed maru.  To ka usekawe, mudakie,
to nyaka une ni uritochike gi buche ma amiyou kawuononi. yasachu osetieko ogendini ma udonjo e pinygi, mi ukawo kargi, kendo udake pinyno,
to beduru kutang’ mondo kik uluw timbegi, nono to gilokorenuobadho.  Ka osetiekgi, mi giweyonu thuolo kamano, to kik upenjru ni, ‘Ereyo mane ogendinigi lamoe nyisechegi? Mondo wan bende watim mana machalkamano kamano. ’
Kik ulam Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kaka gilamonyisechegi, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye mon gi timbe makuero ma gilamogonyisechegi, nimar gise kata mana wang’o ni nyisechegigo yawuotgi ginyigi ka misango.
"Neuru ni urito gik moko duto machikou.  Kik umediegimoro, kata kik ugolie gimoro. Rapar mar Chik
"Ka jakor wach kata jalek moro ohonore e kindu, mokoro ni ranyisi katahono moro biro timore,
mi ranyisi kata hono mowuoyeno otimore, kendobang’e owachonu ni mondo udhi uluw nyiseche mamoko ma ok ung’eyo, kendoulam,
to kik uwinj wachne.  Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu temou mondo ong’eane kuhere gi chunyu duto.
Luwuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kumiyeduong’ kendo kurito chikene.  Winjuru gima owacho, kendo lameuru kupadorukuome.
To nyaka neg jakor wachno kata jalekno, nimar osewuoyo marachkodwaro ni mondo utamru winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu maneoresou, kagolou Misri, kama nubedoe wasumbni.  Ng’atno osetemo witoumondo uwe yo mane Ruoith Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikou mondo uluw.  Kunegekamano, eka unugol richo ma kama kuomu.
"Ka owadu hie kata wuodi kata nyari kata chiegi mihero, kata manaosiepni migeno osemi ling’ling’ kawachoni ni mondo idhi ilam nyisechemamoko ma in ok ing’eyo kata ma kwereni bende ne ok ong’eyo,
ma ginnyiseche mag ogendini moluorou, bed ni gin mabor kata machiegni,
to kikiyie, kata mana winjo wachne kik iwinji, nyaka inege anega mak iweyekata ikeche kata ichwake.
In ema nyaka ikwong keto lweti kuome, ekabang’e jou duto nokonyi nege.
Unugoye gi kite nyaka otho, nimar notemohoyou mondo uwe Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou Misri kuma nubedoewasumbni.
Jo-Israel duto nowinj wachno, mi ginidok, maluor, kendo gimarach makamano ok nochak otimre kuomu.
"Kuwinjo ni joweteu ma acheje osehoyo joma odak e dala moro ma RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou mondo udagie,
ka giwachonigi ni mondogidhi gilam nyiseche mamoko ma un ok ung’eyo,
to nonuru wachno matut. Koyud ni gima kuero kamano osetimore kuomu adier,
to nyaka uneg jomaodak e dalano duto kaachiel gi dhok, kendo uketh chuth gik moko dutomanie dalano.
Nyaka uchok mwandu duto mag dalano kanyakla, kendo ukete laru manie dier dalano.  Eka uwang’ dala duto, kaachioel gi gik mokoduto manie iye ka misango miwang’o pep ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Dalano ok noger kendo, to nodong’ gunda nyaka chieng’.
To kik ukawgimoro kata achiel kuom gik monego keth chuthgo, eka mirima mager marRuoth Nyasaye norum, mi notimnu ng’wono kendo nomi unya kaka nosingoreni kwereu.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro timo kamano kuwinjo dwonde,kendo urito chikene ma amiyou kawuono, kendo kutimo gik malongo e nyime. Rapar mar Chik
Kit ywak ma Ruoth Nyasaye ok dwar
"Un e nyithind Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, omiyo kik usar dendu katakik uliel nyiem wengeu kuywago ng’at motho,
nikech un joma ler mowal niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Ruoth Nyasaye noyierou kuom ogendini dutomanie piny mondo ubed joge owuon. Le ma jo-Israel nyalo chamo gi mago makuergi(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"Kik ucham gimoro makuero.
To jamni gi le munyalo chamo e magi:Dhiang’ gi rombo gi diel
gi nyakech gi ogunde gi ngawo gi diend thim gipuro gi omoro kod nyambaja.
Unyalo chamo kit jamni gi kit le duto maombong’gi opogore ariyo, kendo ma nyamo kambula.
To mak mana ni kikucham mago ma nyamo kambula, to ombong’gi ok opogore ariyo, kata mago maombong’gi opogore ariyo to ok nyam kambula kaka ngamia gi apuoyo kodterere.  Mago nyamo kambula to ombong’giu ok opogore, omiyo nyakaukwan-gi ka gik makuero.
Mbidhi bende kik ucham, nikech kata ombong’neopogore kamano, to ok onyam kambula omiyo en gima kuero.  Kik ucham legokata mulogi kik umulgi ka gisetho.
"Unyalo chamo rech duto man gi thuokgi kata man gi kagahla,
to kikucham rech moro amora maonge gi gigo, nimar ka en kamano to en gimakuero.
"Unyalo chamo winy duto ma ok kuero,
to mago ma kuero ma kik ucham emagi: Ongo gi koga gi kwasi
gi kalamindi gi okunekune gi otenga giwiny machal kamago,
kod kit agak duto,
gi udo gi nyatawo gi okok kodkit olith duto,
gi tula matin gi tula maduong’ kod tula ma ite dongo,
gi mbusi gi achuth gi osou
kod nyamnaha gi kit ng’ang’a duto gicherwa kod oliktik.
Gik mahuyo mang’eny kanyakla gin gik makuero,omiyo kik uchamgi.
To unyalo chamo gik mahuyo ma ok kuero.
Kik uchamgima otho kende, nimar un joma ler mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Gima kamano unyalo miyo jopinje mamoko modak kodu mondo ocham, kataunyalo ng’iewe gi jopinje mamoko. "Kutedo nyadiel, to kik uolie cha min mare. Chike mag chiwo mar achiel kuom apar
"Higa ka higa nyaka uket tenge achiel kuom apar mag gik moko dutomonyak e puotheu, kaka cham gi divai gi mo, kaachiel gi nyithind jambuduto mokwong nywol.
Chamgiuru e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kamaobiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.  Kamano ubiro puonjoru luoro RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu ndalo duto.
To ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuoseguedhou gii gik mang’eny, kendo ng’atu moro odak mabor gi kama RuothNyasaye biro yierono, ma ok onyal ting’o gigo motundgo kuno,
to onyalolokogo pesa, moter kuno.
Kosetundo kuno, to onyalo ng’iewo gima oherogi pesago, bed ni en ring dhiang’ kata ring rombo, divai kata kong’o. Unuchiem kuno gi joodu kumor e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Todhiuru gi jo-Lawi modak kodu, ni mar dhood Lawi ok opogne piny kakaopognu.
"To bang’ higni adek ka higni adek, keluru achiel kuom apar mag gikmonyaknu e higano, kendo uket e dhorangeyeu,
mondo jo-Lawi ma onge gipiny mopognigi, kod jopinje mamoko, gi nyithindo ma kiye kod mond lietemodak kodu oyud chiemo moromogi.  Kutimo kamano, to Nyasaye noguedh gikmoko duto mutimo. Rapar mar Chik
Higa miweyoe gope
"Bang’ higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo nyaka uwe gopeu duto ma ji nigo.
Unuwegi kama: Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka we gope ma ja-Israel owadgioseholo kuome.  Ok nochune mondo ochul, nikech higa ma Ruoth Nyasayeoketo mondo oweyee gope osechopo.
Jo pinje mamoko to unyalo chuno mondoochul gope ma gin-go, to gopeu ma jo-Israel weteu nigo nyaka uwenigi.
,
To kuluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo urito chikene ma amiyougi,to jochan ok nobedie kuomu, e piny ma omiyou mondo obed mwanduu, toRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhu ahinya.
Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuoseguedhou kaka nosingore ni notim, ji moa e pinje mang’eny biro hologik moko kuomu, to un ok nuhol gimoro kuomgi.  Pinje mang’eny nobed e bwolochu, to un ok nubed e bwo lochgi.
"Kapo ni nitie jo-Israel weteu moko ma jochan e dalau moro e piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou, to kik iu bed makwar, mutamrukonyogi,
to ubednigi mang’won, mi uholgi gimoro amora ma gichando.
Kata dabed ni higa mar abiriyo miweyoe gope chiegni chopo, to kik ubedgi ich lit, mutamru miyogi gimoro.  Jogo diywag ni Ruoth Nyasaye, midubed joricho.
Nyaka umigi gik ma gidwarogo mabup, kendo gi chunymaler.  Kutimo kamano to Ruoth Nyasaye biro guedhou kuom gik moko dutomutimo.
Pile ubiro bedo gi jochan e pinyu, mano emomiyo achikou nimondo ubed mang’won ni jo-Israel weteu ma jochan kata manie chandruok. Chike mag rito wasumbni(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ka ing’iewo ja-Hibrania wadu ma dichwo kata ma dhako mondo obedmisumbani, enotini kuom higni auchiel, to e higa mar abiriyo nyaka iweyeodhi.
To kik iweye odhi gi lwete nono,
mak ikowe mabup gi jamni kodcham gi divai.  Bed ne mang’won, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuosebedoni mang’won.
Paruru ni ne un wasumbni e piny Misri, to RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu noresou.  Mano emomiyo amiyou chikni.
To kamisumbanino ohero dak kodi, mi owacho ni ok odwar weyo dalani, nikechoheri kaachiel gi joodi,
to ikaw riw, ituchgo ite, kitenoe dhoot, ekanobed misumbani kuom ngimane duto.  Chikno oriwo koda ka misumba ma dhakobende.
"To kapo ni iweyo ni misumba thuolo odhi, to onge gima inyalo ywago,nimar ka dine indiko jatich, to dine ichulo msara nyadiriyo moloyo ting’mane ikawo kirito misumbano.  Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhgik moko duto mitimo. Chike mag walo jamni makayo
"Waluru kach jambu machwo duto ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Kik uketruedhi ma jou okuongo nywolo e tich, bende kik ung’ad yie imbe ma rombuokuongo nywolo,
to giga ka giga nyaka utergi kuma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu biro yiero, mondo uchamgi kaachiel gi jouteu e nyim RuothNyasaye kuno.
To ka chiayo moro nigi songa, kata ka osuto, kata ka enmuofu kata ka en gi mbala moro marach manade, to kik timgo misango niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Unyalo chame e miechu.  Joma ogak kaachielgi joma ok ogak nyalo chamo ring’ono mana ka gima en ring ogunde kataring mwanda.
Remo to kik ucham, to oleuru piny mana ka pi. Rapar mar Chik
Sewniu adek madongo(Wuok
.
-
;
.
-
)
"Nyaka utim Sap Pasaka e due mar Abib, nimar dueno ema ne RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu ogolou e Misri gotieno.
Nyaka uneg nyarombo katanyadiel kata nyaroya kutimogo misango mar Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.
Kik ucham sawono gimakati moketie thowi, to kuom ndalo abiriyo unucham mana makati ma okketie thowi, ma en ranyisi mar sandruoku, nikech nuwuok Misri kurikni. Mano nobednu rapar mochwere muparogo chieng’ mane uwuokie Misri.
Kikubed gi thowi kamoro amora e pinyu kuom ndalo abiriyogo, to bende ringchiayo muyang’o godhiambo e odiechieng’ mokwongo mar sawo kik nind nyakaokinyi mak uwang’o pep.
Kik uyang’ jamni mag Pasaka e mier ma RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro miyou,
to mak mana kama obiro yiero mondonyinge obedie.  Nyaka uyang’gi godhiambo ka chieng’ podho, e sa maneuwuokie Misri.
Nyaka uted ringgi kendo ucham kama Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu biro yiero, to kinyne nyaka udog e miechu.
Chamuru makati maok ketie thowi kuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka ubed gichokruok kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro, kendo kik uti tich moroamora chieng’no.
"Kwanuru jumbe abiriyo, chakre ndalo michako kayoe cham.
Bang’jumbego nyaka utim Sap Jumbe kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro kukelochiwo ma ng’ato golo kuom dwarone, maromre gi gueth ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu guedhougo.
Un kaachiel gi yawuotu kod nyiu, gi wasumbu machwokod mamon, gi jo-Lawi modak e miechu gi jopinje mamoko gi nyithindo makiye kod mond liete modak kodu, nubed mamor e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.
Paruru ni ne unwasumbni e piny Misri.  Mano emomiyo nyaka une ni urito chikego.
"Kusetieko kayo ngano kendo pono mzabibu, to nyaka utim Sap Kichekuom ndalo abiriyo.
Unutim sawono gi mor, kaachiel gi yawuotu gi nyiukod wasumbu machwo gi mamon gi jo-Lawi kod jopinje mamoko gi nyithi kiyekod mond liete modak kodu.
Nyaka utime ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachukaka obiro yiero, nimar unubed mamor ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuoguedho gik monyak e puotheu kod gik moko duto mutimo.
"Jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye didek e higa ka higa,mondo otim sewni adekgo kama Ruoth Nyasaye biro yiero.  Gin Sap Makati maok ketie Thowi, gi Sap Jumbe, kod Sap Kiche.  Onge ng’at ma nobi e nyimNyasaye gi lwete nono.
To ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka kel gima romre gigueth ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseguedhego. Chike mag ndalo bura
"Unuyier jang’ad bura kod jotend dhoutu e mier duto ma Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu biro miyou, kendo nyaka ging’ad ni ji bura kare.
Kikung’ad buch amwor kata buch nyakonchiel, to bende kik ucham asoya, nimarasoya mono kata mana ng’at mariek wacho adiera, kendo wito buch ng’at maonge ketho.
Nyaka une ni uluwo mana adiera kende.  Kutimo kamano, tounudag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou.
"Kik upidh yath moro amora milamo but kendo-mar-misango, mubiro geroni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,
kata kik uchung siro milamo, nimar gingik ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ok dwar. Rapar mar Chik
"Kik utim misango ni Ruothn Nyasachu gi rwath kata rombo kata diel mangi mbala kata songa, nikech gima kamano en kuero e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kapo ni unwang’o ng’at ma dichwo e dala moro amora ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu biro miyou, kotimo gima rach e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi okethosingruok kendo odagi chikna,
kolamo kendo okulore ni nyiseche mamoko,kata ni wang’chieng kata ni due kata ni gimoro amora manie kor polo,
tonyaka unon wachno maber.  Ka ofweny malong’o ni gima rach kamanoosetimore adier e Israel,
to nyaka ukel ng’at motimo kamano e dhorangadala, mi ugoye gi kite nyaka otho, kata da bed ni en dhako kata endichwo.
Kik ung’ad ni ng’ato buch tho ka nitie mana janeno achielkende, to unyalo ng’adone buch tho mana ka nitie joneno ariyo kata adek.
Joneno ema nyaka kwong goyo ng’at ma kamano gi kite, eka ji duto bendenogoye.  Kamano e kaka unupwodhru kuom richo ma kamano.
"Kapo ni unwang’o buche matek ma ok unyal ng’ado, to nyaka udhipiyopiyo kama Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro yiero.  Buchego nyalo betmag nek, kata mag laro gimoro kata mag gorruok.
Unudhi ir jodolo majo-Lawi man kuno, kendo ir jang’ad bura muyudo ka nie tich kuno, mondounyisgi wachno, kendo gin ema gining’ad bura.
Gima giwachonu kamaRuoth Nyasaye biro yierono ema nyaka utim.
Nyaka une ni utimo manakaka giwachonu, ma ok uweyo kata matin.
Ng’ato ang’ata modagi wachjadolo matiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kanyo, kata modagi wachjang’ad bura, nyaka negi.  Kamano e kaka unupwodh jo-Israel kuom richo makamano.
Kutimo kamano, to ji duto nowinj wachno, mi ginibed maluor,kendo onge ng’at ma nochak otim wichteko. Chike mag tich ruoth
"Ka usedonjo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou mondoukaw, udagie, mi uparo ni mondo uket ruoth oritu kaka ogendini dutomoluorou timo,
to nyaka uket mana ng’at ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachunoyiernu.  Ng’at ma uketo ruothno nyaka bed mana ja-Israel wadu, to kikuket ng’at ma ok ja-Israel.
Kik ruodhno bed gi farese mang’eny, tobende kik oor jo-Israel Misri mondo oomne farese moko ni eka omed bedogi farese mang’eny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nokwerou ni kik udog kuno kendongang.
Kik obed gi mon mathoth, nikech mano dipo koketho parone, tomwandu bende kik obedgo mang’eny.
Kosekete ruoth, to nyaka ondik wecheduto mag chik, kogologi e kitap chik ma jadolo ma jo-Lawi nigo.
Nyakaobed gi kitabuno, kendo nyaka osome pile e ndalo duto mag ngimane, mondoopuonjrego luoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, korito chike gi buchegoduto.
Kotimo kamano, to ok nosungre ni jowadgi, kendo ok nowe makorito chikego kata matin.  Bang’e en kaachiel gi nyikwaye ginibed ruodhimag Israel aming’a. Rapar mar Chik
Pok ma jodolo gi jo-Lawi yudo
"Jodolo ma jo-Lawi, tiende ni dhood Lawi duto, ok noyud pinygi giwegikaka dhout Israel mamoko.  Ginibed ka giyudo pokgi mana kuom misengnimotim ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kuom dir mwandu muchiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kaka ok giniyud piny mopognigi ka mwandugi, Ruoth Nyasaye owuon emanobed mwandugi kaka nosingore.
Ka ji timo misango gi rwath kata girombo kata gi diel, to nyaka gimi jadolo bat gi lem duto kod chino kakalembgi.
Bende nyaka umigi cham mukwongo kayo gi divai mukwongo loso, gimor zeituni mokwongo nyak, kaachiel gi yie rombu mukwongo ng’ado,
nimarRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyierogi kuom dhoutu duto mondo gin kaachielgi nyikwagi giti e nying Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka chieng’.
"Ka ja-Lawi moro modak e achiel kuom miech Israel obiro kuom heronekama Ruoth Nyasaye biro yiero,
mi otiyo tich dolo e nying Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasache kaka jo-Lawi wetene ma tiyo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kanyo,
tonyaka oyud pok maromre kodgi, ka ok okwan mwandu monego ocham e dalawuon mare. Nyasaye osiemo jo-Israel ni kik giluw timbe ogendini mamoko
"Kusedonjo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou, to kikupuonjru luwo timbe makuero mag ogendini mamoko modak e pinyno.
Kikuyie ni ng’ato kuomu wang’ wuode kata nyare ka gir misango.  Bende kikbedie jakor kata jambofwa kata jadil kata jandagla
kata ajuoknyakalondo kata japenj jochiende wach.
Joma kamago Ruoth Nyasayeokwedo, kendo timbegi makuerogo ema omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuriembo ogendinigo mondo owenu thuolo.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaromondo utine gi chunyu duto. Nyasaye osingore ni nomi jo-Israel janabi machal gi Musa
"Ogendini ma ubiro kawo pinygigo oyie gi weche jombofwa kod wechejokor, to un, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okwerou ni kik utim gik makamago.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noyier janabi moro ka an kuom jouuwegi, kendo nyaka uwinj wachne.
Mano e gima nukwayo Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu chieng’ mane uchokore Horeb, kuwacho niya, ‘Owinjore kik wachakwawinj duond Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, bende ok onego wachak wane machmaduong’ kama kendo, nono to wabiro tho. ’
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachonaniya, ‘Gima giwachono ni kare.
Abiro yieronigi janabi kaka in, kuomogandagi giwegi.  Abiro keto wechena e dhoge, kendo enowachnigi wecheduto ma achike.
Ng’ato ang’ata modagi winjo wachna ma janabino wacho,to noyal.
To janabi ma nohedhre wacho wach moro e nyinga ma ok achikeni mondo owachi, kata ma nowuo e nying nyiseche mamoko, nyaka negi. ’
To ma e kaka unyalo ng’eyo wach ma ok oa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye:
Kajanabi owacho wach moro e nying Ruoth Nyasaye to bang’e wachno ok ochopokare, mano nyiso ni ok en wach Ruoth Nyasaye, to osewuoyo mana gi tekoneowuon.  Omiyo kik umiye duong’. Rapar mar Chik
Miech Tony(Kwan
.
-
; Joshua
.
-
)
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osetieko ogendini ma obiro miyou pinygi,udakie,
to unuyier mier adek manie pinyno.
Poguru pinyno didek, kendoulosie yore mondo ka ng’ato onego wadgi, to nyalo luwo kadhi tony eachiel kuom miego.
Ng’at moboth monego wadgi ma ok gimonrego ema nyaloringo dhi kuno mondo ores ngimane.
Ranyisi mar nek moboth kamano chalkama: Ng’ato nyalo dhi e bungu gi wadgi mondo otong’ yien, to kaonyigore gi le kong’udo, mi wi le obwodhore oa e loge mogoyo wadginomonego, to ng’atno nyalo ringo dhi e achiel kuom miego mondo oresngimane.
Ka ok uloso yorego, kata ka miego bor gi kar nek, to ng’at madwaro chulo kuor dipo kolawo janek ka pod mirimbe liet, mi ojuke, kendoonege.  To chutho, janekno ok owinjore negi, nikech ne ok gimonre giwadgi mane onegono.
Mano emomiyo achikou mondo uyier mier adek.
"To kapo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oyaro pinyu, mi omiyou piny dutomane osingore ni kwereu ni nomiu,
to nyaka umed yiero mier moko adekkuom mago.  Adier enomiu pinyno, kuketo chunyu kuom rito chik ma amiyoukawuononi, mi uhero Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuwuotho e yorene pile.
Kuyiero miego, to remb joma onge ketho ok nochuer e piny ma RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou obed mwanduu, kendo richo mar chuero remook nobed kuomu.
"To ka nga’to nigi sigu gi wadgi, mi obutone, eka opoye, kendo ogoyemotho, mi bang’e oringo odhi e achiel kuom miego,
jodong dalagi nyakaor ji moko mondo oome, mi kete e lwet owadgi jal monegono, mondo onegeka chulonego kuor.
Kik ukeche, nyaka ugol ketho mar chuero remb ng’atma ok oketho oko kuom piny Israel.  Kamano unudag maber. Kiepe machon
"Ka udak e lowo mubiro yudo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacu dwaromiyou, to kik ng’ato kuomu gol kidi ma kwereu noketo manyiso kiepe giwadgi. Chik moket ni joneno
"Wach janeno achiel kende ok nyal mi ng’ad ni ng’ato bura kuom kethomoro, kata kuom richo moro, to wach nyaka ng’ere malong’o e nyim jonenoariyo kata adek.
Ka ng’ato obedo janeno mar miriambo mana ni mondoohiny wadgi kuom ketho moro,
ji ariyogo nyaka chung’ e nyim RuothNyasaye kendo e nyim jodolo gi jong’ad bura.
Jong’ad bura nyaka nonwachno matut, to ka giyudo ni janenono hango ni wadgi wach,
to nyakautimne mana kaka odwaro timo ni wadgino.  Mano e kaka unupwodhru kuomricho ma kamano.
Bang’e jou moko duto nowinj wachno, mi ginidokmaluor, kendo gima rach ma kamano ok nochak otimre kuomu.
Kik ukechjaketho.  Ngima nyaka chul kar ngima, wang’ kar wang’, lak kar lak, lwedokar lwedo, kendo tielo kar tielo. Rapar mar Chik
Chike mag lweny
"Kudhi kedo gi wasiku, muneno ogandagi ka duong’ moloyo maru, kendonigi farese kod geche lweny, to kik uluorgi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu ma nogolou Misri ni kodu.
Ka uchiegni rado kodgi, to jadolonowuogi e nyim ogandau mar lweny,
kendo nowach niya, ‘Un jo-Israel,winjuru, kawuono uyuoro machiegni mondo uked gi wasigu.  Kik chunyunyosre, kendo kik uluor.  Kibaji bende kik gou kuneno wasikugo,
nikechRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema dhi kodu, mondo okednu, kendo olonuwasigu. ’
Jodongo bende nowach ni jolweny niya, ‘Ka ng’at moro kuomuosegero ot manyien, to pok orwako, onego odog dala, nimar dipo ka otho elweny, mi ng’at machielo ema orwako odno.
Kata ng’at mosepidho mzabibu,to pok ochamo olembgi, bende onego odog dala, nimar dipo ka otho elweny, mi ng’at moro nono ema ochamo olembego.
To bende ka nitie ng’atomosenywomo nyako, to pok okawo, onego odog dala, nimar dipo ka otho elweny, mi ng’at moro ema okawo chiege. ’
Jodongo nomed wuoyo gi jolweny,kawacho niya, ‘Bende kapo ni nitie ng’ama luor, kata ma chunye onyosore,to onego odog dala nikech dipo ka omiyo jowetene obedo maluor ka en. ’
Ka jodongo osetieko wuoyo, eka noket jotend lweny.
"Kuchopo machiegni gi dala mudhi kedogo, to penjuru jodalano kagidwaro timo kodu winjruok mar kue.
Ka giyie timo kodu winjruok, migiyawonu dhoranga dala, to nyaka uchun ji duto munwang’o dalano e mondootinu.
To ka gidagi timo kodu winjruok, mi gichako kedo kodu, tolworuru dalano,
kendo ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okete e lwetu, tonyaka uneg chwo duto man kanyo.
To unyalo kawo mon gi nyithindo, kendoyako jamni kod gik moko duto manie dalano, mi ukonyru gi gik ma RuothNyasaye oseketo e lwetugo kaka uhero.
Timuru kamano ni mier duto manmabor gi pinyu, mak mana miech ogendini mokiewo kodu ema kik utimnigikamano.
To e miech ogendini ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyougo,kik uweyee kata gimoro achiel ka ngima.
Jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gijo-Kanaan gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus, nyaka utiek chuth, kakaRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechiko.
Timuru kamano mondo kik gipuonjuluwo timbegi makuero ma gitimo ni nyisechegi, nimar timbe ma kamago ginricho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Ka uselworo dala moro kuom kinde malach mondo ukaw, to kik utong’yiend dalano mi ukethi.  Unyalo mana chamo olembgi, to kik utong’gi,nimar yath ok en dhano ma unyalo kedogo.
To unyalo ng’ado kata tong’oyien ma ung’eyo ni olembgi ok cham, mi ugergo raidhi kod gi lweny mamokomondo umonjgo dala mukedogo nyaka ukaw. Rapar mar Chik
Gima itimo kuom wach nek, ka janek ok oyudi
"Ka oyud ringre ng’at motho ka oriere e pap e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu dwaro miyou, to ng’at monege ok ong’e,
jodongu gi jou majong’ad bura nyaka dhi opim bor mae kind kama ringruokne nitie, gi miechgweng’no, mondo ong’e ni ere dala machiegni gi kanyo.
Jodong dalamachiegni gi ringruokno nyaka yier nyaroya ma pok otiyo tich moro katama pok oywayo jok.
Ginikele e holo moro ma ok pur man gi aora ma okdwon, kendo ginitur ng’ute kanyo.
Jodolo ma jo-Lawi bende nyaka bedie,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyierogi mondo gitine, kendo giguedhji e nyinge.  Gin ema omigi tich ng’ado buche ma ji laroe gimoro, kodbuche goruok duto.
Bang’e jodongo duto mag dala machiegni gi ringruoknonyaka log lwetgi kuom nyaroya mosetur ng’ute e holo cha,
ka giwachoniya, ‘Wan ne ok wachuero remoni, kata ng’at ma nochuere bende ne okwaneno.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, yie iwe richo mag jogi Israel ma isewaro,kendo kik iyie mondo remo ma onge gi ketho mien-gi. ’ Kamano ginipuodhrekuom richo mar chuero remono.
Mano e kaka unugol remo ma onge gi kethokuomu, kutimo gima ber ma Ruoth Nyasaye dwarono. Kaka irito mon momak e lweny
"Kusekedo gi wasiku, mi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oketogi e lwetu,kendo umako jomoko udhigo,
mi ng’ato kuomu oneno dhako moro ma jaberkuomgi ma doher mondo okendi,
to onyalo kawe akawa, motere dala.  Bang’mano noliel wiye, mi ong’ad koke,
kendo olony lewni mane omakego. Dhakono nodag e dala ng’atno koywago min gi wuon kuom due ngima, ekang’atno nyalo loke dhako.
To kapo ni bang’e ojok kode, to onyalo weyeodhi kuma ohero.  To ok nong’iewe gi ng’ato, kata loke misumba, nikechoseriwore kode. Pok wuowi makayo
"Ka ng’ato nigi mon ariyo, ma achiel ohero, to machielo ok ohero, todhako ma ok oherono ema onywolone wuowi makayo,
kendo kinde modwarolamo nie yawuowi ochopo, to kik okaw wuod dhako moherono ka wuode makayokar wuod dhako ma ok ohero, ma adier e wuowi makayo.
Nyaka omi wuodemakayo duong’ne mar nywol, kopogone pok nyadiriyo moloyo yawuote mamoko,kata dabed ni en wuod dhako mocha kamano, nimar en e wuode motiekowuowine, omiyo duong’ mar nywol en mare. Wuowi ma achach
"Kapo ni ng’ato nigi wuowi ma wiye tek kendo ma achach, ma ok nyalwinjo jonywolne, kata da gikume,
to nyaka gimake, mi gitere e nyimjodongo e dhoranga dala.
Giniwach ni jodongo niya, ‘Wuodwani wiye tek,kendo en achach.  Ok otim gima wawachone, bende timbene richo kendoojamer. ’
Eka jodalano duto nyaka goye gi kite nyaka otho.  Mano e kakaunupodhru kuom richo ma kamano, mi jo-Israel duto nowinj wachno, kendonobed maluor. Chike moko mopogore opogore.
"Ka oseng’ad ni ng’ato buch tho, mi onege, kendo olier ringre e yath,
to ringreno kik we kanyo otienono duto.  Nyaka yike chieng’ onogo,mondo kik uketh piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou ka mwanduu,nikech ng’at molier e yath okuong’ e nyim Nyasaye. Rapar mar Chik
"Kineno dher wadu moro kata rombone ka ringo lal, kik iweye to nyakaigeng’e, mi idwoke ni wuon-go.
Kopo ni wuon-go ok jagweng’u, kata ka oking’eye, to nyaka iter chiayono e dalani, kendo irite nyaka wuon-gonwang’e kuomi, eka idwoknego.
Nyaka itim kamano ni kanj wadu, kata nilawe, kata ni gimoro amora molalne, to kik iweye orweny.
Kineno kanjwadu moro kata dhere kopodho e yo, to kik iwe mak ikonyo wuon-go chunge.
"Dhako kik rwakre ka dichwo, dichwo bende kik rwakre ka dhako, nimarjoma otimo kamano okwedi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Kapo ni iyudo od winyo man gi nyithindo kata tong’ e yath manie diryo, kata man piny e lowo ka min-gi butnoe, to kik ikaw min-gi kaachielgi nyithinde.
Nyaka iwe min-gi dhi, to ikaw mana nyithinde kende. Kamano inibed maber kendo nidag aming’a.
"Ka igero ot, to nyaka iriw rageng’ e lak tado gi yo ka oko, mondo kikng’ato podhi koa ewi tatino, mi kel bura mar remo kuom odi.
"Kik ipidh kodhi moro amora e puothi mar mzabibu, nimar kitimo kamano,to gik ma kodhino onyago, kaachiel gi olembe mag mzabibu nyaka chiw niRuoth Nyasaye.
"Kik ipur gi dhiang’ kod kanyna e kwer achiel.
"Kik irwak law molos gi usi mar yie rombo mokik gi usi mar katana.
"Nyaka iket usi momin e konde ang’wen mag lawi mar abola. Chike moko mag kend
"Ka ng’ato okendo chiege, to bang’e ojok kode,
mi ohangone wachkendo oketho nyinge, kowacho ni nokawe to ok oyude gi ringre,
tojonywol nyakono nyaka dhi ir jodongo e dhoranga dala, ka gitero gimanyiso ni nyargino ne nigi ringre.
Eka wuon nyako nowachni jodongoniya, ‘Namiyo ng’atni nyara mondo okendi, to koro ojok kode,
omiyoosehangone wach, kendo oketho nyinge kowacho ni ne ok oyude gi ringre. To kata kamano ma e gima nyiso ni nyara ne nigi ringre. ’ Bang’ mano,noyar law mane oywego ringre nyakono e nyim jodong dala.
Jodongogonyaka chwad ng’atno,
kendo goye faini pesa moromo fedha mia achielmondo omi wuon nyako, nikech ng’atno oseketho nying nyar Israel.  Nyakononosik kode, kendo ok noriembe nyaka chieng’.
To ka en adier ni nyakonone onge gi ringre, kendo oonge gima nyiso ni ne en gi ringre,
to nyakatere e dhood wuon mare, kendo jodalagi nogoye gi kite nyaka otho nimarosekelo wichkuot e piny Israel kochodo ka pod en e dala wuon.  Mano ekaka unupwodhru kuom richo ma kamaano.
"Ka onwang’ ng’ato ka terore gi chi wadgi, to nyaka neggi giduto.  Manoe kaka unupwodh jo-Israel kuom richo ma kamano.
"Ka ng’ato onwang’o nyako moro minywomo, mi oterore kode e dala,
tonyaka ukelgi giduto e dhoranga dala, mi ugogi gi kite nyaka githo.  Nyakaneg nyakono nikech kata obedo ni ne en e dala kamano, to ne ok ogoyo uwimondo okonye.  Ng’atno to nyaka neg kuom kuodo wi chi wadgi.  Mano e kakaunupwodh ogandau kuom richo ma kamano.
"To ka ng’ato oyudo nyako moro minywomo, mi omako, kendo oterorego githwon oko e pap, to ng’atno kende ema nyaka negi.
Kik utim gimoro ninyako, nikech en ok osetimo gimoro moromore gi buch tho,
nimar ng’atnonomake oko e pap, omiyo kata obedo ni nogoyo uwi to onge ng’at manenyalo konye.  Tim ma kamano chalo gi tim ng’at momonjo wadgi monego.
"Ka ng’ato omako nyako ma ok nywom, mi oterorego, bang’e ofwenygi,
to nyaka ng’atno chul wuon nyako pesa moromo fedha piero abich.  Tobende nyaka okend nyakono, nikech osemiye wichkuot, kendo ok onyalriembe nyaka chieng’.
"Kik ng’ato ter chi wuon mare, nimar kotimo kamano, to okuodo wiwuon. Rapar mar Chik
Joma ok oyienigi bet e chokruok mar jo-Nyasaye
"Ng’at ma nyangetane otore kata ma duong’ne ong’ad oko, kik donj echokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kimirwa kik donji e chokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye, nyaka nyikwaye marapar.
"Jo-Amon gi jo-Moab kata mana nyaka nyikwagi mar apar kik donj echokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ok ginidonj e chokruokno,
nikech ne okgiromonu gi chiemo kata gi pi kane uwuok Misri, to bende nikech negiluongo Balaam wuod Beor modak Pethor manie piny Mesopotamia mondookuong’u.
To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ne ok odewo wach Balaam, minoloko kuong’no obedonu mana gueth, nikech noherou.
Kik udwar gimadikelnigi kue kata gima dikelnigi dongruok e ndalou duto.
"To kik ukaw jo-Edom ka joma okwedi, nikech gin joweteu, bende kik ukawjo-Misri ka joma okwedi nikech ne udak e pinygi ndalo moko.
Nyikwagimar adek ema nyalo donjo e chokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye. Rito ler e kambi
"Ka un e kambi ndalo lweny, to kik utim gimoro mochido.
Ka ng’at morokuomu ogak nikech nende olekore gotieno, to nyaka owuog oa e kambi mobedoko.
To kochopo odhiambo, nyaka olwokre, eka oduog e kambi ka chieng’podho.
Nyaka ubed gi kamoro oko mulosorue,
kendo kudhi kanyo, tonyaka udhi gi rapur, ukunygo bur, mi ka uselosoru to uiko.
Nyaka utimkamano nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu wuotho kuonde duto e kambiu,mondo oritu kendo omiu loyo wasiku.  Emomiyo kambiu nyaka bed maler,mondo kik Ruoth Nyasaye nwang’ie gimoro marach ma dimi oweu. Chike mopogore opogore
"Ka misumba moro opondo koa e piny moro, mi oringo obiro iru, to kikuduoke ni ruodhe.
Nyaka uweye odag e pinyu e dala moro amora mohero. To kik uloke misumba.
"Onge nyar Israel moro kata wuod Isreal moro manyalo bedo jachode eod lemo.
Pesa ma dhako moro kata ma dichwo moro oyudo kuom chode kikkel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mondo ochopgo kuong’ruok, nikech pesamoyud kamano okwedi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Kik imi ja-Israel wadu chul ohala kuom gima oholo, bed ni en pesa,kata chiemo, kata gimoro amora monego dwok gi ohala.
Inyalo kawo ohalakuom gima iholo japiny moro nono, to ok kuom ja-Israel wadu.  Kuluwochikno, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhu kuom gik moko duto mutimoe piny ma ubiro donjoe mondo udagie.
"Kikuong’ori kuom wach moro, to nyaka ichop kuong’ruokno piyopiyo,nikech ka ok itimo kamano, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nobandhi wachno,kendo nibed jaketho.
Ka ok ikuong’ori to ok iketho,
to kikuong’orini Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuom heroni iwuon, to nyaka irit kendoichop gima iwachono.
"Ka idonjo e puoth ng’ato mar mzabibu to inyalo chamo mzabibu kakaihero, to kik ikaw moko iago.
Bende kidonjo e puoth ng’ato mar cham,to inyalo jako ajaka cham gi lweti, to kik ika gi pala. Rapar mar Chik
Chike mar weyo dhako
"Ka ng’ato okendo chiege, to bang’e oyudo ni ok ohere nikech osetimogimoro ma ok owinjore, onyalo ndiko barup weruok momiye, kendo oriembe.
Bang’e ka dhakono osea, nyalo bet ni ng’ato ochako okende, obedochiege,
to ka chwore mar ariyono bende ojok kode, mondiko barup weruokmomiye, kendo oriembe, kata ka chwore mar ariyono otho,
to chworemokwongo mane oriembe cha kik chak kawe mi loke chiege kendo, nikechkoro osedokone mogak.  Tim ma kamano en kuero e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo dikel richo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biromiyou obed mwanduu.
"Ka ng’ato okendo, to kik tere e lweny kata e tich moro amora, to onegoobed dala kuom higa achiel komiyo chiege mor. Chike mopogore opogore
"Kik ng’ato mak pong’ rego kata mana nyapong’ ka gir singo, nikech manochalre gi nego dhano.
"Ka oyud ng’ato kokwalo ja-Israel wadgi mi oloke misumbane, kataong’iewe gio ng’ato, to nyaka neg jakuogno.  Mano e kaka unupwodhru kuomricho ma kamano.
"Kuom weche mag tuo dhoho, nyaka utim mana kaka jodolo ma jo-Lawi birochikou, nimar namiyogi chikena duto ma nyaka uriti.
Paruru gima neRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu otimo ni Miriam ka ne usewuok Misri!
"Kiholo ja-Israel wadu gimoro, to kik idonj e ode kikawo gir singo.
Nyaka irit mana gi oko mondo ng’at ma jagopino ema okelni gino.
Kaen ng’at ma jachan, mi omiyi lawe mar abola ka gir singo, to kik inind elaweno,
to nyaka idwoknego ka pok chieng’ opodho mondo onindie.  Kamanong’atno noguedhi, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi nokwan gima itimono kagima ber.
"Kik itim marach ni jatich moro modhier machandore, kataa obedo ni enja-Israel kata jadak.
Nyaka imiye pokne pilepile kapok chieng’ opodho,nimar en jachan kendo pokneno ema konye.  Ka ok itimo kamano, to onyaloywakni kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, mi dibed jaketho.
"Kik neg wuone nikech richo mag nyithinde, kata kik neg nyithindonikech richo mag wuonegi, too ng’ato ka ng’ato noneg mana nikech richoneowuon.
"Kik ung’ad buch amwor ni jodak kata ni nyathi kich, bende kik ukawlaw dhako ma chwore otho ka gir singo.
Paruru nii ne un wasumbni epiny Misri, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noresou mogolou kuno.  Manoemomiyo achikou ni mondo utim kamano.
"Ka ikayo cham e puothi, mi wiyi owil gi cham moko motue kuno, to kikidog iom, to nyaka iwegi ni jodak gi nyithindo ma kiye kod mond lietemondo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oguedhi kuom gik moko duto mitimo.
"Ka iseyiengo yiendi mag zeituni mondo olembe olwar, to kik ichakiyienggi kendo, to nyaka iwe modong’ ni jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mondliete.
"Ka isepono mzabibu e puothi to kik ichak ipon kendo, to nyaka iwemodong’ ni jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mond liete.
Paruru ni ne unwasumbni e piny Misri.  Mano emomiyo achikou ni mondo utim kamano. Rapar mar Chik
"Ka ji ariyo larore e wach moro, mi gibiro mondo oyalgi, to nyakajong’ad bura ng’ad nigi bura kare, ka giweyo ng’at ma onge gi ketho, togikumo jaketho.
Ka ong’ad ni ng’at ma jakethono buch chweto, to nyakaonind piny e nyim jang’ad bura, mi chwade.  Nyaka chwade maromre gikethone,
to kar kwan kiboko kik kadh piero ang’wen, nono to dipo kachweto ohingo ja-Israel waduno, mi oyudo wichkuot marach e nyimu.
"Kik itue dho dhiang’ ka ywayo lodi madiemo cham. Chik mar tero dhako
"Ka owete odak kanyakla, mi achiel kuomgi otho ka ok oweyo nyathi mawuowi, to ng’at moro nono ma ok jadalano ok nyal tero chiege.  Owadgichwor dhakono ema nyaka riwre kode, mi loke chiege, kendo timne gik mokoduto ma owinjore yuor dhako tim.
Nyathi ma wuowi ma dhakono okwongonywolo nyaka kaw nying wuon mare mothono, mondo nyinge kik lal e Israel.
To ka owadgi ng’at mothono ok dwar tero chi owadgino, to dhakono nyakadhi ir jodongo e dhoranga dala kar bura, mondo onyisgi niya, ‘Yuoraotamore chungo wi owadgi e Israel, kendo odagi timona gima owinjore yuorng’ato tim ni chi owadgi. ’
Ka jodong dala owinjo kamano, to nyakagiluong ng’atno, kendo giwuo kode e wachno.  Ka owachonigi malong’o ni okodwar kawe,
to chi owadgino nyaka dhi ire e nyim jodongo mi lony wuoree tiende, kendo ng’udh wang’e olawo.  Bang’ mano dhakono nyaka wach niya,‘Ma e kaka watimo ni ng’at modagi chungo wi owadgi. ’
E Israel joodng’atno noluong ni, ‘Jood ng’at ma olony wuore. ’Chike mamoko
"Ka ji ariyo gore, mi chi ng’at achiel kuomgi odhi konyo chwore,momako duong’ ng’at machielono,
to nyaka ng’ad lwet dhakono oko ma okukeche.
"Kik ibed gi rapim mopogore opogore e mifuki, ma moro duong’ to morotin.
Bende kik ibed gi rapur mopogore opogore e odi, ma moro duong’ tomoro tin.
Nyaka ubed gi rapim kod rapur malong’o kendo makare mondoudag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou.
Joma timogik ma kamago kawuondo ji, okwedi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. Nyasaye ochiko jo-Israel mondo otiek jo-Amalek
"Paruru gima ne jo-Amalek otimonu e yo, ka uwuok e piny Misri.
Negibutonu mi gimonjou gi ka ng’eu, ka uol kendo ujony, mi ginego jomanodong’ chien, ma ok gidewo luoro Nyasaye.
Emomiyo ka Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu osemiyou kue kuom wasiku duto molworou e piny ma obiro miyoumondo obed mwanduu, to kik wiu wil mak utieko jo-Amalek, mi nyinggi lale piny. Rapar mar Chik
Chike mag chiwo gik mokwongo nyak
"Ka usechopo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou mondo obedmwanduu, mi udak kuno,
to nyaka ng’ato ka ng’ato kaw gik moko dutomokwongo nyak e pinyno, kendo ket e atonga, mi dhigo kama Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu biro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.
Nyaka odhi ir jadolo mankanyo, kendo owachne niya, ‘Ahulo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha kawuononi asechopo e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa. ’
Bang’ mano jadolo nokaw atonga e lwet ng’atno, mi noket piny e nyimkendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eka ng’atno nowach e nyim RuothNyasaye niya, ‘Kwara ne en ja-Aram ma bayo abaya, ma onge gi kar dak.  Neodhi e piny Misri kane pod joge nok, mi gidak kuno.  Bang’e ne ginya, migidoko oganda maratego man gi ji mang’eny.
To jo-Misri nosandowa,monyorowa, kendo oketowa e tich misumba malit.
Ne waywak ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kwerewa mondo okonywa, mi nowinjo ywakwa, kendo onenothagruok gi nyor mane inyorowago, kod tich matek mane watiyo.
Kuom manonogolowa e piny Misri gi teko maduong’ kod bat morie, kendo gi timbemadongo kod ranyisi gi honni.
Nokelowa kaeri momiyowa piny maber kendomomewni.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, mano emomiyo akeloni gik mokwongo nyak elowo misemiya. ’ Eka noket atongano piny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, miokulorene piny mondo olame.
Bang’e un gi jo-Lawi kod jopinje mamokomodak kuomu nyaka utim sawo mondo upargo gik mabeyo duto ma RuothNyasaye osetimonu kaachiel gi jou. Chike mag chiwo achiel kuom apar mag gik monyak
"Ka usetieko choko achiel kuom apar mag gik monyak e higa mar adek,ma en higa michiwoe achiel kuom apar mar gik manyak, to nyaka uchiw gigoni jo-Lawi gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, kaachiel gi nyithindo ma kiyekod mond liete, mondo gibed gi chiemo moromogi e miechu.
Bang’ manong’ato ka ng’ato nowach e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu niya, Asegologik mowalni e oda, mi amiyo jo-Lawi gi jopinje mamoko gi nyithindomakiye kod mond liete mana kaka nichika.  Wiya ok osewil, kata okaseketho chikni moro kata achiel.
Pok achamo gik mowalnigo e ndalo maaywago ng’at motho, kata gologi e oda ka agak, kendo ok asechiwogi ning’at motho.  A Ruoth Nyasaye asemako chikni, katimo gik moko dutomidwaro.
Rang piny gie polo kar dakni maler, mondo iguedh jogi Israelkod piny maber kendo momew misemiyowa, kaka nikuong’ori ni kwerewa. "Jo-Israel nyaka bed oganda mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye
"Kawuono, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu chikou mondo urit chikegi gibuchegi duto.  Nyaka uritgi gi chunyu duto.
Usehulo tinende ni RuothNyasaye e Nyasachu, kendo ni ubiro luwo yorene, murit chikene gibuchene, kendo uwinj wachne.
Ruoth Nyasaye bende osehulo tinende ni une joge owuon, marito chikene duto, kaka nosingorenu.
Obiro ting’oumalo moloyo ogendini mamoko duto mane ochueyo, mondo nyinge oyud duong’gi pak kod huma.  Kamano unubed oganda mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachumana kaka nosingore. "Rapar mar Chik
Ndiko chike e got Ebal
Kane Musa nigi jodong Israel, nochiko ji niya, "Rituru chike duto maamiyou kawuono,
kendo chieng’ ma ung’ado aora Jordan kudhi e piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou, to uchung kite madongo, kendoumwon-gi.
Ndikuru kuomgi weche duto mag chikni, mondo udonji e pinymaber momew ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu.
Ka useng’ado aora Jordan, to unuchung kitegi e got Ebal mana kakaachikou kawuono, kendo umwon-gi.
Geruru kendo-mar-misango kanyo niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi kite ma ok opa gi chuma.
Kendo mar RuothNyasayeno nyaka ger gi kite ma ok opa, bende utimie ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu misengni miwang’o pep.
Timuru misengni mag sawo, kendochiemuru kanyo, mi ubed mamor e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ndikurumalong’o weche duto mag chikni kuom kitego. "
Musa kod jodolo ma jo-Lawi nowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya, "Chikuru itumaber, un jo-Israel.  Tinendeni usedoko jo-Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Winjuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo rituru chikene gi buchene maamitou kawuono. "Weche mag kuong’ ma nyaka hul e got Ebal
Chieng’no ema Musa nogoloe chik, kowacho ni ji niya,
"Ka useng’adoaora Jordan, to jo-Simeon gi jo-Lawi gi jo-Juda gi jo-Isakar gi jo-Josefkod jo-Benjamin nyaka chung’ e got Gerizim, mondo oguedh ji.
Tojo-Reuben gi jo-Gad gi jo-Asher gi jo-Zebulun gi jo-Dan kod jo-Naftalimondo ochung’ e got Ebal, kihulo weche mag kuong’.
Bang’ mano jo-Lawinowach nii jo-Israel duto gi dwol maduong’ niya.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moloso kido mar nyasaye manono mar bao kata marchuma, kata bed ni oketo gino kama opondo.  Mano en tim makuero e nyimRuoth Nyasaye.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mochayo wuon kata min.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moketho kiepe gi wadgi.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mowuondo muofu, mi obaro oweyo yo.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moketho buch japiny moro modak kodu, kata buchnyathi ma kich, kata buch chi liel.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi chi wuon, nikech oelo dug wuon mare.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi le moro amora.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi nyamin hie, kata nyamin ma nyar wuon.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi mar mare.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mogoyo wadgi ling’ling’.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mochamo asoya mondo oneg ng’at ma onge gi ketho.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at ma ok orito kata ma ok ochopo weche duto mag chikni. Bang kuong’ ka kuong’ to ji duto nyaka duok ni, ‘Obed kamano. ’Rapar mar Chik
Gueth miyudo kuom rito chik(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
; Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
"Ka uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo urito adimba chikene dutoma amiyou kawuono, to enoting’u malo moloyo ogendini duto mag piny,
kendo guethgi duto biro bironu:
Noguedhu kamoro amora ma untie; ka une dala, kata ka un oko.
Noguedhu gi nyithindo mang’eny, kendo gi chammogundho kod jamni mathoth.
Noguedh atongeu gi dakuondeu.
Noguedhukudonjo e dala kendo kuwuok.
"Ruoth Nyasaye noket wasiku momonjou e luetu, kendo unulogi muriembgi. Ginirad kodu ka gin oganda achiel, to giniringu ka gike e sidienjeabiriyo.
Ruoth Nyasaye noguedh dereu kaachiel gii tich luetu duto epiny ma obiro miyou.
Kurito chike Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendouwuotho e yorene, to obiro miyo udoko joge owuon maler, kakanosesingorenu.
Ogendini duto mag piny none ni un jo Ruoth Nyasaye miginiluoru.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro miyo udhi maber.  Ubiro bedo gi nyithindo mang’eny,kendo gii jamni mathoth, kod cham mogundho e piny mane Ruoth Nyasayeosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro golo koth e polo karkenone, mondo ochwenu e ndalo mowinjore, kendo obiro guedho gik mokoduto mutimo.  Ogendini mang’eny biro holo gik moko kuomu, to un ok nuholkuomgi.
Kurito chike mag Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma anyisou kawuonomondo urit matek,
kendo ka ok utamoru chikego mi udagi lamo nyisechemamoko, to Ruoth Nyasaye biro ketou jotelo, to ok joma itelonigi.  Kamanoubiro dhi nyime maber, kendo ok nudog chien. Kuong’ miyudo kuom tamruok mako chik(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"To ka ok uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mi udagi rito chikene gibuchene ma amiyou kawuono, to kuong’ gi duto biro makou:
Nokuong’ukamoro amora ma untie; ka un e dala, kata ka un oko.
Nokuong’ atongeugi dakuondeu.
Nokuong’u kuom nywol kendo kuom cham kod kuom jamni.
Nokuong’u kudonjo e dala kendo kuwuok.
Ruoth Nyasaye noornu kuong’gi chandruok kod kum ma ketho gik moko duto mutimo, nyaka otieku mi urumka diemo wang’ kuom timbeu maricho, kendo nikech useweye.
RuothNyasasye biro goyou gi tuoche nyaka tieku ua e piny mudonjoe mondo ukaw.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro goyou gi kahera gi midhusi gi tuo akuodi kodguonyo, kendo kelonu oro, mi cham rochre ewi dongo.  Gigo duto birothagou nyaka urum.
Polo norieny ka mula, to piny nodok matek ka chuma.
Kar kelo koth, to Ruoth Nyasaye nomi lowo gi buru chwenu mana ka koth,nyaka tieku.
Ruoth Nyasaye noketu e lwet wasiku, mi ginilou.  Unuradkodgi ka un oganda achiel, to unuringi kuke e sidienje abiriyo, miunubed joma pinje duto wuoro.
Ringreu nobed chiemb winy gi le, kendoonge ng’at ma noriembgi.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro goyou gi tuo buche mag Misri gi akuodi kendo gikalanga kod guonyo ma ok nyal thiedhi.
Obiro goyou gi tuo mar neko,kendo lokou muofni gi joma morundore.
Unubed kumulo godiechieng’, manakaka muofu mulo, kendo ok nuchop kuma udwaro dhiyoe.  Nothiru kendonoyaku e ngimau duto, kendo onge ng’at ma nokonyu.
Unukend mon, tojomoko nono ema nonind kodgi.  Unuger udi, to ok nudagie.  Unupidhmzabibu, to ok unucham olembegi.
Unune dhou kiyang’o, to ok unubilringgi.  Nomau kenjeu kuneno, to ok nodwoknugi.  Rombeu nomi wasiku, toonge ng’ama nokonyu.
Yawuotu gi nyiu nokaw, kendo nomi jopinje mamokoong’iew mana kuneno, mi siso nolou kodgi, to ok nubed gi teko mar timogimoro.
"Oganda moro ma ok ung’eyo nocham gik monyak e puotheu, kendo unubedjoma othir malich e ngimau duto.
Gigo biro miyo udoko joneko.
RuothNyasaye biro goyo chongeu kod tiendeu gi buche ma ok nyal thiedhi, toginilandre e dendu duto.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro terou, kaachiel gi ruoth mubiro yiero, kuom ogandama un ok ung’eyo kata kwereu bende ne ok ong’eyo, kendo kuno unulamienyiseche mamoko mag yien kod mag kite.
Nyingu nolokre ka ngero kendogima ji jaro kendo nyiero.
"Ubiro chwoyo kodhi mang’eny e puotheu, to unuka matin, nimar bonyobiro chamogi.
Unupidh mzabibu, kendo unudogi, to ok unuka olembgi katamadho divachgi, bende ok unumadhi nikech kudni nokethgi.
Yiend zeituninoyudre e pinyu kuonde duto, to ok unuwirru gi mogi, nimar ginilwar pinyka pok gichiek.
Ununywol yawuowi gi nyiri, to ok ginisik kodu, nikechnotergi e tuech.
Yiendu duto, kod gik monyak e puotheu, bonyo notiekpep.
Jopinje mamoko modak kuomu biro medo dongore molou, to un ubirodok piny.
Ginibed gi gik ma giholou, to un ok nubed gi gima duholgi. Ginibed jotelo, to un unubed joma itelonigi.
"Masichego duto biro lawou mi maku nyaka tieku, nikech kane RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikou mondo urit chikene gi buchene, to ne okuwinjo wachne.
Masichego nobednu ranyisi mochwere, kendo ni nyikwau,
nikech ne ok utiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi mor kendo gi ilokuom chiwone mogundho.
Emomiyo unuti ni wasigu ma Ruoth Nyasaye birioro mondo omnju.  Kech nokau, kendo riyo nolou; unuwuoth duge, kendonuchand gimoro amora.  Ruoth Nyasaye noket jok mar nyinyo e ng’utu nyakaotieku.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelo kuomu oganda moro moa kuma bor ma dhogi oknuwinji.  Ginimuomre kuomu mana kaka ongo muomore kuom nyagweno.
Ogandano nobed mager ahinya.  Ok ginidew joma oti, kendo ok ginikechnyithindo.
Ginicham jambu gi chambu, ma ok giweyonu cham kata divaikata mo kata mana chiayo moro kuom jambu nyaka urum.
Ginilwor mierduto ma Ryuoth Nyasaye nomiu mondo gikau, nyaka gimuk ohinga maboyokendo motegno muparo ni dugeng’rugo.
Wasikugo nokelnu chandruok malichahinya, e ndalo ma giluoro e miechu, mi unucham kata mana nyithinduuwegi ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu omiyou.
Kata mana ng’at malong’okendo mang’wonie moloyo biro bedo ma iye kwar gi wadgi, kata mana chiegemohero kaachiel gi nyithinde modong’,
mi notamre pogonigi ringrenyithinde mochamo, nimar onge gimoro machielo ma nodong’ne, nikechchandruok malich ma wasiku biro kelonu e ndalo ma giluoroe miechu.
Bende kata mana dhako malong’o kendo mang’wonie moloyo bende, ma nyakanene ok wuoth gi tiende, biro bedo ma iye kwar gi chwore mohero kaachielgi nyithinde,
mi notamre pogonigi bieche kata mana nyathi mosenywolo,nikech chandruok malich ma wasigu biro kelone e ndalo ma giluoroe miechuduto.
"Ka ok urito chike duto mondiki e kitabuni, kendo ok luoro nying RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, ma en nying maduong’ kendo malich,
to ubiro kelokuomu, kendo kuom nyikwau, masiche malich kendo miwuoro, kod tuochemayuayo ji kuom kinde malach.
Ruoth Nyasaye nokel tuoche duto magMisri mane uluoro, kendo ginisik kuomu.
To bende nokel kuomu tuochekod masiche ma ok ondik e kitap chikni, nyaka urum.
Kata obedo niung’eny ka sulue manie polo kamano, to ji manok kuomu kende ema nodong’nikech ne ok uwinjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ruoth Nyasayenobed mamor kokethou, kendo kotiekou mana kaka nobedo mamor koguedhoukendo omiyo unya, mi nogolu gi thuon e piny ma udonjoe mondo ukau.
Ruoth Nyasaye nokeu e kind ogendini, chakre tung’ piny konchiel nyakatung’ piny komachielo, kendo kuondego duto unulamie nyiseche mag yienkod mag kite, ma un ok ung’eyo kata kwereu bende ne ok ong’eyo.
Ka une kind ogendinigo, to ok nuyud kue, to unuriwni e kindgi, kendo RuothNyasaye nomi ubed gi parruok, gi wenge mojony, kod chuny mokuyo.
Okunung’e gima biro timorenu, kendo unubed gi kihondko odiechieng’gotieno, mi ok unung’e sa thou.
Kihondkono gi gik mubiro neno, nomiuwach okinyi kokinyi ni, ‘Yaye! Mad obed odhiambo!’ To odhiambokodhiambo unuwach ni, ‘Yaye! Mad obed okinyi. ’
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwokuMisri gi yiedhi, kata obedo ni nosingore ni ok nudog kuno kendo. Unuhonru ni wasiku mondo ong’iewu ka wasumbni, to onge ng’amanong’iewu. "Rapar mar Chik
Mago e weche mag singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa mondo omijo-Israel otim, kane gin e piny jo-Moab.  Singruokno ne omedi kuomsingruok mane otimo kodgi Horeb. Singrouk mane Nyasaye otimo gi jo-Israel e piny Moab
Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto, mowachonigi niya, "Ne uneno gi wang’u gikmoko duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye otimo e piny Misri ni Farao gi jodonge kodpinye duto.
Timbe madongo mane unenogo ne gin ranyisi gi honni
to katakamano, nyaka chop sani Ruoth Nyasaye pok omiyou chuny mar ng’eyo, katawang’ mar neno, kata it mar winjo.
Ruoth Nyasaye osetelonu e thim kuomhigni piero ang’wen, to lepu kata wuochu pok oti,
bende ok usechamomakati kata madho divai kata gimoro mamero ji.  Notimonu kamano mondoung’ego ni en e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
Ka ne uchopo ka, to Sihonruodh Heshbon kod Og ruodh Bashan ne jomonjowa, to ne waloyogi.
Newakawo pinygi, mi wamiyo jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod nus jo-Manase mondoobed mwandugi.
Nyaka urit weche mag singruok adimba, mondo udhi maberkuom gik moko duto mutimo.
"Kawuono uchung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, koda ka jotenddhoutu gi jodongu gi jotendu mamoko kod jo-Israel duto, chwo,
gi monkod nyithindo, kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, kata mana jomamodonu yien, kendo ma umbonu pi.
Uikoru mondo ukuong’ru, kutimosingruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro timo kodu kawuono.
RuothNyasaye dwaro mondo oloku joge, kendo mondo obed Nyasachu kaka nonyisou,kendo kaka nosingore ne kwereu ma Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo.
Ok unkende ema amiyou utimo singruokni,
to ji duto mochung’ kodwa ka e nyimRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kaachiel gi ji duto maonge kodwa ka kawuono,bende amiyo otimo singruokni.
Ung’eyo kaka ne wadak e piny Misri,kendo kaka ne wakadho e pinje mag ogendini mamoko.
Bende nuneno gikmakuero ma gilamo, kod kido mag nyisechegi manono mag yien gi mag kite,kod mag fedha gi mag dhahabu.
Kapo ni nitie ng’ato kuomu ma dichwokata ma dhako, kata ka nitie joot kata dhoot moro madwaro weyo lamoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, mondo odhi olam nyiseche mag ogendinimamoko, to mano nyalo bedone chakruok mar masira gi lit.
Ka ng’atnoowinjo weche mag singruokni, mi owuondore e chunye ni onge gima birotime, kata koluwo timbene mag wich teko, to mano nokel masira maduong’.
Ruoth Nyasaye ok nowe ni ng’atno richone, kendo mirimbe mager nolielkuome, mi kuong’ duto mondiki e kitabuni nomake kendo Ruoth Nyasayenoruch nyinge oko.
Ruoth Nyasaye nopoge kuom dhout Israel duto, minosande kaka kuong’ duto mondik e kitabu mar chikni dwaro.
"E ndalo mabiro, nyikwau kod joma oa e pinje mamoko maboyo nonemasiche kod tuoche mane Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo e pinyni.
Piny dutonowang’ gi mach kendo notim chumbi, ma ok nyal pidhie, kata mana lumbende ok notwiye.  Nokethre mana ka Sodom gi Gomora, kod Adma gi Zeboim,mane Ruoth Nyasaye otieko gi mirimbe mager.
Bang’e ogendni dutonopenjre ni, ‘Ang’o momiyi Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo gima kama e pinyni? Eretiend mirima magerni?’
To nodwokgi niya, ‘Mano osetimore nikechjo-Israel ne ok oriti singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregiotimo kodgi kane gin e piny Misri.
Ne gilamo nyiseche mamoko mane okging’eyo, kendo mane Ruoth Nyasaye ok omiyogi mondo gilam.
Manoemomiyo mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye nobedo mager kuom pinyni, mi nokeloe kuong’duto mondik e kitabuni.
Osedhuologi gi lop tiendgi e pinygi gi mirimbemager, mi oterogi e piny machielo ma pod gintie nyaka chil kawuono. ’
"Nitie gik moko mopondo, to gin mag Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, to gikmoelnwa tiendgi ema omiwa kaachiel gi nyikwawa nyaka chieng, omiyowanyalo timo gik moko duto ma chikni dwaro. Rapar mar Chik
Gik ma onego ji tim mondo oduog ir Ruoth Nyasaye, mi oguedhgi
"Ka gueth kod kuong’ ma aketo e nyimugo duto osetimorenu, muparowechena e pinje ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseteroue,
mi uduogo iregi chunyu duto, kaachiel gi nyithindu, mana kaka chike ma amiyougidwaro,
to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nong’wonnu, mi nochak omi udhinyime maber kendo.  Enochak ochoku kendo kanyakla, kogolou e pinje dutomane okeyoue.
Kata obedo ni osekeyou e tung’ piny gi tung’ piny kamano,to nochak ochoku kaachiel kendo.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nodwoku epiny kwereu mondo udagie.  Enomi unya mang’eny, kendo ubed gi mwandumathoth moloyo kwereu.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nomi chunyu gi chunynyikwau tim gik ma odwaro, mondo uhere gi chunyu duto kendo gi adiera,eka ubed mangima.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nolok kuong’go dutoni wasiku, kendo ni joma sandou.
Unuchak uluor Ruoth Nyasaye kendo, miunurit chikene duto ma amiyou kawuonogi.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachunomedu mwandu mang’eny moloyo.  Unubed gi nyithindo mathoth, gi jamnimang’eny, kod cham mogundho.  Enobed mamor komiyou mwandu, mana kakanobedo mamor komiyo kwereu mwandu,
to mana ka uluore, murito chikenegi buchene kaka ondiki e kitabu mar chikni, kendo ka uduogo ire gichunyu duto kendo gi adiera.
"Chik ma amiou kawuononi ok en chik matek, to bende ok en kuma bor.  Oken e polo ma dimi uwach ni,
‘Ng’ama didhinwa malo e polo mondo oomnwachikno, kendo opuonjwa, eka warite?’
Bende ok en loka nam, ma dimiuwach ni, ‘Ng’ama ding’adnwa nam mondo okelwago, mi opuonjwa, ekawarite?’
To wach Nyasaye chiegni kodu ahinya, kendo en mana e dhoukendo e chunyu, omiyo ritogo yot.
"Neuru, kawuono aketo gik moko ariyo e nyimu mondo uyier.  Gin ngima giber, kata tho gi rach.
Ka umako chik Ruoth Nyasachu ma amiyou kawuono,muhere kuluwo yorene, kendo urito chikene gi buchene, to unubed mangima,mi ununya mang’eny, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhu e piny maubiro donjoe mondo ukaw.
To kuweye, mubaro kudhi lamo nyiseche mamokokendo ukulorunigi,
to ng’euru maler ni karu nolal nono, kendo okunudag aming’a e piny ma ubiro donjoe mondo ukaw, kuseng’ado aoraJordan.
Koro aluongo polo gi piny mondo obed joneno ni aseketo gikmoko ariyo e nyimu mondo uyier.  Gin ngima gi gueth, kata tho gi kuong’. To yieruru ngima, mondo udag maber kaachiel gi nyikwau.
Heruru RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, kuwinjo wachne, kendo kuketo chunyu kuome.  Manonomi ubed mangima, kendo udag aming’a e piny mane osingore ni kwereu maIbrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo. "Rapar mar Chik
Oket Joshua kar Musa
Musa nomedo wuoyo ni jo-Israel, kowacho niya,
"Koro hika gin miaachiel gi piero ariyo, kendo ok anyal dhi nyime gi telonu.  To bendeRuoth Nyasaye osenyisa ni ok nang’ad aora Jordan.
Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu owuon biro telo nyimu mondo otiek ogendini mudhi kawo pinygigo,mi unudag e pinygi, kendo Joshua notelnu kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro tieko ogendinigo mana kaka notieko Sihon gi Og,Ruodhi jo-Amor, kaachiel gi pinjegi.
Nochiwgi e luetu, mi unutimnigimana kaka nochikou.
Beduru gi chir, kendo gi jing’o.  Kik uluorgi, kendokik chunyu nyosre, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro dhi kodu, kendook noweu kata jwang’ou ok nojwang’u. "
Bang’e Musa noluongo Joshua mowachone e nyim jo-Israel duto niya, "Bedgi chir kendo gi jing’o, nikech in ema ibiro telo ni jogi ka gidhi epiny ma Ruoth Nyasaye nosingore ni kweregi ni nomigi, kendo inimigikawe.
Ruoth Nyasaye owuon biro teloni, kendo nobed kodi.  Ok noweyi,bende ok nojwang’i, omiyo kik ibed maluor, kendo kik chunyi nyosre. "Nyaka som chik bang’ higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo
Musa nondiko chikno momiyo jodolo ma jo-Lawi mane ting’o Sandug Mumamar Ruoth Nyasaye, kod jodong Israel duto.
Eka nochikogi kama: "Bang’higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo e higa miweyoe gope, e kinde mutimoe SapKiche,
ka jo-Israel duto biro mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachukama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie, to nyaka usom chikni matek enyimgi duto.
Nyaka uchik ji duto, chwo gi mon kod nyithindo, kaachielgi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, mondo giwinj chikno, eka gipuonjre luoroRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mi girit wechene duto maber.
Tienge mabiromapok ong’eyo wechegi nowinjgi, mi nopuonjre luoro Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu ndalo duto ma gidakgo e piny ma ubiro kawo ka useng’ado aoraJorda,. "Chike mogik mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa
