Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ibiro tho machiegni, omiyo luongJoshua udhi e Hemb Romo mondo akete e tich. " Omiyo Musa gi Joshua nejodhi kaka nowachnigi,
kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyore e Hema ka ni ebor polo mane ochung’ e dho Hema.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ka isetho, moyiki, to jogi biroweya mi luw nyiseche mag jomoko ma gidhi yudo ka gidonjo e pinyno, manakaka dhako weyo chwore, to dwanyore gi chwo mamoko.  Giniweya, kendoginiketh singruok ma asetimo kodgi.
Kuom mano, mirimba mager nolielkuomgi ka mach mi notiekgi.  Anawegi, kendo ok nakwan-gi ka joga, miginithagre malit, kendo ginine masiche madongo.  Eka bang’e giniwachniya, ‘Thagruokgi osebironwa mana nikech Nyasachwa koro ok ni kodwa. ’
To ok nawinjgi e ndalogo, nikech richo ma gisebedo ka gitimo mar lamonyiseche mamoko.
"Kuom mano, koro ndik wer ma anyisi ni, kendo ipuonjgi kaka iwere,mondo oparnigi chikena.
Ka asekelogi e piny maber kendo momew, kakanasingora ni kweregi, mi giyudo chiemo, kendo gidoko machwe, eka bang’eginichara, kendo giniketh singruokna, ka giluwo nyiseche mamoko kendotiyonigi.
Ka githagore malit kendo gineno masiche malit kamano, towendni nobednigi rapar, nimar nyikwagi nosik ka were.  Kata koroni, kapok akelogi e piny ma nasingora ni namigi, ang’eyo kaka chunygi chalo. "
Musa nondiko wendno chieng’no, mopuonjo jo-Israel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Joshua wuod Nun niya, "Bed gi chir, kendo gijing’o, nikech in ema nitelni jo-Israel ka gidhi e piny ma ne asingorani namigi kendo anabed kodi. "
Kane Musa osetieko ndiko chikno duto e kitabu,
nochiko jo-Lawi maneting’o Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
"Kawuru kitap chikni, ukete bath Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mondo obednu kanyo karapar,
nimar ang’eyo ni un joma wigi tek ta.  Usetamoru winjo RuothNyasaye kata ka pod angima ka an kodu.  Koro kasetho to ubiro dage machalnadi?
Omiyo chokuru jodong dhoutu gi jotendu duto e nyima, mondoawachnigi wechegi, kendo aluong polo gi piny mondo obedna joneno.
Ang’eyo ni ka asetho, to ubiro duworu malich, muwe yo ma asechikoue. Kuom mano, unune masiche e ndalo mabiro, nikech numiyo Ruoth Nyasayemirima gi timbeu maricho. "Wend Musa
Bang’e Musa nowachonigi weche duto mag wendni, ka oganda jo-Israelochiko itgi. Rapar mar Chik
"In polo, chik iti ka awuoyo!In piny, winj wechena!
Puonj mara mondo obedka koth machue e lek,kendo wechena mondo obedka tho mamiyo lum doko mang’ich.
Abiro luongo nying Ruoth Nyasaye,to dwokuru ni,‘Omi Nyasaye duong’!’
En lwanda, ma tichne long’o,nikech yorene duto ni kare. En Nyasaye ma jaadiera,kendo maonge ketho,ma timbene kare,kendo ma jaratiro.
Tieng’ni to en tieng’ makoch,kendo mobam,ma timbegi mobam nyiso niok gin nyithind Ruoth Nyasaye.
Yaye, oganda mofuwoma onge gi rieko,mano e kaka utimoni Ruoth Nyasaye adier?Donge en e wuorumane ochueyou?Donge en ema omiyou dokooganda maratego?
Paruru ndalo machon,kod tienge ma koro osekadho. Penjuru wuoneu kod jodongu,mondo ogannu sigendgi.
Kane Ng’ama Duong’ Moloyoochiwo ni ogendini pinjegi,mondo obed kuondegi mag dak,noketo ni oganda ka oganda tong’ pinygimaromre gi kar romb nyithi Nyasaye.
To Ruoth Nyasaye owuonnoyiero joka Jakobomondo obed joge owuon,kendo obed mwandune.
Noyudo ogandano e thimmalich ma ondiegi rutoe,mi nolworogi koni gi koni,moritogi maber.
Kaka ongo yiengo odemondo nyithinde owuogi,koyaro bwombene mondo okawgi,kendo oting’gi e bwombene,e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye yaro bwombene,kendo kawo ogandane.
Ruoth Nyasaye kende ema otelonigi,ka onge nyasaye moro makonye.
Nomiyo giidho gode mag piny,kendo omiyo gichamo gik ma nyak e lowo. Nomiyo gichamo mor kichmothodhi e kind lwanda,kod mor zeitunimanyak e lowo motimo kite.
Ne gin gi cha adila gi cha rombe,kod nyirombe gi imbe mabeyo moloyogi dhok moa Bashan, kod nyuogi,kaachiel gi ngano maber. Ne gimadho mana divai makwar maber.
Kamano dhood Jakobo nochiemo, moyieng’. Adier, joka Jeshurun nodoko machwe, mogwecho. Ee, nubedo machwe ahinya,nikech nuchiemo mang’eny. Ne giweyo Nyasaye ma nochweyogi,ka gicharo Lwanda ma noresogi.
Ne gimiyo nyiego omakekuom lamo nyiseche mamoko,kendo ne gimiye mirimagi timbegi makuero.
Ne gitimo liswecheni jochiende ma ok Nyasaye,kendo ni nyiseche ma ok ging’eyo,ma kata mana kweregi bende ne ok ong’eyo.
Wigi nowil gi Lwandama nochweyogi!Ne ok giparo Nyasayema nomiyogi ngima.
Ruoth Nyasaye noneno gik mane yawuote gi nyige timo,mi nojwang’oginikech ne giwang’o iye.
Nowacho niya,‘Ok named kwanogi ka joga,to abiro neno gikogi,nimar gin tieng’ ma wigi tek,nyithindo ma ok nyal gen.
Gisemiyo nyiego omaka,nikech giselamo gikma ok nyasaye. Adier gisewang’o iya,nikech giselamo gima nono. Omiyo abiro miyo nyiego makgika ayiero oganda ma nono oloyo,kendo abiro wang’o igi,ka ayiero oganda ma ok dew Nyasaye.
Mirimba osemoko mach!Mawang’o pinykaachiel gi gik manyakie,kendo owang’o mise mag gode,bende ochopo kata kar joma otho e liel piny.
Anamed masiche kuom joga,kendo nachielgi gi asechena duto,
mi kech nokagi,kendo midhusi notuogi,kendo tuoche maricho nogogi,bende naol kuomgi ondiegi mangemo,kod thuonde man gi kwiri mager.
Ligangla noneggi ka gin oko,kendo ka gin ei udi,mi nyithindgi nodong’ kiye,kendo mondgi nodok mond liete. Yawuowi gi nyiri bende notho,kaachiel gi nyithindo mayom,kod jodongo moti.
Naparo ni mondo ang’adgi matindotindo,kendo atiekgi ma ok nochak opargi.
To naparo ni dipo ka wasigu ojara,ka gipakore ni gin ema gisetimo gigo duto,to ok an, Ruoth Nyasaye. ’
"Joma wacho kamanogin oganda mofuwo,kendo maonge gi paro.
Ka dine giriek,to dine ging’eyo tiend gik matimore,dine ging’eyo gima biro timorenigi e giko.
Ere kaka ng’at achiel dilaw ji gana achiel,kata ji ariyo riemb ji gana apar,mak mana ka ok Ruoth Nyasaye ma Lwandagi ema oweyogi,moketogi e lwet wasikgi?
To adier, lwanda mar wasikwa ok chal gi Lwandawa,kata mana wasikwa bende ong’eyo kamano.
Mzabibu maggi gin mzabip Sodom, mopidh Gomorama olembgi otimo kwiri, kendo kech.
Divachgi chalo gi kwich thuol mager.
"Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,‘Donge gigo duto okan maber e od kenona,
nyaka chop chieng’ ma abiro chuloe kuor kendo kumogimana chieng’ ma tiendgi nokierie, mi gipodh piny?Chieng’’ mar masira,ma gibiro rumoesudonigi machiegni!’
"Adier, ka Ruoth Nyasaye oneno ni joge ool,kendo ni onge kata ng’at achiel modong’ makonyogi,to obiro ng’adonigi bura maber,kendo obiro kechogi.
Enowach niya,‘Nyisecheu ni kanye,lwanda mane udwaro yudo konyruok kuome?
Ere nyisecheu mane chamo boche mag misengni mau,kendo madho divai mar misengni miolo piny?Koro gibi mondo gikonyu,kendo gibednu kar konyruok. ’
"Koro ng’euru malong’o nian e Nyasaye,kendo onge nyasaye moro,mak mana an. An kende ema anego ji,kendo an ema achiwo ngima. Ahinyo, bende achango. Onge ng’ama nyalo reso ng’ato e lweta.
Koro ating’o badaka akuong’ora gi nyinga awuon mochwere ni,
kasepiago ligangla mamil,to anachul kuor ni wasika,kendo kasechako ng’ado bura,to anakum jogo mochaya.
Anami asere maga chadhregi remb joma onegi kod joma omaki. Liganglana nochadh jotend wasigu.
"Un polo, morurukaachiel gi Ruoth Nyasaye. Un nyiseche duto,kulreneuru. Moruru un ogendini kaachiel gi joge,kendo malaika duto mag Nyasaye mondo opak tekone,nikech enochul kuor kuom remb jotichne,kokumo wasike kod joma ochaye. Enopwodh piny kaachiel gi joge. "
Musa nobiro gi Joshua wuod Nun, mosomo weche duto mag wendno, ka jiochiko itgi.
Kane Musa osetieko wuoyo ni jo-Israel duto,
nowachoniginiya, "Chikuru itu maber mondo uwinj weche duto ma asiemougo kawuono. Puonjuru nyithindu chikego duto, mondo girit kendo gitim, mak giweyokata achiel,
nikech ok gin weche ma nono, to gin e ngimau.  Kuritogi,to gibiro miyo udag aming’a e piny ma ubiro kawo ka useng’ado aoraJordan. "Nyasaye oyie mondo Musa one piny Kanaan
Odiechieng’ onogo Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Idh got Neboma en achiel kuom gode Abarim manie piny Moab, yo wuokchieng’ marJeriko, mondo irang piny Kanaan ma abiro miyo jo-Israel ka mwandugi.
Initho ewi got ma ibiro idhono, mi iluw kwereni, mana kaka owadu Harunnotho e got Hor, moluwo kwerene.
Gima kamano nyaka timre nimar nukethoe nyima kane ok uluora e nyim jo-Israel e sokni mag Meribath-kadesh, ethim Zin.
Inine piny ma abiro miyo jo-Israelno gi chien, to okinidonjie. "Rapar mar Chik
Musa oguedho dhout Israel
Kane Musa ng’at Nyasaye chiegni tho, noguedho jo-Israel, kowacho kama:
"Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro koa Sinai. Ne orienynigi gie Seir,kendo gie got Paran. Nobiro ka ji maler gana gi gana oruowo e bathe ma korachwich.
Adier, ohero joge maler,kendo oguedhogi. Giluwe kamoro amora modhiye,kendo giwinjo chikene
mane Musa omiyowa,mondo obed mwandu mar oganda joka Jakobo.
Ruoth Nyasaye nodoko Ruodh Israelma bende iluongo ni jo-Jeshurum,kane jodong dhoutgi ochokore kaachiel. "
Kuom jo-Reuben, Musa nowachoe niya,"Jo-Reuben mondo obed mangima kendo kik githo,to kata kamano, onego gibed manok. "
Kuom jo-Juda to nowuoyoe kama,"A Ruoth Nyasaye, winj ywak jo-Judamondo idwokgi kuom ogandagi. Bednigi tekregi ma gisiroregokendo ikonygi kuom wasikgi. "
Jo-Lawi to nowuoyo kuomgi niya,"A Ruoth Nyasaye,nimiyo nyikwa Lawi ombulumiluongo ni Urim gi Thumimmondo ging’ego dwaroni,nikech gin joma tiyoni gi adiera. Ne itemogi Masa,kendo e sokni mag Meribami inwang’o nigin joma inyalo geno.
Hera mane giherigooloyo heramane giherogo wuonegigi minegi kod owetegi,kata nyithindgi,nikech ne giluwo mana chikeni,mi girito singruok mari maber.
Gipuonjo joka Jakobo chikeni. Ee, gipuonjo jo-Israel chikeni. Giwang’oni misengni,madum tik mamit,kendo gitimoni misengnimiwang’o pepe kendoni mar misango.
A Ruoth Nyasaye,guedh riekogi duto,kendo iyie gi tichgi. Tiek wasikgi duto,mondo wasikgigo kik chak bed gi teko. "
To kuom jo-Benjamin nowuoyoe kama,"Joma Ruoth Nyasaye oheroodak gi kue;Nyasaye Maduong Moloyoritogi seche duto,kendo gidak e godene. "
Kuom joka Josef to nowachoe niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye onego guedh lopgi,gi chiwo maber moa e polo malo,kaachiel gi pi manie bwo piny,
gi olembe mabeyo ma chieng’ onyago,kod olembe mabeyo manyak due ka due,
gi gik mabeyo mag gode ma chon mochwere,
kaachiel gi gik mabeyo mag piny,kod gik moko duto manie iye,gi ng’wono mar Jal modak e Bungu Maliel. Guethgi duto onego bed ewi joka Josef,jal mane oyier kuom owetene.
Dhoode nochal gi nyarwath makayo,ma tungene chalo gi tung jowi,ma obiro chwowogo ogendini,moriembgi nyaka tung piny gi tung’ piny. Tungego gin gi ji tara gi tara ma jo-Efraim,kod ji gana gi gana ma jo-Manase. "
Jo-Zebulun to nowuoyo kuomgi kama,"Un jo-Zebulun,beduru mamor e wuodheu,kendo un jo-Isakar,beduru mamor e hembeu.
Dhoudi ariyogo biro luongo ogendini e got,kama gitimoe misengni makare,nimar gibiro yudo mwandu mogundho e nembe,kendo gik mabeyo mopondo e dhonam. "
Kuom jo-Gad to nowuoyoe niya,"Oguedh jalo mayaro tong’ jo-Gad. Dhood Gad chalo gi sibur madhako, mogwom piny,ka yiecho bat gi wi gima omako.
Ne giyiero piny koma ber moloyo,nikech gin ema nopognigi migap jatelo. Ne gibiro ir jotend ji,kendo ne gitimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro,ka girito chikemane Ruoth Nyasayeomiyo jo-Israel. "
Kuom jo-Dan nowachoe kama,"Dhood Dan chalo gi nyathi sibuor,machikore koa Bashan. "
Kuom jo-Naftali to nowuoyoe niya,"Dhood Naftali nigi gik moko duto modwaro,kendo en gi gueth mogundho,moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Bende opogne nam Galilikod dho wedhe ma milambo. "
To kuom jo-Asher nowachoe kama,"Dhood Asher mondo oyud guethmoloyo dhout owetene mamoko. Dhout owetene mondo oher dhoode, kendo mondo dhoode odag maber.
Lodi mag dhorangeyene obed mag chuma gi mag mula,kendo tekone omedre ndalo duto.
"Onge Nyasaye moro machal gi Nyasach joka Jeshurunmaringo e kor polo e duong’ne maler mondo okonyu.
Nyasaye mochwere ma nyaka chieng’ en kar daku,kendo bedene mochwere ema konyou. Noriembonu wasigu,mi ogolo chik mondo neggi.
Kamano jo-israel odak gi kue. Adier, nyikwa Jakobo odakmaonge ng’ama thagogie piny machiego cham gi divai,kama tho moa e polo tonie maber.
Ere joma mor ka un,un jo-Israel ma Ruoth Nyasaye owaro!Ruoth Nyasaye e kuot mogeng’ou,kendo en e liganglau mar duong’. Wasiku mondo obolrenu,kendo unyon hembko maggi gi tiendu. "Rapar mar Chik
Tho mar Musa
Musa nowuok oa e paw Moab moidho got Nebo nyaka wi Pisga yo wuokchieng’mar Jeriko, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nonyise piny Kanaan duto, chakre Gileadnyaka Dan,
gi piny Naftali duto, kod piny Efraim gi Manase kaachiel gipiny Juda duto nyaka nam Mediterenia man yo podho chieng’,
gi piny manyo milambo, kod paw holo man yo Jeriko miluongo ni Dala Othidhe, nyakaZoar.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Ma e piny mane asingora ni Ibrahimgi Isaka kod Jakobo ni nami nyikwagi.  Asenyisigo mondo inene gi wang’i,to kata kamano, ok niidh loka, midonjie. "
Kamano, Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye notho e piny Moab kuno, mana kakaRuoth Nyasaye nosewacho,
mi noyike e holo momanyore gi Beth-peor e pinyMoab.  To onge ng’ama ong’eyo liende nyaka chil kawuono.
Musa ne otho ka jahigni mia achiel gi piero ariyo, to ne pod en ng’atmatek ma wang’e bith.
Jo Israel noywage e paw Moab kuom ndalo pieroadek, nyaka ndalo miywagego norumo.
Joshua wuod Nun nomi rieko mathoth,nikech Musa noseyieyo lwete kuome, mi jo-Israel nowinje, motimo gik maneRuoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa.
Nyaka koroni janabi moro machal gi Musa,mane Ruoth Nyasaye romogo wang’ gi wang’, pok owuok e Israel.
Parururanyisi gi honni duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye ooro Musa mondo odhi otim niFarao gi joge kod piny Misri duto,
kendo paruru timbe madongo kendomalich mane Musa otimo, ka jo-Israel neno. Joshua
Jo-Israel ikore mondo omonj piny Kanaan
Kane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye osetho, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshuawuod Nun, mane jalup Musa niya,
"Musa jatichna osetho.  Omiyo ikri gijo-Israel duto mondo ung’ad aora Jordan, udhi e piny mamiyou.
Kamoroamora ma tiendu onyono, nobed maru, kaka nasingora ni Musa.
Kuonde dutonobed mau, chakre e thim ma yo milambo, nyaka Lebanon yo nyandwat, kendokoa Yufrate, aora maduong’ man yo wuok chieng’, koluwo piny jo-Hiti,nyaka Nam Mediterenia man yo podho chieng’.
Onge ng’at ma nosiri nyakachieng’.  Anabed kodi kaka nabet gi Musa, Ok naweyi kata jwang’i oknajwang’i.
Bed gi chir, kendo gi jing’o, nimar in ema nitel ni jogagi,ka gikawo piny mane asingora ni kweregi ni namigi.
To bed mana gi chir,kendo gi jing’o, kiluwo chik duto mane Musa jatichna omiyi.  Kik iwechikno, kibaro koracham kata korachwich, mi inibed gi hawi kuonde dutomidhiye.
Kik wiyi wil gi Kitap Chikno, to nyaka isome odiechieng’gotieno, kendo ine ni iluwo chik duto mondikie.  Eka inidongi, kendonoguedh gik moko duto mitimo.
Par kaka asechiki ni mondo ibed gi chirkendo gi jing’o.  Kik iluor, kendo kik chunyi nyosre, nikech an RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachi, an kodi kuonde duto midhiye. "
Eka Joshua nochiko jotend jo-Israel kowachonigi niya,
"Wuothuru ekambi duto, kunyiso ji niya, ‘Ikreuru, nimar bang’ ndalo adek ubirong’ado aora Jordan, mondo ukaw piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye miyou. ’ "
Joshua nowacho ni jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel niya,
"Paruru gima Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye nochikou, kowacho niya, ‘RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu nomiu pinyni mondo obed kar daku. ’
Mondu ginyithindu kod jambu nyalo dong’ e piny mane Musa omiyou yo wuok chieng’mar aora Jordan, to un jolweny nyaka uidh loka, kutelo e nyim jo-Israelweteu, mondo ukonygi kedo.
Ka gin bende gisekawo piny ma Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu miyogi, kendo gidakie, eka unuduogi, mondo udag e pinyuuwegi man yo wuok chieng mar aora Jordan, mane Musa jatich Nyasayeomiyou. "
Ne giduoko Joshua niya, "Wanatim duto michikowa, kendo wanadhi kamoroamora miorowae.
Wanawinji kaka ne wawinjo Musa, to Nyasaye mondo obedkodi kaka nobedo gi Musa!
Ng’ato ang’ata ma nodagi winjo chikni, katama notamre timo gima ichiko, nonegi.  Omiyo bed gi chir kendo gi jing’o!"Joshua
Joshua ooro jombetre Jeriko
Kane pod gin Shitim, Joshua wuod Nun nooro jombetre ariyo ling’ling’mondo odhi ocheng piny.  Jombetrego nodhi Jeriko modonjo e od dhako moroma ohodho ma nyinge Rahab, kendo ne ginindo kanyo.
To ruodh Jerikonoyudo wach ni jo-Israel moko osebiro kanyo gotieno mondo ocheng piny,
omiyo nooro ni Rahab wach, kochike niya, "Golnwa joma nie odigo oko,nimar gisebiro mondo gicheng pinywa duto. "
To noyudo dhakonoosepandogi, omiyo nodwoko ruoth niya, "Adier, jomoko nende obiro e oda,to ne ok ang’eyo kuma giaye.
Nende giwuok kar sa miloroe rangach kapiny dwaro yuso, to akia kuma gidhiye.  Kulawogi matek, to ubiro jukogi. "
To chutho, noseterogi e tado, moumogi gi tworo mane osechano kanyo.
Jootego nowuok, molor rangach.  Ne gilawo jombetre ka giluwo yo madhikuma iyorogo aora Jordan.
Kane Rahab odhi ir jombetrego e tado, nonwang’o ka pok ginindo,
mowachonigi niya, "Ang’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyou pinyni, kendo enadier ni waduto waluor nikech birou, kendo kibaji omako piny duto.
Wasewinjo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nodwono pi Nam Makwar e nyimu, kane uaMisri.  Bende wasewinjo kaka nunego Sihon gi Og, ruodhi mag jo-Amon manloka Jordan, kaachiel gi ogendini mag lweny.
Kane wawinjo wachno, newadoko maluor.  Birou bende osekawo chunywa duto, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu en Nyasach polo gi piny.
Emomiyo koro kuong’renauru e nyingRuoth Nyasaye kendo umiya ranyisi ni kaka asetimonu maber, un bendenutimne joodwa maber.
Singrenauru ni unures wuora gi mama kod owetenagi nyiminena, kaachiel gi joutgi duto.  Kik uwe watho. "
Jogo nodwokeniya, "Kutho, to kara wan bende owojore watho.  Ka Ruoth Nyasayeosemiyowa pinyni, to wanarit singruokwa, kendo wanatimni maber, mak manakihulo wachwani. "
Rahab nodak e ot mochuog e kor ohinga mar dala Jeriko, omiyo nogologigie dirisa, molorogi piny gi tol,
kowachonigi niya, "Dhiuru e got,nikech dipo ka joma lawou oyudou, ponduru kuno kuom ndalo adek, tobang’e ka jogo oseduogo, eka uchak wuoth. "
Jombetrego nosieme ni ka okotimo gima gichike, to muma ok nomakgi.
Ne giwachone niya, "Chieng mawanadonj e pinyni, to nyaka itue tol makwarni e dirisa kama ilorowaeni,kendo ichok wuoru gi meru gi oweteni kod joodu duto, mondo gibed kodi eodi ka.
Ka ng’ato nowuog oko, mi negi, to rembe nobed e wiye owuon,kendo ok wanabed joketho.  To ka oneg ng’ato man kodi e ot, to rembenobed e wiwa.
To kapo ni ihulo wachwani, muma ok nomakwa. "
Nodwokoginiya, "Obed kamano. " Eka noweyogi, mi gidhi.  To bang’e notueyo tolmakwar e dirisa.
Kamano ne gidhi e got, mi gipondo kuno.  Joma ne lawogi nomanyogikuonde duto e yo madhi Jordan kuom ndalo adek, to ne ok giyudogi, omiyone gidok Jeriko.
Eka jombetre ariyogo nolor oa e got.  Ne ging’adoaora, mi gidok ir Joshua.
Ne ginyise weche duto ma notimorenigi, kagimedo nyise niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyowa pinyno duto, kendo kibajiosemako ji duto, ka giwinjo birowa. "Joshua
Jo-Israel ong’ado aora Jordan
Gokinyi mang’ich, Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nowuok Shitim, mi gidhiaora Jordan.  Ne gibworo kanyo ka pok ging’ado aora.
Bang’ ndalo adekjotelo nowuotho e kambi duto,
ka ginyiso ji niya, "Kuneno ka jo-Lawi majodolo otelo e nyimu koting’o Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasachu, eka unbende unuchak wuoth kuluwo Sanduk.
Kuluwe kamano, eka unung’e yo monegouluw, nimar yandi pok ubiro koni.  To kik usud machiegni kode; weuruthuolo ma dirom ondamo alufu achiel. "
Joshua nowacho ni ji niya,"Puodhreuru nikech kiny Ruoth Nyasaye notimnu hono maduong’. "
Ekanowacho ni jodolo niya, "Ting’uru Sandug Muma, kendo utel ni ji. " Mi negitimo kamano.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Tinendeni abiro chako miyi bedogi duong’ e nyim jo-Israel duto kendo gining’e ni abedo kodi mana kakanabedo gi Musa.
Omiyo nyis jodolo moting’o Sandug Muma, ni, ka gichopoe aora Jordan, to mondo gichung’ e pi. "
Joshua nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Biuru ka mondo uwinj gima RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu owacho.
Tinende unuyud ranyisi ni Nyasaye mangimani kodu, kendo nodarnu jo-Kanaan gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Hivi gi jo-Perizi gijo-Girgash gi jo-Amor kod jo-Jebus.
Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye maRuodh piny ngima notelnu kung’ado aora Jordan,
,
kendo ka jodolomoting’e nonyon pi Jordan, to aora nowe mol, mi pi moa malo nogudrekogingore ka pith.  Koro yieruru ji apar gariyo kuom dhout Istrael,kugolo ng’at achiel e dhoot ka dhoot. "
Omiyo ji nowuok e kambi mondoong’ad aora Jordan, ka jodolo otelonigi koting’o Sandug Muma.  Ne enndalo keyo, kinde mane aora pong’ie mao.
Kane jodolo ochopo e dhoaora, mi giketo tiendegi e pi,
gikanyono pi nochung’ gi yo ka malo,kogingore machiegni gi Adam, dala man but Zarethan.  Pi mane mol kochomonam mar Araba, miluongo ni Nam Kado, noduono chuth, mi jo-Israelnong’ado aora kama omanyore gi Jeriko.
Jodolo ma noting’o Sandug Mumamar Ruoth Nyasaye nochung’ e lowo motwo e dier Jordan nyaka jo-Israelduto notieko kadho, ka giwuotho e lowo motwo. Joshua
Ogol kite apar gariyo e aora Jordan
Kane ji duto oseng’ado aora Jordan, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshuaniya,
"Yier ji apar gariyo, kigolo ng’at achiel e dhoot ka dhoot,
kendo chikgi mondo gikwany kite apar gariyo e dier Jordan, kama nejodolo ochung’ie, mondo giting’gi mi gichunggi kama ang’ nubworiegotienoni. "
Eka Joshua noluongo ji apar gariyo ma noseyiero,
mowachonigi niya, "Kadhuru utel e nyim Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nyaka e dier Jordan, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo okwany kidiachiel oyie e goke, mondo kidi ka kidi ochung’ ni dhoot ka dhoot.
Kitego nobednu ka rapar e ndalo mabiro, kendo ka nyithindu nopenjungechgi,
to ununyisgi kaka pi aora Jordan ne odono kane Sandug Muma marRuoth Nyasaye kadho.  Kamano kitego nobed rapar ni jo-Israel ndalo duto. "
Jo-Israelgo notimo gima ne Joshua ochikogi, kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosechike.  Ne gikwanyo kite apar gariyo e dier Jordan, maromre gi karkwan dhoutgi, kendo ne giting’ogi nyaka kama ne gidhi bworoe, migiketogi kanyo.
Bende Joshua nochungo kite apar gariyo moko e dier aoraJordan, kama jodolo mane oting’o Sandug Muma ochung’ie, kendo kitego podni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
Jodolo ma noting’o Sandug Muma nochung’achung’a e dier Jordan nyaka ji notieko timo gik moko duto mane RuothNyasaye ochiko Joshua mondo gitim.  Ji nokadho piyopiyo,
to kanegiseng’ado aroa giduto, eka jodolo bende nong’ado gi Sanduk mar RuothNyasaye,
Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel ema nong’ado aorakotelo ni jo-Israel, ka giikore ni lweny kaka Musa nosewachonogi.
Jialufu mia ang’wen moikore ni lweny nong’ado aora e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kagiidho loka nyaka paw Jeriko mondo gikedi.
Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasayenomiyo Joshua bedo gi duong’ ahinya e nyim jo-Israel duto, kendo negimiye luor e ngimane duto, mana kaka ne gimiyo Musa.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya,
"Chik jodolo moting’o SandugRapar, mondo owuog e aora Jordan. "
Mi Joshua notimo kamano.
To kanejodolo oseidho loka, mo nyono lowo motwo, aora nochako mol kendo, migenge nopong’ kaka chon,
Jo-Israel nong’ado aora Jordan tarik apar mar due mokwongo, kendo negibworo Gilgal, yo wuok chieng’ mar Jeriko.
Kanyo Joshua nochungoekite apar gariyo mane gigolo e aora Jordan.
Eka nowacho ni jo-Israelniya, "Ka nyikwau nopenju ngech kitegi e ndalo mabiro,
to ununyisgi nijo-Israel nong’ado aora Jordan kotwo,
kendo ne Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nomiyo aora Jordan odwono nyaka ne ukadho uduto mana kakanomiyo nam Makwar oduono nyaka ne wakadho.
Kamano ji duto manie pinynong’e teko mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ginimi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuduong’ nyaka chieng’. "Joshua
Jo-Israel oter nyangu, kendo ocham Pasaka, Gilgal
Ruodhi duto mag jo-Amor ma nodak yo podho chieng’, kod jo-Kanaan manodak mokiewo gi Nam Mediterenia nowinjo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo aoraJordan oduono ka jo-Israel kadho.  Omiyo kihondko nomakogi, mi gidokomaluor, kendo chunygi noa nikech jo-Israel.
E ndalogo, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Los miriye mag kite,mondo ochak oter jo-Israel nyangu kendo. "
Omiyo Joshua noloso miriye,motero ji nyangu e Gibeathhaaraloth.
Notimo kamano nikech ji duto manosebedo madongo moromo kedo e kinde mane gia Misri nosetho e thim kanepod gin e yo.
To kata obedo ni joma chwo duto ma noa Misri noseternyangu, ji duto ma nonywol e kinde mane ging’ado thim ne pok oternyangu.
Jo-Israel nosewuotho e thim kuom higni piero ang’wen, kendojoma dongo duto mane oa Misri koseromo kedo nosetho, nikech ne ok giritochik Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ruoth Nyasaye noramo ni ok nowe gine piny momewkendo man gi mwandu mane osesingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa.
To yawuotgima nodongo bang’gi ne ok oter nyangu kane giwuotho e thim.  Omiyo gin emaJoshua noterogi nyangu.
Kane osetergi nyangu, ji duto nobet e kambi nyaka ne gichango.
EkaRuoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Tinendeni asegolo ayanj jo-Misrioko kuomu. " Mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni Gilgal, kendo pod iluongekamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Kane jo-Israel obworo Gilgal e paw Jeriko, ne gitimo Pasaka godhiambodue apar gang’wen mar dueno.
Kinyne ne gichamo chamb Kanaan.  Ne enchamb abula, kod makati moted maonge thowi.
Chakre chieng’ manejo-Israel ochamoe chiemb Kanaanno, chiemb Manna mane oyudo gichamonorumo, mi ne ok giyudo moko kendo.  Higano ne gichamo mana chemb Kanaan. Joshua oromo gi ng’at moying’o ligangla
Kane Joshua ochopo machiegni gi Jeriko, noneno ng’at mochung’; enyime, koting’o ligangla, Joshua nodhi ire, mopenje niya, "In jakorwa,koso jasikiwa?"
Ng’atno nodwoke niya, "An ka kaka jaduong’ jolweny magRuoth Nyasaye. " Joshua nogoyo chonge piny, mokulore nyaka e lowo,mowacho niya, "Ang’o midwaro mondo atim ruodha?"
Jaduong’ jolweny magRuoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Lony wuocheni nimar kama ichung’ieno enkama ler. " Mi Joshua notimo kamano. Joshua
Jo-Israel okawo Jeriko
Ranga Jeriko nolor matek mondo ogeng’ jo-Israel oko, kendo onge ng’amane nyalo donjo kata wuok.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya,"Asechiwo Jeriko gi ruodhe e lweti.
Nyaka ilwor dalano gi jogi maglweny kuom ndalo auchiel, kilwore odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ dichiel.
Jodolo abiriyo nyaka dhi e nyim Sandug Muma, koting’ tunge abiriyomolos gi tunge imbe.  To chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka ilwor dala gi jogi maglweny nyadibiriyo, ka jodolo goyo tungegi.
Ka giselwore kamano, tomondo gigo tung’ dichiel matek.  Gikanyono muwinjoe tung’, to ji dutomondo okog matek.  Eka ohinga mar Jeriko nopodh riep, kendo oganda lwenynodonj e dala, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato ochomo nyime tir. "
Omiyo Joshua wuod Nun nolwongo jodolo, mowacho nigi niya, "Ting’uruSandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye, to ji abiriyo kuomu mondo otel e nyime,koting’o tunge abiriyo molos gi tunge imbe. "
Eka nowacho ni jolwenyniya, "Wuothuru mondo ulwor dala Jeriko, ka jolweny moa e dhoudi ariyogi nus kande otelo gi Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Kane Joshua osechikojolweny kamano, jodolo abiriyo moting’o tunge abiriyo e nyim RuothNyasaye nochako wuoth ka goyo tung’, kendo Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasayene luwo bang’gi.
Jolwenygo notelo e nyim jodolo mane goyo tung’, tomoko ne luwo bang’ Sanduk, kendo e kindeno duto tung’ ne ywak.
ToJoshua nokwero ji ni kik gikogi, kendo kik gilos nyaka chop chieng’ maenogol chik, eka ginikog matek.
Kane Joshua osegolo chik kamano, ne gilworo dala dichiel gi Sanduk marRuoth Nyasaye.  Eka bang’e ne gidok e kambi mi ginindo kanyo.
Joshuanochiew gokinyi mang’ich, kendo jodolo noting’o Sanduk mar RuothNyasaye.
Jodolo abiriyo moting’o tunge abiriyo notelo e nyim Sandukmar Ruoth Nyasaye ka goyo tung’.  Jolweny moko notelonigi, to moko neluwo Sanduk, kendo e kindego duto tung’ ne ywak.
Kamano ne gilworodala dichiel chieng’ mar ariyo eka gidok e kambi.  Ne gitimo kamano kuomndalo auchiel.
To chieng’ mar abiriyo, ne gichiew ka ugue wang’, mi gilworo daladibiryo.  Chieng’no kende ema ne gilworoe dalani dibiriyo.
E sa manegilworee mar abiriyo jodolo ne goyo tung’.  Eka Joshua nowacho ni jolwenyniya, "Koro gueuru, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyou dalani.
To jomaodakie kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye noketh chuth, kendo dhano oknomulgi, to ginibed gik mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Rahab gi ji duto manieode kende ema nowe ka ngima, nikech en ema nopando jombetre mane waoro.
To un, beduru motang’ kendo kik ugomb gik mokwer! Kik ukaw kata achielkuomgi, nikech kutimoo kamano to masira momako jodalano nomak kambijo-Israel, kendo nokelnigi chandruok.
To fedha gi dhahabu duto kod gikmoko molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo ema nobed gik mochiw ni RuothNyasaye, kendo nyaka tergi e kar keno mare. "
Jodolo nogoyo tung’, kendo kane jolweny owinjo, ne gigueyo gi duolmaduong’, mi ohinga mar dala nopodho.  Eka jolweny duto nodonjo e dala,ka ng’ato ka ng’ato ochomo nyime tir, mi gikawe.
Ne giketho gik mokoduto e dalano, bende ne ginego ng’ato ang’ata ma dichwo kata ma dhako,ma rawera kata moti, kod dhok gi romb kod kenje.
Joshua nowacho ni jombetre ariyo kande mondo odhi e od Rahab okelekaachiel gi joode, kaka ne gisesingore ni ginitim.
Omiyo yawuowigonodhi, mogolo Rahab gi wuon kod min, gi owetene kod ji duto mane nikode.  Ne gikelogi duto, mi giweyogi e kambi mar jo-Israel gi yo ka oko.
Eka ne giwang’o dala gi gik moko duto manie iye, mak mana fedha gidhahabu kod gik molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo ema ne gikawo, migikano kar keno mar od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kamano Joshua noreso ngima Rahabgi joode kod ji duto mane nii kode, nikech nosepando jombetre ma noormondo ocheng Jeriko.  Nyikwa Rahab pod odak gi jo-Israel nyaka chilkawuono.
Chieng’no Joshua nokwero ji gi kuong’ niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo okumng’at ma notem gero Jeriko kendo! Koketo mise mare, to wuode makayonotho, kendo kochungo dharangaye, to wuode ma chogo notho. "
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ne ni kod Joshua, mi humbe nolak e pinyno duto. Joshua
Richo mar Akan
To jo-Israel ne ok orito chik mane Nyasaye ogolo ni mondo oketh gikmoko duto.  Akan wuod Karmi ma wuod Zabdi ma wuod Zera ma ja-Juda nokawogik mokwer mi Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho gi jo-Israel.
Kane gin Jeriko, Joshua noseoro jomoko mondo odhi Ai, dala manmachiegni gi Bethaven, yo wuokchieng’ mar Bethel, mondo girang kakapinyy chalo.  Mi jogo notimo kamano.
Kane giduogo Jeriko, ne giwacho niJoshua niya, "Jolweny duto ok onego dhi Ai to or mana ji alufu adek kataariyo kende ema mondo odhi omonje.  Kik imi jolweny duto sandre gi idhomalo kuro, nikech joma odak kuno nok. "
Kamano ji ma dirom alufu adeknodhi Ai, to jo-Ai noriembogi,
kendo nonego ji alufu piero adekgauchiel kuomgi.  Jo-Ai nolawogi chakre rangagi nyaka Shebarim, monegogikama yo ridoree.  Gikanyono chir mane jo-Israel nigo nolalnigi ka yamo.
Joshua gi jodong Israel noyiecho lepgi, kendo noolo buru e wigi.  Negiriere piny auma e nyim Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giriyo kanyo nyakaodhiambo.
Joshua nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, ere gimomiyo isekelojogi loka Jordan mana ni mondo ichiwgi e lwet jo-Amor, kendo itiekgi?Mad ne wasik loka cha!
A Ruoth Nyasaye ang’o ma dawachi ka koro wasiguoseriembo jo-Israel?
Kapo ni jo-Kanaan kod jopinyno duto owinjo wachni,to gibiro nur kuomwa, kendo yweyowa ka yuech.  To koro ang’o ma nitimmondo ires nyingi maduong’ni?"
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko Joshua niya, "A malo! Ang’o momiyo inindo aumakamano?
Jo-Israel oseketho! Ok giserito chik mane amiyogi, togisekwalo gik mokwer, kendo giriwogi gi mekgi.
Mano emomiyo ok ginyalsiro wasikgi, to giringo nimar gin bende koro okwedgi.  Ka ok giwang’ogimoro amora mokwer ma gisekawo, to ok anabed kodgi.
"A malo! Luong ji duto, kendo chikgi mondo gipwodhre ka giikore nigima kiny notimre.  Nyisgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho nigisekawo gik mokwer, omiyo ka pok gigolo gigo kuomgi, to ok ginyal sirowasikgi.
Kiny gokinyi giniwuog oko libamba ka libamba, kendo libambama Ruoth Nyasaye okwanyo nowuog oko dhoot ka dhoot.  To dhoot ma RuothNyasaye okwanyo nowuog oko anywola ka anywola.
Eka anywola ma RuothNyasaye okwanyo nowuog oko ng’ato ka ng’ato.  To ng’at ma ombulu nonyisni nokawo gik mokwer, nowang’ gi joge kaachiel gi mwandune duto, nikechosetimo gima nono, kendo oseketho chik mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo jogeIsrael. "
Joshua nochiew gokinyi mang’ich, moluongo jo-Israel oko libamba kalibamba, to libamba mar jo-Juda ema nokwany.
To noluongo dhout Juda,joka Zera ema nokwany.  Kuom joka Zera, anywola mar Zabdi ema nokwany.
Kane ogolo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuom joka Zabdi, to Akan wuod Karmi, mawuod Zabdi, ma wuod Zera, ema nokwany.
Eka Joshua nowacho ni Akanniya, "Wuoda, mi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel duong’, kendo hulnerichoni.  Nyisa gima isetimo, ma ok ipanda kata achiel. "
Akan nodwokeniya, "Adier aseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,
nikechkane aneno law maber molos Shinar, gi fedha ma pekne oromo kilo ariyo,kod dhahabu ma pekne oromo nus kilo kuom mwandu Jeriko, gombo nomaka,makawogi.  Nakunyogi e hemba ka fedha ema akuongo keto e bur. "
Joshuanooro joote, modhi e hema piyopiyo.  Ne giyudo gigo koyiki e lowo manakaka Akan nowacho.
Ne gigologi, kendo gikelogi ir Joshua kod jo-Israelduto, mi giyarogi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eka Joshua kod jo-Israel dutonokawo Akan nyakwar Zera, kaachiel gi fedha kod law kod dhahabu, giyawuote gi nyige gi dhoge gi kenjene gi rombene gi hembe kod mwanduneduto, moterogi e holo mar Akor.
Joshua nowacho ni Akan niya,"Isekelonwa masira marach! Koro in bende Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelonimasira!" Eka jo-Israel duto nogoyo Akan kod joge gi kite nyaka githo, migiwang’ogi kaachiel gi mwandune.
Ne gidhuro kuome kite mogundho, mapod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.  Mano emomiyo pod iluongo kanyo ni Holomar Akor, (tiende ni, holo mar masira).  Eka bang’e mirimb Ruoth Nyasayenorumo. Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,
nikech kane aneno law maber molos Shinar,gi fedha ma pekne oromo kilo ariyo, kod dhahabu ma pekne oromo nus kilokuom mwandu Jeriko, gombo nomaka, makawogi.  Nakunyogi e hemba ka fedhaema akuongo keto e bur. "
Joshua nooro joote, modhi e hema piyopiyo.  Negiyudo gigo koyiki e lowo mana kaka Akan nowacho.
Ne gigologi, kendogikelogi ir Joshua kod jo-Israel duto, mi giyarogi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eka Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nokawo Akan nyakwar Zera, kaachiel gifedha kod law kod dhahabu, gi yawuote gi nyige gi dhoge gi kenjene girombene gi hembe kod mwandune duto, moterogi e holo mar Akor.
Joshuanowacho ni Akan niya, "Isekelonwa masira marach! Koro in bende RuothNyasaye biro keloni masira!" Eka jo-Israel duto nogoyo Akan kod joge gikite nyaka githo, mi giwang’ogi kaachiel gi mwandune.
Ne gidhuro kuomekite mogundho, ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.  Mano emomiyo podiluongo kanyo ni Holo mar Akor, (tiende ni, holo mar masira).  Eka bang’emirimb Ruoth Nyasaye norumo. Joshua
Jo-Israel okawo Ai moketho
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Kik iluor, kendo kik chunyinyosre.  Kaw jolweny duto, kendo dhi imonj Ai.  Anachiw ruodh Ai gi dalanegi joge kod pinye e lweti,
kendo unutim ni Ai kod ruodhe mana kakanutimo ni Jeriko kod ruodhe.  To wang’ni unyalo kawo dhok kod gik mokomuyudo kuno.  Koro or jolweny moko mondo odhi opond yo podho chieng’ mardalano. "
Omiyo Joshua kod jolweny duto noikore mondo omonj Ai.  Noyierojolweny alufu piero adek, moorogi gotieno, kowachonigi niya,
"Ponduruyo podho chieng’ mar dalano, kubet machiegni kode, kendo kuikore.
An toanamonje gi jolweny modong’, to ka jogo nowuog mondo orad kodwa kaka negitimo chieng’ mokwongo, to wanaring e nyimgi.
Kuom mano ginipar niwaringogi kaka ne watimo mokwongo, mi ginilawwa nyaka chop waseywayogimabor gi dalagi.
Kwaringo kamano, eka uwuogi kama upondoe, kendo ukawdalagino, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro chiwe e lwetu,
kendoosechiko ni kusekawe to uwang’e.  Koro timuru kamano. "
Eka Joshuanoorogi yo podho chieng’ mar Ai, mondo gipond e kind dalano kod Bethel. Joshua nonindo kanyachiel gi jolweny,
to gokinyi mang’ich nochiew,mochokogi, kendo ne gidhi Ai, kotelo gi jodong Israel,
nyaka negichopo machiegni gi dalano.  Ne gijot yo nyandwat mar Ai, to holo ne nie kindgi gi dalano.
To Joshua noseoro ji maromo alufu abich yo podhochieng mar Ai mondo opond e kind dalano kod Bethel.
Kamano thothjolweny nojot yo nyandwat mar Ai, to joma nopondo ne ni yo podhochieng’.  Joshua to nonindo e holo.
Kane ruodh Ai oneno ni jo-Israel nowuok mapiyo gi joge duto mondo okedkodgi.  Ne ok ong’eyo ni jolweny moko osepondone yo podho chieng’ mardala.
Joshua kod jo-Israel nowuondore ni ologi, mi giringo ka gichomothim.
Eka noluong jo-Ai duto mane ni e dala mondo olawgi.  To kanegilawo Joshua kamano, ne gichwalora mabor gi dalagi.
Onge ng’ato kataachiel ma nodong’ e Ai, nikech ne gisewuok giduto mondo gilaw jo-Israel. Kuom mano ne giweyo dala nono.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Siem yo Ai gi tong’i, nimarabiro chiwe e lweti. " Mi Joshua notimo kamano.
Kane jo-Israel mopondooneno ranyisi ma Joshua otimono, ne giwuok.  Ne giringo piyopiyo, migidonjo e dala, kendo kane gisekawe, ne giwang’e gi kanyono.
Kane jo-Ai ogoyo machiemo, ne gineno iro kadum e dala kochomo polo. Onge kuma ne ginyalo tonyie, nikech jo-Israel ma noyudo wuondore niringo kochomo thim, nolokore gi joma ne lawogi.
Joshua gi jo-Israelduto nolokore gi jo-Ai nikech ne gineno ka joma nopondo koro osekawodala, mi owang’o.
Jo-Ai mane owuok mondo orad gi jo-Israel koro noketdiere, mi jo-Israel nonegogi duto, maonge modong’ kata motony,
makmana ruodh Ai ema ne gimako kangima, mi gitero ir Joshua.
Kanejo-Israel osenego jo-Ai duto mane ni e pap, kod mane ni e thim kuma negiselawogie, ne gidok Ai, mi ginego ji duto ma nodong’ kuno.
Chieng’nononeg jo-Ai duto, ma onge ng’ama dichwo kata madhako ma nodong’.  Negiromo ji alufu apar gariyo.
Joshua ne ok oweyo siemo Ai gi tong’ nyaka noneg ji duto ma nodakkuno.
Jo-Israel nokawo mana dhok gi mwandu mane giyudo, kaluwore giwach mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni Joshua.
Kamano Joshua nowang’o Aichuth, moweye kokethore, ma onge ji modakie nyaka chil kawuono.
Noliero ruodh Ai e yath, moweye kanyo nyaka odhiambo.  To ka chieng’podho, nogolo chik mondo ong’ade oko e yath.  Ne giwito ringre e dhorangadala, mi gidhuro kuome kite mogundho, ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chilkawuono. Joshua ondiko chik Musa ka jo-Israel nie got Ebal(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Joshua nogero kendo-mar-misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel egot Ebal.
Nogere gi kite ma ok opa gi gir nyinyo, kaluwore gi chikmane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo jo-Israel, kaka ondik e kitap Chikmar Musa.  Ne gitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni miwang’o pep kod mag sawoe kendono.
Joshua nondiko chik Musa e kitego e nyim jo-Israel.
Mijo-Israel duto gi joma nobiro kodgi, kaachiel gi jodongo gi jotelo kodjong’ad bura, nochung’ e dir Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye koni gi koni,ka gimanyore gi jo-Lawi ma jodolo ma noting’e.  Jo-Israel moko nochung’kochomo got Gerazim, to modong’ nochomo got Ebal, mondo oguedhgi kakaMusa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye nosechiko chon.
Eka Joshua nosomo weche dutomag gueth kod mag kuong’ mana kaka ondik e Kitap Chik.
Ne ok oweyokata wach achiel kuom weche mane Musa osechiko, to nosomogi duto gi dwolmaduong’ ni jo-Israel duto, machwo gi mamon gi joma tindo, kod jomanobiro kodgi. Joshua
Jo-Gibeon owuondo jo-Israel
Ruodhi duto ma nodak yo podho chieng’ mar Jordan nowinjo humb wechego. Ne gin ruodhi mag jo-Hiti, gi mag jo-Amor, gi mag jo-Kanaan, gi magjo-Perizi, gi mag jo-Hivi, kod mag jo-Jebus, mane gin ogendini modak egode, gi pewe kod e dho Nam Mediterenia nyaka Lebanon yo nyandwat.
Kanegiwinjo wechego, ne giriwore giduto, mondo giked gi Joshua kodjo-Israel.
To kane jo-Gibeon owinjo gima Joshua osetimo Jeriko gi Ai, ne giparomondo giwuonde.
Ne gikawo gunde moti moting’o chiemo motwo kendo mopur,mi giketo e ng’e kenjegi, kaachiel gi ndede mobaw obaw mag divai.
Negirwako wuoch moyiech, kod nengni moti,
eka ne gibiro ir Joshua e kambiGilgal, mi giwachone kod jo-Israel niya, "Waa e piny mabor ahinya, omiyoyie watim kodu winjruok mar kue. "
To jo-Israel nodwoko jo-Hivigo niya,"Ang’o ma dimi watim kodu winjruok mar kue? Kamoro udak mana machiegnikodwa. "
Jo-Hivi to nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Wayie bedo e bwo lochni. "Eka Joshua nopenjogi nyinggi, kendo kuma giaye.
Ne gidwoke niya,"Ruoth, waa e piny mabor ahinya nikech humb Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Wasewinjo gik ma notimore e Misri,
kendo gima notimo ni ruodhi ariyomag jo-Amor man yo wuok chieng’ mar Jordan, ma gin Sihon ruodh Heshbonkod Og ruodh Bashan ma nodak Ashtaroth.
Omiyo jodongwa duto nochikowamondo wakaw chiemo ma dirom wuoth, kendo wabi iru mondo wanyisu ni wayiebedo e bwo lochu.  Kuom mano, yie watim kodu winjruok mar kue.
Neurumakati mwating’ogi.  Kane wachako wuoth kwabiro ka, ne pod giliet, tokoro gisetwo kendo gipur.
Neuru ndedewagi! Kane waoloe divai, neginyien, to koro giseyiech.  Wuochewa gi lepwa bende oseti nikech wuothmabor. "
Jotelo moko mag jo-Israel nobilo chiemb jogo, mak gipenjoRuoth Nyasaye wach.
Omiyo Joshua norwako jootego, motimo kodgiwinjruok mar kue, kokuong’orenigi ni ok noneggi, kendo jodong Israelbende okuong’orenigi kamano.
Chieng’ mar adek bang’ timo kodgi winjruokno, wach nofwenyore ni karagin manaa jogweng’ modak machiegni.
Mano omiyo jo-Israel nochakowuoth, kendo bang’ ndalo adek ne gichopo e mier mane jogo odakie.  Miegone gin Gibeon gi Kefira gi Beeroth kod Kiriath-jearim.
Jo-Israel ne okonegogi, nikech singruok mane jodong Israel otimo kodgi e nying RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, to kata kamano ji duto nong’ur gi jodonggi.
To jodongo duto nodwokogi niya "Ng’euru ni ne wachamo kodgi muma enying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, omiyo koro ok wanyal mulogi.
Wabiro weyogi mak wanegogi, mondo muma mane wachamo kodgi kik dognwa,
to wabiro ketogi joma baronwa yien kendo ma umbonwa pi. " Kamanojo-Israel duto noyie gi wach mane jodonggi onyisogi.
Joshua noluongo jo-Gibeon, mopenjogi niya, "Ere gimomiyo ne uwuondowakamano? Nunyisowa ni ua e piny mabor ahinya, to kara un mana jogweng’!
Koro unubed joma okwedi nikech wachni, kendo e kinde duto unubedwasumbwa ma baro yien kendo ma umbo pi mitiyogo e Od Nyasachwa. "
Negidwoke niya, "Ruoth, ne watimo kamano nikech nonyiswa ni Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachi nochiko Musa jatichne ni mondo ochiwnu pinyni duto, kendo nimondo uneg ji duto modakie.  Kuom mano, birou osemiyo kihondko omakowa.
Koro wan e lweti, omiyo timnwa gima ineno ni ber. "
Kamano Joshuanoresogi e lwet jo-Israel, mi ne ok ginegogi.
To chakre kanyononoketogi jobar yien kod joumb pi ni jo-Israel, kendo ni tichkendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Pod gitiyo kamano nyaka chilkawuono kamoro amora ma Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero.
Ruodhi abichgo noringo mopondo e rogo man Makeda,
to noyudgi, monyisJoshua ni gipondo kanyo.
Eka Joshua nowacho niya, "Ng’ieluru kitemadongo olorgo dho rogono, kendo uket ji orite.
To kik udek kuno, tomeduru mana lawo wasiku, kendo kik uwe gichop e miechgi mak unegogi,nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechiwogi e lwetu. "
Joshua kodjo-Israel nonego jo-Amor motieko, mak mana ji manok ma nodonjo e miermochiel gi ohinga ema notony.
Eka jolweny duto nodwogo ir JoshuaMakeda kangima.  Onge ng’ama notemo timo gimoro marach ni jo-Israel.
Koro Joshua nowacho ni mondo oel dho rogo, kendo okelne ruodhiabichgo.
Mi ne gitimo kamano.  Ne gin ruodhi mag Jerusalem gi Hebron giJarmuth gi Lakish kod Eglon.
Kane gisekelogi ire, Joshua noluongojo-Israel duto, mowacho ni jotend jolweny ma nodhi kode niya, "Suduruka, mondo unyon ng’ut ruodhigi. " Mi ne gitimo kamano.
Eka Joshuanowacho ni jotelogo niya, "Kik uluor kata kik chunyu nyosre.  Beduru gichir kendo gi jing’o, nimar mano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye notim ni wasiguduto mubiro kedogo. "
Bang’e Joshua nonego ruodhigo, kendo nolierogi eyien abich, mi ne giriyoe nyaka odhiambo.
Kane chieng’ podho, Joshuanogolo chik, mi ong’adgi oko, kendo nowitgi e rogo mane gisepondoeno. Eka nolor dho rogo gi kite madongo, ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
Chieng’no, Joshua nokawo Makeda, monego ruodhe gi joge.  Notiekogiduto, kaachiel gi gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno.  Ne ok oweyo ng’atoka ngima kata achiel, kendo notimo ni ruodh Makeda mana kaka nosetimo niruodh Jeriko.
Bang’ mano Joshua gi jo-Israel duto noa Makeda modhi Libna.  Ne gimonjodalano,
mi Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwe gi ruodhe e lwetgi, kendo ne ginegojoma odakie duto, kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno.  Ne ok giweyokata ng’at achiel kangima, kendo ne gitimo ni ruodh dalano mana kaka negitimo ni ruodh Jeriko.
Kane Joshua kod jo-Israel duto oa kanyo, ne gidhi mi gilworo Lakish. Ne gimonje,
kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwe e lwetgi.  Ne gikawe bang’ndalo ariyo, mi ne ginego gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno, kaka negisetimo Libna.
E kindeno, Horam ruodh Gezer nobiro mondo ores Lakish,to Joshua nonege kaachiel gi joge, ma onge ng’ama otony.
Joshua kod jo-Israel duto noa Lakish modhi Eglon.  Ne gilwore kendogimonje,
mi gikawe mana odiechieng’no.  Ne ginego ji duto modakie, kodgimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno, mana kaka ne gitimo Lakish.
Kane gia Eglon, Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nodhi momonjo Hebron.
Negikawe, mi ginego ruodhe kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno, kaachielgi mago mane nie mier matindo mokiewo kode.  Joshua noketho dalano chuth,ma ok oweyo kata ng’at achiel kangima, mana ne gitimo Eglon.
Bang’e Joshua gi jo-Israel duto nowichore mochomo Debir, mi gimonje.
Ne gikawe kaachiel gi ruodhe kod mier matindo mokiewo kode, mi neginego ji duto kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno.  Ne ok giweyong’ato otony kata achiel.  Ne gitimo ni Debir gi ruodhe mana kaka negitimo ni Hebron kod Libna gi ruodhi maggi.
Kamano Joshua nokawo pinyno duto.  Noloyo ruodhi mag piny gode, kod magpiny milambo, gi mag pewe, kod mag kuonde motimo thidhiya.  Nonego jiduto, ma ok oweyo ng’ato otony kata achiel, kotieko gimoro amora mayueyo, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nosechiko.
Nonegojopinjego duto, chakre Kadesh-barnea nyaka Gaza, kokwako piny duto marjo-Goshen nyaka Gibeon.
Joshua nomako ruodhigo duto, kaachiel gipinjegi e lweny achielno, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nokedoni joge.
Bang’e Joshua gi jo-Israel duto nodok e kambi Gilgal. Joshua
Jo-Israel oloyo Jabin gi joma ne oriwore kode
Kane Jabin ruodh Hazor owinjo wechego duto, nooro wach ni Jobab ruodhMadon kod ruodhi mag Shimron gi Akshaf,
kod ruodhi mae piny gode ma yonyandwat, gi holo mar aora Jordan man yo milambo mar Kinereth, kod maepewe, gi mae piny Dor yo podho chieng’.
Nooro wach bende ni jo-Kanaanma yo wuokchieng’ gi ma yo podho chieng’, kendo ni jo-Amor gi jo-Hiti gijo-Perizi gi jo-Jebus ma nodak e piny gode, kod jo-Hivi ma nodak e tiendgot Hermon e piny Mizpa.
Giduto ne giwuok gi jolwenjgi duto.  Neging’eny ka kuoyo mae dhonam, kendo ne gin gi geche lweny mogundho.
Ruodhigo duto noriwo paro achiel, mi ne gibiro, kendo gijot e dhokuonde motimo thidhiya mag Merom mondo gimonj jo-Israel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Kik iluorgi, nimar kiny samakama nachiwgi e lwet jo-Israel, kendo giduto ginitho, mi ning’ad odondfaresegi kendo niwang’ gechegi. "
Kamano Joshua kod jolwenje nopoyogi edho kuonde motimo thidhiya mag Merom, mi gimwomore kuomgi.
RuothNyasaye nochiwogi e lwet jo-Israel, mi jo-Israel noloyogi, kendonolawogi yo nyandwat nyaka Sidon Maduong’, kendo yo podho chieng’ nyakaMisrefoth, kendo yo wuok chieng’ nyaka holo mar Mizpa.  Ne ginegogi, maonge kata ng’at achiel ma nodong’ ka ngima.
Joshua nong’ado odondfaresegi, kendo nowang’o gechegi, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko.
Eka Joshua nowichore ni Hazor, dala ma noyudo otelo ni pinjego. Jo-Israel nokawe, monego ruodhe.
Ne ginego gimoro amora mangima maneni kuno, ma onge gima yueyo manodong’, kendo ne giwang’o dalano.
Kamano Joshua nomako ruodhigo monego, kendo noketho miechgi.  Nonego jiduto ma nodak e miego, kendo noketho gik moko duto, kaka Musa jatichRuoth Nyasaye nosechiko.
To jo-Israel ne ok owang’o mier mane oger ewipidhe, mak mana Hazor kende ema ne Joshua owang’o.
Ne gipeyo dhok, migiyako gimoro amora mane giyudo e miego, kendo ne ginego ji duto, ma okgiweyo kata ng’at achiel ka yueyo.
Ruoth Nyasaye noketo chikene e lwetMusa jatichne, to Musa nomiyogi Joshua, mi Joshua nochopo duto, ma okoweyo kata chik achiel mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa. Joshua okawo piny Kanaan duto
Joshua nokawo piny gode gi piny milambo duto gi piny Goshen duto,kaachiel kod pewe gi holo mar aora Jordan kod piny gode mag Israel gipewe mokiewo kode.
Lochne nochakore got Halak man but Seir, nyakaBaal-gad e holo mar Lebanon manie tiend got Hermon.
Nokedo gi pinjegokuom ndalo mang’eny, nyaka nomako ruodhi maggi duto, monego.
Miegoduto nokaw gi thwon, ma onge mane otimo winjruok gi jo-Israel mak manaGibeon mane jo-Hivi odakie.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyogi chir mar kedo gijo-Israel mondo jo-Israel oneggi maonge ng’wono, kendo otiekgi chuth,mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosechiko Musa.
E ndalogo ema ne Joshua odhiye piny gode, motieko jo-Anak mane odakHebron gi Debir gi Anab kendo e piny gode duto mag Juda kod mag Israel. Notiekogi duto, kendo noketho miechgi.
Onge jo-Anak ma nodong’ kataachiel e piny mane jo-Israel okawo, mak mana mago ma nodak Gaza gi Gathkod Ashdod.
Kamano Joshua nokawo pinyno duto, kochopo chike duto maneRuoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.  Joshua nomiyo jo-Israel pinyno, kopogo nidhoot ka dhoot lembe, mi piny nokue. Joshua
Ruodhi mane Musa oloyo
Jo-Israel nosekawo piny duto man yo wuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan,chakre aora Arnon, koluwo aora Jordan nyaka got Hermon, kendo ne ginegoruodhi mag pinyno.
Ne ginego Sihon, ruodh jo-Amor ma nodak Heshbon. Pinye nochakore Aroer man but holo mar Arnon, koluwo holono.  Piny Gileadkonchiel nyaka aora Jabok motimo tong’ Amon bende
ne nie pinye kaachielgi piny man yo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan, chakre Nam Galili nyaka NamAraba, miluongo ni Nam Kado, koluwo yor Beth-jeshimoth, kochomo yomilambo nyaka got Pisga.
Bende ne ginego Og ruodh Bashan, ma nodakAshtaroth gi Edrei.  Ne en achiel kuom jo-Refaim manok ma nodong’.
GotHermon gi Saleka kod Bashan duto mochopo e mbap Geshur gi Maakath kodGilead komachielo nyaka mbap Sihon ruodh Heshbon ne nie pinye.
Musajatich Nyasaye kod jo-Israel nonegogi duto, mokawo pinygi.  Nomiyojo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel pinyno mondo obed margi. Ruodhi mane Joshua oloyo
Joshua kod jo-Israel nonego ruodhi modak e piny man yo podho chieng’mar aora Jordan, chakre Baal-gad e holo mar Lebanon, nyaka got Halak manbut Seir.  Joshua nokawo pinygi mopogo ni dhout Israel mondo obed margi.
Ne en piny gode gi pewe gi holo mar aora Jordan gi kuonde motimothidhiya gi piny milambo.  Kuondego ema jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Kanaangi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus odakie.
Ne ginego ruodhi magJeriko gi Ai man but Bethel,
gi Jerusalem gi Hebron
gi Jarmuth giLakish
gi Eglon gi Gesher
gi Debir gi Geder
gi Horma gi Arad
giLibna gi Adulam
gi Makeda gi Bethel
gi Tapia gi Hefer
gi Afek giSharon
gi Madon gi Hazor
gi Shimron-meron gi Akshaf
gi Taanak giMegido
gi Kedesh gi Jokneam-karmel
gi Dor e piny Dor gi Gaim-galili
kod Tirza.  Giduto ne gin ruodhi piero adek gachiel. Joshua
Bath piny Kanaan ma pod onego kaw
Joshua koro noseti, kendo hike oniang’, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nowachoneniya, "Isedoko jaduong’ moti to piny malach pod odong’ monego kaw.
Magie pinje ma pod odong’: Piny jo-Filistia kod piny jo-Geshur duto. "
(Pinyno duto chakre Shihor yo wuok chieng’ mar Misri, nyaka Ekron yonyandwat, ikwano ka piny Kanaan.  To ruodhi mag jo-Filistia ma nodak Gazagi Ashdod gi Ashkelon gi Gath kod Ekron ema ne weg pinyno. ) "Pinyjo-Avim duto
yo milambo, gi piny jo-Kanaan duto, chakre Meara e pinyjo-Sidon nyaka Afek gi mbap jo-Amor,
kod piny jo-Gebal gi piny Lebanonduto man yo wuok chieng’ mar Baal-gad manie tiend got Hermon nyaka kamaidonjogo Hamath.
Pinyno oting’o jo-Sidon modak e piny gode, chakreLebanon nyaka Misrefoth-maim.  Anariemb jogo duto mondo oweni jo-Israelthuolo.  To pinyno duto ipog ni jo-Israel mondo obed margi, kakaasechiki.
Koro pog pinyni ni dhoudi ochiko kande, kaachiel gi jo-Manasekonchiel. "Piny mopog ni jo Manase konchiel gi jo Reuben kod jo Gad
Jo-Manase komachielo, kaachiel gi jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad, noseyudo pinjemane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyogi yo wuok chieng’ mar Jordan. Nopogonigi pinyno
chakre Aroer man but holo mar aora Arnon gi pinymopie man e bath holo konchiel kendo noting’o piny pap duto chakreMedeba nyaka Dibon,
kod mier duto mag Sihon ruodh jo-Amor ma nodakHeshbon, nyaka mbap jo-Amon.
Noting’o bende piny Gilead kod pinyjo-Geshur gi jo-Maakath kod got Hermon duto gi piny Bashan duto nyakaSaleka.
Piny Bashan noting’o piny Og duto, mane Og orito kodakAshtaroth gi Edrei.  E ndalo mane Musa onegoe jo-Refaim manok ma nodong’,mokawo pinygi, Og kende ema notony.
To jo-Israel ne ok oriembojo-Geshur gi jo-Maakath, omiyo pod gidak gi jo-Israel nyaka chilkawuono.
Jo-Lawi kende ema ne ok oyudo piny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel ema nobedo ka mwandugi, kaka nosesingorenigi.
Musa nosepogo piny gi dhout jo-Reuben.
Pinygi nochakore Aroer manbut holo mar aora Arnon, kod piny mopie manie bath holo konchiel, kendonoting’o piny pap duto nyaka Medeba,
gi Heshbon kaachiel gi miermokiewo kode duto, kod Dibon gi Beth-baal-meon
gi Jahaz gi Kedemoth giMafaath
gi Kiriathaim gi Sibma kod Zereth-shahar e got manie holo,
gi Beth-peor gi kuonde thidhiya mag got Pisga, gi Beth-jeshimoth
kodmier moko duto mag piny pap, gi piny duto mane Sihon ruodh jo-Amor manodak Heshbon orito.  Musa nosenego Sihon kaachiel gi Evi gi Rekam gi Zurgi Hur kod Reba mane jodong jo-Midian.  Jodongogo nodak e pinyno, ka gine bwo loch Sihon.
Balaam wuod Beor, mane jakor wach, ne en achiel kuomjoma jo-Israel nonego.
Aora Jordan ema nobedo mbap jo-Reuben.  Pinynokaachiel gi mieche kod mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo mwandu dhoutjo-Reuben.
Bende Musa nopogo piny ni dhout jo-Gad.
Pinygi ne en Jazer gi miechGilead duto kod piny jo-Amon konchiel nyaka Aroer man yo wuok chieng’mar Raba.
Nochakore Heshbon nyaka Ramoth-mizpe gi Betonim, kendochakre Mahanaim nyaka mbap Lodeba.
To pinygi mane nie holo mar aoraJordan noting’o Beth-haram gi Beth-nimra gi Sukoth gi Zafan kod bathpiny Sihon ruodh Heshbon modong’.  Pinygino ne ni yo wuokchieng’ mar aoraJordan kendo Jordan nyaka Nam Galili nodoko mbape.
Pinyno kaachiel gimieche, kod mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo mwandu dhout jo-Gad.
Kamano bende Musa nopogo piny ni dhout jo-Manase komachielo cha.
Pinygi nochakore Mahanaim, mokwako piny Og ruodh Bashan duto kod mierpiero auchiel mag Jair e Bashan.
Kamano dir Gilead konchiel giAshtaroth kod Edrei, ma gin joka Makir wuod Manase, tiende ni dhout jokaMakir konchiel.
Mago e pinje mane Musa opogo ni dhoudigo e paw Moab, yo wuok chieng’mar Jordan.
To ne ok opogo ni jo-Lawi piny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel nobedo ka mwandugi, kaka nosesingorenigi. Joshua
Piny Kanaan opog gi ombulu
Koro magi e pok mane jo-Israel oyudo e piny Kanaan kaka Eleazar jadologi Joshua wuod Nun kod jodong dhout Israel nopogonigi.
Pinyno nopog giombulu, ni dhoudi ochiko gi nus kande kaluwore gi chik mane RuothNyasaye omiyo Musa.
Musa nosepogo ni dhoudi ariyo gi nus kande pinygiloka Jordan, to ne ok opogo ni jo-Lawi piny kaka nopogo ni dhoudimamoko.
Joka Josef nosepogore dhoudi ariyo, ma Manase gi Efraim. Jo-Lawi ne ok oyudo pok moro e pinyno, mak mana mier mag dak kod legejamni ma nokiewo gi miego.
Jo-Lawi nopogo piny kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosechiko Musa. Dala mar Hebron omi Kaleb
Jo-Juda nobiro ir Joshua Gilgal, mi Kaleb wuod Jefune ma ja Keniznowachone niya, "Bende iparo gima ne Ruoth Nyasaye onyiso Musa jatichNyasaye kuomi gi kuoma kane wan Kadesh-barnea?
Ne an jahigni pieroang’wen kane Musa jatich Nyasaye oora mondo abi anon pinyni, kendo kaneadok, naterone wach ma adieri.
Jomoko mane wabirogo nonyoso chuny ji,to an ne aluwo dwaro mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha gi chuny modimbore.
Chiengno Musa nosingore kawachona niya, ‘Piny ma isenyono gi tiendinobed mari kod yawuoti nyaka chieng’, nimar iseluwo dwaro mar RuothNyasaye ma Nyasacha gi chuny modimbore. ’
Koro en higni piero ang’wengabich nyaka ne Ruoth Nyasaye singre ni Musa e wachno e ndalo manejo-Israel pod wuotho e thim.  To Ruoth Nyasaye oserito ngimana kakanosingore mi koro an jahigni piero aboro gabich.
To pod atek mana kakane atek e kinde mane Musa oora, kendo pod anyalo kedo, kata timo gimoroamora monego atim.
Omiyo koro miya piny gode mane Ruoth Nyasayeosingorena e kinde cha.  Chieng’ cha donge niwinjo ni jo-Anak odak kuno,kendo ni gin gi mier madongo kendo mochiel matek mar siro wasigu? Todipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye okonya, mi ariembogi kaka nosesingorena. "
Joshua noguedho Kaleb, momiye dala mar Hebron,
kendo pod en marKaleb wuod Jefune ma ja Kenaz, nikech noluwo dwaro mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel gi chuny modimbore.
Koro piny nobedo mokue.  E ndalomachon niluongo Hebron ni Kiriath-arba, tiende ni, dala Arba.  Arbano nejaduong’ jo-Anak. Joshua
Piny mopog ni jo-Juda
Piny ma nopog ni dhout Juda gi ombulu nogik yo milambo e mbap jo-Edomman e thim Zin.
Mbapgi ma yo milambono nochakore yo milambo mar NamKado,
koluwo yor Akrabim, mokadho Zin, kochomo yo milambo marKadesh-barnea.  Eka nokadho Ezron nyaka Adar, mogomo kochomo Karka
nyakaAzmon, kendo noluwo aora manie tong’ piny Misri nyaka Nam Mediterenia. Mano e mbapgi ma yo milambo.
Nam Kado nyaka dho aora Jordan ema nobedo mbapgi ma yo wuok chieng’.  Tombapgi ma yo nyandwat nochakore e dho aorano,
modhi nyaka Beth-hogla,kokadho yo nyandwat mar Beth-araba, mochopo nyaka Lwanda Bohan wuodReuben.
Eka noluwo holo mar Akor nyaka Debir, kochomo yo nyandwat nyakaGilgal, machiegni gi yo maidho Adumin man yo milambo mar aora.  Ekanokadho kuonde thidhiya man En-shemesh, mochopo En-rogel.
Noluwo holomar Ben-hinom, yo milambo mar; piny gode mane jo-Jebus odakie, ma tindeogerie Jerusalem.  Noidho got momanyore gi holo Hinom yo podho chieng’,ma en giko holo mar Refaim.
Noluwo wi godno molor nyaka soko marNeftoa, kendo nyaka mier man e got Efron.  Kosekadho miego, nogomokochomo Baala, miluongo bende ni Kiriath-jearim.
Koa Baala, nochikogot Seir, mokadho yo nyandwat mar got Jearim, miluongo bende ni Kesalon,nyaka Beth-shemesh, mochopo Timna.
Eka nochomo yo nyandwat nyakaEfron, mogomo kochiko Shikeron.  Bang’ mano nokadho got Baala, kendonodhi Jabneel, mogik e Nam Mediterenia.
Nam Mediterenia ema notimotong’ pinygi ma yo podho chieng’.  Mano e tong’ ma nolworo dhout Judaduto. Kaleb okawo Hebron gi Debir(Jobura
.
-
)
Nopog ni Kaleb wuod Jefune dir piny jo-Juda, kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosechiko Joshua.  Pok ma noyudono ne en Hebron, dala mar Arba, kwarjo-Anak.
Kaleb nodaro jo-Anak adek ma nodak kuno, ma nyinggi Sheshaigi Ahiman kod Talmai.  Ne gin nyikwa Anak.
Bang mano, nodhi momonjojoma nodak Debi, ma chon niluongo ni Kiriath-sefer.
Eka nowacho niya,"Ng’at ma nokaw Kiriath-sefer ema nami Aksa nyara mondo okendi. "
Othniel wuod Kenaz owadgi Kaleb ema nokawo dalano, omiyo Kaleb nomiyeAksa nyare mokendo.
Kane Aksa odhi ir chwore, nojiwe mondo okwa wuonmare lowo, mi Aksa nodhi ir Kaleb, kendo kane oselor e kanje, Kalebnopenje gima odwaro.
Nodwoke niya, "Kaka iseketa e piny milambomotwoni, yie imiya sokni. " Kuom mano Kaleb nomiye sokni mamalo gimamwalo. Miech jo-Juda
Koro magi e mier duto mopog ni dhout Juda, kaachiel gi mier matindo manokiewo kodgi:
Mier man yo milambo e tong’gi gi jo Edon ne gin Kabzeel gi Eder giJagur
gi Kina gi Dimona gi Arara
gi Kedesh gi Hazor gi Ithnan
giZif gi Telem gi Bealoth
gi Hazor-hadata gi Kerioth-hezron,
gi Amamgi Shema gi Molada
gi Hazar-gada gi Heshmon gi Beth-pelet
giHazar-shual gi Beer-sheba kod mier matindo mokiewo kode,
gi Baal giIyim gi Ezem
gi Eltolad gi Kesil gi Horma
gi Ziklag gi madmana giSansana
gi Lebaoth gi Shilhim gi Ain kod Rimon.  Giduto ne gin mierpiero ariyo gochiko.
To mier mane giyudo e pewe ne gin Eshtaol gi Zora gi Ashna
gi Zanoagi En-gamin gi Tapua gi Enam
gi Jarmuth gi Adulam gi Soko gi Azeka.
Gi Shaaraim gi Adithaim gi Gedera kod Gederathaim.  Giduto ne gin mierapar gang’wen.
Bende jo-Juda noyudo Zenan gi Hadasha gi Migdal-gad
gi Dilan giMizpe gi Joktheel
gi Lakish gi Bozkath gi Eglon
gi Kabon gi Lamas giKithlish
gi Gederoth gi Beth-dagon gi Naama kod Makeda.  Giduto ne ginmier apar gauchiel.
Kendo ne giyudo Libna gi Ether gi Ashan
gi Ifta gi ashna gi Nezib
gi Keila gi Akzib kod Maresha.  Giduto ne gin mier ochiko.
Ekron bende ne margi
kod mier duto mokiewo gi Ashdod, chakre Ekronnyaka Nam Mediterenia.
Ashdod gi Gaza, kod mieche mochopo nyaka aora manie tong’gi gi Misri,kendo nyaka Nam Mediterenia ne maggi bende.
To mier mane giyudo e piny gode ne gin Shamir, gi Jatir gi Soko
giDana gi Kiriath-sana, miluongo bende ni Debir,
Anab gi Eshtemoa giAnim
gi Goshen gi Holon kod Gilo.  Giduto ne gin mier apar gachiel.
Kendo ne giyudo Arab gi Duma gi Eshan
gi Janim gi Beth-tapua gi Afek
gi Humta gi Kiriath-arba, miluongo bende ni Hebron, kod Zior.  Gidutone gin mier ochiko.
Nomigi bende Maon gi Karmel gi Zif gi Juta
gi Jezreel gi Jokdeam giZanoa
gi Kain gi Gibea kod Timna.  Giduto ne gin mier apar.
To bende ne giyudo Halhul gi Beth-zur gi Gedor
gi Maarath giBeth-anoth kod Eltekon.  Giduto ne gin mier auchiel.  Ne giyudo bendeTekoa gi Efratha, ma tinde iluongo ni Bethlehem, gi Peor gi Etam giuKulom gi Tatam gi Sores gi Karem gi Galim gi Baither kod Manak.  Gidutone gin mier apar gachiel.
Kiriath-baal, miluongo ni Kiriath-jearim,kod Raba ne maggi bende.
To mier mane giyudo e thim ne gin Beth-arabagi midin gi Sekaka
gi Nibshan gi Ir-melek kod Engedi.  Giduto ne ginmier auchiel.
Jo-Juda ne ok nyal riembo jo-Jebus ma nodak Jerusalem, omiyo podgidak kodgi kuno, nyaka chil kawuono. Joshua
Piny mopog ni jo-Efraim gi jo-Manase komachielo
Piny mane opog ni joka Josef gi ombulu nochakore e aora Jordan, kamaomanyore gi Jeriko, yo wuok chieng’ mar sokni mag Jeriko man but thim. Tong’gi noa Jeriko, moidho Bethel.
Koa Bethel, noidho Luz mochopoataroth manie tong’ piny jo-Arki.
Eka nochomo yo podho chieng, kolornyaka tong’ piny jo-Jaflet, mochopo but Beth-horon mamwalo kod Gezer,mogik e Nam Mediterenia.
Pinyno ema nopog ni jo-Manase kod jo-Efraim mayawuot Josef.
To piny dhout jo-Efraim e ma: Mbapgi ma yo wuok chieng’ nochakoreAtaroth-adar, modhi nyaka Beth-horon mamalo.
Eka nochiko yo-podhochieng’, koweyo Mikmethath yo nyandwat, kendo nokadho yo wuok chieng’mar Taanath-shilo kod Janoa.
Kosekadho Janoa nolor nyaka Ataroth kodaora Jordan.
Tong’gi ma yo nyandwat noa Tapua, kochiko yo podho chieng’moluwo aora Kana, nyaka nogik Naaroth, mokadho machiegni gi Jeriko,mogik e nam Mediterenia.  Pinyno ema nopogni dhout jo-Efraim,
kaachielgi mier moko mane omigi ei piny jo-Manase kod mier matindo mokiewokodgi.
To jo-Efraim ne ok oriembo jo-Kanaan ma nodak Gezer, mijo-Kanaan-go pod odak e diergi nyaka chil kawuono, to nochun-gi mondogibed wasumbni nyaka chieng. Joshua
Nopog ni jo-Manase dir piny nikech Manase ne e wuod Josef maduong’. Makir wuon Gilead nomi piny Bashan gi piny Gilead nikech ne en wuodManase maduong’.
Dhout jo-Manase modong’ ma gin joka Abiezer gi joka Helek gi jokaAsriel gi joka Shekem gi joka Hefer kod joka Shemida, bende nopognigipiny.  Mago ne gin dhout nyikwa Manase wuod Josef.
Zelofehad wuod Hefer, ma wuod Gilead, ma wuod Makir, ma wuod Manase,nonywolo mana nyiri lilo, ma nyinggi Mala gi Noa gi Hogla gi Milka kodTirza.
Ne gibiro ir Eleazar jadolo gi Joshua wuod Nun kod jotend Israelmi giwachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa mondo opognwa piny manakaka opog ni jowetewa. " Kuom mano Joshua nopogonigi piny kaka nopog niowete wuon-gi, kaluwore gi chik Ruoth Nyasaye.
Jo Manase noyudo pok apar, ka ok okwan piny Gilead gi piny Bashan manyo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan,
nikech nopog piny ni nyikwa Manasemanyiri kaachiel gi nyikwaye ma yawuowi.  Piny Gilead nobedo pok marnyikwa Manase modong’.
Tong’ piny jo-Manase nochakore e piny Asher mochopo nyaka Mikmethathman yo wuok chieng’ mar Shekem.  Eka tong’gi nochomo yo milambo nyakaJashub, kokadho but En-tapua.
Piny Tapua nobedo mar jo-Manase, to dalaTapua hie, mane nie mbapgi, nobedo mar jo-Efraim.
Koa kuno, tong’ginoluwo aora Kana, to mier man yo milambo mar aorano ne mag Efraim, kataobedo ni gin e dier miech jo-Manase kamano.  Tong’ Manase noluwo gengaora Kana gi yo nyandwat, mogik e Nam Mediterenia.
Piny Efraim ne niyo milambo mar aorano, to piny Manase ne ni yo nyandwat, ka NamMediterenia obedo tong’gi giduto.  Jo-Manase nokiewo kod jo-Asher gi yonyandwat, kendo kod jo-Isakar gi yo milambo.
Bethshean kaachiel gimier mokiewo kode gi joma nodak Ibleam gi Dor manie dhonam, gi En-dor giTaanak kod Megido, kaachiel gi mier matindo ma nokiewo kodgi ne nie bwojo-Manase, kata obedo ni ne gin e pinje mag jo-Isakar gi jo-Asherkamano.
Jo-Kanaan pod weg pinyno nyaka chil kawuono, nikechh jo-Manasene ok nyal riembogi.
To kane jo-Israel osebedo motegno, ne gichunojo-Kanaan mondo obed wasumbgi.
Joka Josef nopenjo Joshua niya, "Ere gima omiyo isemiyowa mana pokachiel kende e pinyni? Wasenya ahinya, nikech Ruoth Nyasayeoseguedhowa. "
Joshua nodwokogi niya, "Kusenya kamano, kendo uhingopiny gode mag Efraim, to koro dhiuru e bungu manie piny jo-Perizi gijo-Refaim, mondo ubete obed lopu. "
To joka Josef nowachone niya,"Adier piny godeno ok oromowa, to bende jo-Kanaan modak Beth-sheam gimier mokiewo kode kaachiel gi mago modak e paw Jezreel, nigi geche lwenymag nyinyo!"
Joshua nowacho ni jo-Efraim gi jo-Manase ma nyikwa Josefniya, "Un ji mang’eny, kendo man gi nyalo.  Ok unubed gi pok achielkende,
to piny gode bende nobed maru. "Kata otimo bungu kamano, to kaweuru, kendo ubete nyaka uchop e tong’. Adier, jo-Kanaan ni gi geche lweny mag nyinyo, to pod unuriembgiariemba. "Joshua
Piny modong’ opog gi ombulu Shilo
Ka ne jo-Israel osekawo pinyno, ne gichokore Shilo giduto, mi giguroHemb Romo kuro.
To dhout Israel abiriyo ne pok okawo lowo,
omiyoJoshua nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Ang’o murito momiyo pok ukawo piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu osemiyou?
Dhoot ka dhoot mondo omiya jiadek ma anyalo oro mondo odhi onon kaka dipog pinyno duto e migepeabiriyo, ka gindiko kaka migawo ka migawo chalo.  Ka gisetieko, ekagiduog ira
mondo opog pinyno ni dhoudi abiriyogo.  To jo-Juda to nobedabeda e pinygi man yo milambo, kendo joka Josef bende nobed e pinygi manyo nyandwat.
Kusepogo piny nyadibiriyo kamano, kendo usendiko kakaochalo, eka ukelna ndiko manyiso migepego, kendo nopognugi gi ombulu enyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
To jo-Lawi ok noyud lowo kaka uyudo, nimar pokgi enbedo jodolo mag Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben gi jo-Manasekonchiel bende ok nopognigi nikech giseyudo lopgi loka Jordan mane Musajatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyogi. "
Joma noyiergo nodhi, mowuotho e pinyno duto ka ginono kaka ochalo,nikech Joshua nosechikogi niya, "Dhiuru uwuoth e pinyno duto, kendoundik kaka ochalo; eka uduog ira Shilo ka.  Bang’e napognu piny gi ombulue nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Kuom mano jogo nodhi monono pinyno duto, kendone gindiko e kitabu kaka ochalo.  Ne gipogo piny nyadibiriyo, ka gichanonying mier duto mane ni kuno.  Bang’e ne giduogo ir Joshua e kambi Shilo,
kendo Joshua nogoyonigi ombulu e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mopogo ni dhootka dhoot lope. Piny mopog ni jo-Benjamin
Ombulu mokwongo nolwar kuom dhout Benjamin, mi giyudo lowo e kindjo-Juda gi joka Josef.
To malo yo nyandwat tong’gi nochakore e aoraJordan modhi nyaka gode man yo nyandwat mar Jeriko.  Noluwo piny godego,kochomo yo podho chieng’ nyaka e thim machiegni gi Beth-aven.
Ekanochomo Luz yo milambo nyaka god Luz ma tinde iluongo ni Bethel.  Bang’enodhi nyaka Ataroth-adar e got man yo milambo mar Beth-horon mamwalo.
Nogomo koa yo podho chieng’ mar godno, mochomo yo milambo mar got manbut Beth-horon, mogik Kiriath-baal, dala jo-Juda, miluongo bende niKiriath-jearim.  Mano e tong’gi ma yo podho chieng’.
Tong’gi ma yomilambo nochakore Kiriath-jearim, kochomo yo podho chieng’ nyaka sokomar Neftoa.
Eka nodhi nyaka bath got mochomore gi holo Ben-hinom manyo nyandwat mar holo Refaim.  Noluwo holo Hinon tir kochomo yo milambomar god jo-Jebus nyaka En-rogel.
Bang’e nogomo kochomo yo nyandwatnyaka Enshemesh, kendo nyaka Geliloth momanyore gi yo maidho Adumin.  Ekanolor nyaka Lwanda Bohan wuod Reuben,
mokadho yo nyandwat marBeth-araba kendo noridore nyaka holo mar aora Jordan.
Bang’e nodhi yonyandwat mar got Beth-hogla, mogik yo nyandwat mar Nam Kado e dho aoraJordan gi yo milambo.  Mano ne tong’gi ma yo milambo.
To tong’gi ma yowuok chieng’ ne en aora Jordan.  Mano ne tong’ piny ma nopog ni dhoutBenjamin.
Miech jo-Benjamin, kaluwore gi dhoutgi, ne gin Jeriko, gi Beth-hogla,gi Emek-keziz,
gi Beth-araba, gi Zemaraim, gi Bethel,
gi Avim, giPara, gi Ofra
gi Kefar-amoni, gi Ofni, kod Geba.  Giduto ne gin mierapar gariyo, ka ok okwan mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi,
to bende negin gi Gibeon, gi Rama, gi Beeroth,
gi Mizpe, gi Kefira, gi Moza,
giRekem, gi Irpeel, gi Parala
gi Zela, gi Ha-elef gi Jebuz (ma tindeiluongo ni Jerusalem,) gi Gibea, kod Kiriath-jearim.  Giduto ne gin mierapar gang’wen ka ok okwan mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi.  Mago e miermane opog ni dhout Benjamin. Joshua
Piny mopog ni jo-Simeon
Ombulu mar ariyo nolwar kuom dhout Simeon.  Pinygi ne nie dier pinyjo-Juda.
Noting’o Beer-sheba gi Molada
gi Hazar-shual gi Bala gi Ezem
gi Eltolad gi Bethul gi Horma
gi Ziklag gi Beth-mar-kaboth giHazar-susa
gi Beth-lebaoth kod Sharuhen.  Giduto ne gin mier apar gadek,ka ok okwan mier matindo ma nokiewo kodgi.
Bende ne giyudo Ain gi mierRimon gi Ether kod Ashan, duto mier ang’wen, ka ok okwan mier matindo maokiewo kodgi,
nyaka Baalath-beer miluongo bende ni Ramath-negeb.  Pinynoema nopog ni dhout Simeon,
to pinyno ne en dir piny jo-Juda, nikechjo-Juda nomi piny malach mohingogi. Piny mopogni jo-Zebulun
Ombulu mar adek nolwar kuom dhout Zebulun.  Piny mane opognigi nochoponyaka Shadub.
Koa kuno tong’gi mochiko yo podho chieng’ nodhi nyakaMarala, moluwo bath Debesheth kod Apra man yo wuok chieng’ mar Jokneam.
To tong’gi moa Shedub kochomo yo wuok chieng’, nochiko tong’Kisloth-tabor modhi Daberath kod Jafia.
Nomedo dhi yo wuok chieng’,mochopo Geth-hefer kod Ita-kazin nyaka Rimon, mogomo kochiko Nea.
Tong’ ma yo nyandwat nolworo nyaka Hanathon mogik e holo Jethael.
Pinyno noting’ Katath gi Nahalal gi Shimron gi Idala kod Bethlehem. Giduto ne gin mier apar gariyo ka ok okwan mier matindo ma nokiewokodgi.
Miegi kaachiel gi mier matindo ma nokiewo kodgi ema nopog nidhout Zebulun. Piny mopog ni jo-Isakar
Ombulu mar ang’wen nolwar kuom dhout Isakar.
Jezreel gi Kesiloth giShunem
gi Hafaraim gi Shion gi Anaharath
gi Rabith gi Kishion giEbez,
gi Remeth gi En-ganim gi En-haga kod Beth-pazez ne nie pinygi.
Tong’gi nokadho but Tabor gi Shahazuma kod Beth-shemesh mogik e aoraJordan.  Giduto ne gin mier apar gauchiel, ka ok okwan mier matindo manokiewo kodgi.
Miego duto, kaachiel gi mier matindo ma nokiewo kodhiema nopog ni dhout Isakar. Piny mopogni jo-Asher
Ombulu mar abich nolwar kuom dhout Asher.
Pinygi noting’o Helkath giHali gi Beten gi Akshaf
gi Alamelek gi Amad kod Mishal.  Yo podhochieng’ tong’gi noluwo Karmel gi Shihor-libnath.
Eka nochiko yo wuokchieng’ modhi Beth-lagon, koluwo bath piny Zebulun kod holo Jiftael,kochomo yo nyandwat nyaka Beth-emek gi Neyel.  Yo nyandwat, pinynonoting’o Kabul
gi Abdon gi Rehob gi Hamon kod Kana, mochopo SidonMaduong’.
Eka tong’ nogomo mochomo Rama, nyaka Turo dala mochiel, kumanogomoe kochiko Hosa, mogik e Nam Mediterenia.  Yo podho chieng’ noting’oMehalab gi Akzib
gi Ako gi Afek kod Rehob.  Giduto ne gin mier pieroariyo gariyo ka ok okwan mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi.
Miego dutokaachiel gi mier matindo ma nokiewo kodgi ema nopog ni dhout Asher. Piny mopog ni jo-Naftali
Ombulu mar auchiel nolwar kuom dhout Naftali.
Pinygi nochakore Helefkendo e yath maduong’ man Zaananim moluwo Adami-negeb gi Gabneel nyakaLakum, mogik e aora Jordan.
Tong’gi ma yo podho chieng’ noluwoAzmoth-tabor nyaka Hukoth.  Piny jo-Zebulun ne ni yo milambo, kendo pinyjo-Asher ne ni yo podho chieng’, to aora Jordan nobedo tong’ ma yo wuokchieng’.
Miechgi mane ochiel gi ohinga ne gin Zidim gi Zer gi Hamathgi Rakath gi Kinereth
gi Adama gi Rama gi Hazor
gi Kedesh gi Edreigi En-hazor
gi Yiron gi Migdalel gi Horem gi Beth-anath kodBeth-shemesh.  Giduto ne gin mier apar gochiko, ka ok okwan mier matindomane okiewo kodgi.
Miego duto kaachiel gi mier matindo mane okiewo kodgi ema ne opog nidhout Naftali. Piny mopog ni jo-Dan
Ombulu mar abiriyo nolwar kuom dhout Dan.
Pinygi noting’o Zora giEshtaol gi Ir-shemesh
gi Shaalabin gi Aijalon gi Ithla
gi Elon giTimna gi Ekron
gi Elteke gi Gibethon gi Baalath
gi Jehud giBene-berak gi Gath-rimon
gi Mejarkon kod Rakon, kaachiel gi pinymomanyore gi Jopa.
Kane oriemb jo-Dan e pinygi, ne gidhi nyaka Leshem,mi gimonjo dalano.  Ne gikawe, kendo ne ginego ji duto ma nodakie.  Negidak kuno, mi giloko nyinge ni Dan, nying kwargi.
Miego duto,kaachiel gi mier matindo ma nokiewo kodgi ema nopog ni dhout Dan. Piny mopog ni Joshua
Kane jo-Israel osetieko pogo piny, kendo guro mbapgi, ne gimiyo Joshualowo e pinygi,
kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosechiko.  Ne gimiye Timna-sera epiny gode mag Efraim, nikech mano ema nokwayo.  Nochako ogero dalano,modakie.
Mano e kaka Eleazar jadolo, gi Joshua wuod Nun, kod jodong dhoutIsrael, nopogo lowo gi ombulu e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo, kane gin Shilo.  Kamano ne gitieko pogo piny. Joshua
Mier mag Tony(Kwan
.
-
; Rapar mar Chik
.
-
;
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Joshua
ni mondo owach ni jo-Israel kama: "Koroyieruru miechu mag tony mane awacho ni Musa mondo onyisu.
Ng’at monekokobothne nyalo dhi kuondego mondo opond ni ng’at madwaro chulone kuor.
Ka ng’ato dwaro tony kamano, moringo nyaka e achiel kuom miego, tonochung’ e dhorangach, kendo nonyis jodong dalano gima osetimorene.  Ekaginiyiene odonji, kendo ginimiye kar dak.
Ka ng’ato madwaro chulokuorno oluwe nyaka kuno, to jodalano kik chiwe, to girite, nikech nonegonyawadgi mana kuom both, to ok nikech ne gimonre.
Janekno nodag edalano nyaka chop yale e nyim oganda, kendo ka jadolo maduong’ e kindenoosetho, eka onyalo dok dalagi, kuma noseringo oaye. "
Kuom mano ne giyiero Kadesh-galili manie piny gode mag Naftali, giShekem manie piny gode man Efraim kod Kiriath-arba, miluongo bende niHebron, manie piny gode mag Juda.
To yo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan, epiny mamalo momanyore gi Jeriko, ne giyiero Bezer-me-thim kuom pinyjo-Reuben, gi Ramoth-gilead kuom piny jo-Gad, kod Galon-bashan kuom pinyjo-Manase.
Mago ne gin mier mane ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie.  Ne oketgine jo-Israel duto, kendo ni jodak mane ni kodgi.  Ng’ato ang’ata maneoneko kobothne, ne nyalo ringo kuno, mondo ng’at ma dwaro chulone kuorkik nege, kapok oyale e nyim oganda. Joshua
Miech jo-Lawi(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Jodong dhout jo-Lawi nodhi Shilo e piny Kanaan, mowacho ni Eleazarjadolo gi Joshua wuod Nun, kod jodong dhout Israel niya,
"Ruoth Nyasayenochiko Musa ni mondo wayud mier mag dak kaachiel gi lege jamni mokiewokodgi. "
Kuom mano jo-Israel nomiyo jo-Lawi miechgi gi lege mokiewokodgi mana e pinygi giwegi, kaluwore gi chik Ruoth Nyasaye.
Joka Kohath ema nokwong pognigi mier gi ombulu.  Jo-Lawi ma nyikwa Harunjadolo noyudo mier apar gadek e piny jo-Juda gi piny jo-Simeon kod pinyjo-Benjamin.
To joka Kohath modong’ nomi mier apar e piny jo-Efraim gijo-Dan, kendo e piny jo-Manase konchiel.
Joka Gershom nomi mier apar gadek e piny jo-Isakar gi piny jo-Asher kodpiny jo-Naftali kendo e piny jo-Manase komachielo ma nodak bashan.
Joka Merari to nomi mier apar gariyo e piny jo-Reuben gi piny jo-Gadkod piny jo-Zebulun.
Kamano jo-Israel nopogo ni jo-Lawi miego gi ombulu, kaluwore gi chikmane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.
,
Ombulu mokwongo nolwar kuom jo-Lawi ma nyikwa Harun mane gin dhootachiel kuom joka Kohath.  Mier mane opognigi kuom piny jo-Juda gi marjo-Simeon ne gin
Kiriath-arba, miluongo bende ni Hebron, e piny godemag Juda, kaachiel gi lege ma nokiewo kode.  (Arbano ne kwar jo-Anak. )
To mier matindo ma nokiewo gi dalano, kaachiel gi gweng’ momanyorekode, nosemi Kaleb wuod Jefune.
Mier mane opog ni nyikwa Harun jadolo e magi: Hebron, (ma achiel kuommier ma ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie,) gi Libna
gi Jatir gi Eshtemoa
giHolon gi Debir
gi Ashan gi Juta kod Beth-shemesh.  Ne gin mier ochikoma nopog ni dhoudi ariyogo.
To e piny jo-Benjamin nomigi mier ang’wenmane gin Gibeon gi Geba
gi Anathoth kod Almon.
Kamano jodolo manyikwa Harun noyudo mier apar gadek, kaachiel gi legegi.
Kane ogo ombulu, jo-Lawi ma jodhout Kohath modong’ nopognigi mierang’wen kaachiel gi legegi e piny Efraim.
Ne gin Shekem, (ma dala mang’ato moneko nyalo tonyie,) e piny gode mag Efraim, gi Gezer
Kibzaimkod Beth-horon.
Nopognigi bende mier ang’wen e piny jo-Dan.  Ne ginElteke gi Gibethon
gi Aijalon kod Gath-rimon.
To e piny jo-Manasekonchiel nomigie Taanak kod Ibleam.
Kamano dhout Kohath modong’gonoyudo mier apar, kaachiel gi legegi.
Nyikwa Gershom, ma achiel kuom dhout jo-Lawi, bende nomi mier kaachielgi legegi.  E piny jo-Manase komachielo ne giyudoe mier ariyo, mane ginGalon-gashan, (dala ma ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie,) kod Be-astaroth.
Toe piny jo-Isakar ne giyudoe mier ang’wen mane gin Kishion gi Daberath
gi Jarmuth kod En-gamuth.
E piny jo-Asher bende nomigie mierang’wen, mane gin Mishal gi Abdon
gi Helkath kod Rehob.
E pinyjo-Naftali to ne giyudoe Kedesh-galili, (dala ma ng’at moneko nyalotonyie,) gi Hamothdor gi Kartan, duto mier adek.
Kamano dhoutjo-Gershom koriwore noyudo mier apar gadek kaachiel gi legegi.
Koro magi e mier kaachiel gi legegi mane opogni jo-Lawi ma jodhoutMerari modong’.  E piny jo-Zebulun ne giyudoe mier ang’wen mane ginJoklean gi Karta
gi Dimna kod Nahalal.
To yo wuok chieng’ mar aoraJordan, e piny jo-Reuben momanyore gi Jeriko ne giyudoe mier ang’wenmane gin Bezer-me-thim, (dala ma ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie,) gi Jahaz
gi Kedemor kod Meraath.
To e piny jo-Gad ne giyudoe mier ang’wen,mane gin Ramoth-gilead, (ma bende dala ma ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie,) giMahanaim
gi Heshbon kod Jazer.
Kamano jo-Lawi ma jodhout Merarimodong’go noyudo mier apar gang’wen, kaachiel gi legegi.
Kuom mano, mier duto mane jo-Lawi oyudo e piny Israel, noromo pieroang’wen gaboro.
Dala ka dala ne nigi lege mokiewo kode. Jo-Israel okawo piny Kanaan
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Israel piny duto mane osesingore nikweregi ni nomigi.  Ne gikawe, mi gidak kuno.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyogikue e tong’gi duto kaka nosesingore ni kweregi.  Onge wasikgi kata achielmane nyalo sirogi, nikech Ruoth Nyaaye ema nomiyo giloyogi duto.
RuothNyasaye nochopoi singruokne duto ma nosetimo ni jo-Israel. Joshua
Kendo-mar-misango oger e bath aora Jordan
Bang’ wechego duto, Joshua noluongo jo-Benjamin gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manasekonchiel kande,
mowachonigi niya, "Usechopo chike duto mag Musa jatichRuoth Nyasaye, kaachiel gi maga bende.
E kindegi duto ok useringo uweyojo-Israel weteu, to userito chik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi chunyuduto nyaka chil kawuono.
To koro Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo oweteu pinynikaka nosingorenigi, omiyo unyalo dok e miechu manie piny mane Musajatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyou yo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan.
Neuru niurito chik duto mane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyiou.  Heruru RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, kuluwo yorene, kendo kurito chikene.  Padreurukuome, kutiyone gi chunyu duto. "
Eka Joshua noguedhogi, kendonowachonigi niya,
,
"Ero, udok e miechu gi mwandu mang’eny.  Un gi dhokmathoth, gi fedha kod dhahabu, gi mula kod nyinyo, kendo gi lewnimogundho.  Neuru ni upogo ni joweteu gigo duto musepeyo kuom wasiku. "Bang’ wachonigi kamano, noweyogi gia, mi gidok miechgi.  (Musa nosemiyojo-Manase konchielgi lowo e Bashan, to jo-Manase modong’ ema Joshuanomiyo lowo yo podho chieng’ mar Jordan kaachiel gi jowetegi. )
Kuom mano, jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel noweyo jo-IsraelShilo e piny Kanaan.  Ne gidok Gilead e pinygi, mane Ruoth Nyasayeosechiko Musa ni mondo gikaw.
To kane gichopo Geliloth man but aoraJordan, ne gigero kendo mang’ongo mar misango e bath aora kanyo, mane jinyalo neno gi kuma bor.
Kane jo-Israel mamoko owinjo ni jo-Reuben gijo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel osegero kendo-mar-misango Geliloth e bathaora Jordan, kama omanyore gi piny Kanaan,
ne gichokore Shilo mondogidhi giked kodgi.
Bende ne gioro Finehas wuod Eleazar jadolo e piny Gilead ir jo-Reubengi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel,
mi nodhi gi jotelo apar mag dhoutIsrael ka moro ka moro ochung’ ni dhoot ka dhoot.
Ne gibiro ir jogo,mi giwachonigi niya,
"Wabiro e nying jo-Ruoth Nyasaye duto mondowapenju gima omiyo usetimo gima rachni e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma NyasachIsrael? Useketho ni Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech ugero kendo mar-misango maruuwegi, kendo useweyo luwe.
Paruru richo mane watimo Peor, kod kum maneRyoth Nyasaye omiyowa, ma pok orumo nyaka chil kawuono.
Uparo ni kumnone yot, ma kendo pod uweyoe mana luwo Ruoth Nyasaye? Ka uketho ni RuothNyasaye kawuono, to kiny nokech gi jo-Israel duto.
Kuom mano, kunenoni ok unyal lemo maber e pinyu, to biuru lokawa e piny Ruoth Nyasayekuma ogurie Hema Maler, mondo udag kodwa.  To kik uwe Ruoth Nyasaye, miurwakwa e masira, kugero kendo-mar-misango machielo ni ma ok mana marRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ma noseger cha.
Paruru kaka Akan wuod Zeranotamore rito chik kuom gik mokwer, momiyo jo-Israel duto noyudo kum, maok Akan kende ema ne otho nikech richono!"
