Kane ochopo dala, nokawo pala, mopogo ringre chiegeno migepeapar gariyo, mi noorogi e piny Israel duto.
Nowacho ni joma nooro nimondo openj jo-Israel duto kama: "Bende gima kama osetimoree kataoseneye chakre ndalo mane jo-Israel owuokie Misri nyaka chil kawuono?Paruru wachni, kendo uchiw parou. " Kamano ng’ato ka ng’ato ma nonenoginowacho niya, "Gima chal kama pok otimore kata pok one nyaka nene!"Jong’ad Bura
Jo-Israel okedo gi jo-Benjamin
Jo-Israel duto, chakre Dan nyaka Beer-sheba, kaachiel gi Gilead,noyworo ni lweny, mochokore Mizpa e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maonge ng’atmodong’.
Dhout Israel duto, kaachiel gi jodonggi nobiro e chokruokmaduong’ mar jo-Nyasayeno, ka gin jolweny alufu mia ang’wen.
Mijo-Benjamin nowinjo ni jo-Isarel osedhi Mizpa. Jo-Israel nopenjo niya, "Ere kaka gima rach machalo kama notimore?"
Ja-Lawi mane oneg chiege cha nodwoko niya, "Noyudo wan e wuoth gichiega, mi ne wabuoro Gibea e piny Benjamin.
To jo-dalano nobiro mondoomonja gotienono, mi gilworo ot mane antie, ka gidwaro nega.  Eka neginindo gi chiega gi thwon, motho.
Bang’e nakawo ringre, mi apogokidienje kidienje, kendo naoro sidienjego e piny Israel duto, nikechjogo osetimo tim mochido kendo makuero e Israel.
Koro en wachu, unjo-Israel, mondo upar ane gima onego utim. "
Mi ji duto nochung’ rat,mowacho niya, "Onge kata ng’ato achiel kuomwa ma biro dok e hembe kataode.
To ma e gima nyaka watim: Wabiro yiero jomoko gi ombulu, mondoomonj Gibea.
To achiel kuom apar mar jo-Israel duto biro choko chiemokuom ji ni joma kedo.  Jomoko duto modong’ biro dhi chulo kuor nijo-Gibea kuom tim marach kendo makuero ma gisetimo e Israel. "
Kamanojo-Israel nowuok gi chuny achiel mondo omonj dalano.
Dhout Israel nooro joote e piny jo-Benjamin, ka giwacho niya.  "Manotim marach manade musetimo!
Miwauru joma acheje man Gibeago mondowaneg: kamano wabiro pwodho Israel kuom tim marachno. " To jo-Benjaminnotamore winjo wach jo-Israel wetegi.
Ne giwuok e miechgi duto, migibiro Gibea mondo giked gi jo-Isarel.
Chieng’no jolweny alufu pieroariyo gauchiel moa e miech Benjamin noyworo ni lweny.  To bende ne nitiejo-Gibea mia abiriyo moyier,
ma jo-orujre ma rachembe kendo ma josaba,ma nyalo goyo kata mana yie wich ma ok obayo.
Jolwenj Israel maratekema nochokore noromo alufu mia ang’wen ma onge jo-Benjamin.
Jo-Israel nowuok modhi Bethel, mi gipenjo Nyasaye wach niya, "Eredhoot monego kuong dhi monjo jo-Benjamin?" Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko ni,"Dhood Juda ema mondo okuong monjogi. "
Kuom mano, jo-Israel nowuokkogwen mojot kuma omanyore gi Gibea.
Ne gisudo machiegni gi dalanomondo giked gi jo-Benjamin, kendo ne giriedo jolwenjgi kanyo.
Jo-Benjamin nowuok Gibea, morado gi jo-Israel kuno, kendo ne ginegojolwenj jo-Israel alufu piero ariyo gariyo chieng’no.
,
Jo-Israelnodok Bethel moywak e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka odhiambo, ka gipenjeniya, "Ber mondo waked gi jowetewa ma jo-Benjamin kendo koso?" RuothNyasaye nodwokogi niya "Ee, ber, keduru kodgi kendo. "
Kamano jo-Israel nojiwore, mochako oriedo mana kama ne giriedoechieng’ mokwongo.  Ne gimonjo jo-Benjamin kendo mar ariyo.
Jo-Benjaminnowuok Gibea.  Mi chieng’no ne ginego ji alufu apar gaboro, ma duto negin jolweny marateke.
Eka jo-Israel duto nodok Bethel, mi gibet kuno enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, ka gilemo kendo giriyo kech nyaka odhiambo.  Negitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni miwang’o pep, kod misengni mag sawo.
E ndalono Sandug Muma mar Nyasaye ne ni kuno,
kendo Finehas wuodEleazar ma wuod Harun ne e jadolo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jo-Israelnopenjo Nyasaye niya, "Wadog mondo waked gi owetewa ma jo-Benjamin, kosowawe?" Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko niya, "Monjgiuru, kendo kiny nachiwgi elwetu. "
Mi jo-Israel noketo ji obuto, molworo Gibea duto.
Chieng’ mar adek, jo-Israel nodhi kedo gi jo-Benjamin, kendo negiriedo jolwenjgi Gibea, mana kaka ne gisetimo mokwongo.
Jo-Benjaminnowuok mondo orad kodgi, mi giyware mabor gi dala.  Ne gichako negojo-Israel kaka ne gisetimo mokwongo.  Ne ginego ji moromo piero adek epap, moko e yo madhi Bethel, to moko e yo madhi Gibea.
Jo-Benjamin neparo ni gibiro loyo jo-Israel mana kaka pile, to kata kamano jo-Israelnosechano mondo oyondhgi giwuog oko e wang’ yore madongo.
Thothjolwenj Israel nowuok kuonde mane gintie, mi gichokore kanyaklaBaal-Tamar, to joma oyier alufu apar nothinyore kowuok kuonde manegisebutoe machiegni gi Gibea,
mi gimonjo dalano, ka gia yo wuokchieng’.  Lweny nodoko mager, to jo-Benjamin ne pok ong’eyo ni ibirotiekogi.
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Israel oloyo jo-Benjamin,kendo ne ginegogi alufu piero ariyo gabich gi mia achiel chieng’no.
Mijo-Benjamin nong’eyo ni kara ologi. Jo-Israel noseringo e nyim jo-Benjamin mondo oyondhgi, nikech neging’eyo ni jogi ma obuto kolworo Gibea biro konyogi.
Joma nobutogonowuok mothinyore Gibea koni gi koni, mi ginego ji duto mane nie dalano.
Jo-Israel noyudo osewinjore gi jogi mane obuto ni ka gineno iro madume dalano kochomo polo, to mano biro bedonigi ranyisi
ni onego gilokregichom lweny tir.  Kane jo-Benjamin osenego ji moromo piero adekgo, migiparo ni giloyo jo-Isarel kaka ne gisetimo mokwongo,
iro nodum edala, kochomo polo.  E sano ne gigoyo machiemo, mi gineno ka dala dutowang’.
Omiyo jo-Israel nolokore gi jo-Benjamin, mi luoro maduong’nomako jo-Benjamin, ka gifwenyo ni kara oselogi.
Ne giringo jo-Israel,ka gichiko yo thim, to ne ok ginyal yombo, nimar thoth jolwenj jo-Isarelnothung’ogi, to bende jo-Israel ma noa e dalano nopodho kuomgi gikang’egi, monegogi.
Ne giromo jo-Benjamin koni gi koni, mi giriembogika ginegogi nyaka ne gichopo kamoro man yo wuokchieng’ mar Gibea.
Jolwenj jo-Benjamin marateke alufu apar gaboro nonegi.
Joma notonynoringo kochomo Lwanda Rimon, to ji alufu abich kuomgi noneg e yo. Jo-israel nolawo joma nodong’, monego alufu piero ariyo moko kendo.
Kamano jolwenj jo-Benjamin marateke mane oneg chieng’no noromo alufupiero ariyo gabich.
To ji mia auchiel notony, moringo odhi e thimnyaka Lwanda Rimon, mi gidak kuno kuom dueche ang’wen.
Jo-Israelnoduogo chien momonjo jo-Benjamin ma nodong’, mi ginego ji gi jamni manenie miechgi, kod gik moko duto mane ginwang’o, kendo mier duto manegidhiye, ne giwang’o gi mach. Jong’ad Bura
Onwang’ mon ni jo-Benjamin
Kane jo-Israel ni Mizpa, ne gisekuong’ore ni onge ng’ato kuomgi manoyie mondo ja-Benjamin okend nyare.
Koro ne gibiro Bethel, mi gibetkanyo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka odhiambo ka giywak matek.
Ne gipenjoRuoth Nyasaye niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, ang’o motimore eIsrael, momiyo Israel achiel lal kama?"
Kinyne gokinyi, ji nochiew chon, mogero kendo-mar-misango kanyo, migitimoe misengni miwang’o pep kod misengnii mag sawo.
Ne gipenjorekendgii ka nitie jomoko kuom dhout Israel mane ok obiro e chokruok marRuoth Nyasaye, nikech ne gisekuong’ore matek ni nyaka neg ng’ato ang’atamane ok obiro Mizpa e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ne gikuyo, ka giparo owetegima jo-Benjamin, mi giwacho niya, "Kawuono dhood Israel achiel oselal.
Ere gima dwatim mondo wayud mon ni jo dhoodno modong’ nikech newakuong’ore e nyim Nyasaye ni ok wayie mondo gikend nyiwa. "
Manoemomiyo ne gipenjore ka nitie jomoko kuom dhout Israel mane ok obiroMizpa e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  To nobedo ni onge ja-Jabesh-gilead maneobiro e chokruokno,
omiyo kane okwan ji, to ne oyud ni ongeja-Jabesh-gilead kata achiel kanyo.
Omiyo jo-Israel nooro jogi majochir alufu apar gariyo, ka gichikogi niya, "Dhiuru Jabesh-gilead mondouneg joma odakie, chwo gi mon kod nyithindo.
Neguru chwo gi mon duto,to kik uneg nyiri ma pok ong’eyo chwo. " Mi jogo nodhi, motimo kamano.
Ne giyudo nyi Jabesh-gilead mia ang’wen ma pok ong’eyo chwo, migikelogi e kambi man Shilo e piny Kanaan.
Bang’e jo-Israel duto nooro joote mondo odhi ir jo-Benjamin mane ni ebur lwanda man Rimon, mondo olos kodgi winjruok.
Eka jo-Benjamin-gonoduogo, mi jo-Israel nomiyogi nyi Jabesh-gilead mane ok ginego kande. To kata kamano ne ginok, ma ok giromo jo-Benjamin-go.
Chuny jo-Israel ne pod ywago jo-Benjamin, nikech Ruoth Nyasayenosemiyo nying jomoko olal kuom dhout Israel.
Kuom mano, jodong Israelnowacho niya, "Koro watim ang’o mondo wayud mon ni joma odong’gi, nikechmond jo-Benjamin duto osenegi?
Nyaka wayud mon ni jo-Benjamin modong’,mondo kik nyinggi lal,
to ok wanyal yienigi mondo gikend nyiwa, nikechwasekuong’ore ni nokuong’ ng’at momiyo ja-Benjamiin nyare okendo. "
Bang’e ne giparo ni Sap Ruoth Nyasaye mitimo Shilo higa ka higa birotimore machiegni.  (Shilo ni yo nyandwat mar Bethel, kendo en yo milambomar Lebona, to kendo en yo wuok chieng’ mar yo moa Bethel, kadhiShekem. )
Omiyo ne giwacho ni jo-Benjamin niya, "Dhiuru mondo ubuti e puothemzabibu,
kendo urit une ka nyi Shilo wuok dhi miel e nyasi.  Ekauwuogi, mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu omak nyako moro gi thwon, odoggo epiny Benjamin mondo obed chiege.
Ka wuonegi kata owetegi obiro irumondo ogolgi, to unyalo wachonigi niya, ‘Yieuru wakendgi, nikech ne okwamayougi e lweny mondo gibed mondewa.  To bende ne ok umiyowagi, oomiyopok uketho singruok ma dikelnu bura!’ "
Mi jo-Benjamin notimo kamano. Ng’ato ka ng’ato nomako nyako kuom nyiri mane mielgo, modhigo mondo obedchiege.  Bang’e ne gidok e pinygi giwegi, mi gichako gigero mier,gidakie.
To jo-Israel mamoko bende noke, modok kuom dhoutgi kendo kuomjoodgi e miechgi giwegi.
E ndalogo Israel ne pok obedo gi ruoth, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato netimo mana gima ohero. Ruth
Ruth gi Naomi
E ndalo mane jobura rito piny Israel kech nowuok, mi ng’at moro maja-Bethlehem-Juda nodhi gi chiege kod yawuote ariyo mondo odag e pinyMoab.
Nying ng’atno ne Elimelek, kendo nying chiege ne Naomi, to nyingyawuote ne Malon kod Kilion.  Ne gin jo-Efratha man Bethlehem-Juda.  Negichopo e piny Moab mi gidak kuno.
To Elimelek chwor Naomi notho,moweye gi yawuote ariyo.
Yawuotego nokendo nyi Moab, ma nyinggi Orpa giRuth.  Ne gidak kuno kuom higni ma dirom apar.
Bang’e Malon gi Kilion nejotho, mi Naomi nodong’ maonge yawuote gi chwore.
Kane Naomi pod ni e piny Moab, nowinjo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye oseparo joge,momiyo chiemo.  Omiyo nochako wuoth gi mond yawuote mondo oa kuno, odogthurgi.
Kamano nowuok oa kuma ne entieno, kaachiel gi mond yawuote, migimako yo ma dok e piny Juda.
To nowachonigi niya, "Ng’ato ka ng’atokuomu mondo odog thurgi, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye mondo otimnu maber, manakaka nutimona maber gi joga motho.
Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oguedhu, kendong’ato ka ng’ato obed mamor e ode kokende. " To kane ogoyonigi oriti, negichako ywak matek,
mi giwachone niya, "Ok kamano, to nyaka wadhi kodiir jou. "
To Naomi nowachonigi niya, "Doguru nyiga.  Ang’o ma dimi udhikoda? Bende pod danywol yawuowi ma dibed chwou?
Doguru nyiga nikechtinde ati, ok danyal bedo gi dichwo kendo.  Ka da anyalo wacho ni agenobedo gi dichwo gotienoni, kendo nywolo yawuowi,
bende da uyie ritonyaka gidok madongo? Duritru mak okendu? Ooyo nyiga, an ema aniechandruok moloyo un, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye osekuma. "
Kane giwinjokamano, ne gimedo ywak matek.  Orpa nonyodho wuon odgi, moweye; Ruth tonotuere kuome.
Naomi nowacho ni Ruth niya, "Ne! Nyieki osedok thuru, kendo osedok irnyisechegi.  Dog iluw bang’e. "
To Ruth nodwoke niya, "Kik ichuna nimondo apogra kodi, mi adog mak aluwi, nikech kuma idhiye ema nadhiye,kendo kama idakie ema nadagie.  Jou nobed jowa, kendo Nyasachu nobedNyasacha.
Kama nithoe ema nathoe, kendo kanyo ema noyikae.  RuothNyasaye mondo okweda ka wach moro opoga kodi, kata da obed mana tho. "
Kane Naomi oneno kaka Ruth oketo chunye mar dhi kode, noling’.
Mon ariyogo nowuotho kanyakla nyaka Bethlehem.  To kane gichopo kuno,dala duto nobwok, mi mond dalano nopenjore niya, "Ma bende Naomi adier?"
To Naomi nowachonigi niya, "Kik uluonga ni Naomi, tiende ni Ng’amaMor, to luongauru ni Malit, nikech Ng’ama Nyalo Gik Moko Duto osetimonamalit ahinya.
Nene aa ka, ka ang’eny gi mwandu, to Ruoth Nyasayeoduoga nono.  Uluonga ni Naomi nang’o, ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama NyaloGik Moko Duto, osekuma malit kama?"
Kamano e kaka Naomi noduogo koa e piny Moab gi chi wuode ma nyar Moab. Ne gichopo Bethlehem e ndalo michako kayoe shairi. Ruth
Ruth ohulo cham e puoth Boaz
Naomi ne nigi watne moro ma nyinge Boaz, ja dhoodgi Elimelek.  Ne enng’at ma rahuma, kendo ma japith.
Chieng’ moro Ruth nyar Moab nowachoni Naomi niya, "Yiena adhi mondo ahul cham bang’ ng’ato ang’ata moyiekecha. " Nodwoke niya, "Dhiyo, nyara. "
Omiyo nowuok modhi hulo cham e puodho bang’ jokeyo, kendo nopo kochopoe puoth Boaz, jadhoodgi Elimelek.
To bang’e Boaz nobiro e puothe, koaBethlehem, momoso jokeyo niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye obed kodu!" Ne gidwoke ni,"Ruoth Nyasaye oguedhi!"
Eka Boaz nopenjo jatichne mane rito jokeyo ni,"Mano nyar ng’a?"
Jatichneno nodwoke niya, "En nyar Moab, ma nobiro giNaomi, koa e piny Moab cha.
Nokwaya ni mondo ayiene ohul cham bang’jokeyo e kind pidhe mosetue.  Osebedo kotiyo ka chakre okinyi nyaka sani,ma ok oyue kata matin. "
Boaz nowacho ni Ruth niya, "Nyara winji.  Kik idhi ihul e puoth ng’ato,bende kik ia ka, to bed mana kod jotichna ma nyiri.
Ket wang’i mana epuodho ma gikeyoeni, kendo ihul bang’gi.  Asekwero yawuowi ni kik gimuli. Kendo ka riyo oloyi, to dhi kar dapige, imodh pi ma jotich oumbo. "
Ruth nogoyo chonge piny, mokulore nyaka e lowo, kowachone niya, "Ang’omomiyo ipara, mikecha kama, to an wendo awenda?"
Boaz nodwoke niya,"Osenyisa malong’o gik moko duto misetimo ni wuon odu nyaka ne chworitho, kendo kaka niweyo wuoru gi meru kod piny ma nonywolie, mibiro ir jimane ok ing’eyo.
Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ochuli kuom tichni, kendo iyudpok makare moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, ma nibiro e bwotipone mondo iyud kar konyruok. "
Eka Ruth nowachone niya, "Itimonamaber, ruoth, nikech ihoyo chunya, kendo iwuoyo koda maber, kata obedoni ok an achiel kuom jotichni kamano. "
Kane sa chiemo ochopo, Boaz nowacho ni Ruth niya, "Bi ka, ichiem. "Omiyo nobet piny but jokeyo.  Boaz nomiye shairi molodi, mi nochamomoyieng’ nyaka moko nodong’.
Ka nowuok mondo odhi ohul cham, Boaznogolo chik ni jotichne niya, "Weyeuru mondo ohul kata mana e kindtuche, kik ukwere.
Bende ugol moko kuom mago mosechoki, uwene mondoohul, kik utame. "
Kamano nohulo e puodho nyaka chieng’ opodho.  Eka nodino shairimosehulo, moromo depe ariyo.
Noting’o chamgo motero dala, kendononyiso wuon odgi kar rombgi.  Bende nogolone chiemo ma nochamo odong’,momiye.
Wuon odgi nopenje niya, "Nihulo kanye kawuono? Nitiyo kune?Oguedh jalo mane opari!" Mi Ruth nonyise ni notiyo ka ng’at ma nyingeBoaz.
Naomi nowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye, osetimonwa ng’wono kodjowa motho, mondo oguedh jalo. " Eka nomedo wacho niya, "Jalo en watwamahie. "
Ruth nowachone ni, "Bende nokona ni mondo ati but jotichnenyaka chieng’ ma gitieko keyone duto. "
Naomi nowachone niya, "En adiernyara, ber iluwri gi jotichne manyiri, nikech dipo kiyudo chandruok epuoth ng’ato. "
Omiyo Ruth nobedo ka tiyo but jotich Boaz manyiri,nyaka giko keyo mar shairi, gi mar ngano bende, kodak gi wuon odgi. Ruth
Ruth gi Boaz e kar dino
Bang’e Naomi nowacho ni Ruth niya, "Nyara, onego ayudni kar dak, mondoibed maber.
Ing’eyo ni Boaz mane ibet kitiyo but jotichne manyiri cha,en watwa.  Awinjo ni ang’ nopiedh shairi gotienoni kar dinone.
Omiyolwokri, kendo iwirri gi mo.  Rwak lepi mabeyo, ilor idhi kuno.  To kik iweong’eyi, ka pok ochiemo kendo ometho.
Kodhi nindo, to ng’i kamaonindoe.  Bang’e idonj kanyo, iel gir um gi yo ka tiende, kendo inindkanyono.  Obiro wachoni gima onego itim. "
Ruth nodwoke ni, "Dutomiwachona, abiro timo. "
Ruth nodhi kar dino motimo duto mane wuon odgi owachone.
Kane Boazosechiemo kendo ometho morome, nodhi monindo but pidh cham.  Eka Ruthnolidho, moelo gir um gi yo ka tiende, kendo onindo kanyo.
Odiewuortir, gimoro nobwogo Boaz, mochiew.  To ka nolokore, nopo konwang’o dhakomoro konindo yo ka tiende!
Nopenje ni, "In ng’a?" Ruth nodwoke ni, "AnRuth, jatichni ma nyako.  Yar gir um mondo iuma, nikech in e ng’at monegotera. "
Boaz nowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye oguedhi, nyara! Gima itimokawuononi nyiso long’o maber moloyo ma nitimo ni wuon odu, nikech okiseluwo bang’ wuowi moro ma jachan kata ma japith.
Koro nyara, kikiluor.  Abiro timoni duto miwacho, nikech jodalawa duto ong’eyo ni innyako makare.
Adier an jadhoodu mahie, to nitie wadu moro mahiemoloya.
Bed ka gotienoni, to kiny gokinyi, ka jalo nyalo timoni gimajadhoodu mahie onego tim, to ber, mondo otim kamano.  To ka ok oyie timokamano, to akuong’ora gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, ni abiro timoni kamano. Koro nindi nyaka okinyi. "
Omiyo Ruth nonindo ka tiende nyaka huyuhuyu piny, to noa malo ka podng’ato ok nyal ng’eyo wadgi.  Boaz nowachone niya, "Kik ng’ere ni dhakomoro nende obiro kar nindo ka. "
Eka nomedo wachone niya, "Kel lawi marabola, iyar. " Mi noyare, kendo Boaz noolone shairi ma dirom migerniauchiel, moyieye.  Eka Ruth nodok dala.
Kane oduogo, wuon odgi nopenje niya, "Wach odhi nadi, nyara?" Ruthnonyise duto mane jagono otimone,
kendo nowachone niya, "Magi emigerni auchiel mag shairi momiya, nikech nowachona ni kik aduog ir wuonodwa gi lweta nono. "
Naomi nowachone niya, "Bed mos nyara nyaka ing’egima biro wuok e wachni, nikech ng’atno ok bi ling’ mak oloso wachnikawuono. "Ruth
Boaz okawo Ruth
Boaz nodhi e dhoranga Bethlehem, mobet piny.  Bang’e noneno jadhoodgimane osewuoyo kuome cha ka kadho kanyo, mowachone niya, "Akoni, bar ibiku, ibed piny ka. " Kane osebiro, mobet piny,
Boaz noluongo jodong dalaapar, mowachonogi niya, "Un beduru ka. "
Eka nowacho ni jal majadhoodgino niya, "Ing’eyo ni Naomi oseduogo koa Moab.  Koro odwaro lokopuoth Elimelek owadwa.
Omiyo naparo mondo anyisi wachno, kakwayi nimondo ing’iewe e nyim joma obet ka, kendo e nyim jodongwa.  Kiyie warogo,to ware.  To ka ok idwar ware, to wachna mondo ang’e, nikech onge ng’atma diware mak mana in, kata an. " Mi jadhoodgino nodwoke ni, "Abiroware. "
Eka Boaz nowachone niya, "Chieng’ ming’iewoe puodhono kuomNaomi, to nyaka ikaw Ruth nyar Moab bende, ma chi jal ma notho mondoichung wi ng’at mothono kuom mwandune. "
Jadhoodgino nodwoke niya, "Kakamano, to ok anyal ware, nimar dipo kaketho mwanduna awuon.  Ber mondoikaw kara, iwar gino ma owinjore awar, nikech an ok anyal ware. "
E ndalo machon, jo-Israel ne nigi tim moro kuom wach waro gimoro kataloko gimoro.  Ng’ato ne lonyo wuore, kendo miyo wadgi, mondo wachno obedgi teko.  Mano e kaka jo-Israel ne miyo wach bedo gi teko e nyim joneno.
Omiyo ng’at cha nolonyo wuor, kawacho ni Boaz niya, "Ero, in ema mondoing’iew puodhono. "
Eka Boaz nowacho ni jodongo kod ji duto niya, "Un ejoneno kawuono, kang’iewo kuom Naomi gik moko duto mane mag Elimelek gimag Kilion kod mag Malon.
Ruth nyar Moab, ma chi malon bende akawoobed chiega, mondo achung wi jal mothono kuom mwandune, mondo kik nyingelal kuom owetene, kata kuom dhoodgi. "
Eka jodongo, kaachiel gi ji dutomane nie dhorangach, nowacho niya, "Wan joneno.  Ruoth Nyasaye mondooguedh dhako ma donjo e odino, obed machal gi Rahel kod Lea, mon ariyoma nogero dhood Israel.  Bende in mondo iyud duong’ e Efratha, kendo ibedgi pak mathoth e Bethlehem.
Nyithindo ma Ruoth Nyasaye omiyi gi dhanimondo omi dhoodi obed machal gi dhood Perez, wuod Tamar chi Juda. "
Kamano Boaz nokawo Ruth, mobedo chiege, mi Ruoth Nyasaye noguedhe,momako ich, kendo nonywolo wuowi.
Bang’e mon nowacho ni Naomi niya,"Opak Ruoth Nyasaye tinende, ma ok oweyi nono.  Koro in gi nyakwari. Nying nyathi mondo obed gi huma maduong’ e Israel.
Nobedni ng’amaduogo chunyi, kendo ka ng’ama riti e tiyoni, nikech chi wuodi moherino,kendo moloyoni yawuowi abiriyo, ema osenywolo nyathini. "
Naomi nokawonyathi, moriwo e kore, kendo nobedo japite.
Mon wetene nochako nyathinying ni Obed, kendo ne giwacho niya, "Osenywol ni Naomi nyathi. " En ewuon Jesse, ma wuon Daudi.
Magi e tienge mag Perez: Perez nonywolo Hezron,
to Hezron nonywoloRam.  Ram nonywolo Aminadab,
to Aminadab nonywolo Nashon.  Nashonnonywolo Salmon,
to Salmon nonywolo Boaz.  Boaz nonywolo Obed,
toObed nonywolo Jesse.  To Jesse nonywolo Daudi.
SAMUEL
Nywol mar Samuel
Ne nitie ja-Ramathaim moro, ma ja-Zuf, mane odak e piny gode magEfraim.  Nyinge ne Elkana wuod Jeroham, wuod Elihu, wuod Tohu, wuod Zufma ja-Efraim.
Ne en gi mon ariyo, ma nyinggi Hana gi Penina.  Penina nenigi nyithindo, to Hana ne ongego.
Higa ka higa, ng’atni ne wuok e dalane, kadhi Shilo mondo olem kendootim misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.  E ndalogo, noyudoka Hofni gi Finehas, yawuot Eli, ne tiyo kuno ka jodolo mag RuothNyasaye.
Kane Elkana timo misango, nopogo migepe mag ring misango nichiege ma Penina kod yawuote gi nyige duto.
Nohero Hana, to kata kamanonomiye mana migawo achiel, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok omiyenyathi.
Nyiek Hana ne chando chuny Hana malit, konyiere nikech RuothNyasaye ok omiye nyathi.
Wachni ne timore higa ka higa.  Kane odhi e OdRuoth Nyasaye, nyieke nosiko ka chande, omiyo noywak, kendo nokunochiemo.
Chieng moro, Elkana chwore nopenje niya, "Hana, ang’o momiyochunyi lit, kendo iywak kamano, ma ok inyal kata chiemo? Donge abernimoloyo yawuowi apar?"
Kane gisetieko chiemo kod metho e sawo mane ni Shilo, Hana noa malomodhi ochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  To noyudo ka Eli jadolo obet e komebut dhood Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Chuny Hana ne chandore, kendonolamo Ruoth Nyasaye, koywakne malit.
Kwan
.
. Nokuong’ore kowachoniya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ka inine chandruokna,kendo ipara an jatichni, ma ok wiyi owil koda, mi imiya nyathi ma wuowi,to anachiwnigo, mondo obed mari ndalo duto mag ngimane, kendo mirich oknoka wiye. "
Kane Hana pod lemo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kamano Eli to ne ng’iyodhoge.
Hana ne lemo gi chunye.  Kata obedo ni dwonde ne ok winji, todhoge ne diemore, omiyo Eli ne paro ni omer,
mopenje niya, "Inimernyaka karang’o? Kuer kong’o!"
Hana nodwoke niya, "Ooyo jaduong’, anmana dhako ma chunye chandore.  Ok asemadho kong’o kata gimoro ma nyalomero ji, to achiwo chunya ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kik ikawa ka dhakomachach.  Ywagruok gi kuyo mogundho ema omiyo asewuoyo kamano kindeniduto. "
Eli nodwoke niya, "Dhiyo gi kue, kendo Nyasach Israel mondoomiyi gima isekwaye. "
Hana nowachone niya, "Mad abed ng’ama owinjoregi ng’wononi. " Eka nodhi mochiemo, ka chunye ler.
Ne gichiew gokinyi mang’ich, kendo kane giselemo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,ne gidok dalagi Rama.  Elkana noriwore gi chiege ma Hana, mi RuothNyasaye noparo Hana.
Nomako ich, kendo kane ndalo ogik, nonywolowuowi, mi owacho niya, "Achake ni Samuel, nikech ne akwaye RuothNyasaye. "
Kane ndalo ochopo, Elkana gi joode duto nodhi timo ni Ruoth Nyasayemisango mar higa ka higa, kendo chopo singruokne.
Hana to ne ok odhi,to nowacho ni chwore niya, "Ok nadhi nyaka nyathi we dhoth, eka natere enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi nosik kuno. "
Elkana chwore nokone niya, "Timgima ineno ni ber.  Rit nyaka nyathi we dhoth.  To Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oneni ichopo singruokni. " Kamano Hana nodong’, kadhodho nyathine nyaka wedhoth.
Kane nyathi oseweyo dhoth, nodhi kode Shilo gi rwath ma hikeadek, gi mogo ma dirom depe ariyo, gi divai e ndede mar pien, modonjo eod Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ne ginego rwadhno, eka Hana nokelo nyathi irEli,
mowacho niya, "A jaduong’, an e dhako mane ochung’ kalamo RuothNyasaye cha.
Ne akwaye nyathini, kendo koro osemiyago kakanakwaye.
Emomiyo an bende achiwe ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mondo obed jatichnendalo duto mag ngimane. "
SAMUEL
Wend Hana
Luka
.
-
. Hana nolamo Ruoth Nyasaye, kowacho niya,"Chunya il gi Ruoth Nyasaye,nimar osemedo tekona. Achayo wasika,kendo amor nikech oseresa.
Onge nyasaye moro malermachal gi Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech onge moro,to mana en kende. Bende onge lwanda moro,machal gi Nyasachwa
Weuru sungruok mukwarorugo,kendo ng’ayi kik wuog e dhou,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye en Nyasayemong’eyo gik moko duto,kendo en ema opimo timbe dhano.
"Tunge mag joma rateke otur,to joma yomyom manore gi teko.
Joma ne yieng’koro tiyo ni jomokomondo oyud chiemo,to joma ne denyo koro yieng’. Dhako ma migumbaonywolo nyithindo abiriyo,to en ma nyithinde ng’eny odong’ nono.
"Ruoth Nyasaye ema nego,kendo en ema ochiero. Oloro nyaka ei liel,bende ogolo oko.
Ruoth Nyasaye kelo dhier,kendo okelo mwandu. Odwoko piny,bende oting’o malo.
Ogolo jachan e buru,kendo oting’o ng’ama odhiera e pidh yugi,mondo omiye bedo e kom moyiedhikaachiel gi ruodhi. Mise mar piny en mar Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo orenjo piny kuome.
Orito tiend joge ni kik chwanyre,to joricho lal e mudho,nikech teko ng’ato owuonok nyal miye loch.
Joma piem gi Ruoth Nyasayenotur matindotindo,komiyo polo mor kuomgi. Ruoth Nyasaye ng’ado burae tung’ piny gi tung’ piny. Enomi ruoth moyiero duong’,kendo nomede teko. "
Bang’ mano nodok Rama, to nyathi nodong’, katiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye enyim Eli jadolo. Okor wach kuom dhood Eli
To yawuot Eli ne joma acheje, ma ok dew Ruoth Nyasaye.
E ndalogogima jodolo ne timo ni jolemo ne chalo kama: kane ng’at moro timomisango, jatich jadolo ne biro gi uma ma lekene adek ka pod itedoring’o.
Nonyumo umano e gima itedoe, kaka agulu, kata kabange, katanyalaro.  Ring’o duto mane lak uma omako ema ne jadolo kawo.  Kamano ekaka ne gitimo ni jo-Israel duto ma nobiro Shilo.
To bende kane pokowang’ bor e kendo-mar-misango, jatich jadolo ne biro kawacho ni ng’atmatimo misango niya, "Chiw ring’o mondo obul ni jadolo, nikech ok odwarring’o motedi, to odwaro mana manumu. "
To kapo ni ng’atno odwoke niya,"We mondo okwong owang’ bor, eka ikaw gima ihero," to jatich ne wachoni, "Ngang’! Miyago mana sani.  To ka ok itimo kamano, to abiro kawo githwon. "
Ketho mag yawuowigo ne dongo ahinya e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech ne gichayo gima ochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Samuel ne tiyo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ka pod en nyathi, korwakore ginanga mar katana.
Higa ka higa, min mare ne twang’one law matin, kendokelone, kobiro gi chwore mondo otim misango mar higa.
Eli ne guedhoElkana gi chiege, kowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo omiyi nyithindo gidhani kar mano misechiwone. " Kane oseguedhogi kamano, ne gidokthurgi.
Ruoth Nyasaye noparo Hana, mi nonywolo yawuowi adek gi nyiriariyo.  To nyathi ma Samuel nodongo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eli koro noti ahinya.  Nowinjo gik mane yawuote timo ni jo-Israel duto,kendo kaka ne giterore gi mon matiyo e dho Hemb Romo.
Omiyonowachonigi niya, "Mar ang’o utimo gik ma kamagi? Asewinjo wach timbeumaricho e dho ji duto.
Ooyo yawuota, wach masewinjo ka jo-RuothNyasaye wacho kuomu ok en wach maber.
Ka ng’ato oketho ni wadgi,Nyasaye nobedne jathek, to ka ng’ato oketho ni Ruoth Nyasaye to ereng’ama nokonye?" To ne gidagi winjo dwond wuon-gi, nimar Ruothn Nyasayenoseng’ado ni mondo githo.
Luka
.
. To nyathi ma Samuel nodongo, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye gi jinomedo bedo mamor kode.
Ng’at Nyasaye moro nobiro ir Eli, monyise niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owachokama: ‘Nafwenyora ni kwaru kane en gi joode Misri e tuech e odFarao.
Wuok
.
-
; T. Lawi
.
,
. Ne ayiere kuom dhout Israel dutomondo obed jadolona, kendo odhi e kendona-mar-misango, otim misengni,kendo orwakre gi law dolo miluongo ni efod e nyima.  Namiyo dhoodumisengni duto miwang’o ma jo-Isarel chiwo.
Ang’o momiyo koro uchayomisengni maga gi mich masechiko? Imiyo yawuoti duong’ moloyo an awuon,kiweyo gichamo lemo mabeyo mag mich ma joga Israel kelo, mi gidokomachwe.
Nasingora ni dhoodu ni ginitina nyaka chieng’.  To koro awachoni ok nobed kamano ngang’, nimar joma miya duong’ ema nami duong’, tojogo mochaya, ok nokwan ka gimoro.
Ndalo biro ma anang’adie tekoni okogi teko mar dhoodu bende, nyaka chieng’.
Eka e chandruokni ininemwandu duto ma Nyasaye omiyo jo-Isarel, kendo inigombi, to onge ng’at manoru e dhoodi nyaka chieng’.
Anatiek jogi duto matiyo ekendona-mar-misango, mak mana ja-dhoodi achiel ema nodong’, kaywak,kendo ka chunye chandore.  To thoth jogi nonegi.
Sam
.
. Gimanotimre ni yawuoti ariyo, ma Hofni gi Finehas, nobedni ranyisi.  Ginithogiduto chieng’ achiel.
Mi anaket jadolona awuon, ng’at ma jaadiera, manotim duto manie chunya gi parona.  Anagur dhoode mondo nyikwaye otinyaka chieng’ ni Ruoth mayiero mowir.
Jo-dhoodi duto ma nodong’ kangima nobi ire, kakwaye fedha matin, kata kuon matin.  Giniwach niya,"Asayi, keta e tich kama jadolo moro tiyoe, mondo ayudie gima dacham. " ’"
SAMUEL
Ruoth Nasaye oluongo Samuel
Nyathi ma Samuel ne tiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye e nyim Eli.  To weche manewuok kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ne nok ndalogo, kendo ne ok fwenyrepile.
Ndalogo wang’ Eli nosechako imore, ma ok onyal neno maber. Chieng’ moro Eli ne nindo kare mar nindo.
Samuel bende nosenindo eHekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kama Sanduk mar Nyasaye ne nitie.  To kane tayamar Nyasaye pok otho,
Ruoth Nyasaye noluongo Samuel, mi Samuel nodwokoni, "Antie. "
Eka noringo odhi ir Eli, mowachone niya, "Iluonga; era e. "To Eli nowachone niya, "Ok aluongi.  Dog inindi. " Mi nodokmonindo.
Ruoth Nyasaye noluonge kendo niya, "Samuel. " Mi Samuelnochung’, kendo odhi ir Eli, mowachone ni, "Era e, nikech iluonga. " Tonodwoke ni, "Ooyo wuoda, ok aluongi.  Dog inindi. "
Noyudo ka Samuel pokong’eyo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ne pokofwenyorene,
omiyo, kane Ruoth Nyasaye oluongo Samuel kendo luong maradek, nochung’ kendo odhi ir Eli, mowachone niya, "Era e, nikechIluonga. " Eli nofwenyo ni kara Ruoth Nyasaye ema luongo nyathino.
Omiyonowacho ni Samuel niya, "Dhiyo inindi, to koluongi kendo, to iwach niya,‘Wachi, Ruoth Nyasaye, jatichni winjo. ’ " Samuel nodok, monindo.
EkaRuoth Nyasaye nobiro mochung’ kanyo, kendo oluongo Samuel kakanoseluonge mokwongo niya, "Samuel, Samuel. " Eka Samuel nodwoko ni,"Wachi, jatichni winjo. "
Mii Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Samuel niya,"Abiro timo gimoro e Israel ma ng’ato ang’ata mowinjo to itenopopni.
E ndalono anachop weche duto te mane awacho kuom Eli gidhoode.
Nyaka iwachne ni abiro ng’ado ni dhoode bura mosiko, nikechnong’eyo ni yawuote yanyo Nyasaye, to ne ok okwerogi.
Emomiyoakuong’ora ni dhood Eli ni, misango kata chiwo ok nopwodh richogi. "
Samuel nonindo nyaka okinyi, eka nochiew, moyawo dhood Hekalu marRuoth Nyasaye, to noluoro nyiso Eli fwenyruokno.
Eli noluonge,mowachone niya, "Samuel wuoda. " Nodwoke ni, "Era e,. "
Eli nopenjeniya, "Wach ang’o ma Ruoth Nyasaye onyisi? Asayi, kik ipandago.  Nyasayemondo okwedi kipanda wach moro kuom weche duto ma nowachoni. "
MiSamuel nonyise duto te, ma ok opande kata wach achiel.  Eli nowacho niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye mondo otim gima oneno ni ber. "
Kane Samuel dongo, Ruoth Nyasaye ne ni kode, kendo weche duto maneokoro, Ruoth Nyasaye ne ochopo kare.
Kamano jo-Israel duto, chakre Dannyaka Beer-sheba, nong’eyo koseket Samuel mondo obed janabi mar RuothNyasaye.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo fwenyore Shilo, nikech kanyo emanosefwenyoree ni Samuel. Kamano wach Samuel nobedo gi teko e piny Israel duto.
SAMUEL
Jo-Filistia omako Sandug Muma
E ndalogo, jo-Filistia nochokore mondo omonj jo-Israel, kendo jo-Israelnowuok mondo oked kodgi.  Jo-Israel nojot Ebenezer, to jo-Filistia nojotAfek.
Jo-Filistia noyaro nii lweny momanyore gi jo-Israel, kendo kanegirado, jo-Filistia noloyo jo-Israel, mi ginego jogi ma dirom alufuang’wen e paw lweny.
Kane jolweny oduogo e kambi, jodong Israelnopenjore niya, "Marang’o Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo jo-Filistia oloyowakawuono? Wadhiuru Shilo waom Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye wabedgo,mondo oreswa e lwet wasikwa. "
Wuok
.
. Omiyo ne gioro wach Shilo, migikelo Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma enNyasaye mobet ewi kerubi.  Hofni gi Finehas, ma yawuot Eli, ema nobiro giSandug Muma.
Kane Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye obiro e kambi, jo-Israel duto nokokmatek, ma piny omor.
Kane jo-Filistia owinjo kokono, ne gipenjore niya,"Mano koko manade matimore e kambi jo-Hibraniano?" To kane giwinjo niSanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye osechopo e kambi,
ne gidoko maluor mi giwachoniya, "Nyisechegi osebiro e kambigi!" Bende ne giwacho niya, "Yaye!Nyaka nene gima kama pok notimore.
Yaye! Ng’ano ma noreswa e lwetnyiseche maratekegi? Gin nyiseche ma nosando jo-Misri gi masichemayoreyore e thim.
Jiwreuru ubed ka chwo, un jo-Filistia, mondo kikubed ka wasumb jo-Hibrania, kaka gisebedonu.  Beduru ka chwo, kendokeduru!"
Jo-Filistia nokedo gi jo-Israel, mi giloyo, kendo jo-Israel dutonoringo odok e miechgi.  Ne ologi marach, kendo jogi ma dirom alufu adeknotho.
Sanduk mar Nyasaye nokaw, kendo Hofni gi Finehas, ma yawuotEli, bende nonegi.
Ja-Benjamin moro noringo oa e lweny, mobiro Shilo chieng’onogo,koyiecho lepe, kendo obuko wiye buru.
E sa ma nochopoe, Eli noyudoobet e kom e dir yo, kang’icho, nikech chunye ne ridore, koparo Sandukmar Nyasaye.  Kane jalo odonjo e dala, monyiso ji wach, dala dutonoywak,
Eli nowinjo ywak, mopenjo ni, "Mano koko manade?" Ng’atnonodhi ire kareto, monyise wach.
Eli koro ne jahigni piero ochikogaboro, kendo wang’e noyuso mane ok onyal neno.
Jalo nowachone niya,"An ng’at moa e lweny.  Aringo lweny mana kawuono. " Eli nopenje niya,"Wuoda, lweny dhi nadi?"
Ng’atno nodwoke niya, "Jo-Israel oringojo-Filistia, kendo oseneggi gi nek malich.  Hofni gi Finehas yawuoti,bende josetho.  Kendo Sanduk mar Nyasaye osekaw. "
Kane Eli owinjo wachSanduk mar Nyasaye, nogore piny ataro, koa e kom ma nobetie but rangach,mi ng’ute notur, motho nikech ne en jaduong’ moti, kendo nopek.  Nosebedojang’ad bura ni jo-Israel kuom higni piero ang’wen.
Noyudo ka chi Finehas ma wuod Eli nigi ich, mogik nywol.  To kaneowinjo ni Sanduk mar Nyasaye osekaw, kendo kwar mare kod chwore josetho,nopo ka muoch kaye, mi nobet piny monywol.
To nohewore ahinya modwarotho, mi mon mane chole nokone niya, "Kik iluor, isenywolo wuowi. " To neok odwoko wach, kata dewo ne ok odewo.
Nochako nyathi ni Ikabod,(tiende ni, maonge duong’) kowacho niya, "Duong’ osea kuom Israel. "Nowacho kamano nikech Sanduk mar Nyasaye nosekaw, kendo kwar mare gichwore ne josetho.
Mano emomiyo nowacho ni, "Duong’ osea kuom Israel,nikech Sanduk mar Nyasaye osekaw. "
SAMUEL
Gik mane otimore kane Sanduk nie piny Filistia
Kane jo-Filistia okawo Sanduk mar Nyasaye, ne gigole Ebenezer, migikele Ashdod.
Eka ne gitere e od nyasachgi ma Dagon, mi gikete butnyasachgino.
Kinyne gokinyi, kane jo-Ashdod obiro, ne giyudo ni Dagonosepodho piny auma e nyim Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Omiyo ne gichunge,mi gidwoke kare.
Kinyne gokinyi mar ariyo, kane gibiro, ne ginwang’o niDagon ochako opodho piny auma e nyim Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mi wiyegi luetene ochot, molwar e paw dhoot.  Kor Dagon kende ema nodong’.
Manoemomiyo jodolo mag Dagon, kata ng’ato ang’ata ma donjo e od Dagon, oknyon paw dhood Dagon e Ashdod, nyaka chil kawuono.
Ruoth Nyasaye nosando jo-Ashdod malich, mi luoro omakogi.  Nogoyogi gituo mar buche, kendo oyieyo bende nopong’o pinygi.
Kane jo-Ashdod onenogima timore, ne giwacho niya, "Sanduk mar Nyasach jo-Israel kik bed edierwa, nimar osandowa malit, kendo osando Dagon nyasachwabende. "
Omiyo ne giluongo ruodhi duto mag jo-Filistia mondo gine anegima ginyalo timo gi Sanduk mar Nyasach Israel.  Jogo nodwokogi niya,"Goluru Sanduk mar Nyasach Israel, uter Gath. " Kuom mano, ne gigoloSanduk mar Nyasach Israel, gitero kuno.
Kane gisetere, eka Nyasayenochako sando jo-Gath ahinya.  Nogoyo jodalano, matindo gii madongo gituo mar buche mokwodogi.
Omiyo ne gikowo sanduk mar Nyasaye Ekron. Kane ochopo Ekron, jo-Ekron noywak, kawacho niya, "Gisekelo Sanduk marNyasach Israel kuomwa mondo onegwa waduto. "
Emomiyo ne giluongo ruodhiduto mag jo-Filistia, mi giwachonigi niya, "Dwokuru Sanduk mar NyasachIsrael kare, mondo kik onegwa waduto. " Ji mang’eny notho e dalano,nikech Nyasaye nosandogi malit.
Jogo mane ok otho, to buche nokwodo,kendo ywak mar dalano nochopo nyaka e polo.
SAMUEL
Jo-Filistia odwoko Sanduk
Kane Sanduk Mar Ruoth Nyasaye osebedo e piny Filistia moromo duecheabiriyo,
jo-Filistia noluongo jodolo kod ajuoke, mopenjogi niya, "Watimang’o gi Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye? Nyiswauru gima dwadwokego kuma neentie. "
Ne giwacho niya, "Kudwoko Sanduk mar Nyasach Israel, to kikudwoke nono, to chiwneuru mich mar pwodho richo, eka unukwo, kendounung’e gimomiyo ok onyal weyo sandou. "
To ne gimedo penjo niya, "Enmich machal nadi monego wamiye?" Ne gidwoko niya, "Onego umiye gik mokoabich mag dhahabu, maket gi buche mane okuodou, kaachiel gi oyieyo abichmolos gi dhahabu, moromo kar kwan ruodhi mag jo-Filistia, nimar thoachiel ema nogoyou uduto, kaachiel gi ruodhi mau.
Emomiyo mondo ulosgik maket gi buche mane okuodou, kendo ulos gik maket gi oyieyo makethonu piny, kumiyogo Nyasach Israel duong’, mi dipo koweyo sandou,kaachiel gi nyisecheu kod pinyu.
Marang’o wiu tek, ka wi Farao gi wijo-Misri? Donge Nyasaye nosandogi malich, nyaka ne giweyo jo-Israel oa?
"Emomiyo koro uik gari manyien, kendo ukaw duesni ariyo madhodho, mayandi pok otuenigi jok.  Tueuru dhogo e garino, to ugol nyithindgikuomgi, odong’ dala.
Eka ukaw Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye, uket e gari, togik molos gi dhahabu muchiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka mich mar pwodho richo,uket e sanduk moro but Sandugno.  Eka uweye odhi adhiya,
kung’iye.  Kaponi ochiko yo madhi thurgi nyaka Beth-shemesh, to wanang’e ni kara RuothNyasaye ema osekelonwa masirani.  To ka ok oluwo yorno, eka wanang’e niok en ema osandowa, to en gimoro mobironwa abira. "
Jogo notimo kamano.  Ne gikawo duesni ariyo madhodho, mi gitueyo egari, to nyiroye ne giloronigi e kul.
Ne giyieyo Sanduk mar RuothNyasaye e gari, kaachiel gi sanduk moketie oyieyo mag dhahabu kod gikmaket gi buchegi.
Dhogo nochiko nyimgi tir e yo madhi Beth-shemesh, kagiluwo yo maduong’.  Ne giywak ka gidhi, to ne ok gibaro korachwich katakoracham.  Ruodhi mag jo-Filistia noluwogi nyaka tong’Beth-shemesh.
Noyudo jo-Beth-shemesh kayo ngano e holo, kendo kanegiting’o wang’gi, mi gineno Sanduk, ne gidoko mamor.
Gari nodonjo,mochung’ e puoth Joshua ja-Beth-shemesh, but kidi moro mang’ongo.  Negibaro yiend gari, kendo ne gichiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye dhogo ka misangomiwang’o pep.
Jo-Lawi noloro Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye kod sanduk maneoting’o gik molos gi dhahabu mi giketogi ewi kidi mang’ongono.  Chieng’nojo-Beth-shamesh notimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni miwang’o pep, kodmisengni mamoko.
Kane ruodhi abich mag jo-Filistia oseneno gimaotimore, ne gidok Ekron mana chieng’ono.
Buche molos gi dhahabu mane jo-Filistia ochiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye kamich mar pwodho richo ne mag Ashdod gi Gaza gi Ashkelon gi Gath kodEkron, ka bur ka bur ochung’ ni dala ka dala.
To oyieyo molos gidhahabu ne mag miech jo-Filistia, mane ruodhi abichgo rito.  Ne gin miermochiel gi ohinga, kod ma ok ochiel.  Kidi mang’ongo mane giketoe Sandukmar Ruoth Nyasaye obedo ranyisi e puoth Joshua ja-Bethshemesh nyaka chilkawuono.
To jo-Beth-shemesh moko nong’iyo i Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyoRuoth Nyasaye nonego ji piero abiriyo kuomgi, mi ji noywak nikech kummalit mane Ruoth Nyasaye okelonigi kamano.
Eka jo-Beth-shemesh nowachoniya, "Onge ng’ama nyalo chung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, ma Nyasayemalerni! Ere kama dwatere mondo oa kuomwa?"
Mi gioro joote irjo-Kiriath-jearim, ka giwacho niya, "Jo-Filistia osedwoko Sanduk marRuoth Nyasaye.  Biuru ukawe, ubed kode. " Omiyo jo-Kiriath-jearim nobiro,moomo Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
SAMUEL

Sam
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. Ne gitere e od Abinadab e got, kendo negiyiero Eleazar wuode mondo orite. Samuel obedo jang’ad bura e Israel
Sanduk nobet Kiriath-jearim kuom ndalo mang’eny.  To bang’ higni madirom piero ariyo, jo-Israel nochako duogo ir Ruoth Nyasaye.
Samuelnowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya, "Ka en adier ni uduogo ir Ruoth Nyasayegi chunyu duto, to wituru nyiseche mag pinje mamoko, kod nyiseche mamonmiluongo ni Ashtaroth.  Chiwreuru ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo uti mana ni enkende, mi enoresu e lwet jo-Filistia. "
Omiyo jo-Israel nowito Baal kodAshtaroth, mi ne gitiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye kende.
Samuel nowacho niya, "Chokuru jo-Isarel duto Mizpa, mondo alamnu RuothNyasaye. "
Mi ne gichokore kanyakla Mizpa.  Ne giumbo pi, mi giolo piny enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ne gitueyo chiemo chieng’no, ka giwacho niya,"Waseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. " (Mizpa ema ne Samuel ng’adoe buche magjo-Israel. )
Kane jo-Filistia owinjo ni jo-Israel osechokore kanyakla Mizpa,ruodhigo nodhi mondo oked gi jo-Israel.  To kane jo-Israel owinjo nijo-Filistia biro, luoro nomakogi.
Ne giwacho ni Samuel niya, "Kik iwekwayonwa Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa mondo oreswa e lwetjo-Filistia. "
Omiyo Samuel nokawo nyarombo madhoth, mochiwo ni RuothNyasaye ka misango miwang’o pep.  Eka nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oresjo-Israel, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo kwayone, modwoke.
Kane pod Samueltimo misango, jo-Filistia nokayo ni jo-Israel mondo oked kodgi, to RuothNyasaye nomiyo polo omor matek kuom jo-Filistia, mokeyogi mi jo-Israelnoloyogi.
Jo-Israel nowuok Mizpa, molawo jo-Filistia, ka ginegoginyaka gikadho Beth-kar.
Samuel nokawo kidi, mochungo kanyo e kind Mizpa gi Jeshana.  Nowachoniya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osekonyowa nyaka ka. " Omiyo nochako kidino niEbenezer, (tiende ni, kidi mar konyruok).
Kamano nolo jo-Filistia, mine ok gichako gidonjo e piny Israel.  Ruoth Nyasaye nosandogi malit endalo duto mag samuel.
Mier mane jo-Filistia okawo e lweny, noduogo nijo-Isarel, kendo jo-Israel noreso gwenge duto manie kind Ekron gi Gath elwet jo-Filistia.  To bende kue nobedo e kind jo-Israel gi jo-Amor.
Samuel nobedo jang’ad bura ni jo-Israel ndalo duto mag ngimane.
Higaka higa nolworore Bethel, gi Gilgal, gi Mizpa, kong’ado buche jo-Israelkuondego duto.
To bang’e nodoknga Rama, kuma dalane ne nitie.  Kunobende nong’adoe buche jo-Israel, kendo nogeroe kendo-mar-misango niRuoth Nyasaye.
SAMUEL
Jo-Israel okwayo mondo omigi ruoth
Kane Samuel oseti, noketo yawuote mondo obed jong’ad bura eIsrael.
Nying wuode makayo ne Joel, to jalupne ne Abija.  Ne gin jong’adbura Beer-sheba.
Yawuotego ne ok oluwo timbene, to ne giketho bura, kagibaro kuom dwaro mwandu malang’, kendo kuom chamo asoya.
Kuom mano,jodong Israel duto nochokore kanyakla, modhi Rama ir Samuel.
T. Chik
.
. Ne giwachone niya, "Iseti, to yawuoti ok luw timbeni.  Koro ketnwaruoth mondo oritwa, mana machalre gi ogendini duto. "
To kane gikwayoSamuel mondo omigi ruoth kamano, wachno ne rachne, mi nolamo RuothNyasaye,
to Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Winj gima ji wachoni.  Ok inema gidagi, to an ema gisedaga, ni kik abed ruodhgi.
Gima korogitimoni, en gima gisebedo ka gitimona, chakre ndalo mane agologie Misrinyaka chil kawuono, ka giweya, kendo gitiyo ni nyiseche mamoko.
Emomiyokoro, winj gima giwachoni.  To kata kamano, siemgi matek, kendo nyisgikaka ruoth biro ritogi. "
Samuel nonyiso joma ne kwaye ruoth weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasayeosewachone.
Nowachonigi niya, "Timbe ruoth ma biro ritou nochal kama:Enokaw yawuotu, mi noketgi e tich gechene.  Ginibed joidh faresene, kendoginiring e nyim gechene.
Enoketgi jodong lweny madongo gi matindo,kendo noket jomoko mondo opur puothene, mi gika chambe, kendo moko nolosgige mag lweny gi gik moko mag gechene.
Enokaw nyiu mondo olos gikmang’ue ng’ar, gi joted chiemo kod makati.
Enokaw puotheu mabeyomoloyo mag cham, gi mag mzabibu, kod mag zeituni, mi enomijotichne.
Nokaw achiel kuom apar mar chambu gi mar mzabibu mau, mienomi jodonge kod jotichne.
Nokaw jotichu machwo gi jotichu manyiri,gi dhou kod kenjeu mabeyo, mi noketgi e tichne.
Nokaw achiel kuom aparmag jambu, kendo un bende unubed wasumbni mage.
Mi unuywag e ndalononikech timbe ruodhu mane uyiero, to Ruoth Nyasaye ok nowinju e ndalono. "
Kata kamano, ji nodagi winjo dwond Samuel, mi ne giwachone niya,"Ooyo, nyaka wabed gi ruoth ma ritowa,
mondo wan bende wachalre giogendini duto, ka ruodhwa ritowa, kendo telonwa ka wakedo. "
KaneSamuel osewinjo weche duto mag jo-Israel, nonyiso Ruoth Nyasaye,
miRuoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Winj gima giwachoni, mondo iketnigi ruoth. "Eka Samuel nowacho ni jo-Israel ni mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato odog dalane.
SAMUEL
Oyier Saulo obed ruoth
Ne nitie ja-Benjamin moro, ma nyinge Kish, wuod Abiel, wuod Zeror, wuodBekorath, wuod Afia.  Ne en jaduong’ ma japith.
Nonywolo wuowi marategokendo ma jaber ma nyinge Saulo.  Kuom jo-Israel duto ne onge ng’at man gichia moloye.  Ne orabora ahinya, ma ji duto ne rem mana e goke.
Chieng’ moro kenje mag Kish wuon Saulo nolal, mi Kish nowacho ni Saulowuode niya, "Kaw jatich moro, udhi umanygo kenjego. "
Ne gidhi migimanyogi e piny gode mag Efraim kendo e piny Shalisha, to ne okgiyudogi.
To kane gibiro e piny Zuf, Saulo nowacho ni jotichne mane ni kode niya,"Wuoth wadogi, dipo ka wuora oweyo paro kenje, koparo mana wan. "
Tojalo nowachone ni, "E dalani nitie ng’at Nyasaye marahuma.  Weche dutomowacho timore adier.  We wadhi kuno, dipo ka ofwenyonwa wach moro kuomwuodhwani. "
Saulo nopenje niya, "Ka wadhi to ere gima dang’ water ning’at Nyasayeno, nimar chiemo mane wating’o koro oserumo, kendo waongegi mich ma wanyalo terone? Koso wan gang’o?"
Jatich nodwoke ni, "An gipesa moro matin.  Mano ema adhi miye mondo onyiswa gima onegowatim. "
Saulo nowachone niya, "Iwacho maber, wuoth wadhi. " Eka negidhi e dala mane ng’at Nyasaye nitie. (
E ndalo ma chon e Israel kane ng’ato dhi penjo wach kuom Nyasaye, tonowacho ni, "Wadhiuru ir janen" nikech ng’at ma ndalogi luongo nijanabi, ne iluongo chon ni, janen. )
Kane pod giidho got, ka gichiko dalano, ne giromo gi nyiri moko kadhiumbo pi, mi gipenjo niya, "Janen nitie?"
Nyigo nodwokogi ni, "Ee, ennyimu kanyo.  Returu, koroni eka odonjo dala, nikech jodalano timomisango kawuono e hembko man kama oting’ore.
Ka usedonjo e dala toubiro yude, ka pok oidho odhi e hembko.  Ji ok nyal chiemo ka pok obiro,nimar en ema oguedho gir misango, eka bang’e joma oluong chiemo.  Ero,idhuru, ubiro yude piyo. "
Omiyo ne giidho gidhi e dalano.  To kanegidonjo e dala, ne gineno Samuel kowuok biro romo kodgi, kodhi e hembko.
To chieng’ motelo ni biro mar Saulo, Ruoth Nyasaye noyudo osefwenyoreni Samuel, ka wachone niya,
"Kiny kar sa makama, anaorni ng’at moromoa e piny Benjamin.  Wire mondo obed ruodh joga Israel.  Enores joga elwet jo-Filistia, nimar aseneno chandruok mar joga, kendo ywakgiosechopo ira. "
Mano emomiyo kane Samuel oneno Saulo, Ruoth Nyasayenonyise niya, "Ma e jal ma nyoro awachoni.  En ema norit joga. "
Bang’esaulo nosudo machiegni gi Samuel e dhorangach, mowachone ni, "Kiyie tonyisa kama janen odakie. "
Samuel nodwoke niya, "An e janen.  Telurunyima e hembko, nikech kawuono ang’ nichiem koda.  To kiny gokinyi naweyiidhi, ka asedwoko weche duto manie chunyi.
To kik iparri kuom kenjenima nyocha olal, nimar koro oseyudgi.  To en ng’a, ma noyud gik malong’oduto mag Israel? Donge en mana in gi dhoodu koso?"
Saulo nodwoke niya,"To an mana ja-Benjamin, ma libamba matinie moloyo libembni duto magIsrael, kendo dhoodwa en dhoot matinie moloyo dhoudi duto mag Benjamin. Koro, ere gimomiyo iwachona weche ma kamago?"
Samuel notero Saulo gi jotichne e od chiemo, moketogi kama oyiedhi ekind joma noluongi, ma dirom piero adek.
Eka Samuel nowacho ni jatedoniya, "Kel lemo ma nende amiyi kawachoni ni mondo ikan tenge cha. "
Mijatedo nokelo em kod sembe, moketo e nyim Saulo.  "Ma e lemo ma nendeokanni.  Chame, nikech osekannigo mondo ichame e sawoni gi welomaseluongo. "Kamano Saulo nochiemo gi Samuel chieng’ono.
Bang’e ne gilor gia ehembko, mi gidhi e dala, kendo ne gipedho ni Saulo kitanda ewi ot malo,monindo.
To kinyne gokinyi mang’ich, Samuel noluongo Saulo ewi ot,kowachone niya "Chungi, mondo akowi. " Saulo nochung’, mi ne giwuok okogi Samuel.
To kane oyudo gilor e mbap dala, Samuel nowacho ni Sauloniya, "Wach ni jatichni okadh otel nyimwa, kendo kosetelo, to in ichung’mondi, anyisi wach Nyasaye. "
SAMUEL
Samuel nokawo tung’ mar mo, moolo ewi Saulo.  Nonyodhe, mowachone niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye osewiri gi mo mondo ibed ruodh joge Israel.  Initel nijo-Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo iniresgi e lwet wasikgi molworogi.  To gima birobedoni ranyisi ni Ruoth Nyasaye oseyieri mondo ibed ruodh joge ema:
Kaisea kuoma kawuono, to ibiro yudo ji ariyo Zelza e piny Benjamin, butliend Rahel.  Ginikoni niya, ‘Kenje mane idhi dwaro oseyudi.  Koro wuoruoweyo paro kenje to oparo mana in, kowacho niya, "Atim ang’o, ka korowuoda olal?" ’
Bang’ mano, i ichop e yath maduong’ man Tabor, kamainiromie gi ji adek ma dhi lamo Nyasaye, ka achiel kuomgi oting’onyidiek adek, to machielo oting’o makati adek, kendo moro oting’o ndedemar divai.
Ginimosi, kendo ginimiyi makati ariyo, mi inikaw elwetgi.
Bang’mano, kichopo e Gibea-elohim, kama jolweny mag jo-Filistianitie, to inirom gi oganda jonabi, kalor a e hembko, ka joma goyo thumbegi nyigwerni kod asili, otelonigi, kendo iniyud ka gidhumore.
MuchRuoth Nyasaye nobi kuomi gi teko, mi inidhumri kaachiel kodgi, kendoinilokri ng’at moro machielo.
Ka ranyisigo otimoreni, to tim gima inenoni ber, nikech Nyasaye ni kodi.
Tel nyima kilor nyaka Gilgal, to anabiiri mondo atim misengni miwang’o pep, kod mag sawo.  Rita kuom ndaloabiriyo, eka nabi iri mondo anyisi gima onego itim. "
Kane Saulo pod loko ng’eye a ir Samuel, Nyasaye nomiye chuny manyien,kendo ranyisigo duto notimore chieng’no.
Kane gichopo Gibea, ogandajonabi noromo kode, kendo much Nyasaye nobiro kuome gi teko, mi en bendenodhumore kodgi.
Kane ji duto mong’eye oneno kaka odhumore kod jonabine gipenjore niya, "En ang’o mosetimore ni wuod Kishni? Kara Saulo bendeen achiel kuom jonabi?"
Sam
.
,
. To ng’at moro ma ja gweng’nonopenjo niya, "Gin yawuot ng’a?" Mano e chakruok ngero, mawachore ni,"Kara Saulo bende en achiel kuom jonabi?"
Kane Saulo osetieko dhumore,nodok dala.
Wuon Saulo matin nopenjo Saulo kod jotichne niya, "Ne udhi kanye?"Nodwoke niya, "Ne wadhi dwaro kenje, to kane waneno ni ok wanyal yudogi,ne wadhi ir Samuel. "
Wuon Saulo matin nomedo penje ni, "Kiyie, nyisagima Samuel nowachoni. "
Saulo nodwoke niya, "Nonyisowa ratiro kenjeoseyudi. " To wach bedo ruoth mane Samuel owachone, to ne ok onyise.
Samuel nochoko jo-Israel Mizpa e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,
mowachoniginiya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, owacho kama: ‘Ne agolou Misri,maresou e lwet jopinyno, kendo e teko mar pinje duto mane othirou’
Toun koro usedagi Nyasachu, ma noresou e masicheu, kod chandruoku duto,kendo usekwaye mondo oketnu ruoth.  Emomiyo koro chung’uru e nyim RuothNyasaye, kuchanoru e libembni mau, kendo e dhoutu. "
Eka Samuel nokelo libembni duto mag Israel machiegni, to libamba marBenjamin ema ne ombulu okwanyo.
Mi nokelo libamba mar Benjaminmachiegni, dhoot ka dhoot, kendo dhood Matri ema noyier.  Eka nokelodhood Matri machiegni, ng’ato ka ng’ato, kendo Saulo wuod Kish emaombulu nolwar kuome.  To kane gidware, ne ok ginyal nwang’e.
Emomiyo negichako gipenjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach niya, "Ng’atno osebiro ka koso?"Ruoth Nyasaye nodwokogi ni, "Ero opondo e kind misike. "
Mi ne giringogiome kuno.  Ne orabora ahinya, ma kochung’ e dier ji, to giduto giremmana e goke.
Samuel nowacho ni ji duto niya, "Neuru jal ma RuothNyasaye oyiero.  Onge ng’at machal kode kuomu duto. " Mi ji duto nokokkawacho niya, "Ruoth mondo odag aming’a!"
Eka Samuel nonyiso ji kaka tich ruoth chalo,, kendo nondiko wachno ekitabu, mi okano e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Bang’e nomiyo ji thuolo mondong’ato ka ng’ato odog dalane.
Saulo bende nodhi dalagi Gibea, kendothuondi moko ma Nyasaye omulo chunygi, nodhi kode.
To jomoko ma achejenowacho niya, "Ere kaka jali dikonywa?" Ne gichaye, mi ne ok gikelonemich.
SAMUEL
Saulo oloyo jo-Amon e lweny
Bang’ due achiel, Nahash ja-Amon nodhi molworo Jabesh-gilead mondookaw.  Omiyo jo-Jabesh duto nowacho ni Nahish niya, "Tim kodwa winjruok,mondo wabed jogi. "
To Nahash ja-Amon nodwokogi niya, "Ok ayie timo koduwinjruok, mak mana ka agolo wengeu ma korachwich mondo akuodgo wijo-Israel duto. "
Jodong Jabesh nowachone niya, "Wenwa kinde kuom ndaloabiriyo, mondo waor joote e piny Israel duto.  Bang’ mano, ka joma resowaonge, eka wanachiwre e lweti. "
Kane jootego obiro Gibea, dalagi Saulo,ne ginyiso ji wachno, mi ji duto nochako ywak.
Noyudo ka Saulo donjo e dala koa puodho, ka sembo dho pur, mi kaneowinjo ywak, nopenjo gima ji ywago.  Eka ne ginyise wach jo-Jabesh.
KaneSaulo owinjo wachno, Much Nyasaye nobiro kuome gi teko, kendo mirimanomake ahinya.
Nonego dho pur ariyo, mopogo lemo lemo.  Eka nomiyogijoote, moterogi e piny Israel duto, kowacho niya, "Ng’at modagi wuokbang’ Saulo, kendo bang’ Samuel noneg dhoge mana kama. "Luoro moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nomako ji, mi ne giwuok giduto gi chunyachiel.
Saulo nochanogi Bezek, moyudo ni jo-Israel oromo ji alufu miaadek, to jo-Juda alufu piero adek.
Eka nowacho ni joote mane obironiya, "Wachuru ni jo-Jabesh-gilead ni kiny gonyango giniyud konyruok. "Kane jootego odok, monyiso jo-Jabesh kamano, ne gidoko mamor,
migiwacho ni jo-Amon niya, "Kiny wanawuognu, mondo utimnwa gimauhero. "
Kinyne Saulo nopogo joge e migepe adek.  Ne gimwomore e kambijo-Amon kogwen, mi ginegogi nyaka chieng’ otegno.  Jo-Amon mane odong’noke, mane ok nyal nwang’ kata ji ariyo kaachiel.
Eka jo-Israel nowacho ni Samuel niya, "Ng’a gini mane odagi ni Saulokik bed ruodhwa? Kelgiuru mondo waneggi. "
To Saulo nowacho niya,"Kawuono ok nyal neg ng’ato, nikech tinendeni ema Nyasaye oresoejo-Israel. "
Bang’e Samuel nowacho ni ji niya, "Wadhiuru Gilgal, mondo wagur ruothe loch kuno. "
Kamano ji duto nodhi Gilgal, kendo ne giketo Saulo ruothe nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuno.  Ne gitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni mag sawo,kendo Saulo kod jo-Israel duto nobedo mamor ahinya.
SAMUEL
Samuel owuoyo gi jo-Israel
Samuel nowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya, "Uneno kaka asewinjo gik mokoduto mane ukwaya, mi aseketonu ruoth.
Koro Ruoth e jatendu.  An toaseti, mi lwar omaka, kendo yawuota bende ni kodu.  To asebet jatendu,chakre tinna nyaka kawuono.
Era e.  Koro donjnauru e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo e nyim ruoth moseyiero mowir.  Rwadh ng’a, kata kanj ng’a masekawo?Ere ng’a ma asemayo gire? Koso ere ng’ama asethiro? Kata en ng’a maasekawo asoya kuome, madinogo wang’a? Ng’eng’auru, mondo adwoknugo. "
Tone gidwoke ni, "Pok imayowa gimoro, kata thirowa pok ithirowa, bende pokikawo gimoro kuom ng’ato. "
Samuel nowachonigi niya, "Tinende ruothNyasaye obedo janeno kuomu, kendo Ruoth moseyiero bende obedo janeno, nipok amulo gimoro. " Mi ne gidwoke ni, "Ee, obedo janeno. "
Wuok
.
. Eka Samuel nowacho ni ji niya, "Adier, Ruoth Nyasaye maneomiyou Musa gi Harun, kendo mane ogolo kwereu e piny Misri, ema obedojaneno.
Emomiyo chung’uru mos, mondo awuo kodu e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kaaparonu timbe makare duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye otimonu, kendo otimo nikwereu.
Wuok
.
. Kane Jakobo gi yawuote osedhi Misri, jo-Misri koro nesando nyikwagi ma kwereu.  Omiyo ne giywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mi RuothNyasaye nooro Musa gi Harun mogologi, kendo omiyogi kamawadakieni.
Bura
.
; Bura
.
; Bura
.
. To wigi nowil gi RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachgi, omiyo nojwang’ogi e lwet Sisera, jaduong’ jolwenyma Jabin ruodh Hazor, kendo e lwet jo-Filistia, kendo e lwet ruodh Moab,mi nyaka ne gikedo kodgi.
Bura
.
-
. Ne giywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye kagiwacho niya, ‘Waseketho, nikech waseweyi, kendo waselamo Baal giAshtaroth, to koro mondo ireswa e lwet wasikwa, kendo wanatini. ’
Bura
.

.
; Bura
.

Sam
.
. Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nooroJerubaal, Barak gi Jeftha, kod Samson, kendo noresou e lwet wasiku konigi koni, mi nubedo gi kue.

Sam
.
. "Ne ung’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye e ruodhu, to kata kamano,kane uneno ni Nahash ruodh jo-Amon omonjou, nuwachona niya, ‘Nyaka wabedgi ruoth maritowa. ’
Emomiyo koro neuru ruoth museyiero, kendo manukwayo, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye osetimonu mana gima nukwaye.
Ka unuluorRuoth Nyasaye, mi utine, kendo uwinj dwonde, ma ok udagi chikene, kendoka un kaachiel gi ruodhu unuluw Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, to manonokonyu
To ka utamoru winjo dwond Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo udagi chikene,to nosandu kaachiel gi ruodhu.
"Emomiyo koro ling’uru, une gima duong’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye biro timo enyimu.
Donge en ndalo kwayo Ruoth Nyasaye mondo omi polo omor, kendokoth ochue, mi ubiro neno kendo ng’eyo kaka nuketho ahinya kuom kwayomondo ubed gi ruoth maritou. "
Kamano Samuel nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye, miRuoth Nyasaye nomiyo polo omor, kendo koth ochue, chieng’no.  Omiyo jiduto noluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ahinya, kod Samuel bende.
Ji duto nowacho ni Samuel niya, "Kwanua Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachimondo kik watho, kane wakwayo mondo wabed gi ruoth, to ne wamedo manaricho ewi moko. "
Samuel nodwokogi ni, "Kik uluor.  En adier ni usetimorichogo duto, to kata kamano meduru mana luwo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendotineuru gi chunyu duto.
Weuru lamo nyiseche manono, ma ok nyal konyo,kata ma ok nyal reso gimoro, nikech gin mana gik manono.
Ruoth Nyasayeok nojwang’ joge nikech dipo ka nyinge maduong’ okethore, nimaroseyierou mondo ubed joge owuon.
To an bende, asingora ni ok naketh enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kaweyo lemonu kendu nyisou yo maber kendomakare.
Mak mana ni, luoruru Ruoth Nyasaye, kutiyone gi adiera kodchunyu duto, kendo paruru gik madongo mosetimonu.
To kusiko kutimoricho, to obiro tiekou kaachiel gi ruodhu. "
SAMUEL
Lweny e kind jo-Israel gi jo-Filistia
Saulo noyiero ji alufu adek kuom jo-Israel, mondo ji alufu ariyo kuomgiobed kode Mikmash, kendo e piny gode mag Bethel, to alufu achiel obed giJonathan wuode, Gibea, dala jo-Benjamin.  Ji moko duto to noweyo, modokmiechgi.
Jonathan nonego jatend jolweny mag jo-Filistia mane ni Geba, mijo-Filistia nowinjo ni jo-Hibrania oseng’anyo.  Saulo nogoyo tung’ e pinyIsrael,
mi jo-Israel duto nowinjo osenego jatend jolweny magjo-Filistia, kendo ni jo-Filistia ojok kodgi.  Omiyo ne giwakore irSaulo, mane oyudo ni Gilgal.
Jo-Filistia nochokore mondo oked gi jo-Israel.  Ne gin gi geche alufupiero adek, gi joidh farese alufu auchiel, kod ji mathoth ka kuoyo maedhonam.  Ne gidhi Mishmash, mi gijot kuno, yo wuokchieng’ marBethaven.
To kane jo-Israel oneno ka wach otamo wang’gi, nikechnothung’gi ahinya, ne gipondo kamoro amora mane ginyalo tonyie, kakabuche gi bunge gi bugni kod sokni, kendo e kind lwendni.
Jomoko kuomginokadho aora Jordan nyaka piny Gad gi Gilead.  Saulo to ne pod odong’Gilgal, kendo ji duto mane ni kode ne luoro omako.

Sam
.
. Saulo norito kuom ndalo abiriyo, kaka Samuel nosechike, toka ne ji oneno ni Samuel ok obiro, ne gichako ke, ka gia kuomSaulo.
Omiyo Saulo nowacho niya, "Kelnauru dhok mitimogo misangomiwang’o pep, kod misengni mag sawo. "
To e sa mane otieko timoemisango miwang’o pep ema Samuel nobiroe, mi Saulo nowuok mondo oromne,kendo omose.
Samuel nopenje niya, "En ang’o misetimoni?" Saulo nodwokeniya, "Naneno ka ji ke a kuoma, to bende in ne ok ibiro kaka ne ichiko,kendo jo-Filistia chokore Mikmash.
Emomiyo naparo ni koro jo-Filistiabiro biro monja Gilgal, ka pok akwayo Ruoth Nyasaye mondo okonya.  Kuommano, nochuna timo misango. "
Samuel nowacho ni Saulo niya, "Itimo timmofuwo.  Ok iserito chik mane Ruorh Nyasaye omiyi.  Da bed ni iseritochikne, to da oguro lochni e Israel nyaka chieng’.
Joote
.
. To korolochni ok nosiki.  Ruoth Nyasaye osedwaro ng’at ma chunye mor godo, kendoosekete mondo obed jatend joge, nikech ne ok irito gima ne Ruoth Nyasayeochiki. "
Eka Samuel noa Gilgal, modhi adhiya.  Saulo bende noa kuno,mowuotho kochomo kambi mar lweny, ka ji duto modong’ luwo bang’e.  Kaneochopo Gibea, dala jo-Benjamin, nokwano joma ne ni kode, monwang’o nigin ji ma dirom mia auchiel.
Saulo gi Jonathan wuode, kod joma ne engo, nobet Geba, dala jo-Benjamin, to jo-Filistia ne pod jotMikmash.
Ogendni adek mag mony ne thoro wuok e kambi jo-Filistia. Oganda achiel ne luwo yo madhi Ofra e piny Shual,
to oganda machielone luwo yo madhi Beth-horon, kendo oganda mar adek ne luwo yo mochikogode, momanyore gi holo mar Zeboim gi thim.
Ne ok nyal yud jatheth e piny Israel duto, nikech jo-Filistia ne okoyie mondo jo-Hibrania othedh ligengni kata tonge.
To jo-Isreal dutone dhi ir jo-Filistia mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato opiag kweye gi leye giratonge kod bithe.
Nengo mar piago kwer kata le ne en nus shekel, tomar ratong’ kata bidhi ne en achiel kuom adek mar shekel.
Omiyo kanendalo mar lweny ochopo, ne ok nyal yud ligangla kata tong’ e lwet jiduto mane ni kod Saulo gi Jonathan, to mak mana Saulo gi Jonathan kendeema ne nigi gilweny.
Noyudo jo-Filistia oseketo jolweny e holo mar Mikmash.
SAMUEL
Chieng’ moro Jonathan wuod Saulo nowacho ni jating’ne gilweny niya, "Bimondo waidh loka cha ir jolweny mag jo-Filistia. " To ne ok onyiso wuonmare wachno.
Noyudo ka Saulo oguro hembe e tiend yath maduong’ manMigron e tong’ Gibea, kendo ji mane ni kode ne dirom mia auchiel.
Ahijawuod Ahitub, ma owadgi Ikabod, ma wuon Finehas, ma wuod Eli, jadolo marRuoth Nyasaye e Shilo, ema ne oting’o law dolo miluongo ni efod.  To ongeng’ama nong’eyo ni Jonathan osedhi.
E hoho mar jolweny mag jo-Filistia,ne nitie lwendni ariyo mogingore e bathe koni gi koni.  Nying lwandamokwongo ne Bozez, to nying machielo ne Sene.
Lwanda achiel ne ni yonyandwat, koma omanyore gi Mikmash, to machielo ne ni yo milambo, komaomanyore gi Geba.
Jonathan nowacho ni jating’ne gilweny niya, "Bi mondo waidh loka irjolweny mag joma ok ter nyangugo.  Dipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye okonyowa, nimaronge gima mono Ruoth Nyasaye resowa, kata ka wang’eny, kata kawanok. "
Jating’ne gilweny nokone ni, "Tim duto manie chunyi, nikechabiro konyi e gimoro amora ma idwaro timo. "
Mi Jonathan nowacho niya,"Ber wadhi loka ir jogo mondo ginewa.
Kapo ni giwachonwa ni, ‘Ritwaurukanyo,’ to wanachung’ mana kanyo, mak wadhi irgi.
To ka giwacho niwadhi irgi, eka wanadhi, kwang’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osechiwogi e lwetwa. Mano ema nobednwa ranyisi. "
Omiyo ne giwuok e lela, mondo jolweny magjo-Filistia onegi.  Jo-Filistiago nowacho ni, "Neuru! Jo-Hibrania wuok ebuche ma yande gipondoe. "
Ne giluongo Jonathan kod jatichne, kagiwacho niya, "Idhuru ubi ku, ubiro neno!" Jonathan nowacho ni jatichneniya, "Luw bang’a, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osechiwogi e lwet jo-Israel. "
Jonathan noidho kalawore gi lwete, ka jatichne luwo bang’e.  Ekanomonjo jo-Filistia, kogoyonigi piny, to jatichne negogi, ka luwobang’e.
E lweny mokwongono, Jonathan gi jatichne nonego ji ma dirompiero ariyo, e pap matin mane gintieno.
Mi luoro maduong’ nolandorekuom jo-Filistia duto, mane nie paw lweny, kendo mane nie kambi.  Jolwenyma jorit, kaachiel gi oganda mony bende nokirni, kendo piny noyiengni,mi kihondko malich nobetie.
Jorito mag Saulo mane ni Gibea noneno ka oganda lweny mag jo-Filistiake, karingo koni gi koni.
Eka Saulo nowacho ni joma ne ni kode niya,"Kwanreuru, mondo une ane ng’ama onge kuomwa. " To kane gitieko kweno, neginwang’o ni Jonathan gi jating’ne gi lweny ema onge.
Saulo nowacho niAhija ni, "Kel Sanduk mar Nyasaye ka. " Ahija ema ne ting’o Sanduk nijo-Israel ndalogo.
To kane Saulo pod wuoyo gi jadolo, mahu mane niekambi jo-Filistia nomedore, omiyo nokwero jadolo mondo owe aweya.
EkaSaulo gi joge duto nowuok mogiyo kadhi e lweny, kuma ne giyudoe kajo-Filistia negore kendgi giwegi, achadha nono.
Jo-Hibrania mane nikor jo-Filistia chon, kendo mane jot kodgi, nodok kor jo-Israel maneluwo Saulo gi Jonathan.
Bende kane jo-Israel duto mane osepondo e pinygode mag Efraim owinjo ni jo-Filistia ringo, ne gilawogi matek.
KamanoRuoth Nyasaye noreso jo-Israel chieng’no, kendo ne gikadho dala marBethaven, mana ka pod gikedo.
Jo-Israel nool ahinya chieng’no nikech Saulo nosekwerogi niya,"Okuong’ jalo mochamo gimoro kapok piny oyuso, kendo kapok atieko chulokuor kuom wasikwa. " Kamano ne onge ng’ato kuomgi mane obilo gimoro.
Tonoyudo ka ji duto ochopo e bungu kama mor kich ne chuerie piny.
Kanegidonjo e bunguno, ne gineno mor kich ka ton, to onge ng’ato ma noterolwete e dhoge, nikech ne giluoro kuong’.
To Jonathan ne ok owinjo kawuon mare kwero ji gi kuong’.  Emomiyo nochwowo pedni gi luth mane en goe lwete, moketo mor kich e dhoge, mi chunye nodwogo.
Eka ng’at moronowachone niya, "Wuoru nokwero ji matek gi kuong’ niya, ‘Okuong’ jalomachamo gimoro tinende. ’ " To noyudo nong’no koro ohewo jiahinya,
omiyo Jonathan nowacho niya, "Wuora osethago ji, kuom kwerogikamano.  Neuru kaka chunya koro oduogo.  Mana nikech mor kich matin maabiloni.
Dobedo maber manade ka da ji ochamo chiemo mane giyako kuomwasikwa, mi da wanego jo-Filistia oyokre!"
Ne giloyo jo-Filistia chieng’no, mi gilawogi chakre Mikmash nyakaAijalon.  To kata kamano nong’no nohewo jo-Israel ahinya.
Omiyo negigore kuom gik mope, mi gikawo rombe gi rwedhi kod nyiroye, kendoo neginegogi mana e lowo.  Ne gichamogi ka pod gitimo remo.
