;
.
. Eka nonyisSaulo niya, "Ji ketho ni Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech gichamo ring’o motimoremo. " Saulo nowacho ni ji niya, "Usetimo marach, omiyo ng’ieluru kidimaduong’, ukelna ka. "
Eka nomedo wacho niya, "Dhiuru kuom ji,ulandnigi wach ni ruoth wacho kama: ‘Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo okelnarwadhe kata rombone mondo onegi kendo ocham ka.  To kik uketh ni RuothNyasaye, kuchamo ring’o motimo remo. ’ " Omiyo godhiambono, ng’ato kang’ato nokelo chiache monego kanyo.
Mano emomiyo Saulo nogero ni RuothNyasaye kendo-mar-misango.  En e kendo-mar-misango mane okuongo gero niRuoth Nyasaye.
Saulo nowacho ni ji niya, "Waloruru mondo wamonj jo-Filistiagotienoni, kendo wayakgi nyaka piny ru, bende kik wawe kata ng’at achieldong’ kangima. " Mi ne gidwoke niya, "Tim gima ineno ni ber. " To jadolonowacho ni, "Wapenjuru Nyasaye wach mondi. "
Omiyo Saulo nopenjoNyasaye wach niya, "Alaw jo Filistia koso? Bende ibiro chiwogi e lwetjo-Israel?" To ne ok odwoke gimoro chieng’ono.
Mi Saulo nowacho nijodonge niya, "Suduru machiegni, mondo unon kendo ufweny kuma kethonioaye tinendeni.
Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye mareso Israel, kata dabed ning’at mokethono en mana Jonathan wuoda, to nyaka otho!" To onge katang’at achiel mane odwoke.
Eka nowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya, "Unbeduru bathe konchiel, to an gi Jonathan wuoda, wabed komachielo. " Mi jiduto nodwoko Saulo ni, "Tim gima ineno ni ber. "
Kwan
.
;
Sam
.
. Eka Saulo nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, ang’omomiyo ok isedwokowa tinendeni? A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, kaketho ni kuoma, kata kuom Jonathan wuoda, to chiw ombulu miluongo niUrim.  To ka en kuom jogi Israel, to chiw ombulu miluongo ni Thumim. " MiSaulo gi Jonathan ema noyier, to jo-Israel nowe.
Eka Saulo nowachoniya, "Go ombulu e kindwa gi Jonathan wuoda. " Mi ombulu nolwar kuomJonathan.
Saulo nowacho ni Jonathan niya, "Nyisa gima isetimo. " Mi Jonathannonyise ni, "Adier, nabilo mor kich matin gi luth mane nie lweta.  Era e,ayie tho. "
Saulo nowacho niya, "Nyasaye mondo okweda ka ok itho. Jonathan, in nyaka itho!"
To ji duto nowacho ni Saulo niya, "BendeJonathan nyalo tho adier, to en ema osekelo konyruok maduong’ kama eIsrael? Ngang’! Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kata mana yie wiye achiel oknolwar piny, nikech Nyasaye ema osekonye timo tich mosetimo kawuononi. "Kamano ji nowaro Jonathan mondo kik tho.
Eka Saulo noweyo lawojo-Filistia, nikech ne gisedok thurgi.
Kane Saulo obedo ruodh Israel, nokedo gi wasike duto koni gi koni,moloyogi kuonde duto modhiye.  Ne gin jo-Moab, gi jo-Amon, gi jo-Edom, giruodhi mag Zoba, kod jo-Filistia.
Notimo chir, mi noloyo jo-Amalekbende, kendo noreso jo-Israel e lwet joma ne monjogi.
Yawuot Saulo ne Jonathan gi Ishfi kod Malkishua, to nyige ne Merab,nyare maduong’ gi Mikal nyare matin.
Nying chi Saulo ne Ahinoam nyarAhimaaz.  To nying jatend jolwenje ne Abner wuod Ner, owadgi wuonSaulo.
Kish wuon Saulo, kod Ner wuon Abner, ne yawuot Abiel.
Nenitie lweny mager e kind jo-Israel gi jo-Filistia kuom ndalo duto magngima Saulo.  Omiyo kane oneno ng’at moro maratego, kata mathwon, tonokete achiel kuom jolwenje.
SAMUEL
Saulo otamore winjo chik Nyasaye, mi Nyasaye odage

Sam
.
. Samuel nowacho ni Saulo niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ne oora nimondo awiri mo, ibed ruodh joge Israel.  Emomiyo koro winj wachne.
Wuok
.
-
; T. Chik
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owachokama: ‘Anakum jo-Amalek kuom geng’o ni jo-Israel yo, kane giaMisri.
Koro dhiyo iked gi jo-Amalek, kendo iketh mwandugi duto chuth. Kik iwegi, to ineggi duto, chwo gi mon, rawere gi nyithindo madhoth, gidhok gi rombe, kod ngamia gi kenje. ’ "
Omiyo Saulo noluongo jo-Israel Telaim.  Nokwanogi, monwang’o ni ginjolweny alufu mia ariyo, kaachiel gi ji alufu apar moa Juda.
Eka nodhie dala jo-Amalek, mobutonigi e holo.
To nowacho ni jo-Keni niya, "Unto, wuoguru ua kuom jo-Amalek, nimar dipo ka anegou kaachiel kodgi, toun nutimo maber ni jo-Israel kane giwuok gia Misri. " Kamano jo-Keninowuok moa kuom jo-Amalek.
Eka Saulo nonego jo-Amalek, chakre Havilanyaka Shur, man yo wuok chieng’ mar Misri.
Agag, ruodh jo-Amalek, emanomako kangima, to jomoko duto nonego pep.
Saulo gi joge noweyo Agagkangima, to bende ne ok giketho rombe gi dhok machwe gi nyirombe kod gikmoko mabeyo.  To gik moko maricho, ma onge ohala, ema ne giketho chuth.
Eka wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Samuel niya,
"Chunya olokore kuomketo Saulo ruoth, nimar osedok chien ma ok oluwa, kendo ok osetimo gimanachike. " Mirima nomako Samuel, moywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye otienonoduto.
Eka nochiew gokinyi mang’ich, modhi mondo one Saulo, to noyudowach ni Saulo nende odhi Karmel, mochungo rapar mondo oparego, to bang’eochweyo nyaka Gilgal.
Samuel nodhi ir Saulo, mi Saulo owachone niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oguedhi.  Asetimo gima ne Ruoth Nyasayeochika. "
To Samuel nopenje niya, "Ka kamano, to ere gimomiyo awinjoywak rombe gi mar dhok?"
Nodwoke niya, "Gin rombe gi dhok mabeyo magjo-Amalek, mane ji oweyo mak onego, mondo gitimgo misango ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachi.  To moko duto wasenego pep. "
Eka Samuel nowacho niSaulo niya, "Ter mos, mondo anyisi gima Ruoth Nyasaye nende owachonagotienoni. " Saulo nodwoke ni, "Wachna. "
Samuel nowachone niya, "kata obedo ni in iwuon ineno ni itin, tooseketi jatend dhout Israel.  Ruoth Nyasaye ne oyieri mondo ibed ruodhIsrael.
Ne oori mondo idhi iked gi joricho ma jo-Amalek, kinegoginyaka itiekgi chuth.
Koro marang’o ne ok iwinjo dwond Ruoth Nyasaye,mitimo gima rach e nyime, kimwomori, kendo ipeyo mwandu?"
Saulonodwoko Samwel niya, "Ooyo, asewinjo dwond Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo asetiyotich mane Ruoth Nyasaye oorae.  Asekelo gag ruodh Amalek, kendo asetiekojo-Amalek chuth.
To ji ema nokawo rombe gi dhok mabeyo kuom mwandumowe ni mondo okethi, mana ni mondo gitimgo misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachi, Gilgal. "
To Samuel nopenje niya, "Iparo ni Ruoth Nyasayeohero chiwo kod misengni moloyo mako chikene koso? Ooyo, mako chik bermoloyo misango, kendo chiko it ber moloyo boche imbe.
Tamruok makochik chalo gi tim jwok, kendo wichteko chalo gi tim mamono.  Isedagi chikRuoth Nyasaye, omiyo en bende osedagi ni kik ibed ruoth. "
Saulo nowacho ni Samuel niya, "Aseketho, kaweyo luwo chik RuothNyasaye kod wechene bende, nimar naluoro ji, kendo nawinjodwondgi.
Emomiyo koro asayi ni wena kethona, kendo lokri wadog kodi,mondo alam Ruoth Nyasaye. "
To Samuel nodwoke niya, "Ok nadog kodi,nimar isedagi wach Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye osedagi ni kikibed ruodh Israel. "
Sam
.
;
Ruo
.
,
. Kane Samuel olokoremondo odhi, Saulo nomako riak lawe, mi oyiech.
Eka Samuel nokone niya,"Kawuono Ruoth Nyasaye oyiecho loch Israel kuomi, kendo omiyo ng’atmachielo, maber moloyo.
Bende Nyasaye ma en Duong’ Maler mar Israel okriambi kata lokre, nimar ok en dhano ma dolokre. "
Eka Saulo nowachoniya, "Aseketho, to kata kamano, asayi, miya duong’ kawuono e nyimjodong joga, kendo e nyim jo-Isarel.  Wichri wadog kodi, mondo alam RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachi. "
Kuom mano, Samuel nowichore, moluwo bang’ Saulo,kendo Saulo nolamo Nyasaye.
Samuel nowacho niya, "Kelnauru Agag, ruodh jo-Amalek. " Mi Agag nobiroire gi mor, koparo ni koro ok obi tho.
To Samuel nowachone niya, "Kakaliganglani osenego nyithind mon, e kaka meru bende nobed achiel kuom monma nyithindgi onegi!" Eka Samuel nonego Agag achanya achanya Gilgal enyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Samuel nodok Rama, to Saulo bende nodok e dalane Gibea.
Samuelnokuyo nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ne oneno ni kara ne ok ber mondo oket Sauloruodh Israel.  Nyaka chop tho Samuel ne ok ochako oneno Saulo kendo.
SAMUEL
Owir Daudi mondo obed ruoth
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Samuel niya, "Ibiro kuyo nyaka karang’o, toasedagi ni kik Saulo obed ruoth? Koro ol mo e tung’ni mondo aori irJesse ja-Bethlehem, nikech aseyiero wuode moro mondo obedruoth. "
Samuel nodwoke ni, "Anyalo dhi nadi? To ka Saulo owinjo todonega!" Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Kaw roya idhigo, kendo iwach niisebiro mondo itim misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To iluong Jesse obi emisango, eka nanyisi gima onego itim.  Nyaka iwirna jal ma abironyisi. "
Kuom mano Samuel nodhi Bethlehem kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone. Jodong dala nobiro romone ka kirni, mi gipenje niya, "Ibiro gi kuekoso?"
Nodwokogi niya, "Ee, abiro gi kue, ni mondo atim misango niRuoth Nyasaye.  Pwodhreuru mondo wadhi kar misango. " To Jesse gi yawuote,Samwel owuon ema nopwodho, moluongogi e misango.
Kane gichopo, Samuel noneno Eliab, moparo ni, "Adier, ng’at ma RuothNyasaye oyiero eri ochung’ e nyime. "
To Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Samuelniya, "Kik ing’i wang’e kata borne, nikech asedage.  Ruoth Nyasaye okng’ichi kaka dhano ng’icho.  Dhano ng’iyo ringruok, to Ruoth Nyasayeng’iyo chuny. "
Eka Jesse noluongo Abinadab, momiye okadho e nyimSamwel.  To Samuel nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ok oyiero jalibende. "
Eka Jesse nomiyo Shama okadho, to Samuel nowacho niya, "RuothNyasaye ok oyiero kata mana jali. "
Kamano Jesse nomiyo yawuote abiriyookadho e nyim Samuel, to Samuel nowacho ni, "Ruoth Nyasaye ok oyieromoro kuom jogi. "
Eka nopenjo Jesse niya, "Magi e kar romb yawuoti dutokoso?" Nodwoke ni, "Ooyo, pod odong’ machogo.  En to okwayo rombe. "Samuel nowacho ni Jesse niya, "Or ng’ato oluonge, nikech ok wanyal betpiny kapok obiro. "
Mi nooro ng’ato mokele e nyimgi.  Ne en wuowi masilwal, kendo man gi chia.  Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Samuel niya,"Chungi, iwire gi mo, nikech jali e en. "
Omiyo Samuel nokawo mo,mowirogo Daudi e nyim owetene, mi Roho mar Nyasaye nobiro kuom Daudi giteko, mobedo kode chakre chieng’no.  Beng’e Samuel nowuok, modok Rama. Daudi ogoyo ni Saulo thum
To Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye noseweyo Saulo, kendo muya marach moa kuomRuoth Nyasaye ne chande.
Jatich Saulo nokone niya, "Ruoth, ineno kakamuya marach moa kuom Nyasaye chandi.
Dak ior jotichni odhi odwarning’at mong’eyo goyo thum, mondo ogo thum e kinde ma muya marachnochandie, eka iyud kue?"
Omiyo Saulo nowacho ni jotichne niya, "Aradwarnauru jagocho molony. "
Eka achiel kuom jotichne nodwoke niya,"Ang’eyo wuowi moro ma wuod Jesse ja-Bethlehem, molony e goyo thum.  Enng’at ma jachir, kendo ma ratego e lweny.  Ong’eyo wuoyo, kendo en jaber. Ruoth Nyasaye bende ni kode. "
Kuom mano, Saulo nooro joote ir Jesse,kowacho niya, "Orna Daudi wuodi, ma jakwath rombe. "
Omiyo Jesse nokawomakati apar, gi ndede mar divai, kod nyadiel, moorogo Daudi wuode mondooter ni Saulo.
Kamano Daudi nobiro ir Saulo, mobedo jatichne.  Saulonohere ahinya, mokete jating’ne gilweny.
Saulo nooro ni Jesse wachniya, "Yie iwe Daudi otina, nikech en jatich maber. "
Omiyo kinde manemuya marach moa kuom Nyasaye chandoe Saulo, to Daudi ne goyo thum. Kamano chuny Saulo ne oduogo, moyud kue, kendo muya marach ne weye.
SAMUEL
Daudi onego Goliath
Chieng’ moro jo-Filistia nochoko jolwenjgi kanyakla e dala moro marJuda, miluongo ni Soko.  Ne gijot Efes-damin, e kind soko giAzeka.
Saulo gi jo-Israel bende nochokore kanyakla, mojot e holo marEla.  Ne giyaro ni lweny, ka gichomo jo-Filistia.
Jo Filistia ne ni egot moro, to jo-Israel e got machielo, to holo nopogo kindgi.
Thwonmoro ma nyinge Goliath ja-Gath, nowuok e kambi jo-Filistia.  Borne nedirom mita adek.
Nosidho ogut mula, kendo norwako akor mar nyinyo mapekne ne dirom kilo piero auchiel.
Norwako mula e ogwendene, kendonoting’o tong’ abaja e goke.
Bond tonge ne chalo lodi, kendo pek mar witonge ne dirom kilo abiriyo.  Jating’ kuode ne wuotho e nyime, kotelone.
Goliath nokok ni jolweny mag Israel niya, "Marang’o uyaro ni lweny?Donge ung’eyo ni an ja-Filistia, to un to un jotich Saulo? Ara yierurung’ato mondo obi orad koda.
Kokedo koda, monega, to wanabed wasumbnimau.  To ka an ema aloye, manege, to unubed wasumbni mawa. "
Eka nomedowacho niya, "Athiano ni jolweny mag Israel ni kawuono keluru ng’atomondo akedgo. "
Kane Saulo gi jo-Israel duto owinjo wecheja-Filistiano, kibaji nogoyogi, mi gidoko maluor ahinya.
Daudi ne en wuod ja-Efrath ma Bethlehem-Juda, ma nyinge Jesse, manenigi yawuowi abiriyo.  E ndalo mag Saulo, Jesse nosebedo jaduong’ motiahinya.
Yawuote adek madongo nosedhi gi Saulo e lweny.  Nying wuodemakayo ne Eliab, to jalupne ne Abinadab, kod Shama, wuode mar adek.
ToDaudi ne wuode machogo.  Yawuote adek madongogo nosedhi gi Saulo,
toDaudi ne tiyo ni Saulo ndalo moko, to ndalo moko nodok Bethlehem, kwayojamb wuon mare.
Kuom ndalo piero ang’wen ja Filistia cha ne sudo machiegni, kanyisoreokinyi godhiambo.
Chieng’ moro Jesse nowacho ni Daudi wuode niya, "Kawatonga mar chamb abulani, kod makati apargi, iter piyo ni oweteni ekambi.
Modhi mong’in apargi bende ter ni jaduong’gi mar lweny.  Dhi inekaka oweteni obet, kendo iduogna wach ma kuomgi.
Gin kod Saulo gijo-Israel duto e holo mar Ela, ka gikedo gi jo-Filistia. "
Daudi nochiew gokinyi mang’ich, moweyo rombe gi jorit.  Nokawo gigomodhi kaka Jesse nochike.  Nochopo e kambi mana ka jolweny wuok dhi kedo,kendo ka gigiyo sigich lweny.
Jo-Israel kod jo-Filistia noyaro nilweny ka gimanyore.
Daudi noweyo gik mane oting’o ni jarit misike,moringo odhi ir jolweny, kendo omoso owetene.
Kane pod owuoyo kodgi, thwon ma nyinge Goliath, ja-Filistia maja-Gath, nowuok kuom jolweny mag jo-Filistia, mowacho wechene kaka pile,kendo Daudi nowinje.
Kane jo-Israel oneno jalo, ne giringo giduto, kaluoro omakogi ahinya.
Ne giwacho niya, "Donge uneno jal mabironi?Obiro mana ni mondo othian ni jo-Israel.  Ng’at monege, to ruoth nomimwandu mang’eny, kod nyare okendi.  Bende joodgi ok nogol osuru kata tiyotich achune e Israel. "
Daudi nopenjo joma nochung’ bute niya, "Ang’oma ibiro timo ni ng’at ma nyalo nego ja-Filistia cha, kogolo wichkuotkuom jo-Israel? Ja-Filistia ma ok oter nyanguno en ng’a, ma dothian niogend Nyasaye mangima?"
Jogo nodwoke niya, "Ruoth nomiye mwandumang’eny, kod nyare okendi. "
To kane Eliab, owadgi Daudi maduon’, owinjo Daudi ka wuoyo gi jogo,mirima nomake kode, mopenje niya, "Ang’o mokeli ka? Koso ng’ama iweyo karitoni rombe manok kande e thim? Ang’eyo sing’ayini, kod richo maniechunyi.  Isebiro mana ni mondo ine lweny!"
Daudi nodwoke niya, "Eregima asetimo? Donge apenjo maber?"
Mi nolokore oweye modhi ir ng’atmachielo, kopenjo mana penjono.  To ji nodwoke mana wach machalre.
Kane ji owinjo gima Daudi owacho, ne ginyiso Saulo, mi Saulo noorong’ato mondo oome.
Daudi nowacho ni Saulo niya, "Chuny ji kik nyosrenikech ja-Filistia cha.  Abiro dhi kedo kode. "
To Saulo nowachone niya,"Ok inyal dhi kedo gi ja-Filistiano, nikech pod in mana wuowi, to jaloosebedo jalweny chakre tinne. "
To Daudi nodwoko Saulo niya, "Ruoth, anjakwath jamb wuora, to ka sibuor kata ondiek omako rombo e lek,
toaluwe, maked kode, mondo ares rombono e lake.  To kapo ni ochikore kuoma,to amako yie tike kendo agoye, manege.
Asenego sibuoche gi ondiegi,omiyo ja-Filistia ma kia Nyasayeno bende biro tho mana ka ondiegigo,nikech othiano ni ogend Nyasaye mangima. "
Daudi nomedo wacho niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye moseresa e kok sibuoche, kendo e kok ondiegi, biro resa elwet ja-Filistiani bende. " Saulo nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Ara dhiyo,kendo Ruoth Nyasaye obed kodi. "
Mi norwako Daudi kod gige owuon maglweny.  Nosidhone ogut mula, kendo orwakone akor mar nyinyo.
Daudinotweyo ligangla kuom gik ma norwaknego, to kane otemo wuoth, wuothnotame nikechh ne pok ongiyo kodgi.  Omiyo nowacho ni Saulo niya, "Okanyal dhi gi gigi, nikech pok ang’iyo kodgi. " Kuom mano nolonyogi,
miokawo ludhe, kendo noyiero kite mapoth abich e aora, moketo e kirope markwath.  Eka nomako arujre, mosudo machiegni gi ja-Filistiano.
Ja-Filistia bende nosudo machiegni gi Daudi, ka jating’ kuodeotelone.
Kane oneno Daudi, nojare, nikech ne en mana wuowi moa, masilwal, kendo ma jaber.
Nopenjo Daudi niya, "Iparo ni an guok koso,mibirona mana gi kede?" Mi nokuong’o Daudi e nying nyisechene.
Ekanowacho ni Daudi niya, "Bi ira ka, mondo achiw ringri ni winy mae polo,kendo ni odiegi mae thim!"
Daudi nodwoko ja-Filistiano niya, "Ibironagi ligangla gi tong’ abaja kod tong’ dindo, to an abironi mana e nyingRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach jolweny mag Israel,mithianonigi.
Tinendeni Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwi e lweta, mi abironegi, kendo ang’ad wiyi oko.  Ringri gi ringre jolweny mag jo-Filistiaabiro weyo ni winy mae polo, kendo ni ondiegi mae thim, mondo piny dutoong’e ni nitie Nyasaye e Israel.
Kamano joma ochokore ka duto birong’eyo ni Nyasaye ok res joge gi ligangla kod tong’.  Lweny en mar RuothNyasaye, kendo en ema obiro ketou e lwetwa. "
Kane ja-Filistia osudo machiegni mondo orad gi Daudi, Daudi noringopiyopiyo, kochomo jolwenj Filistia mondo orom kode.
Nosoyo lwete ekirope, mogoloe kidi.  Nodiro kidino gi orujre, mogoyogo lela wang’ja-Filistia.  Kidi nopowo lela wang’e, mi nogore piny auma.

Sam
.
. Kamano Daudi noloyo ja-Filistia mana gi orujre kod kidi. Nogoye, monege, kata obedo ni ne oonge gi ligangla kamano.
Sam
.
. Eka noringo mochung’ kuom ja-Filistiano, kendo nowuodho liganglang’atno e olalo, mong’adogo wiye oko. Kane jo-Filistia oneno ni thwon-gi osetho, ne giringo.
Jo-Israel gijo-Juda nogiyo sigich lweny, mi giriembo jo-Filistia nyaka Gath koddhoranga Ekron.  Ringre jo-Filistia mane onegi noriere e yo, chakreShaarim nyaka Gath kod Ekron.
Kane jo-Israel oduogo koa riembojo-Filistia, ne giyako kambigi.
Daudi nokwayo wi ja-Filistia cha,motero Jerusalem, to gik ng’atno mag lweny, nokano e hembe.
Kane Saulo oneno Daudi kadhi kedo gi ja-Filistia, nopenjo Abner jatendjolweny niya, "Abner, wuowino en wuod ng’a?" Abner nodwoke ni, "Ruoth,ok ang’
SAMUEL
Jonathan gi Daudi jotimo singruok
Kane Saulo otieko wuoyo gi Daudi,
nokawe chieng’ono mi ok oyiene odogka wuon mare, nikech noneno ka chuny Jonathan oriwore gi chuny Daudi,mohere mana kaka oherore owuon.
Jonathan gi Daudi ne joherore ahinya,omiyo ne gikuong’ore ni osiep mani kindgi ok norum.
Jonathan nolonyonanga mane orwako, momiyo Daudi kaachiel gi liganglane gi atung’e kodokandane.
Daudi nolocho kuonde duto mane Saulo oree, omiyo Saulo nokete jatendjolweny.  Wachno nodoko maber ni ji duto, kata mana ni jodong Saulo. Nyiego omako Saulo gi Daudi
Kane Daudi dok dala koa nego ja-Filistia, mon nowuok e miech Israelduto, mondo orom ni ruoth Saulo.  Ne giwero wende geto, kendo ne gimielka gigoyo thum gi bul.
Sam
.
;
.
. Ne gimiel ka giolo wer niya,"Saulo onego ji gana,Daudi to onego ji gana gi gana. "
Wachno ne rach ni Saulo, omiyo mirima nomake ahinya.  Nowacho niya,"Giketo ni Daudi ji gana gi gana, to an giketona mana gana kende.  Enang’o machielo ma pod odongne, mak mana bedo ruoth?"
Chakre chieng’noSaulo ne ng’iyo Daudi gi wang’ marach.
Kinyne muya marach moa kuom Nyasaye nobiro gi teko kuom Saulo, minodhumore e ode, kendo Daudi nogoyone thum, kaka nojatimo.  To Saulo nenigi tong’ e lwete,
mi nobayogo Daudi koparo ni mondo ochwowego oriwegi kor ot, to Daudi noleng’o motony.  Gima kama notimore diriyo.
Noyudo ka Ruoth Nyasaye oseweyo Saulo, to koro ni kod Daudi, emomiyoSaulo noluoro Daudi.
Kuom mano, nogole bute mokete jatend jolwenyalufu achiel.  Daudi ne telo ni joge e lweny,
kendo nolocho kuonde dutomodhiye, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ne ni kode.
Kane Saulo oneno kaka Daudidhi nyime maber, nomedo luore ahinya,
to jo-Israel gi jo-Juda dutonohero Daudi, nikech notelonigi e lweny.
Saulo nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Ineno Merab nyara maduong’ni? Abiromiyigo, ikende.  To in nyaka ibed mathwon, kikedona lwenje gi wasik RuothNyasaye. " To Saulo ne dwaro ni mondo jo-Filistia ema oneg Daudi, ma okonege en owuon.
Daudi nodwoko Saulo niya, "An ng’a, koso anywolana enang’o, kata joodwa gin ng’a gini e Israel, ma dahedhra bedo orruoth?"
To kane ndalo ochopo ma Saulo onego chiwie Merab nyare niDaudi, nochiwe mana ni Adriel ja-Mehola.
To Mikal nyar Saulo nohero Daudi, kendo kane Saulo owinjo wachno,nodoko mamor.
Noparo ni komiyego, to obiro bedone obadho, mondojo-Filistia onege.  Omiyo Saulo nochako oparo ni mondo Daudi obed chwornyare.
Kuom mano nochiko jotichne mondo owach ni Daudi ling’ling’niya, "Ruoth mor kodi, kendo jotichne duto oheri.  Omiyo koro mondo ibedor ruoth. "
To kane jotich Saulo onyiso Daudi, nodwokogi niya, "Uparoni bedo or ruoth en gima yot koso, ma ng’at ang’ata ma jachan ka ankama, nyalo mana bet?"
Jotich Saulo noduogo ire, monyise gima Daudiowacho.
Eka Saulo nowachonigi niya, "Wachuru ni Daudi ni ruoth ok dwargima inywomone, to odwaro mana ringre
.
Dho Hibrania wacho ni pienduong’ gi.  jo-Filistia mia achiel, mondo ochulgo kuor ni wasike. " ToSaulo noparo ni mano ema dimi Daudi tho e lwet jo-Filistia.
Kane jotich Saulo onyiso Daudi wechego, Daudi ne mor gi bedo orruoth.
Omiyo nowuok gi joge ka ndalo moket pok ochopo, mi ne ginegojo-Filistia mia ariyo.  Eka Daudi nokelo ringregi, mokwano ni ruoth mondoobed ore, mi Saulo nomiye Mikal nyare mondo obed chiege.
To kane Saulooneno malong’o kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ni kod Daudi, kendo kaka jo-Israelduto ohere,
nomedo mana luore, mobedo jasike mochwere.
E kinde ka kinde mane jotend lweny mag jo-Filistia odhi kedo gijo-Israel, Daudi ne kedo matek, kendo nonego ji moloyo jolwenj Saulomoko duto.  Omiyo nyinge noyudo pak maduong’. eye ngang’. "
Ruoth nowachone niya, "Penj ane nying wuonmare. "
Omiyo, kane Daudi oa nego ja-Filistia, Abner nokele ir Saulo,ka en gi wi ja-Filistiano e lwete.
Saulo nopenje niya, "Wuowi, in wuodng’a?" Daudi nodwoke niya, "An wuod Jesse ja Bethlehem, ma jatichni. "
SAMUEL
Saulo odwaro nego Daudi
Saulo nowuoyo gi Jonathan wuode, kendo gi joge duto, ni mondo ginegDaudi.
To Jonathan nohero Daudi ahinya.  Omiyo nonyiso Daudi wach niya,"Saulo wuora dwaro negi.  Emomiyo tang’, mondo kiny ipond gokinyi kamaogeng’ore.
An to kiny nawuog machung’ but wuora e pap kama intie, kendonawuo kode kuomi.  Ka awinjo wach moro, to nanyisi. "
Jonathan nowuoyo maber gi Saulo wuon mare kuom Daudi, kowachone niya,"Ruoth, kik itim marach ni Daudi jatichni, nikech pok otimoni gimoromarach, to osekonyi ahinya.
Noyie tho konego ja-Filistia cha, mi RuothNyasaye nokelo konyruok maduong’ ni jo-Israel duto.  Nineno mano, kendonimor.  Marang’o koro idwaro timo marach ni Daudi maonge ketho, kinegekayiem nono?"
Saulo nowinjo wach Jonathan, mi nokuong’ore gi nyingRuoth Nyasaye ni ok noneg Daudi.
Bang’e Jonathan noluongo Daudi monyisowachno.  Eka nokele ir Saulo, mi Daudi notiyone kaka chon.
Lweny nochako owuok, mi Daudi nodhi kedo gi jo-Filistia, moloyogichuth, nyaka ne giringo.
Chieng’ moro kane Saulo obet e ode gi tong’ e lwete, to Daudi goyothum, muya marach moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro kuome,
mi notemochwowo Daudi gi tong, mondo oriw gi kor ot, to Daudi noleng’o, mi tong’ochwowo mana kor ot.  Eka Daudi nopusore motony.
Zab
. Gotienono Saulo nooro joote mondo orit od Daudi, nikechnodwaro nege gokinyi.  To Mikal chi Daudi nonyise wach niya, "Ka okipondo gotienoni, to kiny nonegi. "
Omiyo noloro Daudi piny gie dirisa,mi Daudi noringo motony.
Bang’e Mikal nokawo kido mar nyasaye manono,moketo e kitanda, kendo noketone raten molos gi yie diek yo ka wiye,moumo duto gi nanga.
Kane Saulo ooro joote mondo omak Daudi, Mikalnowachonigi ni otuo.
Jootego noduoko ni Saulo wach, to noorogi kendo,mondo gidog gine Daudi kendgi giwegi.  Nomedo wachonigi niya, "Keleuru gikitanda, mondo anege. "
To kane jootego odonjo, ne ginwang’o mana kidomar nyasaye manono e kitanda, kod raten molos gi yie diek yo kawiye.
Saulo nopenjo Mikal niya, "Marang’o iwuonda kamano, miweyojasika odhi, motony?" To Mikal nodwoke niya, "Nokona ni mondo aweyeodhi, nono to onega. "
Kamano Daudi noringo, motony.  Nodhi Rama ir Samuel monyise gik mokoduto mane Saulo osetimone.  Eka ne gidhi gi Samuel, mi gidakNayoth.
Nonyis Saulo wach ni Daudi ni kuno,
mi nooro joote mondoomake.  To kane jootego oneno oganda jonabi ka dhumore, kod Samuelkochung’ ka jatendgi, Much Nyasaye nobiro kuomgi, mi gin bende negidhumore.
Kane onyis Saulo wachno, nochako ooro joote moko, to ginbende ne gidhumore.  Eka Saulo nooro joote kendo mar adek, mi kata jogobende nodhumore.
Bang’e nodhi Rama en owuon, to kane ochopo e sokomaduong’ man Seku, nopenjo kuma Samuel gi Daudi odakie, mi ng’at moronodwoke ni gin Nayoth e Rama.
Kane oyudo odhi kuno, Much Nyasayenobiro kuome en bende kendo nodhumore kowuotho nyaka nochopo Nayoth.
Sam
.
,
. En bende nolonyo lepe, kendo nodhumore e nyim Samuel minoriere duk odiechieng’no gotienono duto.  Emomiyo wachno olokore ngeroni, "Kara Saulo bende en achiel kuom jonabi. "
SAMUEL
Osiep manie kind Daudi gi Jonathan
Daudi noringo oa Nayoth e Rama.  Nodhi ir Jonathan, nopenje niya, "Ang’oma asetimo? Ere kethona? Ere gima rach ma wuoru oneno ni asetimo momiyoodwaro nega?"
Jonathan nodwoke ni, "Ngang’! Ok odwar negi.  Wuora ok timgimoro amora, mak onyisa.  Ere gimomiyo wuora dipanda wachni? Ok enkamano?"
To Daudi nowachone, koramo niya, "Wuoru ong’eyo ni igenaahinya, omiyo ok odwar mondo ing’e wachni, nimar dipo ka obedoni malit. To adier, gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gi nyingi iwuon, ondamo achielkende ema nie kinda gi tho. "
Eka Jonathan nopenjo Daudi niya, "Ere gimaidwaro mondo atimni?"
Kwan
.
. Daudi nodwoke niya, "Kiny due nopor,kendo owinjore abed gi ruoth e chiemo.  To we adhi apond e lek nyaka chopodhiambo mar chieng’ mar adek,
kapo ni wuoru oneno ni aonge, to iwachneni, ‘Daudi nokwaya ahinya mondo ayiene oring odhi dalagi Bethlehem,nikech ndalogi ema joodgi duto timoe misango mar higa. ’
Kowacho ni,‘Mano ber,’ eka anayud kue.  To ka mirima omake, eka ning’e ni odwarotimona gimoro marach.
Emomiyo koro bedna jaadiera, nimar nikuong’orinae nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ni osiep manie kindwa ok norum.  To ka aseketho, tonega in iwuon.  Ang’o ma dimi itera ir wuoru?"
Jonathan nodwoke niya,"We paro kamano! Ka da ang’eyo ni wuora dwaro timoni gimoro marach,donge danyisi?"
Daudi nopenjo Jonathan niya, "To ere ng’ama nokelnawach, kapo ni wuoru odwoki gi gero?"
Jonathan nowachone niya, "Biwadhi oko e pap. " Mi ne giwuok giduto, gidhi e pap.
Eka Jonathan nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Akuong’ora e nying Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach Israel ni kiny kata orucha, sa makama, nang’e gima wuoraparo.  Ka ayudo ni wach ber kuomi, to nanyisi.
To ka wuora dwaro timonimarach, mi ok anyisi mondo itony, to Ruoth Nyasaye mondo okweda.  RuothNyasaye obed kodi, kaka yande obet gi wuora.
Ka ok atho, to bednajaadiera, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro.  To ka atho,
Sam
.
. to ibedjaadiera ni oda nyaka chieng’.  Ka Ruoth Nyasaye otieko wasiki duto epiny,
to kik nyinga bed kaachiel kodgi.  Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ochul kuormana ni wasiki. "
Jonathan nochako okuong’ore ni Daudi kendo, nikechnohere mana kaka noherore owuon.
Eka Jonathan nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Kiny due nopor, kendo kinynong’ere ni ionge, nikech komi nobed nono.
To kochopo orucha, tonong’ere ni ionge chuth.  Omiyo chieng’no dhiyo kuma nipondoe chieng’cha, ibed but pidh kite.
Eka naba kanyono gi aserni adek, ka ng’amathoro,
kendo naor rawera moro, mondo odhi omany asernigo.  Ka awachoneniya, ‘Aserni eko ni e bathi koni, kawgi,’ to mano nyiso ni mondo iwuogkama ipondoe, nikech wach ber kuomi.  Akuong’ora gi nying Ruoth Nyasayeni onge gima biro timi.
To ka awachone rawerano ni, ‘Aserni nienyimi’, to mano nyiso ni Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro mondo idhi adhiya.
ToRuoth Nyasaye mondo obed janeno nyaka chieng’ kuom singruok mane watimokodi. "
Kamano Daudi nodhi mopondo e pap kendo kane due opor, ruoth nodhi esawo.
Nobet e kome man but kor ot, kaka nojatimo.  Abner nobet bute,kendo Jonathan bende ne ni kanyo, to kom Daudi ne ni nono.
Saulo ne okowacho gimoro chieng’ono, nikech noparo ni Daudi ok obiro nikech gimoroogeng’one.  Kamoro en gi chola, to pok ogude.
Kinyne, kane due osepor,kom Daudi ne pod ni nono, mi Saulo nopenjo Jonathan wuode niya,"Marang’o wuod Jesse ok osebiro e chiemo, nyoro kata kawuono?"
Jonathanodwoke niya, "Daudi nohomba ahinya ni mondo ayiene odhiBethlehem,
kowachona ni, ‘Asayi, yiena adhi, nikech joodwa timomisango dala, kendo owetena osechika mondo abedie.  Emomiyo koro kiyiena,to we mondo adhi ane wetena. ’ Mano emomiyo ok obiro mondo ochiem kodi. "
Saulo nokecho gi Jonathan, mowachone niya, "In wuod dhako ma wiye tek,kendo ma jajemo! Donge ang’eyo ni imako osiep gi wuod Jesse, ma birokeloni wichkuot, kendo ni meru monywoli bende?
Ndalo duto ma wuodJesse osiko ka ngima e piny, in ok nidongi.  Emomiyo koro or wach,iomnago, nikech nyaka otho!"
To Jonathan nodwoko Saulo wuon mare niya,"Ere gimomiyo dotho? Ang’o mosetimo?"
To Saulo nobaye gi tong’ mondoochwowe.  Mano omiyo Jonathan nong’eyo ni wuon mare dwaro negoDaudi.
Jonathan noa e mesa ka mirima mager omake, mokuno chiemochieng’ mar ariyo mar sawo.  Chunye ne lit nikech wach Daudi, nimar wuonmare noseyanye.
Kinyne gokinyi, Jonathan nowuok gi rawera moro, modhi e pap, kaka negichikore gi Daudi.
Nowacho ni rawerano niya, "Ringi imany asernimadwaro dirogi. " E sa mane rawera ringo, Jonathan nodiro asernimokadhe.
Kane ochopo kama aserni olwarie, Jonathan nokone niya "Aserniero nie nyimi.
Ruri, kik ideki. " Omiyo rawerano nochoko aserni,moduogogi ni Jonathan ruodhe.
To nokiya gima timore, mak mana Jonathangi Daudi kende ema nong’eyo tiend wachno.
Bang’e Jonathan nomiye gigemag lweny, kowachone ni mondo otergi dala.
Kane rawera osedhi, Daudinoa kar pidh kite, mokulore didek, eka ne gimosore gi Jonathan, migiywak giduto, to Daudi noywak moloyo.
Jonathan nowacho ni Daudi niya,"Dhiyo gi kue.  Wasesingore e nying Ruoth Nyasaye mobedo janeno e kindwakodi, kendo e kind nyikwaya gi nyikwayi nyaka chieng’. " Eka Daudinochung’, modhi, to Jonathan nodok dala.

Daudi oringo Saulo

Koro ere gima in go ka? Yieimiya makati abich, kata gimoro amora mantie. "
Ahimelek nodwoke niya,"Makati onge ka, to mak mana mago mowal ni tich Ruoth Nyasaye kende, majogi nyalo chamo ka giseritore kuom mon. "

T. Lawi
.

. Kuom mano jadolo nomiye makati mowal ni tichRuoth Nyasaye, nikech makati moro amora ne onge kanyo, mak mana makatimooket e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, migolo oko chieng’ miketo makati malietkargi.
To ng’at moro ma jatich Saulo ne ni kanyo chieng’no, kogeng’e e nyimRuoth Nyasaye mondo opwodhe.  Nyinge ne Doeg ja-Edom, mane ng’at marategomoloyo kuom jokwadh Saulo duto.
Daudi nopenjo Ahimelek niya, "Donge inie gi tong’ kata ligangla moroka, nimar ok nabiro gi ligangla kata gi gir lweny moro, nikech wachruoth nobet arika. "
Sam
.
. Jadolo nodwoke niya, "Nitie liganglamar Goliath ja-Filistia, jal mane inego e holo mar Ela cha.  Ero okane etok law dolo miluongo ni efod, koboye gi nanga.  Kidware to kawe, nikechonge moro ka, mak mana en. " Daudi nowacho niya, "Miyago, nikech ongemoro maloye gi ber. "

Zab
;
. Kuom mano, Daudi noringo modhi otony e rogo mar Adulam. Kane owetene kod joodgi duto owinjo wachno, ne gidhi ire kuno.

Sam
.
-
; Zab
. Eka Doeg ja-Edom, ma bende noyudo ochung’ gijodong Saulo, nodwoke niya, "Naneno wuod Jesse kobiro Nob, ir Ahimelekwuod Ahitub.
Ahimelek nopenjone Ruoth Nyasaye wach, kendo nomiyechiemo kod ligangla mar Goliath ja-Filistia. "
Eka Ruoth nooro wach, moluongo Ahimelek jadolo, ma wuod Ahitub, kodjoodgi duto, mane gin jodolo Nob, mi ne gibiro ire giduto.
Saulonowacho niya, "Koro winji, wuod Ahitub. " Ahimelek nodwoke niya, "Ruoth,awinjo. "
Saulo nopenje niya, "Marang’o uriwona gi wuod Jesse? Nimiyechiemo kod ligangla, kendo nipenjone Nyasaye wach.  Mano omiyo koroosebalo koda, kendo osebutona tinendeni. "
Ahimelek nodwoko ruoth niya,"To kuom jotichni duto, ere ng’at ma jaadiera ma dirom gi Daudi ma ori,ma jatend joma riti, kendo momi duong’ e odi?
Kawuono eka achakopenjone wach kuom Nyasaye koso? Ooyo, ok kamano! Kik ruoth jig wachkuoma, kata kuom joodwa duto, nimar nakiya wachno chuth. "
To ruothnowachone niya, "Nyaka itho, Ahimelek, in gi joodu duto!"
Eka ruoth nowacho ni jorit ma nochung’ bute niya, "Dhiuru, uneg jodolomag Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech gin bende giriwore gi Daudi.  Ne ging’eyo nioringo to ne ok ginyisa. " To jotich ruoth notamore nego jodolo mag RuothNyasaye.
Omiyo ruoth nowacho ni Doeg ja-Edom niya, "In dhi inegjodolo. " Mi Doeg nodhi momwomore kuom jodolo, kendo chieng’no nonego jipiero aboro gabich, mane joting’ law dolo miluongo ni efod.
Bende Doegnomonjo Nob, dala jodolo, monego chwo gi mon, kod rawere gi nyithindomadhoth, kod dhok gi kenje gi rombe.
To wuod Ahimelek achiel ma nyinge Abiathar, notony, moringo odhi irDaudi,
kendo nonyise kaka Saulo osenego jodolo mag RuothNyasaye.
Daudi nokone niya, "Kane aneno Doeg ja-Edom chieng’ cha,nang’eyo ni asekelo tho ni joodu duto.
Bed koda ka, kendo kik iluor,nikech jal madwaro negino, ema dwaro nega an bende.  To kibet koda, tonitony. "
SAMUEL
Daudi obet Keila, kendo obet e thim
Chieng’ moro nonyis Daudi ni jo-Filistia kedo gi jo-Keila, kendo yakocham mane ni kuonde dino.
Omiyo nopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach niya, "Adhiaked gi jo-Filistia koso?" Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Dhiyo, ikedkodgi, mondo ires jo-Keila. "
To joma ne ni kod Daudi nowachone niya,"Ka luoro nyalo makowa mana e Juda kaeri, donge wanaluor moloyo kwadhikedo gi jo-Filistia?"
Kuom mano Daudi nochako openjo Ruoth Nyasayewach, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "A malo idhi Keila, nimar abirochiwo jo-Filistia e lweti. "
Omiyo Daudi gi joge nodhi Keila, mokedo gijo-Filistia.  Ne giloyogi marach, kendo gipeyo jambgi, mi giresojo-Keila.
Kane Abiathar wuod Ahimelek oringo odhi Keila ir Daudi, nodhi koting’olaw dolo miluongo ni efod e lwete.
Saulo nowinjo ni Daudi odhi Keila, mi nowacho niya, "Nyasaye osechiwe elweta nikech kosedonjo e dala man gi rangeye kod radedi, to osemakoreowuon. "
Omiyo Saulo nowako ji duto ni lweny, mondo gidhi Keila, gitimageng’a ni Daudi gi joge.
To kane Daudi owinjo ni Saulo dwaro timonemarach, nowachone Abiathar niya, "Kelna law dolo. "
Eka Daudi nokwayoRuoth Nyasaye niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, asewinjo niSaulo dwaro biro Keila ka, mondo oketh dala nikech an.
Obiro biroadier kaka asewinjono, koso? A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, asayimondo inyisa wachno. " Mi Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Obiro biro. "
EkaDaudi nopenjo kendo niya, "Jo-Keila nochiwa kaachiel gi joga e lwetSaulo koso?" Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke ni, "Ginichiwi. "
Omiyo Daudi nowuokgi joge duto mia auchiel, modhi kamoro amora mane ginyalo dhiye.  KaneSaulo owinjo ni Daudi oseringo oa Keila, ne ok odhi kuno.
Daudi nodakkuonde rogo e piny gode manie thim Zif.  Saulo ne dware pile, to Nyasayene ok ochiwe e lwete.
Luoro nomako Daudi nikech Saulo nosewuok mondo onege.  To kane Daudi niHoresh e thim Zif,
Jonathan wuod Saulo nowuok, modhi ire kuno, mojiwekotego chunye kuom Nyasaye.
Nowachone niya, "Kik iluor, nimar Saulowuora ok bi nwang’i.  Inibed ruodh Israel, to anabed jalupni.  Saulo wuorabende ong’eyo kamano. "
Sam
.
. Mi ne gikuong’ore e nyim RuothNyasaye ni osiep manie kindgi ok norum.  Bang’ mano, Jonathan nodok dala,to Daudi nodong’ Horesh.
Zab
. Jo-Zif nodhi Gibea ir saulo, mi giwacho niya, "Daudi opondokuomwa Horesh, e got Hakila, yo milambo mar Jeshimon
Emomiyo ruoth,koro bi e kinde moro amora midwaro, mondo wachiwe e lweti. "
Saulonodwokogi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oguedhu, nikech usetimonamaber.
Koro dhiuru, unon mondo ung’e maber kama opondoe, bende ung’ejoma osenene kanyo, nikech osenyisa ni ogalagala ahinya.
Ng’eurukuonde duto mopondoe, kendo uduogna wach madier.  Eka anadhi kodu, kendoka en e pinywa ka, to anadware kuom dhout Juda nyaka ayude. "
Kuom mano ne giwuok, mi gidok Zif, motelo ni Saulo.  To Daudi gi jogene nie thim Maon man Araba yo milambo mar Jeshimon.
Saulo gi jogenowuok dhi dware, to nonyis Daudi wach, mi nolor odhi nyaka e lwandamanie thim Maon.  Kane Saulo owinjo kamano, nolawo Daudi nyakathimno.
Saulo nodhi e bath got konchiel, to Daudi gi joge ne nie bathekomachielo.  Daudi ne reto mondo oyomb Saulo, nikech Saulo gi joge neochako timonigi ageng’a koni gi koni, mondo omakgi.
To e sa nogono,jaote moro nobiro ir Saulo mowachone niya, "Reti, ibi piyo, nikechjo-Filistia osemonjo pinywa. "
Mi Saulo noweyo lawo Daudi, modok kedogi jo-Filistia.  Emomiyo iluongo kanyo ni, ‘Lwanda mar Pogruok’.
ToDaudi noa kanyo, modhi odak kuonde rogo man Engedi.
SAMUEL
Daudi oyudo Saulo, to oweye mak onege

Zab
;
. Nochopo e abilni mag rombe man but yo, kama ne nitie rogo, kendonodonjo e rogono mondo olosre.  To Daudi gi joge noyudo osedonjo erogono, mobet piny gi yo ka iye.
Joma ne Daudi nigo nowachone niya,"Kinde koro osechopo ma Ruoth Nyasaye oketoe jasiki e lweti kakanosingore.  Omiyo timne gima idwaro. "
Sam
.
. To Daudi nowacho nijoge niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ogeng’a kik ahiny ruodha, kata mana lithlweta kik ater kuome, nikech en ng’at mowir ma Ruoth Nyasayeoyiero. "
Kamano Daudi nogeng’o joge, mi ok oyienigi mondo gineg Saulo. To nochung’ mong’ado riak law Saulo ling’ling’.
To ka nosetimo kamanochunye noridore.  Saulo nowuok oa e rogo, modhi nyime gi wuodhe.
Bang’e Daudi bende nowuok oa e rogo, mokok ni Saulo niya, "Ruoth!" EkaSaulo nogoyo machiemo, mong’iye.  Daudi nogoyo chonge piny, ka miyeduong’,
mi owachone niya, "Marang’o iyie gi joma wacho ni Daudi dwarotimoni marach?
Ne kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nende oketi e lweta ei rogokawuono.  Jomoko nende owachona ni mondo anegi, to naweyi.  Nende awachoni ok nater lweta kuom ruodha, nikech en ng’at mowir ma Ruoth Nyasayeoyiero.
Bende wuora, ng’i ine riak lawi manie lweta.  Nang’ade to ne okanegi.  Mano nyalo nyisi ni aonge gi paro mar timoni marach kamano.  Kataobedo ni ilawa mondo inega, an to pok akethoni.
Ruoth Nyasaye mondoong’ad bura e kindwa kodi, kendo en ema onyalo chuloni kuor kuom gimaisetimona.  To an awuon to ok natimni marach.
Kaka ngech joma chonwacho ni, ‘Richo wuok e chuny joma richo. ’ To an ok natimni marach.
Sam
.
. En ng’a ma ruoth dwaro? Ilawo ng’a? Ilawo mana guok motho,ilawo mana kikun!
Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ong’ad bura e kindwa kodi.  Enmondo oyalwa kodi, nikech ong’eyo ni ibiro chwaka, kendo wacho ni aongeketho. "
Kane daudi otieko nyiso Saulo wechegi, Saulo nopenje niya, "Daudiiwuoda, mano dwondi koso?" Eka noywak matek,
komedo wacho ni Daudiniya, "In ng’at makare moloya, nikech isetimona maber, to an toasetimoni marach.
Ng’wono mitimona kawuono duong’ motamore gi nono,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye noketa e lweti, to ne ok inega.
Ka ng’ato oyudojasike, doweye mak onege koso? Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye mondo omiyi pokmaber kuom tim misetimona kawuono.
Koro an gi ratiro ni inibed ruoth,kendo piny Israel nodhi nyime maber e bwo lochni.
Koro kuong’rina enying Ruoth Nyasaye ni ok nitiek nyikwaya kata ok niruch nyinga kuomdhoodwa. "
Mi Daudi nokuong’orene kamano.  Eka Saulo nodok dala, toDaudi gi joge nodok e rogo mane gidakie.
SAMUEL
Daudi gi Abigail
Samuel notho, mi jo-Israel duto nochokore kanyakla moywage kendo negiyike e ode Rama.  Bang’ mano, Daudi nodhi e thim Maon.
Ne nitie ng’at moro ma japith ahinya ma nodak Karmel e piny Maon.  Ne engi rombe alufu adek, kod diek alufu achiel.  Noyudo ong’ado yie rombeKarmel.
Nyinge ne Nabal, to nying chiege ne Abigail.  Abigail ne endhako man gi rieko maber, kendo man gi chia, to chwore ne koch, kendotimne richo.  Ne en ja dhood kaleb.
Daudi nowinjo gie thim kuno ni Nabalng’ado yie rombe,
mi nooro yawuowi apar, kowachonigi niya, "DhiuruKarmel, umosna Nabal.
Uwachne kama: ‘Bed gi kue, kaachiel gi joodi, kodji duto ma in go.
Asewinjo kaka koro ung’ado yie rombe.  Ka yandejokwadhi kwayo butwa, to ne ok watimonigi marach, bende gimoro oknolalnigi ndalo duto mane gin Karmel.
Penj jogi, to gibiro nyisikamano.  Emomiyo rwak jogagi mang’won, nikech wabiro e ndalo maber. Akwayi ni mondo imi Daudi wuodi kod joge gimoro amora ma in go. ’ "
Kane Yawuowigo ochopo ir Nabal, ne ginyise gima Daudi owacho.  To kanegitieko wuoyo,
Nabal nodwokogi niya, "Daudi to ng’a? Wuod Jesse toang’o? Ndalogi wasumbni mang’eny ringo ka weyo ruidhigi.
Bende dakawmakati maga, gi piga kod ring’o ma aseyang’o ni joma ng’adona yie rombe,ami jomoko nono, ma akia kuma oaye?"
Omiyo jo-Daudi noa kanyo modok,kendo onyise weche duto.
Eka Daudi nowacho ni joge niya, "Ng’ato kang’ato mondoo otue liganglane!" Mi ne gitimo kamano giduto, koda kaDaudi bende.  Eka ji ma dirom mia ang’wen nodhi gii Daudi, to ji miaariyo nodong’ ka rito gigegi.
To noyudo wuowi moro osenyiso Abigail chi Nabal niya, "Daudi noorojoote oa e thimm mondo oomos ruodhwa, to nong’ayonigi wach ang’aya.
Tojo-daudi nosetimonwa maber ndalo duto mane wan kodgi, kwakwayo rombe ethim.  Ne ok githagowa, kata girwa moro ne ok olalnwa,
To ne gibedonwakaka ohinga mogeng’onwa odiechieng’ gotieno.
Emomiyo koro, par gimaonego itim, nikech gima rach biro timore ni ruodhwa.  To nimar ing’eyo nien ng’at marach, kendo onge ng’ama nyalo wuoyo kode. "
Kuom mano Abigail noreto, mokawo makati mia ariyo, gi ndede ariyo magdivai, gi rombe abich moseyang’, gi migerni abich mag chamb aloda, gitombo mia achiel mag olemb mzabibu motwo mong’in, kod tombo mia ariyomag olemb ng’owo mong’in moting’ogi gi kanje.
Nowacho ni jotichneniya, "Teluru, an to abiro bang’u. " To ne ok onyiso Nabal chwore gimaotimo.
Kane oyudo olor gi kanje e hoho manie got, nopo koneno Daudi gijoge ka biro, mi noromo kodgi.
Noyudo Daudi osewacho niya, "Nathagorakayiem, karito mwandu jali e thim, mak gimoro olal.  To kata obedo niasetimone maber kamano, en to osetimona tim marach.
Nyasaye mondookweda ka aweyo kata ng’at achiel madichwo kuom joge kangima kawuononi!"
Kane Abigail oneno Daudi, noreto molor e kanje, kendo nogoyo chongepiny e nyime, mokulore nyaka e lowo.
Nolung’ore e tiende, mowachoneniya, "Ruoth, kwana ka jaketho.  To kata kamano, yie awuo kodi, kendoiwinj wachna.
Ruoth, kik idew ng’at ma achach miluongo ni Nabal,nikech ochalo gi nyinge.  Nabal e nyinge, kendo orabala adier.  To an, neok aneno yawuowi ma nioro.
Emomiyo koro ruoth, Ruoth Nyasaye osegeng’imondo kik ichuer remo, kichulo kuor gi lweti iwuon.  Gi nying RuothNyasaye, kendo gi nyingi iwuon, wasiki duto kod jogo duto ma dwarotimoni marach mondo obed kaka Nabal.
To michni eri ma asekeloni, mondoimi joma in go.
Asayi, wena kethona, nimar adier Ruoth Nyasaye nomidhoodi bedo mosiko, nikech ikedo gi wasike.  Onge masira ma biro nwang’ie ndaloni duto.
Ka ng’ato lawi mondo onegi, to Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachi biro keto ngimani e kanyakla mar joma ngima morito ka mwandumokan e ndede.  To ngima wasiki nowit oko mana kaka kidi midiro giorujre.
Chieng’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye osetimonie gik mabeyo dutomosesingoreni, kendo oseketi ruodh Israel,
ok nine malit, kendo oknichari kendi, kuom chuero remo kayiem, kata kuom chulo kuor.  To kaRuoth Nyasaye osetimoni maber, eka mondo ipara. "
Daudi nodwoko Abigail niya, "Apako Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,moori tinendeni mondo irom koda.
Oguedh riekoni, kendo in bendeoguedhi, nikech isegeng’a kawuono ni kik achuer remo, kendo kik achulkuor.
Adier, gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, mosegeng’a nikik atimni malit, ka da ok ireto ka ibiro romona, to kiny ka piny oru okdodong’ni Nabal kata ng’ama dichwo achiel. "
Eka Daudi nokawo gik maneAbigail okelone, mi owachone niya, "Dog dala gi kue.  Asewinjo gimaikwayo, kendo ayiego. "
Kane Abigail odok dala, noyudo ka Nabal timo sawo maduong’, mana kasap ruoth.  Nabal ne mor, nikech nomer ahinya, omiyo Abigail ne ok onyisegimoro kata matin, nyaka piny oru.
To kinyne gokinyi, ka kong’onoserumo e wang’e, chiege nonyise weche duto, mi chunye notho kakidi.
To bang’ ndalo apar, Ruoth Nyasaye nochwade, motho.
Kane Daudi owinjo ni Nabal osetho, nowacho niya, "Apako Ruoth Nyasayemosechulo kuor kuom achaye ma nayudo kuom Nabal, kendo ma nogeng’ona nikik atim richo.  To Ruoth Nyasaye osedwoko richo Nabal e wiye owuon. " EkaDaudi nooro wach ni Abigail, mondo okende.
Kane jotich Daudi obiroKarmel ir Abigail, ne giwachone niya, "Daudi oorowa iri, ni mondo wadhikodi ibed chiege. "
Mi Abigail noa malo, mogoyo chonge piny nyaka elowo.  Eka nowacho niya, "An mana misumba, ma nyalo lwoko tiend jotichruoth. "
Noikore mapiyo, moidho kanyna, kendo jotichne abich manyirinotere, ka giluwo bang’ joote Daudi
SAMUEL
Daudi oyudo Saulo Zif, to ok onege
Zab
. Jo-Zif nobiro Gibea ir Saulo, mi giwachone niya, "Donge ing’eyoni Daudi opondo e got Hakila, momanyore gi Jeshimon?"
Mi Saulo nolormowuok odhi nyaka thim Zif gi jo-Israel moyier alufu adek, mondo odwarDaudi e thimno.
Nobworo but yo e got Hakila, momanyore gi Jeshimon, toDaudi ne nie thim.  To kane Daudi ong’eyo ni Saulo obiro dwarekuno,
nooro jombetre, mofwenyo kama Saulo obworoe.
Eka nowuok, modhikanyono, moneno kama Saulo gi Abner wuod Ner, jatend jolweny, jonindoe edier kambi, to joge noguro hembegi alwora.
Daudi nowacho ni Ahimelek ja-Hiti, kod Abishai wuod Zeruya ma owadgiJoab niya, "Ere ng’ama didhi koda mwalo e kambi Saulo?" Abishai nodwokeni, "Wadhi kodi. "
Omiyo Daudi gi Abishai nodhi kuno gotieno, moyudoSaulo ka nindo e dier kambi, to tong’e ochwowo piny gi yo ka wiye.  Abnergi jolweny bende ne nindo bute alwora.
Abishai nowacho ni Daudi niya,"Nyasaye oseketo jasiki e lweti tinendeni.  Yiena mondo achwowe dichielgi tong’e, ariwe gi lowo, mak anwoyo lweta!"
To Daudi nodwoke niya,"Kik inege, nimar onge ng’ama nyalo tero lwete kuom ruoth mowir ma RuothNyasaye oyiero, mak doyud bura. "
Eka nomedo wacho niya, "Gi nyingRuoth Nyasaye, Ruoth Nyasaye ema chieng’ notieke, kata ka chieng’ thoneochopo, kata kodhi e lweny.
Sam
.
. Kuero ngang’! Kik ater lwetakuom ruoth mowir ma Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero.  To wakaw mana tong’ ma yo kawiyeno, kod puga mar pino mondo wadhigo. "
Kamano Daudi nokawo tong’ gipuk pi mane ni yo ka wi Saulo, mi ne gia, ma onge ng’at monenogi, katamowinjogi, kata mochiew.  Ne ginindo giduto, nikech Ruoth Nyasayenosemiyo nindo ogoyogi ngoga.
Daudi noidho loka machielo, mochung’ ewi got gi kuma bor, ka kindgiopogore malach.
Eka noluongo jolweny kod Abner wuod Ner, kowacho niya,"Abner, dak idwoka wach?" Abner nodwoko niya "In ng’awa, ma luongoruoth?"
Mi Daudi nowachone niya, "Donge in dichwo? Bende nitie ng’amaromo kodi e Israel? To ka kamano, nende ok irito ruoth maber? Dongeing’eyo ni ng’at moro nobiro nege?
Gima isetimo ok ber.  Gi nying RuothNyasaye, uwinjoru gi tho, nikech ne ok urito ruoth, ng’at mowir ma RuothNyasaye oyiero.  Koro neye kuma tong’ ruoth nitie, kod puk pi mane ni yoka wiye. "
Kane Saulo ochamo dwond Daudi, nopenje niya, "Daudi wuoda, mano dwondikoso?" Daudi nodwoke niya, "Ee, mano dwonda, ruoth.
Marang’o ilawa, toan mana jatichni? En ang’o masetimo? Koso rach manadi misenenokuoma?
Koro yie iwinj wachna.  Kapo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ema othuwi koda,to mondo oyie kawo misango.  To ka ji ema othuwi koda, to mondo okuong’gie nying Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech gisegola tinende ni kik abed e oganda marjo-Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo giseriemba mondo adhi ati ni nyisechemamoko.
Emomiyo koro kik iwe atho e pinyni, kuma bor gi Ruoth Nyasaye,nimar isewuok dwaro ngimana, mana ka ng’at ma dwaro ayuer e gode. "
EkaSaulo nowacho niya, "Aseketho.  Duogi, Daudi wuoda.  Ok nachak atimni gimadihinyi, nikech nende iluoro ngimana.  Awuoro, asefuwo, kendo alalmarach. "
Mi Daudi nodwoke niya, "Ruoth, ne tong’i! Or jalweny moromondo obi loka ku, oome.
Ruoth Nyasaye ema miyo ng’ato ka ng’ato pokmowinjore gi timne makare kod adierane.  Ruoth Nyasaye nende oketi elweta, to nadagi tero lweta kuom ruoth mowir ma Ruoth Nyasayeoyiero.
Kaka ngimani nende long’o e wang’a, e kaka ngimana bende mondoobed malong’o e wang’ Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo en ema mondo oresa e masicheduto. "
Eka Saulo nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Oguedhi, Daudi wuoda! Initimtimbe madongo, kendo nilo. " Mi Daudi nodhi, to Saulo nodok dala. .
To Daudi nokendo bende Ahinoam nyar Jazreel, mi mon ariyogo nobedomonde.
Sam
.
-
. To noyudo Saulo osekawo Mikal nyare, ma chiDaudi, momiyo Paltiel wuod Laish, ma ja-Galim.

SAMUEL
Daudi odak e piny jo-Filistia
Daudi noparo niya, "Chieng’ moro Saulo nonega.  Onge gimoro maber madatim, mak mana karingo adhi e piny jo-Filistia.  Mano eka Saulo nowelawa, nikech kata komanya machal nadi e piny Israel duto, to oknonwang’a, kendo natony kaa e lwete. "
Omiyo Daudi nowuok gi ji miaauchiel mane ni kode, modhi ir Akish, wuod Maok, ruodh Gath,
mi gidakkode kuno.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato ne ni kod joode.  Daudi bende ne ni kod mondeariyo, Ahinoam nyar Jezeel, kod Abigail ma chi Nabal ja-Karmel.
Kaneonyis Saulo ni Daudi oseringo nyaka Gath, noweyo dware.
Daudi nokwayo Akish niya, "Ruoth, ka koro iyie konya, to mondo imiyakamoro e mier maoko, adagie.  Ok owinjore adag kodi e dalani. "
Mi Akishnomiye Ziklag mana chieng’ono.  Mano emomiyo Ziklag pod ni e bwo ruodhJuda nyaka chil kawuono.
Daudi nodak e piny jo-Filistia kuom kinde madirom higa achiel kod dueche ang’wen.
Ndalogo Daudi gi joge ne monjo jo-Geshur, gi jo-Girzi, kod jo-Amalek,nikech ogendnigo ema nodak e pinyno, chakre Telam kochomo yo Shur, nyakapiny Misri.
Daudi ne ketho pinyno ma ok owe ng’ama dichwo kata ma dhakoka ngima.  Nopeyo rombe, gi dhok gi kenje, kod ngamia, kendo noyakolewni, to bang’e nodokga ir Akish.
To kane Akish openje ni, "Ia monjokune kawuono?" Daudi ne dwoke niya, "Waa monjo yo milambo mar Juda,"kata, "Yo milambo mar piny jo-Jerameel," kata, "Yo milambo mar pinyjo-Keni. "
Daudi ne ok we ng’ama dichwo kata madhako kangima, manedikel wach Gath, nikech noparo niya, "Dipo ka gidonjonwa, ka ginyisogima watimo. " Kamano e kaka tim Daudi nobet ndalo duto mane odakie epiny jo-Filistia.
To Akish nogeno Daudi, koparo niya, "Osemiyo jogi majo-Israel sin kode chuth, omiyo nobed ng’ata mosiko. "
SAMUEL
Ndalogo jo-Filistia nochoko jolweny duto mondo giked gi jo-Israel. Akish nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Ng’e malong’o ni in kaachiel gi jogi nyakaudhi koda e lweny. "
Daudi nodwoke ni, "Mano ber, kendo ibiro neno gimaanyalo timo!" Mi Akish nowachone ni, "Ber! Abiro keti jaritna mosiko. "Saulo gi dhako ma ja-nyakalondo

Sam
.
.  T. Lawi
.
; T. Chik
.
,
. Noyudo Samuel osetho, mijo-Israel duto noywage, kendo ne giyike Rama, dalane owuon.  To Saulonoseriembo jo-nyakalondo kod ajuoge duto oa e piny Israel.
Jo-Filistia nochokore kanyakla Shunem, mi gijot kuno.  Saulo bendenochoko jo-Israel duto, mojot Gilboa.
Kane Saulo oneno jolwenyjo-Filistia, luoro nomake, mokirni ahinya.
Kwan
.
. To kane okwayoRuoth Nyasaye wach, Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok odwoke, kata e yor lek, kata eyor Urim
.
Urim ne en ombulu migoyo, kipenjogo wach kuom Nyasaye.  katagi dho jonabi.
Bang’e Saulo nowacho ni jotichne niya, "Dwarnauru dhakoma ja nyakalondo, mondo adhi ire, apenj wach. " Jotichne nodwoke ni,"Nitie dhako moro ma janyakalondo modak Endor. "
Saulo no wako lewni mopogore gi mane ojarwako, mondo orweny ji.  Ekanokawo ji ariyo, modhigo ir dhakono gotieno.  Nowacho ni dhakono niya,"Korna wach gi nyakalondo, kendo igolna ng’at mabiro wachoni, kuom jomaotho. "
To dhakono nodwoke niya, "Donge ing’eyo gima Saulo osetimo?Oseriembo jo-nyakalondo gi ajuoge e pinywa.  Marang’o ichika gimasira?"
To Saulo nokuong’ore, kawachone ni, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye,onge bura ma noyudi kuom wachnii. "
Eka dhakono nopenje niya, "Agolning’a?" Mi nodwoke ni, "Golna Samuel. "
To kane dhakono oneno Samuelkawuok, nokok matek, kowacho ni Saulo niya, "Marang’o iwuonda? To karain mana Saulo!"
To ruoth nowachone ni, "Kik iluor.  Ineno ang’o?"Nodwoko Saulo niya, "Aneno nyasaye moro kawuok ei lowo. "
Mi Saulonopenje ni, "Ochalo nadi?" Nodwoke niya, "Jaduong’ moti, moumore gi lawabola ema owuok. " Eka Saulo nong’eyo ni en Samuel, mi nogoyo chongepinyu, mokulore nyaka e lowo, komiye duong’.
Samuel nopenjo Saulo niya, "Marang’o ichanda, kimiyo awuok oko eliel?" Saulo nodwoke niya,, "Adhier nono, nikech jo-Filistia kedo koda,to Nyasaye oseweya, ma dwok moro ok odwoka, kata gi dho jonabi, kata giyor lek.  Emomiyo aluongi ni mondo inyisa gima onego atim. "
Samuelnowachone niya, "Marang’o ipenja, kobedo ni Ruoth Nyasaye oseweyi,modoko jasiki?
Sam
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye osetimoni mana kaka nomiyoawacho.  Osemayi loch, momiyo Daudi.
Sam
.
-
. Osetimoni kamanonikech nidagi winje, kendo ne ok itimo ni jo-Amalek gima romre gimirimbe mager.
To bende Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwi kaachiel gi jo-Israele lwet jo-Filistia, kendo kiny inibed koda ka, kaachiel gi yawuoti. Adier, Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwo oganda lweny mar Israel e lwetjo-Filistia. "
Kane Saulo owinjo weche Samuelgo, luoro nomake ahinya, mogore pinyauma.  Noonge gi teko chuth, nimar noyudo oseriyo kech odiechieng’gotieno duto.
Dhakono nosudo bute, kendo ka noneno ni luoro omake,nokone niya, "Nende awinjo wachni, kendo nayie tho kane atimo gimanikwaya.
Emomiyo koro in bende yie iwinj wachna.  We amiyie chiemo moromatin, mondo icham, iyudgo teko mar chako wuoth. "
To nodagi ni okochiem, to jotichne kaachiel gi dhakono nomedo kwaye, moyie.  Nochung’koa e lowo, mobet e kitanda.
Dhakono ne nigi nyarwath machwe e otkanyo.  Noreto moyang’o nyarwadhno piyopiyo.  Bende nokawo mogo, modwalo,kendo olosogo makati, ma ok oketie thowi.
Noketogi e nyim Saulo gijotichne, mi ne gichiemo.  Eka ne giwuok, mi gidhi mana gotienono.
SAMUEL
Jo-Filistia ochich gi Daudi
Jo-Filistia nochoko jolweny duto kanyakla Afek, to jo-Israel nojot butthidhiya man Jezreel.
Jodong jo-Filistia ne chano jogi e migepe matindogi madongo, to Daudi gi joge, kaachiel gi jo-Akish, ne luwobang’gi.
Kane jotend jo-Filistia oneno kamano, ne gipenjo niya,"Jo-Hibraniagi to timo ang’o ka?" Akish nodwokogi niya, "Jali e Daudi,mane jatich Saulo ruodh Israel.  Koro osedak koda moloyo higa achiel, tochakre ndalo mane obiroe ira, pok aneno rach moro kuome nyaka chilkawuono. "
To jotend jo-Filistia nokecho kode, mi giwachone niya, "Kwerjali odog kuma niketee, kik odhi kodwa kedo, nimar dipo kolokore jasikwae lweny, nikech kodwaro ni owinjre gi ruodhe, to doneg man jowa.
Sam
.
;
.
. Donge en e Daudi mane ji miel ka wero ni,‘Saulo onego ji gana,to Daudi onego ji gana gi gana’?"
Omiyo Akish noluongo Daudi, mowachone niya, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, injaadiera, kendo an to aneno ni owinjore wadhi kodi e lweny, nikech pokaneno rach moro kuomi, chakre ndalo mane ibiroe ira, nyaka chil kawuono. To kata kamano, jodongo ok oyie kodi.
Emomiyo koro dogi, idhi gi kue,ma ok itimo gima diketh chunygi. "
To Daudi nowacho ni Akish niya, "Eregima asetimo? Wach ang’o miseyudo kuoma ndalo duto masebedogo kodi nyakachil kawuono, ma dimona dhi kedo gi wasiki?"
Akish nodwoke niya,"Ang’eyo ni isebedona jaadiera, mana kaka malaika mar Nyasaye, to katakamano jotend jo-Filistia osedagi ni kik idhi kodgi e lweny.
Emomiyokiny ichiew gokinyi mang’ich, kaachiel gi jotich ruodhu ma nubirogo,kendo umondi ka piny dwaro ru, mondo udog e dala ma namiyou.  To kik ibedgi chuny moro marach, nikech an to ageni chuth. "
Kamano Daudi gi jogenowuok gokinyi mang’ich, modok e piny jo-Filistia.  Jo-Filistia to nodhiJezreel.
SAMUEL
Daudi oloyo jo-Amalek e lweny
Chieng’ mar adek, Daudi gi joge nochopo Ziklag.  To jo-Amalek noyudo kaosemonjo yo milambo mar Juda, kendo gisewang’o Ziklag mi giketho.
Tomond dalano kod ji duto matindo gi madongo, ne gimako gidhigo, ma okginego kata achiel
Omiyo kane Daudi gi joge jochopo e dala, ne giyudokosewang’e, to mondgi gi yawuotgi kod nyigi oseter e tuech.
Daudi gijoge noywak matek, nyaka teko ma di gimed ywakgo orumo.
Sam
.
,
. Ahinoam nyar Jezreel, gi Abigail chi Nabal ja-Karmel, ma mond Daudibende noseter e tuech.
Daudi nodhier nono, nikech joge ne wacho nimondo ogoye gi kite, nimar chunygi ne lit ahinya, ka ng’ato ka ng’atoparo yawuote gi nyige.  To kata kamano Daudi noyudo teko kuom RuothNyasaye.

Sam
.
-
. Daudi nowacho ni Abiathar jadolo ma wuod Ahimelek niya,"Kelna efod. " Mi Abiathar nokelone law dolo miluongo ni efodno.
Daudinopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach niya, "Anyalo lawo joma nomonjowago, koso?Bende dajukgi?" Mi nodwoke ni, "Lawgi, nikech adier ibiro jukogi, kendoibiro reso jogi duto. "
Omiyo Daudi nodhi gi joge duto mia auchiel.  Tokane gichopo e aora Besor,
ji mia ariyo nool ahinya, ma ok nyal ng’adoaora, omiyo ne gidok kanyo, to Daudi gi ji mia ang’wen nodhi nyime gilepo.
Eka ne giyudo ja-Misri moro e pap, mi gikelo ir Daudi.  Ne gimiyechiemo, mochamo, kod pi, momodho,
bende ne gimiye ng’owo mong’in, kodsaga ariyo mag mzabibu motwo.  Kosechiemo, chunye noduogo, nikechnosebedo ka ok oyud chiemo, kata pi modho kuom odiechienge adek gotienoadek.
Daudio nopenje ni, "In ng’at ng’a? In jakanye?" Nodwoke ni, "Anja-Misri ma misumba ja-Amalek.  To ruodha noweya, nikech nyocha ayudotuo, ndalo adek mokadho.
Ne wamonjo yo milambo mar piny jo-Kereth, gimar jo-Juda, kod mar jo-Kaleb, kendo ne wawang’o Ziklag gimach. "
Daudi nokone ni, "Diyie itera ir jogo?" Nodwoke niya,"Kuong’rina e nying Nyasaye nu ok ninega, kendo ok nichiwa e lwet ruothma nartiyone, eka dateri ir jogo. "
Kamano notelo ni Daudi gi joge, mi ne giyudo jo-Amalek koke e pap. Jo-Amalekgo ne chiemo kendo metho, ka gimor nikech mwandu mang’eny manegipeyo e piny jo-Filistia, kendo e piny Juda.
Daudi nonegogi chakrerum piny nyaka yuso piny.  Onge ng’ato kata achiel kuomgi ma notony makmana yawuowi mia ang’wen ma noidho ngamia moringo.
Daudi noreso jiduto mane jo-Amalek omako kaachiel gi monde ariyo.
Onge jamoko katajachan, wuowi kata nyako, mane ok oreso.  Nodwoko bende gik moko duto temane jogo opeyo.
To bende nopeyo jambgi duto, mi jogo nosembogi enyime, ka giwacho niya, "Magi gik ma Daudi opeyo. "
Daudi noduogo ir ji mia ariyo mane oweyo aora Besor, ka tekogi orumo,kendo ok nyal luwo bang’e, mi jogo nowuok mondo oromne kaachiel gi jomane ni kode.  Kane gichopo machiegni, ne gimosogi, kendo gipenjogi kakawach obet.
To jomoko maricho, kod joma acheje mane ni kuom joma nodhigi Daudi, nowacho niya, "Jogi ne ok odhi kodwa, omiyo kik wapognigigimoro kuom gik mane ope ma wasereso, mak mana ni ng’ato ka ng’ato mondooyud chiege gi nyithinde, odhigo. "
To Daudi nowacho niya, "Owetena,kik utim kamano kuom gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyowa, nikech en emaoseresowa, kendo ochiwo oganda ma nomonjowano e lwetwa.
Ere ng’amadiyie kodu e wachni? Ooyo, nyaka pog ni joma nodong’, ka rito misike,mana maromre gi joma nodhi e lweny.  Nyaka pognigi maromre. "
Chakrechieng’no nolokore tim jo-Israel nyaka chil kawuono.
Kane Daudi odok Ziklag, nooro gik mope moko ni jodong Juda maosiepene, kowachonigi niya, "Aoronu mich moa kuom gik mwapeyo kuom wasikRuoth Nyasaye. "
Jogo nodak Datir,
gi Aroer, gi Sifmoth, giEshtemoa,
gi miech jo-Jerameel, gi miech jo-Keni,
gi Horma, giBora-shan, gi Athak,
gi Hebron, kod kuonde duto mane Daudi jorawoe gijoge.
SAMUEL
Tho Saulo gi yawuote(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Noyudo jo-Filistia kedo gi jo-Israel, kendo jo-Israel noringo, kinegogie got Gilboa.
Jo-Filistia nojuko Saulo kod yawuote ma Jonathan giAbinadab kod Malkishua, kendo ne ginego yawuotego.
Lweny nohingo Saulo,mi jodir-asere noyude, mochwowe kendo ohinye marach.
Saulo nowacho nijating’ne gi lweny niya, "Wuodh liganglani, inegago, nono to joma kiaNyasayegi biro chwowa, kendo nyiera. " To jalo nodagi, nikech noluorahinya.  Emomiyo Saulo nomako liganglane owuon, mochwoworee.
To kanejating’ne gi lweny oneno ni Saulo osethoo, en bende nochwowore eliganglane, motho gi kanyo.
Kamano, Saulo, kaachiel gi yawuote adek, gijating’ne gi lweny, kod joge duto, notho chieng’no.
Kane jo-Isreal maneodak e holo machielo, kaachiel gi joma nodak loka Jordan, oneno nijolwenj Israel oseringo, kendo ni Saulo gi yawuote josetho, ne gibolomiechgi kanyo, mi gin bende ne giringo.  Bang’e jo-Filistia nobiro, modake miergo.
Kinyne, kane jo-Filistia obiro dedo jomotho, ne giyudo ringre Saulo giringre yawuote adek, koriere e got Gilboa.
Ne ging’ado wiye oko, kendone gikawo gige mag lweny.  Eka ne gioro joote e piny jo-Filistia duto,mondo oter wach maberno ni nyisechegi kod jopinygi.
Ne giketo gikSaulo mag lweny e od nyisechegi mamon, miluongo ni Ashtaroth, kendo negitueyo ringre e kor ohinga mar Bethshan.
To kane jo-Jabesh-gileadowinjo gima jo-Filistia osetimo ni Saulo,
thuondi duto nowuok,mowuotho otieno duto.  Ne gigolo ringre Saulo kod ringre yawuote e ohingamar Bethshan, mi gikelogi Jabesh, kendo ne giwirogi gi gik mang’ue ng’arkanyo.
Eka ne gikawo chokegi, mi giyiko e tiend yath moro man Jabesh,kendo ne gitueyo chiemo ndalo abiriyo.
SAMUEL
Daudi owinjo wach tho Saulo
Kane Daudi oseduogo koa nego jo-Amalek, nonindo Ziklag ndaloariyo.
Chieng’ mar adek ka Saulo osetho, ng’at moro nobiro moa e lwenykoyiecho lepe, kendo obuko wiye buru.  Kane ochopo ir Daudi, nokulorepiny, komiye duong’.
Daudi nopenje niya, "Ia kanye?" Nodwoko ni,"Nyocha apondo aa e kambi lweny mar jo-Israel. "
Daudi nomedo penjeniya, "Ang’o motimore kuno? Wachna. " Nodwoke ni, "Jo-Israel oseringo oae lweny, to thothgi osetho.  Saulo gi Jonathan wuode bende josetho. "
EkaDaudi nomedo penje kendo niya, "Ere kaka ing’eyo gi Saulo gi Jonathanwuode josetho?"

Sam
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. Wuowino nowacho niya, "Noyudo an e gotGilboa, kendo naneno Saulo kosirore gi tong’e, to geche lweny gi joidhfarese lwore machiegni.
To kane ogoyo machiemo, nonena, moluonga. Nadwoke ni, ‘Era e. ’
Eka nopenja ni, ‘In ng’a?’ Nadwoke ni, ‘Anja-Amalek. ’
Eka nowachona niya, ‘Bi ka, inega, nikech an gi rem malit,to pod angima. ’
Omiyo nasudo bute, manege, nikech nang’eyo ni ok onyalbedo mangima, kosehinyore kamano.  Bang’e nakawo osimbo mane ni e wiye,kod ronge mane ni e bade, kendo ekigi. "
Kane Daudi owinjo wachno, noyiecho lepe owuon, kendo ji duto mane nikode bende notimo kamano.
Ne gisedo ka giywago Saulo gi Jonathan wuodekod jo-Ruoth Nyasaye, ma tiende ni jo-Israel.  Bende ne gitueyo chiemonyaka piny oyuso, ka giparo joma otho e lwenygo.
Daudi nopenjo wuowi ma nokelone wachno niya, "In jakanye?" Nodwokeniya.  "An wuod ja-Amalek ma jadak. "
Daudi nowachone ni, "Marang’o neok iluoro tero lweti kuom ruoth mowir ma Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero?"
Ekanoluongo wuowi moro kuom joge mowachone niya, "Bi inege. " Mi jalo nogoyong’atno motho.
Daudi nowacho niya, "Rembi obed e wiyi, nimar dhogiiwuon ema ong’adoni bura, kiwacho ni isenego ruoth mowir ma RuothNyasaye oyiero. "Daudi oywago Saulo gi Jonathan
Daudi nochwogo wend ywak ni Saulo gi Jonathan wuode.
Josh
.
. Nochiko ni mondo jo-Juda opuonjre wendno kendo ondike e kitapJasher, kama:
"A Israel, jou madongo osenegi e godeu!Yaye, joma rateke osepodho.
Kik ihul wachni e Gath. Kik igo milome mare e wang’yore mag Ashkelon,dipo ka mond Filistia obedo mamor. Ee, dipo ka nyi joma kia Nyasayego obedo moil.
Un gode mag Gilboa, kik tho mok kuomu. Un puothe mag kuoyo, kik koth chue kuomu,nikech kuondegoo ema kuodi mag joma rateke odong’ie, ka kethore,kaachiel gii kuod saulo, ma koro ok owir gi mo.
Atung’ Jonathan ne ok duog nono,mak ochuero remo,kata mak ong’olo boche mag joma rateke. Ligangla Saulo bende ne ok duog nono.
Saulo gi Jonathan ne joma oher kendo joma beyo. Ne ok gipogore e ngimagi kata e thogi. E ng’uech, ne giyot kongo. Ne gin rateke moloyo sibuor.
Un nyi Israel, ywaguru Saulo!En ema norwakou gi lewni makwar kendo mabeyo,kendo en ema noketonu dhahabu e lepu.
Yaye! Mano kaka joma rateke osepodho e lweny. Oneg Jonathan e lweny mager. A Jonathan, chunya lit nikech itho.
Ne ageni ahinya,kendo gen ma nigenago ne lich miwuoro. Ne okadho hera ma mon herogo chwogi.
Yaye! Joma rateke osetho,kendo gigi mag lweny olal nono!"SAMUEL
Oket Daudi ruoth Juda
Bang’ wechegi, Daudi nopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach niya,, "Dadhi e dalamoro mar Juda koso?" Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke ni, "Dhiyo!" Daudi nomedopenjo niya, "Ere dala ma dadhiye?" Mi nodwoke ni, "Hebron. "
Sam
.
,
. Omiyo Daudi nodhi kuno, gi monde ariyo, ma Ahinoam nyarJazreel, kod Abigail chi Nabal ja-Karmel.
Nodhi gi joge duto, ng’ato kang’ato gi joode, mi ne gidak Hebron.
Sam
.
-
. Jo-Juda nobiro,mowiro Daudi gi mo, ka gikete ruodh dhood Juda. Kane onyis Daudi ni jo-Jabesh-gilead ema noyiko Saulo,
nooro jooteirgi, kowachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oguedhu, nikech nutimong’wono ni Saulo ruodhu, kuom yike.
Koro Ruoth Nyasaye mondo otimnung’wono gi adiera.  An bende natimnu maber, kuom timo kamano.
Emomiyokoro beduru joma otegno, kendo ma jochir, nikech Saulo ruodhu osetho,kendo dhood Juda osewira abed ruodhgi. "Daudi okedo gi jo-Saulo
To noyudo ka Abner wuod Ner, ma jatend jolweny mag Saulo, osekawoIshbosheth wuod Saulo, motero Mahanaim, loka Jordan.
Nokete ruodhGilead, gi Asher, gi Jezreel, gi Efraim, gi Benjamin, kendo ruodhjo-Israel duto.
Ishbosheth ne jahigni piero ang’wen kane ochako bedoruodh jo-Israel, mi nobedo ruoth kuom higni ariyo.  Dhood Juda to ne luwoDaudi,
kendo Daudi nobedo ruoth kuom higni abiriyo gi dueche auchielkodak Hebron.
Abner wuod Ner, kod joma ne luwo Ishbosheth wuod Saulo, nowuokMahanaim, modhi Gibeon.
Joab wuod Zeruya, kaachiel gi joma ne luwoDaudi bende nowuok Hebron, mi ogendini ariyogi noromo e yawo man Gibeon. Jo-Daudi nobet e bath yawo konchiel, to jo-Ishbosheth nobet e bath yawokomachielo.
Eka Abner nowacho ni Joab niya, "We yawuowi oa malo, mondo otemre enyimwa. " Joab nodwoke ni, "Ara, gitim kamano. "
Omiyo ne gia malo,moyier ji apar gariyo kor Ishbosheth wuod Saulo gi jo-Benjamin, kendo jiapar gariyo kor Daudi.
Eka ne girakore, mi ng’ato ka ng’ato omako wijasike, kohobo ng’etne gi ligangla, mine giruombore piny rat giduto. Omiyo kanyo nochak ni Helketh-hazurim, (tiende ni, Paw Lak Ligangla. )Pawno nie gweng’ Gibeon.
Negruokno nokelo lweny mager chieng’ono,kendo jo-Daudi noloyo Abner gi jo-Israel.
Yawuot Zeruya adek duto ne ni kanyo.  Ne gin Joab gi Abishai kodAsahel.  To Asahel, mane tiende yot ka mwanda,
nolawo Abner, ka okong’i korachwich kata koracham
nyaka Abner nogoyo machiemo, mopenjeniya, "Asahel, mano in?" Asahel nodwoke niya, "Ee, an. "
Abnernowachone niya, "Bar korachwich kata koracham, mondo imak jalweny moro,ipe gige. " To Asahel notamore weyo lawe.
Mi Abner nowachone kendo ni,"Bar mondo iwe lawa, dipo ka agoyi manegi.  To katimo kamano.  To ere kakadachung’ e nyim Joab owadu?"
Kata kamano, Asahel notamore baro.  OmiyoAbner nochwowo bund iye gi kapier tong’, mopowo nyaka ka ng’eye.  Nogorepiny, motho gikanyo.  Kane ji duto ochopo kama Asahel othoe, negichung’.
To Joab gi Abishai nodhi nyime ka lawo Abner, nyaka chiengopodho.  Mano noyudo ka gin e got Ama, kama omanyore gi Gia, e yo madhi ethim Gibea.
Jo-Benjamin nochokore bang’ Abner, kendo ne giriedo ni lweny, kagichung’ ewi got moro.
To Abner nokok ni Joab, kawacho niya, "Ji bironegore nyaka chieng’ koso? Donge ing’eyo ni giko wachni biro bedo marachmoloyo? Nyaka karang’o ma ibiro siko kikwero jogi mondo owe lawojowetegi?"
Joab nodwoke niya, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye ka da ok iwuoyo,da ok giweyo lawo jowetegi nyaka piny oru!"
Eka Joab nogoyo tung’,kendo ji duto nochung’.  Ne giweyo lawo jo-Israel kendo kedo kodgi.
Gotienono duto, Abner gi joge nowuotho e holo mar aora Jordan.  Neging’ado aora Jordan, kendo ne gichopo Mahanaim kar odiechieng’.
KaneJoab oduogo koa lawo Abner, nochoko joge duto kanyakla, monwang’o nijo-Daudi apar gochiko osetho, ka ok okwan Asahel.
To jo-Daudi nosenegoji mia adek kod piero auchiel kuom jo-Benjamin mane luwo Abner.
Negiting’o ringre Asahel, mi giyiko e liend wuon mare, bethlehem.  Bang’eJoab kod joge nowuotho gotienono thole, mochopo Hebron ka piny ru.
SAMUEL
Lweny nodhi nyime e kind dhood Saulo gi dhood Daudi kuom ndalomomedore.  Daudi nomedo locho, to dhood Saulo nomedo dok chien. Yawuot Daudi mane onywol Hebron(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Yawuot Daudi mane onywolo Hebron e magi: Wuode makayo ne Amon, ma minmare ne Ahinoam, nyar Jezreel;
mar ariyo ne Kileab, ma min mare neAbigail, chi Nabal ja-Karmel; mar adek ne Absalom, ma min mare ne Maaka,nyar Talmai, ruodh Geshur;
mar ang’wen ne Adonija, ma min mare neHagith; mar abich ne Shefetia, ma min mare ne Abital;
mar auchiel neIthream, mane wuod chiege ma nyinge Elga.  Jogi duto Daudi nonywoloHebron. Abner ochano timo winjruok gi Daudi
Kane pod lweny dhi nyime e kind dhood Saulo gi dhood Daudi, Abnernomedo yudo duong’ e dhood Saulo.
Ne nitie chi Saulo moro, ma nyingeRizpa, nyar Aya, ma nomiyo Ishbosheth openjo Abner niya, "Marang’oisedonjo e doho wuora, mitero chiege?"
Abner nokecho ahinya nikechwachno, mi nodwoko Ishbosheth niya, "Ikawa ka guo Juda koso? Kinde dutoasebedo jaadiera ni dhood Saulo wuoru, gi owetene kod osiepene, ka okachiwi e lwet Daudi, to koro eka ichwanya kuom wach dhako!
Sam
.
. Nyasaye mondo okweda ka ok atimo ni Daudi kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosingorene,
ni enogol loch kuom dhood Saulo, kendo noket Daudi obedruodh jo-Israel gi jo-Juda, chakre Dan nyaka Beer-sheba!"
Ishboshethne ok nyal dwoko Abner kata wach achiel, nikech noluore.
Abner nooro joote Hebron ir Daudi, kowachone niya, "Tim koda winjruok,mi nakonyi loko jo-Israel duto mondo oduog iri. "
Daudi nodwoke niya,"Ber! Ayie timo kodi winjruok, to mak mana kikelo Mikal nyar Saulo,chieng’ mibiro nena. "
Sam
.
. Bende Daudi nooro joote irIshbosheth wuod Saulo, kowacho niya, "Dwokna Mikal ma chiega, mananywomo gi ringre jo-Filistia mia achiel. "
Mi Ishbosheth nooro joote,mogolo Mikal kuom chwore ma Paltiel wuod Laish.
Chworeno nokowe nyakaBahurim, ka ywak.  To Abner nowachone ni, "Dogi!" Mi nodok.
Abner nowuoyo gi jodong Israel, kowachonigi niya, "Kuom ndalo mokadhousedwaro mondo Daudi obed ruodhu.
Koro keteuru, nikech Ruoth Nyasayeosesingore kuome, ka wacho niya, ‘Gi lwet Daudi anares joga Israel elwet jo-Filistia, kendo e lwet wasikgi duto. ’ "
Abner nowuoyo gijo-Benjamin bende.  Eka nodhi Hebron mondo onyis Daudi gik moko duto manejo-Israel gi jo-Benjamin dwaro timo.
Abner nobiro Hebron ir Daudi, kaachiel gi ji piero ariyo mi Daudinorwakogi gi chiemo.
Bang’e Abner nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Ruoth, koroadok loko jo-Israel duto odogni, mondo gitim kodi singruok, kendo mondoibed ruodh pinywa duto, kaka chunyi dwaro. " Omiyo Daudi nogoyo ni Abneroriti, modhi gi kue. Joab ogeno Abner
To Joab gi jo-Daudi noyudo duogo mana sano.  Ne gia peyo, ka gikelo gikmang’eny mane giyako.  To Abner ne koro osea ir Daudi Hebron, nikechDaudi nosemiye thuolo, modhi gi kue.
Kane Joab gi jolweny mane ni kodeochopo Hebron, nonyise niya, "Abner wuod Ner nobiro ir ruoth, mi ruothoweye odhi gi kue. "
Abner nodhi ir ruoth, mopenje niya, "En ang’omisetimo? Awinjo ni Abner nobiro iri.  Marang’o imiye thuolo mondo odhi,momiyo koro otony?
Donge ing’eyo ni Abner wuod Ner nobiro mana nimondo owuondi, kendo ong’e wuodheni, kod gik mitimo duto?"
Kane Joab osea ir Daudi, nooro joote mondo olaw Abner.  Ne gijuke esoko mar Sira, mi giduoge.  To Daudi ne kia wachno.
Kane Abner oduogoHebron, Joab nobaro kode but rangach, ka gima odwaro wuoyo kodeling’ling’, mi nochwowo bund iye, monege, kochulo kuor nikech rembAsahel owadgi.
Kane Daudi owinjo wachno, nowacho niya, "An, kod joga,waonge bura e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom tho Abner wuod Ner nyakachieng’.
Rembe mondo obed ewi Joab, kendo kuom dhoode duto.  E dhoodJoab nyaka bedie ng’ama rembe chuer, kata ng’ama jadhoho, kata ng’atmodere, kata ng’ama ochando chiemo!"
Kamano e kaka Joab gi Abishaiowadgi nonego Abner, nikech en ema nonego Asahel owadgi Joab gi Abishaie lweny Gibeon.
Daudi nowacho ni Joab gi ji duto mane ni kode niya, "Yiechuru lepu,urwakru gi piende gugru, kendo uywag Abner. " Daudi owuon nodhi e liel kaluwo bang’ Abner.
Ne giyiko Abner Hebron, kendo ruoth noywak gi mirimae liende, mi ji duto bende noywak kode.
Ruoth noywago Abner, kawachoniya:"Yaye Abner! Bende owinjore itho kaka ng’ama ofuwo adier?
Lweti ne ok otue, kata tiendi ne ok omaki gi ratege. To nitho mana kaka ng’ato tho e lwet joma richo!" Bang’e ji duto nomedoywage.
Ne gihoyo Daudi mondo ochiem, to piny ne pod odiechieng’, omiyo Daudinokuong’ore, kawacho niya, "Nyasaye mondo okweda, kapo ni achiemo, kataabilo gimoro ka pok chieng’ opodho. "
Wachno ne long’o ni ji duto manowinjo, mana kaka gik moko duto mane ruoth timo ne long’onigi.
Kamanoji duto nong’eyo chieng’no ni kara, ruoth ne kiya wach nek Abner wuodNer.
Ruoth nowacho ni joge niya, "Donge ung’eyo ni jalweny maduong’ eIsrael ema otho kawuono?.
Kata obedo ni an ruoth kamano, to yawuotZeruyagi otamo wang’a.  Ruoth Nyasaye ema mondo ochul kuor ni ng’ama rachmoromo gi rach mosetimo. "
SAMUEL
Nek mar Ishbosheth
Kane Ishbosheth wuod Saulo owinjo ni oseneg Abner, ka ni Hebron, chunyenoa, kendo jo-Israel duto nobwok.
To Ishbosheth ne nigi jotend monyariyo, achiel ne nyinge Baana, to machielo Rekab.  Ne gin yawuot Rimonja-Beeroth, ma ja-Benjamin,
nimar jo-Beeroth noseringo modhi Gitaim, migibedo jodak kuno nyaka chil kawuono.

Sam
.
. Jonathan wuod saulo ne nigi wuode moro mane tiende ong’ol. Ne en jahigni abich kane wach tho Saulo gi Jonathan okel oa Jezreel, mijapite noting’e moringo kode.  To kane oyudo japidino reto mondo otony,nyathi nogore piny mohinyore, kendo nodoko rang’ol.  Nyinge neMefibosheth.
Rekab kod Baana, ma yawuot Rimon ja-Beeroth, nodhi mochopo e odIshbosheth godiechieng’ ka piny oore, mi giyudo koyueyo chieng’makech.
Dhako ma jarit dhoot noyudo obet ka piedho ngano, to nochakonur nyaka nindo otere, mi Rekab gi Baana owadgi nolidho, modonjo eot.
Kane gichopo e ot mane Ishbosheth nindoe, ne gigoye, motho kendoging’ado wiye oko.  Ne gikawo wiye, mi giwuothogo otieno tulu, ka giluwoyo madhi e holo mar aora Jordan.
Ne gikelo wi Ishbosheth Hebron, niDaudi, mi giwachone niya, "Ruoth, wakeloni wi Ishbosheth wuod Saulo,jasiki, mane dwaro negi.  Tinendeni Ruoth Nyasaye osechuloni kuor kuomSaulo, kendo kuom kothe. "
To Daudi nodwoko Rekab gi Baana owadgi niya,"Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye mosereso ngimana e masiche duto,
Sam
.
-
. kane ng’at moro obiro Ziklag mokona ni Saulo osetho, koparo niokelona wach maber, namake, manege.  Mano e pok ma namiye kuom wach manokelo.
To koro nadi, ka joma richo osenego ng’at makare e ode owuon,kendo mana e kitandane? Donge owinjore achulnu kuor kuom remomusechuero, mondo uae piny?"
Mi Daudi nogolo chik, kendo joge nonego jogo.  Ne ging’adoluetegi kod tiendegi oko, mi giliero e yath but yawo man Hebron.  To wiIshbosheth ne gikawo, mi giyiko Hebron, e liend Abner.

Oket Daudi ruodh Israel(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Dhout Israel duto nobiro Hebron ir Daudi, mi giwachone niya, "Ng’e niwan mana remo achiel kodi.
E ndalo ruodhwa mokadho, kane Saulo podruodhwa, in ema nitelo ni jo-Israel e lwenjegi duto, kendo Ruoth Nyasayenowachoni niya, ‘Inibed jakwadh joga Israel, kendo in ema nibedruodhgi. ’ "
Jodong Israel duto nobiro Hebron ir Daudi, kendo ne gitimo kodesingruok kuno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giwire gi mo mondo obed ruodhjo-Israel.

.
;
W. Nda
.
;
.
. Daudi ne jahigni piero adekka nochako tich ruoth, kendo nobedo ruoth kuom higni pieroang’wen.
Nobedo ruodh jo-Juda kuom higni abiriyo kodak Hebron, kendonobedo ruodh jo-Israel duto kaachiel gi jo-Juda kuom higni piero adekgadek kodak Jerusalem. Daudi okawo dala mar Sayun(

Josh
.
; Bura
.
. Ruoth Daudi nodhi Jerusalem gi joge mondo okedgi jo-Jebus ma weg pinyno.  To jo-Jebusgo ne paro ni Daudi ok nyal donjoe dalagi, omiyo ne giwachone niya, "Ok nidonj ka, nikech kata manamuofni gi rang’onde oromo geng’ou!"
To kata kamano Daudi nokawo Sayun,dala mochiel gi ohinga, ma tinde iluongo ni Dala Daudi.
Chieng’no Daudinowacho niya, "Ng’ama dwaro loyo jo-Jebus, to mondo oidh gi aora motuchogot, kendo oneg rang’onde gi muofni ma chunya osin-go kande. " Manoemomiyo iwacho ni, "Muofni gi rang’onde kik donj e Hekalu. "
Bang’eDaudi nodak e dala mochiel gi ohingano, mi noluonge ni Dala Daudi. Nomedo gero udi moluore, chakre ohinga mar Milo, ka dok ka iye.
Duong’mar Daudi koro nomedore ahinya, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto ne ni kode. Hiram oyie gi loch Daudi(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Hiram ruodh Turo nooro joote ir Daudi gi yiend Sida, kaachiel gi jopabao kod jogedo mag kite, mi jogo nogero ni Daudi ot.
Koro Daudinong’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osekete ruodh Israel, kendo osetego lochneahinya, mondo oguedhgo joge Israel. Yawuot Daudi mane onywol Jerusalem(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
;
.
-
)
Kane Daudi osea Hebron, modhi odak Jerusalem, nomedo mon moko, manonywologo yawuowi gi nyiri
Nying yawuote ma nonywolo Jerusalem emagi: Shamua gi Shobab gi Nathan gi Solomon,
gi Ibhar gi Elishua giNefeg gi Jafia
gi Elishama gi Eliada kod Elifelet. Daudi oloyo jo-Filistia e lweny(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane jo-Filistia owinjo ni osewir Daudi mondo obed ruodh Israel, negibiro kar rombgi mondo gimonje.  To kane Daudi owinjo kamano, nolormodhi e dala mochiel gi ohinga cha.
Kane jo-Filistia ochopo, ne giyaroni lweny e paw holo mar Refaim.
Daudi nopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach niya,"Kadhi kedo gi jo-Filistia, nichiwgi e lweta koso?" Ruoth Nyasayenodwoke niya, "Dhiyo; nachiwgi e lweti. "
Mi Daudi nodhi Baal-perizim,momonjogi, kendo oloyogi.  Eka nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osemwomorekuom wasikwa, mana kaka aora mwomo genge. " Mano emomiyo nochak kanyo niBaal-perizim, (tiende ni, Ruoddh mwomruok. )
Jo-Filistia noringo moweyonyisechegi kanyo, mi Daudi kod joge nokawogi.
Chieng’ machielo jo-Filistia noduogo kendo mochako oyaro ni lweny epaw holo mar Refaim.
Daudi nochako openjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach, mi RuothNyasaye nodwoke niya, "Kik ichomgi tir, to ng’ad yo ka ng’egi mondoimonjgi kama omanyore gi yien maboyo ka.
Kiwinjo mutni ewi yien, kamutni mag ji mawuotho, to ireti, nimar asetelo nyimi, mondo adhi alojolweny mag jo-Filistia. "
Daudi notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike minonego jo-Filistia chakre Geba nyaka Gezer.
SAMUEL
Oket Daudi ruodh Israel(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Dhout Israel duto nobiro Hebron ir Daudi, mi giwachone niya, "Ng’e niwan mana remo achiel kodi.
E ndalo ruodhwa mokadho, kane Saulo podruodhwa, in ema nitelo ni jo-Israel e lwenjegi duto, kendo Ruoth Nyasayenowachoni niya, ‘Inibed jakwadh joga Israel, kendo in ema nibedruodhgi. ’ "
Jodong Israel duto nobiro Hebron ir Daudi, kendo ne gitimo kodesingruok kuno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giwire gi mo mondo obed ruodhjo-Israel.
Ruo
.
;
W. Nda
.
;
.
. Daudi ne jahigni piero adekka nochako tich ruoth, kendo nobedo ruoth kuom higni pieroang’wen.
Nobedo ruodh jo-Juda kuom higni abiriyo kodak Hebron, kendonobedo ruodh jo-Israel duto kaachiel gi jo-Juda kuom higni piero adekgadek kodak Jerusalem. Daudi okawo dala mar Sayun(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Josh
.
; Bura
.
. Ruoth Daudi nodhi Jerusalem gi joge mondo okedgi jo-Jebus ma weg pinyno.  To jo-Jebusgo ne paro ni Daudi ok nyal donjoe dalagi, omiyo ne giwachone niya, "Ok nidonj ka, nikech kata manamuofni gi rang’onde oromo geng’ou!"
To kata kamano Daudi nokawo Sayun,dala mochiel gi ohinga, ma tinde iluongo ni Dala Daudi.
Chieng’no Daudinowacho niya, "Ng’ama dwaro loyo jo-Jebus, to mondo oidh gi aora motuchogot, kendo oneg rang’onde gi muofni ma chunya osin-go kande. " Manoemomiyo iwacho ni, "Muofni gi rang’onde kik donj e Hekalu. "
Bang’eDaudi nodak e dala mochiel gi ohingano, mi noluonge ni Dala Daudi. Nomedo gero udi moluore, chakre ohinga mar Milo, ka dok ka iye.
Duong’mar Daudi koro nomedore ahinya, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto ne ni kode. Hiram oyie gi loch Daudi(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Hiram ruodh Turo nooro joote ir Daudi gi yiend Sida, kaachiel gi jopabao kod jogedo mag kite, mi jogo nogero ni Daudi ot.
Koro Daudinong’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osekete ruodh Israel, kendo osetego lochneahinya, mondo oguedhgo joge Israel. Yawuot Daudi mane onywol Jerusalem(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
;
.
-
)
Kane Daudi osea Hebron, modhi odak Jerusalem, nomedo mon moko, manonywologo yawuowi gi nyiri
Nying yawuote ma nonywolo Jerusalem emagi: Shamua gi Shobab gi Nathan gi Solomon,
gi Ibhar gi Elishua giNefeg gi Jafia
gi Elishama gi Eliada kod Elifelet. Daudi oloyo jo-Filistia e lweny(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane jo-Filistia owinjo ni osewir Daudi mondo obed ruodh Israel, negibiro kar rombgi mondo gimonje.  To kane Daudi owinjo kamano, nolormodhi e dala mochiel gi ohinga cha.
Kane jo-Filistia ochopo, ne giyaroni lweny e paw holo mar Refaim.
Daudi nopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach niya,"Kadhi kedo gi jo-Filistia, nichiwgi e lweta koso?" Ruoth Nyasayenodwoke niya, "Dhiyo; nachiwgi e lweti. "
Mi Daudi nodhi Baal-perizim,momonjogi, kendo oloyogi.  Eka nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osemwomorekuom wasikwa, mana kaka aora mwomo genge. " Mano emomiyo nochak kanyo niBaal-perizim, (tiende ni, Ruoddh mwomruok. )
Jo-Filistia noringo moweyonyisechegi kanyo, mi Daudi kod joge nokawogi.
Chieng’ machielo jo-Filistia noduogo kendo mochako oyaro ni lweny epaw holo mar Refaim.
Daudi nochako openjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach, mi RuothNyasaye nodwoke niya, "Kik ichomgi tir, to ng’ad yo ka ng’egi mondoimonjgi kama omanyore gi yien maboyo ka.
Kiwinjo mutni ewi yien, kamutni mag ji mawuotho, to ireti, nimar asetelo nyimi, mondo adhi alojolweny mag jo-Filistia. "
