SAMUEL
Nyasaye otimo ni Daudi singruok(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane ruoth osechako dak e ode ma nogero, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye omiye kuee kinde gi wasike duto ma nolwore koni gi koni,
nowacho ni Nathanjanabi niya, "Koro an adak e ot moger maber gi yiend sida, to Sanduk marNyasaye odak mana e hema. "
Nathan nodwoko ruoth niya, "Tim dutomidwaro, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ni kodi. "
To gotienono, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Nathan niya,
"Dhiyo, inyisDaudi jatichna ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘In digerna ot ma mondoadagie adier?
Chakre ndalo mane agoloe jo-Israel e piny Misri, nyakachil kawuono, pok adak e ot, to asebet ka adak e hema.
Kuonde duto manawuothoe gi jo-Israel duto, ne ok apenjo achiel kuom jobura ma naketomondo obed jokwadh joga Israel gimomiyo ok gigerona ot mar yiendsida. ’
Bende nyis Daudi ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko duto owachokama: ‘Ne agoli e lek, kuma nikwayoe rombe, mondo ibed jatend jogaIsrael.
Asebet kodi kuonde duto midhiye, kendo asetiekoni wasiki duto. Koro abiro miyo nyingi bedo gi huma maduong’, ka humb joma dongo magpiny,
kendo abiro miyo joga Israel pinygi giwegi.  Anagurgi kuno, kendoginidagie ma ok othaggi kendo, kaka chon,
chakre ndalo mane aketoejobura mondo oritgi, to anamiyi kue e kindi gi wasiki duto.  To bendeawacho ni anaguedh dhoodi mondo osiki.
Zab
.
,
;
.
; Joh
.
;Joote
.
. Kisetho, minindo e liel gi kwereni, to anaket achiel kuomyawuoti kari, kendo anagur lochne obed motegno.
En ema nogerna ot,kendo anager lochne osik nyaka chieng’.
Zab
.
,
;
Kor
.
; Hib
.
. Anabed wuon mare, kendo enobed wuoda, koketho, to anachwade kakawuon nyathi chwado nyathine,
to ok nagol herana kuome, kaka nagolokuom Saulo, ma nariembo mondo oweni thuolo.
Zab
.
,
. Dhoodi gilochni ogur matek e nyima, kendo lochni nosik nyaka chieng’. ’ "
Nathan nonyiso ruoth Daudi weche duto ma nofwenyne,
mi ruoth nodhi enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mobet piny.  Nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, an ng’a,koso dhooda en ang’o momiyo isemiya duong’ ma kama?
To gima isetimonapod in ikwano ka gima tin, nimar bende isewacho ni dhooda nosik kuomndalo mang’eny, kendo isenyisa kaka tienge mabiro nochal.
A RuothNyasaye, ang’o ma damed wachoni, to ing’eya oko gi iye?
Isemiya ng’eyogik madongo misetimogi, mana nikech singruokni, kendo nikech mano emaidwaro.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, in ema iduong’, kendo pok wawinjo ni nitienyasaye moro machal kodi.  Onge nyasaye moro mak mana in.
T. Chik
.
. Ere oganda moro e piny, machalo gi jogi Israel? Bende nitie jopinymoro mane isedhi miwaro e tich misumba, miloko jogi? Ere oganda moro,misetimonigi gik madongo malich, kimiyogo nyingi duong? Koso ere ogandamachielo misereso, kigolo Misri mondo obed jogi iwuon, kendokiriembonigi ogendini mamoko gi nyisechegi mondo oweni thuolo?
Niwalojogi Israel mondo obed jogi nyaka chieng’, kendo in, a Ruoth Nyasaye,ema isedoko Nyasachgi.
To koro, Ruoth Nyasaye, mi singruok misetimonakaachiel gi dhooda obed gi teko nyaka chieng’, mi ichop gimaisewacho.
Nyingi mondo oyud duong’ nyaka chieng’ ka ji wacho niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto en Nyasach Israel. ’ Kamano dhoodanodongi e nyimi,
nimar in, Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto enNyasach Israel, ema isenyisa wach ni ibiro dongo oda.  Kuom mano asebedogi chir mondo alem kama e nyimi.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, in e Nyasaye adier. Wecheni gin adier, kendo isesingorina maber kama.
Emomiyo koro, ARuoth Nyasaye, yie iguedh dhooda mondo osik e nyimi nyaka chieng’.  InRuoth Nyasaye ema isesingori kamano, omiyo dhooda noyud gueth nyakachieng’. "
SAMUEL
Daudi oyaro tong’ pinye(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Bang’e Daudi noloyo jo-Filistia mi gibedo moboch, kendo nomayogiMetheg-ama, dalagi.
Noloyo jo-Moab bende, kendo nochikogi mondo ginindpiny, ka giriedo.  Eka nopogogi gi tol e migepe adek.  Nogolo chik mondooneg migepe ariyo to migawo achiel mondo odong’.  Bang’ mano jo-Moabnobedo e bwo loch Daudi, kendo ne gigolone osuru.
Bende Daudi noloyo Hadadezer wuod Rehob, ma ruodh Zoba, e kinde maneruodhno dhiyo chungoe rapar mar lochne e lweny but aora Yufrate.
Daudinomako joidh farese alufu achiel gi mia abiriyo, kod jolweny moko alufupiero ariyo.  Nong’ado odond farese duto mag geche lweny moweyo manafarese mia achiel.
To kane jo-Aram moa Damaski obiro mondo okonyHadadezer ruodh Zoba, Daudi nonego ji alufu piero ariyo kuomgi.
Noketoaskeche ma jorit e piny jo-Aramgo, mi ne gibedo e bwo lochne, kendo negigolone osuru.  Kuonde duto mane Daudi dhiye, Ruoth Nyasaye ne miyelocho.
Noyako gi lweny mag dhahabu mane jorit Hadadezer oting’o, mokeloJerusalem.
Bende noyako mula mogundho Beta kod Berothai, ma miechHadadezer.
Kane Tou, ruodh Hamath, owinjo ni ruoth Daudi oseloyo lweny magHadadezer,
nooro Joram wuode ire, mondo omose, kendo opake kuom loyoHadadezer, nimar Hadadezer ne jasik Tou.  Joram nokelo gik moko magfedha, gi mag dhahabu, kod mag mula.
Magi bende ruoth Daudi nochiwo niRuoth Nyasaye kaka nosechiwo fedha gi dhahabu ma noseyako
kuom jo Edomgi jo-Moab gi jo-Amon gi jo-Filistia kod jo-Amalek, ma noseloyo.  Gikmoko ma noyako kuom Hadedazer wuod Rehob, ma ruodh Zoba, bende nochiwoni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Zab
. Kamano nying Daudi noyudo huma. Kane Daudi oduogo, nonego jo-Edom alufu apar gaboro e holokado.
Bang’e noketo askeche ma jorit e piny Edom, kendo jo-Edom dutonobet e bwo lochne.  Kuonde duto mane Daudi dhiye, Ruoth Nyasaye ne miyelocho. Jodong Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Daudi nobedo ruodh Israel duto, morito piny gi kue, kong’ado bura kareni joge duto.
Joab wuod Zeruya ne jatend jolweny, to Jehoshafat wuodAhilud ne jachan weche.
Zadok wuod Ahitub, kod Ahimelek wuod Abiatharne jodolo.  Seraya to ne jagoro.
Benaya wuod Jehoyada ne jatendjo-Kereth kod jo-Peleth.  Yawuot Daudi bende ne jodolo.
SAMUEL
Daudi otimo maber ni Mefibosheth

Sam
.
-
. Daudi nopenjo niya, "Dipo kodong’ie ng’at moro ma jadhood Saulo koso, mondo atimne maber, nikech hera mane aherogoJonathan?"
Ne nitie jatich joka Saulo moro ma nyinge Ziba.  Ne giluongemondo obi ir Daudi.  Kane osebiro, ruoth nopenje niya, "In e Ziba koso?"Mi nodwoke niya, "E an, ruoth. "
Sam
.
. Ruoth nomedo penje ni, "Dipokodong’ie ng’at moro ma ja dhood Saulo, mondo atimne maber, kaka Nyasayedwaro?" Ziba nodwoko ruoth niya, "Wuod Jonathan moro pod nitie, matiendene ong’ol"
Ruoth nopenje ni, "En kanye?" Ziba nodwoke niya, "EnLodebar, e od Makir wuod Amiel. "
Omiyo Daudi nooro joote Lodebar, mondooome.
Kamano Mefibosheth wuod Jonathan, ma wuod Saulo nobiro ir Daudi,mogoyo chonge piny nyaka e lowo.  Daudi noluonge niya, "Mefibosheth. " Minodwoke ni, "Antie ruoth. "
Daudi nowachone niya, "Kik iluor, nimarabiro timoni maber nikech hera ma naherogo Jonathan wuoru.  Abiro dwokonipuothe duto mane mag Saulo kwaru, kendo anamiyi chiemopile. "
Mefibosheth nochako okulorene, ka wacho niya, "An aana ni, anng’a, momiyo itimona maber kamano! An machalo guok mothoni?"
Ruoth noluongo Ziba, jatich Saulo, mowachone niya, "Gik moko duto manemag Saulo kod joode, koro amiyo Mefibosheth nyakwar ruodhu.
In kodyawuoti gi wasumbi nyaka upurne puothene, kendo ukelne cham monyakie,mondo jood nyakwar ruodhu oyud chiemo.  Mefibosheth owuon to abiro miyochiemo ndalo duto. "
Ziba nodwoke niya, "Ruoth, abiro timo gik mokoduto michika. " (Noyudo ka Ziba nigi yawuowi apar gabich, kod wasumbinipieri ariyo. ) Kamano Mefibosheth nochiemo e mesa Daudi, kaka achiel kuomyawuot ruoth.
Ne en gi wuode matin, ma nyinge Mika.  Jogo duto ma nodake od Ziba nodoko jotich Mefibosheth.
Mefibosheth nodak Jerusalem,nikech nochiemo ndalo duto e mesa ruoth.  To tiende duto nong’ol.
SAMUEL
Daudi oloyo jo-Amon gi jo-Aram(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Bang’e ruoth Amon notho, mi Hanun wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Daudinowacho niya, "Abiri timo ni Hanun wuod Nahash maber, mana kaka wuonmare notimona maber. " Omiyo nooro joote mondo oduog chuny Hanun kuom thowuon mare.  To kane joote Daudi ochopo e piny jo-Amon,
jotend jo-Amonnowacho ni Hanun ruodhgi niya, "Bende iparo ni Daudi oseoro joge mondoomi wuoru duong’? Ooyo, oseorogi mana ni mondo gicheng dala, eka oyud yomonyalo loyego. "
Kuom mano, Hanun nomako joote Daudi, molielo tikginyakulchiel, kendo ong’ado lepgi nyabathe, chakre nungogi kalor piny;bang’e noriembogi.
Kane onyis Daudi wachno, nooro ji mondo orom nijootego, nikech ne giyudo wichkuot maduong’.  Nowacho mondo gibed Jerikomondi nyaka yie tikgi dongi, eka giduogi.
Jo-Amon noneno ni gisemiyo Daudi ojok kodgi, omiyo ne giholo jolwenyalufu piero ariyo kuom jo-Aram ma Beth-rehob, kod jo-Aram ma Zoba, kendone giwako ruoth Maaka kod joge alufu achiel kaachiel gi jo-Tob alufuapar gariyo.
Kane Daudi owinjo wachno, nooro Joab kod joma rateke duto,mondo oked kodgi.
Jo-Amon nowuok, mi ne giriedo ni lweny e dhorangadala, to jo-Aram ma Zoba, kod ma Rehob, kaachiel gi jo-Tob kod jo-Maakanochanore e pap.
Kane Joab oneno ni lweny olwore, noyiero thuond jo-Israel moko, mochanokochomo jo-Aram,
to jomoko duto modong’ noketo e lwet Abishai owadgi,mi Abishai nochanogi ka gichomo jo-Amon.
Joab nowacho ni Abishai niya,"Kineno ka jo-Aram tek madwaro loya, to nyaka ibi ikonya.  To ka jo-Amondwaro loyi, to nabi akonyi.
Bed gi chir, waked matek ni jowa.  To RuothNyasaye mondo otim gima oneno ni ber. "
Kamano Joab gi joge norado gijo-Aram moriembo.
Kane jo-Amon oneno ni jo-Aram ringo, gin bende negiringo Abishai, mi gidonjo e dalagi.  Eka Joab noweyo kedo kodgi, modokJerusalem.
Kane jo-Aram oneno ni jo-Israel oseloyogi, ne gichokorekanyakla.
Hadadezer nooro joote mondo oluong jo-Amon ma nodak lokaaora Yufrate, mi ne gibiro Helam, ka Shobak jatend oganda lweny marHadadezer otelonigi.
Kane Daudi oyudo wach ni gibiro, nochoko jolwenjIsrael duto kanyakla, mi giidho loka Jordan mondo girad kodgi Helam. Jo-Aram noriedo ni lweny kochomo Daudi gi joge, mi ne girado.
Tojo-Israel noloyogi, mi giringo, kendo Daudi gi joge nonego jogi ma joidhgeche mia abiriyo, kod joidh farese alufu piero ang’wen.  Bende ne gigoyoShobak jatendgi, motho kanyo.
To kane ruodhi duto manie bwo Hadadezeroneno ni jo-Israel oloyogi, ne giywagorenigi, mi gibedo e bwo lochgi. Bang’ mano jo-Aram ne ok ohedhore konyo jo-Amon kendo.
SAMUEL
Daudi gi Bathsheba

W. Nda
.
. E ndalo chakruok oro, mane ruodhi thoro wuokie kadhikedo, Daudi nooro Joab kod askechene owuon, kaachiel gi jolwenj Israelduto, mogoyo jo-Amon asasa kendo ne giluoro dala Raba.  To Daudi nodong’Jerusalem.
Chieng’ moro kar sa ma dhok donjoe, Daudi noa e kitandane, ma noyudooyueyoe, mowuotho ewi tat ode, mi nopo koneno dhako moro ka lwokore.  Neen dhako ma jaber ahinya.
Daudi nopenjo wach dhakono, mi nodwoke ni enBathsheba nyar Elam, ma chi Uria ja-Hiti.
Eka Daudi nooro joote mondooome, to ka nobiro noterore kode.  Bang’e nodok e ode.
Dhakono nomakoich, mi nooro ni Daudi wach, konyise ni en gi ich.
Daudi nooro ni Joab wach niya, "Orna Uria ja-Hiti. " Mi Joab nooro Uriair Daudi.
To kane Uria obiro, Daudi nopenje ka Joab gi jolweny jongima,kendo ni lweny dhi nadi.
Bang’e Daudi nowachone niya, "Dhiyo e odimondo iyue. " Kane Uria owuok e od ruoth, ruoth noorone chiemo moa emesane owuon.
To Uria ne ok odhi e ode, to nonindo mana but ranga dalaruoth, kaachiel gi jorit ruoth.
Kane onyis ruoth ni Uria nyoro ok odhie ode, nopenjo Uria niya, "Donge nyoro ia wuoth? Ang’o momiyo ok idhi eodi?"
To Uria nodwoke niya, "Sandug Muma kod jo-Israel gi jo-Juda odakmana e hembe, kendo Joab ma jatendwa gi jodongi mag lweny bende jojotoko e pap.  Koro ere kaka an dadonj e oda machiem kendo amethi, kendoanind gi chiega? Akuong’ora gi nyingi, ni ok natim kamano!"
Daudinowacho ni Uria niya, "Ri kawuono bende, to kiny nawe mondo idhi. "Kamano Uria noriyo Jerusalem chieng’no.  Kinyne,
Daudi noluonge mondogichiem, mi nohoye mometho nyaka omer.  To kane piny ochido, Uria nowuok,modhi onindo mana kama jorit ruoth ne nitie, to ne ok odhi e ode.
Kinyne gokinyi, Daudi nondiko ni Joab barua, moorogo Uria.
Baruanonondikoe niya, "Ket Uria yo ka nyime, koma lweny gerie moloyo, to unudong’ chien uweye mondo onege. "
Omiyo Joab, ma noyudo lworo dalamoro, noketo Uria kama nong’eyo ni wasigu mager nitie.
Jodalano nowuokmondo oked gi Joab, mi ne ginego jolweny moko, ma kuomgi ne nitieaskeche moko ma jorit Daudi.  Uria bende notho.
Joab nooro ni Daudi jaote mondo onyise weche duto ma kuomlweny.
Nochiko jaoteno niya, "Ang’eyo ni kisetieko nyiso ruoth wecheduto ma kuom lweny,
kamoro mirima dipo komake, mowacho niya, ‘Marang’onusudo machiegni gi dalano kukedo? Donge nung’eyo ni joma ni ewi ohingadichielu gi asere?
Bura
.
. Paruru ane ng’ama nonego Abimelek wuodJerubaal.  Ok mana dhako ema nodiro pong’ rego kuome, gi ewi ohinga marThebez, monege? Ka ung’eyo kamano to ere gimomiyo nusudo machiegni giohinga?’ Kapo ni openji kamano, to iwachne ni Uria ja-Hiti bende otho. "
Jaoteno nodhi monyiso Daudi weche duto mane Joab ochike.  Mi mirimanomako Daudi gi Joab, mowacho niya, "Marang’o nusudo machiegni gi dalanokukedo? Donge nung’eyo ni joma ni ewi ohinga dichielu gi asere? Paruruane ng’ama nonego Abimelek wuod Jerubaal.  Ok mana dhako ema nodiro pong’rego kuome, gi ewi ohinga mar Thebez, monege? Ka ung’eyo kamano to eregimomiyo nusudo machiegni gi ohinga?"
Jaote nodwoko Daudi niya, "Jogonochako loyowa, ni ne giwuoknwa e pap, to ne wariembogi, kwadwokogichien nyaka dhorangagi.
To jo-asere mane ni ewi ohinga nochielojolwenji, kendo jomoko kuom thuondi magi notho.  Uria bendeosetho. "
Kane Daudi owinjo kamano, nodwoko jaote niya, "Wach ni Joabni kik wachno chande, nikech mano e kaka lweny obet.  Kawuono ng’ato tho,kendo kiny en mar ng’ama chielo.  Dhiyo ijiwe kamano, mondo omed manakedo matek gi dalano nyaka olo. "
Kane chi Uria owinjo ni Uria osetho,noywage.
To kane ndalo ywakne orumo, Daudi nooro joote moome, kendonobedo chiege, monywolone wuowi.  To gima ne Daudi otimono ne ok long’oni Ruoth
SAMUEL
Nathan okwero Daudi
Zab
. Ruoth Nyasaye nooro Nathan ir Daudi, kendo ka nobiro ire,nokone niya, "Ji ariyo nodak e dala moro, achiel ne japith, to machielone jachan.
Japith ne nigi jamni gi dhok mogundho,
to jachan ne onge gigimoro, mak mana nyarombo achiel kende, ma noseng’iewo.  Nopidhe kendonodongo e ode kaachiel gi nyithinde, kochamo mana chiembe.  Nometho ekikombene, kendo nonindo e kore, mobedone kaka nyare.
Chieng’ morong’ato nobworo e dala japithno, to japithno ne ok oyie kawo chiayo morokuom jambe owuon mondo oyang’ ni wendono, to nokawo mana nyarombo ng’atma jachan cha, ema noyang’o ni wendone. "
Kane Daudi owinjo wachno,mirima nomake ahinya gi japithno.  Nowacho ni Nathan niya, "Gi nyingRuoth Nyasaye, ng’at mosetimo kamano owinjore gi tho!
Onego ochulnyading’wen kar nyarombono, nikech notimo kamano koonge gi chunye. "
Eka Nathan nowacho ni Daudi niya, "In e ng’atno! Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho kama: ‘Ne ayieri mondo ibed ruodh Israel, kendonaresi e lwet Saulo.
Ne amiyi od ruodhi, kod monde bende obed magi,kendo namiyi dhood Israel gi dhood Juda.  Kata da ni mano pod tin, to daamedi gik moko moloyo mago.
Marang’o nichayo wach Ruoth Nyasaye, mitimogima ok long’one? Isenego Uria ja-Hiti kuom golo chik otho e lwetjo-Amon, kendo isekawo chiege mi obedo chiegi.
Emomiyo koro lweny oknorum e dhoodi, nikech isechaya, kendo isekawo chi Uria ja-Hiti obedochiegi. ’

Sam
.
. "Ruoth Nyasaye omedo wacho niya, ‘Abiro keloni thagruokmowuok mana e odi iwuon.  Nakaw mondi, kendo namigi ng’at moro manakineno, mi noterre kodgi e lela, godiechieng’.
Gima nitimo, nitimoling’ling’, an to anatim gini e nyim jo-Isarel duto, odiechieng’alanga. ’ "
Daudi nowacho ni Nathan niya, "Aseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. " EkaNathan nomedo wachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye bende oseweyoni richoni; korook nitho.
To kata kamano nyathi monywolni biro tho, nikech isechayoRuoth Nyasaye. "
Nathan nodok e dalane.  Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo tuoogoyo nyathi mane chi Uria onywolo ni Daudi, mi nohewore ahinya.
Daudinosayo Nyasaye mondo kik nyathi tho, koriyo kech, kendo konindo piny elowo otieno duto.
Jodong ode ne biro, kendo chung’ bute, ka dwarochunge oa e lowo.  To notamore kendo ne ok oyie mondo ochiemkodgi.
Chieng’ mar abiriyo, nyathi notho, to jodong od Daudi noluoronyise ni nyathi osetho.  Ne giwacho niya, "Kane nyathi pod ngima, newawuoyo gi ruoth, to ne ok owinjwa.  To koro obiro timore nadi ka wanyiseni nyathi osetho?"
To kane Daudi oneno jotichne ka kuodho wach kendgi,nofwenyoo ni kara nyathi osetho.  Omiyo nopenjogi niya, "Kara nyathiosetho?" Ne gidwoke ni, "Ee, osetho. "
To Daudi noa malo mi olwokore, kendo owirore gi mo, moloko lepe.  Ekanodonjo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, molemo.  Bang’e nodok e ode, mokwayo mondookelne chiemo.
Jotichne nopenje niya, "En ang’o mitimoni? Kane nyathipod ngima, nitueyo chiemo, kendo niywak.  To ka koro nyathi osetho, to iamalo, michiemo!"
Nodwokogi niya, "Kane nyathi pod ngima, natueyochiemo kaywak, nikech naparo niya, ‘Ng’ama ong’eyo kata ka Ruoth Nyasayebiro ng’wonona mondo nyathi obed mangima?’
To koro osetho, ere gimadatuene chiemo? Anyalo duoge koso? An ema nadhi ire, to en ok noduogira. "
Daudi nohoyo Bathsheba chiege, modhi ire, kendo noriwore kode, miBathsheba nonywolo wuowi, mochako ni Solomon.  Ruoth Nyasaye noheronyathino.
Kuom mano, nomiyo Nathan janabi owacho ni mondo ochake niJedidia, nikech mano e dwaro mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Tiend nying’no en ni,‘Ng’ama ohero Ruoth Nyasaye’. Daudi okawo Raba, dala jo-Amon(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Joab nokedo gi Raba, dala jo-Amon, mokawo Yap Ruoth.
Eka nooro jooteir Daudi, kowacho niya, "Asekedo gi Raba, kendo asekawo YapRuoth.
Omiyo koro chok joma odong’ duto, ibi ilwor dalano, kendo ikaw,nikech ka ok itimo kamano to dipo ka an ema akawe, mi ji diluonge ginyinga. "
Kuom mano Daudi nochoko oganda lweny duto, modhi Raba.  Nokedogi dalano, mokawo.
Nogolo osimbo ewi Milkom ma nyasach jo-Amon, moyudoni pek mar dhahabu molosego oromo kilo piero ang’wen, kendo kidi manengone tek ochom kuome, mi nosidho osimbono e wiye owuon.  Noyako bendegik mathoth e dalano,
kendo nodaro joma nodakie, moketogi e tichng’ado bao, kod kunyo kite, gi tong’o yien, kod wang’o matafari.  Kamanoe kaka Daudi notimo e miech jo-Amon duto.  Bang’e nodok Jerusalem gi jogoduto.
SAMUEL
Amnon gi Tamar
Absalom wuod Daudi ne nigi nyamin mare moro ma jaber, ma nyinge Tamar,to Amnon wuod Daudi nohere.
Chuny Amnon ne chande ahinya, nyaka nobedomatuo, mana nikech Tamar nyamin mare.  To ne tekne timo kode gimoro,nikech ne en nyako ma pok ong’eyo chwo.
To Amnon ne nigi osiepne moroma rieke ng’eny ahinya, ma nyinge Jonadab, wuod Shimea owadgiDaudi.
Nopenjo Amnon niya, "Wuod ruoth, idhero nadi ndalogi? Dak inyisagimomiyo?" Amnon nodwoke niya, "Ahero Tamar ma nyamin Absalomowadwa. "
Mi Jonadab nowachone niya, "Dhi inind e kitandani, kiwuondorini ituo.  To ka wuoru obiro mondo oneni, to ikwaye niya, ‘Yie mondo Tamarnyamera obi, omiya chiemo.  To iyiene mondo olos chiemono e nyima ka,kaneno, kendo achiem koting’ona chiemo e lwete. ’ "
Kamano Amnon nonindokawuondore ni otuo.  Kane ruoth obiro mondo onene, Amnon nokwaye niya,"Yie mondo Tamar nyamera obi, olosna kek moko e nyima ka, mondo achamkoting’ona e lwete. "
Mi Daudi nooro jaote ir Tamar dala, kowacho niya, "Dhiyo e od Amnonowadu, illosne chiemo. "
Omiyo Tamar nodhi e od Amnon owadgi, moyudekonindo.  Nokawo mogo modwalo, kendo otedogo kek e nyime kanyo.
Ekanokawo nyalaro, motokoe e nyime, to Amnon nodagi chiemo.  Nogolo chik nimondo ji duto owuog oko, mi ne giwuok.
Eka nowacho ni Tamar niya, "Kelchiemo e od nindo koni, mondo acham kiting’ona e lweti. " Tamar nokawokek ma noseloso, mokelo ni Amnon owadgi e od nindo.
To ka nosekelonemondo ocham, Amnon nomake, kawachone niya, "Yie anind kodinyamera!"
En to nokwere ni, "Ooyo owadwa, kik ikuod wiya.  Jo-Israel oktim gima kamano.  Kik itim gima ofuwoni.
Ere kuma dadhi apondie giwichkuot ma kama? To in bende, dikwani kaka achiel kuom joma ofuwo eIsrael.  Asayi, dhi ilos gi ruoth, nikech ok nodagi ni kik ikenda. "
Tokata kamano Amnon nodagi winje.  Nomake moterore kode gi thwon.
To bang’ mano, Amnon nojok kode ahinya, kendo jok mane ojokgo neduong’ moloyo hera ma noherego mokwongo.  Nowachone niya, "A maloidhiyo!"
En to nodwoke ni, "Ooyo owadwa, riemb miriembagoni rachmoloyo gima isetimona. " To Amnon ne ok odewo wechene.
Noluongo wuowimane tiyone, mowachone niya, "Gol nyakoni oko, mondo ilor dhoot. "
Miwuowino nogole oko, moloro dhoot.  Noyudo nyakono orwako law ma bade boyoma nyi ruodhi ma pok okendi ne rwako e ndalogo.
Tamar nobuko wiye gi buru, moyiecho lawe ma bade boyo ma norwako,kendo nodhi koywak, komako wiye.
Absalom owadgi nopenje niya, "Amnonowadu osetimoni gimoro koso? Bed gi kue nyamera, nikech en owadu.  Wachnokik chand chunyi. " To Tamar nodak e od Absalom owadgi, kotamore hore.
Kane ruoth Daudi owinjo wechego duto, iye nowang’ ahinya, to ne okotimo ni Amnon gimoro, nikech ne en wuode makayo, kendomohero.
Absalom bende ne ok owacho ni Amnon kata wach achiel, nimarnosin kode kuom kuodo wi Tamar nyamin mare. Absalom ochulo kuor, moringo
Bang’ higni ariyo, Absalom noluongo yawuot ruoth duto Baal-hazor, manbut Efron, kuma noyudo ong’adoe yie rombe.
Nodhi ir ruoth mowachoneniya, "Ruoth, ing’eyo ni tinde ang’ado yie rombe.  Akwayi ni mondo ibikaachiel gi jogi. "
To ruoth nodwoke niya, "Ooyo wuoda, ok onego wabiwaduto, dipo ka wamiyi ting’ mapek. " Absalom nosaye, to kata kamano neok oyie dhi, to nogoyone mana oriti.
Eka Absalom nowachone niya, "Kaok iyie biro, to we mondo wadhi gi Amnon owadwa. " Ruoth nodwoke niya,"Ere gimomiyo dodhi kodu?"
To Absalom nomienore nyaka oyie ni mondoAmnon gi owetene duto odhi.
Absalom noloso chiemo mathoth, to noyudo osewacho ni jotichne niya,"Ka Amnon osemer, mi awachonu ni, ‘Negeuru,’ to unege.  Kik uluor, nikechan awuon ema achikou.  Beduru gi chir, kuikoru. "
Mi jotich Absalomnotimo ni Amnon mana kaka Absalom nochikogi.  To yawuot ruoth moko dutonoidho kenjegi piyopiyo, moringo.
Kane pod gin e yo, wach nochopo ni Daudi niya, "Absalom osenegoyawuoti duto, ma onge kata achiel modong’. "
Ruoth noa malo, moyiecholepe, kendo norudhore piny e lowo.  Joge duto ma nochung’ bute bendenoyiecho lepgi.
To Jonadab, wuod Shimea ma owadgi Daudi, nowacho niya,"Ruoth, kik ipar ni gisenego yawuoti duto, Amnon kende ema osetho. Absalom nochako ochano wachni chakre chieng’ mane Amnon okuodoe wi Tamarnyamin mare.
Omiyo kik igen wachni, kiparo ni mita yawuoti dutoosetho.  Amnon kende ema osetho,
to Absalom oseringo. "Wuowi ma jarit noting’o wang’e moneno ji mang’eny ka lor e kor got,koluwo yo moa Horonaim.
Jonadab nowacho ni ruoth niya, "Ne! Yawuotibiro.  Ero, en mana kaka awachoni. "
Gikanyono kotieko wuoyo, yawuotruoth nochopo, kendo ne giywak matek.  Eka ruoth, kaachiel gi joge duto,bende noywak malit ahinya.  Daudi noywago wuode kuom ndalo mang’eny.
Sam
.
. To Absalom noringo, modhi ir Talmai wuod Amihud, ma ruodhGeshur,
mobet kuno kuom higni adek.
Bang’e ruoth ne gombo nenoAbsalom, nikech chunye nosea kuom wach tho Amnon.
SAMUEL
Joab otiyo gi rieko mondo Absalom oduogi
Joab wuod Zeruya noneno ni chuny ruoth dwaro Absalom.
Omiyo noorojaote Tekoa, moomone dhako moro mariek kuno.  Joab nowacho ni dhakononiya, "Rwakri gi lep ywak, mondo iwuondri ka ng’ama ywago ng’ama otho. Kik iwirri gi mo, to chal dhako moseywago ng’ama otho kuom ndalomang’eny.
Mi idhi ir ruoth, kendo iwachne weche ma abiro nyisigi. " EkaJoab nopuonje weche modhi wacho.
Kane chi Tekoano obiro ir ruoth, nogoyo chonge piny, nyaka e lowo,komiye duong’ mowacho niya, "Ruoth, konya. "
Ruoth nopenje ni, "Ang’omachandi?" Nodwoke niya, "Ruoth, an chi liel, chwora osetho.
Ne an giyawuowi ariyo, to ne gigore ka kwath, kuma ne onge ng’ato ma thegogi, miachiel ogoyo wadgi.
To koro joodwa duto okayona, kawacho niya, ‘Gol jalmane onego owadgi, mondo wanege kar owadgino. ’ Kuom mano, diginet jachammwandu bende.  Gidwaro lung’o kara duto pep, mak giweyo nying chwora katakothe e piny. "
Ruoth nowacho ni dhakono niya, "Dog dala, abiro ng’adobuchi. "
To dhakono nomedo wachone niya, "Yaye, ruoth! Ketho mondo obedkuoma, kendo kuom joodwa, to in kod lochni ibed ma onge ketho. "
Omiyo ruoth nowachone niya, "Ka ng’ato omedo wachoni gimoro, to keleira, mi ok nochak ochandi kendo!"
Dhakono nomedo wacho niya, "Ruoth,akwayi mondo ikuong’rina e nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi, ni jachulkuor kik med ketho, konego wuoda. " Ruoth nodwoke ni, "Gi nying RuothNyasaye, kata yie wi wuodi achiel ok nolwar piny. "
Eka dhakono nowacho niya, "Asayi ruoth, yie mondo amed wachoni wachachiel kende. " Ruoth nokone ni, "Wachi. "
Dhakono nowacho niya,"King’ado wach wuoda kamano, to imiyo bura loyi in iwuon,, nikech idagiomo jal ma niriembo, mondo oduog dala.  Marang’o iseparo wach ma dikethjo-Nyasayeni?
Waduto wabiro tho, nikech wachalo gi pi mopukore piny,ma ok nyal twom kendo.  Kata kamano, Nyasaye ok dwar mondo ng’ato otho,to oloso wach mondo jal moriemb oduog dala.
A ruoth, asebiro mondoawuo kodi nikech ji miya luoro.  Naparo ni, ‘Awuo gi ruoth, nimar dipo kaotimo gima odwaro.
Ang’eyo ni ruoth biro winjo ywakna, kendo obiroresa e lwet jal ma dwaro tieka kaachiel gi wuoda, ni kik wabed e ogandamar jo-Nyasaye. ’
Sam
.
. Bende naparo niya, ‘Wach ruoth ema nyalomiya kue, nikech ruoth chalo malaika mar Nyasaye mapogo gima ber gi gimarach. ’ Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mondo obed kodi. "
Ruoth nowacho ni dhakono niya, "Kik ipanda gimoro kuom wach madwaropenjini" Dhakono nodwoke ni, "Ruoth, wachi. "
Ruoth nopenje ni, "Joabni kodi e wachni koso?" Nodwoke niya, "Ruoth, akuong’ora gi nyingi nionge ng’at ma nyalo mbalore ni weche misewacho.  Adier, Joab jatichni emanonyisa wechego duto mondo awachni.
Notimo kamano ni mondo gikmosetimore olokre.  Malaika mar Nyasaye ming’eyogo gik moko duto matimoree piny. "
Bang’e ruoth nowacho ni Joab niya, "Koro ayie wachni.  Dhiyo, iomrawera ma Absalom. "
Joab nokulore piny, komiyo ruoth duong’, kendonodende.  Nowacho niya, "Ruoth, tinendeni ang’eyo nii iyie koda, nikechisetimona gima akwayo. "
Mi Joab nodhi Geshur omo Absalom, mokeleJerusalem.
To ruoth nowacho niya, "We mondo odag e ode owuon.  Ok adwarmondo obi e nyima. " Mano omiyo Absalom nodak e ode owuon, ka ok odhi enyim ruoth.
E Israel duto ne onge ng’at man gi chia miwuoro ka Absalom.  Mbala neonge kuome, a wiye nyaka tiende piny.
Nolielo wiye higa ka higa, kaneyie wiye ohinge.  To ka nopimo yie wiyeno, noyudo ni pekne romo kiloariyo.
Absalom nonywolo yawuowi adek gi nyako achiel ma nyinge Tamar. Ne en nyako ma jaber ahinya.
Absalom nodak Jerusalem kuom higni ariyo mangima, ka ok odhi e nyimruoth.
Eka noluongo Joab mondo oor irr ruoth, to Joab nodagi biro ire. Noluonge kendo, to Joab ne pod odagi.
Omiyo Absalom nowacho nijotichne niya.  "Donge ung’eyo puoth Joab mar cham, mokiewo gi puotha?Dhiuru uwang’e gi mach. " Mi ne gidhi mi giwang’o puodhono.
Eka Joabnodhi ir Absalom e ode, mopenje niya, "Marang’o jotichni owang’opuotha?"
Absalom nodwoke ni, "Naoroni wach kaluongi mondo aori irruoth, ipenje gimomiyo nooma Geshur.  Dobedona maber moloyo ka da pod ankuno.  Emomiyo koro adwaro neno ruoth, kendo ka oneno rach moro kuoma, tomondo onega. "
Kane Joab odhi ir ruoth, monyise wachno, ruoth noluongoAbsalom, mobiro ire.  Absalom nokulore piny e nyime, mi ruoth nomose kanyodhe.
SAMUEL
Absalom ong’anyo ni Daudi
Bang’ mano, Absalom nong’iewo gari gi farese, kendo ne en gi ji pieroabich mane telo nyime.
Nothoro chiew gokinyi mang’ich, kendo chung’ edir yo mochomo dhoranga Jerusalem.  Ka noneno ng’at man gi wach moro kadhi ir ruoth mondo ong’ad buche, to noluongo ng’atno kendo openje kumaoaye.  Kane ng’atno onyise dhood Israel moaye,
to Absalom ne wachoneniya, "Aneno ni wecheni beyo, kendo adier, to mak mana ni onge ng’at maruoth oseketo mondo oyal buche ma kamagi. "
Bende nomedo wacho niya,"Yaye! Mad keta jang’ad bura e pinyni! Eka ng’ato ka ng’ato man gi wachkata ywak nyalo biro ira, kendo dang’adne bura kare. "
Pile kane ng’atoobiro ire, kendo okulorene ka miye duong’, Absalom ne rieyo lwete kamose, kendo ka nyodhe.
Notimo kamano ni jo-Israel duto mane biro nimondo ruoth Daudi ong’adnigi bura.  Mano e kaka Absalom noywayo chunyjo-Israel.
Bang’ higni ang’wen, Absalom nowacho ni ruoth niya, "Yiena adhi Hebron,mondo achop singruok mane asingora ni Ruoth Nyasaye,
nikech kane adakGeshur e piny Aram, nasingora ni ka Ruoth Nyasaye oduoga Jerusalem, tonalame Hebron. "
Ruoth noyiene, mi Absalom nodhi Hebron.
To Absalomnooro joote ni dhout Israel duto ling’ling’, kowacho niya, "Ka uwinjotung’, to ukog ni, ‘Absalom e ruodh Hebron’ "
Absalom noluongojo-Israel mia ariyo mondo odhi kode Hebron, mi jogo nodhi ka chunygiler, kendo ka kiya gima Absalom ochano.
Kane Absalom timo misango,nooro wach Gilo, moluongne Ahitofel ja-Gilo, ma jang’ad rieko ni Daudi. Kamano ji mane ong’anyo ka dok ni Absalom nomedore.
Kane Daudi oyudo wach ni jo-Israel osedok ni Absalom,
nowacho nijoge duto mane ni kode Jerusalem niya, "Wuoguru, waringuru, nimar ka okwatimo kamano, to ok wabi tony mak Absalom ojukowa.  Wuoguru aruya, dipokong’ukowa, moloyowa, kendo onego jo dala ka duto. "
Jotend lwenynodwoko ruoth niya, "Ruoth waikore timo gimoro amora miwacho. "
OmiyoRuoth nowuok kaachiel gi joode duto, mak mana monde apar moko ema noweyomondo orit ode.
Kamano nowuok kaachiel gi joge duto, mi gichung’ butot matung’.
Eka jolwenje duto kod jo-Kereth gi jo-Peleth duto, kodjo-Giti mia auchiel ma nobiro kode koa Gath, nokadho e nyime.
To ruoth nopenjo Itai ja-Giti niya, "Marang’o in bende idhi kodwa?Dogi ibed gi ruoth manyien, nikech in ng’ama wendo ma noriembi, moweyodalagi.
Yandi eka ibiro, ere kaka dwawuoth kodi kamoro amora, to anakia kuma adhiye? Emomiyo dogi, kaachiel gi jowadu.  Ruoth Nyasaye mondooguedhi, kendo onyisi herane mosiko. "
To Itai nodwoko ruoth niya, "Ginying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gi nyingi iwuon, kamoro amora midhiye, kanyoema an bende nabedie, kata e tho, kata e ngima. "
Omiyo Daudi nowachoneniya, "Ara, dhi nyime. " Mi Itai ja-Giti nokadho, kaachiel gi jogeduto.
Jopinyno duto noywak ka ji kadho.  To ruoth nochung’ e aoraKidron, ka ji duto kadho nyime, kochiko yo thim.
Abiathar gi Zadok bende nobiro, kaachiel gi jo-Lawi duto koting’oSandug Muma mar Nyasaye.  Ne giyieyo Sanduk mar Nyasaye piny nyaka jiduto mane wuok Jerusalem okadho.
Eka ruoth nowacho ni Zadok niya,"Dwok Sanduk mar Nyasaye Jerusalem.  Kapo ni Ruoth Nyasaye okecha, toenoduoga, mi anane Sanduk kod kar dakne kendo.
To ka Ruoth Nyasayeowacho ni ok an ng’at malong’o e nyime, to era e, mondo otimna gimaohero. "
Ruoth nomedo wacho ni Zadok jadolo niya, "Koro doguru dala gikue, in gi Ahimaaz wuodi, kod Abiathar gi Jonathan wuode.
To an abirobet kama iyorogo aora e thim, nyaka ayud wach moa kuomi. "
Omiyo Zadokgi Abiathar ne jodwoko Sanduk mar Nyasaye Jerusalem, mi gimedo dak kuno.
To Daudi noidho got Zeituni ka ywak, koumo wiye, kendo ka en gi tiendenono.  Ji duto mane ni kode bende noidho got koumo wigi, kendo kaywak.
Nonyis Daudi ni Ahithofel en achiel kuom joma odok ni Absalom,mi nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, asayi, lok rieko mar Ahithofel mondoobed mana fuwo!"
Kane Daudi ochopo ewi got, kama nilamoe Nyasaye, Hushai ja-Arki nobiroromone, koyiecho lawe, kendo obuko wiye buru,
Daudi nowachone niya,"Kwadhi kodi, to dimedna mana ting’.
Omiyo in dog Jerusalem, mondoiwach ni Absalom ni initine kaka nitiyo ni wuon mare e ndalo mokadho. Kitimo kamano to inikethna rieko Ahithofel.
Un gi Zadok gi Abiathar majadolo kuno.  Wach moro amora miwinjo e od ruoth to inyisjodologo.
Ahimaaz wuod Zadok, kod Jonathan wuod Abiathar bende nikodgi kuno.  Gin ema mondo iorgi gikelna weche duto miwinjo. "
Kuom manoHushai ma osiep Daudi nodok, modonjo Jerusalem mana e sa mane Absalombende ochopoe kuno.
SAMUEL

Sam
.
,
. Noyudo Daudi oselor matin koa ewi got, eka Ziba jatichMefibosheth noromone, ka nigi kenje ariyo moting’o makati mia ariyo, gitombo mia achiel mag olemb mzabibu motwo, kod olembe moko mia achiel gidivai e ndede mar pien.
Ruoth nopenjo Ziba niya, "Marang’o ikelo gigi?"Ziba nodwoke niya, "Akelo kenje mondo jood ruoth oidhi, kendo makati giolembe mondo jolweny ocham, to divai mondo joma nong’no ohewo e thimomadhi. "
Sam
.
-
. Ruoth nomedo penje ni, "To wuod ruodhi nikanye?" Ziba nodwoke niya, "Odong’ Jerusalem, nikech nowacho ni,‘Tinende jo-Israel biro dwokona loch wuora. ’ "
Eka ruoth nowacho niZiba niya, "Gik moko duto mag Mefibosheth koro amiyi. " Ziba nodwoke ni,"Erokamano ruoth.  Mad isik kigena kamano. "
Kane Daudi ochopo Bahurim, ng’at moro ma nyinge Shimei wuod Gera, ma jadhood Saulo, nowuok, mokuong’e alanda.
Nobayo Daudi gi joge duto gikite, kata obedo ni jolweny duto, kaachiel gi thwondi nolworo ruoth konigi koni.
Weche mane Shimei okuong’o e magi: "Aye, in dhand remo, ng’amaachach!
Ruoth Nyasaye osechuloni kuor, nikech nichuero remb joka Saulo,ma nikawo lochne.  Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo Absalom wuodi loch.  Koro masiraosenwang’i, nimar in dhand remo. "
Abishai wuod Zeruya nowacho ni ruoth niya, "Marang’o iweyo guok mothonikuong’i? Yiena mondo adhi ang’ad wiye oko. "
To ruoth nowacho niya,"Ang’o ma chandou koda, un yawuot Zeruya? We mondo okuong’a akuong’a.  KaRuoth Nyasaye ema ochike mondo okuong’a to onge ng’ama nyalo penjegimomiyo otimo kamano. "
Eka nomedo wacho ni Abishai kod joge dutoniya, "Uneno ka wuoda manywolo ema dwaro nega.  To ka kamano, koroja-Benjaminni to didwar nega machal nadi! Weye okuong’a akuong’a kamano,nikech ruoth Nyasaye ema osechike.
Dipo nono ka Ruoth Nyasaye onenochandruokna, motimona ber kar kuong’ mikuong’agono. "
Daudi gi jogenodhi nyime gi wuodhgi, to Shimei ne wuotho e kor got komanyore giDaudi, kokuong’e kendo obaye gi kite, kendo oguetho.
Daudi gi jogeduto nochopo e aora Jordan kool mi ne giyueyo kanyo.
To Absalom gi jo-Israel duto nodonjo Jerusalem kaachiel giAhithofel.
Hushai ja-Arki ma osiep Daudi nosudo ir Absalom, mowachoneniya, "Ruoth, mondo idag aming’a!"
Absalom to nopenje niya, "Ma e kakainyisogo ni ihero Daudi osiepni? Marang’o ne ok idhi kode?"
Hushainodwoke niya, "Ooyo, ng’at ma Ruoth Nyasaye kod oganda man kae, gijo-Israel duto oyiero ema an ng’ate, kendo anasikgo.
Ere ng’ama chielokendo ma datine, mak mana wuod ruoth? Kaka natiyo ni wuoru e kaka inbende natini. "
Absalom nowacho ni Ahithofel niya, "Ng’adnwae rieko; ere gima onegowatim?"
Ahithofel nodwoke ni, "Dhi iriwri gi mond wuoru, ma noweyomondo oritne dala.  Bang’e jo-Israel duto biro winjo ni isetimo timmakuero momiyo wuoru ojok kodi.  Mano biro jiwo chuny jogo duto maluwi. "
Sam
.
,
. Jo-Absalom nieyie gi wachno mi ne giguro niAbsalom hema ewi ot malo, kendo Absalom nodonjo, moriwore gi mond wuonmare, mana ka jo-Israel duto neno.
E ndalogo rieko mane Ahithofelng’ado ne chalo mana gi rieko mane ng’ato yudo kopenjo Nyasaye wach. Daudi kod Absalom bende ne kwano rieko mar Ahithofel kamano.
SAMUEL
Rieko mar Hushai oloyo rieko mar Ahithofel
Ahithofel nowacho ni Absalom niya, "Yiena ayier ji alufu apar gariyo,mondo alawgo Daudi gotienoni.
Abiro juke kool, kendo ka chunyeonyosore, mi anamiye kihondko maduong’, kendo ji duto man kode noringi. To naneg mana ruoth kende,
eka anadwok ji duto iri, ka dhako midwoko irchwore.  Kinego ng’at achiel kende to ji duto nobed gi kue. "
Wachno neber ni Absalom gi jodong Israel duto.
To kata kamano, Absalom nowachoniya, "Luong Hushai ja-Arki, mondo wawinj wachne bende. "
Kane Hushai obiro ir Absalom, Absalom nonyise rieko mane Ahithofeloseng’ado, nopenje niya, "Dwatim gima owachono koso? Ka ok kamano, to inmondo ing’adnwa rieko. "
Hushai nodwoko Absalom niya, "Rieko maAhithofel ong’adono kawuono ok ber.
Ing’eyo ni wuoru gi joge gin jomarateke, kendo koro giger mana ka ondiek moma nyithinde.  To bende wuoruen jalweny mariek; Ang’ nonind mana kar kende, mopogore gi joge.
Katasani, koro osepondo e bugo moro kata kamoro machielo.  Omiyo ka jowa mokooneg mana e chakruok lweny, to ng’ato ang’ata mowinjo biro wacho nimasira osemako joma luwo Absalom.
Mi kata ng’at ma jachir, kendo magerka sibuor, nokirni, nikech jo-Israel duto ong’eyo ni wuoru en thwon,kendo joma ni kode jochir.
An to ang’ado rieko ni mondo ichokjo-Israel duto kanyakla, chakre Dan nyaka Beer-sheba, joma thoth kakuoyo ma e dhonam.  Kendo in iwuon itelnigi e lweny.
Kamano wanajukekamoro amora ma entie.  Wanamwomre kuome, kendo wanamok kuome ka thomomoko e lum.  Wananege, kendo onge ng’at achiel kuom joge duto manotony.
Kata kapo ni odonjo e dala moro, to jo-Israel duto nokeltonde, mi giniywa udi duto ma e dalano nyaka aora, ma kata kidi matin oknodong’ kanyo. "
Mi Absalom gi jo-Israel duto nowacho niya, "Rieko marHushai ja-Arki ber moloyo rieko mar Ahithofel. " To mano notimore nikechRuoth Nyasaye nosechano mondo okel masira ni Absalom, komiyo rieko marAhithofel bedo kayiem nono.
Eka Hushai nonyiso Zadok gi Abiathar ma jadolo rieko mane Ahithofelong’ado ni Absalom gi jodong Israel, kod rieko mane en owuonong’ado.
Bang’e nomedo wacho niya, "Koro oruru wach piyo, kunyisoDaudi ni, gotienoni kik obwor kar yoro aora manie thim, to oidh lokapiyo, nimar dipo ka onege gi joge duto. "
Noyudo Jonathan gi Ahimaaz jobet En-rogel ka rito wach, nikech ne okowinjore mondo gidonj Jerusalem, nimar dipo ka ng’ato onegogi.  To nyakomoro ma jatich ema ne dhi En-rogel pile nyisogi gik matimore, eka negitero ni Daudi wach.
To kata kamano rawera moro nonenogi, monyisoAbsalom.  Omiyo ji ariyogo nowuok ayuka, modhi e dala ng’at moro Bahurim. Ne gidonjo e soko ng’atno mane ni e laru.
Chi ng’atno nokawo par,moumogo dho soko, eka nomoyoe cham nondo kik gimoro nen.
Kane jotichAbsalom ochopo e dalano, ne gipenjo dhakono niya, "Ere Ahimaaz giJonathan?" Dhakono nodwpokogi niya, "Giseidho loka aora. " Jotich Absalomnodwarogi, to ne gitamogi nwang’o, mi gidok Jerusalem.
Kane gisedhi, ji ariyogo nowuok e soko, motero ni Daudi wach niya, "Amalo, ing’ad aora piyo nimar Ahithofel oseng’ado rieko maditieki!"
Omiyo Daudi kod joge nong’ado aora Jordan, mi kane piny oru,ne onge kata ng’at achiel mane pok ong’ado aora.
Kane Ahithofel oneno ni Absalom ok oluwo rieko ma nong’adone, noidhokanje, modok thurgi nyaka dalane.  Nolamo gige ni joode, mi nodere,motho.  Ne giyike but wuon mare. Daudi odak Mahanaim
Kane Absalom gi jo-Israel duto oidho loka aora Jordan, noyudo ka Daudiosechopo Mahanaim.
Absalom noseketo Amasa mondo obed jatend jolwenykar Joab.  Amasa ne wuod ja-Ishmael ma nyinge Ithra, ma nokendo Abigailnyar Nahash, ma nyamin Zeruya ma min Joab.
Absalom gi jo-Israel nojote piny Gilead.
Kane Daudi ochopo Mahanaim, Shobi wuod Nahash, ja-Amon ma Raba, giMakir wuod Amiel ja-Lodebar, kod Barzilai ja-Gilead ma Rogelim, nejobiro ire.
Ne gikelo kitendni, gi tewni gi agulni, kod ngano ghishairi gi mogo gi chamb aloida gi oganda gi ng’or,
kod mor kich gichak mopoto, gi rombe, kod mo mabuo, mondo Daudi gi joge ocham, nimar neging’eyo ni midenyo gi riyo koro omakogi e thim, kendo giol.
SAMUEL
Tho mar Absalom
Daudi nochano joma ne ni kode, kendo noyieronigi jotelo madongo gimatindo.
Nopogo jolweny e migepe adek.  Migawo achiel noketo e bwo Joab,to moro e bwo Abishai wuod Zeruya, omin Joab, kendo mar adek e bwo Itaija-Giti.  Nowacho ni jolweny niya, "An bende adhi kodu e lweny. "
Tojolweny nodwoke ni, "Ok didhi kodwa, nikech wan kata kapo ni waringo,kata kapo ni ginegowa mathoth, to mano ok gimoro.  To in iromri gi jialufu apar kuomwa.  Emomiyo owinjore idong’ mondo ikonywa gi ka. "
Miruoth nowachonigi niya, "Abiro timo gima uneno ni ber. " Omiyo nochung’but rangach ka oganda lweny wuok, kochanore e migepe matindo gimadongo.
Ruoth nochiko Joab gi Abishai kod Itai niya, "Akwayou ni kikuhiny rawera ma Absalom. " Jolweny duto nowinjo ka ruoth chiko jotelo nikik gihiny Absalom.
Kamano oganda lweny mar Daudi nowuok kedo gi jo-Isarel, kendo lwenynorado e bungu mar Efraim.
Jo-Daudi noloyo jo-Isarel, kendoo ji mathothma dirom alufu piero ariyo notho chieng’no.
Lweny nolandore, mokwakopinyno duto, mi chieng’no joma ne otho e bungu ne ng’eny moloyo magomane jolweny onego.
Absalom nopo koromo gi jolwenj Daudi.  Noyudo oseidho kanyna, to kanekanyna kadho e tiend yath maduong’ ma bedene okar, wi Absalom nomoko ebad yadhno, mi nodong’ koliero kanyo e kor muya, to kanje nodhiadhiya.
Ng’at moro noneno Absalom, mowacho ni Joab niya, "A nenoAbsalom koliero e yath. "
Joab nopenjo ng’atno niya, "Ka inene adier,marang’o ne ok ichwowe mondo otho gi kanyono? Da amiyi fedha apar, giokanda maber. "
To ng’atno nodwoko Joab niya, "Kata da ni imiya fedhagana e lweta, to ok dater lweta kuom wuod ruoth, nimar ne wawinjo karuoth chiki kaachiel gi Abishai kod Itai niya, ‘Akayou ni kik uhinyrawera ma Absalom’.
Ka da ahinye, ruoth dowinjo, nikech onge wachmanyalo mung’ore ni ruoth, to in ok diresa!"
Joab nowachone niya, "Anok anyal galora kodi kamano. " Mi nokawo aserni adek, modhi ochielogoAbsalom mane pod oliero e yath ka ngima.
Eka yawuowi apar ma joting’ni Joab gi lweny nolworo Absalom, mogoye nyaka otho.
Bang’e Joab nogoyo tung’, kokwerogo jolweny ni kik gimed lawojo-Israel.
Jolweny noduogo mokawo ringre Absalom, mi gibolo e bugomatut mane ni e bungu, kendo ne gidhuro kuome kite mang’eny, molokorepith maduong’.  To jo-Israel duto noringo nyaka miechgi.
Kane Absalom pod ngima, noyudo osechungo siro e holo mar Ruoth, mondoobedne ka rapar.  Nowacho niya, "Aonge gi wuowi ma dichung wiya kasetho. "Omiyo nochako sirono nyinge owuon, kendo pod iluonge ni Rapar marAbsalom nyaka chil kawuono.
Ahimaaz wuod Zadok nowacho niya, "We aring ater ni ruoth wach maberkaka Ruoth Nyasaye oserese e lwet wasike. "
To Joab nodwoke ni,"Kawuono ok niter wach, nimar wach maditer kawuono ok en wach maber,nikech wuod ruoth osetho.  Ibiro tero wach chieng’ machielo. "
Eka Joabnowacho ni misumba moro ma ja-Kush niya, "Dhiyo inyis ruoth gimaiseneno. " Ja-Kushno nokulore ni Joab, momako ng’uech.
To Ahimaaz wuodZadok nochako okwayo Joab niya, "Ok adewo gima biro timorena.  Akwayi,yiena aring aluw ja-Kush. " Joab nopenje niya, "Wuoda, marang’o idwa dhi,to onge gima ibiro yudo kuom oteni?"
Ahimaaz nodwoke niya, "Kata danadi, to nyaka aring adhi. " Omiyo Joab noyiene mondo oring odhi.  MiAhimaaz noringo, koluwo yor paw aora Jordan moyombo ja-Kush.
Noyudo Daudi obedo e kind dhorangach maoko gi maiye, kendo jarit ne niewi dhoranga ohinga.  Kane jaritno oting’o wang’e, noneno ng’at man kendeka ringo.
Omiyo noluongo ruoth, monyiso wach.  Ruoth nodwoke niya, "Kang’at achiel ema biro, to okelo wach maber. " Jalo noringo piyo, to kanochopo machiegni,
jarit noneno ng’at machielo ka ringo biro.  Noluongojoma ne nie dhorangach, kokok niya, "Aneno ng’at machielo ka ringo birokende. " Ruoth nodwoko niya, "En bende okelo wach maber. "
Jarit nomedowacho niya, "Jal motelo ringo ka Ahimaaz wuod Zadok. " Ruoth noko ni,"Ahimaaz ng’at malong’o, kendo ageno ni okelo wach maber. "
Ahimaaz nochopo, moting’o dwonde, kowacho ni ruoth niya, "Wach ber. "Bang’e nokulore piny ni ruoth, mowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachiduong’, mosechiwo joma nopiem kodi e lweti. "
Ruoth nopenje niya, "Torawera ma Absalom ngima koso?" Ahimaaz nodwoke niya, "Kane Joab oora,nawinjo mahu maduong’, to ne ok ang’eyo gima otimore. "
Ruoth nowachoneni, "Sudi ichung’ ka. " Mi nosudo.
Eka ja-Kush bende nochopo, mowacho niya, "Ruoth akeloni wach maber,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye oseresi e lwet joma nopiem kodi. "
Ruoth nopenjeniya, "Rawera ma Absalom ngima koso?" Ja-Kush nodwoke niya, "Mad wasikiduto, kod joma piem kodi ka dwaro hinyi, bed mana kaka wuowino koroobedo. "
Ruoth nobwok ahinya, moidho e ot mane ni ewi dhorangach,koywak kama: "Yaye, Absalom wuoda, wuoda! Yaye, Absalom wuoda, mad anema atho kari, Absalom wuoda, wuoda!"
SAMUEL
Nonyis Joab ni ruoth ywak malit nikech Absalom,
kendo mor marodiechieng’no nolokore mana ywak kuom jolweny duto, kane giwinjo niruoth okuyo nikech wuode.
Chieng’ono jolweny nodok Mahanaim ka lidhomana kaka joma olo e lweny dwogo alucha ka wigi okuot.
Noyudo ruothogeng’o wang’e kendo ywak gi dwol maduong’ niya, "Yaye Absalom wuoda!Absalom wuoda, wuoda!"
To Joab nodonjo ei ot ir ruoth, mowachone niya, "Kawuono jogi oseresongimani, kaachiel gi ngima yawuoti gi nyigi kod mondi, to ikuodowigi,
nikech ihero jogo mochayi, to ichayo jogo moheri.  Tinendeniisemiyo ji ong’eyo ni ok ikwan jotend lweny gi jolwenji ka gimoro, nimaraneno ni kada Absalom bed mangima kawuono, to wan duto watho, to dibedomamor!
Omiyo wuogi, iho chuny jogi, nikech an gi adiera e nying RuothNyasaye ni ka ok itimo kamano, to onge kata ng’at achiel ma ang’ nobedkodi otienoni, kendo mano dibedni masira maduong’ moloyo masiche dutomiseneno nyaka ia e nyathi. "
Mi ruoth nowuok mobet e kome e dhorangach,kendo kane onyis ji ni ruoth obet kanyo, ne gibiro e nyime giduto. To noyudo ka jo-Israel oseringo. Daudi oduogo Jerusalem
Koko maduong’ ne nitie e dhout Israel duto, ka ji penjore niya, "RuothDaudi noresowa e lwet wasikwa, kendo e lwet jo-Filistia, to korooseringo oa e pinywa nikech Absalom nopiem kode.
To Absalom manewawiro mondo obed ruodhwa koro osetho e lweny.  Marang’o waling’ aling’ama ok wachan kaka wanyalo duogo ruoth?"
Ruoth nowinjo wach jo-Israel, omiyo nooro wach ni Zadok gi Abiathar majadolo, kowachonigi ni mondo gipenj jodong Juda niya, "Marang’o un emadubi achien kuom dwoka e dala?
Un e jowetena, kendo un e remba. Marang’o un ema dudong’ achien kuom dwoka e dala?
Wachuru ni Amasabende ni, ‘Donge ing’eyo ni in kod an wan remo achiel? Nyasaye mondookweda ka ok aketi jatend jolweny kar Joab. ’ "
Kamano noloko chuny jo-Juda duto, mi ne gibet gi chuny achiel, kendone giorone wach niya, "Duogi kaachiel gi jogi duto. "
Omiyo ruothnoduogo nyaka aora Jordan, monwang’o ka jo-Juda osechokore Gilgal mondooromne, kendo okele loka Jordan.

Sam
.
-
. Shimei wuod Gera, ja-Benjamin ma Bahurim, nobiropiyopiyo kod jo-Juda mondo orom ni ruoth Daudi.
Jo-Benjamin alufuachiel bende nobiro kode.  Ziba jatich joka Saulo kod yawuote apar gabichgi wasumbni piero ariyo, noreto, mokwongo ni ruoth chopo Jordan,
mondogikonye ng’ado aora gi joode, kendo gitimne gimoro amora modwaro.  Kaneruoth oikore ng’ado aora, Shimei wuod Gera nogoyo chonge piny,mokulorene nyaka e lowo,
kowacho niya, "Ruoth, kik ikwana ka jaketho,kata paro tim achach ma natimo chieng’ ma niwuok Jerusalem cha.  Kik ikanwachno e chunyi,
nikech ayie ni aseketho, emomiyo an e ng’at mokuongokuom dhood Josef mobiro romoni kawuono. "
Abishai wuod Zeruya nowachoniya, "Donge owinjore Shimei tho kuom kuong’o ruoth mowir ma RuothNyasaye oyiero?"
To Daudi nodwoke niya, "Ang’o machandou koda, unyawuot Zeruya, momiyo udoko wasika tinendeni? Uparo ni bende dinegng’ato e Israel kawuono adier? To kawuono eka ang’eyo ni kare an ruodhIsrael!"
Mi nosingore ni Shimei, kowacho niya, "Ok nonegi. "

Sam
.
-
;
.
-
. Mefibosheth nyakwar Saulo nobiro romo ni ruoth. To ne pok olwoko tiende, kata golo yie tike, kata mana lwoko lepe chakrechieng’ mane ruoth owuokie, nyaka chieng’ mane oduogoe koselocho.
KaneMefibosheth ochopo koa Jerusalem, mondo orom ni ruoth, ruoth nopenjeniya, "Mefibosheth, marang’o ne ok idhi koda?"
En to nodwoke niya,"Ruoth, jatichna nowuonda.  Kaka ing’eyo ni an rang’ol, nadwaro gawokanyna mondo aidh adhi kodi,
to jatichnano nothuwa kodi, omiyo naluorobiro.  To ruoth ichalo kaka malaika mar Nyasaye, emomiyo tim gima inenoni ber,
nikech joodwa duto nowinjore gi tho e lweti, to kata kamanoniyiera mondo abed achiel kuom joma chiemo kodi.  Koro ere gima chielo madamed kwayi?"
Ruoth nowachone niya, "Asewinjo wachni, kendo koro anenoni mondo upogru gi Ziba mwandu mane amiye. "
To Mefibosheth nowacho niruoth niya, "Ruoth, kaka koro iseduogo gi kue, we mondo Ziba okawgiduto. "

Sam
.
-
. Barzilai ja-Gilead bende nosebiro koa Rogelim, kokoworuoth nyaka aora Jordan.
Ne en ng’at moti ahinya, ma jahigni pieroaboro.  En ema nokonyo ruoth gi chiemo, e kinde mane ruoth ni Mahanaim,nikech ne en jamoko.
Ruoth nowachone niya, "Bi wadhi kodi loka cha,kendo anapidhi, kidak koda Jerusalem. "
To Barzilai nodwoke ni, "Ruoth,an ng’at moseti.  Ere kaka dadhi kodi Jerusalem?
Koro an jahigni pieroaboro.  Iparo ni pod nitie gimoro manyalo miya mor? Koso awinjon dhathgima achamo kata mar gima amadho? Iparo ni wende chwo kata wende mon podnyalo miya ilo? Ooyo ruoth, ok owinjore amedni ting’ kayiem.
Eregimomiyo dimiya pok ma kama? Abiro ng’ado kodi aora Jordankende,
bang’e iyiena adog dalana, mondo oyika kuma liend wuora gi mamanitie.  To Kimham wuoda eri.  Yie mondo idhi kode, kendo irite kakaidwaro. "
Ruoth noyiene, ka dwoke niya, "Kara, Kimham nyalo dhi koda. Anatimne kaka idwaro, kendo gimoro amora midwaro kuoma, anatimni. "
Jiduto nong’ado aora Jordan, to ruoth nodong’, ka goyo ni Barzilai oriti. Nonyodhe kendo oguedhe, eka Barzilai nodok dalane.
Bang’e ruothnong’ado aora, modhi nyaka Gilgal, ka jo-Juda duto kowe, kaachiel gijo-Israel moko.  Kimham bende nodhi kode.
Eka jo-Israel duto nobiro ir ruoth, mi gipenje niya, "Marang’o owetewama jo-Juda okawi ling’ling’ kendo okowi loka Jordan kaachiel gi joodi gijolwenji duto?"
To jo-Juda duto nodwoko jo-Israel niya, "Ne watimokamano nikech wan wat ruoth machiegni moloyo.  Marang’o iu wang’ giwachni? Bende uwinjo ni ruoth osemiyowa gimoro wachamo? Koso uparo niosemiyowa mich moro?"
Jo-Israel nodwoko jo-Juda kendo niya, "Wandhoudi apar e piny Daudi, omiyo owinjore wabed kode moloyo un! Marang’oujarowa? Donge wan ema ne wakwongo paro wach duogo ruoth?" To katakamano weche jo-Juda ne ger moloyo weche jo-Israel.
SAMUEL
Nonyis Joab ni ruoth ywak malit nikech Absalom,
kendo mor marodiechieng’no nolokore mana ywak kuom jolweny duto, kane giwinjo niruoth okuyo nikech wuode.
Chieng’ono jolweny nodok Mahanaim ka lidhomana kaka joma olo e lweny dwogo alucha ka wigi okuot.
Noyudo ruothogeng’o wang’e kendo ywak gi dwol maduong’ niya, "Yaye Absalom wuoda!Absalom wuoda, wuoda!"
To Joab nodonjo ei ot ir ruoth, mowachone niya, "Kawuono jogi oseresongimani, kaachiel gi ngima yawuoti gi nyigi kod mondi, to ikuodowigi,
nikech ihero jogo mochayi, to ichayo jogo moheri.  Tinendeniisemiyo ji ong’eyo ni ok ikwan jotend lweny gi jolwenji ka gimoro, nimaraneno ni kada Absalom bed mangima kawuono, to wan duto watho, to dibedomamor!
Omiyo wuogi, iho chuny jogi, nikech an gi adiera e nying RuothNyasaye ni ka ok itimo kamano, to onge kata ng’at achiel ma ang’ nobedkodi otienoni, kendo mano dibedni masira maduong’ moloyo masiche dutomiseneno nyaka ia e nyathi. "

Koko maduong’ ne nitie e dhout Israel duto, ka ji penjore niya, "RuothDaudi noresowa e lwet wasikwa, kendo e lwet jo-Filistia, to korooseringo oa e pinywa nikech Absalom nopiem kode.
To Absalom manewawiro mondo obed ruodhwa koro osetho e lweny.  Marang’o waling’ aling’ama ok wachan kaka wanyalo duogo ruoth?"
Ruoth nowinjo wach jo-Israel, omiyo nooro wach ni Zadok gi Abiathar majadolo, kowachonigi ni mondo gipenj jodong Juda niya, "Marang’o un emadubi achien kuom dwoka e dala?
Un e jowetena, kendo un e remba. Marang’o un ema dudong’ achien kuom dwoka e dala?
Wachuru ni Amasabende ni, ‘Donge ing’eyo ni in kod an wan remo achiel? Nyasaye mondookweda ka ok aketi jatend jolweny kar Joab. ’ "
Kamano noloko chuny jo-Juda duto, mi ne gibet gi chuny achiel, kendone giorone wach niya, "Duogi kaachiel gi jogi duto. "

. Shimei wuod Gera, ja-Benjamin ma Bahurim, nobiropiyopiyo kod jo-Juda mondo orom ni ruoth Daudi.
Jo-Benjamin alufuachiel bende nobiro kode.  Ziba jatich joka Saulo kod yawuote apar gabichgi wasumbni piero ariyo, noreto, mokwongo ni ruoth chopo Jordan,
mondogikonye ng’ado aora gi joode, kendo gitimne gimoro amora modwaro.  Kaneruoth oikore ng’ado aora, Shimei wuod Gera nogoyo chonge piny,mokulorene nyaka e lowo,
kowacho niya, "Ruoth, kik ikwana ka jaketho,kata paro tim achach ma natimo chieng’ ma niwuok Jerusalem cha.  Kik ikanwachno e chunyi,
nikech ayie ni aseketho, emomiyo an e ng’at mokuongokuom dhood Josef mobiro romoni kawuono. "
Abishai wuod Zeruya nowachoniya, "Donge owinjore Shimei tho kuom kuong’o ruoth mowir ma RuothNyasaye oyiero?"
To Daudi nodwoke niya, "Ang’o machandou koda, unyawuot Zeruya, momiyo udoko wasika tinendeni? Uparo ni bende dinegng’ato e Israel kawuono adier? To kawuono eka ang’eyo ni kare an ruodhIsrael!"
Mi nosingore ni Shimei, kowacho niya, "Ok nonegi. "

Sam
.
-
;
.
-
. Mefibosheth nyakwar Saulo nobiro romo ni ruoth. To ne pok olwoko tiende, kata golo yie tike, kata mana lwoko lepe chakrechieng’ mane ruoth owuokie, nyaka chieng’ mane oduogoe koselocho.
KaneMefibosheth ochopo koa Jerusalem, mondo orom ni ruoth, ruoth nopenjeniya, "Mefibosheth, marang’o ne ok idhi koda?"
En to nodwoke niya,"Ruoth, jatichna nowuonda.  Kaka ing’eyo ni an rang’ol, nadwaro gawokanyna mondo aidh adhi kodi,
to jatichnano nothuwa kodi, omiyo naluorobiro.  To ruoth ichalo kaka malaika mar Nyasaye, emomiyo tim gima inenoni ber,
nikech joodwa duto nowinjore gi tho e lweti, to kata kamanoniyiera mondo abed achiel kuom joma chiemo kodi.  Koro ere gima chielo madamed kwayi?"
Ruoth nowachone niya, "Asewinjo wachni, kendo koro anenoni mondo upogru gi Ziba mwandu mane amiye. "
To Mefibosheth nowacho niruoth niya, "Ruoth, kaka koro iseduogo gi kue, we mondo Ziba okawgiduto. "

Sam
.
-
. Barzilai ja-Gilead bende nosebiro koa Rogelim, kokoworuoth nyaka aora Jordan.
Ne en ng’at moti ahinya, ma jahigni pieroaboro.  En ema nokonyo ruoth gi chiemo, e kinde mane ruoth ni Mahanaim,nikech ne en jamoko.
Ruoth nowachone niya, "Bi wadhi kodi loka cha,kendo anapidhi, kidak koda Jerusalem. "
To Barzilai nodwoke ni, "Ruoth,an ng’at moseti.  Ere kaka dadhi kodi Jerusalem?
Koro an jahigni pieroaboro.  Iparo ni pod nitie gimoro manyalo miya mor? Koso awinjon dhathgima achamo kata mar gima amadho? Iparo ni wende chwo kata wende mon podnyalo miya ilo? Ooyo ruoth, ok owinjore amedni ting’ kayiem.
Eregimomiyo dimiya pok ma kama? Abiro ng’ado kodi aora Jordankende,
bang’e iyiena adog dalana, mondo oyika kuma liend wuora gi mamanitie.  To Kimham wuoda eri.  Yie mondo idhi kode, kendo irite kakaidwaro. "
Ruoth noyiene, ka dwoke niya, "Kara, Kimham nyalo dhi koda. Anatimne kaka idwaro, kendo gimoro amora midwaro kuoma, anatimni. "
Jiduto nong’ado aora Jordan, to ruoth nodong’, ka goyo ni Barzilai oriti. Nonyodhe kendo oguedhe, eka Barzilai nodok dalane.
Bang’e ruothnong’ado aora, modhi nyaka Gilgal, ka jo-Juda duto kowe, kaachiel gijo-Israel moko.  Kimham bende nodhi kode.
Eka jo-Israel duto nobiro ir ruoth, mi gipenje niya, "Marang’o owetewama jo-Juda okawi ling’ling’ kendo okowi loka Jordan kaachiel gi joodi gijolwenji duto?"
To jo-Juda duto nodwoko jo-Israel niya, "Ne watimokamano nikech wan wat ruoth machiegni moloyo.  Marang’o iu wang’ giwachni? Bende uwinjo ni ruoth osemiyowa gimoro wachamo? Koso uparo niosemiyowa mich moro?"
Jo-Israel nodwoko jo-Juda kendo niya, "Wandhoudi apar e piny Daudi, omiyo owinjore wabed kode moloyo un! Marang’oujarowa? Donge wan ema ne wakwongo paro wach duogo ruoth?" To katakamano weche jo-Juda ne ger moloyo weche jo-Israel.
SAMUEL
Nonyis Joab ni ruoth ywak malit nikech Absalom,
kendo mor marodiechieng’no nolokore mana ywak kuom jolweny duto, kane giwinjo niruoth okuyo nikech wuode.
Chieng’ono jolweny nodok Mahanaim ka lidhomana kaka joma olo e lweny dwogo alucha ka wigi okuot.
Noyudo ruothogeng’o wang’e kendo ywak gi dwol maduong’ niya, "Yaye Absalom wuoda!Absalom wuoda, wuoda!"
To Joab nodonjo ei ot ir ruoth, mowachone niya, "Kawuono jogi oseresongimani, kaachiel gi ngima yawuoti gi nyigi kod mondi, to ikuodowigi,
nikech ihero jogo mochayi, to ichayo jogo moheri.  Tinendeniisemiyo ji ong’eyo ni ok ikwan jotend lweny gi jolwenji ka gimoro, nimaraneno ni kada Absalom bed mangima kawuono, to wan duto watho, to dibedomamor!
Omiyo wuogi, iho chuny jogi, nikech an gi adiera e nying RuothNyasaye ni ka ok itimo kamano, to onge kata ng’at achiel ma ang’ nobedkodi otienoni, kendo mano dibedni masira maduong’ moloyo masiche dutomiseneno nyaka ia e nyathi. "
Mi ruoth nowuok mobet e kome e dhorangach,kendo kane onyis ji ni ruoth obet kanyo, ne gibiro e nyime giduto. To noyudo ka jo-Israel oseringo. Daudi oduogo Jerusalem
Koko maduong’ ne nitie e dhout Israel duto, ka ji penjore niya, "RuothDaudi noresowa e lwet wasikwa, kendo e lwet jo-Filistia, to korooseringo oa e pinywa nikech Absalom nopiem kode.
To Absalom manewawiro mondo obed ruodhwa koro osetho e lweny.  Marang’o waling’ aling’ama ok wachan kaka wanyalo duogo ruoth?"
Ruoth nowinjo wach jo-Israel, omiyo nooro wach ni Zadok gi Abiathar majadolo, kowachonigi ni mondo gipenj jodong Juda niya, "Marang’o un emadubi achien kuom dwoka e dala?
Un e jowetena, kendo un e remba. Marang’o un ema dudong’ achien kuom dwoka e dala?
Wachuru ni Amasabende ni, ‘Donge ing’eyo ni in kod an wan remo achiel? Nyasaye mondookweda ka ok aketi jatend jolweny kar Joab. ’ "
Kamano noloko chuny jo-Juda duto, mi ne gibet gi chuny achiel, kendone giorone wach niya, "Duogi kaachiel gi jogi duto. "
Omiyo ruothnoduogo nyaka aora Jordan, monwang’o ka jo-Juda osechokore Gilgal mondooromne, kendo okele loka Jordan.

Sam
.

SAMUEL
Sheba ong’anyo

Ruo
.
;
W. Nda
.
. To ne nitie ja-Benjamin moro kanyo maachach, ma nyinge Sheba wuod Bikri.  Nogoyo tung’ kowacho niya,"Waonge wat gi Daudi!Ok wan libamba achiel gi wuod Jesse. Wan jo-Israel, wadoguru dala. "
Omiyo jo-Israel duto noweyo Daudi kendo ne giluwo Sheba wuod Bikri.  Tojo-Juda nomedo kowo ruodhgi gi chuny achiel, ka gia Jordan nyakaJerusalem.

Sam
.
. Kane Daudi ochopo e ode Jerusalem, nokawo monde apar manoweyo ka rito dala, mi noketogi e ot moro machielo, kama ne gibedokiritogie.  Nomiyogi chiemo, to ne ok oriwore kodgi kendo.  Kamanonoloronigi nyaka chieng’ thogi, ka gidak mana ka mond liete.
Daudi nonyiso Amasa niya, "Chok jo-Juda duto kanyakla, ibigo ira kapokndalo adek orumo. "
Mi Amasa nodhi choko jo-Juda.  To nodeko, mi kinde manomiye okadho.
Eka Daudi nowacho ni Abishai niya, "Koro Sheba wuodBikri biro hinyowa moloyo Absalom.  Omiyo, dhiyo gi jolwenja, ilawe,nimar dipo ka odonjo e mier mochiel gohinga, kendo dotony moa elweta. "
Abishai nowuok Jerusalem, kotelo ni Joab gi jo-Kereth gijo-Peleth, kod thwondi duto, mondo gilaw Sheba wuod Bikri.
Kane gichopoe lwanda maduong’ man Gibeon, ne gipo ka giromo gi Amasa.  Noyudo ka Joaborwakore gi lep lweny, ka en gi ligangla ei olalo, moliero e okanda maneotueyo e nungone.  Nosudo machiegni, kopando gima odwaro timo.
NomosoAmasa, kopenje niya, "In nadi, omera?" Eka nomako yie tik Amasa gi lwetema korachwich mondo onyodhe.
To Amasa ne ok odewo ligangla mane ni elwet Joab.  Gikanyono Joab nochwowo bund iye dichiel mak onwoyo, mi jambiye noo piny, motho. Eka Joab gi Abishai owadgi nomedo lawo Sheba wuod Bikri.
To ng’atachiel kuom jolwenj Joab nochung’ but ringre Amasa, kawacho niya, "Jiduto moyie Joab, kendo modok kor Daudi, mondo oluw bang’ Joab. "
Toringre Amasa noriere e dier yo, kochadhore gi remo, kendo ji duto maneluwo yorno ne chung’ ka ng’iye.  Kane ng’atno oneno ni ji chung’ kanyo,nogolo ringre Amasa oko e yo, moketo tenge, kendo nobolo lawkuome.
Kane osegole e yo, ji duto noluwo bang’ Joab, ka gilawo Shebawuod Bikri.
Sheba nolimo dhout Israel duto nyaka nochopo Abel-beth-maaka, kendojo-Bikri duto nochokore ire, modonjo kode e dalano.
Bang’e Joab nobirogi joge duto, mi gilawo Sheba e Abel-beth-maaka.  Ne gigingo pithmaduong’ but dala, eka ne gichako kunyo ohinga mondo osienyre.
Todhako moro mariek mane nie dalano, nokok matek niya, "Uwinjo! NyisuruJoab obi ka, mondo alos kode. "
Joab nosudo machiegni mi dhakononopenje ni, "In e Joab?" Nodwoko ni, "E an. " Eka dhakono nowachone niya,"Ruoth winj wechena. " Joab nodwoke ni, "Wachi. "
Mi dhakono nowachoneniya, "E ndalo machon ji ne biro Abel mondo ong’adnigie rieko.  Kamano negiwacho weche mathagogi.
Dalawani en achiel kuom mier mabeyo kendomokue moloyo e Israel, to koro in idwaro ketho dala maduong’ kama eIsrael.  Marang’o idwaro ketho jo-Ruoth Nyasaye?"
Joab nodwoke niya,"Ooyo, ok adwar tiekogi kata ketho gimoro!
Ok en kamano, to ng’at moromiluongo ni Sheba wuod Bikri, modak e piny gode mag Efraim, ema osepiemgi ruoth Daudi.  Omiyo goluru mana ng’atno kende, eka abiro weyo dalani. "Dhakono nowacho ni Joab niya, "Ber! Wabiro dironi wiye gi ewiohinga. "
Eka dhakono nodhi ir jodalano duto, moloso kodgi gi rieko.  Mine ging’ado wi Sheba wuod Bikri, kendo gidiro ni Joab.  Omiyo Joab nogoyotung’, kendo joge noweyo dalano, modok miechgi.  To Joab nodok Jerusalemir ruoth. Jotend Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Koro Joab ne jatend jolweny duto, to Benaya wuod Jehoyada ne jatendjolweny mowuok ma jo-Kereth gi jo-Peleth.
Adoram ne jarit joma nichunogi thwon mondo oti.  To Jehoshafat wuod Ahilud ne jachan weche.
Shevane jagoro, kendo Zadok gi Abiathar ne jodolo.
To Ira ja-Jair bende nejadolo mar Daudi.
SAMUEL
Jo-Gibeon ochulo kuor
E ndalo Daudi ne nitie kech kuom higni adek, omiyo Daudi nopenjo RuothNyasaye wach gimomiyo kejno obiro.  Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Ketho nikuom Saulo kod joodgi, nikech nochuero remb jo-Gibeon. "
Josh
.
-
. Kuom mano ruoth noluongo jo-Gibeon ire.  (Jo-Gibeon ne ok ginjo-Israel to ne gin jo-Amor ma nodong’ mae jo-Isarel otimogo winjruok. Kata kamano Saulo ne dwaro negogi, nikech nodwaro ni mondo jo-Israel gijo-Juda ogurre motegno. )
Daudi nopenjo jo-Gibeon niya, "Ere gima anyalotimonu? Ere kaka dagol richono, mondo umi hawi oduog ni jo-RuothNyasaye?"
To jo-Gibeon nodwoke niya, "Wach manie kindwa gi Saulo kodjoodgi ok en wach ma ditiek gi fedha kata dhahabu.  Bende waonge gi tekomar nego ja-Israel moro. " Daudi nopenjogi kendo niya, "To ere gimaudwaro mondo atimnu?"
Ne gidwoke ni, "We mondo watiek nying jal manohinyowa, ka dwaro tiekowa ni kik wadag e piny Israel.
Miwa yawuoteabiriyo mondo waneg e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye Gibea, dala Saulo, ruoth maneRuoth Nyasaye oyiero. " Daudi noyie, mochiwogi.
Sam
.
-
;
Sam
.
-
. To ne ok ochiwo Mefibosheth wuod Jonathan ma wuod Saulo, nikechsingruok ma notimo gi Jonathan e nying Ruoth Nyasaye.
Sam
.
. Tonokawo mana Armoni gi Mefibosheth, yawuowi ariyo mane Rizpa nyar Ayaonywolo ni Saulo, kod yawuowi abich mane Merab nyar saulo onywolo niAdriel wuod Barzilai ja-Mehola.
Jogo ema ne ruoth ochiwo ni jo-Gibeon,mi jo-Gibeon nonegogi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye e got.  Ji abiriyogo dutonotho kaachiel e ndalo keyo mar atamalo mar shairi.
Rizpa nyar Aya nopedho pien gugru ewi lwanda, mobedoe, chakre ndalokeyo, nyaka koth nochue, kendo notamo winy godiechieng’, kod ondiegigotieno, mondo kik cham ringre jogo.
Kane onyis Daudi gima Rizpa nyarAya ma chi Saulo otimo,
Sam
.
-
. nodhi mokawo choke Saulo kodchoke Jonathan wuod Saulo kuomm jo-Jabesh-gilead.  Noyudojo-Jabesh-gilead osekawogi ling’ling’ e paw dala mar Bethshan, kamajo-Filistia nolierogie bang’ nego Saulo Gilboa.
Daudi noomo chokeSaulo kod choke Jonathan wuode kanyo, kendo noketogi kaachiel gi chokejoma oneg kande.
Ne gikawo choke Saulo gi mag Jonathan wuode, kaachielgi mag joma noneg, mi giyiko Zeba e piny Benjamin, e liend Kish wuonSaulo.  Ne gitimo duto mane ruoth ochiko, kendo bang’ mano, Nyasayenokecho pinygi. Abishai oreso Daudi e lwet thwon marabet
Kinde moro jo-Filistia nochako omonjo jo-Israel, mi Daudi gi jolwenjenodhi mojot Gob.  Ne gikedo gi jo-Filistia, nyaka Daudi nodoko mool.
Nenitie ja-Refaim moro mathwon, ma pek tong’e ne dirom kilo adek.  Noting’oligangla manyien, kendo noparo ni doneg Daudi.
Ruo
.
; Zab
.
. To Abishai wuod Zeruya nobiro monego ja-Filistiano, mi Daudiotony.  Bang’e jolwenj Daudi nosayo Daudi niya, "Kik ichak idhi kodwa elweny, nimar dipo ka chieng’ moro onegi, to in ema ibedonwa ka taya eIsrael. "Joma rabede mane jo-Daudi onego(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Bang’ mano, lweny nochako owuok e kind jo-Israel gi jo-Filistia, mi negikedo Gob.  E lwenjno Sibekai ja-Husha nonegoe Saf ma ja-Refaim.
Lweny nowuok kendo e kind jo-Israel gi jo-Filistia e Gob.  Mi Elhananwuod Jair ma ja-Bethlehem nonego Goliath ja-Giti, ma bond tong’e nechalo lodi.
Lweny nochako owuok e Gath, kama ne nitie ng’at magana marabora man gi lith lwedo auchiel gi lith tielo auchiel koni gi koni. Lith luetene gi mag tiendene duto koriw ne romo piero ariyo gang’wen. Jalo bende ne ja-Refaim.
To ka nothiano ni jo-Israel, Jonathan wuodShimea owadgi Daudi nonege.
Ji ang’wen-go duto ne jo-Refaim ma ogandajoma rabede, to Daudi gi joge nonegogi duto.
SAMUEL
Wend Daudi mane opakogo Nyasaye kuom rese(Zaburi
.
-
)
Kane Daudi oneno ni Ruoth Nyasaye oserese e lwet Saulo kendo e lwetwasike duto, nopake gi wer kama:
"A Ruoth Nyasaye, in elwandana, kendo ohingana.
Nyasacha, in e jaresna,gi lwandana ma ageng’orae. In e okumbana,gi teko mar resruokna. In e ohinganagi kar geng’ruokna, kendo jawarnain ema iresakuom masiche mager.
Akwayo Ruoth Nyasayemowinjore oyud pak,kendo ma resa kuom wasika.
Tho notaga ka apakakodwaro tera kaka ohula.
Tonde mag liel nodhoga. Tho ne dwaro maka kobadho.
Kane anie chandruok,nakwayo Ruoth Nyasaye. Ee, naywak ni Nyasacha. Nowinjo dwonda gie hekalu mare,kendo ywakna nochopo e ite.
Piny notetni, kendo oyiengni. Mise mag polo bende notetnikendo okirni,nikech mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye
Iro nodum ka wuok e ume,kendo mach mang’angni bende nowuok e dhoge.
Nosudo polo machiegni,eka nolor,konyono rumbi molil ti.
Ne oidho kerubi,mi ohuyogo ka kalausi.
Nokawo mudho kod boche polomorweyo gi koth maduong’,moloko ka hembe.
Ler motelo e nyime nomoko mach motimo ligega.
Dwond Ruoth Nyasaye nomor. Ee, Ng’ama Duong’ Moloyo nomor gie polo.
Nodiro mor polo ka aserni,kokworogi koni gi koni.
Kane Ruoth Nyasaye okudho ka yamb nyakoi,kendo okwerogi,mise mag piny noelorekendo kude mag nam nofwenyore.
Norieyo bade ka en malo, mi omaka,kogola e ataro-ngala.
Ne oresa e lwet wasika maratekekendo kuom ji duto mosin koda,mane oloya gi teko.
Ne gimonja ka anie masira, tto Ruoth Nyasaye ema nokonya.
Ne ogola e chandruok,mi abedo thuolo. Noresa nikech nomor koda.
Ruoth Nyasaye ne opoga pokmowinjore gi timna makare. Nochula moromo gi tichna maler,
nikech naluwo yorenekendo ok asepogora kod Nyasacha,kadonjo e richo.
Aserito chikene duto,ma onge kata achiel ma apogorago.
Aonge gi ketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasayekendo aseritora kuom richo.
Omiyo osemiya pokmowinjore gi timna makare,kendo mowinjore gi tim malong’o e nyime.
In Ruoth Nyasaye, in jaadiera ni ji mohero adiera,kendo ilong’o ni joma long’o.
Iler ni joma ler,to wiyi tek ni joma wigi tek.
Ireso joma muol,to josunga idwoko piny.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, in e tacha. In e Nyasacha ma menyona mudho.
Imiyo aloyo oganda lwenja,kendo in e Nyasachama konya kalo ohinga.
Yor Nyasaye en yo malong’oOsenon wach Ruoth Nyasaye,moyud ni en adier. Ruoth Nyasaye e okumbamar joma ogeno kuome.
Ere Nyasaye moro,mak mana Ruoth Nyasachwa?Koso ere lwanda moro,mak mana Nyasachwani?
Nyasayeni e kar pondona motegno,osemiyo yorena bedo thuolokendo moboch.
Hab
.
. En ema omiyo tienda bedo mayot ka tiend mwanda,kendo oresa,koketa malo kama oting’ore.
Ojiwo bada ni lweny,mi onyalo ywayokata mana atung’ mar mula.
In Ruoth Nyasaye,isekelona resruokmobedona okumba,kendo konyni ema nomiyoabedo gi duong’
Ne imiya yo malach mondo awuothiemi ne ok akier
Nalawo wasika,mi atiekogi,kendo ne ok aduogo dalaka pok girumo.
Nagoyogi ngoga,mi atiekogi!Ne giriere piny e tienda,ma ok ginyal chung’.
Nimiya teko mar kedo,kendo mar loyo wasika.
Ne imiyo wasika oringami atiekogi
Ne girango koni gi koni,to onge ng’amaa ne nyalo resogi. Ne giywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye,to ne ok oduokogi.
Ne aregogi mayom,mana ka buru ma yamo tero,mi anyonogi ka chuodho.
Ne iresa kuom joma piem koda,kendo niketa jatelo mar ogendini,mi ji mane pok ang’eyo notiyona.
Joma oa e pinje mamokone biro ira kobolore. Kane giwinjo humba,to ne giyie lochna mana gikanyono.
Chunygi nool,mi ne giwuok ka gitetni,kuma ne gipondoe.
Ruoth Nyasaye nitieEn e lwandana! Pakeuru!Ee, odend nying Nyasacha,ma lwanda mar resruokna.
En Nyasayemane omiya teko mar chulo kuor,koketo ogendini e bwo lochna,
Kendo kogola kuom wasika. En e Ruoth Nyasayemane omiyo aloyo joma ne piem koda,kendo oresa kuom jomahundu.
Rumi
.
. Kuom mano, anapake kuom kind ogendini. Adier, anapak nyinge gi wer.
Nyasaye kelo resruok maduong’ni ruoth moketo. Ee, ohero ng’at moyiero, gi hera mosiko,ma en mana Daudi,gi kotha nyaka chieng’. "
SAMUEL
Weche mogik mag Daudi
Koro magi e weche mogik mag Daudi wuod Jesse, ng’at momi duong’.  Adier,Ruoth mowir mane Nyasach Jakobo oyiero, kendo mane jachuog wende mamit eIsrael, nowacho kama:
"Roho mar Ruoth Nyasayeema miya weche mawacho,kendo wachne nie dhoga.
Nyasach Jakobo, lwanda mar Israel,oseloso, kowacho niya,‘Ka ruoth rito ji gi bura makare,nikech oluoro Nyasaye,
To lochne chalo gi ler mar wang’chieng’,mopilore gokinyi ka boche polo onge,kendo mamiyo lum loth bang’ koth. ’
Donge kamano e kaka oda obet e nyim Nyasaye,nikech osetimo koda singruok mosiko, mochan kare,kendo ma ok nyal lokore?Oseguedho gik moko ma konya, kendo ma adwaro.
To joma ok oluoro Nyasaye,chalo gi kudho moke,ma ok nyal choki gi lwedo.
Ng’at manyalo dwaroginyaka konyre gi nyinyo,kata gi bond tong’. Eka bang’e owang’gi chutho gi mach. "Thuondi mag Daudi(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Koro thuondi mane Daudi nigo e ndalone e magi: Josheb-bashebethja-Takemon ne jatend thuondi adek madongo.  En ema nonego ji mia aboro gitong’, odiechieng’ achiel.
Ng’at mane luwe ne Eleazar wuod Dodo, ja-Ahohi.  Ne en gi DaudiPas-Damin, kama ne jo-Filistia ochokoree ni lweny.  Jo-Israelnoringo
to en nochung’ kanyo, monego jo-Filistia nyaka bade nojony, miligangla nomoko e lwete, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyogi loch maduong’chieng’ono.  Kane jolweny oduogo ir Eleazar bang’ ringo, koro neodong’nigi mana dedo joma otho.
Ng’at mar adek ne Shama wuod Agee ja-Harar.  Jo-Filistia nochokoreLehi, kama ne nitie puoth ng’or moro.  Jolweny moko duto noringojo-Filistia,
en to nodong’ e puodhono, korite, kendo nonegojo-Filistiago.  Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyogi loch maduong’.
Chieng’ moro kane oyudo jolweny mag jo-Filistia ojot e holo marRefaim, e kinde mar keyo, ji adek kuom thuondi piero adek madongo kandenodhi ir Daudi e holo mar Adulaim.
Kindego Daudi ne nie rogo, tojolweny mag jo-Filistia nosekawo Bethlehem.
Daudi noomo chunye ka sisoomake, mowacho niya, "Mad ng’ato kelna pi soko man but ranga Bethlehem,mondo amodhi!"
Eka thwondi adekgo nomwomo oganda lweny marjo-Filistia.  Ne gidhi omo pi sokono, mi gikelo ni Daudi.  To nodagi modhopigno, moole piny ka misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye,
kowacho niya, "RuothNyasaye mondo orita kik amodh pigni, nikech ochalo mana remb jogo maneodhi ome, koyie wito ngimagi. " Mano emomiyo Daudi notamore modhe.  Gik makamago ema thuondi adekgo ne timo.
Abishai owadgi Joab, wuod Zeruya, ema ne jatend thwondi piero adekgo. Nonego ji mia adek gi tong’ mi nobedo ng’at marahuma kuomthuondigo.
Ne en rahuma moloyo kuomgi, mobedo jatendgi, to katakamano, ne ok ochopo e rang’iny mar ji adek kande.
Benaya wuod Jehoyada, thwon Kabzeel marahuma, notimo timbe thwonmang’eny.  Bende nonego thwond Moab ariyo.  Chieng’ moro kane kodh peosechue, nolor e bur, monego sibuor kanyo.
Bende en ema nonegoja-Misri marabet.  Ja-Misrino ne nigi tong’, to Benaya nodhine gi odunga. Noyudho tong’ e lwet ja-Misrino, monegego.
Timbe machal kamago emaBenaya wuod Jehoyada oyudogo huma, kaachiel gi thwondi piero adekkande.
Ne en rahuma moloyo ji piero adekgo, to kata kamano, ne okochopo e rang’iny mag thuondi adek madongo kande.  Daudi nokete jatendjoge mag lweny mane rito ngimane.
Asahel owadgi Joab ne achiel kuom ji piero adekgo.  Jomoko ne gin:Elhanan wuod Dodo ja-Bethlehem,
kod Shama gi Elika jo-Harod,
giHelez ja-Palti, gi Ira wuod Ikesh ja-Tekoa,
gi Abiezer ja-Anathoth, giSibekai ja-Husha,
gi Zalmon ja-Ahohi, kod Maharai
gi Itai wuod Ribaija-Gibea e piny Benjamin,
gi Benaya ja-Pirathon gi Hidai ja-Gaash,piny aore,
gi Abialbon ja-Arbath, gi Azmoth ja-Bahurim,
gi Eliaba jaShalbon, gi Hashem ja-Gizon kod Jonathan
wuod Shama, gi Ahiam wuodSharar, jo-Harar,
gi Elifelet wuod Ahasbai ja-Maaka, gi Eliam wuodAhithofel ja-Gilo,
gi Hezro ja-Karmel, gi Paarai ja-Arbi,
gi Igalwuod Nathan ja-Zoba, gi Bani ja-Gad
gi Zelek ja-Amon, gi Naharaija-Beeroth, mane jating’ gilweny mag Joab wuod Zeruya,
kod Ira giGareb, jo-Ithri,
kod Uria ja-Hiti.  Duto ne gin ji piero adek gariyo.
SAMUEL
Daudi okwano jo-Israel gi jo-Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Mirima nochako omako Ruoth Nyasaye kod jo-Israel, mi nomiyo Daudi otimogimoro ma dihinygi, kowachone niya, "Dhiyo ikwan jo-Israel gijo-Juda. "
Omiyo ruoth nowacho ni Joab gi jotend lweny mane ni kodeniya, "Dhiuru koro, uwuoth e dhout Israel duto, chakre Dan nyakaBeer-sheba, kukwano ji, mondo ung’e kar rombgi. "
To Joab nodwoko ruothniya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mondo omedni ji nyadi mia achiel kapodwang’i neno.  To marang’o iketo chunyi e wachni?"
Kata kamano ruothnochuno Joab gi jotend lweny, mi ne giwuok mondo gikwan jo-Israel.
Neging’ado aora Jordan, mi gichako kweno Aroer kod dala manie holono, kagichiko Gad nyaka Jazer.
Eka ne gidhi Dan, mi kane giwuok kuro, negiluwo piny nyaka Sidon,
gi dala Turo mochiel gi ohinga kod mier dutomag jo-Hivi gi mag jo-Kanaan.  Achien ne gidhi nyaka Beer-sheba, yo thimJuda.
Bang’ dueche ochiko gi ndalo piero ariyo, kane gisewuotho epinygi duto, ne giduogo Jerusalem.
Joab nonyiso ruoth kar romb ji kama:E piny Israel ne nitie ji alufu mia aboro ma nyalo kedo, to jo-Juda negin alufu mia abich.
To kane Daudi osekwano ji, chunye nochande, mowacho ni Ruoth Nyasayeniya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, aseketho ahinya kuom gima asetimo.  To koro asayini mondo iwena richona, nikech asetimo gima ofuwo. "
Eka kane Daudiochiew gokinyi, noyudo ka Ruoth Nyasaye osenyiso Gad janabi, mane jakorwach ni Daudi, kowachone niya,
"Dhiyo inyis Daudi ni Ruoth Nyasayeosewacho kama: ‘Aketo gik moko adek e nyimi.  Yier achiel kuomgi monegoatimni. ’ "
Omiyo Gad nodhi ir Daudi mopenje niya, "Ere gima iyiero?Idwaro mondo kech omak pinyu kuom higni adek? Koso idwaro ringo wasikikuom dueche adek ka gilawi? Koso tho malit mondo obed e pinyu kuom ndaloadek? Parane, inyisa gima dadwok jal moora. "
Daudi nodwoko Gad niya, "An gi masira maduong’, to ber mondo wabed elwet Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar ng’wonone duong’.  To kik abed e lwet dhano. "
Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nooro tho malit kuom jo-Israel, chakre okinyi,nyaka chop kinde ma noketo.  Ji alufu piero abiriyo notho, chakre Dannyaka Beer-sheba.
To kane malaika orieyo bade kochiko Jerusalem mondooketh dalano, Ruoth Nyasaye noloko parone kuom masira ma nodwaro timomowacho ni malaika mane nego ji niya, "Oromo! Koro dwok lweti. " Tonoyudo ka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye obet but kar dino mar Araunaja-Jebus.
Kane Daudi oneno malaika mane nego ji, nowacho ni RuothNyasaye niya, "An e jakwath moseketho, kendo an ema asetimo gima rach. To ere rach ma ogandani osetimo? Akwayi ni an ema mondo ikuma koddhoodwa. "
Chieng’no Gad nodhi ir Daudi, mowachone ni, "Dhiyo kar dino mar Araunaja-Jebus, igerie ni Ruoth Nyasaye kendo-mar-misango. "
Omiyo kane Daudiowinjo wachno, nodhi kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.
To kane Arauna onenoruoth gi joge ka biro ire, nowuok modhi romone, kendo nogoyo chongepiny, mokulorene nyaka e lowo.
Arauna nopenjo ruoth niya, "Marang’oibiro ira?" Daudi nodwoke ni, "Adwaro ng’iewo kodi kar dinoni, mondoagerie ni Ruoth Nyasaye kendo-mar-misango, mondo tho ma nego jogaorum. "
Arauna nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Ruoth, kaw akawa gimoro amora machunyi dwaro, ichiw ni Nyasaye.  Ruedhi nitie minyalo timogo misango,kendo yien mag dino cham, kendo jok motue e ng’ut dhok, minyalochwako.
Ruoth, magi duto amiyi. " Eka Arauna nomedo wacho ni ruothniya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mondo oyie gi chiwoni. "
To ruothnodwoke ni, "Ooyo, nyaka achuli, nikech ok natim ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasacha misengni gi gik mayudo nono. " Omiyo Daudi nochulo fedha madirom nus kilo, kong’iewogo kar dino kaachiel gi ruedhigo.
Eka nogeroni Ruoth Nyasaye kendo-mar-misango kanyono, motimoe misengni miwang’opep, kod mag sawo.  Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo lemo ma nochiwne, kendonogeng’o tho malitno mondo kik oneg jo-Israel.
Ruodhi
Abishag tiyo ni Daudi
Ruoth Daudi koro noseti, kendo hike ne oniang’, ma kata ne oume gi lepnindo, to pod ne ok onyal yudo liet.
Emomiyo jotichne ne owachone niya,"Yie mondo wadwarni nyako manyalo tiyoni kendo riti.  Bende nonind butimondo iyud liet. "
Omiyo ne gidwaro nyako ma jaber e piny Israel duto,nyaka ne giyudo Abishag nyar Shunam, mi ne gikele ir ruoth.
Nyakono nejaber ahinya, norito ruoth kotiyone, to ruoth ne ok riwre kode.
Adonija wuod Hagith nochako kawore, kaparo ni nobed ruoth.  Nong’iewogeche lweny, gi joidh farese kod gi ji piero abich mane telo nyime.
Nyaka oa e tinne wuon mare ne pok otale.  Adonija ne wuod Daudi manejalup’ Absalom, kendo ne en gi chia kaka owadgino.
Noloso gi Joab wuodZeruya, kod Abiathar jadolo, mi jogo nodokne, kendo ne gikonye.
ToZadok jadolo, gi Nathan janabi, gi Shimei, gi Rei, kod thuondi mag Daudine ok odokne.
Adonija noyang’o rombe gi rwedhi kod dhok machwe, kotimogo misango butlwanda mar Zoheleth man but En-rogel.  Nogwelo owetene duto ma yawuotruoth, kod jodong Juda duto,
to ne ok ogwelo Nathan janabi, gi Benayakod thuondi kande, kata Solomon owadgi bende ne ok ogwelo.
Eka Nathan nowacho ni Bathsheba min Solomon niya, "Donge isewinjo niAdonija wuod Hagith osebedo ruoth, to ruodhwa Daudi ok ong’eyo?
Tokoro yiena mondo ang’adni rieko minyalo resogo ngimani gi ngima Solomonwuodi.
Dhi ir ruoth Daudi, kendo penje niya, ‘Ruodha, dongeisesingorina ni Solomon wuoda ema nobed ruoth kari, kendo nobed e komduong’ni? Ka en kamano, to ang’o momiyo Adonija osebedo ruoth?’
To kapod iwuoyo gi ruoth kamano, to anadonj bang’i, mondo asir wechemiwachogo. "
Omiyo Bathsheba nodonjo e od ruoth.  Ndalogo Daudi noseti ahinya, kendoAbishag nyar Shunam ne tiyone.
Bathsheba nolung’ore ni ruoth, ka miyeduong’ mi ruoth nopenje gima odwaro.
En to nodwoke niya, "Ruodha,nisingorina e nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi ni Solomon wuoda ema nobedruoth kari, kobet e kom duong’ mari.
To koro Adonija osebet ruothkakia.
Osetimo misango gi ruedhi, kod dhok machwe, gi rombe mathoth,kendo osegwelo yawuot ruoth duto, kod Abiathar jadolo, gi Joab jatendjolweny.  To ok ogwelo Solomon wuodi.
Koro ruodha, jo-Israel ritowachni mondo inyisgi ng’at ma nobed ruoth kari.
Ka ok itimo kamano, towan gii Solomon wuoda wanane masira kisetho. "
Kane Bathsheba pod wuoyo gi ruoth, Nathan janabi nodonjo, mi onyisruoth ni Nathan janabi dwaro nene.
Nochopo ir ruoth, mogoyo chongepiny, kokulorene nyaka e lowo.
Eka nopenjo Ruoth niya, "Isewacho niAdonija ema nobed ruoth kari, kendo nobed e kom duong’ni?
Osedhi mwalomoyang’o ruedhi gi dhok machwe kod rombe mogundho.  Osegwelo yawuot ruothduto, kaachiel gi Joab jatend jolweny kod Abiathar jadolo, kendo korogibet piny kode, ka gichiemo kendo gimetho.  Giwacho niya, ‘Ruoth Adonijamondo odag aming’a!’
To an gi Zadok jadolo, gi Benaya wuod Jehoyada,kod Solomon wuodi, ne ok ogwelowa.
In ema iyienigi mondo gitim kamanokoso, mak inyisowa ng’ama nobed ruoth kari?"Oket Solomon ruoth
Ruoth Daudi nodwoko niya, "Luongna Bathsheba obi ka. " Mi nobiromochung’ e nyim Ruoth.
Eka ruoth nokuong’ore kowacho niya, "Adier ginying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, mosereso ngimana e masiche duto,
ne akuong’ora ni Solomon wuodi ema nobed ruoth bang’a e kom duong’na. Kawuono eka abiro chopo gima nakuong’ora. "
Bathsheba nogoyo chongepiny, mokulore nyaka e lowo, komiyo ruoth duong’, mi nowacho niya,"Ruodha, mondo idag nyaka chieng’. "
Eka ruoth Daudi nowacho niya, "Luongnauru Zadok jadolo, gi Nathanjanabi, kod Benaya wuod Jehoyada, jobi ira. " Mi ne gibiro e nyime. Nowachonigi niya,
"Dhiuru gi askechena, uket Solomon wuoda e kanja,kendo ukowe nyaka Gihon,
kama Zadok jadolo gi Nathan janabi biro wireegi mo, mondo obed ruodh Israel.  Bang’e ugo tung’, kendo ukog niya,‘Ruoth Solomon mondo odag aming’a!’
Eka uluw bang’e, kuduoge ka, mondoobed e kom duong’na, nikech asekete ruoth kara, kendo aseyiere mondoobed jatend jo-Israel gi jo-Juda. "
Benaya wuod Jehoyada nodwoko Ruothniya, "Obed kamano! Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mondo oyie otimre kamano.
Ruoth Nyasaye mondo obed gi Solomon kaka ne en kodi, kendo lochne obedmaduong’ moloyo mari. "
Eka Zadok jadolo, gi Nathan janabi, kod Benayawuod Jehoyada, kaachiel gi jo-Kereth kod jo-Peleth, nomiyo Solomon oidhokanyna mar ruoth Daudi, mi ne gilor ka gikowe nyaka Gihon.
Zadokjadolo nokawo tung’ mar mo mane ogolo e Hemb Nyasaye, mowirogo Solomonkuno.  Eka ne gigoyo tung’, kendo ji duto nokok niya, "Ruoth Solomonmondo odag aming’a!"
Bang’e ji duto noluwe ka giduoge; ne gigoyoasili, kendo ne gimor gi mor maduong’, mi piny noyiengni nikech kokomargi.
Adonija gi welo duto mane ni kode nowinjo kokono, ka noyudo gitiekochiemo.  Joab to ka nowinjo tung’ ka ywak, nopenjo niya, "Ere gimomiyodala otimo mahu?"
Kane Joab pod loso, Jonathan wuod Abiathar jadolonochopo.  Adonija nokone ni, "Donji! In ng’ama ber, kendo ageno ni ikelowach maber!"
