Jonathan nodwoke niya, "Ok kamano.  Ruodhwa Daudi oseketoSolomon ruoth.
Nooro Zadok jadolo, gi Nathan janabi, kod Benaya wuodJehoyada, kaachiel gi jo-Kereth gi jo-Peleth, mondo okow Solomon koidhokanyna mar ruoth,
kendo Zadok jadolo gi Nathan janabi, josewire gi mobut soko Gihon, mondo obed ruoth.  Koro gisea kuro gi ilo; emomiyo dalaotimo mahu kendo mano e koko musewinjo.
Solomon koro obet e kom ruoth.
To moloyo, jodong ruoth bende nobiro mopako ruodhwa Daudi, ka giwachoniya, ‘Nyasachi mondo omi nying Solomon obed gi huma moloyo nyingi,kendo omi lochne duong’ moloyo mari. ’ Mi ruoth Daudi nokulore ekitandane,
mowacho ni, ‘Apako Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,moseyiena mondo ane wuoda kobet e kom duong’na kawuono. ’ "
Eka luoro nomako wend Adonija duto, mi gia malo, kendo ng’ato kang’ato nodok dalane.
Adonija bende noluoro Solomon, mi nodhi, momakotunge mag kendo-mar-misango.
Nonyis Solomon niya, "Adonija oluori;omiyo osemako tunge mag kendo-mar-misango, kowacho niya, ‘Ruoth Solomonmondo okuong’rena ni ok nonega. ’ "
Solomon nowacho ni, "Ka timbenenonyiswa ni en ng’ama kare, to onge kata yie wiye achiel ma nolwar piny. To ka noyud kuome ketho moro, to nonege!"
Eka ruoth Solomon noorowach, kendo ne gigole oko e kendo-mar-misango.  Nobiro, mokulore niruoth, mi ruoth nowachone ni, "Dog dalani. "
Ruodhi
Daudi olemo ni Solomon
Kane Daudi chiegni tho, nolemo ni Solomon wuode niya,
"An to eri adhikuma ji duto mae piny dhiye; in to bed motegno kinyiso ni in dichwo.
Mak chik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi, kiwuotho e yorene, kendo kimakowechene, gi chikene kod buchene, kaka ondiki e chik Musa, kamoro amoramidhiye.
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye nochopo singruok mane otimona, kowachonani, ‘Ka yawuoti noritre, kendo nowuoth e nyima gi adiera gi chunygi dutokod parogi duto, to nyikwayi nobed ruodhi mag Israel nyaka chieng’. ’
"Bende ing’eyo gima Joab wuod zeruya notimona.  Ne onego Abner wuodNer, kod amasa wuod Jether, mane jotend jolwenj Israel.  E ndalo kue,nochulo kuor kuom gima notimore e lweny, kokelona buch remo nikech thomar ng’at makare.
Omiyo ti gi riekoni; wiye oseti lwar, to kik iwe othogi kue.
To tim maber ni jood Barzilai ja-Gilead, kendo ikonygi, nikechne girwaka gi ng’wono kane aringo Absalom owadu.
To kik wiyi wil giiShimei wuod Gera ma ja-Benjamin moa Bahurim, nikech nokuong’a gi kuong’amalit, chieng’ mane awuok kadhi Mahanaim.  To bang’, kane romona e aoraJordan, nakuong’orane gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye ni ok nanege.
To koro kikiweye mak ikume.  In ng’at mariek, kendo ibiro ng’eyo ng’ama owinjoreitim, mondo otho tho mar masira, kata obedo ni wiye oseti lwar kamano. "Tho mar Daudi(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kamano Daudi notho, moluwo kwerene, kendo noyike Jerusalem.
Nobetruodh Israel kuom higni piero ang’wen.  E Hebron nobedoe ruoth kuom higniabiriyo, to e Jerusalem higni piero adek gadek.
Koro Solomon nobetruoth kar Daudi wuon mare, kendo lochne nogurore motegno. Solomon oguro lochne
To Adonija wuod Hagith nodhi ir Bathsheba min Solomon.  Bathshebanopenje niya, "Ibiro gi kue koso?" Nodwoke ni, "Ee, abiro gi kue.
Toadwaro kwayi gimoro. " Bathsheba nokone ni, "Wachi. "
Eka nowacho niya,"Ing’eyo ni yande loch onego bed mara, kendo jo-Israel duto nogeno ni anema nabed ruoth.  To wach olokore, kendo owadwa osebet ruoth, nikechNyasaye ema omiye.
Koro adwaro kwayi gimoro achiel, to kik itama. "Bathsheba nokone ni, "Kwa akwaya. "
Nowacho niya, "Asayi, kwa ruothSolomon mondo omiya Abishag nyar Shunam obed chiega, nikech ok onyaltami. "
Nodwoke ni, "Ber, abiro wuoyoni gi ruoth. "
Omiyo Bathshebanodhi ir ruoth Solomon mondo okwaye gima Adonija dwaro.  Ruoth nochung’ka dhi romo ni min, mokulorene.  Eka nobet e kom duong’ne, kendo nochikojotich mondo okel kom ni min mare, mondo obed e bade korachwich.
Bathsheba nowachone niya, "An gi kwayo matin, kik idagi. " Ruothnodwoke ni, "Kwa akwaya, mama ok nadagi. "
Nowacho niya, "Yie mondoAbishag nyar Shunam obed chi Adonija owadu. "
Ruoth Solomon nopenjo minmare ni, "Ang’o momiyo ikwaya mondo Abishag nyar Shunam obed chiAdonija? Chal ka gima ikwaya mana ni mondo amiye loch, nimar en owadwamaduong’, kendo Abiathar jadolo, gi Joab wuod Zeruya, jodokne. "
Bang’mano, ruoth Solomon nokuong’ore gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye kowacho niya,"Nyasaye mondo okweda ka Adonija ok otho nikech wachni!
Gi nying RuothNyasaye mosemiyo agurora motegno e loch kar Daudi wuora, kendo mosemiyojodhooda obedo jotelo kaka nosingore, akuong’ora ni, Adonija biro thokawuono!"
Kuom mano ruoth Solomon nooro Benaya wuod Jehoyada monegoAdonija.
To ruoth nowacho ni Abiathar jadolo niya, "In to dog Anathoth dalau. Owinjore itho, to kata kamano koro ok nanegi, nikech niting’o Sanduk marRuoth Nyasaye e nyim Daudi wuora, kendo nineno chandruok kaachiel kode. "
Omiyo Solomon nogolo Abiathar ni kik obed jadolo mar Ruoth Nyasaye. Kamano wach mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho Shilo kuom od Eli nochopo kare.
Kane Joab owinjo wachno, noringo odhi e Hema mar Nyasaye, momako tungekendo-mar-misango, nimar nodok ni Adonija,, kata obedo ni ne ok odok niAbsalom, e kinde mane Absalom ong’anyoe.
Nonyis Solomon ni Joaboseringo odhi e od Hema mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mobet e bathkendo-mar-misango.  Mi Solomon nooro Benaya wuod Jehoyada, kochike ni,"Dhiyo, inege. "
Omiyo Benaya nodhi e Hema mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mowachoni Joab niya, "Ruoth owacho ni mondo iwuogi. " To Joab nodagi, kowachoni, "Ooyo, atho mana ka. " Eka Benaya nokelo ni ruoth wach mane Joabodwoke.
Ruoth nokone niya, "Tim kaka owacho.  Nege kendo iyike, mondoigol oko remo mane ochuero kayiem, kik sik kuoma, kendo kuom od wuora.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro kume kuom remo ma nochwero, nikech nonego ji ariyomakare moloyo gi ber.  Nonego Abner wuod Ner, jatend jolweny mag Israel,kod Amasa jotend jolweny mag Juda kane daudi wuora kia.
Emomiyo rembgimondo obed ewi Joab gi kothe nyaka chieng’, to ruoth Nyasaye mondo omedkue ni Daudi gi kothe gi ode kod lochne nyaka chieng’. "
Eka Benayawuod Jehoyada nodhi monego Joab.  Mi noyik Joab e dalane e thim.
Ruothnoketo Benaya wuod Jehoyada jatend jolweny kar Joab, to Zadok jadolonoketo kar Abiathar.
Eka ruoth noluongo Shimei, mowachone niya, "Ger ot Jerusalem, idagie,to kik iwuog oko ngang’,
nikech chieng’ ma iniwuogie, king’ado aoraKidron, to bed king’eyo ni nonegi.  To rembi nodong’ e wiyi iwuon. "
Shimei nodwoko ruoth ni, "Gima iwacho ber.  Anatim kamano. " Mi Shimeinodak Jerusalem kuom ndalo mang’eny.
To bang’ higni adek, wasumb Shimei ariyo noringo adhi ir Akish wuodMaaka, ruodh Gath.  Kane onyis Shimei ni wasumbni mage ni Gath,
nogawokanyna, moidho kodhi ir Akish, dwarogi.  Kamano noomogi Gath, moduogogi.
To ka nonyis Solomon ni Shimei osewuok Jerusalem, odhi Gath, kendooseduogo,
noluongo Shimei, mowachone niya, "Namiyo ikuong’ori e nyingRuoth Nyasaye, kendo asiemi matek, kawachoni ni, ‘Ng’e adier ni chieng’ma iniwuog oko kidhi kamoro amora, to nonegi. ’ Kendo kidwoka ni, ‘Anatimkaka iwacho. ’
Marang’o nitamori rito singruok ma nitimo e nying RuothNyasaye, kod chik mane aketoni?"
Ruoth nomedo wacho ni Shimei niya,"Ing’eyo richo duto mane itimo ni Daudi wuora.  Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasayenodwok richoni e wiyi.
To an Solomon, nayud gueth, kendo loch Daudinogurre e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka chieng’. "
Eka Ruoth nochiko Benayawuod Jehoyada mondo oneg Shimei, mi Benaya nowuok oko, monege.  Kamanoloch nogurore e lwet Solomon.
Ruodhi
Solomon okendo nyar Farao
Solomon nokendo nyar Farao, ruodh Misri, kokelogo winjruok e pinjegi,kendo nokele e dala Daudi gi Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kod ohinga molworoJerusalem.
Ji ne pod timo misango e hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore,nikech ot moger ni Ruoth Nyasaye ne pod onge ndalogo.
Solomon noheroRuoth Nyasaye, koluwo chik Daudi wuon mare, mak mana ni notimo misango,kendo nowang’o ubani, e hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore. Solomon okwayo Nyasaye rieko(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Ruoth Solomon ne jadhi Gibeon mondo otim misango, nikech ne en hembkomong’ere moloyo, kendo nothoro timo misengni miwang’o pep alufu achiel ekar misangono.
Kane Solomon odhi dalano, Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyorene elek gotieno, mowachone ni, "Kwa gima idwaro mondo amiyi. "
Solomonnodwoke niya, "Ninyiso hera mosiko ni Daudi wuora ma jatichni, manewuotho e nyimi gi adiera, kendo kuom dimbruok gi chuny makare.  Bende podinyise hera mosikono nyaka chil kawuono, nimar isemiyo wuode obedo ruothkare.
Koroni, A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha, iseketa ruoth kar Daudiwuora, to pod an rawera mayot, kendo akia kaka onego awuoth e nyim ji.
Iseketa e kind jogi miseyiero, ma gin ji mathoth mokadho akwana.
Emomiyo yie imiya chuny mariek, manyalo yango gima ber gi gima rach,mondo ang’adgo ni jogi bura, nikech ere ng’ama dinyal ng’ado bura nijogi mang’enygi?"
Ruoth Nyasaye ne mor nikech Solomon nokwayo kamano,
omiyo nodwokeniya, "Nikech ikwayo wachni, to ok ikwayo ni mondo idag aming’a, katamondo iyud mwandu, kata mondo iketh ngima wasiki, to ikwayo mana riekomar ng’ado bura kare,
koro atimoni kaka isekwayo.  Amiyi chuny marrieko kod mar ng’eyo.  Pok onywolie ng’at machal kodi, bende ok nonywolmoro bang’i.
Mago mane ok ikwayo bende amedi, gin mwandu kod duong’,ma onge ruoth moro amora ma dibed marom kodi ka pod ingima.
Bendekiluwo yorena, kendo imako chikena gi buchena, kaka Daudi wuoru notimo,to namedni ndalo. "
Eka Solomon nochiew, moyudo ni kara en mana lek. Nodok Jerusalem, mochung’ e nyim Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kotimomisengni miwang’o pep kod mag sawo, kendo noloso ni jotichne duto sawomaduong’. Solomon ong’ado bura gi rieko
Chieng’ moro, mon ariyo ma jochode nobiro ir ruoth, mi ochung’ enyime.
Dhako achiel nowacho niya, "Yaye ruodha, wadak gi dhani e otachiel, kendo nanywolo nyathi ka wan kode e odno.
Bang’ ndalo adek,dhani bende nonywol.  Ne wan kendwa e ot; ne onge ng’at moro machielo makmana wan ji ariyo.
To nyathi dhani notho gotieno, nikech nonindokuome.
Eka noa malo dier otieno, mokawo wuoda buta ka nindo otera, miopielo e kore, to wuode motho nopielo e kora.
Kane achiew mondo adhodhnyathina, nayudo kosetho, to kane anone maber gokinyi, nayudo ni ok ennyathi manywolo. "
Eka dhako machielo nowacho niya, "Ooyo, nyathimangima e mara, to motho e mari. " Dhako mokwongo nodwoko ni, "Ooyo,nyathi motho e mari, to mangima e mara. " Kamano e kaka ne gimino wach enyim ruoth.
Eka Ruoth nowacho niya, "Dhako achiel wacho niya, ‘Nyathimangima e wuoda, to motho e wuodi. ’ To machielo wacho ni, ‘Ooyo, in emawuodi otho, to wuoda ema ngima. ’ "
Kane ruoth osewacho kamano, nokwayomondo okelne ligangla, kendo kane gisekelonego,
nowacho niya, "Pogurunyathi mangima diere, mondo umi dhako achiel konchiel, to komachielo umidhako machielo. "
To dhako mane nyathine ngima nohero wuode ahinya,omiyo nosayo ruoth, kowacho niya, "Yaye ruoth, mi dhani nyathi mangima,to kik inege ngang’!" To dhako machielo nowacho ni, "Ok enobed mara katamari.  Poge apoga!"
Eka ruoth nodwoko ni, "Miuru dhako mokwongononyathi mangima, kik unege ngang’, nikech en e min mare. "
Jo-Israelduto nowinjo bura mane ruoth ong’ado, mi ne giluore, nikech ne gineno nirieko Nyasaye ni kuome, ka konye ng’ado bura makare.
Ruodhi
Jodong Solomon
Solomon nobedo ruodh jo-Israel duto,
kendo magi ne jodonge: Azariawuod Zadok ne jadolo maduong’;
Elihoref gi Ahija, ma yawuot Shisha, nejogoro; Jehoshafat wuod Ahiud ne jachan weche;
Benaya wuod Jehoyada nejatend jolweny; Zadok gi Abiathar ne jodolo;
Azaria wuod Nathan nejatend jodong piny; Zebud wuod Nathan ne jadolo kendo osiep ruoth;
Ahishar ne jaduong’ e od ruoth, kendo Adoniram wuod Abda ne jarit jogoma nichuno mondo oti gi thwon.
Solomon noketo jodongo apar gariyo mondo orit piny Israel duto, kendoochok chiemo ma dirome kod joge.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomgi ne choko chiemokuom due achiel e higa,
kendo magi e nying jogo: Wuod Hur ne rito pinygode mag Efraim;
wuod Deker ne rito Makaz, gi Shaalbim, gi Beth-shemeshkod Elon-beth-hanan;
wuod Hesed ne rito Aruboth, kaachiel gi Soko, kodpiny Hefer duto;
wuod Abinadab, ma chiege Tafath nyar Solomon, ne ritopiny Dor duto;
Baana wuod Ahilud ne rito Taanak gi Megido nyakaBeth-shean, chakre kama yo lorie koa Jezreel dhi Beth-shean, mopoworenyaka Abel-mehola mokiewo gi Zerethan, kendo nyaka loka Jokmeam;
wuodGeber ne rito piny ramoth-Gilead; pinyno ema miech Jair wuod Manase manGilead ne nitie, kod piny Argob man Bashan, mier piero auchiel mochielgi ohinga, kendo man gi lodi mag mula.
Ahinadab wuod Iddo ne ritoMahanaim.
Ahimaaz ma nokendo Basemath nyar Solomon ne rito pinyNaftali.
Baana wuod Hushai ne rito piny Asher kod Bealoth.
Jehoshafat wuod Parua ne rito piny Isakar.
Shimei wuod Ela ne ritopiny Benjamin.
Geber wuod Uri ne rito piny Gilead; (enie piny maneSihon ruodh jo-Amor, kod Og ruodh Bashan rito chon. ) To ne nitiejaduong’ achiel kende mane rito piny Juda. Rieko Solomon gi mwandune
Jo-Juda gi jo-Israel ne ng’eny ka kuoyo mae dhonam; ne gidak gi kue,kendo gi mor.
Solomon nobedo ruodh pinje duto, chakre aora Yufrate,nyaka piny jo-Filistia kod tong’ piny Misri.  Jopinjego duto ne chuloosuru, kendo ne tiyo ni Solomon kuom ndalo duto mag ngimane.
Chiemo mane ikelo ni Solomon odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ ne romo kama:gunde piero auchiel mag mogo mayom, gi gunde mia achiel gi piero ariyomag mogo amoga,
gi ruedhi apar machwe ma kwayo kama ochiel, gi ruedhipiero ariyo ma kwayo e lek, gi rombe mia achiel, kaachiel gi nyikeye, gingepe, gi mwendni, kod gwen machwe.
Solomon noloyo ruodhi kod pinjeduto koa yo milambo mar aora Yufrate, chakre Tifsa nyaka Gaza, mi nobedogi kue e tong’ pinye duto.
E ndalo Solomon duto, jo-Juda gi jo-Israelduto nodak e miechgii gii kue, chakre Dan yo nyandwat, nyaka Beer-sheba,yo milambo.
Solomon ne nigi udi alufu piero ang’wen moger ni farese mag gechene,bende ne en gi joidh geche alufu piero ang’wen moger ni farese maggechene, bende ne en gi joidh farese alufu apar gariyo.
Jodong gwengekande ne kelo chiemo ni ruoth Solomon kod jogo duto mane chiemo edalane.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato ne kelo chiemo kamano e due moketne, mak gimoroorem.
Ne gitero bende shairi gi lum mag farese gi mag kenje kamoroamora mane idwarogie.
Nyasaye nomiyo Solomon rieko gi winjo mathoth, to kod paro malach kanam.
Kuom mano, rieko Solomon noyombo rieko mar jo yo wuokchieng’duto.  Noloyo bende rieko duto mag jo-Misri.
Noriek moloyo ji duto,kata Ethan ja-Ezra, gi Heman, gi Kalkol kod Darda, ma yawuot Mahol. Humbe nolak e pinje duto mokiewo kode koni gi koni.
Nochuogo ngechealufu adek, kendo wende moromo alufu achiel kod abich.
Nowuoyo kuomkit yien duto, kochako gi sida madongo man Lebanon nyaka okinga mati ekind kite mag ohinga.  Nowuoyo bende kuom le gi winy gi gik mamol, kendokuom rech.
Ji ne biro, koa e ogendini duto, mondo owinj rieko Solomon. Ruodhi duto mag piny ngima mane osewinjo humb riekone bende ne biro ire.
Ruodhi
Solomon otimo winjruok gi Hiram ruodh Turo(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane Hiram ruodh Turo owinjo ni Solomon osewir, moket ruoth kar Daudiwuon mare, nooro joote ire, nikech yande ne ohero Daudi.
Eka Solomonnooro ni Hiram wach niya,
"Ing’eyo ni Daudi wuora ne ok nyal geroHekalu ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, nikech lwenje mane wasike olworego,nyaka Ruoth Nyasaye noketogi e bwo lochne.
To koro Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasacha osemiya kue kuonde duto, kendo aonge gi wasigu kata masiramoro.
Emomiyo koro adwaro gero ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha, ka aluwosingruok mane omiyo Daudi wuora, kowacho niya, ‘Wuodi ma naket ruothkari ema nogerna Hekalu. ’
Omiyo koro yie ichik ji mondo otong’na yiendsida mag Lebanon.  Jotichna nonywak tich kod jotichni, kendo anamiyichudo mag jotichni kaka ichano, nikech onge ng’ato kuomwa mong’eyotong’o yien machal gi jo-Sidon. "
Kane Hiram owinjo weche Solomon, nomor ahinya, mowacho niya, "ApakoRuoth Nyasaye tinendeni, mosemiyo Daudi wuowi man gi rieko mondo otel nioganda maduong’ kamano. "
Nooro ni Solomon wach niya, "Asewinjo wachmiorona, kendo aikora timo gik moko duto midwaro kuom wach yiend sida giyiend saipras.
Jotichna nogolgi Lebanon, kendo notergi nyaka e dhonam,mi notuegi kanyakala, mondo okwang’gi e nam nyaka kuma idwaro.  Joganogony yien-go kanyono, kendo inikawgi.  To kichiwo chiemo moromo joodato inichop dwarona. "
Eka Hiram nomiyo Solomon yien duto modwaro,
Kendo higa ka higa Solomon ne miyo Hiram gunde alufu piero ariyo magcham mondo obed chiemb joode, kod mo ma dirom depe alufu piero ariyogabich.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Solomon rieko, kaka nosesingorene.  Kue nenitie e kind Hiram gi Solomon, kendo ne gitimo winjruok.
Solomon nochuno ji alufu piero adek kuom jo-Israel duto mondo oti githwon.
Due ka due nooro ji alufu apar kuomgi Lebanon.  Ne gitiyo kunokuom due achiel, to ne giyueyo dala kuom dueye ariyo.  Adoram ne en jaritjoma nichuno mondo oti gi thwon-go.
To bende Solomon ne nigi joting’misike alufu piero abiriyo kod jopecho alufu piero aboro mane payo kitee gode,
kaachiel gi nyipeche alufu adek gi mia adek.
Ruothnoketonigi chik, mi ne gipayo kite madongo ma nengogi tek, mondo gilosgomise mar Hekalu.
Kamano jogedo mag Solomon gi mag Hiram kod jo-Gebalne payo kite kod bepe ka giko mondo ogergo Hekalu.
Ruodhi
Solomon ogero Hekalu mar Nyasaye(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar mia ang’wen gi piero aboro bang’ wuok jo-Israel Misri, kaneSolomon osebet ruodh Israel higni ang’wen, nochako gero Hekalu mar RuothNyasaye, e due mar ariyo miluongo ni Zif.
Bor mar Hekalu mane ogero niRuoth Nyasaye noromo mita piero adek, lachne mita apar, to borne modhimalo mita apar gabich.
Bor mar agola mane ni e nyim Kama Ler mar Hekalunoromo mita apar, maromre gi lach Hekalu, to lach agolano, koa e nyimHekalu, noromo mita abich.
Noloso ni Hekalu dirise mogaji,
kendonogero udi moko momakore gi kor Hekalu gi oko.  Udigo noluoro Kama Ler,kaachiel gi Kama Ler Moloyo.
Udigo ne oluwo gorofa adek, kendo lach marudi mapiny noromo mita ariyo gi nus, to lach mar udi ma diere ne mitaadek, kendo lach mar udi mamalo ne mita adek gi nus, nikech ne giswekokor ot mondo yiend arip kik pow.
Noger Hekalu gi kite mane opa kuma nikunyogie, mondo koko mar nyundokata mar le kata mar gir tich moro mar nyinyo kik winji e Hekalu, kapodigere.
Dhoot midonjogo e udi mapiny ne nie bat korachwich mar Hekalu, toraidhi nochopo e udi madiere nyaka gorofa mar adek.
Kamano Solomonnogero Hekalu, motieko, kendo nochwade gi sida.
Eka nogero udi molworoHekalu duto.  Bepe mag sida ema noriwo kor udigo gi Hekalu, kendo bormodhi malo mar gorofa ka gorofa noromo mita ariyo gi nus.
Wach Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyore ni Solomon niya,
"Kuom wach Hekalumigeroni, ka inirit chikena duto, kendo iluwgi maber, to anachop gimanawacho ni Daudi wuoru kuomi.
Anadag kod joga Israel, mak aweyogingang’. "
Kamano Solomon nogero Hekalu, motieko.
Nochwado kor ot gi yo ka iyegi bap sida, chakre tiend ot nyaka yiend tado, to noloso dier ot giyiend saipras.
Mita apar ma iye nong’ado gi bap sida, chakre tiend otnyaka yiend tado mondo obed ot maler maiye, miluongo ni Kama Ler Moloyo.
To bor mar ot modong’, mane nie nyim ot maler ma iye, moromo mitapiero ariyo.
Bap sida mane nie Hekalu nopa machal gi budho kod thiepe. Ne en bap sida lilo, ma kata kidi moro ne ok nen.
Ei Hekalu nolosoe otmaler ma iye, mondo oketie Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ot ma iyeno,borne gi lachne kod borne modhi malo noromo mita apar, kendo Solomonnobawe gi dhahabu maler.  To bende noloso kendo-mar-misango gi bap sida.
Nobawo ii Hekalu gi dhahabu maler, kendo noriwo thiwini mag dhahabu enyim ot maler ma iye.  Odno bende nobawo gi dhahabu.
Kamano nobawo otduto gi dhahabu, kaachiel gi kendo-mar-misango mane nie ot ma iye.
Ei ot maler maiye noketoe kido ariyo molos gi bap zeituni maket gimalaika miluongo ni kerubi, ma moro ka moro borne noromo mita abich.
Buomb kerubi konchiel noromo mita ariyo gii nus, to komachielo bendekamano.  Kamano bor buombe duto korie noromo mita abich.
Pim mar kerubimachielo bende noromo mita abich.  Duong’ kod kido mar kerubi ariyogo nechalre chuth,
kendo bor modhi malo mar moro ka moro noromo mita abich.
Noketo kerubigo e dier ot maler maiye, ka buombegi oyarore.  Buombkerubi achiel nogik e kor ot koni, kendo buomb kerubi machielo nogik ekor ot kocha, to buombegi madiere noromo e dier ot tir.
Solomon nobawokerubigo bende gi dhahabu.
Kor ot duto, ma iye gi maoko nopayoe kido mag kerubi gi mag yiendothidhe kod thiepe moyarore,
kendo dier udi maiye gi maoko noumo gidhahabu.
Dhoot midonjogo e ot maiye noloso gi bepe abich mag zeituni;
thikeneariyo nopayoe kido mag kerubi gi mag yiend othidhe kod thiepe moyarore,kendo thikego kaachiel gi kerubi kod yien-go nobawo gi dhahabu.
Kamanobende noloso sich dhood Hekalu gi bepe ang’wen mag zeituni,
to thikeneariyo noloso gi bap saipras, ma moro ka moro nibano diriyo kiyawo.
Thikego bende nopayoe kido mag kerubi gi mag yiend othidhe kod thiepemoyarore, kendo nobawo gik mopago gi dhahabu maromre chuth.
Laro maiyenochielo gi ohinga moger gi kite mopa, moluow didek, kaachiel gi lainiachiel mar bap sida.
Mise mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye noket e higa mar ang’wen mar loch Solomon, edue miluongo ni Zif.
To e higa mar apar gachiel, e due mar aboromiluongo ni Bul, Hekalu norumo chuth, kaka nosechan ni onego gere. Kamano Solomon notieko higni abiriyo kagero Hekalu. Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
.
Ruodhi
Udi mamoko ma Solomon ogero
Solomon nogero dalane owuon kuom higni apar gadek, eka otieko gere.
Nogero ot miluongo ni Od Bungu mar Lebanon Borne noromo mita pieroabich, to lachne mita piero ariyo gabich, kendo borne modhi malo mitaapar gabich.  Nogere ewi laini adek mag sirni mag sida, moriwie bepe magsida.
Ne oumo wiye gi bap sida, mokadho ewi sirni piero ang’wengabichgo.  E laini ka laini nochanie sirni apar gabich.
Ne nitie lainiadek mag dirise mogaji, kendo dirisa ka dirisa nomanyore gi wadgi.
Sisimar dhoudi duto gi mag dirise duto ne romre, kendo dirisa ka dirisanomanyore gi wadgi e laini adek.
Bende nogero ot moro miluongo ni Od Sirni, ma borne noromo mita pieroariyo gabich, to lachne mita apar gabich.  Ne en gi agola man gi sirni enyime.
Nogero bende Od Kom Duong’ mochwado gi bap sida, chakre tiend ot nyakatado.  Noluonge ni Od Bura nimar nong’adoe bura.
Solomon nogero ode owuon mane obiro dakie e laru machielo man tok OdBura.  Nolose machal gi Od Burano, kendo nogero ot moro machielo ma bendechal kode, ni mondo nyar Farao mane okendo odagie.
Udigo duto noger gi kite mopa ma nengogi tek, chakre mise nyakayiendambewa, kendo chakre laru mar Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka larumaduong’.  Kitego duto nong’ad gi musmeno marom kaka idwaro, kendo nopagikoni gi koni.
Mise noger gi kite madongo ma nengogi tek, ma moko mitaabich to moko mita ang’wen.
To ewigi ne nitie bap sida gi kite manengogi tek, ma moro ka moro opa kaka idwaro.
Laru maduong’ nochiel giohinga moger gi kite mopa moluow didek, kod laini achiel mar bap sida,machal gi laru ma iye mar Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye kod agola mar Hekalu. Tich ma Huram otiyo e Hekalu(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
;
.
—
.
)
Eka ruoth Solomon nooro jaote Turo mondo oom ng’at moro miluongo niHuram.
Ne en wuod chi liel ma jadhood Naftali, to wuon mare neja-Turo, ma jatich mula.  Ne en gi rieko gi winjo kod lony mar losogimoro amora mar mula, kendo nobiro ir ruoth Solomon, molosone gik mokoduto mane odwaro.
Noloso sirni ariyo mag mula.  Bor mar moro ka moro noromo mita ochiko,to alwora mar kore noromo mita auchiel.  Igi norokore, kendo mith mulamolosgigo ne romre gi lach lith lwedo ang’wen.
Nolenyo mula molosogogik moko ariyo machal gi agulini madongo, moumogo sirni.  Bor mar aguluka agulu noromo mita abich.
Noloso gik moko ariyo mag mula e kidomachal gi osera, mong’awogi kuom agulini mane nie wi agulini mane nie wisirni.  Agulu ka agulu ne nie wi osera achiel.
Kamano bende noloso gikmong’inore ong’inore ka machunga e laini ariyo, molworo osera ma noumoagulini mane nie wi sirni.
Agulini mane nie wi sirni mochung’ e nyimagolago, nolos gi mula machal gi wi oyungu, moromo mita ariyo.
Wisirni ariyogo noyarore, kendo agulini moum gi osera noumore kuomgi, togik mong’inore ong’inore mia ariyo mochan e laini ariyo nolworo agulu kaagulu.
Nochungo sirnigo e agola mar Hekalu.  Siro achiel nochungokorachwich, mochako ni Jakin.  Siro machielo nochungo koracham, mochakoni Boaz.
Wi sirnigo noketie mula molos e kido machal gi wi oyungu. Kamano tich sirni norumo.
Eka nolenyo mula molosogo gima duong’ mating’o pi, machal gi karaya,mochako ni Nam.  Lach dhoge ne romo mita abich, kendo tutne ne romo mitaariyo gi nus, to alwora mar dhoge mita apar gabich.
E bwo dhoge nenitie gik ma maradadi mong’inore ong’inore, molwore.  Noriedgi e lainiariyo, ma borgi romo mita apar gabich.  Namno nochue kaachiel gi gik mamaradadigo.
Norenje e ng’e ruedhi apar gariyo mag mula.  Ruedhi adeknomanyo yo nyandwat, to adek yo podho chieng’, adek yo milambo, kendoadek yo wuok chieng’.  To wigi nodok ka iye.  Kamano e kaka noten Namno edieng’e ruedhigo.
Mith mula molosego ne romre gi lach lith lwedoang’wen.  Dhoge nolos ka dho kikombe, machal gi thiep oyungu.  Nonyaloting’o pi ma dirom depe alufu ang’wen.
Bende noloso rachungi apar mag mula mondo kareche orenjree.  Bor marrachungi ka rachungi ne romo mita ariyo, kendo lachne bende mita ariyo,to borne modhi malo mita achiel gi nus.
Rachungigo nolos kama: ne gingi pewe moket e frembe.
To nolos sibuoche gi ruedhi kod kerubi magmula e pewe mane ni e frembego.  Nokiewo frembego, yo ka wi sibuoche giyo ka wi ruedhi, kod yo ka tiendegi.
Rachungi ka rachungi ne nigitiende ang’wen mag mula, mane nyalo lworore kuom chumbe mag mula.  Etunge ang’wen mag rachungi, ne nitie sirni morenjie karaya.  Sirnigonolos gi mula, kendo nokiew bethegi.
Chuma moting’oo karaya ne nimalo, moyombo wi rachungi gi mita achiel.  En bende nokiewe.  Dhogenolworore mondo karaya orenjree maber.  To pewe mag rachungi ne okolworore, to ne gin gi bethe ang’wen maromre.
Tiende ang’wen go ne niebwo pewe mag rachungi, to chumbe mane tiendegi lwororee nolos mobedogimoro achiel gi rachungi.  Bor modhi malo mar tielo ka tielo ne romomita achiel.
To tiendego nolos machal gi tiend gach lweny.  Chumbe manetiende lwororee, kaachiel gi tiendegi giwegi, nolos gi mula.
Ne nitiesirni ang’wen e tunge ang’wen mag rachungi, to sirnigo nolos mobedogimoro achiel kode.
To ewi rachungi ne nitie chuma molworore, ma bornemodhi malo romo mita achiel.  Chumano gi ramekni mage kod bethene nolosmobedo gimoro achiel kode.
Kuom rameknigo kod pewe, nopayoe kerubi gisibuoche kod yiend othidhe kama thuolo ne yudoree, kendo nokiewgi gioko.
Kamano e kaka noloso rachungigo duto apar mag mula, kendo romgigi kitgi ne chal.
Eka noloso kareche apar mag mula, ma moro ka moro ne nyalo ting’o pima dirom depe mia achiel, to lach karaya ka karaya noromo mita ariyo. Rachungi apargo moro ka moro, ne nigi karache owuon.
Noketo rachungiabich e bath Hekalu korachwich kendo abich e bathe koracham, to Nam chanoketo e bath Hekalu korachwich, yo wuok chieng’ mochomo milambo.
Achien Huram noloso agulini gi rajope kod tewni.  Kamano notieko tijeduto mag Odd Ruoth Nyasaye ni ruoth Solomon.
Noseloso sirni ariyo, giagulini madongo ariyo mane ni e wi sirni, gi oserni mag mula ma noumoagulini ariyogo,
kod gik mong’inore ong’inore mia ang’wen ma noried elaini ariyo e kor oserni;
gi rachungi apar, gi kareche apar mane orenjkuom rachungigo,
kaachiel gi Nam cha, gi ruedhi apar gariyo maneorenjie Namno;
gi agulini gi rajope kod tewni.  Gigo duto mag Od RuothNyasaye, Huram noloso ni ruoth Solomon gi mula mang’ang’ni.
Nolosogi epaw aora Jordan e lop chuech man e kind Sukoth gi Zerethan.
To Solomonne ok opimo pek gigo, nikech ne ging’eny ahinya.  Omiyo pek mula maneolosgigo ne ok ong’ere.
Solomon noloso gik moko duto mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nolosokendo-mar-misango mar dhahabu ma ting’o makati miketo e nyim RuothNyasaye;
gi rachung teyni apar mag dhahabu maler maiye.  Bende nolosothiepe, gi teyni kod ramekni mag dhahabu;
gi kikombe, gi rangis teyni,gi degi, gi tewni mag ubani, kod tegni mag mach.  Magi duto nolos gidhahabu maler.  Pata mag dhood Hekalu bende nolos gi dhahabu.
Kamano ruoth Solomon notieko tich duto mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, ekanoomo gik moko duto mane Daudi wuon mare osechiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, minoketogi kar keno mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ne gin fedha, gi dhahabu kod gikmamoko.
Ruodhi
Solomon okelo Sandug Muma e Hekalu(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Solomon nochoko jodong Israel duto Jerusalem, mondo oom Sandug Mumamar Ruoth Nyasaye e dala Daudi miluongo ni Sayun.
Mi jo-Israel dutonochokore gi ruoth Solomon chieng’ sawo ma nitimo higa ka higa e due marabiriyo miluongo ni Ethanim.
Kane jodong Israel duto osebiro, jodolonoting’o Sandug Muma.
Ne gikele kaachiel gi Hemb Romo, kod gik mokoduto mane nie Hema mitiyogo tich Nyasaye.  Jodolo kod jo-Lawi emanokelogi.
Ruoth Solomon gi jo-Israel duto ma nochokore kode ne nie nyim Sanduk,ka gitimo misengni gi rombe kod ruedhi mokadho akwana.
Eka jodolonorwako Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye kama nolosne e bwo buomb kerubi,ei ot maiye mar Hekalu miluongo ni Kama Ler Moloyo,
nimar kerubi noyarobwombegi ewi kama Sanduk betie, ka giume kaachiel gi ludhe miting’ego.
Ludhego ne boyo ahinya, ma wigi ne nenore oko e Kama Ler mane nie nyimot maiye, to ne ok ginen oko mar Hekalu.  Pod gin kanyo nyaka chilkawuono.
Ne onge gimoro ei Sanduk mak mana kite ariyo mopa, mane Musaoketoe kane en Horeb, kuma Ruoth Nyasaye notimoe winjruok gi jo-Israelka gia e piny Misri.
Kane jodolo owuok oa Kama Ler, bor polo nopong’o Od Ruoth Nyasaye,
mi ne ok ginyal tiyo tichgi mar dolo, nikech duong’ maler mar RuothNyasaye nopong’o Hekalu. Solomon oguedho Hekalu(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
—
.
)
Eka Solomon nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, niketo wang’ chieng’ epolo malo, to isewacho ni nidag e mudho mandiwa.
Koro asegeroni ot mangi duong’ mondo idagie nyaka chieng’. "
Ruoth Solomon nowichore, kendo kane jo-Israel duto ma nochokoreochung’, noguedhogi.
Nowacho niya, "Apako Ruoth Nyasaye ma NyasachIsrael, mosechopo singruok ma notimo ni Daudi wuora, kowachone ni,
‘Chakre ndalo mane areso joga Israel, kagologi e piny Misri, pokayiero dala moro kuom dhout Israel duto, mondo ogernae ot ma nyingabetie, to nayiero Daudi mondo obed jatend joga Israel. ’
Ung’eyo niDaudi wuora ne dwaro gero ot ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,
toRuoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, ‘Nitimo maber, kuom paro gerona ot.
Katakamano, in ok niger odno, to mana wuodi mibiro nywolo ema nogernago. ’
Koro Ruoth Nyasaye osechopo singruok ma notimo, nikech asebet karDaudi wuora, kendo an e ruodh Israel, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosingore. Mi asegero ot ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,
kendo aseikoe karbet ni Sanduk moting’o weche mag singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye otimo gikwerewa, kogologi e piny Misri. "
Eka Solomon nochung’ e dho kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye, e nyimjo-Israel duto.  Norieyo bedene malo kochomo polo,
mowacho niya, "ARuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel onge nyasaye moro e piny mwalo machalkodi.  Irito singruokni mitimo gi jotichni ma wuotho e yoreni gi chunygiduto, kendo iherogi gi hera mosiko.
Isechopo singruok mane itimo niDaudi wuora ma jatichni.  Adier, gima niwacho ema koro isetimo.
Emomiyo, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, chop singruok mane itimo niDaudi wuora ma jatichni, kiwachone ni, ‘Anywolani nobed ruodhi magIsrael nyaka chieng’, to mana ka yawuoti oritore, kendo owuotho e nyimakaka isewuotho. ’
Koro Nyasach Israel, wachni ma niwacho ni Daudi wuorama jatichni, mondo otimre.
"In Nyasaye, bende didag e piny? Ka kata polo maduong’ manadi ok nyalromi, to koro ot masegeronini direm marom nadi!
Kata kamano, RuothNyasaye ma Nyasacha, yie mondo iwinj lemona gi kwayona, kendo iwinjywakna makeloni tinende,
Odiechieng’ gotieno mondo irang ot misewachoni nyingi nobedieni, kendo iwinj lemo ma anakwa ka eri.
Iwinj kwayo maan kod jogi Israel biro kwayi ka eri.  Yie iwinj e polo kama idakie, tokiwinjo, to mondo iwenwa richowa.
"Ka ng’ato otimo ni wadgi marach, kendo okete mondo ocham muma, miokuong’ore e nyim kendo-mar-misango manie odni,
to iwinj e polo, kendoing’ad buch jotichni, kikumo ng’at moketho, kendo kidwoko richone e wiyeowuon.  To jal makare mondo iket kare, kimiye pok moromo gi timne maber.
"Ka wasigu oloyo jogi Israel nikech gisekethoni, to koro gilokore iri,kendo gisayi e odni,
to yie mondo iwinjgi gi e polo, kiweyonigirichogi, kendo idwokgi e piny ma nimiyo kweregi.
"Ka polo ong’awo, ma koth onge, nikech jogi Israel osekethoni, migilemo ka eri, kendo giyie duong’ni ka gilokore giweyo richogi nikechikumogi,
to yie mondo iwinjgi e polo, kiweyonigi richogi.  Nyisgi yomaber ma onego giwuothie, kendo imi koth chue e pinyi misemiyo jogimondo obed mwandugi.
"Ka kech kata dera mar tho marach nie piny, kata ka cham orochore ewidongo, kata ka bonyo kata kungu nitie, kata ka wasigu olworo dala moro,kata ka tho kata tuo manade nitie,
mi ng’ato olami ka kwayi gimoro,korieyo bedene kochomo Hekaluni, (nimar ng’ato ka ng’ato ong’eyo gimachando chunye,)
to yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie.  Iwene richone,kendo ichop lemone, kimiye moromo gi timbene, nikech in kendi emaing’eyo chuny ji duto.
Kuom mano, mondo giluori ndalo duto ma gidakgoe piny ma nimiyo kwerewani.
"Ka ng’ama wendo ma ok achiel kuom jogi Israel obiro mondo olem eHekaluni, koa e piny mabor nikech nyingi,
(nimar ji biro winjo humbnyingi maduong’, gi mar lueti motegno kod mar badi morie,)
to yiemondo iwinj e polo kama idakie, kendo itim duto ma ng’at ma wendonookwayi.  Kamano ji duto mae piny mondo ong’e nyingi, kendo oluori, manakaka jogi Israel oluori, kendo mondo ging’e ni Hekalu ma asegeronini enmari adier.
"A Ruoth Nyasaye, ka jogi dhi e lweny kedo gi wasikgi kamoro amoramiorogie, mi gilami, ka gichomo dala miseyiero kod Hekalu ma asegeroni,
to yie mondo iwinji e polo, lemo ma gikwayigo, kendo ikonygi.
"Ka gitimo gima isekwero, (nimar onge ng’ato ma ok kethi,) kendoikecho kodgi, michiwogi e lwet wasikgi mondo otergi e tuech e pinywasikgigo, kuma bor kata kuma chiegni,
to eka bang’e giloko parogi epiny motuegieno, mi chunygi olokore, kendo gikwayi niya, ‘Waseketho,kwatimo wich teko kod richo,’
mi giduogo iri gi parogi duto, kendo gichunygi duto, e piny wasikgi ma notuegieno, kendo gilami ka gichomopinygi mane imiyo kweregi, kod dala mane iyiero, gi Hekalu maasegeronini,
to yie mondo iwinj lemogi ma gikwayigo e polo kamaidakie, kendo ikonygi.
Iwe ni jogi richogi duto ma gisetimo, kodchwanyruok duto ma gisechwanyorego e nyimi, kendo imi joma noterogi etuech ong’wonnigi ka kechogi,
nikech gin jogi, kendo gin mwanduni maneigolo e piny Misri, kireso e sand mager ka mach makakni.
"A Ruoth Nyasaye, winj kwayona gi kwayo mag jogi Israel, kichiko itimondo iwinjgi sa moro amora ma giywaknie,
nimar niyierogi kuom ji dutomae piny mondo gibed jogi, kaka kwerewa Misri. "
Kane Solomon osetieko lamo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kwaye wechego duto,noa malo e nyim kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kama nosegoyoechonge piny, morieyo bedene kochomo polo.
Kane osechung’ noguedhooganda Israel duto gi dwol maduong’, kowacho niya,
"Apako RuothNyasaye, mosemiyo joge Israel kue, kochopo gik moko duto mane osingore. Onge kata wach achiel moserem kuom singruokne duto mabeyo mane omiyoMusa jatichne owacho.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa obed kodwa, kakanobet gi kwerewa.  Kik owewa kata kik ojwang’wa,
to mondo okonywa ketochunywa kuome, wawuoth e yorene duto, kendo wamak chikene gi buchene kodwechene mane ochiko kwerewa.
Wechena ma asehombogo Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwagi mondo obed e nyime odiechieng’ gotieno, mondo okonyakaachiel gi joge Israel, kaka dwarore odiechieng’ kodiechieng’.
Jiduto mae piny ngima mondo ong’e ni Ruoth Nyasaye kende e Nyasaye, kendoonge moro.
Koro mondo chunyu obed malong’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa, kuwuotho e yorene, kendo kurito chikene, kaka utimo kawuono. "
Eka ruoth Solomon, kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto, notimo misengni niRuoth Nyasaye.
Solomon nochiwo ruedhi alufu piero ariyo gariyo, kodrombe alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo, (
,
) kotimogo misengni magsawo.  Mano e kaka ruoth kod jo-Israel duto noyango Hekalu ni RuothNyasaye.
Chieng’ono ruoth nopwodho dier laru mane nie nyim Hekalu marRuoth Nyasaye, nikech kanyo ema notimoe misengni miwang’o pep, gimisengni mag sawo, nikech kendo-mar-misango mar mula mane ok nyal timiemisengnigo duto.
E ndalogo Solomon, kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto, notimo sawo maduong’ enyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo.  Oganda maduong’ nochokore kanyomoa e piny Israel duto, chakre kama idonjogo Hamath nyaka aora maniekind pinygi kod piny Misri.
To chieng’ mar aboro nomiyogi thuolo, migidok miechgi ka gidendo ruoth.  Ne gimor kendo giil, nikech gik mabeyoduto mane Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo ni Daudi jatichne, kendo ni joge Israel.
Ruodhi
Nyasaye ochako ofwenyore ni Solomon(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane Solomon osetieko gero Od Ruoth Nyasaye, gi ode owuon, kod udi dutomane odwaro gero,
Nyasaye nofwenyorene kendo, kaka nofwenyorenemokwongo e dala Gibeon.
Nowachone niya, "Asewinjo lemoni kod kwayoni,mi asegwedho Hekalu misegeronani.  Aketo nyinga kanyo mochwere, kendowengena kod chunya nobedie nyaka chieng’.
To in, kiwuotho e nyima gichuny makare kod bidhruok, kitimo duto masechiki, kendo kimako chikenagi buchena kaka Daudi wuoru notimo,
eka anagur loch mar nyikwayi eIsrael nyaka chieng’ mana kaka nasingora ni Daudi wuoru, ka awachone ni,‘Ndalo duto, nyikwayi nobed ruodhi mag Israel. ’
To ka un katanyithindu, ulokoru muweyo luwa, ka ok umako wechena gi chikena maneaketo e nyimu, mudhi tiyo ni nyiseche mamoko, kendo lamogi,
to anagoljo-Israel e piny mane amiyogi, kendo Hekalu masewalo ni nyingani naketh,mondo olal e wang’a, mi nying Israel nolok ka ngero, kendo gima ji dutojaro.
To bende Hekaluni nodong’ gunda, kendo ji duto ma kadho butenowuor kendo nohum, ka gipenjo niya, ‘Ang’o momiyo Ruoth Nyasaye osetimogima kama ni pinyni gi Hekaluni?’
Eka nodwokgi niya, ‘Ne giweyo RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachgi, mane ogolo kweregi e piny Misri, mi ne gilamonyiseche mamoko, kendo gitiyonigi.  Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye osekelomasichegi duto kuomgi. ’ "Gik mamoko ma Solomon otimo(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane higni piero ariyo mane Solomon ogeroe Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi odeowuon oserumo,
nomiyo Hiram mier piero ariyo e piny Galili.  (Hiramruodh Turo nosemiyo Solomon bap sida gi bap saipras kod dhahabu kakanodwaro. )
To kane Hiram oa Turo mondo odhi one mier mane Solomonomiye, ne ok oherogi.
Omiyo nowacho niya, "Owadwa, imiya mier machalnadi?" Emomiyo nochako gweng’no ni ‘piny Kabul’ (tiende ni, piny motimoongoro. ) Pod iluonge kamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Hiram nokowo ni RuothSolomon dhahabu moromo kilo alufu ang’wen.
Tije mane ruoth Solomon otiyo gi joma nichuno mondo oti gi thwon emagi: nogero Od Ruoth Nyasaye, gi ode owuon, gi Milo, kod ohinga marGezer, gi Hazor, gi Megido kod Gezer.
(Noyudo ka Farao ruodh Misriosedhi, mokawo Gezer, mowang’o gi mach, kendo nosenego jo-Kanaan modakkanyo, mi dalano nomiyo nyare ma chi Solomon kaka chiwo mar kopo.
Manoemomiyo Solomon nochako gero Gezer kendo. ) Bende nogero Beth-horon maMwalo,
gi Baalath, gi Tamar manie thim e piny Juda,
kod mier dutomag keno mane en go, gi mier mokanoe gechene mag lweny, kod miech jogema joidh farese,.  Bende Solomon nogero udi e Jerusalem, kod Lebanon,kendo e pinye duto, kaka nodwaro.
Ji duto ma nodong’ e piny Israelkuom jo-Amor, gi jo-Hiti, gi-jo-Perizi, gi jo-Hivi, kod jo-Jebus, ma okjo-Israel,
Solomon noloko wasumbni mochuno mondo oti gi thwon, kakaobet nyaka chil kawuono.  Ne gin joma notamo jo-Israel tieko chuth.
Solomon ne ok oloko jo-Israel wasumbni to noketogi jolweny, gi jobura,gi jodong lweny, gi jotend joidh gechene kod joidh faresene.
Ne en gijotelo madongo mia abich gi piero abich mane rito jotichne.
Nyar Farao noa e dala Daudi, modhi e ode mane Solomon osegerone, ekaSolomon nogero Milo.
Didek e higa, Solomonn ne timo misengni miwang’o pep, gi mag sawo ekendo-mar-misango ma nogero ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kowang’o ubani e nyimRuoth Nyasaye.  Kamano nochopo singruokne.
Ruoth Solomon nohondho yiedhi moko Ezion-geber but Eloth e dho wadhNam Makwar e piny Edom.
Eka Hiram nooro jokwang’ molony kuom tich nammondo oti e yiedhigo kaachiel gi jotich Solomon.
Ne gidhi Ofir, kumane giomoe dhahabu moromo kilo alufu apar gang’wen, mi ne gikelo ni ruothSolomon.
Ruodhi
Ruoth madhako mar Sheba olimo Solomon(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane ruoth madhako ma Sheba owinjo humb Solomon korka nying RuothNyasaye, nobiro mondo oteme gi penj mang’eny matek.
Nobiro Jerusalem gioganda maduong’ ahinya, kod ngamia moting’o gik mang’ue ng’ar, gidhahabu mogundho, kod kite mabeyo ma nengogi tek.  Ka nobiro ir Solomon,nopenje duto mane nie chunye.
To Solomon nodwoko penjone duto, maongemoro mane otame dwoko.
Kane ruoth madhako mar Sheba oneno riekone duto,gi ot ma nosegero,
gi chiemb ode, gi jotichne, gi rwakruokgi, gi jolosdivai mage, kod misengni ma notimo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, dhoge nomoko.
Nowacho ni ruoth niya, "Kara humb timbeni gi riekoni ma nawinjo e pinyaen adier!
Kane pok abiro mi anenogi gi wang’a, ne ok anyal yie ni ginadier.  To koro aneno ni nonyisa mana dir wach, ni mar riekoni kodmwanduni oloyo huma ma nawinjo.
Mondi kod jotichni johawi mawinjoriekoni ndalo duto!
Apako Ruoth ma Nyasachi moheri, kendo oketi ruodhIsrael.  Ruoth Nyasaye oseketi ruoth ni mondo ing’ad bura kare. "
Ekanomiyo ruoth Solomon dhahabu moromo kilo alufu abiriyo, kod kite manengogi tek.  Solomon ne ok ochako oyudo gik mang’ue ng’ar ma dirom gimago mane ruoth madhako mar Sheba omiye.
To bende yiedhi mag Hiram mane dhi Ofir omo dhahabu, ne kelo yiendalmug mang’eny,, gi kite ma nengogi tek.
Yien-go ruoth nolosogo sirnimag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, gi mag ode owuon, kod thumbe nyatiti gi nyigwernimane jower wergo e Hekalu.  Yiend almug machal kamago pok okel kata pokone nyaka chil kawuono.
Ruoth Solomon nomiyo ruoth madhako mar Sheba gimoro amora ma nokwayo,komedogi kuom mago ma nosemiye kuom herone.  Eka ruodh Sheba nodok epinye kaachiel gi jotichne. Mwandu Solomon gi humbe(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Pek mar dhahabu mane ikelo ni Solomon higa ka higa ne romo kilo alufupiero ariyo gadek,
ka ok okwano mago mane wuok e osuch joohala, kendokuom ruodhi duto mag piny Arabia, kendo kuom jorit piny.
Ruoth Solomon nochuogo kuodi mia ariyo, kendo kuot ka kuot nobaw gidhahabu moromo kilo abiriyo.
Nochuogo bende okumbni mia adek, kendookumba ka okumba nobaw gi dhahabu moromo kilo ariyo.  Magi duto ruothnoketoe Od Bungu mar Lebanon.
Bende noloso kom duong’ mang’ongo marlak liech, mobawo gi dhahabu maler.
Kom duong’no ne nigi raidhi man gikuonde minyono auchiel.  Ka toke ne nitie nyaroya mar dhahabu, tosibuoche ariyo mag dhahabu nochung’ e bath bede kom koni gi koni,
kendo sibuoche apar gariyo moko nochung’ moro ka moro e dir raidhikoni gi koni.  Onge piny moro ma noselosie kom ruoth machal gi mano.
Kikombe duto mag Solomon nolos gi dhahabu, kendo gik moko dutomikonyruokgo e Od Bungu mar Lebanon bende nolos gi dhahabu maler.  Ongegimoro mane olos gi fedha, nikech fedha ne ok kwan ka gimoro e ndalo magSolomon.
Ruoth Solomon ne nigi yiedhi mane kwang’ e nam, kaachiel giyiedhi mag Hiram.  Ne gidongo, machal gi mago mane dhi Tarshish.  Bang’higni adek adek, yiedhigo ne kelo dhahabu gi fedha, gi lak liech, giiong’eche kod bimbe.
Kamano Ruoth Solomon noloyo ruodhi duto mag piny gi mwandu kendo girieko.
Piny duto ne biro ir Solomon mondo owinj rieko mane Nyasayeomiye.
Higa ka higa, ng’ato ka ng’ato ne kelone chiwo mag gik molos gifedha gi dhahabu, kaachiel gi lewni, kod gilwenje, gi gik mang’we ng’ar,gi farese kod nyumbu. Ohand farese gi geche lweny ma Solomon oloko(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
;
.
-
)
Solomon nochako ong’iewo geche mag lweny kod farese.  Ne en gi gechealufu achiel gi mia ang’wen.  Kod farese alufu apar gariyo, ma mokonoketo e miech geche, to moko ne en go Jerusalem.
Solomon nomiyo fedha obedo mang’eny ka kuoyo e Jerusalem, kendo yiendsida bende ne ng’eny ka ng’owo ma e pap.
Ne oomo farese Misri gi Koah,kuma johala mage ne ng’iewogie kuom nengo moketi.
Gari achielning’iewo Misri gi kilo abiriyo mag fedha, to faras achiel nengonenoromo kilo ariyo, kendo johala mag ruoth ne terogi ni ruodhi duto magjo-Hiti gi mag jo-Aram.
Ruodhi
Solomon odok chien moweyo Nyasaye
Ruoth Solomon nohero nyi pinje mamoko mang’eny.  Nokendo nyar Farao, ginyi Amon, gi nyi Edom, gi nyi Sidon, kod nyi Hiti.
To Ruoth Nyasayenosewuoyo ni jo-Israel kuom ogendnigo niya, "Kik ukend nyigi, to ginbende kik uyienigi mondo gikend nyiu, nikech adier ginilok chunyu mondoulam nyisechegi. " To kata kamano Solomon nohero mon-go ahinya.
Ne en gimon mia abiriyo ma nyi ruodhi, kod mon mamoko mia adek.
To kane oseti,mondego noloko chunye, molamo nyiseche mamoko, kendo chunye ne ok nikare gi Ruoth Nyasaye kaka chuny Daudi wuon mare ne ni kare.
Solomon nelamo Ashtoreth, nyasaye ma dhako mar jo-Sidon, kod Milkom, nyasachjo-Amon.
Notimo gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye okwero, kendo ne ok ohero RuothNyasaye chutho kaka Daudi wuon mare nohero.
Nogero ut lemo ni Kemosh,nyasach jo-Moab, kendo ni Molek, nyasach jo-Amon, ewi got yo wuokchieng’ mar Jerusalem.
Kamano e kaka notimo ni mondene duto ma nyipinje mamoko, mane wang’o ubani kendo timo misengni ni nyisechegi.
Koro Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho gi Solomon, nikech chunye nosea kuom RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel mane ofwenyorene diriyo,
mochike ni kik olamnyiseche mamoko, to ne ok orito chik Ruoth Nyasaye.
Emomiyo RuothNyasaye nowacho ni Solomon niya, "Ok iserito singruokna gi buchena kakanachiki, omiyo abiro golo loch kuomi, mi ami achiel kuom jotichni.
Okabi timo kamano e ndaloni, nikech pod aparo Daudi wuoru, to anagol loche lwet wuodi.
Kata kamano ok anagole duto, to anawene dhoot achiel,nikech ahero Daudi jatichna, kendo nikech dala Jerusalem ma aseyiero. "Wasik Solomon
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Hadad ja-Edom obedo jasik Solomon; ne en jadhood gi ruodh Edom.
Hadad notony e kinde mane Daudi ni Edom.  Ndalogoema Joab jaduong’ oganda lweny odhi yikoe joma osetho, kendo ne ginegochwo duto Edom.
Joab gi jo-Isarel duto nodong’ kuno kuom duecheauchiel, nyaka ne gitieko chwo duto Edom.
Kane Hadad pod rawera,noringo odhi nyaka Misri, gi jo-Edom moko ma jotich wuon mare.
Negiwuok Midian, mi gibiro Paran, ir ruoth Farao, mi ruoth Farao nomiyeot, gi chiemo, kod lowo.
Koro Hadad noyudo ng’wono maduong’ ahinyakuom Farao, mi Farao nomiye yuore ma nyamin Tapenes ma mikache mondoobed chiege.
Chiege, ma nyamin Tapenesno, nonywolone wuowi miluongo niGenubath, ma Tapenes nopidho e od Farao; nobedo e od ruoth kaachiel giyawuot Farao.
To kane Hadad owinjo e Misri ni Daudi osetho, kendo Joabjaduong’ oganda lweny bende osetho, nokwayo Farao niya, "Weya adogthurwa. "
Farao nopenje ni, "Ang’o moremi kuoma ka, momiyo idwaro dokthuru?" Nodwoke niya, "Onge gimoro, to weya aweya mondo adhi. " Kamano ekaka Hadad nodoko jasik jo-Israel, mi othagogi.  Nobedo ruodh Edom.
Nyasaye nomiyo Razon wuod Eliada bende obedo jasik Solomon.  Jalinoseringo moweyo ruodhe Hadadezer ma ruodh Zoba,
kendo kane Daudiosekawo Zoba, Razon nochoko mony, mobet jatendgi.  Eka nokawo dalano.
Ne en jasik Israel ndalo duto mag Solomon. Ahija okoro ni Jeroboam biro bedo ruodh dhout Israel apar
Jatich Solomon moro bende nopiem kode.  Ne ne Jeroboam wuod Nebat,ja-Efraim ma ja-Zareda.  Nying min mare ne Zerua, ma chi liel.
Gimanokelo piem e ma:Noyudo Solomon gero Milo, kendo dino kuonde mopodho manie kor ohinga mardala Daudi wuon mare.
Jeroboam ne ng’at maratego, kendo kane Solomononeno ni ojatich matek, nokete jarit jotich duto michuno mar dhoodJosef.
Chieng’ moro ka Jeroboam ne wuok Jerusalem, Ahija janabi, ma ja-Shilonoromo kode e yo.  Ji ariyogo ne nie pap kendgi, to noyudo ka Ahijaorwako law manyien.
Ahija nomako lawe manyienno, moyiecho kidienjeapar gariyo.
Nowacho ni Jeroboam niya, "Kaw kidienje apar obed maginimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho niya, ‘Winji, achiegni gololoch e lwet Solomon.  Abiro miyi dhoudi apar,
to Solomon nodong’ gidhoot achiel, mana nikechh ahero Daudi jatichna, kendo nikech Jerusalemdala maseyiero kuom dhoudi duto mag Israel.
Abiro golo loch kuomenikech oseweya, molamo Ashtoreth, nyasaye madhako mar jo-Sidon, giKemosh nyasach jo-Moab, kod Milkom nyasach jo-Amon, ka ok oluw yorenamondo otim gik malong’ona, kata rito chikena gi buchena kaka Daudi wuonmare notimo.
Kata kamano ok abi golo loch duto e lwete, to enosikjatelo ndalo duto mag ngimane, mana nikech ahero Daudi jatichna manayiero.  En jal ma norito chikena gi buchena.
To abiro golo loch elwet wuode, mi amiyi dhoudi apar.
Wuode to abiro miyo dhoot achiel,mondo Daudi jatichna obed gi taya maliel e nyima e Jerusalem, dalamaseyiero mondo aketie nyinga.
To abiro kawi, mondo ibed ruodh Israelkaka chunyi dwaro.
Kiwinjo wechena duto, kendo kiwuotho e yorena, miitimo gima long’ona, kirito chikena kod buchena kaka Daudi jatichnanotimo, eka nabed kodi, kendo nagur dhoodi mosiko, kaka naguro dhoodDaudi; kendo anamiyi piny Israel.
Kamano e kaka anasand koth Daudi, took nyaka chieng’. ’ "
Mano emomiyo Solomon ne dwaro nego Jeroboam, to Jeroboam noringo,modhi Misri ir Shishak ruodh Misri, kendo nodak kuno nyaka Solomonnotho. Tho mar Solomon(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Weche moko mag Solomon, gi timbene duto, kod riekone ondik e KitapTimbe mag Solomon.
Kinde mane Solomon obedo ruodh Israel duto kodakJerusalem noromo higni piero ang’wen.
Solomon notho, moyike e dalaDaudi wuon mare.  Rehoboam wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Ruodhi
Dhout Israel mamoko ong’anyo ni ruoth Rehoboam(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
—
.
)
Rehoboam nodhi Shekem, nikech jo-Israel duto nosechokore kuno mondookete ruoth.
To kane Jeroboam wuod Nebat owinjo wachno, noduogo oaMisri, nikech ne pod en Misri kuma nodhiye koringo ruoth Solomon.
Negioro ne wach mondo obi Shekem, mi nobiro gi jo-Israel duto.  Eka negiwacho ni Rehoboam niya,
"Wuoru miyowa ting’ mapek, emomiyo in korong’ad ting’ mapek mane oketo kuomwa, eka wanatini. "
Nodwokogi ni,"Doguru mondi kuom ndalo adek, eka uduog ira. " Mi ne gidok.
Ruoth Rehoboam noporo wach gi jodongo ma yande ng’ado rieko ni Solomonwuon mare ka pod ngima, kowachonigi niya, "Nyisauru gima dadwok jogo. "
Ne gidwoke niya, "Yie ibed jatichgi kawuono, kidwokogi gi weche mabeyo,eka gibiro bedo jotichni ndalo duto. "
To Rehoboam nodagi rieko manejodongo ong’adone, mi noporo wach gi yawuowi ma mbesene mane ni kode,
kopenjogi niya, "Ere kaka dadwok joma osekwaya mondo ang’adnigi ting’mapek mane wuora oketo kuomgi?"
Ne gidwoke niya, "Dwok joma okwayimondo ing’adnigi ting’ mapek mane wuoru omiyogi, kiwachonigi kama: ‘Lithlweta matung’ duong’ moloyo nungo wuora.
Wuora ero nomiyou ting’mapek, an to abiro medou moloyo.  Wuora nochwadou gi del, an to abirochwadou gi thomoni. ’ "
Chieng’ mar adek, Jeroboam gi oganda nobiro ir ruoth Rehoboam, kakanochikogi mondo gidog ire.
Ruoth nodwokogi kager.  Noweyo rieko manejodongo ong’adone,
to noluwo rieko mbesene, kowacho niya, "Wuoranomiyou ting’ mapek, an to abiro medou moloyo.  Wuora nochwadou gi del,an to abiro chwadou gi thomoni. "
Kamano ruoth ne ok odewo ji.  To RuothNyasaye ema nomiyo gigo otimore kamano, mondo ochop singruok mane omiyoAhija ja-Shilo owacho ni Jeroboam wuod Nebat.
Kane jo-Israel oneno ni ruoth ok odewogi, ne gidwoke niya,"Waonge wat gi Daudi!Ok wan libamba achiel gi wuod Jesse!Wadoguru dala, wan jo-Israel. Un oganda Daudi,koro rituru mana dhoodu. "
Mi jo-Israel nodok miechgi.
Ruoth Rehoboam nooro Adoram mane jarit jogo michuno mondo oti githwon,to jo-Israel duto nogoye gi kite nyaka otho.  Kuom mano, ruoth Rehoboamnoidho gache piyopiyo, moringo nyaka Jerusalem mondo otony.
Chakrechieng’no, joi-Israel osebet ka dagi loch dhood Daudi nyaka chilkawuono.
Kane jo-Israel duto owinjo ni Jeroboam oseduogo, ne giluonge echokruok mi gikete ruodh Israel duto.  Onge joma nodok ni Rehoboam kodjood Daudi mak mana jo-Juda kende, gi jo-Israel mane odak e dierjo-Juda.
Kane Rehoboam ochopo Jerusalem, nochoko jolweny moyier alufu miaachiel gi piero aboro (
,
) kuom jo-Juda duto gi jo-Benjamin.  Negidhi kedo gi jo-Israel, mondo gidwok loch ni Rehoboam wuod Solomon.
To wach Nyasaye nobiro ni Shemaya ng’at Nyasaye niya,
"Wuo kodRehoboam wuod Solomon ruodh Juda, gi dhoodgi duto, gi jo-Benjamin, kodjoge duto, kiwachonigi ni,
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama, ‘Kik udhi ukedgi oweteu ma jo-Israel, to ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo odog dala, nikech gimatimoreni oa kuoma. ’ " Ne giwinjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gidok miechgikaka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho. Ruoth Jeroboam otero jo-Israel e richo
Jeroboam nogero Shekem e piny gode mag Efraim, modak kuno.  Bang’e noakanyo, modhi ogero Penuel.
Jeroboam ne paro niya,
"Ka pod jogi dhi Jerusalem e Hekalu mar RuothNyasaye, to chunygi biro dok ir Rehoboam ma ruodhgi, ma ruodh Juda,kendo loch biro dok ni dhood Daudi.  Gininega, kendo ginidog ni Rehoboamruodh Juda. "
Omiyo ruoth Jeroboam noporo wach, moloso nyiruedhi ariyomag dhahabu.  Eka nowacho ni ji niya, "Un jo-Israel, usedhi Jerusalemmoromo.  Koro neuru nyisecheu mane ogolou e piny Misri!"
Noketonyarwath achiel Bethel, yo milambo mar piny Israel, to machielo noketoDan, yo nyandwat.
Wachni nomiyo jo-Israel obedo joketho, nikech jimoko ne dhi lamo nyarwath man Bethel, to ji moko ne dhi Dan.
Nogero utliswa e hembko mane oseloso moketoe jodolo moa e dhoudi duto, kata maneok nyikwa Lawi.
Jeroboam nogolo chik mondo otim sawo due apar gabich,due mar aboro, machal gi sawo mane jo-Juda timo, kendo notimo misango ninyiruedhi mane oloso Bethel.  Nogolo jodolo matiyo e hembko mane oseloso,moketo Bethel.
Chieng’ due apar gabich, due mar aboro, due maneoseyiero, nosudo e dho kendo-mar-misango mane oseloso Bethel, motimosawo ni jo-Israel kendo owang’o misango e kendono.
Ruodhi
Janabi moa Juda okwero ruoth Jeroboam
To Ruoth Nyasaye nosewacho ni jatichne moro mondo oa Juda odhiBethlehem, mi jalo nodhi moyudo Jeroboam kochung’ e dhokendo-mar-misango kawang’o misango.
Ng’at Nyasayeno nokuong’okendo-mar-misango kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike, koywage niya, "Yaye,kendo-mar-misango! Yaye, kendo-mar-misango! Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:Enonywol wuowi e dhood Daudi, ma nochak nyinge ni Josia.  Enoneg jodolomag hembko man kuonde moting’ore, ma wang’o ubani kuomi, kendo enowang’choke ji kuomi. "
Eka nokor wach chieng’ono, kowacho niya, "Ranyisi maRuoth Nyasaye osewacho ni biro timore ema: Kendo-mar-misangoni nobarre,kendo buru manie wiye nopukre. "
Kane ruoth Jeroboam owinjo wach mane ng’at Nyasaye okuong’ogokendo-mar-misango man Bethel, nogolo bade e misango, mosiemo ng’atno,kowacho niya, "Makeuru!" To bede mane osiemogo ng’atno notal, mi ne okonyal dole kendo.
Kendo-mar-misango bende nobarore, mi buru manie wiyenopukore.  Mano noluwore gi ranyisi mane ng’at Nyasaye nokoro, mana kakaRuoth Nyasaye nochiko.
Eka ruoth nowacho ni ng’at Nyasaye niya, "KwanaRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mondo bada ochangi. " Eka ng’at Nyasaye notimokamano, mi bade notugore.
Ruoth nowacho ni ng’at Nyasaye niya, "Wadog oda mondo iyue, eka abiromiyi gimoro. "
To ng’at Nyasaye nodwoko ruoth niya, "Kata da bed niimiya mana nus mwanduni, to ok nadonj e odi.  Ok nachiem, kata madhogimoro ok namadh ka,
nikech wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirona ni kik achiemkata kik amadh gimoro, bende kik adog gi yo mane abirogo. "
Omiyonoluwo yo machielo, ka ok odok gi yo ma nodhigo Bethel.
To ne nitie janabi moro moti ma nodak Bethel.  Yawuote nobiro ire,monyise gik moko duto mane ng’at Nyasaye otimo Bethel chieng’ono.  Negihulone weche duto mane ng’atno owacho ni ruoth.
Wuon-gi nopenjogi yomane oluwo, mi ginyise.
Eka nowachonigi ni, "Gawnauru kanyna. " Mi negigawone, moidho.
Noluwo ng’at Nyasaye moyude kobet piny e tiend yathmoro.  Nopenje niya, "In e ng’at Nyasaye mane oa Juda koso?" Ng’atnonodwoke niya, "Ee an"
Eka nowachone ni, "Wadog dala, idhi ichiem. "
To nodwoke ni, "Ok anyal dok kodi, kata donjo e odi ok anyal donjo. Bende ok nachiem kata madho gimoro ok namadhi,
nikech wach RuothNyasaye nobirona ni kik achiem kata kik amadh gimoro, kendo kik adog giyo mane abirogo. "
Janabi motino nowuonde, kawachone niya, "An bende anjanabi kaka in, kendo malaika osekelona wach Ruoth Nyasaye ni mondo abiaomi, wadhi e oda, ichiem. "
Omiyo nodok kode, mochiemo e ode.
To kane pod gichiemo, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni janabi mane oomeno,
mi nowacho ni ng’at Nyasaye mane oa Juda niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owachokama: Isedagi winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi ochiki,
to iseduogomichiemo kama nokweri ni kik ichiemie kata kik imethie.  Emomiyo ringriok noyik gi kwereni. "
Kane gisechiemo, janabi moti mane odwokeno nogawone kanyna,
kendokane jalo osewuok dhiyo, noromo gi sibuor e yo, mi sibuor nonege.  Ringrenoriere e yo, to kanyna gi sibuor nochung’ bute.
Ji mane kadho kanyononeno ringre koriere e yo, kod sibuor kochung’ bute, mi ne gitero wache dala janabi moti cha.
Kane janabino owinjo wachno, nowacho niya, "Nyaka bed ni en ng’atNyasaye mane ok orito wach Ruoth Nyasaye cha.  Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasayeosechiwe ni sibuor, ma koro osenege mokidhe, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenowachone. "
Eka noko ni yawuote ni, "Gawnauru kanyna. " Mi ne gitimokamano.
Nodhi moyudo ringre ng’atno koriere e yo, ka kanyna kod sibuorochung’ bute.  To sibuor ne ok ochamo ringre ng’atno, kata timo gimoro nikanyna ne ok otimo.
Janabino noketo ringre e ng’e kanyna, modwokoBethel, mondo oywage kendo oyike.
Noyiko ringre ng’atno e bure owuon,mi ne giywage, ka giwacho niya, "Yaye owadwa!"
Kane oseyike, nowachoni yawuote niya, "An katho, to uyika e liel moyikie ng’at Nyasayeni,kuketo chokena but chokene,
nimar wach Ruth Nyasaye nochopo kare, kakajali nowacho kokuong’o kendo-mar-misango man Bethel, kod ut lemo maniehembko mag miech Samaria. "
To kata kamano, Jeroboam ne ok oweyo yorene maricho, to nomedo ketojomoko nono mondo obed jodolo ma rito hembko man kuonde moting’ore,kopwodho ng’ato ang’ata ma ne dwaro bedo jadolo.
Timni nomiyo dhoodJeroboam obedo joketho, mi notiekgi chuth, ma onge modong’ e piny.
Ruodhi
Ahija okoro wach marach kuom Jeroboam
E ndalogo Abija wuod Jeroboam ne tuo.
Jeroboam nowacho ni chiege niya,"Lok kiti, mondo kik ng’ato ng’e ni in chiega, kendo idhi Shilo ir Ahijajanabi ma nokoro ni an ema nabed ruodh pinyni.
Kaw makati apar, gi kekmoko kod puga mar mor kich, iterne; enonyisi gima biro timore kuomnyathi. "
Chi Jeroboam notimo kamano; nodhi Shilo mochopo e od Ahija.  Tokoro Ahija ne ok nyal neno; wengene nosechor, nikech hike noniang’.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Ahija niya, "Ng’e ni chi Jeroboam biro irimondo openji wach wuode, nikech wuode tuo. " Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisoAhija kaka onego owuo kod dhakono.  Kane chi Jeroboam ochopo, nowuondoreni en dhako moro nono.
To kane Ahija owinjo tiende e dhoot, nowachoniya, "Donji chi Jeroboam; ang’o momiyo iriasori ni in ng’at moro nono?An gi wach marach monego anyisi.
Dhi iwach ni Jeroboam ni Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach Israel owacho kama: ‘Ne ayieri e kind ji mondo amiyi duong’. Ne aketi jatend joga Israel,
kendo nagolo loch kuom dhood Daudi,mamiyi.  To kata kamano ok isebet ka Daudi jatichna ma norito chikena,kendo noluwa gi chunye duto, katimo mana gik malong’o e nyima,
to iniseketho moloyo joma nokwongoni; iseloso nyisecheni iwuon mag chuma,kimiyago mirima, kendo iselokana ng’eyi.
Emomiyo abiro keloni masirani dhoodi, kendo abiro tieko joodi machwo duto koda ka wasumbni, ma ongeng’ati ma nodong’ e Israel, kendo abiro yweyo jodhoodi oko pep, manakaka ng’ama wang’o owuoyo marum chuth.
Jadhood Jeroboam moro ma nothoe dala, guogi nocham, to mago ma notho oko, winy nocham, nikech RuothNyasaye osewacho kamano. ’
Koro dog dala, to e sa asaya ma tiendenionyonoe da lani i, to nyathi notho.
Jo-Israel duto biro ywage kendoyike, to en ng’at achiel kende kuom jodhood Jeroboam ma noyike e liel,nimar kuome kende ema Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel onwang’oe gimalong’one.
Bende Ruoth Nyasaye noyier ng’at moro obed ruodh Israel, mabiro tieko dhood Jeroboam.  Chakre kawuono,
Ruoth Nyasaye biro goyojo-Israel, mi ginikirni kaka odundu ma pi yiengo, kendo nogol jo-Israeloko e piny maber ma nomiyo kweregini, mi nokegi koterogi loka aoraYufrate nikech gisemiyo Ruoth Nyasaye mirima, ka gichungo sirni milamomiluongo ni Ashera.
Enojwang’ jo-Israel nikech richo Jeroboam, maneomiyo jo-Isarel bende otimo. "
Chi Jeroboam nodok Tirza dalagi, to kane ochopo e dhoot, nyathi chanotho.
Jo-Israel duto noyike, kendo noywage, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenomiyo Ahija janabi ma jatichne owacho.
Weche moko mag Jeroboam, kod lwenjene, kendo kaka norito piny, ondikie Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Jeroboam norito pinykuom higni piero ariyo gariyo.  Notho moyike, eka Nadab wuode nodokoruoth kare. Loch Rehoboam, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Rehoboam wuod Solomon, ma min mare niluongo ni Naama, nyar Amon,nodoko ruodh Juda.  Nochako tich ka en jahigni piero ang’wen gachiel,kendo norito piny kuom higni apar gabiriyo, kodak Jerusalem, dala maneRuoth Nyasaye oyiero kuom dhout Israel duto mondo nyinge obedie.
Jo-Juda notimo gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye okwero, mi richogi nomiyo RuothNyasaye ojok kodgi moloyo kweregi duto.
Ne giloso ut lemo e hembkomane ni kuonde moting’ore, kendo ne gichungo sirni milamo mag kite gimag yien, e gode maboyo duto, kendo e tiend yien moro amora motimootiep.
Bende ne giketo ji kuonde lemo mondo jolemo oterrego, kaka kitlemo margi nobet.  Jo-Juda ne timo timbe makuero duto mag ogendini maneRuoth Nyasaye oriembo mondo owe ni jo-Israel thuolo.
E higa mar abich mar loch Rehoboam, Shishak ruodh Misri nomonjoJerusalem.
Nokawo mwandu duto mag Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye, gi mag odruoth.  Bende nokawo kuodi duto mag dhahabu mane Solomon oloso,
miruoth Rehoboam noloso kuodi mag mula kar mago, momiyo jotend jorit rangadalane.
Kane ruoth dhi e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye, jorit ne ting’okuodigo, eka bang’e ne gidwokogi ka od jorit.
Koro weche moko mag Rehoboam, gi timbene duto, ondiki e Kitap Wechemag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda.
Ne nitie lweny e kind Rehoboam giJeroboam ndalo duto.
Rehoboam notho, moyike but kwerene e dala Daudi. Min mare ne nyinge Naama nyar Amon.  Abija wuod Rehoboam nodoko ruothkare.
Ruodhi
Loch Abija ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar apar gaboro mar loch Jeroboam wuod Nebat, Abija nodoko ruodhJuda.
Norito piny kuom higni adek, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyingeMaaka, nyar Abishalom.
Abija ne timo richo duto mane wuon mare otimo. Chunye ne ok long’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye kaka chuny Daudi kwar mare nelong’o.
To kata kamano, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache noketo wuode ruothkare, mondo obedne ka taya maliel e Jerusalem mana nikech nying Daudi,kendo nomiyo Jerusalem ogurore,
nimar Daudi notimo gik malong’o niRuoth Nyasaye, kendo e ngimane duto ne ok oketho wach moro mane ochike,mak man wach Uria ja-Hiti.
Ne nitie lweny e kind Ahija gi Jeroboam ndalogi duto.
Weche moko magAbija, gi timbene ondik e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda.
Abija notho, mi noyike e dala Daudi, Asa wuode nodoko ruoth kare. Loch Asa, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
;
.
-
)
E higa mar piero ariyo mar loch Jeroboam ruodh Israel, Asa nodoko ruodhJuda,
mi norito piny kuom higni piero ang’wen gachiel, kodakJerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Maaka nyar Abishalom.
Timbe Asa nelong’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mana kaka timbe Daudi kwar mare.
Noriembojoterruok mag kuonde lemo, kodarogi e pinye, kendo nogolo nyisechemanono mane kwerene oloso.
Bende nogolo Maaka e duong’ne mar bedo minruoth, nikech noloso kido makuero, maket gi nyasaye madhako miluongo niAshera.  Asa nomuko gima ketno, mowang’o e dho aora Kidron.
Hembko maneni kuonde moting’ore ne ok okethi, to kata kamano chuny Asa ne long’o enyim Ruoth Nyasaye e ndalone duto.
Nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kod giklemo, mi oketo e od Ruoth Nyasaye, to moko en owuon ema nochiwo. Asa otimo winjruok gi Benhadad ruodh Aram(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Ne nitie lweny e kind Asa gi Baasha ndalo duto mag ngimagi.
Baasharuodh Israel nodhi monjo jo-Juda, kendo nochielo Rama gi ohinga, moketoejolweny mondo ogeng’ ni ji duto madhi ka Asa ruodh Juda, kata maa kuno.
Eka Asa nokawo fedha gi dhahabu duto ma nodong’ kuom mwandu mag OdRuoth Nyasaye kod mag ode owuon, momiyo jotichne mondo okow ni Ben-hadadruodh Aram, ma wuod Tabrimmon, wuod Hezion, ma nodak Damaski.  Nooronewach niya,
"Winjruok mondo obed e kindwa kodi, kaka winjruok mane niekind wuora gi wuoru.  Ero aoroni chiwo mar fedha gi dhahabu; yie ikethwinjruok manie kindu gi Baasha ruodh Israel, mondo owe kedo koda. "
Ben-hadad noyie kwayo mar ruoth Asa, mi nooro jotend ogend lweny mondoomonj miech Israel.  Noketho Ijon, gi Dan, gii Abel-beth-Maaka, gi pawKineroth duto, kod piny Naftali.
Kane Baasha owinjo gima otimore,noweyo gero ohinga mar Rama, modok Tirza.
Eka ruoth Asa noluongojo-Juda duto, maonge ng’ama odong’.  Ne gigolo kite gi yien duto maneBaasha gerogo ohinga mar Rama, mi Ruoth Asa nochielogo Geba manie pinyBenjamin, kod Mizpa.
Weche moko mag Asa, gi tekone kod timbene duto, gi mier mane ogero,ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda.  Kane oseti, tuo moronomako tiendene.
Notho moyike e dala Daudi kwar mare.  Jehoshafat wuodenodoko ruoth kare. Loch Nadab, ruodh Israel
E higa mar ariyo mar loch Asa ruodh Juda, Nadab wuod Jeroboam nodokoruodh Israel.  Nobedo ruoth kuom higni ariyo,
to notimo gik ma RuothNyasaye okwero, koluwo timbe wuon mare, ma nomiyogo jo-Israel obedojoketho.
Baasha wuod Ahija, ja-Isakar, nojamo Nadab, monege Gibethon, dalajo-Filistia, kane oyudo Nadab gi jo-Israel lworo Gibethon mondo omonji.
E higa mar adek mar loch Asa ruodh Juda ema Baasha nonegoe Nadab,mokawo lochne.
Gikanyono kosedoko ruoth, nonego jood Jeroboam duto. Notieko od Jeroboam chuth, ma ok oweyo kata ng’at achiel kangima, manakaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosemiyo Ahija ja-Shilo ma jatichne owacho.
Manonotimore nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, nokecho gi richo maneJeroboam otimo, kendo mane omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
Weche moko mag Nadab, kod timbene duto, ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalomag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Ne nitie lweny e kind Asa kod Baasha ruodhIsrael e ndalo duto mag ngimagi. Loch Baasha, ruodh Israel
E higa mar adek mar loch Asa ruodh Juda, Baasha wuod Ahija nodokoruodh Israel, morito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gang’wen, kodak Tirza.
Notimo gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye okwero, koluwo timbe Jeroboam ma nomiyogojo-Israel obedo joricho.
Ruodhi
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Jehu wuod Hanani owacho ni Baasha niya,
"Ne amiyiduong’ kagoli e buru, kendo naketi jatend joga Israel, to eka iluwotimbe Jeroboam, kendo imiyo joga Israel obedo joketho, ka gimiya mirimanikech richogi.
Emomiyo abiro yweyi oko, kaachiel gi jodhoodi, kendoanami odi bed kaka od Jeroboam wuod Nebat.
Jodhood Baasha ma otho edala guogi nocham; to mago ma otho oko, winy nocham. "
Weche moko mag Baasha, kaachiel gi tekone, kod timbene duto, ondik eKitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Koro Baasha notho moyikeTirza, eka Ela ma wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
To Ruoth Nyasaye nosemiyoJehu ma wuod Hanani owuoyo kuom Baasha gi dhoode nikech Baasha notimogik ma Ruoth Nyasaye okwero.  Baasha nomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye mirima gitimbene mane chalo gi timbe mag dhood Jeroboam, kendo nikech notiekodhoodno. Loch Ela, ruodh Israel
E higa mar piero ariyo gauchiel mar loch asa ruodh Juda, Ela wuodBaasha nodoko ruodh Israel, mi norito piny kuom higni ariyo kodak Tirza.
To Zimri, ma achiel kuom jotend geche mag lweny nojame, mokedo kode.  Ehiga mar piero ariyo gabiriyo mar loch Asa ruodh Juda, kane oyudo Elaomer Tirza e od Arza mane jarit od ruoth,
Zimri nodonjo, monege, kendookawo lochne.
Kane Zimri osedoko ruoth, nonego jodhood Baasha duto, ma ok oweyo katang’ama dichwo achiel kuom wedene, kata osiepene.
Kamano Zimri notiekodhood Baasha duto, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Jehu janabi owacho.
Manonotimore nikech richo duto mag Baasha gi mag Ela wuode, ma ne gimiyojo-Israel otimo, ka gimiyogo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel mirimanikech nyiseche manono.
Koro weche moko mag Ela, gi timbene duto, ondik e Kitap weche magNdalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel. Loch Zimri, ruodh Israel
Zimri nobet ruoth kuom ndalo abiriyo e higa mar piero ariyo gabiriyomar loch Asa ruodh Israel, kodak Tirza.  Nonwang’o ka jolweny ojot butGibethon, dala jo-Filistia.
Jolweny mane ojotgo nowinjo kiwacho ni,"Zimri osejamo ruoth, monego. " Emomiyo jo-Isarel duto mane nie kar jotnoketo Omri ma jatend lweny mondo obed ruodh Israel chieng’no.
EkaOmri, kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto, nowuok Gibethon, mi gidhi gilworoTirza.
To kane Zimri oneno ni dala osekaw, nodonjo e od ruoth,mochwinyo mach kuom odno, motho kanyo.
Mano notimore nikech notimo gikmane Ruoth Nyasaye okwero, koluwo timbe Jeroboam, kendo nikech nomiyojo-Israel obedo joricho.
Koro weche moko mag Zimri, gi timbene mag andhoga, ondiki e KitapWeche mag Ndalo mag ruodhi mag Israel. Loch Omri, ruodh Israel
Eka jo-Israel nopogore diriyo.  Jomoko noluwo Tibni wuod Ginath, kagidwaro kete ruoth, to jomoko noluwo Omri.
To joma noluwo Omri noloyojo-Tibni wuod Ginath e lweny, mi ginego Tibni, kendo Omri nokawo loch.
E higa mar piero adek gachiel mar loch Asa ruodh Juda, Omri nodokoruodh Israel, motiyo higni apar gariyo, Higni auchiel nodak Tirza,
ekabang’e nong’iewo got Samaria kuom Shemer gi fedha, ma dirom kilo pieroabiriyo kendo nochielo godno gi ohinga, mochake ni Samaria, machal ginying Shemer, ma wuon godno.
Omri notimo gik mane Ruoth Nyasaye okweromoloyo ji duto ma nokwongone,
nikech noluwo timbe duto mag Jeroboamwuod Nebat, kendo nomiyo jo-Israel obedo joricho, ka gimiyo RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel mirima nikech nyisechegi manono.
Koro weche moko mag Omri, gi tekone ma nonyiso, ondik e Kitap Wechemag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Omri notho, moyike Samaria; Ahabwuode nodoko ruoth kare. Loch Ahab, ruodh Israel
E higa mar piero adek gaboro mar loch Asa ruodh Juda, Ahab wuod Omrinodoko ruodh Israel, morito Israel kuom higni piero ariyo gariyo kodakSamaria.
To Ahab wuod Omri notimo gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye okwero moloyojogo duto mane okwongone.
Ok noluwo mana richo mag Jeroboam kende, togima rachie moloyo mane otimo, en ni nokendo Jezebel nyar Ethbaal ruodhjo-Sidon, kendo notiyo ni Baal, kolame.
Noloso kendo-mar-liswa ni Baale ot ma nogero ni Baal Samaria,
kendo nochungo siro milamo miluongo niAshera.  Nomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel mirima moloyo ruodhi dutomag Israel ma nokwongone.
Ndalo Ahab ema Hiel ja-Bethel nogeroeJeriko.  Kane oketo mise, Abiram wuode makayo notho, kendo ka nochungodhorangeyene, Segub wuode machogo notho, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyoJoshua wuod Nun owacho.
Ruodhi
Elija okoro ni oro marach biro biro
Elija ja-Tishbe modak e piny Gilead nowacho ni Ahab niya, "Gi nyingRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, kata tho ok nomok e lum, kata koth oknochue e piny kuom hignigi, mak mana ka awacho. "
Eka wach Ruoth Nyasayenobiro ni Elija niya,
"Aye ka, ichik yo wuok chieng’, kendo ipond ebath aora Kerith, man yo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan.
Inimodh e aora,kendo asechiko agak mondo okelni chiemo kuno. "
Nodhi kaka Ruoth Nyasayenowacho, modak e bath aora Kerith man yo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan.
Agak ne kelone kuon gi ring’o okinyi godhiambo, kendo nomodho e aorano.
To bang ndalo moko aora nodwono, nikech koth ne onge e piny. Elija gi chi liel modak Zarefath
Eka wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirone niya,
"A malo, idhi Zarefath, dalamoro e piny Sidon, idag kuno, nikech asechiko chi liel moro dalano mondoopidhi. "
Omiyo nodhi Zarefath.  To kane ochopo e dhoranga dala, noyudodhako moro ka dondo yien.  Noluonge, mokwaye ni, "Omnae pi matin e agwatamondo amodhi. "
To kane dhakono dhi, Elija nokowone wach ni, "Ikelnaekuon matin bende. "
En to nodwoko ni, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachi, aonge gi gimoro motedi, mak mana sanja mar mogo modong’ e dak,kod mo matin e agulu.  Koro eka adondo yien matin, mondo adhi atedgochiemo, wacham gi wuoda, aye watho. "
Elija nowachone niya, "Kik iluor. Dhi mondo itim kaka asewacho, to mokwongo ited kuon matin ikelna, ekabang’e ited modong’ ucham gi wuodi.
Nimar ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:‘Mogo manie dak, kata mo manie agulu ok norum nyaka chop chieng’ maRuoth Nyasaye nokel koth e piny. ’ "
Mi dhakono nodhi, motimo kakaElija nowachone, kendo ne gichiemo gi joode kod Elija ndalo mang’eny.
Mogo manie dak kod mo manie agulu ne ok orumo, kaka Ruoth Nyasayenomiyo Elija owacho.
Bang’ mano, tuo nogoyo wuod dhako ma wuon otno, kendo tuono nohinge,mi chunye nochot.
Dhakono nopenjo Elija niya, "Yaye ng’at Nyasaye, ingang’o koda? Bironi osefwenyo richona koso, ma omiyo wuoda otho?"
ToElija nodwoke niya, "Miya wuodi. " Eka nokawe kuome, moting’e kodhi kodee gorofa malo, kama nodakie mi nopiele e kitandane owuon.
Eka noywakni Ruoth Nyasaye, kopenje niya, "Yaye, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha, in emaisekelo masira ni chi liel ma adakgoni kinego wuode?"
Eka noriere kuomnyathi didek, koywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha,akwayi, yie chuny nyathini oduogi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo Elija, michuny nyathi noduogo, modoko mangima.
Elija nokawo nyathi, molorgo koae gorofa.  Nomiye min mare, kowacho niya, "Neye! Wuodi ngima. "
Dhakononowacho ni Elija niya, "Kawuono eka ang’eyo ni in ng’at Nyasaye, kendowach Ruoth Nyasaye mawuok e dhogi en adier. "
Ruodhi
Elija odok ir Ahab
Bang’ ndalo mang’eny, ka oro osebetie kuom higni adek, wach RuothNyasaye nobiro ni Elija niya, "Wuogi mondo Ahab oneni nikech abiro kelokoth e piny. "
Omiyo Elija nowuok mondo Ahab onene. Ndalogo kech ne duong’ e Samaria,
omiyo Ahab noluongo Obadia, majaduong’ ode.  (Obadia ne en ng’at moluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ahinya,
kendokane Jezebel nego jonabi mag Ruoth Nyasaye, to nopando jonabi mia achielkuomgi.  Piero abich nopando e rogo achiel, to piero abich opando e rogomachielo, momiyogi chiemo gi pi bende. )
Ahab nowacho ni Obadia niya,"Wawuoth e piny duto, e sokni kod aore duto, dipo ka wayudo lum madwaresgo farese gi kenje, mondo kik kech neggi duto. "
Omiyo ne gipogopiny e kindgi ji ariyo, mondo kik gimoro dong’ mak orangi.  Ahab nochikokonchiel, to Obadia nochiko komachielo.
Kane Obadia dhi, nopo koromo gi Elija.  Kane onene, nogoyo chonge piny,mokulorene, kowacho niya, "Jaduong’ Elija! Kara mana in?"
Nodwoke ni,"Ee, mana an.  To koro dhi inyis ruodhu ni, an ka. "
To Obadia nopenjeniya, "Ere gima aseketho, momiyo idwaro keta e lwet Ahab mondo onega?
Akuong’ora gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi ni onge oganda kata pinymoro ma ruodha pok oroe ji mondo odwari.  To kane jopinjego okwer niionge kuno, to nyaka ne gikuong’re ni gikia kuma intie.
Koro ioramondo adhi anyis ruodha ni, ‘Elija ni ka!’
To kwasewere kodi, to Rohomar Ruoth Nyasaye biro teri kuma ok ang’eyo.  Omiyo, ka adhi, ma anyisoAhab ni in ka, mi obiro to ok onwang’i, enonega.  To jaduong’, aseluoroRuoth Nyasaye, chakre tinna.
Bende isewinjo gima natimo ka Jezebel nenego jonabi mag Ruoth Nyasaye? Napando jonabi mia achiel.  Piero abichnapando e rogo achiel, to piero abich e rogo machielo, mamiyogi chiemogi pi bende.
To pod iora mondo adhi anyis ruodha ni, ‘Elija ni ka!’Donge ing’eyo ni obiro nega?"
To Elija nodwoke niya, "Gi nying RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma Nyasacha ma atiyone, akuong’ora niabiro nene kawuono. "
Eka Obadia nodhi dwaro Ahab, monyise wach.  MiAhab nodhi neno Elija.
Kane Ahab oneno Elija, nowachone niya, "Kara mana in, jasandjo-Israel!"
Elija nodwoke ni, "An ok asand jo-Israel, to in gijodhoodu ema usandogi, nikech useweyo chik Ruoth Nyasaye, kuluwonyiseche manono miluongo ni Baal.
Emomiyo koro or wach mondo jo-Israelduto obi, wachokre e got Karmel, kaachiel gi jonabi mia ang’wen gi pieroabich mag Baal, kod mag Ashera mia ang’wen, ma Jezebel opidho. "Elija opiem gi jonabi mag Baal e got Karmel
Kuom mano, Ahab noluongo jo-Israel duto, kendo nochoko jonabigokanyakla e got Karmel.
Eka Elija nochung’ e nyim ji duto, mopenjoginiya, "Unuriwni e kind paro ariyo nyaka karang’o? Ka Ruoth Nyasaye enNyasaye, to luweuru; to ka Baal e Nyasaye, to luwuru Baal. " To jinoling’ thi.
Eka Elija nowachonigi niya, "Eri an kende e janabi marRuoth Nyasaye modong’, to jonabi mag Baal gin mia ang’wen gi pieroabich.
Koro miwauru ruedhi ariyo.  We giyier achiel mondo giyang’,kendo gikete ewi yien, to kik gimok mach.  An bende abiro yang’o rwathmachielo, kendo nakete ewi yien, to ok namok mach.
Eka uluong nyingnyasachu, to an abiro luongo nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo Nyasaye ma noormach, e Nyasaye. " Ji duto nodwoko ni, "Wayie. "
Elija nowacho ni jonabi mag Baal niya, "Yieruru rwath achiel, uyang’mokwongo nikech ung’eny.  Eka uluong nying nyasachu, to kik umok mach. "
Omiyo ne gikawo rwath, mi giyang’o, kendo ne giluongo nying Baal,chakre okinyi nyaka odiechieng’, ka giwacho niya, "Baal, yie idwokwa!"To ne onge dwoko kata matin.  To koro ne gichikore achika ka gilworokendo-mar-liswa mane giseloso.
Kane ochopo odiechieng’ tir, Elijanojarogi, ka ngeko nyiero, kowacho niya, "Koguru matek! Donge ennyasaye? Dipo ka wach moro pod ogale, kata odich, kata odhi wuoth. Kamoro onindo, chieweuru!"
Omiyo ne gimedo kok matek, ka ging’olore gipelni kod ligengni, kaka kit timgi nobet, nyaka rembgi nochuer.
Odiechieng’ nokadho, to ne gimedo dhumore nyaka sa michiwoe misangomar odhiambo.  To ne onge dwoko, kata ng’ama dewo ywakgi.
Eka Elija nowacho ni ji duto niya, "Suduru ka. " Mi ji duto nosudomachiegni.  Noloso kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma nomukore.
Nokawo kite apar gariyo maromre gi kwan mar dhout yawuot Jakobo, jalmane wach Ruoth Nyasaye obirone niya, "Nyingi noluong ni Israel. "
Kitego nolosogo kendo-mar-misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nokunyo burmolworo kendo-mar-misango.  Burno dine rom ting’o migerni ariyo mag kothngano.
Nochano yien, kendo nopogo rwath lemo lemo, moketo ewi yien. Eka nowacho niya, "Keluru pi, depige ang’wen, uol kuom misango kendokuom yien. " Mi ne gitimo kamano.
Nowacho niya, "Meduru kendo. " Mi negitimo kamano.  Nowacho kendo ni, "Timuru mar adek. " Mi ne gitimo,
kendo pi noo piny, molworo kar misango, nyaka bur nopong’.
Kane sa michiwoe misango mar odhiambo ochopo, Elija janabi nosudomachiegni, mowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Ibrahim, gi Isaka,kod Israel, yie mondo ji ong’e kawuono ni in e Nyasach Israel, kendo nian e jatichni, mosetimo magi duto kaka iwacho.
Dwoka, Ruoth Nyasaye!Dwoka mondo jogi ong’e ni in e Nyasaye maloko chunygi iri. "
Eka mach mar Ruoth Nyasaye nolwar, motieko misango kaachiel gi yien gikite kod lowo, kendo nonywayo pi mane nie bur pep.
Kane ji duto onenogima otimore, ne gipodho piny auma, ka giwacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye eNyasaye! Adier, Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasaye!"
Elija nokonogi niya, "Makurujonabi mag Baal.  Kik uwe kata achiel tony. " Ne gimakogi, mi Elijanoterogi mwalo e aora Kishon, monegogi kuno. Elija olemo ni koth
Koro Elija nowacho ni Ahab niya, "Dhi ichiem, kendo imethi, nikechawinjo ka koth mor matek. "
Ahab nodhi motimo kamano.  To Elija nodhimoidho ewi got Karmel.  Nogoyo chonge piny, koketo wiye e kind chongene.
Nowacho ni jatichne ni, "Dhi ewi got, ing’i yo nam. " Jalo nodhi,mong’icho, mi nodwoke niya, "Ok aneno gimoro. " Elija nowachone ni, "Dognyadibiriyo. "
Kane oduogo e wuodhe mar abiriyo, nowacho niya, "Koroaneno bor polo matin ka lwet dhano ka wuok e nam. " Eka Elija nowachoneni, "Dhi inyis Ahab ni mondo oik geche, kendo olor mwalo, nimar dipo kakoth ogeng’e. "
Bang’ sa matin, polo nodudo gi yamo, kendo koth nochuemaduong’, mi Ahab noidho geche, modhi Jezreel.
Teko mar Ruoth Nyasayenolor kuom Elija, mi Elija nong’wano lepe, moringo nyim Ahab kateloenyaka ranga Jezreel.
Ruodhi
Elija oringo odhi Horeb
Ahab nonyiso Jezebel gik moko duto mane Elija otimo, kendo kaka nonegojonabi duto.
Mi Jezebel nooro jaote ir Elija, kowacho niya, "Ka kinyochopo sa makama, ka pok anegi kaka isenego jonabigo, to nyiseche mondoonega!"
Elija noluor, mi noringo mondo otony.  Kane ochopo Beer-sheba,dala mar Juda, noweyo jatichne kuno.
To en owuon, nodhi e thim moromo wuodh ndalo achiel.  Eka nobet e tiendyath moro, mokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye ni mondo otho, kowacho niya, "Oromo!Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye, kaw ngimana, nikech ok aber moloyo kwerena. "
Noriere e tiend yadhno, monindo.  Eka malaika nomule, ka wachone niya,"A malo, ichiem. "
Kane oting’o wang’e, nopo koneno makati kod puga marpi yo ka wiye.  Nochiemo kendo nomodho, eka nochako oriere piny.
Tomalaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye noduogo, momule, ka wacho niya, "A malo,ichiem, nono to wuoth biro hingi. "
Eka noa malo mochiemo kendo omodho. Chiemono nomede teko, mowuotho ndalo piero ang’wen, odiechieng’ gotieno,mochopo Horeb, god Nyasaye.
Nodonjo e rogo moro, mobworoe.  Eka wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirone niya,"Elija, itimo ang’o ka?"
Nodwoko niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto, asetiyoni gi kinda nikech hera maduong’ maherigo, tojo-Israel ok oserito singruok mane itimo kodgi.  Gisemuko kendeni magmisango, kendo gisenego jonabi magi, mak mana an ema adong’, to korogidwaro nega. "
