Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Wuogi, idhi ichung’nyima ewi got nikech abiro kadho kanyo. " Mokwongo yamo nokudho, momukogode, kendo obaro lwendni e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye; to Ruoth Nyasaye ok nenie yamo
Bang’e ka piny oseyiengni, ne nitie mach; to Ruoth Nyasaye okne nie mach.  To bang’ mach, piny noling’ thi.
Kane Elija owinjokamano, nogeng’o wang’e gi lawe mar abola, kendo nowuok, mochung’ e dhorogo.  Eka nowinjo dwol kapenje niya, "Elija, itimo ang’o ka?"
Nodwokoni, "A Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, asetiyoni gi kinda, tojo-Israel ok oserito singruok mane itimo kodgi.  Gisemuko kendeni magmisango, kendo gisenego jonabi magi; mak mana an ema odong’, to korogidwaro nega. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya "Dog gi yor thim maneibirogo, idhi Damaski, to kisechopo, iwir Hazael gi mo mondo obed ruodhAram.
Jehu wuod Nimshi bende iwir mondo obed ruodh Israel; to Elishawuod Shafat ja-Abel-mehola ema mondo iwir obed janabi kari.
Ng’at maHazael ok onego, Jehu noneg; to ng’at ma Jehu ok onego, Elisha noneg.
To abiro weyo ji alufu abiriyo kangima, mana jogo duto ma pok ogoyochongegi piny ni Baal, kendo ma pok onyodhe. "Oluong Elisha obed janabi
Elija nowuok kanyo, modhi oyudo Elisha wuod Shafat ka puro.  Ji ne purogi dhok piero ariyo gang’wen; dhok ariyo ne ywayo kwer achiel, to Elishaema ne puro gi dhok ariyo mogik.  Elija nochopo bute, mobolo kuome lawemar abola.
Eka Elisha noweyo dhok, moringo olawo Elija, kendo owachoneniya, "Dogi, to kik wiyi wil gi gima asetimoni. "
Mi Elisha noweyolawe, modok okawo dhok ariyogo.  Noyang’ogi motedogi gi yiend kwer, minomiyo joge mondo ocham.  Eka nowuok moluwo Elija, kendo nodoko jatichne.
Ruodhi
Ahab oloyo jo-Aram
Ben-hadad ruodh Aram nochoko ogandane mar lweny, kaachiel gi ruodhipiero adek gariyo gi farese kod geche lweny.  Nodhi molworo Samaria,kendo nokedo kode mondo okawe.
Eka nooro joote dalano mondo owach niAhab niya, "Ben-hadad owacho kama:
‘Fethi gi dhahapi, gin maga, tomondi kod nyithindi ema inyalo dong’go. ’ "
Ruodh Israel nodwoke niya,"Ruodha, ok adagi gima iwacho.  An mari, kaachiel gi giga duto. "
Tobang’e jootego noduogo ire, mowacho niya, "Koro Ben-hadad owacho nimondo imiye fethi gi dhahapi, kaachiel gi mondi kod nyithindi.
Kiny karsa makama, noor jotichne mondo omany odi, kod ut jogi, kendo ginikawgimoro amora ma gihero. "
Eka ruodh Israel noluongo jodongo duto mag piny, mowachonigi niya,"Koro neuru kaka ng’atni dwaro kelona masira.  Ne ok atamora chiwo fethagi dhahapa, to koro odwaro mondo amiye monda gi nyithinda bende!"
Jodongo kod ji duto nodwoke ni, "Kik idewe, kendo kik iyiene. "
Omiyonodwoko joote Ben-hadad niya, "Dhi unyis ruodha ni duto ma nokwongokwaya, anatim, to gima koro okwaya sani ok anyal timo. " Mi joote nodwokoni ruodhgi wach.
Ben-hadad noorone wach kendo niya, "Nyiseche mondookweda ka ok aduwo Samaria ma kata mana buru modong’ie ok nyal romo jogaduto jowo!"
Ruodh Israel nodwoko ni, "Wachneuru niya, ‘Ng’ama rwakogilweny kik pakre ka ng’ama oselonyogi!’ "
Ben-hadad nowinjo wachnikometho gi ruodhi kande e hembegi, mi nowacho ni joge niya, "Chanreuruni lweny. " Mi ne giikore monjo dala Samaria.
Eka janabi moro nobiro ir Ahab ruodh Israel, mowachone niya, "RuothNyasaye owacho kama: ‘Donge ineno oganda maduong’ni? Kawuono eka abirochiwogi e lweti, mi ining’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye. ’ "
Ahab nopenje ni,"Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwonwagi e lwet ng’a gini?" Janabi nodwoke ni,"Mana in. "
Eka Ahab nochano yawuowigo, moromo ji mia achiel gi pieroadek gariyo.  Achien nochano jolweny duto mag Israel, ma dirom ji alufuabiriyo.
Ne giwuok odiechieng’,
ka yawuowi ma lang jodong gwenge otelo nyime. To noyudo ka Ben-hadad mer e hembe, kaachiel gi ruodhi piero adek manekonye.  Nokel ni Ben-hadad wach niya, "Jomoko wuok Samaria. "
Nodwokoni, "Makgiuru ka gingima, bed ni gibiro gi kue, kata gibiro kedo kodwa. "
Yawuowi ma lang jodong gwenge nowuok e dala Samaria, kendo ogandalweny noluwo bang’gi.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato nonego ng’ate, mi jo-Aramnoringo, ka jo-Israel lawogi.  To Ben-hadad ruodh Aram noidho farasmotony kaachiel gi joidh faresene moko.
Eka ruodh Israel nowuok momakofarese gi geche, kendo nonego jo-Aram oyokre.
Janabi cha nodhi ir ruodh Israel, mowachone niya, "Koro jiwri, inegima onego itim, nikech e ndalo oro, ruodh Aram biro monji. "
Jodong Aram nowacho ni ruodhgi niya, "Nyasach jogo en nyasach gode;mano emomiyo ne giloyowa.  Koro onego waked kodgi e pap, eka wanalogiadier.
To tim kama: gol ruodhi kande e tichgi, iket jotend lwenykargi.
Eka ichok oganda lweny moromo gi oganda ma nolalni, kiketofaras ka faras, kendo gari ka gari.  Wanaked kodgi e pap, mi wanalogiadier. " Ben-hadad nowinjo wachgi motimo kamano.
E ndalo oro, Ben-hadad nochoko jo-Aram, mi nodhi Afek mondo omonjjo-Israel.
Jo-Israel bende nochokore koseikgi ni lweny, mi ne giwuokmondo giked gi wasikgigo.  Jo-Israel nojot momanyore gi jo-Aram.  Jo-Aramnopong’o piny, to jo-Israel ne chalo kweth matindo ariyo mag diek.
Ng’at Nyasaye moro nodhi ir ruodh Israel, mowacho ne niya, "RuothNyasaye owacho kama: ‘Jo-Aram osewacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye en nyasach gode,to ok en nyasach holni.  Omiyo abiro chiwo oganda maduong’ni duto elweti, eka unung’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye. ’ "
Ne gijot ka gimanyorekamano kuom ndalo abiriyo.  Chieng’ mar abiriyo ne girado ni lweny, kendoodiechieng’no jo-Israel nonego jo-Aram alufu mia achiel.
Joma nodong’noringo modonjo e dala Afek, to ohinga mar dala nopodho, monego ji alufupiero ariyo gabiriyo kuomgi. Ben-hadad bende noringo, modonjo e dalano, kendo nopondo ei ot moromaiye.
Jodonge nodhi ire, mowachone niya, "Wasewinjo ni ruodhi magIsrael ng’won.  We mondo watue piende gugru e nungowa, kod tonde eng’utwa, wadhi ir ruodh Israel, dipo koreso ngimani. "
Kuom mano, negitueyo piende gugru e nungogi, kod tonde e ng’utgi, mi gidhi ir ruodhIsrael.  Ne giwachone niya, "Ben-hadad jatichni osayi ni kik inege. " Ahabnopenjogi niya, "Kara, pod ongima? En owadwa. "
Noyudo ka jogo ritogima dinyisgi parone, omiyo ne giyiene mapiyo niya, "Adier, Ben-hadad enowadu. " Nowachonigi ni, "Dhiuru ukele ka. "Ben-hadad nodhi ir Ahab, mi Ahab noluonge mondo giidh kode gache.
Ben-hadad nowachone ni, "Abiro dwoko mier mane wuora omayo wuoru,kendo iniyud thuolo mar yawo kuonde ohala Damaski, kaka wuora notimo edala Samaria. " Ahab nodwoke niya, "Abiro gonyi kiyie timo kamano. " Minotimo kode winjruok, mogonye.
Wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni ng’at achiel kuom oganda jonabi, mowachoni wadgi ni, "Yie igoya!" To jalo nodagi goye.
Eka nowachone ni,"Isedagi winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo sibuor biro negi kiwuok kuomaka. " Gikanyono mane owuokie, noromo gi sibuor monege.
Janabino noyudong’at machielo, mi owachone niya, "Yie igoya. " Ng’atno nogoye mohinye.
Eka janabino nodhi morito ruoth Ahab e yo, koumo wang’e gi nanga mondokik ong’eye.
Kane ruoth kadho, jalo nokok kawachone ni, "Ruoth, kanadonjo e chuny lweny, naromo gi jalweny moro mokelona ng’at motue,kowachona niya, ‘Rit ng’atni, to kapo ni olalni, to initho, kata inichul kilo piero adek mag fedha. ’
To kane oyudo adich koni gi koni,napo ka ng’atno olalna. " Ruodh Israel nodwoke ni, "Iseng’ado buchiiwuon! Kamano e kaka nobedi. "
Eka janabino noelo nanga e wang’epiyopiyo, mi ruodh Israel nong’eyo ni en achiel kuom jonabi.
Nowachoni ruoth niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘Ng’at ma nyocha adwaro nimondo otho, iseweyo odhi, omiyo ibiro tho kare, kendo jogi biro tho karjoge. ’ "
Mi ruodh Israel nodok Samaria ka chunye lit.
Ruodhi
Ahab omayo Naboth puothe
Naboth ja-Jezreel ne nigi puoth mzabibu thurgi, machiegni gi od Ahabruodh Samaria.
Ahab nowacho ni Naboth niya, "Miya puothi mar mzabibu,mondo aloke puoth alot, nikech ochiegni gi oda.  Anyalo miyi puothmzabibu maber moloye; kata kihero, to anachuli nengo moromo kode. "
ToNaboth nodwoko Ahab niya, "Mano kuero! Ok anyal miyi mwandu kwerena. "
Kuom mano Ahab nodok dala ka iye owang’, motamore chiemo.
Jezebelchiege nodhi ire, mopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyo ikuyo, kendo idagichiemo?"
Nodwoke niya, "Akuyo nikech nakwayo Naboth ja-Jezreel ni mondoang’iew puothe mar mzabibu, to ka ok odwar pesa to mondo awilne gipuodho machielo.  To nokwera ni ok onyal miya puothe. "
Jezebel chiegenowachone ni, "Donge inie ruodh Israel? A malo, ichiem kendo ibed mamor. Abiro miyi puoth mzabibu mar Naboth ja-Jezreel. "
Omiyo Jezebel nondiko barupe gi nying Ahab, modinogi gi alama marruoth; mi noorogi ni jodongo kod joma ogen modak e dala achiel giNaboth.
Weche mane ondiko e barupego e magi: "Chikuru chieng’ ma jionego tueye chiemo, kendo uket Naboth obed e nyim ji e kom moyiedhi.
Eka uket ji ariyo macheje obed momanyore kode mondo odonjne, kagiwacho ni oseyanyo Nyasaye kod ruoth bende.  Eka ugole oko, ugoye gikite nyaka otho. "
Mi jodongo gi joma ogen mag dalano mane odakmachiegni gi Naboth notimo kaka Jezebel nonyisogi e barupe maneooronigi.
Ne gichiko chieng’ ma ji onego otueye chiemo, kendo negiketo Naboth e kom moyiedhi e nyim ji.
Ji ariyo macheje nodonjo,mobet momanyore kode.  Eka ne gidonjo ni Naboth e nyim ji duto, kagiwacho niya, "Naboth noyanyo Nyasaye kod ruoth bende. " Omiyo ji nogoleoko, kendo ne gigoye gi kite nyaka otho.
Bang’e ne gioro ni Jezebelwach niya, "Osego Naboth gi kite, kendo osetho. "
Kane Jezebel owinjo ni osego Naboth gi kite, kendo osetho, nowacho niAhab niya, "Dhiyo, ikaw puoth mzabibu mane Naboth ja-Jezreel odaging’iewo kodi, nikech koro osetho. "
Kane Ahab owinjo ni Naboth osetho,nodhi mondo okaw puotheno.
To wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Elijaja-Tishbe niya,
"Dhi irom gi Ahab ruodh Isreal modak Samaria, nikecheni puoth mzabibu mar Naboth, modhi kawo.
To wachne ni Ruoth Nyasayeowacho kama: ‘Kara iseneko kendo yeko?’ Eka imed nyise ni Ruoth Nyasayeowacho niya, ‘Kama nyocha guogi onang’oe remb Naboth, ema nonang’ie maribende!’ "
Ahab nowacho ni Elija niya, "Yaye, jasika, kara isenwang’a?" Nodwokeni "Ee, asenwang’i, nikech isechiwori mar timo gik ma Ruoth Nyasayeokwero.
Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, ‘Abiro kelo masira kuomi. Abiro yweyi oko, kendo abiro tieko jodhoodi machwo duto, ma onge katang’at achiel ma nodong’ e Israel.
Anami dhoodi chal gi dhood Jeroboamwuod Nebat, kendo gi dhood Baasha wuod Ahija, nikech isemiya mirima,kendo nikech isemiyo jo-Israel obedo joricho.
Jodhoodi mabiro too edala, guogi nocham, to mago mabiro tho oko, winy nocham. ’ "
To kuomJezebel, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Guogi nocham ringre e Jezreel. "
Onge ng’at mane ochiwore mar timo gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye okwero kakaAhab, mane Jezebel chiege chwalo.
Notimo gik makuero chuth, kolamo gikmaket kaka jo-Amor ne timo.  Jo-Amorgo ema ne Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo mondoowe ni jo-Israel.
Kane Ahab owinjo wechego, noyiecho lepe, morwako pien gugru e dende. Notueyo chiemo, monindo e pien gugru, kendo nodembore koboch.
Mi wachRuoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Elija ja-Tishbe niya,
"Bende ineno kaka Ahabodembore e nyima? Ok abi kelo masira e ndalone, nikech osebedo modemboree nyima kamano, to abiro kelo masira e ode mana e ndalo wuode. "
Ruodhi
Mikaya okoro ni ibiro loyo Ahab gi Jehoshafat(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Higni adek nokadho ka lweny onge e kind jo-Aram gi jo-Israel.
To ehiga mar adek, Jehoshafat ruodh Juda nolimo ruodh Israel.
Ruodh Israelnopenjo jodonge ni, "Donge ung’eyo ni Ramoth-gilead en dalawa? Towaling’ nadi mak wadhi wakawe kuom ruodh Aram?"
Eka nopenjo Jehoshafatniya, "Iyie dhi kodwa mondo waked gi jo-Ramoth-gilead?" Jehoshafatnodwoko ruodh Israel niya, "Ayie! Joga e jogi, kendo faresena efareseni. "
Eka Jehoshafat nowacho ni ruodh Israel niya, "To mokwongo onego wapenjRuoth Nyasaye wach. "
Omiyo ruodh Israel nochoko jonabi ma dirom miaang’wen, mopenjogi niya, "Adhi aked gi jo-Ramoth-gilead, koso awe?" Negidwoke niya, "Dhiyo, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye biro miyi dalano. "
ToJehoshafat nopenje niya, "Janabi moro mar Ruoth Nyasaye onge ka, madwapenj wach koso?"
Ruodh Israel nodwoke ni, "Ee, ng’at achiel pododong’ ma dipenjnwa Ruoth Nyasaye wach, en Mikaya wuod Imla. " ToJehoshafat nowachone ni, "Kik iwuo kamano. "
Eka ruodh Israel noluongojatichne moro, mowachone niya, "Dhi piyo iluong Mikaya wuod Imla. "
Koro noyudo ka ruodh Israel gi Jehoshafat ruodh Juda obet e alap maniedhoranga Samaria, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato nie kom duong’ne, korwako lawe marruoth, kendo jonabi duto ne koro wach e nyimgi.
Zedekia wuod Kenaananosethedho tunge mag nyinyo morwako, mi nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasayeowacho kama: ‘Ibiro chwowo jo-Aram gi tungegi, nyaka itiekgi. ’ "
Jonabi duto bende nokoro mana wach machal kamano, ka giwacho niya,"Dhi Ramoth-gilead mondo ilo.  Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwe e lweti. "
Jaote mane odhi luongo Mikaya nowachone niya, "Jonabi duto osekorowach nyalhodia, ka giwacho ni gima ber biro timore ni ruoth.  In bendeyie ikor wach maber kaka gisekorono. "
To Mikaya nodwoke ni,"Akuong’ora gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye ni gima Ruoth Nyasaye biro wacho emanawachi. "
Kane Mikaya ochopo e nyim ruoth, ruoth nopenje niya, "Kosowawe?" Nodwoke niya, "Dhi mondo ilo! Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwe e lweti. "
Ruoth nowachone ni, "Asesiemi nyadidi ni kik iwach miriambo, to makmana adiera kende e nying Ruoth Nyasaye!"
Mikaya nowacho niya, "Nanenojo-Isarel duto koke e gode, ka rombe maonge jakwath; kendo nawinjo kaRuoth Nyasaye wacho niya, ‘Jogi onge gi wuon-gi, we mondo gidog emiechgi gi kue. ’ "
Ruodh Israel nowacho ni Jehoshafat niya, "Donge nawachoni ni jali okdikorna wach maber, to mana marach?"
Mikaya nowacho niya, "Koro winjwach Ruoth Nyasaye.  Naneno Ruoth Nyasaye kobet e kom duong’ne, kendo kaoganda polo ochung’ e bathe koni gi koni.
Ruoth Nyasaye nopenjoginiya, ‘Ere ng’ama diho Ahab odhi Ramoth-gilead mondo otho kuno?’ To rohoka roho nochiwo parone,
nyaka roho moro nosudo mochung’ e nyim RuothNyasaye, kowacho niya, ‘An ema abiro hoye. ’
Ruoth Nyasaye nopenjeniya, ‘Ere kaka ibiro hoye?’ Nodwoke niya, ‘Abiro dhi bet roho marmiriambo e dho jonabini duto. ’ Ruoth Nyasaye noyie ni, ‘Ee, in ema ibirohoye, kendo iniloye.  Dhiyo itim kamano. ’
Koro sani Ruoth Nyasayeoseketo roho mar miriambo e dho jonabini duto.  To kata kamano RuothNyasaye oseng’adoni buch masira. "
Eka Zedekia wuod Kenaana nosudo machiegnii, mothalo lemb Mikaya,kapenje niya, "Ere kaka Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye ne nyalo a kuoma mondoowuo kodi?"
Mikaya nodwoke niya, "Chieng’ ma inidonjie ot maiye mondoipondie, eka ining’e!"
Ruodh Israel nowacho ni, "Makuru Mikaya, uterir Amon jaduong’ Samaria, kod Joash wuod ruoth, mondo girite.
Wachnigiuru niya, ‘Ruoth owacho ni mondo uket ng’atni e od tuech,kendo umiye mana kuon abang’a gi pi kende, nyaka aduog ka angima. ’ "
To Mikaya nowacho niya, "Kiduogo kingima, to kara Ruoth Nyasaye okosemiyo awuoyo!"
Kamano ruodh Israel gi Jehoshafat nodhi Ramoth-gilead.
Ruodh Israelnowacho ni Jehoshfat niya, "Kwadhi e lweny, to abiro rwako lewni mokomondo kik ji ng’eya, to in rwak lepi mag ruoth. " Kamano ruodh Israelnoloko kite, modhi e lweny.
To ruodh Aram nosechiko jodong lweny pieroadek gariyo ma jotend gechene ni kik giked gi ng’at moro amora, to makmana ruodh Israel kende.
Kane jotend geche oneno Jehoshafat, negiwacho niya, "Nyaka bed ni jal cha e ruodh Israel. " Ne gilokore iremondo giked kode, to Jehoshafat nogiyo.
Kane jotend geche oneno ni oken ruodh Israel, ne giweyo lawe.
To ng’at moro nodiro asere, morodhno gi kor ruodh Israel e kind chumbemag lweny ma norwako.  Mi ruoth nowacho ni jariemb gache niya, "Wichri,igola e lweny, nikech ahinyora malit. "
Lweny nomedore chieng’no, to negiyiengo ruoth e gache kochomo jo-Aram, kendo rembe nochuer aming’a egari nyaka notho godhiambo.
Kane chieng’ dwaro podho, nogo milome nioganda lweny niya, "Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo odog thurgi,
nikech ruothosetho. " Ne gidwoko ringre ruoth Samaria, mi giyike kuno.
Ne gilwokogeche e dho yawo mar Samaria, kuma mon ma jochode ne lwokoree, mi guoginonang’o rembe.  Kamano wach Ruoth Nyasaye nochopo kare.
Weche moko mag Ahab, gi timbene duto, kod ode mane olos gi lak liech,gi mier duto ma nogero, ondik e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi magIsrael.
Kane Ahab otho, Ahazia wuode nodoko ruoth kare. Loch Jehoshafat, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar ang’wen mar loch Ahab ruodh Israel, Jehoshafat wuod Asanodoko ruodh Juda.
Nokawo loch ka en jahigni piero adek gabich, kendonorito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gabich kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare nenyinge Azuba nyar Shilhi.
Jehoshafat noluwo timbe duto mag Asa wuonmare, ma ok oweyo kata achiel, kendo timbene ne long’o e nyim RuothNyasaye.  To hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore ne ok okethi, kendo ji nepod timo misengni kendo wang’o ubani kuondego.
Jehoshafat bende notimowinjruok gi ruodh Israel.
Timbe moko duto mag Jehoshafat, gi tekone kod lwenjene ondik e KitapWeche mag Ndalo mag ruodhi mag Juda.
Noriembo joterruok mag kuondelemo mane otony e ndalo Asa wuon mare, mondo kik gidag e pinye.
Ndalogo Edom ne onge gi ruoth, to jaduong’ moro ema nobet jatelo karruoth.
Jehoshafat nohondho yiedhi madongo machal gi mago mane dhiTarshish, mondo oomgo dhahabu Ofir.  To ne ok gidhi, nikech ne gibaroremana Ezion-giber.
Eka Ahazia wuod Ahab nokwayo Jehoshafat niya, "Yiemondo jowa odhi gi jou e yiedhi mau. " To nodagi.
Jehoshafat notho, moyike but kwerene e dala Daudi kwar mare.  Jehoramwuode nodoko ruoth kare. Loch Ahazia, ruodh Israel
E higa mar apar gabiriyo mar loch Jehoshafat ruodh Juda, Ahazia wuodAhab nodoko ruodh Israel kuom higni ariyo.
Notimo gik ma Ruoth Nyasayeokwero, koluwo timbe wuon mare, gi timbe min mare, kod timbe Jeroboamwuod Nebat, ma nomiyo jo-Israel obedo joricho.
Notiyo ni Baal, kendonolame, komiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel mirima mana kaka wuonmare notimo.
Ruodhi
Tho mar Ahazia
Kane Ahab osetho, jo-Moab nodagi bet e bwo loch Israel.
Chieng’ moroAhazia nogore piny koa e dirisa mar gorofa mar ode man Samaria,mohinyore.  Nooro joote mondo odhi openj Baal-zebub nyasach Ekron katakobiro kwo.
To malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Elija ja-Tishbeniya, "Dhi irom gi joote mag ruodh Samaria, kendo ipenjgi nia, ‘Nyasayeonge e Israel ka koso, momiyo udhi mana ir Baalzebub mondo upenje wach?
Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni ok nikwo, to initho mana e kitandaniminindoeno. ’ "
Kane jootego odok ir ruoth, nopenjogi gimomiyo giduogo.
Ne gidwokeniya, "Ng’at moro oromo kodwa, mowachonwa ni mondo wadog ir ruoth manoorowa, wanyise ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘Nyasaye onge Israelkoso, momiyo ioro ji ir Baalzebub nyasach Ekron mondo ipenje wach? Kuommano ok nikwo, to iinitho manaa e kitanda minindoeno. ’ "
Ruothnopenjogi niya, "Jal moromo kodu, monyisou wechego, chal nadi?"
Negidwoke ni, "Norwako law ma rayier, kendo notweyo okanda mar del enungone. " Ahazia nowacho ni, "Kara en Elija ja-Tishbe. "
Eka ruoth nooro jatend lweny mane nigi jolweny piero abich mondo odhiir Elija.  Jatelono noyude kobet piny ewi got moro.  Nowachone niya,"Ng’at Nyasaye, ruoth owacho ni mondo ilor!"
To Elija nodwoke ni, "Kaan ng’at Nyasaye adier, to mach mondo oa e polo, otieki kaachiel gi jogipiero abichgo. " Eka mach noa e polo motieko jalo gi joge.
Ruoth nochako ooro ni Elija jatelo machielo kod joge piero abich.  Jalonodhi ir Elija, mowachone niya, "Ng’at Nyasaye, ruoth owacho ni mondoilor piyo!"
To Elija nodwoke ni, "Ka an ng’at Nyasaye adier, to machmondo oa e polo, otieki kaachiel gi jogi. " Mi mach noa e polo, motiekegi joge.
Eka ruoth nooro jatelo mar adek kod joge piero abich.  Jatelono nodhi,mogoyo chonge piny e nyim Elija, kosaye niya, "Yaye ng’at Nyasaye,akwayi ni mondo ngimana kod ngima ji piero abichgi obedni ka gima igenoe chunyi.
Wasewinjo kaka mach noa e polo monego jotelo ariyogo,kaachiel gi jogi mag lweny, to koro mondo ngimana obedni ka gima igeno echunyi. "
Eka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Elija niya, "Lorkode, kik iluore. " Omiyo nolor, mi ne gidhi kode ir ruoth.
Eka Elijanowacho ni ruoth niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘Ok nikwo, to inithomana e kitanda minindoeno, nikech nioro joote ir Baalzebub nysach Ekronmondo ipenje wach. ’ "
Omiyo Ahazia notho kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Elija owacho.  Joramowadgi nodoko ruoth kare e higa mar ariyo mar loch Jehoram wuodJehoshafat, ruodh Juda, nikech Ahazia ne onge gi wuowi.
Timbe mokoduto mag Ahazia ondik e kitap Weche Mag ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Ruodhi
Elija oter e polo
E ndalo mane Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro tero Elija e polo gi kalausi, noyudoka Elija gi Elisha josewuok Gilgal.
Elija nowacho ni Elisha niya, "Yieidong’ ka, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye oora nyaka Bethel. " To Elisha nodwokeni, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gi nyingi iwuon, ok naweyi. " Omiyo negidhi nyaka Bethel.
To oganda jonabi ma nodak Bethel nowuok modhi irElisha, mopenje niya, "Bende ing’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro kawojaduong’ni kawuono?" Nodwokogi niya, "Ee, ang’eyo kamano, to ling’uru. "
Elija nowacho ni Elisha niya, "Yie idong’ ka, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ooranyaka Jeriko. " To nodwoke niya, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gi nyingiiwuon, ok naweyi. " Omiyo ne gidhi nyaka Jeriko.
Oganda jonabi mane odakJeriko nosudo machiegni gi Elisha, mopenje niya, "Bende ing’eyo ni RuothNyasaye biro kawo jaduong’ni kawuono?" Nodwokogi niya, "Ee, ang’eyokamano, to ling’uru. "
Eka Elija nowachone niya, "Yie idong’ ka, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ooranyaka aora Jordan. " To nodwoke niya, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ginyingi iwuon, ok naweyi. " Omiyo ji ariyogo nodhi adhiya.
Ji piero abichkuom oganda jonabi bende nodhi, mochung’ kama ochwalore kodgi, ka jiariyogo chung’ e dho aora.
Eka Elija nobano lawe mar abola, mochwadogopi, mi pi nopogore koni gi koni, eka ji ariyogo noyudo thuolo mar ng’adoaora kotwo.
Kane giseidho loka, Elija nowacho ni Elisha niya, "Yier gima datimni,kapok okawa kuomi. " Elisha nokone ni, "Akwayi mondo ayud pok ariyo magteko ma in go. "
Elija nodwoke ni, "Ikwayo gima tek, to kata kamano,kinena sa mikawa kuomi, to gima ikwayo notimreni.  To ka ok inena, to oknotimreni. "
To kane pod giwuotho, kendo giwuoyo, gari mar mach gifarese mag mach nobiro, mopogogi, kendo Elija noidho gi kalausi nyaka epolo.
Elisha noneno gima notimore, mokok niya, "Wuora, wuora, anenogeche Israel kod joidh faresene!" Kamano Elija nolal e wang’e. Elisha okawo kar ElijaEka Elisha noyiecho lepe owuon kidienje ariyo.
Nokwanyo law abola marElija mane olwar piny, kendo nodok mochung’ e dho aora Jordan.
Nochwado pi gi law Elijano kowacho niya, "Ere Ruoth Nyasaye ma NyasachElija?" Kane osechwado pi kamano, pi nopogore koni gi koni, mi nong’adoaora.
Kane oganda jonabi modak Jeriko onene gi kuma bor, ne giwacho niya,"Teko mane Elija nigo, koro odok ni Elisha. " Ne gidhi romone, migikulorene,
ka giwachone niya, "Wan gi joma rateke piero abich.  Yiemondo gidhi gidwar jaduong’ni cha, dipo ka Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye otere,moweye ewi got, kata e hoho moro. " Nodwokogi ni, "Kik uorgi. "
To negikwaye kidhuku kidhuku, nyaka wiye nokuot, mowachnigi niya, "Ara,orgiuru. " Omiyo ne gioro ji piero abich, momanyo Elija kuom ndalo adek,to ne ok giyude.
Ne giduogo Jeriko kuma Elisha ne pod ritogie, minowachonigi niya, "Donge nakwerou ni kik udhi?"
Jo-Jeriko nowacho ni Elisha niya, "Jaduong’ neye kaka dalawa oger kamaber, mak mana pi ema ok ber, kendo lowo bende rach. "
Nodwokogi niya,"Kelnauru agulu manyien, kendo ketieuru kado. " Mi ne gitimo kamano.
Eka nodhi e soko, moboloe kado, kowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owachookamaa: Aseloso pigni maber; chakre kawuono ok nokel tho, kendo ok nomonpiny chiek. "
Kamano pigno osiko ka ber nyaka chil kawuono, kaka Elishanowacho.
Elisha noa kuno, modhi Bethel to kane pod enie yo koidho thur, raweremoko nowuok e dalano, monyiere, ka giyanye ni, "Rabondoni, dhi adhiya!Rabondoni, dhi adhiya!"
Nogoyo machiemo monenogi, kendo nokuong’ogi enying Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ondiegi ma mon ariyo noa e bungu, mokidho rawerepiero ang’wen gariyo kuomgi.
Eka Elisha noa kuno, modhi nyaka gotKarmel.  To koa Karmel, nodok Samaria.
Ruodhi
Loch Joram, ruodh Israel
E higa mar apar gaboro mar loch Jehoshafat ruodh Juda, Joram wuod Ahabnodoko ruodh Israel morito piny kuom higni apar gariyo, kodak Samaria.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, to ok marom gi mago mane wuonmare gi min mare otimo, nikech nogolo siro mar Baal mane wuon mareoloso.
Kata kamano notuere e timbe mokwer mane Jeroboam wuod Nebatomiyogo jo-Israel obedo joricho.  Ne ok oweyogi kata matin. Elisha okoro ni ibiro loyo jo-Moab
Mesha ruodh Moab ne japith rombe, kendo higa ka higa nogolo rombe alufumia achiel kod piende imbe alufu mia achiel.
To kane Ahab otho, ruodhMoab nodagi bedo e bwo loch ruodh Israel.
Omiyo ruoth Joram nowuokSamaria, mochoko jo-Israel duto.
Nooro wach ni Jehoshafat ruodh Judaniya, "Ruodh Moab piem koda.  Diyie wanywak ni jo-Moab koso?" Jehoshafatnodwoke ni, "Ayie! Joga e jogi, kendo faresena e fareseni. "
Eka nopenjeni, "Dwaluw yo mane?" Joram nodwoke ni, "Waluw yor thim Edom. "
Eka ruodh Israel gi ruodh Juda kod ruodh Edom ne jodhi kanyakla.  Negitieko ndalo abiriyo ka gilworo kuma bor, nyaka pi norumo ni jolwenykod jamni mane gin go.
Eka ruodh Israel noywak, kawacho niya, "Yaye,wan ruodhi adekgi, hapwa rach, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osekelowa ka mondooketwa e lwet jo-Moab!"
To Jehoshafat nopenjo niya, "Bende nitiejanabi mar Ruoth Nyasaye ka, manyalo penjonwa Ruoth Nyasaye wach?"Achiel kuom jotich ruodh nodwoke niya, "Elisha wuod Shafat, mane tiyo niElija, ni ka. "
Jehoshafat nowacho niya, "Ero, jalo e ng’at man gi wachRuoth Nyasaye. " Mi ruodh Israel gi Jehoshafat kod ruodh Edom ne jodhi irElisha.
Elisha nopenjo ruodh Israel niya, "An gang’o kodi? Dhiyo ir jokorweche ma wuoru gi meru ne dhiye!" To ruodh Israel nokwere ni, "Ok kamanonimar Ruoth Nyasaye ema osechokowa kanyakla, mondo oketwa e lwetjo-Moab. "
Elisha nodwoke niya, "Akuong’ora gi nying Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto ma atiyone, ni da ni ok ageno Jehoshafat ruodhJuda, to da ok adewi, kata ng’iyi da ok ang’iyi.
Kata kamano, kelnajago thum. " Kane jago thum gocho, teko mar Ruoth Nyasaye nolwar kuomElisha,
mowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni mondo ukuny buchemang’eny e holoni,
nikech owacho ni ok unune yamo kata koth, to pibiro pong’o holo, mondo umodhi kaachiel gi jambu.
To mano en gima yotni Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar jo-Moab bende obiro keto e lwetu.
Ubiro loyomier mochiel gi ohinga, kod mier mabeyo duto, kendo unutong’ yien mabeyoduto.  Unudin sokni, kendo unuketh puothe mabeyo duto gi kite. "
Kamano,kinyne gokinyi kar sa mitimoe misango, pi nobiro koa yo Edom, nyakagweng’no duto nolokore pi lilo.
Kane jo-Moab duto owinjo ni ruodhigo obiro mondo oked kodgi, ji dutomane nyalo ting’o gi lwenje noyworo ni lweny, mi giriedo e tong’ pinygi.
Kane gichiew gokinyi, chieng’ norieny e pi, mi ne gineno pi momanyorekodgi kamil makwar ka remo.
Omiyo ne giwacho niya, "Macha remo! Nyakabed ni ruodhigo nende okedi kendgi, monegore! Koro wadhi wayeki!"
Tokane gichopo kama jo-Israel ojotie, jo-Israel nowuok momonjogi, mi negiringo, ka jo-Israel lawogi kendo negogi.
Jo-Israel noketho miechMoab, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato nodiro kidi e puothe duto mabeyo, nyakakite nopong’ogi.  Ne gidino sokni duto, kendo ne gitong’o yien mabeyoduto.  Dala Kir-hareseth kende ema nodong’ ni jo-Moab, to jodir orujrenolwore mobaye.
Kane ruodh Moab oneno ni lweny dwaro loye, nowuok gijo-ligangla mia abiriyo, kotemo mwomo nyaka ir ruodh Aram, mondo otony,to notamogi.
Eka nokawo wuode makayo, mane onego bed ruoth kare, mionego ewi ohinga, mowang’o ka liswa.  Kuom mano mirima maduong’ nomakojo-Israel, kendo ne giweyo kedo kode, mi gidok e pinygi.
Ruodhi
Chi liel gi hond mo
Chieng’ moro, dhako moro ma chi liel, ma chwore ne achiel kuom ogandajonabi, notero ywak ir Elisha, kawachone niya, "Chwora osetho, kendoing’eyo kaka ne en ng’at ma oluoro Ruoth Nyasaye.  To jabendho osebiromondo okaw nyithinda ariyo, olok wasumbe. "
Elisha nopenje niya, "Datimang’o? Nyisa gima in go e ot. " Nodwoke niya, "Aonge gi gimoro, mak manamo matin. "
Eka Elisha nowachone niya, "Dhiyo e gweng’u, ihol agulinimang’eny kuom jowadu.
Bang’e idonj e odi, ilorrie kaachiel gi yawuoti. Eka iol morno e agulinigo, kendo ka moro osepong’, to iket tenge. "
Omiyo dhakono nodhi, molorore e ode kaachiel gi yawuote.  Ne gigamoneagulinigo, to en nooloe mo.
Ne gimedo timo kamano nyaka agulini dutoopong’.  Omiyo kane okwayo wuode mondo ogamne moro, to wuode nodwoke ni,"Onge modong’. " E sa nogono mo nochok.
Eka dhakono nodhi, monyiso ng’atNyasaye gima osetimore.  Elisha nodwoke niya, "Dhiyo, ihon morno, ichulgogopeni, to modong’, ukonyrugo gi yawuoti. "
Chieng’ moro, Elisha nodhi Shunem, kuma dhako moro ma jamoko nodakie. Dhakono nochune mondo ochiem e ode.  Bang’ mano, kinde duto mane Elishaluwoe yorno, nothoro rawo kanyo mondo ochiemie.
Mano omiyo dhakononowacho ni chwore niya, "Aneno ni jal makadho ka pileni en ng’atNyasaye.
Wachuogne ot moro matin ewi tado, kendo waketnee kitanda gimesa gi kom kod taya, mondo pile kobiro limowa to oyue kanyo. "
Chieng’ moro, kane oyudo Elisha orawo kanyo, nodonjo e odno moyueyo.
Bang’e nowacho ni Gehazi jatichne niya, "Luong chi Shunem. " Gehazinoluongo dhakono, mobiro ochung’ e nyim Elisha.
Eka Elisha nowacho niGehazi mondo openje niya, "Isekawo chandruok ahinya mar ritowa maber, tokoro ere gima dwatimni? Donge dibedie gi ywak moro ma dwater ni ruothkata jatend jolweny?" Nodwoko ni, "Ooyo, adak kod jowa. "
Elishanopenjo kendo niya, "Dwatimne ang’o?" Gehazi nowacho niya, "Oonge giwuowi, kendo chwore oti. "
Eka Elisha nowacho niya, "Luonge oduogi. "Kane oseluong dhakono, nobiro mochung’ e dhoot.
Elisha nowachone niya,"Due makama, higa mabiro, inibed gi nyathi ma wuowi. " To dhakono nodwokeniya, "Ooyo, ruodha, kik iwuonda!"
To bang’e nomako ich, monywolowuowi e ndalo mane Elisha owacho.
Nyathino nodongo, kendo chieng’ moro ne odhi e puodho kuma wuon marene nitie gi jokeyo.
Kane en kuno, nochako ywak ni wuon niya, "Wiyabara! Wiya bara!" Wuon mare nowacho ni jatichne moro niya, "Tere irmin. "
To kane osetere, nobet e tiend min nyaka sa auchiel, aye notho.
Min mare noidho gorofa, mopiele e kitanda ng’at Nyasaye, eka nolorodhoot, mowuok.
Noluongo chwore, mowachone niya, "Adwaro jatich kodkanyna.  Ornagi mondo aret adhi ir ng’at Nyasaye, kendo aduog piyo. "
Chwore nopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyo idwaro dhi ire kawuono? Due pokopor, bende ok en chieng’ Sabato. " Nodwoke ni, "Adhi adhiya. "
Kaneosegawo kanyna, nowacho ni jatichne niya, "Sembe, wadhi! Sembe asembamatek, mak mana ka awachoni ni, we. "
Mi nowuok modhi got Karmel irng’at Nyasaye. Kane ng’at Nyasaye onene gi kuma bor, kobiro, nowacho ni Gehazi jatichneniya, "Ne! Chi Shunem cha biro.
Ring iromne, ipenje ngimane gi ngimamar chwore kod mar wuode. " Dhakono nodwoko Gehazi ni, "Wangima. "
Kaneochopo e got, nodhi ir ng’at Nyasaye, momako tiende, Gehazi nosudo mondoogole, to ng’at Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Weye, nimar chunye chandoremalit, to Ruoth Nyasaye osepandona wachne, mak onyisa. "
Dhakononopenje ni, "An ema nakwayi wuowi koso? Donge nakweri ni kik iwuonda?"
Elisha nowacho ni Gehazi niya, "Ng’wan lepi, ikaw ludha, kendo ichakwuoth.  Kiromo gi ng’ato, to kik imosi, kata ka ng’ato mosi, to kikidwoke, kendo kichopo, to iriw ludha e lela wang’ nyathi. "
To minnyathi nowachone niya, "Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gi nyingi iwuon,ok naweyi. " Omiyo Elisha nochung’ modhi kode.
Gehazi notelonigi, kendokochopo kuno, noketo luth e lela wang’ nyathi, to nyathi noling’ thi, maok otimo gimoro manyiso ni ongima.  Omiyo Gehazi nodok romo ni Elisha,monyise ni nyathi ok ochier.
Kane Elisha ochopo e ot, noyudo nyathi kotho e kitandane.
Omiyonodonjo, moloro dhoot mondo obed kende gi nyathi, kendo nolamo RuothNyasaye.
Eka noriere kuom nyathi, koketo dhoge e dho nyathi, wang’ekuom wang’ nyathi, kendo lwete kuom lwet nyathi.  Kane osetimo kamano,ringre nyathi nodoko maliet.
Elisha nochung’ mowuotho koni gi koni eot dichiel.  Eka nodok, moriere kuom nyathi kendo, mi nyathi nogirdibiriyo, kendo wang’e noyawore.
Elisha noluongo Gehazi, mowachoneniya, "Luong chi Shunem. " Mi noluonge.  Kane obiro, Elisha nowachoneniya, "Kaw wuodi. "
Dhakono nodonjo, mogoyo chonge piny e tiende,kokulo wiye piny.  Eka nokawo wuode, mowuok.
Elisha nodok Gilgal. Honni ma Elisha otimo ni jonabiChieng’ moro kane kech nie piny, Elisha ne ni kod oganda jonabi,kapuonjogi.  Nowacho ni jatichne niya, "Ket agulu maduong’ e kendo, itedchiemo ni jonabigi. "
Ng’at achiel kuom jonabi nodhi ng’ueto, moyudootangle.  Nopono bade kopong’ modokgo irgi.  Nobarogi, moologi e agulu, kaok ong’eyo ni gin ang’o.
Eka notok ni ji mondo ocham.  To kane gichakochiemo, ne giywak niya, "Yaye, ng’at Nyasaye, ang’o manie agulu manegowani?" Mi ne ok ginyal chiemo.
To Elisha nowacho niya, "Karakeluru mogo. " Eka nokiro mogo e agulu, mowacho niya, "Koro tokuru ni jimondo ochiem. " Mi ne giyudo ni gima rach koro onge agulu.
Ng’at moro noa Baal-shalisha, mokelo ni ng’at Nyasaye cham manyien egunia.  Ne gin makati piero ariyo mag shairi, kod cham mawidhi.  Elishanowacho ni mondo omigi ji ochamgi.
To jatichne nokone ni, "Ere kakaanyalo miyo ji mia achiel chiemo matin ni?" Elisha nomedo wacho ni,"Migi amiya, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni ginichiem, mi chiemo mokonodong’. "
Omiyo nomiyogi, mi gichiemo, kendo moko nodong’, mana kakaRuoth Nyasaye nowacho.
Ruodhi
Ochang dhoho mar Naaman
Naaman ne jaduong’ lweny mar ruodh Aram, kendo Ruoth Nyasayenosekonye, komiyo jo-Aram loyo e lweny.  Kuom mano, ne en ng’at ma ruodheogeno kendo morgo.  Bende ne en ng’at maratego ma jachir.  To ne enradhoho.
Noyudo ka chiege nigi nyar Israel moro ma jatichne, manejo-Aram omako kane gimonjo jo-Israel, kaka ne githoro timo.
Nyakononowacho ni chi Naaman niya, "Mad ruodhwa dhi ir janabi man Samaria!Dothiedh dhohone. "
Kane Naaman owinjo kamano, nodhi monyiso ruodhe gimanyar Israel owacho.
Ruodh Aram nowachone niya, "Kara dhiyo, abiro oriir ruodh Israel gi barua. "Naaman nodhi gi fedha moromo kilo mia adek, gi dhahabu moromo kilo apar,kod lewni mabeyo apar.
Barua mane otero ni ruodh Israel nowacho kama:"Kisomo barupani, to ng’e ni aseoroni Naaman jaduong’na mar lweny, mondoithiedh dhohone. "
Kane ruodh Israel osomo barua noyiecho lepe, kowachoniya, "An e Nyasaye koso, ma anyalo nego ng’ato kata miye ngima, momiyojali orona ng’ato mondo athiedh dhohone? Neuru kaka odwaro dhaw kodwa!"
To kane Elisha, ng’at Nyasaye owinjo kaka ruodh Israel oyiecho lepe,noorone wach niya, "Marang’o iseyiecho lepi? Or jalo ira, mondo ong’e nikara janabi nitie e Israel. "
Mi Naaman nodhi gi faresene kod gechene,mochung’ e dhood Elisha.
Elisha noorone jaote niya, "Dhiyo, inyumridibiriyo e aora Jordan, to dendi biro chango, kendo ibiro pwodhori. "
To Naaman nokecho, modok kowacho niya, "Nende aparo ni dowuog obi ira,kendo dochung’ koluongo nying Nyasaye ma Nyasache, kendo dorie lwetekuom adhondena mondo othiedhna dhoho.
Donge aore mag Damaski, ma Abanagi Farpa, beyo moloyo aore duto mag Israel? Ok danyumra e aorego mondoachangi?" Bang’e nolokore modhi ka iye owang’.
To jotichne nosudobute, mopenje niya, "Wuonwa, ka da janabi chiki ni mondo itim gimoromaduong’, donge ditimo? To koro ok ber moloyo kowachoni mana ni mondoinyumri e pi, idok maler?"
Omiyo nolor modhi onimo e aora Jordandibiriyo, kaka ng’at Nyasaye nowacho, mi nopwodhore, kendo dende noduogomapakni ka dend nyathi matin.
Naaman gi joge duto nodok ir ng’at Nyasaye, mochung’ e nyime,kowachone niya, "Koro ang’eyo ni onge Nyasaye kamoro amora mak mana eIsrael; omiyo akwayi ni yie ikawie mich moro matin. "
To nodwoke niya,"Gi nying Ruoth Nyasayee ma atiyone, ok nakaw gimoro. " Nochune mondookaw, to Elisha nodagi.
Eka Naaman nowachone niya, "Kidagi ni kikamiyi gimoro, to akwayi ni mondo imiya lowo ma dirom kenje ariyo ting’o,nikech chakre kawuono ok abi timo misango ni Nyasaye moro amora, to makmana ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To ne nitie gimoro achiel ma Ruoth Nyasayeonego wenae; ruodha pod biro donjo e od Rimon nyasache mondo olem kuro,koyiengore e bada.  Obiro kulore e od Rimon, kendo an bende abiro kulorakode, to Ruoth Nyasaye mondo owena kuom timo kamano. "
Elishaniowachone niya, "Dhiyo gi kue. "To kane Naaman osechwalore matin,
Gehazi ma jatich Elisha ng’atNyasaye, noparo niya, "Ruodha oseweyo Naaman ma ja-Aram odhi mak okawomich ma nokelo.  Gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye, abiro lawe mondo ayudie gimorokuome. "
Omiyo Gehazi nolawo Naaman.  Kane Naaman oneno ng’ato kalawe,nolor oa e gari, modhi moromone, kopenje niya, "Ere wach?"
Gehazinodwoke niya, "Onge wach, to ruodha oora mondo anyisi ni yawuowi ariyomag oganda jonabi ochopo sani koa e piny gode mag Efraim.  Okwayi mondoimiye fedha moromo kilo piero adek, kod lewni ariyo. "
Naaman nodwokeniya, "Yie mondo ikaw kilo piero auchiel. " Nochuno Gehazi, momiyo kilopiero auchiel mag fedha e kirope ariyo, kod lewni ariyo.  Nomiyo jotichneariyo mondo oting’gi, ka gitelo e nyim Gehazi.
Kane gichopo e dala,Gehazi nokawo gigo kuomgi, mokano e ot.  Eka nomiyogi thuolo, mi gidok.
To kane Gehazi odonjo e ot, mondo oti ni ruodhe.  Elisha nopenje niya,"Gehazi, ia kanye?" Nodwoke ni, "Ne ok adhi kamoro. "
Elisha nokoneniya, "Donge chunya nodhi kodi, kane ng’at cha lor a e gache, duogoromoni? Iparo ni ma e kinde mar kawo fedha, gi lewni, gi puothe mzabibu,gi rombe, gi dhok, kod jotich machwo gi mamon koso?
Omiyo koro dhohomar Naaman biro maki, kaachiel gi nyikwayi nyaka chieng’" Mi Gehazii noakanyo kosedoko radhoho, ma dende rachar ka pe.
Ruodhi
Le molwar e aora, olewore e pi
Oganda mar jonabi nowacho ni Elisha niya, "Kama wadakie kodini tin,wahewo.
We wadhi aora Jordan mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato otong’ yien,wagergo udi. " Nodwoke niya, "Ayie dhiuru. "
To ng’ato achiel kuomginokwayo Elisha ni, "Yie idhi kodwa" Mi noyie,
modhi kodgi.  Kane gichopoe aora Jordan, ne gichako tong’o yien.
To kane oyudo ng’at moro tong’oyien, wi leye nolwar e pi, mi noywak kowacho niya, "Ruoth, hapa rach,nikech en le ma aholo. "
Ng’at Nyasaye nopenje niya, "Olwar gi kanye?"Kane jalo onyise, Elisha nong’ado luth, mobolo kanyono, mi le nolewore.
Elisha nokone ni, "Kawe. " Mi ng’atno notero lwete, mokawe. Elisha gi jo-Aram
Chieng’ moro kane jo-Aram kedo gi jo-Israel, noporo wach gi jotende maglweny, konyisogi kuma obiro butoe.
To ng’at Nyasaye nooro ni ruodhIsrael wach, kanyise niya, "Kik iluw yorno, nikech jo-Aram obuto kuno. "
Eka ruodh Israel nooro ji kuma ng’at Nyasaye nosenyise.  Kamano e kakaElisha ne thoro timo, omiyo ruoth noresore ndalo mogwarore.
Wachno nothago chuny ruodh Aram ahinya, mi noluongo jodonge, mopenjoginiya, "Dak unyisa ng’atwa ma konyo ruodh Israel?"
Achiel kuom jogenodwoke niya, "Ruoth, onge ng’atwa moro amora, to mak mana Elisha janabiema nyiso ruodhgi gik miwacho kata ka in e odi mar nindo. "
Ruothnowacho niya, "Dhiuru mondo udwar kuma entie, eka naor ji odhi omake. "Ne ginyise ni, "En Dothan. "
Omiyo nooro farese gi geche kod ogandalweny maduong’.  Ne gichopo kuno gotieno, mi gilworo dalano.
Ka ne ng’at Nyasaye ochiew gokinyi, nowuok oko, moneno oganda lwenyman gi farese kod geche kolworo dala.  Jatichne nowach niya, "Ruodha,wadiwo! Ti wanatim ang’o?"
Nodwoke niya, "Kik iluor, nimar jowa ng’enymoloyogi. "
Eka Elisha nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Asayi, yaw wang’jali mondo onen. " Ruoth Nyasaye noyawo wang’ wuowino, mi noneno ka gotopong’ gi farese kod geche mag mach, ka rito Elisha.
Kane jo-Aram obiro monjo Elisha, nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Lok jogimuofni. " Mi Ruoth Nyasaye nolokogi muofni mana kaka Elisha nokwaye.
Eka Elisha nowachonigi niya, "Ma ok e yo, kendo ok enie dala mudwaro. Luwauru mondo ateru ir ng’at mudwarono. " Eka noterogi nyaka Samaria!
To kane gidonjo Samaria, Elisha nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, koroyaw wang’gi mondo ginen. " Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye noyawo wang’gi, mi negipo ka gin mana e dier Samaria!
Kane ruodh Israel onenogi, nopenjoElisha niya,, "Wuonwa, aneggi koso?"
To nodwoke ni, "Kik ineggi! Bendedineg ji mimako e lweny adier? Migi chiemo mondo gichiem, eka gidog irruodhgi. "
Omiyo nolosonigi chiemo mathoth, to kane gisechiemo kendogimetho, noweyogi, mi gidok ir ruodhgi.  Chakre kanyo, jo-Aram ne okochako omonjo jo-Israel. Wach mane Elisha okoro ka jo-Aram olworo Samaria
Bang’ mano, Ben-hadad, ruodh Aram nochoko joge duto mag lweny, modhiolworo Samaria mondo okaw.
Ne gilwore aming’a, nyaka kech maduong’nomako jo-Samaria.  Wi kanyna ning’iewo gi fedha moromo kilo achiel, toondong’ mar owuoch akuru ning’iewo gi fedha moromo achiel kuom pieroariyo mar kilo.
Chieng’ moro kane ruodh Israel oyudo wuotho ewi ohingamar dala, dhako moro noywakne kawacho niya, "Yaye ruoth, konya!"
Ruothnodwoke niya, "Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ok konyi, an to dakonyi nadi? Dakonyi gicham, koso gi divai?"
Eka ruoth nomedo penje ni, "Ang’o machandi?"Nodwoke niya, "Dhako moro nowachona ni mondo achiw wuoda wacham, tokinyne wacham mare.
Omiyo ne watedo wuoda, mwachamo.  To kinyne kaneawachone ni mondo ochiw wuode wacham, to nayudo kosepande. "
Kane ruothowinjo wach dhakono, noyiecho lepe.  (Wachno notimore ka ruoth wuotho ewiohinga, mi ji nong’iye, moneno ni pien gugru ema orwako ei lepe. )
Nowacho niya, "Nyasaye mondo okweda ka ok ang’ado wi Elisha wuodShafat oko kawuono!"
Noyudo ka Elisha obet ewi ode kaachiel gi jodongo.  Ruoth nooro jaoteire, to kane pok jaoteno ochopo, Elisha nowacho ni jodongo niya, "Unenokaka ng’at ma janekno oro ng’ato mondo obi ong’ad wiya oko? Ka jaotenenoochopo ka, to ulor dhoot matek, nikech ruodhe luwo bang’e machiegni. "
Kane pod owuoyo kodgi, ruoth nochopo, mowacho niya, "Masirani oa manakuom Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo onge tiende, medo rito Ruoth Nyasaye mondookonywa!"
Ruodhi
To Elisha nowacho niya, "Winjuru wach Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ruoth Nyasayeowacho niya, ‘Kiny, kar sa makama, nengo atonga mar mogo mayom nobedotonglo achiel e dhoranga Samaria, kendo atonge ariyo mag shairi bendeotonglo achiel. ’ "
Jaduong’ lweny ma nyagach ruoth nowacho ni ng’atNyasaye niya, "Bende gini ditimre adier, kata da Ruoth Nyasaye yawdirise polo?" To nodwoke niya, "Ibiro nene gi wang’i, to ok nichame!"
Noyudo ka jodhoho ang’wen obet e dhoranga Samaria.  Ne gipenjore niya,"Ere gima omiyo warito mondo watho ka?
Kwadonjo e dala, to kech nikuno, wabiro tho.  Kata kwamedo bet ka, pod wabiro mana tho.  Ber wadog nijo-Aram.  Ka ging’wononwa, to wanabed mangima.  To kata ka gidagi, bendewatho. "
Omiyo kane chieng’ osepodho, ne giwuok mondo gidhi kuma jo-Aramojotie.  To kane gichopo e dho kambigi, ne gipo ka onge kata ng’at achielkanyo,
nimmar Ruoth Nyasaye nosemiyo oganda jo-Aram owinjo koko margeche gi farese, machalo oganda maduong’, mi giwacho kendgi niya,"Winjuru! Ruodh Israel osewako ruodhi mag jo-Hiti gi mag jo-Misri mondoobi oked kodwa. "
Omiyo kar ang’ich welo ne giringo mondo gitony, kagiweyo hembegi gi faresegi kod kenjegi e kambi.
Kuom mano, kanejodhohogo ochopo e dho kambi, ne gidonjo e hema moro, mi gichiemoe kendogimethoe.  Eka ne gipeyo fedha gi dhahabu kod lewni, mi gidhi gipando.  Negidok kendo ne gipeyo gik mane nie hema machielo.  Gigo bende ne gidhigipando.
Eka ne giwacho kendgi niya, "Yawa! Ok watim maber.  Ma en odiechieng’mar mor, to waling’ aling’a nadi? Kwagalore kama nyaka piny oru, towabiro neno masira.  Omiyo koro wadhiuru mondo wanyis jood ruoth gimaotimore. "
Mi ne gidok, kendo ne giluongo jorit ranga dala, kagiwachonigi niya, "Nende wachopo e kambi mar jo-Aram, to ne ok wanenong’ato, kata winjo dwol moro ne ok wawinjo, mak mana hembe gi farese kodkenje motue e loyegi. "
Eka jorit rangach nogoyo koko, mi wach noter nijood ruoth.
Ruoth nochiew gotieno, mowacho ni jodonge mag lweny niya,"Winjuru gima jo-Aram dwaro timonwa.  Ging’eyo ni wadenyo, omiyo gisewuoke kambigi, to gipondo mana e bungu, ka giparo ni gibiro makowa kwawuok,eka gidonj e dalawa ka. "
To achiel kuom jodonge nowacho niya, "Yiemondo ji moko odhi gi farese abich modong’, nikech farese duto biro thomana kaka jo-Israel mang’eny osetho.  We waorgi mondo wane gima timore. "
Omiyo ne giluongo joidh farese ariyo, mi ruoth noorogi mondo giluwbang’ oganda lweny mar jo-Aram, kowachonigi niya, "Dhiuru, une gimaotimore. "
Kuom mano, ne giluwo jo-Aram nyaka aora Jordan, mi giyudolewni kod gik moko mang’eny mane jo-Aram owito e yo, ka gireto nikechkibaji.  Eka jootego nodok, monyiso ruoth gima ne gineno.
Omiyo ji dutonowuok, moyako kambi jo-Aram, kendo atonga mar mogo mayom ning’iewootonglo achiel, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho.
Ruoth noketo jaduong’lweny ma nyagache cha mondo obed jatend jorit rangach, to ji nonyonepiny e dhorangach, motho, mana kaka ng’at Nyasaye nowacho, chieng’ maneruoth obiro ire.
(Ng’at Nyasaye nosewacho ni ruoth niya, "Kiny kar sa makama, nengoatonge ariyo mag shairi nobed otonglo achiel, kendo nengo atonga marmogo mayom bende otonglo achiel. "
Jaduong’ lweny cha nosewacho ning’at Nyasaye niya, "Bende gini ditimre adier, kata da Ruoth Nyasaye yawdirise polo?" To Elisha nosedwoke niya, "Ibiro neno gi wang’i to okinichame. "
Kendo kamano e kaka notimorene, nikech ji ne onyone edhorangach, motho. )
Ruodhi
Odwok ni chi Shunem lope
Elisha nosenyiso dhako mane ochierone wuode cha niya, "Dar gi joodi,udhi udag kamoro amora ma unyalo yudoe thuolo, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye birokelo kech e piny kuom higni abiriyo. "
Kamano dhakono nodhi motimo kakang’at Nyasaye nowachone.  Nodar gi joode modhi odak e piny jo-Filistiakuom higni abiriyo.
Kane higni abiriyogo oserumo, dhakono noduogo koa epiny jo-Filistia, mi nodhi mondo okwa ruoth odwokne ode gi puothe.
To noyudo ka ruoth penjo Gehazi jatich ng’at Nyasaye ni mondo onyisegik madongo duto ma Elisha osetimo.
Kane pod Gehazi nyiso ruoth kakaElisha nochiero ng’at motho, nopo ka min wuowi mane ochierono obiro,mokwayo ruoth mondo odwokne ode gi puothene.  Mi Gehazi nowacho ni ruothniya, "Ruodha, ma e dhako nogono, kendo ma e wuode mane Elisha ochiero!"
Ruoth nopenjo dhakono wachno, mi dhakono nonyise gik ma notimore.  Ekaruoth nomiye jaduong’ moro kowachone niya, "Los wach dhakoni, mondoodwokne gige duto, kaachiel gi cham duto mosenyak e puothene, chakrechieng’ mane oaye ka, nyaka chil kawuono. "Hazael odoko ruodh Aram
Chieng’ moro Elisha nodhi Damaski, moyudo ka Ben-hadad ruodh Haram tuo. Kane ruoth owinjo ni ng’at Nyasaye obiro.
Nowacho ni Hazael niya, "Kawmich, idhi irom godo ni ng’at Nyasaye, kendo ikwaye mondo openj RuothNyasaye ka abiro kwo. "
Kamano Hazael nodhi romo ni Elisha, kotero nemich mang’eny mogolo Damaski, moromo ngamia piero ang’wen ting’o.  Kaneoromo kode, nochung’ e nyime, mowachone niya, "Ben-hadad ruodh Aram manyathini oora ni mondo apenji kobiro kwo. "
Elisha nodwoke niya,"Dhiyo, iwachne ni obiro kwo.  To kata kamano, Ruoth Nyasaye osenyisamalong’o ni obiro tho. "
Eka wang’ Elisha notwo kuome kang’iye, nyakawi Hazael nokuot, to pi wang’ ng’at Nyasaye noton.
Hazael nopenjeniya, "Jaduong’, iywago ang’o?" Nodwoke niya, "Aywak nikech ang’eyo kakaibiro sando jo-Israel.  Iniwang’ miechgi mochiel gi ohinga, kendo ininegyawuotgi marateke.  Inikidh nyithindgi matindotindo, bende iniried iyemondegi mayach. "
To Hazael nopenje ni, "To an anani, ere kaka danyaltimo gima duong’ kamano?" Elisha nodwoke niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osenyisani ibiro bedo ruodh Aram. "
Eka Hazael noa ir Elisha, modok ir ruodhe. Ruoth nopenje gima Elisha owachone, mi Hazael nodwoke niya, "Nonyisa niibiro kwo maonge kiawa. "
To kinyne noumo wang’ ruoth gi nanga moluti epi, mothung’e nyaka otho.  Eka nobet ruoth kare. Loch Jehoram, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar abich mar loch Joram wuod Ahab, ruodh Israel, Jehoram wuodJehoshafat nodoko ruodh Juda.
Ne en jahigni piero adek gariyo kochakotich ruoth, kendo norito piny kuom higni aboro, kodak Jerusalem.
Noluwo timbe ruodhi mag Israel, kaka jodhood Ahab notimo, nikechnokendo nyar Ahab.  Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
To katakamano, Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok otieko jo-Juda, nikech noparo Daudijatichne, nimar nosesingorene ni anywolane nobed e kom duong’ ka tayamalielne nyaka chieng’.
E ndalo loch Jehoram, jo-Edom nodagi bet e bwo loch Juda, mi negiketo ruodhgi giwegi.
Omiyo Jehoram noidho loka nyaka Zair, kaachielgi gechene duto mag lweny, to jo-Edom nolworogi.  Mi Jehoram gi jotendgechene nochiew gotieno, momwomo, to joge duto noringo, modok miechgi.
Mano e kaka jo-Edom notieko loch Juda Edom nyaka chil kawuono.  Endalogo Libna bende nodagi bet e bwo loch Juda.
Koro weche moko mag Jehoram, kod timbene duto, ondiki e Kitap Wechemag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda.
Jehoram notho, mi noyike but kwerene edala Daudi.  Ahazia wuode nodoko ruoth kare. Lochh ahazia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar apar gariyo mar loch Joram wuod Ahab ruodh Israel, Ahaziawuod Jehoram nodoko ruodh Juda.
Ahazia ne jahigni piero ariyo gariyokane ochako tich ruoth, kendo norito piny kuom higa achiel, kodakJerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Athalia, nyakwar Omri ruodh Israel.
Ahazia bende noluwo timbe dhood Ahab.  Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye, mana kaka timbe Ahab, nikech ne en or jodhood Ahab.
Ahazia gi Joram wuod Ahab ne jodhi Ramoth-gilead mondo oked gi Hazaelruodh Aram, to nopo ka jo-Aram ohinyo Joram kuno.
Mi ruoth Joram nodokJezreel ni mondo ochang kuom hinyruok ma noyudo Ramoth kokedo gi Hazaelruodh Aram.  Eka Ahazia wuod Jehoram, ruodh Juda, nodhi Jezreel mondo oneJoram wuod Ahab nikech Joram ne tuo.
Ruodhi
Owir Jehu mondo obed ruodh Israel
Elisha janabi noluongo achiel kuom jonabi, mowachone niya, "Ng’wanlepi, idhi Ramoth-gilead gi puga mar morni.
Kichopo, dwar Jehu wuodJehoshafat ma wuod Nimshi.  Kisetundo kama entie, to gole kuom jolwenywetene, kendo itere e ot maiye.
Eka ikaw puga mar mo, iol e wiye,kikone ni Ruoth Nyasaye owachone ni oseyiere mondo obed ruodh Israel.  Kaisewacho kamano, to yaw dhoot iring ia.  Kik ideki!"
Omiyo janabi ma rawerano nodhi Ramoth-gilead,
monwang’o jodong lwenyka nie bura.  Nowacho niya, "Jaduong’, adwaro loso kodi. " Jehu nopenjeniya, "En ng’a ma idwaro losogo kuomwa?" Nodwoke ni, "Mana in, jaduong’"
Mi Jehu noa malo, modonjo e ot.  Eka janabino noolo mo e wiye, kawachoneni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho niya, "Aseyieri mondo ibedruodh Israel.
Inineg dhood Ahab ma ruodhu, mondo ochulgo kuor kuomJezebel nikech nochuero remb jotichna ma jonabi, kod jotichna mamokoduto.
Dhood Ahab duto norum! Anatiek jo-Ahab machwo duto, ma onge kataachiel ma nodong’ e Israel.
Analok dhoode mondo ochal gi dhood Jeroboamwuod Nebat, kendo machal gi dhood Baasha wuod Ahija.
Guogi nochamJezebel e piny Jezreel, kendo onge ng’ama nokonye. " Eka janabino noyawodhoot, moringo.
Kane Jehu owuok, modok ir jodong ruodhe, ne gipenje niya, "Ere wach?Janekono nobiro iri nang’o?" Nodwokogi niya, "Ung’eyo kaka ng’atnowuoyo!"
To ne gikwere ni, "Mano miriambo! Wachnwa awacha adiera. "Nodwokogi kendo niya, "Nonyisa ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni oseyiera mondoabed ruodh Israel. "
Mi jogo duto nopedho lepgi aruya ewi raidhi, mondoJehu obedie.  Eka ne gigoyo tung’ ka gikok niya, "Jehu e ruoth!"Jehu onego Joram, ruodh Israel
Kamano e kaka Jehu wuod Jehoshsfat ma wuod Nimshi nochako piem giJoram, mondo ogol e tich ruoth.
Jehu nowacho ni jodong lweny weteneniya, "Ka parou chal kamano, to kara neuru ni ng’ato ok owuok e dala ka,ma diter wach Jezreel. "
Eka Jehu noidho gache, modhi Jezreel, nimarJoram ne ni kuno.  To Ahazia ruodh Juda bende ne ni kuno, ka wendo Joram. (Ruoth Joram ne ni Jezreel mondo ochang kuom hinyruok mane oyudo e lwetjo-Aram Ramoth-gilead gi jo-Israel duto, mondo kik Hazael ruodh Aramkaw. )
Jarito mane oyudo ochung’ ewi ohinga mar Jezreel noneno Jehu gi jogeka biro, mowacho niya, "Aneno ji moko, ka biro. " Joram nowachone ni, "Orng’ato gi faras odhi oromnigi, mondo openjgi ka wach ber. "
Omiyo jaidhfaras nodhi romonigi, mowachonigi niya, "Ruoth penjo ka wach ber. " ToJehu nodwoke niya, "Wach maber obadhie ang’o? Wichri ilu bang’a. " Jaritomane ni ewi ohinga nochako owacho niya, "Jaote cha osechopo irgi, to okane koduogo. "
Eka ruoth nooro jaidh faras machielo, ma bendenowachonigi niya, "Ruoth penjo ka wach ber. " Jehu nodwoke niya, "Wachmaber obadhie ang’o? Wichri ilu bang’a. "
Jarito nowacho kendo niya,"Jaoteno osechopo irgi, to en bende ok oduogi.  To jariemb gari cha chalomana gi Jehu wuod Nimshi, nikech oriembo matek ka janeko. "
Joram nowacho ni joge mondo oikne gache, mi ne gitimo kamano.  EkaJoram ruodh Israel, kod Ahazia ruodh Juda, ne jowuok gi gechegi, ka dhiromo ni Jehu, mi ne giromo kode e puoth Naboth ja-Jezreel.
Kane Joramoneno Jehu, nopenje niya, "Ere kaka wach nyalo bet maber, ka meruJezebel pod dhi nyime gi timbene mag ndhogruok gi mag jwok?"
KaneJoram owinjo wachno, noloko gache moringo, kowacho ni Ahazia niya,"Ahazia masira ni ka! Jogi jemo!"
To Jehu noywayo asere gi tekoneduto, mochwowo otenga Joram, mi asere nopowo e dho chunye, monywowore egache.
Eka Jehu nowacho ni Bidkar mane jating’ne gilweny niya, "Kawe,ibole e pwoth Naboth ja-Jezreel.  Ok ipar gima Ruoth Nyasaye nowachokuome chieng’ mane wan kodi e gach lweny, kwaluwo bang’ Ahab wuon mare?
Donge Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho kuome ni, ‘Nyoro aneni kinego Naboth giyawuote, to abiro chuloni kuor e puodhoni’? Omiyo kawe, ibole epuodhono, mondo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ochop kare. "Jehu onego Ahazia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane ahazia ruodh Juda oneno gima otimore, noringo kochomo Beth-hagan. Jehu nolawe, kawacho niya, "En bende negeuru!" Mi ne gichwowe ka gecheidho got Gur, machiegni gi Ibleam.  Noringo nyaka Megido, motho kuro.
Joge noting’e e gari nyaka jerusalem, mi giyike but kwerene e dalaDaudi.
Ahazia nochako bet ruodh Juda e higa mar apar gachiel mar loch Joramwuod Ahab. Tho mar Jezebel
Kane Jehu ochopo Jezreel, Jezebel nowinjo birone, omiyo nowiro wang’egi mo, kendo oloso yie wiye.  Eka nong’icho gie dirisa.
Kane Jehuodonjo e dhorangach, Jezebel nowachone niya, "Ere wach, in Zimri majanek ruodheni?"
Jehu noting’o wang’e, mong’iyo dirisa kapenjo niya,"Ere ng’ama odokna?" Eka jotich ariyo kata adek nobiro e dirisa,mong’iye.
Jehu nowacho nigi niya, "Dhiruru dhakono piny. " Kamano negidhire, mi rembe nokirore e kor ot, kendo farese nonyone.
Jehunodonjo e ot, mochiemo kendo ometho.  Eka nowacho niya, "Dhiuru uyikdhako mokuong’ni nikech en nyar ruoth. "
To kane gidhi mondo giyike, neginwang’o mana hanga wiye gi tiendene kod luetene kende.
Kane gidoknyiso Jehu, nowachonigi niya, "Mano e gima Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jatichneElija ja-Tishbe owacho, kokoro niya, ‘Guogi nocham ringre Jezebel egweng’ Jezreel;
kendo ringre nochal kaka owuoyo moyar e puothe magJezreel, ma onge ng’ato ma nong’e ni, ma e Jezebel. ’ "
Ruodhi
Jehu otieko dhood Ahab
Noyudo ka yawuot Ahab piero abiriyo odak Samaria.  Omiyo Jehu nondikobarupe, mooro Samaria ni jodong dala kod joma ne pidho yawuot Ahabgo,kowacho niya,
"Donge yawuot ruoth odak kodu, kendo un gi gilwenje, gigeche, gi farese, kod mier mochiel? Omiyo kuyudo baruani,
to yieruruwuod ruoth moro, malong’o kendo motegno, uket e kom wuon mare, mondouked ni dhood ruodhu. "
To ne giluor ahinya ka giwacho niya, "Jehunoloyo ruodhi ariyo kande, koro wan to dwaloye nadi?"
Omiyo jaduong’ odruoth gi jaduong’ dala kaachiel gi jodongo kod jogo mane pidho yawuowigonooro ni Jehu wach niya, "Wan jotichni, kendo wayie timo gimoro amoramiwachonwa.  Ok wanaket ng’at moro obed ruoth.  Tim atima gima idwaro. "
Eka Jehu nondikonigi barua machielo kawacho niya, "Kuyie dokna, kendomako chikna, to ng’aduru wiye yawuot ruodhu, ukelna Jezreel kiny samakama. " (Yawuot ruoth piero abiriyogo nodak kod jodong dala manepidhogi. )
Kane jodongogo oyudo baruano, ne ginego yawuot ruoth duto, migiketo wiyegi e aditni, kendo giorogi Jezreel ni Jehu.
Kane jaoteonyiso Jehu ni osekel wiye yawuot ruoth, Jehu nowacho ni mondo odhurgipidhe ariyo e dhorangach, gibed kanyo nyaka piny ru.
Nowuok gokinyimowacho ni ji duto niya, "An ema najamo ruodha, manego, omiyo un uongebura e wachno; to koro, jogi duto ng’ama onego?
Kuom mano ng’euru nionge wach Ruoth Nyasaye kata achiel ma norem mak otimore kuom weche dutomane owacho kuom dhood Ahab, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo gima nomiyoElija jatichne owacho. "
Eka Jehu nonego jodhood Ahab duto ma nodong’Jezreel, gi jodonge duto gi osiepene kod jodolo mage, nyaka ne onge katang’at achiel modong’.
Jehu nowuok kadhi Samaria.  To kane osechopo Beth-eked Kajokwath,
nopo koromo gi owete Ahazia ruodh Juda.  Nopenjogi niya, "Un ng’agini?" Ne gidwoke ni, "Wan owete Ahazia, kendo wadhi limo joka ruoth. "
Eka Jehu nowacho niya, "Makgiuru. " Mi ne gimakogi duto, ji pieroang’wen gariyo, kendo ne ginegogi pep e Yap Beth-eked.
Kane Jehu osea kuno, noneno Jehonadab wuod Rekab ka biro romone. Nomose, mopenje niya, "Bende chunyi ler koda, kaka chunya ler kodi?"Jehonadab nodwoke niya, "Ee, chunya ler kodi. " Jehu nokone ni, "Kakamano, to mak lweta. " Omiyo Jehonadab nomako lwete.  Eka Jehu nokwayemondo giidh gari,
kowachone niya, "Bi wadhi mondo ine kaka atiyo niRuoth Nyasaye gi kinda. " Kamano Jehu notero Jehonadab Samaria gi geche.
Kane gichopo Samaria, nonego jodhood Ahab duto ma nodong’ kuno, nyakanotiekogi chuth.  Mano e kaka wach mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni Elijanochopo kare. Jehu otieko lemo mar Baal
Eka Jehu nochoko jo-Israel duto, mowachonigi niya, "Ahab notiyo niBaal matin nono, to an abiro tiyone moloyo.
Omiyo luongnauru jonabiduto mag Baal gi ji duto malame kod jodolo mage.  Kik ng’ato dong’ kataachiel, nikech adwaro timo ni Baal liswa maduong’, to ng’ama obarenotho!" To Jehu nowuondogi kamano mondo oneg jogo duto mane lamo Baal.
Nochiko ni mondo olos chokruok mopwodhi mar lamo Baal.  Mi ne gitimokamano.
Nooro wach e piny Israel duto, mi jolam Baal nobiro maongekata ng’at achiel modong’.  Ne gidonjo e od Baal, ma ot opong’ ma ongekata kama iboloe luth.
Jehu nonyiso jarit lep lemo mondo opogni jolamBaal duto lewnigo, mi nomiyogi.
Eka Jehu nodonjo e od baal giJehonadab wuod Rekab.  Nowacho ni jolam Baal niya, "Nonuru mondo une nionge jatich Ruoth Nyasaye moro e dieru ka, to mak mana jolam Baalkende. "
Eka nochako wang’o misango kendo timo liswa. To Jehu noseketo askeche piero aboro oko, mondo orit ot, kawachoniginiya, "Ka ng’ato kuomu oweyo ng’at achiel kuom joma aseketo e lwetuotony, to en ema notho kar ng’atno!"
Kane Jehu osetieko wang’omisango, nowacho ni askechego kod jotendgi niya, "Donjuru, uneggi; kikuwe ng’ato tony!" Kane askechego kod jotendgi osenegogi, ne giwitoringregi oko.  Eka ne gidonjo e od Baal maiye,
mi gigoloe siro mane jilamo, mi giwang’o.
Kamano ne giketho siro mar Baal, kendo ne gimuko odBaal, mi giloko choo, kendo pod en kamano nyaka chil kawuoono.
Mano e kaka Jehu notieko lemo mar Baal e Israel.
Kata kamano, ne okoweyo timo timbe maricho mane Jeroboam wuod Nebat omiyo jo-Israel otimo,nimar ji ne pod lamo nyiroye mag dhahabu mane ni Bethel gi mane ni Dan.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jehu niya, "Amor gi tich misetiyo, nikechisetimo ni dhood Ahab kaka nadwaro, omiyo nyikwayi nobed ruodhi magIsrael nyaka tieng’ mar ang’wen. "
To Jehu ne ok odewo rito chik RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel gi chunye duto.  Nomedo timo richo maneJeroboam omiyo jo-Israel otimo.
Ndalogo ema Ruoth Nyasaye nochako thiroe jo-Israel, komiyo wasikgikawo bethe pinygi.  Hazael noloyo jo-Israel e pinygi duto,
chakre aoraJordan kochomo yo wuokchieng’.  Nokawo piny Gilead gi Bashan duto, chakreAroer but aora Arnon, koloyo jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben kod jo-Manase.
Weche moko mag Jehu, gi timbene kod tekone duto, ondik e Kitap Wechemag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Jehu notho, moyike Samaria.  Jehoahazwuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Jehu nobet ruodh Israel kuom higni pieroariyo gaboro, kodak Samaria.
Ruodhi
Athalia okawo loch gi thwon(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
—
.
)
Kane Athalia min Ahazia oneno ni wuode osetho, nonego joka ruoth duto.
To Jehosheba nyar ruoth Jehoram, ma nyamin Ahazia, nogolo Joashling’ling’ kuom yawuot ruoth ma nidwaro nego, mi nopande e od nindo kodjapite.  Kamano Athalia ne ok onege.
Joash nodak kod Jehosheba e OdRuoth Nyasaye kuom higni auchiel e kinde mar loch Athalia.
To e higa mar abiriyo, Jehoyada jadolo nooro wach, moluongo jotendjo-Kari kod jotend askeche ma jorit, mondo obi ire e Od Ruoth Nyasaye. Notimo kodgi winjruok, kendo nomiyo gikuong’ore, eka nonyisogii wuodruoth.
Nochikogi kama:
"Migap askeche matiyo chieng’ Sabato nyaka ritod ruoth,
to migepe ariyo modong’ mondo orit Od Ruoth Nyasaye,
kendooluor ruoth ka girite, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato omako gilweny e lwete.  Kang’at moro amora dwaro mwomou, to negeuru.  Bende kamoro amora ma ruothdhiye, to koweuru kurite. "
Jotend askeche notimo duto mane Jehoyada jadolo ochikogi.  Ng’ato kang’ato kuomgi nokelo askeche duto mane onego oa e tich chieng’ Sabato,kaachiel gi mago mane onego ochak tich chieng’no.
Jadolono nopogo nijotend askechego tonge gi kuodi mane mag ruoth Daudi, mane okan e OdRuoth Nyasaye.
Askeche mag jorit noriedo, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato omakogilweny e lwete, chakre yo milambo nyaka yo nyandwat mar Hekalu, kagilworo kendo-mar-misango kaachiel gi Hekalu.
Eka Jehoyada nogolo wuodruoth oko.  Nosidhone osimb duong’, momiye kitap chik, kendo nowire gi momondo obed ruoth.  Ji duto nopamo lwetgi, ka kok niya, "Ruoth mondo odagaming’a!"
Kane Athalia owinjo mahu mar ji, nodhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye kama negintie.
Noneno ruoth kochung’ e bath siro, kaka kit jo-Israel nobet,ka tung’ ywak, kendo ji wer.  Ji duto ne mor, kendo goyo tung’.  MiAthalia noyiecho lepe, ka kok niya, "Ujemo! Ujemo!"
Jehoyada jadolonowacho ni jotend askeche niya, "Goleuru oko! Kik unege e Od RuothNyasaye, kendo ka ng’at moro oluwe, to neguru ng’atno. "
Omiyo negimake, kendo ne gigole ka giluwo dhorangach mane farese donjogo e dalaruoth, mi ne ginege kanyo.
Eka Jehoyada nomiyo ruoth kod jo-Israel osingore ni Ruoth Nyasaye, niginibed jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nomiyo ruoth gi ji bende otimo winjruok ekindgi giwegi.
Mi ji duto nodhi momuko od Baal, kendo ne ginego Matanjadolo mar Baal e nyim kende mag liswago.  Jehoyada noketo jorit e OdRuoth Nyasaye.
Eka nodhi gi jotend askeche, gi jo-Kari, kod ji duto,mi ne giwuok gii ruoth e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ne gikowe nyaka e od ruoth,ka giluwo dhoranga jorit.  Eka Joash nobet e kom duong’.
Kane osenegAthalia e od ruoth, ji duto nobedo mamor, kendo Jerusalem nokue. Loch Joash, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Joash ne jahigni abiriyo kane odoko ruoth.
Ruodhi
Loch Jehoahaz, ruodh Israel
E higa mar piero ariyo gadek mar loch Joash wuod Ahazia ruodh Juda,Jehoahaz wuod Jehu nodoko ruodh Israel, mi norito kuom higni apargabiriyo, kodak Samaria.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, koluworicho mane Jeroboam wuod Nebat omiyo jo-Israel otimo.  Ne ok oweyo kataachiel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho gi jo-Israel, mi nothoro ketogi e lwetHazael ruodh Aram, kendo e lwet Ben-hadad ma wuode.
To Jehoahaz nosayoRuoth Nyasaye, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nowinje, nikech noneno kaka ruodh Aramsando jo-Israel.
Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Israel ng’at ma noresogie lwet jo-Aram, mi ne gidak e miechgi gi kue kaka chon.
To kata kamano,ne ok giweyo timbe maricho mag dhood Jeroboam, mane Jeroboam omiyojo-Israel otimo, to ne pod giluwogi.  Kido mar nyasaye ma dhako miluongoni Ashera bende ne pod ni Samaria.
Ruoth Nyasaye noweyo ni Jehoahaz mana jolweny alufu apar, gi joidhfarese piero abich, kod geche lweny apar, nikech ruodh Aram nosetiekogimi gichalo mana mihudhi.
Weche moko mag Jehoahaz, gi timbene duto, kod tekone, ondiki e KitapWeche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Jehoahaz notho moluwo kwerene,mi noyike Samaria.  Jehoash wuode nodoko ruoth kare. Loch Jehoash, ruodh Israel
E higa mar piero adek gabiriyo mar loch Joash ruodh Juda, ema Jehoashwuod Jehoahaz nodokoe ruodh Israel, kendo norito piny kuom higni apargauchiel, kodak Samaria.
En bende timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye, koluwo timbe maricho duto mane Jeroboam wuod Nebat omiyojo-Isarel otimo.
Weche moko mag Jehoahaz gi timbene duto, kod teko mane okedogo giAmazia ruodh Juda, ondiki e kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Jehoahash notho, moluwo kwerene, mi noyike Samaria but ruodhi magIsrael.  Jeroboam nodoko ruoth kare. Tho mar Elisha
Kane Elisha tuo gi tuo mane biro nege, noyudo Jehoash ruodh Israelosedhi nene, moywage ni, "Wuora! Wuora! Isebedonwa kaka geche lweny gijoidh farese mag Israel. "
Elisha nowachone niya, "Kaw tung’ giaserini. " Mi notimo kamano.
Eka Elisha nochako owachone niya, "Ywaatung’. " Mi noywayo.  Elisha noketo luetene kuom luete ruoth,
mowachoniya, "Yaw dirisa mochomo yo wuokchieng’" Mi noyawo.  Eka Elishanowachone niya, "Dir asere. " Kane osediro, Elisha nowachone niya, "Manoasech loch Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo onyiso ni ibiro loyo jo-Aram.  Ibiro kedogi jo-Aram e dala mar Afek nyaka itiekgi chuth. "
Nowachone kendo niya,"Koro kaw aserini modong’. " Kane ruoth osekawogi, Elisha nowachone ni,"Chiel piny kodgi. " Mi nochielo piny nyadidek, moweyo.
To Elisha,ng’at Nyasaye, nokecho kode, mowachone niya, "Da bed ni ichielo pinynyadibich kata nyadiuchiel, to eka da itieko jo-Aram chuth, to koroinilogi mana nyadidek kende. "
Elisha notho, moyiki.  Kindego jo-Moab ne thoro monjo piny Israel higaka higa.
To chieng moro kane jomoko yiko ng’ato, ne gipo ka ginenowasigu kabiro, mi ne gibolo ringre ng’atno ei liend Elisha.  To kaneringre ng’at mothono olwar kuom choke Elisha, chunye noduogo, mochung’.
Hazael ruodh Aram ne thago jo-Israel ndalo duto mag loch Jehoahaz.
To Ruoth Nyasaye nong’wononigi, kendo nokechogi, koparo singruok maneotimo gi Ibrahim kendo gi Isaka kod Jakobo.  Emomiyo ne ok otiekogi, katawitogi oko ne ok owitogi.
Kane Hazael ruodh Aram otho, Ben-hadad wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz nomayo Ben-hadad wuod Hazael mier mane Hazaelogolo e lwet Jehoahaz wuon mare e lweny.  Jehoash noloyo Ben-hadadnyadidek, mi nodwoko miergo ni Israel.
Ruodhi
Loch Amazia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar ariyo mar loch Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz ruodh Israel, Amaziawuod Joash nodoko ruodh Juda.
Ne en jahigni piero ariyo gabich kaneochako tich, kendo norito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko, kodakJerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Jehoadin nyar Jerusalem.
Timbe Amazia nelong’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, to ok machal gi Daudi kwar mare.  Noluwotimbe duto mag Joash wuon mare,
to kata kamano hembko mane ni kuondemoting’ore ne ok okethi, kendo ji ne pod timo misengni, kendo wang’oubani kuondegoo.
Kane Amazia ogurore e tich ruoth, nonego joge manonego wuon mare mane ruoth.
Ne ok onego yawuot jonekgo, to noluwo wachmondiki e Kitap Chik mar Musa, kama Ruoth Nyasaye owachoe niya, "Kikuneg wuone nikech richo mag nyithindgi, kata kik uneg nyithindo nikechricho mag wuonegi, to ng’ato ka ng’ato noneg mana nikech richone owuon. "
Amazia nonego jo-Edom alufu apar e holo Kado, mi okawo Sela gi lweny,mochako ni Joksheel.  Pod iluonge kamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Eka Amazia nooro ni Jehoash wuod Jehoahaz ma wuod Jehu ruodh Israel,kowachone niya, "Bi mondo waradi. "
To Jehoash ruodh Israel nodwokoAmazia ruodh Juda gi ngero niya, "Okuro moro man Lebanon, nooro wach niyath maduong’ man Lebanon, kowachone niya, ‘Yie mondo wuoda okendnyari. ’ To nopo ka le moro kadho kanyo, monyono okurono, moketho.
Adieri, iseloyo jo-Edom, mi koro ipakori.  Pakruoknino mondo oromi, toibedgo mana e dala.  Ang’o momiyo iero miero ma biro tieki, kaachiel gijo-Juda?"
To Amazia ne ok odewo.  Omiyo Jehoash ruodh Israel nodhi Bethshemesh,dala mar Juda.  Nokedo gi Amazia ruodh Juda kuno,
kendo jo-Israelnoloyo jo-Juda, moringo nyaka miechgi.
Jehoash ruodh Israel nomakoAmazia wuod Joash ma wuod Ahazia ruodh Juda, e Beth-shemesh.  NodhiJerusalem, momuko bath ohinga ma borne mita mia ariyo, chakre dhorangaEfraim nyaka dhorangach kama ohinga ogomogo.
Nokawo dhahabu gi fedhakod gik moko duto mane onwang’o e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kod kar keno mar odruoth, bende nokawo ji moko, motueyo ka gir singo.  Eka nodok Samaria.
Koro weche moko mag Jehoash, gi timbene duto, kod chir mane okedogo giAmazia ruodh Juda, ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Jehoash notho, moluwo kwerene.  Noyike samaria but ruodhi mag Israel. Jeroboam wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Amazia wuod Joash, ruodh Juda, nodak higni apar gabich bang’ tho Joashwuod Jehoahaz ruodh Israel.
Timbene moko duto ondiki e Kitap Weche magNdalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda.
Joge moko nojame Jerusalem, mi noringonyaka Lakish, to ne gilawe mi ginege kuno.
Ne giting’o ringre gifarese ka gidwoko Jerusalem, mi noyike but kwerene e dala Daudi.
Ekajo-Juda duto noketo Uzia ruoth kar Amazia wuon mare, ka en jahigni apargauchiel.
En ema nokawo dala mar Elath, modwoko ni jo-Juda, bang’ thowuon mare.  Eka ne ochiele gi ohinga. Jeroboam machielo odoko ruodh Israel
E higa mar apar gabich mar loch Amazia wuod Joash ruodh Juda, Jeroboamwuod Jehoash nodoko ruodh Israel, kodak Samaria.  Norito piny kuom hignipiero ang’wen gachiel.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, manakaka timbe duto mane Jeroboam wuod Nebat omiyogo jo-Israel obedojoricho.
Nodwoko piny mane olal ni Israel, chakre kama idonjogoHamath, nyaka Nam Kado, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nomiyojanabi Jona ma wuod Amitai, ja-Gath-hefer, owacho.
Kane Ruoth Nyasayeoneno ni masich jo-Israel lit ahinya, kendo onge ng’ato kata achielmanyalo konyogi, nomiyo Jeroboam wuod Jehoash oresogi,
nikechnosewacho ni ok noruch nying jo-Israel oko.
Koro weche moko mag Jeroboam, gi timbene duto, kod chir mane okedogogi jo-Damaski, kendo kaka nohoyo Ruoth Nyasaye ni kik to mirimbe kuomjo-Israel, ondik e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel.
Jeroboam notho, moluwo kwerene mane ruodhi mag Israel.  Zekaria wuodenodoko ruoth kare.
Ruodhi
Loch Ahaz, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar apar gabiriyo mar loch Peka wuod Remalia ema Ahaz wuodJotham nodokoe ruodh Juda.
Ne en jahigni piero ariyo kane ochako tich,morito piny kuom higni apar gauchiel, kodak Jerusalem.  To timbene ne oklong’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kaka timbe Daudi wuon mare ne long’o.
Noluwo timbe ruodhi mag Israel, to gima rach moloyo, en ni nowang’owuode ka gir misango, koluwo timbe makuero mag ogendini mane RuothNyasaye oriembo mondo owe thuolo ni jo-Israel.
Bende notimo misengni,kendo nowang’o ubani, e hembko ewi gode, kendo e tiend yath moro amoramotimo otiep.
E ndalogo, Rezin, ruodh Aram, gi Peka wuod Remalia ruodh Israel nodhimonjo Jerusalem.  Ne gilworo Ahaz gi joge, to ne ok ginyal loye.
(Kindego bende ema ruodh Edom noriemboe jo-Juda Elath, modwoko nijo-Edom, mi jo-Edom nodhi Elath, kuma gidakie nyaka chil kawuono. )
Tokane Ahaz oyudo ni ruodhigo olwore kamano, nooro joote irTiglath-pileser ruodh Asuria, kowachone niya, "An nyathini kendojatichni, yie ibi iresa e lwet ruodh Aram gi ruodh Israel ma kedo koda. "
Bende Ahaz nokawo fedha gi dhahabu mane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye kod karkeno mar od ruoth, mooro ni ruodh Asuria kaka chiwo.
Ruodh Asuria noyiegi wechene, modhi omonjo Damaski, mokawo.  Nodaro joma odakie, motero etuech Kir.  Rezin bende nonego.
Kane ruoth Ahaz odhi Damaski romo gi Tiglath-pileser ruodh Asuria,noneno kendo-mar-misango mane ni kuno, mi nooro ni Uria jadolo kido markendono gi romne duto, manyise kaka ochalo.
Uria jadolo nolosokendo-mar-misango machielo machal gi mano chuth, kendo notieke ka pokruoth Ahaz oduogo koa Damaski.
Kane ruoth oduogo, norango kendono.  Ekanoidho raidhi, kosudo machiegni kode.
Nowang’oe misango miwang’o pep,kod misango mar mogo.  Bende notimoe misango miolo piny, kendo nokiroeremb misengni mag sawo.
To kendo-mar-misango mar mula mane nie nyimRuoth Nyasaye nogolo e kind kendone manyien gi Od Ruoth Nyasaye, moketoyo nyandwat mar kendo manyienno.
Ruoth Ahaz nowacho ni Uria jadoloniya, "E kendo maduong’ni ema nitimie misango mar okinyi, kod mar mogomitimo godhiambo, gi mar ruoth kod misangone mar mogo kod misengni miolopiny.  Inikir kuome remo duto mag misengni mamoko.  To kendo-mar-mula emaanapenjie Ruoth Nyasaye wach. "
Uria jadolo notimo gik mojo duto kakaruoth Ahaz nochike.
Ruoth Ahaz nong’ado frembe mag rachungi mane nie Hekalu, kendo nogolonyilerni mane nie wigi.  Gima ne iluongo ni nam bende nogolo kuom ruedhimag mula mane nie bwoye, mi orenjo e rachungi mar kite.
Bende nomukoagola mane okonyorego chieng’ Sabato, gi dhorangach ma oko mane odonjogoe Od Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech noluoro ruodh Asuria.
Timbe moko mag Ahaz ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi magJuda.
Ahaz notho, moyike but kwerene e dala Daudi.  Hezekia wuodenodoko ruoth kare.
Ruodhi
Okaw Samaria, mi oter jo-Israel e tuech
E higa mar apar gariyo mar loch Ahaz ruodh Juda, Hoshea wuod Ela nodokoruodh Israel, morito piny kuom higni ochiko, kodak Samaria.
Timbene neok long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, to ok ne giricho kaka timbe ruodhi magIsrael mane okuongone tiyo.
Shalmaneser ruodh Asuria nokedo gi Hoshea,mi oloyo.  Koro Hoshea nobet e bwo lochne, kendo golone osuru.
To ruodhAsuria noyudo ni Hoshea ndhoge, nikech Hoshea noseoro joote ir So ruodhMisri, bende noweyo chulo osuru kaka nosebedo kotimo higa ka higa.  Kuommano, ruodh Asuria nomake, mokete e od tuech.
Eka ruodh Asuria nomonjopinyno duto, mochopo Samaria.  Noluore kuom higni adek,
mokawe e higamar ochiko mar loch Hoshea.  Nomako jo-Israel, motero Asuria, kendonoketo moko mondo odag Hela but aora Habor man Gazon, to moko noketo emiech jo-Media.
Mano notimore nikech timbe jo-Israel ne ok long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasayemane ogologi e piny Misri e bwo loch Farao.
Ne gilamo nyiseche mamoko,kendo ne giluwo timbe mag ruodhi mag Israel oketo, kod timbe ogendinimane Nyasaye oriembo e pinygi mondo owe ni jo-Israel thuolo.
Jo-Israel noyanyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, kendo ne gigero ut lemo ehembko mane nie miechgi matindo gi madongo duto.
Ne gichungo sirnimilamo mag kite gi mag yien ewi gode maboyo duto, kendo yiend yath moroamora motimo otiep.
Ne giwang’o ubani kuondego duto, kaka ogendinimane Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo e pinyno ne timo, kendo ne gitimo timbemamono, mane omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye mirima.
Ne gilamo nyiseche manonomane Ruoth Nyasaye okwerogi ni kik gilam.
Ruoth Nyasaye ne siemojo-Israel kod jo-Juda, kooronigi jonabi gi jokor wach duto, kowachoniginiya, "Weuru yoreu maricho, mondo umak chikena gi buchena ma jonabinamane aoro onyiso kwereu. "
To kata kamano, ne gidagi weyo yorego,nikech ne wigi tek ka wi kweregi mane ok oyie kuom Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi.
Ne gichayo chikene gi singruokne mane otimo kod kweregi,kendo ne ok gidewo weche mane osiemogigo.  Ne gilamo nyiseche manono,nyaka gin giwegi gidoko joma nono, nikech ne giluwo timbe mag ogendinimokiewo kodgi, mane Ruoth Nyasaye osekwerogi ni kik giluw.
Ne giweyochike duto mag Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, ka gilenyo mula mi gilosgonyiroye ariyo mondo gilam, kendo ka gichungo siro milamo.  Bende negilamo sulue duto, kendo ne gitiyo ni Baal.
Ne giwang’o yawuotgi ginyigi ka misango, kendo ne giwuoyo gi nyakalondo.  Kamano ne gichiwore nitimbe maricho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, ka gimiyego mirima.
Kuom mano,Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho ahinya gi jo-Israel, mi noriembogi e nyime, maonge modong’ mak mana jo-Juda kende.
Jo-Juda bende ne ok orito chik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, to negiluwo mana timbe ma jo-Israel ochako timo.
Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nodaginyikwa Israel duto.  Nothagogi moketogi e lwet wasigu mane peyogi toachien nogologi e pinygi.
Kane Ruoth Nyasaye opogo jo-Israel kuom dhood Daudi, jo-Israel noketoJeroboam wuod Nebat ruoth.  Mi Jeroboam nohoyo jo-Israel mondo owe luwoRuoth Nyasaye, kendo nomiyo gidonjo e richo maduong’.
Jo-Israel noluwotimbe maricho duto mane Jeroboam otimo.  Ne ok giweyo richogo kata matin,
nyaka Ruoth Nyasaye nogologi e nyime, kaka nosemiyo jonabine dutoowacho.  Nodarogi moterogi Asuria, kuma gintie nyaka chil kawuono. Ruodh Asuria okelo ogendini moko mondo odag Samaria
Ruodh Asuria nogolo ji Babulon gi Kutha gi Ava gi Hamath kodSefarvaim, moketogi e miech Samaria kar jo-Israel, mi ne gidoko wegpinyno.
To kane gichako dak kanyo, ne ok gilam Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyoRuoth Nyasaye nooro sibuoche, monego jomoko kuomgi.
Ne onyis ruodhAsuria niya, "Ogendini mane idaro, miketio e miech Samaria, ok ong’eyoyo ma onego olamgo nyasach pinyno.  Kuom mano, nyasayeno oseoro sibuochema koro negogi. "
Eka ruodh Asuria nowacho niya, "Dwokuru achiel kuomjodolo mane agolo Samaria, odhi odag kuro, kapuonjogi kaka onego lamnyasach pinyno. "
Kamano jadolo achiel mane osegol Samaria nodok kuro,modak Bethel kapuonjo ji kaka onego lam Ruoth Nyasaye.
To kata kamano, oganda ka oganda ne pod loso nyisechegi giwegi, kendoketogi ei ut lemo mane jo-Samaria oloso e hembko mane ni kuondemoting’ore.  Nyiseche mane oganda ka oganda oloso e miechgi e magi:
Jo-Babulon noloso Sukoth-benoth nyasachgi, kendo jo-Kuth nolosoNergal.  Jo-Hamath to noloso Ashima,
kendo jo-Arvi noloso Nibhaz kodTartak, to jo-Sefarvaim ne wang’o nyithindgi ka misango ni Adramelek giAnamelek mane nyisechegi.
To kaachiel gi nyisechego ne gilamo RuothNyasaye bende, kendo ne giyiero ji ariyo mondo obed jodolo mag hembkomane ni kuonde moting’ore, mondo otimnigi misengni kuondego.
Kamano negilamo Ruoth Nyasaye, to bende ne gitiyo ni nyisechegi giwegi, ka giluwotimbe pinje mane ogolgie.
Pod giluwo timbe machon-go nyaka chilkawuono.  Ok giluoro Ruoth Nyasaye, bende ok giluw buchene gi yorene,kata mako puonjne, kata rito chik mane oketo ni nyikwa Jakobo, jal maneRuoth Nyasaye oloko nyinge ni Israel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nosetimo kodgisingruok, kawachonigi niya, "Kik ulam nyiseche mamoko, kata kikukulrunigi.  Kim utinigi, kata kik utimnigi misango.
To an ema mondoukulruna kendo utimna misango, nikech an ema nagolou e piny Misri giteko maduong’, karieyo bada ni lweny.
Kik ulam nyiseche mamoko, torituru buchena gi chikena mane aketonu e ndiko.
Wiu kik wil gisingruok mane atimo kodu.  Kik ulam nyiseche mamoko,
to lamuru mana anRuoth Nyasaye, mi anaresu e lwet wasiku duto. "
Kata kamano ne okgidewo, to ne gisiko gi timbegi machon.
Kamano ogendinigo ne lamoRuoth Nyasaye, to gi nyiseche manono bende.  Nyithindgi gi nyikwagi netimo kaka kweregi ne timo, kendo pod gitimo kamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Ruodhi
Loch Hezekia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar adek mar loch Hoshea wuod Ela ruodh Israel, Hezekia wuodAhaz nodoko ruodh Juda.
Ne en jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane ochakotich, morito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko, kodak Jerusalem.  Minmare ne nyinge Abija nyar Zekaria.
Timbe Hezekia ne long’o e nyim RuothNyasaye mana kaka timbe Daudi kwar mare.
Noketho ut lemo mag hembko,kaachiel gi sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien.  Thuond mula mane Musaoloso, bende nong’ado matindotindo, nikech nyaka chop ndalogo, jo-Israelne pod wang’oe ubani.  Thuondno niluongo ni Nekushtan, (tiende ni, gimaolos gi mula. )
Hezekia nogeno Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, kendoonge ruoth moro machal kode kuom ruodhi duto mag Juda,
nikech nopadorekuom Ruoth Nyasaye chutho, ka ok oweyo luwe, kendo norito chike dutomane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye ne ni kode,kendo noguedho gik moko duto mane otimo.  Nodagi bet e bwo loch Asuria,
kendo noloyo jo-Filistia e lweny, kokawo mier madongo gi matindo duto,nyaka Gaza gi mier mokiewo kode. Ruodh Asuria okawo Samaria, mi otero jo-Israel e tuech
E higa mar ang’wen mar loch Hezekia, kane Hoshea wuod Ela osebet ruodhIsrael kuom higni abiriyo, Shalmaneser ruodh Asuria nomonjo Samaria.
Nolworo dalano kuom higni adek, mokawo e higa mar auchiel mar lochHezekia, kane Hoshea wuod Ela osebet ruodh Israel kuom higni ochiko.
Ruodh Asuria nodaro jo-Israel, motero nyaka Asuria, mi noketo mokokuomgi mondo odag Hela but aora Habor man Gozan, to moko noketo e miechjo-Media.
Wachno notimore nikech ne ok girito chik Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi, to ne giketho singruok mane gitimo kodgi.  Ne ok gimako wecheduto mane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye ochikogi, kata dewogi bende ne okgidewo. Senakerib, ruodh Asuria, omonjo piny Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
E higa mar apar gabich mar loch Hezekia, Senakerib ruodh Asurianomonjo miech Juda duto mochiel gi ohinga, mokawo.
Eka Hezekia ruodhJuda nooro wach ni ruodh Asuria mane oyudo ni Lakish niya, "Aseketho towe kedo koda kendo, nikech ayie chulo gimoro amora midwaro. " Kamanoruodh Asuria nodwaro kuome fedha maromo kilo alufu apar, kod dhahabumoromo kilo alufu achiel.
Mi Hezekia nomiye fedha duto mane nie OdRuoth Nyasaye, kod mane nie kar keno mar od ruoth.
E ndalono emaHezekia nogoloe dhahabu mane obawgo thike kod sirni mag dhood RuothNyasaye, momiyo ruodh Asuria.
Ruodh Asuria nooro Tartan gi Rabsaris kod Rabshake, ma jodonge,kaachiel gi oganda lweny maduong’, ir Hezekia, mi ne giwuok Lakish kagidhi Jerusalem.  Kane gichopo kuno, ne gichung’ but fereji ma golo pi eyawo mamalo, e yo maduong’ madhi e puodho miluongo ni Puoth JalwokLewni.
Ne giluongo ruoth, to Eliakim wuod Hilkia, mane jaduong’ odruoth, gi Shebna jagoro, kod Joa wuod Asaf, ma jachan weche mag piny,ema ne jowuok irgi.
Rabshake nowachonigi ni mondo ginyis Hezekia niruoth maduong’, ma ruodh Asuria owachone kama: "Ere gimomiyo idhialorikamano?
