Iparo ni weche awecha nyalo lokore rieko kod teko mar loyolweny? En ng’a ma igeno ni biro konyi piem koda?
Ang’eyo ni idhialorinikech jo-Misri, to nyaka ing’e ni Farao ruodh Misri chalo gi odundumobarore, ma ka ng’ato oyiengoree, to pilore, kendo chwowo lwete.  Mano ekaka farao ruodh Misri chalo ni ji duto mogeno kuome.
To kuwachona niugeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, donge en ema Hezekia osekethohembkone gi kuonde mitimonee misengni kochiko jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem ninyaka lem mana e nyim kendo-mar-misango man Jerusalem?
"Koro in Hezekia, singri ni ruodh Asuria ma atiyone! Ayie miyi faresealufu ariyo, kapo nono ni inyalo yudo joma diidhgi!
Ka jo-Misri emaigeno ni biro konyi gi geche kod joidh farese, to ere kaka iparo ni dilokata mana achiel matinie moloyo kuom jotend lweny mag ruodha?
Kosoiparo ni asebiro mana ni mondo amonj amonja Jerusalem, akethi, ka okRuoth Nyasaye ema ne owachona ni mondo abi amonj pinyni, akethi!"
Eka Eliakim wuod Hilkia gi Shebna kod Joa nowacho ni Rabshake niya,"Wasayi, yie iwuo kodwa gi dho Aram, nikech en dhok mwang’eyo, to wewuoyo kodwa gi dho Hibrania kae, nimar joma ni ewi ohinga nyalowinjowa. "
To Rabshake ne odwokogi, kapenjogi niya, "Uparo ni un kodruodhu kende ema ne ruodha oora iru mondo awachnu wechegi? Ooyo, noorair joma ni ewi ohinga, ma ochunore ni nyaka cham chiethgi, kendo madhlachgi, mana kaka un bende unutim!"
Bang’ mano Rabshake nochung’ mokok gi duol maduong’ gi dho Hibranianiya, "Winjuru wach ruoth maduong’ ma ruodh Asuria!
Owacho ni kik uyieHezekia wuondu, nikech ok onyal resou e lweta.
Kik uwe ohou ni mondougen kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kowachonu ni, adier Ruoth Nyasaye ema noresu,kendo ni ruodh Asuria ok nokaw dala maduong’ni.
Kik uwinj wachHezekia, nimar ruodh Asuria owacho niya, ‘Winjreuru koda mondo ubi ira,mi ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nocham olemb mzabipe kod ng’ope, bende nomodhpi e sokone owuon,
nyaka chop abi, mi agolu kendo ateru e piny machalgi pinyuni, mondo kik utho, to ubed mana mangima.  En piny ma cham gimzabibu chiekie maber, kendo ma makati gi divai gi mor zeituni kod morkich ng’enyie.  To kik uwinj Hezekia kawuondou ni Ruoth Nyasaye birokonyou.
Bende nitie nyasach piny moro mosereso pinye e lwet ruodhAsuria?
Nyiseche mag Hamath gi arpad ni kanye? Koso ere nyiseche magSefarvaim gi Hena kod Iva? Bende ne gireso Samaria e lweta?
Kuomnyiseche duto mag pinjego, ere mosereso Jerusalem e lweta?’ "
To ji noling’ thi, ma onge ng’at modwoke kata wach achiel, nikechruoth Hezekia nosegolo chik ni kik dwoke.
Eliakim wuod Hilkia majaduong’ od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro kod Joa wuod Asaf ma jachan wechemag piny ne jobiro ir Hezekia, ka joyiecho lepgi, mi ginyise gima neRabshake owacho.
Ruodhi
Nyasaye oreso piny Juda e lwet Senakerib(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
Kane ruoth Hezekia owinjo wechego, noyiecho lepe, mi orwako pien gugru,kendo odhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nooro Eliakim ma jaduong’ ode gi Shebnama jagoro kod jodolo madongo ir janabi Isaya wuod Amoz ka jorwako piendegugru,
mondo odhi owachne niya, "Hezekia owacho ni kawuono en chieng’dhier gi kum kod wichkuot.  Wachalo gi dhako ma muoch kayo, to onge muyamochologo nyathi.
Nyalo bet ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osewinjo wecheRabshake ma ruodh Asuria oseoro mondo oyany Nyasaye Mangima.  Omiyokamoro obiro kumo Rabshake nikech weche ma osewinjo ka Rabshake wachogo. Kuom mano, in Isaya, lem ni jowa mapod odong’. "
Kamano kane jodong ruoth Hezekia ochopo ir Isaya, nowachone wechego,
nodwokogi niya, "Dhiuru uwach ni ruodhu ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:‘Kik iluor weche ma isewinjo ka ruodh Asuria yanyago,
nikech abiro miyechuny man gi kibaji, mi, kowinjo wach moro marach, to noring odog epinye, kuma nami onegee. ’ "
Rabshake nodok, moyudo ni ruodh Asuria osea Lakish, odhi monjo Libna. Omiyo nodhi ire kuno.
To kane ruodh Asuria owinjo Tirhaka ruodhEthiopia obiro monje, nochako ooro joote ir Hezekia ruodh Juda, kowachoniya,
"Kik iyie Nyasachi migeno kuomeno wuondi ni ruodh Asuria oknokaw Jerusalem
Chutho, isewinjo kaka ruodhi mag Asuria oseketho pinjemane gikedogo chuth.  To koro iparo ni in ema dikwo?
Kwerena nonegojo-Gozan gi jo-Haran gi jo-Rezef kod jo-Eden ma nodak Telasar.  Koro dakne nyisechegi okonyogi?
Koso ere ruodhi mag Hamath gi Arpad giSefarvaim gi Hena kod Iva?"
Hezekia nokawo barua mane joote okelone, mi osomo.  Bang’e ne odhi eHekalu, mi oyaro baruano e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kokwaye niya,
"A RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, mobet ewi kerubi kaka ruoth bet e komduong’ne, in kendi e Nyasach ogendini duto mae piny, kendo in emanichueyo polo gi piny.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, chik iti mondo iwinji, kendoyaw wang’i mondo inen.  Winj weche ma Senakerib yanyigo, in Nyasayemangima!
A Ruoth Nyasaye, en adier ni ruodhi mag Asuria oseketho pinjeduto,
mi gibolo nyisechegi e mach, kendo gisekethogi chuth, nimar neok gin nyiseche kata matin, to mana tich dhano molos gi yath kata gikidi.
To koro in Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, yie ireswa e lwetSenakerib, mondo ogendinii duto mae piny ong’e ni in kendi e Nyasaye. "
Eka Isaya wuod Amoz nooro ni Hezekia wach niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho ni osewinjo lemo mikwayego nikech wach maSenakerib ruodh Asuria osesiemigo,
omiyo osewuoyo kuom Senakerib kama:"In Senakerib,dala Sayun ochayi kendo jari!Ee, dala Sayun twenyoni ume!
To koro in,en ng’ano ma isejarokendo iyanyo?Koso en ng’a, ma isekokne,kijowo wang’i!Nyaka ing’e nien Ng’ama Ler mar Israel!
Isejaro Ruoth Nyasayekimiyo jooteni wacho niya,‘Aseidho gode maboyo mag Lebanon,mi achopo midimidi,ka an gi gechena mag lweny mang’eny mokadho akwana. Bende asetong’o yiend sida madongo,kod yiend saipras man kuno. Asechopo nyaka e chuny bungu,kuma ni iye mogik,kendo ma yien odichie.
Asekunyo sokni,mi amodho pi pinje mamoko. Bende aore mag Misri noduono,ka anyonogi gi tienda!’
To in Senakerib,kata obedo ni iwacho kamano,donge ing’eyo ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ema nachano chonmondo gigo otimre?Adier, ne achanogi chon,to koro amiyo gitimore. An ema ne achanomondo imuk mier mochiel motegnoolokre gundni.
Ma joma odakie chalo gi lum mae pap,maonge gi teko,kata ka lum matwi e tat ot,to ner ka pok odongo,nimar ne gionge gi teko,kendo ne ging’eng’ka luoro omakogi.
To ang’eyo timbeni duto:ang’eyo kata ka ichung’kata ka ibet piny,kata kiwuokkata kiduogo dala.
Asewinjo kaka iyanya malich,kendo kaka isungori,omiyo abiro keto mbedo e umi,kod rajaki e dhogi,mondo awichiidog thuru gi yo mane ibirogo.
"To winji, in Hezekia, ranyisi ma amiyi ema: E higa mokwongoni,unucham gik matwi kendgi, kendo e higa mar ariyo unucham orowe moloth ehiga mokwongono, to e higa mar adek unuket kodhi, kendo unuka cham. Bende unupidh mzabibu, kendo unucham olembgi.
Jo-Juda modong’ nochalgi yath matero tiendene piny, kendo nyago olemo e bedene,
nimar jomanok modong’ nowuog Jerusalem.  Adier, oganda mar joma otony noa e gotSayun.  Ruoth Nyasaye oseketo chunye mondo otim mano. "
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kuom ruodh Asuria kama: "Ok nodonj edala Jerusalem, kendo ok nobaye gi asere, kata monjogo koting’o kuot oknomonje.  Bende ok noging pith mondo oidhgo ohingane.
Enodog gi yo manobirogo, to ok nodonj Jerusalem,
nimar anaked ni dalani mondo aresi,nikech nyinga, kendo nikech Daudi jatichna. "
Otienono, malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi monego jo-Asuria alufu miaachiel gi piero aboro gabich (
,
) e kambigi, kendo kane ji ochiewgokinyi, to ringre joma otho ema ne ginwang’o kopie piny.
Mano omiyoSenakerib ruodh Asuria noa kuno, mi odok Nineve odakie.
To chieng’moro, kane oyudo olemo e od Nisrok nyiseche, yawuote ma Adramalek giSharezer nobiro monege.  Bang’e ne giringo, mi gidhi e piny Ararat, toEsarhadon nodoko ruoth kar Senakarib wuon mare.
Ruodhi
Tuo mar Hezekia(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
E ndalogo, Hezekia ne tuo, kendo ohewore.  Janabi Isaya wuod Amoz nobiroire, mowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owachoni ni mondo ilam mwanduni niyawuoti, nimar ibiro tho, ok nikwo. "
Kane Hezekia owinjo kamano,nolokore mong’iyo kor ot, kokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
"A Ruoth Nyasaye,asayi, parie kaka asewuotho e nyimi gi adieri kod chuny mobidhore, kaatimo gik malong’oni. " Eka ne oywak malit.
To kane Isaya pok ochopo edier laru, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirone niya,
"Dogi iwach ni Hezekia majatend joga, ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Daudi kwaru owacho kama:‘Asewinjo kwayoni, kendo aseneno pi wang’i.  Omiyo abiro changi, kendobang’ ndalo adek inidhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Abiro medi ndalo moromohigni apar gabich, bende abiro resi kaachiel gi dala Jerusalem e lwetruodh Asuria, kendo abiro rito dalani nikech nyinga, kendo nikech Daudijatichna. ’ "
Eka Isaya nowacho ni jood Hezekia ni mondo okel ng’owo moswagi omwon ebur mane okuodo Hezekia.  Ne gitimo kamano, mi Hezekia nochango.
Bang’ mano, Hezekia nopenjo Isaya niya, "Ere gima biro bedona ranyisini Ruoth Nyasaye biro changa, kendo ni anadhi e Hekalune bang’ ndaloadek?"
Isaya nodwoke, ka penje niya, "Diher mondo tipo mar wang’chieng’manie raidhi odhi nyime ondamo apar, koso mondo odog chien ondamo apar?Mano e ranyisi ma Ruoth Nyasaye onyisigo ni enotim gima osewacho. "
ToHezekia nokone niya, "En gima yot mondo tipo odhi nyime ondamo apar. Emomiyo tipo mondo odog mana chien ondamo apar. "
Eka Isaya janabinokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye kamano, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko tipo chien ondamoapar e raidhi mane Ahaz oloso. Hezekia orwako joote moa Babulon(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
E ndalogo Merodak-baladan nooro joote ir Hezekia gi barupe kod mich,nikech nowinjo ni yande otuo.
Hezekia norwako jootego, monyisogimwandune duto mane nie ode mar keno, kaka fedha gi dhahabu gi gikmang’ue ng’ar, gi mo ma nengone tek, kod gige mag lweny, kaachiel gi gikmoko duto mane ni kuonde kenone.  Onge gimoro amora e ode kata e pinyemane ok onyisogi.
To bang’e janabi Isaya nobiro ir Ruoth hezekia, mopenje niya, "Jogi oakanye? To wach ang’o mokelogi?" Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Gia e piny Babulon,kuma bor. "
Isaya nomedo penje niya, "To ang’o ma gineno e odi?"Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Giseneno gik moko duto manie oda.  Onge gimoro amoramodong’ mak anyisogi e kuonde kenona. "
Eka Isaya nowacho ni Hezekianiya, "Winj wach Ruoth Nyasaye!
Ndalo biro ma gik moko duto manie odi,ma kwereni osekano nyaka chil kawuono, noter Babulon.  Bende RuothNyasaye omedo wacho ni onge gima nodong’ kata achiel mak oter kuno.
Yawuoti moko nolok wasumbni.  Adier, moko kuom yawuoti hie nolokwasumbni mabuoch e od ruodh Babulon. "
Hezekia ne odwoke niya, "WachRuoth Nyasaye ma isenyisa ber. " To ne odwoke kamano, koparo ni en to kuebiro siko e ndalone duto. Tho mar Hezekia(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Weche moko mag Hezekia, gi tekone duto, kendo kaka noloso yawo gifereji maduong’ mane kelo pi Jerusalem, ondik e Kitap Weche mag Ndalomag Juda.
Hezekia notho, moyiki but kwerene.  Manase wuode nodoko ruothkare.
Ruodhi
Loch Manase, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Manase ne jahigni apar gariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom hignipiero abich gabich, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Hefziba.
TimbeManase ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kaka timbe makuero mag ogendinimane Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo mondo owe thuolo ni jo-Israel.
Nochako olosohembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore mane Hezekia wuon mare oseketho, kendonogero kuonde liswa ni Baal.  Nochungo siro milamo miluongo ni Ashera,kaka Ahab ruodh Israel notimo, bende nolamo sulue duto, kotiyonigi.
Nogero kende mag liswa e Hekalu mane Ruoth Nyasaye osewuoyo kuome niya,"Jerusalem ema naketie nyinga. "
Bende nogero kende mag misango ni sulueduto e laru ariyo mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nowang’o wuode bende, kotimogomisango.  Noyie gi jokor wach gi jo nyakalondo kod ajuoke.  Timbenemaricho ne ng’eny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo mirima nomako RuothNyasaye.
Siro milamo mane oseloso, nochungo ei Hekalu, to Ruoth Nyasayenosewuoyo kuom Hekaluno, kawacho ni Daudi gi Solomon wuod Daudi niya,"Aseyiero Hekaluni gi Jerusalem kuom dhoudi duto mag Israel mondo nyingaobedie nyaka chieng’.
Ka jo-Israel orito gik moko duto mane achikogi,kendo gitimogi, bende ka giluwo chike duto mane Musa jatichna onyisogi,to ok nariembgi e piny mane amiyo kweregi. "
To ne gitamore winjo, kendoManase nosemogi ni mondo gimed timbegi maricho e nyim Ruoth Nyasayemoloyo ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye otieko mondo owe thuolo ni jo-Israel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jotichne ma jonabi owacho niya,
"Manase ruodhJuda osetimo tim makuero, kod richo madongo moloyo mago duto manejo-Amor otimo chon, kendo osemiyo jo-Juda bende obedo joricho, nikechnyisechene manono.
Emomiyo abiro kelo masira malich kuom Jerusalem giJuda, ma ka ng’ato owinjo, to ite nopopni.
Abiro pimo Jerusalem gi tolmane apimogo Samaria, kendo gi rapim mane apimogo dhood Ahab.  Abironang’o Jerusalem mapoth, mana kaka kungu nang’o puodho.
Anawit jogaawuon modong’, kendo anachiwgi e lwet wasikgi duto, mondo opegi, kendooyakgi,
nikech gisemiya mirima gi timbegi maricho, chakre ndalo manekweregi owuokie Misri nyaka chil kawuono. "
To ewi richo duto mane Manase otimo, komiyogo jo-Juda obedo joricho enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, en ni nomedo chuero remb ji mang’eny maonge ketho,nyaka remo nomol ka ohula e Jerusalem.
Weche moko mag Manase, gi timbene duto, gi richo mane otimo, ondiki eKitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda.
Manase notho, moyike eorundune mane nie puoth Uza.  Amon wuode nodoko ruoth kare. Loch Amon, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Amon ne jahigni piero ariyo gariyo kane ochako tich, morito piny kuomhigni ariyo, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Meshulemeth nyar Haruzma ja-Jotba.
Timbe Amon ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mana kaka timbeManase wuon mare.
Noluwo yore duto mane wuon mare oluwo, kotiyo ninyiseche manono mane wuon mare tiyonigi, kendo kokulorenigi.
NoweyoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwerene, kendo notamore luwe.
Jodong ruothAmon nojame, monege e ode.
To jo-Juda nonego jogo duto mane ojame,kendo ne giketo Josia wuode mondo obed ruoth kare.
Weche moko mag Amon ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi magJuda.
Noyike e liende mane nie puoth Uza.  Josia nodoko ruoth kare.
Ruodhi
Loch Josia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Josia ne jahigni aboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni pieroadek gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Jedida nyar Adaya maja-Bozkath.
Timbe Josia ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo noluwotimbe duto mag Daudi kwar mare, ma ok oweyo kata achiel. Kitap Chik oyudi e Hekalu(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane Josia obedo ruoth, kuom higni apar gaboro, nooro Shafan jagorowuod Azalia ma wuod Meshulam e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kowachone niya,
"Dhiyoir Hilkia jadolo maduong’, inyise mondo okwan kar romb pesa mosekel eiOd Ruoth Nyasaye, ma jorit osechoko kuom ji.
Pesago mondo oket e lwetnyipeche marito tich Od Ruoth Nyasaye,
mondo gichulgo jotich bao gijogedo kod jopa kite maloso kuonde mokethore e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendomondo ging’iewgo yien gi kite mopa milosogo kuonde mokethorego.
To kikpenjgi kaka gitiyo gi pesa momigi, nikech gin joma ogen. "
Kindeno ema Hilkia jadolo maduong’ nowachoe ni Shafan jagoro niya,"Aseyudo Kitap Chik e Od Ruoth Nyasaye. " Mi nomiyo Shafan kitabuno,mosomo.
Shafan jagoro notero ni ruoth wach niya, "Jotichni osegolo pesamane oyud e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gisemiyo nyipeche marito tich odno. "
Eka nomedo wacho ni ruoth niya, "Hilkia osemiya kitabu moro. " Minosome ni ruoth.
Kane ruoth owinjo weche manie kitap chik, noyiecho lepe.
Eka nochikoHilkia jadolo, gi Ahikam wuod Shafan gi Akbor wuod Mikaya, gi Shafanjagoro, kod Asaya jatich ruoth, niya,
"Dhiuru upenj Ruoth Nyasaye gimabiro timorena, kendo ni jo-Juda duto, nikech weche manie kitabumwaseyudoni.  Nyaka bed ni Ruoth Nyasaye okecho kodwa malich, nikechkwerewa ne ok orito chike manie kitabuni, kata timo gik moko dutomondikie. "
Omiyo Hilkia jadolo gi Ahikam gi Akbor gi Shafan kod Asaya ne jodhi irHulda janabi madhako ma chi Shalum wuod Tikva, ma wuod Harhas, jarit leplemo, mane odak Jerusalem e migawo mar ariyo.  Ne giwuoyo kode,
minodwokogi niya, "Nyisuru ng’at mane oorou ira ni
Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho kama: ‘Abiro kelo masira e pinyni, kendo kuom jomaodakie, kaluwore gi weche duto manie kitabu ma ruodh Juda osesomo.
Negikwinya gi timbegi ka giweya, kendo ka giwang’o ubani ni nyisechemanono.  Emomiyo mirimba nobed mager kuom pinyni, kendo ok norum. ’
Towachuru ni ruodh Juda mane oorou mondo upenjne Ruoth Nyasaye wach, niRuoth nyasaye owacho kama:
‘Kane iwinjo wechena mane awacho kuompinyni kod joma odakie, ni ginibed joma okuong’ kendo okwedi, chunyi neyom, kendo odembore, miyiecho lepi kendo iywak e nyima.  Emomiyo an bendeasewinjo ywakni.
Noyiki e liendi gi kue, kiluwo kwereni, ma katawang’i ok none masira ma abiro kelo kae. ’ "
Ruodhi
Josia oloso piny Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane jootego odwoko ni ruoth wach, noluongo jodongo duto mag Juda gimag Jerusalem.
Nodhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalemduto; joma omew gi jochan machalre, kaachiel gi jodolo kod jonabi, minosomonigi weche duto mane nie kitap singruok mane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eka nodhi e bath siro, mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kosingore nienoluw Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto kod tekone duto, komako chikene giwechene kod buchene, kamano mondo orit weche mag singruok mondiki ekitabuno.  Mi ji duto bende notimo singruokno.
Eka ruoth nochiko Hilkia jadolo maduong’, gi jadolo maluwe, kod joritdhoot, ni mondo gik moko duto milamogo Baal gi siro miluongo ni Asherakod sulue, ogol e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nowang’ogi e bath Jerusalem e pawaora Kidron, mi notero buchgi nyaka Bethel.
Nogolo jodolo mag nyisechemanono mane ruodhi mag Juda oketo mondo owang’ ubani e hembko mag miechJuda, kod mag gwenge mokiewo kod Jerusalem, kendo nogolo joma ne wang’oubani ni Baal gi wang’chieng’ gi due kod sulue duto.
Nogolo siro milamomiluongo ni Ashera e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, motero e dho aora Kidron e bathJerusalem.  Nowang’e kanyo but aora, motoye matindotindo nyaka olokoreburu.  Eka nokawo buche, mopuko e liete ji ajiya.
Nomuko ut jochode manenie Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mane ji terorego, kaka kit lemogi nobet.  Udigo emane mon twang’oe pasia mag Ashera.
Bang’e Josia noluongo jodolo mane nie miech Juda, kendo noketho hembkomane jodologo wang’oe ubani, chakre Geba nyaka Beer-sheba.  (Bende nomukohembko mar jochiende mane oger e dhoranga Joshua jaduong’ Jerusalem, batkoracham kidonjo e dala. )
Kata obedo ni noluongo jodolo mag hembko maneni kuonde moting’ore kamano, to ne otamogi ni kik gitim misango ekendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye man Jerusalem, to noyienigi manachamo makati ma ok ketie thowi kaachiel gi jodolo wetegi.
Ruoth Josianoketho Tofeth manie holo mar Ben-hinom ni kik ji wang’ie nyithindgi kamisango ni Molek.
Nogolo kido mag farese mane ruodhi mag Juda oseketoni wang’chieng’.
Nomuko kende-mag-misango mane nie wi gorofa mar odAhaz, mane ruodhi mag Juda oloso e laru ariyo mag od Ruoth Nyasaye. Notoyogi matindotindo, mopuko ng’injogi e aora Kidron.
Ruoth nokethobende kuonde hembko mane ni yo milambo mar got Zeituni, man yo wuokchieng’ mar Jerusalem, mane Solomon ruodh Israel ogero ni Ashteroth,nyasaye ma kuero mar jo-Sidon, gi Kemosh, nyasach jo-Moab, kod Milkom,nyasach jo-Amon.
Noturo sirni mag kite gi mag yien mane ji lamo,motoyogi matindotindo, mi kuonde mane gichungie nodino gi choke ji.
Josia nomuko kendo-mar-misango man Bethel, kaachiel gi hembkone maneJeroboam wuod Nebat oloso.  Notoyo kitene, molokore buru, kendo nowang’osiro milamo mane ni kanyo.  (Jeroboam nogo ema nomiyo jo-Israel obedojoricho. )
Kane Josia owichore, noneno liete ewi got.  Nooro ji, mogolochoke e lietego, mi ne giwang’ogi e kendo-mar-misango.  Kamano nokethokendono, kaluwore gi wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane ng’at Nyasaye okoro kaneJeroboam ochung’ e dho kendo chieng’ sawo cha.  Eka Josia noting’owang’e, moneno liend ng’at Nyasaye mane okoro wechego.
Nopenjo niya,"Mano liend ng’a, ma aneno loka cha?" Jodalanoo nodwoke niya, "En liendng’at Nyasaye mane oa Juda, mokoro gik moko duto misetimo kuomkendo-mar-misangoni. "
Eka Josia nowacho niya, "Weyeuru! Ng’ato kik golchokene. " Omiyo ne giweyo chokene kaachiel gi choke janabi mane oaSamaria.
Bende Josia noketho od lemo mane nie hembko man kuonde moting’ore,mane ruodhi mag Israel ogero e miech Samaria, kamiyogo Ruoth Nyasayemirima.
Jodolo duto mane Josia onwang’o e hembko nonego ekende-mag-misango.  Eka nodok Jerusalem. Jo-Israel orito Sap Pasaka(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Ruoth nochiko ji duto ni mondo otim Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi, kaka ondiki e Kitap Singruok.
Adier, Pasaka ma kamano nepok otim, e ndalo mane jobura ritoe Israel, kata e ndalo mag ruodhi magIsrael gi Juda.
To e higa mar apar gaboro mar loch Josia kende ema neotimie Pasaka makama ni Ruoth Nyasaye, Jerusalem. Mirimb Nyasaye osiko kuom jo-Juda
Bende Josia nogolo jonyakalondo, gi ajuoke, gi kido mag nyisechemanono miluongo ni Terafim, gi nyiseche mamoko molos gi lwet dhano,kaachiel gitimbe makuero duto mane onwang’ e piny Juda, kendo eJerusalem.  Kamano noluwo weche mag chik mane ondik e kitabu mane Hilkiajadolo oyudo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Onge ruoth moro kata achiel maneoluwo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto, kod tekone duto, komako chike dutomag Musa, kaka Josia notimo.
Kata kamano chuny Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok olendo kuom mirima mager maneokechogo gi jo-Juda nikech timbe maricho mane Manase ochwanyego.
Tonowacho niya, "Abiro riembo jo-Juda bende mondo oa e nyima, kaka neariembo jo-Israel.  Abiro jwang’o Jerusalem, dala mane ayiero, kendoabiro wito Hekalu mane awacho ni nyinga nobedie. "Tho mar Josia(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Weche moko mag Josia, kod timbene duto, ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalomag Ruodhi mag Juda.
E ndalo Josia ema ne Farao-neko, ruodh Misri,odhi kedoe gi ruodh Asuria e dho aora Yufrate.  Ruoth Josia nodhi Megidokedo kode, to kane girado, Farao nonege.
Joge nogolo ringre Megido,koting’e e gari.  Ne gikele Jerusalem, mi giyike e liende owuon.  Eka jiduto nokawo Jehoahaz wuod Josia, moketo ruoth kar wuon mare. Loch Jehoahaz, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Jehoahaz ne jahigni piero ariyo gadek kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom dueche adek, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Hamutal nyarJeremia ma ja-Libna.
Timbe Jehoahaz ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,mana kaka timbe kwerene.
Farao-neko notere Ribla e piny Hamath,motueye kuno, mondo kik obed ruodh Jerusalem, kendo noketo ni jo-Judaosuru moromo kilo alufu adek mag fedha, gi kilo mia adek mag dhahabu.
Eka Farao-neko noketo Eliakim wuod Josia mondo obed ruoth kar Josiawuon mare, kendo noloko nyinge ni Jehoyakim.  Jehoahaz to notero Misri,kuma nothoe.
Jehoyakim noketo ni jo-Juda osuru ma dirom pesa mane Farao dwaro. Ng’ato ka ng’ato nogolo dhahabu gi fedha kaka mwandune obet.  KamanoJehoyakim nochulo fedha gi dhahabu mane Farao oketone. Loch Jehoyakim, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Jehoyakim ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni apar gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Zebida nyarPedaya ma ja-Ruma.
Timbe Jehoyakim ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, manakaka timbe kwerene.
Ruodhi
E ndalo Jehoyakim, Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nobiro, mi Jehoyakimnobet e bwo lochne kuom higni adek.  To bang’e nopiem kode, modagi lochne
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nooro mony mag jo-Babulon gi mag jo-Aram, gi magjo-Moab kod mag jo-Amon, mondo oked gi jo-Juda, kendo ne giketho pinygichuth, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosemiyo jatichne ma janabi owacho.
Adier,gigo notimore kuom jo-Juda mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho, ni mondoogolgi e nyime.  Ruoth Nyasaye nodagi weyonigi kethogi, nikech richo maneManase otimo,
kopong’o Jerusalem gi remb joma onge ketho.
Weche mokomag Jehoyakim gi timbene duro, ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhimag Juda.
Jehoyakim notho, moluwo kwerene, mi Jehoyachin wuode nodokoruoth kare.
Ruodh Misri ne ok owuok kendo e pinye, nimar ruodh Babulonnosemaye pinje duto mane nie bwo lochne, chakre aora manie tong’ Misrinyaka chop aora Yufrate. Jehoyachin gi jodong Juda oter Babulon e tuech(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Jehoyachin ne jahigni apar gaboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuomdueche adek kende, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Nehushta nyarElnathan ma ja-Jerusalem.
Timbe Jehoyachin ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye mana kaka timbe wuon mare.
Ndalono jolwenj Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nodhi monjo Jerusalem kendone gilworo dalano.
Kane pod gilworo Jerusalem, Nebukadnezar nodhi kunoowuon,
mi piny nohewo Jehoyachin, mochiwore ni ruodh Babulon, kaachielgi min mare, gi jong’adne rieko, gi jodonge kod jotende.  Nomake e higamar aboro mar loch ruodh Babulon.
Nebukadnezar nokawo gik mabeyo dutomane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kod mane nie kar keno mar od ruoth, kendonong’ado ong’ado gik moko duto mag dhahabu mane Solomon ruodh Israeloloso, mane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kamano wach Ruoth nochopo kare.
Nebukadnezar nodaro jo-Jerusalem duto, kotero jodongo kod jomwandu madirom alufu apar e tuech kaachiel gi jotheth, kod ji duto molony kuomtich lwedo.  Onge ng’ato mane odong’ mak mana joma odhier.
Ruothkaachiel gi min mare, gi monde gi jotende, kod jodong gwenge.
Nogolojogo duto Jerusalem kaachiel gi jomwandu duto ma dirom alufu abiriyo, gijotheth kod joma olony kuom tich lwedo ma dirom alufu achiel.  Giduto negin joma otegno, moromo lweny.
To ruodh Babulon noketo Matania maowadgi wuon Jehoyachin mondo obed ruoth kar Jehoyachin.  Noloko nyingMatania ni Zedekia. Loch Zedekia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
)
Zedekia ne jahigni piero ariyo gachiel kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni apar gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Hamutalnyar Jeremia ma ja-Libna.
Timbe Zedekia ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,mana kaka timbe Jehoyakim.
Jo-Jerusalem gi jo-Juda nomiyo RuothNyasaye mirima, nyaka nogologi e nyime.
Ruodhi
Jo-Babulon okawo Jerusalem(Jeremia
.
-
;
.
-
)Zedekia nopiem gi ruodh Babulon, modagi lochne.
Omiyo chieng’ due apar,due mar apar, e higa mar ochiko mar loch Zedekia, Nebukadnezar ruodhBabulon nobiro gi joge mag lweny, mi gimonjo Jerusalem.  Ne gigero kambioko mar dala, eka ne gichielone ohinga molwore.
Ne gigoyo ni Jerusalemageng’a nyaka higa mar apar gachiel mar loch Zedekia.
Koro kech ne liche dalano, kendo ji ne onge gi chiemo chuth.
Chieng’ due ochiko, due marang’wen, jo-Babulon nomwomo ohinga mar dala, mi Zedekia notemo ringo gijolwenje duto gotieno, kata obedo ni jo-Babulon nosedhogo dala koni gikoni.  Ne giluwo rangach mane nie kind ohingni ariyo, ka ging’ado orunduruoth, mi gichiko yo holo mar Jordan.
To jolweny mag babulon nolawoZedekia, mojuko e paw Jeriko, mi jolwenje duto oringo oweye.
Ne gimakemi gitere Ribla ir ruodh Babulon, mong’adone bura kuno.
Ne ginegoyawuot Zedekia e wang’e koneno, eka ne gitoko wengene oko, kendo gitueyegi nyororo, mi gitere Babulon. Odar jo-Juda moter Babulon e tuech(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
;
.
-
)
Chieng’ due abiriyo due mar abich, e higa mar apar gochiko mar lochNebukadnezar, jatend joma ne rito ruodh Babulon, nobiro Jerusalem,
Nowang’o Od Ruoth Nyasaye, gi od ruoth, kod udi duto mag Jerusalem,
kendo joge mag lweny nomuko ohinga duto mane olworo Jerusalem.
Bang’e Nebukadnezar nomako ji duto mane odong’ Jerusalem moteroBabulon, kaachiel gi joma ne oseringo modok ni ruodh Babulon, kod jotichmolony mane pod odong’ kuno.
To joma odhier ahinya, mane onge gigimoro, noweyo e piny Juda mondo oti e puothe mzabibu, kendo e puothemamoko.
Jo-Babulon notoyo sirni mag mula, gi rachungi mane itiyogo e Hekalu,kod karaya maduong’ mar mula ma bende ne ni kanyo.  Bang’e ne giteromulago duto Babulon.
Bende ne gidhi gi agulini gi rachodhi gi rangisnigi bakunde miting’oe remb misango, kod gik moko duto mag mula mane olosni tich Hekalu.
Bende jatend jolweny nokawo gik moko duto molos gidhahabu kata molos gi fedha, kaka kikombe gi tegni mag mach.
Pek mulamane ruoth Solomon olosogo sirni ariyo gi karaya maduong’ ne ng’enymokadho apima.
Sirni ariyogo ne romre.  Moro ka moro borne modhi malone romo mita ochiko.  Ewi siro ka siro ne nitie gima chalo agulu marmula, ma borne modhi malo romo mita achiel gi nus, to alwora mare neoketie gik mong’inore ong’inore ka machunga, ma bende nolos gi mula.
Nebuzaradan, jatend lweny maduong’, nomako Seraya jadolo maduong’, giZefania jadolo maluwe, kod ji adek ma jorit dhood Hekalu.
Bende nokawong’at mane osebedo jatend jolweny, gi jagoro mare mane tichne en ndikonying joma onego obed jolweny, kaachiel gi ji abich kuom joma ne ng’adoni ruoth rieko, kod jodongo piero auchiel mane pod ni Jerusalem.
Jogoduto notero Ribla ir ruodh Babulon,
mi ruoth nogolo chik, mi ogogikendo oneggi kuno e piny Hamath.  Kamano e kaka nodar jo-Juda e pinygi,moter e tuech. Jo-Juda modong’ oringo odhi Misri
To kuom joma nodong’ e piny Juda, Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon noyieroGedalia wuod Ahikam ma wuod Shafan, mondo obed jatendgi.
Jodong lwenyduto, kaachiel gi jogi, nowinjo ni ruodh Babulon oseyiero Gedalia.  MiIshmael wuod Nethania, gi Johanan wuod Karea, gi Seraya wuod Tanhumethja-Netoifa, kod Jaazania wuod ja-Maaka ne jodhi ir Gedalia kaachiel gijogi.
Gedalia nokuong’orenigi kowacho niya, "Kik uluor jo-Babulon. Daguru adaga e pinywani kuyie loch ruodh Babulon, to unune maber. "
Toe due mar abiriyo, Ishmael wuod Nethania ma wuod Elishama ma anywolajoka ruoth, nobiro gi ji apar, momonjo Gedalia.  Ne ginege, kaachiel gijo-Yahudi kod jo-Babulon mane ni kode Mizpa.
Eka ji duto, kaachiel gijodong lweny, noringo modhi Misri, nimar ne giluoro jo-Babulon. Ogony Jehoyachin, kendo omiye duong’ e dala Babulon(Jeremia
.
-
)
Kane Jehoyachin ruodh Juda osetue higni piero adek gabiriyo,Evil-merodak ruodh Babulon nogonye.  Mano notimore chieng’ due pieroariyo gabiriyo, mar due apar gariyo, e higa mane Evil-merodak ochakoetich ruoth.
Evil-merodak norito Jehoyachin gi ng’wono, kendo ne omiyeluor maduong’ moloyo ruodhi duto mane ni Babulon e tuech.
Kuom manoJehoyachin nolonyo lep tuech, kendo nochiemo e od ruoth ndalone duto.
Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ kuom higni duto mane ongima, ne imiye gikmoko morome konyorego.
Weche mag Ndalo
Nyikwa Adam(Chakruok
.
-
)
Adam nonywolo Seth, to Seth nonywolo Enosh.
Enosh nonywolo Kenan, toKenan nonywolo Mahalalel.  Mahalalel nonywolo Jared,
to Jared nonywoloEnok.  Enok nonywolo Methusela, to Methusela nonywolo Lamek.
Lameknonywolo Nowa, to Nowa nonywolo Shem gi Ham kod Jafeth. Nyikwa yawuot Nowa(Chakruok
.
-
)
Jafeth nonywolo Gomer gi Magog, gi Madai gi Javan gi Tubal gi Meshakkod tiras.
To Gomer nonywolo Ashkenaz gi Rifath kod Togarma.
Javan tononywolo Elisha gi Tarshish gi Kitim kod jo-Rodan.
Ham nonywolo Kush gi Misri gi Put kod Kanaan.
To Kush nonywolo Seba giHavila gi Sabta gi Raama kod Sabteka.  To Raama nonywolo Sheba kod Dedan.
Kush ne wuon Nimrod bende, ma nokwongo bet ruoth e piny.
NyikwaMisri ne gin jo-Lud, gi jo-Anam gi jo-Lehab gi jo-Naftu
gi jo-Pathrusgi jo-Kaslu kod jo-Kaftor, ma jo-Filistia nowuok kuomgi.
Kanaannonywolo yawuowi ariyo; Sidon wuode makayo gi Heth.
Nyikwaye ne ginjo-Jebus gi jo-Amor gi jo-Girgash
gi jo-Hivi gi jo-Arki gi jo-Sini
gi jo-Arvad gi jo-Zemar kod jo-Hamath.
Shem nonywolo Elam gi Ashur gi Arpaksad gi Lud kod Aram.  To Aramnonywolo Uz gi Hul gi Gether kod Mash.
Arpaksad nonywolo Shela, toShela nonywolo Eber.
Eber nonywolo Shela, to Shela nonywolo yawuowiariyo: wuode makayo nochak ni Peleg (tiende ni, Pogruok), nikech endalone ema nopogie piny, to owadgi ne nyinge Joktan.
Joktan nonywoloAlmodad gi Shelef gi Hazarmoth gi Jera
gi Hadoram gi Uzal gi Diukla
gi Ebal gi Abimael gi Sheba gi
Ofir gi Havila kod Jobab.  Jogo dutone joka Joktan. Nyikwa Shem(Chakruok
.
-
)
Shem nonywolo Arpaksad to Arpaksad nonywolo Shela.
Shela nonywoloEber, to Eber nonywolo Peleg.  Peleg nonywolo Reu,
to Reu nonywoloSerug.  Serug nonywolo Nahor, to Nahor nonywolo Tera.
Tera nonywoloAbram, ma bang’e niluongo ni Ibrahim. Nyikwa Ishmael gi Ketura(Chakruok
.
-
,
-
)
Yawuot Ibrahim ne Isaka gi Ishmael,
to Ishmael nonywolo Nebayothwuode makayo, kod Kedar gi Abdeel gi Mibsam
gi Mishma gi Duma gi Masagi Hadad gi Tema
gi Jetur gi Nafish kod Kedema.  Jogo duto ne jokaIshmael.
Ketura ma chi Ibrahim machielo nonywolo Zimram gi Jokshan gi Medan giMidian gi Ishbak kod Shua.  To yawuot Jokshan ne Sheba gi Dedan.
ToMidian nonywolo Efa gi Efer gi Hanok gi Abida kod Eldaa.  Jogo duto nejoka ketura. Nyikwa Esau(Chakruok
.
-
)
Isaka wuod Ibrahim nonywolo Esau gi Israel.
Esau nonywolo Elifaz gi Reuel gi Jeush gi Jalam kod Kora.
To Elifaznonywolo Teman gi Omar gii Zefi gi Gatam gi Kenaz gi Timna kod Amalek.
To Reuel nonywolo Nahath gi Zera gi Shama kod Miza.
Seir nonywolo Lotan gi Shobal gi Zibeon gi Ana gi Dishon gi Ezer kodDishan.
To yawuot Lotan ne Hori gi Homam.  Bende ne en gi nyamin manyinge Timna.
Yawuot Shobal ne gin Alian gi Manahath gi Ebal gi Shefikod Onam.  Yawuot Zibeon ne Aya gi Ana.
Wuod Ana ne Dishon.  YawuotDishon ne gin Hamran gi Eshban gi Ithran kod Keran.
Yawuot Ezer ne ginBilhan gi Zaavan kod Jaakan.  To yawuot Dishan ne Uz gi Aran.
Koro ruodhi mane rito piny Edom kane jo-Israel pod onge gi ruoth emagi: Ruoth mokwongo ne en Bela wuod Beor, ma dalane niluongo niDinhaba.
Kane Bela otho, Jobab wuod Zera ma ja-Bozra nodoko ruothkare.
To kane Jobab otho, Husham ja-Teman nodoko ruoth kare.
Bang’tho Husham, Hadad wuod Bedad nodoko ruoth kare.  Hadadno ema noloyojo-Midian e lweny e piny Moab.  Dalane niluongo ni Avith.
Kane Hadadotho, Samla ja-Masreka nodoko ruoth kare.
Kane Samla otho, Shaulja-Rehoboth man but aora Yufrate nodoko ruoth kare.
To kane Shaulotho, Baal-hanan wuod Akbor nodoko ruoth kare.
To bang’ thoBaal-hanan, Hadad nodoko ruoth kare.  Dalane niluongo ni Pai.  Nyingchiege ne Mehetabel nyar Matred ma nyar Mezahab.
Magi e jodongo mane rito piny Edom kane Hadad osetho: Timna gi alia giJetheth
gi Oholibama gi Ela gi Pinon
gi Kenaz gi Teman gi Mibzar
gi Magdiel kod Iram.  Jogo duto ne jodong Edom.
Weche mag Ndalo
Yawuot Israel(Chakruok
.
-
)
Yawuot Israel ne gin Reuben gi Simeon gi Lawi gi Juda gi Isaka giZebulun
gi Dan gi Josef gi Benjamin gi Naftali gi Gad kod Asher. Nyikwa Juda
Yawuot Juda ma od Bath-shua nyar Kanaan ne gin Er gi Onan kod Shela.  Totimbe Er, wuod Juda makayo, ne richo e nyiom Ruoth Nyasaye, mi RuothNyasaye nonege.
Bang’e Juda nonywolo yawuowi moko ariyo gi Tamar chiwuodeno, ma nyinggi Perez gi Zera.  Koro yawuot Juda duto ne abich.
Yawuot Perez ne Hezron gi Hamul.
Zera ne nigi yawuowi abich.  Ne ginZimri gi Ethan gi Heman gi Kalkol kod Dara.
Wuod Karmi ne en Akan, manokelo ni jo-Israel chandruok nikech noketho, kokawo gima ochiw ni RuothNyasaye.
Wuod Ethan ne en Azaria.
Yawuot Hezron ne gin Jerameel gi Ram kod Kaleb.
Ram nonywoloAminadab, to Aminadab nonywolo Nashon mane jaduong’ jo-Juda.
Nashonnonywolo Salmon, to Salmon nonywolo Boaz.
Boaz nonywolo Obed, to Obednonywolo Jesse.
Jesse nonywolo Eliab wuode makayo, gi Abinadab, wuodemar ariyo, gi Shimea, wuode mar adek,
gi Nethaneel, wuode marangg’wen, gi Radai wuode mar abich,
Gi Ozem, wuode mar auchiel, giDaudi wuode mar abiriyo.
Nyiminegi ne Zeruya gi Abigail.  Zeruya nenigi yawuowi adek: Abishai gi Joab kod Asahel.
Abigail mane chi JatherJa-Ishmael, nonywolo Amasa.
Kaleb wuod Hezron ne nigi dhako ma nyinge Azuba.  Azuba nonywoloJerioth gi Jesher gi Shobab kod Ardon.
Kane Azuba osetho, Kalebnokendo Efrath, mane ginywologo Hur.
Hur nonywolo Uri, to Uri nonywoloBezalel.
Kane Hezron jahigni piero auchiel, nokendo nyar Makir wuon Gilead. Chiegeno nonywolo Segub,
to Segub nonywolo Jair mane nigi mier pieroariyo gadek e piny Gilead.
To Geshur kod Aram nomayogi Havoth-jair, giKenath kod mier matindo mokiewo kode, duto mier piero auchiel.  Jogo dutone nyikwa Makir wuod Gilead.
Kane Hezron osetho, Kaleb notero Efrathachi Hezron wuon mare, mi ne ginywologo Ashur wuon Tekoa.
Jerameel ne kach Hezron, to yawuot Jerameel ne gin Ram, wuode makayo,gi Buna gi Oran gi Ozem kod Ahija.
Jerameel ne nigi dhako machielo manyinge Atara, ma nonywolone Onam.
Ram ma wuod Jerameel makayo nonywoloMaaz gi Jamin kod Eker.
To yawuot Onam ne Shamai gi Jada.  To yawuotShamai ne Nadab gi Abishur.
Chi Abishur mane nyinge Abihail nonywoloAban gi Molid.
Yawuot Nadab ne Seled gi Apaim, to Seled notho maongenyathi.
Apaim nonywolo Ishi, to Ishi nonywolo Sheshan, to Sheshannonywolo Alahi.
Yawuot Juda ma omin Shamahi ne Jether gi Jonathan. Jether notho maonge nyathi,
to yawuot Jonathan ne Pelleth gi Zaza. Jogo duto ne joka Jerameel.
Sheshan ne onge gi yawuowi, to nonywolo mana nyiri kende, to ne en gimisumba ma ja-Misri ma nyinge Jerha.
Jali ema Sheshan nomiyo nyaremokendo, mi ne ginywolo wuowi ma nyinge Atai.
Atai nonywolo Nathan, toNathan nonywolo Zabad.
Zabad nonywolo Eflal, to Eflal nonywolo Obed.
Obed nonywolo Jehu, to Jehu nonywolo Azaria.
Azaria nonywolo Helez,to Helez nonywolo Eleasa.
Eleasa nonywolo Sismai, to Sismai nonywoloShalum.
Shalum nonywolo Jekamia, to Jekamia nonywolo Elishama.
Kaleb omin Jerameel, nonywolo Mesha wuode makayo, to Mesha nonywoloZif.  Zif nonywolo Meresha, to Meresha nonywolo Hebron.
Yawuot Hebronne gin Kora gi Tapua gi Rekem kod Shema.
Shema nonywolo Raham, toRaham nonywolo Jorkeam.  Rekem nonywolo Shamai,
to Shamai nonywoloMaon.  Maon to nonywolo Bethzur.
Chi kaleb moro, ma nyinge Efa,nonywolo Haran gi Moza kod Gazez.  To Haran nonywolo Gazez.
Yawuotjadai ne gin Regem gi Jothan gi Geshan gi Pelet gi Efa kod Shaaf.
Maaka, ma bende chi Kaleb nonywolo Sheber gi Tirhana,
gi Shaaf, kodSheva.  Shaaf ne wuon Madmana, to Sheva ne wuon Makbena gi Gibea, BendeKaleb ne nigi nyako ma nyinge Aksa.
Jogo duto ne joka Kaleb. To joka Hur e magi: Hur, wuod Efratha makayo, nonywolo Shobal wuonKiriath-jearim,
gi Salma wuon Bethlehem, kod Haref wuon Beth-gader.
Shobal wuon Kiriath-jearim nonywolo Reaya, kendo ne en kwar jokaManahath joka Manahath.
Jo-Kiriath-jearim ne gin jo-Ithri gi jo-Pu gijo-Shuma, kod jo-Mishra.  Jo-Zora gi jo-Eshtaol nowuok kuom ogendnigo.
Joka Salma ne gin jo-Bethlehem gi jo-Metofa gi jo-Atroth-beth-joab gijoka Manahath modong’, gi jo-Zor
gi dhout jondiko ma nodak Jabez, gijo-Tira gi jo-Shimea kod jo-Suka.  Jogi ne jo-Keni ma kwargi ne or jokaRekab.
Weche mag Ndalo
Yawuot Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
;
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Yawuot Daudi mane onywolo Hebron e magi: Wuode makayo ne Anon, ma minmare ne Ahinoam nyar Jezreel.  Mar ariyo ne Daniel, ma min mare neAbigail nyar Karmel.
Mar adek ne Absalom, ma min mare ne Maaka nyarTalmai ruodh Geshur.  Mar ang’wen ne Adonija ma min mare ne Hagith.
Marabich ne Shefatia ma min mare ne Abital.  Mar auchiel ne Ithream, wuodchiege ma nyinge Egla.
Daudi nonywolo yawuowi auchielgo kodak Hebron,kuma nobetie ruoth kuom higni abiriyo gi dueche auchiel.  Bang’e nodakJerusalem, korito piny kuom higni piero adek gadek.
Kane odak Jerusalemnonywolo Shimea gi Shobab gi Nathan kod Solomon ma min-gi ne Bathshebanyar Amiel.  Bang’e Daudi nonywolo yawuowio moko ochiko.
Ne gin Ibhar giElishama gi Elifelet.
Gi Noga gi Nefeg gi Jafia
gi Elishama gi Eliadakod Elifelet.
Jogo duto ne yawuot Daudi, ka ok okwan mond yawuotemamoko.  Ne gin gi nyamingi ma nyinge Tamar. Nyikwa Solomon
Solomon nonywolo Rehoboam, to Rehoboam nonywolo Abija.  Abija nonywoloAsa, to Asa nonywolo Jehoshafat.
Jehoshafat nonwolo Jehoram, toJehoram nonywolo Ahazia, Ahazia nonywolo Joash,
to Joash nonywoloAmazia, Amazia nonywolo Azaria, to Azaria nonywolo Jotham.
Jothamnonywolo Ahaz to Ahaz nonywolo Hezekia.  Hezekia nonywolo Manase,
toManase nonywolo Amon.  Amon to nonywolo Josia.
Yawuot Josia ne ginJohanan, wuode makayo, gi Jehoyakim wuode mar ariyo, gi Zedekia wuodemar adek, gi Shalum, wuode mar ang’wen.
Yawuot Jehoyakim ne Jekonia giZedekia.
Jekonia, mane oter e tuech, nonywolo Shealtiel
gi Malkiram gi Pedayagi Shenazar gi Jehamia gi Hosham kod Nedabia.
Pedaya nonywoloZerubabel gi Shimei, to yawuot Zerubabel ne Meshulam gi Hanania.  Ne gingi nyamin-gi ma nyinge Shelomith.
Zerubabel nonywolo yawuowi mokoabich.  Ne gin Hashuba gi Ohel gi Berekia gi Hasadia kod Jushab-hesed.
Hanania nonywolo Pelatia, to Pelatia nonywolo Jeshaya.  Jeshayanonywolo Refaya, to Refaya nonywolo Arnan.  Arnan nonywolo Obadia, toObadia nonywolo Shekania,
Shekania to nonywolo yawuowi auchiel, manyinggi Shemaya gi Hatush, gi Igal gi Baria gi Nearia kod Shafat.
Nearia nonywolo yawuowi adek, ma nyinggi Elioenai gi Hizkia kodAzikram.
Elioenai nonywolo yawuowi abiriyo.  Ne gid Hodavia gi Eliashibgi Pelaya gi Akub gi Johanan gi Delaya kod Anani.
Weche mag Ndalo
Nyikwa Juda
Joka Juda ne Perez gi Hezron gi Karmi gi Hur kod Shobal.
Reaya wuodShobal nonywolo Joath, to Joath nonywolo Ahumai gi Lahad.  Giduto ne ginjoka Hora.
Yawuot Etam ne gin Jezreel gi Ishama kod Idbash.  Ne gin gi nyamingi manyinge Hazelelponi.
Penuel ne wuon Gedor.  Ezer ne wuon Husha.  Ne ginjoka Hur wuod Efratha makayo ma wuon Bethlehem.
Ashur wuon Tekoa ne nigi mon ariyo ma nyinggi Hela gi Naara.
Naaranonywolo Ahuram gi Hefer kod jo-Timni gi jo-Ahashtar.  Mago ne jokaNaara.
To yawuot Ela ne Zereth gi Zoar gi Ethman kod Koz.
Koz nonywoloAdub gi Zobeba kod joka Aharhel wuod Harun.
Jabez ne ng’at marahuma moloyo owetene duto.  Min mare nochake ni Jabeznikech nonywole gi rem malit.
Jabez nokwayo Nyasach Israel niya, "Yieigwedha, kendo imed mbap pinya, bende lweti orita mondo kik gima rachhinya. " Mi Nyasaye nomiye gima nokwayono.
Kelub owadgi Shua nonywolo Mehir ma wuon Eshton.
Eshton nonywoloEfratha gi Pasea kod Tehina wuon Irnahash.  Jogo duto ne joka Reha.
Yawuot Kenaz ne Othniel gi Seraya, to yawuot Othniel ne Hathath giMeonithia.
Meonithia nonywolo Ofra, to Seraya nonywolo Joab ma wuonjo-Geharashim.  Ne ochakgi nyingno nikech ne gin jopa bao.
Yawuot Kaleb wuod Jefune ne gin Iru gi Ela kod Naam, to wuod Ela neKenaz.
Yawuot Jehalelel ne Zif gi Zifa gi Tiria kod Asarel.
YwuotEzra ne Jether, gi Mered gi Efer kod Jalon.  Mered nokendo Bithia nyarFarao mi Bithia nonywolo Miriam gi Shamai kod Ishba ma wuon Eshtemoa.
Chi Mered ma nyar Yahudi nonywolo Jared wuon gedor, gi Heber wuonSoko, kod Jekuthiel wuon Zanoa.
Yawuot Hodia ma od nyamin Naam neKeila ja-Garbi, kod Eshtemoa ja Maaka.
Yawuot Shimon ne gin Amnon giRina gi Ben-hanan kod Telon.  Yawuot Ishi ne Zoheth gi Ben-zoheth.
JokaShela wuod juda ne gin Er wuod Leka, gi Laada wuon Maresha, gi dhoutjotueng’o ma nodak Bethashbea
Gi Jokim gi jo-Kozeba gi Joash kod Sarafma nochwanyore gi jo-Moab modok Bethlehem.  (Wechegi nondik chon ahinya. )
Jogo ne jochue agulini.  Ne gidak Nataim gi Gedara, ka gitiyo ni ruoth. Nykwa Simeon
Yawuot Simeon ne gin Nemuel gi jamin gi Jarib gi Zera kod Shaul.
Shaul nonywolo Shalum, to Shalum nonywolo Mibsam, to mibsam nonywoloMishma.
To joka Mishma e magi: Mishma nonywolo hemuel, to hemuelnonywolo Zakur.  Zakur to nonywolo Shimei.
Shimei nonywolo yawuowi apargauchiel kod nyiri auchiel, to owetene ne ok ne nigi nyithindo mang’enykamano, kendo dhoodgi ne ok onya kaka jo-Juda.
Ne gidak beer-sheba giMolada gi Hazarshual
gi Bilha gi Ezem gi Tolad
gi Bethuel gi Hormagi Ziklag
gi Bethmarkaboth gi Azar-susim gi beth-biri, kod Shaaraim. Mago ne miechgi nyaka chop ndalo loch Daudi.
Miechgi abich mamoko negin Etam gi Ain gi Rimon gi Token kod Ashan,
kaachiel gi mier mokiewokodgi nyaka Baalath.  Mago kuonde mane gidakie.  Nyinggi mane ondik ne gin
Meshobab gi Jamlek gi Josha ma wuod Amazia
gi Joel gi Jehu wuodJosibia ma wuod Seraya ma wuod Asiel,
gi Elioenai gi Jaakoba giJeshohaya gi Asaya gi Adiel gi Jesimiel gi Benaya
gi Ziza wuod Shifima wuod Alon ma wuod Jedaya ma wuod Shimri ma wuod Shemaya.
Jogo dutone jodong dhoudi, kendo dhoutgi nonya ahinya.
Ne gia kama idonjogoGedor, yo wuok chieng’ mar holo, ka gidwaro lek ni jambgi.
Mi neginwang’o lege momew kendo mabeyo.  Pinyno ne lach ahinya.  Jo-Ham emanokwongo dakie.
Joma nyinggi osendikgo nochopo kuno e ndalo Hezekiaruodh Juda.  Ne giketho hemb jo-Ham kod jo-Maun, mane giyudo kuno kendone ginegogi duto, ma pok ndachgi oneno nyaka chil kawuono.  Piny nokue,kendo oboch, mi ne gidak e pinyno, nikech ne nitie lek ni jambgi.
Toji mia abich kuom jo-Simeon nodhi nyaka got Seir.  Jotendgi ne Pelatia giNearia gi Refaya kod Uziel, ma yawuot Ishi.
Ne ginego jo-Amalekmodong’ kendo pod gidak kuno nyaka chil kawuono.
Weche mag Ndalo
Nyikwa Reuben
Reuben ne en wuod Israel makayo, to noterore gi chi wuon mare, omiyokata obedo ni ne en kayo kamano, duong’ne mar dala ne omi yawuot Josefma wuod Israel.  To joka Josef ne ok omi duong’ mar dala kaka owinjoretim ni dhood wuowi makayo,
nimar Juda noloyo owetene gi duong’, nikechode ema nodoko od ruoth.  To adier duong’ mar dala ne en mar Josef.
Yawuot Reuben ma wuod Israel makayo ne gin Hanok gi Palu gi Hezron kodKarmi.
Joka Joel e magi:Joel nonywolo Shemaya, to Shemaya nonywolo Gog, Gog nonywolo Shimei,
toShimei nonywolo Mika.  Mika nonywolo Reaya, to Reaya nonywolo Baal.
Baalto nonywolo Beera.  Beera ne en achiel kuom joma ne Tiglath-peleser ruodhAsuria odaro, motero e tuech piny mabor.  Ne en jaduong’ joka Reuben.
Mae kaka ochan owetene e dhoutgi: Jeyel ne jatelo, eka Zekaria
kod Belawuod Azaz ma wuod Shema ma wuod Joel ne luwo.  Ne gidak Aroer, mi negilandore nyaka Nebo gi Baal-meon.
Bende ne gidak e yo wuok chieng’nyaka chop e thim mopogo kindgi gi aora Yufrate, nikech jambginosemedore e piny Gilead.
E ndalo loch Saulo ne gikedo gi jo-Hagri, miginego, kendo gidak e miechgi e piny man yo wuok chieng’ mag Gilead. Nyikwa Gad
Jo-Gad nomanyore gi jo-Reuben, ka gidak e piny Bashan nyaka Saleka.
Joel ma jatendgi gi Shafan jalupne gi Janai kod Shafat ne jodakBashan.
Jowetegi nowuok kuom dhout Mikael gi Meshulam gi Sheba giJorai gi Jakan gi Zia kod Eber.
Ji abiriyogo ne yawuot Abihail wuodHuri ma wuod Jaroa, ma wuod Gilead, ma wuod Mikael, ma wuod Jeshishai,ma wuod Jado, ma wuod Buz.
Ahi wuod Abdiel ma wuod Guni ne jatenddhoodgi.
Ne gidak e piny Gilead kod e miech Bashan, kendo e thimSharon nyaka mbape.
Nying jogo duto nondik e ndalo mag lochh Jothamruodh Juda, kendo Jeroboam ruodh Israel. Weche man kuom jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel
Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel ne nigi jolweny molonyalufu piero ang’wen gauchiel gi mia abiriyo kod piero auchiel.  Ne gikoregi kuodi gi tong’ kod asere.
Ne gikedo gi jo-Hagri gi jo-Getur gijo-Nafish kod jo-Nodab.
Nyasaye nokonyogi e lweny nikech ne giywaknekane gikedo.  Nowinjogi nikech ne gigene, mi ne giloyo jo-Hagri gi jiduto mane jo-Hagri oseriworego.
Ne gipeyo jamb jo-Hagri, ngamia alufupiero abich gi rombe alufu mia ariyo gi piero abich, kod kenje alufuariyo, kendo ne gimako ji alufu mia achiel.
Ne ginego ji mang’eny,nikech Nyasaye ema nomiyo lwenyno obedoe.  Bang’e ne gidak e pinyno karjogo, nyaka ndalo mane odargi kiterogi e tuech Babulon ochopo.
Jo-Manase konchiel nodak e pinyno chakre Bashan nyaka Baal-hermon giSenir kod Got Harmon.  Ne ging’eny,
kendo jotend dhoutgi ne Efer giIshi gi Eliel gi Azriel gi Jeremia gi Hodavia kod Jadiel.  Ne ginthuondi, kendo joma rahuma.
To ne giweyo Nyasach kweregi, kagindhogore gi nyisech ogendni mag pinyno mane Nyasaye otieko mondooyawnegi thuolo.
Omiyo Nyasach Israel nomiyo Pul, ma bende iluongo niTiglath-peleser ruodh Asuria mondo omonj jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kodjo-Manasego.  Nodarogi moterogi nyaka Hala gi Habor gi Hasa kod aoraGozan, kuma gidakie nyaka chil kawuono.
Weche mag Ndalo
Nyikwa Lawi
Yawuot Lawi ne gin Garshon gi Kohath kod Merari.
Yawuot Kohath ne ginAmram gi Izhar gi Hebron gi Uziel.
To yawuot Amram ne Harun gi Nadab giAbihu gi Eleazar kod Ithamar.
Eleazar nonywolo Finehas to Finehasnonywolo Abishua.
Abishua nonywolo Buki, to Buki nonywolo Uzi.
Uzinonywolo Zerahia.  To Zerahia nonywolo Merayoth.
Merayoth nonywoloAmaria, to Amaria nonywolo Ahitub.
Ahitub nonywolo Zadok, to Zadoknonywolo Ahimaaz.
Ahimaaz nonywolo Azaria, to Azaria nonywolo Johanan.
Johanan nonywolo Azaria, mane jadolo e Hekalu mane Solomon ogeroJerusalem.
Azaria nonywolo Amaria, to Amaria nonywolo Ahitub,
Ahitubnonywolo Zadok, to Zadok nonywolo Shalum.
Shalum nonywolo Hilkia toHilkia nonywolo Azaria.
Azaria nonywolo Seraya, to Seraya nonywoloJehozadak.
Kane Nyasaye omiyo Nebukadnezar odaro jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem koterogi Babulon e tuech, Jehozadak bende noter kodgi.
Yawuot Lawi ne gin Gershon gi Kohath kod Merari.
Yawuot Gershon ne Libna gi Shimei.
To yawuot Kohath ne gin Amram giIzhar gi Hebron kod Uziel.
To yawuot Merari ne Mali gi Mushi.  Dhoutjo-Lawi, kaluwore gi kweregi e magi:
Joka Gershon:Nonywolo Libni, to Libni nonywolo Jahath.  Jahath nonywolo Zima,
toZima nonywolo Joa.  Joa nonywolo Ido, to Ido nonywolo Zera, to Zeranonywolo Jeatherai.
Joka Kohath e magi:Kohath nonywolo Abinadab, to Abinadab nonywolo Kora.  Kora nonywolo Asir.
To Asir nonywolo Elkana, Elkana nonywolo Ebiasaf, to Ebiasaf nonywoloAsir.
Asir nonywolo Tahath, to Tahath nonywolo Uriel.  Uriel nonywoloUzia, to Uzia nonywolo Shaul.
Yawuot Elkana ne Amasai gi Ahimoth.
Ahimoth nonywolo Zofia, to Zofia nonywolo Nahath.
Nahath nonywoloEliab, to Eliab nonywolo Jeroham, to Jeroham nonywolo Elkana.
WuodSamuel makayo ne Josef, to jalupne ne Abija.
Joka Merari e magi:Merari nonywolo Mali, to Mali nonywolo Libni, to Libni nonywolo Shimeito Shimei nonywolo Uza.
Uza nonywolo Shimea, to Shimea nonywolo Hagia,to Hagia nonywolo Asaya. Daudi oketo jower mag Hekalu
Daudi noyiero jo-Lawi moko mondo obed jotend wer, chieng’ mane Sandukokan e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ne giwer e nyim Hemb Romo nyaka Solomonnotieko gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye Jerusalem, kendo ne gitiyo tijegikaka nochanegi.
Jower kaachiel gi yawuotgi e magi:Kuom joka Kohath, jatend wer ne en Heman ma jathum, ma wuod Joel, wuodSamuel,
wuod Elkana, wuod Jeroham, wuod Eliel, wuod Toa,
wuod Zuf,wuod Elkana, wuod Mahath, wuod Amasai,
wuod Elkana, wuod Joel, wuodAzaria, wuod Zefania,
wuod Tahath, wuod Asir, wuod Ahiasaf, wuod Kora,
wuod Izhar, wuod Kohath, wuod Lawi, wuod Israel.
Jalup Heman ne Asafomin mare, mane ochung’ e bade korachwich.  Asaf ne wuod Berakia, ma wuodShimea,
wuod Mikael, wuod Baaseya, wuod Malkija,
wuod Ethni, wuodZera, wuod Adaya,
wuod Ethan, wuod Zima, wuod Shimei,
wuod Jahath,wuod Gershon, wuod Lawi.
Joka Merari nochung’ yo koracham.  Jatendgi ne en Ethan wuod Kishi, mawuod Abdi, wuod Maluk,
wuod Ashabia, wuod Amazia, wuod Hilkia,
wuodAmzi, wuod Bani, wuod Shemer,
wuod Mali, wuod Mushi, wuod Merari, wuodLawi.
Jowetegi ma jo-Lawi nomi tije duto mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye. Nyikwa Harun
To Harun gi dhoode ema ne tiyo tije duto mag Kama Ler Moloyo, kakaMusa jatich Nyasaye nochiko.  Ne gitimo misango e kendo-mar-misango,kendo ne giwang’o ubani e kendo mar ubani, kendo ne gitimo misangomigologo richo mag jo-Israel.
Joka Harun e magi:Harun nonywolo Eleazar, to Eleazar nonywolo Finehas.  Finehas nonywoloAbishua,
to Abishua nonywolo Buki, Buki nonywolo Uzi.  To Uzi nonywoloZerahia.
Zerahia nonywolo Merayoth, to Merayoth nonywolo Amaria, toAmaria nonywolo Ahitub,
to Ahitub nonywolo Zadok, to Zadok nonywoloAhimaaz. Mier mopog ni jo-Lawi(Joshua
.
-
)
Koro magi e kuonde dak kod gwenge mane omi joka Harun, kane ogoombulu.  Nyikwa Harun ma joka Kohath
ema nomi Hebron e piny Judakaachiel gi lege mokiewogo.
To puothe gi mier matindo mag Hebron nomiKaleb wuod Jefune.
Joka Harun nomi Hebron, dala ma ng’at moneko nyalotonyie, gi Libna gi Jatir gi Eshtomoa
gi Hilen gi Debir
gi Ashan kodBeth-shemesh, kaachiel gi legegi.
To e piny Benjamin joka Harunnoyudoe Geba gi Alemeth koth Anathoth, dala ka dala gi legene.  Kamanojoka Harun noyudo mier apar gadek.
Joka Kohath moko noyudo mier apar mane opognigi kogo ombulu e pinymane jo-Manase konchiel odakie.
Joka Gershon noyudo mier apar e pinjemag jo-Isakar gi jo-Aser gi jo-Naftali kod jo-Manase ma nodak e pinyBashan.
Joka Merari noyudo mier apar gariyo e pinje mag jo-Reuben gijo-Gad kod jo-Zebulun.
Miergo, kaachiel gi legegi ema ne jo-Israelomiyo jo-Lawi kogo ombulu,
mana kaka jo-Juda gi jo-Simeon kodjo-Benjamin bende nomiyogi mier mosekwan malogo.
Dhout jo-Kohath moko noyudo mier kuom jo-Efraim.
Ne gin Shekem, dalama ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie, manie piny gode mag Efraim, kod Gezer
giJokmeam gi Beth-horon
gi Aijalon kod Gath-rimon kaachiel gi legegi.
Jo-Kohath modong’ noyudo Aner gi Bileam kod legegi e piny manejo-Manase konchiel odakie.
Joka Gershon noyudo Golan manie piny Bashan gi legene kod Ashtarothbende gi legene e piny mane jo-Manase komachielo odakie.
To e pinyIsakar ne giyudoe Kedesh gi Daberath
gi Ramoth kod Anem, kaachiel gilegegi.
To e piny Asher ne giyudoe Mashal gi Abdon
gi Hukok kodRekob, kaachiel gi legegi.
To e piny Naftali ne giyudoe Kedesh-galili,gi Hamon kod Kiriathaim, kaachiel gi legegi.
Joka Merari modong’ noyudo Rimona gi Tabor, kaachiel gi legegi e pinyZebulun.
To e piny Reuben man yo wuok chieng’ loka Jordan, momanyoregi Jeriko, ne giyudoe Bezer manie thim, kod Jaza,
gi Kedemoth kodMefaath, kaachiel gi legegi.
To e piny Gad ne giyudoe Ramoth-gilead giMahanain
gi Heshbon kod Jazer, kaachiel gi legegi.
Weche mag Ndalo
Nyikwa Isakar
Isakar ne nigi yawuowi ang’wen.  Ne gin Tola gi Pua gi Joshub kodShimron.
To Tola nonywolo Uzi gi Refaya gi Jeriel gi Jamai gi Ibsam kodShemuel.  Ne gin jotend joka Tola, kendo ne gin thuondi marateke endalogi.  E ndalo Daudi kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero ariyo gi miaauchiel.
Uzi nonywolo Izrahia, to Izrahia nonywolo Mikael gi Obadia kodJoel.
Jodongo abichgo ne nigi mon gi nyithindo mang’eny.  Omiyojolwenjgi ne romo alufu piero adek gauchiel, mane ochan e monje kakadhoutgi obet.
To jowetegi ma jo-Isakar ne romo ji alufu piero aborogabiriyo.  Giduto ne gin thuondi marateke, kendo joka kwaro. Nyikwa Benjamin
Benjamin nonywolo yawuowi adek.  Ne gin Bela gi Beker kod Jediael.
ToBela nonywolo yawuowi abich, ma gin Ezbon gi Uzi gi Uziel gi Jerimothkod Iri.  Ne gin jotend dhoutgi, kendo thuondi marateke.  Ne gitelo nijolweny alufu piero ariyo gariyo kod piero adek gang’wen ma joka kwaro.
Joka Beker ne gi Zemira gi Joash gi Eliezer gi Elioenai gi Omri giJeromoth gi Abija gi Anathoth kod Alemeth.
Mago e kar romb joka Beker. Ne gin jotend dhoutgi, kendo thuondi marateke.  Ne gitelo ni jolwenyalufu piero ariyo gi mia ariyo, ma joka kwaro.
Jediael nonywoloBilhan, to Bilhan nonywolo Jeush gi Benjamin gi Ehud gi Kenaana giZethan gi Tarshish kod Ahishahar.
Jogo duto ne joka Jadiael, kendo negin jotend dhoutgi.  Ne gin gi jolweny marateke alufu apar gabiriyo gimia ariyo motiegore ni lweny.
Jo Dan ne gin Hushim ma wuode, gi yawuot Aher. Nyikwa Naftali
Yawuot Naftali ne gin Jaziel gi Guni gi Jazer kod Shalum.  Jogo duto negin joka Bilha. Nyikwa Manase
Manase ne nigi dhako ma nyar Aram mane onywolo Makir, wuon Gilead.
Makir nokendo nyako ma nyinge Maaka.  Wuod Manase mar ariyo neZelofehad, to Zelofehad nonywolo mana nyiri.
Maaka chi Makir nonywolo wuowi, mochako ni Peresh, to nying owadgiPeresh ne Sheresh.  Sheresh nonywolo Ulam gi Rekem.
To Ulam nonywoloBedan.  Jogo duto ne joka Gilead, wuod Makir, ma wuod Manase.
Gilead nenigi nyamin mare ma nyinge Hamoleketh, ma nonywolo Ishdod gi Abiezer kodMala.
Yawuot Shemida ne gin Abihan gi Shekem gi Liki kod Aniam. Nyikwa Efraim
Jo-Efraim e magi:Efraim nonywolo Shuthela, to Shuthela nonywolo Bered.  Bered nonywoloTahath, to Tahath nonywolo Eleada.  To Eleada nonywolo Tahath,
toTahath nonywolo Zabad, to Zabad nonywolo Shuthela.  Yawuot Efraim moko negin Ezer gi Elead, mane jo-Gath onego kodhi peyo jamni.
Efraim wuon-ginoywak ndalo mathoth nyaka owetene nobiro mondo okue chunye.
Bang’eEfraim noriwore gi chiege, monywolo wuowi.  Nochake ni Beria, (tiende ni,masira), nikech ode noseyudo masira.
Ne en gi nyako ma nyinge Sheera,ma nogero Beth-horon mamalo kod Uzen-sheera.
Beria nonywolo Refa, toRefa nonywolo Reshef.  Reshef nonywolo Tela, to Tela nonywolo Tahan.
Tahan nonywolo Ladan.  Ladan nonywolo Amihud.  Amihud nonywolo Elishama,
to Elishama nonywolo Nun, to Nun nonywolo Joshua.
Lopgi gi miechgine Bethel gi mier matindo mokiewo kode, kaachiel gi Naaran man yo wuokchieng’.  To yo podho chieng’ ne gin gi Gezer gi Shekem gi Aya, kod miermatindo mokiewo kodgi.
To jo-Manase ne nigi Beth-shean gi Taanak giMegido kod Dor gi mier matindo mokiewo kodgi.  Ji duto ma nodak e miergone nyikwa Josej wuod Israel. Nyikwa Asher
Jo Asher e magi:Asher nonywolo Imna gi Isva gi Ishvi gi nyamin-gi ma nyinge Sera.
Yawuot Beria ne gin Heber gi Malkiel.  Malkiel nonywolo Birzaith,
toHeber nonywolo Jaflet gi Shomer gi Hotham kod Shua ma nyamin-gi.
Yawuot Jaflet ne gin Pasak gi Bimhal kod Ashvath.  Mago e kar rombyawuot Jaflet.
To yawuot Shomer owadgi Jaflet ne gin Roga gi Jehubakod Aram.
Yawuot Hotham ma bende owadgi Jaflet ne gin Zofa gi Imna giShelesh kod Amal.
Joka Zofa ne gi Sua gi Harnefer gi Shual gi Beri giImra
gi Beezer gi Hod gi Shama gi Shilisha gi Ithran kod Beera.
Yawuot Jether ne gin Jefune gi Pispa kod Ara.
Yawuot Ula ne gin Aragi Haniel kod Rizia.
Mago duto ne jotend dhout Asher.  Ne gin jolwenymarateke kendo jotend jodongo.  Kar romb jolweny mag dhoutgi ne alufupiero ariyo gauchiel.
Weche mag Ndalo
Nyikwa Benjamin
Benjamin nonywolo Bela, wuode makayo, gi Ashbel, wuode mar ariyo, giAhiram, wuode mar adek,
gi Noha, wuode mar ang’wen, kod Rafa, wuode marabich.
Bela bende nonywolo yawuowi.  Ne gin Adar gi Gera gi Abihud
giAbishua gi Naaman gi Ahoa
gi Gera gi Shefufan kod Huram.
Joka Ehud negin jodong dhoudi ma nodak Geba e ndalo mane odargi kiterogi Manahath etuech.
Nyinggi ne Naaman gi Ahija kod Gera ma nyinge moro Heglam wuonUza gi Ahihud.
Shaharaim nonywolo nyithindo e piny Moab, koseriemboHushim gi Baara ma monde.
Chiege moro ma nyinge Hodesh nonywoloyawuowi, ma nyinggi Jobab gi Zibia gi Mesha gi Malkam
gi Jeuz giShakia kod Mirma.  Yawuotegi duto ne gin jodong dhoudi.
Shaharaim bende ne nigi yawuowi mane chiege ma Hushim onywolo.  Ne ginAbitub gi Elpaal.
Elpaal ema nogero Ono gi Lud kod mier mokiewo kodgi. Yawuot Elpaal ne gin Eber gi Misham gi Shemed
gi Beria gi Shema
giAhio gi Shashak kod Jeremoth.  Beria gi Shema ne jodong’ riembo jo-Gath elweny.  Ahio gi Shashak gi Jeremoth
gi Zabadia gi Arad gi Eder
giMikael gi Ishpa kod Joha ne gin yawuot Beria.
To Zebadia gi Meshulamgi Hizki gi Heber
gi Ishmerai gi Izlia kod Jobab ne gin yawuot Elpaal.
To Jakim gi Zikri gi Zabdi
gi Elienai gi Zilethai gi Eliel
giAdaya gi Beraya kod Shimrath ne gin yawuot Shimei.
Ishpan gi Eber giEliel
gi Abdon gi Zikri gi Hanan
gi Hanania gi Elam gi Antothia
giIfdeya kod Penuel ne gin yawuot Shashak.
Shamsherai gi Sheharia giAthalia
gi Jaareshia gi Elija kod Zikri ne gin yawuot Jeroham.
Magoe kar romb jodong dhoudi ma nodak Jerusalem. Anywola Saulo(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Jeyel wuon Gibeon nodak Gibeon, to nying chiege ne Maaka.
Wuod Jeyelmakayo ne Abdon, to yawuote mamoko ne Zur gi Kish gi Baal gi Nadab
giGedor gi Ahio gi Zeker
kod Mikloth.  To Mikloth nonywolo Shimea.  Jogobende nodak Jerusalem mokiewo gi owetegi.
Ner nonywolo Kish, to Kishnonywolo Saulo, to Saulo nonywolo Jonathan gi Malkishua gi Abinadab kodEshbaal.
Wuod Jonathan ne Meribaal.  Meribaal nonywolo Mika,
to Mikanonywolo Pithon gi Melek gi Tarea kod Ahaz.
Ahaz nonywolo Jehoada, toJehoada nonywolo Alemeth gi Azmoth kod Zimri.  Zimri nonywolo Moza,
toMoza nonywolo Binea.  Binea nonywolo Rafa, to Rafa nonywolo Eleasa,Eleasa nonywolo Azel,
to Azel nonywlo yawuowi auchiel ma nyinggiAzrikam gi Bokeru gi Ishmael gi Shearia gi Obadia kod Hanan.  Giduto negin yawuot Azel.
To yawuot Eshek owadgi Ezel ne gin Ulam, wuodemakayo, gi Jeush, wuode mar ariyo, kod Elifelet, wuode mar adek.
Yawuot Ulam ne gin thuondi molony kuom diro asere.  Ne gin gi yawuowigi nyikwayo mang’eny moromo mia achiel gi piero abich.  Jogo duto ne ginjo-Benjamin.
Weche mag Ndalo
Jo-Israel mane oduogo e pinygi, koa Babulon(Nehemia
.
-
)
Jo-Israel duto nokwan koluwore gi dhoutgi, kendo ne ondik nyinggi eKitap Ruodhi mag Israel gi Juda kane pok odargi kiterogi Babulon e tuechnikech richogi.
Joma nokwongo dak e miechgi ne gin jo-Israel gi jodolo gi jo-Lawi kodjotich Hekalu.
To jo-Juda gi jo-Benjamin gi jo-Efraim kod jo-Manasenodak Jerusalem.
Jo-Juda ne gin Uthai wuod Amihud, ma wuod Omri, wuodImri, wuod Bani, ma achiel kuom nyikwa Perez ma wuod Juda.
Joka Shelane Asaya ma wuowi makayo, kaachiel gi yawuote.
Joka Zera ne Jeuel kodowetegi mia auchiel gi piero ochiko.
Jo-Benjamin ne Salu wuod Meshulam, ma wuod Hodavia, ma wuod Hasenua,
gi Ibneya wuod Jeroham gii Ela wuod Uzi ma wuod Mikra, kod Meshulamwuod Shefatia, ma wuod reuel, wuod Ibnija.
Jogo kaachiel gi jowetegimane nyinggi ochan, ne romo ji mia ochiko gi piero abich gauchiel. Giduto ne gin jodong dhoudi.
To jodolo ne gin Jedaya gi Jehoyarid gi Jakin
gi Azaria wuod Hilkia,ma wuod Meshulam, ma wuod Zadok, ma wuod Merayoth, ma wuod Ahitub manejatelo e Od Nyasaye
gi Adaya wuod Jeroham, ma wuod Pashur, ma wuodMalkija, kod Maasa wuod Adiel ma wuod Jazera, wuod Meshulam, wuodMeshilemith, wuod Imer.
Jogo ne nigi owetegi ma jodong dhoudi alufuachiel gi mia abiriyo gi piero auchiel.  Giduto ne gin joma dongo molonye tich Od Nyasaye.
Jo-Lawi ne Shemaya wuod Hashub wuod Azrikam, wuod Hashabia ja-Merari,
gi Bakbakar gi Heresh gi Galal gi Matania wuod Mika, ma wuod Zikri,wuod Asaf,
gi Obadia wuod Shemaya, ma wuod Galal, wuod Jeduthun, kodBerekia wuod Asa wuod Elkana, ma nodak gi joka Netola.
Jorit rangeye ne gin Shalum gi Akub gi Talmon gi Ahiman kod owetegi. To Shalum ne jatendgi.
Mokwongo noketgi yo wuokchieng’ mar ranga dalaruoth, ka girito rangeye mag kar dak jo-Lawi.
Shalum wuod Koreah, mawuod Abiasaf, wuod Kora, kaachiel gi owetene ma jo-Kora ne rito rangeyemag Hema Maler kaka kweregi ne rito rangeye mag kambi jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.
Chon Finehas wuod Eleazar ne jatendgi.  (Ruoth mondo obed kode!)
Zekaria wuod Meshelemia norito ranga Hemb Romo.
Joma noyier mondoobed jorit rangeye ne gin ji mia ariyo gi apar gariyo, mochan koluworegi miechgi.  Daudi gi Samuel ma janen ema noketogi e tich, nikech ne ginjoma kare.
Omiyo gin gi yawuotgi, ne girito rangeye Od Ruoth Nyasaye,tiende ni Hema Maler.
Jorit rangeye nodak e bath Hekalu korwuokchieng’ gi kor podho chieng’ gi kor nyandwat gi kor milambo.
Toowetegi ma nodak oko e mier ne nyaka bi konyogi rito kuom ndalo abiriyokinde ka kinde.
Jorit ang’wen ma jotelogo noyier nimar ne gin jomakare.  Ne gin jo-Lawi, kendo ne girito udi gi kuonde keno mag Od Nyasaye.
Ne gidak ei alwora mar Od Nyasaye, nikech nomigi tich yawo rangeyepile gokinyi.
Jomoko kuomgi nomi tich rito gik lemo.  Ne gikwano gigo kigologi karkeno, kendo kidwokogi.
To moko ne rito gik Hekalu kod gik mowal nitich Ruoth Nyaaye, kod mogo mayom gi divai gi mo gi ubani kod gikmang’ue ng’ar.
To jodolo ema neruwo gik mang’ue ng’argo.
Ja-Lawi moro ma nyinge Matithia, mane kach Shalum ja-Kora, ema nomitich tedo chapat michiwo ni Nyasaye nikech ne en ng’at makare.
To owetegi moko ma jo-Kohath nomi tich teto makati e nyim RuothNyasaye, chieng’ Sabato ka Sabato.
Mago ne jower kendo jodong dhout jo-Lawi.  Ne gidak e udi moko magHekalu.  Ne ok omigi tich moro machielo, nikech nonego gibed moikore nitichgi odiechieng’ gotieno.
Jogo duto, kaka dhoutgi giwegi nochanogi, ne gin jodong dhout jo-Lawi,kendo ne gidak Jerusalem. Anywola Saulo
Jeyel wuon Gibeon nodak Gibeon, to nying chiege ne Maaka.
Wuod Jeyelmakayo ne Abdon, to yawuote mamoko ne Zer gi Kish gi Baal gi Ner giNadab
gi Gedor gi Ahio gi Zekaria kod Mikloth,
to Mikloth nonywoloShimeam.  Jogo bende nodak Jerusalem mokiewo gi owetegi.
Ner nonywoloKish, to Kish nonywolo Saulo, to Saulo nonywolo Jonathan gi Malkishua giAbinadab kod Eshbaal.
Wuod Jonathan ne Meribaal.  Meribaal nonywoloMika,
to Mika nonywolo Pithon gi Melek gi Terea kod Ahaz.
Ahaznonywolo Jara, to Jara nonywolo Alemeth gi Azmoth kod Zimri.  Zimrinonywolo Moza,
To Moza nonywolo Binea.  Binea nonywolo Refaya, toRefaya nonywolo Eleasa.  Eleasa nonywolo Ezel,
to Ezel nonywolo yawuowiauchiel ma nyinggi ne Azrikam gi Bokeru gi Ishmael gi Shearia gi Obadiakod Hanan.  Mago e kar romb yawuot Azel.
Weche mag Ndalo
Tho mar Saulo gi yawuote(
Samuel
.
-
)
Noyudo jo-Filistia kedo gi jo-Israel, kendo jo-Israel noringo, kinegogie got Gilboa.
Jo-Filistia nojuko Saulo gi yawuote ma Jonathan giAbinadab kod Malkishua, kendo ne ginego yawuotego.
Lweny nohingo Saulo,mi jo-asere noyude, mochiele kendo ohinye.
Saulo nowacho ni jating’negilweny nita, "Wuodh liganglani inegago, nono to joma kia Nyasayegi,biro nyiera. " To jating’ gilwenje nodagi, nikech noluor ahinya.  EmomiyoSaulo nomako liganglane owuon, mochwoworee.
To kane jating’ne gilwenyoneno ni Saulo osetho, en bende nochwowore e liganglane, motho.
KamanoSaulo notho kaachiel gi yawuote adek kod joode duto chieng’ achiel.
Kane jo-Israel mane odak e holo oneno ni jolweny oseringo, kendo niSaulo gi yawuote josetho, ne gibolo miechgi kanyo, mi gin bende negiringo.  Bang’e jo-Filistia nobiro, modak e miergo.
Kinyne, kane jo-Filistia obiro dedo joma otho, ne giyudo ringre Saulogi ringre yawuote koriere e got Gilboa.
Ne gidedo Saulo, kendo neging’ado wiye, mi gikawo gige mag lweny.  Eka ne gioro joote e pinyFilistia duto, mondo oter wach maberno ni nyisechegi, kendo ni jopinygi.
Ne giketo gi Saulo mag lweny e od nyisechegi, to wiye ne giguro e korhekalu mar Dagon nyasachgi.
To kane jo-Jabes-gilead owinjo gima nejo-Filistia osetimo ni Saulo,
thuondgi duto nowuok modhi oomo ringreSaulo gi ringre yawuote.  Ne gikelogi Jabesh, mi giyiko chokegi kuno etiend yath moro, kendo ne gitueyo chiemo kuom ndalo abiriyo.
KamanoSaulo notho nikech noweyo Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ne ok orito chik Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo kar penjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach, to nodhi mana ir jonyakalondo mondoonyise wach.
Mano emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nonege, momiyo Daudi wuodJesse lochne.
Weche mag Ndalo
Oket Daudi ruodh Israel(
Samuel
.
-
)
Bang’e jo-Israel duto nochokore gi Daudi Hebron, mi giwachone niya,"Ng’e ni wan mana remo achiel kodi.
E ndalo mokadho, kane Saulo podruoth, in ema nitelo ni jo-Israel e lwenjegi duto, kendo Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachi nowachoni niya, ‘Inibed jakwadh joga Israel, kendo in emanibed jatendgi. ’ "
Kuom mano, jodong Israel duto nobiro Hebron ir ruothDaudi, kendo Daudi notimo kodgi singruok kuno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mine giwire gi mo mondo obed ruodh Israel, kaluwore gi wach mane RuothNyasaye omiyo Samuel owacho. Daudi okawo dala mar Sayun(
Samuel
.
-
)
Bang’e Daudi gi jo-Israel duto nodhi Jerusalem, mane iluongo ni Jebuskuma ne jo-Jebus odakie.
Jo-Jebus gogo nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Oknidonj kaeri!" To kata kamano Daudi nokawo Sayun, dala mane ochielmotegno ahinya.  Tinde iluonge ni Dala Daudi.
Daudi nosewacho niya,"Ng’at ma nokwong nego ja-Jebus ema nobed jatelo kata jaduong’ lweny. "Joab wuod Zeruya ema nokwongo timo kamano, mi nokete jatelo.
Daudinodak e dala mochiel motegnono, emomiyo nochak kanyo ni Dala Daudi.
Nogero udi molwore, kochakore gie ohinga mar Milo, to Joab nolosokuonde mamoko mane okethore e dalano.
Duong’ mar Daudi koro nomedoreahinya, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ne ni kode. Thuondi mag Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
)
Koro thuondi madongo moloyo, mane konyo Daudi gi tekregi duto mondookete ruoth, kaluwore gi wach mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kuom jo-Israel emagi:
Jashobeam ja-Hakmon ne jatend thuondi adek madongo.  En ema nonego jimia achiel gi tong’, odiechieng’ achiel.
Ng’at mane luwe ne en Eleazarwuod Dodo ja-Ahohi.
Ne en gi Daudi Pasdamim, kuma ne jo-Filistiaochokoree ni lweny.  Ne nitie puoth shairi kuno.  Jolweny moko dutonoringo jo-Filistia,
To gin ne gichung’ gineno jo-Filistiago e dierpuodhono, ka girite, kendo ne ginego jo-Filistiago.  Mano e kaka RuothNyasaye noreso jo-Israel, komiyogi loch maduong’.
Kane jolweny mag jo-Filistia ojot e holo Refaim, ji adek kuom thuondipiero adek madongo nodhi ir Daudi e lwanda man but rogo mar Adulam.
Kindego Daudi ne nie rogo, to jolweny mag jo-Filistia nosekawoBethlehem.
Daudi noomo chunye ka siso omake, mowacho niya, "Yaye! Madng’ato kelna pi soko man but ranga Bethlehem mondo amodhi!"
Ekathuondi adekgo nomwomo oganda mar jo-Filistia.  Ne gidhi omo pi sokono,mi gikelo ni Daudi, to nodagi modho pigno, moole piny ka misango niRuoth Nyasaye,
kowacho niya, "Nyasaye mondo orita kik amodh pigni,nikech ochalo mana remb jogo mane odhi ome koyie wito ngimagi. " Manoemomiyo Daudi notamore modhe.  Gik makamago ema thuondi adekgo ne timo.
Abishai omin Joab ema ne jatend thuondi piero adekgo.  Nonego ji miaadek gi tong’, mi nobedo ng’at marahuma kuom thuondigo.
Ne en rahumamoloyo kuomgi, mobedo jatendgi, to kata kamano ne ok ochopo e rang’inymag ji adek kande.
Benaya wuod Jehoyada, thwon Kabzeel marahuma, nosetimo timbe thwonmang’eny.  Bende nonego thuond Moab ariyo.  Chieng’ moro, kane kodh peosechue, nolor e bur moro, monegoe sibuor.
Bende en ema nonegoja-Misri marabet mane borne romo mita ariyo gi nus.  Ja-Misrino ne nigitong’ machal gi lodi, to Benaya nodhine gi odunga.  Noyudho tong’ e lwetja-Misrino, monegego.
Timbe machal kamago ema ne Benaya wuod Jehoyadaoyudogo huma kaachiel gi thuondi piero adek kande.
Ne en rahuma moloyoji piero adekgo, to kata kamano ne ok ochopo e rang’iny mag thuondi adekmadongo kande.  Daudi nokete jatend joge mag lweny mane rito ng’imane.
Thwond jolweny mag Daudi ne gin Asahel omin Joab, gi Elhanan wuod Dodoja-Bethlehem,
gi Shamoth ja-Horad, gi Helez ja-Pelon,
gi Ira wuodIkesh ja-Tekoa, gi Abiezer ja-Anathoth,
gi Sibekai ja-Hushath, gi Ilaija-Ahohi,
kod Maharai gi Heled wuod Baana ma jo-Netofa,
gi Benjamin,gi Benaya ja-Pirathon,
gi Hurai ma ja-Gaash, piny aore, gi Abielja-Beth-araba,
gi Azmoth ja-Bararim, gi Eliaba ja-Shaalbon,
giHashem ja-Gizon, kod Jonathan wuod Shagee,
gi Ahiam wuod Sakar majo-Harar, gi Elifal wuod Ur,
gi Hefer ja Mekera, gi Ahija ja-Pelon,
gi Ezbai,
gi Joel owadgi Nathan, gi Mibhar wuod Hagri,
gi Zelek jaAmon, gi Naharai ja Beerroth, mane jating’ gi lweny mag Joab wuodZeruya,
kod Ira gi Gareb ma jo-Ithri,
gi Uria ja-Hiti, kod Zabadwuod Alai.
Jatend thuondi piero adekgo ne Adina wuod Shiza ja-Reuben,ma jatend jo-Reuben.
Jomoko mane ni kodgi ne gin Hanan wuod Maaka, giJoshafat ja-Mithni,
gi Uzia ja-Asheteroth, kod Shama gi Jeyel yawuotHotham ja-Aroer,
kod Jadiael wuod Shimri gi Joha owadgi, ma jo-Tizi,
gi Eliel ja-Mahav, kod Jeribai gi Joshavia yawuot Elnaam, gi Ithmaja-Moab,
kod Eliel gi Obed kod Jaasiel jo-Zoba.
Weche mag Ndalo
Thuond Daudi mane ni kode Ziklag
Koro magi e joma nobiro Ziklag ir Daudi kane Saulo wuod Kish oseriembee nyime.  Gin bende ne gin thuondi mane konyo Daudi lweny.
Ne ginyalodiro asere kata bayo orujre gi bat korachwich kata gi bat koracham.  Negin jo-Benjamin, dhoodgi Saulo.
Jotendgi ne Ahiezer, gi Joash owadgi,ma yawuot Shemaa ja-Gibea, kod Jeziel gi Pelet yawuot Azmoth, kod Berakagi Jehu jo-Anathoth,
gi Ishmaya ja-Gibeon ma achiel kuom jotend thuondipieradekgo, kod Jeremia gi Jahaziel gi Johanan gi Jozabad ja-Gedera,
giEluzai gi Jerimoth gi Bealia gi Shemaria gi Shefatia ja-Haruf,
kodElkana gi Ishia gi Azereel gi Joezer gi Jashobeam jo-Kora,
kod Joela giZebadia yawuot Jeroham ma ja-Gedor.
Jo-Gad moko bende nobiro ir Daudi kane enie rogo e thim.  Ne gin jomarateke motiegore ni lweny, mong’eyo kedo gi kuodi kod tong’.  Ne giger kasibuoche, kendo tiendgi ne yot ka tiend mwanda maringo e got.
Ezer nejatendgi, to Obadia jalupne, eka Eliab mar adek,
Mishmana mar ang’wen,Jeremia mar abich,
Atai mar auchiel, Eliel mar abiriyo,
Johanan maraboro, Elzabad mar ochiko,
Jeremia mar apar, Makbanai mar apargachiel.
Joka Gadgo ne jodong oganda lweny.  Ng’at matinie moloyokuomgi muche ne romre gi much ji mia achiel, to much ng’at maduong’moloyo ne romre gi much ji alufu achiel.
Jogo ema nong’ado aora Jordane due mokwongo kane opong’ moo, kendo oimo genge duto.  Ne giriembo jiduto ma nodak e holni man yo wuok chieng’ gi yo podho chieng’ maraorano.
Jomoko kuom jo-Benjamin gi jo-Juda bende nobiro ir Daudi e rogo.
Daudi nowuok romonigi, mowachonigi niya, "Ka usebiro ira kaka osiepemondo ukonya, to arwakou gi mor.  To ka ubiro ni mondo undhoga, kendouketa e lwet wasika, to onge gima aseketho, to Nyasach kwerewa mondo onewachno, kendo ong’adnu bura. "
Eka Roho nolor kuom Amasai, jatendthuondi piero adek kande mowacho niya,"Wan kodi!Wan jogi, wuod Jesse. Wamosi! Wamosi!Wamoso jakonyni bende!En Nyasachi makonyi. "Eka Daudi norwakogi, moketogi kuom joge mag lweny.
Kane Daudi dhi gi jo-Filistia mondo giked gi Saulo, jo-Manase mokonoweyo Saulo modok ni Daudi.  Kata kamano Daudi ne ok okonyo jo-Filistia,nimar kane jotendgi oseporo wach, ne giriembe.  Ne giwacho niya, "Dipokondhogowa kodok ni Saulo ma ruodhe, mi okelnwa masira. "
Jo-Manase manodok ni Daudi kane odhi Ziklag, ne gid Adna gi Jozabad gi Jadiael giMikael gi Jozabad gi Elihu kod Zilthai.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomgi nejatend jolweny alufu achiel mag jo-Manase.
Gin ema ne gikonyo Daudikedo gi joma ne monje, nimar giduto ne gin thuondi mager, kendo Daudinoketogi jotend jolweny.
Ji ne medo biro ir Daudi odiechieng’kodiechieng’ mondo okonye, nyaka ne gidoko oganda mang’ongo mar jolweny. Thuond Daudi mane ni kode Hebron
Jolweny ma nobiro Hebron ir Daudi mondo okaw loch Saulo omi Daudi kakaRuoth Nyasaye nosewacho e magi:
Jo-Juda mane oting’o kuodi gi tong’ nealufu auchiel gi mia aboro.
Jo-Simeon ma thuondi mager ne alufuabiriyo gi mia achiel.
Jo-Lawi ne alufu angwen gi mia auchiel
kaachiel gi Jehoyada jaduong’ dhood Harun, mane nigi ji alufu adek gimia abiriyo,
kod Zadok, wuowi mathwon kendo mager, mane nigi jodonglweny piero ariyo gariyo moa e dhoodgi.
Jo-Benjamin, ma owete Saulo,ne romo ji alufu adek, to ji mang’eny kuomgi nopandore kuom dhood Saulonyaka thone.
Jo-Efraim ne thuondi alufu piero ariyo gi mia aboro, mangi huma e dhoutgi.
Jo-Manase konchiel mane oyier mondo obi oket Daudiruoth ne romo alufu apar gaboro.
Jo-Isakar ne gin joma riek kuom nyisojo-Israel gima onego gitim, kendo kinde monego gitimee.  Ne gin jotelomia ariyo, ma nobiro gi jolwenjgi.
Jo-Zebulun ne jolweny molony alufupiero abich man gi gi lweny mopogore opogore.  Ne gin thuondi mager mangi chuny achiel.
Jo-Naftali ne jotend jolweny alufu achiel gi ji alufupiero adek gabiriyo moting’o kuodi gi tong’.
Jo-Dan ne ji alufu pieroariyo gaboro gi mia auchiel moikore ni lweny.
Jo-Asher to ne ji alufupiero ang’wen mochwiny kendo moikore ni lweny.
To joma noa loka Jordankuom jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel ne gin ji alufu miaachiel gi piero ariyo, ma noting’o kit gilweny duto.
Jolweny maratego duto nobiro Hebron gi chuny achiel ni nyaka giketDaudi ruodh jo-Israel duto.  Jo-Israel modong’ bende ne nigi paro achielmar timo kamano.
Ne gibet kuno gi Daudi kuom ndalo adek, ka gichiemokendo gimetho, nikech jowetegi noseikonigi gik moko duto.
Bende jomanokiewo kodgi, chakre piny Isakar gi Zebulun kod Naftali nokelonigichiemo mane giting’o gi kenje gi ngamia gi nyumbu kod ruedhi.  Ne ginmogo gi olembe mag ng’owo gi mag mzabibu motwo mong’in kod divai gi mo,kaachiel gi dhok kod rombe mang’eny ahinya, nikech mor mane nitie eIsrael.
Weche mag Ndalo
Daudi dwaro kelo Sanduk mar Nyasaye Jerusalem
Daudi noporo wach gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo, kod joteloduto.
Nowacho ni jo-Israel mane ochokore niya "Ka wachni bernu, kendoen dwaro mar Nyasachwa, to mondo waor joote ir jo-Israel wetewa dutomodong’ dala, kendo ir jodolo gi jo-Lawi ma nopognigi mier man gi lege,mondo obi irwa.
Eka mondo waom Sanduk mar Nyasaye obed kodwa, nimar newajwang’e e ndalo Saulo. "
Mi oganda duto noyie timo kamano, kendowachno ne ber ni piny duto. Daudi odhi omo Sanduk mar Nyasaye(
Samuel
.
-
)
Omiyo Daudi nochoko jo-Israel duto kanyakla, chakre aora Shihor nyakakama idonjogo Hamath, yo nyandwat, mondo giom Sanduk mar NyasayeKiriath-jearim.
Mi Daudi gi jo-Israel duto nodhi Baala, ma bendeiluongo ni Kiriath-jearim, manie piny Juda, mondo giomie Sanduk marNyasaye miluongogo nying Ruoth Nyasaye, mobet kuom kerubi kaka ruoth bete kom duong’ne.
Ne gigolo Sanduk mar Nysaye e od Abinadab, ka giting’ee gari manyien.  Uza gi Ahio ema ne chiko garino.
Daudi gi jo-Israel tone jomiel gi tekregi duto e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, ka giwer, kendo gigoyothumbe gi nyidwonge gi ongeng’o kod tung’.
To kane gichopo kar dino mar Kidon, dhok mane ywayo gari nochwanyore,mi Uza norieyo bade mondo ojuk Sanduk mane oyudo dhi podho.
To RuothNyasaye nokecho kode, mochwade nikech nomako Sanduk, mi notho kanyo enyim Nyasaye.
Daudi nokecho nikech Nyasaye nomwomore kuom Uza.  Omiyonochako kanyo ni Perez-uza, (tiende ni, mwomruok kuom Uza. ) Pod iluongekamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Daudi noluoro Nyasaye chieng’no, mowachoniya, "Kara Sanduk mar Nyasaye ok onego kel e dalana!"
Omiyo ne okokelo Sanduk e dalane, to nobaro kode, motere e od Obed-edom ma ja-Giti.
Sanduk mar Nyasaye nodong’ e hembe but od Obed-edom kuom dueche adek. Mi Ruoth Nyasaye noguedho od Obed-edom kod gige duto. Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
.
Weche mag Ndalo
Hiram ruodh Turo oyie gi Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
)
Hiram ruodh Turo nooro joote ir Daudi gi yiend sida, kaachiel gi jogedomag kite kod jopa bao, mondo oger ni Daudi ot.
Koro Daudi nong’eyo nikara Ruoth Nyasaye osekete ruodh Israel kendo osetego lochne ahinyamondo oguedhgo joge Israel. Nyithind Daudi mane onywol Jerusalem(
Samuel
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Daudi nokendo mon moko Jerusalem, mi nomedo nywolo yawuowi gi nyiri.
Nying nyithindo mane onywolo kuno e magi: Shamua gi Shobab gi Nathan giSolomon
gi Ibhar gi Elishua gi Elphet
gi Noga gi Nefeg gi Jafia
giElishama gi Beeliada kod Elifelet. Daudi oloyo jo-Filistia(
Samuel
.
-
)
Kane jo-Filistia owinjo ni osewir Daudi mondo obed ruodh Israel duto,ne gibiro kar rombgi mondo gimonje.  To kane Daudi owinjo kamano, nowuokmondo orad kodgi.
Noyudo ka jo-Filistia osemonjo joma odak e HoloRefaim.
Daudi nopenjo Nyasaye wach niya, "Kadhi kedo gi jo-Filistia,inichiwgi e lweta koso?" Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Dhiyo! Nachiwgi elweti. "
Mi Daudi nodhi Baal-perazim, momonjogi, kendo oloyogi.  Ekanowacho niya, "Nyasaye osemiyo amwomo wasika mana kaka aora mwomogenge. " Mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni Baal-perazim, (tiende ni ruodhmwomruok. )
Jo-Filistia noringo moweyo nyisechegi kanyo, mi Daudinogolo chik, mowang’gi.
Chieng’ machielo jo-Filistia nochako omonjo holo cha.
Daudi nochakoopenjo Nyasaye wach, mi Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Kik ichomgi tir, to ng’adyo ka ng’egi, mondo imonjgi kama omanyore gi yien maboyo kande.
Kiwinjo mutni ewi yien, machalo gi mutni mar ji mawuotho, to imonjjolweny mag jo-Filistia, nimar asetelo nyimi mondo adhi alogi. "
Daudinotimo kaka Nyasaye nochike, mi jo-Israel noriembo jo-Filistia, chakreGibeon nyaka Gezer.
Humb Daudi nolak e pinje duto, kendo Ruoth Nyasayenomiyo ogendini duto oluore. Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
.
Weche mag Ndalo
Daudi okelo Sanduk mar Nyasaye jerusalem(
Samuel
.
-
)
Daudi nomedo gero udi e Dala Daudi, kendo noloso kama Sanduk marNyasaye nyalo betie, mogurone hema.
Eka nochiko ni onge ng’at moro manyalo ting’o Sanduk mar Nyasaye mak mana jo-Lawi kende nimar gin ema neNyasaye oyierogi mondo giting’e, kendo gitine nyaka chieng’.
Bang’mano, Daudi nochoko jo-Israel duto Jerusalem mondo giter Sanduk marRuoth Nyasaye kuma noselosone.
Nochoko bende joka Harun kod jo-Lawikanyakla.
Ne gin joka Kohath mia achiel gi piero ariyo, mane Urielotelonigi,
gi joka Merari mia ariyo gi piero ariyo, mane Asayaotelonigi,
gi joka Gershom mia achiel gi piero adek, mane Joelotelonigi,
gi joka Elizafan mia ariyo mane Shemaya otelonigi,
gijo-Hebron piero aboro, mane Eliel otelonigi,
kod joka Uziel mia achielgapar gariyo, mane Aminadab otelonigi.
Eka Daudi noluongo Zadok giAbiathar ma jodolo kod Uriel gi Asaya gi Joel gi Shemaya gi Eliel kodAminadab ma jo-Lawi.
Nowachonigi niya, "Un ma un jodong dhout Lawi,pwodhreuru kaachiel gi oweteu mondo uter Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel kuma aseikone.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ne omwomorekuomwa e kinde mokwongo, nikech ne ok untie mondo uting’ Sanduk, kendonikech ne ok warite kaka owinjore. "
Omiyo jodolo gi jolawi nopwodhoremondo oter Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel kama noseikne.
Jo-Lawi noting’o Sanduk mar Nyasaye e gokgi gi ludhe, koluwore gi wachNyasaye kaka Musa nochiko.
Daudi nochiko jotend jo-Lawi bende mondo oyier owetegi ma jower molonykendo mong’eyo goyo thumbe mopogore opogore mamit.
Omiyo jo-Lawinoyiero Heman wuod Joel, gi Asaf wuod Berekia ma owadgi.  To kuom owetegima joka Merari ne giyiero Etham wuod Kushaya.
Owetegi mane jolupgi etich ne Zekaria gi Jaaziel gi Benaya gi Maaseya gi Matithia gi Elifelehukod Mikneya, kaachiel gi Obed-edom kod Jeyel ma jorit rangeye.
Hemangi Asaf kod Etham ma jower noyierr mondo ogo ongeng’o mag mula,
toZekaria gi Jaaziel gi Shemiramoth gi Jehiel gi Uni gi Eliab gi Maaseyakod Benaya noyier mondo ogo nyigwerni.
Matithia gi Elifelehu giMikneya gi Obed-edom gi Jeyel kod Azazia noyier mondo ogo thumbe, kagitelo ni jower.
