Ne giketho mier duto mokiewo gi Gera, nikech luoro moa kuomRuoth Nyasaye nomako pinyno.  Ne giyako miego duto, nimar ne nitie mwandumang’eny ma noyudo jogo oseyako.
Ne gituro kuonde dhok, kendo negipeyo rombe gi ngamia mathoth.  Eka ne gidok Jerusalem.
Weche mag Ndalo
Asa oloso piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Roho mar Nyasaye nobiro kuom Azaria wuod Oded,
modhi romo gi Asa. Nowacho ni Asa gi jo-Juda kod jo-Benjamin niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ni kodu,to mana ka pod un kode.  Kudware, unuyude; to kuweye en bende noweu.
Kuom higni mathoth Israel nobedo maonge gi jodolo ma puonjogi, kendo maonge gi chik.
To ka ginie thagruok, ginidog ir Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi, kendo ginidware, mi giniyude.
E ndalogo, kue nobed maonge ning’ato e yorene duto, nimar chandruok maduong’ nobi kuom ji duto modak epinyni.
Ginitiekre kendgi ka libamba kedo gi libamba kendo dala kedo gidala, nimar Nyasaye nomigi thagruok mang’eny.
To un, timuru chir! Lwetukik jony, nimar nochulu kuom tichu. "
Kane Asa owinjo weche mane Azaria wuod Oded okorone, notimo chir mogolonyiseche mokwer e piny Juda gi Benjamin duto kod mier duto ma nokawo epiny gode mag Efraim.  Noloso kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye manenie nyim agoch Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nochoko jo-Juda gi jo-Benjamin duto gijodak ma jo-Efraim gi Manase kod Simeon, nimar ji mang’eny noseweyoIsrael mobiro ire ka gineno ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache ni kode.
Negichokore Jerusalem e due mar adek mar higa mar apar gabich mar lochAsa.
Chieng’no ne gitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni gi dhok mia abiriyomane gigolo kuom gik mane gipeyo.
Ne gisingore mondo giluw RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi gi chunygi duto,
kendo mondo oneg ng’atoang’ata, matin kata maduong, ma dichwo kata madhako, ma ok dwar luwoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel.
Ne gitimo singruok ni Ruoth Nyasayegi dwol madwong’, ka gikok kendo ka gigoyo tung’ gi oporo.
Jo-Judaduto ne mor nikech singruokno, nimar ne gisingore gi chunygi duto.  Negidwaro Ruoth Nyasaye gi siso maduong’, mi ne giyude, kendo nomiyogi kuekuonde duto.
Bende Asa nogolo Maaka min mare e duong’ne mar bedo min ruoth, nikechnoloso kido makuero maket gi nyasaye ma dhako miluongo ni Ashera.  Asanomuko gima ketno, mong’ade matindotindo, kendo nowang’e e dho aoraKidron.
To ne ok oketho hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore e pinyIsrael.  Kata kamano chunye nodimbore e nyim Nyasaye ndalone duto.
Nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kod gik lemo, mi oketo e Od Nyasaye.  Moko negin gik mane wuon mare ochiwo ni Nyasaye, to moko en ema nochiwo. Asa otimo winjruok gi Benhadad, ruodh Aram(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Ne onge lweny nyaka higa mar piero adek gabich mar loch Asa,
Weche mag Ndalo
to e higa mar piero adek gauchiel mar lochne, Baasha ruodh Israel nodhimomonjo jo-Juda, kendoo nochielo Rama gi ohinga, moketoe jolweny mondoogeng’ ni ji duto ma dhi ka Asa ruodh Juda, kata maa kuno.
Eka Asanokawo fedha gi dhahabu kuom mwandu mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye kod mag odeowuon.  Noorogi ni Benhadad ruodh Aram ma nodak Damaski gi wach niya,
"Winjruok mondo obed e kindwa kodi, kaka winjruok mane nie kind wuoragi wuoru.  Ero, aoroni fedha gi dhahabu; yie iketh winjruok mane kindu giBaasha ruodh Israel, mondo owe kedo koda. "
Benhadad noyie kwayo marruoth Asa, mi nooro jotend jolweny mondo omonj miech jo-Israel.  NokethoIjon gi Dan gi Abelmaim kod miech keno duto mag Naftali.
Kane Baashaowinjo gima otimore, noweyo gero ohinga mar Rama, mi tijno nochung’.
Eka ruoth Asa nodhi gi jo-Juda duto mi gigolo kite gi yien duto maneBaasha gerogo ohinga mar Rama, mi nochielogo Geba gi Mizpa.
E ndalogo, Hanani janen nobiro ir Asa ruodh Juda mowachone niya,"Jolweny mag ruodh Aram biro tony e lweti, nikech nigeno kuom jo-Aram,to ne ok igeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi.
Donge jo-Kush gijo-Libia ne gin oganda maduong’ man gi geche gi joidh farese mang’enyahinya? To Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwogi e lweti, nimar nigeno kuome,
nikechwang’ Ruoth Nyasaye ng’iyo piny duto koni gi koni mondo onyis tekonemokonyogo joma chunygi odimbore e nyime.  Nitimo gima ofuwo kuom wachni,omiyo chakre kawuono ibiro bedo gi lwenje. "
Wachnoo nomiyo Asa okechogi janen, mi otueye gi nyororo e od tuech.  To bende Asa nochako sandojomoko e ndalogo.
Chakruok weche Asa nyaka gikogi ondiki e kitap Ruodhi mag Juda gi magIsrael.
Kane Asa osebedo ruoth kuom higni piero adek gochiko, tuonomako tiendene.  Tuoneno nomedore ahinya, to kata kamano ne ok okwayoRuoth Nyasaye mondo okonye, to nodhi mana kuom ajuoke.
Asa notho higamar piero ang’wen gachiel mar lochne moluwo kwerene.
Noyike e liendema nokunyo e dala Daudi.  Ne gikete e ng’ango mopong’ gi gik mang’ueng’ar mane joma olony e tijno oseloso, kendo ne giloso mach mang’ongoahinya ka gimiyego duong’.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Jehoshafat ogurore motegno
Jehoshafat nodoko ruoth kar Asa wuon mare.  Noikore mondo osir Israel,
omiyo noketo jolweny e miech Juda duto mochiel gi ohinga, kendo noketojotendgi e piny Juda kod e miech Efraim duto mane Asa wuon mare osekawo.
Ruoth Nyasaye ne konyo Jehoshafat nimar Jehoshafat noluwo timbemokwongo mag wuon mare ka ok oluwo Baal.
Nogeno Nyasach wuon marekomako buchene mak oluwo timbe jo-Israel.
Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyolochne obedo motegno kendo jo-Juda duto nokelone mich mi nobedo gimwandu mang’eny kod huma maduong’.
Chunye nojiwore e yor Ruoth Nyasaye,bende noketho hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore, kaachiel gi sirni milamomane nie piny Juda.
E higa mar adek mar lochne nooro Banhail gi Obadia gi Zekaria giNethaneel kod Mikaya ma jodonge mondo odhi opuonj e miech Juda.
Bendenooro Shemai gi Nethania gi Zebadia gi Asahel gi Shemiramoth giJehonathan gi Adonija gi Tobija kod Tobadonija ma jo-Lawi kaachiel giElishama gi Jehoram ma jodolo.
Ne giwuotho e miech Juda duto gi KitapChike mag Ruoth Nyasaye ka gipuonjogo ji.
Luoro moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nomako ruodhi mag pinje mokiewo gi Juda,mi ne ok gikedo gi Jehoshafat.
Jo-Filistia moko ne kelo ni Jehoshafatmich, kaachiel gi fedha ma gichulogo osuru.  Jo-Arabu bende nokelone imbealufu abiriyo gi mia abiriyo kod nyuogi alufu abiriyo.
Teko Jehoshafatne medore ameda.  Nogero mier mochiel gi ohinga gi mier mag keno e Juda.
Nokano gilweny e miego, kendo ne en gi jolweny marateke Jerusalem.
Ma e kar rombgi, kaluwore gi dhoutgi: Jatend jolweny mar dhood Juda neen Adna mane nigi jolweny marateke alufu mia adek.
Jalupne ne enJehohanan mane nigi ji alufu mia ariyo gi piero aboro, (
,
) kendo
jatelo mar adek ne en Amasia wuod Zikri ma nochiwore ni tich RuothNyasaye.  En to ne en gi jolweny marateke alufu mia ariyo.
To jatendjolweny mar dhood Benjamin ne en Eliada thwon mager.  Ne en gi ji alufumia ariyo moting’o atung’ gi okumbini.
Jalupne ne en Jehozabad manenigi jolweny alufu mia achiel gii piero aboro (
,
) moikore nilweny.
Mano e kar romb joma ne nie tich ruoth, ka ok okwan jogo maneruoth oketo e miech Juda duto mochiel gi ohinga.
Weche mag Ndalo
Mikaya okoro ni ibiro loyo Ahab kod Jehoshafat(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Jehoshafat koro ne nigi mwandu mang’eny kod huma maduong’ ahinya. Nomiyo jodhoodgi okendore gi jodhood Ahab, mondo okelgo winjruok.
Bang’higni moko nodhi Samaria limo Ahab, mi Ahab noyang’one rombe gi ruedhimogundho mondo ocham gi joma nowuotho kohoye mondo owuoth gijo-Ramoth-gilead.
Nopenjo Jehoshafat niya, "Iyie dhi kodwaRamoth-gilead?" Nodwoke niya, "Ayie, joga e jogi.  Wabiro dhi kodi elweny. "
Eka Jehoshafat nowacho ni ruodh Israel niya, "To mokwongo onego wapenjRuoth Nyasaye wach. "
Omiyo ruodh jo-Israel nochoko jonabi mia ang’wenmopenjogi niya, "Wadhi waked gi jo-Ramoth-gilead, koso wawe?" Ne gidwokeniya, "Dhiyo nikech Nyasaye biro miyi dalano. "
To Jehoshafat nopenjeniya, "Janabi moro mar Ruoth Nyasaye onge ka koso, ma dwapenj wach?"
Ruodh Israel nodwoke ni, "Ee, ng’at achiel pod odong’ ma dipenjnwaRuoth Nyasaye wach, en Mikaya wuod Imla, to asin kode, nikech ok okorgik mabeyo kuoma, to okoro mana gik maricho. " To Jehoshafat nowachoneniya, "Kik iwuo kamano. "
Eka ruodh Israel noluongo jatichne moro,mowachone niya, "Dhi piyo iluong Mikaya wuod Imla. "
Koro noyudo karuodh Israel gi Jehoshafat ruodh Juda obet e alap manie dhorangaSamaria, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato obet e kom duong’ne, korwako lawe marruoth, kendo jonabi duto ne koro wach e nyimgi.
Zedekia wuod Kenaananosethedho tunge mag nyinyo morwako, mi nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasayeowacho kama, ‘Ibiro chwowo jo-Aram gi tungegi. ’ "
Jonabi duto bendenokoro wach machal kamano ka giwacho niya, "Dhiyo Ramoth-gilead mondoilo.  Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwe e lweti. "
Jaote mane odhi luongo Mikaya nowachone niya, "Jonabi duto osekorowach nyalhodia ka giwacho ni gima ber biro timore ni ruoth.  In bende yieikor wach maber kaka gisekorono. "
To Mikaya nodwoke niya, "Akuong’oragi nying Ruoth Nyasaye ni gima Nyasaye owachona ema abiro wacho. "
KaneMikaya ochopo e nyim ruoth, ruoth nopenje ni, "Wadhi waked gijo-Ramoth-gilead, koso wawe?" Nodwoko niya, "Dhi mondo ilo! RuothNyasaye biro chiwogi e lweti. "
Ruoth nowachone ni, "Asesiemi nyadidini kik iwach miriambo, to mak mana adiera kende e nying Ruoth Nyasaye?"
Mikaya nowacho niya, "Naneno jo-Israel duto koke e gode ka rombemaonge jakwath, kendo nawinjo ka Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, ‘Jogi onge giwuon-gi, we mondo gidog e miechgi gi kue. ’ "
Ruodh Israel nowacho ni Jehoshafat niya, "Donge nawachoni ni jali okdikorna wach maber, to mana marach?"
Mikaya nowacho niya, "Koro winjwach Ruoth Nyasaye: Naneno Ruoth Nyasaye kobet e kom duong’ne, kendooganda polo duto kochung’ e bathe koni gi koni.
Ruoth Nyasayenopenjogi niya, ‘Ere ng’ama diho Ahab ruodh Israel odhi Ramoth-gileadmondo otho kuno?’ To roho ka roho nochiwo parone,
nyaka roho moronosudo mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kawacho niya, ‘An ema abiro hoye,’Ruoth Nyasaye nopenje ni, ‘Ere kaka ibiro hoye?’
Nodwoke ni, ‘Abirodhi bet roho mar miriambo e dho jonabine duto. ’ Ruoth Nyasaye noyieneni, ‘Ee, in ema ibiro hoye.  Dhiyo itim kamano. ’
Koro sani RuothNyasaye oseketo roho mar miriambo e dho jonabini duto.  To kata kamanoRuoth Nyasaye oseng’adoni buch masira. "
Eka Zedekia wuod Kenaana nosudo machiegni mothalo lemb Mikaya kopenjeniya, "Ere kaka Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye ne nyalo a kuoma mondo owuokodi?"
Mikaya nodwoke niya, "Chieng’ ma inidonji e ot maiye mondoipondie, eka ning’e!"
Ruodh Israel nowacho ni, "Makuru Mikaya, uter irAmon jaduong’ Samaria kod Joash wuod ruoth, mondo jorite.
Wachnigiuruniya, ‘Ruoth owacho ni mondo uket ng’atni e od tuech, kendo umiye manakuon abang’a gi pi kende nyaka aduog kangima. ’ "
To Mikaya nowachoniya, "Kiduogo kingima, to kara ok asewuoyo gi dho Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Kamano ruodh Israel gi Jehoshafat ruodh Juda nodhi Ramoth-gilead.
Ruodh Israel nowcho ni Jehoshafat niya, "Kwadhi e lweny, abiro rwakolewni moko mondo kik ji ng’eya, to in rwak lepi mag ruoth. " Kamano ruodhIsrael noloko kite kendo ne gidhi e lweny.
To ruodh Aram nosechikojodong lweny ma jotend gechene ni kik giked gi ng’at moro amora, makmana ruodh Israel kende.
Kane jotend geche oneno Jehoshafat, negiwacho niya, "Jal cha e ruodh Israel. " Ne gilokore ire mondo gikedkode, to Jehoshafat nogiyo, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nokonye.  Nyasaye nogologikuome,
nimar kane jotend geche oneno ni ok en ruodh Israel, ne giweyolawe.
To ng’at moro nodiro asere, morodhno gi kor ruodh Israel e kindchumbe mag lweny ma norwako.  Mi ruoth nowacho ni jariemb gache niya,"Wichri, igola e lweny, nikech ahinyora malit. "
Lweny nomedorechieng’no; mi ruodh Israel noyiengore e gache kochomo jo Aram nyakaodhiambo, mi notho ka chieng’ podho.
Weche mag Ndalo
Janabi Jehu okwero Jehoshafat
Jehoshafat ruodh Juda nodok dalane Jerusalem kongima.
To Jehu wuodHanani ma janen nodhi romone mopenje niya, "Bende itimo maber kikonyojoricho kendo ihero joma ok ohero Ruoth Nyasaye? Mirima osemako RuothNyasaye kodi nikech wachni.
Kata kamano kamoro bende iber, nimar nigolosirni milamo e piny, kendo iketo chunyi kuom luwo Nyasaye. "Jehoshafat oketo jong’ad bura
Jehoshafat nodak Jerusalem, to nochako owuok kolimo joge chakreBeersheba nyaka piny gode mag Efraim, modwokogi ir Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach kweregi.
Noketo jong’ad bura e miech Juda duto mochiel giohinga,
kendo nowachonigi niya, "Paruru gima utimo, nimar ok ung’adbura e nying dhano, to ung’ado e nying Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech ok en kodukung’ado bura.
Emomiyo tiuru kuluoro Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ritreuru kuom gimautimo, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ok oyie gi ng’ado buch amworkata buch nyakonchiel kata chamo asoya. "
Bende Jehoshafat noketo jo-Lawi gi jodolo moko kod jodong dhout Israele Jerusalem mondo ong’ad bura e nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo otheg buchemilaruokie.  Od bura ne ni Jerusalem.
Jehoshafat nochikogi kama, "Unutitijeu gi adiera kendo gi chunyu duto kuluoro Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kamano kajoweteu modak e mier mamoko okelo wach moro e nyimu, bed ni en wach nekkata wach ketho chik Nyasaye, kata buch piny, kata buch dini, kata chikmoro amora, to nyaka upuonjgi ni kik giketh e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, nimardokech kodu kaachiel gi joweteugo.  Kutimo kamano, ok nubed gi ketho.
Amaria jadolo maduong’ ema notelnu e weche duto mag Ruoth Nyasaye, toZebadia wuod Ishmael ma jaduong’ dhood Juda notelnu e weche duto magruoth, kendo jo-Lawi nobed jogoro.  Timuru chir, kendo Ruoth Nyasayemondo okony jogo man gi adiera. "
Weche mag Ndalo
Jo-Moab gi jo-Amon olo e lweny
Bang’ mano jo-Moab gi jo-Amon kod jo-Meun moko nobiro kedo giJehoshafat.
Jomoko nonyiso Jehoshafat niya, "Oganda maduong’ moa Edomloka nam biro mondo omonji, kendo gisechopo Hazazon-tamar, miluongobende ni Engedi. "
Luoro nomako Jehoshafat, moketo chunye ni kwayo RuothNyasaye, kendo nochiko jo-Juda duto mondo otue chiemo.
Ji noa e miechJuda duto, mi ochokore kaachiel mondo okwa kony kuom Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kane jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem osekoro e od Ruoth Nyasaye, Jehoshafatnochung’ e nyim laru manyien,
mokwayo niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkwerewa, donge in e Nyasaye manie polo? Donge in e ruoth ogendini duto?Nyalo gi teko duto nie lueti maonge ng’ato ma nyalo siri.
A Nyasachwa,donge in ema nichiwo pinyni ni nyikwa Ibrahim ma osiepni, kiriembo jomanodakie mondo owe thuolo ni jogi Israel, odagie nyaka chieng’?
Migisedakie kendo gisegeronie Hekalu mondo nyingi obedie,
ka giwachoniya, ‘Ka gima rach obiro kuomwa, kaka lweny kata sand kata dera katakech to wanachung’ e nyim Hekalu kendo e nyimi, nimar nyingi nika. Wanaywag e nyimi nikech masichwa, kwang’eyo ni iniwinjwa kendoinireswa. ’
Kane jo-Israel oa e piny Misri, ne ikwerogi ni kik gimonjjo-Amon gi jo-Moab gi jo-got Seir, omiyo ne giweyogi ma ok gitiekogi.
To kar goyonwa erokamano, to koro gidwaro riembowa e piny mane imiyowamondo obed marwa.
A Nyasachwa, donge ibiro kumogi? Wan waonge gi tekoma dwasirgo oganda maduong’ mabiro monjowani! Ok wang’eyo gima dwatim,to wageno mana kuomi. "
Jo-Juda duto, kaachiel gi mondegi kod nyithindgi kata matindo manadi,nochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eka Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye nolor kuomJahazia ja-Lawi, mane nie dier chokruok.  Ne en wuod Zekaria, ma wuodBenaya, ma wuod Jeyel, ma wuod Matania, ma achiel kuom nyikwa Asaf.
Nowacho niya, "Un jo-Juda duto gi joma odak Jerusalem, kod ruothJehoshafat, winjuru gima Ruoth Nyasaye owachonu.  Owacho ni kik uluoroganda maduong’ni, kendo chunyu kik parre, nimar lweny ok en maru to enmar Nyasaye.
Kiny uwuognigi awuoga.  Gibiro biro ka giluwo yor Ziz,kendo unuyudgi e giko pony, yo wuok chieng’ mar thim Jeruel.
To un,jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem, ok onego uked e lwenjni.  Kuseriedo ni lweny, touchung’ achung’a, mondo une kaka Ruoth Nyasaye biro lochonu.  Kik uluor,kendo chunyu kik parre.  Kiny uwuognigi awuoga, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye birokonyou. "
Eka Jehoshafat nogoyo chonge piny, mokulo wiye nyaka e lowo, mijo-Juda gi joma odak Jerusalem bende nogoyo chongi piny e nyim RuothNyasaye ka gilame.
Koro jo-Lawi ma jo-Kohath gi jo-Kora nochako wer niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel gi dwol maduong’ ahinya.
Jo-Juda ne ochiew gokinyi mang’ich mondo odhi e thim Tekoa, to kanegidhi, Jehoshafat nochung’ mowachonigi niya, "Winjuru un jo-Juda gi jomaodak Jerusalem! Genuru kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mi unukwo, kendogenuru kuom jonabi mage, mi unulo. "
Kane oseporo wach gi joge, noyierojoma onego tel nyim jolweny korwako lep lemo, mondo opak Ruoth Nyasaye,ka wer kama:"Gouru erokamano ni Ruoth Nyasaye,nimar herane mosiko ochwere. "
Kane gichako wer kendo peko, Ruoth Nyasaye norundo jo-Amon gi jo-Moabkod jo-got Seir, mane obiro monjo jo-Juda, mi nologi.
Noyudo kajo-Amon kod jo-Moab onywako ni jo-got Seir, motieko chuth, kendo kanegisetiekogi kamano, ne gichako negore kendgi giwegi.
Kane jo-Juda ochopo kama oting’ore manie thim, mondo gine wasikgimang’enygo, ne gineno mana ringre joma otho ka opie piny, maonge ng’amaotony.
Kane Jehoshafat kod joge odhi mondo oyeki, ne giyudo dhokmathoth, gi mwandu gi lewni kod gik moko mabeyo mang’eny, mane ok ginyalting’o duto.  Ne gitieko ndalo adek ka pod giyeko, nimar gigo ne ng’enyahinya.
To chieng’ mar ang’wen ne gichokore e holo mi gipakoe RuothNyasaye.  Emomiyo kanyo ne ochak ni, holo mar Pak, nying ma pod iluongegonyaka chil kawuono.
Eka jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem ne jodok Jerusalem, kaJehoshafat otelonigi, ka gimor nikech Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo giloyowasikgi.
Ne gidhi Jerusalem, e Od Ruoth Nyasaye ka gigoyo tung’ githumbe mopogore opogore.
Kane ruodhi mag pinje mamoko duto owinjo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osekedo giwasik Israel, luoro moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nomakogi.
Kamano pinyJehoshafat nobet gi kue, nimar Nyasache nokelo kue e kindgi gi pinjeduto mokiewo kode. Loch Jehoshafat, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Mano e kaka Jehoshafat norito Juda.  Ne en jahigni piero adek gabichkane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gabich, kodakJerusalem, Min mare ne nyinge Azuba nyar Shilhi.
Jehoshafat noluwotimbe Asa wuon mare adimba.  Timbene ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Tokata kamano, hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore ne ok okethi, kendo ji nepok oketo chunygi kuom Nyasach kweregi.
Chakruok weche Jehoshafat nyaka gikogi yudore e kitap Jehu wuodHanani, ma koro ondik e Kitap Ruodhi mag Israel.
Bende Jehoshafat ruodh Juda notimo winjruok gi Ahazia ruodh Israelmane timbene richo.
Noriwore kode e tich hondho yiedhi madhi Tarshish,kendo ne gilosogi Ezion-geber.
Eka Eliezer wuod Dadavahu ma ja-Mareshanokoro wach marach kuom Jehoshafat niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye biro ketho gimauseloso, nikech isetimo winjruok gi Ahazia. " Kamano yiedhi nobarore, maok nyal dhi Tarshish.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Jehoram, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Jehoshafat notho moyike but kwerene e dala Daudi, mi Jehoram wuodenodoko ruoth kare.
Ne en kod owetene ma nyingegi Azaria, Jahiel,Zekaria, Azaria, Mikael, kod Shefatia.  Giduto ne gin yawuot Jehoshafatruodh Juda.
Wuon-gi nopogonigi mwandu mang’eny mag fedha gi dhahabu kodgik moko ma tekregi ng’eny kaachiel gi miech Juda mochiel gohinga.  Toloch nomiyo Jehoram nimar ne en wuode makayo.
Kane Jehoram osebet e komduong’ mar wuon mare kendo oguroree, nonego owetene duto kod jodongomoko bende mag Israel.
Jehoram ne jahigni piero adek gariyoo kane odoko ruoth, kendo noritopiny kuom higni aboro, kodak Jerusalem.
Noluwo timbe ruodhi Israel kakajodhood Ahab notimo, nimar nokendo jodhood Ahab.  Timbene ne richo e nyimRuoth Nyasaye.
To kata kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok otieko dhood Daudi,nikech nosesingorene kaachiel gi nyikwaye ni anywolane nobed e komduong’ ka taya malielne nyaka chieng’.
E ndalo loch Jehoram, jo-Edom nodagi bet e bwo loch Juda, mi ne giketoruodhgi giwegi.
Omiyo Jehoram nodhi kuno kaachiel gi jodonge mag lwenygi gechene duto, to jo-Edom nolworogi, mi Jehoram gi jotend gechenenochiew gotieno momwomo.
Mano e kaka jo-Edom notieko loch Juda e Edomnyaka chil kawuono.  E ndalogo Libna bende nodagi bedo e bwo lochJehoram, nimar noseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwerene.
Bende noloso hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore e piny gode mag Juda,momiyo jo-Jerusalem oweyo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo omiyo jo-Juda oruenyo.
Eka barua noa kuom Elija janabi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Daudikwaru owacho kama,
‘Nakel masira maduong’ kuom jogi gi nyithindgi gimondi kod gigi duto,
kendo in iwuon nibed gi tuo marach ma nochamdhokchindi kuom ndalo mang’eny nyaka giniwuog oko nikech ne ok iluwotimbe Jehoshafat wuoru kata timbe Asa ruodh Juda,
to niluwo mana timberuodhi mag Israel.  Bende nimiyo jo-Juda gi jo-Israel oweyo Ruoth Nyasayekaka dhood Ahab nomiyo jo-Israel oweye, kendo ninego oweteni ma yawuotwuoru mane joma kare moloyi. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Filistia kod jo-Arabu mokiewo gi jo-Kush obedowasik Jehoram,
mi ne gimonjo jo-Juda kendo ne gikawo gik moko dutomane giyudo e od ruoth kaachiel gi yawuote gi monde, mak mana Ahaziawuode machogo ema nodong’.
Bang’ mago duto Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo tuo mar dhokchin ma ok nyalchango omako Jehoram.
Tuo nomedore, mi bang’ higni ariyo dhokchindenowuok oko mi notho gi rem malit.  Joge ne ok olosone mach kaka nolosnikwerene.
Ne en jahigni piero adek gariyo kane odoko ruoth, kendonorito piny kuom higni aboro kodak Jerusalem.  Notho ma onge ng’amaoywage.  Ne giyike e dala Daudi, to ok e liete ruodhi.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Ahazia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Mony mabiro gi jo-Arabu e lwenjno nosenego yawuot Jehoram madongo duto. Kamano e kaka Ahazia wuod Jehoram machogo nodoko ruodh Juda.
Ahazia nejahigni piero ang’wen gariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higaachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Athalia nyakwar Omri.
Ahazia bende noluwo timbe dhood Ahab nimar min mare nopuonje timbemaricho.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mana kaka timbe jodhoodAhab, nikech bang’ tho wuon mare, jogo nodoko jong’adne rieko marach mane okethe.
Noyie puonjgi modhi Ramoth-gilead gi Joram wuod Ahab maruodh Israel mondo giked gi Hazael ruodh Aram.  To jo-Aram nohinyo Joram,
modok Jezreel ni mondo ochang kuom hinyruok ma noyudo Rama kokedo giHazael ruodh Aram. Jehu onego Ahazia(
Ruodhi
.
-
)Ahazia wuod Jehoram ma ruodh Juda nodhi Jezreel mondo one Joram wuodAhab nikech notuo.
To Nyasaye nosechano ni mondo Ahazia otho kodhi limoJoram, omiyo, kane Ahazia ni kuno, nowuok gi Joram mondo girom gi Jehuwuod Nimshi, mane Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero mondo otiek od Ahab.
Kane Jehunego jodhood Ahab, noromo gi jodong Juda kod Ahazia, monegogi.
Ekanochako dwaro Ahazia, monwang’e Samaria kuma noyudo opondoe.  Ne gikeleir Jehu mi ginege.  Ne giyike maber, nikech ne giwacho ni en nyakwarJehoshafat mane oluwo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto.  Ne onge ng’ato e odAhazia manyalo bedo ruoth. Athalia okawo loch gi thwon(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Kane Athalia min Ahazia oneno ni wuode osetho, nonego jood ruodh Judaduto.
To Jehosheba, nyar ruodh Jehoram nogolo Joash wuod Ahazialing’ling’ kuom yawuot ruoth mane idwaro nego, mi opande e od nindokaachiel gi japite.  Jehosheba nyar ruoth Jehoram ma chi Jehoyada jadolo,kendo ma nyamin Ahazia nopando Joash, mi Athalia ne ok onege.
Joashnodak kodgi kuom higni auchiel, kopondo e Od Nyasaye, e kinde mar lochAthalia.
Weche mag Ndalo
E higa mar abiriyo, Jehoyada notimo chir motimo winjruok gi jotendogend lweny, ma gin Azaria wuod Jehoram, gi Ishmael wuod Jehohanan, giAzaria wuod Obed, gi Maaseya wuod Adaya, kod Elishafat wuod Zikri.
Negiwuotho e piny Juda duto ka gichoko jo-Lawi mane nie miech Juda duto,kod jodong dhout israel, mi gibiro Jerusalem.
Eka joma nochokore dutonotimo singruok gi ruoth e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo Jehoyada nowachoniginiya, "Neuru wuod ruoth! Waketeuru ruoth kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho kuomnyikwa Daudi.
Gima onego utim e ma: Un jodolo gi jo-Lawi kod joritrangeye, pogreuru migepe adek.  Migawo mokwongo mondo obi e Hekaluchieng’ Sabato.  Migawo mar ariyo nyaka rit od ruoth,
kendo migawo maradek nyaka rit rangach miluongo ni Ranga Mise, to ji mamoko duto nobed elaru mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Jodolo gi jo-Lawi makonyogi kende ema nyalodonjo e Hekalu, nimar gin joma owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to ji mamoko dutokik donji kata achiel, kaluwore gi chik Ruoth Nyasaye.
Jo-Lawi nyakalwor ruoth ka girite, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato omako gilwenje e lwete.  Kang’ato moro amora dwaro donjo e Hekalu, to negeuru.  Bende kamoro amorama ruoth dhiye, to koweuru kurite. "
Jo-Lawi gi jo-Juda duto notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Jehoyada jadolonochikogi.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomgi nokelo joge mane onego a e tichchieng Sabato, kaachiel gi mago mane onego ochak tich chieng’no, nimarJehoyada jadolo ne ok omiyo migawo moro amora thuolo mara.
Nopogo nijotend askechego tonge gi kuodi kod okumbni mane mag ruoth Daudi maneokan e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nochano ji duto mondo orit ruoth, ka ng’atoka ng’ato omako gilweny e lwete, chakre yo milambo nyaka nyandwat marHekalu, ka giluwo kendo-mar-misango kaachiel gi Hekalu.
Eka Jehoyadanogolo ruoth oko, mosidhone osimb duong’, kendo omiye kitap chik, migikete ruoth.  Jehoyada gi yawuote nowire gi mo ka gikok niya, "Ruothmondo odag aming’a!"
Kane Athalia owinjo mahu mar joma ringo kendo pako ruoth, nodhi e OdRuoth Nyasaye kama ne gintie.
Noneno ruoth kochung’ e bath sich ruothe dhoot, ka tung’ ywak kendo ji wer.  Ji duto ne mor kendo ne goyo tung’,ka jower otelonigi gi thum.  Athalia noyiecho lepe ka kok niya, "Ujemo!Ujemo!"
Eka Jehoyada jadolo noluongo jatend askeche, mowachonigi niya,"Goleuru oko! Kik unege e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ka ng’at moro oluwe,to neguru ng’atno. "
Omiyo ne gimake, kendo kane gichopo e dhorangadala ruoth miluongo ni Ranga Farese, ne ginege kanyo.
Eka Jehoyada, kaachiel gi ji kod ruoth bende, ne josingore ni ginibedjo-Ruoth Nyasaye.
Mi ji duto nodhi momuko od Baal, gi kende-mag-liswa,kod kido duto mag Baal e nyim kende-mag-liswago.
Jehoyada noketo jorite Od Ruoth Nyasaye e bwo jodolo gi jo-Lawi.  Daudi nosechano jodolo gijo-Lawi mondo orit Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo omiye misengni miwang’o pep,kaka ondiki e chik Musa, ka giwero wende mor kaluwore gi chik mane enowuon ogolo.
Jehoyada noketo jorit e dhorangeye mag Od Ruoth Nyasayeni kik ng’ato man gi chola donjie.
Eka nodhi gi jotend askeche gijodongo kod jotend ji kaachiel gi ji duto, kendo ne giwuok gi ruoth e OdRuoth Nyasaye.  Ne gikowe nyaka od ruoth, ka giluwo dhorangach mamalo, mine gikete e kom duong’ne.
Kane Athalia oseneg, ji duto nobedo mamor,kendo Jerusalem nokue.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Joash, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Joash ne jahigni abiriyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni pieroang’wen, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Zibia nyar Beer-sheba.
Timbe Joash ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo duto mag Jehoyadajadolo.
Jehoyada noyudone mon ariyo, mane onywologo yawuowi gi nyiri.
Bang’ mano Joash noketo chunye mondo olos Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nochokojodolo gi jo-Lawi, mowachonigi niya, "Wuothuru e miech Juda, usol pesakuom jo-Israel duto mondo ulosgo od Nyasachu higa ka higa.  Neuru niutimo piyo. " To jo-Lawi ne ok otimo kamano.
Omiyo Ruoth noluongoJehoyada jadolo maduong’, mopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyo ok ijiw jo-Lawimondo osol osuru kuom jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem? En osuru mane Musa jatichRuoth Nyasaye oketo kuom jo-Israel mondo olosgo Hemb-Romo.
Neye kakaAthalia, dhako machachno, gi yawuote, oseketho Od Nyasaye, kendogisekawo gik moko duto mitiyogo tich Nyasaye, mi giketo ni Baal. "
Bang’e ruoth nogolo chik mondo olos sanduk, oket e dhood Hekalu marRuoth Nyasaye gi yo ka oko,
kendo ogo milome e Juda gi Jerusalem dutomondo ji ochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye osuru mane Musa jatich Nyasaye oketokuom jo-Israel e thim.
Mano omiyoo jodongo gi ji duto nokelo osuru gimor, ma giketo e sandugno nyaka ne gitieko.
E kinde ka kinde manejo-Lawi onenoe ka pesa ng’eny e sanduk, ne gitere ni jodong ruoth.  Ekajogoro mar ruoth gi jatich jadolo maduong’ ne jobiro mondo okaw sanduk. Kane gisegolo pesa, ne gidwoko sanduk kare.  Kamano e kaka ne gitimo pilepile, mi ne gichoko pesa mogundho.
Ruoth kod Jehoyada nomiyo nyipechemane rito tich loso Od Ruoth Nyasaye pesago.  Jogo nondiko jogedo gi jopabao kod joma olony e tich chuma, gi mula mondo olos Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kamano jotich ne tiyo, kendo tich nodhi nyime malong’o e lwetgi, mi negiloso Od Nyasaye maber kendo motegno, moloyo kaka ne en chon.
Kanegisetieko tich, ne gikelo pesa modong’ ni ruoth gi Jehoyada, mi negilosogo tewni mag ubani gi agulini mag dhahabu gi mag fedha mondookonyruokgo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye kuom misengni miwang’o pep, kod tije mokomag Hekalu. Ne gitimo misengni miwang’o pep e Od Ruoth Nyasaye pile pile ndalo dutomag Jehoyada.
Jehoyada koro noti, kendo hike oniang’, mi notho kane en jahigni miaachiel gi piero adek.
Ne oyike e dala Daudi but liete ruodhi, nikechnosetimo maber e Israel kotiyo ni Nyasaye, kendo koloso Hekalu.
Kane Jehoyada osetho, jodong Juda nolondho ruoth, mi noyie luworiekogi.
Koro ji noweyo Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gitiyo ni sirni milamo ginyiseche mamoko.  Kethono nomiyo Nyasaye okecho kod jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem.
Kata kamano nooronigi jonabi mondo odwokgi ire.  Jonabigonosiemogi, to ne gidagi winjo.
Roho mar Nyasaye nobiro kuom Zekaria wuod Jehoyada jadolo, minochung’ kama oting’ore, mowacho ni ji niya, "Nyasaye owacho kama,‘Ang’o momiyo uketho chikna, momiyo ok unyal yudo hawi? Un useweya,omiyo an bende aseweyou. ’ "
To ne giriwore ni Zekaria mi ne gigoye gikite e laru mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye kaka ruoth nochikogi, mi otho.
Kamanowi ruoth Joash nowil gi ng’wonoo mane Jehoyada otimone, konegoo Zekariawuod Jehoyada ma notho kaywak niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo one, kendoochul kuor. "
Bang’ higa achiel jolweny ma jo-Aram nobiro monjo Joash.  Ne gibiroJuda gi Jerusalem, mi ne ginego jodongo duto mag pinyno, to mwandu dutomane gikawo kuomgi ne gioro ni ruodh Damaski.
Kata nobedo ni jo-Aramnobiro gi jolweny manok, Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwo oganda maduong’ magjolweny e lwetgi, nimar jo-Juda noseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkweregi.  Kamano jo-Aram notimo gima buch Ruoth Nyasaye noseng’ado kuomJoash.
Kane jo-Aram osea, ne giweyo Joash kohinyore malit.  Eka jodongenoriwone nikech remb wuod Jehoyada jadolo, mi ne ginege e kitandane. Kamano e kaka notho, mi ne giyike e dala Daudi, to ok kar yiko ruodhi.
Joma noriwone ne gin Zabad wuod Shimeath nyar Amon, kod Jehozabad wuodShimrith nyar Moab.
Weche mang’eny mane jonabi okoro kuome kagisiemego, kendo kaka noloso Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kaachiel gi timbeyawuote, ondiki e kitabu monyisie weche mag Kitap Ruodhi.  Amazia wuodenodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Amazia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Amazia ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, kendo noritopiny kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko, kodak Jerusalem.
Timbe Amazia nelong’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, to ne ok otimgi gi chunye duto.
Kaneosegurore e tich ruoth, nonego joma nonego wuon mare mane ruoth.
Ne okonego nyithindgi, to noluwo chik mondiki e kitap Musa, kama RuothNyasaye owachoe niya, "Kik uneg wuone nikech richo mag nyithindgi, bendekik uneg nyithindo nikech richo mag wuonegi, to ng’ato ka ng’ato nonegmana nikech richone owuon. "
Eka Amazia nochoko jo-Juda gi jo-Benjamin duto moketonigi jotelomadongo gi matindo kaluwore gi dhoutgi.  Nokwano joma osetieko hignipiero ariyo kod mosekadho kanyo, monwang’o ni gin joma ochwiny alufu miaadek moromo kedo, kendo mong’eyo diro tong’ kod ting’o okumba.
Bendenondiko jo-Israel mathwondi alufu mia achiel kuom kilo alufu adek magfedha.
To ng’at Nyasaye moro nobiro ire mowachone niya, "A Ruoth, kikiwe jolweny mag jo-Israel dhi kodi nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ok ni kodjo-Israel ma jo-Efraimgi.
To kiparo ni mano e kaka inyalo loyo lweny,to Nyasaye biro mana miyo wasiki loyi, nimar en ema en gi teko mar konyokata mar wito. "
Amazia nopenjo ng’at Nyasaye niya, "To wabiro timoang’o kuom kilo alufu adek ma asemiyo jolweny ma jo-Israel?" Ng’atNyasaye nodwoke niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye nigi teko mar miyi moloyo mago. "
Eka Amazia noriembo jolweny mane oa Efraim, mi ne gidok miechgi kagikecho ahinya gi jo-Juda.
To Amazia notimo chir, mowuok gi jo-Juda kagidhi holo Kado, mi ne ginego jo-Seir alufu apar kuno.
Bende ne gimakoji alufu apar kangima, mi ne gitero ewi lwanda moro, kendo ne gidhirogipiny, mi githo ka gitur bonje bonje.
To jolweny mane Amazia oriembo niok ginyal dhi kode e lweny nomwomore kuom miech Juda chakre Samarianyaka Beth-horon, mi ne ginego ji alufu adek, kendo gipeyo gik mang’eny.
Kane Amazia oa nego jo-Edom, nobiro gi nyiseche jo-Seir, moketogi kanyisechene, kolamogi kendo owang’onigi ubani.
Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasayenokecho gi Amazia, moorone janabi moro, mopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyoigeno kuom nyiseche mag jopiny moro mane ok nyal reso joma lamogi elweti?"
Kane pod janabino wuoyo, ruoth nopenje niya, "Waseketi jabuchruoth koso? Ling’! Koso idwaro tho?" Mi janabi noling’ matin, to bang’enowacho niya, "Koro ang’eyo ni Nyasaye osechano mondo otieki, nikechisedagi winjo puonjna. "
Bang’e Amazia ruodh Juda noporo wach gi joge mane ng’adone rieko, miooro joote ir Jehoash wuod Jehohoahaz ma wuod Jehu, ruodh Israel,kowachone niya, "Bi mondo waradi. "
To Jehoash ruodh Israel nodwokoAmazia ruodh Juda gi ngero niya, "Okuro moro man Lebanon nooro wach niyath maduong’ man Lebanon, kowachone niya, ‘Yie mondo wuoda okendnyari. ’ To nopo ka le moro kadho kanyo, monyono okurono, moketho.
InAmazia, iwuorori ni iseloyo jo-Edom, mi koro iwuoyo gi sunga.  To bermondo ibed mana e dala.  Ang’o momiyo iero miero ma biro tieki kaachielgi jo-Juda?"
To Amazia ne ok odewo, nimar ne en dwaro Nyasaye mondo ochiw jo-Juda elwet wasikgi, nikech ne gigeno kuom nyiseche jo-Edom.
Omiyo Jehoashruodh Israel nodhi Beth-shemesh dala mar Juda.  Nokedo gi Amazia ruodhJuda kuno,
kendo jo-Israel noloyo jo-Juda, moringo nyaka miechgi.
Jehoash ruodh Israel nomako Amazia wuod Joash ma wuod Ahazia, ruodhJuda, e Beth-Shemesh, modwoko Jerusalem.  Nomuko bath ohinga marJerusalem ma borne mita mia ariyo, chakre dhoranga Efraim nyakadhorangach kama ohinga ogomogo.
Nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kod gik mokoduto mane onwang’o e Od Ruoth Nyasaye mane Obed-edom rito.  Nokawo bendemwandu mag od ruoth, kaachiel gi ji moko, motueyo ka gir singo.  Ekanodok Samaria.
Amazia wuod Joash ruodh Juda nodak higni apar gabich bang’ tho Jehoashwuod Jehoahaz, ruodh Israel.
Chakruok timbe Amazia nyaka gikogi,ondiki e Kitap Ruodhi mag Juda gi Israel.
Chakre ndalo mane Amaziaoweyoe Ruoth Nyasaye, jo-Jerusalem moko nojame, mi noringoo nyakaLakish.  To ne gilawe, mi ginege kuno.
Ne giting’o ringre gi farese, kagidwoko e dala Daudi, mi noyike but kwerene.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Uzia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Jo-Juda duto noketo Uzia ruoth kar Amazia wuon mare, ka en jahigni apargauchiel.
Kane wuon mare osetho, nokawo dala mar Elath modwoko nijo-Juda, eka nochiele gi ohinga.
Uzia ne jahigni apar gauchiel kaneodoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni piero abich gariyo, kodak Jerusalem. Min mare ne nyinge Jekolia nyar Jerusalem.
Timbe Uzia ne long’o e nyimRuoth Nyasaye mana kaka timbe Amazia wuon mare.
Noketo chunye kuom luwoNyasaye e ndalo Zekaria, jal mane opuonje luoro Nyasaye, kendo ndaloduto mane oluwoe Ruoth Nyasaye, noyudo gueth.
Uzia nodhi kedo gi jo-Filistia, momuko ohinga mar Gath gi mar Jabne kodmar Ashdod.  Nogero mier e gweng’ Ashdod kod kuonde moko e piny Filistia.
Nyasaye nokonye loyo jo-Filistia, gi jo-Arabu mane odak Gur-baal, kodjo-Meun.
Uzia noketo ni jo-Amon osuru, kendo humbe nolak nyaka mbapMisri, nimar nosedoko ruoth maduong’ ahinya.
Nogero kuonde maboyo magng’icho e Jerusalem e dhorangach kama ohinga ogomogo, gi e dhorangaHoho, kod e giko ohinga, moketoe gilweny.
E thim bende nogeroe kuondemaboyo mag siro lweny, kendo nokunyo yewni mang’eny, nimar ne en gijamni mathoth e piny gode kendo e piny pap, bende ne en gi jopur gijopith mzabibu mane tiyone e gode kod kuonde momew, nikech nohero pur.
Uzia ne nigi joma oikore ni lweny, mopog e migepe kaka Jeyel jagoro giMaaseya jatelo nosechano.  Achiel kuom jotend lweny mag ruoth ma nyingeHanania ema noritogi.
Kar romb jodong dhoudi mane thuondi mager wuokiene alufu ariyo gii mia auchiel.
Ne gin jotend jolweny marateke alufumia adek gabiriyo gi mia abich (
,
) ma dikony ruoth kedo gi wasike.
Uzia noiko ni jolweny kuodi gi tong’ gi ogute kod akor mag chuma, giatunge gi kite midiro gorujre.
Noloso masinde midirogo aserni gi kitemadongo mane joma riek ofwenyo, moketo kuonde maboyo mag ng’icho, kodkuonde ma ohinga ogomogo e Jerusalem.  Humbe nolak malach ahinya, kendonodoko motegno nikech Ruoth Nyasaye nokonye miwuoro.
Kane Uzia osedoko motegno kamano, nobedo jasunga mi okethore.  NochayoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, modonjo ei Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye mondoowang’ ubani e kendo-mar-ubani.
To Azaria jadolo, kaachiel gi jodolomamoko mag Ruoth Nyasaye piero aboro ma jochir noluwe mondo okwere,
kagiwachone niya, "Wang’o ubani ni Ruoth Nyasaye ok en tiji, Uzia, to entich jodolo ma nyikwa Harun, mowal ni tijno.  Aye Kama Ler! Iketho! RuothNyasaye nyalo kumi nikech wachni. "
To Uzia nokecho.  Noyudo ka en gitap mach e lwete, mondo owang’ie ubani.  To kane mirima omake gi jodolokamano, dhoho notuch e lela wang’e e nyim jodolo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye butkendo-mar-ubani.
Kane Azaria jadolo maduong’ gi jodolo duto orange, negineno dhoho e lela wang’e, mi gigole oko mapiyo.  To en bende noretomondo owuogi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nosechwade.
Ruoth Uzia nobedojadhoho nyaka chieng’ thone, emomiyo nodak e ot kar kende, kendo ne okoyiene donjo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jotham wuode nobedo jatend od ruoth,kendo norito piny.
Chakruok weche Uzia nyaka gikogi, Isaya janabi wuod Amoz ema nondiko.
Uzia notho, moyike but kwerene e paw liete ruodhi, to ok e lietegihie, nimar ne en jadhoho.  Jotham wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Jotham, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Jotham ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuomhigni apar gauchiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Jerusha nyarZadok.
Timbe Jotham ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kaka timbe Uziawuon mare, kendo en ne ok odonjo e Hekalu kaka wuon mare nodonjo.  Totimbe ji ne pod richo.
Jotham nogero dhorangach mamalo mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo notiyoahinya kuom gero ohinga mar Ofel.
Bende nogero mier e piny gode magJuda gi kuonde maboyo mag ng’icho kod mag siro lweny e gode motimobunge.
Nokedo gi ruodh jo-Amon, mi oloyo.  E higano jo-Amon nomiye kiloalufu ang’wen mag fedha, gi gunde alufu apar mag ngano, kod gunde alufuapar mag shairi.  Ne gimedo miye kamano e higa mar ariyo kod mar adek.
Kamano Jotham nobedo gi teko, nikech timbene ne long’o e nyim RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache.
Koro weche moko mag Jotham, gi lwenjene, kod timbene duto, ondiki ekitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel gi Juda.
Ne en jahignipiero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni apargauchiel, kodak Jerusalem.
Notho moluwo kwerene, mi noyike e dalaDaudi.  Ahaz wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Ahaz, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Ahaz ne jahigni piero ariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higniapar gauchiel, kodak Jerusalem.  To timbene ne ok long’o e nyim RuothNyasaye kaka timbe Daudi kwar mare ne long’o.
Noluwo timbe maricho magruodhi mag Israel, mothedho koda ka kido mag Baal.
Nowang’o ubani eholo mar Ben-hirom, kendo nowang’o yawuote ka misango, koluwo timbemakuero mag ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo mondo owe thuolo nijo-Israel.
Bende notimo misengni, kendo nowang’o ubani e hembko, gi ewigode, kod e tiend yath moro amora motimo otiep.
Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache ne ochiwe e lwet ruodh Aram, mioloye, kendo omako joge mang’eny, motero Damaski.  Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayenochiwe e lwet ruodh Israel ma bende noloye, monego joge oyokre.
Odiechieng’no, Peka wuod Ramalia nonego jo-Juda ma thuondi mia achielgi piero ariyo.  Ne ologi nikech ne giseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkweregi.
Zikri thwon Efraim nonego Maaseya wuod ruoth, gi Azkiramjaduong’ od ruoth, kod Elkana jalup ruoth.
Jo-Israel nomako owetegi alufu mia ariyo, (
,
) kaachiel gi mondgigii nyithindgi machwo kod manyiri.  Bende ne giyako mwandugi mang’eny magitero Samaria.
To noyudo ka janabi mar Ruoth Nyasaye ni kuno ma nyingeOded.  Nodhi romo ni jolweny mane dok Samaria, mowachonigi niya, "RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nochiwo jo-Juda e lwetu nimar nokecho kodgi,to un koro usenegogi achadha marach, mi wachno osetundo e polo.
To ekapod udwaro ni mondo jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem machwo gi mamon obedwasumbni mau! Un uwegi donge un gi ketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu?
Koro winjuru! Weuru oweteu mane umako odhi, nimar RuothNyasaye chiegni kecho kodu. "
Azaria wuod Johanan gi Berekia wuodMeshilemoth gi Jehizkia wuod Shalum kod Amasa wuod Hadlai ma jodongEfraim bende nodhi romo ni joma ne a e lweny,
mokwerogi, kawachoniginiya, "Ok unyal kelo joma omaki kaeni, nimar kutimo kamano, to ubiromiyo waketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kwamedo richo ewi mago mane wasetimo. Kethowa osebedo mang’eny ahinya, omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye okecho malich gijo-Israel. "
Kane jolweny owinjo wechego, ne gigonyo joma omaki, kendone gidwoko gik mane oyaki, ka jodongo gi joma nochokore neno.
Mi jomanyinggi oseluongigo nokonyo joma omaki, kamiyo joma ne ni duge nengnimogol kuom gik moyaki.  Ne gichiwonigi lewni kod wuoche, kendo negimiyogi chiemo, bende ne giwirogi gi mo.  Ne giting’o jogo duto moyomnogi kenje, ka giterogi kuom jowetegi Jeriko, dala mar othidhe.  Bang’e negidok Samaria.
E kindeno ruoth Ahaz nokwayo ruodh Asuria mondo okonye,
nikechjo-Edom noseduogo momonjo jo-Juda, mi oloyo, kendo omako ji mang’eny.
Jo-Filistia bende nosemonjo miech Juda manie piny pap kod manie thim. Ne gikawo Beth-shemesh gi Aijalon gi Gederoth kod Soko gi Timna gi Gimzokod mier mokiewo kodgi, mi gidakie.
Ruoth Nyasaye nothiro jo-Judanikech Ahaz ruodhgi notimo timbe machach e Juda, koweyo Ruoth Nyasaye.
Tiglath-pileser ruodh Asuria nobiro ir Ahaz, to kar konye, to nomonje.
Emomiyo Ahaz nokawo gik moko e Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi od ruoth kod utjodongo, momiyo ruodh Asuria kaka osuru, to mano ne ok okonye.
To Ahaz achielni nomedo ketho ni Ruoth Nyasaye e ndalo marchandruokne,
nikech notimo liswa ni nyiseche mag jo-Damaski mane oyudooseloye.  Nowacho niya, "Abiro golo liswa ni nyiseche mag ruodhi Aram,mondo okonya kaka ne gikonyo ruodh Aram. " To ne gimiyo othirno kaachielgi jo-Juda duto.
Bende Ahaz nochoko gik lemo mag Od Nyasaye, mong’adoong’ado.  Noloro dhout Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo nogerokende-mag-liswa kuonde duto e Jerusalem.
Noloso hembko e mier duto magJuda mondo owang’ie ubani ni nyiseche manono, kokwinyogo Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach kwerene.
Chakruok weche Ahaz nyaka gikogi, kaachiel gi timbene duto, ondiki eKitap Ruodhi mag Juda gi Israel.
Ahaz notho, moluwo kwerene, mi noyike Jerusalem, to ok e liete ruodhiIsrael.  Hezekia wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Hezekia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Hezekia ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni piero ariyo gochiko, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyingeAbija nyar Zekaria.
Timbe Hezekia ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kakatimbe Daudi kwar mare. Hezekia ochako oloso wach lemo e Hekalu
E due mokwongo mar higa mane ochakoe lochne, noyawo dhout Hekalu marRuothh Nyasaye, moloso.
Noluongo jodolo gi jo-Lawi, mochoko e laru mayo wuokchieng’,
mi nowachonigi niya, "Winjuru un jo-Lawi! Pwodhreuru,kendo upwodh Od Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu, kugolo chilo man KamaLer.
Kwerewa noweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kane gitimo timbemaricho e nyime.  Ne giweye, mi gilokone ng’egi, kendo kata mana kardakne, ne ok gidwar neno.
Bende ne ginego teyni, mi giloro dhout agola,kendo ne giweyo wang’o ubani kata timo misengni miwang’o pep ni NyasachIsrael e Hekalu.
Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho, moloko jo-Juda giJerusalem gima lich miwuoro, mabwogo ji, kendo michicho, kaka unenouwegi.
Mano emomiyo wuonewa notho e lweny, kendo yawuotwa gi nyiwa kodmondwa oseter kuma bor e tuech.
Koro adwaro singora ni Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach Israel ni wanamak chikne, mondo chunye olend kuom mirimamager ma en go kodwa.
Un nyithinda, kik koro umalru, nimar RuothNyasaye oseyierou mondo uti e nyime ka jodolone, kutimone misengni. "
Eka Mahath wuod Amasai gi Joel wuod Azaria ma joka Kohath, kod Kishwuod Abdi gi Azaria wuod Jahalel ma joka Merari, kod Joa wuod Zima giEden wuod Joa ma joka Gershon,
kod Shimri gi Jeuel ma joka Elizafan,kod Zekaria gi Matania ma joka Asaf,
kod Jehuel gi Shimei ma jokaHeman, kod Shemaya gi Uziel ma joka Jeduthun, ma duto jo-Lawi,
nochokojowetegi kaachiel.  Ne gipwodhore giduto, eka ne gidonjo e Od RuothNyasaye, mi gilose kaka ruoth nochikogi e nying Ruoth Nyasaye.
Jodolonodonjo e ot maiye mar Hekalu mondo gilosi.  Ne gigolo chilo duto manegiyudo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giketo e laru mar Hekalu, eka jo-Lawinokawo chilono, motero e aora Kidron.
Ne gichako tich loso hekaluchieng’ mokwongo mar due mokwongo, mi ne gichopo e agoch Hekalu chieng’mar aboro mar dueno.  Eka ne giloso Od Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo aboromoko, mi ne gitieko tich chieng’ mar apar gauchiel mar due mokwongono.
Bang’e ne gidhi ir ruoth Hezekia e ode, mi giwachone niya, "WaselosoOd Ruoth Nyasaye duto, kaachiel gi kendo-mar-misango, kod mesa marmakati miketo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye pile, kaachiel gi gik lemo duto.
Bende gik moko duto mane ruoth Ahaz owito e ndalo lochne kane oweyoRuoth Nyasaye, waseiko mwapwodho, kendo koro waseketogi e nyimkendo-mar-misango mar Ryuoth Nyasaye. "
Kinyne Hezekia nochiew gokinyi mang’ich, moluongo jodong Jerusalemkanyakla, mi gidhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ne gikelo ruedhi abiriyo girombe abiriyo gi nyirombe abiriyo kod nyuogi abiriyo, mondo gitimgomisango mar go richo mag dhood joka ruoth gi mag jodolo kod mag jo-Judaduto.  Nochiko jodolo ma nyikwa Harun mondo otim kodgi misango ekendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Omiyo noyang’ ruedhi gi imbe kodnyirombe, kendo rembgi nomi jodolo, moolo e kendo-mar-misango.
Ekanokel nyuogi mag misango mar golo richo e nyim Ruoth gi joma ochokore,mi ne giketo lwetgi kuomgi.
Bang’e jodolo noyang’ogi mi gitimo misangomar golo richo kod rembgi e kendo-mar-misango mondo ochulgo richo magjo-Israel duto.  Ne gitimo kamano nikech ruoth nochiko mondo otim misangomiwang’o pep, kod misango mar golo richo, mondo opwodhgo richo magjo-Israel duto.
Hezekia noketo jo-Lawi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, momiyogi thumbe mopogoreopogore, kaluwore gi chik Daudi, gi mar Gad janen mar ruoth, kod marNathan janabi.  Chik mane jonabi ogolono noa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kanejo-Lawi oseikore gi thumbe mane Daudi oloso, kendo jodolo bende oikoregi tungegi,
Hezekia nogolo chik mondo otim misango miwang’o pep ekendo-mar-misango.  Kane jodolo ochako timo misango miwang’o pepno,jo-Lawi bende nochako wer, kendo ne gigoyo tung’ kaachiel gi thumbe maneDaudi ruodh Israel oloso.
Joma nochokore duto nolamo Nyasaye, ka jowerwer, kendo jogo tung’ goyo tungegi.  Mano nodhi nyime nyaka misangomiwang’o pep norumo.
Eka ruoth kod ji duto mane ni kode nokulore,kalamo Ruoth Nyasaye.
Bang’e ruoth Hezekia kod jodonge nochiko jo-Lawimondo opak Ruoth Nyasaye gi wende mane Daudi kod Asaf janen ochwogo.  Negiwer gi mor, kendo ne gikulore ka gilamo Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eka Hezekia nowacho niya, "Kaka usechiworu ni Ruoth Nyasaye, korokeluru misengni mag erokamano e Od Ruoth Nyasaye. " Mi joma nochokorenokelo misengni mag erokamano.
Gik mane okel mondo otimgo misangomiwang’o pep, ne gin ruedhi piero abiriyo, gi imbe mia achiel, kodnyirombe mia ariyo.  Mago duto nochiw mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pepni Ruoth Nyasaye.
To mago mane okel ni mondo otimgo misengni magerokamano ne ruedhi mia auchiel gi rombe alufu adek.
Jodolo ne nokahinya, mane ok nyal yang’o jamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep,emomiyo jowetegi ma jo-Lawi nokonyogi tich nyaka jodolo moko notiekopwodhore.  Jo-Lawi ne jokinda kuom tich pwodhruokgi moloyo jodolo.
Ewitich timo misengnigo ne nitie bende tich dolo mar wang’o bor magmisengni mag erokamano, kaachiel gi misengni miolo piny kuom misengnimiwang’o pep.  Kamano e kaka tich Od Ruoth Nyasaye nodwok kare,
Hezekiagi joge duto ne mor nikech gima Nyasaye nosetimonigi, nimar ginonitimore apoya.
Weche mag Ndalo
Ji ochako timo Sap Pasaka kendo
Hezekia nooro joote ir jo-Israel gi jo-Juda duto, kendo nondiko barupebende ni jo-Efraim gi jo-Manase koluongogi ni mondo gibi Jerusalem e OdRuoth Nyasaye mondo gitim Sap Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel.
Ruoth noseporo wach gi jodonge kod jobura duto man Jerusalem ni mondogitim Pasaka e due mar ariyo.
Ne ok ginyal time e ndalo monego timee,nimar jodolo ne pok opwodhore mang’eny moromo, to ji bende ne pokochokore Jerusalem.
Wachni ne ber ni ruoth kod jobura duto.
Kamano neging’ado bura mondo ogo milome e Israel duto, chakre Beer-sheba, yomilambo nyaka Dan, yo nyandwat, mondo ji obi Jerusalem otim Pasaka niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, nikech ji ne pok otime mang’eny kakachik dwaro.
Omiyo joote nodhi e piny Israel gi Juda duto, kaka ruoth nochiko, kagitero barupe moa kuom ruoth gi jodonge, mondikie niya, "Un jo-Israelmosetony e lwet ruodhi mag Asuria, koro duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Israel, mondo en bende oduog iru.
Kikuchal gi kwereu kod oweteu mane oweyo ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi,momiyo noweyogi ma gikethore chuth kaka uneno.
Koro kik utim wichtekokaka kwereu notimo, to chiwreuru ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo udonj e Hekalu,ma Ruoth Nyasaye oseguedho mondo obed mare nyakachieng’.  Tiuru ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, mondo chunye olend kuom mirima mager ma en go kodu.
Kuduogo kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, eka oweteu gi nyithindu noyud ng’wono kuomjoma nomakogi, mi giniduogi e pinyni, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachung’won, kendo jamiwafu, omiyo ka uduogo kuome, to ok noloknu ng’eye. "
Kamano joote nodhi e dala ka dala e piny Efraim gi Manase duto nyakaZebulun, to ji nonyierogi anyiera ka charogi.
Mak mana jomoko manok machunygi muol ema noa Asher gi Manase kod Zebulun, mobiro Jerusalem.
Topiny Juda ema ne Nyasaye otiyoe gi teko, momiyogi chuny achiel mar winjowachne kaka ruoth gi jodonge nochikogi.
Omiyo ji mang’eny nochokoreJerusalem e due mar ariyo, mondo gitim Sap Makati maduong’ miwuoro.
Negigolo kende-mag-liswa duto mane ni Jerusalem, kaachiel gi kendemiwang’oe ubani, mi giwito e holo Kidron.
Ne ginego nyarombo mar Pasaka chieng’ due apar gang’wen mar due marariyo.  Jodolo gi jo-Lawi noyudo wichkuot, omiyo ne gipwodhore mi gikelomisengni miwang’o pep e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ne gikawo keregi e tich,kaluwore gi chik Musa ng’at Nyasaye, kendo jodolo nokiro remo manejo-Lawi ogamonigi.
Ne nitie ji mang’eny e chokruok mane pok opwodhore,omiyo jo-Lawi nonego nyarombo mar Pasaka ni ng’ato ka ng’ato mane okler, mondo opwodhe ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
Adieri, ji mathoth, ma ng’enyginoa Efraim gi Manase gi Isakar kod Zebulun, ne pok opwodhore, to katakamano ne gichamo Pasaka, ka ok giluwo chik.  To Hezekia nokwayonigikawacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mang’won, ma Nyasach kwerewa, mondo ong’wonni ng’ato ka ng’ato
moketo chunye kuome, kata obedo ni ng’atno okopwodhore kaka chik Hekalu dwaro. "
Mi Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo kwayoHezekia moweyo ni ji kethogi.
Jo-Israel mane ni Jerusalem notimo Sap Makati ma ok ketie Thowi gi mormaduong’ kuom ndalo abiriyo, kendo jo-Lawi gi jodolo ne pako RuothNyasaye odiechieng’ kodiechieng’, ka giwerne gi tekogi duto.
Hezekianopako jo-Lawi duto, nimar ne gitiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkweregi.
Eka joma nochokorego duto noyie ni mondo gimed timo sawo kuom ndaloabiriyo moko, mi ne gitimo kamano gi mor.
Hezekia ruodh Juda nomiyogiruedhi alufu achiel gi rombe alufu abiriyo mondo gitimgo misango, tojodongo nochiwo ruedhi alufu achiel gi rombe alufu apar.  Mi jodolomang’eny ahinya nopwodhore.
Joma nochokore duto mane oa Juda, kodjodolo gi jo-Lawi, kaachiel gi ji mane oa Israel kod jodak manie Israelgi Juda ne jobedo gi mor maduong’.
Kamano ne nitie mor maduong’ ahinyaJerusalem, nimar chakre ndalo Solomon wuod daudi ruodh Israel, gimoromachal kamano ne pok otimore Jerusalem.
Jodolo gi jo-Lawi noguedhojoma nochokore, mi Nyasaye nowinjogi, ka lemogi otundo kar dakne e polo.
Weche mag Ndalo
Kane mago duto oserumo, jo-Israel duto mane osechokore Jerusalem nodhie miech Juda.  Ne gimuko sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien, gi ut lemomag hembko, kod kende-mag-liswa e piny Juda gi Benjamin kod Efraim giManase, nyaka ne gitieko kethogi duto te.  Eka jo-Israel duto nodok emiechgi. Hezekia opogo mwandune ni jodolo gi jo-Lawi
Bang’e Hezekia nopogo jodolo gi jo-Lawi e migepe mopogore opogore, kakatichgi nobet.  Moko noketo mondo otim misengni miwang’o pep, to mokomisengni mag sawo, kendo moko mondo orit dhorangeye mag Od RuothNyasaye, to moko mondo ogo erokamano kendo opak Ruoth Nyasaye gi wer.
Ruoth ne golo kuom mwandune owuon gik mitimogo misengni miwang’o pepokinyi godhiambo, kod miwang’o e ndalo mag Sabato, kendo ka due opor,kendo e ndalo mag sewni moketi, kaka ondiki e chik Ruoth Nyasaye.
Bendenochiko joma nodak Jerusalem mondo ochiw ni jodolo gi jo-Lawi pokgi,mondo gichiwre ni chopo chik Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kane wachni oselandore epiny, jo-Israel nochiwo cham ma gikwongo kayo, gi divai ma gikwongoloso, gi mor zeituni mokwongo nyak, gi mor kich, kod gik moko magpuodho, kendo ji mang’eny nokelo achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto.
Jo-Juda gi jo-Israel mane odak e miech Juda nokelo achiel kuom apar mardhok gi rombe bende, kod gik mosechiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, mine giketogi pidhe pidhe.
Ne gichako dhuro pidhego e due mar adek, kendone gitieko dhurogi e due mar abiriyo.
Kane Hezekia gi jodonge obiromoneno pidhego, ne gipako Ruoth Nyasaye gi joge Israel bende.
EkaHezekia nopenjo jodolo gi jo-Lawi wach pidhego,
mi Azaria jadolomaduong’, ma jadhood Zadok, nodwoke niya, "Nyaka ne gichak kelo chiwo eOd Ruoth Nyasaye, wasechiemo mwayieng’, kendo chiemo mang’eny pododong’, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseguedho joge.  Mano emomiyo wadong’ gichiemo mang’enygi. "
Eka Hezekia nochikogi mondo gilos kuonde keno e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kanegisetimo kamano,
ne gikano chiwo mag achiel kuom apar, kod gik mochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye kaka nochikgi.  Konania ja-Lawi ne jarit maduong’ margigo, kendo Shimei omin mare nobedo jalupne,
to ruoth Hezekia giAzaria jaduong’ Hekalu noketo Jehiel gi Azazia gi Nathan gi Azahel giJerimoth gi Jozabad gi Eliel gi Ismakia gi Mahath kod Benaya mondookonygi.
Koreh wuod Imna ja-Lawi ma jarit dhorangach ma yo wuokchieng’ norito gik ma ji chiwo ni Nyasaye kuom herogi.  Tichne ne en pogoni jodolo gik mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kod chiwo maler moloyo.
Eden giMiniamin gi Jeshua gi Shemaya gi Amaria kod Shekania ne konyo Koreh giKinda, ka gidak e miech jodolo.  Ne gipogo gik moko ni owetegi madongo gimatindo duto te,
mosetieko higni adek, mak mana joma chwo ma nyingginosechan ema ne ok pognigi gimoro, nikech ne giyudo pokgi pile, ka gidhie Od Ruoth Nyasaye mondo giti tichgi e migepegi.
Jodolo nochankaluwore gi dhoutgi, to jo-Lawi mosetieko higni piero ariyo nochankaluwore gi tichgi.
Jodolo nochan kaachiel gi mondgi kod nyithindgimachwo gi manyiri duto, nimar ne gitimo kinda kuom bedo joma kare e nyimNyasaye.
Noyier ji moko e mier mopogore opogore mondo opog gik moko nijodolo ma nyikwa Harun mane odak oko e puothe man but miechgi madongo,kendo ni jo-Lawi duto ma nyinggi osechan.
Kamano e kaka Hezekia notimo e piny Juda duto.  Timbene ne beyo e nyimRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, kendo ne ok oweye.
Tije duto ma notimo e OdNyasaye notimo koluwo chik, kendo kodwaro Nyasaye gi chunye duto, minoyudo gueth.
Weche mag Ndalo
Senakerib ruodh Asuria omonjo piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
Kata obedo ni Hezekia nosetiyo ni Nyasaye maber kamano, Senakerib ruodhAsuria, nobiro momonjo jo-Juda, kendo nolworo miechgi mochiel gi ohingani mondo okaw.
Kane Hezekia oneno ni Senakerib ruodh Asuria osebiromondo omonj Jerusalem,
noporo wach gi joge kod joma rateke ni mondoodin sokni mane chiegni gi Jerusalem, mi ne gikonye timo kamano.
Jimang’eny nochokore, mi ne gidino sokni gi aore mane mol kanyo, kagiwacho niya, "Onge gimomiyo ruodhi Asuria onego oyud pi mang’eny kamaka gibiro ka. "
Hezekia noketo chunye moloso ohinga kuonde dutomomukore, kendo nomedo geroe kuonde maboyo mag ng’icho.  Nogero ohingamachielo molworo mokwongono, kendo noloso Milo mane nie dala Daudi mondoobed motegno.  Bende noloso gilweny kod okumbni mogundho.
Noketo jodonglweny mondo otel ni ji, mi noluongogi ire e laru manie dhorangach.  Ekanotego chunygi kowachonigi niya,
"Jiwreuru kendo timuru chir.  Kik uluorruodh Asuria, kendo oganda lweny maduong’ mobirogo kik bwogu, nimar Jalmakonyowa tek moloyo jal makony.
Teko mar dhano ema en go, to wan,Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ema konyowa, kendo kedo lwenjewa. " Kane jiowinjo weche Hezekia ruodh Juda, ne gitimo chir.
Beng’ mano Senakerib ruodh Asuria mane oyudo olworo Lakish kod ogandaneduto mag lweny, nooro joote Jerusalem ir Hezekia ruodh Juda gi jo-Judaduto ma nodak kuno, kowacho niya,
"Senakerib ruodh Asuria owacho kama:Ugeno kuom ang’o momiyo uhedhoru mondo uked kodwa kwamonjo Jerusalem?
Ok upar ni Hezekia witou mondo kech gi riyo onegu kowachonu ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu biro resou e lwet ruodh Asuria?
Donge Hezekiaachielni osegolo hembko man kuonde moting’ore gi kende duto mag misangomag Ruoth Nyasaye, kochiko jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem niya, ‘Unulam e nyimkendo-mar-misango achiel kende, kendo wi kendono ema unuwang’iemisengini mau?’
Donge ung’eyo gik mwasetimo gi kwerewa ni jopinjemoko? Bende nyiseche jopinjego duto ne nyalo resogi e lweta adier?
Kuom nyiseche duto mag ogendini mane kwerena otieko chuth, ere moromane nyalo reso joge e lweta, momiyo ugeno ni Nyasachu dinyal resou?
Omiyo koro kik uyie Hezekia wuondu kendo witu kamano, bende kik uyiewechene, nimar onge nyasach oganda moro kata piny moro amora mane nyaloreso joge e lweta kata e lwet kwerena.  To koro ere kaka Nyasachu diresue lweta?"
Jootene nomedo wuoyo marach kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kuom Hezekiajatichne.
Bende Senakerib nondiko barupe mojarogo Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel kowuoyo marach kuome niya, "Kaka nyiseche mag jopinjegone ok nyal resogi e lweta, e kaka Nyasach Hezekia bende ok nores joge elweta. "
Jootego nowacho kamano ni jo-Jerusalem mane ni ewi ohinga, kagikok gi duol maduong’ gi dho jo-Juda mondo obwoggi kendo omigi luoro,eka mondo gikaw dalano.
Ne giwuoyo kuom Nyasach Jerusalem mana kaka negiwuoyo kuom nyiseche mag jopinje mamoko molos gi lwet dhano. Nyasaye oreso Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
Omiyo ruoth Hezekia kod Isaya janabi ma wuod Amoz nolemo ka ywak niNyasaye.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nooro malaika e kambi mar ruodh Asuria,motieko thuondi gi jodongo kod jotend jolweny duto.  Omiyo nodok e pinyeka en gi wichkuot.  To kane odonjo e od nyasache, yawuote moko nonegekanyo.
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye noreso Hezekia gi jo-Jerusalem e lwetSenakerib ruodh Asuria kendo e lwet wasike duto, mi nomiyogi kue embapgi duto.
Ji mang’eny nobiro Jerusalem, ka gikelo ni Ruoth Nyasayemich, kendo Hezekia ruodh Juda bende ne gimiyo gik ma nengogi tek, kendochakre kanyo ogendini duto nomiye duong’. Tuo Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
E ndalogo Hezekia nobedo matuo modwaro tho, mi nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye,mowinje kendo omiye ranyisi.
To Hezekia ne ok odwoko erokamano maromgi ber mane otimne, to nodoko jasunga.  Emomiyo ruoth Nyasaye nokechokode kaachiel gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem.
To Hezekia nobolore moweyosunga.  Jo-Jerusalem bende notimo kamano.  Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ne okosandogi e ndalo duto mag Hezekia. Hezekia orwako joote moa Babulon(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)
Hezekia ne nigi mwandu mang’eny kod huma maduong’.  Noloso ut keno magkano fedha gi dhahabu gi kite ma nengogi tek gi gik mang’ue ng’ar giokumbni kod gik moko mabeyo mopogore opogore.
Nogoyo dere mag cham,kendo nochueyo degi mag divai gi mag mo, kendo nogero kunde jamnimopogore opogore kod abich rombe.
Bende nogero mier modakie, kendonobedo gi rombe gi dhok mogundho, nimar Nyasaye nomiye mwandu mang’enyahinya.
Hezekia nogono nogeng’o soko mar Gihon gi yo ka malo, mochiko pi, miomol kochomo dala Daudi yo podho chieng’.  Tije duto mane Hezekia ochako,notieko maber.
Kamano bende e kaka notieko wach joote jodong Babulon,mane oor ire mondo onon tiend hono ma nosetimore e pinye.  Chutho Nyasayenoweye kende e wachno, to mana ni mondo oteme, kendo mondo ong’ego gimanie chunye. Tho mar Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Weche modong’ mag Hezekia gi timbene mabeyo ondik e weche mag Isayajanabi wuod Amoz e Kitap Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda gi Israel.
Hezekianotho moluwo kwerene mi ne giyike gi yo ka malo mar liete joka Daudi. Jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem duto ne joyike gi luor maduong’.  Manase wuodenodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Manase, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Manase ne jahigni apar gariyo ka nodoko ruoth, kendo norito piny kuomhigni piero abich gabich kodak Jerusalem.
Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye kaka timbe makuero mag ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo mondoowe thuolo ni jo-Israel.
Nochako oloso hembko man kuonde moting’oremane Hezekia wuon mare oseketho, kendo nogero kuonde liswa ni Baal. Nochungo sirni milamo, kendo nolamo sulue duto kotiyonigi.
Nogerokende-mag-liswa ei Hekalu, mane Ruoth Nyasaye osewuoyo kuome niya,"Jerusalem ema nyinga nobedie nyaka chieng’. "
Nogero kende mag liswa nisulue duto e laru ariyo mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nowang’o yawuote bende kaliswa e holo mar wuod Hinom.  Noyie gi jokor wach gi jonyakalondo kodajuoke.  Timbene maricho ne ng’eny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo RuothNyasaye nokecho kode.
Kido mar nyasaye manono ma noseloso, noketo eiHekalu.  To Nyasaye nosewuoyo kuom Hekaluno, kowacho ni Daudi gi Solomonwuod daudi niya, "Aseyiero Hekaluni gi Jerusalem kuom dhoudi duto magIsrael mondo nyinga obedie nyaka chieng’.
Ka jo-Israel orito kendootimo gik moko duto ma nachikogi, kendo oluwo buche gi chike duto maneMusa onyisogi, to ok nariembgi e piny mane amiyo kweregi. "
Manasenosemo jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem, mi ne gimedo timo richo e nyim RuothNyasaye moloyo ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye otieko mondo owe thuolo nijo-Israel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyoo gi Manase kod joge, to ne ok gidewe.
EmomiyoRuoth Nyasaye nomiyo jotend jolweny mag ruodh Asuria odhi kedo kodgi.  Negimako Manase gi olowu, kendo ne gitueye gi ratege mag mula, mi gitereBabulon.
Koro kane ene thagruok, nohombo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachemondo ong’wonne.
Nokwayo Nyasach kwerene kobolore ahinya, mi Nyasayenowinjo ywakne mokonye, kendo nodwoke Jerusalem e lochne.  Koro manasenong’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasaye.
Bang’e nogero ohinga moro e holo gi yo ka oko mar dala Daudi kor podhochieng’ mar Gihon.  Ohingano nochopo e Dhoranga Rech, mi odhogo got Ofelkendo nodhi malo mabor ahinya.  Bende noketo jotend jolweny e miech Judaduto mochiel gohinga.
Nogolo nyiseche manono kaachiel gi kido marnyasaye manono mane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo nomuko kende mag liswaduto ma noseloso e god hekalu kendo Jerusalem, mi nowitogi oko.
Bendenochako oloso kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mi notimoe misengnimag sawo kod mag erokamano, kendo nochiko jo-Juda mondo oti ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel.
Kata kamano ji ne pod timo misengni ehembko man kuonde moting’ore, to mana ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.
Weche moko mag Manase, gi lemo mane okwayogo Nyasache, kod weche manejonen owachone e nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, ondiki e Kitapweche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhii mag Israel.
To lemone, kendo kaka Nyasayenowinjo kwayone, kaachiel gi kethone gi richone duto, kod kuonde maneogeroe hembko moketoe sirni milamo gi kido mag nyiseche manono, kane pokchunye olokore modembore kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, ondiki e Kitap Weche magNdalo mag Jonen.
Manase notho moluwo kwerene, moyike e ode.  Amon wuode nodoko ruothkare. Loch Amon, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Amon ne jahigni piero ariyo gariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuomhigni ariyo, kodak Jerusalem.
Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasayemana kaka timbe Manase wuon mare.  Notimo liswa ni kido manono duto maneManase wuon mare oloso, kendo notiyonigi.
Amon achielni ne ok oboloree nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kaka Manase wuon mare nobolore, to nomedo kethomoloyo.
Jodonge nojame, monege e ode.
To jo-Juda nonego jogo dutomane ojame, kendo ne giketo Josia wuode mondo obed ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Josia ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Josia ne jahigni aboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni pieroadek gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.
Timbene ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo noluwo timbe Daudi kwar mare, ma ok oweyo kata achiel. Josia oloso piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
E higa mar aboro mar lochne, kane pod en rawera, nochako luwo Daudikwar mare.  To e higa mar apar gariyo nochako pwodho Juda gi Jerusalem,koketho hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore, gi sirni milamo, kod kido mopagi mothedhi.
Nogolo chik, mi ji omuko kende-mag-liswa mag Baal,kaachiel gi kende miwang’oe ubani mane ochung’ e wigi.  Nomuko sirnimilamo kod kido mopa gi mothedhi, eka notoyogi molokogi buru, kendonokiro burugo e liete joma nosetimonigi liswa.
Bende nowang’o chokejodolo e kende mane gitimoe liswa, kopwodho Juda gi Jerusalem.
Notimokamano bende e miech Manase gi Efraim kod Simeon nyaka chop Naftali,komuko ute jodologo.
Nomuko bende kende-mag-liswa kod sirni milamo, gikido manono, mi otoyogi molokogi buru.  Noketho kende duto miwang’oeubani e piny Israel duto.  Eka nodok Jerusalem. Kitap Chik oyudi e Hekalu(
Ruodhi
.
—
.
)
Koro e higa mar apar gaboro mar lochne, kane osepwodho piny kod Hekalu,nooro Shafan wuod Azalia gi wuod Joahaz jagoro mondo olos Od RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache.
Ne gidhi ir Hilkia jadolo maduong’, mi gimiye pesamane osekel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, ma jo-Lawi ma jorit dhoot nosechoko kuomjo-Manase gi jo-Efraim gi jo-Israel modong’ duto, gi jo-Juda gijo-Benjamin duto, kendo kuom jo-Jerusalem.
Ne giketo pesago e lwetnyipeche mane rito tich Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi nyipechego nochiwo pesago elwet jotich, mondo olosgo Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Pesago jotich bao gijogedo ne jong’iewogo kite mopa kod yiend ripo gi sirni, mondo gilosgoudi mane ruodhi mag Juda oseweyo okethore.
Mi ne gitiyo tijno kagiketo chunygi.  Jahath gi Obadia jo-Lawi ma joka Merari, gi Zekaria kodMeshulam ma joka Kohath, ema nobedo joritgi.  Jo-Lawi duto mane olonykuom goyo thum
ema ne rito joting’, kendo chiko jotich moko duto kuomtich moro amora.  Jo-Lawi moko bende ne jotelo, kendo moko ne joritdhorangeye.
Chieng’ moro, kane oyudo gigolo pesa mosekel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye,Hilkia jadolo noyudo kitabu mondikie chik Ruoth Nyasaye mane Musaochiwo.
Eka Hilkia nowacho ni Shafan jagoro niya, "Aseyudo kitap chike Od Ruoth Nyasaye. " Mi Hilkia nomiyo Shafan kitabuno.
Shafan notereni ruoth kendo nowachone niya, "Jotichni tiyo tich duto mane omigi.
Gisegolo pesa mane ochoki e Od Ruoth Nyasaye kendo giseketo e lwetnyipeche kod jotich. "
Eka nomedo wacho ni ruoth niya, "Hilkia osemiyakitabu moro. " Mi nosome ni ruoth.
Kane ruoth owinjo weche mag chik, noyiecho lepe.
Nochiko Hilkia, giAhikam wuod Shafan, gi Abdon wuod Mika, gi Shafan jagoro kod Asayajatich ruoth, kowachonigi niya,
"Dhiuru upenj Ruoth Nyasaye wach makuoma, gi man kuom jo-Isarel gi jo-Juda modong’, kor wach weche maniekitabu mwaseyudoni.  Nyaka bed ni Ruoth Nyasaye okecho kodwa malich,nikech kwerewa ne ok orito wachne, kata timo gik moko duto mondiki ekitabunii, bende ne ok gitimo. "
Omiyo Hilkia, gi jogo mane ruoth ooro, nodhi ir Hulda janabi madhakoma chi Shalum wuod Tikva, ma wuod Harhas, jarit lep lemo, mane odakJerusalem e migawo mar ariyo.  Ne giwuoyo kode kuom wachno,
minodwokogi niya, "Nyisuru ng’at mane oorou ira ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho kama:
‘Abiro kelo masira e pinyni, kendo kuomjoma odakie kaluwore gi kuong’ duto manie kitabu ma nosesom e nyim ruodhJuda.
Ne gikwinya gi timbegi, ka giweya, kendo ka giwang’o ubani ninyiseche manono.  Emomiyo akecho kodgi, kakumogi nyaka chieng’. ’
Towachuru ni ruodh Juda mane oorou mondo upenjne Ruoth Nyasaye wach niRuoth Nyasaye owacho kama:
‘Asewinji nikech kane iwinjo wechena maneawacho kuom pinyni kod joma odakie, chunyi ne yom kendo odembore,miyiecho lepi, kendo iywak e nyima.
Noyiki e liendi gi kue, kiluwokwereni, ma kata wang’i ok none masira ma abiro kelo kuom dalani, kendokuom joma odakie. ’ "Kane jootego odwoko ni ruoth wach,
noluongo jodongo duto mag Juda giJerusalem.
Nodhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem duto,joma omew gi jochan machalre, kaachiel gi jodolo kod jo-Lawi, minosomonigi weche duto mane nie kitap singruok mane oyud e Od RuothNyasaye.
Eka ruoth nodhi kar betne, mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasayekosingore ni enoluw Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto kod tekone duto, komakochikene gi wechene kod buchene, kamano mondo orit weche mag singruokmondiki e kitabuno.
Eka nomiyo jo-Jerusalem duto okuong’ore ni giniritsingruokno.  Mi jo-Jerusalem norito singruok mar Nyasach kweregi.
Bang’e Josia nogolo gik makuero duto mane nie piny Israel, mi nomiyoji duto modak e Israel otiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.  Ne ok giweyoluwo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi e ndalo Josia duto.
Weche mag Ndalo
Josia otimo Sap Pasaka(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Josia notimo Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye e Jerusalem kendo ne oneg nyarombomar Pasaka chieng’ due apar gang’wen mar due mokwongo.
Noketo jodolo etijegi, mojiwogi mondo giti maber e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Eka nowuoyo gijo-Lawi mane owal ni tich ruoth Nyasaye, mane puonjo jo-Israel duto,kowachonigi niya, "Keturu Sanduk Maler e Hekalu mane Solomon wuod Daudi,ruodh Israel, ogero.  Ok onego uting’e e goku kendo.  Omiyo koro tiuru niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo ni joge Israel.
Chanreuru e migepe,kaluwore gi dhoutu, kaka Daudi ruodh Israel gi Solomon wuode nochiko.
Chanuru tijeu e Hekalu, kaluwore gi dhout oweteu ma ok jo-Lawi, mondodhoot ka dhoot obed gi migawo moro makonye.
Neguru nyiromb Pasaka,kendo pwodhreuru mondo ukony oweteu luwo chik mane Ruoth Nyyasaye omiyoMusa ogolo. "
Eka Josia nochiwo ni joma nosechokore nyirombe gi nyidiek moromo alufupiero adek, kod ruedhi alufu adek, mondo otimgo misango mar pasaka.  Magoduto nochiwo kogolo kuom mwandune owuon.
Jodonge bende ne mor gi kelochiwo ni ji gi jodolo kod jo-Lawi.  Hilkia gi Zekaria kod Jehiel, jotelomadongo mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, nochiwo ni jodolo nyirombe gi nyidiekalufu ariyo gi mia auchiel, kod ruedhi mia adek, mondo otimgo misangomar Pasaka.
Konania bende, kod Shemaya gi Nethanel ma owetene kodHashabia gi jeyel kod Jozabad, ma jodong jo-Lawi, nomiyo jo-Lawinyirombe gi nyidiek alufu abich kod ruedhi mia abich mondo otimgomisango mar Pasaka.
Kane gik moko duto oseikore, jodolo nochung’ keregi, kendo jo-Lawinobedo e migepegi, kaluwore gi chik ruoth.
Kane oneg nyiromb Pasaka,jo-Lawi ema noyang’ogi, to jodolo nokiro remo mane jo-Lawi gamonigi.
Ne gipogo boche mag misengnii ni migepe mag dhoudi ma ok jo-Lawi,mondo owang’ ni Ruoth Nyasaye kaka ondiki e Kitap Musa.  Kamano e kaka negitimo gi ruedhi bende.
Ne gibulo nyiromb Pasaka kaka chik nowacho, toring misengni maler ne gitedo e agulini gi sufriache, eka ne giteropiyopiyo ni ji duto ma ok jo-Lawi.
Bang’e ne giloso maggi giwegi kod mag jodolo, nikech jodolo ma yawuotHarun nodich gi timo misengni miwang’o pep, kod tich wang’o bor, nyakaotieno.  Mano emomiyo jo-Lawi nooloso maggi giwegi kod mag jodolo mayawuot harun.
Jower ma yawuot Asaf ne ni keregi, kaluwore gi chikDaudi, gi mar Asaf, gi mar Heman, kod mar Jeduthun janen mar ruoth. Jorit dhorangeye bende ne rito dhorangeye duto.  Onge ng’ama nonego a etije mondo odhi olos chiemo, nikech owetegi ma jo-Lawi nosetedonigi.
Kamano tich Ruoth Nyasaye duto mar Pasaka kod mar timo misengnimiwang’o pep e kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye notim chieng’ono,kaka ruoth Josia nochiko.
E ndalono jo-Israel mane osechokore notimoPasaka kod Sap Makati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Pasakamachal kamano ne pok otimie Israel chakre ndalo mag Samuel janabi.  Ongeruodh israel moro amora ma nosetimo Pasaka machal gi mano mane Josiakaachiel gi jodolo gi jo-Lawi gi jo-Jerusalem kod ji duto ma noa Juda giIsrael otimo.
Ne en higa mar apar gaboro mar loch Josia mane otimiePasakano. Tho mar Josia(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Bang’e kane Josia osetieko loso Hekalu, noyudo ka Neko ruodh Misriodhi kedo Karkemish man but aora Yufrate mi Josia nodhi mondo orad kode.
To Neko noorone joote gi wach niya, "Walar ang’o kodi, ruodh Juda? Inok ema abiro monji kawuono, to abiro mana monjo dhoot ma an go gi lweny,kendo Nyasaye osechika mondo atim piyo.  Kik ipeam gi Nyasaye man kora,nono to abiro tieki. "
Kata kamano Josia ne ok nyal weye, to noramoarama ni nyaka oked kode.  Ne ok odewo wach mane Nyasaye omiyo Nekoowacho, too nodhi adhiya mi girado e paw Megido.
Jodir asere nochieloruoth Josia, mi nowacho ni jotichne niya, "Golauru oko nimar asehinyoramalich. "
Omiyo jotichne nogole e gache mi gitere Jerusalem ka giting’ee gache machielo.  Notho kuno, mi ne giyike but kwerene, kendo jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem duto noywage.
Jeremia bende nochuogo wend ywak ni Josia,kendo jower duto, machwo gi mamon, pod wero wendno nyaka chil kawuono. Gino oselokore tim jo-Israel kendo wendno ondik e Kitap Wende Ywak.
Weche moko mag Josia, a chakruokgi nyaka gikogi, gi timbene mabeyomoluwore gi chik Ruoth Nyasaye,
ondiki e Kitap Ruodhi mag Israel giJuda.
Weche mag Ndalo
Loch Jehoahaz, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Ji duto noketo Jehoahaz ruoth e Jerusalem kar josia wuon mare.
Ne enjahigni piero ariyo gadek kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom duecheadek, kodak Jerusalem.
Bang’e Neko ruodh Misri nogole e tich ruoth,modare Jerusalem, kendo noketo ni piny Juda osuru moromo kilo piero adekmag dhahabu.
Eka noketo Eliakim owadgi Jehoahaz ruodh Juda giJerusalem, kendo noloko nyinge ni Jehoyakim.  Jehoahaz to notero Misri. Loch Jehoyakim, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
—
.
)
Jehoyakim ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni apar gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache.
Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nomonje, motueye giratege kendo notere Babulon.
Nebukadnezar nokawo bende bath gik mokomag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, motero Babulon e ode.
Timbe moko mag Jehoyakim gigik makuero ma notimo, kod ketho maling’ling’ ma nofweny kuome, ondiki eKitap Ndalo mag ruodhi mag Israel gi Juda.  Jehoyachin wuode nodoko ruothkare. Jehoyachin ruodh Juda oter Babulon e tuech(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Jehoyachin ne jahigni aboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom duecheadek gi ndalo apar kodak Jerusalem.  Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye.
E ndalo oro ruoth Nebukadnezar nooro joote mokelo JehoyachinBabulon kaachiel gi mwandu mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi Nebukadnezar noketoZedekia owadgi Jehoyachin ruodh Juda gi Jerusalem. Loch Zedekia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
)
Zedekia ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni apar gachiel kodak Jerusalem.
Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache.  Notamore winjo weche Jeremia jadolo, mane RuothNyasaye ooro ire.
Bende ruoth Nebukadnezar nosemiyo okuong’ore e nyingNyasaye ni nobed e bwo lochne, to kata kamano nopiem kode, motamoreduogo kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel.
Jodolo madongo duto bendekaachiel gi ji, noweyo Ruoth Nyasaye chuth, ka giluwo timbe makuero magjopinje mamoko.  Ne gidwanyo Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mane oseguedho mondo obedmare e Jerusalem.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi notimo kinda kooronigi jootene pilenikech nokecho joge, kendo nohero kar dakne.
To ne gimedo charo jooteNyasaye, ka gichayo wachne, kendo ginyiero jonabi mage, nyaka RuothNyasaye nokecho kodgi, ma koro ne ok ginyal konyo. Jo-Babulon oloyo piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
;
.
-
)
Emomiyo nokelonigi ruodh jo-Babulon, monego yawuotgi e Hekalu, kendone ok okecho wuowi kata nyako, ng’at motegno kata jaduong’ moti.  RuothNyasaye nochiwogi duto e lwete,
mi nokawo gik moko duto mitiyogo e OdRuoth Nyasaye, madongo gi matindo, kod mwandu mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, gimag od ruoth, kod mag ut jodonge, motero Babulon.
Ne giwang’o OdNyasaye, mi gimuko ohinga mar Jerusalem.  Ne giwang’o ut ruoth duto,kendo ne giketho gik moko duto ma nengogi tek man Jerusalem.
Jogo maneok onegi, ruoth notero Babulon, kuma ne gidokoe wasumbe, kendo wasumbyawuote, nyaka nochopo ndalo mane jo-Persia okawoe loch.
Mano notimoremondo wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane omiyo Jeremia owacho, ochopi.  Jeremianosewacho niya, "Pinyni nonind ma ok opur kuom higni piero abiriyo,mondo ochulgo ndalo mag Sabato mane osekadho, ka jopiny ok orito. "Ruoth Kuros ogonyo joma otue(Ezra
.
-
)
E higa mokwongo mar loch Kuros, ruodh Persia, Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyowachne, mane Jeremia okoro, ochopo kare.  Nomiyo Kuros ogoyo milome epinye duto, kendo olando wach gi barupe,
ni Kuros ruodh Persia, owachokama: "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach polo osemiya loch kuom pinje duto, kendoosechika mondo agerne ot Jerusalem, manie piny Juda.  Ng’ato ang’atakuomu ma en achiel kuom joge nyalo dhi, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachemondo obed kode. "EZRA
Ruoth Kuros ogoyo milome(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Jer
.
;
.
. E higa mokwongo mar loch Kuros ruodh Persia, RuothNyasaye nomiyo wachne mane Jeremia okoro, otimore.  Nomiyo Kuros ruodhPersia ogoyo milome e pinje duto,, kendo olando wach gi barua, kowachoniya:
Isa
.
. "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach polo osemiya loch kuom pinjeduto, kendo en owuon osechika mondo agerne Hekalu Jerusalem e pinyJuda.
Jo-Ruoth Nyasaye duto man kuomu nyalo dhi Jerusalem e piny Judamondo ochak oger Hekalu ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, ma dalane enJerusalem, kendo Nyasaye mondo obed kode.
To ng’ato ka ng’ato ma okodhi, omi teko mar solo fedha gi dhahabu gi jamni kod gik mamoko kuomjogweng’gi, kamoro amora modakie.  Mago nobed mich momedi kuom gik maneji chiwo kuom herogi ni tich Hekalu mar Nyasaye man Jerusalem. "Joma otue Babulon odok Jerusalem
Bang’e jodong dhout Juda gi Benjamin kod jodolo gi jo-Lawi, kaachiel giji mamoko duto mane Nyasaye ojiwo chunygi mondo ochak oger Hekalu marRuoth Nyasaye man Jerusalem, noikore dhi timo kamano.
Mi jogweng’giduto nokonyogi gi fedha gi dhahabu gi jamni gi gik mamoko, kod gik manengogi tek, kaachiel gi gik mane ng’ato ka ng’ato ochiwo kuom herone.
To bende gik lemo mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye mane Nebukadnezar oyudo osegoloJerusalem, mi oketo e od nyisechene, koro Kuros ruodh Persianogolo,
moketo e lwet Mithredath jakeno, mane okwanogi ni Sheshbazarjaduong’ mar piny Juda.
Kwan-gi ne romo kama: Nyilerni piero adek molosgi dhahabu, gi nyilerni alufu achiel molos gi fedha, gi tewni mopogoreopogore piero ariyo gochiko,
gi tewni piero adek molos gi dhahabu, gitewni mia ang’wen gapar mopogore opogore molos gi fedha, kod tewnimamoko alufu achiel.
Gik moko duto molos gi dhahabu kod molos gi fedhamoromo alufu abich gi mia ang’wen.  Gigo duto ema Sheshbazar nodhigo kanejoma otue owuok Babulon dhi Jerusalem. EZRA
Kar romb joma noa e tuech(Nehemia
.
-
)
Koro magi e jo-Juda ma nodok Jerusalem gi Juda koa Babulon, kuma neNebukadnezar ruodh Babulon oterogie tuech.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato nodok egweng’gi.
Jotendgi ne gin: Zerubabel, gi Jeshua, gi Nehemia, gi Seraya,gi Reelaya, gi Mordekai, gi Bilshan, gi Mizpar, gi Bigvai, gi Rehum, kodBaana.
Kar romb jo-Israel machwo e magi: joka Parosh ne romo alufuariyo gi mia achiel gi piero abiriyo gariyo;
joka Shefatia, ne mia adekgi piero abiriyo gariyo;
joka Ara, mia abiriyo gi piero abiriyogabich;
joka Pahath-moab, tiende ni joka Jeshua kod joka Joab ne romoalufu ariyo gi mia aboro gapar gariyo;
joka Elam ne alufu achiel miaariyo gi piero abich gang’wen;
joka Zatu, mia ochiko gi piero ang’wengabich;
joka Zakai, mia abiriyo gi piero auchiel;
joka Bani, miaauchiel gi piero ang’wen gariyo;
joka Bebia, mia auchiel gi pieroariyo gadek;
joka Azgad, alufu achiel gi mia ariyo kod piero ariyogariyo;
joka Adonikam, mia auchiel gi piero auchiel gauchiel;
jokaBigvai, alufu ariyo gi piero abich gauchiel;
joka Adin, mia ang’wen gipiero abich gang’wen;
joka Ater, tiende ni joka Hezekia, to pieroochiko gaboro;
joka Bezai, mia adek gi piero adek gariyo;
joka Jora,mia achiel gapar gariyo;
joka Hashum, mia ariyo gi piero ariyogadek;
joka Gibar, to piero ochiko gabich;
jo-Bethlehem, mia achielgi piero ariyo gadek;
jo-Netofa, piero abich gauchiel;
jo-Anathoth,mia achiel gii piero ariyo gaboro;
jo-Beth-azmoth, piero ang’wengariyo;
jo-Kiriath-jearim gi jo-Kefira kod jo-Beeroth, mia abiriyo gipiero ang’wen gadek;
jo-Rama gi jo-Geba, mia auchiel gi piero ariyogachiel;
jo-Mikmas, mia achiel gi piero ariyo gariyo;
jo-Bethel kodjo-Ai, mia ariyo gi piero ariyo gadek;
jo-Nebo, piero abichgariyo;
jo-Magbish, mia achiel gi piero abich gauchiel;
jo-Elammachielo, alufu achiel gi mia ariyo kod piero abichgang’wen;
jo-Harim, mia adek gi piero ariyo;
jo-Lod gi jo-Hadid kodjo-Ono, mia abiriyo gi piero aboiro gabich;
jo-Jeriko, mia adek gipiero ang’wen gabich;
jo-Senaa, alufu adek gi mia auchiel kod pieroadek.
Kar romb jodolo: joka Jedaya ma jodhood Jeshua, mia ochiko gi pieroabiriyo gadek;
joka Imer, alufu achiel gi piero abich gariyo;
jokaPashur, alufu achiel gi mia ariyo kod piero ang’wen gabiriyo;
jokaHarim, alufu achiel gapar gabiriyo.
Kar romb jo-Lawi: joka Jeshua gi joka Kadmiel ma jodhood Hodavia ne jipiero abiriyo gang’wen.
