Piny Juda nolokre masira ni jo-Misri.  Nyinge kende kajo-Misri owinjo, to nogogi gi kihondko, nikech gik ma Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto osechano timonigi.
E ndalog, noyud ka joma odak e mier abich mag Misri wuoyo gi dhoHibrania, ka kuong’ore ni noluw Ruoth Nyasaye manyalo Gik Moko Duto. Dala achiel kuomgi noluong ni Dala Wang’chieng’.
E kindego, nobedie kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye e dier Misri,kod siro maler mochung’ ni Ruoth Nyasaye e tong’ piny Misri.
Sirononochung’ kanyo kaka ranyisi, kendo kaka rapar ni Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto e Misri, mondo ka giywakne e kinde ma wasikgi thirogi, tooornigi jawar, mondo okonygi kendo oresgi.
Ruoth Nyasaye noyangre nijo-Misri mondo ong’eye, kendo chieng’no giniyie kuome, mi ginitimnemisango mar cham kod misengni mamoko.  Bende ginikuong’re, mi gichopkuong’ruokgigo.
Ruoth Nyasaye nogo jo-Misri, to kata kamano,enochanggi mana e kinde ma ogoyogieno.  Pile ka giduogo ire, to enowinjkwayogi, mi ochanggi.
E kindego ndara maduong’ nobedie moa Misri kadhi Asuria.  Jo-Asurianobi Misri, kendo jo-Misri bende nodhi Asuria.  Kamano jo-Misri gijo-Asuria nolam Nyasaye kaachiel.
E ndalogo, duong’ mar Israel nobed maromre gi duong’ mar Misri kod marAsuria, kendo pinje adekgo nobed gueth e dier piny.
Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko duto noguedhgi, ka wacho kama: "Oguedh jo-Misri majoga, kendo oguedh jo-Asuria ma chuechna, bende oguedh jo-Israel ma ginmwanduna awuon. "Isaya
Okor wach ni Asuria biro loyo Misri gi Ethiopia
Sargon ruodh Asuria ne ooro jatend lweny mare Ashdod, mi okawo dalanobang’ lweny mager.
E kindeno Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Isaya wuod Amozniya, "Gony pien gugru manie nungonino, kendo ilony wuocheni. " Isayanotimo kamano, mowuotho duk, gi tiende nono.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayenowacho niya, "Kaka Isaya osewuotho duk, kendo gi tiende nono, kuomhigni adek, kobedo ranyisi misieomogo Misri kod Ethiopia,
e kaka ruodhAsuria nosemb jo-Misri kod jo-Ethiopia ma osemako duto, joma dongokaachiel gi nyithindo.  Giniwuoth duge gi tiendegi nono, ka siandagineno, mi Misri noyud wichkuot.
Ji duto nogore nyang’eng’a ka geno magigenogo kuom jo-Ethiopia, kendo sunga ma gisungorego ni jo-Misridikonygi, nolal nono.
Chieng’no joma odak a donam nowach niya, ‘Neurugima osetimore ni joma ne wageno kuomgi, mi waringo irgi mondo oreswakuom ruodh Asuria! To koro wan to dwatony nadi?’ "Isaya
Wach mokor kuom Babulon
Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom thimm man but nam e ma:E fweny malichno nanenoe kalausi magerkaa e thim man yo milambo, ma en piny ma ji oluoro.
Ne aneno kaka dala mandhogo ji, ondhogi. Ne awinjo ka Nyasaye jiwo jo-Elam kod jo-Mediani mondo odhi omonj Babulon kendo olwore,mondo sungane orum.
Kane aneno fwenyno ne apuodora ka rem rama malit,mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo. Gik mane aneno kendo awinjo ne ogoya gi kibaji, mi adhier nono.
Dhoga nomoko kendo natetni ma ok anyal konyoNe asegeno ni abiro yueyo godhiambo, ka chieng’ opodho,to kindeno nolokorena mana masira.
Bende naneno ka chiemo oseket piny, mi ochan kombe,kendo ka jatend jo-Babulon chiemo kendo metho,to e sano ne gipo ka oluonggimondo gimanre gi gigi mag lweny.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona kama:"Ket jang’icho mondo ohul gik ma oneno.
Ka oneno geche lweny ka biro,ma farese ariyo ariyo ywayo,kaachiel gi joma oidho kenje kod ngamia,to mondo orang ane maber gima timore. "
Bang’e jang’icho nokok niya,"Jaduong’, asebet ka achung’ kar ng’ichoodiechieng’ gotieno duto pile,
to koro echa aneno joidh farese ka biro,kaachiel gi geche lweny ma farese ariyo ariyo ywayo. "Eka nawinjo dwoko niya,"Babulon osepodho!Osepodho, kendo nyisechene manono osemuki moriere piny. "
Yaye, jothurwa ma jo-Israel,ma osenyon ka kal minyono kidino,asenyisou gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach Israelowachona. Wach mokor kuom Duma
Ma e wach mane Nyasaye oyiso e fweny kuom Duma:Ne awinjo ng’ato ka luonga Seir. Ne openjo niya, "In jang’icho koro en sa adi mar otieno?"
Ne adwoko niya,"Piny chiegni ru, to obiro yuso kendo. To kudwaro penjo kendo, to uduog ira. "Wach mane okor kuom jo-Arabu
Ma e wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom jo-Arabu:Un jo-Dedan ma bworo e thim gi jo-Arabu,
kod un joma odak Tema,rwakuru joma oseringo, kumiyo chiemoo gi pi,
nikech giseringo lweny mager,minegoe ji gi ligangla kod asere mabith.
Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho niya, "Kapok higa achiel orumo ngang’, toduong’ duto mar jo-Arabu ma Kedar notieki.
Jo asere marateke maggimanok kende ema nodong’, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel emaowacho kamano. "Isaya
Wach mokor kuom holo mar Hinom
Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso kuom holo mar Hinom e ma:Un jo-Jerusalem, nyisauru gima omiyo uduto uidho ewi udi.
Yaye, in dala ma ji goyoe mahu, kendo ma koko opong’o,bende ok ginitho e lweny.
Jotendu mag lweny duto noringi,kendo nomaki kapok oywayo atungegi. Kata mana jou marateke bende noring kuma bor.
Mano emomiyo awacho niya,. "Weuru ng’iya! Weuru aweya, aywag malit!Kik utem kueyo chunya, nikech jowa oserumo. "
Aywak nikech Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutooseketo chieng’ lweny gi koko kod masira. Nomuk ohinga e holo mar fweny,kendo ji nokogi ewi gode, kadwaro kony.
Jo-Elam biro kawo aserni maggi,kendo jo-Aram biro tueyo farese e gechegi mag lweny. Jo-Kir bende nokaw kuodigi.
Geche lweny nopong’ holni mau mabeyo,kendo joidh farese noried ni lweny e dhorangeyeu.
Kamano teko mar Juda norum. Chieng’no unubed gi chir nikech giu mag lwenymokan e ot miluongo ni Od Bungu.
Bende unurang ohinga mar dala Daudi,mondo ulos kuondene mang’eny momukore. Unuchik pi Soko Mamwalo mondo ochokre,
kendo unukwan ut Jerusalem,mi unumuk moko mondo ulosgo ohinga obed motegno,
bende unukuny yawo e kind ohinga ma oko kod ohinga maiyemondo pi Soko Machon odonjie. To kata kamano ok nupar Jachuech gik moko duto,kata dewo Jal mane oseloso gigo duto chon, ok nudew.
Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto noluongumondo uywagi kendo udengi,kendo mondo uliel wiu kendo urwak piende gugru.
To kar timo kamano, to unutug atuga kumetho,kendo kuyang’o dhok gi rombe uchamo,ka uwacho niya,"Wachiemuru kendo wamethuru, nikech kiny wanatho. "
To Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osebirona e fweny,mi awinjo ka okuong’ore ni,richou ok nopwodhi nyaka chop thou. Mano e wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto!Okor ni Eliakim biro kawo kar Shebna
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nowachona niya,"Dhiyo ir jakeno ma nyinge Shebna, ma jarit od ruoth,mondo ipenje kama:
‘Ere gima itimo ka, koso ere wadu man ka,momiyo isekunyo bur mibiro yikie kae?Chutho, ang’o momiyo ikunyo bur malo e lwanda,mondo obed liel ma ringri biro yueyoe?
Ruoth Nyasaye biro teng’i oko,mana ka ng’ama teng’o nyuogo oko e nanga.
Eka eno g’wasi motueyi matek,kendo oboli e piny malach, mana ka mpira mowit e pap,kendo gecheni mag lweny mayande isungorigo nosik mana kuno. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye wachoni niya, "Anagoli e tiji, mi adwoki e piny.
Chieng’no analuong jatichna Eliakim wuod Hilkia mondo okaw kari.
Anarwake gi lawi mar duong’, mi asidhne kilembani, kendo enobed wuonjo-Jerusalem gi jo-Juda
Anamiye rayaw mar od Daudi, kendo gima oyawo,onge ng’ama nolor; bende gima oloro, onge ng’ama noyaw.
Enobed jateloma nomi joodgi yud duong’, kendo anagure matek, mana ka musmal.
Kuomeema joodgi duto te, koda ka modhier, nobed kayudoe konyruok, mana kakagik mang’eny mopogore opogore liero kong’aw e musmal.
To an, RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, amedo wachoo ni, chieng’no musmal maneogur motegnono nopudh oko.  Adier, nong’adee mi olwar, kendo gik mokoduto mayande olier kuome nokethi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "Isaya
Wach mokor kuom Turo gi Sidon
Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom Turo ema:Un yiedhi madongo mag Turo madhi Tarshish, ywaguru,nikech dhowath mugowoe ibiro kethi chuth. Ubiro winjo wachni e yo kurawo e chula Saiprus.
Un joma odak e dho nam, ling’uru thi. Ywaguru, un joohala mag Sidon,
ma jotendgi ng’ado nembe mondo oom cham Shihor,kendo ma yudo ohala kuom ting’o mwandu mag ogendini.
Dala mar Sidon, ma en dhowath mochiel motegno,noywagi ka wiye okuot ka wacho niya,"Tinde ok awinj rem mar muoch. Nyithindo bende ok anywol. Aonge gi nyithindo ma yawuowi kata ma nyiri ma apidho. "
Ka jo-Misri owinjo masira ma biro mako Turo,to ginichandre malit mi giwach niya,
"Yaye, un joma odak e dhonam, ywaguru,kendo idhuru yiedhi udhi Tarshish.
Yande jou dhi e pinje mamoko maboyo mondo oyud kuonde dak,to koro dalau mane mor, kendo humbe olak chon,odong’ mana gunda!"
To en ng’a mosechano kelo masira kuom Turo,dala ma pinje moko nie bwoye,kendo ma joohala mage gin joma ogen e piny ngima?
Ruoth Nyasaye manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema osechano kelo masiranokendo okel achaya kuom ji duto moluor ahinya e piny.
Kuom mano, pururu lowo un jo-Tarshish,nikech ohandu biro rumo!
Ruoth Nyasaye oserieyo bade e nam mondo olok loch ruodhi,bende osegoolo chik mondo omuk miech Kanaan mochiel motegno.
Osewacho niya,"Yaye, un jo-Sidon, dala mothir, ok unuchak uubed mamor. Kata ka ung’ado nam mudhi Saiprus,to kuno bende ok unuyudie yueyo.
Ranguru uneye piny jo-Babulon. Jo-Babulon ema nolok Turo thim ma ondiegi dakie,to jo-Asuria ok ema noloke. Ginidhur lowo mondo ginyon ka giidho ohingane,kendo ginimuk ut ruodhi, mi giketh dalano chuth.
Ywaguru, un yiedhi madongo madhi Tarshish,nikechh dhowath mugowoe ibiro kethi.
Chakre chieng’no wich nowil gi Turokuom higni piero abiriyo, maromre gi hik ruoth achiel. To ka higni piero abiriyogo oserumo,to Turo nochandre ka dhako ma jachode miwero niya:
In dhako ma jachode mojwang’,kaw thumi iwuothgo e dala koni gi koni,kigwelo puch mamit, kendo kiwero wendi duto,mondo chwo ochak opari. "
To bang’ higni piero abiriyo Ruoth Nyasaye nokech Turo, mi resi, tokata kamano, dalano nodog e tije machon, mi oyud ohala kuom tiyo niogendini duto mae piny ngima, mana kaka dhako ma jachode yudo ohala kuomdwanyruok gi chwo.
To ohala moyudo e tijeno nochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye. Ok nokunggi, bende ok nokan-gi, to nong’iew kodgi chiemo mathoth kodlewni mabeyo ni jodolo mag Ruoth Nyasaye. Isaya
Okor wach ni Nyasaye biro kumo piny
Winjuru! Ruoth Nyasaye biro teng’o piny, mi dong’ nono. Obiro bare, mi oloke ataro, kendo oke joma odakie.
Chieng’no jadolo nobed maromre gi ji ajia,kendo misumba nobed maromre gi ruodhe. Jahon gik moko bende nobed maromre gi jang’iewo,kendo jahol ji nobed maromre gi ng’ama holo.
Piny nodong’ nono haa, kendo nokethre chuth,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ema osewacho kamano.
Piny notwo kendo gik mantie noner. Adier, piny duto noner kendo notwo,koda ka kuonde moting’ore duto.
Ji modak e piny osedwanyo piny,nikech gidagi rito chike, mi giketho muma mochwere.
Mano emomiyo kuong’ biro mwonyo piny,kendo joma odakie none chandruok nikech richogi,bende ginilal nono, mak mana ji manok kende ema nodong’.
Yiend mzabibu noner, mi divai mobi manyien nobed matin. Joma mor bende chunygi nobed malit.
Nyiduonge noling’ thi,bende mahu ma joma mor goyo norumkendo thumbe ok noywagi.
Onge ng’ama nochak omadh divai ka wer,kendo kong’o nobed marach ni jamath.
Dala Manono nokethre chuth,kendo ot ka ot nolor mondo joyeko kik donjie.
Ji noywagre e wang’yore nikech divai nobed maonge. Tuke duto bende norum,kendo mor nobed maonge e piny.
Dalano nodong’ mana gunda,kendo dhorangach notur matindotindo.
Mano e gima biro timore e piny ngima,kendo ni oganda ka oganda. Ji manok kende ema nodong’mana kaka olemo manok ema dong’ e yadh zeituni moyiengi,kata e yadh mzabibu mihulo bang’ keyo.
Ji biro ywak matek yo podho chieng’,ka gikok niya,"Mano kaka duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye ng’ongo!
Kuom mano ji mondo omi Ruoth Nyasaye duong’ e pinje man yo wuokchieng’,kendo nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel opakie dhonembe gi chulni man yo podho chieng’. "
Wasewinjo ka giwer e tung’ piny ka tung’ piny niya,"Mano kaka Ng’ama Kare ber!"An to chunya pod lit ahinya,nimar ji pod osiko ka timo atima richo,kendo ndhogruok opong’o piny.
A yaye, un joma odak e piny,masira gi bur kod obadho ema ochomou!
Ka uringo masira, to ununyumru e bur,kendo ka utony mak unyumoru e bur, to obadho nomaku,nikech masira biro lwar kuomu koa e polo,kendo piny duto noyiengni marach.
Piny nobarre, mi gik moko duto lal nono.
Adier, piny notagre mana ka ng’at momer,kendo noukni mana ka kiru ma yamo yiengo. Nopodhi, to ok nochak ochung’ kendo,nimar richo ji ohinge gi pek.
Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nong’ad bura,mi malaika mae polo, nokum e polo,kendo ruodhi mae piny, nokum e piny.
Enochokgi mana ka joma omaki,mi ketgi e od tuech nyaka chop yalgi, kendo kumgi.
Due norieny matiptip, kendo wang’chieng’ bende noimre,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nogur lochnee got Sayun man Jerusalem,mi duong’ne maler norieny e nyim jodonge. Isaya
Wer mipakogo ng’wono mar Nyasaye
A Ruoth Nyasaye, in e Nyasacha!Anating’ nyingi malo, kendo anapaki,nikech honni mane ichano chon, isetimo gi adiera.
Iseketho mier, mi udi momukore odhurore pidhe pidhe. Adier, iseloko mier mochiel motegno pidhe mag kite,mi udi mabeyo mag jopinje mamoko osekethore chuth,kendo ok nochak oger.
Mano emomiyo oganda makwiny miyi luor. Adier, mier mag ogendini mager oluori,
nikech isebedo kar konyruok ni ng’at modhier machandore. Ee, in e kar bwogo koth, kendo e tipo ma geng’o chieng’e ndalo ma joma ger monjowaka koth machwe maduong’ e ndalo chiri,
kata ka chieng’ marieny mager e ndalo oro. In ema itieko koko mar wasikwa mager,mana kaka boche polo geng’o liet mar chieng’,mi wer ma wasikwago chayowago lal nono.
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutobiro loso sawo mamit ni ji duto ewi got Sayun. Enobed sawo mar divai mochiek chuth, kendo modhing’ maber,kod chiemo mamit motimo mo.
Ewi godni ema Ruoth Nyasaye nogolie kanikmoumo wang’ ogendini duto.
Enotiek tho nyaka chieng’. Bang’e enoywe pi wang’ ng’ato ka ng’ato,kendo nogol achaye man kuom joge e piny duto. Ruoth Nyasaye ema owacho kamano.
Chieng’no ji nowach niya,"Ma e Nyasachwa, ma waserito mondo oreswa. Adier, ma e Ruoth Nyasachwa ma wageno kuome,omiyo wabeduru mamor kendo moil, nikech osewarowa,
kendo nikech lwete nobed ewi godni mondo okonywa. Jo-Moab to nonyon gi tiende,mana kaka dhok nyono tiang’ e kul.
Kanyo ema jo-Moab norieye bedegimana kaka ng’ama goyo abal rieyo bedene ka kwang’,to Nyasaye notiek sungagi,kaachiel gi gimoro amora ma lwetgi oseloso.
Ruoth Nyasaye nomuk ohinga margi marabora ma gigeng’orego,mi ruombre piny e buru. "Isaya
Wer migenogo kony mar Ruoth Nyasaye
Wer ma nower e piny Juda chieng’no e ma:"Wan gi dala mochiel motegno,kendo resruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye osekelonwaema obedo ohinga mwageng’orego.
Yawuru dhorangeye mondo oganda moyie kuom Nyasaye odonji.
Joma parogi osiko kuomi, A Nyasaye, irito gi kue. Gin gi kue nikech gigeno kuomi.
Genuru kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka chieng’,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye owuon en lwanda mosiko.
Joma ne odak e dala moting’ore osedwoko piny,kendo osemuko dalagi, mi orwombore piny e buru,
mondo joma ithiro kendo ma jochan onyone gi tiendgi. "
Yor ng’at makare oriere tir,nikech in ema iloso ni joma long’o yo ma onego giluw.
Wan bende waluwo yo mondiki e chikeni,kwageni, A Ruoth Nyasaye. Gima chunywa dwaro moloyo en ni mondo nyingi oyud duong’.
Otieno duto chunya dwari. Adier, amanyi ka aketo chunya,nikech ka ibiro e piny, ming’ado bura,to eka joma odakie puonjore tim makare.
Jaricho to kata da dhial manade,to pod ok onyal puonjore tim makare,to omedo ameda timo richo e piny ma adiera nitie,ka ok odew duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
A Ruoth Nyasaye iselocho, to joricho ok ne mano. We gineye hera matut miherogo jogi, mondo wigi okuodi,kendo mach ma iseiko ni wasiki otiekgi!.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, inimiwa kue,nikech gik moko duto ma wasetimo, in ema itimonwa.
A Ruoth Nyasachwa, ruodhi moko ma ok in osebedo ka ritowa,to koro in kendi ema walami.
Joma otho ok nochak obed mangima. Adier, joma osenindo e liel ok nochak ochier. Mano emomiyo isekumoo ruodhigo mi itieko,kendo imiyo wich owil kodgi.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, inimed ogandawa. Ee, inimede kiyaro tong’ pinywa mondo nyingi oyud duong’.
Ne wamanyi, a Ruoth Nyasaye ka wan e chandruok,kendo kane ikumowa, to ne walami mos.
Kaka dhako winjo rem kendo ywak ka muoch kayo,e kaka wachalo ka wan e nyimi, A Ruoth Nyasaye.
Wasebedo kwanegore gi tich, to onge gima wasetimo,mana ka dhako mosebedo ka muoch kayo,to onywolo mana yamo!Kata obedo ni wasechandore kamano,to ok wasekelo resruok ni pinywa.
Jogi duto mosetho nochak obed mangima. Adier, ringregi nochier kendo. Joma onindo e lowo biro chier, mi kog gi mor,nimar tekoni biro lor kuomgi mana ka tho ma moko e lum,mi piny nogol joma notho chon oko.
Un joga, donjuru e uteu, mi ulor dhoudi,mondo upond matin mi mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye kadhi,
nikech Ruoth Nyasaye biro biro, koa kar dakne,mondo okum joma odak e piny nikech richogi. Piny noel remo mosechuer kuome,kendo ok nopand joma osenegi. Isaya
Okor wach ni nores jo-Israel, mi chokgi kanyakla
Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nokaw liganglane mabith kendo motegno, mioneggo Levayathan, kod thuol malich kendo manudore, modak e nam.
Chieng’no wer ma nower ema:"Israel e puodho maber mar mzabibu.
To an Ruoth Nyasaye e jaritne,kendo akelone pi pile mondo kik pot mzabibu lwar. Arite gotienoo kendo godiechieng’,
to ok onyagna olemo ma anyalo losogo divai. Omiyo ochalo mana gi puodho ma kudho gi pedo ema opong’o. Kuom mano, abiro monje, mi awang’e pep,
mak mana ka jo-Israel oringo kuoma kaka kar konyruokgi,mi gitimo koda winjruok. Adier, onego gitim koda winjruok.
E ndalo mabiro, nyikwa Jakobo nogurre motegno. Ee, jo-Israel nobed ka yath ma dongo kendo thiewonyaka nyag olemo, mi pong’ piny ngima. "
To bende Nyasaye osekumo jo-Israel matek,kaka nokumo joma nosesandogi?Koso bende osenego jo-Israel matek,kaka nonego wasigu mane onegogi?
Ooyo, ose mana riembogi gidhi e piny mabor,ka gima yamo mager moa yo wuok chieng’ ema oterogi.
Kapok richo mag jo-Israel opwodhi,to nyaka giketh kendegi mag liswa,mi gireg kitegi olokre buru, kendo ging’ad oko yien gi sirni dutomilamo.
To dala ma ochiel motegno nodong’ gunda. Enobed dala mojwang’ maonge ng’ama odakie,kendo nolokre thim. Jamni nokwa kuno, ka chamo bede yien.
Bende mon mamoto nojak bede yien motwo, ochwakgo mach. Mano notimre nikech ogandano onge gi rieko. Omiyo, Jachuechgi ok nokechgi. Adier, Ng’ama nochueyogi ok nong’wonnigi.
Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nochoku un jo-Israel, achiel achiel,chakre aora Yufrate nyaka aora Nael,ka gima ookwanyo olemb yath moyiengi.
Chieng’no tung’ maduong’ noywagi,mi joma olal e piny Asuria nobi,kaachiel gi joma noter Misri e tuech,mi ginilam Ruoth Nyasaye e got maler man Jerusalem. Isaya
Siem mosiemgo jo-Israel
Yaye, inine malit, in dala Samaria manie holo momew,ma jomer mag Israel sungorego ka osimbgi. Duong’ni biro rumo mana ka maua moner,in dala ma joge lwokore gi kong’o!
Winjuru!Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelo ng’at maratego moseyiero mondo oketh pinyu. Obiro biro mana ka yamb koth makelo pe, maketho piny,kata mana ka pi ohula mabubni kaywoyo gik moko.
Bang’e osimbo ma jomer mag israel sungoregono nonyon piny,
mi duong’ne biro rumo ka maua moner,kata ka olemo mokwongo chiek,ma ng’ato ang’ata moneno, to pono chamo ka rikni.
Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema nobed osimbo mabermar duong’ ni joge manok modong’.
Enomi jong’ad bura mau bed gi chunymar ng’ado bura gi adiera, kendo enomi jolwenju ma kedo matek gi wasigue dhorangeyeu bed gi chir mathoth. Siem kod singruok momi jo-Jerusalem
To koro jotend Jerusalem duto bende gin jomer. Jodolo mage kod jonabine mer kendo kwang’nikech kong’o makech,omiyo gitimo gik mofuwo. Gitagore ataga ka gineno fweny, kata ka ging’ado bura.
Ging’ok e mesni, kendo kuonde duto ma gintie onywandore.
Giwacho niya,"Koro ere ng’ama Janabi paro ni biro puonjo?Koso ere joma biro winjo tiend gima opuonjo?Mit koparo ni wan nyithindo ma tinde eka oweyo dhoth?
Onwoyonwa gik mowacho ndalo mang’eny,kodhum gi weche ma onge tiendgi. "
To chutho, kamano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye biro loso kodgi,kowuoyo gi dhok moro nono ma ok ginyal winjo.
Chon Nyasaye nowachonigi niya,"Achiwonu yueyo maradier, kendo joma ool mondo oyue. Adier, mano e yueyo. "To ne gidagi winjo.
Mano omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nochak owuo kodgikadhum gi weche ma onge tiendgi!To ka giwinjo wechego, to ginichwanyre,mi gipodh kendo gitur. Ginimok e obadho, mi makgi, kendo tergi e tuech.
Kuom mano, chikuru itu,un josunga, ma jotend jo-Jerusalem.
Uwacho niya,"Wasetimo winjruok gi tho. Adier, wasetimo singruok gi Piny Joma Otho. Omiyo ka ohula miwachono biro, to ok obi ywoyowa,nikech waseloso miriambo ka kar konyruokwa,kendo wuondruok e okumba ma wageng’orego. "
To koro Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama:"Winjuru! Abiro keto kidi mar mise e Sayun,mondikie ni, ‘Ng’ama oyie ok norikni. ’En kidi motegno, moyier, ma nengone tek, momako kor ot.
Anami adiera bed rapim,kendo anami tim makare bed tol mipimogo ot, kigero. To kodh pe biro ywero miriambo ma ugeng’orugo. Kendo pi ohula biro mwomo kar konyruoku,
mi winjruok mane utimo gi tho, kethre,kendo singruok mane utimo gi Piny Joma Otho, rum. Pi mabubni noywo gik moko,mi unuchal gi piny ma ohula omwomo!
Pile pile ohula nobi, mi yweru. Adier, noywou okinyi kokinyi, kendo odiechieng’ gotieno. Kuwinjo wachni, to unukirni,
nimar unubed e thagruokmana ka ng’ama onindo e kitanda machiek,ma ok nyal riere tir,kendo ma baranget ma oumorego tin,ma ok nyal ume maber. "
Ruoth Nyasaye biro a malo gi mirima,kaka ne oa malo e got Perazim,kendo kaka ne otimo e holo mar Gibeon,mondo oti tije magalagala ma osechano timo,ma ji ok par ni onyalo timo.
Koro weuru sunga, nono to ibiro tueu gi ratego motegno,nimar asewinjo ka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto golo chik mondooketh piny duto.
Chikuru itu mondo uwinj wechena:
Uparo ni ng’ato nyalo siko ka puro apura puodho,to ok chwowe kodhi?Koso onyalo buso abusa nyalandra,to ok opidh gimoro?
Donge ka osetieko buso,to ochuoyo kothe mopogore opogore,moro ka moro gi kare mowinjore kode?
Ong’eyo gima onego otim,nikech Nyasaye ema puonje,kendo nyise yo maber monego otimee.
Cham duto ok diem machalre. Moko idino gi radin, to moko iteng’o gi luth.
Ngano en cham mayom, omiyo ok dine matek,nimar dipo ka ong’inyore matindotindo. Chutho, ok dine nyalandra. Kata ka obedo ni iywayo gari kuome mondo tiende gari odine,to ok tim kamanoo aming’a, nimar dipo ka orege mayom.
Wachno bende oa kuom Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto,ma ng’ado rieko mabeyo, kendo ma tekone duong’!Isaya
Jerusalem gi wasike
Yaye, inine malit in Jerusalem,dala mane Daudi obworoe!Kuom higa achiel kata higni ariyo sewni mitimo higa ka higa pod timore,
to bang’e anakelni masira,mi ywagruok gi nduru nobedie,kendo inichal gi kendo-mar-misango ma remo ochuerie!
Anabed jasiki, mi agoni ageng’a.
Nadwoki piny, mi iwuo mana gie lowo,kendo wecheni nowuog mana e buru. Duondi nochal gi dwond ng’at ma jajuogi,ma dwonde pilore ka wuok piny.
To oganda maduong’ ma kedo kodi nochal gi buru. Adier, oganda magerno nochal gi mihudhi ma yamo tero.
Piyopiyo nono, Ruoth Nyasaye manyalo Gik Moko Duto biro biro mondookonyi. Polo nomor, kendo piny noyiengni gi koko maduong’. Kodh yamo bende nobedie, gi kalausi,kod polo ma goyo gik moko.
Ogendini mang’eny ma goyoni ageng’a kendo kedo kodi,nolal nono mana ka lek mar otieno, yaye Jerusalem.
Ginichal gi ng’at modenyo ma leko ni chiemo,to chiew, yudo ni onge gima ochamo,kata ka ng’at ma riyo oloyo, ma leko ni modho,to chiew, yudo ni onge pi mosemodho. Mano e kaka ogendini makedo gi got Sayun nochal. "Jo-Israel gin muofni kendo andhoke
Nenore ni udhier nono.  Ara galreuru agala kanyo!Meruru amera, to ok gi divai, bende tagreuru ataga to ok nikech kong’o.
Nimar Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo ubedo gi chuny mar nindo matut. Ee, osedino wengeu, (tiende ni jonabiu),kendo oseumo wiyeu, (tiende ni jou ma koronu wach. )
Weche duto ma bironu e fweny, chalo gi kitabu modin gi dwogo. Kichiwo kitabuno ni ng’at mong’eyo somo,mi ikwaye ni mondo osomnigo,to obiro dwoki ni ok onyal some nikech odine.
To kata ka ichiwo kitabuno ni ng’at makia somo,mi iwachone ni mondo osome,to obiro dwoki ni ok ong’eyo somo.
Bang’ mano ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya,"Jogi lama mana gi dhogi kende,kendo gimiya luor mana gi dhogi ma oko,to chunygi bor koda, kendo luor ma giluoragoen mana chik mar dhano, momak gi wich.
Emomiyo anachak abwog jogi kendo,ka atimo gik malich ma miyo giwuoro. Rieko mar jogi mariek nolal nono,kendo paro matut mar jogi mang’ado rieko, norum. "
Yaye, unune malit, un joma temo pando parogi ni Nyasaye,kendo ma, kosetimo timbegi e mudho, to wacho niya,"Ere ng’ama nenowa, koso ere ng’ama ong’eyo gima watimo?"
To koro mano kaka uloko weche ataro,mana ka gima jachuech bende romre gi lowo mochueyo. Bende gimoro ma ochue dikwer ni jachuechne ok ochueye?Koso agulu bende diwachi ni ng’ama ochueye onge gi rieko?Okor wach ni nores jo-Israel
Bang’ kinde matin, Lebanon biro lokore puodho momew,mi yien mabeyo nodongie.
Chieng’no, joma itgi odinoo nowinj wach, ka isomo kitabu,kendo joma wengegi osebedo kotimo mudho mandiwa, nonen.
Joma muol nochak obed mamor kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Adier, joma odhierie moloyonobed mamor kuom Ng’ama Ler mar Israel.
Joma ger norum, kendo josunga ok nobedie,mi jogo duto ma timbegi mono notieki.
Gin jogo ma ketho nying ji,kendo ma buto mondo ohiny jong’ad bura,bende gimiyo buch ng’at makare iketho katyiem nono.
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach joka Jakobo,kendo mane owaro Ibrahim wacho kama:"Koro Jakobo ok bi yudo wichkuot,kendo kibaji ok nogoye,
nikech ka nyikwaye oneno gima asetimo ni ogandagi,to ginimi nyinga duong’. Ee, ginidend Ng’ama Ler mar Jakobo. Adier, ginimi Nyasach Israel luor.
Joma parogi bayo noyud rieko,kendo joma wigi tek bende nopuonji!"Isaya
Fuwo ma jo-Israel nigo kuom geno kuom jo-Misri
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,"Yaye, unune malit, un nyithinda ma jopiem!Uchano timo gik moko ma ok meka,bende utimo winjruok gi ogendini mamoko, to an ok ahero. Kamano umedo mana richo ewi richo!
Urikni kudhi Misri mondo uyud resruok kuom Farao,kendo ugeng’oru e tipo mar Misri, to ok upenja.
Gen mugenogo kuom Farao ok nokonyu,kendo geng’ruok mugeng’orugo e tipo Misri,nokelnu mana wichkuot,
nimar kata obedo ni jotelo mage ni Zoan,kendo jootene chopo nyaka Hanes,
to uduto unuyud wichkuot kuom oganda ma ok nyal konyouno. Adier, ok unuyud konyruok kata ohala moro,to mana wichkuot kod achaye. "
Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom ondiegi manie piny milambo ema:"Jooteugo kadho e piny ma masira gi parruok malit opong’o,kama sibuoche mamon nitie, kendo sibuoche machwo rutoe,bende kama thuonde mager mahuyo odakie. Kenje gi ngamia oting’o mwandugi,ka gitero ni oganda ma ok nyal konyou.
Adier, kata ka gitero mwandugi ni jo-Misri kamano,to kony ma ubiro yudo kuomgi romre gi nono. Mano ema omiyo achako Misri ni Rahab,ondiek ma budho abudha.
Koro dhiyo mondoo indik wachno kamoro. Ee, ndike mondo obed ranyisi e ndalo mabiro nyaka chieng’.
Jogo gin joma jopiem. Gin yawuowi ma jomriambo,ma odagi winjo chike ma Ruoth Nyasaye ogolo.
Giwacho ni jokor wach niya, ‘Kik une fweny. ’Jonabi to giwachonigi ni,‘Kik ukor wach moro mar adiera,to kornwauru mana weche mamit mag wuondruok.
Baruru uwe yo moriere tir,mondo kik wachak wawinj wach Ng’ama Ler mar Israel. ’ "
To Ng’ama Ler mar Israel wacho kama,"Ok usewinjo wachnano,bende usando ji, kendo utimo timbe mag miganga,kuparo ni gik ma kamago nyalo konyou,
omiyo richouno biro chalonu okak manie ohinga mabor,ma miyo ohinga barore tiarara, kendo podho ka diemo wang’,
mi ng’inyre matindotindo mana ka agulu motore,ma ok nyal yud take mikwanyogo mach,kata pate mitwomogo pi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel owacho niya,"Kuduogo ira, mi ubedo gi kue, to unuyud resruok. Bende kudemboru, kendo uketo genou kuoma, to un ubed gi teko. "To kata kamano ne udagi,
mi uwacho niya,"Ooyo, wabiro idho farese mondo waringi. "To mano ber, ringuru aringa, uyombi, kunyalo!To kata obedo ni uringo matek manade,to wasiku biro ringo matek mi juku.
Ng’at achiel noriemb jou alufu achiel,kendo ji abich kobwogou to unuring uduto mi uke nono,mana ka yien mokelore okelore ewi got. Nyasaye osingore ni obiro ng’wono ni joge
To kata kamano, Ruoth Nyasaye pod dwaro ng’wononu,kendo ogombo ahinya mondo okechu,nimar en Nyasaye ma jaadiera. Mano kaka jogo duto mogeno kuome gin johawi!
Un jo-Sayun modak Jerusalem, ok unuchak uywagii.  Ruoth Nyasaye birong’wononu, kendo obiro dwokou ka owinjo ywaku.
Kata obedo ni omiyochiembu gi piu doko matin, mi uthagru, to en, ma en japuonju, ok nochakopondnu kendo, to unubed kunene gi wang’u pile.
To kubaro korachamkata korachwich, mi uweyo yo, to unuwinj gi itu uwegi ka dwol morowachonu gi kang’eu niya, "Ma e yo, luweuru. "
Bang’e unukaw nyisecheumanono mubawo gi fedha kata gi dhahabu, mi uwiti ka ukwanogi ka gik maok ler, kaka tutu kata chieth.
Ruoth Nyasaye nokel koth ni chambu,kendo nomi puotheu chieg cham mogundho.  Jambu bende nokwa e legemadongodongo,
kendo ruethu kod kenjeu mupurogo nocham mana nganomopidhi maber, kendo mokirie kado.
Chieng’ nek maduong’no, ma ikethoekuonde mochiel motegno, aore kod sokni mamol nobed ewi gode madongo kodpidhe maboyo duto.
Chieng’no due nobed karieny maler ka wang’chieng’kendo wang’ chieng’ nobed ka rieny maler nyadibiriyo moloyo kaka orienypile.  Nochal mana gi ler mar ndalo abiriyo moriw e odiechieng’ achiel!En chieng’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye nochomie tiende joge kod bedegi motur, kendoochangie adhondegi. Kum ma Ruoth Nyasaye biro kumogo jo-Asuria
Neuru! Ruoth Nyasaye biro, kaa kuma bor. Mirimbe liel ka mach ma dhuolore. Dhoge tetni gi mirima mager,kendo lewe otimo mach makakni, mawang’o gik moko duto.
Muche bende chalo gi aora mopong’ ma mwomo genge,kendo imo ng’ato nyaka ng’ute. Obiro piedho ogendini gi rapiedhi mar tho,mi omi giba yo ma gidwaro luwo,mana ka faras michiko gi chuma ma otue e dhoge.
To un, unuwer wende mor,mana ka wende miwero e otieno mitimoe sawo maler. Unubed mamor e chunyu,mana kaka jolemo bedo mamore kinde ma jago asili otelonigika gidhi e god Ruoth Nyasaye ma en lwanda mar Israel.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nomi winj dwonde man gi duong’,kendo nonyis bade motimo mach mawang’o gik moko duto,ka lor gi mirima mager,ka polo mor gi koth maduong’, machue gi pe kod yamo mager.
Kihondko nomak jo-Asuria ka giwinjo dwond Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo ka ogoyogi gi ludhe.
Un to nubed mamor kugoyo thumbe, kendo uwere kinde duto ma ruoth Nyasaye goyogie.
To mach miwang’oe ringre joma otho ne oseik chonmondo owang’ie Molok, nyasach Asuria. Kendono duong’ ahinya, kendo odhurie yien mogundho. Much Ruoth Nyasaye ma chalo gi mach malielema biro mokoe. Isaya
Jo-Misri gin mana ji, ok gin Nyasaye
Mano kaka utimo gima ofuwo, un joma dhi Misri mondo uyud konyruok!Uketo genou kuom farese, kendo kuom geche mag lweny mang’eny ka kuoyo,kod joidh farese gana gi gana, to ok udew Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Lermar Israel, kata kwaye mondo otelnu.
To Ruoth Nyasaye riek, kendoonyalo kelo masira, bende ok olok parone.  Obiro kumo oganda mar joricho,kaachiel gi joma konyogi.
Jo-Misri gin mana ji, to ok gin Nyasaye,bende faresegi gin mana ring’o to ok gin roho.  Omiyo ka Ruoth Nyasayeorieyo bade mondo okumgi, to joma ikonyo kaachiel gi joma konyogi,nopodh piny, mi gilal nono giduto.
Ruoth Nyasaye osewachona niya, "Kaka sibuor kata nyathi sibuor ng’ur,kachamo chiayo mosemako, to ok odew, bende ok oluor kata ka jokwathmang’eny ochokore ka goyo koko, mondo oriembe, e kaka Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto nolor piny mondo oked ewi got Sayun.
Bende kakawinyo huyo but ode, ka rito nyithinde, e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto nobed karito Jerusalem.  Ee, norite kendo nokonye, bendenorese. "
Yaye, jo-Israel, duoguru ir Nyasaye ma useweyo chuth,
nimar chieng’ maunuwitie nyisecheu manono mag fedha gi dhahabu, ma useloso gi lwetumotimo richo,
to noneg jo-Asuria gi ligangla, to ok gi ligangla madhano kedogo.  Giniring lweny, mi yawuotgi ma jolweny nolok wasumbni.
Kihondko nomak jodonggi, mi dhier nono, kendo jotendgi mag lweny bendekibaji nogo ma ok nyal ringo.  Mano e wach maradier mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mamaye omoki Sayun.  Adier, maye ng’ang’ni Jerusalem. Isaya
Jo-Misri gin mana ji, ok gin Nyasaye
Mano kaka utimo gima ofuwo, un joma dhi Misri mondo uyud konyruok!Uketo genou kuom farese, kendo kuom geche mag lweny mang’eny ka kuoyo,kod joidh farese gana gi gana, to ok udew Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Lermar Israel, kata kwaye mondo otelnu.
To Ruoth Nyasaye riek, kendoonyalo kelo masira, bende ok olok parone.  Obiro kumo oganda mar joricho,kaachiel gi joma konyogi.
Jo-Misri gin mana ji, to ok gin Nyasaye,bende faresegi gin mana ring’o to ok gin roho.  Omiyo ka Ruoth Nyasayeorieyo bade mondo okumgi, to joma ikonyo kaachiel gi joma konyogi,nopodh piny, mi gilal nono giduto.
Ruoth Nyasaye osewachona niya, "Kaka sibuor kata nyathi sibuor ng’ur,kachamo chiayo mosemako, to ok odew, bende ok oluor kata ka jokwathmang’eny ochokore ka goyo koko, mondo oriembe, e kaka Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto nolor piny mondo oked ewi got Sayun.
Bende kakawinyo huyo but ode, ka rito nyithinde, e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto nobed karito Jerusalem.  Ee, norite kendo nokonye, bendenorese. "
Yaye, jo-Israel, duoguru ir Nyasaye ma useweyo chuth,
nimar chieng’ maunuwitie nyisecheu manono mag fedha gi dhahabu, ma useloso gi lwetumotimo richo,
to noneg jo-Asuria gi ligangla, to ok gi ligangla madhano kedogo.  Giniring lweny, mi yawuotgi ma jolweny nolok wasumbni.
Kihondko nomak jodonggi, mi dhier nono, kendo jotendgi mag lweny bendekibaji nogo ma ok nyal ringo.  Mano e wach maradier mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mamaye omoki Sayun.  Adier, maye ng’ang’ni Jerusalem. Isaya
Ruoth ma timne kare
Winjuru!Ruoth moro biro biro ma norit piny e yo makare,kendo jotende noti gi adiera.
Adier, ng’at moro nobed ni jika kama gibwogoe koth gi yamo,bende noduog chuny ji mana ka aore mamol e piny motwo,kata ka tipo mang’ich mar lwanda maduong’,man e piny maliet ma chieng’ kechie.
Wenge joma neno onge gima nomon neno,bende it joma winjo nowinj awinja.
Chuny ng’at mamwomore nobed gi rieko,kendo ng’at ma radwal nolos maber.
Ng’at ma achach ok nochak oluong ni ng’at malong’o,bende ng’at ma jamganga ok nochak oluong ni ng’ama ogen,
nimar ng’at ma achach nobed kawuoyo ka ng’ama achach adier,kendo chunye ka paro mana timo timbe manono. Gik motimo duto nobed gik maricho,kendo ka owuoyo to owacho miriambo koda ka kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Omono joma odenyo chamo gik ma onego gicham,bende otamo joma riyo oloyo modho.
Ng’at ma achach yorene richo. Ochano gik maricho e chunye,mondo ohiny joma odhier gi weche mag miriambo, kendo otamo jochan eadiera monego giyudi.
Ng’at ma jaadiera to paro mana gik makare,kendo ok we adiera kata matin. Osiem mond Jerusalem
Un mon modak e ngima maber,auru malo mondo uwinj gima awacho!Un nyiri ma ok dew gimoro.
E sani pod onge gima badhou,to bang’ higa achiel gi ndalo moko manok,unubed gi kibaji, nikech cham ok nochiegi,omiyo ok nuyud gima ukayo.
Un mon ma sani odak e ngima maber, parreuru!Weuru dhil mudhilgono!Lonyreuru duk mondo utue piende gugru e nungou,
kendo ywaguru, nikech puotheu momewkod mzabipu ma nyago olemo mabeyo biro kethore.
Kudho kod pedo ema biro gawore e puothe joga,nimar ot ka ot ma yande mor nitie e dalau maduong’, nodong’ nono.
Ji noring owe udi mabeyo madongodongo duto,mi dala ma yande ji thothie nodong’ nono. Nobed lek maber ni le mae thim,kendo jamni bende nokwae. Kuonde moting’ore mochiel motegno mag siro lwenykod kuonde maboyo mag rito,nolokre thim kuom ndalo mang’eny,
nyaka chop roho moa e polo malo lor kuomwa. Eka piny motwo nolokre puothe momew,mi yien mabeyo dongie.
Bang’e adiera gi tim makare nobedi e piny duto,kuonde momew koda ka kuonde motimo ongoro,
mi kue nosik nyaka chieng’, kendo luoro ok nobedie.
Kamano joga nobed e piny mokue,ka gidak gi mor, ma onge koko.
Tik gode ma otimo bungu nobed mang’ich maber,kendo mier manie pap nobed gi kue.
Koro mano kaka unubed mamor,ka ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu chwoyo chambe e bath aora,kendo weyo jambe wuotho awuotha kaka ohero!Isaya
Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelo warruok
Yaye unune malit un jo-Asuria!Useketho gik moko, to un pok okethu. Bende usendhogo ji, to un pok ondhogu. To koro ka usetieko ketho gik moko,to uun ema ibiro kethu,kendo ka utieko ndhogo ji,to un ema ibiro ndhogu.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, wan too kechwa nimar wageno kuomi. Yie imiwa teko okinyi kokinyi,kendo reswa e kinde mar masira.
Ka ji owinjo kiting’o dwondi, mi imor, to giringo,kendo ka ia malo, to ogendini ke.
Mwandugi noyaki, mi tieki,mana kaka bonyo nang’o lum, mi tieki. Adier, ji nopot kuomgi mana ka det bonyo.
Ruoth Nyasaye duong’ moloyo, nikech odak e polo malo. Opong’o Sayun gi adiera kod tim makare,
kendo ubiro yiengoru kuome e ndalou duto. Rieko gi ng’eyo ema kelo resruok,kendo luor ma oluorgo Ruoth Nyasaye e mwandune!
Neuru kaka thuondu ywak e wang’yore. Adier, joote museoro mondo odwar kue, ywak malit.
Yore madongo odong’ nono; jowuoth ok luwgi. Singruok duto okethi, kendo winjruok motim ok dew. Dhano bende ok kwan ka gimoro.
Piny ywak, kendo dok chien. Lebanon two, kendo kethoreSharon bende olokore thim,kendo Bashan gi Karmel oyaki modong’ nono.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni jo-Asuria niya,"Koro abiro a malo mondo anyis duong’na maler.
Gik ma uchano timo gin gik manono,kendo yamo maliet ka mach biro tiekou pep.
Ogendini nokethi chuth, mi lokre pidhe mag choka,kendo ginichal gi kudho mobeti, mi owang’ e mach.
Un mudak kuonde maboyo, winjuru gima asetimo. To un ma un machiegni, yieru ni aratego. "
Joricho modak Sayun biro tetni ka luoro omako. Adier, joma ok dew Nyasaye kihondko nomaki,mi ginipenjre niya, "Bende nitie ng’ato kuomwamanyalo dak gi mach mawang’o gik moko duto?Koso en ng’a ma didag gi mach maliel nyaka chieng’?"
Ng’atno nyakaa bed mana ng’at ma timbene oriere,kendo ma wacho adiera,bende ma ok dwar mwandu miyudo gi malang’,kendo ma riembo asoya kucha,bende ma dino ite ni weche mag chwero remo,kendo ma umo wang’e ni timbe mamono.
Ng’at ma kamano nodag kama oting’ore mokue. Got mabor motimo lwendni ema nobed kare mar g’eng’ruok,kendo enobed koyudo chiemo gi pi morome.
Enone Ruoth gi duong’ne duto,kendo norang piny moyarore malach.
Chunye nonyise gik machon,kendo nopar kaka ne oluoro wasigumane ochung’ e tok ohinga mar dalagi,ka chano kaka dimwom ohingano, mi yakgi.
Ok enochak one oganda mager ma dhogi tek winjo,kendo mawuoyo kabodho wach ma ok winjreno.
Ka orango Sayun, dala mwatimoe sewni,to enone ni en dala man gi kue. Ee, kong’iyo Jerusalem,to enone ni ochalo gi hema ma ok tungni,ma loyene ogur motegnokendo ma kata tonde achiel ok ochot.
Kanyo ema duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nonenreeEnochalnwa aora malach man gi bade mang’eny. Onge yiedhi ma nokwang’ kanyo, kikiewo,kata ma noringie gi tanga. Tondegi ombekni ma ok nyal rido murungot, kata ywayo tanga,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye en jang’adnwa bura. En e ruodhwa, ma ketonwa chik, kendo en ema noreswa.
Bang’e ng’ama muofu kod ng’ama rang’olbende noyud pok kuom gik moyaki.
Onge ng’at ma odak kuno ma nowach ni otuo,kendo richo mag ji man kuno nong’wonnigi. Isaya
Ruoth Nyasaye okecho gi Edom kod ogendini mamoko
Un ugendini mae piny, biuru ka mondo uchik itu. Piny ngima kod gimoro amora manie iye, mondo owinj wachna,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nigi mirima mager kod ogendini duto,kod jogi mag lweny. Kuom mano osekuong’ogi ni mondo oneggi, mi tiekgi chuth.
Jogi monegi nowe oko mak oyiki,mi ringregi pong’ piny gi mifuolu,kendo rembgi nobubni e gode.
E ndalono gik moko duto manie polo malo noleny, mi lal nono. Polo bende nodol mana ka kalatas,kendo sulue nolwar piny mana ka oboke moner,kata ka olemo mochiek.
To ka ligangla mar Ruoth Nyasaye osetieko tichne e polo,to obiro lwar kuom jo-Edom,ma en oganda ma osekuong’o mondo otieki.
Ligangla mar Ruoth Nyasaye notim remo lilo,kendo boche nogawre kuome,mana ka gima gin boche mag nyiroke imbe,kod remb rombe gi diek mitimogo misango,nimar Ruoth Nyasaye biro timo misango Bozra, dala Edom. Ee, obiro neko malich e piny Edom.
To kar nego jope, to ruodhi ema obiro nego, kendo kar nego ruedhi,to oganda mar joma rateke ema nonegi,mi remo pong’ piny, kendo piny leny nikech boche,
nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseketo chieng’ ma obiro chuloe kuor. Adier, oseketo higa ma nokumie jo-Edomkuom gima ne gitimo ni Sayun.
Aore mag Edom nolokre lam,kendo lowo man kuno nolokre mach lilo,
mi pinyno lokre lam maliel otieno gi odiechieng’,ma ok nyal negi, bende iro nodumie mochwere. Enodong’ thim kuom higni gi higni,kendo onge ng’ama nochak oluw kuno.
Nobed kama otenga gi chiew gi tula kod agak ema odakie. Ruoth Nyasaye nopim pinyno, mi oyud ni oromo gi kethoo,omiyo enodog’ nono.
Onge ruoth ma noti pinyno, bende jodonge norum pep.
Kudho ema noyugno e udi madongodongo man kuno,kendo aila kod pedo nogawre e mier mage mochiel gi ohinga. Enobed piny marach ma ondiegi ema nitie,kendo ma tula ema odakie.
Le mae thim kod ondiegi norom kuno,kendo kanyo ema jochiende noyudree. Gik malich mag otieno nodag kanyo,mi yud kar yueyo.
Aywer noger ode kuno,mi nywolie tonge, kendo toye nyithindo. Noumgi gi buombe mondo kik gimoro chamgi. Otenga bende nochokre kuno, moro ka moro gi wadgi.
Somuru kitap Ruoth Nyasaye,to ubiro yudo ni onge achiel kuom gigo ma nobed maonge,kendo roho mare ema nochokgi.
En ema oseyiero ni moro ka moro kare,kendo osepogonigi piny, kipimo gi tol. Pinyno nobed margi nyaka chieng’,kendo ginidagie tieng’ gi tieng’. Isaya
Gueth ma Ruoth Nyasaye guedhogo Israel
Thimbe kod pinje motwo nobed mamor,kendo maupe mabeyo nothiew kuondego.
Ee, ginithiew mang’eny, kendo piny nopong’ gi wende mor. Kuonde ma yande otwo nobed mang’ichmana ka gode mag Lebanon,kata ka lege mabeyo mag Sharon kod mag got Karmel,kendo jo-Israel none duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasachgi.
Teguru bede mayomyom,kendo rieuru chong monyosore,
bende nyisuru chuny mool niya,"Beduru motegno, kendo kik ubed maluor. Neuru! Nyasachu biro mondo ochul kuor. Ee, obiro mondo okum wasiku kaka owinjore, kendo oresu. "
Bang’e muofni nonen, kendo joma itgi odino nowinj wach.
Rang’onde bende nochikre ka nyidiek,kendo momni nower gi mor,nimar pi nobubni e piny motwo,kendo aore nobed ka molie.
Lop kuoyo ma yande chieng’ oowo gi lietnolokre dago mar pi,kendo sokni nowuog e lowo motwo,mi kuonde ma yande ondiegi ema odakiebed kuonde ma lum gi odundu gi togo dongoe.
Wang’yo maduong’ nobed e thimno,kendo noluonge ni, ‘Wang’yo Maler’Joma ok ler gi joma ofuwo ok nowuothie.
Sibuoche ok nodhi kuno,kendo onge kata mana ondiek magerma nosud machiegni kode. To yorno ema joma Ruoth Nyasaye osewaro nowuothie.
Adier, joma Ruoth Nyasaye osereso noluw yorno,ka duogo dala. Ginidonj Sayun ka gikok gi mor kendo ka giil,to kuyo gi parruok nolal nono. Isaya
Senakerib omonjo Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E higa mar apar gang’wen, mar loch Hezekia, Senakerib ruodh Asurianomonjo miech Juda mochiel motegno duto, mokawo.
Ne ooro Rabshake kodoganda lweny mang’ongo ka en Lakish mondo odhi Jerusalem ir ruothHezekia.  Kane Rabshake ochopo kuno, ne ochung’ but fereji magolo pi eyawo mamalo man yo mochiko puodho milyuongo ni Pwoth Jalwok Lewni.
Eliakim wuod Hilkia ma jaduong’ od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro, kod Joawuod Asa jachan weche mag piny ne jowuok modhi ire kanyo.
Eka Rabshakenowachonigi niya, "Nyisuru Hezekia ni ruoth maduong’ ma ruodh Asuriaowacho kama: ‘Ere gima omiyo idhialori kamano?
In iparo ni weche awechanyalo lokore rieko kod teko miloyogo lweny? En ng’a ma igeno ni birokonyi piem koda?
Ang’eyo ni idhialori nikech jo-Misri, to nyaka ing’eni jo-Misri chalo gi odundu mobarore, ma ka ng’ato oyiengoree, to pilorekendo chwowo lwete.  Mano e kaka Farao, ruodh Misri, chalo, ni jogo dutomogeno kuome!’
To kuwachona ni ugeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, todonge en e Nyasaye ma Hezekia hembko gi kuonde mitimonee misengni,kochiko jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem ni nyaka lem mana e nyimkendo-mar-misango man Jerusalem kende?
"Koro in Hezekia, singri ni ruodh Asuria ma atiyone! Ayie miyi faresealufu ariyo kapo nono ni inyalo yudo joma idhogi!
Ka jo-Misri ema igenoni biro konyi gi geche kod joidh farese, to ere kaka iparo ni dilo katamana achiel matinie moloyo kuom jotend lweny mag ruodha?
Koso iparo niasebiro mana ni mondo amonj amonja Jerusalem, akethi, ka ok RuothNyasaye ema oyiena? Ng’eni Ruoth Nyasaye ema nowachona ni mondo abiamonj pinyni akethi. "
Eka Eliakim gi Shebna kod Joa nowacho ni Rabshake niya, "Wasayi, yieiwuo kodwa gi dho Aram, nikech en dhok mwang’eyo, to we wuoyo kodwa gidho Hibrania kae, nimar joma ni ewi ohinga nyalo winjowa. "
To Rabshakene odwokogi, ka penjogi niya, "Uparo ni un kod ruodhu kende ema neruodha oora iru mondo awachnu wechegi? Ooyo, oora ir joma nie wi ohinga,ma ochunore ni nyaka cham chiethgi, kendo madh lachgi giwegi, mana kakaun bende unutim!"
Bang’ mano nochung’ mokok gi dwol maduong’ gi dhoHibrania niya, "Winjuru wach ruoth maduong’ ma ruodh Asuria!
Owacho nikik uyie Hezekia wuondu, nikech ok onyal resou.
Bende kik uwe ohou nimondo ugen kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kowachonu ni, adier Ruoth Nyasaye emanoresu, kendo ni ruodh Asuria ok nokaw dala maduong’ni.
Kik uwinj wachHezekia, nimar ruodh Asuria owacho niya, ‘Winjreuru koda, mondo ubi ira,mi ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nocham olemb mzabipe kod ng’ope, bende nomodhpi e sokone owuon,
nyaka chop abi mi agolu kendo ateru e piny machalgi pinyuni.  En piny ma cham gi mzabibu chiekie maber, kendo ma makati gidivai ng’enyie.
Tang’uru, nono to Hezekia owitou, kowuondou ni RuothNyasaye biro konyou.  Bende nitie nyasach piny moro mosereso pinye e lwetruodh Asuria?
Nyiseche mag Hamath gi Arpad ni kanye? Koso ere nyisechemag Sefarvaim? Bende ne gireso Samaria e lweta?
Kuom nyiseche duto magpinjego, ere moro mosereso pinye e lweta, ma dimi upar ni Ruoth Nyasayenyalo reso Jerusalem e lweta?’ "
To ji noling’ thi, ma onge ng’at modwoke wach kata achiel, nikechruoth Hezekia nosegolo chik ni kik dwoke.
Eliakim wuod Hilkia majaduong’ od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro kod Joa wuod Asaf ma jachan wechemag piny ne jobiro ir Hezekia, ka joyiecho lepgi, mi ginyise gima neRabshake owacho. Isaya
Nyasaye oreso piny Juda e lwet Senakerib(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Kane ruoth Hezekia owinjo wechego, noyiecho lepe, mi orwako pien gugru,kendo odhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.
Nooro Eliakim ma jaduong’ ode, gi Shebnama jagoro kod jodolo madongo ir janabi Isaya wuod Amoz ka jorwako piendegugru,
mondo odhi owachne niya, "Hezekia owacho ni kawuono en chieng’dhier gi kum kod wichkuot.  Wachalo gi dhako ma muoch kayo, to onge muyamocholgo nyathi.
Nyalo bet ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osewinjo wecheRabshake, ma ruodh Asuria oseoro, mondo oyany Nyasaye Mangima.  Omiyokoro obiro kumo Rabshake nikech weche ma osewinjo ka Rabshake wachogo. Kuom mano, in Isaya, lem ni jowa mapod odong’. "
Kamano, kane jodong ruoth Hezekia ochopo ir Isaya, mowachone wechego,
ne odwokogi niya, "Dhiuru uwach ni ruodhu ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:‘Kik iluor weche ma isewinjo ka ruodh Asuria yanyago
nikech abiro miyechuny man gi kibaji, ma kowinjo wach moro marach, to noring odog epinye, kuma nami onegee. ’ "
Rabshake nodok, moyudo ni ruodh Asuria osea Lakish, odhi monjo Libna. Omiyoo nodhi ire kuno.
To kane ruodh Asuria owinjo ni Tirhaka ruodhEthiopia obiro monje, nochako oro joote ir Hezekia ruodh Juda kowachoniya,
"Kik iyie Nyasachi migeno kuomeno wuondi ni ruodh Asuria oknokaw Jerusalem.
Chutho, isewinjo kaka ruodhi mag Asuria osekethopinje mane gikedogo chuth.  To koro iparo ni in ema dikwo?
Kwerenanonego jo-Gozan gi jo-Haran gi jo-Rezef kod jo-Eden ma nodak Telasar. Koro dak ne nyisechegi okonyogi?
Koso ere ruodhi mag Hamath gi Arpadgi Sefarvaim gi Hena kod Iva?"
Hezekia nokawo barua mane joote okelone, mi osomo.  Bang’e ne odhi eHekalu, mi oyaro baruano e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,
kokwaye niya,
"ARuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma Nyasach Israel, mobet ewi kerubikaka ruoth bet e komduong’ne, in kendi e Nyasach ogendini duto mae piny,kendo in ema nichueyo polo gi piny.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, chik iti mondoiwinji, kendo iyaw wang’i mondo inen.  Winj weche ma Senakerib yanyigo,in Nyasaye Mangima!
A Ruoth Nyasaye, en adier ni ruodhi mag Asuriaoseketho pinje duto,
mi gibolo nyisechegi e mach, kendo gisekethogichuth, nimar ne ok gin nyiseche kata matin, to mana tich dhano molos giyath kata gi kidi.
To koro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, reswa e lwetSenakerib, mondo ogendini duto mae piny ong’e ni in kendi e Nyasaye. "
Eka Isaya wuod Amoz nooro ni Hezekia wach niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho ni osewinjo lemo mikwayego nikech wach maSenakerib ruodh Asuria osesiemigo,
omiyo osewuoyo kuom Senakerib kama:In Senakerib, dala Sayun ochayi kendo jari!Ee, dala Sayun twenyoni ume!
To koro in, en ng’ano ma isejaro kendo iyanyo?Koso en ng’a ma isekokne ka ijowo wang’i?Nyaka ing’e ni en Ng’ama Ler mar Israel!
Isejaro Ruoth Nyasaye gi dho jooteni, kiwacho niya,‘Aseidho gode maboyo mag Lebanon, mi achopo midimidi,ka an gi gechena mag lweny mang’eny mokadho akwana. Bende asetong’o yiend sida madongo,kod yiend saipras mabeyo man kuno. Asechopo nyaka e chuny bungu, kama ni iye mogik,kendo ma yien odichie.
Asekunyo sokni, mi amodho pi pinje mamoko. Bende aore mag Misri noduono, ka anyonogi gi tienda!’
To in Senakerib, kata obedo ni iwacho kamano,donge ing’eyo ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ema ne achano chon mondo gigo otimre?. Adier, ne achanogi chon, to koro amiyo gitimore. An ema ne achano mondo imuk mier mochiel motegno, olokre gundni,
ma joma odakie chalo gi lum ma e pap, maonge gi teko,kata ka lum matwi e tat ot, to ner kapok odongo,nimar ne gionge gi teko,kendo ne ging’eng’ ka luoro omakogi.
To ang’eyo timbeni duto:ang’eyo kata ka ichung’, kata ka ibet piny,kata kiwuok, kata kiduogo dala.
Asewinjo kaka iyanya malich, kendo kaka isungori,omiyo abiro keto mbedo e umi, kod rajaki e dhogi,mondo awichi idog thuru gi yo mane ibirogo.
To winji, in Hezekia, ranyisi ma amiyi ema:E higa mokwongoni, unucham gik matwi kendgi,kendo e higa mar ariyo unucham orowe moloth e higa mokwongono,to e higa mar adek unuket kodhi, kendo unuka cham. Bende unupidh mzabibu, bende unucham olembgi.
Jo-Juda modong’ nochal gi yathma tero tiendene piny, kendo nyago olemo e bedene,
nimar joma nok modong’ nowuog Jerusalem. Adier, oganda mar joma otony noa e got Sayun. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutooseketo chunye mondo otim kamano.
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kuom ruodh Asuria kama:"Ok nodonj e dala Jerusalem,kendo ok nobaye gi asere,kata monjogo koting’o kuot ok nomonje. Bende ok nong’ing pith mondo oidhgo ohingane.
Enodog gi yo ma nobirogo, to ok nodonj Jerusalem,
nimar anaked ni dalani mondo aresi,nikech nyinga, kendo nikech Daudi jatichna. "
Malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi monego jo-Asuria alufu mia achiel gipiero aboro gabich (
,
) e kambigi, kendo kane ji ochiew gokinyi, toringre joma otho ema ne ginwang’o kopie piny.
Mano omiyo Senakeribruodh Asuria noa kuno, mi odok Nineve, odakie.
To chieng’ moro, kaneoyudo olemo e od Nisrok nyasache, yawuote ma Adramelek gi Sharezernobiro monege.  Bang’e ne giringo, mi gidhi e piny Ararat, to Esarhadonnodoko ruoth kar Senakerib wuon mare. Isaya
Tuo omako Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E ndalogo, Hezekia ne tuo, kendo ohewore.  Janabi Isaya wuod Amoz nobiroire, mowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni mondo ilam mwanduni niyawuoti, nimar ibiro tho, ok nikwo. "
Kane Hezekia owinjo kamano,nolokore mong’iyo kor ot, kokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
"A Ruoth Nyasayeasayi; parie kaka asewuotho e nyimi gi adiera kod chuny mobidhore, kaatimo gik malong’oni. " Eka ne oywak malit!
Bang’e wach Ruoth Nyasayenobiro ni Isaya niya,
"Dhiyo iwach ni Hezekia ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Daudi kwaru owacho kama: ‘Asewinjo kwayoni, kendo aseneno piwang’i.
Omiyo abiro medi ndalo moromo higni apar gabich, bende abiroresi kaachiel gi dala Jerusalem e lwet ruodh Asuria, kendo abiro ritodalani. ’ " Eka Isaya ne owacho ni jood Hezekia ni mondo okel ng’owomoswagi, omwon e bur mokuodo Hezekia.  Ne gitimo kamano, mi bur nochango. Bang’ mano, Hezekia nopenjo niya: Ere gima biro bedona ranyisi ni abirodhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye?
To Isaya nodwoke ni, "Ranyisi ma Ruoth Nyasayeonyisigo ni obiro timo gima osewacho e ma:
Rang ane tipo mar wang’chieng’ manie raidhi mar dhood Ahaz.  Abiro dwoko tipono chien ondamoapar. " Kamano wang’chieng’ nodok chien ondamo apar e raidhi mane oyudooselorie.
Koro weche mag Hezekia ruodh Juda mane ondiki ka osechango e magi:
"Ne aparo ni abiro tho kapod atin,kendo ni abiro tieko ndalona duto e piny joma otho.
Ne awacho niya:Ok anachak aneni A Ruoth Nyasaye, e piny joma ngima,bende ok nachak ane dhano gi wang’a kaka joma ngima neno.
Osepudh oda, mi owit kucha,mana kaka ipudho kiru mar jakwath. A Ruoth Nyasaye, iseng’ado ngimana machiekmana kaka jatueng’o dolo usi, kendo ng’ado. Isanda, chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo,
kendo aywak ka an gi rem malit nyaka piny ru. Chokena duto otur, mana ka gima sibuor ema oturo. Adier, isanda, chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo,
omiyo aywak mana ka opija kata akuru,kendo wengena otho bo kuom rango malo. A Ruoth Nyasaye, winj ywakna mondo ibed jawarna.
Ere kaka dater ywakna ni Ruoth Nyasaye?Koso en ang’o ma dawachne,ka en owuon ema osetimona gigi duto,nikech chandruok ma chunya nigo.
To pod chunya nobed mana kodi, A Ruoth Nyasaye. In ema imiyo chunya yueyo. Duoga iri mondo abed mangima.
Chutho, koro aseneno ni chandruok duto mane aseyudo konya,nimar iseresa e tho nikech herani. Bende isewito richona duto ka dieng’eyi.
Piny joma otho ok nyal goyoni erokamano!Adier, joma otho ok nyal paki. Chutho, joma osedhi e bur ok nyal geno adiera mari.
To joma ngima kende ema nyalo goyoni erokamanokaka agoyoni kawuononi. Wuone bende nyiso yawuotgi adiera mari, A Nyasaye.
Ruoth Nyasaye oikore mondo oresa!Kuom mano, waweruru wende pak,ka wagoyo thumbe e Od Ruoth Nyasayee ndalo duto mag ngimawa. "Isaya
Hezekia oyudo joote moa Babulon(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
E ndalo Merodak-baladan wuod Baladan, ma ruodh Babulon, nooro joote irHezekia gi barupe kod mich, nikech ne owinjo ni yande otuo, to koroosedoko mangima.
Hezekia norwako jootego, monyisogi mwandune duto maneni e ode mar keno, kaka fedha gi dhahabu gi gik mang’ue ng’ar, gi mo manengone tek kod gilweny, kaachiel gi gik moko duto mane ni kuondekanone.  Onge gimoro amora e ode kata e pinye mane ok onyisogi.
To bang’e janabi Isaya nobiro ir ruoth Hezekia, mopenjee niya, "Jogi oakanye? To wach ang’o mokelogi?" Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Gia e piny Babulon,kuma bor. "
Janabi Isaya nomedo penje niya, "To ang’o ma gineno e odi?"Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Giseneno gik moko duto manie oda.  Onge gimoro amoramodong’ mak anyisogi e kuonde kenona. "
Bang’ mano Isaya nowacho niHezekia niya, "Winj wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.
Ndalobiro ma gik moko duto manie odi, ma kwereni osekano nyaka chil kawuono,noter Babulon.  Bende Ruoth Nyasaye omedo wacho ni onge gima nodong’ kataachiel mak oter.
Yawuoti moko nolok wasumbini.  Adier moko kuom yawuotihie nolok wasumbni mabuoch e od ruodh Babulon. "
Hezekia ne odwoke niya,"Wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma isenyisa ber. " To ne odwoke kamano, koparo ni ento kue biro siko e ndalone duto. Isaya
Weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye ohoyogo chuny jo-Jerusalem
Nyasachu wacho kama:"Houru chuny joga! Hogiuru!
Wuouru gi jo-Jerusalem gi muolo,kuwachonigi ni gisetieko ndalogi mag tuech,kendo ni osekumgi moromo. Ruoth Nyasaye osekumogi nyadiriyo kuom richogi duto. "
Dwol moro kok niya,"Losuru ni Ruoth Nyasaye yo e thim. Losuru ni Nyasachwa ndara mopie e piny motwo.
Hohni duto nobugikendo gode duto nopie. Yore motimo gogni bende nobed maler,kendo kuonde motimo gode nobed pewe.
Eka duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyre,mi ji duto nonene kaachiel,nimar Ruoth Nyasaye owuon ema owacho kamano. "
Dwol moro wacho niya, "Ting’ dwondi iwuo. "To moro dwoko ni, "Ere gima dawachi?""Wach niya, ‘Dhano ka dhano chalo gi lum,kendo berne duto chalo gi maua manie pap.
Lum ner, kendo maua two,ka much Ruoth Nyasaye okudhogi. Chutho, dhano chalo gi lum.
Adier, lum two, maua bende ner,to wach Nyasachwa to osiko nyaka chieng’. ’ "
In mikelo ni Sayun wach maber,idh wi got mabor, kendo ikogi matek. Ee, in mikelo ni Jerusalem wach maber,ting’ dwondi, ikogi matek ka ok iluor,kiwacho ni miech Juda niya, "Eri, Nyasachu ni ka. "
Ng’euru ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro gi teko. Obiro loyo piny gi tekone maduong’neuru, obiro gi joge mogonyo e lweny ka wuotho e nyime,ka gik moyako.
Ochalo jakwath ma sembo jambe,koting’o nyirombe e bade, kendo oriwogi e kore,kotelo ni mago man gi nyithindo, kotero modho. Nyasach Israel ok pim gi nyasaye moro
En ng’a mane opimo pi nembe e chuny lwete,kata mane opimo duong’ mar polo gi lith lwete?En ng’a mane opimo lowo duto manie piny,kata mane opimo gode madongo gi matindo e ratilmak mana Ruoth Nyasaye?
Ere ng’at ma oseng’ado ni Ruoth Nyasaye rieko,kata mosechung’ e dire ka puonje?
Bende Ruoth Nyasaye osedwaroe rieko moro kuom ng’ato,kata dwaro ni mondo ng’ato opuonje adiera kod yore mabeyo?Ooyo, ok osetimo kamano,
nikech ogendini duto mag piny ok gimoro kipimo kode. Giromre mana gi pi maton kaa e dapi,kata ka buru momoko e ratil. Adier, chulni gi dhonembe duto yotne mana ka muya!
Yien duto manie piny Lebanon,kaachiel gi le duto man kuno,ok nyal romo timonego misango miwang’o pep.
Ogendini duto ok gimoro e nyime. Okwanogi ka gik manono ma onge tich.
En ng’a ma dipim gi Nyasaye?Koso ang’o ma diwachi ni chal kode?
Dochal gi kido ma ng’ato ochueyo,kendo ma jatheth dhahabu obawo gi dhahabu,mi othedhone thiwni mag fedha koso?
Koso dochal gi yien maber ma ok tow ma ng’ato oyiero,mi oluongo japecho molonymondo olosnego kido mopa ma ok nyal podho?
Donge ung’eyo, koso pok uwinjo,
ni Nyasaye obet e polo malo,kendo ni joma odak e piny chalone mana dede. Ok osewachnu kamano chakre chon?Koso pok uparo nyaka ne chue pinyni en ema ne oyaro polo mana ka pasia,kendo ogure mana ka hema midakie?
Odwoko ruodhi gi jotelo duto piny, mi lokre gima nono.
Ka okudho muya kuomgi, to giner,mi kalausi dhi kodgi mana ka mihudhi,nimar gichalo gi kodhi mokom machiegni,ma tiendegi pok ochwowo lowo.
Ng’ama Ler penjo niya,"To koro en ng’a ma duporago?Koso ere ng’ama dirom koda?
Ting’uru wengeu malo e polo,mondo upar ane ng’ama ne ochueyo gigo duto. Donge en mana Jal mane otelo ni oganda mar sulue,ka oluongo moro ka moro gi nyinge,mana ka gima en jaduong’ lweny motelo ni jolwenje?Tekone maduong’ malich omiyo onge kata mana sulue achielma ok ochung’ kare.
Un jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo, ere gima omiyo ung’ur,kuwacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ok ne yorewa,kendo ok ong’adnwa bura maber"?
Donge ung’eyo, koso pok uwinjo,ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasaye mochwere,kendo ma Jachuech piny malichni duto,ok ol, kendo ok nyosre?Parone tut, ma odhiero dhano ng’eyo.
En ema omiyo joma ool teko. Adier, omedo muya ni joma tekogi orumo.
Joma tindo nyalo ol, mi nyosre,kata mana yawuowi mopong’ bendenyalo chwanyore, mi podhi.
To joma ogeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, tekogi noduogi. Ginihu ka ongo, mana ka gima gin gi buombegi,kendo giniringi, to ok giniol,bende giniwuothi, to tekregi ok norum. Isaya
Nyasaye osingore ni obiro guedho jo-Israel
Un pinje mae dhonembe, kod chulni chikuru itu,ka uling’ thi e nyima. Ogendini mondo obi abia!Gibi abia machiegni mondo giwuo ane. Waduto wanadonj kaachiel kama ing’adoe bura.
Ng’at moa yo wuok chieng’,ma locho kamoro amora modhiye cha, ere ng’ama okele?Koso en ng’a moketo ogendini e lwete,kendo miyo oloyo ruodhi mi onyon piny?Okeyogi gi liganglane mana ka buru,kendo oriembogi gi asere, mana ka mihudhi ma yamo tero.
Olawogi koriembogi matek mana ka gima ohuyo,to en okadho maber mak ohinyore.
To koro apenjo ni, mano en tij ng’a?Koso en ng’a mamiyo mago duto timore?En ng’a mamiyo tienge luwore nyaka ne piny chakre?En mana an, Ruoth Nyasaye. An ema akwongo, kendo anie nyamgiko.
Pinje mae dhonembe kod chulni osewinjo wachno,modoko maluor,kendo ji duto kirni, chakre tung’ piny nyaka tung’ piny.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato konyo wadgi,kendo jiwe, kawacho ni mondo obed gi chir.
Kamano japecho jiwo jathedh dhahabu,kaloso nyasaye manono,kendo jal matiyo gi nyundo jiwo jal ma goyo musmalkawacho ni tich riwo nyinyo osetim maber. Eka oguro nyasaye manono gi musmalmondo kik oyiengni.
To un jo-Israel jotichna,aseyierou, mi agolou e giko piny kuonde mane untie. Adier, un nyikwa Jakobo ma aseyiero,kendo ma koth Ibrahim osiepna,
ne aluongou mondo ua kuonde maboyo. Aseluongou ni jotichna,kendo aseyierou ma ok awitou.
Kik uluor gimoro nikech an kodu. Kik kibaji gou, nimar an e Nyasachu. Amiyou teko, kendo akonyou,bende asirou gi bada ma korachwich ma alochogo.
Koro neuru! Jogu duto ma mon kodu wigi biro kuot, mi gidhier nono. Adier, jogo duto ma kedo kodu norum mi lal nono.
Unudwar wasikugo, to ok unuyudgi. Chutho, jogo mane kedo kodu ok nobed gimoro kata matin,
nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema amako badu ma korachwich,kendo awachonu niya,"Kik ubed maluor, nimar an ema akonyou. "
In oganda Jakobo, in kudni akuda, to kik ibed maluor. Yaye, in Israel ma onge ndhathe, kik kibaji goyi. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Neuru! Abiro miyo uchalo gi gir diemo ngano manyien ma lekene bitho. Unumuk gode madongo gi matindo, kutoyogi matindotindo, mi gilokremihudhi.
Unupiedhgi mi yamo notergi mabor, kendo kalausi nokegi. To un to unubed mamor,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel.
Joma odhier kod joma chandore manyo pi, to ok ginwang’,omiyo dwondgi otwo nikech riyo,to an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro dwoko kwayogi. Adier, an Nyasach Israel ok najwang’gi.
Abiro miyo aore wuogi kuonde motwo motimo kwoyo, kendo sokni tuchi eholni. Bende abiro miyo yewni bedi e piny motimo ongoro,mi pi bubni e piny motwo.
Abiro pidho yien mopogore opogore kuonde motwo,
mondo ji duto one kendo ong’e ni,Ruoth Nyasaye, ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel ema osetimo kamano. Ruoth Nyasaye charo nyiseche manono
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ruodh joka Jakobo wacho niya,"Biuru, uwach wachu ane.
Nyisecheu mondo obi onyiswa ane gik matimore. Onego ginyiswa ane tiend gik mane osetimore.
Nyiswauru ane gik mabiro timore e kinde mabiro,mondo wayie ni kara un nyiseche adier. Timuru ane gimoro, maber kata marach,manyalo miyo wang’eng’ mi wadhier nono.
To en adier ni ok unyal gimoro,kendo gik mutimo onge tich. Bende ng’ato ang’ata ma kwanou ka nyisechene en raura ka un!"
An to aseluongo ng’ato yo nyandwat ma yo wuok chieng’ mondo obi. En ng’at mabiro lama. Enonyon ruodhi mana ka lowo mimwonogo ot,kendo nonywasgi mana kaka jachuech nywaso lop agulu.
En ng’a, mane okoro wachno, ni mondo wang’e?Koso en ng’a mane onyisowa chon ni wachno biro timore,mondo wayie ni en adier?. Onge ng’ato mane ohule, kata mane owuoyo kuome. Adier, wecheu ne ok owinji kata matin.
Ne asenyiso jo-Sayun chon ni, "Ero gibiro,"kendo ne aoro ni Jerusalem jaote materonigi wach maber.
To kane arango nyisecheu,to ne ok aneno moro manyalo dwoko penjona.
Neyeuru kaka gin gik manono. Gimoro amora ma gitimo onge tich. Nyisechego in mana yamo makudho!Isaya
Jatich Ruoth Nyasaye
Neuru! Ma e jatichna ma atayo. En ng’at ma aseyiero, kendo ma chunya morgo. Aseketo roho mara kuome,omiyo obiro kelo adiera ni ogendini.
Ok nokogi, kata nduru ok nogo,dwonde bende ok nowinji e yore.
Kata mana odundu motore ok notur mi owiti ka gima nono,bende ok nosim kata mana taya maliel marachrach,to enong’ad bura mana gi adiera.
Ok nochwanyre kata chunye ok nonyosreto enokel adiera e piny,kendo pinje manie dhonembe rito mondo chikne obi.
Ruoth Nyasaye mane ochueyo polo mi oyaro,kendo ochueyo piny gi gik mangima duto mantie,mi ochiwo muya ni joma odakie kod gik moko duto mangima,wacho kama:
"An Ruoth Nyasaye, aseluongini mondo itim gima kelo resruok. Asemako lweti mondo ariti,kendo anami ibed ng’at ma kelo singruok e kinda gi ji,
mondo iyaw wenge muofnikendo igol joma otue e mudho kuma gidakie.
An e Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo mano e nyinga. Ok ayie mondo duong’ ma imiya omi nyasaye moro machielo,bende ok ayie mondo pak mipakago opakgo gik ma opa.
Neuru kaka gik mane akoro osetimore. To koro anyisou gik manyien ma biro timore.  Adier, ahulonugi kapokgitimore. "Pak mipakogo Ruoth Nyasaye kuom reso ji
Weruru ni Ruoth Nyasaye wer manyien,kupako nyinge e piny duto. Un mukwang’ e nam, pakeuru kaachiel gi gik manie nam.
Thim, kod mier man kuno, mondo obed mamor,kaachiel gi kuonde dak mag jo-Arabu ma Kedar. Un joma odak Sela, koguru gi mor ewi gode.
Un duto mudak e dhonembe gi chulni, pakeuru. Kamano ji duto mondo omi Ruoth Nyasaye duong’.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro wuok oko ka thwon maratego. Enobed gi mirima mager mana ka jalweny,kendo enokogi ka ogoyo sigich lweny, mi olo wasike.
An Ruoth Nyasaye, aseling’ kuom ndalo mang’eny,ka abedo gi kue, kendo ka aterora mos,to koro abiro ywak ka dhako ma muoch kayo,ka aomo chunya, kendo agamo yueyo.
Anatiek gik moko duto manie gode,ka amiyo gik mang’ich duto man kuno two. Anami aore lokre kuonde motwo, kendo adwon yewni duto.
Bang’e anatel ni muofni e wuodhgi,ka amiyo giluwo yore ma ok ging’eyo. Mudho ma giwuothoe analoknigi ler,kendo anarie yore mobam ma giluwo. Mago duto natim mak ok aweyo moro mak atimo.
To joma ogeno mana kuom gik mopa,ma luongo gik maket ka nyisechegi,noyud wichkuot, kendo nodwok chien. Kum mane okumgo jo-Israel ne ok opuonjogi gimoro
Un joma itgi odino, koro winjuru!Yaye un muofni, ranguru mondo unen!
Ere muofu maloyou, un jo-Israel jotichna?Kata ere ng’ama ite odino moloyou, un jootena ma aoro?Koso ere muofu maloyou un joma atimogo singruok mar kue,kata ma ite odino maloyou un jotich Ruoth Nyasaye?
Useneno gik mathoth, to ok udewgi. Un gi it, to onge gima uwinjo.
Ruoth Nyasaye noneno ni ber mondo chikne obed gi duong’,mondo adierane olandre.
To kata kamano jogi gin joma oyaki, kendo oter e tuech. Giduto gisenyumore e obadho mokunynigi,mi gilal e ut tuech. Omakgi, mi odhi kodgi mana ka gima gin gik moyaki,ma onge ng’ama nyalo resogi,kata wacho ni mondo odwokgi.
Un joma nyalo winjo wach, chikuru itu uwinji. Ee, chakre kawuono, chikuru itu.
En ng’a, mane ochiwo jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo e lwet joyeko?Donge en Ruoth Nyasaye?Ne giketho e nyime, mi gitamore luwo yorene,kendo gidagi rito chikne.
Mano ema omiyo noolo mirimbe mager kuom jo-Israel,kokelonigi lweny maliet ka mach. Ne olworogi gi mach koni gi koni,to ne ok giwinjo tiend kumno. Adier, ne orewogi, to kata kamano ne ok gidewo. Isaya
Ruoth Nyasaye kende e Jawar
Un jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo,Ruoth Nyasaye mane otimou oganda wacho kama:"Kik ubed maluor nikech asewarou. Aseluongou gi nyingu, omiyo un joga awuon.
Ka ukadho e pige matut, to an kodu. Adier, ka ng’ado aore, to ok giniteru,bende kata ka uwuotho e mach mang’ang’ni to ok unuwang’,
nimar an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel, kendo ma jaresu. Achiwo Misri gi Ethiopia kod Seba mondo awarugo.
Akwanou ka gima nengone tek,bende un joma ogen, ma ahero,omiyo achiwo pinje moko mondo awarugo. Adier, achiwo jomoko nono mondo aresgo ngimau.
An kodu, omiyo kik ubed maluor. Abiro chokou,ka agolou yo wuokchieng’ gi yo podho chieng’,kaachiel gi nyithindu.
Abiro wacho ni jo-nyandwat ni mondo oweu. Jo-milambo to abiro nyiso niya, "Kik ugeng’nigi,
to keluru yawuota gi nyiga, kugolo kuonde maboyo. Adier, kelgiuru kugologi e tung’ piny koni gi koni. Chutho, keluru ji duto ma iluongo gi nyinga,ma asechueyo, kendo asetimo oganda. Gin joma asechueyo, mondo ayud duong’.
Keluru jogo.  Gin joma nigi wenge, to ok nyal neno. Bende gin gi it, to ok ginyal winjo.
Ogendini duto mondo ochokre kaachiel. Ere nyasachgi mane osekoroe gima kama,kata mosehuloe gimoro ka pok otimore?Weuru gikel joneno mondo onyis ane gik mane gitimo,mondo gilo bura, ka wachgi en adier.
To ka ok ginyal, to koro, An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama:"An to an gi joneno. Un jo-Israel e joneno maga, kendo jotichna. Aseyierou mondo ung’eya, kendo uket genou kuoma. Bende mondo ung’e ni an e Nyasaye. Nyasaye moro motelona ne pok obedoe,bende moro maluwa ok nobedie.
An kende e Ruoth Nyasaye. Onge jawar moro mak mana an.
An ema asekoro wach, kanyisou malong’o gik mabiro timore,to nyisecheu manono ok osetimo kamano. Un e joneno maga!An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
An e Nyasaye ma ok lokre nyaka chieng’. Gima amako onge ng’ama nyalo kawo,bende gima atimo, onge ng’ama nyalo ketho. "
Ruoth Nyasaye ma jaresu kendo ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel wacho kama:"Aseoro oganda lweny mondo omonj Babulon nikech un,kendo abiro miyo jo-Babulon podh piny auma ka giringo,mi koko mar mor ma gigoyo lokre ywak.
An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Ler,ma jachuechu, kendo ma Ruodhu, yaye Israel!"
An Ruoth Nyasaye ema ne apogo nam,mondo yo obedie e kind pige mogingore madongo.
Bende ne amiyo geche lweny kod farese odonjo kuno,kaachiel gi oganda lweny maratego,mong’ielore piny, ma ok nyal chako chung’ kendo. Adier, ne githo mana ka taya mosim. Koro awachonu niya,
"Weuru keto chunyu e gik machon, kuparo gik ma osekadho.
Koro adwaro timo gima nyien. Neuru, asechako time.  Donge unene?Abiro loso yo e piny motwo. Adier, abiro loso yore e piny motimo ongoro.
Le mae thim, kaka bwe kod udo nogona erokamano,nikech abiro kelo pi e piny motwo,mi alos yore e piny motimo ongoro,mondo joga moyier oyud pi mamodho.
Gin ji mane atimo ogandana awuon,mondo oland weche ma miya duong’.
To neyeuru,ni ne ok uluonga mondo akonyu, yaye joka Jakobo!Useol koda, A Israel!
Ok usetimona misengni miwang’o pep mag rombe,kendo ok usemiya duong’ kutimona misengni mamoko. To ok asechandou mondo utimna misengni mag cham,bende ok asemiyou ting’ mapek,ka adwaro ni mondo uwang’na ubani.
Ne ok ung’iewona niang’ gi pesau,kata dhila gi boche mag misengniu, ne ok udhila. To ne utura mana gi richou,kendo ne uola mana gi timbeu mamono.
An kende e jal ma rucho richou oko,mi ok chak par kendo,nikech mano e gima ahero timo.
Parnauru gik mane otimore chon,mondo wapim wach kaachiel. Wachuru wecheu ane, manyiso ni uonge gi ketho.
Kwaro mokwongo ne otimo richo,kendo jonabiu ne opiem koda.
Jodongu bende ne omiyo Hekalu mara odoko mogak. Mano omiyo ne ajwang’o jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobomondo otieki, mi yud wichkuot. Isaya
Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasaye kende
"Koro winjauru un jotichna ma nyikwa jakobo. Chikuru itu un jo-Israel, oganda ma aseyiero.
An Ruoth Nyasaye ma jachuechu, kendo ma jakonyu,mane olosou chakre e ich, awacho kama:Un joka Jakobo jatichna, ma bende aluongo ni jo-Jeshurun, kik ubedmaluor,
nikech abiro kelo koth mang’eny e lowo motwo mobaro okak. Bende abiro olo rohona kuom kothu, ka aguedhogi.
Ginidongi mana ka lum man kama ng’ich,kata ka yien manie bath aora.
Ng’at moro nowach niya, ‘An ng’at Ruoth Nyasaye. ’To machielo nowach ni en nyakwar Jakobo. Ng’at moro to nondik nying Ruoth Nyasaye e lwete,kendo noluongre gi nying Israel. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoma Ruodh jo-Israel kendo jawargi, wacho niya,"An e mokwongo, kendo an emogik,bende onge Nyasaye moro mak mana an.
To ka ng’ato paro ni rom koda,to mondo ochung’ ane owach kamano. Onego ohul gik manyalo nyiso ni owacho adiera,nikech kane ginyalo koro gik mane otimore chonto kara nyaka bed ni ginyalo hulo gik ma koro eka biro timore!
Kik ubed maluor, bende kik chunyu nyosre!Donge ne anyisou chon ni gima kama biro timore?Adier, ne ahulo wachno, kendo koro ubedo joneno maga!Bende nitie Nyasaye moro machielo, ma ok mana an?Ooyo, ok ang’eyo Jachuech moro machielo. "Fuwo mar lamo nyiseche manono
Joma loso nyiseche manono gin joma nono oloyo,kendo gik ma giherogo ok kony gimoro. Joma lamogi olokore muofni, kendo ok ging’eyo gimoro,omiyo wigi nokuodi.
Ka ng’ato oloso nyasaye manono gi bao kata gi chuma to oketho tekrekayiem,
nikech joma ogeno kuomgigo biro yudo wichkuot.  Bende jomaolosogi gin mana ji, ma ok Nyasaye.  Koro weuru gichokre giduto mondogichoma tir ane, mak kihondko bi makogi, mi giyud wichkuot maduong’.
Jatheth ema chwako chuma e mach, eka ogoye gi nyundo mondo othedhekaka odwaro.  Olose gi muche duto, mi obed mool, ka kech ohewe kendo riyooloye.
Japecho to pimo bao gi tol, kendo oketo alama kuome, eka opayegi koyo, kendo olose maber e kido mar dhano, mana ni mondo ochungeachunga e od lemo!
Ng’ato nyalo pidho yiend sida, kendo koth miyo yien-go dongo, mondobang’e obed gi yien ma okonyorego.  Kata onyalo yiero yath moro maber ebungu, mi otong’.
Dir yadhno omoko mach mondo oo, to dire mokoochwakogo chiemo.  Moko to olosogo nyasaye molamo kokulorene piny.
Adier, dir yadhno konchiel to ochwako, kendo obuloe ring’o mondoocham, moyieng’.  To bende ooyo majno, kowacho niya, "Ero! Awinjo maber,kendo denda yudo liet. "
Bang’e bath yadhno modong’ to opayo, kendoolosogo nyasaye, mokulorene nyaka e lowo, kendo olamo, kowacho niya,"Resa, nimar in e nyasacha!"
Joma kamago ok ong’eyo gimoro, bende okgiwinj tiend gik moko.  Wengegi odinore ma ok ginyal neno, kendo chunygithanythany ma ok ginyal fwenyo tiend gimoro.
Ng’at machal kamano ongegi paro kata rieko ma onyalo penjorego kende niya, "Bath yadhni konchielne achwako, mi atedogo makati.  Bende asebuloe ring’o mi achamo, to koroere kaka dalok dire konchiel modong’ bed nyasaye? Koso ere gima omiyoonego akulra piny, kalamo mana osiki motong’ mar yath?"
Ng’at ma kamano chamo mana buch kendo! Parone mofuwo osewuonde,mowite.  Omiyo oonge gi rieko monyalo parogo ni gima oting’o e lweteno oken gima adier. Ruoth Nyasaye ma Jawar Israel
"Parieuru mago duto un nyikwa Jakobo. Adier, un jo-Israel, paruru ane, nimar un jotichna,omiyo kik wiu wil koda.
Aserucho richou, mi oduono mana ka ong’ueng’o. Ee, asekeyo timbeu mamono mana ka boche polo. Duoguru ira, nikech asewarou. "
Koguru gi mor un polo,nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ema osetimo kamano. Un kuonde matut moloyo mag piny, gouru mahu gi mor,kendo un gode kaachiel gi bunge kod yien,weruru wende locho,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osewaro jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo,komiyogo nyinge duong’.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma jawaru, kendo mane ochueyou e ich, wacho kama:"An e Ruoth Nyasaye mane ochueyo gik moko duto. Ne ayaro polo awuon, kendo ne aloso piny kenda.
Ang’eyo jonabi mag miriambo kaachiel gi ranyisigi,bende akuodo wi ajuoke. Adwoko weche joma riek chien,kamiyo riekogi lokore gima nono
To weche ma jotichna okoro, amiyo timore,kendo achopo gik ma jootena ochano. Awuoyo kuom Jerusalem ni, ji nochak odag kuno kendo,mi achak alos kuonde mokethore duto kuomgi.
Nam matut, to awachone niya,‘Duon! Abiro miyo aoreni two kururu. ’
To Kuros anyiso niya, ‘Ibiro bedo jakwadha,kendo ibiro timo gik moko duto ma adwaro,kigolo chik mondo ochak oger Jerusalem,mi chak ket mise mag Hekalu kendo. ’ "Isaya
Tich mane Nyasaye omiyo Kuros
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni Kuros, ruoth moseyiero niya,"Asemako lweti ma korachwichmondo ilo ogendini manie nyimi,kendo iketh teko mag ruodhi,mi iyaw dhorangeye gi dhoudima onge kata achiel ma nodong’ ka ochiegi.
An to anatel nyimi mondo apie gode mogangore. Anatur dhorangeye molos gi mula,kendo nang’ad lodi mag nyinyo.
Anamiyi mwandu mopandi e mudho,kendo mokan kuonde mopondo,mondo eka ing’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,ma luongi gi nyingi.
Aseluongi gi nyingi mana nikech jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo,ma jotichna ma aseyiero. Adier asemiyi nying maduong’kata obedo ni ok ing’eya.
An e Ruoth Nyasaye kendo moro onge. Adier, onge Nyasaye moro mak mana an. Kata obedo ni pok ing’eya, to abiro miyi teko,
mondo ji man yo wuok chieng’ gi yo podho chieng’ong’e ni onge Nyasaye moro mak mana an.
Achueyo ler, kendo achueyo mudho. Akelo gueth, to masira bende an ema akelo. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema atimo mago duto. "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Jachuech
Un polo, lwaruru piny,mondo tim makare ochwe ka koth,mi piny nyag olemb warruok, kendo tim makare bende omedre. Mago duto, an Ruoth Nyasaye ema achueyo.
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko duto wacho niya,"Mano kaka ng’at mapiem gi jachuechne none malit!Ere kaka agulu dipiem gi ng’ama chueye?Bende lowo dipenj jachuech ni ere gima ochueyo?Koso gima osechue diwach ni jachuech niya,‘Ikia tich’?
Bende nyathi ma koro eka icholo diwach ni wuon gi min ni, ‘Ang’omunywoloni?’ "
An Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Ler kendo ma Jachuech Israel awacho kama:"Bende duhedhru penja gimoro kuom nyithinda, kata nyisa gima onego atim?
An ema ne achueyo piny, mi aketoe dhano. Ne ayaro polo gi lweta awuon,mi achiko gik moko duto mantie mondo oliel.
An ema aseting’o Kuros malo mondo okel resruok,kendo abiro rieyo yorene tir. Enochak oger dalana,kendo nogony joga mane oter e tuech, mi bed thuolo,to ok nikech ichule gimoro, kata nikech imiye asoya. "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya,"Jotich mag Misri gi joohala mag Nubiakod jo-Sabea ma roboche nobed e bwo lochu,mi lokre wasumbu. Adier, ginibi iru kotuegi gi nyororo,mi gikulrenu ka gimiyou duong’, kendo ka giwacho niya,‘Chutho Nyasaye ni kodu, kendo Nyasaye moro onge. En kende e Nyasaye. ’ "
Adier, in Nyasaye mapondo, A Nyasach Israel ma Jawarwa!
Ji duto mapiem kodi piny ochamo kendo ogore nyang’eng’o. Joma payo nyiseche manono lal nono ka wigi okuot.
Jo-Israel to Ruoth Nyasaye noresi gi resruok mosiko. Piny ok nochak ochamgi,kata ok ginichak gigore nyang’eng’o kendo nyaka chieng’.
Ruoth Nyasaye ema ne ochueyo polo,kendo oloso piny moguro motegno. Kane ochueye, ne ok oweye chwangla,to nolose mondo ji odagie. En ema owacho kama: An e Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo onge Nyasaye moro.
Okawuo ling’ling’, kama opondo e piny motimo mudho, bende pok awacho nijoka Jakobo ni mondookwaya gima ok asechano ni abiro miyogi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho adier. Ahulo mana gik ma ratiro. Nyiseche manono mag Babulon opim gi Ruoth Nyasaye
Chokreuru usud machiegni, un joma otony e ogendini. Mano kaka ufuwo, un joma ting’o nyiseche molos gi yien,kendo malamo nyasaye ma ok nyal reso ji.
Biuru, uwach wachu ane, ka upenjoru ng’ato gi ng’ato. En ng’a mane okoro ni Kuros biro locho kamano?Koso en ng’a mane owacho chon ni gigo biro timore?Donge ne en mana an, Ruoth Nyasaye?Onge nyasaye moro mak man an, man gi loch,kendo manyalo reso ng’ato. Ooyo, onge moro mak mana an.
Un ogendini manie tung’ piny gi tung’ piny,genuru kuoma, mondo uyud resruok,nimar an e Nyasaye, kendo moro onge.
An Nyasaye mangima asekuong’ora!Adier, gima owuok e dhoga en adier, kendo ok nyal lokore. Asesingora ka awacho niya,"Ji duto nogona chonggi piny,kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato nokuong’re ni biro luwa. "
Ji nowach niya, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye kende ema nigi teko,kendo ema miyo ji locho. Ji duto mapiem kode nochung’ e nyime ka wigi okuot.
Nyikwa Israel duto nolochi kendo noyud duong’, mana nikech RuothNyasaye. ’Isaya
Nyiseche Babulon ma Bel gi Nebo okulore piny ka luoro omako. Yande ji ting’ogi ating’a ka miyogi duong’,to koro kenje gi jamni ema oting’ogi,ka gilokore ting’ maturo jamni mool!
Adier, nyisechego okulore ka luoro omako. Ok ginyal konyo joma lamogi,to gin giwegi ema iting’ogi, kiterogi e tuech!
Winjuru, un joka Jakobo ma aseting’o nyaka ne nywol. Ee, chikuru itu un jo-Israel modong’, ma aseting’o nyaka ne a e ich.
Kata ka udoko moti, to pod an e En. Adier, kata ka wiu oti lwar, to pod nating’u ating’a. Kaka asechueyou, e kaka abiro ting’ou. Ee, pod abiro ting’ou kendo resou.
Uparo ni achal gi ng’a?Koso en ng’a marom koda?
Dupima gi nyasaye ma dhano loso koso?Joma dwaro nyasaye machal kamano kawo dhahabu mang’eny,kendo pimo fedha e ratil,eka gindiko jatheth mondo olosnigigo nyasayeno. Bang’e gilame ka giriere piny e nyime.
Giting’e e gokgi ka gitere dala, kendo girenje piny,mi ochung’ achung’a kanyo ma ok ong’ingni. Kata ka ng’ato kokne matek manade,to ok onyal dwoke,bende ok onyal rese e chandruok.
Paruru wachno, mondo utang!Yaye, un joma piem koda, paruru wachno e chunyu.
Kik wiu wil gi gik mane otimore chon,nimar an Nyasaye, kendo onge moro. Adier, an Nyasaye, kendo onge moro marom koda.
Anyiso giko mar gimoro mana e kinde ma ochakoree. Nyaka nene asebedo ka ahulo gik ma pok otimore,ka awacho niya, "Gima awacho nyaka timre. Omiyo abiro timo gimoro amora ma adwaro. "
Aluongo ng’ato e piny mabor mondo otim gima adwaro. Obiro biro kaka winyo mager, koa yo wuok chieng’. Asewuoyo, kendo abiro timo kaka asewacho. Adier, asechano gima adwaro timo,kendo abiro timogo mak orem.
Winjauru, un joma chunygi tek, ma paro ni resruok pod bor.
Akelo resruok mara machiegni.  Ok en mabor ngang’!Adier, kony ma akelo ok bi deko. Anares ji Sayun,mondo jo-Israel mamiya duong’ oyud konyruok. Isaya
Kum mokumgo Babulon
In Babulon, dala ma pok olo, bed piny e lowo. Ee, in dala maduong’ mar jo-Kaldai,we komlochni, ibed piny e buru. Ji ok nochak odendi ka gima in nyako ma dende yom,kendo mosedak e ngima maber!
Kaw nyapong’ mondo ireggo,kendo igol kitamba ma iuomogo wang’i. Lony lawi mabor mirwako,mondo thochi odong’ nono king’ado aore.
Dugi nonen, kendo wichkuot ma in go nonere e lela.
Abiro chulo kuor, kendo onge ng’ama notama. Ng’ama Ler mar Israel ma jawarwa,ma nyinge Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto,owacho kamanoo.
Yaye, dala maduong’ mar jo-Kaldai, bed kiling’ thi,kendo gumbi idhiyo e mudho mandiwa,nimar ok nochak oluongi ni min pinje mang’eny.
