"E ndalono ji nogol choke ruodhi gi choke jodongo mag Juda e lietegi,kaachiel gi choke jodolo gi mag jonabi kod mag ji mamoko duto mane odakJerusalem.
Chokego nowit oko mondo chieng’ gi due kod sulue, manegihero kendo gilamo, orieny kuomgi.  Kar chokogi mondo oyikgi, to nowegiaweya gitow ewi lowo.
Ji duto motony e oganda marachni, mi odak kuondeduto ma asekeyogie, nogomb mana tho kar bedo mangima.  An Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik moko Duto ema awacho kamano. "Richo gi bura
In Jeremia, wach ni joga ni an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: "Ka ng’atoopodho, to donge ochako ochung’? Koso ka ng’ato obaro moweyo yo, todonge oduogo e yo kendo?
Ka kamano, to ere gima omiyo gibaro giweya maok ginyal duogo ira ngang’? Gituere kuom nyisechegi manono, kendo gidagiduogo ira.
Ne achiko ita mondo awinj wechegi, to ne ok giwacho adierakata achiel.  Onge kata ng’at achiel kuomgi moseloko chunye kuom timbegimaricho, kata moseywagore kuom richo mosetimo.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato mwomoree timbene, mana ka faras lweny mochodo kochiko wasigu.
To kata ogungomae kor polo ong’eyo ndalogi mag dar, kendo kata akuru gi opija ginyamnaha bende ong’eyo ndalo ma giduogoe, joga to kia chikena.
"Ere kaka ginyalo wacho ni giriek kendo ging’eyo chikena, to jopuonjchik mag miriambo osegajo chikena?
Jorieko wigi okuot.  Wach ogoyoginyang’eng’o kendo dhogi omoko.  Gisedagi wechena, koro ere rieko magin-go?
Kuom mano mondgi kaachiel gi puothegi abiro miyo jomoko nono. Ji duto, madongo gi matindo, temo yudo pesa e yore mag miriambo, katamana jonabi gi jodolo duto bende jomriambo,
Ezek
.
. nimar giwachoni gik moko dhi nyime maber to chutho gik moko ok dhi nyime maber.  Kuommano gichalo gi jothieth mathiedho jotuo marachrach, mana ka gima okgituo.
Jer
.
-
. Bende uparo ni wigi okuot nikech timbe makuero manegitimogo koso? Ooyo, wigi ok okuot kata matin, bende gionge gi wichkuot. Kuom mano, gibiro podho kaka ji mamoko osepodho, kendo ka akumogi toginirum.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro tieko joga chutho, nikech gichalo yiend mzabibu kata ng’owomaonge olemo, ma kata potgi bende osener. "
Jo-Nyasaye penjore niya, "Ere gimomiyo wabet abeta? Biuru wadhi e miermochiel motegno wathoe, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseng’adonwa buch tho. Osemiyowa pi motimo kwiri mondo wamodhi, nikech timbewa osebedo marichoe nyime.
Ne wageno kue, to mana kayiem nono.  Bende ne wageno ni wabiroyudo resruok, to masira ema obwogowa.
Ne wawinjo ka farese mag wasigufuto ka Dan, kendo ywakgi ne miyo piny duto yiengni.  Wasigugo osebiromondo oketh pinywa, kod gik moko duto mantie, kaachiel gi dalawani kodjoma odakie. "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Ng’euru ni abiro kelothuonde mager kuomu.  Gin thuonde man gi kwiri maricho, ma ok nyal bo,omiyo gibiro kayou. "Jeremia ywago Juda gi Jerusalem
"Akuyo ma ok anyal yudo kue, kendo chunya tuo.
Ling’uru ane, awinjoka joga ywak kuonde duto ma gintie, ka gipenjo niya, ‘Ruoth Nyasayeoseweyo Sayun koso? Ruodh Sayun onge kuno adier?’ To Ruoth Nyasaye maruodhgi dwoko niya, ‘Ere gima omiyo usemiya mirima kuom lamo nyisechemag pinje mamoko?’ "
Ji ywak kawacho niya, "Ndalo keyo osekadho mak wayudo gimadwaresrego. "
Chunya lit, nikech itimo ni joga malit.  Aywak kendo akuyomarach.
Yath tinde orumo e piny Gilead koso? Jathieth onge kuno adier?Ere gima omiyo pok othiedh joga?JEREMIA
"Mad wiya lokre soko mar pi, kendo pi wang’a lokre aora, mondo aywagiodiechieng’ gotieno nikech joga mosenegi.
Mad abed ki kiru mar bworo ethim, kuma anyalo betie mabor gi joga, nimar giduto gin joma terore,kendo oganda ma andhoga.
Lewni chalo gi atung’ moywa, kendo diromiriambo mana kaka atung’ diro asere, bende timbe miganga ema opong’opiny. "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Joga timo richo kinde duto, kendo okgidewa.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka tang’ ni osiepne, kendo onge ng’amanyalo geno owadgi, nimar owete duto gin jowuond ka Jakobo, bende ng’atoka ng’ato kuodho osiepne.
Giduto giwuondo osiepegi, kendo onge ng’amawacho adiera.  Gisepuonjo lewgi wacho miriambo, kendo gisedonjo matut ericho ma ok ginyal wuokie.
Gitimo timbe mahundu kinde duto, timbegi magwuond bende osiko asika, to gitamore yie kuoma.
"Kuom mano, an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho ni abiropwodho joga, ka ng’at malenyo mula mondo ogol ng’iende.  Joga osetimoricho, koro ere gima datimnigi?
Lewni chalo gi asere man gi kwirimager, kendo dhogi wacho weche mag miriambo.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato wuoyomang’won gi wadgi, to kara e chunye kucha to ochikone mana obadho!
Korodonge abiro kumogi kuom timbe ma kamago? Adier, abiro chulo kuor nioganda machal kamano! An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano!"
Jeremia nowacho niya, "Abiro ywago gode gi lege, nikech gisetwo, kendoonge ng’ama wuothoe.  Ywak mar jamni tinde ok winji, kendo winy gi leduto mae thim oseringo. "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Abiro loko miech Jerusalem gundni kamaondiegi ema odakie, kendo miech Juda abiro loko thim. "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni onyalo daro joge
Jeremia nopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Ere gimomiyo piny okethore kendootwo, ka piny motimo ongoro ma onge ng’ama wuothoe? Ere ng’ama riekmanyalo winjo tiend wachni? Koso en ng’a ma isenyiso tiende mondo onyisjoma moko?"
To Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoka niya, "Gima kama osetimore nikechjo-Israel oseweyo chik mane amiyogi.  Ok giseluora, to bende ok gisetimogik mane awachonigi ni mondo gitim.
Gisebedo mana ka wigi tek, kagitimo dwarogi giwegi, kendo giselamo kido manono mag Baal, kaka nekweregi opuonjogi.
Kuom mano, winji gima abiro timo, an Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma nyasach Israel.  Abiro miyo joga alodemakech mondo ocham, kod pi motimo kwiri mondo gimodhi.
Abiro keyogi ekind ogendini ma ok ging’eyo, kendo ma kata kweregi bende ne ok ong’eyo. Bende abiro kelonigi wasigu mondo omonjgi nyaka chop atiekgi chuth. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Luonguru mon majoywak.  Ee, oruru wach mondo mon mong’eyo ywak obi.
Gibi piyo mondogidengnwa, nyaka wengewa pong’ gi pi wang’, mi owre nikechywak.
Winjuru ywak maywagore Sayun, ‘Waserumo chuth, kendo waseyudowichkuot miwuoro.  Osedarwa e pinywa, kendo miechwa osekethi. ’ "
Jeremia nowacho niya, "Un mon, chikuru itu ni gima Ruoth Nyasayeowacho, mondo uwinj wachne.  Puonjuru nyiu gi osiepeu wende ywak.
Thoosedonjo gie dirisewa, koda ka e miech ruodhiwa, kendo osenego nyithindoe pewe oko, kod yawuowi e chirni. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ringre joma otho biro dhurore pidhe mana kaowuoyo mool e puothe.  Ginichal gi cham ma jokeyo osebeto, to pok ochoki. Ng’eyo Nyasaye e mor mar dhano
"Ji mariek kik sungre nikech riekogi, joma rateke bende kik sungrenikech tekogi, kata joma omew kik sungre nikech mwandugi.
Kor
.
;
Kor
.
. To ng’at madwaro sungore, to mondo osungre mana nikechong’eya, kendo wechena osedonjone, nimar an Ruoth Nyasaye ahero ji gihera mosiko, kendo atimo gik makare kendo mowinjore e piny, nikechkamano e kaka adwaro.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni ndalo biro ma nokumie ji duto moternyangu,
kaka jo-Misri gi jo-Juda gi jo-Edom gi jo-Amon kod jo-Moab,kaachiel gi ji duto modak e thim ma timgi en tito yie wigi, nikech teronyangu mar jogo duto, kaachiel gi mar jo-Israel, ok en tero nyangu marchuny to en mana mar ringruok. JEREMIA
Nyiseche manono kod Nyasaye ma adiera
Un jo-Israel winjuru wach ma Ruoth Nyasaye osewachonu:
"Kik uluw timbeogendini mamoko, kendo kik chunyu parre kuom honni muneno e kor polo,kata obedo ni gimiyo ogendini parore.
Gik ma jogo lamo gin gik manono,nimar gin mana yien motong’ e bungu, kendo japecho payogi mana gi koyo,eka obawogi gi fedha kod dhahabu,
kendo oriwogi gi musmal mondo kikgiwuore.
Gichalo gi gik mibwogogo winy e pwothe nikech ok ginyal wuoyo. Iting’ogi ating’a nimar ok ginyal wuotho, omiyo kik uluorgi nimar okginyal hinyou, to bende onge gima ber ma ginyalo timo. "
A Ruoth Nyasaye, onge ng’ato machal kodi, iduong’ kendo nyingi bendeduong’.
Fweny
.
. A Ruodh ogendini duto, ere ng’ama ok diluori, nikechin iwinjori gi luor.  Kuom jorieko duto mag ogendini, kata kuom ruodhigiduto, onge ng’ato maromo kodi.
Giduto gifuwo kendo gionge rieko, nikechgiyudo riekogi manono mana kuom yien mopa!
Kido magi manonogo obaw gifedha mogol Tarshish, kendo gi dhahabu mogol Ufaz.  Gin mana tich lwedo. Irwakogi gi lewni mambulu gi maralik, ka jachuech molony ema ochueyo.
To Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasaye maradier.  En e Nyasaye mangima, kendo ruothmochwere.  Ka okecho to piny yiengni, kendo ogendini ok nyal siromirimbe.
Nyaka inyis jogo ni nyiseche mane ok ochueyo polo gi piny ibiro kethi. Ok ginichak gibed kamoro amora e piny.
Ruoth Nyasaye nochueyo piny gitekone, mogure motegno kendo noyaro polo gi riekone.
Omiyo pi man etok polo wuo, kendo otugo boche polo e tung’ piny duto.  Bende omiyo polomil ka koth chue, kendo ogolo yamo kar kenone mondo okudhi.
Gik makamago miyo ji ng’eng’, kendo bedo mofuwo.  Jotheth duto yudo wichkuotkuom gik ma githedho, nikech gin mana nyiseche manono, ma onge gingima.
Gin gik manono moromo chayo, kendo gibiro rumo, chieng’ maRuoth Nyasaye biro mondo otiekgi.
Nyasach Jakobo to ok chal gi gigo,nimar en ema ochueyo gik moko duto, kendo oseyiero jo-Israel mondo obedjoge owuon.  Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto e nyinge. Masira ma biro mako jo-Juda
"Un jo-Jerusalem ma osetimnigi ageng’a, chokuru giu,
nimar RuothNyasaye owacho ni obiro golo ji duto modak e pinyni, kendo obiro sandounyaka urum pep. "
Jo-Jerusalem ywak niya, "Mano kaka wahinyore malit,kendo adhondewa ok nyal chango, to ne waparo ni en gima wanyalodhilgo.
Hembewa osekethore chuth, kendo tonde mane otuegigo osechot. Yawuotwa duto osea modhi mabor, koro onge ng’ama odong’ ma dichak gurnwahembewa, bende onge ng’ama nyalo lieronwa rageng’ni maggi. "
Jeremia nodwokogi niya, "Jotelo mau onge gi rieko, nikech ok gipenjwach kuom Ruoth Nyasaye.  Mano emomiyo ok gisetimo gimoro maber, kendojowa oseke kuonde duto.
Winjuru! Wach osebiro! Koko maduong’ timore epiny moro yo nyandwat.  Gin jolweny mabiro ketho miech Juda, mi lokrethim ma ondiegi ema dakie.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, ang’eyo ni ngima ng’ato oknie tekone owuon, bende onge ng’ama nyalo yiero yore owuon.
Kuom mano,A Ruoth Nyasaye, riewa gi bura, to ok gi mirimbi, nono to itiekowapep.
Ol mirimbi kuom ogendini ma ok oyie kuomi.  Ee, kech kod jogo maok lami! Gisenegowa, wan nyikwa Jakobo, mi gitiekowa duto, kendo gikethopinywa. "JEREMIA
Jo-Juda oketho singruok
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Winj weche mag singruok maabiro wachoni, eka inyis jo-Juda gi joma odak Jerusalem
ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel okuong’o ng’ato ang’ata motamore rito wachsingruokni.
En singruok mane atimo gi kweregi kane agologi e pinyMisri, e sand mager ka mach makakni.  Ne awachonigi ni ka girito chikena,kendo gitimo gik moko duto ma anyisogi, to ginibed joga, kendo anabedNyasachgi.
Bang’e eka anachop singruok mane atimo gi kweregi ni namigipiny maber kendo momew, ma koro gintieni. " Jeremia nodwoko Ruoth Nyasayeniya, "Ee, ayie timo kamano. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia ni, "Dhiyo iland wechegi e miechJuda kendo e yore mag Jerusalem, kinyiso ji mondo owinj kendo orit wechemag singruokna.
Chakre kinde mane agoloe kweregi e piny Misri nyakachil kawuono, asebedo kasiemogi matek mondo girit wechena.
To negitamore winjo kata dewo.  Kar timo kamano to ng’ato ka ng’ato ka timotimbene mag wich teko.  Ne oyudo ka osechikogi mondo girit singruokno, tone gidagi.  Mano emomiyo nakelonigi kum duto mane singruokno oting’o. "
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya, "Jo-Juda gi joma odakJerusalem piem koda.
Gisedok e richo kweregi mane otamore timo gima neawacho, nikech gisebedo ka gilamo nyiseche manono.  Jo-Israel gi jo-Judaoseketho singruok mane atimo gi kweregi.
Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasayeasiemogi ni abiro kelo masira kuomgi kendo onge ng’at ma notony.  To kataka giywak mondo akonygi, to ok nadewgi.
Bang’e jo-Juda gi joma odakJerusalem biro dhi ir nyisechegi ma gisebedo ka gitimonigi misengni,mondo okonygi.  To nyisechego ok noresgi ka masira obiro.
Jo-Juda niginyiseche mang’eny mana ka miechgi, kendo joma odak Jerusalem bendeoseloso kende-mag-misango mang’eny, mana moromo gi yore mag dalagi,mondo gitimie misengni ni Baal.
Kuom mano, in Jeremia, kik ilam nijogi, kata kik isaya mondo akonygi nimar kata ka ginie chandruok migiluonga, to ok nadewgi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Joma ahero, timo timbe maricho.  Eregimomiyo oyienigi biro e oda? Koso giparo ni ginyalo geng’o masira kuomtimo kuong’ruok kendo kuom wang’o boche ma gitimogo misengni? Bendegiparo ni ginitony adier?
Chon ne aluongogi ni yadh zeituni ma obokeneng’eny, kendo manyago olembe mathoth mabeyo, to koro abiro wang’oobokene kod bedene gi mach mariadore ka mor polo.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo gik Moko Duto ema napidho jo-Israel gijo-Juda kaka ng’ato pidho yath, to koro abiro bwogogi gi masira nikechricho ma gisetimo.  Gisekelo gima kama kuomgi giwegi, nikech gimiyamirima kuom timo misengni ni Baal. "Jo-Anathoth ochano timo ni Jeremia marach
Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa gik maricho mane wasika dwaro timona.
Neachalo gi nyarombo mogol e abila, ka kia ni idwaro nego, kendo ne okang’eyo ni ichano gik marichogo kuoma.  Ne giwacho niya, "Wanegeuru mondonyinge olal nono. "
Eka nalemo niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto, in e jang’ad bura makare, kendo ma temo chuny ji gi parogi.  Weaneye ka ichulo ni jogo kuor, nikech aseketo wachna e lweti. "
Jo-Anathoth ne dwaro nego Jeremia, kendo ne giwachone ni gibiro negeka pod osiko koyalo e nying Ruoth Nyasaye.
Kuom mano Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto nowuoyo kuomgi niya, "Abiro kumogi.  Yawuotgi birotho e lweny.  Nyithindgi bende kech biro nego.
Onge kata ng’at achielkuomgi ma nodong’, chieng’ ma achano ni akelo masira kuom jo-Anathoth. "JEREMIA
Ywagruok Jeremia kod dwoko mar Ruoth Nyasaye
"A Ruoth Nyasaye, ang’eyo ni kata ka akeloni ywakna, to biro yudore niin ema in kare.  Kata kamano pod daher penjie wach kuom adiera mari.  Eregimomiyo joma richo yudo mwandu? Koso ere gimomiyo joma jowuond dhimaber?.
Ipidhogi, mi gigol tiendegi, kendo gidongo, mi ginyag olemo. Pile giwuoyo maber kuomi, to chutho chunygi bor kodi.
To Ruoth Nyasaye,ing’eya, kendo ineno gik ma atimo, bende inono chunya mondo ine kakaaheri.  Ywa joma richogi oko ka rombe ma idwaro yang’o, kendo ketgi tengenyaka chieng’ minegogie chopi.
Nyaka karang’o ma pinywa biro bedomotwo, kendo lum manie lege biro wang’ie? Le gi winy tho, nikech timbemaricho mag joma odak e pinyni, mawacho ni ok ine gik maricho magitimo. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "In Jeremia, ka ringo gi ji oseoli, tokoro ere kaka dipiem gi farese? Ka piny maber midakieni ema iywagorie,to ere kaka ibiro betie bungu mandiwa manie geng Jordan?
Koda kaomineni hie osendhogi, kendo giseriwore gi jomoko ma monji.  Kik igen-gi,kata obedo ni giwachoni weche mabeyo kamano. "
An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho niya, "Aseweyo ogandana mane ayiero, miadagigi.  Aseketo joga ma ahero e lwet wasikgi.
Joga awuon oselokorewasika.  Giserutona ka sibuor manie bungu, mi koro amon kodgi.
Jogaawuon chalo gi olith ma kite okikokiko, ma olidhe mamoko gueyo koni gikoni.  Un ogendini, biuru mondo ugoru kuom joga, mi uyaki mana kakaondiegi gore kuom gima gimako, mi gikidhi.
Jotelo mag pinje mamokooseketho puotha mar mzabibu.  Gisenyono puothena piny gi tiendgi, migiloko pinya maber odoko motwo ma ok nyag gimoro.
Gisekethe, ma orieree nyima kanyo ma onge tich.  Piny duto oselokore thim, to onge ng’amadewo.
Ji oseng’ado gode mae thim ka gibiro mondo giyeki.  To an emaaoro lweny mondo otiek pinyno, ma onge ng’at manyalo dakie gikue.
Joga pidho ngano, to kuthe ema gikayo.  Gisetiyo matek, to okgiyud gimoro.  Pinygi otho nikech mirimba mager. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "An gi gima adwaro wacho kuom ogendinimaricho mokiewo gi jo-Israel.  Abiro pudhogi oko e pinygi ka yienmipudho, mi nares jo-Juda kuomgi.
To ka asepudhogi oko kamano, ekaanakechgi, mi aduog oganda ka oganda e lope, kendo e pinye owuon.
Chonogendinigo ne kuong’ore gi nying Baal, kendo ne gipuonjo joga mondo otimkamano.  To ka koro ginyalo yie luwo dini mar joga gi chunygi duto, migikuong’re gi nyinga, to gin bende ginibed joga.
To ka oganda morootamore, to anapudhe oko, mi akethe chuth.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "JEREMIA
Ngech law mokethore
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona mondo adhi ang’iew law, atue e nungona, to kikabude e pi.
Omiyo ne ang’iewo lawno kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ne ochika, miarwako.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo koda kendo, mowachonaniya,
"Dhiyo e aora Yufrate, ilony law mirwakono mondo ipandi e burlwanda. "
Omiyo ne adhi mi apande but aora Yufrate kaka ne Ruoth Nyasayeochika.
Bang’ kinde moko, Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona mondo adogi Yufrateaom lawno.
Kuom mano nadok Yufrate, mi arango kama ne apandoe lawno, neayude, mi anwang’o ka okethore, ma onge tich.
Ruoth Nyasaye nochakoowuoyo koda, ka wachona niya,
"Mano e kaka abiro ketho sunga marjo-Juda kaachiel gi sunga marach mar jo-Jerusalem.
Oganda marachniosetamore winjo wachna, mi gisebedo joma wigi tek, kendo ma timbegiricho.  Giselamo nyiseche mamoko, kendo gitiyonigi.  Kuom mano gibirochalo mana gi law ma koro onge tichni.
Kaka law atueya mako nungong’at morwake matek, e kaka nadwaro ni mondo jo-Isarel gi jo-Juda omakamatek, mondo gibed joga, kendo gikel pak kod duong’ ni nyinga.  To katakamano ne gitamore luora. "Ngech agulni
"In Jeremia, nyis jo-Isarel ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi awachokama: ‘Agulini mag divai onego opong’ gi divai. ’ To gibiro dwoki ni,‘Wang’eyo maber ni agulini mag divai onego opong’ gi divai. ’
Eka ichakiwachnigi ni an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro miyo jopinyni madho divai nyaka mer. Koda ka ruodhi ma nyikwa Daudi gi jodolo gi jonabi kod jo-Jerusalem dutobiro mer.
Bang’e anarwadgi duto, wuone gi nyithindo machalre.  Oknakechgi kendo ok nawegi, bende ok nang’wonnigi ngang’, to naneggiduto. "Ruoth Nyasaye osiemo jo-Israel ni obiro darogi
"Un jo-Israel, winjuru! Ruoth Nyasaye ema wuoyo, omiyo kik usungru, miutamru winje.
Miuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu duong’, ka pok okelomudho, mi uchwanyoru e gode gotieno, kendo kapok oloko ler mugenonomudho mandiwa.
Ka utamoru winjo siemnni, to anaywagu gi chunya nikechsungau.  Anaywagu malit, mi pi wang’a nochuer nyaka wang’a owre, nikechodar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye, kitero e tuech. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya, "Dhiyo inyis ruoth gi min maremondo joa e kombegi mag duong’ nikech osimbegi mag loch osea e wigimolwar piny.
Oselwor miech piny milambo, kendo onge ng’ama nyaloresogi.  Osedar jo-Juda mi oter e tuech. "
Un jo-Jerusalem, neyeuru! Wasiku biro, koa malo yo nyandwat.  Ereoganda mane chalonu gi kweth maber, mane omiu mondo uriti?
Unuwach niji ang’o ka joma yande uparo ni osiepeu ema koro oket e wiu ka jotendu?Ubiro bedo gi rem mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo!
To eka upenjo gimomiyogima kama osetimorenu, kendo gimomiyo oseyiech lepu kuomu, mi odwanyu,to ubiro yudo ni mano otimore nikech richou lich.
Bende ja-Nubi nyaloloko kit dende? Koso kwach dilok kite marabok dok kido moro nono? Kaponi gigo nyalo timore, to kara un bende mutimo gik maricho unyalo timogik mabeyo!
Ruoth Nyasaye biro keyou ka mihudhi ma yamo mager moa ethim keyo.
Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni mano e gima biro timorenu. Osechano mondo otimnu kamano nikech useweye, mi ugeno mana kuom nyisechemanono.
Ruoth Nyasaye owuon ema noyiech lepu kuomu, mi dugunonen.
Ruoth Nyasaye oseneno kaka utimo gik ma omon-go.  Ulawo nyisechemanono e gode kendo e pewe, mana ka ng’at ma gombo chi wadgi, kendo kafaras ma dichwo ma lawo madhako! Un jo-Jerusalem urumo! Unuben malerkarang’o?JEREMIA
Wach Ruoth Nyasaye kuom oro mane omako piny
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia kuom oro mane omako pinyniya,
"Jo-Juda ywak kendo miechgi kethore.  Jogi oriere piny kokuyo,kendo jo-Jerusalem ywak mondo okonygi.
Jodongo oro jotichgi mondooumbnigi, to ka gichopo e sokni, to ok giyud pi, omiyo giduogo gi dapigenono.  Giumo wigi nikech gidhier nono, kendo gikia gima ginyalotimo.
Chuny jopur lit, nikech koth onge, kendo piny otwo, omiyo giumowigi.
Mwanda bende nywolo nyathi, to oweyo mana kanyo nikech lumonge.
Kenje mag thim chung’ ewi gode, kendo gamo yueyo mana ka bwe. Wengegi wingni nikech lum onge.
"Joga ywakna niya, ‘A Ruoth Nyasaye, kata ka richowa nyiso ni wanjoketho, to yie ikonywa kaka isesingori.  Adier, waseweyi ndalo mang’eny,kwaketho e nyimi.
To in kendi ema jo-Israel ogeno kuomi, nimar in emairesowa ka wanie chandruok.  Ere gima omiyo ichalo wendo e pinywa mabworo kuom otieno achiel kende?
Ere gima omiyo ichalo gi ng’at mobwokkata ka jalweny ma onge gi teko ma dokonygo ng’ato? Adier, in RuothNyasaye in kodwa, kendo wan jogi, omiyo kik iwitwa. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo kuom jogi niya, "Gihero ringo weya kamano, kendogibayo kamoro amora ma gihero.  Kuom mano, ok amor kodgi, to aparo richoma gisetimo, kendo abiro kumogi nikech richogigo. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Kik ikwaya mondo akony jogi.
Kata kagitueyo chiemo, to ok nawinj ywakgi, kendo kata ka gichiwona misengnimiwang’o pep, gi mag erokamano, to ok nabed mamor kodgi.  Abiro miyogitho e lweny, kendo kech gi tuo biro negogi. "
An to ne adwoke ni, "ARuoth Nyasaye, donge ing’eyo ni jonabi wacho ni ji niya, ‘Kech katalweny biro bedo maonge, nimar nisingori ni kue kende ema nobed epinywa’?"
To Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Jonabigo koro weche magmiriambo e nyinga.  An ne ok aorogi, kendo ne ok amiyogi chik, bende neok awuoyo kodgi.  Gik ma giwachonugo gin fweny ma ok owuok kuoma, togikoro mana weche manono ma giparo apara.
An Ruoth Nyasaye anyisi gimaabiro timo ni jonabi mane ok aorogo.  Giwuoyo gi nyinga ka giwacho nilweny kod kech ok bi mako pinyni, to adier, kech gi lweny ema abironegogigo.
Joma ne giwachonigi gigo bende lweny gi kech biro nego. Ringregi kaachiel gi mag mondgi kod nyithindgi nowiti e yore magJerusalem, ma onge ng’ama noyiki, nikech abiro kumogi kuom timbegimaricho.
"In Jeremia, wach ni ji kama: ‘Pi wang’a mondo omol odiechieng’gotieno! Onego kik awe ywak nimar joga osego matek, mi ohinyoremalit.
Ka awuok oko e pap, to aneno ringre joma onegi e lweny, to kaadonjo e dala moro, to aneno joma kech nego.  Jonabi gi jodolo dhi nyimegi tijegi, to chutho ok ging’eyo gima gitimo. ’ "Ywagruok jo-Juda
"A Ruoth Nyasaye iseweyo jo-Juda chuth koso? Adier, ichayo jo-Sayun?Ere gimomiyo isehinyowa malit kamano, ma ok wanyal chango? Ne wageno niwabiro yudo gik mabeyo, to onge gima ber mane wayudo.  Ne waparo ni ibirochangowa, to masira malit ema nopoyowa.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, wahulorichowa kaachiel gi richo kwerewa.  Adier, waseketho e nyimi.
Kikijwang’wa, nikech dipo ka nyingi okethore.  Bende kik iyie jomoko chaJerusalem, kama kom duong’ni nitie.  Rit singruok mane itimo kodwa, kendokik ikethe.
Bende nyiseche manono mag ogendini nyalo kelo koth adier?Koso polo giwegi nigi teko mar miyo koth chue? Ooyo, in ema waketochunywa kuomi, A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, nikech in kende ema inyalotimo gik ma kamago. "JEREMIA
Mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye mager kuom jo-Juda
Wuok
.
-
; Kwan
.
-
;
Sam
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowachonaniya, "Kata da bed ni Musa gi Samuel ema jochung’ e nyima ka, to okanyal weyo ni jogi richogi.  Wachnigi mondo gia e wang’a.
Fweny
.
. Toka gipenjo ni gidhi kanye, to nyisgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:Jomoko kuomu tuo biro nego,kendo mano e kuma gibiro dhiye. To moko biro tho e lweny,kendo kuno ema gibiro dhiye!Bende moko kech biro nego,mi kuno ema gibiro dhiye!To moko ibiro tero e tuech,kendo kuno ema gibiro dhiye!
"An Ruoth Nyasaye asechano ni masiche ang’wen biro makogi.  Ibiro neggimi guogi biro kidho ringregi.  Winy nochamgi kendo ondiegi nochamringregi modong’.
Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. Abiro miyo ogendiniduto mag piny bwog konenogi, nikech gik maricho mane Manase wuod Hezekiaotimo Jerusalem kane en ruodh Juda.
"Ere ng’ama biro kechou, un jo-Jerusalem? Koso ng’ama biro ywagou? Enng’a ma biro chung’ mondo omosu?
Ne uweya, kendo udagi wachna, omiyo neabiro, mi atiekou, nikech ne ok anyal geng’o mirimba kendo.
Ne akeyou emier duto, mana ka mihudhi ma yamo keyo.  Un joga ne atiekou, mi anegonyithindu, nikech ne udagi weyo timbeu maricho.
Ne anego chwo mang’eny,mi ubedo gi mond liete mathoth ka kuoyo mae dhonam ne anego yawuotugodiechieng’, mi akelo ne minegi kuyo.
Dhako man gi yawuowi abiriyoopodho piny ka muche orumo, nikech yawuotego duto osenegi.  Piny othonemudho ka wiye okuot, kendo chunye chandore.  Abiro miyo wasigu neg jou mapod odong’ ka ngima.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Jeremia noywagore niya, "Yaye! Hapa rach! Ere gima omiyo ne mamaonywola, nimar ji duto osiko ka dhaw adhawa koda? Pok aholo ng’atopesana, bende pok aholo pesa kuom ng’ato, to kata kamano, ji dutokuong’a.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, kapo ni ok asetiyoni maber, kata ka okasekwayi mondo ikech wasika ka chandruok omako to kuong’ duto magikuong’ago mondo omaka.
Onge ng’ama nyalo turo chuma, to moloyo chumamonywas gi mula, moa e piny ma yo nyandwat. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoka niya, "Abiro kelo wasigu oyak mwandu joga, mondoakumgi kuom richo ma gisetimo e pinygi duto.
Abiro miyo giti niwasikgi e piny ma ok ging’eyo, nikech mirimba chalo mach, kendo biroliel nyaka chieng’. "Nyasaye okueyo chuny Jeremia
Jeremia nodwoke niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye, in ing’eyo weche duto, omiyopara kendo ikonya.  Chul kuor ni joma sanda.  Kik iwegi, nono to ginega. Ng’e ni giyanya nikech in.
Ne iwuoyo koda, mi awinjo wecheni duto.  ARuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, an ng’ati, omiyo wecheni opong’ochunya gi mor kod ilo.
Ne ok abet e kanyakla mar joma mor, bende ne okaneno ber, to ne an mana kenda, ka apong’ gi siwuori, nikech tich maneimiya.
Ere gima omiyo asiko ka an gi rem malit? Ang’o momiyo adhondenaok nyal chango? Koso idwaro bedona ka aora ma duono ndalo oro?"
To Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoka niya, "Ka iduogo ira, to abiro rwaki, miinichak ibed jatichna, ka iwacho weche makare, ma ok weche manono, toinichak ibed janabina.  Ji biro biro iri, to ok inidhi irgi.
Abiro lokimotegno ka ohinga mar chuma, mondo eka isir jogo.  Gibiro kedo kodi, took giniloyi, nikech abiro bet kodi mondo ariti.
Abiro resi kuom jomatimbegi richo, kendo abiro konyi kuom jomahundu.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Ruoth Nyasaye ong’ado ni joge bura
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owuoyo koda, kowachona niya,
"Ok nikendi, kendook ninywol nyithindo ka.
Abiro nyisi gima biro timore ni nyithindomonywol ka, kaachiel gi jonywolgi.
Tuoche maricho biro negogi, to ongeng’ama noywaggi, bende ok noyikgi.  Ginidhurre pidhe pidhe mana ka owuoyomiolo e puothe.  Moko notho e lweny to moko kech nonegi, kendo winy giondiegi nocham ringrergi.
"Kik idonj e ot miywagoe ngat motho, to bende kik iywag ng’ato, nimarasegolo kue mara gi herana kod ng’wonona kuomgi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
Joma omew kaachiel gi joma odhier biro tho e pinyni, toonge ng’ama noywaggi kata noyikgi.  Onge ng’ama noter buchgi kata manoliel wiye ma nyiso ni en e lit
Ka ng’ato ng’ate otho, to onge ng’amanobi ochiem kode kata ometh kode mondo oduog chunye, bed ni wuon katamin ema otho.
"Kik idonj e ot ma ji timoe sawo.  Bende kik ibed piny mondo ichiemkendo imeth kodgi.
Jer
.
;
.
; Fweny
.
. An Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho kama: Abiro tieko mor kod ilo ma jogo nigo,ma kata dwond mon ma miehni gi chwogi ok nowinj kaeri.  Gigi duto notimrekapod gingima kendo gineno gi wang’gi!"
"Ka inyisogi wechegi, to gibiro penji gima omiyo asechano mondo akumgimalit kamano.  Bende gibiro penji gima giseketho, kata richo ma gisetimoe nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.
To dwokgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye owachokama: ‘Kwereu noweya, mi otiyo ni nyiseche mamoko kendo olamo.  Ne giweyakendo ne ok giwinjo chikena.
Koro un to usetimo gik maricho moloyokata mane kwereu otimo.  Un duto un joma richo ma wigi tek, ma ok nyalluora.
Kuom mano abiro riembou e pinyni, mi ateru e piny ma okung’eyo, kata ma kwereu bende ne ok ong’eyo.  Kuno unulamie nyisechemamoko odiechieng’ gotieno, to ok anakechu. ’
To ndalo biro ma ongeng’ama nokuong’re gi nyinga ka Nyasaye mangima mane ogolo jo-Israel epiny Misri.
To ginikuong’re gi nyinga mana ka Nyasaye mangima maneogolo jo-israel e piny man yo nyandwat gi pinje mamoko duto maneosekeyogie.  Anaduoggi e pinygi giwegi mane amiyo kweregi.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro oro ji mang’eny mondo omak jogi, mana kaka jolupo maluwo rech. Bang’e naor jodwar mang’eny mondo odwargi e gode duto koda ka e kindlwendni.
Aneno gik moko duto ma gitimo, kendo onge gima opondona,bende richogi ok nyal kadhona mak aneno.
Abiro miyo gichul nyadiriyokuom richogi gi timbegi mamono.  Gisedwanyo pinya gi nyisechegi maonge gingima mana ka ringre joma otho, kendo gisepong’o piny gi nyisechegimamono gogo. "
Eka Jeremia nolemo ka wacho kama: "A Ruoth Nyasaye, in ema imiya teko,kendo irita, bende in e kara ma abwokie e kinde mag chandruok.  Ogendinimoa tung’ piny ka tung’ piny nobi iri, kawacho niya, ‘Kwerewa ne lamonyiseche manono ma gin mana kido ma onge tich.
Dhano bende nyalo losonyiseche owuon? Ooyo, mago ok dibed nyiseche kata matin!’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko niya, "Mano emomiyo abiro nyisogi tekona giduong’na dichiel kendo mogik, mi gibiro ng’eyo ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye. "JEREMIA
Chuny jo-Juda ogawore gi richo
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Juda, richou ondik gi kalamb chuma,kendo ogorgi gi gima bith e chunyu, kendo e tunge kendeu magliswa.
Yawuotu paro kende-mag-liswa kod sirni milamo mane ochung’ etiend yien duto motimo tiep, kendo e pidhe
kod gode duto manie pewe. Abiro miyo wasiku yak mwanduu duto, nikech richo ma usetimo kuonde dutoe pinyu.
Ubiro a e piny mane amiyou, kendo abiro miyo utiyo ni wasiku epiny ma ok ung’eyo, nimar mirimba chal gi machh, kendo biro liel nyakachieng’. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,"Okuong’ ng’at ma baro weya,to geno mana kuom dhano,ka parone bor koda.
Ochalo kudho manie thim,madongo e piny motwo,mana e lowo motimo chumbi,ma onge gima odongoe maber. Onge gima berma ng’atno nyalo yudo.
To oguedh ng’at ma ogena kendo oyie kuoma,
Zab
.
. nimar ochalo gi yathmopidh but aora,matero tiendene kochomo pi. Onge gima thage,kata ndalo oro,ma chieng’ rienyie mager,nikech pote osiko ka ng’ich ang’icha. Ok odew kata ka koth ok chue,to osiko konyago anyaga olemo.
"Ere ng’ama nyalo ng’eyo gima chuny dhano paro? Onge gima jamriambokaka chuny dhano.  En gi tuoche mang’eny ma ok nyal chango.
Fweny
.
;Zab
.
. An Ruoth Nyasaye amanyo paro mar dhano, kendo apimo rieko magji.  Atimo ni ng’ato ka ng’ato mana kaka ochalo, kendo mana ka luwore gitimbene.
Ng’ato ma yudo pesa e yor miriambo chalo gi winyo matoyotong’ mane ok otoko.  Gibiro lalne kapok obet ng’at moti, kendo bang’enolokre mana ng’at mofuwo. "
Hekalu marwa chal gi kom duong’ mang’ongo, mogur ewi got mabor nyakane piny chakre.
Ruoth Nyasaye ema jo-Israel ogeno kuome, omiyo ji dutomoweye noyud wichkuot.  Ginilal nono mana ka nying mondik e buru, nikechgiseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma en soko mar pi maliw.
Jeremia nokwayo niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, changa mondo adok mangima. Resa mondo ayud kue.  In ema apaki.
Ji penja ni, ‘Ere masiche maneRuoth Nyasaye obwogowago? Wadwaro mondo okelgi sani!’
To RuothNyasaye, bende ne akwayi mondo ikelnigi masira? In Ruoth Nyasaye ing’eyoni ne ok agomb mondo giyud thagruok, kendo in ing’eyo gimaasewacho.
Kik ilokrina masira, nimar in e kara mar resruok ka masiraoyuda.
Kel wichkuot kuom joma sanda, to an mondo iweya, kendo kelnigikihondko, to an kik ibwoga.  Kelnigi masira, kendo kethgi chuth. "Chieng’ Sabato nyaka rit maler
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Jeremia, dhiyo mondo ichung’ edhorangach miluongo ni Ranga Ji, kama ruodhi mag Juda donjogo kendowuokgo Jerusalem.  Bang’e idhi e dhorangeye mamoko mag dala.
Nyisruodhi kod jo-Juda duto, kaachiel gi ji duto modak Jerusalem maluwodhorangeyegi mondo ochik itgi owinj gima awacho.
Neh
.
-
. Nyisgini ka ok gidwar tho, to kik giting’ misike chieng’ Sabato.  Bende kikgiting’ gimoro ka gikadhogo e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem chieng’no.
Wuok
.
-
; T. Chik
.
-
. Kata mana ting’o gik moko ka gigolo e utgi kikgiting’.  Nyaka girit chieng’ Sabato obed maler, kaka ne achiko kweregi,kendo kik giti tich moro chieng’no.
To kweregi ne ok odewo winjowachna, kendo wigi ne odoko matek, mi gidagi luora, kata obedo niasekumogi kamano.
"Nyisgi ni nyaka giluora gi chunygi duto.  Kik giting’ misigo moroamora ka gikadho e dhorangeye mag dalani chieng’ Sabato, to giritchieng’ Sabato obed maler, mak gitiyo tich moro.
Kamano eka ruodhimaggi gi jodonggi didonj e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem, kendo bed gi duong’mane ruoth Daudi nigo.  Gin kaachiel gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem giniidhgeche gi farese, kendo ji nodag Jerusalem nyaka chieng’.
Ji nobi koa emiech Juda kod mier mokiewo gi Jerusalem.  Bende ji moa e piny Benjaminnobi kaachiel gi joma odak e tiend gode, gi ewi gode, kod e piny Negeb. Ginikel misengni miwang’o pep gi misengni mag cham kod ubani, kaachielgi misengni mag erokamano gi misengni mamoko e Hekalu mara.
To ka okgiluora, mi gitamore rito chieng’ Sabato obed maler, kendo giting’omisigo moro amora ka gikadho e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem chieng’no, toanamok mach e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem, mi majno nowang’ ut ruodhi magJerusalem, kendo onge ng’ama nonege. "JEREMIA
Ngech jachue agulni
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya,
"Dhiyo e od jachue agulini, kendo abiromiyi wechena kuno. "
Omiyo ne adhi mi ayudo ka jachue agulini nietichne.
To e sa asaya mane gima odwaro chueyo ok owuok maber, to neokawo lowono, kendo olosogo gima chielo, mana kaka ohero.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nopenja niya,
"Donge un jo-Israel anyalo timoumana gima jachuech timo gi lowo? Ng’euru ni unie tekona, mana kaka lowoni e teko jachuech.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Kapo ni asiemooganda moro, kata piny moro, ni abiro ketho kata tieko kata dhuolo gilop tiende,
to bang’e ogandano olokore moweyo timbene marachno, to anbende koro aloko parona kuom gima rach mane awacho ni abiro timo.
Tobende kapo ni awacho ni abiro pidho kendo gero oganda moro,
miogandano otimo richo, kendo otamore rito chikna, to nyaka alok paronakuom gima ber mane awacho ni natim.
Omiyo koro dhi inyis jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem ni achano kelonigi masira, kendo abiro kumogi.  Kwergi mondogiwe richogi.  Kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato olok yorene gi timbenemaricho.
To gibiro dwoki niya, ‘Ok wanyal loko timbewa! Wabiro timomana gima wahero, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato timo mana gima wiye omiye. ’
"Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: Penjieuru ogendini duto kagima kama osetimore nyaka nene.  Jo-Israel osetimo gima rachmiwuoro!
Bende wi got Lebanon motimo lwendni nyalo bet maonge peadier? Koso aore mag godno nyalo duono? Ooyo, gisiko asika kamano.
Tojoga wigi osewil koda, kendo giwang’o ubani ni kido manono. Gisechwanyore mi giweyo wang’yo ma onego giluw, mi koro ok giluw yoremachon, to giwuotho e yore mogondore ma ok opa.
Giseketho pinygi,modoko gima bwogo ji, kendo ma ji charo nyaka chieng’.  Ji duto ma kadhomachiegni biro bwok kuom gima gineno, kendo gibiro kino wigi kagiwuoro.
Anake joga e nyim wasikgi, mana ka buru ma yamb ugue keyo. Abiro lokonigi ng’eya, kendo ok nakonygi ka masira omakogi. "Lemo ma Jeremia okwayogo ka enie masira
Bang’ mano ji nowacho niya "Wang’aduru rieko mondo wanyal Jeremia.  Podnobedie abeda jodolo manyalo telonwa, gi joma riek manyalo ng’adonwarieko, kod jonabi manyalo nyisowa wach Nyasaye.  Biuru wahangne wach,kendo wawe dewo gima owacho. "
To Jeremia nolemo niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, winj gima akwayo, kendo winjgima wasika wacho kuoma.
Richo bende ichulo kuom ber? Gin togisekunyona bur mondo anyumrae.  Par kaka ne abiro iri, mi awuoyo kodi,kakwayi mondo kik mirima maki kodgi.
To koro Ruoth Nyasaye, we kechoneg nyithindgi, kendo we githo e lweny.  Joma chwo gi nyithindo mondootho, kendo mon mondo odong’ mond liete, kendo maonge nyithindo.  Tuochemondo oneg jodongo, to yawuowi mondo otho e lweny.
Kel mony apoya,mondo oyak miechgi, mi giywag ka kihondko omakogi.  Gisekunyona bur mondoanyumrae, kendo gisechikona obadho mondo omaka.
To in Ruoth Nyasaye,ing’eyo gik moko duto ma gitimo ka gidwaro nega.  Omiyo kik ing’wonngikuom timbegi maricho, kendo kik iwenigi richogi.  Kelgi e nyimi kagichwanyore, kendo kumgi ka in gi mirima mager. "JEREMIA
Ngech agulu moto
Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa mondo adhi ang’iew agulu.  Bende nonyisa mondoakaw jodongo moko kod jodolo madongo,
Ruo
.
; Jer
.

;
.
,
. adhigo e holo mar Ben-hinom, mokiewo gi dhorangach miluongo ni RangaTegni.  Kuno ema ne adhi huloe wach mane obiro miya.
Ruoth Nyasayenokona mondo awach niya, "Winjuru un ruodhi mag Juda kod jo-Jerusalem. An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel, awachokama: Abiro kelo masira malich kuom dalani, ma ng’ato ka ng’ato mowinjo,to ite nopopni.
Abiro timo kamano nikech useweya, mudwanyo dalani,kutimoe lisweche ni nyiseche mamoko ma ok ung’eyo, to kata mana kwereugi ruodhi mag Juda bende ne ok ong’eyo.  Usemiyo remb ji maonge kethoopong’o ka,
T. Lawi
.
. kendo usegero kende-mag-liswa mondo uwang’ienyithindu ka liswa ni Baal.  To ne ok achikou mondo utim kamano, bendewach ma kamano ne ok aparo kata matin.
Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye, awachoni ndalo biro ma ok noluongie holoni ni Tofeth, kata ni holo Ben-hinom,to noluonge ni holo Nek.
Ka eri ema nakethie gik moko duto ma jo-Judagi jo-Jerusalem chano timo.  Anawe wasikgi logi, mi neggi e lweny, kendoanami winy gi ondiegi cham ringregi.
Anaketh dalani gi keth malich, ming’ato ang’ata makadho machiegni nobwogi, kawuoro gima osetimore nidalani.
Anami ji modak ka cham ringre nyithindgi giwegi.  Bende ginichamringre jowadgi e kinde marach ma wasigu nobed ka lworo dalagi, ka dwaronegogi. "
Bang’ wacho wechego, Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa mondo ato agulu cha e nyimjoma ne asedhigogo,
kendo awachnigi ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto nosewacho kama: "Abiro toyo jogi gi dalani mana kaka itoyo agulu maok nyal chak chom.  Joma otho noyik kata mana e Tofeth, nikech ok noyudkamoro nono ma diyikgie.
Mano e kaka abiro timo ni dalani, kaachiel gijoma odakie, kendo analoke mana ka Tofeth.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano.
Naketh udi mag Jerusalem gi ut ruodhi Juda, to moloyo udi dutoma osewang’ ubani ewi tetgi ni sulue, kendo ma osepukie lisweche miolopiny ni nyiseche mamoko, mi ginibed mogak mana ka Tofeth. "
Bang’ wechego, ne awuok aa Tofeth, kuma ne Ruoth Nyasaye oorae, mondoadhi ahulie wachne.  Ne adhi mi achung’ e laru mar Hekalu, eka anyiso jiduto niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach Israelowacho ni obiro kelo masiche duto mane osiemogo dalani kaachiel gi mierduto mokiewo kode, nikech un joma tokgi tek, motamore winjo wachne. "JEREMIA
Okuong Pashur kuom keto Jeremia e tuech
Kane Pashur wuod Imer jadolo, kendo jatelo maduong’ e Hekalu owinjo gikmane Jeremia okoro,
nogolo chik mochwad Jeremia, kendo otueye e lodi edhoranga Hekalu miluongo ni Ranga Benjamin mamalo.
Kinyne gokinyi,Pashur ne ogonyo Jeremia, mi Jeremia nowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye okluongi ni Pashur, to oluongi ni Magor-misabib, tiende ni, masira nikuonde duto.
Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni obiro miyo ilokri masira ni iniwuon, kendo ni osiepeni, kendo wasigu noneg osiepenigo duto e lwenymana kineno.  Abiro keto jo-Juda duto e teko mar ruodh Babulon, kendoenoter moko e tuech Babulon, to moko nogol chik mondo onegi.
Bendeanawe wasikgi yak mwandu duto manie Jerusalem kaachiel gi gik moko dutomantie, koda ka gik mabeyo duto mag ruodhi Juda, mi gikaw gidhigoBabulon
To in Pashur, nomaki kaachiel gi joodi, mi teri Babulon kumainithoe kendo yikie but osiepeni ma isebedo ka ihulonigi weche magmiriambo!"Jeremia oywagore
"A Ruoth Nyasaye, ne iwuonda, mi iwuonda adier.  In itek moloya, omiyone ihewa.  Ji duto tugo koda kendo ginyiera odiechieng’ duto.
E kindeduto ma awuoyoe, to aywak kendo akok niya, ‘Mahundu gi masira nitie!’ ARuoth Nyasaye, gichara kendo giyanya kinde duto nikech ahulo wachni.
Toka awacho ni abiro weyi mondo kik achak awuo e nyingi, to wachni wang’ochunya, mana ka mach.  Opong’o chokena, kendo ohewa ting’o ma ok anyalsiro.
Awinjo ka ji kuodha gi nying’ ma gichaka ni ‘Masira ni kuondeduto,’ kendo giwacho niya, ‘Kwedeuru! Ee, wakwede!’ Kata mana osiepenama ageno bende gombona mana chwanyruok.  Giwacho niya, ‘Dipo ka oyondhe,mi omoko, kendo wachulone kuor. ’
To in Ruoth Nyasaye, in koda, itek,kendo iduong’, omiyo joma sanda biro chwanyore, kendo ok ginyal gimoro. Wigi biro kuot malich, nikech ok gibi loyo.  Wichkuotgino nosik nyakachieng’, kendo wich ok nowilgo.
In Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoimiyo ji tem makare, kendo inono chunygi gi parogi.  Omiyo yie ichulnakuor kuom wasika, nimar aketo wechena duto e lweti.
"Weruru ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo pakeuru, nikech osereso joma ithiro elwet joma timbegi richo.
Ayub
.
-
. "Okuong’ chieng’ mane mama onywolae!
Okuong’ ng’at maneomiyo wuora mor, kuom kelone wach ni onywolne nyathi ma wuowi!
Madng’atno chal gi mier mane Ruoth Nyasaye oketho mak okecho.  Mad owinj kaji ywagore malit gokinyi, kendo owinj tung’ lweny godiechieng’tir,
nikech ne ok onega kapok onywola.  Kamano dine oyika ei mama, miok dine onywola.
Ere gima omiyo ne onywola mana ni mondo ane lit gimasira, kendo atho mana gi wichkuot?"JEREMIA
Jeremia okoro wach ni Jerusalem ibiro kethi
Ruoth Zedekia nooro Pashur wuod Malkia kod Zefania wuod Maaseya jadoloir Jeremia kokwaye niya,
Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. "Yie ipenjnwaRuoth Nyasaye wach, nikech Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon kedo kodwa.  Dipoka Ruoth Nyasaye otimonwa hono moro kaka ne ojatimo, mi ochunNebukadnezar mondo owewa. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia, mi Jeremia nowacho ni jootego
nimondo onyis Zedekia ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho niya,"Jolweny ma konyo Zedekia kedo gi ruodh Babulon gi joge mag lwenymolworo ohinga mar Jerusalem abiro dwoko ei dala, kendo abiro dhurogikgi mag lweny pidhe pidhe e chuny dala.
An awuon abiro kedo kodu kaiya owang’, kendo ka an gi mirima mager.
Abiro nego ji duto modakdalani.  Tuo marach biro nego ji kaachiel gi jamni.
To Zedekia ruodhJuda gi jodonge kod jodalani duto ma otony e lweny, kendo otony e kechgi tuo, abiro keto e lwet ruoth Nebukadnezar, kendo e lwet wasikgi madwaro negogi.  Nebukadnezar biro negogi, kendo ok obi weyogi kata kechogikata timonigi ng’wono.  An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kamano!"
Ruoth Nyasaye ne ochako owacho ni Jeremia mondo onyis ji kama: "Winjuruan Ruoth Nyasaye aketonu yore ariyo mondo uyier achiel kuomgi.  Achiel endhi e ngima, to machielo en dhi e tho.
Ng’ato ang’ata modong’Jerusalem, lweny kata kech kata tuo noneg, to ng’ato ang’ata modhiochiwore e lwet jo-Babulon ma koro monjo dalani, ok nonegi.  To enoresmana ngimane kende.
Aseng’ado wach ni ok anyal weyo dalani, to nyakaakethe.  Ibiro kete e lwet ruodh Babulon, kendo obiro wang’e morum pep. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano!"Weche mokor kuom ruodhi mag Juda
"In Jeremia, nyis jood ruodh Juda ma nyikwa ruoth Daudi mondo owinjgima Ruoth Nyasaye owacho.
Timuru gik makare pile.  Konyuru ng’at maithiro e lwet joma thire, ka ok kamano, to timbeu maricho biro wang’oiya, ka mach ma ok nyal negi.
Un jo-Jerusalem, dalau obet e bath holnimana ka lwanda mogingore e pap.  To an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro kedo kodu. Uwacho ni onge ng’at ma nyalo monjou kata ma nyalo mwomo ohingau.
Toan Ruoth Nyasaye abiro kumou mana maromre gi kethou.  Abiro wang’o odruodhu gi mach ma nowang’ gik moko duto machiegni kode.  An Ruoth Nyasayeema awacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Dhiyo e od ruodh Juda ma nyakwarDaudi,
mondo iwachne, kaachiel gi jodonge kod joge madonjo edhorangeyegi, ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:
An Ruoth Nyasaye awachonuni mondo utim gik makare kendo madier.  Konyuru ng’at ma ithiro e lwetjoma thire.  Kik usand kata kik uthir jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mondliete, bende kik uneg joma onge ketho kama oyangnani.
Ka utimo kakaawachono to nyikwa Daudi nodhi mana nyime ka bedo ruodhi, kendo ginkaachiel gi jodonggi kod jogi gibiro siko ka gidonjo e dhoranga odruoth, ka giidho geche mag lweny kod farese.
Math
.
; Luka
.
. Toka ok urito wechego, to akuong’oranu ni od ruodhuni biro lokore gunda. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Od ruodh Juda berna mana ka piny Gilead, kendo ka got Lebanon, to katakamano abiro loke thim, kama onge ng’at madakie.
Abiro oro ji mondookethe.  Giduto gibiro biro gi ledhi, mi ging’ad yiend sida duto mabeyomogerego, mi giwiti e mach.
Bang’e achien, jopinje mamoko nobed kakadho kanyo, kendo ginipenjre kendgi ni, ‘Ere gimomiyo Ruoth Nyasayeosetimo gima chal kama ni dala maduong’ni?’
Eka nodwokgi niya, ‘Manoosetimore nikech jogi oseweyo singruok mane Nyasachgi otimo kodgi, migilamo nyiseche mamoko kendo gitiyonigi. ’
"Jo-Juda, kik uywag ruoth Josia, ma koro osethoni, to ywaguru wuode maShalum, nikech osetere e piny moro, kendo ok noduogi, bende ok ochak onepiny mane onywolee.
Ruo
.

;
W. Nda
.
-
. To nikech RuothNyasaye osewuoyo kuom Shalum wuod Josia mane obet ruodh Juda kar wuonmare kowacho niya, ‘Osea ka chuth, kendo ok noduogi.
Enotho e piny magiseteree, kendo ok nochak one pinyni. ’
"En gima lit manadi kuom ng’at ma gero od gorofa e yor miganga kendoka miyo jowetene tiyo kayiem, to ok migi misara.
En gima lit manadikuom ng’at mawacho ni obiro gero ot marang’ongo man gi udi madongo malo. Bang’e oketne dirise mi ochwade gi yiend sida, kendo owire gi rangemaber.
Bende gero ut sida mabeyo moloyo mag jomoko nyalo nyiso ni inruoth adier?"Wuoru nodak maber.  Pile ne en ng’at makare kendo jaadiera, omiyo gikmoko duto mane otimo ne odhi maber.
Ne oyalo jochan kare, omiyo gigeduto nodhi maber.  Gik ma kamago ema nyiso ni ng’ato ong’eyo RuothNyasaye.
In to ineno mana gigi iwuon.  Inego joma onge ketho, kendoithiro jogi gi gero.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "

W. Nda
.

. Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo kuomJehoyakim wuod Josia, ma ruodh Juda niya, "Onge ng’ama noywage, kawachoni, ‘Yaye Ruoth! Thoni lit manadi!’
Noywaye mi wite oko e dhorangaJerusalem, mana ka punda motho.
Un jo-Jerusalem, dhiuru e got Lebanon,mondo ukogi, kendo dhiuru e piny Bashan mondo uywagi.  Ywaguru gie godemag Abarim, nikech joma uriworugo oselo.
Nawuoyo kodu kapod udhimaber, to ne utamoru winjo.  Adier, usiko kutamoru luora chakretindou.
Jotendu, yamo ema biro tero.  Joma uriworugo ibiro kawo mi tere tuech.  Bang’e unuyud wichkuot kendo nog’eng’u nikech timbeumaricho.
Un joma odak Lebanon, moloso kuonde dakgi e yiend sida,unuywag manade ka rem malit ka rem mar muoch ochopo kuomu!"

.
-
;
W. Nda
.
,
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jekonia wuodJehoyakim ma ruodh Juda niya, "An Nyasaye mangima akuong’ora ni kata kainie tere manie lweta ma korachwich to pod dawuodhi oko,
mi achiwi nijoma iluoro madwaro negi, kata mana e lwet Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulonkod joge mag lweny.
Abiro witi kaachiel gi meru, e piny moro mane okonyuolue, kendo unutho kuno uduto.
Ok unuduog e pinyu muheroni. "
Jeremia nowacho niya, "Uparo ni Jekonia en agulu motho, mowit oko, mang’ato ok dwar koso? Ka ok kamano, to ere gima omiyo owite kaachiel ginyithinde e piny ma ok ong’eyo?
"Yaye, piny, piny! Winjuru wach Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ng’atni okuong’,omiyo enotho maonge nyathi.  En ng’at ma ok nyal dhi nyime maber. Nyikwaye ok nobed ruodhi mag Juda ka Daudi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "JEREMIA
Ji manok ema noduogi
"Enobed malich manade kuom jotelo ma weyo joga inego kendo ikeyo.
AnRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel awuoyo kuom jotelo mane onego rit joganiya, ‘Usekeyo joga, mi uriembo, bende ok useritogi maber.  Koro abirokumou nikech gik maricho ma usetimo.
Abiro choko joga modong’, kagolo epinje duto mane akeyogie, kendo nadwokgi e pinygi.  Gininywol nyithindomang’eny mi ginya.
Anaketnigi jotelo ma noritgi maber, mi onge gimanobwoggi kata ma nomi gibed maluor, bende onge ng’ato kuomgi ma noyudkolal.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. ’
Jer
.
-
. "Ndalo biro ma nayierie nyakwar Daudi hie mondo obedruoth.  Enorit piny gi rieko, kotimo gik ma owinjore kendo makare epiny.
E ndalo lochne, jo-Juda nodag gi kue, kendo jo-Israel bende nodagmaonge ng’ama chandogi.  Ginichak ruodhno ni ‘Ruoth Nyasaye ma resowa. ’ "
"An Ruoth Nyasayye awacho niya, ‘Ndalo biro ma onge ng’ama nokuong’regi nyinga ka Nyasaye mangima mane ogolo jo-Israel e piny Misri,
toginikuongre gi nyinga mana ka Nyasaye mangima mane ogolo jo-Israel epiny man nyandwat, kendo e pinje mamoko duto mane asekeyogie.  Bang’e ekaginidag e pinygi giwegi. ’ "Nyasaye okwedo jonabi ma jomriambo
Jeremia nowuoyo kuom jonabi niya,"Chunya ool morumo, kendo atetni. Achal gi ng’at momer,mosemadho kong’o mang’eny,mana nikech Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo nikech wechene maler. "
Joma oseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye opong’o piny.  Timbegi richo, kendogikonyore gi tekogi e yo marach.  Piny ywak kendo lege otwo nikechosekuong’gi.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Timbe jonabi gi timbe jodolo ok ler. Asejukogi ka gitimo richo kata mana e Hekalu mara!
Yore ma giluwo birobedo mapothpoth kendo motimo mudho.  Abiro miyo gichwanyre kendo gipodhi,nikech abiro kelo masira kuomgi chieng’ makumogie.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
"Aseneno ni jonabi mag Samaria gin joma ofuwo.  Ne gikoro weche e nyingBaal, mi gimiyo joga Israel olal.
Chak
.
; Ezek
.
. To bendeaseneno ka jonabi mag Jerusalem timo mana gik mamono.  Giterore, to kendogiwacho miriambo, bende gijiwo joma timo richo, omiyo onge ng’ama nyaloweyo timbene maricho.  Giduto gichalna gi jo-Sodom gi jo-Gomora.
Kuommano, an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, awuoyo kuom jonabi magJerusalem, ni abiro miyogi alode makech mondo gicham, kod pi motimokwiri mondo gimodhi, nikech giselando weche makwedo Nyasaye e pinygiduto. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho ji jo-Jerusalem niya, "Kikuwinj gima jonabi wachonu, nikech gimiyo ugeno kuom gik ma ok bi timore. Ginyisou gik ma giparo apara giwegi, to ok gik ma an emaawacho.
Gisiko ka giwacho ni ji motamore winjo wachna niya, ‘Gik mokoduto biro dhinu maber. ’ Bende giwacho ni joma wigi tek ni masira oknomakgi.
To onge kata ng’ato achiel kuom jonabigo moseng’eyo wechemopondo mag Ruoth Nyasaye.  Bende onge ng’ato kuomgi mosewinjo katamoseng’eyo wechne, kata mana mosechiko ite kuom gik ma an Ruoth Nyasayeawacho.
Mirimba chalo gi ahiti maduong’ ma biro utho joricho.
Ok obirumo kapok otieko timo gik ma adwaro.  E ndalo mabiro un joga ubirong’eyo tiend wechegi duto malong’o!"
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "An, ne ok aoro jonabgo, to ne girikniarika ka gidhi.  Bende ne ok amiyogi wach moro, to pod ne giwuoyo mana enyinga!
Ka dine ging’e parona mopondo, to dine gilando wachna ni jogamondo owe yoregi gi timbegi maricho.
"An, an Nyasaye man kuonde duto, to ok man kanyachiel kende.
Ongeng’ama nyalo pondo kamoro ma ok anyal nene.  Donge ung’eyo ni an, ankuonde duto, e polo kendo e piny.
Asewinjo weche mag miriambo majonabigo osehulo e nyinga ka giwacho ni giseleko, mi giyudo wach moakuoma.
Koro jonabigo biro wuondo joga gi miriambo ma giparo aparanyaka karang’o?.
Giparo ni lek ma giwachogo biro miyo wi joga wil kodakaka wi kweregi nowil koda, modok ni Baal.
Janabi ma oseleko lek,onego owach ni en mana lek, to janabi moseyudo wachna onego ohulwachnano kare.  Koso mihudhi gi cham yande chalre?
Wachna chalo gi machkendo chalo gi nyundo ma baro lwanda matindotindo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
Amon gi jonabi ma kawo weche jowetegi, kendo hulokagima gin wechena.
Bende amon gi jonabi ma wacho wechegi giwegi, towuondore ni wechego oa kuoma.
Winjuru gima awacho, an Ruoth Nyasaye!Amon gi jonabi mahulo lek mag miriambo, nimar giwito joga kod sungagi gilekgigo.  Ne ok aorogi, bende ne ok achikogi mondo gidhi gitim kamano,omiyo onge gima gikonyogo jogagi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho. "
"In Jeremia, ka ng’ato kuom joga kata kuom jonabi kata kuom jodoloopenji wach moa kuoma, kowacho niya, ‘Ere ting’ mapek moa kuom RuothNyasaye,’ to wachne ni, ‘Un e ting’ mapek ma Ruoth Nyasaye nigo, kendoobiro witou. ’
To kapo ni janabi kata jadolo kata achiel kuom jogiomulo wechego, kawacho niya, ‘Wach mapek moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye,’ toanakume kaachiel gi joode.
Kar mulo wechego to ng’ato ka ng’ato mondoopenj osiepene kaachiel gi jowetene niya, ‘Ere kaka Ruoth odwokowa?’Kata ni, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho nang’o?’
To kik gichak gimul weche mawacho ni, ‘Wach Ruoth Nyasaye en ting’ mapek,’ nikmech ka ng’atoomulogi, to anami wachna bedne mapek adier! Ji oseketho weche Nyasachgi,ma Nyasaye mangima, kendo ma Ruoth Nyasaye anyalo Gik Moko Duto.
"Jeremia, in ema nyaka ipenj jonabi niya, ‘Ere kaka Ruoth Nyasayenodwokou? Nowacho nang’o?’
To ka giwacho niya, ‘Wach Ruoth Nyasaye enting’ mapek,’ to iwachnigi ni, abiro ting’ogi mi awitgi kuma bor, nikechgisemulo weche mane akwerogi ni kik gimul.
Gibiro lal e wang’a,kaachiel gi dala maduong’ mane amiyogi gi kweregi.
Abiro miyogiwichkuot mochwere kod achaya ma wich ok nowilgo. "JEREMIA
Ngech ng’owo mabeyo kod ng’owo maricho

W. Nda
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye ne onyisa atonge ariyomoting’o ng’owo, koket e nyim Hekalu, mano notimore kane Nebukadnezarruodh Babulon osetero Jekonia wuod Jehoyakim ma ruodh Juda e tuechBabulon, kaachiel gi jotend Juda gi jotheth kod joma olony e tichlwedo.
Atonga achiel noting’o ng’owo mabeyo machiek atamalo, to atongamachielo noting’o ng’owo maricho ma ok nyal cham.
Bang’ mano, RuothNyasaye nopenja niya, "Jeremia, ang’o mineno?" Ne adwoke ni, "Anenong’owo, ma moko kuomgi beyo ahinya to moko richo ahinya ma ok nyalcham. "
Eka ne Ruoth Nyasaye owachona niya,
"An Ruoth Nyasaye ma NyasachIsrael akwano joma ne oter e tuech Babulon ka ng’owo mabeyogo, kendoabiro guedhogi.
Abiro ritogi maber, kendo anaduoggi e pinyni.  Abirogerogi, kendo ok namukgi.  Abiro pidhogi, kendo ok napudhgi.
Anamigichuny mar ng’eyo ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye.  Bang’e ginibed joga, kendoanabed Nyasachgi, nikech giniduog ira gi chunygi duto.
"To Zedekia ruodh Juda gi jodonge kod jo-Jerusalem mamoko dutomosedong’ kae, kata mosedhi Misri, abiro kwano mana ka ng’owo maricho maok nyal chamgo!
Abiro kelo kuomgi masira malich ma nomi ogendini dutobed maluor.  Ji nobed ka ngerogi, kendo tugo kodgi.  Bende ji nochargi,kendo noluong nyinggi ka gima okuong’ kuonde duto ma akeyogie.
Anakelkuomgi lweny gi kech kod tuo, nyaka chop girum pep e piny mane amiyogigi kweregi. "JEREMIA
Jo-Babulon biro ketho piny

W. Nda
.

; Dan
.
,
. E higa mar ang’wen mar lochJehoyakim wuod Josia ma ruodh Juda, Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremiakuom jo-Juda.  Mano ne higa mokwongo mar loch Nebukadnezar ruodhBabulon.
Jeremia janabi nonyiso jo-Juda kaachiel gi jo-Jerusalem dutoniya,
"Kuom higni piero ariyo gadek, chakre higa mar apar gadek marloch Josia wuod Amon ruodh Juda nyaka chil kawuono, Ruoth Nyasayeosebedo kawuoyo koda, kendo asetimo kinda kanyisou gik mowacho, to okusedewo.
Ruoth Nyasaye bende osetimo kinda kaoronu jotichne ma jonabi,to ok usewinjo, kendo ok usedewo.
Jonabigo ne nyisou mondo uwe yoreu gitimbeu maricho, eka udag e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyou kaachiel gikwereu ka mwanduu mosiko.
Ne gikwerou ni kik uti ni nyiseche mamoko,kendo kik ulamgi.  Bende ni kik umi Ruoth Nyasaye mirima kuom lamo kidomanono muloso uwegi.  Ka da bed ni ne uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye, to dine okokumou.
To Ruoth Nyasaye owuon wacho ni udagi winjo wachne, kendo karluore to ne umiye mana mirima gi kido manono mane uloso, mi un uwegi emaumiyo okumou.
"Emomiyo, kaka ne udagi winjo wechene, Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto wacho niya,
‘Abiro kelo ogendini duto moa yo nyandwat, kendo abirokelo jatichna Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon.  Ogendinigo biro kedo gi pinynikod joma odakie kendo gibiro kedo gi ogendini duto modak machiegni. Abiro tiekogi chuth, mi piny biro dong’ nono malich, mabwogo ji, kendoma ji chayo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Jer
.
;

; Fweny
.
,
. Abiro tieko mor gi ilo ma gin go, ma kata dwond mon ma miehnigi chwogi ok nowinji.  Ponge bende ok nowinji ka rego, kendo anasimtechegi.
W. Nda
.
; Jer
.
; Dan
.
. Pinyni duto biro dong’nono, kendo nobed gima lich mabwogo ji.  Ogendini duto nobed ka tiyo niruodh Babulon kuom higni piero abiriyo.
To bang’ mano, anakum ruodhBabulon kaachiel gi joge kuom richogi.  Anaketh pinygi, mi osik kokethorenyaka chieng’.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Abiro kelo niogandano kum duto ma asesiemogigo, tiende ni gik moko duto mondik ekitabuni.  Gin gik mane Jeremia osewacho kuom ogendinigi.
Ogendinimang’eny kod ruodhi madongo nolokgi wasumbini, kendo abiro chulonigikuor kuom timbegi. ’ "Masira mabiro mako ogendini
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nowacho niya, "Ma e kikombe mopong’ gimirimba.  Kawe mondo imi ogendini duto ma aori irgi omadhe.
Kagisemadhe, to gibiro kwang’ kendo neko biro makogi nikech lweny ma abirokelonigi. "
Omiyo ne agamo kikombe e lwet Ruoth Nyasaye, mi amiyo ogendini dutomane oora irgi omadhe.
Ogendini mane omi omadhego ne gin jo-Jerusalemkaachiel gi joma odak e miech Juda, kod ruodhigi gi jotendgi.  Ne omigimadhe mondo gin gi pinygi gilokre gima owe ma ji chayo, kendo gimalich mabwogogi.  Bang’e nyinggi nobed gima ikuong’ogo ji.  Kamano e kakapod ochal nyaka chil kawuono.
Jomoko ma bende ne omi omadho kikombe mar ngimano e magi: Farao ruodhMisri gi jotende kod jodonge, gi jo-Misri duto,
Kaachiel gi jopinjemamoko modak kuomgi, gi ruodhi duto mag piny Uz, gi ruodhi duto magmiech Filistia, ma Ashkelon gi Gaza gi Ekron kod dir Ashdodmodong’,
gi jo-Edom gi jo-Moab kod jo-Amon duto,
gi ruodhi duto magpinje mae dhonam Mediterania,
gi mier mag Dedan gi Tema kod Buz giogendini duto ma timgi en tito yie wigi,
gi ruodhi duto mag pinyArabia, gi ruodhi duto mag ogendini modak e thim,
gi ruodhi duto magZimri gi Elam kod media,
kaachiel gi ruodhi duto mag pinje man yonyandwat, kuonde maboyo gi machiegnni duto. Jopinjego duto ne omi omadho kikombeno.  Bang’e mogik, ruodh Babulon biromadhe.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Nyis ji ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kendo Nyasach Israel, achikogi mondo gimethi, mi gimerkendo ging’ogi nyaka gipodh piny ma ok ginyal kata chung’, nikech lwenyma abiro kelonigi.
To ka gidagi kawo kikombeno e lweti mondo gimadhi,to nyisgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko duto owacho ni nyakgimadhe!
Dala ma abiro kuongo kumo en mana dalani.  Koso giparo ni nawemak akumogi? Ooyo, abiro kumogi mak orem, nikech abiro kelo lweny kuomji duto modak e piny.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awachokamano.
"To in Jeremia,nyaka ihul weche duto ma asewacho,kinyiso ji niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye ruto gie polo. Ee, owuoyo gie polo malo. Oruto korogo joge,kendo okok ka ng’ama biyo mzabibu,kendo ji duto modak e piny winje.
Dwonde winjore e tung’ piny duto,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye yalo ogendini. Ee, oyalo ji duto,kendo ong’ado ni joricho buch tho. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Masira biro makoogendini duto moro ka moro, kendo ahiti maduong’ chokore e tung’ pinykuma bor.
Chieng’no ringre joma Ruoth Nyasaye onego nokere, chakretung’ piny konchiel nyaka komachielo, kendo onge ng’ama noywaggi.  Oknokaw ringregi mondo oyiki, to gining’ielre ang’iela e lowo ka owuoyomiolo e puothe.
"Ywaguru un jotelo! Ywaguru matek! Ywaguru kendo bukreuru gi buru,nikech kinde minegoue osechopo, kendo ibiro negou ka imbe machwe.
Oknobedie yo moro ma jotelo nyalo tonygo.
Giywak kendo gigoyo uwi ka gingi lit, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseketho pinygi,
kendo miechgi mane nigikue osedoko gundni nikech mirimbe mager.
Ruoth Nyasaye oseweyo jogemana ka sibuor ma oweyo gonde.  Timbe malich mag lweny osemiyo mirimbRuoth Nyasaye mager oloko pinyni thim. "JEREMIA
Osiem Jeremia gi tho

W. Nda
.
-
. Kane Jehoyakim wuod Josia odoko ruodhJuda,
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya, "Dhiyo ichung’ e laru marHekalu mondo inyis joma odak e miech Juda ma biro lemo e Hekalu weche maasenyisi.  Kik iwe kata wach achiel makinyisogi.
Kamoro dipo ka jiowinjo wechego, mi ng’ato ka ng’ato oweyo timbene maricho.  Ka giweyotimbegi maricho kamano, to analok parona kuom masira mane adwaro kelokuomgi.
"Iniwachnigi ni, An Ruoth Nyasaye asewacho ni nyaka uluora, kuluwochike mane anyisou.
Asetimo kinda ka aoro jotichna ma jonabi mondoowachnu wechena, to ok usedewo gik ma giwacho.
Josh
.
; Zab
.
;Jer
.
-
. Ka ok uwinjogi, kendo ka pod utamoru timo gik ma awacho, toabiro ketho Hekaluni mana kaka naketho Shilo, kendo ogendini dutonoluong nying dalani ka gima okuong’. "
Jodolo gi jonabi kod ji duto nowinjo ka Jeremia hulo wechego eHekalu,
kendo kane otieko wacho gik moko duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye ochikemondo owachi, jodolo gi jonabi kod ji duto nomake, ka kok niya,"Owinjore negi kuom wach ma kama!
Ere gima omiyo ikoro wach e nyingRuoth Nyasaye ni Hekalu biro chalo gi Shilo, kendo ni dalani ibirokethi, ma onge ng’ama nodagie?" Gikanyono ji nochokore mang’eny, molworoJeremia ei Hekalu.
Kane jodong Juda owinjo wachno, ne giwuok e od ruoth, mi gidhi gibet edhoranga Hekalu miluongo ni Rangach Manyien.
Eka jodolo gi jonabinonyiso jodongo kaachiel gi ji duto niya, "Owinjore ng’ad ni ng’atnibuch tho, nikech osewuoyo marach kuom dalawa.  Donge usewinje gi itu,kowuoyo?"
Bang’ mano, Jeremia nowacho ni jodongo gi ji niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye emaoseora mondo ahul weche duto ma usewinjo ka awacho kuom Hekaluni kendokuom dalani.
Nyaka ulok yoreu gi timbeu, kendo nyaka uluor RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Eka onyalo loko parone kuom masira ma osewacho niobiro kelo kuomu.
An to an e tekou.  Timnauru gimoro amora muparo niber kendo kare.
To nyaka ung’e ni ka unega, to un gi ji duto modak edalani unubed joketho kuom nego ng’at ma onge ketho, nimar Ruoth Nyasayeema oseora mondo anyisu wechego duto. "
Kane jodongo gi ji duto owinjowechego, ne giwacho ni jodolo gi jonabi niya, "Ng’atni ok owinjoreng’adne buch tho, nikech osewuoyo mana kodwa e nying Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa. "
Bang’e jodongo moko nochung’’ monyiso ji mane ochokore kanyoniya,
Mika
.
. "E ndalo loch Hezekia ruodh Juda, Mika janabi maja-Meresheth nonyiso jo-Juda duto ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoowacho kama: ‘Sayun ibiro pur oko ka puodho.  Jerusalem biro lokore pidhemag lwendni, kendo got mogerie Hekalu nolokre bungu. ’
To uparo niruoth Hezekia kod joge nonego Mika koso? Ooyo ne ok ginege, to Hezekianoluoro Ruoth Nyasaye, mi otemo kueyo mirimb Nyasaye.  Kuom mano RuothNyasaye noloko parone kuom masira mane osewacho ni obiro kelo kuomgi.  Towan to koro ere gima omiyo wadwaro kelo masira malich kuomwa?"(
Ne nitie ng’at moro machielo miluongo ni Uria wuod Shemaya maja-Kiriath-jearim.  En bende ne owuoyo e nying Ruoth Nyasaye kuom dalanikendo kuom ogandani, mana kaka Jeremia osewuoyo.
To kane ruothJehoyakim kod jotend jolwenje gi jodonge owinjo gima ne Uria owachono,notemo nege.  To Uria nowinjo wachno, mi luoro nomake moringo odhiMisri.
Kata kamano, Ruoth Jehoyakim nooro Elnathan wuod Akbor kodjomoko e piny Misri mondo oom Uria.
Omiyo ne gigole kuno, mi gidwokeni ruoth Jehoyakim, monege, kendo ne owit ringre e bur mane iyikoe jiajiya. )
Jeremia to notony, mi ok ochiw e lwet ji mondo onege, mananikech Ahikam wuod Shafan nokonye. JEREMIA
Jeremia orwako jok e ng’ute

Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. Kane Zedekia wuod Josia odoko ruodhJuda, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Kaw yien kod pien molir,ilosgo jok mondo irwak e ng’uti.
Bang’e inyis joote moa kuom ruodhi magEdom gi mag Moab gi mag Amon gi mag Turo kod mag Sidon mosebiroJerusalem neno Ruoth Zedekia,
mondo onyis ruodhigigo ni an RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, kendo ma Nyasach Israel
ema nachueyopiny gi tekona maduong’, kendo nachueyo dhano gi le duto modakie, omiyoanyalo kete e teko ng’ato ang’ata ma ayiero.
Kamano an ema aseketoogendinigi e teko jatichna Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon, bende asemiyokoda ka le tiyone.
Ogendini duto notine, kendo giniti ni wuode kodnyakware bende, nyaka chop kinde ma ogandane owuon nopodhie.  Bang’eogandane noti ni ogendini marateke kod ruodhi madongo.
"To ka oganda moro otamore tiyo ni Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon, katarwako jokne, to lweny gi kech kod tuoche ema nakumgo ogandano nyaka chopami obed e teko mar Nebukadnezar.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano.
Kik uchik itu kuom jonabi kata kuom ng’ato ang’ata mawacho ninyalo koro gik ma biro timore e yor lek kata e yor luongo chuny jomaosetho, kata e yor mbofwa.  Jogo duto koronu wach ni ok unubed e bwo lochruodh Babulon,
to giwuondou, kendo gibiro miyo teru mabor gi pinyu. Anariembu oko, mi urum pep.
To ka oganda moro oyie tiyo ni ruodhBabulon, kendo rwako jokne, to anaweye obed e pinye, mi opure kendoodagie.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Jeremia nonyiso Zedekia ruodh Juda wechego, kowacho niya, "Ka uyierwako jok mar ruodh Babulon mi utiyone kendo utiyo ni joge, eka unuresngimau.
Ere gimomiyo in kod jogi dutho, to Nyasaye osewacho ni lwenykata kech kata tuo biro nego oganda moro amora ma ok ti ni ruodhBabulon?
Kik udew weche jonabi ma kwerou ni kik uti ni ruodh Babulon,nimar giwuondou.
Ruoth Nyasaye owuon osewacho ni ne ok oorogi, togiwuondou awuonda e nyinge.  Mano emomiyo noriembu, mi negu duto,kaachiel gi jonabi ma wachonu miriambogo. "
Bang’e Jeremia nonyiso jodolo kod ji duto ni Ruoth Nyasaye osewachoniya, "Kik uwinj weche mag jonabi mawacho ni bang’ kinde matin ibirodwok gik lemo mag Hekalu mane oter Babulon.  Giwuondou awuonda!
Emomiyokik uwinj wachgi, to tiuru atiya ni ruodh Babulon, eka unures ngimau. Ere gima omiyo dalani dilokre gunda?
Ka gin jonabi adier, kendo ka gingi wachna, to onego gikwaya, an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto,mondo kik ayie gik lemo modong’ Jerusalem e Hekalu kendo e od ruoth, terBabulon!
Winjuru gima an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kuom sirni mag Hekalu gikaraya maduong’ gi rachungi kod gik lemo mamoko mag Hekalu mane ruothNebukadnezar oweyo
kane omako Jekonia wuod Jehoyakim ruodh Juda moteroBabulon kaachiel gi jodong Juda gi Jerusalem.
An Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel awacho ni gik mane owe Jerusalem eHekalu kendo e od ruoth,
ibiro tero Babulon, mi bed kuno nyaka chopapargi kendo.  Bang’e anaduoggi, mi aketgi kaeri.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Hanania okoro weche mag miriambo

Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. E higano, e due mar abich mar higamar ang’wen mar loch Zedekia ruodh Juda, Hanania janabi, ma wuod Azurja-Gibeon, nowuoyo gi Jeremia e Hekalu kowachone e nyim jodolo kodji,
ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israelowacho kama: "Aseturo jok mar ruodh Babulon,
kendo ka pok higni ariyoorumo, to abiro dwoko gik lemo duto mane ruoth Nebukadnezar okawo moteroBabulon.
Bende abiro duogo Jekonia wuod Jehoyakim ma ruodh Judakaachiel gi jo-Juda mane odar moter Babulon e tuech.  Adier, abiro turojok mar ruodh Babulon.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
To Jeremiajanabi nodwoko Hanania janabi e nyim jodolo gi ji duto mane oyudoochung’ e Hekalu,
kowacho niya, "Mad Ruoth Nyasaye tim kamano! Dang’bed maber ka omiyo wecheni duto otimore, mi oduogo gik lemo duto maneoter Babulon, kaachiel gi joma ne odar mi oter kuno e tuech!
To inHanania, kaachiel gi ji duto, winjuru gima awachonu.
Jonabi machon maneokwongonwa ne koro wach ni lweny gi kech kod tuo biro biro kuom ogendinimang’eny gi pinje marateke.
To ubiro ng’eyo ka janabi ma koro wach kueen janabi ma Ruoth Nyasaye oseoro adier, mana ka gik ma okoro otimore. "
Bang’ mano, Hanania nogolo jok e ng’ut Jeremia, moturo matindotindo.
Eka nowacho e nyim ji duto niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho nikaka aseturo jokni e kaka obiro turo jok ma ruoth Nebukadnezar oseketo eng’ut ogendini, kendo obiro timo kamano kapok higni ariyo orumo. "
To bang’ kinde moko, kane Hanania oseturo jok mane nie ng’ut Jeremia,Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia
mondo odhi onyis Hanania niya, "RuothNyasaye osewacho ni inyalo turo jok mar yien, to obiro keto jok marnyinyo kare.
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma NyasachIsrael osewacho ni obiro keto jok mar nyinyo kuom ogendini duto, kendoginiti ni Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon.  Bende osewacho ni obiro miyo katamana le mae bungu ti ni Nebukadnezar. "
Bang’e Jeremia nowacho ni Hanania niya, "Koro winji, Hanania.  RuothNyasaye ok oori, to imiyo jogi geno mana miriambo.
Omiyo Ruoth Nyasayeowuon wacho ni obiro tieki e wang’ pinyni, nimar ibiro tho ka pok higaniorumo, nikech isejiwo ji mondo otamre mako chikne. "
Kamano Hanania janabi notho e due mar abiriyo mar higano. JEREMIA
Hanania okoro weche mag miriambo
