Jeremia ondiko ni joma odar moter Babulon e tuech

Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
. Jeremia nondiko ni jotelo mane odong’kuom joma otue, kaachiel gi jodolo gi jonabi kod ji duto maneNebukadnezar ogolo Jerusalem motero Babulon.
Nondiko baruano kane ruothgi min mare gi jodong od ruoth gi jotend Juda kod jo-Jerusalem gijotheth kod joma olony e tich lwedo osea Jerusalem.
Jeremia noketobaruano e lwet Elasa wuod Shafan gi Gemaria wuod Hilkia mane oyudoZedekia ruodh Juda ooro ir Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon.  Jeremia nondikobaruano kama:
"Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel wacho nijogo duto mane omiyo Nebukadnezar ogolo Jerusalem motero Babulon e tuechniya,
‘Geruru udi mondo udagie.  Losuru puothe kendo chamuru gikmonyakie.
Kenduru mon, mondo ubed gi nyithindo, bende kenduru niyawuotu, kendo uwe nyiu okendi, mondo gin bende gibed gi nyithindgi. Kamano unya kuno, mondo kik udong’ chien.
Tiuru matek mondo ulos dalamoro amora ma asemiyo oterue e tuech.  Lamuru ni dalano nikech ka odhimaber to un bende ubiro dhi maber.
An Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israelasiemou ni kik jonabi modak kodu kata jokor wach wuondu.  Kik uchik ituni lekgi,
nimar giwachonu miriambo e nyinga, to an ne ok aorogi.  AnRuoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. ’ "

W. Nda
.
; Jer
.
; Dan
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ka hignipiero abiriyo mag loch Babulon oserumo, to anaparu mi aduogu e pinyukachopogo singruok mane atimonu.
An awuon ema ang’eyo gima achanonu. En gima ber to ok gima rach, kendo abiro kelonu gik mabeyo duto mugeno. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Bang’e unuluonga, kendo unubiulama, mi nadwoku.
T. Chik
.
. Unudwara, mi unuyuda, nikech unudwaragi chunyu duto.
Adier, awacho ni un uyuda, mi anadwoku e pinyu. Anagolu e pinje duto kuonde ma asekeyoue, mi anadwoku e piny maneagoloue, kane amiyo oteru e tuech.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Un uwacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyou jonabi e Babulon.
To winjurugima Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kuom ruoth marito piny kaka ne Daudi orito,kendo kuom jodalani, tiende ni wedeu mane ok odar moter e tuechkodu.
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, ‘Abiro kelolweny gi kech gi tuoche kuomgi, kendo abiro miyo gichal ka ng’owo motopma ok nyal cham.
Abiro chandogi gi lweny gi kech gi tuoche, miogendini duto mag piny biro bedo maluor koneno gima otimorenigi.  Kamoroamora ma akeyogie, ji nobed kangerogi kendo tugo kodgi.  Ginichargi,kendo giniluong nyinggi ka gima okuong’.
Mano biro timore nikech negitamore winjo wach asiko ka aoro jotichna ma jonabi mondo oternigi.  AnRuoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Un duto joma ne amiyo ruodh Babulonogolo Jerusalem kendo odhigo kaka joma otue, winjuru gima an RuothNyasaye awacho. ’
"An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel, kuomAhab wuod Koloya, gi Zedekia wuod Maaseya, ma wachonu miriambo e nyingaasewuoyoe niya, ‘Abiro ketogi e lwet Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon, miobiro negogi mana kuneno.
Ka joma ne ogol Jerusalem moter Babulon etuech dwaro kuong’o ng’ato, to giniwach niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondootimni kaka notimo ni Zedekia gi Ahab, mane ruodh Babulon owang’o kangima gi mach!"
Mano e gima biro timorenigi nikech ne gilokore jomaofuwo, ka giterore, kendo giwacho miriambo e nyinga, to ne ok amiyogiwach mondo gihul.  Ang’eyo gima gisetimo, kendo asebedo janeno kuomtimbegi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. ’ "Barup Shemaya
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel mondoonyis Shemaya ma ja-Nehelam niya,
"Ne indiko barua e nyingi iwuon,mioro ni jo-Jerusalem duto, kendo ni Zefania ma wuod Maaseya jadolokendo ni jodolo mamoko duto.  Niwacho ni Zefania ei baruanoniya,
‘Ruoth Nyasaye ne oketi jadolo kar Jehoyada, kendo koro in ejatelo maduong’ e Hekalu, kuom mano, en tiji mondo ine ni ng’ato ang’atama janeko to wuondore ni en janabi to mondo otue gi nyororo kod chumamolworo ng’ute.
Ka kamano, to ere gimomiyo ok isekwero Jeremia maja-Anathoth, mosebedo kawuoyo gi ji ka gima en janabi?
Nyaka kwerenikech nowacho ni jo-Juda man Babulon ni ginibed e tuech kuno aming’a. Omiyo onego giger udi gidagie, kendo gilos puothe, gicham gik monyakie. ’"
Zefania janabi nosomo baruano ni Jeremia.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayenowacho ni Jeremia,
mondo oor wach ni ji duto mane oter Babulon etuech, konyisogi gima ne Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kuom Shemaya.
Nowachoniya, "An Ruoth Nyasaye abiro kumo Shemaya gi nyikwaye duto, nikech neowuoyo ka gima en janabi, mi omiyo uyie weche mag miriambo, to ne okaore.  Ok nobed gi nyikwayo ma nochung wiye e ogandau, bende obiro tho kapok oneno gik mabeyo ma abiro timo ni joga, nikech nowachonigi mondogitamre mako chikena.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni jo-Juda mane oter e tuech biro duogo
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Ndik wecheduto ma asewachoni e kitabu,
nimar ndalo biro ma anaduogie joga majo-Israel gi jo-Juda.  Anadwokgi e piny mane amiyo kweregi, mi gidagiekendo. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo kuom jo-Israel gi jo-Juda kama:
"Asewinjo ywak markihondko ma onge kue.
Koro ling’uru mondo upar ane.  Bende dichwodinywol nyathi? Ere gima omiyo ji duto kirni?
Odiechieng’ marach biro,kendo onge odiechieng’ machal kode.  En chieng’ marach ni nyikwa Jakobo. To kata kamano, gibiro tony. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Chieng’no anang’ad jokmanie ng’utgi, kendo anatur ratege motuegigo, mi ok ginichak gibedwasumb jopinje mamoko
To ginitina, an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, kendoginiti ni Daudi ma abiro keto mondo obed ruodhgi.
Jer
.
,
. "Un nyikwa Jakobo jatichna, kik ubed maluor.  Ee, unjo-Israel, kik chunyu parre, nikech abiro resou mi agolu e piny mabormotueueno.  Nyikwa Jakobo noduogi kendo ginidag gi kue, maonge ng’amabwogogi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro bet kodu mondo aritu, mi atiek ogendini dutom kuonde maasekonyoue, to un ok natieku.  Kata kamano ok nawe mak akumou, to oknakumu gi gero. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni joge niya, "Adhondeu ok nyal chango, nikechnuhinyoru marach,
onge ng’ama nyalo ritou, kendo adhondeu ok thiedhre,omiyo ok unyal chango.
Osiepeu duto oseweyou, kendo tinde ok gidewu. Asemonjou mana ka jasigu, kendo useyudo kum mager nikech richoumang’eny, bende nikech timbeu maricho lich.
Ere gimomiyo uywagoru nirem ma un-go, to ok unyal chango.  Asekumou kamano nikech richou ng’eny,kendo nikech timbeu maricho lich.
Ji duto matiekou bende notieki,kendo wasiku noter mabor e tuech.  Ji duto mathirou bende nothir, kendojoma yakou bende noyaki.
Kata obedo ni wasiku wacho niya, ‘Sayunosejwang’ kendo onge ng’ama dewe,’ to anami uchak ubed mangima, kendoanachang adhondeu. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro dwoko nyikwa Jakobo e pinygi, miaguedh ng’ato ka ng’ato e ode.  Dala ka dala nochak oger mana kama neentie, kendo ot ka ot ji nodagie mana kaka nodakie chon.
Ji modakkuondego nower wende pak, kendo ginikogi gi ilo.  Anami ginya mathoth, maok gidok chien, kendo anami giyud pak, ma onge ng’ama chayogi.
Abirodwokonigi tekogi machon, mi achak agur ogandagi motegno, to anakum jiduto mathirogi.
Ruodhgi nobed mana ng’atgi giwegi.  Ee, jatendgi nowuogmana kuomgi.  Ka aluonge, to nobi buta machiegni, nikech onge ng’amadihedhre sudo machiegni ka ok aluonge.
Kamano unubed joga kendo anabedNyasachu.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Mirimba chalo gi ahiti maduong’ ma biro uko joricho.
Ok obi rumokapok otieko timo gik ma adwaro timo.  E ndalo mabiro, ubiro ng’eyowechegi malong’o. JEREMIA
Singruok manyien
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ndalo biro ma anabedie Nyasach dhout Israelduto, kendo ginibed joga.
"Ne atimo ng’wono e thim ni joma ne otony ma ok otho e lweny.  Jo-Israelne gombo yudo yueyo,
omiyo ne athinyoranigi gi kuma bor.  Kinde dutoasebedo ka aherou, un jo-Israel, kendo pod asiko ka aheroumochwere.
Jo-Israel, abiro chako gerou, kendo ubiro tueyo gara, miumiel gi ilo.
Unuchak upidh mzabibu e gode mag Samaria, kendo jomanopidhogi nocham olemo ma ginyago.
Adier, kinde biro ma jorito noluongji gie gode mag Efraim niya, ‘Biuru wadhi Sayun ir Ruoth Nyasachwa!’
"An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: Weruru gi ilo nikech mor ma jo-Israelnigo.  En oganda maduong’ie moloyo.  Weruru wendeu mag pak, kuwacho niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye osekonyo joge.  Osereso jo-Israel duto modong’. ’
Abirokelogi kagologi yo nyandwat, kendo abiro chokogi kagologi e tung’ pinykoni gi koni, kaachiel gi muofni gi rang’onde mi mon mayach kendo mamuoch kayo, mi giniduogi, ka gin oganda maduong’.
Joga noduog kaywak,to anakue chunygi ka atelonigi e yo.  Anatergi e aore mabeyo mamol, kendook ginichwanyre nimar giniwuoth e yo maber.  An wuon jo-Israel, kendoEfraim e wuoda makayo.
"Un ogendini, winjuru, an Ruoth Nyasaye, mondo uland wachna e pinjeman loka nam.  An ema ne akeyo jo-Israel, to koro abiro chako chokogi, miaritgi kaka jakwath rito jambe.
Asegolo jo-Israel e tuech, ka aresogie lwet wasigu mane oloyogi gi teko.
Gibiro duogo, mi giwer gi ilo egot Sayun, ka gimor gi gik ma achiwonigi, kaka cham gi divai gi mo kodjamni.  Ginichal gi puodho ma koth oromo, mi ok ginichak gichand gimorokendo.
Bang’e nyiri nomiel kendo nobed mamor, kendo yawuowi gi jomadongo bende nobed mail.  Anakue chunygi kendo nalok lit ma gin go obedmor, kendo kuyo ma gin go obed ilo.
Abiro miyo jodolo gundh gi chiemomabeyo moloyo, kendo joga noyud gik moko duto ma gichando.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Chak
.
-
; Math
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,"Dwol winjore e dala mar Rama,en nduru gi ywak malit,Rahel ywago nyithinde,kendo ok onyal horenikech gisetho giduto.
Ling’ iwe ywak,kendo ywe pi wang’i,nimar niyud poknikech gik misetimo ni nyithindi. Gibiro duogo ka gia e piny wasigu. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Iniwe nyikwayi bang’ thoni, nimar nyithindi biro duogo dala.
"Awinjo jo-Israel ka ywagore niya, ‘A Ruoth Nyasaye ne wachalo giruedhi masilwende ma ok obo, to ne iboyowa, mi wapie.  Dwogwa, to wabirodwogo nikech in Ruoth Nyasachwa.
Kata obedo ni ne wabaro mi waweyi, topiyopiyo nono ne wadwaro duogo.  Kane isekumowa, to ne wakulo wiwakwakuyo.  Wiwa ne okuot ka chunywa lit, nikech richo mane watimo kapodwayom. ’
To an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: In Israel in e wuoda maheromoloyo.  E sa asaya ma luongoe nyingi, to apari gi hera.  Chunya oheri,omiyo abiro kechi.
Un jo-Israel, keturu ranyisi ma nyiso wang’ yo,mondo yo ma onego uluw kik ruenyu, to uduog e miechu mane uweyo.
Ubirodigni kamano nyaka karang’o, un joma andhokegi? An Ruoth Nyasayeasechueyo gimoro ma hono: asemiyo dhako odoko maratego mana ka dichwo!"
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel wacho niya, "Ka asedwoko jo-Israel epinygi, to ginichak giwach e piny Juda gi mier mage kama: ‘Mad RuothNyasaye guedh got maler mar Jerusalem ma en kama ler modakie. ’
"Ji biro dak e piny Juda, kendo e mier mage duto.  Bende nobedie jopur,kod jokwath gi jambgi.
Anaduog chuny joma ool, kendo ng’ato ang’ata makech ohewo anami chiemo.
Kuom mano ji nowach niya, ‘Nindo noterowa, toka ne wachiew ne wanwang’o ka chunywa oduogo. ’Singruok manyien ma Nyasaye notim gi joge
"An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho ni kinde biro ma ji gi jamni nonya mang’eny epiny Israel gi Juda.
Kaka ne aketo chunya mondo apudhgi, kendo agogipiny, kendo akethgi, e kaka abiro keto chunya mondo apidhgi kendoagergi.
Ezek
.
. Ka ndalono ochopo, to ji ok nochak owach niya,‘Wuone ne ochamo olembe manumu,to nyithindo ema dhogi rewore. ’
To koro ng’ama ochamo olemo manumu, dhoge norewre mana en owuon,tiende ni ng’ato ka ng’ato notho mana nikech richone owuon. "
Math
.
; Mar
.
; Luka
.
;
Kor
.
;
Kor
.
.  Hib
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ndalo biro ma anatimie singruokmanyien gi dhood Israel kod dhood Juda.
Ok nochal gi singruok maneatimo gi kweregi kane atayogi kagologi e piny Misri, nimar ne gikethosingruok mane atimo kodgi kata obedo ni ne an ruodhgi.
Hib
.
. Singruok ma anatim gi dhood Israel bang’ ndalogo ema: Anaketchiekena e parogi, kendo anandikgi e chunygi.  Anabed Nyasachgi, miginibed jogaa.
Hib
.
. Onge ng’ama nopuonj wadgi kata ma nopuonjomin mare, kawachone ni, ‘Ng’e Ruoth Nyasaye,’ nikechh gidutogining’eya, chakre ng’at matinie moloyo nyaka ng’at maduong’ie moloyo. Anawenigi richogi, kendo ok nachak apar timbe maricho mane gisetimo.  AnRuoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Ruoth Nyasaye ema miyo chieng’ rieny godiechieng’, kendo omiyo due gisulue rieny gotieno.  En ema otago pi nam, kendo omiyo apaka wuo.  Nyingeen Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.
Osingore ni Israel nobedoganda kinde duto nyaka giko piny.
Ka da bed ni polo inyalo pimo, katamise mag piny inyalo nono maber, too eka Ruoth nyasaye dijwang’jo-Israel nikech gik maricho ma gisetimo.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ndalo biro ma nochak ogerie dalani, chakrekama oger mabor mar ng’icho mar Hananel kochiko yo podho chieng’, nyakarangach man kama ohinga gomogo.
Tong’ne nodhi koa kanyo kochomo yopodho chieng’, nyaka got Gareb, mi olwor nyaka Goah.
To holo duto kamaowitie ringre joma otho, kendo owitie yugi, nobed kama ler moyangna,kaachiel gi pewe duto manie geng aora Kidron nyaka ranga Farese, komaochomo yo wuok chieng’.  Dala Jerusalem ok nochak omuki, bende ok nochakokethe. "JEREMIA
Jeremia ong’iewo lowo Anathoth

Ruo
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia e higa mar apar mar lochZedekia ruodh Juda, ma bende ne higa mar apar gaboro mar lochNebukadnezar ruodh Babulon.
E ndalono jolweny mag ruodh Babulon nemonjo Jerusalem, kendo noyudo Jeremia janabi otue e laru mar odruoth.
Ruoth Zedekia notueye kanyo nikech noyudo osekoro wach niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni obiro chiwo Jerusalem e lwet ruodh Babulon,mi kaw,
kendo ni ruoth Zedekia ok notony e lwet jo-Babulon, to ibiromake mi tere e nyim ruodh Babulon mi enonene wang’ gi wang’, kendo nowuokode dhok gi dhok.
Enotere Babulon kendo nobed kuno nyaka chop otimnegima odwaro.  To kata da oked gi jo-Babulon matek manade, to ok nolo. Ruoth Nyasaye ema owacho kamano. "
Jeremia nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona ni
Hanamel wuod Shalumma owadgi wuora biro biro ira, ka dwaro mondo ang’iew puothe manAnathoth, nikech an watne mahie, omiyo an gi ratiro mar ng’iewopuotheno. "
Kane Ruoth Nyasaye osenyisa kamano, Hanamel ma wuod owadgiwuora nobiro ira e laru mar jorit, mowachona niya, "Ng’iew puotha manAnathoth e piny Benjamin, nikech in watna mahie, omiyo in ema in giratiro mar ng’iewe obed mari. " To koro nang’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye emadwaro mondo ang’iew puodhono.
Kuom mano ne ang’iewe, mi achulo Hanamelfedha moromo achiel kuom abich mar kilo.
Ne aketo sei e barup winjruokmanyiso ni aseng’iewo puodhono, mi adino baruano e nyim joneno, kendo neapimo fedha e ratil.
Eka ne akawo barua modin mane oting’o weche duto mag winjruok kod manomane ok odin,
mi amiyo Baruk wuod Neria ma wuod Maseya e nyim Hanamelgi joneno mane oseketo sei e barup winjruok nogo, kendo e nyim jo-Yahudiduto mane obet e laru.
Ne anyiso Baruk e nyim jogo duto niya,
"RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel osechiko mondoikaw barup winjruok modinni, kod mano ma ok odin, mondo iketgi e agulugibedie mak gikethre kuom higni mang’eny,
nikech ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko duto keno ma Nyasach Israel osewacho ni udi gi puothe magmzabibu nochak ong’iew kendo e pinyni. "
Kane asemiyo Baruk wuod Neria barup winjruokno, ne alemo kama:
"ARuoth Nyasaye! Ne ichueyo polo gi piny kod riekoni gi tekoni maduong’. Onge gima nyalo tami timo.
Isenyiso herani mosiko ni ji gana gi gana,to bende ikumo ji nikech richo mag wuonegi.  In Nyasaye maduong’ man giteko, kendo nyingi en Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.
In ichanogik malichh miwuoro, kendo itimo gik madongo.  Bende ineno gik moko dutoma ji timo, kendo itimonigi mana moromo gi timbegi.
Ne itimo ranyisigi honni e piny Misri, kendo pod isiko kitimogi nyaka chil kawuono epiny Israel kendo e pinje moko duto.
Te itiyo gi tekoni maduong’ kodriekoni kuom timo ranyisi gi honni mane ibwogogo wasikwa, mi igolo jogie piny Misri.
Ne imiyogi piny maber kendo momewni, mana kakanisesingori ni kweregi.
To kane gidonjo e pinyni, mi gidakie, ne okgirito chikeni, bende ne ok giluori.  Ne ok gitimo gimoro amora maneisechikogi mondo gitim.  Mano emomiyo ne ikelo masirani duto kuomgi.
"Jo-Babulon osedhuro lowo pidhe pidhe e alwora mar dala, kendo gimonjemondo gikawe.  Lweny gi kech kod tuo biro miyo gikawe.  A Ruoth Nyasaye,ineno kaka gigo mane iwacho timore.
To kata kamano, Ruoth Nyasaye, inema ne inyisa mondo ang’iew puodho cha e nyim joneno, kata obedo nijo-Babulon ochiegni kawo dalani kamano. "
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"An e Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach ji duto, kendo onge gima nyalo tama timo.
Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. Kuom mano, abiro chiwo dalani e lwet Nebukadnezar ruodhBabulon kod joge mag lweny mondo okawe.
Jo-Babulon ma koro monjoJerusalem biro moke mach, mi obiro wang’ pep kaachiel gi udi ma jiosebedo kawang’o ubani ni Baal e tetgi, kendo timoe misengni miolo pinyni nyiseche mamoko, ka gimiyago mirima.
Jo-Israel gi jo-Juda osebetmana ka timo gik ma amon-go, chakre tindogi, kendo gisemiya mirima gikido manono ma giseloso.
Dalani osemiya mirima mager, chakre chieng’mane ogeree nyaka chil kawuono, kendo asechano mondo akethe
nikechtimbe maricho ma jo-Israel gi jo-Juda osetimo, kaachiel gi ruodhigi gijotendgi kod jodologi gi jonabigi kod ji duto modak e piny Juda giJerusalem.
Giselokona ng’egi, kendo kata obedo ni ne asesikokapuonjogi, to gidagi winja, bende ok giyie mako puonjna.

;Jer

. Giseketo kido mag nyisechegi makuero e Hakalu mara,mi gidwanyo,
Ruo
.
; Jer
.
; T. Lawi
.
. kendo gisegerokende-mag-liswa ni Baal e holo Ben-hinom mondo giwang’ie yawuotgi ginyigi ka liswa ni nyasaye miluongo ni Molek.  To ne ok anyisogi mondogitim kamano, bende ne ok aparo kata matin ni ginyalo timo gima kamano,mi gimi jo-Juda bed joricho. "
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nowuoyo kuom Jerusalem niya, "Jeremia,isenyiso ji ni lweny gi kech kod tuoche biro miyo jo-Babulon kaw dalani. To koro winji gima chielo ma adwaro wacho
Kinde moro anachokgi,kagologi e pinje duto ma nobed ka asekeyogie, ka akecho kendo ka mirimbager, mi aduoggi ka eri mondo gidagie gi kue.
Eka ginibed joga kendoanabed Nyasachgi.
Abiro miyogi chuny achiel gi yo achiel mondo giluoranyaka chieng’, eka gidhi nyime maber kod nyikwagi bende.
Anatim kodgisingruok mochwere ni ok nawe timonigi maber, kendo anami giluora gichunygi duto, mi ok ginibar giweya.
Anatimnigi maber ka chunya mor,kendo anagurgi motegno e pinyni gi chunya duto kod parona duto.
"Kaka asekelo masira maduong’ni kuom jogi, e kaka abiro miyogi gikmoko duto mabeyo ma asesingoranigi.
In Jeremia, isewacho ni pinynibiro chalo thim, kama le kata dhano ok dagie, kendo ni jo-Babulon birokawe.  To kata kamano, bang’e, puothe nochak ong’iew e pinyni.
Jinong’iewgi mi ket sei e barupe mag winjruok manyiso ni oseng’iewgi,kendo ginidin barupego e nyim joneno.  Mano notimre e piny Benjamin gimier mokiewo gi Jerusalem gi miech Juda, kendo e miech piny gode, kodpiny motwo man yo milambo, nimar nadwok joga e pinygi.  An Ruoth Nyasayeema awacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Jerusalem ibiro guedho kendo
Ruoth Nyasaye ne ochako owuoyo gi Jeremia, kane Jeremia pod otue e larumar od jorit.
Nowachone kama: "An Ruoth Nyasaye mane ochueyo piny, mioloso kendo oguro motegno, nyinga en Ruoth Nyasaye.
In Jeremia awachoniniya, ‘Luonga, to abiro dwoki, kendo ananyisi gik madongo kendo malichma ok ing’eyo. ’
An Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, awacho ni utJerusalem kod od ruodh Juda ibiro muki.  Onge tiende wuok mondo utem mukopidhe mag lowo ma jo-Babulon osedhuro mondo giidhi ka gimonjodala,
nikech mano biro mana miyo dala pong’ gi ringre ji ma abiro negoka an gi mirima mager.  Asejwang’o dalani nikech timbe maricho ma jomaodakie osetimo.
To kata kamano, abiro change, mi odok mangima.  Bendeabiro chango joma odakie mi amigi mor kod kue.
Abiro miyo jo-Juda gijo-Israel dhi nyime maber, kendo anachak agergi, mi gibed mana kaka negin chon.
Abiro pwodhogi kuom richogi duto, kendo abiro weyonigi timbemaricho ma gisetimo e nyima ka gitamore mako chikna.
Jerusalem nobedkama miya mor, kendo makelona pak gi duong’, mi ogendini duto mae pinynobed maluor kendo makirni ka giwinjo gik moko duto mabeyo ma atimo nijo-Jerusalem, kod dongruok maber ma akelo ni dalani. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Ji wacho ni kaeri chalo gi thim, kendoonge ji kata jamni modakie.  En adier ni miech Juda kod yore magJerusalem odong’ nono, kendo onge ji kata jamni mantie.

Unuwinj ka ji wer ka gikelo chiwo mag erokamano e Hekalumara niya,‘Gouru erokamano ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto,nikech ong’won kendo herane osiko. ’Abiro miyo pinyni bed maber mana kaka ne ochalo chon.  An Ruoth Nyasayeema awacho kamano. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nowacho niya, "E piny ma korochalo thim, maonge ji ma odakieni, chieng’ moro lege nochak obedie majokwath nyalo kwayoe jambgi.
Jokwath nochak okwan jambgi e mier maniepiny gode gi manie tiend gode kod manie piny milambo gi manie pinyBenjamin kod manie mier matindo molworo Jerusalem kendo e miech Juda.  AnRuoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "

E kindenoanakel nyakwar Daudi hie, mi enotim gik malong’o kendo makare.
Endalogo nores jo-Juda, kendo jo-Jerusalem nodag gi kue.  Omiyo ginichakdalagi ni, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye moresowa. ’

. An Ruoth Nyasaye asingora ni e kinde duto nobedie nyakwar Daudika ruodh Israel,
Kwan
.
-
. kendo pile nobedie jodolo ma jo-Lawi katiyo e nyima, kendo kachiwo misengni miwang’o pep gi mag mogo kaachielgi misengni mamoko. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Kapo ni chike ma aritogoodiechieng’ gotieno nyalo kethore, mi ok giluwore kaka pile,
to karasingruok mane atimo gi Daudi jatichna ni kinde duto nyakware ema nobedruoth, bende nyalo kethore, kendo singruok mane atimo gi jodolo majo-Lawi ma tiyona bende dikethre.
Abiro miyo nyikwa Daudi jatichna kodjodolo ma jo-Lawi ma tiyona nya, mondo gibed mang’eny ma ok nyal kwan,mana ka sulue manie polo kata ka kuoyo mae dhonam. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Donge isewinjo ka ji wachoni aseweyo jo-Israel gi jo-Juda, ma gin dhoudi ariyo mane ayiero? Kuommano koro gicharo joga, kendo ok gikwan-gi ka joma nigi pinygi.
To anRuoth Nyasaye awacho ni, kapo ni anyalo ketho chike ma aritogoodiechieng’ gotieno kod polo gi piny,
to eka anyalo ketho singruokmane atimo gi nyikwa Jakobo kendo gi Daudi jatichna, ni anaket nyakwarDaudi moro obed ruodh nyikwa Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo.  Adier, abirotimonigi ng’wono mi gichak gidhi nyime maber. "JEREMIA
Jeremia osiemo ruoth Zedekia

Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israelnowuoyo gi jeremia kane oyudo Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon gi ogandane marlweny kod jolweny mag ogendini mamoko, kaachiel gi mag pinje duto maneni e bwo lochne omonjo Jerusalem kod mier mokiewo kode.
Nowachone mondoodhi onyis Zedekia ruodh Juda niya, "An Ruoth Nyasaye, abiro chiwodalani e lwet ruodh Babulon, mi nowang’e pep.
In ok nitony, to ibiromaki mi teri ire.  Ubiro nenoru kode wang’ gi wang’, mi uwuo kode dhok gidhok.  Bang’e inidhi Babulon.
Omiyo ruoth Zedekia, winji, gima an RuothNyasaye awacho kuomi.  Ok nonegi e lweny,
to initho gi kue, mi jinowang’ni gik mang’ue ng’ar kiyiki, mana kaka ne giwang’o ni kwerenimane okwongoni bedo ruodh.  Giniywagi ka giwacho niya, ‘A yaye!’ Ruodhwaotho! An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Bang’e Jeremia janabi noluwo wechego duto ni Zedekia ruodh Juda, maneni Jerusalem.
E kindeno jolweny mag ruodh Babulon noyudo monjoJerusalem, kaachiel gi Lakish kod Azeka.  Mier ariyogo kende e miech Judamochiel motegno mane pok okaw. Jo-Juda oketho singruok mane gitimo gi wasumbgi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia, kane ruoth Zedekia osetimo winjruokgi jo-Jerusalem mondo ogony wasumbni maggi odhi.
Noyudo ji dutoosewinjore ni ng’ato ka ng’ato biro gonyo wasumbni mage ma jo-Hibraniamachwo gi mamon mondo ng’ato kik bed gi ja-Yahudi matiyone kamisumba.
Kane ji duto kaachiel gi jotendgi osetimo singruok ni gibirogonyo wasumbgi kamano kendo ni ok ginichak gilokgi wasumbni, ne gichoposingruokno, mi giweyo wasumbgi odhi.
To achien ne giloko parogi migikawo mon gi chwo mane gisegonyo, mi gichako gidwoko e tich wasumbni.
Kindeno ema Ruoth Nyasaye
ma Nyasach Israel nowachoe ni Jeremianiya, "Ne atimo singruok gi kwereni kane aresogi mi agologi Misri e tichwasumbni.  Ne awachonigi niya,
Wuok
.
; T. Chik
.
. ‘Higni abiriyoka higni abiriyo onego ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu owe ja-Hibrania moro amoramane ong’iewo ka misumba, kendo mosetiyone kuom higni auchiel. ’ Tokwereu ne ok nyal winja, kata rito chikna ne ok girito.
Un to yandeuloko parou, mi utimo gima ahero.  Uduto ne uyie gonyo jo-Hibrania weteu,mi utimo singruok e nyima ei Hekalu miluongo gi nyinga.
To bang’e neuchako uloko parou, mi ukwedo nyinga.  Uduto ne uchako ukawo wasumbnikendo.
Kuom mano, an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho ni ne achikou mondo uwejo-Hibrania weteu thuolo, to ok userito chiknano, emomiyo abiro weyouthuolo, to mana ni mondo lweny gi tuoche kod kech onegu! Abiro miyoogendini duto manie piny bed maluor konenou.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano.
,
Jotend Juda gi mag Jerusalem kod jodong od ruoth gi jodolokod jopinyni duto notimo koda singruok ka gikadho e kind kidienje ariyomag rwath mong’adi sirunda.  To ne giketho singruok mane gisetimo enyima, mi ok gichopo singruokno.  Omiyo abiro timo ni jogi mana gima neatimo ni rwath
Abiro chiwogi e lwet wasikgi ma dwaro negogi, kendoringregi winy gi le ema biro chamo.
Bende abiro chiwo Zedekia ruodhJuda gi jodonge e lwet joma dwaro negogi, kendo abiro ketogi e lwetjolweny mag ruodh Babulon ma koro oseweyo monjou.
Adier, abiro golochik, mi jo-Babulon-go biro duogo monjo dalani mi gikaw, kendo giwang’pep.  Abiro ketho miech Juda, mi lokre thim maonge ng’ama dakie.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Joka Rekab

Ruo
.
—
.
;
W. Nda
.
-
. E ndalo loch Jehoyakim wuod Josiaruodh Juda, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya
"Dhiyo ir joka Rekabmondo iwuo kodgi.  Bang’e ikelgi e ot achiel kuom ut Hekalu mondo imigidivai gimadhi. "
Kuom mano Jeremia nokawo Jazania wuod Jeremia machielo,ma nyakwar Habazia kod owetene gi joka Rekab duto,
mi okelogi e Hekalu. Ne oterogi e od yawuot Hanan wuod Igdalia ng’at Nyasaye.  Odno ne niebath od jodong Hekalu, kendo ewi od Maaseya wuod Shalum mane jatichmaduong’ e Hekalu.
Bang’e Jeremia noketo kikombe gi tewni ma divaiopong’o e nyim joka Rekab, mowachonigi niya, "Madhuru divai. "
To ne gidwoke niya, "Ok wamadh divai nikech Jonadab wuod Rekab makwarwa nowachonwa ni wan kata nyikwawa kik wamadh divai nyakachieng’.
Bende nokwerowa ni kik wager udi kata kik wapur puothe, kendoni kik wapidh yiend mzabibu kata kik wabed gi gik makamago.  Nochikowamana ni mondo wadag mana e hembe kuom ngimawa duto, ni eka wanadagaming’a e piny ma wanie weloni.
Waserito chike duto mag Jonadab wuodRekab ma kwarwa.  Wan wawegi ok wamadh divai, kata mana mondwa giyawuotwa kod nyiwa bende ok madhi.
Ok wager udi mondo wadagie, bendewaonge gi puothe mag mzabibu, kata puothe mamoko, kata cham,
to wadakmana e hembe, kamano, chike dutoo mane kwarwa Jonadab omiyowa waseritomaber.
To kane Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon omonjo pinywani, ne wanenoni ber mondo wabi Jerusalem, dipo ka jolweny mag Babulon gi mag Aramomakowa.  Mano emomiyo wadak Jerusalem. "
Bang’ wechego, Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma NyasachIsrael nowacho ni Jeremia
mondo odhi owach ni jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalemniya, "An Ruoth Nyasaye apenjou gima omiyo utamoru winja, kata ritochikena?
Nyikwa Jonadab oserito chik mane kwargi omiyogi mi ok gimadhdivai, kendo kata nyaka sani onge ng’ato kuomgi mametho, nikech giritochik mane kwargi ogolo.  To an asebedo ka awuoyonu pile, toutamoru.
Bende asebedo ka aoronu jotichna ma jonabi, kendo gisekwerouni mondo uwe timbe maricho, utim gik makare.  Ne gisiemou ni uwe lamonyiseche mamoko mondo udag aming’a e piny mane amiyou gi kwereu.  To neok unyal winja, kata chiko itu kuom gima awacho.
Nyikwa Jonadaboserito chik mane kwargi omiyogi, to un to utamoru winja.
Omiyo anRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel abiro kelokuomu un jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem masiche duto mane asesiemougo, nikechne ok unyal winja ka awuoyo kodu, bende ne ok unyal dwoka ka aluongou. "
Bang’e Jeremia nowacho ni joka Rekab ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma NyasachIsrael osewacho niya, "Userito chik mane kwaru Jonadab omiyou, kutimogik moko duto mane ochikou.
Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto, kendo ma Nyasach Israel asingora ni e kinde duto nobedienyakwar Jonadab wuod Rekab ma tiyona. "JEREMIA
Ruoth Jehoyakim owang’o kitabu

Ruo
.
;
W. Nda
.
-
; Dan
.
,
. E higa mar ang’wen mar lochJehoyakim ruodh Juda, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Kawkitabu mondo indikie weche duto ma asenyisi kuom Israel gi Juda kodogendini duto, chakre chieng’ mane akwongo losoe kodi e ndalo loch ruothJosia nyaka chil kawuono.
Kamoro ka jo-Juda owinjo masiche duto maachano kelo kuomgi, to ginyalo weyo yoregi maricho.  Bang’eanyaloweyonigi timbegi maricho kod richogi. "
Mano omiyo Jeremia noluongo Baruk wuod Neria, mi oluwone weche dutomane Ruoth nyasaye osenyise, kendo Baruk nondikogi duto ekitabu.
Bang’e Jeremia nomiyo Baruk chik niya, "Tinde ok oyiena donjo eHekalu
Omiyo adwaro ni wang’ni ka ji tueyo chiemo, to mondo idhi kunoisom weche manie kitabuni matek mondo giwinj gik moko duto ma RuothNyasaye osenyisa, mi awachoni indiko.  Nyaka itim kamano kama ji dutonyalo winjigo, koda ka jo-Juda mobiro ka oa e miechgi.
Kamoro dipo kagilamo Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gilokore giweyo yoregi maricho, nimarosesiemogi ni obiro kumogi gi mirimbe mager. "
Kamano Baruk nodhi eHekalu mosomo weche Ruoth Nyasaye manie kitabuno, mana kaka Jeremianonyise.
E due mar ochiko, higa mar abich, mar loch Jehoyakim wuod Josia ruodhJuda, jo-Jerusalem duto kaachiel gi ji mane oa e miech Juda ne oriyokech mondo Ruoth Nyasaye okechgi.
Eka Baruk nosomonigi weche duto maneJeremia owachone, mi ondiko e kitabu.  Ne osomo wechego e Hekalu gi e odGemaria wuod Shafan ma jang’ad ni ruoth rieko.  Odno ne nie laru mamalo edhoranga Hekalu miluongo ni ‘Rangach Manyien. ’
Kane Mikaya wuod Gemaria ma nyakwar Shafan owinjo ka Baruk somo wecheRuoth Nyasaye e kitabuno,
ne odhi e dala ruoth modonjo ei od jang’adni ruoth rieko, kama ne oyudo jotelo duto nitie ka yalo.  Elishama majang’ad ni ruoth rieko, kod Delaya wuod Shemia gi Elnathan wuod Akbor,gi Gemaria wuod Shefan gi Zedekia wuod Hanania kod jotelo mamoko duto neoyudo ni kuno.
Mikaya nonyisogi weche duto mane osewinjo ka Baruk somoni ji.
Eka jotelogo nooro Jehudi wuod Nethania ma wuod Shelemia mawuod Kushi mondo onyis Baruk okel kitabu mane oyudo osesomo ni jino. Omiyo Baruk nokawo kitabuno mi odhigo irgi.
Kane ginene, ne giwachoneniya, "Bed piny mondo isomnwa kitabuno. " Kuom mano Baruk nobet piny,mosomonigi,
kendo kane osetieko some duto, jotelogo nowuoyo e kindgigiwegi ka wuoro.  Eka ne giwacho ni Baruk niya, "Nyaka wanyis ruothwachni. "
Bang’ mano ne gipenje niya, "Nyiswa ane, ere kaka ne indikowechegi duto? Koso Jeremia ema ne wuoyoni to indiko?"
Baruk nodwokoginiya, "Jeremia ema ne owachona wechego duto, mi andiko gi wino ekitabuni. "
Bang’e ne giwachone niya, "Un gi Jeremia nyaka upondi,mondo kik ng’ato ng’e kama untie. "
Jotelogo nokawo kitabuno mokano e od Elishama ma jang’ad ni ruothrieko, eka ne gidhi e laru mar od ruoth, mi ginyiso ruoth wecheduto.
Ruoth ne ooro Jehu mondo odhi oomne kitabuno, mi Jehu nodhi oomee od Elishama mosome ni ruoth kod jodongo duto mane nigi ruoth.
Ne endue mar ochiko, kinde ma koyo ng’ichie, kendo ne oyudo ruoth obet ka oyomach e ode modakie ndalo koyo.
E kinde ka kinde mane Jehudi tieko somolaini adek kata ang’wen, ruoth ne ng’ado kuondego gi pala moro matin,kendo owito e mach.  Ne otimo atima kamano nyaka ne otieko kitabuno.
Toruoth, kata ng’ato ang’ata kuom jodonge ne ok obedo maluor, kata yiecholepgi ma dinyis ni giloko chunygi.
Kata obedo ni Elnathan gi Delaya giGemaria ne jokwayo ruoth ni mondo kik owang’ kitabuno, to ne okodewogi.
Bang’e nogolo chik mondo jaduong’ Jerameel kaachiel gi Serayawuod Azriel kod Shelemia wuod Abdiel jodhi omak Jeremia gi Baruk jandikomare.  To noyudo ka Ruoth Nyasaye osepandogi.
Kane ruoth Jehoyakim osewang’o kitabu mane Baruk ondikoe weche maneJeremia oluwone, Ruoth Nyasaye nonyiso Jeremia
mondo okaw kitabumachielo, kendo ondikie weche duto mane nie kitabu mokwongono.
BendeRuoth Nyasaye ne owachone mondo onyis ruoth Jehoyakim niya, "Isewang’okitabu, kendo isepenjo Jeremia gima omiyo ne ondiko ni ruodh Babulonbiro biro ketho pinyni, kendo nego ji modakie koda ka jamni.
Kuommano, an Ruoth Nyasaye awachoni, in ruoth Jehoyakim, ni onge nyakwarimoro amora ma nobed ruoth ka Daudi.  Ringri nowiti oko kama chieng’nochamee godiechieng’, kendo koyo nochamee gotieno.
Anakumi in kodnyikwayi, kaachiel gi jodongi nikech richo ma usetimo.  In gijo-Jerusalem kod jo-Juda, ok usedewo siem mane asiemougo, omiyo abirokelo kuomu masiche duto ma asewacho. "
Bang’ mano, Jeremia nokawo, kitabu machielo, momiyo Baruk jandikomare, mondikoe weche duto mane Jeremia owachone.  Ne ondiko gimoro amoramane nie kitabu mane ruoth Jehoyakim osewang’o e mach.  Bende Jeremia neomedo weche mang’eny machal gi mokwongogo. JEREMIA
Otue Jeremia

Ruo
.
;
W. Nda
.
. Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon noketo Zedekiawuod Josia ruodh Juda kar Jekonia wuod Jehoyakim.
To ruoth Zedekia katajotelo mage kata mana joge ne ok odewo weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye onyisoJeremia janabi mondo owachi.
Ruoth Zedekia nooro Jehukal wuod Shelemia kod Zefania wuod Maaseya majodolo ir Jeremia mondo giwachne niya, "Yie ilamnwa Ruoth Nyasachwa. "
Endalono noyudo ka pok otue Jeremia, kendo ne pod odak adaka gi ji kapoden thuolo.
E kindeni jolweny mag Farao nowuok Misri, kendo kanejo-Babulon mane oyudo monjo Jerusalem owinjo kamano, ne giweyo monjoJerusalem.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nowacho ni Jeremia janabi,
"RuodhJuda osekwayi mondo ipenjne wach kuoma.  Nyise ni jolweny mag Farao maosebiro mondo okonye biro dok thurgi Misri.
Bang’e jo-Babulon biroduogo, mi gimonj Jerusalem, kendo gikawe mi giwang’.
An Ruoth Nyasayeanyisou ni kik uwuondru ka ugalo ni jo-Babulon ok nochak oduogi, nikechadier, gibiro duogo.
To kata kapo ni uloyo jolweny duto mag Babulon mamonjougo, mi odong’ mana joma ohinyore ma nindo aninda, e hembegi, tojoma ohinyorego pod dia malo, mi wang’ Jerusalem pep. "
Kane jolweny mag Babulon oweyo monjo Jerusalem, nimar jolweny magFarao ne biro,
Jeremia notemo wuok Jerusalem mondo odhi e pinyBenjamin opognee mwandu mag joodgi.
To kane ochopo e dhorangachmiluongo ni Ranga Benjamin, jatend jolweny mane tiyo kanyo, ma nyingeIrija wuod Shelemia ma nyakwar Hanania, nochunge, mi owachone niya,"Iringo idok ni jo-Babulon!"
Jeremia to nodwoke ni, "Ooyo, okadognigi. " To Irija ne ok nyal winjo wachne, omiyo ne omake mi otere enyim jodongo.
Kane jodongogo oneno Jeremia, ne gikecho kode ahinya, migigolo chik mondo ochwade, kendo olorne e od Jonathan ma jang’ad niruoth rieko.  (Od Jonathanno ne koro olok od tuech. )
Ne giketo Jeremiae od tuech manie bwo lowo, mi odak kuno aming’a,Ruoth Zedekia owuoyo gi Jeremia
Ruoth Zedekia nogolo chik moter Jeremia ire, kendo kane Jeremia obiro,nopenje ling’ling’ niya, "Bende Ruoth Nyasaye osewachoe wach moro?"Jeremia nodwoke niya, "Ee, osewacho wach moro!" Eka nodhi nyimekowachone ni ruodh Babulon biro make.
Bang’ mano Jeremia nopenjoZedekia niya, "Ere gima asekethoni kata ni jodongi kata ni jogi momiyoiketa e tuech?
Tinde ere jonabi magi mane onyis ni ruodh Babulon ok bimonjo pinyni?
Omiyo jaduong’, akwayi ni ichik iti, kendo itim gimaawacho.  Kiyie, to kik idwoka e od Jonathan ma jang’adni rieko, nimar kaidwoka, to en adier ni abiro tho kuno. "
Omiyo ruoth Zedekia nogolo chik mondo otue Jaremia e laru mar odjorit.  Ne imiye makati achiel odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ mogol kuom jolosmakati, nyaka makati duto norumo Jerusalem.  Kamano Jeremia nosiko asikakotue e laruno. JEREMIA
Ores Jeremia e bur
Shefatia wuod Matan gi Gedalia wuod Pashur gi Jukal wuod Shelemia kodPashur wuod Malkia ne jowinjo gima ne Jeremia wacho ni ji.  Ne onyisoji
ni Ruoth Nyasaye nosewacho niya, "Ng’ato ang’ata ma odong’Jerusalem, lweny kata kech kata tuoche biro nego.  To ng’ato ang’atamodhi ochiwore e lwet jo-Babulon ok nonegi.  Enotony to ngimane kende emanoresi. "
Bende Jeremia ne nyiso ji ni Ruoth Nyasaye nosewacho niya,"Abiro chiwo dalani e lwet jolweny mag ruodh Babulon, mi kawe. "
Kanejodongogo owinjo wechego, ne ginyiso ruoth niya, "Ng’atni nyaka negi,nikech kowuoyo kama, to onyoso chuny jolweny kaachiel gi jomoko dutomodong’ e dala ka.  Emomiyo waneno ni ng’atni ok dwar konyo ji, to odwaromana ni mondo giyud chandruok. "
Mano omiyo ruoth Zedekia nowacho niya, "Onge wach! Kara timneuru gimauneno ni ber.  Ok anyal tamou. "
Kuom mano ne gikawo Jeremia, mi ginyumoe soko jaduong’ Malkia, mane nie laru mar od jorit.  Sokono ne onge pi,mak mana chuodho, omiyo ne gilore piny, e iye gi tonde, mi onyumore echuodho.
To Ebed-melek, ja-Ethiopia ma jatich mabuoch mane tiyo e od ruoth, neowinjo ni jodongogo onyumo Jeremia e sokono.  E sano ne oyudo ka ruothnie bura e dhorangach miluongo ni Ranga Benjamin.
Omiyo Ebed-melek noae od ruoth, mi odhi onyiso ruoth niya,
"Jaduong’, jogi osetimo gima okber.  Gisenyumo Jeremia e soko kama kech biro negee nikech chiemo onge edala duto. "
Kane ruoth owinjo kamano, nogolo chik mondo Ebed-melekodhi gi ji adek mane ni kanyo, mondo giywa Jeremia oko e soko ka pokotho.
Omiyo Ebed-melek nokawo jogo, modhigo e od kendo mar dala ruothmi okawoe nengni moti.  Eka nodhi, mi oloro ni Jeremia nengnigo gi tondee soko,
kowachone niya, "Ket nengni motigo e yuothi, mondo tonde kikhinyi. " Jeremia notimo kamano,
eka ne giywaye gi tonde, mi gigole oko. Bang’ mano ne olorne alora e laru mar od jorit. Ruoth Zedekia okwayo Jeremia mondo ong’adne rieko
Ruoth Zedekia nogolo chik mondo okel Jeremia janabi e rangach mar adekmar Hekalu, kendo kane osekele ire, ne owachone niya, "Adwaro penjiwach, to kik ipanda gimoro kata achiel. "
Jeremia nodwoke niya, "Kaanyisi wach ma adier, to ibiro nega, to bende ka ang’adoni rieko, to okibi dewo tiyogo. "
Kane ruoth Zedekia owinjo kamano, nosingore niJeremia ling’ling’ niya, "Akuong’ora gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye mangima maneochueyowa ni ok nanegi, kendo ok nachiwi e lwet joma dwaro negi. "
EkaJeremia nowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho nika iwuok ma ichiwori e lwet jotelo mag ruodh Babulon, to initony kendodalani ok nowang’ gi mach.  Adier, initony kaachiel gi joodi.
To ka okichiwori e lwetgi, to gibiro kawo dalani, mi giwang’ kendo in ok nitonye lwetgi. "
Ruoth Zedekia nodwoke niya, "Aluoro jo-Yahudi ma oseringoodok ni jo-Babulon, nikech dipo ka ochiwa e lwetgi, mi gisanda. "
EkaJeremia nowachone niya, "Ok nochiwi e lwetgi, omiyo akwayi ni mondoiwinj wach Ruoth Nyasaye kaka asenyisi, mi inine maber kendo oknonegi.
To Ruoth Nyasaye osenyisa e fweny ni ka idagi chiwori,
tomon modong’ e od ruodh Juda ibiro gol, mi ter ni jotelo mag ruodhBabulon, kendo ka gidhi to giniwach niya,‘Osiepe ruoth mogeno osewuonde,kendo gisebet ka gihewe gi rieko. Koro tinde osemoko e chuodho,omiyo osiepene oseweye!’ "
Bang’ mano Jeremia nochako onyiso Zedekia niya, "Jo-Babulon nokawmondi gi nyithindi duto, to in bende ok nitony e lwetgi.  Ruodh Babulonnokawi mi teri e tuech, kendo dalani nowang’, mi rum pep. "
Zedekianokone niya, "Kik iwe ng’ato ng’e weche ma wawacho kodigi, to eka okgimoro ditimi.
Ka jotelo owinjo ni asewuoyo kodi, to gibiro biro penjigima wasewacho, kendo gibiro nyisi ni ka iwachonigi weche duto mawasewacho, to ok gibi negi.
To in nyisgi mana ni ne ibiro kwaya mondokik adwoki e od Jonathan, nimar dipo ka itho kuno. "
Adier, jotelo duto nobiro ir Jeremia, mi gipenje gima ne giwacho giruoth, to ne onyisogi mana kaka ruoth nosenyise mondo owachi.  Omiyo neok ginyal timo gimoro, nikech onge ng’ato mane osewinjo weche maneJeremia jowacho gi ruoth.
Ezek
.
. Kuom mano nodwok Jeremia e larumar od jorit, mi obet kanyo nyaka chieng’ mane okawie Jerusalem. JEREMIA
Jerusalem okaw(
Ruodhi
.
—
.
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
)
E ndalo mar apar, higa mar ochiko mar loch Zedekia ruodh Juda,Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nobiro gi joge mag lweny, molworo Jerusalemmondo omonji.
Kamano chieng’ due ochiko due mar ang’wen e higa mar apargauchiel mar loch ruoth Zedekia, ne omuk ohinga mar Jerusalem.
Kane osekaw Jerusalem, jodongo duto mag ruodh Babulon kaka NergalSerezer machielo, ne jobiro mobet piny e Dhorangach Madiere.
KaneZedekia ruodh Juda gi jolwenje oneno gima osetimore, ne gipondo gotienomi gia e dala.  Ne giwuok ka ging’ado orundu ruoth, mi gikadho edhorangach mane ni e kind ohingni ariyo, ka gichiko Paw Jordan.
Tojolweny mag Babulon nolawogi, mojuko Zedekia e paw jeriko.  Ne gimake migitere ir ruoth Nebukadnezar, mane oyudo ni Ribla e gweng’ Hamath,mong’adone bura kuno.
Ruodh babulon nogolo chik moneg yawuot Zedekia edala mar Ribla kuno, mana e nyim Zedekia koneno.  Bende noneg jodong Judaduto.
Bang’e nogolo wenge Zedekia oko, mi otueye gi nyororo mondo otereBabulon.
E kindeno, jo-Babulon nowang’o od ruoth gi ute ji, mi gimukoohinga mar Jerusalem.
To mogik Nebuzaradan ma jatend lweny nomako jomane odong’ e dala motero Babulon kaachiel gi joma nosedokne.
Jomaodhier ahinya maonge gimoro ema noweyo e piny Juda, mi omiyo puothe magmzabibu gi mag cham. Nebukadnezar oreso Jeremia
To Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon ne ooro wach ni Nebuzaradan jatendjolweny kowuoyo kuom Jeremia, kama:
"Dhiyo ikaw Jeremia, kendo iritemaber.  Kik ihinye, to timne gimoro amora modwaro. "
Omiyo Nebuzaradan,kaachiel gi jaduong Nebushazban gi jaduong’ Nergal Sarezar, kod jodongruodh Babulon duto,
ne ooro joote ir Jeremia, mogole e laru mar odjorit.  Ne gikete e lwet Gedalia wuod Ahikam ma nyakwar Shafan mondootere dala maber.  Kamano Jeremia nodak gi joge. Nyasaye onyiso Ebed-melek ni obiro tony e masira
Ruoth Nyasaye nosewuoyo gi Jeremia kane pod otueye e laru mar odjorit, kowachone
mondo odhi onyis Ebed-edom ja Ethiopia ni RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel osewacho niya,"Abiro ketho dalani, kendo ok abi guedhe, mana kaka nasingora ni natim. To ka chieng’no ochopo mi gigo otimore, to inibedie, kendo ininegi kagitimore.
To an Ruoth Nyasaye anakonyi, kendo ok noketi e lwet jomailuorogo.
Anariti maber, mi ok nonegi, initony nikech isegeno kuoma tokata kamano, inires mana ngimani kende.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "JEREMIA
Jeremia kod joma odong’ gi Gedalia
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia kane Nebuzaradan jatend lweny maduongosegonye Rama.  Nosetere kuno kotueye gi nyororo kaachiel gi jomoko dutomane ogol Jerusalem gi Juda, kitero e tuech Babulon.
Jatend lwenynonogolo tenge mowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ne osesiemo ni obiro kelomasira e pinyni,
kendo koro osetimo gima ne owacho ni notim.  To gigoduto osetimore mana nikech jou osetimo timbe maricho e nyim RuothNyasaye, kendo nikech ne ok giwinjo chikne.
Koro agonyo nyororo oko elweti mondo ibed thuolo, kendo ka idwaro dhi koda Babulon, to wanyalodhi, mi anariti maber.  To ka ok idwar dhi, to bende onge wach, inyalodong’.  In thuolo, omiyo inyalo dhi kamoro amora mihero. "
Jeremia ne ok dwar dhi Babulon, omiyo Nebuzaradan nowachone niya, "Dogiir Gedalia wuod Ahikam ma nyakwar Shafan, ma ruodh Babulon oseketojatend miech Juda.  Inyalo bet kode mondo idag gi jou, kata inyalo dhikamoro amora mihero. " Bang’ mano, nomiyo Jeremia chiwo kod chiemo, mioweye odhi.
Kamano Jeremia nodhi Mizpa, mobet gi Gedalia, kaachiel gijoma noyudo odong’ piny Juda. Ishmael ochano nego Gedalia

Ruo
.
-
. Noyudo jotend lweny moko ma jo-Juda, kod jolwenjgi pokochiwore e lwet jo-Babulon.  Ne giwinjo ni ruodh Babulon oseketo Gedaliawuod Ahikama jatend piny Juda, mondo orit ji duto mane oter e tuechBabulon.  Mago ne joma odhierie moloyo e piny Juda.
Omiyo Ishmael wuodNethania gi Johanan wuod Karea gi Seraya wuod Tunhumeth kod yawuot Efaija-Netofa gi Jezania ja-Makath ne jokawo jogi modhigo Mizpa irGedalia.
Eka Gedalia nowachonigi niya, "Awachonu adier ni ok onegouluor chiworu e lwet jo-Babulon.  Daguru adaga e pinyni mondo uti niruodh Babulon, to ubiro dhi nyime maber.
An abiro dak Mizpa, kendoanabed jaoteu ka jo-Babulon obiro ka.  To unyalo choko divai gi olemo kodmor zeituni mondo ukan, kendo udag e mier ma usekawo. "
E kindeno jo-Yahudi duto mane ni e piny Moab gi piny Amon gi piny Edomkod pinje mamoko nowinjo ni ruodh Babulon oseyie ni jo-Yahudi moko mondoodag adaga e piny Juda.  Bende ne giwinjo ni oseketo Gedalia mondo obedjatendgi.
Mano omiyo jo-Yahudi noa kuonde duto mane oseketgie, migiduogo e piny Juda.  Ne gidhi Mizpa ir Gedalia, kendo ne gichoko divaikod olemo mogundho.
Bang’e Johanan wuod Karea kod jotend lweny mane pok ochiwore e lwetruodh Babulon nobiro Mizpa ir Gedalia,
mi giwachone niya, "Dongeing’eyo ni Balis ruodh jo-Amon oseoro Ishmael wuod Nethania mondo obionegi?" To kata kamano, Gedalia ne ok nyal yie wachno.
Eka Johanannowachone ling’ling’ niya, "We mondo adhi aneg Ishmael, kendo ongeng’ama biro ng’eyo ni an ema anege.  Ere gima omiyo diwe mondo onegi, tomano nyalo miyo jo-Yahudi duto moseduogo iri ke, mi ji duto modong’ eJuda rum?"
To Gedalia nodwoke niya, "Kik itim kamano, nikech gimauwacho kuom Ishmael en mana miriambo. "JEREMIA

Ruo
.
. E due mar abiriyo, Ishmael wuod Nethania ma nyakwarElishama ma anywola joka ruoth, nobiro Mizpa gi ji apar mondo onegGedalia wuod Ahikam.  Kane oyudo gichiemo kode kuno.
Ishmael gi jogeapargo noa malo monego Gedalia mane ruodh Babulon oseketo mondo obedjatend piny Juda.
Bende ne ginego jo-Yahudi duto mane ni Mizpa giGedalia, kaachiel gi jolweny mag jo-Babulon mane oyudo ni kuno.
Kinyne, kane pok ji ong’eyo ni Gedalia osenegi,
ji piero aboro nobirokoa Shekem gi Shilo kod Samaria.  Ne oyudo giselielo tikgi, mi giyiecholepgi, kendo gisaro dendgi, bende ne giting’o cham gi ubani mondo gichiwe Hekalu.
Ishmael noa Mizpa modhi romonigi kaywak.  Kane ochopo irgi. Nowacho nigi niya, "Biuru mondo une Gedalia. "
To gikanyono mane gichopoe chuny Mizpa, Ishmael gi joge nonegogi, mowito ringregi e bur.
To jiapar kuom jogo nosayo Ishmael, kawachone niya, "Kiyie to kik inegwa! Wangi cham gi mor zeituni kod mor kich mwasepando e bungu. " Omiyo noweyogi,mi ok onegogi kaka ne onego jowadgi mamoko.
Bur mane Ishmael owitoejoma ne onegogo ne bur maduong’.  Ruoth Asa ema nosekunyo burno mondookanie pi ndalo mane Baasha ruodh Israel dwaro monje.  Koro Ishmaelnopong’o burno gi ringre ji mane onego.
Bang’e ne okawo nyi ruothkaachiel gi ji mamoko duto man Mizpa mane Nebuzaradan jatend lwenymaduong’ oseketo e bwo Gedalia.  Kane osemakogi kamano, nochako wuothkochomo yo piny Amon.
Johanan wuod Karea kaachiel gi jotend lweny duto mane en-go ne jowinjogima rach mane Ishmael osetimono.
Omiyo ne gikawo jogi, mi gidhi kedokode.  Ne gijuke but yawo maduong’ man Gibeon,
Kendo kane joma Ishmaeltero e tuech oneno Johanan kod jotend lweny, ne gidoko mamor,
migiringo gidok ni Johanan.
To Ishmael kod joge moko aboro notony e lwetJohanan, moringo odhi e piny Amon.
Bang’e Johanan kod jotend lweny mane ni kode ne jokawo joma ne Ishmaelwuod Nathania omako Mizpa, kane osenego Gedalia wuod Ahikam.  Ne gin chwogi mon kod nyithindo, kaachiel gi jotich mabuoch mane Johanan oresoGibeon.
Ne gia Gibeon, mi gibuoro Gerush-kimham but Jerusalem, kagidhi e piny Misri
mondo gitony gia e lwet jo-Babulon.  Ne giluorojo-Babulon nikech Ishmael ne osenego Gedalia, mane ruodh Babulon oketojatend piny Juda. JEREMIA
Jeremia owuoyo ni Johanan
Jotend lweny duto kaka Johanan wuod Karea gi Azaria wuod Hoshaya kod jimamoko duto te nobiro ir Jeremia janabi,
mowachone niya, "Kiyie totimnwa gima wakwayi.  Yie ilamnwa Ruoth Nyasachwa, wan ji duto modong’. Chon ne wan ji mathoth, to koro neye kaka wadong’ mana manokkende.
Lemnwa mondo Ruoth Nyasachi onyiswa yo ma onego waluw, kendogima onego watim. "
Jeremia nodwokogi niya, "Kara mano ber, abiro lamoRuoth Nyasachwa mana kaka usekwaya, kendo gimoro amora mowachona, toabiro nyisou.  Ok napandu wach moro amora kata achiel. "
Eka ne giwachoneniya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa mondo obed janeno makare kendomaradiera ka ok warito chik duto ma omiyi mondo watigo.  Wakuong’ore niwabiro timo gimoro amora ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi owachoni mondoinyiswa,
bed ni en wach maber kata marach.  Wabiro winjo gima RuothNyasaye ma waori ire owacho, nimar mano ema dimi wadhi nyime maber. "
Bang’ ndalo apar, Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia,
mi Jeremianoluongo Johanan wuod Karea kod jotend lweny duto mane ni kode, kaachielgi ji duto te.
Nowachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, maneuora ire mondo apenjnu wach, owacho kama:
‘Ka uyie dhi nyime gi dak epinyni, to abiro gerou, kendo ok abi kethou.  Bende abiro pidhou kang’ama pidho yien, kendo ok napudhu.  Asebedo ka akuyo nikech masira maneakelo kuomu.
Weuru luoro ruodh Babulon, nikech an kodu, kendo abirokonyou, mi aresu ua e tekone.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano.
Abiro kechou, kendo en bende abiro miyo okechu, mi owe udag epinyu ka. ’ "
Jeremia nomedo wachonigi niya, "Un joma odong’ e piny Juda, kik udagiwinjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mi utamru dak e pinyni.
Bendekik uwach ni, ‘Ooyo, wabiro dhi mondo wadag e piny Misri, kuma ok wanyalchako nenoe lweny, kata winjoe tung’ ma luongowa mondo wadhi e lwenykata bedo kech. ’
Ka uwacho kamano to Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto kendo ma Nyasach Israel wacho niya, ‘Ka uramo ni nyaka udhi udag epiny Misri,
to lweny ma uluorono biro jukou, kendo kech ma uparonobende biro luwou, mi utho e piny Misri kuno.
Jogo duto ma oramo ninyaka dhi dag e piny Misri, lweny kata kech kata tuoche biro nego.  Ongekata ng’at achiel kuomgi ma nokwo.  Ooyo, onge achiel ma notony kuommasira ma abiro kelo kuomgi. ’
"Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel wacho niya, ‘Kapo ni udhi e pinyMisri, to abiro olo mirimba kuomu, mana kaka ne aolo mirimba kuomjo-Jerusalem.  Unulokru gima bwogo ji, kendo ji nobed kajarou, mi giluongnyingu ka gima okuong’.  Bende ok nuchak une kaeri kendo. ’ "
EkaJeremia nodhi nyime kawacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osenyisou un jomaodong’ e piny Juda ni kik udhi e piny Misri.  Kuom mano, koro asiemouni,
mano dibed ketho maduong’! Ne uora ir Ruoth Nyasachwa kuwachonaniya, ‘Lamnwa Ruoth Nyasachwa, kendo inyiswa weche duto mowacho mondowatigo. ’
To koro asenyisou gik moko duto, to udagi winjo weche maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa oseora mondo awachnu.
Kuom mano nyaka ung’eni lweny kata kech kata tuoche biro negou e piny ma udwaro dhi dakieno!"JEREMIA
Jo-Juda odhi Dak Misri
Kane Jeremia osetieko nyiso ji weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye oseoromondo onyisgi,
Azaria wuod Hoshaya kod Johanan wuod Karea, kaachiel giji mamoko duto ma wigi tek, ne jowacho ni Jeremia niya, "Iriambo! RuothNyasachwa ok oseori mondo ikwerwa ni kik wadhi wadag Misri.
To Barukwuod Neria ema osethuwi kodwa mondo iketwa e lwet jo-Babulon, mondoonegwa, kata omakwa oterwa Babulon. "
Kamano Johanan gi jotend lweny kodji duto notamore winjo chik Ruoth Nyasaye mondo odong’ e piny Juda.
Ruo
.
. Omiyo Johanan kod jotend lweny nokawo ji duto mane odong’Juda, mi gidhigo Misri kaachiel gi ju duto mane oseduogo mondo odag epiny Juda koa e pinje mane oyudo osekegie.
Ne gin chwo gi mon ginyithindo koda ka nyi ruoth.  Ne okawo ng’ato ang’ata mane Nebuzaradan majatend lweny maduong’ oseweyo e lwet Gedalia mondo oriti.  Jeremia giBaruk bende ne gidhigo.
Ne gitamore winjo chik Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gidutogidhi Tapanhes e piny Misri.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia ka en Tapanhes niya,
"Kaw kite mokomadongo mondo ikuny e nyim dhoranga dala ruoth, ka jo-Juda mokoneno.
Bang’e inyisgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo maNyasach Israel owacho kama: ‘Abiro luongo Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon majatichna, kendo obiro keto kom lochne ewi kite ma aseketo ka eri, miogur hembe e wigi.
Adier, enobi, mi olo piny Misri.  Joma oket ni mondotuoche oneg, tuoche biro nego, kendo joma oket ni itero e tuech, noter etuech, bende joma oket ni tho e lweny, biro tho e lweny!
Anami owang’hekalu mag nyiseche jo-Misri, kendo nokaw nyisechegi mi oter e tuech. Obiro manyo piny Misri, mi oyaki, kendo dong’ nono, mana kaka jakwathdondo nyuogo e lepe, mi dong’ nono.  Bang’e noa Misri kosetieko timo gikmoko duto modwaro timo.
Obiro turo sirni milamo man Heliopolis e pinyMisri, kendo obiro wang’o hekalu mag nyiseche jo-Misri. ’ "JEREMIA
Jeremia ohulo wach ni jo-Juda ma oringo odhi Misri
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel nowuoyo niJeremia kuom jo-Yahudi mane oyudo odak e miech Misri ma Migdol giTapanhes kod Memfis, kendo e gweng’ milambo mar pinyno, kowachoniya,
"Un uwegi useneno masira mane akelo kuom Jerusalem gi mier mamokomag Juda.  Bende kata sani pod gikethore, ma onge ng’ama odakie.
Neatimo kamano nikech joma ne odak kuondego ne otimo timbe maricho kagimiyago mirima.  Ne gilamo nyiseche mamoko, ma gin kata un kata manakwereu ne pok olamo, mi gitimonigi misengni.
Ne asiko ka aoronujotichna ma jonabi mondo okweru kik utim gik makuero ma amon-gogo,
tone udagi winjo, kata dewo ne ok udewo.  Bende ne utamoru weyo tim marachmar timo misengni ni nyiseche mamoko.
Mano omiyo ne aolo mirimba magere miech Juda kendo e yore mag Jerusalem, mi awang’ogi gi mach.  Negidong’ ka gikethore maonge ng’ama dakie, kendo pod gisiko kamano nyakachil kawuono.
"Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto koro apenjou ni, eregima omiyo uhinyoru uwegi kutimo gima rach kamano? Koso udwaro kelomasira kuom chwo gi mon gi rawere kod nyithindo mayom, ma dimi jou dutorum?
To mano ema biro timore, kumedo miya mirima gi kido mag nyisecheumanono, kendo kuom timo misengni ni nyiseche mamoko e piny Misri, kamausebiro mondo udagieni.  Koso utimo kamano mana ni mondo urum, kendomondo ogendini duto mae piny ojaru, kendo oluong nyingu ka gimaokuong’?
To bende wiu diwil gi gik maricho duto ma kwereu kaachiel giruodhi mag Juda gi mondgi kod un gi mondu usetimo e miech Juda kendo eyore mag Jerusalem adier?
To pok uboloru kata mana nyaka chil kawuono,kendo ok useluora kata rito chikena gi buchena mane amiyou gi kwereu.
"Kuom mano, an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, kendo ma NyasachIsrael abiro kelo masira kuomu, mi atiek jo-Juda pep.
Kata manajo-Juda modong’ moramo nyaka dhi dag e piny Misri, abiro tieko chuth. Lweny kata kech biro negogi duto e piny Misri.  Ginilokre gima bwogo ji,mi ji nojargi, kendo noluong nyinggi ka gima okuong’.
Anakum joma odakMisri, mana kaka ne akumo jo-Jerusalem ka akelonigi lweny gi kech kodtuoche.
Onge kata ng’at achiel kuom jo-Juda mane odong’ mi tony.  Bendeonge kata ng’at achiel kuomgi ma nodong’ e piny Juda kuma gigombo mondogidagie kendo.  Onge ng’ama nodogi, mak mana ji moko manok moringolweny. "
Bang’ wechego, ji duto mane ong’eyo ni mondgi timo misengni ninyiseche mamoko, kaachiel gi mon mane oyudo ochung’ kanyo, kod jo-Judamane oyudo odak e gweng’ Misri ma milambo, duto oganda maduong’koriwore, nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Wadagi winjo gima isewachonwa enyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
Wabiro timo gik moko duto ma wasesingore niwatimo.  Wabiro timo misengni ni nyasaye madhako miluongo ni Ruodh Polo,kendo wabiro chiwone misengni miolo piny, mana kaka wan gi kwerewa giruodhwa kod jotendwa ne watimo e miech Juda kendo e yore mag Jerusalem. E ndalono ne wan gi chiemo mogundho, kendo ne wadhi nyime maber maongechandruok moro.
To nyaka ne wawe timo misengni ni ruoth madhako marpolo, kendo wawe chiwone misengni milo piny, wasebet modhier maongegimoro, kendo lweny gi kech osenego jowa. "
Eka mon bende nowacho niya,"Kane waloso kek e kido machal gi ruoth madhako mar polo, kendowachiwone misengni miolo piny, to chwowa ne oyie gi gima ne watimono. "
Bang’e Jeremia nowacho ni ji duto ma chwo gi mamon mane osedwokekamano niya,
"Uparo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok ong’eyo wach misengni ma ungi kwereu kod ruodhiu gi jotendu kaachiel gi jopinyu duto ne utimo emiech Juda kendo e yore mag Jerusalem? Koso uparo ni wiye osewilkodgi?
Kata mana sani, pinyu okethore maonge ng’ama odakie.  Oselokoregima bwogo ji, kendo giluongo nyinge ka gima okuong’, nikech RuothNyasaye ne ok nyal weyo mak okumou kuom timbeu maricho.
Masiranonobiro kuomu kaka uneno kawuononi nimar ne utimo misengni ni nyisechemamoko, mi utimo timbe maricho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ne ok uwinje, katapuonjne bende ne ok uluwo. "
Jeremia nochako onyiso ji duto, kaachiel gi mon niya, "Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko duto, kendo ma Nyasach Israel owacho ni jo-Juda modakMisri kama:
‘Un kaachiel gi mondu, usetimo singruok ni ruoth madhakomar polo.  To mano ber! Chopuru achopa singruokugo, kendo timuru atimagik ma usekuong’oru ni ubiro timo!
To koro winjuru singruok ma anRuoth Nyasaye asetimo e nyinga maduong’ ni jo-Juda duto modak Misri: Oknachak ayie mondo ng’ato ang’ata kuomu oluong nyinga ka wacho niya,"Akuong’ora e nying Ruoth Nyasaye mangima. "
Abiro neno ni ok gidhinyime maber, to anang’igi gi wang’ marach.  Un jo-Juda duto modak e pinyMisri, lweny kata tuoche biro negou nyaka urum pep, maonge kata ng’atachiel modong’.
To ji manok kuomu notony e tho, mi dog Juda koa Misri. Bang’e jo-Juda modong’ kuom mago mane obiro Misri nong’e ka wechena katawechegi ema oselokore adiera.
An Ruoth Nyasaye namiu ranyisi,
Ruo
.
-
. kaketo farao Hofra ma ruodh Misri e lwet wasike madwaro nege,mana kaka naketo Zedekia ruodh Juda e lwet Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulonmane jasike, kendo mane dwaro nege.  Anamiu ranyisino mondo ung’e ninakumu kaeri, kendo ni anakel masira kuomu kaka ne asesingora. ’ "JEREMIA
Jeremia onyiso Baruk wach moa kuom Nyasaye

Ruo
.
;
W. Nda
.
-
; Dan
.
,
. E higa mar ang’wen mar lochJehoyakim wuod Josia ruodh Juda, Baruk wuod Neria nondiko weche maneJeremia owachone.  Bang’e Jeremia janabi nonyiso
Baruk niya, "Weche maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho kuomi e magi:
‘In iwacho nitinde iol, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osemedoni mana kuyo kuom thagruok ma ingo.  Bende iwacho ni iseywak miol, to ok iseyudo kue ngang’. ’
Kuom mano,Ruoth Nyasaye owacho mondo anyisi kama: ‘Abiro muko gik moko duto maasegero, kendo pudho gik ma asepidho.  Abiro timo kamano e pinyngima.
Idwaro mondo iyud gik ma dongo dongo, to onego iwe dwarogi,nimar abiro kelo masira ni ji duto e piny.  In to, initony kamoro amoramidhiye, to ngimani kende ema niresi. ’ "JEREMIA
Weche mokor kuom piny Misri
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia kuom ogendini mamoko majo-Israel.
Isa
.
-
; Ezek
.
—
.
. Noloso kuom Misri, kowuoyo kuomjolweny mag Farao Neko ruodh Misri mane Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon oloyoKarkemish but aora Yufrate e higa mar ang’wen mar loch Jehoyakim wuodJosia ruodh Juda.  Weche gogo e mago:
Jotend jolwenj Misri kok niya,"Ikreuru gi okumbni kod kuodi mondo udhi e lweny!
Gawuru fareseu mondoudhi! Rieduru ni lweny, kusidho kondeu! Piaguru tongeu, kendo manreurugi giu mag lweny. "
To Ruoth Nyasaye penjo niya, "Koro ang’o ma aneno katimoreni? Gigore nyang’eng’o.  Thuondi oselo, omiyo luoro ohewogi, kendogiringo matek ma ok gigo machiemo.
Jong’uech ok nyal tony.  Gichwanyorekendo gipodho yo nyandwat but aora Yufrate. "
En ng’a ma gingore ka aora Naelni, kendo ka aora ma mwomo gengeni?
Ginjo-Misri ema gingore ka Nael, kendo ka aora ma mwomo genge! Misri wachoniya, "Abiro gingora mi apong’ piny, kendo aketh mier gi ji modakie. "
"Chikuru farese mondo odhi, kendo geche mag lweny ochak ng’wech! Radurugi wasigu un thuondi mag Ethiopia gi mag Put moting’o okumbni, kod un joasere molony moa e piny Lud.
Kawuono en chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto.  En chieng’ mochuloe kuor ni wasike.  Ligangla biro chamogimi yieng’, kendo madh rembgi mi mer, nimar kawuono Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto, timo misango yo nyandwat but aora Yufrate.
"Un jo Misri, dhiuru e piny Gilead umanyie yath.  Yedheu duto ok konygimoro.  Onge gima nyalo thiedhou.
Ogendini osewinjo ni wiu okuot,kendo ywaku opong’o piny.  Jolweny gangore kuom jowetegi, kendogiruombore piny giduto. "
Jer
.
-
. E ndalo mane Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon biro mondo omonjMisri, Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia niya,
"Landuru wach e miechMisri ma Migdol gi Memfis kod Tapanhes, mondo giikre gisir wasikgi,nimar lweny oseketho kuonde machiegni kodu.
Ere gimomiyo Nyasachumaratego miluongo ni Apis opodho? Ruoth Nyasaye ema osegoyemopodho!
Jolwenju osechwanyore mopodho, kendo moro ka moro wacho niwadgi niya, ‘Reti wadog dala ir jowa, mondo kik watho e lwetwasigu. ’
Chakuru Farao ruodh Misri nying manyien ni, ‘Ruodh Sunga,’nikech en ng’at mane thuolo momiye obayo.
"Ana Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, an ruoth.  Akuong’ora ginyinga awuon ni, kaka got Tabor duong’ moloyo gode moko duto kendo kakagot Karmel man but nam bende duong, e kaka teko ng’at mabiro monjounobed maduong’.
"Un jo-Misri, ikreuru mondo oteru e tuech! Memfis ibiro loko gunda, minobed thim ma onge ng’ama odakie.
Piny Misri chal gi roya buong’, makich moa yo nyandwat okayo.
Jolweny ma jo Misri ondiko, bende omemoremana ka nyiroye mitueyo dala.  Ne ok ginyono piny mondo gikedi, to gidutone giwichore mi giringo, nikech ndalo ming’adonigie bura nosechopo,momiyo masira omakogi.
Jo-Misri ringo dhi kaywak ka thuol, nikechwasigu biro gi tekregi duto.  Gimonjogi gi ledhi mana ka joma dwarotong’o yien,
kendo gibeto bung Misri.  Jolwenjgi ng’eny mokadho akwana,kendo thoth mohewo bonyo.
Oganda moa yo nyandwat oseloyo jo-Misri, miwigi okuot.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel wachoniya, "Abiro kumo Amon nyasach Thebes, kaachiel gi jo-Misri kodnyisechegi mamoko kod ruodhigi.  Bende abiro kumo Farao gi ji duto mogenokuome,
kachiwogi e lwet Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon gi joge mag lwenyma dwaro negogi.  To achien ji nodag e piny Misri kendo, kaka ne gisedake kinde mokadho.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Jer
.
,
. "To un nyikwa Jakobo jatichna, kik ubed maluor.  Ee, unjo-Israel kik chunyu parre, nikech abiro resou mi agolu e piny maborkuma otueueno.  Ubiro duogo mi udag gi kue, maonge gima thagou, kendong’ato ok nobuogu.
Kik uluor, nikech an kodu.  Abiro tieko ogendiniduto kuonde duto ma asekeyoue, to un ok natieku.  To kata kamano, abirokumou moromo gi timbeu.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Weche mokor kuom jo-Filistia
Isa
.
-
; Ezek
.
-
; Joel
.
-
; Amos
.
-
; Zef
.
-
; Zek
.
-
. Kane pok Farao omonjo Gaza, Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia kuomjo-Filistia niya,
"Neye kaka pi gingore koa yo nyandwat! Obiro bubni kaaora ma mwomo genge, kendo obiro imo piny duto kod gimoro amora mantie,kaka mier kod joma odakie.  Ji biro goyo nduru mondo okonygi, kendong’ato ka ng’ato manie piny noywag malit.
Giniwinj tiend farese kadiko, gi geche maringo, kod tiend geche ka mutni.  Wuone nyithindo oknodog chien mondo oom nyithindgi, to ginibed maluor maonge giteko,
nikech kinde osechopo mikethoe piny Filistia.  Kamano konyruok majo-Turo gi jo-Sidon geno yudo kuom Filistia norum pep, nimar an RuothNyasaye abiro ketho jo-Filistia duto mane oa e dho nembe magKaftor.
Jo-Gaza oseliel wigi, ka nyiso ni gin gi kuyo maduong’, kendojo-Ashkelon oling’ thi.  Jo-Filistia modong’ noywag nyakakarang’o?
Giywak niya, ‘Yaye! Ligangla mar Ruoth Nyasaye biro chadho jinyaka karang’o? Onego odog e olalo mondo oyue kanyo!’
To doyue nadi, toasemiye tich mondo oti? Asechike mondo omonj Ashkelon kaachiel gi jomaodak e dhonam. "JEREMIA
Weche mokor Kuom jo-Moab
Isa
.
—
.
;
.
-
; Ezek
.
-
; Amos
.
-
; Zef
.
-
. RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel nowuoyo kuomjo-Moab kama: "Ywaguru jo-Nebo, nimar dalagi okethi! Kiriathaim osekaw,mi omuk kama ochiel motegno manie dalano.  Joma odak kuno wigiokuot,
kendo duong’ mar piny Moab oselal.  Wasigu ikore Heshbon mondootiek oganda jo-Moab.  Dala mar Dibon biro ling’ thi ka oganda mar lwenyomonje.
Jo-Horanaim goyo koko ka wacho niya, ‘Masira! Warumo!’
PinyMoab osekethi! Winjuru nyithindo ka ywak.
Winjuru ywak joma oruwo e yonyaka chop Luhith.  Ywak bende winjore e yo malor Horanaim.
Un jo-Moab,ringuru piyo ures ngimau! Ringuru mana ka ayuer ma seso e bungu.
Neugeno kuom tekou gi mwanduu, to koro ibiro mako koda ka un, kendo Kemoshnyasachu ibiro ter e tuech, kaachiel gi jodonge kod jodolo mage.
Ongedala kata achiel ma notony mak okethi, kendo holo gi pap duto noyaki, mikethi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Chunguru kidi mar liel,upargo piny Moab, nimar ibiro kethe piyopiyo, kendo mier mage biro dong’gundni ma onge ng’ama odakie. "
(Okuong’ ng’at ma ok otiyo tich RuothNyasaye gi chunye duto! Bende okuong’ ng’at ma ok oneko gi liganglane. )
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Pile jo-Moab osebet kodak gi kue, kendo okosedargi, kiterogi e tuech, gichalo gi divai mowe mondo okue e aguluachiel, ma ok olok e agulini mamoko.  Ndhath divai mowe kamano ok kethre,to osiko asika ka omit.
Kuom mano ndalo biro ma naorie ji mondo ooljo-Moab oko, kendo okethgi, ka ng’ama puko divai oko, kendo toyo aguchdivaino matindo tindo.
Bang’e jo-Moab noyud ni Kemosh nyasachgi oknyal konyogi, mana kaka jo-Israel noyudo ni Bethel ma nyasachgi manegigeno kuome ne ok nyal konyogi.
"Un jo-Moab, ere gimomiyo uketoru ni un thuondi mosekedo e lwenjemager?
To piny Moab gi mier mage osekethi, kendo thuondi mage osenegi!An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awacho kamano.
Piny Moabchiegni rumo, kendo ibiro kethe mapiyopiyo.
Un joma odak machiegnikode, kendo un ji duto mong’eyo humbe, ywageuru kuwacho niya, ‘Lochnemaratego osekethi, kendo humbe gi duong’ne oserumo. ’
To un joma odakDibon, weuru duong ma un-go, mondo ubed piny e buru, nikech jaketh Moabosebiro kuomu, kendo oketho kuondeu mochiel motegno.
Un joma odakAroer, chung’uru e dir yo kung’icho mondo upenj joma ringo gimaosetimore.
Ginidwoku niya, "Piny Moab oserumo! Ywageuru, nikechoseyudo wichkuot.  Gouru milome e bath aora Arnon ni Moab osekethi.
"Oseng’ad bura ni mier mae pap kaka Holon gi Jaza gi Mefath
giDibona gi Nebo gi Beth-diblathaim
gi Kiriathaim gi Bethgamul giBethmeon
gi Kerioth kod Bozra.  Ee, bura oseloyo miech Moab duto, manmabor koda man machiegni.
Duong’ mar Moab oseng’iny matinditindo,kendo tekone osekethi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Miuru jo-Moab kong’o mondo omer, nikech gisedagi winjo chikna, anRuoth Nyasaye.  Gibiro ng’ielore e ng’okgi giwegi, kendo ji bironyierogi.
Un jo-Moab, parieuru kaka ne unyiero jo-Israel! Ne ucharogimana ka gima gin joma osemaki kaachiel gi jomecho.
Koro un jo-Moab,ayeuru e miechu udhi udag e gode maboyo, mondo uchal gi akuru mogero odee bath lwanda marabora morokore.
Jo-Moab gin josunga! Asewinjo kakagisungore kendo gipakore ka gijaro ji, kendo giparo ni gin kende emagiloyo ji moko duto.
An Ruoth Nyasaye ang’eyo kaka gisungore, tosungagino onge tiende, kendo gik moko duto ma gitimo biro rumo.
Manoemomiyo abiro ywago jo-Moab duto kod jo-Kirheres.
Abiro ywago jo-Sibmamoloyo kaka ne aywago jo-Jazer.  A yaye, dala mar Sibma, ichalo gi yiendmzabibu ma bedene oyarore nyaka Nam Kado, mi ochweyo nyaka Jazer.  Tokoro olembeni gi divai mari osekethi!
Mor gi ilo osegol e piny Moabmomewni.  Divai tinde ok mol kuonde bicho, kendo onge joma odong’ madikog gi mor ka loso divai.
"Jo-Heshbon gi jo-Eleale ywak, kendo ywakgi winjore nyaka Jahaz,jo-Zoar bende winje, kendo owinjore nyaka Horonaim gi Elgath-shelishya,nikech pige mag Nimrim oseduono.
Abiro tamo jo-Moab mondo kik tim ninyisechegi misengni miwang’o pep kod misengni mamoko kuonde moting’ore. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho.
"Kamano chunya ywago jo-Moab kod jo-Kirheres mana ka ng’ama goyo tung’e liel, nikech mwandugi duto oselal.
Ng’ato ka ng’ato osepwodho wiye,kendo olielo tike.  Giduto gisaro luetegi, kendo girwako piendegugru.
Ji ywak ewi udi duto kendo e wang’ yore mag Moab nimar asekethopiny Moab, mana ka ng’ama nego agulu ma onge tich.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho.
Oseketh Moab.  Yaye, ywaguru, nimar Moab oseyudo wichkuot. Osekethore chuth, molokore gima bwogo ji, kendo ogendini modak machiegninyierogo.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye asesingora ni oganda moro biro podho kuom jo-Moabmana kaka achuth podho kuom gima otho, koyaro buombene.
Miechgi gikuondegi mochiel motegno ibiro kawo.  Chieng’no jolweny mag Moab nobed gikihondko mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo.
Jo-Moab ibiro tieko chuth, mi okginichak gibed oganda kendo, nikech ne gitamore winjo chikna.
Masichegi bugni kod obadho ema ochomogi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano.
Ng’ato ang’ata ma temo tony e masira biro nyumore e bugo, tong’ama owuok e bugo, obadho biro mako, Mago duto biro timore ni jo-Moabchieng’ ma akumogie.
Joma ringo, ma ok nyal yudo konyruok, temo mondoopondi e dala mar Heshbon ma chon ruoth Sihon nodakie, to gibiro yudo nidalano osemokie mach.  Mach osewang’o tong’ piny kod wi gode mag jo-Moabmohero lwenygi.
Ywaguru jo-Moab! Joma ne lamo Kemosh koro osetieki,kendo yawuotgi gi nyigi osemak moter e tuech.
To e ndalo ma biro anamijo-Moab dhi nyime maber kendo. " Mano e bura ma Ruoth Nyasaye oseng’adoni jo-Moab. JEREMIA

. Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyokuom jo-Amon niya, "Jo-Israel ni kanye? Donge nitie ng’ato manyalo resolopgi? Ang’o momiyo giseweyo jo-Amon malamo Milkomgi okawo piny jo-Gadmi odakie?
Onge wach! To kata kamano, ndalo biro ma anami joma odak edala mar Raba winj mahu mar lweny.  Dala maduong’ mar jo-Amonno nodong’gunda, kendo mier matindo tindo mokiewo kode nowang’ chuth.  Bang’ejo-Israel nochak okaw pinygi kuom joma nomayogigo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
Un jo-Heshbon, ywaguru, nikech dalau osekethi! Un mondRaba denguru kendo urwak piende gugru, mi uring koni gi koni, nimarMilkom nyasachu ibiro kaw mi ter e tuech, kaachiel gi jodolo mage kodjodonge.
Ere gima omiyo usungoru, un joma andhokegi, to tekou orumo?Ang’o momiyo uparo ni un rateke, kendo ni onge ng’ama dihedhremonjou?
Abiro kelonu masiche moa koni gi koni kendo uduto ubiro ringo. Ng’ato ka ng’ato noring mondo ores ngimane, kendo onge ng’ama nochakochok jolweny mau kanyakla
To bang’e achien anami jo-Amon chak dhinyime maber kendo. "Weche mokor kuom jo-Edom
Isa
.

;
.

; Ezek
.

;
.

; Amos
.
,
; Obad
.
-
; Mal
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nowuoyo kuomjo-Edom kama: "Rieko tinde orumo e piny Edom koso? Donge jorieko magging’adonigi rieko? Koso tinde riekogi olal?
Jo-Dedan, wichreuru uringi,mondo utony kuonde maboyo, nimar abiro tieko nyikwa Esau, nikech kindema akumogie osechopo.
Ka ji pono mzabibu, to donge giweyo moko? Koso kajokuo obiro kwalo chambu gotieno, to donge gikawo mana ma gidwaro?
Unto aseyweyou oko gi yuech, kendo asefwenyo kuonde ma upondoe, mi koroonge kama unyalo resorue.  Jo-Edom gi wedegi kod joma odak machiegnikodgi osetieki, kendo onge kata ng’at achiel modong’.
Kuom mano onegouwena nyithindu makiye mondo ariti.  Mondu mag liete nyalo konyorekuoma. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ka ji mane ok owinjore kum, bende noyudokum, koro un uparo ni dutony mak okumu? Ooyo, nyaka kumu!
An awuonasekuong’ora ni dala mar Bozra nobed gima bwogo ji, kendo nolokre thimma ji nyiero, kendo noluong nyinge ka gima okuong’.  Mier matindo mokiewokode nobed kokethore nyaka chieng’! An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
Jeremia nowacho niya, "Aseyudo wach moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ni oseorojaote mondo onyis ogendini kama: ‘Chokuru ogendu mag lweny, kendo uikrumonjo Edom. ’
Un jo-Edom, Ruoth Nyasaye biro miyo ogandau dok manyap,kendo onge ng’ama biro miyou luor.
Sunga ma un go osewuondou, tochutho onge ng’ama oluorou kaka uparono.  Udak malo e lwendni morokoremanie wi gode maboyo.  To kata obedo ni udak malo mabor kaka ongo kamano,to Ruoth Nyasaye biro lorou piny.  Ruoth Nyasaye ema owacho kamano. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Masira malich biro mako jo-Edom, mi ng’atoka ng’ato makadho machiegni, moneno gik moko duto mosetimore ni pinyno,nobwogi ka kihondko omako.
Chak
.
,
. Gima ne otimore ni Sodom giGomora kane okethogi kaachiel gi mier mokiewo kodgi, e gima biro timoreni piny Edom.  Onge ng’ama nodag kuno, kata mana ma nobworie.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Anabi mana ka sibuor mochomo lek moloth,kowuok e bungu moyugno manie geng aora Jordan, kendo anami jo-Edommwomre gi ng’uech kaa.  Bang’e ng’at ma ayiero jatelo norit ogandano. "Ere ng’ama inyalo pimo koda? Koso ere ng’ama dihedhre piem koda? Enruoth mane ma dikwer wachna?
Omiyo winjuru gima asechano timo ni Edomkaachiel gi ji modak e dalagi mar Teman.  Kata mana nyithindgi bendenoywa oko, mi kibaji nogo ng’ato ka ng’ato.
Ka olo Edom, to kokonogore matek mi piny noyiengni, kendo kokono nowinjre nyaka NamMakwar.
Wasigu nomonj Bozra mana ka achuth mopodho piny kuom gimaotho, koa malo e kor polo ka buombene oyarore.  Chieng’no jolweny magEdom kihondko nomaki mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo. "Weche mokor kuom jo-Damaski
Isa
.
-
; Amos
.
-
; Zek
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo kuom jo-Damaskiniya, "Joma odak Hamath gi Arpad luoro omako, kendo chunygi chandorenikech gisewinjo wach marach.  Chunygi ling’ore mana ka apaka mar NamMakwar, kendo ok ginyal yudo yueyo.
Jo-Damaski osedoko manyap, kendogisewichore mondo giring ka kihondko omakogi.  Piny ochamogi kendogiwinjo rem mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo.
Dala marahuma mane mor chono,ji osedarie pep.
Chieng’no yawuowi kod jolweny duto noneg e yore magDamaski.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Anamok mach e ohinga marDamaski, kendo nawang’ ut ruoth Beh-hadad pep. "Weche mokor kuom jo-Kedor gi dalagi mar Hazor
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo kuom jo-Kedor kod ruodhi mag Hazor maneNebukadnezar ruodh Babulon oloyo niya, "Dhiyouru umonj jo-Kedar majo-Arabu modak yo wuok chieng’, mi utieki.
Yakuru hembegi kod jambgikaachiel gi rageng’ni mag hembegi kod gimoro amora muyudo e hembego. Bende peuru ngamia maggi kendo unyisgi ni masira olworogi kuonde duto.
"Un jo-Hazor to asiemou an Ruoth Nyasaye ni, ringuru udhi mabor,upondi, nimar Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon osechano tiekou, kendo owachoniya,
‘Biuru mondo wamonj ji maparo ni odak gi kue, kendo onge gimanyalo timogi! Dhorangeyegi ni nono, kendo ok lor, bende ok riti. ’ AnRuoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Yakuru ngamia maggi kod jambgimogundhogo.  Abiro keyo jo-Kedar ma timgi en tito yie wigi, kuonde duto,kendo abiro kelo kuomgi masira moa koni gi koni.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
Hazor nolokre thim nyaka chieng’, kama ondiegi emadakie.  Onge ng’ama nodag kuno, kata mana ma nobuorie. "Weche mokor kuom piny Elam
Kane Zedekia osedoko ruodh Juda, Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremiajanabi kuom piny Elam.
Nowacho niya, "Abiro nego jo-asere duto magElam mosemiyo pinygi teko.
Anami yamo moa kuonde duto kudh kochomoElam, mi ake joma odak kuno kuonde duto.  Onge piny moro ma joma ringo oknochopie.
Anami jo-Elam bed moluoro wasikgi ma dwaro negogi.  Anatiekgigi mirimba mager, kendo anaor ogendini mag lweny kuomgi nyaka chop girumchuth.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Anatiek ruodhi kod jotelomag Elam, mi agur lochna kuno.
To bang’e achien, anami jo-Elam chakdhi nyime maber.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "JEREMIA
Weche mokor kuom jo-Babulon
Isa
.
—
.
;
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia janabi kuompiny Babulon niya,
Huluru wach ni ogendini!Kik umung’gi,to gonigiuru milome!Chunguru banderamondo ji ong’e niBabulon osepodho. Marduk nyasache osemaki. Nyiseche mamoko mag Babulon oyudo wichkuot. Nyiseche makuerogo okethi.
Oganda moa yo nyandwatosebiro monjo Babulon,kendo biro loke thim,mi ji kod jamni biro ringo,kendo onge ng’ama biro dakie.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ka kindeno ochopo, to jo-Israel gi jo-Judanobi kanyakla, kaywak, kendo ka dwara, an Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi.
Ginipenj yo madhi Sayun, kendo ginichik kuno.  Bang’ manoginitimna singruok mochwere ma wigi ok nowilgo ka gisingore ni ginibedjoga.
"Joga chalo gi rombe molal ma jokwadhgi owito e gode.  Gisebayo ka rombemaa got moro kadhi e got machielo, kendo wigi osewil gi kuma dalaginitie.
Ji duto moyudogi monjogi.  Wasikgi to wacho niya, ‘Ne gitimotimbe maricho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo gima watimonigi ok rach. Kweregi nogeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gin bende nonego gisik kagigeno kuome. ’
Fweny
.
. "Un jo-Israel, ringuru ua Babulon! Ringuru ua e pinyno! Unema ukuong wuok ka nyuogi ma telo ni kweth.
Adhi jiwo ogendini mokomarateke modak yo nyandwat mondo obi omonj Babulon.  Gibiro riedo nilweny mondo giked gi dalano mi gikaw.  Giniba asere ka jodwar ma josabama gima gibayo ok leng’.
Babulon ibiro yaki kendo joma yekogo birokawo gimoro amora ma gidwaro.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Un jo-Babulon ne uyako ogandana.  To kata umor kendo uil ka nyaroyamatugo e lek, kata ka faras manyiero,
to dalau uwegi biro bedo giwichkuot maduong’.  Jo-Babulon nobed oganda matinie moloyo ogendini duto. Bende pinygi nolokre thim ma pi ongee,
nikech asekume gi mirimbamager.  Omiyo onge ng’at ma nodag Babulon, to enodong’ mana gunda.  Jiduto mokadho kanyo nobed maluor, mi dhier nono kuom gima osetimorene.
"Un jo-asere, rieduru ni lweny mondo uked gi Babulon ka ugoyoneageng’a.  Chieluru Babulon gi asere, nikech osetimo timbe maricho enyima, an Ruoth Nyasaye.
Gouru sigich lweny e alwora mar dala koni gikoni, nimar jo-Babulon oseting’o badgi ni wasikgi! Ohingane osetuommomukore! An Ruoth Nyasaye koro achulo kuor ni jo-Babulon.  Kuom mano, unbende chulnigiuru kuor, kendo utimnigi mana kaka ne gitimo ni jimamoko.
Neggiuru mondo chuoyo gi keyo kik bedie.  Jopinje mamoko modakkanyo biro dok thuchegi, nikech lweny ger.
"Jo-Israel chalo gi rombe ma sibuoche lawo kendo keyo.  Mokwongo ruodhAsuria ema nomonjogi, mochamogi ka sibuor machamo le.  Eka bang’e ruothNebukadnezar nobiro momuodo chokegi.
Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto, ma Nyasach Israel abiro kumo ruoth Nebukadnezar.
Abirodwoko jo-Israel e pinygi, mi ginichal rombe ma kwayo e lek maber, kagichamo cham manyak e got Karmel kendo e piny Bashan, kendo ka gichamogik manyak e piny Efraim gi piny Gilead, mi giyieng’.
Ka kindenoochopo, to onge richo ma noyud kuom jo-Israel kata kuom jo-Juda, nikechjoma aweyo ka ngima, ema bende anawenigi richogi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
"Monjuru jo-Marathaim kod jo-Pekod, mi uneggi kendo utiekgi.  Timurugik moko duto ma achikou.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Mahu marlweny winjore e piny, kendo gik moko duto kethore malich.
Babulon nechalo gi nyundo mane ogoyo piny ngima, to koro nyundono oturmatindotindo.  Jopinje duto obwok kuom gima osetimorene.
In Babulon,obadho mane achikoni kikia osemaki! Ne oyudi mi omaki nikech ne ipiemkoda.
An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, aseyawo kama okanie gigamag lweny, kendo asegologi gi mirima, nikech an gi gima onego atim epiny Babulon!
Monjuru Babulon kuonde duto koni gi koni, mondo umukderene.  Dhururu gik muyako ka pidhe mag cham.  Kethuru dalano ma kikgimoro dong’ie.
Neguru jolwenje duto ka rwedhi miyang’o.  Ywagurujo-Babulon, nikech sa osechopo monego kumgie. "
(Joma noringo motony koa Babulon nobiro Sayun monyisowa kaka RuothNyasachwa nochulo ni jo-Babulon kuor kuom gima ne gitimo ni Hekalune. )
Fweny
.
. "Nyisuru jo-asere mondo omonj Babulon.  Ee, ng’ato kang’ato mong’eyo bayo asere olwor dala, kendo kik uwe ng’ato tony. Chuluru ni Babulon kuor kuom gik moko duto mosetimo, kendo utimne manakaka osetimo ni ji mamoko, nikech osesungore e nyima, an Ng’ama Ler marIsrael.
Kuom mano yawuote nonegi e yore mag dala, mi jolwenje notiekpep chieng’no.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"In Babulon isungori ahinya, omiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto amon kodi, kendo kinde koro osechopo ma akumie.
Oganda majasungani biro chwanyore mi podhi, kendo onge ng’ama nochunge.  Abirowang’o mier mokiewo kode gi mach, mi gik moko duto man e alworanekethre. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Jo-Israel gi jo-Judaithiro.  Ji duto mane omakogi kwayogi malich, kendo ok nyal weyonigithuolo mondo gia.
To gin gi jawar maratego ma nyinge Ruoth Manyalo GikMoko Duto! En owuon ema nolos wachgi, mi okel kue e piny, to jo-Babulonenomi chandruok. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Tho ochopo kuom Babulon! Ee, ochopo kuomjoge gi kuom jotende kod kuom joge mariek.
Tho ochopo kuom jonabi magema jomriambo.  Gin joma ofuwo manade! Tho ochopo kuom jolwenje, mi luoroomakogi.
Oseketh faresegi gi gechegi mag lweny.  Tho ochopo kuomjolweny mane ondiko, mi gilokore mayomyom ka mon.  Oseketh mwandune kendooyakgi.
Oro ochopo e pinye, kendo miyo aorene duono.  Mago duto otimorenikech Babulon en piny milamoe nyiseche makuero, mabwogo ji, kendo miyoji fuwo.
Fweny
.
. Kuom mano gibuya gi ondiegi kod winy makuero nodagkuno.  Onge ng’ama nochak odag kuno nyaka chieng’.
Chak
.
,
. Gimanotimore ni Sodom gi Gomora kane akethogi kaachiel gi mier mokiewokodgi, e gima biro timore ni Babulon.  Onge ng’ama nodag kuno, kata manama nobworie.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
