. Ne ating’owang’a mi aneno ng’at morwako law maber, kendo otueyo okanda mardhahabu.
Dende ne ng’ang’ni ka kidi ma nengone tek.  Pat wang’e ne rienymana ka mil polo, kendo wang’e ne liel ka mach.  Bedene gi tiendene bendene rieny ka mula moyue, kendo duonde ne wuo ka koko mar ji mang’eny.
An Daniel kenda ema ne aneno fwenyno, to ji mamoko mane wan go ne okoneno gimoro.  Kata kamano ne gibwok ahinya, mi giringo gipondo.
Neadong’ kenda kanyo ka arango fweny malichno.  Teko norumona kendo dendanolokore maonge ng’ama ne nyalo ng’eya.
Ne awinjo ka ng’atno wuoyo, miapodho piny ka rieko olalna, kendo ka wiya ochomo piny.
Bang’e neawinjo ka ng’ato maka, kendo keta piny gi chongena kod luetena, to dendakirni.
Ne owachona niya, "Daniel in ng’at ma Nyasaye ohero ahinya.  Amalo mondo ichik iti iwinj gima adwaro wacho, nimar oseora iri. " Kaneosewachona kamano, ne aa malo ka pod denda kirni.
Eka ne ochakoowachona niya, "Daniel, kik iluor, nikech Nyasaye nowinjo lemoni manachieng’ mane ikwongo ketoe chunyi, kisandori e nyime, omiyo koro asebiromondo adwoki.
Fweny
.
. To malaika ma jarit piny Persia ne okedo kodakuom ndalo piero ariyo gachiel.  Eka Mikael ma achiel kuom malaikemadongo nobiro mondo okonya, nikech ne adong’ kenda e piny Persiakuno.
Koro asebiro mondo anyisi gima biro timore ni jou e ndalomabiro, nikech ma bende en fweny manyiso gik mabiro timore e ndalomabiro. "
Kane owuoyo koda kamano, to ne akulo wiya, ka dhoga omoko.
Ekagimoro machalo gi dhano nomulo pien dhoga, mi achako wuoyo, ne awacho nigima chalo dhano mane ochung’ e nyimano niya, "Jaduong’, fweny maasenenoni ochwowo chunya, omiyo tekra orumo.
Achalo gi misumbamochung’ e nyim ruodhe.  Koro ere kaka dalos kodi, to aonge gi teko katamuya modong’ e denda?"
Eka ne ochako omula kendo, mi awinjo ka ayudoteko.
Nowachona niya, "Nyasaye oheri, omiyo kik chunyi parre kata kikiluor, to bed abeda gi chir. " Kane osewuoyo koda kamano, ne awinjo kaachako yudo teko moko, mi awachone niya, "Jaduong’ wachna gima idwaronyisa nikech koro iseduogona teko. "
Eka ne openja niya, "Bende ing’eyogima omiyoo asebiro iri?
Asebiro mana ni mondo ahulni gima ondiki ekitap weche ma adiera.  To koro onego adog mondo aked gi malaika ma jaritpiny Persia.  Bang’e malaika ma jarit piny Gris biro wuok, to onge ng’atmanyalo konya mak mana Mikael ma malaika ma jarit piny Israel. DANIEL
En ema ochung’ kaka jakonyna kendo jaritna.
"To koro adwaro nyisi gimabiro timore adier. Ruodh Misri gi ruodh Siria"Ruodhi adek moko biro bet e piny Persia, to bang’gi ruoth mar ang’wennowuogi, ma nobed gi mwandu mang’eny moloyogi.  Bang’e ka mwanduneosemiyo oguro lochne motegno, to nothuw ogendini duto gi ruodhiGris.
Eka bang’ mano ruoth moro ma jalweny nowuogi.  Enobed ruodh pinymaduong’ kendo notim gimoro amora mohero.
To ka lochne osegurore, pinyenopogre tieng’ ang’wen, kendo yawuote gi nyikwaye ok nobed ruodhibang’e.  Jomoko nono ema nokaw lochne gi thwon, to ok ginibed gi tekomarom gi mane en go.
Ruodh Misri nobed gi teko, to achiel kuom jotendjolwenje nobed gi teko moloye, kendo nobed ruodh piny maduong’.
Bang’higni moko achien, ruodh Misri nomi ruodh Siria nyare okendi, mondogitim kode winjruok.  To winjruokgino ok nodag aming’a, kendo nyakono gijotich mane odhi kode, kaachiel gi nyathine kod chwore nonegi,
Bang’ewatne moro nomonj jolweny ruodh Siria, kendoo nodonj e dalagi mochielmotegno, mi logi.
Enokaw kido mag nyiseche kaachiel gi gik ma nengogitek mag fedha gi mag dhahabu, mi oter Misri.  Bang’ bedo gi kue kuomhigni mogwarore,
ruodh Siria nomonj Misri, to nochune mondo odog epinye.
"Bang’e yawuote noikre ni lweny, mi chok jolweny mang’eny.  Achielkuomgi nomwom ka ohula, mi monj kendo kwak kama lach nyaka chopi dalawasigu mochiel motegno.
Eka mirima nomak ruodh Misri, mi noked giruodh Siria, kendo omak ogandane maduong’ mar lweny.
Bang’e sunganomake nikech lochneno, kendo nikech jolweny mang’eny mosenego, tolochne ok nodhi nyime.
Ruodh Siria nochak ochok oganda lweny maduong’moloyo mane en go chon, kendo ka kinde ochopo maber, to noduog gi ogandamar lwenyno, kod gilweny mathoth.
E ndalogo, ji mang’eny nodagi lochruodh Misri, kendo in Daniel, jou moko mohero lweny nong’any nikechfweny moro ma giseneno, to kata kamano nologi.
Bang’e ruodh Sirianolwor dala mochiel motegno, mi kaw.  Jolweny mag Misri ok nodhi nyime gikedo, kendo kata mana joma rateke moloyoe kuomgi ok nobed gi teko markedo.
Kuom mano, jasikgi notimnigi mana gima ohero, maonge ng’amatame.  Enokaw piny Israel ma jaber, mi bed e bwo lochne chuth.
Enobedgi paro mar kawo pinje duto mae bwo loch ruodh Misri.  Omiyo enomiyenyare okendi, eka oyud kaka dohinye, to kata kamano ok nonyal.
Bang’mano nomonj ogendini modak e dho nam, mi olo pinjegi mang’eny.  To jatelomoro moa e piny machielo noloye, mi tiek sungane chuth.
Enoring miodog e mier mochiel motegno e pinye owuon, to noloye kuno, mi mano nobedrumbe chuth.
"Eka ruoth moro nowuog bang’e ma noor ng’ato osolne osuru mondo pinyeobed gi mwandu mang’eny.  To bang’ kinde matin ruodhno nonegi, to ok elweny.
Jal ma nobed ruodh Siria bang’ mano nobed ng’at ma timbenericho, ma ok owinjore bed ruoth.  Enobi apoya e ndalo kue, mi okaw lochgi rieko mar miriambo.
Ogend lweny duto nopiem kode, to enoywegi okomotiekgi pep, koda ka jadolo maduong’ mar Nyasaye.
Enotim winjruok giogendini mamoko kowuondogi.  Kamano nogurre motegno, kata obedo ni nobedmana ruodh oganda matin.
Enomonj piny momew ma yande obet gi kue, miokaw, kotimo timbe mane kwerene ok nyal timo.  Enopog ni joge mwandu gigik moyako e lweny, bende enochan monjo kuonde mochiel motegno mag sirolweny, to mano notim mana kuom kinde matin kende.
"Enowuog gi chir ka en gi oganda maduong’ mondo omonj Ruodh Misri, mabende enobed koikore kedo kode gi oganda lweny maduong, kendo maratego. To ruodh Misri ok nosir nikech joge moko nondhoge.
Jong’adne riekomohero moloyo ema notieke.  Joge mag lweny mathoth nonegi kendo notiekogandane mar lweny.
Bang’e ruodhi ariyogo nobed piny mondo ochiemkaachiel, to ginibed ka gin gi paro maricho.  Omiyo giniwuondre, kendo okginiyud gima gidwaro, nimar kinde ma Nyasaye oketo pok ochopo.
RuodhSiria nochak wuoth ka dok thurgi, gi mwandu mang’eny moseyako, koketochunye mondo singruok manie kind Nyasaye gi jo-Israel okethre.  Enotimgima en ema ohero, eka nodhi adhiya thurgi.
"Achien enochak omonj Misri e kinde ma Nyasaye oketo, to ok nolopinyno kaka noloye mokwongo.
Joma oa yo podho chieng’ nobi gi mendegimondo oked kode, mi nobed maluor.  Bang’e nodog ka en gi mirima magermondo otiek joma otimo singruok maler gi Nyasaye, tiende ni jo-Israel,kendo enoluw rieko mag joma oseweyo singruokno.
Dan
.
;
.
; Math
.
; Mar
.
. Ogendini mage moko mag lweny nodwany Hekalu kodkuondene mochiel motegno, mi ginimi ji we timo misengni mitimo pile,kendo ginichung gima kuero makelo kethruok.
Ruoth nong’ad rieko mondooywago joma oseweyo singruokgi malerno, to kata kamano, joma ong’eyoNyasachgi nobed motegno kendo nolochi.
Ji mariek nong’ad rieko ni jimamoko mathoth.  To kuom kinde matin jomoko kuomgi notho e lweny kendonowang’ e mach.  Moko bende noywag mwandugi, kendo noter e tuech.
To ekinde ma inegogieno giniyud kony matin, kata obedo ni ji mang’eny kuomjoma odoknigi nobed gi paro maricho.
Jomoko kuom joma riek bendenonegi mana ni mondo joma odong’ kuom ogandagi obed joma beyo mopwodhkendo maler, nyaka kinde mar giko ma Nyasaye oseketo chopi.

Thes
.
,
; Fweny
.
,
. "Ruodh Siria notim gima en ema ohero,kendo enosungre ni oloyo nyasaye moro amora, bende enopakre ni oduong’moloyo kata mana Nyasaye maduong’ moloyo nyiseche moko.  Enodhi nyimekotimo kamano nyaka chop Nyasaye kume, nikech Nyasaye nyaka tim gimaosechano.
Ruodhno ok nodew nyasaye mane kwerene lamo, kod nyasaye manemon ohero.  Chutho ok nodew nyasaye moro amora, nimar enobed koparo nioduong’ duto.
Kar lamo nyisechego, to enolam mana nyasaye maritokuonde mochiel motegno mag siro lweny.  Enochiw dhahabu gi fedha gi kitema nengogi tek kod chiwo mamoko mabeyo ni nyasaye ma kwerene ne oklamno.
Enoket ji malamo nyasach jopiny moro nono mondo orit miermochiel motegno mag siro lweny.  Joma oyie lochne noyud duong’ mang’ongo,kendo noketgi e tije madongo, mi omigi lowo kaka gir erokamano.
"E kinde ma loch ruodh Siria chiegni rumo, ruodh Misri biro monje, miked kode gi tekone duto, kokonyore gi geche lweny gi joidh farese kodmende mang’eny, mi omwom mana ka aora ma mwomo genge.
Bende enomonjpiny Israel ma jaber, mi oneg ji gana gi gana.  Piny Edom gi piny Moabkod piny Amon mane odong’, to notony.
Enomonj pinje mang’eny ma katamana Misri bende ok notony.
Enoyak dhahabu gi fedha mopandi mag Misri,kaachiel gi mwandu mamoko ma nengogi tek, kendo enolo piny Libya gi pinyEthiopia.
Bang’e weche moko moa yo wuokchieng’ gi yo nyandwat nomiyeluoro, mi noked gi gero malich, kendo noneg ji mang’eny.
Bende enogurhembene madongo dongo e kind nam gi got maberie moloyo ma ogerie Hekalu. To enotho kuno, ka onge ng’ama konye. DANIEL

. "To in Daniel, koro um kitabu, kendo idine gi odok nyakakinde mar giko chopi.  To kindegi ji mang’eny biro ringo koni gi konimondo onge tiend gik matimore. "

Achiel kuom jogo nowacho ni ng’at mane orwakolaw maber mane ochung’ gi chien yo ka wi aora cha, niya "Odong’ kindemarom nadi mondo honnigi orum?"

.
. Ng’at maneorwako law maberno noting’o bedene malo kochomo polo, mi osingore enying Nyasaye mochwere, kowacho niya, "Odong’ kinde moromo higni adek ginus, kendo ka sand misandogo jo-Nyasaye oserumo, to noyud ka gigi dutoosetimore. "
Ne awinjo gima owacho, to ne ok ang’eyo tiendgi, omiyo napenje niya,"Jaduong’, giko mar gigi nobed nadi?"
Nodwoka niya, "Daniel, koro dhiadhiya, nikech wechegi odin kendo okan nyaka kinde mar gikochopi.
Fweny
.
. Ji mang’eny ibiro pwodhi mondo gibed joma beyokendo maler.  Joma richo to wechegi ok nodonjnigi, kendo ginisik asika kagitimo richo.  Joma riek to wechegi nodonjnigi.

.
. "Chakre chieng’ ma ji noweetimo misengni mitimo pile, tiende ni chakre kinde ma ochungie gima kueromakelo kethruok, ndalo alufu achiel gi mia ariyo gi piero ochikonokadhi.
Joma osiko kuom Nyasaye nyaka ndalo alufu achiel gi mia adekgi piero adek gi abich kadhi gin johawi.
"In Daniel, sik kuom Nyasaye nyaka giko.  Eka initho, to achieninichier mi iyud pokni chieng’ giko piny. "HOSEA

. Kitabuni ondikie weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye onyiso Hosea wuodBeeri e ndalo loch ruodhi Juda ma Uzia gi Jotham gi Ahaz kod Hezekia,kendo e ndalo loch Jeroboam wuod Jehoash ruodh Israel. Chi Hosea ma wang’e tar, kod nyithinde
Kane Ruoth Nyasaye okwongo miyo Hosea owuoyo ni jo-Israel, ne owachoneniya, "Jopinyni oseweya, molamo nyiseche mamoko, mana ka dhako moweyochwore mondo odwanyre gi chwo mamoko.
Omiyo, dhiyo ikend nyako mawang’e tar mondo inywolgo nyithindo. " Kamano Hosea nodhi mokendo Gomernyar Diblaim.  Ne omako ich, monywolo ni Hosea wuowi.
Ruo
.
. EkaRuoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Hosea niya, "Chak nyathino ni Jezreel, nimarachiegni kumo ruodh Israel kuom remo mane Jehu wuon mare ochweroJezreel.  Abiro tieko loch nyikwa Jehu e Israel,
kendo e kindeno anakethteko mar jolwenj Israel e holo Jezreel. "
Gomer nochako omako ich, monywolo nyako.  Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Hoseaniya, "Chake ni Lo-ruhama, tiende ni, ma ok oher, nikech ok nachak aherjo-Israel, kata mana ng’wononigi ok nang’wonnigi,
to anaher jo-Juda.  AnRuoth Nyasaye anaresgi, to ok naresgi gi lweny, kata gi gilweny. "
Kane Gomer oseweyo dhodho Lo-ruhama, nochako omako ich, monywolo wuowimachielo.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Chake ni Lo-ami, tiende nijoma ok joga, bende ok ayie bedo Nyasachu,"
Rumi
.
. "To kata kamano jo-Israel nobed mang’eny ma ok nyal kwankata pim, mana ka kuoyo mae dhonam.  Sani koro awachonigi ni ok gin joga,kendo chieng’ moro nawachnigi niya, ‘Un nyithind Nyasayemangima’,
Bang’e jo-Israel gi jo-Juda nochak oriwre kanyakla achiel,mi gichak gidhi nyime maber.  Kamano chieng’ Jezreel nobed chiengmaduong’ adier!"HOSEA
Hera ma Ruoth Nyasaye oherogo joge moweye
Kuom mano, ubiro luongo joweteu ni Ami, tiende ni, joma oher.
"Nyithinda, wuoru gi meru! Donge en e chiega, to an e chwore? Wuourukode mondo owe timbene mag terruok.
Ka ok kamano to abiro gonye, miodong duk kaka nonywole! Abiro miyo ochal gi piny motwo ma pi ongee,kendo riyo biro nege.
Kata mana nyithinde bende ok naher, dhako majachode
ema nonywologi e terruok.  Dhako mane onywologino onge giwichkuot, nimar owacho niya, ‘Adwaro chodena, nikech gin ema ne gimiyachiemo gi pi, gi mo kod divai, kod yie rombe, gi pamba michweyo nanga. ’
"Kuom mano yo mokadhoe abiro dino gi kudho, kendo abiro gero ohingaogeng; yo moluwo, mondo kik ochak oluw yorene machon.
Ka olawo chodene,to ok nojukgi, kendo ka omanyogi, to ok noyudgi.  Bang’e nowach niya,‘Abiro dok ni chwora kendo, nikech ne aneno maber ka wan kode moloyokaka obet sani. ’
To pod ok ong’eyo ni an ema ne amiye cham gi divai kodmo, bende ok ongeyo ni an ema ne amiye fedha gi dhahabu mogundho, maneotiyogo kuom lamo Baal.
Omiyo e ndalo keyo, to anakaw cham gi divaimane amiye, kaachiel gi yie rombe gi pamba mane amiye mondo ochwegonanga orwaki.
Bang’e anagonye duk mana ka chodene neno, kendo ongeng’ama norese e lweta.
Anatiek mor duto moneno, kod chokruokne dutomag lemo, kaka sewni motimo higa ka higa, gi sewni motimo due ka due,kod nyasi motimo juma ka juma.
Anaketh yiende mag mzabibu gi ng’opene,ma owacho ni gin chudo mane chodene omiye.  Anami yiende mag mzabibu kodyiende mamoko lokre bungu, kendo le ma e thim nokethgi.
Anakume kuomkinde mane oweyae, mowang’o ubani ni Baal, kendo orwako gik mabeyo mondoolombgo chodene.  An Ruoth nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"To koro winjuru! Abiro kawe, mi atere e thim, kendo abiro wuoyo kodemaber kuno, mi aduog chunye.
Josh
.
-
. Anachak adwokne puothene magmzabibu, kendo nalok Holo Thagruok odok dhoranga geno.  Ka aluonge, tonodwoka mana kaka ne odwoka kapod oyom, e kinde mane owuok oa e pinyMisri.
Adier, chieng’no noluonga ni chwore, to ok nochak oluonga niBaal mare.
Ok nachak awe omul nying Baal kendo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
"Bang’ mano anatim singruok gi le mae thim gi winy mae kor polo kodgik mamol e lowo ni kik gihiny joga.  Eka natur atung’ gi ligangla kodgimoro amora mar lweny, mi aywegi oko e piny mondo joga odag gi kue.
In Israel, abiro kendi mondo ibed chiega,mi anatimni gima berr kendo makare. Ananyisi hera gi ng’wono mochwere,kendo inibed mara nyaka chieng’.
Anarit singruokna, kendo anatimu joga,mi unung’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye.
E kindeno anadwok kwayo ma joga Jezreel kwayogo. Anami koth chue e piny,
mi piny nonyag cham gi mzabibu kod zeituni.
Rumi
.
;
Pet
.
. Anapidh joga e pinyni,mi anami gidhi nyime maber. Anaher joma ne iluongo ni, ‘joma ok oher,’kendo anawach ni joma iluongo ni, ‘joma ok joga,’ni un joga, mi ginidwoka niya, ‘In Nyasachwa. ’ "HOSEA
Hosea gi dhako materore
Ruoth nyasaye nowachona niya, "Dhiyo monsdo ikaw dhako man gi chotnekendo materore.  Here mana kaka pod ahero jo-Israel, kata obedo ni giweyaka gilamo nyiseche mamoko, kendo gihero chiwo misengni mag mzabibu motwoni kido manono. "
Kuom mano, ne adhi, mi achulo shekel apar gabich mag fedha kod gundeariyo mag cham, mi akawo dhakono kaka ne Ruoth Nyasaye onyisa.
Eka neawachone ni obiro dak koda kuom ndalo mathoth, kendo ni ok nochak obedjachode.  To bende ng’ato ok nochak onind kode, kata mana an.
Mano nyisoni jo-Israel biro bet maonge ruodhi kata jotelo kendo maonge misengnikata sirni milamo, bende maonge kido mag nyiseche, kata gik mikorogowach.
To achien jo-Israel noduog ir ruoth Nyasachgi, kendo ir Daudiruodhgi, kendo ka ndalogo ochopo, to giniluor Ruoth Nyasachgi, mi giyudmichne mabeyo. HOSEA
Ruoth Nyasaye yalo jo-Israel
Ruoth Nyasaye ni kod wach ni ji modak e pinyni.  Omiyo un jo-Israelchikuru itu mondo uwinj ane gima owacho.  Owacho kama:"Dimbruok kod hera onge e pinyni, kendo ji ok oyie kata mana kuomNyasaye.
Ji ketho singruok ma gisetimo, bende giriambo, gineko,gikuelo, kendo giterore.  Timbegi maricho medore ameda, kendo gichueroremo kinde duto.
Omiyo pinyni biro two kendo gik moko duto modakie birotho.  Adier, le duto gi winy koda ka rech biro tho. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un jodolo ema an kodu gi wach, omiyo kikng’ato par ni ji ema akwero kendo asiemo.
Utimo gik manono odiechieng’gotieno, kendo jonabi bende timo mana kamano.  Kuom mano abiro tiekoIsrael meru.
Un joga, osetieku, nikech ok uyie lochna.  Jodolo mauosedagi yie kuoma, kendo gisetamore puonjna.  Omiyo adagi ni un giyawuotu ok ubed jodolona. "
"Kaka jodolo medore e kaka gimedo timo richo e nyima.  Abiro loko nyingmaber ma gin go obed nyiero.
Gipidhore kuom richo mag joga, omiyogidwaro ni mondo joga omed ameda timo richo.
Jodolo kod ji nokum manamachalre! Abiro kumogi, ka achulogi kuom richo ma gitimo.
Ka gichiemo,to ok giniyieng’.  Gilamo nyasach nyodo, to kata kamano ok ginywolnyithindo, nikech giseweya, kendo gilamo nyiseche mamoko.
"Kong’o osemayo joga rieko!
Gipenjo bao mondo onyisgi gima birotimore, kendo ludhe bende nyisogi wach ma gidwaro ng’eyo! Giseweya, migidhi ir nyiseche mamoko, mana ka dhako moweyo chwore to dwanyore gichwo mamoko.
Gitimo misengni ewi gode, kendo giwang’o ubani kuondemoting’ore e bwo yien maboyo motimo otiep nikech nitie tipo mang’ichkuondego.  Mano emomiyo nyiu tiyo tich chode, to mond yawuotu tiyo tichterruok.
To ok nakumgi kuom timbegigo nimar un uwegi ema undhogoru gimon ma jochode mag hekalu, kendo utimo ni Baal misengni kaachiel kodgi. To ‘Oganda mofuwo yudo masira’, mana kaka ngero wacho.
"Kata obedo ni un jo-Israel useweya, to da obedo maber ka jo-Juda okotimo gima chal kamano.  Kik udhi ulem Gilgal kata Bethel, kendo kikukuong’ru kuondego e nying Ruoth Nyasaye mangima.
Jo-Israel tokgi tekmana ka tok kanyna.  Kuom mano, ere kaka dapidhgi maber ka rombe manielek momew?
Jo-Israel ni e bwo loch mar nyiseche manono,
kendo gin ekanyakla mar jomer.  Gidhi nyime gi timbegi mag chode, kendo giherowichkuot moloyo nying maber.
Gin gi chuny mabiro ywerogi mabor mana kakalausi kendo nyiseche ma gitimonigi misengni ok nokonygi. HOSEA
Jo-Israel oyudo kum kuom weyo Nyasaye
"Un jodolo, winjuru wachni! Chikuru itu, un jo-Israel.  Winjuru un jokaruoth, nikech un ema onego ung’ad ni ji bura, to koro un ema ibirong’adnu bura.  Usemiyo obadho omako jo-Mizpa, kendo uchalo gogo mamako jiewi got Tabor.
Usepiem koda muweya mi udonjo e richo matut, omiyo abirokumou uduto.
Ang’eyo kaka jo-Israel chalo, kendo ok ginyal pondona. Giseweya kaka dhako weyo chwore, to dwanyore gi chwo mamoko. "
Richo ma gisetimo omonogi dok ir Nyasachgi.  Gidwaro mana lamo nyisechemanono, omiyo ok giyie loch Ruoth Nyasaye.
Sunga ma jo-Israel nigonyiso ni gin joricho.  Richogigo miyo gichwanyore kendo gipodho, mijo-Juda bende podho kodgi.
Gidhi gi jambgi mondo gitimgo misengni niRuoth Nyasaye, too ok ginyal yude, nikech oseweyogi.
Gisendhogo RuothNyasaye, mi giweyo, kendo nyithindgi ok gin joge.  Omiyo puothegi koroibiro kethi.
Gouru tung’ mar lweny e dala Gibea.  Rama bende timieuru kamano.  Giurusigich lweny e dala mar Bethel, kuwacho niya, "Wan bang’u, jo-Benjamin!"
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Aseng’ado bura mak lokre ni, chieng’ mokumiejo-Israel, to ginirum pep.
Akecho jotend Juda nikech gisekwalo lopjowetegi, omiyo abiro olo mirimba mager kuomgi mana ka aora mopong’ mamwomo genge.
Jo-Israel ni e thagruok.  Gisewito piny mane margi nikechne giramo ni nyaka giring gidhi ir ji mamoko mondo okonygi, to kara jogoonge gima dikonygigo.
Kuom mano an awuon abiro kelo masira kuomjo-Israel, atiek jo-Juda pep.
"Mano omiyo, kane jo-Israel oneno ni tuo osemakogi, kendo kane jo-Judabende oneno adhondegi giwegi, jo-Israel noringo odhi Asuria mondo ruothmaduong mar pinyno okonygi.  To ruodhno ne ok nyal changogi kata thiedhoadhondegigo.
An awuon abiro monjo jo-Israel gi jo-Juda mana ka sibuormager! Abiro kidhogi matindotindo, kendo naywagi oko, ma onge ng’at manokonygi. Jo-Israel owuondore ni olokore
"Abiro dhi mi adog kar dakna nyaka chop kinde ma giyie ni giseketho,mi giduog ira ka gidwara gi chunygi duto, nikech thagruok malit magiseyudo. "HOSEA
Jo-Israel wacho niya, "Wadoguru ir Ruoth Nyasaye.  Osekidhowa, to katakamano obiro changowa.  Osehinyowa, to donge obiro keto yath eadhondewa?
Bang’ ndalo ariyo kata adek obiro duogo chunywa kendo miyowachak wadhi maber, mi wadag e nyime.
Weuru wabolre kendo watem bedojoma ong’eyo Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar obiro biro irwa adier, mana ka piny majaru pile.  Bende obiro biro mondo oguedhwa, mana na kothh ma miyo pinybedo mang’ich. "
To Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Israel gi jo-Juda, ang’o ma anyalotimonu? Hera ma uherago lal piyo mana ka ong’weng’o mar okinyi, kata katho maduono ka nyango tegno.
Kuom mano, aseoro jonabi maga iru mondoosiemu ni ibiro kumou kendo tiekou.  Gima adwaro ni mondo un joga utim,en gima ratiro kendo maler,
Math
.
;
.
. nimar gima adwaro moloyo enhera mosiko, to ok misengni.  Ber ka joga ong’eya, moloyo ka gitimonamisengni miwang’o.
"To piyopiyo nono mane jogago odonjogo e piny mane asingoranigi, negiketho singruok mane atimo kodgi, mi giweya.
Gilead en dala majomahundu opong’o, kendo ma remb joma onegi chuerie.
Jodolo chalo monymag jomecho marito ji kobuto e bungu.  Kata mana e wang’ yo madhi Shekemginegoe ji.  Gitimo mahundu mana gi wang’ matek.
Aseneno ka gitimo gimamono e Israel.  Joga osedwanyore kendgi kuom lamo nyiseche manono.
Toun jo-Juda aseketo kinde ma abiro kumoue kuom gik ma utimo. "HOSEA
Richo mag jo-Israel
"Pile ka adwaro chango jo-Israel mondo gichak gidhi nyime maber, torichogi gi timbegi makuero ema aneno.  Giwuondo ji kendo gituro udi mondogikuelie, bende gimayo ji gik moko kata mana e wang’ yore.
Ok gipar niwiya ok nyal wil gi richo duto ma gitimo.  Richogi olworogi, kendo oknyal tama neno. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ji wuondo ruoth gi jodonge kuom yoregimaricho.
Giduto gin jowuond kendo jomriambo.  Gichalo kendo ma machnyenyni, ma jatedo ok chwalie mach nyaka mogo mosedwalo kuodi.
Chieng’mane ruoth timo sawo, ne gimiyo omadho divai gi jodonge, mi gimer kendogilokore josunga ma jaro ji ajara.
Adier, giowore gi timbegi mana kakendo ma mach nyenynie.  Otieno duto, mirimbgi okuot, okinyi omuoch kamach maliel.
Ne ginego jotendgi gi mirimbgi mager, kendo ruodhigiosepodho achiel achiel.  To onge ng’ama kwaya mondo akony. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Jo-Israel chalo gi makati motedi manumu,nikech gigeno kuom ogendini molworogi.
Winjruok ma gin-go gi jopinjemamokogo osemayogi teko, to ok ging’eyo.  Bende ok ging’eyo ni wigiosetimo lwar.
Sunga ma jo-Israel nigo nyiso ni gin joricho, to katakamano, pod gitamore duogo ira, an Ruoth Nyasachgi.
Jo-Israel chalo giakuru mofuwo.  Giluongo jo-Misri mondo okonygi, to kendo giringo gidhi epiny Asuria.
Abiro makogi ka gidhi, mana kaka jodwar mako winy giwino, kendo abiro kumogi kuom richo ma gisetimo.
"Gidiwo, nimar giseweya mi gipiem koda, omiyo ibiro tiekgi.  Ne adwaroresogi, to giwacho miriambo kuoma.
Ok giselama gi adiera, to girudhorepiny ka giywak, kendo ka gilama mondo amigi cham gi divai, to ging’olodendgi mana ka joma lamo nyiseche manono.  To gisetamore makochikna.
Kata obedo ni apidhogi, mi amiyo gibedo motegno, to gipiemapiema koda!
Gisiko ka giweya, kendo gidok ni nyiseche maonge teko.  Oknyal gen-gi, nikech gichalo gi atung’ mobam.  Ibiro nego jotendgi e lwenynikech gisungore, mi jo-Misri nonyiergi. "HOSEA
Osiem jo-Israel kuom lamo nyiseche manono
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Go tung’, nikech wasigu yako Hekalu mara,mana ka otenga mayudho nyagweno! Joga oseketho singruok mane atimokodgi, kendo gisedagi winjo puonjna.
Kata obedo ni giluonga niNyasachgi kendo giwacho ni ging’eya kamano,
to gisedagi gima ber, manoomiyo wasikgi biro lawogi.
Joga yiero ruodhi maggi, to gitimo kamano maok gipenja.  Bende giyiero jotelo ka ok ayie.  Gikawo fedha gi dhahabu magin-go, kendo giloso nyiseche manono ma biro kelonigi manamasira.
Asedagi nyaroya mar dhahabu ma jo-Samaria lamo, kendo mirimbang’ang’ni kuomgi.  Koro pod gidwaro ni mondo akumgi nyakakarang’o?
Jatich moro e Israel ema ne oloso kido manono, to kidono oken Nyasaye! Kido mar nyaroya ma jo-Samaria lamono ibiro baro matindotindo.
"Jo-Israel chwoyo yamo, to gikayo mana kalausi.  Gin gi cham ma okwuodhi, omiyo gionge gi mogo.  To kapo ni onyago cham, to jopinje mamokodichame, mi tieke.
Jo-Israel duto ibiro mwonyo, mi tieki pep.  To katamana sani ogendini mamoko okawogi ka joma nono.
Gisedhi Asuria mondogiyudie konyruok, ka gichalo kanj thim moringo oa e kweth, kendo gitimomana gima gin ema gidwaro.  Adier, jo-Israel oseng’iewore kuom ogendinimamoko mondo okonygi.
To koro abiro chokogi mondo akumgi! Piyopiyonono gibiro neno malit ka ruodh Asuria sandogi.
"Kaka jo-Israel medo kende-mag-misango mang’eny mondo ogolgo richo ekaka gimedo bedo gi kuonde mang’eny ma gitimoe richo.
Andiko chikegana gi gana mondo ji opuonjre, to gidagi ni mago gik mayore yore ma okging’eyo.
Gihero timo misengni, kendo gihero chamo ring misengnigo.  Toan Ruoth Nyasaye ok amor kodgi, kendo abiro paro richogi mi akumgi, kaadwokogi e piny Misri.
Jo-Israel osegero ut ruodhi, to wigi owil gijachuechgi.  Jo-Juda osegero mier mochiel motegno, to abiro oro machmondo owang’ miego kaachiel gi ut ruodhigo. "HOSEA
Okum jo-Israel kuom tamruok yie
Un jo-Israel, weuru timo sewni ka ogendini mamoko.  Useweyo Nyasachu miudok ni Baal kuonde dino duto mondo uyudie cham, mana ka dhako moweyochwore to dwanyore gi chwo mamoko mondo oyudie pesa
To ok uyud cham kodmor zeituni.  Divai bende notamore.
Jo-Israel ok nodong’ e piny RuothNyasaye, to ginidog Misri, kata ginidhi Asuria kuma ginichamie chiemomamiyo gibedo mogak.
E pinjego ok ginyal oloe ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengnimag divai kata timone misengni mamoko.  Chiemono biro miyo joma chame bedmogak mana ka joma ochamo chiemb liel, nikech ok ginyal kele e Hekalu,to gichame mana ni mondo gineggo kech.
To ginitim ang’o ka ndalo moketni sewni mag Ruoth Nyasaye ochopo?
Ka masira obiro, mi ji oringo,jo-Misri norwakgi, to noyikgi mana Memfis! Mwandugi kod miechgi magiseweyo to yugi kod kudho ema nopong’.
Luka
.
. Kinde mar kum osechopo ma ng’ato ka ng’ato yudoe gima oromogi timbene, kendo jo-Israel biro winjo! Uwacho niya, "Jonabi ofuwo! Enjaneko!" Un uchaya ahinya nikech richou lich.
Nyasaye oseora ka jonabimondo asiem jo-Israel ma joge.  Kamoro amora ma adhiye to uchikona obadhomana ka winyo.  Kata mana e Hekalu mar Nyasaye bende wasika nitie.
Bura
.
-
. Usedonjo matut e richo mana kaka notimore Gibea.  Nyasaye noparrichou, mi nokumu.
Kwan
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Kane akuongo yudo Israel, toyudogino ne chal mana gi yudo mzabibu ma e thim.  Ee, kane akwongo nenokwereu, nenogino ne chal mana gi neno ng’owo mochiek atamalo.  To kanegibiro Baal-peor, ne gichako lamo kido manono makuodo wich, omiyo neamon kodgi mana kaka ne amon gi kido manono mane giherono.
Duong’ marIsrael biro huyo ka winyo, mi lal nono, kendo ok ginichak ginywolnyithindo, kata bedo mayach mondgi ok nochak obedi.  Onge nyathi ma nomakichne.
To kata kapo ni ginywolo nyithindo, to anami nyithindgigo thoduto mak aweyo kata achiel ka ngima.  Ka ajwang’o jogi, to giniyud masiramalich.
Aneno ni jo-Israel nowe nyithindgi mi maki.  Ibiro chunogimondo gigolgi oko, oneggi.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, ang’o ma dwakwayi mondoimi jogi? Migi iye ma ok onywolo nyithindo, kendo thuno ma ok gol chak. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Richogi duto nochakore Gilgal, kendo kunoema nachako monie kodgi.  Kuom mano abiro riembogi e pinya, nikech richoma gisetimo.  Anawe herogi nimar jotendgi duto osetamoreluora.
Jo-Israel chalo gi yath ma tiendene osetwo kendo ok nyag olemo. Ok gininywol nyithindo, to kata kapo ni ginywolo, to ananeg nyithindgima gihero ahinyago. "
Ruoth Nyasacha biro jwang’o joge nikech ok gisewinje.  Gibiro bedo jomabayo abaya e kind ogendini. HOSEA
Jo-Israel ne chalo gi yadh mzabibu monyak maber.  Kaka ne gimedo dhinyime maber, e kaka ne gimedo gero kende mag misango, kendo kaka pinygine nyak maber, e kaka ne giloso sirni milamo mabeyo.
Chunygi wuondogi,omiyo koro nyaka kumgi kuom richogi.  Nyasaye biro muko kendegi magmisango, kendo ketho sirni maggi ma gilamo.
Bang’e gibiro wacho niya,"Waonge gi ruoth nikech ne ok waluoro Ruoth Nyasaye.  To kata kamano eregima ruoth ditimnwa?"
Githoro weche manono ka gikuong’ore gi miriambokendo giloso winjruok ma ok nyal konyo.  Adiera oselokore miriambo, kendolandore e piny duto kaka kayongo ma ketho lowo.
Kihondko nomak joma odak Samaria, kendo giniywag nyaroya molos gidhahabu man Bethel.  Gin kaachiel gi jodolo matiyo ni nyasaye manonononoywag koneno ka itero girgi ma gigeno kuome Asuria
mondo ochiw niruodh Asuria ka osuru.  Wi jo-Israel nokuodi nikech richogigiwegi.
Samaria ibiro kethi, kendo ruodhe biro lal nono mana ka buoyomanie pi.
Luka
.
; Fweny
.
. Kuonde moting’ore ma jo-Israel timoericho ka gilamo nyisechegi manono ibiro ketho.  Kuthe gi buya ema birotwi ewi kendegi mag misango.  Ji nowach ni gode niya, "Umwauru!" Kendoginiwach ni pidhe ni, "Ruombreuru kuomwa!"
Bura
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Jo-Israel pok oweyo timo richoe nyima chakre ndalo mane gitimoe richo Gibea.  Kuom mano, lweny birojukogi Gibea!
An awuon abiro monjo jorichogi mi akum.  Ogendini bendebiro riwore kanyakla mondo omonjgi, kendo giyud kum kuom richogimang’eny.
"Jo-Israel ne chalo gi nyaroya mobo mamuol, kendo mohero tich ywayolodi madiemo cham.  To koro asetweyo jok e ng’ute ma opugno mondo opur. Ee, namiyo jo-Juda gi jo-Israel opuro.
Jer
.
. Bang’e ne awachoniginiya, ‘Chwouru timbe makare, eka unuka gueth mawuok kuomgi.  Paruruokang’, nikech en kinde ma onego uduogie ira, an Ruoth Nyasachu, mi nabikendo aol gueth kuomu. ’
To kar timo kamano, ne uchuoyo mana timbemaricho, mi richo ema ukayo, kendo usechamo olemo ma miriambou onyago. "To nikech ne ugeno yoreu uwegi, kendo ne ugeno kuom jolwenju maratekemathoth,
lweny biro buko jou, mi miechu mochiel motegno nokethi. Enochal gi kinde mane ruoth Shalman okethoe dala mar Betharbel gi lweny,monego kata mana mine gi nyithindgi.
Mano e gima notimrenu, un joBethel, nikech richo madongo ma usetimo.  E sa ma lweny ochakoree, ruodhIsrael biro tho. "HOSEA
Hera ma Nyasaye oherogo joge moweye
Wuok
.
; Math
.
. "Kane Israel pod tin, ne ahere.  Naluongo wuodamondo oa Misri.
To kaka ne amedo luonge, e kaka ne omedo dhi maborkoda.  Joga ne timo misengni ni Baal, kendo ne giwang’o ubani ni kidomanono.
To eka an ema ne apuonjogi wuoth, kendo ne ariwogi e bada kanyathi, to ne ok giyie ni an ema ne achangogi.
Ne akelogi ira gi heramogundho.  Ne akwanyogi piny mi atenogi e lemba, kendo ne akulora, miamiyogi chiemo.
To gisedagi duogo ira, omiyo nyaka gidog Misri, kendogibiro bedo e bwo loch jo-Asuria.
Lweny biro yweyo miechgi mi tur lodimag dhorangeyegi.  Obiro tieko joga, nikech ne giluwo riekogigiwegi.
Giseweya, omiyo ok ginyal tony, kendo gibiro ywak nikech jokmotuenigi, to onge ng’ama nogonynigigo.
T. Chik
.
. "To ere kaka daweu, un jo-Israel? Koso ere kakadajwang’u? Bende datieku adier, kaka ne atieko jo-Adma? Koso anyalotimonu kaka ne atimo ni jo-Zeboim? Ooyo, ok anyal timonu kamano, nikechaherou ahinya.
Ok nakumu gi mirimba mager, bende ok nachak akethIsrael, nimar an Nyasaye, to ok dhano.  An Ng’ama Ler, an kodu, kendo oknabi iru gi mirima.
Abiro ruto ni wasik jo-Israel ka sibuor, mi jogabiro biro ira.  Gibiro ringo ira ka gia yo podho chieng’.
Gibiro wuokMisri ka gihuyo mana ka winy, kendo gibiro wuok Asuria matek mana kaakuche, mi anachak adwokgi e miechgi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "Orog jo-Israel kuom wuondruok kendo kuom thiro ji
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Jo-Israel osemera gi miriambo kod wuond,kendo jo-Juda bende pod osiko odagi wachna, an Ng’ama kare kendo maler. HOSEA
Gik moko ma jo-Israel timo, chakre okinyi nyaka otieno, gin gik manonokendo mahinyo ji.  Miriambo kod timbe mag mahundu medore ameda kuomgi. Gitimo winjruok gi jo-Asuria, kendo gichiwo mor zeituni ni jo-Misrimondo okonygi.
Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro yalo jo-Juda, bende obiro kumojo-Israel maromre gi timbegi maricho.
Chak
.
. Chak
.
-
. Jakobokwargi nowuondo owadgi ka pod gin ei min-gi, kendo kane osedongo, ne oigi Nyasaye.
Chak
.
-
. Ee, noi gi malaika, mi oloyo.  Noywak kodwaroni mondo oguedhe.  Nyasaye noromo gi Jakobo Bethel, mi owuoyokode.
Manoo ne Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, kendo Ruoth Nyasayee nying mibiro parego.
Kuom mano, un nyikwa Jakobo, genuru kuom RuothNyasachu, kendo udog ire.  Beduru joadiera kendo joma timo gik makare,kendo keturu chunyu pile kuom Ruoth Nyasachu.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Jo-Israeel bende jomganga mana ka jo-Kanaan. Gin gi rapim ma ok ni kare, kendo gihero wuondo jong’iewo.
To ekagiwacho niya, ‘Wamew, nimar waseyudo mwandu, kendo onge ng’ama nyalowacho ni waseyudogi e yor miganga. ’
T. Lawi
.
,
. To an RuothNyasachu mane ogolou Misri, abiro miyo uchak udag e hembe mana kaka neudak ka ne aromo kodu e thim.
Ne awuoyo gi jonabi, mi amiyogi fwenymang’eny, to koro abiro kelo masira gi lwet jonabi!
Jo-Israel lamokido manono Gilead, to joma lamo gik ma kamago biro tho.  Gitimo misengnigi ruedhi Gilgal, emomiyo kende-mag-misango biro lokore, mi dok tuchemag kite manie puothe. "
Chak
.
-
. Jakobo kwarwa ne oringo modhi e piny Aram, kuma neokwayoe jamb ng’at moro mondo oyud dhako.
Wuok
.
,
. Ruoth Nyasayene ooro janabi mondo ogol jo-Israel e tuech.  Adier, nooro janabi mondooritgi.
Jo-Israel osemiyo Ruoth Nyasaye mirima mager.  Giwinjore gi thokuom timbegi maricho, kendo Nyasaye ok nowenigi richogi, to obiro kumogikuom wichkuot ma gisemiye. HOSEA
Okor ni jo-Israel biro rumo pep
Chon kane jo-Efraim wuoyo, to ji mamoko tetni.  Dhoodgi ne duong’ moloyodhout Israel mamoko.  To ji noketho kuom lamo Baal, kendo gibiro thonikech wachno.
To eka pod gimedo timo atima richo, kendo giloso kidomag fedha mondo gilam.  Gikawo fedha ma gin-go, kendo gilosogo kidomanono, ma dhano ema oparo, moloso gi lwete owuon.  To bang’e giwachoniya, "Timnigiuru misengni. " To ere kaka ji nyalo nyodho kido manonogo,mana kido molos e kit rwath?
Kuom mano ji biro leny nono, mana kaong’ueng’o, kata ka tho maduono ka nyango tegno.  Ginichal mana gimihudhi ma yamo keyo kar dino, kendo ka iro mawuok e kendo, mi lal nono.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "An e Ruoth Nyasachu mane ogolou Misri.  Endalogo ne ok ung’eyo Nyasaye moro mak mana an, kendo an kende ne eJawaru.
T. Chik
.
-
. Ne aritou e thim, piny motwo motimo ongoro.
Tokane udonjo e piny maber, ne uyudo gik moromou muyieng’, kendo ne udokojosunga, mi wiu owil koda.
Omiyo koro abiro monjou ka sibuor kendoabiro buto e bath yo mondo akiu mana ka kwach.
Abiro monjou mana kaondiek ma osema nyithinde, kendo abiro yiechou tiarara.  Ee, abiro kidhouka diemo wang’, mana ka sibuor, mi ang’inyu matindo tindo ka ondiek.
"Un jo-Israel abiro tiekou, to koro ere ng’ama dikonyu?
Sam
.
,
. Ne ukwaya mondo aketnu ruoth gi jotelo, to ere kaka digirespinyni?
Sam
.
-
;
Sam
.
. Ne aketonu ruodhi ka an gi mirima,kendo asegologi ka akecho ahinya.
"Richo kod timbe mamono mag jo-Israel ondik e kitabu, kendo okanmaber.
Jo-Israel nigi thuolo mar chako ngima manyien, to gimemore kanyathi ma idwaro nywolo, to ok ong’eyo kaka onego wuogi!
Kor
.
. Uparo ni abiro reso jogi kuom tho, kata konyogi ni kik gidhi epiny joma otho? Ooyo! In tho, bi gi masicheni duto, kendo in piny jomaotho, bi gi kethruokni duto, nimar ok abi kecho jogi.
Kata obedo nijo-Israel dhi nyime maber ka buya malandore, to abiro kelonigi jaketh manotiek gigi mabeyo duto mana kaka yamb oro moa e piny motimo ongoroduono sokni duto.
Jo-Israel nyaka yud kum kuom kethogi, nimar gisepiemgi Nyasachgi.  Gibiro tho e lweny kendo nyithindgi nochwad piny, mi riediye mondgi mayach. "HOSEA
Ohomb jo-Israel mondo odog ir Nyasaye
Duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasachu un jo-Israel.  Richou osemiyo uchwanyoru, miupodho.
Duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kar kelone chiwo, to lameurukama: "Wenwa richowa duto, kendo yie lemowa, mi wanapaki kakawasesingore.
Jo-Asuria ok nyal resowa, bende ok wanadwar geche maglweny mondo waidhi.  Ok wanachak wawach ni gik mwaseloso gi lwetwa niya,‘Un e nyisechewa. ’ A Ruoth Nyasaye, in ema itimo ng’wono ni joma ongeng’ama konyogi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro duogo joga ira, kendo anahergi gichunya duto, nikech koro ok akecho kodgi.
Abiro chalo ni jo-Israel kakakoth e piny motwo.  Gibiro moyo ka maua, kendo tiendegi biro kar ka yiendLebanon.
Gibiro loth kendo gibiro bedo mabeyo ka yiend zeituni.  Ginidummamit mana ka yiend sida mag Lebanon.
Gibiro chako gidak e tipona, miginya ka cham, kendo ginyag mana ka yiend mzabibu.  Gibiro bedo gi humamana ka divai mar Lebanon.
Jo-Israel ok nochak olam nyiseche manonokata matin, omiyo anawinj lemogi, kendo naritgi.  Anageng’gi mana ka yathma tipone ng’ich, nimar an ema amiyogi guethgi duto. "
Joma riek mondoowinj weche mondik ka, kendo girwakgi e chunygi.  Yore mag Ruoth Nyasayeoriere tir, kendo joma kare luwogi, to joricho chwanyore kendo podhonikech ok giluwgi. JOEL
Bonyo oketho piny Israel
Ma e wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane omiyo Joel wuod Pethuel.
"Winjuru, un joma dongo,kaachiel gi ji duto modak e piny Juda. Bende gima kama osetimore e ndalou,kata e ndalo kwereu?
Nyisuru nyithindu wachni,gin bende ginyis nyithindgi,kendo nyithindgigo onyis tieng’ maluwogi.
Bonyo madongo nochamo oboke,bang’e rumbi mar bonyo ma pod tindo nochamo oboke mane odong’.
Auru malo mondo uywagi, un jomergi!Ywaguru un jomadh divai,nikech mzabibu milosogo divai mamit osekethi!
Fweny
.
. Oganda bonyo maduong’ osemonjo pinywa. Gin gi teko mathoth, kendo gikadho akwana. Lekegi bitho mana ka leke sibuor.
Giseketho yiendwa mag mzabibu,kendo giselwaro it ng’opewa. Gisechamo opoko chuth, mi bede odong’ ka rachere.
Ywaguru mana ka nyako maywago ng’at ma nyocha dwaro kende.
Onge mogo kata gima imadhoma inyalo chiwo e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasayemondo otimgo misango mar cham kata misango miolo piny. Mano emomiyo jodolo matimo misengni ni Ruoth Nyasaye ywak.
Puothe ni nono kendo piny ywak,nimar cham okethore,kendo yiend mzabibu gi yiend zeituni otwo.
Ywaguru un jopur,nikech ngano gi shairi kod cham duto okethore. Un joma rito puothe mzabibu, ywaguru,nikech yiend mzabibu kod yiend ng’owo osener.
Yien duto osetwo. Adier, komamanga gi othidhe kod yiend olemo mamoko, osetwo,kendo mor mar ji bende oserumo.
Un jodolo matimo misengni e kendo-mar-misangorwakuru pien gugru mondo uywagi!Ee, un jotich Nyasachwa, donjuru e Hekalukendo ninduru kanyo e piende gugru otieno duto,nikech onge mogo kata divai e od Nyasachuma unyalo timogo misango mar cham kata misango miolo piny.
Gouru milome mondo ji ori kech,kendo luonguru chokruok mar lemo. Un jodongo, chokuru jo-Juda duto e Od Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oywagne!
Isa
.
. Chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye chiegni,chieng’ ma Ng’ama Nyalo Gik Moko Duto keloe masira malich. Chieng’no nobed marach manade!
Cham kethore mana kwaneno;mor onge e Od Nyasachwa;
kodhi top e lowo motwo. Onge cham minyalo kano,omiyo dere man nono kethore.
Dhok chur manade, kendo ng’eng’ ang’eng’a,nikech lek ongenigi. Rombe bende kech nego.
Aywakni, A Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech legewa gi yiendwa otwo pep,mana ka gima mach owang’o.
Kata mana le bende ywakni,nikech aore duto oseduono,kendo lege otwo mana ka gima mach owang’o. JOEL
Gouru tung’ kendo gouru uwi e Sayun got maler mar Nyasaye. Jo-Juda duto mondo okirni,nikech chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye biro machiegni.
Enobed chieng’ mudho machil,chieng’ mudho mandiwa kendo motimo rumbi. Rumbi maduong’ mar bonyo imo gode,kendo obiro mang’eny mana ka oganda jolweny marateke. Gima chal kodgi pok obetie, bende ok nobedie.
Gichamo oboke mana ka gima mach owang’o!Piny ma pok gichopoe ber ka puoth Eden,to ka giseaye, to odong’ motwo tarara. Onge gima giweyo mak gichamo.
Fweny
.
-
. Kirangogi, to gichalo farese,kendo giringo ka farese mag lweny
Kiwinjogi ka gichikore ewi gode,to gichalo ka geche maringo,kata ka lum motwo ma mach wang’o. Ochan-gi mana ka oganda lweny maduong’ moriedo ni lweny.
Ka gibiro, to ng’ato ka ng’ato kirni,kendo wenge ji lokore mamarmar.
Gimonjo mier ka jolweny,kendo giidho ohinga ka askeche. Gisiko ka gidhi mana nyime tir,ma ok gibar kamoro,
bende moro ok tuomre gi wadgi. Gimwomo gik ma digeng’gi mak gichung’.
Gimwomo dala lweny, kendo gikalo ohinga piyopiyo. Giidho kor udi, mi gidonjo gie dirisni ka jokuo.
Fweny
.
. Piny yiengni e nyimgi,to polo bende tetni. Wang’ chieng’ gi due oimore,sulue bende ok rieny.
Fweny
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye ruto e nyim ogandane mar lwenyno. Joge mag lweny ng’eny, kendo rateke. Ndalo Ruoth Nyasaye lich manade!Ere ng’ama nyalo siro chieng’no?Ng’wono mar Ruoth Nyasaye
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya,"To kata mana sani, lokreuru gi chunyu duto,mondo uduog ira kuriyo kech,kendo kuywak kendo kukuyo.
Chunyu mondo otur, eka onyis ni uywagoru,to kik uyiech ayiecha lepu. "Duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,nikech ong’won kendo okecho ji. Iye ok wang’ piyo, kendo onyiso herane mosiko,bende chunye lor a kuom kelo ni ji masira.
Dipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro loko parone,mi oguedhu gi cham mogundhoEka unubed gi mogo kod divai, ma unyalo timonego misengni miolo piny.
Gouru tung’ e got Sayun,gouru milome mondo ji ori kech,kendo luonguru chokruok mar lemo.
Chokuru ji kanyakla,mondo giikre ni chokruok maler. Luonguru joma dongo,kendo chokuru nyithindo, koda ka ma pod dhoth. Kata mana joma nyocha okendo machiegni nyaka a e utgi mi bi.
Jodolo ma tiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ei Hekalu, nyaka ywagi,kochung’ e kind dhorangach gi kendo-mar-misango. Giywak kama:"A Ruoth Nyasaye, kech jogi ma mwanduni,kik iwe ogendini mamoko jarwa mi nyierwa,ka giwacho niya, ‘Nyasachu ni kanye?’ "
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nonyiso ni ohero pinye ahinya,kendo nokecho joge.
Nowinjo ywakgi, modwokogi niya,"Koro abiro miyou cham gi mzabibu kod mo, mi unuyieng’. Onge ogendini mamoko ma nochak ojaru kendo.
Abiro riembo wasiku mane oa nyandwat,mi ater e thim motwo. Moko motelo nariemb, mi tho e Nam Kado,to man chien notho e Nam Mediterenia. Gibiro tow, mi githing’ ji. Abiro timo kamano nikech gik madongo ma gisetimo.
"Kuom mano in lowo kik ibed maluor,to bed gi mor kendo gi ilo,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osetimoni gik madongo!
Un le bende, kik ubed maluor,nikech lege loth, kendo yien nyago olemo. Ee, yiend ng’owo kod mzabibu nyago olemo mang’eny.
Beduru mamor un jo-Sayun,beduru mail kuom gima Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osetimonu. Omiyou koth maber moromo cham,adier, omiyou kodh chwiri gi kodh opon, kaka chon.
Cham biro pong’o dere,kendo divai manyien gi mo biro pong’o kuonde keno.
An ema naoronu bonyogo kaka ogandana mar lweny,to abiro dwokonu gik mane olalnu e higni mane gichamoe puotheu.
Koro ubiro bedo gi chiemo mathoth, mucham nyaka uyieng’,mi unupak Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mosetimonu gik miwuoro. Bende joga ok nochak ojar kendo.
Bang’e unung’e ni an e dieru, un jo-Israel,kendo ni an Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasachu, maonge moro kendo,bende joga ok nochak ojar kendo. Nyasaye biro olo Roho mare kuom ji duto
"Bang’e naol Roho mara kuom ji duto. Yawuotu gi nyiu nokor wach,bende jou madongo nolek lek, kendo jou matindo none fweny.
E ndalogo ema naorie Roho mara,kata mana kuom jotich machwo gi mamon.
Anatim honni e polo kendo e piny, mondo obed ranyisi. Remo gi mach kod iro madhuolore nobedie,
Math
.
; Mar
.
,
; Luka
.
; Fweny
.
,
. wang’chieng’nolokre mudho,kendo due nolokre makwar ka remo,ka pok chieng’ maduong’ miwuoro mar Ruoth Nyasaye ochopo.
Joote
.
-
.  Rumi
.
. Chakre kanyo ng’ato ka ng’ato moluongonying Ruoth Nyasaye noresi. Jomoko modak e got Sayun notony kuno. Ee, jomoko notony Jerusalem,mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho. Joma Ruoth Nyasaye oluongo nobed mangima. "JOEL
Ruoth Nyasaye biro ng’ado bura ni ogendini
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya,"E ndalono nadwok mwandu jo-Juda gi mwandu jo-Jerusalem mane olalnigi,
kendo anachok ogendini duto, mi ater e holo Jehoshafat,(tiende ni, holo ma Ruoth Nyasaye ng’adoe bura. )Kanyo ema nang’adie buchgikuom gik ma gisetimo ni joga Israel,nikech gisekeyo joga awuon e pinje mamoko,mi gipogo pinya e kindgi giwegi.
Ne gigoyo ombulu mondo gipoggo joga,kendo ne giuso yawuowi gi nyiri obed wasumbni,mondo pesa ma giyudo gichodgo, kendo gimadhgo kong’o.

; Zek
.

. "Un jo-Turo gi jo-Sidon kod jo-Filistia duto, ang’omutimonani? Udwaro chulona kuor koso? Ka kamano, to kuor mudwaro chulonoabiro dwoko e wiu uwegi ka diemo wang’.
Usekawo fetha gi dhahapa, kendoutero giga ma nengogi tek kuondeu mag lemo.
Bende usekawo jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem, mutero mabor gi pinygi, kendo ung’iewogi gijo-Yunani.
Koro adhi gologi kuonde ma useng’iewogie, kendo abiro timonumana kaka natimonigi.
Abiro miyo jo-Juda ng’iewo yawuotu gi nyiu, kendoginiusgi ni jo-Sabea, modak kuma bor ahinya.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "
Nyis ogendini niya,"Ikreuru ni lweny, kendo chokuru jokedo. Ee, luonguru jolweny duto mondo obi!
Isa
.
; Mika
.
. Thedhuru kweu obed ligengni,kendo thedhuru rabeti mau obed tonge. Kendo ng’ama ngoro nyaka nyis ni en thwon!
Returu ubi, un ogendini mokiewo,mondo uchokru e holo. "A Ruoth Nyasaye, mi jolwenji marateke olor kuno!
Ogendini nyaka ikre,mondo obi e holo ma Ruoth Nyasaye ng’adoe bura,nimar kanyo ema an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro betieka ayalo ogendini duto moa koni gi koni.
Fweny
.
-
; Fweny
.
,
;
.
. Gin gi richo mang’eny,omiyo betgiuru duto ka cham mibeto chieng’ keyo. Nyon-giuru ka mzabibu minyono kar bicho,ma mzabibu opong’o, kendo divai o oko.
Ji gana gi gana nie holo mar ng’ado bura. Kanyo ema chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye chiegni chopoe.
Wang’ chieng’ gi due olokore mudho,kendo sulue bende ok rieny. Ores jo-Juda
Amos
.
. Dwond Ruoth Nyasaye mor gi ewi got SayunEe, omor Jerusalem,kendo polo gi piny yiengni. To Ruoth nyasaye nores joge Israel,kobedonigi kama ginyalo geng’oree.
"Bang’e un jo-Israel unung’e ni an,Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,adak Sayun, goda maler,kendo jopinje mamoko ok nonyone kendo.
Kindeno yiend mzabibu manyak ahinya nopong’ gode,kendo jamni mathoth noyud e got ka got. Soko nomol kawuok e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye,mi nomi holo Shitim bedo mang’ich.
Piny Misri biro lokore thim,kendo piny Edom nolokre thim modong’ nono,nikech jopinjego nomonjo piny Juda,mochuero remb joma onge gi ketho.
,
Abiro chulo kuor ni jonekgo,kendo joketho ok nawe mak akumo. Ji nodag e piny Juda gi Jerusalem nyaka chieng’,kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nodag e got Sayun. "AMOS

. RuothNyasaye owacho niya, "Jo-Moab osetimo richo mang’eny, omiyo abiro kumogimak orem, nikech ne giwango choke ruodh Edom mi giloko buru.
Kuom manoabiro oro mach e piny Moab mondo owang’ kuonde mochiel motegno magKerioth.  Jo-Moab biro tho e chuny mahu mar lweny, ka jolweny giyo sigichlweny, kendo tung’ ywak.
Abiro nego ruodh Moab, kaachiel gi jotendpinyno duto. " Mano e wach Ruoth Nyasaye.
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Jo-Juda osetimo richo mang’eny, omiyo abirokumogi mak orem, nikech gisechayo puonjna, kendo gisedagi rito chikena. Nyiseche manono mane kweregi lamo osemiyo gibaro, mi giweya.
Kuom manoabiro oro mach e piny Juda mondo owang’ kuonde mochiel motegno magJerusalem. "Bura mibiro ng’ado ni jo-Israel
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Un jo-Israel usetimo richo mang’eny, omiyoabiro kumou mak orem, nimar ung’iewo joma onge gi ketho, nikech pokgichulo gopegi.  Joma odhier ma ok nyal chulo kata mana nengo patpatbende ung’iewo ka wasumbni.
Unyono jochan piny, kendo udhiro jomaodhier oko e yo.  Wuowi gi wuon mare dhi ir dhako achiel ma jachode marHekalu, ka gidwanyogo nyinga maler.
Kuonde duto ma ji lamoe, ginindo elewni mosingnigi kuom gope.  Divai ma ukawo kuom joma ugoyo faini, umadhoe Hekalu mar Nyasachu.
T. Chik
.
-
. To koro eka un ema numiyo atiekojo-Amor ma raboche ka yiend sida, kendo matek ka yiend ober.  Ne atiekogipep!"
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho niya, "An ema nagolou e piny Misri, miatelonu e thim kuom higni piero ang’wen, kendo namiyou piny jo-Amormondo obed maru.
Kwan
.
-
. Ne aketo yawuotu moko mondo obed jonabi,to moko naketo obed jo-Nazir.  Donge awacho adier, jo-Israel?
To neumiyo jo-Nazir omadho divai, bende nuchiko jonabi ni kik hulwachna.
Koro abiro diyou piny kama untie, mana kaka gari mopong’ gicham sikore e lowo.
Jong’uech matek ok notony, kendo joma rateke nobedmool, bende kata mana jolweny mager ok nores ngimagi.
Jo-Aserenoringi, kendo jong’wech matek ok noresre.  Bende joma oidho farese oknotony.
To kata mana jolweny mathuondi moloyo noring duge chieng’no. "AMOS
Tich jonabi
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Un jo-Israel winjuru gima awacho kuomu.  Neagolo dhoutu duto e piny Misri,
kendo un ema aseng’eyou kendo ritoukuom ogendini duto manie piny.  Kuom mano abiro kumou kuom richouduto.
Uparo ni ji ariyo nyalo chako wuoth kaachiel ka pokgiwinjore?
Koso sibuor beende ruto e bungu ka onge gima osemako? Katanyathi sibuor nyalo ng’ur e gono adier, ka onge gima ochamo?
"Bende winyo nyalo moko e obadho ka ok oketne kudni? Koso obadho nyalomeko ka onge gima otuge?
"Bende tung’ mar lweny nyalo ywak e dala mak omiyo ji luoro? Kosogimoro nyalo timore e dala ka ok Ruoth Nyasaye ema okelo?
"Adier, onge gima Ruoth Nyasaye timo ka ok onyiso jotichne ma jonabi.
"Ere ng’ama ok diluor ka sibuor ruto? Koso ere janabi ma diling’ makohulo gima Ruoth Nyasaye owachone?"Masira ma biro mako Samaria
Gouru milome e ut ruodhi mag Ashdod gi mag Misri, kuwacho niya,"Chokreuru kanyakla e gode moluoro Samaria, mondo uneye timbe pogruokmatimore e dalano, kendo kaka ithiro ji kuno. "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: "Jogo ok ong’eyo kaka digibed jomaobidhore.  Gipong’o utgi madongo gi gik moyaki.
Kuom mano wasigu nolworpinygi, kendo noketh kuondegi mochiel motegno kod utgi madongodongo. "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Kaka jakwath reso lemo ariyo kata it romboma ondiek osechamo, e kaka Nyasaye nores mana jo-Israel manok modakSamaria.
Koro chikuru itu mondo usiem nyikwa Jakobo ni Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho kama:
Ruo
.
. Chieng’ ma nakumjo-Israel kuom richogi, to naketh kende mag liswa man Bethel bende. Tunge mag kendogo nong’ad oko, mi ginipodh piny.
Anamuk udi midakiendalo chwiri kod mago midakie ndalo oro.  Udi ma olich igi gi lak liechnodong’ gundni, kendo ot ka ot maduong, nokethi. "AMOS
"Winjuru, un mond Samaria machwe ka dhok makwayo e lege momew.  Uthagojoma onge teko, kendo usando joma odhier, bende ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomurungo chwore, ka wacho niya, ‘Kelna gima anyalo madho!’
To kaka RuothNyasaye en Ng’ama Ler, osesingore ni ndalo biro ma wasiku noywaue giolowu, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nochal mana gi rech ma olowuomako.
Ginigolu e dala ka giluwo kama ohinga omukoree, mi giniwituoko. "Jo-Israel ok opuonjore kuom kum ma Nyasaye omiyogi
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Un jo-Israel, kara dhiuru Bethel mondo utimatima richo e hekalu, kendo dhiuru Gilgal mondo utim richo kuno gitekreu duto! Keluru jamni mondo utimgo misengni okinyi kokinyi, kendokeluru chiwo mar achiel kuom apar chieng’ mar adek ka chieng’ maradek.
Chiwuru makati ma ok ketie thowi ka misango mar erokamano, kendolanduru wach, kusungoru kuom misengni muchiwo kuom herou! Nimar gimakamano ema bernu ka utimo. "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "An ema nakelo kech e miechu duto, mi ubedoma onge gi chiemo.  To kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira.
Ne atamo kothchuenu e ndalo monego ochuee.  Ne amiyo koth ochue e mier moko, to puothemane ok ochuee nowang’.
Ji ne a e mier moko, kendo wuotho kool kadhi edala moro dwaro pi, to ne ok giyud moromogi.  To kata kamano, ne okuduogo ira.
"Naoro dera morocho chambu ewi dongo.  Bonyo nochamo chambu gi yiendumag mzabibu gi ng’owo kod zeituni.  Kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira.
"Ne akelonu yamo marach mar tho machal gi mano mane akelo ni jo-Misri. Bende namiyo yawuotu mang’eny otho e lweny, kendo amayou fareseu.  Neamiyo mifuond jomotho e kambeu othing’ou.  To kata kamano ne ok uduogoira.
Chak
.
. "Ne atieko jomoko kuomu kaka ne atieko Sodom gi Gomora,kendo ne uchalo gi luth moyudh e mach.  Kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira.
"Kuom mano un jo-Israel, abiro timonu mana gik ma kamago.  To nikechabiro timonu kamano, omiyo nyaka uikru ni romo ni Nyasachu. "
Nyasaye ema noloso gode, kendo ochueyo yamo.  Onyiso dhano parone,bende oloko ler mar odiechieng’ bedo mudho.  En e ruodh piny duto, kendonyinge en Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto. AMOS
Oluong jo-Israel mondo olokre
Chikuru itu un jo-Israel mondo uwinj wend ywak ma achuogonu.
"Oganda Israel osepodho,to ok nochak oa malo. Opodho piny auma e lope owuon,kendo onge ng’ama ochunge. "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Dala Israel mane jolweny owuokie alufuachiel, biro duogoe mana ji mia kende.  To mano mane owuokie ji miaachiel, biro duogo mana ji apar. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni jo-Israel niya,
"Kudwaro bedo mangima, toduoguru ira.  To kik udhi Bethel, kata kik udhi Gilgal, bende kik ukadhnyaka Beer-sheba, nimar jo-Gilgal ibiro daro mi ter e tuech, kendoBethel biro lal nono. "
Ka udwaro bet mangima, to dwaruru Ruoth Nyasaye, nono to obiro muochkuom joka Josef ka mach.  En mach mabiro wang’o jo-Israel maonge ng’amanego.
Ayub
.
;
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye ema nochueyo Yugni gi Ratego, kendoen ema omiyo piny ru kendo yuso.  Oluongo pi nam mondo obi, kendo oologie piny.
En ema omiyo sulue wuok kendo podho, kaluwore, chakre OluoroBudho nyaka Ratego.
Mano wach manade kuom un ma loko bura makare ataro, kendo tuono ji gikmonego giyudi!
Un to umon gi ng’ama odonjo ni jaketho, kendo uchayong’at mawacho adiera.
Usethiro joma odhier, kendo usekawo chambgi mokokaka osuru.  Kuom mano ok unudag e udi mabeyo mag kite musegero, bende okunumadh divai kuom mzabibu mabeyo musepidho,
nimar ang’eyo kaka kethoung’eny, kendo ang’eyo kaka richou okadho akwana.  Un usando joma onge giketho, kendo uchamo asoya, bende utamo joma odhier yudo buramakare.
Emomiyo ng’at mariek ling’ aling’a, nikech piny rach.
Dwaruru ber, to kik udwar rach, mondo ubed mangima, kendo RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto obed jakoru adier kaka uparono.
Bedurumamon gi gik maricho, to heruru gik mabeyo, kendo gururu bura makare eut bura, nikech dipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto otimong’wono ni joka Josef modong’.
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho kama: "Ywak birobet e yore duto mag dala, kendo kuonde duto ji nobed kaywakie, ma katamana jopur noluong mondo oywagi kaachiel gi joma ong’eyo wendeywak.
Ywak nobed e puothe duto mag mzabibu, nimar anabi mondoakumu.
Un joma ofuwo ma dwaro mondo chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye obi, uparoni chieng’no nokelnu ang’o? Ok nobed chieng’ ler, to nobed mana chieng’mudho!
Unuchal mana gi ng’at ma sibuor riembo, to romo gi ondiek, katamachal gi ng’at modonjo e ot, kendo oyiengo lwete e kor ot, mi thuolokayo!
Chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye en mana mudho mandiwa.  Adier, en chieng’molil, maonge ler!
Isa
.
-
. "Amon gi sewni mutimona, kendo ajarogi, bende ok aheronyasi mau mag lemo.
Ka utimona misengni miwang’o pep, kod misengni magcham, to ok nayiego, bende ok narang jambu mutimogo misengni magsawo.
Weuru baro wiya gi wendeu mag pak, nikech ok adwar winjo thumbemugoyona.
Weuru bura makare omol ka pi, kendo tim makare bende omol kaaora ma ok duon.
Joote
.
,
. "Apenjou, un jo-Israel, bende nutimona misengni, kendoukelona chiwo kuom higni piero ang’wen mane utieko e thimgo duto?
Koronyaka uting’ nyisecheu manono mag sulue ma Sakuth gi Kaiwan maneuloso,
kendo abiro darou mi ateru e tuech, e piny man loka machielomar Damaski. " Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho kamano. AMOS
Oketh Israel
"Mano biro bedo wach marach manade kuom joma odak maber Sayun, kendokuom joma ogeno ni gode mag Samaria nyalo resogi.  Un joma dongo magoganda maduong’ moloyo, ma joma jo-Israel dhi irgi mondo oyudkonyruok,
dhiuru uneye Kalne mi uchwe nyaka Hamath, eka ulor udhi Gathe piny jo-Filistia.  Uparo ni uber moloyo jo-pinjego? Koso pinyu duong’moloyo pinjegi?
Un joma ok odewo ni chieng’ bura biro, to urikni manakutimo timbe mahundu!
Un ma unindo e kitendni molos gi lak liech, kendoutaroru e kombe madongo, kuchamo nyirombe mugolo kuom jambu, kodnyiruedhi machue mopidh maber.
Un muchuogo wende manono, kugoyo thumkendo uloso thumbe kaka ne Daudi loso,
umodho divai gi ndope, kendouwiroru gi modhi ma nengogi tek, to ok litnu ka joka Josef rumo.
Kuommano, ubiro bedo joma ikwongo daro, kitero e tuech.  Mano biro bedo gikomar mor mudhialorugono. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osesingore owuon niya, "Asin gisunga mar joka Jakobo, kendo asin gi utgi madongo dongo.  Abiro chiwoSamaria ma dalagi, kod gik moko duto man e iye e lwet wasigu.
Ka jiapar odong’ e ot achiel, to ginitho giduto,
kendo ka wat ng’at achielkuom joma othogo obiro mondo ogol ringre wadgi, owang’, nopenj niya,‘Pod nitie ng’ato modong’ koso?’ To dwoko nobed ni, ‘Ongee.  To ling’nimar nying Ruoth Nyasaye ok nyal hul. ’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye biro golo chik, mi udi madongo nomuki, mi lokre pidhe,to matindo noteng’ matindo tindo.
Farese bende nyalo ringo e kite?Koso dhok nyalo puro nam? To un uloko bura makare mana gima kech, kendotim maber uloko mana gima rach.
Umor kuom loyo dala maonge ndhathe,bende usungoru ni un gi teko moloyo kawo Karnaim.
"To un jo-Israel, abiro kelo oganda moro mondo omonju, kendoginisandu, chakre kama idonjogo Hamath, man yo nyandwat, nyaka holo manyo Araba, yo milambo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awachokamano. "AMOS
Fweny adek
Ruoth Nyasaye nokona e fweny, mi anenoe rumbi mar bonyo monywol e ndaloma cham chiegni chiekie.
E fwenyno naneno ka bonyogo osetieko chamogimoro amora mang’ich e piny.  Eka ne awacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye,ng’wonni jogi, ma joka Jakobo.  Ere kaka ginyalo resore, to ginokkamano?"
Mi chuny Ruoth Nyasaye nolendo, mowacho niya, "Ee, ayie.  Gimakamano ok notimre. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako okelona fweny machielo, mi aneno ka ooro machmondo owang’ nam maduong’ manie bwo piny, kendo mondo otiek gik mokoduto manie piny.
Eka naywak niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, akwayi ni we timokamano.  Ere kaka jo-Israel nyalo resore, to ginok kamano?"
Mi chunyRuoth Nyasaye nochako olendo, mowacho niya, "Mano bende ok bi timore. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nokelona fweny moro machielo mi anenoe ng’ato mochung’ ekor ot, koting’o tol mar rapim mipimogo kor ot mondo one ane korieretir.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nopenja niya, "Amos, ang’o minenono?" Ne adwokeniya, "Aneno tol mar rapim. " Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Apimo chunyjoga Israel gi rapim, mana kaka ng’ama pimo kor ot, kendo ok nachakawenigi ngang’.
Kuonde ma joka Isaka lemoe ibiro kethi, kendo kuondemaler duto mag Israel biro kethore, bende abiro biro mondo aked gi dhoodJeroboam. "Amos gi Amazia
Amazia jadolo man Bethel nonyiso Jeroboam ruodh Israel niya, "Amospiem kodi e Israel, kendo wechene biro ketho piny.
Owacho niya,‘Jeroboam biro tho e lweny, kendo jo-Israel ibiro daro e pinygi, mi teree tuech. ’ "
Amos owuon, to ne Amazia okwero niya, "Dhi kucha, jakorni! Dhiyo epiny Juda mondo ikor wach kuno iyudgo chiembi.
To kik ichak ikor wachBethel ka, nikech ma en Hekalu mar pinywa, kama ruoth lemoe. "
To Amosnodwoko Amazia niya, "An ok an janabi, to bende mano ok tija.  An manajakwath, kendo jarit yiend ng’owo.
To Ruoth Nyasaye ema nokawa kaakwayo rombe, mi owachona niya, ‘Dhiyo mondo ikor wach ni jogaIsrael’
Kuom mano koro winj wach Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ikwera ni awe korowach kuom jo-Israel, kendo ni awe wacho weche manono kuom jokaIsaka.
To Ruoth Nyasaye wachoni kama: ‘Chiegi biro doko jachode e dalaSamaria, kendo yawuoti gi nyigi noneg e lweny.  Lopi nopog gipimo girapim, to in iwuon initho e piny moro nono, kendo jo-Israel nodar, miter e tuech. ’ "AMOS
Fweny mar ang’wen: atonga moting’o olemo
Ruoth Nyasaye nokelona fweny machielo, mi anenoe atonga moting’oolemo.
Ruoth Nyasaye nopenja niya, "Amos, ineno ang’o?" Ne adwoke ni,"Aneno atonga moting’o olemo mochiek. " Eka ne Ruoth Nyasaye owachonaniya, "Joga Israel bende ochiek ni yudo kum, kendo ok nachak awegi makakumogi.
Chieng’no wende ma iwero e od ruoth nolokre mag ywak, kendoringre jomotho nopie kuonde duto, to piny noling’ thi. "Okor ni kethruok Israel chiegni
Winjuru un joma nyono jochan, kendo temo manyo joma odhier.
Uwachokendu uwegi niya, "Mad ndalo mag lemo mar due manyien rum piyo, mondowaus cham. " Bende upenjoru niya, "Ndalo mag Sabato biro rumo karang’o,mondo wagol chambwa warundi? Eka wanyalo keto nengo mamalo, kendo tiyogi rapim ma ok ni kare mondo wawuondgo jong’iewo!
Wabiro uso chammaricho e nengo maber.  Bang’e wanyalo ng’iewo joma odhier mondo obedwasumbni mana kuom nengo moromo patpat. "
Jo-Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachjoka Jakobo osekuong’ore ni wiye ok nowil gi timbegi maricho.
Kuom manopiny biro yiengni, kendo ji duto modakie noywagi! Piny duto biro tetni,bende obiro ting’ore mi opie, mana ka aora Nael manie piny Misri.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Chieng’no nami chieng’ podhi odiechieng’tir, mi piny lokre mudho ka chieng rieny ha.
Anami sewni mau lokreywak mar tho, kendo wendeu mag mor nolokre dengo.  Anami urwak pien gugruuduto, kendo uliel wiu.  Unuchal joma ywago wuodgi ma miderma, kendochieng’no nobed malit adier. "
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ndalo biro ma anakelie kech e piny, ok kechmar chiemo, kata riyo mar pi, to mana riyo mar winjo wach RuothNyasaye.
Ji nowuoth kadawo, chakre nyandwat nyaka milambo.  Ginidignichakre yo wuokchieng’ nyaka yo podho chieng’, ka gimanyo wach RuothNyasaye to ok giniyudi.
Chieng’no nyiri ma jobeyo kod yawuowi bendenopodh piny nikech riyo.
Ji duto makuong’ore gi nying Ashima, maNyasaye madhako mar Samaria, kata makuong’ore gi nyasach Dan, kendo ginyasach Beer-sheba, nopodh chuth, kendo ok nochak oa malo. "AMOS
Buch Ruoth Nyasaye
Ne aneno Ruoth Nyasaye kochung’ e bath kendo mar misango, kowacho niya,"Tuom sirni mag hekalu,mondo agola duto oyiengni. Mukgi mondo gilwar ewi ji,to ji duto modong’ anami otho e lweny. Onge ng’at ma noringi,kata ma notony.
Kata ka gikunyo bur,mi gichopo nyaka kar joma otho,to abiro gologi mana kuno. Kata ka giidho nyaka e polo,to abiro lorogi piny.
Ka gipondo ewi got Karmel,to nadwargi nyaka amakgi. Ka gipondona e bwo pi matut,to anachik thuol mondo okagi kuro.
Ka wasikgi omakogi ka terogi e tuech,to anachik mondo oneggi kuno. Aramo ni ok natimnigi maber,to nyaka atimnigi marach!"
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto mulo piny,mi piny leny,kendo ji duto modakie ywak. Piny duto ting’ore malo,kendo pie,mana ka aora Nael.
Ruoth Nyasaye gero ute e polo,kendo orenjo polo kuom piny. Oluongo pi nam mondo obi,kendo oologi e piny. Ruoth Nyasaye e nyinge!
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Israel, gima atimonu chalo mana gigima atimo ni jo-Ethiopia.  Bende nagolo jo-Filistia e piny Kaftor, kendonagolo jo-Aram e piny Kir, mana kaka un bende nagolou e pinyMisri.
Arango piny jo-Israel motimo richoni, kendo abiro tieke e wang’piny.  Kata kamano ok anatiek joka Jakobo duto te.
To anagol chik, mianapiedh jo-Israel e kind ogendini duto, ka cham mipiedho e odheru,kendo kata wang’ cham achiel ok nolwar piny.
Joga duto ma jokethoibiro negi e lweny kata mana mago duto mawacho niya, ‘Nyasaye ok nowemasira chop kuomwa. ’Gueth mibiro guedhogo Israel
Joote
.
-
. "Chieng’no anachung’ e dhood Daudi mosebet ka otmolokore gunda.  Analos kuonde momukore mondo oduog maber.  Abiro gerekendo, mi alose machal gi kaka nochal chon.
Bang’e jo-Israel nolojo-Edom modong’ kaachiel gi ogendini mamoko duto ma chon yande meka. "Ruoth Nyasaye mabiro miyo gima kamano timore owacho kamano.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ndalo biro ma cham nobed mang’eny, mi nogolpur ka ji pod keyo, kendo mzabibu nonyag mathoth, mi nochak oket kodhika ji pod loso divai.  Yiend mzabibu mang’eny mabeyo nonyag mathoth egode duto, mi unubed gi divai mang’eny.
Abiro chako amiyo joga Israeldag e ngima maber.  Gibiro gero miechgi mane olokore gundni, mi gidagie,kendo gibiro pidho yiend mzabibu, mi gimadh divai.  Gibiro puro puothegi,mi gicham gik manyakie.
Abiro pidhogi e lopgi mane amiyogi kendo oknochak opudhgi. "OBADIA
Jo-Edom obolore
Magi e weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni Obadia e fweny kuom jo-Edom. Ruoth Nyasaye oseoro jaotene ir ogendini,kowacho niya,"Biuru mondo wadhi waked gi jo-Edom. "Kendo wasewinjo wachne.
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni jo-Edom niya,"Abiro miyo udokoe matinie moloyo e kind ogendini duto,mi ji duto biro jarou.
Sunga ma un-go osewuondou!Udak e mbita mar lwanda motegno,kendo dalau ni ewi gode malo. Mano emomiyo uwacho kendu uwegi niya,‘Ere ng’ama didwokwa piny?’
To kata bed ni ugero dalau midimidi malo ka od ongo,mi uchal mana gi joma odak e kind sulwe kamano,to abiro dwokou piny. "Ruoth Nuasaye omedo wacho niya,
"Ka jokuo obiro gotieno to gikawo mana gik ma gidwaro,kendo ka ji pono mzabibu to pile giweyo moko. Un to wasiku oseyweyou oko gi yuech!
Yaye, joka Esau! Giseyudo mwanduu, kata mana mago mupando, mi giyako.
Ogendini mane uriworugo osewuondou,mi giseriembou ua e pinyu. Joma ne ubetgo gi kue koro oseloyou,kendo osiepeu mane uchiemogo osechikonu obadhoka giwacho kuomu niya, ‘Riekogi cha duto koro olal kanye?’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya,"Chieng’ ma nakum piny Edom, anatiek jogi mariek,mi onge rieko ma nodong’ e piny gode mag Esau.
Jolweny mag Teman biro bwok,mi noneggi, maonge kata achiel modong’ e piny gode mag Esau.
Notieku kendo nochau nyaka chieng’ nikech ne unego oweteu ma jokaJakobo muyakogi.
Chieng’ mane wasikgi moa e pinje mamoko omuko dhorangeyegi,ne uchung’ achung’a. Ne uricho mana ka wasigu mane oyako mwandu Jerusalem,mi opogo e kindgi giwegi gi ombulu.
"Ne ok onego ubed mamor gi masira mane oweteu ma jo-Juda oyudo,bende ne ok onego unyiergi chieng’ rumbgi. Ne ok onego usungru kuneno ka gin e chandruok.
Chieng’ mane masira omako joga,ne ok onego udonj e dalagimondo unyiergi ka gin e thagruok, kendo uyak mwandugi.
Isa
.

;
.

; Jer
.

; Ezek
.

;
.

; Amos
.
,
; Mal
.
-
. Ne ok onego uchung’ e akek yomondo ugeng’ ni joma dwaro tony,kendo chieng’ mane gin e chandruok,ne ok onego uketgi e lwet wasikgi.
"Chieng’ ma an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro ng’adoe bura ni ogendini chiegni. Yaye, jo-Edom! Gik ma usetimo ema notimnu,kendo timbeu maricho nodong’ mana e wiu uwegi.
Joga oseyudo kum malit ewi goda maler,omiyo ogendini molworo joga biro yudo kum malit moloyo. Ibiro kumogi sidangg’, mi gilal nono!Jo-Israel olocho
"To jomoko modak e got Sayun biroo tony kuno,mi kanyono nobed kama ler.
Joka jakobo gi joka josef nochal mach,mi ginitiek joka Esau manaa kaka mach wang’o tiang’ mi tieki. Onge nyakwar Esau moro ma nodong’ kangima. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema asewacho kamano. "
Jo-Israel modak yo milambo nokaw piny gode mag Esau,kendo joma odak e tiend gode mag Juda biro kawo piny jo-Filistia. Jo-Israel nokaw piny Efraim gi Samaria,to jo-Benjamin nokaw piny Gilead.
Jo-Israel mamalo mane odar, mi oter e tuech,ma koro ni Sefarad, biro kawo mich piny man yo milambo.
Jo-Israel biro dhi e got Sayun mondo oresi,mi god Esau nobed e bwo lochgi. To Ruoth Nyasaye ema nobed ruoth. JONA
Jona oringo Ruoth Nyasaye

Ruo
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jona wuod Amitai niya,
"Wuogi,idhi Nineve, dala maduong’, mondo isiem jodalano, nikech richogiosechopo e nyima. "
To kane Jona owinjo kamano, nowuok mondo oring odhiTarshish, oa e wang’ Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nodhi Jopa, kuma noyudoe yie madhiTarshish.  Nochulo nengo mar wuoth, mi oidho yie mondo odhi Tarshish kumabor gi Ruoth Nyasaye.
To Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo yamo okudho matek e nam,mi ahiti mager ne dwaro ketho yie.
Kibaji nogoyo jokwang’, mi ng’ato kang’ato nolamo nyasache.  Gik mane gin go e yie ne giwito e nam, mondo yieodong’ mayot.  To sechego noyudo Jona oselor e yie piny, kendo orierekuno ka nindo ogoye ngoga.
Jatend yie nopo konwang’o Jona kanyo,mopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyo inindo aninda? Chungi mondo iywag ninyasachi, dipo ka owinjo moresowa. "
Jokwang’ nowacho e kindgi giwegi niya, "Biuru wago ombulu, mondowang’ego ni ng’ano mokelonwa hawi marachni. " Kamano ne gigoyo ombulu, miombulu nolwar mana kuom Jona.
Eka ne gipenje niya, "Ang’o mitimo ka?Nyiswa kuma iaye.  To ija kanye?"
Nodwokogi niya, "An ja-Hibrania, kendoalamo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach polo mane ochueyo nam gi piny. "
Kanegiwinjo kamano, ne gidoko maluor ahinya, mi giwacho niya, "Mano kakaisetimo gima rach!" Ne giwacho kamano, nimar ne giseng’eyo ni Jona ringoa e wang’ Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech noyudo osewachonigi.
Koro nam ne medo tugore marach moloyo, omiyo jokwang’ nopenjo Jonaniya, "Watimni ang’o, mondo nam okuenwa?"
Jona nodwokogi niya,"Kawauru ubola e nam, to bang’e nam biro bedonu mokue, nimar ang’eyo niahiti maduong’ni obironu mana nikech an. "
To jogo nokiewo yie matekmondo gigow e dho nam, to ne ok ginyal, nimar nam nomedo tugore giahiti, motamogi.
Mogik ne giywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye, ka giwacho niya, "ARuoth Nyasaye, yie kik iwe watho kuom nego ng’atni, kendo kik ikwanwa kajonek kuom tho ng’at ma ok oketho, nimar gima osetimore en manadwaroni. "
Kamano ne gikawo Jona, mi gibolo e nam, eka namnokue.
Bang’ mano jokwang’ noluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ahinya, mi negitimone misango, kendo gikuong’orene.
Math
.
. To Ruoth Nyasaye nosechano ni mondo rech mang’ongo omwonyJona, omiyo Jona noriyo ei rechno ndalo adek, odiechieng’ gotieno. JONA
Jona olemo ka goyo erokamano
Jona nolamo Nyasaye gi ei rech, kowacho niya,
"A Ruoth Nyasaye,ne aywakni ka an e masira, mi nidwoka. Naywak ka an e Piny Joma Otho mondo ikonya,mi niwinjo ywakna.
Niluta e chuny nam mandiwa,mi ataro nolwora koni gi koni. Apaka gi ahiti duto nokadho kuoma.
Naparo ni oriemba e nyimi,kendo ni ok nachak ane Hekalu mari maler.
Pi nolwora, modwaro thung’a,nam matut noima chuth.
Nadhi piny e tiend gode,mi buya mag nam nogajore e wiya. A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha,nanimo e piny moroma dhorangeyene olor nyaka chieng’. To kata kamano nigola e bur kangima.
Kane chunya dwaro a,ne apari, A Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo lemona nochoponi e Hekalu mari maler.
Joma lamo nyiseche manononyalo weyo gik ma gigeno kuomgi,
an to natimni misango,ka apaki gi wer. Anachul gima asingorani. Ruoth Nyasaye ema reso ji!"
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko rechno, mi ong’ogo Jona e dhonam. JONA
Jo-Nineve oweyo richogi
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owuoyo gi Jona kendo, kowachone niya,
"Wuogi,idhi Nineve, dala maduong’, mondo isiem jodalano gi wach ma abiromiyi. "
Kamano Jona nowuok modhi Nineve kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  ToNineve ne en dala maduong’ gilala, moromo wuodh ndalo adek, kia tung’ekoni nyaka kocha.
Math
.
; Luka
.
. Jona nodonjo e dala, mowuothokuom odiechieng’ achiel.  Eka nogoyo milome kama: "Bang’ ndalo pieroang’wen, ibiro ketho Nineve!"
Kane jo-Nineve owinjo gima Nyasayenowacho, ne giyiego.  Ne gigoyo milome mondo ji otue chiemo, kendo negirwako piende gugru giduto, joma dongo gi joma tindo machalre.
Kane ruoth owinjo wachno, noa malo e kome, molonyo lepe mag ruoth,kendo norwako pien gugru, mi obet e buru.
Ruoth gi jodonge nogoyomilome e Nineve duto niya, "Onge dhano kata chiayo ma nobil chiemo katadhi e kwath, kata mana modho pi.
Nyaka girwakre gi pien gugru, kendogiywag ni Nyasaye gi tekregi duto.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo owe yorenemaricho kaachiel gi timbene mag miero.
Kamoro Nyasaye dipo ka olokoremoweyo mirimbe, mi ok watho. "
Nyasaye noneno gima ne gitimo mokaka negiweyo yoregi maricho.  Omiyo nolokore, mi ok okelo masira kuomgi kakanosesiemogi. JONA
Mirimb Jona gi ng’wono mar Nyasaye
Wachno nojogo Jona ahinya, mi iye owang’.
Wuok
.
. Omiyo nowacho niRuoth Nyasaye niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, kane pod an thurwa, donge nawachoni ibiro timo gima kama? Mano emomiyo ne atemo ringo mondo adhiTarshish, nikech nang’eyo ni in Nyasaye ma jang’wono, kendo makecho ji. Iyi ok wang’ piyo, kendo inyiso hera mosiko, bende chunyi lor a kuomkelo ni ji masira.
Ruo
.
. Omiyo koro kaw ngimana, A Ruoth Nyasaye. Da ber katho, moloyo bet mangima!"
To Ruoth Nyasaye nopenje niya,"Bende iparo ni ber kikecho kamano?"
Jona nowuok modhi obet piny yo wuok chieng’ mar Nineve.  Nogero kirukanyo mobetie koyueyo chieng’, korito gima ditimre ni dalano.
RuothNyasaye nomiyo otangle otwi e wi tat kiruno, mondo okel tipo ma dimiJona kue.  Omiyo Jona nobedo mamor ahinya gi otangleno.
To kinyne kanepiny oru, Nyasaye nomiyo kudni ochwowo otangleno, mi otangle otwo.
Kanechieng’ owuok, Nyasaye nokelo yamb ugue maliet, mi chieng’ ochamo wiJona, kendo nong’no otere.  Kuom mano, nogombo mondo otho, kowacho niya,"Da ber katho, moloyo bet mangima. "
To Nyasaye nopenje niya, "Iparo niber kikecho kuom tho otangle?" Nodwoko niya, "Ee, ber ka akecho, katamana nyaka tho!"
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Ka inyalo kechootangle, mane otwi otieno achiel, to otho otieno machielo, mane okipidho, kata miyo dongo kamano,
an to donge dakech Nineve, dalamaduong’ man gi nyithindo moloyo alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo,(

) kaachiel gi jamni mang’eny?"MIKA
Ywak miywagogo jo-Samaria gi jo-Jerusalem

Ruo
.
