;
W. Nda
.
-
;
Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
;
Ruo
.
—
.
;
W. Nda
.
—
.
. Kitabuni ondikie weche mane Ruoth Nyasayeomiyo Mika ja-Moresheth e fweny kuom Samaria gi Jerusalem e kinde lochJotham gi Ahaz gi Hezekia, ruodhi mag Juda.
Winjuru un ogendini duto!Chikuru itu,un ji duto modak e piny!Ruoth Nyasaye nowuog e Hekalu maler,mondo onyis gik musetimo.
Ruoth Nyasaye biro wuok kar dane maler,kendo nolor piny,mowuothi ewi gode.
Gode biro leny e bwoyemana ka odok moket e mach. Giniruombre e holnimana ka pi mabubni e abururu.
Mago duto biro timore nikech jo-Israel oseketho, mi oweyo Nyasaye.  Erejoma omiyo jo-Israel oweyo Nyasaye kamano? Gin mana jo-Samaria! Koso erejoma timo richo mar lamo nyiseche manono e piny Juda? Donge gin manajo-Jerusalem?
Kuom mano Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro miyo Samariadok gunda e pap, kama inyalo pidhoe mzabibu.  Anang’iel kite mag dalano eholo mi awe mise mage tangalare.
Kido mopa mag nyisechegi ibiro toyomatindo tindo kendo wang’ gi mach, mi lokre pidhe mag yugi.  Ji nolosonyiseche manono gi mwandu mane giyudo kuom weyo Nyasaye, omiyo korogibiro yudo gima romre gi richo mar weyo Nyasaye. "
Bang’e Mika nowacho niya, "Abiro ywak malit nikech wachni.  Abiro wuothogi tienda nono, kendo ka an duk, mondo anyisgo kuyo ma an go.  Anahol kadhiang’ kendo naywag ka tula
nimar adhonde Samaria ok nyal chango.  Katamana Juda bende osebedo gi adhondego, nikech masira osechopo e dhorangaJerusalem hie koma jowa odakie. "
Kik unyis jo-Gath ni oselowa, bende kik uwe gine ka waywak.  Bukreurugi buru e dala mar Beth-afra.
Jo-Shafir idaro kitero e tuech duge, kawigi okuot.  To joma odak Zaanan ok nya wuok ka ngima.  Ka uwinjojo-Bethezel ka ywak, to unung’e ni ng’ato ok nyal kuo kuno.
Jo-Marothtwenyore malit ka rem ramo, kendo gidwaro resruok, nikech Ruoth Nyasayeosekelo masira machiegni gi dhoranga Jerusalem.
Un joma odak Lakish,tueuru fareseu e geche lweny.  Ne uluwo timbe maricho mag Israel, miumiyogo jo-Jerusalem odonjo e richo.
Koro un jo-Juda gouru oriti nidala mar Moresheth-gath, nikech ruodhi mag Israel ok noyud konyruok edala mar Beth-akzib.
Un jo-Maresha, Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni obiro ketou e lwet wasigu mabiro kawo dalau.  Ruodh Israel biro dhi pondo e rogo man Adulam.
Unjo-Juda, pwodhuru wiu obed ranyisi ni uywago nyithindo muhero.  Ee,lokreuru rabonde ka achudhe, nikech nyithindugo ibiro mau. MIKA
Masira ma biro mako joma thiro jochan
Enobed marach manade ni joma riere e kitanda ka paro timo timbemaricho! Gichiew ka piny yawore mondo gitim richogo, nikech ging’eyo nigin gi teko mar timo kamano.
Ka gidwaro lop ng’ato, to gikawo akawa githwon.  To kata ka gidwaro udi, to mago bende gikawo akawa.  Gimayo jikata mana utegi kaachiel gi mwandugi, mi giwegi nono.
Omiyo RuothNyasaye wacho niya, "Achano kelo masira kuomu, kendo enochal lodi eng’utu ma ok unyal gonyo.  Ok unuchak uwuothi ka uchung’ tir, nikechkindeno nobednu kinde marach.
Ka kindeno ochopo, to ji nogou ngero, kawero wend ywak niya,‘Otiekwa chuth!Ruoth Nyasaye osekawo pinywa,mi omiyo joma oketowa e tuech!’
Kuom mano, onge ng’ato kuomu ma biro yudo lowo chieng’ ma ipoge kendoni Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Ji lwera, kawachona niya "Kik ilwerwa! We lwerowa gi weche ma kamago. Masira ma kamano ok bi makowa!
Iparo ni okwong’ jo-Israel koso? BendeRuoth Nyasaye dikechi, mi tim gik ma kamago adier? Donge en ema owuoyomaber gi joma timbegi ni kare?"
To Ruoth Nyasaye dwoko niya, "To donge un ema uselokoru wasik joga?Joma duogo gi kue kaa e lweny ka paro ni masira orumo, umayolopegi.
Uriembo mond joga e mier ma gihero, kendo gueth moa kuomausemayo nyithindgi nyaka chieng’.
Auru malo mondo udhi! Ka eri ok enkama onego uyuee.  Ubiro rado gi masira.
Aneno ni janabi ma ji ohero enmana ng’at ma lworore e kor gweng’, gi weche maag miriambo, kokoro ni jini gibiro yudo divai gi kong’o mang’eny.
"To un jo-Israel modong’ abiro chokou kanyakla mana ka rombe manieabila, kata ka kweth manie lek.  Koko nogore e pinyu nikech ng’eny marji.
Jal ma noyawnigi rangach ema nogolgi oko.  Ginipusre e dhorangach,mi gitony.  Ruodhgi, ma en Ruoth Nyasaye owuon, ema notelnigi ka giwuok. "MIKA
Okwed jotend Israel
Un jotend Israel winjuru! Donge en tichu, ng’ado bura makare?.
To katakamaano, umon gi gima ber, kendo uhero mana gima rach! Usando joga malitmana ka ondiek makidho rombo kendo yuyo ring’o oko kuom choke,
kata kang’ato maturo chok chiayo, kendo kango ring’o mondo otedi, ocham!
Kindebiro ma unuywagie ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to ok nodwoku, kata mana winjo lemouok nowinji, nikech timbe maricho musetimo.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Jonabi wuondo joga ka nyiso joma miyogi gikmoko ni gibiro yudo kue, to joma ok migi gimoro, to gibwogo ni gibirokelonigi lweny.
Kuom mano ok ginichak giyud fweny moro gotieno, kendook ginichak gibed gi teko mar koro wach.  Ler ma gineno nolokre mudho,kendo wang’chieng’ biro podhonigi.
Joma koro wach wigi biro kuot,nikech Nyasaye ok dwokgi. "
To an, Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye opong’a, momiya teko gi rieko kod chirmar nyiso jo-Israel richogi.
Winjuru, un jo-Israel mochayo timbemakare, kendo ma loko adiera bedo miriambo.
Ugero Jerusalem, dalaNyasaye, gi remo kendo e yo mamono.
Jodong dala ng’ado bura maber manani joma miyogi asoya; jodolo bende lero tiend chik ni joma miyogigimoro, kendo jonabi hulo gik ma gikoro mana ka omigi pesa.  To eka podgineno ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro konyogi! Giwacho niya, "Donge Ruoth Nyasayeni kodwa? Omiyo onge masira moro mabiro makowa. "
Jer
.
. Gik mutimoma kamagogo biro miyo ipuro Sayun ka puodho, mi Jerusalem lokre gunda,kendo god Hekalu lokre bungu. MIKA
Loch Ruoth Nyasaye man gi kue e piny ngima(Isaya
.
-
)
E ndalo mabiro,got ma Hekalu ochung’ienobed mabor moloyo gode moko duto,kendo ogendini mang’eny nodhi kanyo.
Giniwach niya,"Waidhuru god Ruoth Nyasayemondo wadhi e Hekalu mar Nyasach Israel. Enopuonjwa yorene,mi wanaluwgi. "Puonj mar Ruoth Nyasaye wuok Jerusalem. Ee, Sayun e kama owuoyoe gi joge.
Isa
.
; Joel
.
. Enong’ad bura, ka othego ogendini,kendo enoyal weche mag ogendini maratekemodak kuonde maboyo. Ng’ato ka ng’ato nothedh liganglanemondo obed kwer,kendo tongegi ginithedhi rabetni. Onge oganda moro ma noked gi oganda machielo,kendo ji ok nochak opuonjre lweny.
Zek
.
. To ng’ato ka ng’ato nodag e dalane gi kue,koyueyo e tipo yiend mzabibu mare kod ng’ope,ma onge gima goye kibaji. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema osesingore kamano.
Oganda ka oganda lamo nyasache kendo tiyone.  Wan to wabiro lamo RuothNyasachwa, kendo en ema wabiro tiyone nyaka chieng’. Okor wach ni jo-Isral ibiro gonyo e tuech
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Kinde biro ma abiro chokoe joma ne akumo,tiende ni joma ne oter e tuech mi othagore.
Ging’ol kendo osedargimabor gi pinygi, to kata ginok kamano, to abiro miyo gibed ogandamaduong’, kendo abiro bedo ruodhgi e got Sayun, chakre chieng’no nyakachieng’. "
Omiyo in Jerusalem, dala ma Nyasaye ritoe joge, ibiro bedo dalamaduong’, kendo loch mane in go chon biro duogoni.
Ere gima omiyo iywakmatek? Ionge gi ruoth koso? Koso ionge gi joma ding’adni rieko, momiyorem chami malit ka dhako ma muoch kayo?.
Un jo-Jerusalem, rudhreuruarudha e lowo kuywak mana ka dhako manywol, nimar nyaka koro ua e dalauudhi udag oko e thim, kiterou Babulon, kuma Ruoth Nyasaye nokonyoue,kendo noresue kuom wasiku.
Ogendini mathoth osechokore mondo omonju, ka wacho niya, "Jerusalemnyaka kethi! Wadwaro nenogo kokethore, mondo wagone siboi!"
Toogendinigo ok ong’eyo gima Ruoth Nyasaye paro.  Gikia ni ochano chokogimondo okumgi, mana kaka ichoko cham midwaro dino!
Mano emomiyo RuothNyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Jerusalem, chakuru kumo wasiku! Abiro miyoubedo maratego ka rwath ma tunge tek ka nyinyo, kendo ma tiende chalochuma.  Ubiro nyono ogendini mang’eny, kendo unuwalna mwandugi kod gik magiseyako, obed maga, an Ruoth Nyasaye ma ruodh piny ngima. "MIKA
Un jo-Jerusalem, ng’oluru dendu manyiso ni un gi kibaji, nimar wasikwaolworowa, kendo gigoyo lemb jatend Israel gi luth. Loch jawar moa Bethlehem
Math
.
; Joh
.
. Bethlehem Efratha, in e dala matinie moloyo miechJuda duto.  To kuomi ema jatend Israel biro wuokie, ma anywolane nitienyaka nene.
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye biro weyo joge e lwet wasikginyaka dhako ma muoch kayo nywol wuode.  Bang’e jowete wuowino modong’ makotho e tuech, noduogi mi chak riwre gi jowetegi.
To wuowino nobi, minobed jatend joge, koritogi gi teko kod duong’ moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Joge nodag maber, nikech ji duto manie piny noyie lochne,
mi enobedng’at makelo kue. Ka jo-Asuria omonjo pinywa, mi omwomo miechwa mochiel motegno, to wanaorjotendwa marateke moloyo, mondo oked kodgi,
Chak
.
-
. mi ginikethpiny Asuria gi lweny.  Ginireswa ka jo-Asuria monjo pinywa.
Jo-Israel modong’ mak otho nochal ni ogendini mang’eny ka koth ma RuothNyasaye okelo ni cham, nikech dhano ok nyal kelo koth, to Nyasaye emakele.
Ee, jo-Israel motony nobed e kind ogendini mana ka sibuor madwaro le e bungu, kata madwaro rombe e lek.  Ka odonjo kuom rombe toopodho kuomgi kendo okidhogi matindo tindo ma onge ng’amaresogi.
Jo-Israel biro loyo wasikgi mi tiek pep.
Ruoth Nyasaye wachonu un jo-Israel niya, "E kindeno ananeg fareseukendo naketh gecheu mag lweny.
Anaketh miechu, mi amuk kuondeu dutomochiel motegno mag siro lweny.
Abiro ketho timbe ajuoke duto, kendook nuchak ubed gi jokor wach kata achiel.
Abiro ketho nyiseche manonogi sirni milamo, kendo ok unuchak ulam gik ma uloso uwegi.
Abiro mukosirni milamo e pinyu, mi aketh miechu,
to bende abiro chulo kuor gimirimba mager ni ogendini ma ok oseluora. "MIKA
Ruoth Nyasaye yalo jo-Israel
Winjuru kaka Ruoth Nyasaye yalo jo-Israel.  A Ruoth Nyasaye, bi mondoihul wachni ka gode winjo kendo bedo joneno.
Un gode, kendo un mise mochwere mag piny, winjuru weche ma RuothNyasaye dwaro yalo, nikech en gi bura gi joge, kendo obiro yalo kodgi.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un joga, ere gima asetimonu? Ere kakaasemiyo ubedo mool? Dwokauru!
Wuok
.

; Wuok
.

Kwan

; Josh

. Un joga, parieuru gima ne Balak ruodh Moab ochano timonu.  Kendokaka Balaam wuod Beor nodwoke.  Bende parieuru gik mane otimore e yo, kuaShitim udhi Gilgal, mana ni mondo ung’e timbe madongo mane atimo mondoaresugo. "Gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro kuom dhano
Ang’o ma dakel ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach polo, ka abiro mondo alame?Dakel nyiroye ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo awang’ne ka misango?
KosoRuoth Nyasaye dibed mamor ka akelone rombe gana gi gana, kata ka akelonemor zeituni mamol ka aora? Koso onego achiw nyathina makayo ka misangomondo achulgo richona?
To, in dhano, Ruoth Nyasaye osenyisi yo mabermonego iluw.  Odwaro mondo itim gik makare, kendo iher ji gi ng’wono,bende iluor Ruoth Nyasachi gi chunyi mamuol.
Luoro Ruoth Nyasaye enrieko.  Ruoth Nyasaye luongo jo-Jerusalem niya, "Winjuru, un jomaochokore e dalani.
Mwandu muyudo e yor miganga ema opong’o ut jomaricho.  Gipimo gik moko gi rapim ma ok ni kare, ma ok adwar.
Bendeuparo ni anyalo weyo ni joma tiyo gi rapim ma ok ni karegorichogi?
Joma jomoko manie dalani mayo joma odhier.  Gin jomriambomosiko ka hango wach ahanga.
To koro asechako goyou gi goch malitmondo atieku nikech richou.
Kuom mano, unuchiem to ok unuyieng’, kendokech pod nokau akaya.  Ka ugolo gik moko e uteu mondo upandi, to okunyal.  To kapo ni ureso gimoro, to abiro miyo okethre e lweny!
Ubirochuoyo, to ok unuka cham, kendo ubiro biyo zeituni, mi uyud mo, to okunukonyru gi morno.  Bende unulos divai, to ok unumadhi.

.
,
. Useluwo timbe maricho mag ruodhOmri, gi mag dhood Ahab, kendo pok uweyogi.  Omiyo abiro tiekou, mi joubed joma ichayo.  Adier, ogendini mamoko duto biro mana charou. "MIKA
Timbe maricho mag jo-Israel
A yaye! Koro achalo ng’ama kech kayo, mobiro pono olemo, to oyudo kayath odong’ nono, ma onge olemo minyalo cham kata mana ng’owo mamitnamanyak atamalo.
Ji moluoro Nyasaye oserumo e piny Israel, kendo ongekata ng’at achiel makare modong’.  Ji duto kichore ni chuero remo, kendong’ato ka ng’ato chiko mana ni wadgi obadho.
Gitimo timbe maricho gichunygi duto.  Jodongo kwayo gik moko mondo omigi, kendo jong’ad burachamo asoya, bende jotelo golo chik mana kaka gin ema gihero.
Kuommano, kata mana timbegi mabeyo kendo modimbore obam, kendo chalo mana gibunge motimo kuthe.  To koro chieng’ ma Nyasaye kumogie osechopo, manakaka jonabi mage ne osiemogi ni enotim.  Omiyo koro kihondkoomakogi.
Kik iyie gi weche wadu, kendo kik igen kuom osiepeni, to bendenyaka itang’ ni weche miwacho kata mana ni chiegi.
Math
.
,
; Luka
.
. E ndalogi yawuowi jaro wuonegi, nyiri bende kwedo minegi, kendomond yawuowi kwedo weg utegi.  Kamano wasik ng’ato gin mana joodgi. Ruoth Nyasaye okelo ler gi warruok
An to abiro manyo Ruoth Nyasaye. Abiro rito Nyasaye jawarna,kendo Nyasacha biro winjo wachna.
Yaye wasika, kik ogona siboi,nikech kata obedo ni asepodho,to abiro chung’ kendo. Kata obedo ni adak e mudho,to Ruoth Nyasaye nobedna ler.
Aseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo ayie mirimbe nyaka ochwaka,mi ong’adna bura maber,kendo ogola oko e ler,mi ane ni otimo gima kare kaka nosingore.
Bang’e wasika mane penja ni,‘Ere Nyasachi nogono?’None gima osetimore,mi wigi nokuodi. Eka ananegi ka oselogi,kendo onyon-gi pinyka chuodho ma e wang’ yo.
E ndalo gogo,un jo-Jerusalem unuchak uger ohingau,kendo unuyar tong’ pinyu,
mi jou noduog iru koa kuonde duto. Ginia Asuria yo wuok chieng’,kod Misri, yo milambo,kendo ginia e dho nembe gi gode duto.
To piny nokethre,mi lokre thim,nikech timbe maricho mag joma odakie. Ruoth Nyasaye okecho jo-Israel
A Ruoth Nyasaye,rit jogi miseyiero,kaka jakwath kawo luth,kendo kwayogo jambe. Gidak mana kendgi e thim,ka piny momew olworogi koni gi koni. To we mondo gikwa e lege mag Bashan gi mag Gilead,kaka ne gitimo chon.
Timnwa honni kaka nitimoe kinde mane iwuokie Misri.
Ogendini one honnigo,mondo luoro omakgi,kata obedo ni gitek kamano. Giniling’ thi,kendo ok giniwinj gimoro.
Gininang’ lowo mana ka thuol,kendo giniwuog kuonde ma gipondoemana ka gik malak piny. Giniduog ir Ruoth Nyasachwa ka giluor kendo ka gitetni.
A Ruoth Nyasaye,onge Nyasaye moro maromo kodi. Iweyo ni jogi iwuon modong’ richogi,kendo ok ikechi nyaka chieng’,to iherowa gi hera mosiko.
Inichak ikechwa kendo,mi inyon richowa e tiendi,kendo inyumgi e bwo nam.
Initim gima kare, kendo iniher jo-Israel ma nyikwa Ibrahim gi heramosiko, mana kakane isingori ni kwerewa chon. NAHUM
Mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye mochulogo kuor
Isa
.

;
.

; Zef
.
-
. Ma e fweny mane Nyasaye omiyo Nahumja-Elkosh kuom dala mar Nineve.
Ruoth Nyasaye en Nyasaye ma janyiegokendo ma jachul kuor gi mirimbe mager. Okano mirima e chunyemondo ochulgo ni wasike kuor.
Iye ok wang’ piyo,to en gi teko mathoth. Chutho ok onyal weyo joricho mak okumo. En gi yore moluwoei kalausi kendo ei ahiti,bende boche polo e buru monyono.
Kogolo chik, to nembe gi aore duono,mi lokre lowo motwo. Lege mabeyo mag Bashan gi Karmel two,kendo lumbe mang’ich man Lebanon wang’.
Gode madongo gi matindotetni e nyime, kendo leny nono. Piny duto kod joma odakie bende tungni.
En ng’a manyalo chomo mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye tir?Koso ere ng’ama nyalo siro gero ma en-go?Mirimbe o okomana ka aora mar mach,kendo lwendni barore abara e nyime.
Ruoth Nyasaye ber. En e kar konyruok mar adierni joma dwaro mondo okonygi ka gin e thagruok,bende ong’eyo ji duto mogeno kuome,
kendo oresogi e ohula ma raywoyi. Joma opiem kode to otieko chuth,kendo oriembogi koterogi e mudho.
Un jo-Asuria ere gima omiyo upiem gi Ruoth Nyasaye?Obiro tiekou en owuon!Joma mon kode ok nohedhre piem kode kendo!
Giduto giniwang’ pepmana ka kudho mochoki,kata ka tiang’ motwo.
Ng’at machach ni kuomumachano gik maricho kuom Ruoth Nyasaye,
To Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,"Kata obedo ni wasigu ng’eny kendo rateke,to ibiro negogi,mi girum chuth. To un jo-Juda,kata obedo ni asandou,to ok anachak asandu kendo.
Koro abiro chodo nyororo motueugo,mi agolu e tich misumba.
Ruodh Asuria to awachone kama:‘Asegolo chikmondo nyingi orum chuth!Yawuoti ok nobed ruodhi kari,kendo abiro ketho nyisecheni manie hekalu mari,mi ananegi nikech in gima nono!’ "Wach maber owinji ni Nineve oselo
Isa
.
. Neyeuru kaka jaote ringo kalor e gode kakelo wach maber markue.  Owacho niya, "A yaye, un jo-Juda, timuru sewni mau, kendo chiwuruni Ruoth Nyasaye gik mane usekuong’oru ni unuchiw, nimar joma richo oknochak olou kendo, nikech osetiekgi chuth. "NAHUM
,
Un jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo, Ruoth Nyasaye biro dwokonu duong’ mayande un go, kata obedo ni joma monjou oseyakou, mi okawo olemb mzabipu. Un jo-Nineve, oganda lweny mag wasiku ma ketho gik moko oselworoumoketou diere.  Ranguru yo, kendo jiwreuru gi tekou duto!
Jolwenjgioserwakore gi nengni makwar, kendo kuodigi kwar ka remo.  Gechegi maglweny oriedo, kendo rieny mana ka wang’ chieng’!
Giringo ka gimwomore ealap mar dala, ka moro ka moro tuomore gi wadgi.  Gichalo gi meny mang’angni kendo gimil e dir dala mana ka polo.
Ruodh Nineve kok ka golochik ni jotende.  Gichwanyore ka gireto, kendo girikni mondo gidhi gichanjolwenjgi e ohinga.
To dhorangeye mag aore molworo dala oseyawore,kendo kibaji goyo joka ruoth.
Chi ruoth ogol oko duk, moter e tuech,kendo jotichne duto manyiri ywak malit komako wigi.
Nineve koro chalogi yawo ma pige dwono, nikech jolwenje duto ringo weye.  Okoknigi kowachoni, "Chung’uru!" To onge ng’ama duogo.
Mwandu mag fedha gi dhahabu oyaki, kendo nenore ni ging’eny ma ok rum. Gin mwandu mabeyoe moloyo ma chuny ng’ato nyalo gombo.
Mago duto oyakimotieki, ma onge gima odong’.  Kibaji goyo joge, kendo chongegi tuomoreka gitetni, kendo wengegi olokore makwar haa!
Koro tinde ere dala mane ong’ere kaka gond sibuor, kama thuondi nenitie, kendo kama mon gi nyithindo ne odakie ka onge gimagiluoro?
Nineve ne chalo gi sibuor.  Nonego wasike mondo opidhgonyithinde kod monde, mi opong’o dalane kod mieche mamoko gi mwandumoyaki kaachiel gi wasumbni. Okor wach ni Nineve ibiro kethi
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Asedoko mamon kodi, kendo abiro wang’ogecheni mag lweny! Nyithindi duto biro tho e lweny, kendo gik moko dutomane iyako nomayi.  Bende dwond jotendi mioro ok nowinji. "NAHUM
Mano kaka inine marach yaye dala Nineve! In dala momienore gi remokendo ma miriasia gi gik moyaki opong’o.
Winjie kaka del michwadogofarese ywak, kendo kaka geche mag lweny ringo matek ka tiendegi wuo!Tiend faras diko piny matek, kendo geche lweny chikore kamwomore.
Ligengni gi tonge ng’ang’ni, kendo mil.  Joma otho okadhoakwana, kendo ringregi odhurore pidhepidhe kuonde duto.  Ji chwanyoreachwanya kuomgi.
Mago duto otimore nikech timbeni modwanyore.  Ne indala ma jaber, to ipong’ gi timbe mag juok.  Ne indhogo ogendini gitimbeni mag juok gi mag dwanyruokgo.
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Amon kodi, kendo abiroelo lepi nyaka malo e ng’uti mondo ogendini duto one dugi, mi wiyikuodi.
Abiro bolo kuomi gik mochido modwanyore ka akuodo wiyi, mondo jiduto onyieri.
Ji duto moneni nobwogi, ka wacho niya, ‘Mano kaka Nineveokethore malich!’ To kata kamano, onge ng’ama noho chunyi.  Chutho erekama diyudie ng’ama diywagi?"
In iparo ni ditony moloyo jo-Amon, dala mane ni e but aora Nael, ka piolworo koni gi koni ka ohinga?
Jo-Ethiopia gi jo-Misri ne e tekre,kendo ne gin gi teko mathoth.  Jo-Put kod jo-Libya bende ne konye.
Tokata kamano, en bende ne oloye, mi omak joge moter e tuech.  Nyithinddalano ne ochwad piny e akek yore, mi otho, kendo ne ogo ombulu mondoong’ego joma dikaw jotende ka wasumbni.  Jodongo mage duto bende ne otuegi nyororo.
Kamano e kaka in Nineve bende ibiro kwang’ ka ng’at momer, mi pinychami, kendo inimany kar tony kiringo wasigu.
Kuondeni duto mochielmotegno mag siro lweny nopodhi.  Notiekgi mana ka ng’owo mokwongo chiek,ma lwar e dho joma yiengo yath.
Jolwenji nodok manyap ka mon. Dhorangeye mag pinyi noyawre malach ni wasigu, kendo mach nowang’gi pep.
Ikreuru ni ageng’a mabiro.  Umburu pi kendo nyonuru lowo, unywasi mondoogogo matafari mang’eny ulosgo kuonde mag siro lweny obed motegno.
Toe kinde ma utimoe gigo, mach nowang’u, mi tieku pep, kendo liganglanonegu, mi wasigu notieku mana ka nyithi bonyo ma chamo gik moko duto magiyudo.  Kata obedo ni unywoloru ka dede kamano, to unulal nono mana kakarumbi mar dede mahuyo kendo lal nono.
Jou ma johala ng’eny ka sulue ma e polo,
kendo jodongu kod jotenduchokore kaachiel mana ka dede mopoto e chiel ka koyo ng’ich.  To gidutogibiro ringo mi gilal nono mana ka det bonyo ma ringo ka chieng oowopiny, kendo onge ng’ama ong’eyo kuma gidhiye.
A yaye ruodh Asuria, jodongi oriere piny kotho, bende jogi oke e korgode ka onge ng’at machokgi.
Adhondeni ok nyal chango, nimar gidhimarach.  Ji duto mowinjo gima otimoreni biro pamo lwetgi gi mor, nimaronge kata ng’at achiel e piny ngima ma pok isebedo kisando. HABAKUK
Habakuk ywagore ni adiera onge
Ma e wach mane Ruoth Nyasaye onyiso janabi Habakuk e fweny.
A Ruoth Nyasaye, nyaka karang’o ma anyalo ywaknie mondo ikonywa, to okiwinja? Aywakni ka awacho niya, ‘Masira’, to ok ireswa.
Ere gima omiyoiweyo aneno chandruok machalo kamano? Koso ang’o momiyo iweyo anenotimbe mamonogi? Mecho kod timbe machach ema aneno, kendo miero gi lwenyolwora koni gi koni.
Kuom mano ji ok luw chik, kendo buche ok yal giadiera, nimar joma timbegi mono thoth, mohewo joma kare.  Mano emomiyoadiera iloko aloka. Okor wach ni jo-Babulon biro sando jo-Juda
Joote
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye ne odwoka niya, "Winjuru un joma andhokegi!Gimoro biro timore ma ubiro wuoro kendo biru bwogou, nimar abiro timogimoro e ndalou, ma ok unuyie kinyisou.
Ruo
.
. Abiro kelojo-Babulon, ma oganda mager kendo ma jomrima! Giwuotho e piny ngima kagimayo jomoko nono miechgi.
Gin joma ger marach, kendo gitimo mana gimagin ema gidwaro to onge ng’ama geng’ogi.
Faresegi jong’wech moloyokwach, kendo ger moloyo ondiegi mawuotho ka piny oselil.  Joidh faresegia kuma bor, kendo gihuchore mana ka ongo ma yudho gima omako,
kendojoma temo geng’ogi, leny nono koneno kaka gilich.  Gichoko ji ma gimakomang’eny mana ka kuoyo.
"Gijaro ruodhi kod jodonggi, bende giseyo kuonde mochiel motegno magsiro lweny, nikech gidhuro pidhe mag lowo, ma giidhogo ohinga, kendogimuko kuonde mochiel motegnogo.
Bang’e gikadho piyopiyo mana ka yamo,ka gidhi kamoro machielo.  To kata kamano gin joketho nikech gikwanotekregi giwegi ka nyasachgi. "Habakuk ywagore ni Ruoth Nyasaye
A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha kendo ma Ng’ama Ler, donge in e Nyasaye manyaka nene kendo mochwere? A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Lwandawa, in ema iketojo-Babulon mondo okumwa king’adonwa bura.
In to iler ma ok inyal yieneno richo, kata yie nenoo timbe mamono.  Koro ere gima omiyo irangoaranga joma andhokegi, to ok itim gimoro? Koso ang’o momiyo iling’aling’a ka joma richo tieko joma kare moloyogi.
Koro imiyo ji chalo mana gi rech ma e nam, kata gi gik malak piny, maonge gi jotelo.
Jo-Babulon mako ji mana kaka jolupo mako rech giolowu, kendo ywayogi gi tol ka mor.
Bang’e gikulore ni tondegigo kendogiwang’onigi ubani ka giwacho niya, "Magi e nyiseche ma kelonwa mwandu,momiyo wadak maber. "
A Nyasaye, koro ibiro weyo gitimo kamano nyakachieng’ ka ginego ogendini anega, to ok idew?HABAKUK
Ruoth Nyasaye odwoko Habakuk
Abiro chung’ kara.  Adier, abiro chung’ ewi kama oger mabor mar ng’icho,mi arit mondo ane ane gima Nyasaye biro dwoka kuom ywakna.
Eka ne Ruoth Nyasaye odwoka kama: "Ndik wach mibiro yudo e fweny,kigoro maler e kite mopa, ma ng’ato nyalo somo mayot, mi ring nyis jomamoko.
Hib
.
. To fweny mibiro yudono nigi kinde moketne, kendo kakindeno ochopo, to gigo notimre mana ma piyopiyo mak orem.  Kata ka inenoni odeko, to rite arita, nikech notimre maonge kiawa, kendo mana e kindemowinjore. "
Rumi
.
; Gal
.
; Hib
.
. Koro ma e fweny nogo: Ng’at ma chunyeok ni kare nopodhi, to ng’at makare nobed mangima nikech adierane. Masiche mabiro mako joma richo
Andhoke ma jo-Babulon sungore, to ok ginidhi maber.  Gisechoko ogendinimang’eny moa e pinje mopogore opogore, ka wuoro omakogi, to ok ginyalyieng’.
To kinde biro ma joma koro gimakogo nong’ong’nigi, kawachoniginiya, "Unune malit, un jomecho ma doko momew gi mwandu moyaki kod gikmohol. "
Donge joma uholo gik moko biro bandhou gigo? Koso donge gibirotucho apoya, mi giteng’u nyaka udong’ nono, mi ubed wasumbgi?
Kaka neuyako ogendini mang’eny, e kaka ogendini duto bende noyaku, nikech remomane uchuero kod timbe mahundu mane utimo e piny kendo e mier, kusandogojoma odakie.
Unune malit, un muyudo mwandu e yo marach, mondo ugergo dalau kamaoting’ore ma wasigu ok nyal monjoue.
Tim musetimo kutieko ogendinimang’eny biro kelonu wichkuot, mi ket ngimau e masira.
Kata mana kitemanie kor utu noywagrenu, kendo yien manie tetu nodwokgi!
Mano kaka unune malit, un joma gero mier gi pesa moyud kuom nek gimecho.
Donge Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osewacho ni gik maogendini mamoko oseyudo gi luchgi nowang’, mi lal nono?
Isa
.
. Kinde biro chopo ma joma ong’eyo duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasayenopong’ie piny ka, mana ka pi mopong’o nam.
Unune malit, un joma sando jopinje makiewo kodu, mi kwang’ ka jomaomer, mana ni mondo unyiergi ka giwuotho duk.
To un bende duong’ ma ungo biro lokore wichkuot, nikech ubiro madho kikombe ma mirimb Nyasayeopong’o mi ukwang’.  Ee, Nyasaye biro kumou malit mi unubed gi wichkuotmarach kar duong’ mane un-go.
Timbe mahundu, mane utimo ni Lebanon,kendo nek mane unegogo le man kuno nodog e wiu, kendo nomi udhier nono,nikech usechuero remo e piny kendo e mier, bende usetimo timbe mahunduni joma odakie duto.
Ere ohala muyudo kuom lamo nyiseche manono ma lwet dhano ema oloso?Gin mana kido mamiyo ji lal.  Ere ohala ma ng’at molosogi yudo kuomgi?Chutho oloso mana nyiseche manono ma ok nyal wuoyo!
Unune malit, unjoma wacho ni yath mopa mondo ochiew, kendo ma kwayo kidi mondo oa malo. Bende gik makamago dikelnu wach moa kuom Nyasaye adier? Obawgi gi fedhakod dhahabu, kendo gionge gi ngima.
Ruoth Nyasaye to nie Hekalu mare. Piny duto mondo oling’ thi e nyime!HABAKUK
Lemo mar Habakuk
Ma e lemo mar Habakuk janabi:
A Ruoth Nyasaye,asewinjo humbi,kendo timbeni miya luoro. Chak itim timbeni machon mana e ndalogi,kendo kata obedo ni ikecho kamano to ng’wonnwae.
Nyasaye biro koa Teman. Ee, Ng’ama Ler biro koa got Paran. Duong’ne maler opong’o kor polo kaachiel gi piny.
Othinyore ka ler mar okinyi,kendo meny ariyo rieny e bathe koni gi koni. Kor polo kanyo e kama opandoe duong’ne maler.
Tho malich otelo e nyime,to dera luwo bang’e.
Ka ochung’ to piny yiengni,kendo ka ong’icho,to ogendini kirni,bende gode duto ma nyaka nene barore kendo nimo. Pod owuotho mana kaka ne owuotho chon.
Aneno ka kihondko malichomako jo-Kushan gi jo-Midian,madak e hembe.
A Ruoth Nyasaye,mirima omaki gi aore koso?Koso ikecho gi nam,ma omiyo ibiro kiidho fareseni kod gecheni ma ilochogo?
Igolo atung’ oko,kendo ipong’o olalo gi asere. Imiyo ohula baro piny,
bende ka gode orangi,to tetni ka luoro omako. Ohula mwomo ka ridore,kendo nam matut wuo matekka apaka gingore.
Wang’ chieng’ gi dueochung’ achung’a keregi,ka gineno polo ka mil,mana ka gima gin aserni gi tong’ magi.
Iwuotho e piny gi gero,kendo inyono ogendini piny gi mirima.
Ibiro mondo ires jogi,kaachiel gi ruoth miseyiero. Iseketho od jaricho,chakre tado nyaka dier ot,kimuko mise mare chuth.
Wasikwa nobiro ka kalausi,kaparo ni ibiro tiekowa,mana kaka inyalo tieko ng’at modhier man kar kende. To kata kamano ne itiekogimana gi gilwenjegi giwegi.
Ka ingado nam gi fareseni,to apaka madongo gingore.
Ka awinjo gigi to kibaji goya,kendo dhoga tetni. Chokena duto nyosore,kendo tiendena kirni ka luoro ohewa. Ahora mos,karito chieng’ ma masira biro makoe joma monjowa.
Kata obedo ni ng’owo ok thiew,kendo mzabibu gi zeituni ok nyagi,bende puothe ok chieg cham,kendo rombe gi dhok onge dala,
to pod anamor amora kuom Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo anabed moil kuom Nyasaye jawarna.

Sam
.
; Zab
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye e tekra. En ema omiyo tienda bedo mayot ka tiend mwanda,mondo awuothgo kuonde moting’ore. ZEFANIA
Chieng’ mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye

Ruo
.
—
.
;
W. Nda
.
—
.
. Ma e wach Ruoth Nyasaye maneobiro ni Zefania wuod Kushi ma wuod Gedalia, ma wuod Amaria ma wuodHezekia, e ndalo Josia wuod Amon, ruodh Juda.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro yweyo gik moko duto manie piny, mi lalnono.
Abiro tieko dhano kaachiel gi le, bende abiro tieko winy ma e korpolo, kod rech ma e nam.  Abiro goyo joma timbegi mono piny, mi atiekkoth dhano chuth.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro kumo jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem duto, mondo atiek tich lamo Baalduto mitimo ka, mi kata mana nying jodolo manono ok nowinji.
Bendeabiro tieko ji maidho ewi udi, kendo kulore piny kalamo gik mane korpolo, Kod joma lama an Ruoth Nyasaye, to kendo kuong’ore gi nyingMilkom, nyasaye manono,
kaachiel gi joma oselokona ng’egi, kendo okmanya kata kwaya mondo akony. "
Ling’uru thi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar odiechienge chiegni.  RuothNyasaye oseloso misango, kendo osepwodho wende.
Owacho niya, "Ka chieng’ ma atimoe misango ochopo, to anakum joka ruothkod jotendgi madongo, kaachiel gi joma luwo timbe jopinjemamoko.
Chieng’no abiro kumo jogo duto mamiel e laru mar Hekalu, kendomapong’o od ruodhgi gi timbe mahundu kod timbe mag wuond.
"Chieng’no, ywak nowinjre e dhorangach miluongo ni Dhoranga Rech,kendo e bath dala koma nyien, bende koko maduong’ nogore e gode,
kendoji modak e dala mamwalo noywagi, nimar joohala duto orumo, kendo jomaloko ohand fedha otiek pep.
"Chieng’no anamany Jerusalem, kamenye gi taya, mi akum joma osikokatimo atima richo, kendo wacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye ok bi timo gimoro katamatin.
Mwandugi noyaki, kendo miechgi nokethi.  Giniger udi, to okginidagie, kendo ginipidh mzabibu, to ok ginimadh divachgi. "
Odiechieng’ mang’ongo mar Ruoth Nyasaye chiegni.  En odiechieng’marach, kendo obiro koringo piyopiyo, moloyo jalweny majang’wech.
Chieng’no en chieng’ bura, kendo en chieng’ ywagruok girem, bende en chieng’ kethruok gi lal, kod mudho gi kuyo, kaachiel girumbi molil kod ong’ueng’o malich.  En chieng’ ma tung’ ywakie,
kendosigich lweny winjoree e mier mochiel motegno, kendo kuonde moger maboyomag ng’icho.
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Abiro kelo ni ji thagruok malich, kendoginituomre atuoma ka muofni, nikech richo ma gisetimo e nyima.  Rembginochuer ka pi, kendo ringregi noriere, ka tow e lowo.
Fethgi katadhahapgi ok noresgi. "Chieng’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye ng’adoe bura, nyiego mager ma en-go nowang’piny duto, mi tiek pep.  Kamano enotiek gik moko duto modak e piny manaka diemo wang’. ZEFANIA
Okor wach ni piny Juda gi ogendini molwore biro podho
Chokreuru kanyakla, un oganda ma onge gi wichkuotni,
ka pok oteru kumabor, mi ulal nono ka mihudhi! Ee, chokreuru, kapok Ruoth Nyasaye okelomirimbe mager kuomu, kata kapok chieng’ mirimbe ochopo.
Dwaruru RuothNyasaye un jogo duto modak e piny, kobolore kendo korito chikene.  Bendedwaruru tim makare, bende beduru gi chuny mamuol nimar dipo ka uyudo karkonyruok, chieng’ mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye.
Isa
.
-
; Jer

. Dala mar Gaza ibiro we nono. Ashkelon bende biro dong’ gunda, kendo jo-Ashdod ibiro riembo manaodiechieng’ tir.  Ekron to ibiro dhuolo gi lop tiende.
Mano kaka unune malit, un jo Kereth modak e dhonam! Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyokuomu niya, "Un jo-Filistia, abiro dwoko pinyu piny.  Abiro kethe miaweye ka onge ng’ama odakie,
kendo obiro dong’ mana kama jokwath kendeema kwayoe, kendo kama rombe ema nindoe.
Jo-Juda modong’ ema nobed wegpiny man e dhonam.  Ginikwa jambgi e dhonam kuno, kendo giniyue e utjo-Askelon gotieno, nimar an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, abiro konyogi,mi adwoknigi gueth mane gin-go chon.

Chak
.
. "Kuom mano, an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, akuong’oragi nyinga awuon, ni Moab biro chalo gi Sodom, to Amon nochal gi Gomora,mi gibed kuonde ma aila gi bugni mag pundo ema opong’o, kendo mokethorenyaka chieng’.  Joga modong’ noyakgi mi kaw pinygi. "
Mano ema nobed pok ma giniyud kuom sunga ma gin go, nikech ne giyanyojo-Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ka gikawore malich.
To RuothNyasaye biro thinyore mondo okumgi marach! Obiro nego nyiseche duto magpiny gi kech, mi ji duto modak e pinje mae dhonembe kod chulni nokulreka lame, ng’ato ka ng’ato e dalane.

; Nah
.
—
.
. kendo norie bade kuom pinyman yo nyandwat, motiek Asuria, kendo olok Nineve piny motwo mana kapiny ongoro.
Kueth mag jamni nogudre kuno, kaachiel gi le duto magthim.  Achuth gi otenga bende nobed kayueyo ewi sirni modong’ kochung’kuno, kendo tula kod agak noywagi e dirise kod dhoudi, bende yien mabeyomane obawgo kor udi nodong’ kong’iengore.
Ji nopenjre niya, "Koro ma edala mane mor, kendo ogeno kuom lochne cha adier? Koso en e dala manesungore e chunye kawacho niya, ‘Anie kende, kendo onge moro maromokoda’? To koro okethore chuth, mi olokore mana kama le mae thim emaodakie, kendo ng’ato ang’ata ma kadho kanyo wuoro, ka tang’o lwete. "ZEFANIA
Richo jo-Israel ong’wonnigi
Mano wach malit manade kuom dala Jerusalem, ma jasand ji, kendomonyorore ma japiem!
Ne ok onyal yie kwer mane ikwerego, kendo ne odagiwinjo puonj.  Bende ne ok oyie kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kata mana sudomachiegni kode ne ok osudo.
Jotende ne chalo gi sibuoche ma ruto e iye,kendo ruodhi mage ne chalo gi ondiegi mawuotho gotieno, ma ok we piny runi gimoro ka pok gitieko,
Jonabi mage ne joyiem, kendo ne ok gin jonabimadiera, bende jodolo mage ne ok dew gik mowal ni Nyasaye, kendo negiketho chik.
To Ruoth Nyasaye man Jerusalem timo mana gik makare.  Okotim gimoro marach to ong’ado bura gi adiera okinyi kokinyi mak olewongang’.  Jaricho to wiye ok kuodi.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama: "Aseyweyo ogendini ka yuech, kendo ohingni magigeng’orego okethore chuth.  Asemiyo wang’yoregi olokore thim ma ongeng’ama luwo.  Miechgi bende okethore, kendo odong’ nono ma onge jomaodakie.
Ne aparo ni jo-Jerusalem diwinj chikna, omiyo ne awachoniginiya, ‘Luorauru, kendo winjuru puonjna. ’ To kata kamano ne giketochunygi mana kuom timo timbegi mamono.
"Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye, awachonu niya, ‘Ritauru! Adier, rituruchieng’ ma abiro chung’ie ka ayalou, nimar asechano choko ogendini koddhoudi kanyakla, mondo aol kuomgi mirimba duto maliet ka mach, kendomabiro wang’o piny duto ma tiek pep.
Bang’e anapwodh dho ji mondo anRuoth Nyasaye ema gilama, ka gitiyona gi chuny achiel.
Joga malamakendo moke loka aora mag Ethiopia, nobi kakelona mich.
Chieng’no, inJerusalem ok niyud wichkuot kuom timbeni mamono mane ipiemgo koda, nimare kindeno anagol jogi ma josunga kendo ma jong’ayi, mi ok nichak isungrikendo e goda maler.
To joma nawe nobed joma odhier kendomathagore.
Fweny
.
. Jo-Israel modong’ noyud kar resruok e nyingRuoth Nyasaye.  Ok ginichak gitim timbe mamono, kendo weche mag miriambomiwuondogo ji ok nowuog e dhogi, nimar ginichal gi rombe machiemo kendonindo piny, ma onge ng’ama bwogo. ’ "
Un jo-Sayun, koguru gi mor! A jo-Israel, gouru mahu matek! Ee, bedurumamor gi chunyu duto, yaye, jo-Jerusalem,
nimar Ruoth Nyasayeoseriembo wasiku, motero kuma bor.  Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ruodh Israel niekindu, omiyo ok unuchak uluor masira.
Wach ma nobi ni Jerusalem chieng’no e ma: A jo-Sayun, kik ubed maluor,kendo kik uwe lwetu nyosre.
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nie kindu, mondooritu maber mana ka jalweny.  Obiro bedo mamor nikech un, mi ochak onyisuherane, kower gi mor nikech un, mana kaka ne otimo chon.
Ruoth Nyasayewacho niya, "Abiro golo masiche oko kuomu, mi ok ginimiu wichkuotkendo.
Winjuru! Ka kindeno ochopo, to anakum joma thirou.  Anakonyrang’onde, kendo anachok joma oke, mi alok wichkuot mane joga nigo obedpak gi huma e piny ngima.
Ka kinde ochopo monego achokue, to anakeludala.  Anamiu pak kod huma e kind ogendini duto mae piny, ka adwokonugueth mane un-go chon, mana kuneno.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "HAGAI
Ojiw jo-Israel mondo ochak oger Hekalu
Ezra
.
—
.
;
.
. Chieng’ mokwongo mar due mar auchiel e higa marariyo mar loch Darius, Ruoth Nyasaye nokelo ni janabi Hagai wach mondoonyis Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel, ma jatend piny Juda, gi Joshua wuodJehozadak, jadolo maduong’ niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutowacho kama: Ogandani wacho ni kinde pok ochopo mar chako gero Hekalumara. "
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nochako ooro wach ni Hagai janabi mondo openjjo-Israel niya,
"Bende ma en kinde maber adier monego un uwegi udag eutu mugero mabeyo, ka Hekalunani to omukore kama?
Mano emomiyo koro anRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho ni, nonuru timbeu!
Usechuoyomathoth, to ukayo matin, bende uchiemo to ok uyieng’.  Umetho to ok romu,kendo urwakoru to koyo pod chamou achama.  Jatich tiyo kendo chamo msara,to oketo pesane mana e mifuko motuch.
"Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho kama: Nonurutimbeu!
Dhiyouru e gode mondo ukel yien ugergo Hekalu ma amorgo, kendokama duong’na maler nyalo nenoree.
Ugeno yudo gik mathoth, to uyudomana manok.  Ka ukelo cham dala, to akudhogi kucha.  An Ruoth Nyasayeapenjo ni, ‘Uparo ni atimo kamano nikech ang’o?’ To adwokou kama: ‘Atimokamano nikech Hekaluna odong’ gunda, ka un to, ng’ato ka ng’ato nigi odeowuon motimoe gige.
Mano emomiyo polo otwo, ma koth ok chuenu, kendopiny otho ma ok nyag gimoro.
Asehono oro mondo otwo piny kaachiel gigode, mi cham gi mzabibu kod zeituni, gi gik moko duto ma piny nyago,ner, mondo kech omak dhano gi jamni kendo oketh tije duto ma dhanooloso. ’ "
Zerubabel wuod Sheatiel, gi Joshua wuod Jehozadak jadolo maduong’,kaachiel gi ji moko duto mane oa e tuech nowinjo weche Ruoth Nyasaye,kaachiel gi weche mane Hagai owacho kane Ruoth Nyasachgi oore, mi luoromaduong’ nomakogi e nyim Ruoth Nyasachgi.
Kuom mano, Hagai jaote maneRuoth Nyasaye ooro, nonyiso ji weche mane Nyasaye omiye, kowacho niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni en kodu. "
Bang’ mano Ruoth Nyasaye nojiwochuny Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel ma jatend piny Juda, gi chuny Joshua wuodJehozadak, jadolo maduong’, kod chuny ji mamoko mane oa e tuech,
mi negibiro mi gichako gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto maNyasachgi, due piero ariyo gang’wen, due mar auchiel. HAGAI
Duong’ maler ma Hekalu manyien nobedgo
Due piero ariyo gachiel, due mar abiriyo e higa mar ariyo mar lochruoth Darius, weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho gi dho janabi Hagai emagi:
"Penj Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel ma jatend Juda gi Joshua wuodJehozada, jadolo maduong, kod joma moko duto niya,
Ezra
.
. ‘Bendenitie ng’ato modong’ kuomu duto mane oneno Hekaluni kapod nigi duong’nemachon? Ka kamano, to tinde onene kochal nadi? Donge ochalnu ka gimaonge?’
Bang’e nyis Zerubabel gi Joshua wuod Jehozadak jadolo maduong’kod ji moko duto mondo ojiwre obed motegno.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho ni, "Chakuru achaka tich,nikech an kodu,
Wuok
.
,
. kendo Roho mara ni kuomu.  Kik ubedmaluor,
Hib
.
. nikech awacho kama: Gimoro achiel kende ema odong’;en ni abiro yiengo polo gi piny kod nam.
Bende anayieng ogendini duto,mi mwandugi duto nobi ka, mi anapong’ Hekalu gi duong’ maler.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.
An e wuon fedha, kendo an e wuondhahabu.
Duong’ ma Hekaluni biro bedogo achien nolo duong’ mane en gomokwongo, kendo anakel kue gi gueth ka.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto awacho kamano. "Okwer ji kuom weyo Nyasaye
Due piero ariyo gang’wen, due mar ochiko, e higa mar ariyo mar lochDarius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane obiro gi dho janabi Hagai e ma:
RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho kama "Nyis jodolo mondo odwok wachma apenjogini.
‘Ka nga’to oting’o ring’o mowal ni tich Nyasaye e riaklawe, mi riak laweno ogere e makati, kata e kado, kata e divai, kata emo, kata e chiemo moro amora, to gima ogere kuomeno bende didok mowal nitich Nyasaye koso?’ " Eka Hagai nopenjoo jodolo wachno, mi gidwoke ni,"Ooyo. "
Kwan
.
-
. Hagai nodhi nyime kapenjogi niya, "To ka ng’atoomuloo ringre ng’at motho, mi koro odoko mogak, bang’e ogere kuomgimoro, koro gino bende didok mogak koso?" Jodolo nodwoke niya, "Dodokmogak. "
Eka Hagai nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama: Mano e kakajo-Israel, kod gik moko duto ma gitimo, chalo.  Mano emomiyo gik mokoduto ma gichiwona e Hekaluni ogak.
To paruru ane gima biro timorechakre kawuono.  Kane pok uchako gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye kendo, toere kaka ne uchalo?
Donge kane ng’ato obiro kama ochokie cham, kaoparo ni obiro yudo gunde piero ariyo, to ne oyudo mana apar kende?
Neasektho chambu duto gi dera marach kod pe, to kata kamano ne ok uduogoira.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
"Paruru, chakre kawuono, due piero ariyo gang’wen due mar ochiko, maen odiechieng’ moketie mise mar Hekalu mara.
Adier, chakre kawuonoparuru matut mondo une ane ka pod cham dibed matin, kata kapod mzabibugi komamanga kod zeituni ok dinyag olemo.  Ooyo, ok nobed kamano, nikechchakre kawuono abiro guedhou. "Nyasaye osingore ni Zerubabel
Chieng’ due piero ariyo gang’wenno, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nochako obironi Hagai niya,
"Nyis Zerubabel jatend Juda ni abiro yiengo polo gipinyu.
Analok loch ruodhi, mi aketh teko mag pinje mamoko, kendo anagogeche mag lweny piny, kaachiel gi joithgi.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato noked giwadgi, mi farese kod joma idhogi nonegi.
To chieng’no anakawi, injatichna Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel kendo anami ibed ruodh jogo, nikech inema aseyieri.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "ZEKARIA
Oluong jo-Israel mondo oduog ir Ruoth Nyasaye

;
.
. E due mar aboro, higa mar ariyo mar loch ruothDarius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni janabi Zekaria, wuod Berekia mawuod Iddo, kawacho niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho ahinya gikwereu.
Emomiyo wach ni ji ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoowacho kama: Duoguru ira mondo an bende aduog iru.
Kik ubed machal gikwereu mane jonabi machon ywaknigi kwacho ni, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto wacho niya, "Weuru yoreu maricho kod timbeu mamono mondo uduogira. " ’ To ne ok gichiko itgi kata dewo wechena ne ok gidewo.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.
Ang’eyo ni unyalo penja ni kwereu ni kanye,kata ni jonabigo pod ngima?
To donge wechena gi chikena mane amiyojotichna ma jonabi mondo osiemgo kwereu ne otimore, mi masira omakogi?Koso donge ne gilokore mi giweyo timbegi maricho, ka giwacho niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osetimonwa kaka nochano.  Adier,osetimonwa mana maromre gi timbewa. ’ "Zekaria janabi oneno farese e fweny
Due piero ariyo gang’wen, due mar apar gachiel miluongo ni Shebat, ehiga mar ariyo mar loch Darius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Zekariajanabi, wuod Berekia ma wuod Iddo mi nowacho kama:
Fweny
.
; Fweny
.
. Nende aneno fweny gotieno ni ng’ato oidho faras masilwal, kochung’ ekind yien e holo moro.  To kadieng’eye ne nitie farese ma silwende gimarabuore kod marachere.
Kane anenogi kamano, ne apenjo malaika moromane oyudo wuoyo koda niya, "Jaduong’, magi ang’o?" Ne odwoka ni, "Abironyisi tiendgi. "
Eka ng’at mane ochung’ e kind yienno nowacho niya,"Mago e joma Ruoth Nyasaye oseoro mondo owuothi e piny ngima koni gikoni. "
Bang’e jogo nodwoko malaika mane ochung’ e kind yien niya,"Wasewuotho e piny ngima koni gi koni, mi wanwang’o ni okue kendooboch. "
Eka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "A Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto, nyaka karang’o ma ibiro betie ka ok idewoJerusalem kaachiel gi mier mag Juda, ma isebedo kikechogo kuom hignipiero abiriyogi?"
Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko malaika mane osebedo kawuoyokoda, kohoyo chunye gi weche mabeyo.
Kuom mano, malaikano nowachonaniya, "Dhiyo inyis ji ni weche Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto emagi: ‘Hera maduong’ ma aherogo Jerusalem gi Sayun miya mirima.
Akechoahinya gi ogendini ma neno maber, nikech kane pok mirima omaka ahinya gijoga to ne gisandogi moloyo kaka owinjore.
Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasayeawacho kama: Aseduogo Jerusalem gi ng’wono mondo akeche.  Omiyo kanyo emaibiro chako igeroe oda, kaachiel gi udi mamoko duto. ’ "
To bende malaikano nowachona ni mondo anyis ji ni, Ruoth Nyasaye wachokama: "Miecha duto biro pong’ gi gik moko mabeyo, mi anachak aho Sayun,kendo anatim Jerusalem dala ma ayiero. "Zakaria janabi oneno tunge gi jotheth e fweny
Ne ating’o wang’a mi aneno tunge ang’wen.
Eka ne apenjo malaika manewuoyo koda ni, "Magi to ang’o?" Ne odwoka ni "Gin ruodhi mosekeyojo-Juda gi jo-Israel kod jo-Jerusalem. "
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisajotheth ang’wen,
mi apenjo gima gibiro timo.  Ne odwoka niya, "Gisebiromondo gibwog kendo gilo tunge ang’wen-go.  Tungego gin ruodhi mane okeyojo-Juda, ma onge kata ng’at achiel mane nyalo ting’o wiye. "ZEKARIA
Zekaria janabi oneno ng’ato man gi tond pimo e fweny
Ne ating’o wang’a mi aneno ng’ato koting’o tond pimo e lwete.
Neapenje kuma odhiye, mi odwoka ni odhi pimo Jerusalem, mondo one ane kakaborne gi lachne onego obedi.
Kane malaika mane awuoyogo owuok dhi,malaika machielo nothinyore kabiro romone, mowachone niya,
"Ring idhiiwachne wuowi man gi rapimno ni Jerusalem biro bedo dala maonge giohinga, nikech ji mabiro dakie kaachiel gi jamni nobed mang’enymohinge.
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni obiro bedone ohinga mar mach molwore,kendo obiro bedone duong’ maler e diere. "Oluong joma ne oter e tuech
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ne akeyou e tunge ang’wen mag piny, to koroauru, uring ua e piny ma yo nyandwat.
Adier, ringuru, un jo-Sayun modakBabulon. "
Ruoth Nyuasaye Manyalo Gik Mooko Duto oherou malich ahinya,ma ka ng’ato mulou, to ng’atno soko mana wang’a owuon.  Emomiyo RuothNyasaye mane oora gi ote maduong’ ir ogendini ma noyakou owachokama:
"Abiro goyogi, mi uyakgi, un joma ne tiyonigi. " Kamano unung’e niRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema ne oora.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama: "Un jo-Sayun, koguru matek, kendo bedurumamor, nikech abiro mondo adag e kindu. "
Chieng’no ogendini mang’eny nobi ir Ruoth Nyasaye mi bed joge kendoenodag e kindu
Eka unung’e ni kara Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoema ne oora iru.  Ruoth Nyasaye biro chako kawo piny Juda kendo ka mareowuon e piny maler mi ochak otim Jerusalem dala moyiero.
Ji duto mondooling’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar osechiew, moa kar dakne maler. ZEKARIA
Fweny mane Zekaria janabi oneno kuom Joshua, jadolo maduong
Ezra
.
; Fweny
.
. Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa Joshua, jadolomaduong’, kochuny e nyim malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ne aneno Satanbende kochung’ bad Joshua korachwich, mondo odonjne.
Juda
.
. Ekamalaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Satan niya, "Yaye Satan, RuothNyasaye mondo okweri! Adier, Ruoth Nyasaye moseyiero Jerusalem obed mareowuon, mondo okweri! Ng’atni donge chalo gi yien moyudhi kaliel emach?"
Noyudo ka Joshua ochung’ e nyim malaikano korwakore gi lewnimochido.
Malaikano nowacho ni joma ochung’ e nyime niya, "Lonyneurulewni mochidogo oko. " Eka nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Neye kaka asegolorichoni oko kuomi! Koro abiro rwaki gi lewni mabeyo. "
Nomedo wachoniya, "Sidhneuru kilemba e wiye".  Omiyo ne gisidhone kilemba maler,kendo girwakone lewni maler, ka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye ochung’ kanyo.
Bang’e malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Josha gi teko niya.
"RuothNyasaye owacho kama: Ka iwuotho e yorena, kendo imako chiknani, toinibed gi loch e Hekalu mara, kendo inirit alwora mar Hekalu, bendeanamiyi thuolo mar donjo e nyima kaachiel gi joma tiyonagi.

.
;
.
; Zek
.
. Koro yaye Joshua jadolo maduong’, in kaachiel gi jowadumobet e nyima ka, chikuru itu.  Un duto un ranyisi maber mar gik mabiro. Abiro kelo jatichna miluongo ni Badyath.
Aseketo kidi man gi betheabiriyo e nyim Joshua, kendo an awuon abiro ndiko kuome weche mawachoniya, ‘Abiro tieko richo mag pinyni e odiechieng’ achiel.
Mika
.
. Chakre chieng’no un duto unudag e miechu gi kue, ka ng’ato ka ng’atoluongo wadgi mondo odhi olime.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik moko Dutoema awacho kamano. ’ "ZEKARIA
Rachung taya kod yiend zeituni
Bang’e malaika mane osebedo ka wuoyo koda nodwogo mochiewa, mana kang’ama ochiew e nindo.
Ne openja niya, "Ineno ang’o?" An to ne adwokeniya, "Aneno rachung taya mar dhahabu man gi tawo e wiye.  Rachung tayanooting’o teyni abiriyo, kendo taya ka taya nigi kuonde abiriyo mirwakoekitambi.
Fweny
.
. Bende aneno yiend zeituni ariyo e bathe, ma moronie dir tawo korachwich, to machielo nie dire koracham. "
Bang’e napenjomalaika mane wuoyo koda niya, "Jaduong’, magi to ang’o?"
Malaikanodwoka kapenja ni, "Ikia gigi adier?" To ne adwoke ni, "Ooyo jaduong’,ok ang’eyogi. "
Eka nowachona niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni Zerubabelkama: ‘Gik moko matimore ok timre kuom teko kata kuom nyalo, to gitimorekuom Roho mara.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awachokamano. ’
Kata da bed ni thagruok mochomo Zerubabel dongo ka gode, toginipie ka pewe.  En ema obiro keto kidi matieko gero Hekalu, ka ji kokniya, ‘Mano kaka Hekalu ber! Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oguedhe. ’ "
To bende wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirona niya,
"Kaka Zerubabel ema oseketomise mar Hekalu, e kaka en bende ema obiro tieke.  Kamano unung’e niRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema ne oora iru.
Ezra
.
. Fweny
.
. Adier, kawuono wachako tijni mana marachrach, to en ng’a ma dihedhrechaye, nikech ji nobed mabor koneno Zerubabel koting’o rapim migedogo elwete. "Olok tiend fweny mar rachung taya
Fweny
.
. Malaikano nowachona niya, "Teyni abiriyogo gin wenge magRuoth Nyasaye marango piny ngima. "
Bang’e ne apenjo malaikano niya,"Yiend zeituni ariyo manie bath rachung taya koni gi konigi, nyisoang’o?"
Ne odwoka kopenja niya, "Donge ing’eyo tiend gigo?" An to neadwoke ni, "Ooyo, jaduong’. "
Bang’e nowachona niya, "Mago gin ji ariyomowal ni tij Ruodh piny ngima. "ZEKARIA
Kalatas mahuyo e kor yamo
Ne ating’o wang’a, mi aneno kalatas moban kahuyo e kor yamo.
Ekamalaika cha nopenja niya, "Ineno ang’o?" Ne adwoke ni "Aneno kalatasmoban kahuyo.  Borne oromo mita apar, to lachne mita abich. "
Bang’enowachona niya, "Mano en kuong’ ma lak e piny ngima.  Weche mondik e bathkalatasno konchiel biro tieko jokuo duto, kendo weche mondik e bathekomachielo notiek ji duto ma kuong’ore gi miriambo.
Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho ni, ‘Anaor kuong’no e ut jokuo duto, kende eod ng’ato ang’ata makuong’ore gi miriambo e nyinga.  Kuong’no nosik eudigo, mi tiekgi pep, koda ka yien gi kite mogergigo. ’ "Dhako manie atonga
Malaika mane wuoyo koda cha ne oduogo ira mowachona niya, "Ting’ wang’imondo ineye gima birono kaka chalo. "
Ne apenje ni en ang’o, mi odwokani en atonga ma opong’ gi richo duto motim e piny ngima.
Eka raum mapekmolos gi chuma mane oumgo atongano noelore, mi apo ka aneno dhako mobetpiny.
Malaika nowachona niya, "Dhakono e richo. " Eka ne odhiro dhakono,modwoko ei atonga, mi ochako oumo dhoge gi raum mapekno.
Bang’ mano ne aneno mon ariyo mahuyo e kor yamo, ka biro irwa gi buombemachalo buombe ogungo.  Ne gikawo atonga, mi gidhigo e kor polomalo.
Eka ne apenjo malaika mane wuoyo koda cha kuma giteroeatongano.
Nodwoka niya, "Gitere e piny Babulon mondo ogerne ot kuno,kendo ka oseger odno, to norenj atongano kare molosne kanyo. "ZEKARIA
One geche ang’wen mag lweny e fweny
Ne achako ating’o wang’a, mi aneno geche lweny ang’wen ka wuok e kindgode ariyo.  To godego ne mag mula.
Fweny
.
; Fweny
.
. Gari mokwongone nigi farese ma silwende, to mar ariyo ne nigi maratenge.
Fweny
.
. Mar adek to ne nigi farese marachere, kendo mar ang’wen ne nigimarang’eye.
Ne apenjo malaika mane oyudo wuoyo koda cha niya,"Jaduong’, magi to ang’o?"
Fweny
.
. Eka nodwoka ni, "Magi gin yembeang’wen mag polo mowuok e nyim Ruodh piny ngima, kuma gisebedoe kagitiyoe. "
Gari man gi farese maratengeno dhiyo e piny ma yo nyandwat,to mano man gi farese marachere dhiyo e piny ma yo imbo man iye mogik,kendo mano man gi farese marang’eye dhiyo e piny Babulon man yo milambo. To kane farese marang’eye wuok,
ne gigombo dhi wuotho e piny duto. Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nowachonigi niya, "Dhiuru uwuoth e piny koni gikoni. " Mi ne gitimo kamano.
Eka ne oluonga monyisa niya, "Winji! Magomadhi yo nyandwatgo osemiyo chunya olendo gi piny ma nyandwatno. "Osidh ni Joshua osimbo mar rapar
Bang’e wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirona niya,
"Kaw fedha gi dhahabu kuomjoma ne omak moter e tuech, ma nyinggi Heldai gi Tobia kod Jedaya, majoseduogo koa Babulon, mondo idhiyo e od Josia wuod Zefania mana chieng’mikawogieno.
Kaw fedha gi dhahabugo mondo ilosgo osimbo, isidh ewiJoshua wuod Jehozadak jadolo maduong’,
Jer
.
;
.
; Zek
.
. kiwachone niya, ‘Weche ma Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owachoe magi: Jali e ng’at miluongo ni Badyath.  Obiro dhi nyime maber, kodongopiyopiyo kama entie, kendo obiro gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Adier,en ema obiro gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Bende en ema obiro bedoruoth, kobet e kom duong’, kotiyo piny, ka jodolo konye, kendo kue nobede kindgi ji ariyogo. ’
To Heldai gi Tobia gi Jedaya kod Josia wuodZefania ema nobed karito osimbo kaka rapar e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye. "
Ji moa kuonde maboyo nobi mondo okony tich gero Hekalu mar RuothNyasaye.  Kamano unung’e ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto emaoseora iru.  To mano notimre mana ka uyie winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu. ZEKARIA
Okwer riyo kech ma ok adier
Chieng’ due ang’wen, due mar ochiko e higa mar ang’wen mar loch ruothDarius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Zekaria.
Noyudo ka jo-Bethel ooroSherezer kod Regemelek kaachiel gi ji mamoko mondo okwa gueth kuom RuothNyasaye.
Ne oorogi mondo gipenj jodolo manie Od Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kod jonabi niya, "Wasebedo kwaywak kendo watweyo chiemo edue mar abich, kuom higni mang’enygi, to pod onego wamed timo kamanokoso?"
Eka ne wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto obironakama:
"Nyis ane ji duto kod jodolo niya, ‘Bende ne umiya duong’ adier,kuom riyo kech mane uriyogo e due mar abich gi mar abiriyo, kuom hignipiero abiriyogo?
Koso kane uchiemo kendo umetho, to donge ne utimokamano, mana ni mondo ubedgo mamor un uwegi?’
Donge mano e gima namiyojonabi machon ohulo e kinde mane kue nitie kendo ji opong’o Jerusalem gimier mane olwore koni gi koni, kaachiel gi piny ma yo milambo kod pinypap?"Wich teko ema nomiyo oter ji e tuech
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Zekaria kama:
"An Ruoth Nyasaye ne awachoniya, ‘Ng’aduru bura kare, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato miyo wadgi luor kendotimone ng’wono.
Kik usand nyithi kiye gi mond liete, gi jopinje mamokomodak kuomu, kod joma odhier, bende kik ng’ato chan timo ni wadgi timmoroo mamono. ’
To ne gidagi, mi giloko ng’egi ka gidino itgi, mondo mikik giwinj wachna.
Bende ne gijiwo chunygi mobedo matek ka kidi, migitamore winjo puonj kod weche duto mane Roho mara miyo jonabi machonpuonjogi.  Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nakumogi gimirimba.
Ne awacho niya, ‘Kaka ne gidagi winja ka aluongogi, e kaka neadagi winjogi ka giluonga,
mi ariembogi kakeyogi e kind ogendini ma okging’eyo, ka giweyo pinygi kokethore, ma onge ng’ama luwo. ’ Kamano negimiyo pinygi maberno olokore thim. "ZEKARIA
Okor ni Jerusalem ibiro guedho kendo
Wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nobirona niya,
"Magi e wecheRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto: Hera malich ma aseherogo Sayunosemiyo abedo gi mirima.  Adier, hera maherego osemiya mirimamager.
Koro an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho ni aseduogo Sayun kendo abiro dakJerusalem.  Jerusalem ibiro luongo ni, ‘Dala ma Adiera Nitie’, kendo godRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto noluong ni, ‘Got Maler’.
Bende anRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho ni, Jodongo kod mon moti birochako bet e wang’yore mag Jerusalem kendo, ka moro ka moro sirore giluth nikech hike oniang’ ahinya.
Bende yawuowi gi nyiri nopong’wang’yore mag dala ka tugo.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, awacho kama: Kata kapo ni gimakamano nenore ni joma odong’ e ogandani ka gima ok nyal timore, koro anbende nonenrena kamano?
Winjuru! Abiro reso joga kagolo e pinje ma yowuokchieng’ gi ma yo podho chieng’,
mi adwokgi Jerusalem mondo gidagie. Ginibed joga kendo anabed Nyasachgi, kuom adiera kod tim makare. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho kama: "Beduru gi chir, unjoma ndaloni weche ma jonabi osebedo kawacho, chakre chieng’ mane iketoemise mar Hekalu mara, mondo ochak oger kendo.
To kane pok kindenoochopo, ji kata jamni ne ok ti tich michulo, kendo kane ng’ato owuok dhie tije, to ok ong’ere kata ka doduogi, nikech wasigu ne ng’eny.  Bende neathuwo ng’ato ka ng’ato gi wadgi.
To koro ok abi timo ni joma odong’ eogandani kaka natimo e kinde mokadho.  An Ruoth nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto ema awacho kamano.
Ginichwo kodhi ka gin gi kue, mi mzabibunonyag olembe, kendo lowo nochieg cham.  Koth bende nochuenigi maber,kendo anaguedh joma odong’ kuom jogagi gi gigo duto.
Un jo-Juda kodjo-Israel, usebedo ranyisi malong’o ni ogendini mamoko duto kuom gimatimore ni joma akuong’o, to koro abiro resou, mi ubed ranyisi mar gimatimore ni joma aguedho.  Kuom mano kik ubed maluor, to beduru gi chir. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Kaka ne awacho niabiro tiekou, nikech kwereu nomiya mirima, mi ok aloko parona,
e kakaasechano mondo aguedh Jerusalem kod jo-Juda: omiyo kik ubedmaluor.
Efes
.
. To gik ma onego utim e magi: Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyakawach mana adiera kende ni wadgi, kendo nyaka uyal bura kare, kendo giadiera, mondo kue obedie.
Kik ng’ato chan timo gima mono ni wadgi,kendo kik ukuong’ru gi miriambo, nikech amon gi gik ma kamago duto.  AnRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awacho kamano. "
Wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nobirona niya,
"Kinde magriyo kech e due mar ang’wen gi mar abich gi mar abiriyo kod mar aparbiro lokore sewni mag mor gi ilo ni jo-Juda.  Omiyo beduru gi adiera kodkue. "
Bende magi e weche Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto: "Kindebiro chopo ma ogendini madongo moa e pinje marateke kendo e mier madongonobi Jerusalem.
Joma odak e dala moro nodhi ir joma odak e dalamachielo, mi wachnigi niya, ‘Wadhiuru ir Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto mondo walame, kendo wakwaye mondo oguedhwa. ’
Kamano ogendinimadongo kod ji marateke nobi Jerusalem mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kendo okwaye mondo oguedhgi. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto wacho niya, "E kindego ji apar moa e ogendini mamoko, mawachodhok mopogore opogore, nobi ir ja-Yahudi, mi mak riak lawe, ka wachoneniya, ‘Wadwaro dhi kodi, nimar wasewinjoBura mibiro ng’ado ni ogendini mokiewo gi jo-Juda

. Wach moa kuomRuoth Nyasayee ema:Ruoth Nyasaye osechano kumo piny Hadrak, kod dala mar Damaski.  Piny dutoen mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mana kaka dhout Israel bende mage.
Dala marHamath, mokiewo gi Hadrak bende mare, kaachiel gi mier ma Turo gi Sidon,kata obedo ni joma odak kuondego riek kamano,
Jo-Turom osegero ohingama gigeng’orego, kendo gisedhuro fedha gi dhahabu mana ka lowo.
ToRuoth Nyasaye biro mayogi mwandugi duto, mi wit e nam.  Dala hie to machbiro wang’o, mi rum pep.

kendo ji ma anywola ema nobed kodak Ashdod.  Ruoth Nyasayewacho niya, "Anaketh sunga ma jo-Filistia sungorego,
mi ok ginichakgicham ring’o man gi remo, kata chamo chiemo moko makuero.  Jogi motonynobed joga, mi lokre achiel kuom dhout Juda.  Jo-Ekron bende nolokre jogakaka ne jo-Jebus olokore.
"Anachung’ e pinya ka jarito, mondo ng’ato kik donji kata wuogi, miwasigu ok nochak olo joga nimar aseneno thagruokgi gi wang’a. "Ruodh Sayun mabiro
Math
