; Joh
.
. Un jo-Sayun, beduru mamor!Koguru matek, yaye jo-Jerusalem,nimar ruodhu biro iru, kolocho. Obiro komuol,kendo koidho kanyna. Chutho oidho kanyna matin. Adier, en mana nyathi kanyna.
Zab
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro golo geche mag lweny oa epiny Israel, kendo abiro tieko farese mag lweny man Jerusalem, Bendeatunge mag jolweny biro rumo.  Ruodhno nokel kue ni ogendini duto, kendolochne noyarre, koa e nam man yo imbo nyaka nam man yo wuok chieng’,bende koa e aora Yufrate nyaka tung’ piny koni gi koni. Okor ni nochak oger Sayun kendo
Wuok
.
. "To un, abiro duoko jou motue, ka agolo e bur motwo maongepi, nikech singruok mane utimo koda gi remb misango.
Un joma otue makoro nigi geno, duoguru e dalau mochiel motegno.  Ahulo ni abiro guedhounyadiriyo kuom sand mane osandugo.
Aseloko Juda atung’ kendo asetimoIsrael asere.  Asekawo yawuoti yaye Sayun, mi aloko ligangla ma akedogogi jo-Yunani. "
Ruoth Nyasaye biro thinyore ewi joge malo, kendo obiro chielo aseremage ka mil polo.  Obiro goyo tung’, mi odhi gi ahiti moamilambo.
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema nobed okumbagi miginilo lweny ka ginyono kite mag orujre piny.  Ginigo koko ka joma omer,mi ginineg ji, mi rembgi chuer mana ka remb misango miolo gi tawo etunge mag kendo-mar-misango.
Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi noresjoge chieng’no mana kaka jakwath reso jambe, kendo enoketgi e pinye manaka kite ma nengogi tek miketo e osimbo mar duong mondo omil.
Mano kakagin gi mwandu mogundho kod mor maduong’! Cham gi divai biro miyoyawuotgi gi nyigi bed gi del mabeyo. ZEKARIA
Okor ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro waro joge
Kwauru Ruoth Nyasaye koth e kinde mowinjore, nimar en ema okelo bochepolo morweyo, eka koth chue mi dhano gi le yud chiemo.
Math
.
; Mar
.
. Nyiseche manono wacho weche maonge tiendgi, kende ajuoke nenoranyisi mag miriambo.  Gileko lek ma ok adiera, kendo giwacho wechemawito ji.  Mano emomiyo ji bayo abaya ka rombe, kendo githagore nikechgionge jakwath.
Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Mirima omaka gi jotend joga, omiyo abirokumogi.  To an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro konyo jo-Juda, ma akwano ka jamba, miami gibed marateke ka farese mag lweny.
Bende ginibed motegno ka kitemoriwo kor ot, kendo ka loye migurogo hema.  Ginichal gi atung’ moywamochiek ni lweny, kendo kuomgi ema jotend lweny duto nowuogie.
Ginibedka jolweny marateke ma nyono wasikgi ka chuodho, kendo ginikedi nikechan Ruoth Nyasaye an kodgi, bende ginilo kata mana joidh farese, migikuod wigi.
Abiro miyo jo-Juda bed marateke, kendo abiro miyojo-Israel locho.  Bende anachak aguedhgi, nikech asekechogi, mi ginichalka gima ne ok ajwang’ogi, nikech an Ruoth Nyasachgi, kendo abiro dwokokwayogi.
Jo-Israel nochal gi jolweny marateke, bende ginibed moil kajoma ometho.  Nyithindgi none kamano, mi bed mamor, kendo ginipak RuothNyasaye gi ilo.
"Abiro luongogi gi liyo mondo achokgi, mi ginibed mang’eny mana kaka negin chon.
Kata obedo ni nakeyogi e kind ogendini man maboyo kamano, toginipara, mi gipidh nyithindgi kuondego.  Bang’e giniduogi.
AnagolgiMisri gi Asuria, kakelogi dala, bende anakelgi e piny Gilead gi pinyLebanon, nyaka chop piny pong’ thich.
Ka ging’ado nam Misri, to apakanokue.  Adier, kuonde matut duto mag aora Nael noduon.  Sunga ma jo-Asuriasungorego nodwok piny, kendo loch mar Misri norum.
To an Ruoth Nyasayeema nami jo-Israel teko, mi ginipaka ka gimiyo nyinga duong’.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano. "ZEKARIA
A Lebanon, yaw dhorangeyeni, mondo mach owang’ yiendi mabeyo mag sida!
Ywaguru un yien duto,nimar yiend sida osepodho. Adier, yien madongo osekethi. Un yiend Bashan, ywaguru,nimar bungu ma yien odichie osebeti.
Winjuru kaka jotelo ywak ka chunygi lit,nimar duong’ ma yande gin-go olal nono. Adier, winjuru kaka giywak ka chunygi lit,nimar duong’ ma yande gin-go olal nono. Adier, winjuru kaka giywak ka sibuoche marutonimar bung Jordan ma gidakie osekethi. Jakwath maber gi jakwath marach
Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha nowachona niya, "Bed jakwadh rombe ma ibiroyang’o,
nikech jokwadhgi giwegi ok dewgi.  Joma ng’iewogi bende negogi,to ok yud kum.  Giloko ringgi pesa, kendo giwacho niya, ‘Opak Ruoth,nikech waseyudo mwandu!’ "
Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho niya, "Ok anakech joma odak e pinyni, toabiro keto ng’ato ka ng’ato e lwet jatende kendo e lwet ruodhe, mijotelogo noketh piny, to ok anares ji e lwetgi. "
Kuom mano ne adoko jakwadh rombe miyang’o, ka atiyo ni joohand rombe. Bang’e ne akawo ludhe ariyo, mi achako achiel ni, ‘Ng’wono’, to machielone achako nio, ‘Riwruok’.  Kamano ne abedo jakwadh rombe.
Kane pok due achiel orumo, ne ariembo jokwath adek nikech ne gijoga,kendo gin bende chunygi nosin koda.
Bang’e ne awacho ni rombe niya, "Okabi medo bedo jakwadhu kendo.  Mago kuomu matho, to otho athoya, kendomago madwaro lal, olal alala, to mago modong’, moro ka moro onegwadgi. "
Eka ne akawo ludha miluongo ni Ng’wono, mi aturo, ka anyisogoni singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye otimo gi ogendini duto okethi.
Kamanosingruok ne okethi chieng’no, kendo joohand rombe mane ranga nong’eyo nien wach Ruoth Nyasaye.
Math
.
,
. Math
.
. Ne awachonigi niya,"Ka uyie to miyauru pokna.  To ka ok kamano, to bedgouru. " Kuom mano negichula pokna moromo shekel piero adek mag fedha.
Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Ket pesago kar keno mar Hekalu. "Omiyo ne akawo shekel piero adek mag fedhago, mane giparo ni ema oroma,mi aketo kar keno mar Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Bang’ mano ne aturoluth machielo miluongo ni Riwruok, ka anyisogo ni aketho riwruok maniekind jo-Juda gi jo-Israel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona kendo niya, "Kawgigi, ichak iwuondri ni in jakwath, to bed jakwath manono,
kakaranyisi ni abiro keto jakwath e piny ma ok rang rombe matho, kata okmany molal, kata ok thiedh matuo, bende ma ok kwa mago mangima, to chamomana mago machue, kendo mwodo koda ka orengegi.
Masira ochomo jakwathmanono ma jwang’o rombeno! Ligangla biro lwar e bade kendo e wang’e makorachwich, mi bade tal, kendo wang’e ma korachwich nokethre chuth. "ZEKARIA
Res ma ibiro resogo jo-Israel
Ma en wach Ruoth Nyasaye kuom Israel: Ruoth Nyasaye mane oyaro polo,kendo oketo mise mar piny, mi omiyo dhano much ngima wacho kama:
"AnamiJerusalem chal gi agwata mar kong’o, ma ogendini mokiewo kode biromadho, mi kwang’ ka joma omer.  Ka ogendinigo goyo ni Jerusalem ageng’a,to miech Juda bende giniluor.
Chieng’no ka ogendini duto mag pinyochokore mondo omonj Jerusalem, to naloke obed mapek ka kidi, ma ongeng’ama nyalo ting’o, kendo ogendini duto motemo ting’e, nohinyre marach.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho niya, chieng’no anago farese duto gi kihondko,mi ami joma idhogi lokre joneko.  Anarit jo-Juda, to farese mag ogendinimamokogo analok muofni,
mi dhout Juda nowach kendgi niya, ‘Joma odakJerusalem yudo teko kuom Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto maNyasachgi. ’
"E kindeno anami dhout Juda bed ka mach manie bungu kata manie puothtiang’.  Ginitiek ogendini duto mokiewo kodgi koni gi koni.  Jo-Jerusalemto nodag gi kue e dalagi.
An Ruoth Nyasaye nakuong miyo dhoudi duto magJuda locho, mondo duong’ mar dhood Daudi kod jo-Jerusalem kik lo duong’ma jo-Juda mamoko nigo.
"Chieng’no an Ruoth Nyasaye nabed okumba ni jo-Jerusalem, mi kata manang’ama yomyomie moloyo kuomgi nobed motegno ka Daudi, kendo joka Daudinobed jotend ji mana kaka Nyasaye kata malaika mare.
Bende anatiekogendini duto mabiro mondo omonj Jerusalem.
Joh
.
; Fweny
.
. Math
.
; Fweny
.
. Anami joka Daudi gi jo-Jerusalem chuny mang’won, kendomohero lemo.  Eka bange giniteg wang’gi kuom jal mane gichwowo, mi otho,kendo giniywage mana ka joma ywago nyathi ma miderma.  Adier, giniywagmalit mana ka joma ywago wuodgi makayo.
"E kindeno ywak nobed malich Jerusalem mana ka ywak mane oywaggoHadad-rimon e paw Megido.
Dhoudi duto ma e piny noywagi kar kendgi, kamondgi bende ywak kar kendgi.  Joka Nathan
gi joka Lawi kod joka Shimeibende noywag kamano ka mondgi bende ywak kar kendgi.
Dhoudi mamokoduto bende noywagi kar kendgi, ka mondgi bende ywak kar kendgi. "ZEKARIA
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Ka ndalogo ochopo, tosoko noyawre ni nyikwa Daudi kod jo-Jerusalem mondo opwodhgo richogi gitimbegi makuero.
E kindeno, anaruch nying nyiseche manono e piny, mi oknochak opargi kendo.  Bende anatiek jokor wach kod chuny magombo timotimbe makuero.
Bang’ mano, ka ng’ato pod nodhi adhiya nyime gi korowach, to wuon gi min nowachne niya, ‘Ok inichak ibed mangima kendo,nimar isewacho miriambo e nying Ruoth Nyasaye. ’ Kamano wuon gi minnochwowe gi tong’, mi nege, kokoro wach.
Ndalogo jokor wach duto wiginokuodi gi fweny ma gineno, bende ok ginirwak lewni motimo yier ma jokorwach rwako, mondo giwuondgo ji,
to moro ka moro nowach niya, ‘Ok anjakor wach, to an mana japur, kendo asebedo kayudo chiemba e lowo chakretinna. ’
To ka ng’ato openje ni, ‘Mbelni manie korigi to manade?’ Toenodwok niya, ‘Ne ayudogi e od osiepna. ’ "Ruoth Nyasaye ogolo chik mondo oneg jatend pinye
Math
.
; Mar
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya,"In ligangla,a malo mondo ichadh jakwadha!Ee, chadh ng’at matiyona. Chutho, neg jakwath mondo rombe oke,nimar abiro kumo joga moyomno. "
An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: "Mano biro timore e piny duto, mi ariyokuom adek ibiro negi, to achiel kuom adek nowe ka ngima.
Bang’e anaketachiel kuom adek nogono e mach mondo opwodhgi maler mana kaka ipwodhofedha.  Adier, natemgi mana kaka itemo dhahabu.  Bang’e ginilama, mianadwok kwayogi, an awuon.  Anawachnigi ni gin joga.  Gin to giniwach nian Nyasachgi. "ZEKARIA
Gik mabiro timore ni Jerusalem kod ogendini mamoko
Winjuru! Odiechieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye sudo machiegni, ma mwandu Jerusalemnoyakie, mi pog mana e wang’u kuneno.
Enochok ogendini duto mondo okedgi Jerusalem, kendo dalano nokaw, mi mwandu manie udi noyaki, bende monnomak gi thwon.  Bath dala konchiel noter e tuech, to bathe komachielonowe mana kanyo.
Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowuogi mi ked gi ogendinigo mana kagima okedo e paw lweny.
Chieng’no enochung’ e got Zeituni, ma omanyoregi Jerusalem yo wuok chieng’, kendo godno nobarre mi hoho maduong’,mochakore yo wuok chieng’ nyaka podho chieng’, poge ariyo.  Bath gotkonchiel nodog yo nyandwat to bathe komachielo nodog yomilambo.
Unutony kuluwo hohono, nimar enochwe nyaka dhoranga dala. Adier, unutony kaka jou notony higni mang’eny mokadho, ka giringoyiengni piny mane otimore e ndalo Uzia ruodh Juda.  Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasacha nobi kaachiel gi malaika mage duto.
Chakre chieng’no koyo gi pe ok nobedie.
Otieno bende ok nobedie, topiny nosik mana odiechieng’ lilo, kendo kata ka piny olokore odhiambo toler nosik asika.  Ruoth Nyasaye kende ema ong’eyo ndalo ma gigo birotimoree.
Ezek
.
; Joh
.
; Fweny
.
. Chakre chieng’no, pi maliw nomolkawuok Jerusalem.  Moko nochik Nam Kado, man yo wuok chieng’ to mokonochik Nam Mediterenia, man yo podho chieng’.  Enosik komol e ndalochwiri kendo e ndalo oro mana machalre.
Chakre chieng’no, Ruoth Nyasayenobed ruodh piny ngima, kendo ji duto nolame ka Nyasachgi, mi ng’eye ginyinge achiel ma Ruoth Nyasaye.
Piny duto mokiewo gi Jerusalem nobedmopie ka pap, chakre Geba, kochomo milambo nyaka Rimon.  Jerusalem tonosik koting’ore ating’a kama entie, chakre dhorangach miluongo niDhoranga Benjamin, nyaka dhorangach man yo kama ohinga ogomogo, kendochakre kama oger mabor mar ng’icho mar Hananel nyaka kuonde mibiyoemzabip ruoth.  (Kuma ohinga ogomogo, chon ne nitie dhorangach moro. )
Fweny
.
. Ji nodag Jerusalem gi kue, ka onge ng’ama bwogogi ni ibirokuong’ dalagi mondo okethi.
Ruoth Nyasaye nogo ogendini duto maneokedo gi Jerusalem gi tho marach.  Thono nochal kama: Ringregi notow manaka gichung’ gi tiendgi, kendo wengegi notow mana e wigi, to lewgi bendenotow mana e dhogi.
Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nogogi gi kihondko malich,kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato nomak wadgi mondo ogorego.
Jo-Juda bende nokonyjo-Jerusalem e lweny kendo giniyak mwandu mag ogendini mokiewo kodgi,kaka fedha gi dhahabu kod lewni mogundho.
Bende tho machalo gi manomane ogoyo jogo nogo farese gi nyumbu gi ngamia kod kenje manie kambimag wasigu, mi neg pep.
T. Lawi
.
-
. Bang’ lweny, ji duto motony e ogendini mane omonjoJerusalemgo nobi higa ka higa mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto ka ruodhgi, kendo mondo otim Sap Kiche.
To ka dhoot moro marogendini ma e piny ok odhi Jerusalem mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto ka ruodhgi, to koth ok nochue e pinygi.
Bende kajo-Misri ok odhi mi ochopo e dalano, to giniyud tuo machal gi mano maRuoth Nyasaye biro kelo ni oganda moro amora ma ok odhi mondo otim SapKiche.
Mano e kum ma ibiro kumogo jo-Misri kod ogendini mamoko ma okodhi Jerusalem mondo otim Sap Kiche.
Chakre chieng’no, kata mana okode mag farese nogorie weche mawachoniya, ‘Mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye,’ kendo agulni mitedogo e Hekalu nobedmowal ni tich Ruoth Nyasaye mana ka tewni mitiyogo ekendo-mar-misango.
Agulni duto manie Jerusalem kod Juda nobed mowal nitich Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ji duto matimo misengni nokaw moko mondoochwakie ring misango.  Kamano ka kindeno ochopo, to onge johala moroamora ma nochak oyud e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto. Malaki
Ruoth Nyasaye ohero Jakobo gi nyikwaye
Ma e wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane omiyo Malaki mondo onyis jo-Israel.
RuothNyasaye owacho niya, "Aherou. " To usedwoke kupenje ni, "Ere kakaiherowa?" To Ruoth Nyasaye odwoko ni, "Donge Esau gi Jakobo ne ginowete? Kata kamano ahero Jakobo gi nyikwaye.
Esau gi nyikwaye toasin-go.  Aseketho piny gode mag Esau, mi aloko obedo thim ma ondiegidakie. "
Ka nyikwa Esau ma jo-Edom owacho ni kata obedo ni miechgi osekethikamano, to gibiro gerogi kendo, to Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutodwoko niya, "We mondo gigergi, to abiro kethogi kendo, mi ji noluongjogo ni oganda mar kethruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye okechogo nyaka chieng’.
Ubiro neno gigo gi wang’u ka timore, mi unuwach niya, ‘Kara RuothNyasaye nigi teko kata e pinje mamoko ma ok Israel!’ "Ruoth Nyasaye okwero jodolo
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho ni jodolo niya, "Wuowi nyakami wuon luor, kendo jatich bende nyaka luor ng’at ma otiyone.  To an dakumiya duong’, to an wuonu? Koso dak umiya luor, to an ema utiyona?Usejara, to eka upenja ni, ‘Ere kaka wasejari?’
Usejara kuom chiwochiemo ma chik ok oyiego e kendona mar misango, to eka upenja ni erekaka ok usemiya luor! To usejara kuchayo kendona mar misango.
Uparo nien gima kare ka ukelo chiayo ma muofu kata mong’ol kata matuo mondoutimnago misango? To ka da bed ni uchiwo chiayo ma kamano ni ruodhu,bende da obedo mamor kodu, koso da orwakou?
Koro sani un jodolo, kaponi utemo ni ukwayo Nyasaye mondo okonyu, to ok nowinj kwayou, kendo manoen kethou. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Da obedo maber kang’at achiel kuomu oloro dhorangeye mag laru mar Hekalu, mondo kik umokmach e kendona mar misango kayiem nono.  Ok amor kodu, kendo ok nayiemisengni muchiwona.
Ji manie tung’ piny koni gi koni miyo nyingaduong’.  Giwang’ona ubani mang’ue ng’ar kuonde duto, kendo gichiwonamisengni ma ayiego.  Giduto gimiyo nyinga duong’.
To uchaya, kuparo nikendona mar misango en kama odwanyore, ma unyalo chiwoe chiemo moroamora.
Uwacho niya, ‘Mano kaka waol gi gik makamagi!’ Kendo utwenyonaumu.  To bende uchiwona jamni mokwal kata mong’ol kata matuo mondootimnago misango.  Uparo ni anyalo yie gi chiwo ma kamago?
Okuong’ng’at ma jawuond ma timona misango gi chiayo modwanyore kamano mondoochopgo kuong’ruokne, to oweyo chiache maber e kul.  An e ruodh ruodhi,kendo ogendini duto oluora!"Malaki
Un jodolo, Ruoth Nyasaye ochikou kama:
"Nyaka umi nyinga duong’ kuomgik mutimo.  To ka ok uwinjo wachna, kendo ok utimo kaka awacho, to abirokuong’ou, kendo anakuong’ gik moko duto mabeyo ma uyudo e tich dolo.  Ee,abiro kuong’o gigo nikech udagi rito chikna.
Anang’ad bedeu oko kendoanarwadh owuoch jamni mutimogo misengni e pat wengeu, mi nariembu ua ewang’a.
Eka ubiro ng’eyo ni an ema asemiyou chikni, mondo singruok maneatimo gi nyikwa Lawi osik kogurore motegno.
"Kane atimo kodgi singruokna, ne achikogi ngima kod dak maber,mamiyogi mago duto mondo gimiya luor.  Kamano ne gimiyo nyinga duong’,kendo giluora.
Ne gipuonjo ji mana weche makare, maonge kata wachachiel mar miganga.  Ne gitimo gik makare ma adwaro, kendo ne gikonyo jimang’eny mondo owe timbe maricho.
En tich jodolo mondo opuonj ji wachmar adiera mar Nyasaye, kendo ji onego odhi irgi mondo opuonjre chikNyasaye, nikech gin jootena, An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.
Toun jodolo usebaro, muweyo yo makare.  Puonj maru osemiyo ji mang’enyochwanyore.  Bende un jo-Lawi, useketho singruok mane atimo kodu.
Manoemomiyo an bende asemiyo jo-Israel jarou kendo chayou, nikech ok uluwchikena, to bende ka uponjo ji wachna, to ok utimnigi machalre giduto. "Ruoth Nyasaye okwedo jo-Israel kuom weye
Uwacho niya, "Donge waduto wuonwa en achiel? Donge Nyasaye achiel emane ochueyowa? Ka kamano, to ere gima omiyo waketho singruok mane Nyasayeotimo gi kwerewa, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato ketho singruok motimo gi wadgi?
Jo-Juda oseketho singruok mane gitimo ni Nyasaye, kendo gisetimo gikmaricho e Israel kendo e Jerusalem.  Gisedwanyo Kama Ler mar RuothNyasaye mohero, kendo gisekendo mon malamo nyiseche mamoko.
RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto onego otiek ng’ato ang’ata matimo kamano,kendo ong’ad kare oko chuth kuom oganda joka Jakobo, kendo kuom jomachiwone misengni. "
To bende uywak kendo udengo, ka ulwoko kendo mar misango mar RuothNyasaye gi pi wang’u, nikech Ruoth nyasaye odagi ng’iyo misengnimuchiwone, kata yie kodgi ok oyie.
To eka pod ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomupenjo gimomiyo otimo kamano.  Ruoth Nyasaye dwoko ni mano timore nikechuketho singruok mane utimo gi mon mane ukendo ka pod un yawuowi.  Ne ginmondeu, to useketho singruok mane utimonigi, kata obedo ni ne usingoru enyim Nyasaye ni ok unuwegi.
Donge Nyasaye notimou ringruok achielkendo chuny achiel kodgi? Donge otimo kamano mana ni mondo wabed ginyithindo maluwo Nyasaye adier? Kuom mano, nyaka uritru mondo kik ng’atokuomu keth singruok mane otimo ni dhako mane okendo ka en wuowi.
RuothNyasaye Manyaalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach Israel owacho niya, "Amon giweruok manie kind dhako gi chwore.  Ok berna ka ng’ato timo gima rachkamano ni chiege.  Emomiyo ritreuru mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu kik timgima rach kamano ni chiege. "Chieng’ ng’ado bura chiegni
Wecheu osemiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ool.  To kupenjo ni ere kaka usemiyo ool,to odwokou niya, "Umiyo aol kuwacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye kwano joma richo kajoma beyo, kendo oherogi.  Bende usemiyo aol kupenjo ni, ‘Ere Nyasachwama ng’ado bura kare?’ "Malaki
To Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto dwoko kama: "Abiro oro jaotenaotel, mondo olosna yo.  Bang’e Ruoth mudwaro nobi apoya e Hekalu mare,kendo jaote mudwaro nenono nobi, mi nohul weche mag singruokna.
Tochieng’ mobiroeno, ere ng’ama nosir? Koso chieng’ ma othinyoree, ereng’ama noting’ wiye? Enochal gi mach malenyo mula mondo obed maler,kendo enochal sabun ma luoko maler.
Enobi mondo ong’ad bura mana kang’at malenyo fedha obed maler.  Enopwodh jodolo maler mana kaka ipwodhofedha gi dhahabu.  Bang’e ginitim ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni makare.
EkaRuoth Nyasaye nobed mamor gi misengni ma jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem kelone,kaka ne omor kodgi chon. "
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owachoniya, "Abiro ng’adonu bura, kendo bedo janeno kuomu piyo piyo, ka ayaloajuoke gi joma terore gi joma kuong’ore kayiem gi joma wuondo jotichgi eyor misara, kod joma ok oluora, ma timo marach ni mond liete gi nyithikiye kod jopinje mamoko modak kuomu. "Chudo mar achiel kuom apar
Ruoth Nyasaye omedo wacho niya, "An Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ok alokra. Mano emomiyo un nyikwa Jakobo pok urumo chuth.
Useweyo chikena, mi okurito, mana kaka kwereu noweyo.  To koro ka uduogo ira, to an bende abiroduogo iru.  Ka upenjoru niya, ‘Ang’o ma onego watim mondo wadog ire?
Dhano bende nyalo mayo Nyasaye gire koso?’ To adwokou niya, ‘Umayaadier!’ To ka upenja niya, ere kaka umaya? To adwokou niya, ‘Usemayakuom dagi miya chiwo mar achiel kuom apar kod mag misengni kaka chikdwaro. ’
Omiyo okuong’u uduto, nimar oganda duto osemaya giga.
Keluruachiel kuom apar mag giu duto kar keno mar Hekalu, mondo chiemo obed eoda.  Temieuru timo kamano ane, ka ok nayaw dirise mag polo, kendo amiugik mabeyo mogundho, ma onge kama ikete.
Ok nawe kute keth chambu,kendo yiendu mag mzabibu nonyag olembe mang’eny.
Bang’e ogendini dutonoluongu ni johawi, nikech pinyu nobed kama ber dakie. "Pogruok manie kind joma kare gi joma richo
Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kendo niya, "Usewacho weche mag wich teko kuoma. To eka pod upenja niya, ‘Ang’o marach mwasewacho kuomi?’
Bendeusewacho ni, ‘Tiyo ni Nyasaye onge gi tiende.  Ere tiend timo gima RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho, kata ywagruok e nyime, kwanyise niwayie kethowa?
Waneno ka joma josunga ema nigi mor.  Joma timbegi richodhi maber ahinya, to bende gitemo Nyasaye gi timbegi marichogo, to ongegima timogi. ’ "
Kane joma oluoro Ruoth Nyasaye owinjo wechego, ne giwuoyo e kindgigiwegi, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo wechegi.  Nying joma oluoro RuothNyasaye kendo mamiye duong’ ne ondik e kitabu moro e nyime.
RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Chieng’ ma ang’adoe bura, toginibed joga awuon kendo ginibed mwanduna.  Anabednigi mang’won mana kakawuoro bedo mang’won ni wuode moluore.
Bang’ mano unune pogruok maniekind joma richo, kendo e kind joma tiyona gi joma ok tina. "Malaki
Chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye
Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Winjuru, ndalo biroma josunga gi joma richo duto nowang’ie ka tiang’.  Chieng’no giniwang’adier, kendo onge gima nodong’ kuomgi.
To un joma oluoro nyinga tekonanopilre kuomu ka wang’chieng’ ma kelo ler, mi noresu, kendo ler marenobed gima changou.  Unubed joma ni thuolo kendo mail ka nyiroyemoyawnigi abila.
Chieng’ ma ang’adoe bura, unulo joma timbegi richo,kendo ginichalnu ka buru munyono.
"Paruru puonj mag Musa jatichna gi chike mane amiye e got Horeb, nimondo jo-Israel duto oluw.
"To ka pok chieng’ maduong’ kendo malich mar Ruoth Nyasaye ochopo,abiro oro Elija janabi,
mondo ochak okel winjruok e kind wuone ginyithindo, nono to abiro, mi aketho pinyu chuth!"
